Vāgbhaṭa's Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṁhitā - SARIT transcript
Compilation and editing by
R.P. Das and R.E. Emmerick
Editing and conversion to TEI markup by
Richard Mahoney, Indica et Buddhica
SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts
London
:
2009
 
Financial support by The British Association for South Asian Studies

1. Part 1 :: Sūtrasthānam

[Page 1 ] [Note: [ K edn 1-176 :: V edn & tr. 44-264]

1.1. Chapter 1 :: Athāyuṣkāmīyādhyāyaḥ prathamaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 1-12 :: V edn & tr. 44-81]
AHS1.1.001a/ rāgādi.rogān satatānuṣaktān a.śeṣa.kāya.prasṛtān a.śeṣān |
AHS1.1.001c/ autsukya.mohā.rati.dāñ jaghāna yo '.pūrva.vaidyāya namo 'stu tasmai || 1 ||
AHS1.1.002a/ āyuḥ.kāmayamānena dharmārtha.sukha.sādhanam |
AHS1.1.002c/ āyur.vedopadeśeṣu vidheyaḥ param ādaraḥ || 2 ||
AHS1.1.003a/ brahmā smṛtvāyuṣo vedaṁ prajāpatim ajigrahat |
AHS1.1.003c/ so 'śvinau tau sahasrākṣaṁ so 'tri.putrādikān munīn || 3 ||
AHS1.1.004a/ te 'gniveśādikāṁs te tu pṛthak tantrāṇi tenire |
AHS1.1.004c/ tebhyo 'ti.viprakīrṇebhyaḥ prāyaḥ sāra.taroccayaḥ || 4 ||
AHS1.1.005a/ kriyate 'ṣṭāṅga.hṛdayaṁ nāti.saṅkṣepa.vistaram |
AHS1.1.005c/ kāya.bāla.grahordhvāṅga.śalya.daṁṣṭrā.jarā.vṛṣān || 5 || [Note: AHS1.1.005v/ 1.5bv nāti.saṅkṣipta.vistṛtam]
AHS1.1.006a/ aṣṭāv aṅgāni tasyāhuś cikitsā yeṣu saṁśritā |
AHS1.1.006c/ vāyuḥ pittaṁ kaphaś ceti trayo doṣāḥ samāsataḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.1.007a/ vikṛtā.vikṛtā dehaṁ ghnanti te vartayanti ca |
AHS1.1.007c/ te vyāpino 'pi hṛn.nābhyor adho.madhyordhva.saṁśrayāḥ || 7 || [Note: AHS1.1.007v/ 1.7bv ghnanti te vardhayanti ca]
AHS1.1.008a/ vayo.'ho.rātri.bhuktānāṁ te 'nta.madhyādi.gāḥ kramāt |
AHS1.1.008c/ tair bhaved viṣamas tīkṣṇo mandaś cāgniḥ samaiḥ samaḥ || 8 ||
AHS1.1.009a/ koṣṭhaḥ krūro mṛdur madhyo madhyaḥ syāt taiḥ samair api |
AHS1.1.009c/ śukrārtava.sthair janmādau viṣeṇeva viṣa.krimeḥ || 9 ||
AHS1.1.010a/ taiś ca tisraḥ prakṛtayo hīna.madhyottamāḥ pṛthak |
AHS1.1.010c/ sama.dhātuḥ samastāsu śreṣṭhā nindyā dvi.doṣa.jāḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS1.1.010v/ 1.10cv sama.dhātuḥ samais tāsu]
[Page 2 ]
AHS1.1.011a/ tatra rūkṣo laghuḥ śītaḥ kharaḥ sūkṣmaś calo 'nilaḥ |
AHS1.1.011c/ pittaṁ sa.sneha.tīkṣṇoṣṇaṁ laghu visraṁ saraṁ dravam || 11 ||
AHS1.1.012a/ snigdhaḥ śīto gurur mandaḥ ślakṣṇo mṛtsnaḥ sthiraḥ kaphaḥ |
AHS1.1.012c/ saṁsargaḥ sannipātaś ca tad.dvi.tri.kṣaya.kopataḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.1.013a/ rasāsṛṅ.māṁsa.medo.'sthi.majja.śukrāṇi dhātavaḥ |
AHS1.1.013c/ sapta dūṣyā malā mūtra.śakṛt.svedādayo 'pi ca || 13 ||
AHS1.1.014a/ vṛddhiḥ samānaiḥ sarveṣāṁ viparītair viparyayaḥ |
AHS1.1.014c/ rasāḥ svādv.amla.lavaṇa.tiktoṣaṇa.kaṣāyakāḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.1.015a/ ṣaḍ dravyam āśritās te ca yathā.pūrvaṁ balāvahāḥ |
AHS1.1.015c/ tatrādyā mārutaṁ ghnanti trayas tiktādayaḥ kapham || 15 ||
AHS1.1.016a/ kaṣāya.tikta.madhurāḥ pittam anye tu kurvate |
AHS1.1.016c/ śamanaṁ kopanaṁ svastha.hitaṁ dravyam iti tri.dhā || 16 ||
AHS1.1.017a/ uṣṇa.śīta.guṇotkarṣāt tatra vīryaṁ dvi.dhā smṛtam |
AHS1.1.017c/ tri.dhā vipāko dravyasya svādv.amla.kaṭukātmakaḥ || 17 ||
AHS1.1.018a/ guru.manda.hima.snigdha.ślakṣṇa.sāndra.mṛdu.sthirāḥ |
AHS1.1.018c/ guṇāḥ sa.sūkṣma.viśadā viṁśatiḥ sa.viparyayāḥ || 18 ||
AHS1.1.019a/ kālārtha.karmaṇāṁ yogo hīna.mithyāti.mātrakaḥ |
AHS1.1.019c/ samyag.yogaś ca vijñeyo rogārogyaika.kāraṇam || 19 ||
AHS1.1.020a/ rogas tu doṣa.vaiṣamyaṁ doṣa.sāmyam a.roga.tā |
AHS1.1.020c/ nijāgantu.vibhāgena tatra rogā dvi.dhā smṛtāḥ || 20 ||
[Page 3 ]
AHS1.1.021a/ teṣāṁ kāya.mano.bhedād adhiṣṭhānam api dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.021c/ rajas tamaś ca manaso dvau ca doṣāv udāhṛtau || 21 || [Note: AHS1.1.021v/ 1.21dv 'tra dvau doṣāv udāhṛtau]
AHS1.1.022a/ darśana.sparśana.praśnaiḥ parīkṣeta ca rogiṇam |
AHS1.1.022c/ rogaṁ nidāna.prāg.rūpa.lakṣaṇopaśayāptibhiḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS1.1.022v/ 1.22bv samparīkṣeta rogiṇam 1.22bv parīkṣetātha rogiṇam]
AHS1.1.023a/ bhūmi.deha.prabhedena deśam āhur iha dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.023c/ jāṅgalaṁ vāta.bhūyiṣṭham anūpaṁ tu kapholbaṇam || 23 ||
AHS1.1.024a/ sādhāraṇaṁ sama.malaṁ tri.dhā bhū.deśam ādiśet |
AHS1.1.024c/ kṣaṇādir vyādhy.avasthā ca kālo bheṣaja.yoga.kṛt || 24 ||
AHS1.1.025a/ śodhanaṁ śamanaṁ ceti samāsād auṣadhaṁ dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.025c/ śarīra.jānāṁ doṣāṇāṁ krameṇa paramauṣadham || 25 ||
AHS1.1.026a/ vastir vireko vamanaṁ tathā tailaṁ ghṛtaṁ madhu |
AHS1.1.026c/ dhī.dhairyātmādi.vijñānaṁ mano.doṣauṣadhaṁ param || 26 ||
AHS1.1.027a/ bhiṣag dravyāṇy upasthātā rogī pāda.catuṣṭayam |
AHS1.1.027c/ cikitsitasya nirdiṣṭaṁ praty.ekaṁ tac catur.guṇam || 27 ||
AHS1.1.028a/ dakṣas tīrthātta.śāstrārtho dṛṣṭa.karmā śucir bhiṣak |
AHS1.1.028c/ bahu.kalpaṁ bahu.guṇaṁ sampannaṁ yogyam auṣadham || 28 ||
AHS1.1.029a/ anuraktaḥ śucir dakṣo buddhi.mān paricārakaḥ |
AHS1.1.029c/ āḍhyo rogī bhiṣag.vaśyo jñāpakaḥ sat.tva.vān api || 29 ||
AHS1.1.029+(1)a/ sādhyo '.sādhya iti vyādhir dvi.dhā tau tu punar dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.029+(1)c/ su.sādhyaḥ kṛcchra.sādhyaś ca yāpyo yaś cān.upakramaḥ || 29+(1) ||
[Page 4 ]
AHS1.1.030a/ sarvauṣadha.kṣame dehe yūnaḥ puṁso jitātmanaḥ |
AHS1.1.030c/ a.marma.go 'lpa.hetv.agra.rūpa.rūpo 'n.upadravaḥ || 30 ||
AHS1.1.031a/ a.tulya.dūṣya.deśartu.prakṛtiḥ pāda.sampadi |
AHS1.1.031c/ graheṣv anu.guṇeṣv eka.doṣa.mārgo navaḥ sukhaḥ || 31 ||
AHS1.1.032a/ śastrādi.sādhanaḥ kṛcchraḥ saṅkare ca tato gadaḥ |
AHS1.1.032c/ śeṣa.tvād āyuṣo yāpyaḥ pathyābhyāsād viparyaye || 32 ||
AHS1.1.033a/ an.upakrama eva syāt sthito 'ty.anta.viparyaye |
AHS1.1.033c/ autsukya.mohā.rati.kṛd dṛṣṭa.riṣṭo 'kṣa.nāśanaḥ || 33 ||
AHS1.1.034a/ tyajed ārtaṁ bhiṣag.bhūpair dviṣṭaṁ teṣāṁ dviṣaṁ dviṣam |
AHS1.1.034c/ hīnopakaraṇaṁ vyagram a.vidheyaṁ gatāyuṣam || 34 ||
AHS1.1.035a/ caṇḍaṁ śokāturaṁ bhīruṁ kṛta.ghnaṁ vaidya.māninam |
AHS1.1.035c/ tantrasyāsya paraṁ cāto vakṣyate 'dhyāya.saṅgrahaḥ || 35 ||
AHS1.1.036a/ āyuṣ.kāma.dinartv.īhā.rogān.utpādana.dravāḥ |
AHS1.1.036c/ anna.jñānānna.saṁrakṣā.mātrā.dravya.rasāśrayāḥ || 36 ||
AHS1.1.037a/ doṣādi.jñāna.tad.bheda.tac.cikitsā.dvy.upakramāḥ |
AHS1.1.037c/ śuddhy.ādi.snehana.sveda.rekāsthāpana.nāvanam || 37 ||
AHS1.1.038a/ dhūma.gaṇḍūṣa.dṛk.seka.tṛpti.yantraka.śastrakam |
AHS1.1.038c/ sirā.vidhiḥ śalya.vidhiḥ śastra.kṣārāgni.karmikau || 38 || [Note: AHS1.1.038v/ 1.38cv sirā.vyadhaḥ śalya.vidhiḥ]
AHS1.1.039a/ sūtra.sthānam ime 'dhyāyās triṁśac chārīram ucyate |
AHS1.1.039c/ garbhāvakrānti.tad.vyāpad.aṅga.marma.vibhāgikam || 39 ||
[Page 5 ]
AHS1.1.040a/ vikṛtir dūta.jaṁ ṣaṣṭhaṁ nidānaṁ sārvarogikam |
AHS1.1.040c/ jvarāsṛk.śvāsa.yakṣmādi.madādy.arśo.'tisāriṇām || 40 ||
AHS1.1.041a/ mūtrāghāta.pramehāṇāṁ vidradhy.ādy.udarasya ca |
AHS1.1.041c/ pāṇḍu.kuṣṭhānilārtānāṁ vātāsrasya ca ṣo.ḍaśa || 41 ||
AHS1.1.042a/ cikitsitaṁ jvare rakte kāse śvāse ca yakṣmaṇi |
AHS1.1.042c/ vamau madātyaye 'rśaḥsu viṣi dvau dvau ca mūtrite || 42 ||
AHS1.1.043a/ vidradhau gulma.jaṭhara.pāṇḍu.śopha.visarpiṣu |
AHS1.1.043c/ kuṣṭha.śvitrānila.vyādhi.vātāsreṣu cikitsitam || 43 ||
AHS1.1.044a/ dvā.viṁśatir ime 'dhyāyāḥ kalpa.siddhir ataḥ param |
AHS1.1.044c/ kalpo vamer virekasya tat.siddhir vasti.kalpanā || 44 ||
AHS1.1.045a/ siddhir vasty.āpadāṁ ṣaṣṭho dravya.kalpo 'ta uttaram |
AHS1.1.045c/ bālopacāre tad.vyādhau tad.grahe dvau ca bhūta.ge || 45 ||
AHS1.1.046a/ unmāde 'tha smṛti.bhraṁśe dvau dvau vartmasu sandhiṣu |
AHS1.1.046c/ dṛk.tamo.liṅga.nāśeṣu trayo dvau dvau ca sarva.ge || 46 ||
AHS1.1.047a/ karṇa.nāsā.mukha.śiro.vraṇe bhaṅge bhagandare |
AHS1.1.047c/ granthy.ādau kṣudra.rogeṣu guhya.roge pṛthag dvayam || 47 ||
AHS1.1.048a/ viṣe bhujaṅge kīṭeṣu mūṣakeṣu rasāyane |
AHS1.1.048c/ catvāriṁśo 'n.apatyānām adhyāyo bīja.poṣaṇaḥ || 48 || [Note: AHS1.1.048v/ 1.48dv adhyāyo bīja.poṣaṇe]
AHS1.1.048ū̆/ ity adhyāya.śataṁ viṁśaṁ ṣaḍbhiḥ sthānair udīritam || 48ū̆ ||

1.2. Chapter 2 :: Athadinacaryādhyāyo dvitīyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 12-18 :: V edn & tr. 82-120] [Page 6 ]
AHS1.2.001a/ brāhme muhūrta uttiṣṭhet svastho rakṣārtham āyuṣaḥ |
AHS1.2.001c/ śarīra.cintāṁ nirvartya kṛta.śauca.vidhis tataḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.2.002a/ arka.nyagrodha.khadira.karañja.kakubhādi.jam |
AHS1.2.002c/ prātar bhuktvā ca mṛdv.agraṁ kaṣāya.kaṭu.tiktakam || 2 ||
AHS1.2.003a/ kanīny.agra.sama.sthaulyaṁ praguṇaṁ dvā.daśāṅgulam |
AHS1.2.003c/ bhakṣayed danta.pavanaṁ danta.māṁsāny a.bādhayan || 3 || [Note: AHS1.2.003v/ 2.3cv bhakṣayed danta.dhavanaṁ]
AHS1.2.004a/ nādyād a.jīrṇa.vamathu.śvāsa.kāsa.jvarārditī |
AHS1.2.004c/ tṛṣṇāsya.pāka.hṛn.netra.śiraḥ.karṇāmayī ca tat || 4 ||
AHS1.2.005a/ sauvīram añjanaṁ nityaṁ hitam akṣṇos tato bhajet |
AHS1.2.005c/ cakṣus tejo.mayaṁ tasya viśeṣāc chleṣmato bhayam || 5 || [Note: AHS1.2.005v/ 2.5dv viśeṣāc chleṣmaṇo bhayam]
AHS1.2.005.1+1a/ bhukta.vāṁś ca śiraḥ.snātaḥ śrāntaḥ chardana.nāvanaiḥ |
AHS1.2.005.1+1c/ rātrau jāgaritaś cāpi nāñjyāj jvarita eva ca || 5.1+1 ||
AHS1.2.006a/ yojayet sapta.rātre 'smāt srāvaṇārthaṁ rasāñjanam |
AHS1.2.006c/ tato nāvana.gaṇḍūṣa.dhūma.tāmbūla.bhāg bhavet || 6 || [Note: AHS1.2.006v/ 2.6bv srāvaṇārthe rasāñjanam]
AHS1.2.007a/ tāmbūlaṁ kṣata.pittāsra.rūkṣotkupita.cakṣuṣām |
AHS1.2.007c/ viṣa.mūrchā.madārtānām a.pathyaṁ śoṣiṇām api || 7 ||
AHS1.2.008a/ abhyaṅgam ācaren nityaṁ sa jarā.śrama.vāta.hā |
AHS1.2.008c/ dṛṣṭi.prasāda.puṣṭy.āyuḥ.svapna.su.tvak.tva.dārḍhya.kṛt || 8 ||
AHS1.2.009a/ śiraḥ.śravaṇa.pādeṣu taṁ viśeṣeṇa śīlayet |
AHS1.2.009c/ varjyo 'bhyaṅgaḥ kapha.grasta.kṛta.saṁśuddhy.a.jīrṇibhiḥ || 9 ||
[Page 7 ]
AHS1.2.010a/ lāghavaṁ karma.sāmarthyaṁ dīpto 'gnir medasaḥ kṣayaḥ |
AHS1.2.010c/ vibhakta.ghana.gātra.tvaṁ vyāyāmād upajāyate || 10 ||
AHS1.2.011a/ vāta.pittāmayī bālo vṛddho '.jīrṇo ca taṁ tyajet |
AHS1.2.011c/ ardha.śaktyā niṣevyas tu balibhiḥ snigdha.bhojibhiḥ || 11 ||
AHS1.2.012a/ śīta.kāle vasante ca mandam eva tato 'nya.dā |
AHS1.2.012c/ taṁ kṛtvānu.sukhaṁ dehaṁ mardayec ca samantataḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.2.013a/ tṛṣṇā kṣayaḥ pratamako rakta.pittaṁ śramaḥ klamaḥ |
AHS1.2.013c/ ati.vyāyāmataḥ kāso jvaraś chardiś ca jāyate || 13 ||
AHS1.2.014a/ vyāyāma.jāgarādhva.strī.hāsya.bhāṣyādi.sāhasam |
AHS1.2.014c/ gajaṁ siṁha ivākarṣan bhajann ati vinaśyati || 14 || [Note: AHS1.2.014v/ 2.14dv bhajan yato 'ti naśyati]
AHS1.2.015a/ udvartanaṁ kapha.haraṁ medasaḥ pravilāyanam |
AHS1.2.015c/ sthirī.karaṇam aṅgānāṁ tvak.prasāda.karaṁ param || 15 ||
AHS1.2.016a/ dīpanaṁ vṛṣyam āyuṣyaṁ snānam ūrjā.bala.pradam |
AHS1.2.016c/ kaṇḍū.mala.śrama.sveda.tandrā.tṛḍ.dāha.pāpma.jit || 16 || [Note: AHS1.2.016v/ 2.16bv snānam ojo.bala.pradam]
AHS1.2.017a/ uṣṇāmbunādhaḥ.kāyasya pariṣeko balāvahaḥ |
AHS1.2.017c/ tenaiva tūttamāṅgasya bala.hṛt.keśa.cakṣuṣām || 17 || [Note: AHS1.2.017v/ 2.17cv tenaiva cottamāṅgasya 2.17cv sa eva cottamāṅgasya 2.17cv sa eva tūttamāṅgasya]
AHS1.2.018a/ snānam ardita.netrāsya.karṇa.rogātisāriṣu |
AHS1.2.018c/ ādhmāna.pīnasā.jīrṇa.bhukta.vatsu ca garhitam || 18 ||
AHS1.2.019a/ jīrṇe hitaṁ mitaṁ cādyān na vegān īrayed balāt |
AHS1.2.019c/ na vegito 'nya.kāryaḥ syān nā.jitvā sādhyam āmayam || 19 ||
[Page 8 ]
AHS1.2.020a/ sukhārthāḥ sarva.bhūtānāṁ matāḥ sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥ |
AHS1.2.020c/ sukhaṁ ca na vinā dharmāt tasmād dharma.paro bhavet || 20 ||
AHS1.2.021a/ bhaktyā kalyāṇa.mitrāṇi sevetetara.dūra.gaḥ |
AHS1.2.021c/ hiṁsā.steyān yathā.kāmaṁ paiśunyaṁ paruṣān.ṛte || 21 ||
AHS1.2.022a/ sambhinnālāpaṁ vyāpādam abhidhyāṁ dṛg.viparyayam |
AHS1.2.022c/ pāpaṁ karmeti daśa.dhā kāya.vāṅ.mānasais tyajet || 22 ||
AHS1.2.023a/ a.vṛtti.vyādhi.śokārtān anuvarteta śaktitaḥ |
AHS1.2.023c/ ātma.vat satataṁ paśyed api kīṭa.pipīlikam || 23 ||
AHS1.2.024a/ arcayed deva.go.vipra.vṛddha.vaidya.nṛpātithīn |
AHS1.2.024c/ vi.mukhān nārthinaḥ kuryān nāvamanyeta nākṣipet || 24 ||
AHS1.2.025a/ upakāra.pradhānaḥ syād apakāra.pare 'py arau |
AHS1.2.025c/ sampad.vipatsv eka.manā hetāv īrṣyet phale na tu || 25 ||
AHS1.2.026a/ kāle hitaṁ mitaṁ brūyād a.visaṁvādi peśalam |
AHS1.2.026c/ pūrvābhibhāṣī su.mukhaḥ su.śīlaḥ karuṇā.mṛduḥ || 26 ||
AHS1.2.027a/ naikaḥ sukhī na sarva.tra viśrabdho na ca śaṅkitaḥ |
AHS1.2.027c/ na kañ.cid ātmanaḥ śatruṁ nātmānaṁ kasya.cid ripum || 27 ||
AHS1.2.028a/ prakāśayen nāpamānaṁ na ca niḥ.sneha.tāṁ prabhoḥ |
AHS1.2.028c/ janasyāśayam ālakṣya yo yathā parituṣyati || 28 || [Note: AHS1.2.028v/ 2.28av prakāśayen nāvamānaṁ]
AHS1.2.029a/ taṁ tathaivānuvarteta parārādhana.paṇḍitaḥ |
AHS1.2.029c/ na pīḍayed indriyāṇi na caitāny ati lālayet || 29 ||
[Page 9 ]
AHS1.2.030a/ tri.varga.śūnyaṁ nārambhaṁ bhajet taṁ cā.virodhayan |
AHS1.2.030c/ anuyāyāt prati.padaṁ sarva.dharmeṣu madhyamām || 30 ||
AHS1.2.031a/ nīca.roma.nakha.śmaśrur nir.malāṅghri.malāyanaḥ |
AHS1.2.031c/ snāna.śīlaḥ su.surabhiḥ su.veṣo 'n.ulbaṇojjvalaḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS1.2.031v/ 2.31cv snāna.śīlaḥ sa.surabhiḥ]
AHS1.2.032a/ dhārayet satataṁ ratna.siddha.mantra.mahauṣadhīḥ |
AHS1.2.032c/ sātapa.tra.pada.trāṇo vicared yuga.mātra.dṛk || 32 ||
AHS1.2.033a/ niśi cātyayike kārye daṇḍī maulī sahāya.vān |
AHS1.2.033c/ caitya.pūjya.dhvajā.śasta.cchāyā.bhasma.tuṣā.śucīn || 33 ||
AHS1.2.034a/ nākrāmec charkarā.loṣṭa.bali.snāna.bhuvo na ca |
AHS1.2.034c/ nadīṁ taren na bāhubhyāṁ nāgni.skandham abhivrajet || 34 ||
AHS1.2.035a/ sandigdha.nāvaṁ vṛkṣaṁ ca nārohed duṣṭa.yāna.vat |
AHS1.2.035c/ nā.saṁvṛta.mukhaḥ kuryāt kṣuti.hāsya.vijṛmbhaṇam || 35 || [Note: AHS1.2.035v/ 2.35dv kṣutiṁ hāsyaṁ vijṛmbhaṇam 2.35dv kṣut.hāsyaṁ ca vijṛmbhaṇam]
AHS1.2.036a/ nāsikāṁ na vikuṣṇīyān nā.kasmād vilikhed bhuvam |
AHS1.2.036c/ nāṅgaiś ceṣṭeta vi.guṇaṁ nāsītotkaṭakaś ciram || 36 || [Note: AHS1.2.036v/ 2.36bv nā.kasmād vilikhen mahīm 2.36dv nāsītotkaṭaka.sthitaḥ]
AHS1.2.037a/ deha.vāk.cetasāṁ ceṣṭāḥ prāk śramād vinivartayet |
AHS1.2.037c/ nordhva.jānuś ciraṁ tiṣṭhen naktaṁ seveta na drumam || 37 ||
AHS1.2.038a/ tathā catvara.caityāntaś.catuṣ.patha.surālayān |
AHS1.2.038c/ sūnāṭavī.śūnya.gṛha.śmaśānāni divāpi na || 38 ||
AHS1.2.038+1a/ a.sammārjitam ādarśam an.upaskṛta.kāminīm |
AHS1.2.038+1c/ rajasvalāṁ ca nekṣeta sadā prātar a.maṅgalam || 38+1 ||
[Page 10 ]
AHS1.2.039a/ sarva.thekṣeta nādityaṁ na bhāraṁ śirasā vahet |
AHS1.2.039c/ nekṣeta pratataṁ sūkṣmaṁ dīptā.medhyā.priyāṇi ca || 39 ||
AHS1.2.040a/ madya.vikraya.sandhāna.dānādānāni nācaret |
AHS1.2.040c/ puro.vātātapa.rajas.tuṣāra.paruṣānilān || 40 ||
AHS1.2.041a/ an.ṛjuḥ kṣavathūdgāra.kāsa.svapnānna.maithunam |
AHS1.2.041c/ kūla.cchāyāṁ nṛpa.dviṣṭaṁ vyāla.daṁṣṭri.viṣāṇinaḥ || 41 ||
AHS1.2.042a/ hīnān.āryāti.nipuṇa.sevāṁ vigraham uttamaiḥ |
AHS1.2.042c/ sandhyāsv abhyavahāra.strī.svapnādhyayana.cintanam || 42 ||
AHS1.2.043a/ śatru.sattra.gaṇākīrṇa.gaṇikā.paṇikāśanam |
AHS1.2.043c/ gātra.vaktra.nakhair vādyaṁ hasta.keśāvadhūnanam || 43 ||
AHS1.2.044a/ toyāgni.pūjya.madhyena yānaṁ dhūmaṁ śavāśrayam |
AHS1.2.044c/ madyāti.saktiṁ viśrambha.svātantrye strīṣu ca tyajet || 44 ||
AHS1.2.045a/ ācāryaḥ sarva.ceṣṭāsu loka eva hi dhī.mataḥ |
AHS1.2.045c/ anukuryāt tam evāto laukike 'rthe parīkṣakaḥ || 45 ||
AHS1.2.046a/ ārdra.santāna.tā tyāgaḥ kāya.vāk.cetasāṁ damaḥ |
AHS1.2.046c/ svārtha.buddhiḥ parārtheṣu paryāptam iti sad.vratam || 46 ||
AHS1.2.047a/ naktan.dināni me yānti katham.bhūtasya samprati |
AHS1.2.047c/ duḥkha.bhāṅ na bhavaty evaṁ nityaṁ sannihita.smṛtiḥ || 47 ||
AHS1.2.047+1a/ evaṁ kṛtsna.dinaṁ nītvā rātrau yāme gṛhe gate |
AHS1.2.047+1c/ devān ṛṣīn gurūn smṛtvā tataḥ śayanam ācaret || 47+1 || [Note: AHS1.2.047+1v/ 2.47+1bv rātrer yāme gate sati]
[Page 11 ]
AHS1.2.048a/ ity ācāraḥ samāsena yaṁ prāpnoti samācaran |
AHS1.2.048c/ āyur ārogyam aiśvaryaṁ yaśo lokāṁś ca śāśvatān || 48 ||

1.3. Chapter 3 :: Athaṛtucaryādhyāyas tṛtīyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 18-26 :: V edn & tr. 121-170]
AHS1.3.001a/ māsair dvi.saṅkhyair māghādyaiḥ kramāt ṣaḍ ṛtavaḥ smṛtāḥ |
AHS1.3.001c/ śiśiro 'tha vasantaś ca grīṣmo varṣā.śarad.dhimāḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.3.002a/ śiśirādyās tribhis tais tu vidyād ayanam uttaram |
AHS1.3.002c/ ādānaṁ ca tad ādatte nṛṇāṁ prati.dinaṁ balam || 2 ||
AHS1.3.003a/ tasmin hy aty.artha.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.rūkṣā mārga.sva.bhāvataḥ |
AHS1.3.003c/ āditya.pavanāḥ saumyān kṣapayanti guṇān bhuvaḥ || 3 ||
AHS1.3.004a/ tiktaḥ kaṣāyaḥ kaṭuko balino 'tra rasāḥ kramāt |
AHS1.3.004c/ tasmād ādānam āgneyam ṛtavo dakṣiṇāyanam || 4 ||
AHS1.3.005a/ varṣādayo visargaś ca yad balaṁ visṛjaty ayam |
AHS1.3.005c/ saumya.tvād atra somo hi bala.vān hīyate raviḥ || 5 ||
AHS1.3.006a/ megha.vṛṣṭy.anilaiḥ śītaiḥ śānta.tāpe mahī.tale |
AHS1.3.006c/ snigdhāś cehāmla.lavaṇa.madhurā balino rasāḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.3.007a/ śīte 'gryaṁ vṛṣṭi.gharme 'lpaṁ balaṁ madhyaṁ tu śeṣayoḥ |
AHS1.3.007c/ balinaḥ śīta.saṁrodhād dhemante prabalo 'nalaḥ || 7 ||
AHS1.3.008a/ bhavaty alpendhano dhātūn sa paced vāyuneritaḥ |
AHS1.3.008c/ ato hime 'smin seveta svādv.amla.lavaṇān rasān || 8 ||
AHS1.3.009a/ dairghyān niśānām etarhi prātar eva bubhukṣitaḥ |
AHS1.3.009c/ avaśya.kāryaṁ sambhāvya yathoktaṁ śīlayed anu || 9 ||
[Page 12 ]
AHS1.3.010a/ vāta.ghna.tailair abhyaṅgaṁ mūrdhni tailaṁ vimardanam |
AHS1.3.010c/ niyuddhaṁ kuśalaiḥ sārdhaṁ pādāghātaṁ ca yuktitaḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS1.3.010v/ 3.10bv mūrdha.tailaṁ vimardanam]
AHS1.3.011a/ kaṣāyāpahṛta.snehas tataḥ snāto yathā.vidhi |
AHS1.3.011c/ kuṅkumena sa.darpeṇa pradigdho 'guru.dhūpitaḥ || 11 ||
AHS1.3.012a/ rasān snigdhān palaṁ puṣṭaṁ gauḍam accha.surāṁ surām |
AHS1.3.012c/ godhūma.piṣṭa.māṣekṣu.kṣīrottha.vikṛtīḥ śubhāḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.3.013a/ navam annaṁ vasāṁ tailaṁ śauca.kārye sukhodakam |
AHS1.3.013c/ prāvārājina.kauśeya.praveṇī.kaucavāstṛtam || 13 || [Note: AHS1.3.013v/ 3.13dv .praveṇī.kuthakāstṛtam]
AHS1.3.014a/ uṣṇa.sva.bhāvair laghubhiḥ prāvṛtaḥ śayanaṁ bhajet |
AHS1.3.014c/ yuktyārka.kiraṇān svedaṁ pāda.trāṇaṁ ca sarva.dā || 14 ||
AHS1.3.015a/ pīvaroru.stana.śroṇyaḥ sa.madāḥ pramadāḥ priyāḥ |
AHS1.3.015c/ haranti śītam uṣṇāṅgyo dhūpa.kuṅkuma.yauvanaiḥ || 15 ||
AHS1.3.016a/ aṅgāra.tāpa.santapta.garbha.bhū.veśma.cāriṇaḥ |
AHS1.3.016c/ śīta.pāruṣya.janito na doṣo jātu jāyate || 16 ||
AHS1.3.017a/ ayam eva vidhiḥ kāryaḥ śiśire 'pi viśeṣataḥ |
AHS1.3.017c/ tadā hi śītam adhikaṁ raukṣyaṁ cādāna.kāla.jam || 17 ||
AHS1.3.018a/ kaphaś cito hi śiśire vasante 'rkāṁśu.tāpitaḥ |
AHS1.3.018c/ hatvāgniṁ kurute rogān atas taṁ tvarayā tyajet || 18 ||
AHS1.3.019a/ tīkṣṇair vamana.nasyādyair laghu.rūkṣaiś ca bhojanaiḥ |
AHS1.3.019c/ vyāyāmodvartanāghātair jitvā śleṣmāṇam ulbaṇam || 19 ||
[Page 13 ]
AHS1.3.020a/ snāto 'nuliptaḥ karpūra.candanāguru.kuṅkumaiḥ |
AHS1.3.020c/ purāṇa.yava.godhūma.kṣaudra.jāṅgala.śūlya.bhuk || 20 ||
AHS1.3.021a/ sahakāra.rasonmiśrān āsvādya priyayārpitān |
AHS1.3.021c/ priyāsya.saṅga.surabhīn priyā.netrotpalāṅkitān || 21 ||
AHS1.3.022a/ saumanasya.kṛto hṛdyān vayasyaiḥ sahitaḥ pibet |
AHS1.3.022c/ nirgadān āsavāriṣṭa.sīdhu.mārdvīka.mādhavān || 22 ||
AHS1.3.023a/ śṛṅgaverāmbu sārāmbu madhv.ambu jaladāmbu ca |
AHS1.3.023c/ dakṣiṇānila.śīteṣu parito jala.vāhiṣu || 23 || [Note: AHS1.3.023v/ 3.23bv madhv.ambu jaladāmbu vā]
AHS1.3.024a/ a.dṛṣṭa.naṣṭa.sūryeṣu maṇi.kuṭṭima.kāntiṣu |
AHS1.3.024c/ parapuṣṭa.vighuṣṭeṣu kāma.karmānta.bhūmiṣu || 24 || [Note: AHS1.3.024v/ 3.24av a.dṛṣṭā.naṣṭa.sūryeṣu]
AHS1.3.025a/ vicitra.puṣpa.vṛkṣeṣu kānaneṣu su.gandhiṣu |
AHS1.3.025c/ goṣṭhī.kathābhiś citrābhir madhyāhnaṁ gamayet sukhī || 25 ||
AHS1.3.026a/ guru.śīta.divā.svapna.snigdhāmla.madhurāṁs tyajet |
AHS1.3.026c/ tīkṣṇāṁśur ati.tīkṣṇāṁśur grīṣme saṅkṣipatīva yat || 26 || [Note: AHS1.3.026v/ 3.26cv sneham arko 'ti.tīkṣṇāṁśur]
AHS1.3.027a/ praty.ahaṁ kṣīyate śleṣmā tena vāyuś ca vardhate |
AHS1.3.027c/ ato 'smin paṭu.kaṭv.amla.vyāyāmārka.karāṁs tyajet || 27 ||
AHS1.3.028a/ bhajen madhuram evānnaṁ laghu snigdhaṁ himaṁ dravam |
AHS1.3.028c/ su.śīta.toya.siktāṅgo lihyāt saktūn sa.śarkarān || 28 ||
AHS1.3.029a/ madyaṁ na peyaṁ peyaṁ vā sv.alpaṁ su.bahu.vāri vā |
AHS1.3.029c/ anya.thā śoṣa.śaithilya.dāha.mohān karoti tat || 29 || [Note: AHS1.3.029v/ 3.29cv anya.thā śopha.śaithilya.]
[Page 14 ]
AHS1.3.030a/ kundendu.dhavalaṁ śālim aśnīyāj jāṅgalaiḥ palaiḥ |
AHS1.3.030c/ pibed rasaṁ nāti.ghanaṁ rasālāṁ rāga.khāṇḍavau || 30 || [Note: AHS1.3.030v/ 3.30av kundendu.dhavalāñ chālīn 3.30dv rasālāṁ rāga.khāḍavau 3.30dv rasālāṁ rāga.ṣāḍavau]
AHS1.3.031a/ pānakaṁ pañca.sāraṁ vā nava.mṛd.bhājane sthitam |
AHS1.3.031c/ moca.coca.dalair yuktaṁ sāmlaṁ mṛn.maya.śuktibhiḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS1.3.031v/ 3.31bv nava.mṛd.bhājana.sthitam]
AHS1.3.032a/ pāṭalā.vāsitaṁ cāmbhaḥ sa.karpūraṁ su.śītalam |
AHS1.3.032c/ śaśāṅka.kiraṇān bhakṣyān rajanyāṁ bhakṣayan pibet || 32 ||
AHS1.3.033a/ sa.sitaṁ māhiṣaṁ kṣīraṁ candra.nakṣatra.śītalam |
AHS1.3.033c/ abhraṅ.kaṣa.mahā.śāla.tāla.ruddhoṣṇa.raśmiṣu || 33 ||
AHS1.3.034a/ vaneṣu mādhavī.śliṣṭa.drākṣā.stabaka.śāliṣu |
AHS1.3.034c/ su.gandhi.hima.pānīya.sicyamāna.paṭālike || 34 ||
AHS1.3.035a/ kāyamāne cite cūta.pravāla.phala.lumbibhiḥ |
AHS1.3.035c/ kadalī.dala.kalhāra.mṛṇāla.kamalotpalaiḥ || 35 ||
AHS1.3.036a/ komalaiḥ kalpite talpe hasat.kusuma.pallave |
AHS1.3.036c/ madhyan.dine 'rka.tāpārtaḥ svapyād dhārā.gṛhe 'tha.vā || 36 ||
AHS1.3.037a/ pusta.strī.stana.hastāsya.pravṛttośīra.vāriṇi |
AHS1.3.037c/ niśā.kara.karākīrṇe saudha.pṛṣṭhe niśāsu ca || 37 ||
AHS1.3.038a/ āsanā svastha.cittasya candanārdrasya mālinaḥ |
AHS1.3.038c/ nivṛtta.kāma.tantrasya su.sūkṣma.tanu.vāsasaḥ || 38 ||
AHS1.3.039a/ jalārdrās tāla.vṛntāni vistṛtāḥ padminī.puṭāḥ |
AHS1.3.039c/ utkṣepāś ca mṛdūtkṣepā jala.varṣi.himānilāḥ || 39 ||
[Page 15 ]
AHS1.3.040a/ karpūra.mallikā.mālā hārāḥ sa.hari.candanāḥ |
AHS1.3.040c/ mano.hara.kalālāpāḥ śiśavaḥ sārikāḥ śukāḥ || 40 ||
AHS1.3.041a/ mṛṇāla.valayāḥ kāntāḥ protphulla.kamalojjvalāḥ |
AHS1.3.041c/ jaṅgamā iva padminyo haranti dayitāḥ klamam || 41 ||
AHS1.3.042a/ ādāna.glāna.vapuṣām agniḥ sanno 'pi sīdati |
AHS1.3.042c/ varṣāsu doṣair duṣyanti te 'mbu.lambāmbu.de 'mbare || 42 || [Note: AHS1.3.042v/ 3.42av ādāna.mlāna.vapuṣām]
AHS1.3.043a/ sa.tuṣāreṇa marutā sahasā śītalena ca |
AHS1.3.043c/ bhū.bāṣpeṇāmla.pākena malinena ca vāriṇā || 43 ||
AHS1.3.044a/ vahninaiva ca mandena teṣv ity anyo.'nya.dūṣiṣu |
AHS1.3.044c/ bhajet sādhāraṇaṁ sarvam ūṣmaṇas tejanaṁ ca yat || 44 ||
AHS1.3.045a/ āsthāpanaṁ śuddha.tanur jīrṇaṁ dhānyaṁ rasān kṛtān |
AHS1.3.045c/ jāṅgalaṁ piśitaṁ yūṣān madhv.ariṣṭaṁ ciran.tanam || 45 ||
AHS1.3.046a/ mastu sauvarcalāḍhyaṁ vā pañca.kolāvacūrṇitam |
AHS1.3.046c/ divyaṁ kaupaṁ śṛtaṁ cāmbho bhojanaṁ tv ati.dur.dine || 46 || [Note: AHS1.3.046v/ 3.46av mastu sauvarcalāḍhyaṁ ca]
AHS1.3.047a/ vyaktāmla.lavaṇa.snehaṁ saṁśuṣkaṁ kṣaudra.val laghu |
AHS1.3.047c/ a.pāda.cārī surabhiḥ satataṁ dhūpitāmbaraḥ || 47 ||
AHS1.3.048a/ harmya.pṛṣṭhe vased bāṣpa.śīta.sīkara.varjite |
AHS1.3.048c/ nadī.jaloda.manthāhaḥ.svapnāyāsātapāṁś tyajet || 48 ||
AHS1.3.049a/ varṣā.śītocitāṅgānāṁ sahasaivārka.raśmibhiḥ |
AHS1.3.049c/ taptānāṁ sañcitaṁ vṛṣṭau pittaṁ śaradi kupyati || 49 ||
[Page 16 ]
AHS1.3.050a/ taj.jayāya ghṛtaṁ tiktaṁ vireko rakta.mokṣaṇam |
AHS1.3.050c/ tiktaṁ svādu kaṣāyaṁ ca kṣudhito 'nnaṁ bhajel laghu || 50 ||
AHS1.3.051a/ śāli.mudga.sitā.dhātrī.paṭola.madhu.jāṅgalam |
AHS1.3.051c/ taptaṁ taptāṁśu.kiraṇaiḥ śītaṁ śītāṁśu.raśmibhiḥ || 51 ||
AHS1.3.052a/ samantād apy aho.rātram agastyodaya.nir.viṣam |
AHS1.3.052c/ śuci haṁsodakaṁ nāma nir.malaṁ mala.jij jalam || 52 ||
AHS1.3.053a/ nābhiṣyandi na vā rūkṣaṁ pānādiṣv amṛtopamam |
AHS1.3.053c/ candanośīra.karpūra.muktā.srag.vasanojjvalaḥ || 53 ||
AHS1.3.054a/ saudheṣu saudha.dhavalāṁ candrikāṁ rajanī.mukhe |
AHS1.3.054c/ tuṣāra.kṣāra.sauhitya.dadhi.taila.vasātapān || 54 ||
AHS1.3.055a/ tīkṣṇa.madya.divā.svapna.puro.vātān parityajet |
AHS1.3.055c/ śīte varṣāsu cādyāṁs trīn vasante 'ntyān rasān bhajet || 55 ||
AHS1.3.056a/ svāduṁ nidāghe śaradi svādu.tikta.kaṣāyakān |
AHS1.3.056c/ śarad.vasantayo rūkṣaṁ śītaṁ gharma.ghanāntayoḥ || 56 ||
AHS1.3.057a/ anna.pānaṁ samāsena viparītam ato 'nya.dā |
AHS1.3.057c/ nityaṁ sarva.rasābhyāsaḥ sva.svādhikyam ṛtāv ṛtau || 57 ||
AHS1.3.058a/ ṛtvor antyādi.saptāhāv ṛtu.sandhir iti smṛtaḥ |
AHS1.3.058c/ tatra pūrvo vidhis tyājyaḥ sevanīyo 'paraḥ kramāt || 58 || [Note: AHS1.3.058v/ 3.58av ṛtvor antyādi.saptāhād]
AHS1.3.002/ a.sātmya.jā hi rogāḥ syuḥ sahasā tyāga.śīlanāt || 58ū̆ ||

1.4. Chapter 4 :: Atharogānutpādanīyādhyāyaś caturthaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 26-30 :: V edn & tr. 171-197] [Page 17 ]
AHS1.4.001a/ vegān na dhārayed vāta.viṇ.mūtra.kṣava.tṛṭ.kṣudhām |
AHS1.4.001c/ nidrā.kāsa.śrama.śvāsa.jṛmbhāśru.cchardi.retasām || 1 ||
AHS1.4.002a/ adho.vātasya rodhena gulmodāvarta.ruk.klamāḥ |
AHS1.4.002c/ vāta.mūtra.śakṛt.saṅga.dṛṣṭy.agni.vadha.hṛd.gadāḥ || 2 ||
AHS1.4.002+1a/ sneha.sveda.vidhis tatra vartayo bhojanāni ca |
AHS1.4.002+1c/ pānāni vastayaś caiva śastaṁ vātānulomanam || 2+1 ||
AHS1.4.003a/ śakṛtaḥ piṇḍikodveṣṭa.pratiśyāya.śiro.rujaḥ |
AHS1.4.003c/ ūrdhva.vāyuḥ parīkarto hṛdayasyoparodhanam || 3 || [Note: AHS1.4.003v/ 4.3cv ūrdhvaṁ vāyuḥ parīkarto]
AHS1.4.004a/ mukhena viṭ.pravṛttiś ca pūrvoktāś cāmayāḥ smṛtāḥ |
AHS1.4.004c/ aṅga.bhaṅgāśmarī.vasti.meḍhra.vaṅkṣaṇa.vedanāḥ || 4 ||
AHS1.4.005a/ mūtrasya rodhāt pūrve ca prāyo rogās tad.auṣadham |
AHS1.4.005c/ varty.abhyaṅgāvagāhāś ca svedanaṁ vasti.karma ca || 5 ||
AHS1.4.006a/ anna.pānaṁ ca viḍ.bhedi viḍ.rodhottheṣu yakṣmasu |
AHS1.4.006c/ mūtra.jeṣu tu pāne ca prāg.bhaktaṁ śasyate ghṛtam || 6 || [Note: AHS1.4.006v/ 4.6cv mūtra.jeṣu ca pānaṁ tu 4.6cv mūtra.jeṣu prayuñjīta 4.6dv sarpiṣaś cāvapīḍakam]
AHS1.4.007a/ jīrṇāntikaṁ cottamayā mātrayā yojanā.dvayam |
AHS1.4.007c/ avapīḍakam etac ca sañjñitaṁ dhāraṇāt punaḥ || 7 ||
AHS1.4.008a/ udgārasyā.ruciḥ kampo vibandho hṛdayorasoḥ |
AHS1.4.008c/ ādhmāna.kāsa.hidhmāś ca hidhmā.vat tatra bheṣajam || 8 ||
AHS1.4.009a/ śiro.'rtīndriya.daurbalya.manyā.stambhārditaṁ kṣuteḥ |
AHS1.4.009c/ tīkṣṇa.dhūmāñjanāghrāṇa.nāvanārka.vilokanaiḥ || 9 ||
[Page 18 ]
AHS1.4.010a/ pravartayet kṣutiṁ saktāṁ sneha.svedau ca śīlayet |
AHS1.4.010c/ śoṣāṅga.sāda.bādhirya.sammoha.bhrama.hṛd.gadāḥ || 10 ||
AHS1.4.011a/ tṛṣṇāyā nigrahāt tatra śītaḥ sarvo vidhir hitaḥ |
AHS1.4.011c/ aṅga.bhaṅgā.ruci.glāni.kārśya.śūla.bhramāḥ kṣudhaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS1.4.011v/ 4.11dv .kārśya.śūla.śrama.bhramāḥ]
AHS1.4.012a/ tatra yojyaṁ laghu snigdham uṣṇam alpaṁ ca bhojanam |
AHS1.4.012c/ nidrāyā moha.mūrdhākṣi.gauravālasya.jṛmbhikāḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS1.4.012v/ 4.12av vaivarṇyaṁ ca kṣudhas tatra 4.12bv snigdhoṣṇaṁ laghu bhojanam]
AHS1.4.013a/ aṅga.mardaś ca tatreṣṭaḥ svapnaḥ saṁvāhanāni ca |
AHS1.4.013c/ kāsasya rodhāt tad.vṛddhiḥ śvāsā.ruci.hṛd.āmayāḥ || 13 ||
AHS1.4.014a/ śoṣo hidhmā ca kāryo 'tra kāsa.hā su.tarāṁ vidhiḥ |
AHS1.4.014c/ gulma.hṛd.roga.sammohāḥ śrama.śvāsād vidhāritāt || 14 || [Note: AHS1.4.014v/ 4.14dv śrama.śvāsā.vidhāraṇāt]
AHS1.4.015a/ hitaṁ viśramaṇaṁ tatra vāta.ghnaś ca kriyā.kramaḥ |
AHS1.4.015c/ jṛmbhāyāḥ kṣava.vad rogāḥ sarvaś cānila.jid vidhiḥ || 15 || [Note: AHS1.4.015v/ 4.15cc jṛmbhāyāḥ kṣuti.vad rogāḥ]
AHS1.4.016a/ pīnasākṣi.śiro.hṛd.ruṅ.manyā.stambhā.ruci.bhramāḥ |
AHS1.4.016c/ sa.gulmā bāṣpatas tatra svapno madyaṁ priyāḥ kathāḥ || 16 ||
AHS1.4.017a/ visarpa.koṭha.kuṣṭhākṣi.kaṇḍū.pāṇḍv.āmaya.jvarāḥ |
AHS1.4.017c/ sa.kāsa.śvāsa.hṛl.lāsa.vyaṅga.śvayathavo vameḥ || 17 ||
AHS1.4.018a/ gaṇḍūṣa.dhūmān.āhārā rūkṣaṁ bhuktvā tad.udvamaḥ |
AHS1.4.018c/ vyāyāmaḥ srutir asrasya śastaṁ cātra virecanam || 18 || [Note: AHS1.4.018v/ 4.18av gaṇḍūṣa.dhūmān.āhāraṁ 4.18av gaṇḍūṣa.dhūmān.āhārān 4.18bv rūkṣaṁ bhuktvā tad udvamet 4.18bv rūkṣān bhuktvā tad udvamet]
AHS1.4.019a/ sa.kṣāra.lavaṇaṁ tailam abhyaṅgārthaṁ ca śasyate |
AHS1.4.019c/ śukrāt tat.sravaṇaṁ guhya.vedanā.śvayathu.jvarāḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS1.4.019v/ 4.19bv abhyaṅgārthe ca śasyate]
[Page 19 ]
AHS1.4.020a/ hṛd.vyathā.mūtra.saṅgāṅga.bhaṅga.vṛddhy.aśma.ṣaṇḍha.tāḥ |
AHS1.4.020c/ tāmra.cūḍa.surā.śāli.vasty.abhyaṅgāvagāhanam || 20 ||
AHS1.4.021a/ vasti.śuddhi.karaiḥ siddhaṁ bhajet kṣīraṁ priyāḥ striyaḥ |
AHS1.4.021c/ tṛṭ.śūlārtaṁ tyajet kṣīṇaṁ viḍ.vamaṁ vega.rodhinam || 21 ||
AHS1.4.022a/ rogāḥ sarve 'pi jāyante vegodīraṇa.dhāraṇaiḥ |
AHS1.4.022c/ nirdiṣṭaṁ sādhanaṁ tatra bhūyiṣṭhaṁ ye tu tān prati || 22 ||
AHS1.4.023a/ tataś cāneka.dhā prāyaḥ pavano yat prakupyati |
AHS1.4.023c/ anna.pānauṣadhaṁ tasya yuñjītāto 'nulomanam || 23 ||
AHS1.4.024a/ dhārayet tu sadā vegān hitaiṣī pretya ceha ca |
AHS1.4.024c/ lobherṣyā.dveṣa.mātsarya.rāgādīnāṁ jitendriyaḥ || 24 ||
AHS1.4.025a/ yateta ca yathā.kālaṁ malānāṁ śodhanaṁ prati |
AHS1.4.025c/ aty.artha.sañcitās te hi kruddhāḥ syur jīvita.cchidaḥ || 25 ||
AHS1.4.026a/ doṣāḥ kadā.cit kupyanti jitā laṅghana.pācanaiḥ |
AHS1.4.026c/ ye tu saṁśodhanaiḥ śuddhā na teṣāṁ punar.udbhavaḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS1.4.026v/ 4.26cv ye tu saṁśodhanaiḥ śuddhās 4.26dv teṣāṁ na punar.udbhavaḥca]
AHS1.4.027a/ yathā.kramaṁ yathā.yogam ata ūrdhvaṁ prayojayet |
AHS1.4.027c/ rasāyanāni siddhāni vṛṣya.yogāṁś ca kāla.vit || 27 || [Note: AHS1.4.027v/ 4.27av yathā.kramaṁ yathā.yogyam]
AHS1.4.028a/ bheṣaja.kṣapite pathyam āhārair bṛṁhaṇaṁ kramāt |
AHS1.4.028c/ śāli.ṣaṣṭika.godhūma.mudga.māṁsa.ghṛtādibhiḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS1.4.028v/ 4.28dv .mudga.māṁsa.rasādibhiḥ]
AHS1.4.029a/ hṛdya.dīpana.bhaiṣajya.saṁyogād ruci.pakti.daiḥ |
AHS1.4.029c/ sābhyaṅgodvartana.snāna.nirūha.sneha.vastibhiḥ || 29 ||
[Page 20 ]
AHS1.4.030a/ tathā sa labhate śarma sarva.pāvaka.pāṭavam |
AHS1.4.030c/ dhī.varṇendriya.vaimalyaṁ vṛṣa.tāṁ dairghyam āyuṣaḥ || 30 ||
AHS1.4.031a/ ye bhūta.viṣa.vāyv.agni.kṣata.bhaṅgādi.sambhavāḥ |
AHS1.4.031c/ rāga.dveṣa.bhayādyāś ca te syur āgantavo gadāḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS1.4.031v/ 4.31cv kāma.krodha.bhāyādyāś]
AHS1.4.032a/ tyāgaḥ prajñāparādhānām indriyopaśamaḥ smṛtiḥ |
AHS1.4.032c/ deśa.kālātma.vijñānaṁ sad.vṛttasyānuvartanam || 32 ||
AHS1.4.033a/ atharva.vihitā śāntiḥ pratikūla.grahārcanam |
AHS1.4.033c/ bhūtādya.sparśanopāyo nirdiṣṭaś ca pṛthak pṛthak || 33 ||
AHS1.4.034a/ an.utpattyai samāsena vidhir eṣa pradarśitaḥ |
AHS1.4.034c/ nijāgantu.vikārāṇām utpannānāṁ ca śāntaye || 34 || [Note: AHS1.4.034v/ 4.34av an.utpattau samāsena]
AHS1.4.035a/ śītodbhavaṁ doṣa.cayaṁ vasante viśodhayan grīṣma.jam abhra.kāle |
AHS1.4.035c/ ghanātyaye vārṣikam āśu samyak prāpnoti rogān ṛtu.jān na jātu || 35 ||
AHS1.4.036a/ nityaṁ hitāhāra.vihāra.sevī samīkṣya.kārī viṣayeṣv a.saktaḥ |
AHS1.4.036c/ dātā samaḥ satya.paraḥ kṣamā.vān āptopasevī ca bhavaty a.rogaḥ || 36 ||

1.5. Chapter 5 :: Athadravyavijñānīyādhyāyaḥ pañcamaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 30-42 :: V edn & tr. 198-264]
AHS1.5.001a/ jīvanaṁ tarpaṇaṁ hṛdyaṁ hlādi buddhi.prabodhanam |
AHS1.5.001c/ tanv a.vyakta.rasaṁ mṛṣṭaṁ śītaṁ laghv amṛtopamam || 1 ||
AHS1.5.002a/ gaṅgāmbu nabhaso bhraṣṭaṁ spṛṣṭaṁ tv arkendu.mārutaiḥ |
AHS1.5.002c/ hitā.hita.tve tad bhūyo deśa.kālāv apekṣate || 2 ||
AHS1.5.003a/ yenābhivṛṣṭam a.malaṁ śāly.annaṁ rājate sthitam |
AHS1.5.003c/ a.klinnam a.vi.varṇaṁ ca tat peyaṁ gāṅgam anya.thā || 3 || [Note: AHS1.5.003v/ 5.3bv śāly.annaṁ rājata.sthitam 5.3cv a.klinnam a.vi.varṇaṁ syāt 5.3cv a.klinnam a.vivarṇaṁ vā 5.3dv tat toyaṁ gāṅgam anya.thā]
[Page 21 ]
AHS1.5.004a/ sāmudraṁ tan na pātavyaṁ māsād āśvayujād vinā |
AHS1.5.004c/ aindram ambu su.pātra.stham a.vipannaṁ sadā pibet || 4 ||
AHS1.5.005a/ tad.a.bhāve ca bhūmi.ṣṭham āntarikṣānukāri yat |
AHS1.5.005c/ śuci.pṛthv.asita.śvete deśe 'rka.pavanāhatam || 5 || [Note: AHS1.5.005v/ 5.5av tad.a.bhāve ca bhūyiṣṭham 5.5av tad.a.bhāve pibed bhaumam]
AHS1.5.006a/ na pibet paṅka.śaivāla.tṛṇa.parṇāvilāstṛtam |
AHS1.5.006c/ sūryendu.pavanā.dṛṣṭam abhivṛṣṭaṁ ghanaṁ guru || 6 ||
AHS1.5.007a/ phenilaṁ jantu.mat taptaṁ danta.grāhy ati.śaityataḥ |
AHS1.5.007c/ an.ārtavaṁ ca yad divyam ārtavaṁ prathamaṁ ca yat || 7 ||
AHS1.5.008a/ lūtādi.tantu.viṇ.mūtra.viṣa.saṁśleṣa.dūṣitam |
AHS1.5.008c/ paścimoda.dhi.gāḥ śīghra.vahā yāś cā.malodakāḥ || 8 ||
AHS1.5.009a/ pathyāḥ samāsāt tā nadyo viparītās tv ato 'nya.thā |
AHS1.5.009c/ upalāsphālanākṣepa.vicchedaiḥ kheditodakāḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS1.5.009v/ 5.9av pathyāḥ samāsato nadyo]
AHS1.5.010a/ himavan.malayodbhūtāḥ pathyās tā eva ca sthirāḥ |
AHS1.5.010c/ kṛmi.ślīpada.hṛt.kaṇtha.śiro.rogān prakurvate || 10 ||
AHS1.5.011a/ prācyāvanty.aparāntotthā dur.nāmāni mahendra.jāḥ |
AHS1.5.011c/ udara.ślīpadātaṅkān sahya.vindhyodbhavāḥ punaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS1.5.011v/ 5.11bv sahya.vindhya.bhavāḥ punaḥ ]
AHS1.5.012a/ kuṣṭha.pāṇḍu.śiro.rogān doṣa.ghnyaḥ pāriyātra.jāḥ |
AHS1.5.012c/ bala.pauruṣa.kāriṇyaḥ sāgarāmbhas tri.doṣa.kṛt || 12 || [Note: AHS1.5.012v/ 5.12dv sāgarāmbu tri.doṣa.kṛt]
AHS1.5.012+1a/ āvilaṁ sa.malaṁ nīlaṁ ghanaṁ pītam athāpi ca |
AHS1.5.012+1c/ sa.kṣāraṁ picchilaṁ caiva sāmudraṁ tan nigadyate || 12+1 ||
[Page 22 ]
AHS1.5.013a/ vidyāt kūpa.taḍāgādīn jāṅgalānūpa.śailataḥ |
AHS1.5.013c/ nāmbu peyam a.śaktyā vā sv.alpam alpāgni.gulmibhiḥ || 13 ||
AHS1.5.014a/ pāṇḍūdarātisārārśo.grahaṇī.śoṣa.śothibhiḥ |

AHS1.5.015a/ sama.sthūla.kṛśā bhukta.madhyānta.prathamāmbu.pāḥ |
AHS1.5.015c/ śītaṁ madātyaya.glāni.mūrchā.chardi.śrama.bhramān || 15 || [Note: AHS1.5.015v/ 5.15av sama.sthūla.kṛśā bhakta.]
AHS1.5.016a/ tṛṣṇoṣṇa.dāha.pittāsra.viṣāṇy ambu niyacchati |

AHS1.5.017a/ hidhmādhmānānila.śleṣma.sadyaḥ.śuddhi.nava.jvare |

AHS1.5.018a/ an.abhiṣyandi laghu ca toyaṁ kvathita.śītalam |

AHS1.5.082a/ mūtraṁ go.'jāvi.mahiṣī.gajāśvoṣṭra.kharodbhavam |

AHS1.5.083c/ gulmā.ruci.viṣa.śvitra.kuṣṭhārśāṁsi jayel laghu || 83 || [Note: AHS1.5.083v/ 5.83bv .śūla.pāṇḍu.kaphāmayān]
AHS1.5.084a/ toya.kṣīrekṣu.tailānāṁ vargair madyasya ca kramāt |
AHS1.5.084c/ iti dravaika.deśo 'yaṁ yathā.sthūlam udāhṛtaḥ || 84 ||

1.6. Chapter 6 :: Athānnasvarūpavijñānīyādhyāyaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 42-60]
AHS1.6.001a/ rakto mahān sa.kalamas tūrṇakaḥ śakunāhṛtaḥ |
AHS1.6.001c/ sārā.mukho dīrghaśūko lodhraśūkaḥ sugandhikaḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.6.002a/ puṇḍraḥ pāṇḍuḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ pramodo gaura.śārivau |
AHS1.6.002c/ kāñcano mahiṣaḥ śūkaḥ dūṣakaḥ kusumāṇḍakaḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS1.6.002v/ 6.2av pāṇḍukaḥ puṇḍarīkaś ca 6.2av pauṇḍrakaḥ puṇḍarīkaś ca 6.2bv pramodo gaura.śālikaḥ]
AHS1.6.003a/ lāṅgalā lohavālākhyāḥ kardamāḥ śītabhīrukāḥ |
AHS1.6.003c/ pataṅgās tapanīyāś ca ye cānye śālayaḥ śubhāḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS1.6.003v/ 6.3av jāṅgalā lohavālākhyāḥ 6.3av lāṅgalā lohavālāś ca 6.3av lāṅgalo lohavālākhyaḥ 6.3bv kardamaḥ śītabhīrukaḥ]
[Page 30 ]
AHS1.6.004a/ svādu.pāka.rasāḥ snigdhā vṛṣyā baddhālpa.varcasaḥ |
AHS1.6.004c/ kaṣāyānu.rasāḥ pathyā laghavo mūtralā himāḥ || 4 ||
AHS1.6.005a/ śūka.jeṣu varas tatra raktas tṛṣṇā.tri.doṣa.hā |
AHS1.6.005c/ mahāṁs tam anu kalamas taṁ cāpy anu tataḥ pare || 5 || [Note: AHS1.6.005v/ 6.5cv mahāṁs tasyānu kalamas]
AHS1.6.006a/ yavakā hāyanāḥ pāṁsu.bāṣpa.naiṣadhakādayaḥ |
AHS1.6.006c/ svādūṣṇā guravaḥ snigdhāḥ pāke 'mlāḥ śleṣma.pittalāḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS1.6.006v/ 6.6bv .vāpya.naiṣadhakādayaḥ]
AHS1.6.007a/ sṛṣṭa.mūtra.purīṣāś ca pūrvaṁ pūrvaṁ ca ninditāḥ |
AHS1.6.007c/ snigdho grāhī laghuḥ svādus tri.doṣa.ghnaḥ sthiro himaḥ || 7 ||
AHS1.6.008a/ ṣaṣṭiko vrīhiṣu śreṣṭho gauraś cāsita.gaurataḥ |
AHS1.6.008c/ tataḥ kramān mahā.vrīhi.kṛṣṇa.vrīhi.jatūmukhāḥ || 8 ||
AHS1.6.009a/ kukkuṭāṇḍaka.lāvākhya.pārāvataka.śūkarāḥ |
AHS1.6.009c/ varakoddālakojjvāla.cīna.śārada.dardurāḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS1.6.009v/ 6.9av kukkuṭāṇḍaka.pālākṣa. 6.9av kukkuṭāṇḍaka.pālākhya. 6.9av kukkuṭāṇḍaka.lāvākṣa. 6.9dv .cīna.śārada.durdarāḥ]
AHS1.6.010a/ gandhanāḥ kuruvindāś ca guṇair alpāntarāḥ smṛtāḥ |
AHS1.6.010c/ svādur amla.vipāko 'nyo vrīhiḥ pitta.karo guruḥ || 10 ||
AHS1.6.011a/ bahu.mūtra.purīṣoṣmā tri.doṣas tv eva pāṭalaḥ |
AHS1.6.011c/ kaṅgu.kodrava.nīvāra.śyāmākādi himaṁ laghu || 11 ||
AHS1.6.012a/ tṛṇa.dhānyaṁ pavana.kṛl lekhanaṁ kapha.pitta.hṛt |
AHS1.6.012c/ bhagna.sandhāna.kṛt tatra priyaṅgur bṛṁhaṇī guruḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.6.013a/ koradūṣaḥ paraṁ grāhī sparśo śīto viṣāpahaḥ |
AHS1.6.013c/ rūkṣaḥ śīto guruḥ svāduḥ saro viḍ.vāta.kṛd yavaḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS1.6.013v/ 6.13bv sparśo śīto garāpahaḥ 6.13bv sparśa.śīto viṣāpahaḥ]
[Page 31 ]
AHS1.6.014a/ vṛṣyaḥ sthairya.karo mūtra.medaḥ.pitta.kaphāñ jayet |
AHS1.6.014c/ pīnasa.śvāsa.kāsoru.stambha.kaṇṭha.tvag.āmayān || 14 ||
AHS1.6.015a/ nyūno yavād anu.yavo rūkṣoṣṇo vaṁśa.jo yavaḥ |
AHS1.6.015c/ vṛṣyaḥ śīto guruḥ snigdho jīvano vāta.pitta.hā || 15 || [Note: AHS1.6.015v/ 6.15av nyūno yāvad anya.yavo]
AHS1.6.016a/ sandhāna.kārī madhuro godhūmaḥ sthairya.kṛt saraḥ |
AHS1.6.016c/ pathyā nandīmukhī śītā kaṣāya.madhurā laghuḥ || 16 ||
AHS1.6.016+1/ niḥ.sārā vātalā rūkṣā jūrṇādhmāna.karā sarā || 16+1 ||
AHS1.6.017a/ mudgāḍhakī.masūrādi śimbī.dhānyaṁ vibandha.kṛt |
AHS1.6.017c/ kaṣāyaṁ svādu saṅgrāhi kaṭu.pākaṁ himaṁ laghu || 17 ||
AHS1.6.018a/ medaḥ.śleṣmāsra.pitteṣu hitaṁ lepopasekayoḥ |
AHS1.6.018c/ varo 'tra mudgo 'lpa.calaḥ kalāyas tv ati.vātalaḥ || 18 ||
AHS1.6.018.1+1/ asṛk.pitta.haro rūkṣo vātalaś caṇakaḥ smṛtaḥ || 18.1+1 ||
AHS1.6.019a/ rāja.māṣo 'nila.karo rūkṣo bahu.śakṛd guruḥ |
AHS1.6.019c/ uṣṇāḥ kulatthāḥ pāke 'mlāḥ śukrāśma.śvāsa.pīnasān || 19 ||
AHS1.6.020a/ kāsārśaḥ.kapha.vātāṁś ca ghnanti pittāsra.dāḥ param |
AHS1.6.020c/ niṣpāvo vāta.pittāsra.stanya.mūtra.karo guruḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS1.6.020v/ 6.20cv niṣpāvo vāta.pittāsṛk.]
AHS1.6.021a/ saro vidāhī dṛk.śukra.kapha.śopha.viṣāpahaḥ |
AHS1.6.021c/ māṣaḥ snigdho bala.śleṣma.mala.pitta.karaḥ saraḥ || 21 ||
[Page 32 ]
AHS1.6.022a/ gurūṣṇo 'nila.hā svāduḥ śukra.vṛddhi.vireka.kṛt |
AHS1.6.022c/ phalāni māṣa.vad vidyāt kākāṇḍolātmaguptayoḥ || 22 ||
AHS1.6.023a/ uṣṇas tvacyo himaḥ sparśe keśyo balyas tilo guruḥ |
AHS1.6.023c/ alpa.mūtraḥ kaṭuḥ pāke medhāgni.kapha.pitta.kṛt || 23 || [Note: AHS1.6.023v/ 6.23av uṣṇas tvacyo hima.sparśaḥ]
AHS1.6.024a/ snigdhomā svādu.tiktoṣṇā kapha.pitta.karī guruḥ |
AHS1.6.024c/ dṛk.śukra.hṛt kaṭuḥ pāke tad.vad bījaṁ kusumbha.jam || 24 ||
AHS1.6.025a/ māṣo 'tra sarveṣv avaro yavakaḥ śūka.jeṣu ca |
AHS1.6.025c/ navaṁ dhānyam abhiṣyandi laghu saṁvatsaroṣitam || 25 || [Note: AHS1.6.025v/ 6.25bv yavakaḥ śūka.jeṣv api 6.25dv laghu varṣoṣitaṁ ca yat]
AHS1.6.026a/ śīghra.janma tathā sūpyaṁ nis.tuṣaṁ yukti.bharjitam |
AHS1.6.026c/ maṇḍa.peyā.vilepīnām odanasya ca lāghavam || 26 ||
AHS1.6.026.1+1a/ yava.godhūma.māṣāś ca tilāś cābhinavā hitāḥ |
AHS1.6.026.1+1c/ purāṇā vi.rasāḥ sūkṣmā na tathārtha.karā matāḥ || 26.1+1 ||
AHS1.6.027a/ yathā.pūrvaṁ śivas tatra maṇḍo vātānulomanaḥ |
AHS1.6.027c/ tṛḍ.glāni.doṣa.śeṣa.ghnaḥ pācano dhātu.sāmya.kṛt || 27 ||
AHS1.6.028a/ sroto.mārdava.kṛt svedī sandhukṣayati cānalam |
AHS1.6.028c/ kṣut.tṛṣṇā.glāni.daurbalya.kukṣi.roga.jvarāpahā || 28 ||
AHS1.6.029a/ malānulomanī pathyā peyā dīpana.pācanī |
AHS1.6.029c/ vilepī grāhiṇī hṛdyā tṛṣṇā.ghnī dīpanī hitā || 29 ||
AHS1.6.030a/ vraṇākṣi.roga.saṁśuddha.dur.bala.sneha.pāyinām |
AHS1.6.030c/ su.dhautaḥ prasrutaḥ svinno '.tyaktoṣmā caudano laghuḥ || 30 ||
[Page 33 ]
AHS1.6.031a/ yaś cāgneyauṣadha.kvātha.sādhito bhṛṣṭa.taṇḍulaḥ |
AHS1.6.031c/ viparīto guruḥ kṣīra.māṁsādyair yaś ca sādhitaḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS1.6.031v/ 6.31av yaś cāgneyauṣadha.kvāthe 6.31bv sādhito bhṛṣṭa.taṇḍulaiḥ]
AHS1.6.032a/ iti dravya.kriyā.yoga.mānādyaiḥ sarvam ādiśet |
AHS1.6.032c/ bṛṁhaṇaḥ prīṇano vṛṣyaś cakṣuṣyo vraṇa.hā rasaḥ || 32 ||
AHS1.6.033a/ maudgas tu pathyaḥ saṁśuddha.vraṇa.kaṇṭhākṣi.rogiṇām |
AHS1.6.033c/ vātānulomī kaulattho gulma.tūṇī.pratūṇi.jit || 33 ||
AHS1.6.033+1a/ a.kṛtaṁ kṛta.yūṣaṁ ca tanu saṁskāritaṁ rasam |
AHS1.6.033+1c/ sūpam amlam an.amlaṁ ca guru vidyād yathottaram || 33+1 ||
AHS1.6.034a/ tila.piṇyāka.vikṛtiḥ śuṣka.śākaṁ virūḍhakam |
AHS1.6.034c/ śāṇḍākī.vaṭakaṁ dṛṅ.ghnaṁ doṣalaṁ glapanaṁ guru || 34 ||
AHS1.6.035a/ rasālā bṛṁhaṇī vṛṣyā snigdhā balyā ruci.pradā |
AHS1.6.035c/ śrama.kṣut.tṛṭ.klama.haraṁ pānakaṁ prīṇanaṁ guru || 35 ||
AHS1.6.036a/ viṣṭambhi mūtralaṁ hṛdyaṁ yathā.dravya.guṇaṁ ca tat |
AHS1.6.036c/ lājās tṛṭ.chardy.atīsāra.meha.medaḥ.kapha.cchidaḥ || 36 ||
AHS1.6.037a/ kāsa.pittopaśamanā dīpanā laghavo himāḥ |
AHS1.6.037c/ pṛthukā guravo balyāḥ kapha.viṣṭambha.kāriṇaḥ || 37 ||
AHS1.6.038a/ dhānā viṣṭambhinī rūkṣā tarpaṇī lekhanī guruḥ |
AHS1.6.038c/ saktavo laghavaḥ kṣut.tṛṭ.śrama.netrāmaya.vraṇān || 38 || [Note: AHS1.6.038v/ 6.38dv .śrama.netra.galāmayān]
AHS1.6.039a/ ghnanti santarpaṇāḥ pānāt sadya eva bala.pradāḥ |
AHS1.6.039c/ nodakāntaritān na dvir na niśāyāṁ na kevalān || 39 ||
[Page 34 ]
AHS1.6.040a/ na bhuktvā na dvi.jaiś chittvā saktūn adyān na vā bahūn |
AHS1.6.040c/ piṇyāko glapano rūkṣo viṣṭambhī dṛṣṭi.dūṣaṇaḥ || 40 ||
AHS1.6.040+1a/ raukṣyād viṣṭambhate koṣṭhe viṣṭambhi.tvād vidahyate |
AHS1.6.040+1c/ vidāhāt kurute glāniṁ piṇyāko niśi sevitaḥ || 40+1 ||
AHS1.6.041a/ vesavāro guruḥ snigdho balopacaya.vardhanaḥ |
AHS1.6.041c/ mudgādi.jās tu guravo yathā.dravya.guṇānugāḥ || 41 ||
AHS1.6.042a/ kukūla.karpara.bhrāṣṭra.kandv.aṅgāra.vipācitān |
AHS1.6.042c/ eka.yonīl̐ laghūn vidyād apūpān uttarottaram || 42 || [Note: AHS1.6.042v/ 6.42av kukūla.kharpara.bhrāṣṭra. 6.42bv .kaṭv.aṅgāra.vipācitān 6.42dv apūpāṁs tu yathottaram]
AHS1.6.043a/ hariṇaiṇa.kuraṅgarkṣa.gokarṇa.mṛgamātṛkāḥ |
AHS1.6.043c/ śaśa.śambara.cāruṣka.śarabhādyā mṛgāḥ smṛtāḥ || 43 ||
AHS1.6.044a/ lāva.vārtīka.vartīra.raktavartmaka.kukkubhāḥ |
AHS1.6.044c/ kapiñjalopacakrākhya.cakora.kurubāhavaḥ || 44 || [Note: AHS1.6.044v/ 6.44bv .raktavartmaka.kurkubhāḥ]
AHS1.6.045a/ vartako vartikā caiva tittiriḥ krakaraḥ śikhī |
AHS1.6.045c/ tāmra.cūḍākhya.bakara.gonarda.giri.vartikāḥ || 45 || [Note: AHS1.6.045v/ 6.45cv kukkuṭo bakaraḥ kaṅka. 6.45cv tāmra.cūḍākhya.varaka.]
AHS1.6.046a/ tathā śārapadendrābha.varaṭādyāś ca viṣkirāḥ |
AHS1.6.046c/ jīvañjīvaka.dātyūha.bhṛṅgāhva.śuka.sārikāḥ || 46 || [Note: AHS1.6.046v/ 6.46bv .vāraṭādyāś ca viṣkirāḥ 6.46bv .vāraṭāś ceti viṣkirāḥ 6.46bv .varaṭāś ceti viṣkirāḥ]
AHS1.6.047a/ laṭvā.kokila.hārīta.kapota.caṭakādayaḥ |
AHS1.6.047c/ pratudā bheka.godhāhi.śvāvid.ādyā bile.śayāḥ || 47 ||
AHS1.6.048a/ go.kharāśvataroṣṭrāśva.dvīpi.siṁharkṣa.vānarāḥ |
AHS1.6.048c/ mārjāra.mūṣaka.vyāghra.vṛka.babhru.tarakṣavaḥ || 48 ||
[Page 35 ]
AHS1.6.049a/ lopāka.jambuka.śyena.cāṣa.vāntāda.vāyasāḥ |
AHS1.6.049c/ śaśaghnī.bhāsa.kurara.gṛdhrolūka.kuliṅgakāḥ || 49 || [Note: AHS1.6.049v/ 6.49cv śaśāri.bhāsa.kurara.]
AHS1.6.050a/ dhūmikā madhuhā ceti prasahā mṛga.pakṣiṇaḥ |
AHS1.6.050c/ varāha.mahiṣa.nyaṅku.ruru.rohita.vāraṇāḥ || 50 ||
AHS1.6.051a/ sṛmaraś camaraḥ khaḍgo gavayaś ca mahā.mṛgāḥ |
AHS1.6.051c/ haṁsa.sārasa.kādamba.baka.kāraṇḍava.plavāḥ || 51 ||
AHS1.6.052a/ balākotkrośa.cakrāhva.madgu.krauñcādayo 'p.carāḥ |
AHS1.6.052c/ matsyā rohita.pāṭhīna.kūrma.kumbhīra.karkaṭāḥ || 52 ||
AHS1.6.053a/ śukti.śaṅkhodra.śambūka.śapharī.varmi.candrikāḥ |
AHS1.6.053c/ culūkī.nakra.makara.śiśumāra.timiṅgilāḥ || 53 || [Note: AHS1.6.053v/ 6.53av śukti.śaṅkhodru.śambūka. 6.53cv cullakī.nakra.makara.]
AHS1.6.054a/ rājī.cilicimādyāś ca māṁsam ity āhur aṣṭa.dhā |
AHS1.6.054c/ yoniṣv ajāvī vyāmiśra.go.cara.tvād a.niścite || 54 ||
AHS1.6.054.1+1a/ mṛgyaṁ vaiṣkirikaṁ kiṁ ca prātudaṁ ca bile.śayam |
AHS1.6.054.1+1c/ prāsahaṁ ca mahā.mṛgyam ap.caraṁ mātsyam aṣṭa.dhā || 54.1+1 ||
AHS1.6.055a/ ādyāntyā jāṅgalānūpā madhyau sādhāraṇau smṛtau |
AHS1.6.055c/ tatra baddha.malāḥ śītā laghavo jāṅgalā hitāḥ || 55 ||
AHS1.6.056a/ pittottare vāta.madhye sannipāte kaphānuge |
AHS1.6.056c/ dīpanaḥ kaṭukaḥ pāke grāhī rūkṣo himaḥ śaśaḥ || 56 ||
AHS1.6.057a/ īṣad.uṣṇa.guru.snigdhā bṛṁhaṇā vartakādayaḥ |
AHS1.6.057c/ tittiris teṣv api varo medhāgni.bala.śukra.kṛt || 57 ||
[Page 36 ]
AHS1.6.058a/ grāhī varṇyo 'nilodrikta.sannipāta.haraḥ param |
AHS1.6.058c/ nāti.pathyaḥ śikhī pathyaḥ śrotra.svara.vayo.dṛśām || 58 ||
AHS1.6.059a/ tad.vac ca kukkuṭo vṛṣyo grāmyas tu śleṣmalo guruḥ |
AHS1.6.059c/ medhānala.karā hṛdyāḥ krakarāḥ sopacakrakāḥ || 59 ||
AHS1.6.060a/ guruḥ sa.lavaṇaḥ kāṇa.kapotaḥ sarva.doṣa.kṛt |
AHS1.6.060c/ caṭakāḥ śleṣmalāḥ snigdhā vāta.ghnāḥ śukralāḥ param || 60 || [Note: AHS1.6.060v/ 6.60dv vāta.ghnāḥ śukralāḥ bhṛśam]
AHS1.6.061a/ gurūṣṇa.snigdha.madhurā vargāś cāto yathottaram |
AHS1.6.061c/ mūtra.śukra.kṛto balyā vāta.ghnāḥ kapha.pittalāḥ || 61 ||
AHS1.6.062a/ śītā mahā.mṛgās teṣu kravyāda.prasahāḥ punaḥ |
AHS1.6.062c/ lavaṇānu.rasāḥ pāke kaṭukā māṁsa.vardhanāḥ || 62 || [Note: AHS1.6.062v/ 6.62bv kravyādāḥ prasahāḥ punaḥ]
AHS1.6.063a/ jīrṇārśo.grahaṇī.doṣa.śoṣārtānāṁ paraṁ hitāḥ |
AHS1.6.063c/ nāti.śīta.guru.snigdhaṁ māṁsam ājam a.doṣalam || 63 || [Note: AHS1.6.063v/ 6.63cv nāti.śītaṁ guru snigdhaṁ]
AHS1.6.064a/ śarīra.dhātu.sāmānyād an.abhiṣyandi bṛṁhaṇam |
AHS1.6.064c/ viparītam ato jñeyam āvikaṁ bṛṁhaṇaṁ tu tat || 64 ||
AHS1.6.065a/ śuṣka.kāsa.śramāty.agni.viṣama.jvara.pīnasān |
AHS1.6.065c/ kārśyaṁ kevala.vātāṁś ca go.māṁsaṁ sanniyacchati || 65 ||
AHS1.6.066a/ uṣṇo garīyān mahiṣaḥ svapna.dārḍhya.bṛhat.tva.kṛt |
AHS1.6.066c/ tad.vad varāhaḥ śrama.hā ruci.śukra.bala.pradaḥ || 66 ||
AHS1.6.067a/ matsyāḥ paraṁ kapha.karāś cilicīmas tri.doṣa.kṛt |
AHS1.6.067c/ lāva.rohita.godhaiṇāḥ sve sve varge varāḥ param || 67 ||
[Page 37 ]
AHS1.6.067.1+1a/ matsyādi.pakṣiṇāṁ caiva gurūṇy aṇḍāni cādiśet |
AHS1.6.067.1+1c/ tāni snigdhāni vṛṣyāṇi svādu.pāka.rasāni ca || 67.1+1 || [Note: AHS1.6.067.1+1v/ 6.67.1+1bv gurūṇy aṇḍāny ato diśet 6.67.1+1bv gurūṇy aṇḍāni cānyato]
AHS1.6.068a/ māṁsaṁ sadyo.hataṁ śuddhaṁ vayaḥ.sthaṁ ca bhajet tyajet |
AHS1.6.068c/ mṛtaṁ kṛśaṁ bhṛśaṁ medyaṁ vyādhi.vāri.viṣair hatam || 68 ||
AHS1.6.069a/ puṁ.striyoḥ pūrva.paścārdhe guruṇī garbhiṇī guruḥ |
AHS1.6.069c/ laghur yoṣic catuṣ.pātsu vihaṅgeṣu punaḥ pumān || 69 ||
AHS1.6.070a/ śiraḥ.skandhoru.pṛṣṭhasya kaṭyāḥ sakthnoś ca gauravam |
AHS1.6.070c/ tathāma.pakvāśayayor yathā.pūrvaṁ vinirdiśet || 70 ||
AHS1.6.071a/ śoṇita.prabhṛtīnāṁ ca dhātūnām uttarottaram |
AHS1.6.071c/ māṁsād garīyo vṛṣaṇa.meḍhra.vṛkka.yakṛd.gudam || 71 ||
AHS1.6.072a/ śākaṁ pāṭhā.śaṭhī.sūṣā.suniṣaṇṇa.satīna.jam |
AHS1.6.072c/ tri.doṣa.ghnaṁ laghu grāhi sa.rāja.kṣava.vāstukam || 72 || [Note: AHS1.6.072v/ 6.72av śākaṁ pāṭhā.śaṭhī.śūṣā.]
AHS1.6.073a/ suniṣaṇṇo 'gni.kṛd vṛṣyas teṣu rāja.kṣavaḥ param |
AHS1.6.073c/ grahaṇy.arśo.vikāra.ghno varco.bhedi tu vāstukam || 73 ||
AHS1.6.074a/ hanti doṣa.trayaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ vṛṣyā soṣṇā rasāyanī |
AHS1.6.074c/ kākamācī sarā svaryā cāṅgery amlāgni.dīpanī || 74 || [Note: AHS1.6.074v/ 6.74bv vṛṣyā soṣṇā rasāyanam]
AHS1.6.075a/ grahaṇy.arśo.'nila.śleṣman.hitoṣṇā grāhiṇī laghuḥ |

AHS1.6.077a/ nāḍī.kalāya.gojihvā.vārtākaṁ vanatiktakam |

AHS1.6.081c/ sa.kṣāram agni.jananaṁ hṛdyaṁ rucyam a.pittalam || 81 ||
