AHS1.6.141a/ jantu.juṣṭaṁ jale magnam a.bhūmi.jam an.ārtavam |
AHS1.6.141c/ anya.dhānya.yutaṁ hīna.vīryaṁ jīrṇa.tayāti ca || 141 || [Note: AHS1.6.141v/ 6.141dv .vīryaṁ jīrṇa.tayāpi ca]
AHS1.6.142a/ dhānyaṁ tyajet tathā śākaṁ rūkṣa.siddham a.komalam |
AHS1.6.142c/ a.sañjāta.rasaṁ tad.vac chuṣkaṁ cānya.tra mūlakāt || 142 ||
AHS1.6.143a/ prāyeṇa phalam apy evaṁ tathāmaṁ bilva.varjitam |
AHS1.6.143c/ viṣyandi lavaṇaṁ sarvaṁ sūkṣmaṁ sṛṣṭa.malaṁ viduḥ || 143 || [Note: AHS1.6.143v/ 6.143dv sūkṣmaṁ sṛṣṭa.malaṁ mṛdu]
AHS1.6.144a/ vāta.ghnaṁ pāki tīkṣṇoṣṇaṁ rocanaṁ kapha.pitta.kṛt |
AHS1.6.144c/ saindhavaṁ tatra sa.svādu vṛṣyaṁ hṛdyaṁ tri.doṣa.nut || 144 ||
AHS1.6.145a/ laghv an.uṣṇaṁ dṛśaḥ pathyam a.vidāhy agni.dīpanam |
AHS1.6.145c/ laghu sauvarcalaṁ hṛdyaṁ su.gandhy udgāra.śodhanam || 145 ||
AHS1.6.146a/ kaṭu.pākaṁ vibandha.ghnaṁ dīpanīyaṁ ruci.pradam |
AHS1.6.146c/ ūrdhvādhaḥ.kapha.vātānulomanaṁ dīpanaṁ viḍam || 146 || [Note: AHS1.6.146v/ 6.146av kaṭu pāke vibandha.ghnaṁ]
AHS1.6.147a/ vibandhānāha.viṣṭambha.śūla.gaurava.nāśanam |
AHS1.6.147c/ vipāke svādu sāmudraṁ guru śleṣma.vivardhanam || 147 ||
AHS1.6.148a/ sa.tikta.kaṭuka.kṣāraṁ tīkṣṇam utkledi caudbhidam |
AHS1.6.148c/ kṛṣṇe sauvarcala.guṇā lavaṇe gandha.varjitāḥ || 148 ||
AHS1.6.149a/ romakaṁ laghu pāṁsūtthaṁ sa.kṣāraṁ śleṣmalaṁ guru |
AHS1.6.149c/ lavaṇānāṁ prayoge tu saindhavādi prayojayet || 149 || [Note: AHS1.6.149v/ 6.149dv saindhavādīn prayojayet]
AHS1.6.150a/ gulma.hṛd.grahaṇī.pāṇḍu.plīhānāha.galāmayān |
AHS1.6.150c/ śvāsārśaḥ.kapha.kāsāṁś ca śamayed yava.śūka.jaḥ || 150 || [Note: AHS1.6.150v/ 6.150cv śvāsārśaḥ.kapha.vātāṁś ca 6.150dv śamayed yāva.śūka.jaḥ]
[Page 46 ]
AHS1.6.151a/ kṣāraḥ sarvaś ca paramaṁ tīkṣṇoṣṇaḥ kṛmi.jil laghuḥ |
AHS1.6.151c/ pittāsṛg.dūṣaṇaḥ pākī chedy a.hṛdyo vidāraṇaḥ || 151 ||
AHS1.6.152a/ a.pathyaḥ kaṭu.lāvaṇyāc chukraujaḥ.keśa.cakṣuṣām |
AHS1.6.152c/ hiṅgu vāta.kaphānāha.śūla.ghnaṁ pitta.kopanam || 152 ||
AHS1.6.153a/ kaṭu.pāka.rasaṁ rucyaṁ dīpanaṁ pācanaṁ laghu |
AHS1.6.153c/ kaṣāyā madhurā pāke rūkṣā vi.lavaṇā laghuḥ || 153 ||
AHS1.6.154a/ dīpanī pācanī medhyā vayasaḥ sthāpanī param |
AHS1.6.154c/ uṣṇa.vīryā sarāyuṣyā buddhīndriya.bala.pradā || 154 ||
AHS1.6.155a/ kuṣṭha.vaivarṇya.vaisvarya.purāṇa.viṣama.jvarān |
AHS1.6.155c/ śiro.'kṣi.pāṇḍu.hṛd.roga.kāmalā.grahaṇī.gadān || 155 ||
AHS1.6.156a/ sa.śoṣa.śophātīsāra.meda.moha.vami.kṛmīn |
AHS1.6.156c/ śvāsa.kāsa.prasekārśaḥ.plīhānāha.garodaram || 156 || [Note: AHS1.6.156v/ 6.156bv .meha.moha.vami.kṛmīn]
AHS1.6.157a/ vibandhaṁ srotasāṁ gulmam ūru.stambham a.rocakam |
AHS1.6.157c/ harītakī jayed vyādhīṁs tāṁs tāṁś ca kapha.vāta.jān || 157 ||
AHS1.6.158a/ tad.vad āmalakaṁ śītam amlaṁ pitta.kaphāpaham |
AHS1.6.158c/ kaṭu pāke himaṁ keśyam akṣam īṣac ca tad.guṇam || 158 || [Note: AHS1.6.158v/ 6.158cv kaṭu pāke '.himaṁ keśyam]
AHS1.6.159a/ iyaṁ rasāyana.varā tri.phalākṣy.āmayāpahā |
AHS1.6.159c/ ropaṇī tvag gada.kleda.medo.meha.kaphāsra.jit || 159 ||
AHS1.6.160a/ sa.kesaraṁ catur.jātaṁ tvak.pattrailaṁ tri.jātakam |
AHS1.6.160c/ pitta.prakopi tīkṣṇoṣṇaṁ rūkṣaṁ rocana.dīpanam || 160 ||
[Page 47 ]
AHS1.6.160.1+1a/ su.gandhi sarva.peyānāṁ vyañjanānāṁ ca vāsanam |
AHS1.6.160.1+1c/ lehānāṁ khādya.pākānāṁ cūrṇānāṁ ca prayojayet || 160.1+1 ||
AHS1.6.161a/ rase pāke ca kaṭukaṁ kapha.ghnaṁ maricaṁ laghu |
AHS1.6.161c/ śleṣmalā svādu.śītārdrā gurvī snigdhā ca pippalī || 161 ||
AHS1.6.162a/ sā śuṣkā viparītātaḥ snigdhā vṛṣyā rase kaṭuḥ |
AHS1.6.162c/ svādu.pākānila.śleṣma.śvāsa.kāsāpahā sarā || 162 ||
AHS1.6.163a/ na tām aty upayuñjīta rasāyana.vidhiṁ vinā |
AHS1.6.163c/ nāgaraṁ dīpanaṁ vṛṣyaṁ grāhi hṛdyaṁ vibandha.nut || 163 ||
AHS1.6.164a/ rucyaṁ laghu svādu.pākaṁ snigdhoṣṇaṁ kapha.vāta.jit |
AHS1.6.164c/ tad.vad ārdrakam etac ca trayaṁ tri.kaṭukaṁ jayet || 164 ||
AHS1.6.165a/ sthaulyāgni.sadana.śvāsa.kāsa.ślīpada.pīnasān |
AHS1.6.165c/ cavikā.pippalī.mūlaṁ maricālpāntaraṁ guṇaiḥ || 165 ||
AHS1.6.166a/ citrako 'gni.samaḥ pāke śophārśaḥ.kṛmi.kuṣṭha.hā |
AHS1.6.166c/ pañca.kolakam etac ca maricena vinā smṛtam || 166 || [Note: AHS1.6.166v/ 6.166cv pañca.kolakam etat tu]
AHS1.6.167a/ gulma.plīhodarānāha.śūla.ghnaṁ dīpanaṁ param |
AHS1.6.167c/ bilva.kāśmarya.tarkārī.pāṭalā.ṭuṇṭukair mahat || 167 || [Note: AHS1.6.167v/ 6.167bv .śūla.ghnaṁ dīpanaṁ laghu]
AHS1.6.168a/ jayet kaṣāya.tiktoṣṇaṁ pañca.mūlaṁ kaphānilau |
AHS1.6.168c/ hrasvaṁ bṛhaty.aṁśumatī.dvaya.gokṣurakaiḥ smṛtam || 168 || [Note: AHS1.6.168v/ 6.168av jayet kaṣāya.tīkṣṇoṣṇaṁ]
AHS1.6.169a/ svādu.pāka.rasaṁ nāti.śītoṣṇaṁ sarva.doṣa.jit |
AHS1.6.169c/ balā.punarnavairaṇḍa.śūrpaparṇī.dvayena tu || 169 || [Note: AHS1.6.169v/ 6.169cv balā.punarnavairaṇḍaiḥ 6.169dv .śūrpaparṇī.dvayena ca 6.169dv śūrpaparṇī.dvayena ca 6.169dv śūrpaparṇī.dvayena tu]
[Page 48 ]
AHS1.6.170a/ madhyamaṁ kapha.vāta.ghnaṁ nāti.pitta.karaṁ saram |
AHS1.6.170c/ abhīru.vīrā.jīvantī.jīvakarṣabhakaiḥ smṛtam || 170 ||
AHS1.6.171a/ jīvanākhyaṁ tu cakṣuṣyaṁ vṛṣyaṁ pittānilāpaham |
AHS1.6.171c/ tṛṇākhyaṁ pitta.jid darbha.kāśekṣu.śara.śālibhiḥ || 171 || [Note: AHS1.6.171v/ 6.171av jīvanākhyaṁ ca cakṣuṣyaṁ]
AHS1.6.172a/ śūka.śimbī.ja.pakvānna.māṁsa.śāka.phalauṣadhaiḥ |
AHS1.6.172c/ vargitair anna.leśo 'yam ukto nityopayogikaḥ || 172 || [Note: AHS1.6.172v/ 6.172dv ukto nityaupayogikaḥ]

1.7. Chapter 7 :: Athānnarakṣādhyāyaḥ saptamaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 60-68]
AHS1.7.001a/ rājā rāja.gṛhāsanne prāṇācāryaṁ niveśayet |
AHS1.7.001c/ sarva.dā sa bhavaty evaṁ sarva.tra pratijāgṛviḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.7.002a/ anna.pānaṁ viṣād rakṣed viśeṣeṇa mahī.pateḥ |
AHS1.7.002c/ yoga.kṣemau tad.āyattau dharmādyā yan.nibandhanāḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS1.7.002v/ 7.2dv dharmādyās tan.nibandhanāḥ]
AHS1.7.003a/ odano viṣa.vān sāndro yāty a.visrāvya.tām iva |
AHS1.7.003c/ cireṇa pacyate pakvo bhavet paryuṣitopamaḥ || 3 ||
AHS1.7.004a/ mayūra.kaṇṭha.tulyoṣmā moha.mūrchā.praseka.kṛt |
AHS1.7.004c/ hīyate varṇa.gandhādyaiḥ klidyate candrikā.citaḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS1.7.004v/ 7.4dv klidyate candrikānvitaḥ 7.4dv klidyate candrakācitaḥ 7.4dv klidyate candrakānvitaḥ]
AHS1.7.005a/ vyañjanāny āśu śuṣyanti dhyāma.kvāthāni tatra ca |
AHS1.7.005c/ hīnātiriktā vikṛtā chāyā dṛśyeta naiva vā || 5 || [Note: AHS1.7.005v/ 7.5dv chāyā dṛśyeta vā na vā]
AHS1.7.006a/ phenordhva.rāji.sīmanta.tantu.budbuda.sambhavaḥ |
AHS1.7.006c/ vicchinna.vi.rasāḥ rāgāḥ khāṇḍavāḥ śākam āmiṣam || 6 || [Note: AHS1.7.006v/ 7.6cv vicchinna.vi.rasā rāga. 7.6cv vicchinnā vi.rasā rāgāḥ 7.6dv .khāṇḍavāḥ śākam āmiṣam ]
AHS1.7.007a/ nīlā rājī rase tāmrā kṣīre dadhani dṛśyate |
AHS1.7.007c/ śyāvā.pītāsitā takre ghṛte pānīya.sannibhā || 7 || [Note: AHS1.7.007v/ 7.7bv kṣīre dadhni ca dṛśyate]
[Page 49 ]
AHS1.7.008a/ mastuni syāt kapotābhā rājī kṛṣṇā tuṣodake |
AHS1.7.008c/ kālī madyāmbhasoḥ kṣaudre harit taile 'ruṇopamā || 8 ||
AHS1.7.009a/ pākaḥ phalānām āmānāṁ pakvānāṁ parikothanam |
AHS1.7.009c/ dravyāṇām ārdra.śuṣkāṇāṁ syātāṁ mlāni.vivarṇa.te || 9 ||
AHS1.7.010a/ mṛdūnāṁ kaṭhinānāṁ ca bhavet sparśa.viparyayaḥ |
AHS1.7.010c/ mālyasya sphuṭitāgra.tvaṁ mlānir gandhāntarodbhavaḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS1.7.010v/ 7.10cv mālyānāṁ sphuṭitāgra.tvaṁ 7.10dv glānir gandhāntarodbhavaḥ 7.10dv mlāni.gandhāntarodbhavaḥ]
AHS1.7.011a/ dhyāma.maṇḍala.tā vastre śadanaṁ tantu.pakṣmaṇām |
AHS1.7.011c/ dhātu.mauktika.kāṣṭhāśma.ratnādiṣu malākta.tā || 11 || [Note: AHS1.7.011v/ 7.11bv śātanaṁ tantu.pakṣmaṇām]
AHS1.7.012a/ sneha.sparśa.prabhā.hāniḥ sa.prabha.tvaṁ tu mṛn.maye |
AHS1.7.012c/ viṣa.daḥ śyāva.śuṣkāsyo vi.lakṣo vīkṣate diśaḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.7.013a/ sveda.vepathu.māṁs trasto bhītaḥ skhalati jṛmbhate |
AHS1.7.013c/ prāpyānnaṁ sa.viṣaṁ tv agnir ekāvartaḥ sphuṭaty ati || 13 || [Note: AHS1.7.013v/ 7.13dv ekāvartaḥ sphuṭaty api]
AHS1.7.014a/ śikhi.kaṇṭhābha.dhūmārcir an.arcir vogra.gandha.vān |
AHS1.7.014c/ mriyante makṣikāḥ prāśya kākaḥ kṣāma.svaro bhavet || 14 ||
AHS1.7.015a/ utkrośanti ca dṛṣṭvaitac chuka.dātyūha.sārikāḥ |
AHS1.7.015c/ haṁsaḥ praskhalati glānir jīvañjīvasya jāyate || 15 ||
AHS1.7.016a/ cakorasyākṣi.vairāgyaṁ krauñcasya syān madodayaḥ |
AHS1.7.016c/ kapota.parabhṛd.dakṣa.cakravākā jahaty asūn || 16 ||
AHS1.7.017a/ udvegaṁ yāti mārjāraḥ śakṛn muñcati vānaraḥ |
AHS1.7.017c/ hṛṣyen mayūras tad.dṛṣṭyā manda.tejo bhaved viṣam || 17 || [Note: AHS1.7.017v/ 7.17av udvejayati mārjāraḥ 7.17cv hṛṣyen mayūras tad dṛṣṭvā ]
[Page 50 ]
AHS1.7.018a/ ity annaṁ viṣa.vaj jñātvā tyajed evaṁ prayatnataḥ |
AHS1.7.018c/ yathā tena vipadyerann api na kṣudra.jantavaḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS1.7.018v/ 7.18av ity annaṁ sa.viṣaṁ jñātvā 7.18bv tyajed eva prayatnataḥ]
AHS1.7.019a/ spṛṣṭe tu kaṇḍū.dāhoṣā.jvarārti.sphoṭa.suptayaḥ |
AHS1.7.019c/ nakha.roma.cyutiḥ śophaḥ sekādyā viṣa.nāśanāḥ || 19 ||
AHS1.7.020a/ śastās tatra pralepāś ca sevya.candana.padmakaiḥ |
AHS1.7.020c/ sa.somavalka.tālīśa.pattra.kuṣṭhāmṛtā.nataiḥ || 20 ||
AHS1.7.021a/ lālā jihvauṣṭhayor jāḍyam ūṣā cimicimāyanam |
AHS1.7.021c/ danta.harṣo rasā.jña.tvaṁ hanu.stambhaś ca vaktra.ge || 21 || [Note: AHS1.7.021v/ 7.21av lālā jihvauṣṭhayor jāḍyaṁ 7.21bv mukhe cimicimāyanam]
AHS1.7.022a/ sevyādyais tatra gaṇḍūṣāḥ sarvaṁ ca viṣa.jid dhitam |
AHS1.7.022c/ āmāśaya.gate sveda.mūrchādhmāna.mada.bhramāḥ || 22 ||
AHS1.7.023a/ roma.harṣo vamir dāhaś cakṣur.hṛdaya.rodhanam |
AHS1.7.023c/ bindubhiś cācayo 'ṅgānāṁ pakvāśaya.gate punaḥ || 23 ||
AHS1.7.024a/ aneka.varṇaṁ vamati mūtrayaty atisāryate |
AHS1.7.024c/ tandrā kṛśa.tvaṁ pāṇḍu.tvam udaraṁ bala.saṅkṣayaḥ || 24 ||
AHS1.7.025a/ tayor vānta.viriktasya haridre kaṭabhīṁ guḍam |
AHS1.7.025c/ sindhuvārita.niṣpāva.bāṣpikā.śataparvikāḥ || 25 ||
AHS1.7.026a/ taṇḍulīyaka.mūlāni kukkuṭāṇḍam avalgujam |
AHS1.7.026c/ nāvanāñjana.pāneṣu yojayed viṣa.śāntaye || 26 ||
AHS1.7.027a/ viṣa.bhuktāya dadyāc ca śuddhāyordhvam adhas tathā |
AHS1.7.027c/ sūkṣmaṁ tāmra.rajaḥ kāle sa.kṣaudraṁ hṛd.viśodhanam || 27 ||
[Page 51 ]
AHS1.7.028a/ śuddhe hṛdi tataḥ śāṇaṁ hema.cūrṇasya dāpayet |
AHS1.7.028c/ na sajjate hema.pāṅge padma.pattre 'mbu.vad viṣam || 28 ||
AHS1.7.029a/ jāyate vipulaṁ cāyur gare 'py eṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
AHS1.7.029c/ viruddham api cāhāraṁ vidyād viṣa.garopamam || 29 || [Note: AHS1.7.029v/ 7.29dv vidyād gara.viṣopamam]
AHS1.7.030a/ ānūpam āmiṣaṁ māṣa.kṣaudra.kṣīra.virūḍhakaiḥ |
AHS1.7.030c/ virudhyate saha bisair mūlakena guḍena vā || 30 ||
AHS1.7.031a/ viśeṣāt payasā matsyā matsyeṣv api cilīcimaḥ |
AHS1.7.031c/ viruddham amlaṁ payasā saha sarvaṁ phalaṁ tathā || 31 ||
AHS1.7.032a/ tad.vat kulattha.caṇaka.kaṅgu.valla.makuṣṭakāḥ |
AHS1.7.032c/ bhakṣayitvā haritakaṁ mūlakādi payas tyajet || 32 || [Note: AHS1.7.032v/ 7.32av tad.vat kulattha.varaka. 7.32cv bhakṣayitvā harit.kanda. 7.32dv .mūlakādi payas tyajet]
AHS1.7.033a/ vārāhaṁ śvāvidhā nādyād dadhnā pṛṣata.kukkuṭau |
AHS1.7.033c/ āma.māṁsāni pittena māṣa.sūpena mūlakam || 33 || [Note: AHS1.7.033v/ 7.33av varāhaṁ śvāvidhā nādyād]
AHS1.7.034a/ aviṁ kusumbha.śākena bisaiḥ saha virūḍhakam |
AHS1.7.034c/ māṣa.sūpa.guḍa.kṣīra.dadhy.ājyair lākucaṁ phalam || 34 ||
AHS1.7.035a/ phalaṁ kadalyās takreṇa dadhnā tāla.phalena vā |
AHS1.7.035c/ kaṇoṣaṇābhyāṁ madhunā kākamācīṁ guḍena vā || 35 ||
AHS1.7.036a/ siddhāṁ vā matsya.pacane pacane nāgarasya vā |
AHS1.7.036c/ siddhām anya.tra vā pātre kāmāt tām uṣitāṁ niśām || 36 || [Note: AHS1.7.036v/ 7.36bv pacane nāgarasya ca 7.36dv kāmāt tām uṣitāṁ niśi 7.36dv kapotām uṣitāṁ niśām 7.36dv nādyāt tām uṣitāṁ niśām 7.36dv kāmātām uṣitāṁ niśām 7.36dv kāmācīm uṣitāṁ niśām]
AHS1.7.037a/ matsya.nistalana.snehe sādhitāḥ pippalīs tyajet |
AHS1.7.037c/ kāṁsye daśāham uṣitaṁ sarpir uṣṇaṁ tv aruṣkare || 37 || [Note: AHS1.7.037v/ 7.37av matsya.nistalana.sneha. 7.37bv .sādhitāḥ pippalīs tyajet 7.37dv sarpir uṣṇaṁ tv aruṣkaraiḥ]
[Page 52 ]
AHS1.7.038a/ bhāso virudhyate śūlyaḥ kampillas takra.sādhitaḥ |
AHS1.7.038c/ aikadhyaṁ pāyasa.surā.kṛśarāḥ parivarjayet || 38 ||
AHS1.7.039a/ madhu.sarpir.vasā.taila.pānīyāni dvi.śaś tri.śaḥ |
AHS1.7.039c/ eka.tra vā samāṁśāni virudhyante paras.param || 39 ||
AHS1.7.040a/ bhinnāṁśe api madhv.ājye divya.vāry anu.pānataḥ |
AHS1.7.040c/ madhu.puṣkara.bījaṁ ca madhu.maireya.śārkaram || 40 ||
AHS1.7.041a/ manthānu.pānaḥ kṣaireyo hāridraḥ kaṭu.taila.vān |
AHS1.7.041c/ upodakātisārāya tila.kalkena sādhitā || 41 ||
AHS1.7.042a/ balākā vāruṇī.yuktā kulmāṣaiś ca virudhyate |
AHS1.7.042c/ bhṛṣṭā varāha.vasayā saiva sadyo nihanty asūn || 42 ||
AHS1.7.043a/ tad.vat tittiri.pattrāḍhya.godhā.lāva.kapiñjalāḥ |
AHS1.7.043c/ airaṇḍenāgninā siddhās tat.tailena vimūrchitāḥ || 43 ||
AHS1.7.044a/ hārīta.māṁsaṁ hāridra.śūlaka.prota.pācitam |
AHS1.7.044c/ haridrā.vahninā sadyo vyāpādayati jīvitam || 44 || [Note: AHS1.7.044v/ 7.44cv hāridra.vahninā sadyo]
AHS1.7.045a/ bhasma.pāṁsu.paridhvastaṁ tad eva ca sa.mākṣikam |
AHS1.7.045c/ yat kiñ.cid doṣam utkleśya na haret tat samāsataḥ || 45 ||
AHS1.7.046a/ viruddhaṁ śuddhir atreṣṭā śamo vā tad.virodhibhiḥ |
AHS1.7.046c/ dravyais tair eva vā pūrvaṁ śarīrasyābhisaṁskṛtiḥ || 46 ||
AHS1.7.047a/ vyāyāma.snigdha.dīptāgni.vayaḥ.stha.bala.śālinām |
AHS1.7.047c/ virodhy api na pīḍāyai sātmyam alpaṁ ca bhojanam || 47 || [Note: AHS1.7.047v/ 7.47av vyāyāmi.snigdha.dīptāgni.]
[Page 53 ]
AHS1.7.048a/ pādenā.pathyam abhyastaṁ pāda.pādena vā tyajet |
AHS1.7.048c/ niṣeveta hitaṁ tad.vad eka.dvi.try.antarī.kṛtam || 48 ||
AHS1.7.049a/ a.pathyam api hi tyaktaṁ śīlitaṁ pathyam eva vā |
AHS1.7.049c/ sātmyā.sātmya.vikārāya jāyate sahasānya.thā || 49 || [Note: AHS1.7.049v/ 7.49cv sātmyā.sātmyaṁ vikārāya]
AHS1.7.050a/ krameṇāpacitā doṣāḥ krameṇopacitā guṇāḥ |
AHS1.7.050c/ santo yānty a.punar.bhāvam a.prakampyā bhavanti ca || 50 || [Note: AHS1.7.050v/ 7.50cv nāpnuvanti punar.bhāvam]
AHS1.7.051a/ aty.anta.sannidhānānāṁ doṣāṇāṁ dūṣaṇātmanām |
AHS1.7.051c/ a.hitair dūṣaṇaṁ bhūyo na vidvān kartum arhati || 51 ||
AHS1.7.052a/ āhāra.śayanā.brahma.caryair yuktyā prayojitaiḥ |
AHS1.7.052c/ śarīraṁ dhāryate nityam āgāram iva dhāraṇaiḥ || 52 || [Note: AHS1.7.052v/ 7.52bv .caryair yuktyā niṣevitaiḥ]
AHS1.7.053a/ āhāro varṇitas tatra tatra tatra ca vakṣyate |
AHS1.7.053c/ nidrāyattaṁ sukhaṁ duḥkhaṁ puṣṭiḥ kārśyaṁ balā.balam || 53 || [Note: AHS1.7.053v/ 7.53bv tatra tatra ca lakṣyate]
AHS1.7.054a/ vṛṣa.tā klība.tā jñānam a.jñānaṁ jīvitaṁ na ca |
AHS1.7.054c/ a.kāle 'ti.prasaṅgāc ca na ca nidrā niṣevitā || 54 ||
AHS1.7.055a/ sukhāyuṣī parākuryāt kāla.rātrir ivāparā |
AHS1.7.055c/ rātrau jāgaraṇaṁ rūkṣaṁ snigdhaṁ prasvapanaṁ divā || 55 ||
AHS1.7.056a/ a.rūkṣam an.abhiṣyandi tv āsīna.pracalāyitam |
AHS1.7.056c/ grīṣme vāyu.cayādāna.raukṣya.rātry.alpa.bhāvataḥ || 56 || [Note: AHS1.7.056v/ 7.56cv grīṣme vāta.cayādāna.]
AHS1.7.057a/ divā.svapno hito 'nyasmin kapha.pitta.karo hi saḥ |
AHS1.7.057c/ muktvā tu bhāṣya.yānādhva.madya.strī.bhāra.karmabhiḥ || 57 ||
[Page 54 ]
AHS1.7.058a/ krodha.śoka.bhayaiḥ klāntān śvāsa.hidhmātisāriṇaḥ |
AHS1.7.058c/ vṛddha.bālā.bala.kṣīṇa.kṣata.tṛṭ.śūla.pīḍitān || 58 || [Note: AHS1.7.058v/ 7.58dv .kṣut.tṛṭ.śūla.nipīḍitān]
AHS1.7.059a/ a.jīrṇy.abhihatonmattān divā.svapnocitān api |
AHS1.7.059c/ dhātu.sāmyaṁ tathā hy eṣāṁ śleṣmā cāṅgāni puṣyati || 59 || [Note: AHS1.7.059v/ 7.59av a.jīrṇābhihatonmattān]
AHS1.7.060a/ bahu.medaḥ.kaphāḥ svapyuḥ sneha.nityāś ca nāhani |
AHS1.7.060c/ viṣārtaḥ kaṇṭha.rogī ca naiva jātu niśāsv api || 60 ||
AHS1.7.061a/ a.kāla.śayanān moha.jvara.staimitya.pīnasāḥ |
AHS1.7.061c/ śiro.ruk.śopha.hṛl.lāsa.sroto.rodhāgni.manda.tāḥ || 61 ||
AHS1.7.062a/ tatropavāsa.vamana.sveda.nāvanam auṣadham |
AHS1.7.062c/ yojayed ati.nidrāyāṁ tīkṣṇaṁ pracchardanāñjanam || 62 ||
AHS1.7.063a/ nāvanaṁ laṅghanaṁ cintāṁ vyavāyaṁ śoka.bhī.krudhaḥ |
AHS1.7.063c/ ebhir eva ca nidrāyā nāśaḥ śleṣmāti.saṅkṣayāt || 63 ||
AHS1.7.064a/ nidrā.nāśād aṅga.marda.śiro.gaurava.jṛmbhikāḥ |
AHS1.7.064c/ jāḍya.glāni.bhramā.pakti.tandrā rogāś ca vāta.jāḥ || 64 || [Note: AHS1.7.064v/ 7.64cv jāḍyaṁ glāni.bhramā.pakti.]
AHS1.7.064+1a/ kapho 'lpo vāyunoddhūto dhamanīḥ sannirudhya tu |
AHS1.7.064+1c/ kuryāt sañjñāpahāṁ tandrāṁ dāruṇāṁ moha.kāriṇīm || 64+1 ||
AHS1.7.064+2a/ unmīlita.vinirbhugne parivartita.tārake |
AHS1.7.064+2c/ bhavatas tatra nayane srute lulita.pakṣmaṇī || 64+2 ||
AHS1.7.064+3ab/ ardha.tri.rātrāt sā sādhyā na sā sādhyā tataḥ param || 64+3ab ||
[Page 55 ]
AHS1.7.065a/ yathā.kālam ato nidrāṁ rātrau seveta sātmyataḥ |
AHS1.7.065c/ a.sātmyāj jāgarād ardhaṁ prātaḥ svapyād a.bhukta.vān || 65 || [Note: AHS1.7.065v/ 7.65cv a.sātmya.jāgarād ardhaṁ]
AHS1.7.066a/ śīlayen manda.nidras tu kṣīra.madya.rasān dadhi |
AHS1.7.066c/ abhyaṅgodvartana.snāna.mūrdha.karṇākṣi.tarpaṇam || 66 ||
AHS1.7.067a/ kāntā.bāhu.latāśleṣo nirvṛtiḥ kṛta.kṛtya.tā |
AHS1.7.067c/ mano.'nukūlā viṣayāḥ kāmaṁ nidrā.sukha.pradāḥ || 67 ||
AHS1.7.068a/ brahma.carya.rater grāmya.sukha.niḥ.spṛha.cetasaḥ |
AHS1.7.068c/ nidrā santoṣa.tṛptasya svaṁ kālaṁ nātivartate || 68 ||
AHS1.7.069a/ grāmya.dharme tyajen nārīm an.uttānāṁ rajasvalām |
AHS1.7.069c/ a.priyām a.priyācārāṁ duṣṭa.saṅkīrṇa.mehanām || 69 ||
AHS1.7.070a/ ati.sthūla.kṛśām sūtāṁ garbhiṇīm anya.yoṣitam |
AHS1.7.070c/ varṇinīm anya.yoniṁ ca guru.deva.nṛpālayam || 70 || [Note: AHS1.7.070v/ 7.70bv garbhiṇīm anya.yoṣitām]
AHS1.7.071a/ caitya.śmaśānāyatana.catvarāmbu.catuṣ.patham |
AHS1.7.071c/ parvāṇy an.aṅgaṁ divasaṁ śiro.hṛdaya.tāḍanam || 71 ||
AHS1.7.072a/ aty.āśito '.dhṛtiḥ kṣud.vān duḥ.sthitāṅgaḥ pipāsitaḥ |
AHS1.7.072c/ bālo vṛddho 'nya.vegārtas tyajed rogī ca maithunam || 72 ||
AHS1.7.073a/ seveta kāmataḥ kāmaṁ tṛpto vājī.kṛtām hime |
AHS1.7.073c/ try.ahād vasanta.śaradoḥ pakṣād varṣā.nidāghayoḥ || 73 || [Note: AHS1.7.073v/ 7.73bv tṛpto vājī.karair hime 7.73bv tṛpto vājī.kṛtair hime 7.73cv dvy.ahād vasanta.śaradoḥ 7.73dv pakṣād vṛṣṭi.nidāghayoḥ]
AHS1.7.074a/ bhrama.klamoru.daurbalya.bala.dhātv.indriya.kṣayāḥ |
AHS1.7.074c/ a.parva.maraṇaṁ ca syād anya.thā gacchataḥ striyam || 74 || [Note: AHS1.7.074v/ 7.74av bhrama.klamoru.daurbalyaṁ 7.74bv bala.dhātv.indriya.kṣayaḥ]
[Page 56 ]
AHS1.7.075a/ smṛti.medhāyur.ārogya.puṣṭīndriya.yaśo.balaiḥ |
AHS1.7.075c/ adhikā manda.jaraso bhavanti strīṣu saṁyatāḥ || 75 || [Note: AHS1.7.075v/ 7.75dv bhavanti strīṣu saṁyutāḥ]
AHS1.7.076a/ snānānulepana.himānila.khaṇḍa.khādya.śītāmbu.dugdha.rasa.yūṣa.surā.prasannāḥ |
AHS1.7.076c/ seveta cānu śayanaṁ viratau ratasya tasyaivam āśu vapuṣaḥ punar eti dhāma || 76 ||
AHS1.7.077a/ śruta.carita.samṛddhe karma.dakṣe dayālau bhiṣaji nir.anubandhaṁ deha.rakṣāṁ niveśya |
AHS1.7.077c/ bhavati vipula.tejaḥ.svāsthya.kīrti.prabhāvaḥ sva.kuśala.phala.bhogī bhūmi.pālaś cirāyuḥ || 77 ||

1.8. Chapter 8 :: Athamātrāśitīyādhyāyo 'ṣṭamaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 68-74]
AHS1.8.001a/ mātrāśī sarva.kālaṁ syān mātrā hy agneḥ pravartikā |
AHS1.8.001c/ mātrāṁ dravyāṇy apekṣante gurūṇy api laghūny api || 1 ||
AHS1.8.002a/ gurūṇām ardha.sauhityaṁ laghūnāṁ nāti.tṛpta.tā |
AHS1.8.002c/ mātrā.pramāṇaṁ nirdiṣṭaṁ sukhaṁ yāvad vijīryati || 2 || [Note: AHS1.8.002v/ 8.2dv sukhaṁ yāvad dhi jīryate]
AHS1.8.003a/ bhojanaṁ hīna.mātraṁ tu na balopacayaujase |
AHS1.8.003c/ sarveṣāṁ vāta.rogāṇāṁ hetu.tāṁ ca prapadyate || 3 ||
AHS1.8.004a/ ati.mātraṁ punaḥ sarvān āśu doṣān prakopayet |
AHS1.8.004c/ pīḍyamānā hi vātādyā yuga.pat tena kopitāḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS1.8.004v/ 8.4cv sampīḍyamānā vātādyā]
AHS1.8.005a/ āmenānnena duṣṭena tad evāviśya kurvate |
AHS1.8.005c/ viṣṭambhayanto 'lasakaṁ cyāvayanto viṣūcikām || 5 ||
AHS1.8.006a/ adharottara.mārgābhyāṁ sahasaivā.jitātmanaḥ |
AHS1.8.006c/ prayāti nordhvaṁ nādhas.tād āhāro na ca pacyate || 6 ||
AHS1.8.007a/ āmāśaye 'lasī.bhūtas tena so 'lasakaḥ smṛtaḥ |
AHS1.8.007c/ vividhair vedanodbhedair vāyv.ādi.bhṛśa.kopataḥ || 7 ||
[Page 57 ]
AHS1.8.008a/ sūcībhir iva gātrāṇi vidhyatīti viṣūcikā |
AHS1.8.008c/ tatra śūla.bhramānāha.kampa.stambhādayo 'nilāt || 8 ||
AHS1.8.009a/ pittāj jvarātisārāntar.dāha.tṛṭ.pralayādayaḥ |
AHS1.8.009c/ kaphāc chardy.aṅga.guru.tā.vāk.saṅga.ṣṭhīvanādayaḥ || 9 ||
AHS1.8.010a/ viśeṣād dur.balasyālpa.vahner vega.vidhāriṇaḥ |
AHS1.8.010c/ pīḍitaṁ mārutenānnaṁ śleṣmaṇā ruddham antarā || 10 ||
AHS1.8.011a/ alasaṁ kṣobhitaṁ doṣaiḥ śalya.tvenaiva saṁsthitam |
AHS1.8.011c/ śūlādīn kurute tīvrāṁś chardy.atīsāra.varjitān || 11 || [Note: AHS1.8.011v/ 8.11bv śalya.tveneva saṁsthitam]
AHS1.8.012a/ so 'laso 'ty.artha.duṣṭās tu doṣā duṣṭāma.baddha.khāḥ |
AHS1.8.012c/ yāntas tiryak tanuṁ sarvāṁ daṇḍa.vat stambhayanti cet || 12 ||
AHS1.8.013a/ daṇḍakālasakaṁ nāma taṁ tyajed āśu.kāriṇam |
AHS1.8.013c/ viruddhādhyaśanā.jīrṇa.śīlino viṣa.lakṣaṇam || 13 ||
AHS1.8.014a/ āma.doṣaṁ mahā.ghoraṁ varjayed viṣa.sañjñakam |
AHS1.8.014c/ viṣa.rūpāśu.kāri.tvād viruddhopakrama.tvataḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.8.015a/ athāmam alasī.bhūtaṁ sādhyaṁ tvaritam ullikhet |
AHS1.8.015c/ pītvā sogrā.paṭu.phalaṁ vāry uṣṇaṁ yojayet tataḥ || 15 ||
AHS1.8.016a/ svedanaṁ phala.vartiṁ ca mala.vātānulomanīm |
AHS1.8.016c/ nāmyamānāni cāṅgāni bhṛśaṁ svinnāni veṣṭayet || 16 || [Note: AHS1.8.016v/ 8.16bv mala.doṣānulomanīm]
AHS1.8.016.1+1a/ madanaṁ pippalī kuṣṭhaṁ vacā gaurāś ca sarṣapāḥ |
AHS1.8.016.1+1c/ guḍa.kṣāra.samāyuktā phala.vartiḥ praśasyate || 16.1+1 ||
[Page 58 ]
AHS1.8.017a/ viṣūcyām ati.vṛddhāyāṁ pārṣṇyor dāhaḥ praśasyate |
AHS1.8.017c/ tad.ahaś copavāsyainaṁ virikta.vad upācaret || 17 ||
AHS1.8.018a/ tīvrārtir api nā.jīrṇī pibec chūla.ghnam auṣadham |
AHS1.8.018c/ āma.sanno 'nalo nālaṁ paktuṁ doṣauṣadhāśanam || 18 ||
AHS1.8.019a/ nihanyād api caiteṣāṁ vibhramaḥ sahasāturam |
AHS1.8.019c/ jīrṇāśane tu bhaiṣajyaṁ yuñjyāt stabdha.gurūdare || 19 || [Note: AHS1.8.019v/ 8.19bv vyāpattiḥ sahasāturam]
AHS1.8.020a/ doṣa.śeṣasya pākārtham agneḥ sandhukṣaṇāya ca |
AHS1.8.020c/ śāntir āma.vikārāṇāṁ bhavati tv apatarpaṇāt || 20 ||
AHS1.8.021a/ tri.vidhaṁ tri.vidhe doṣe tat samīkṣya prayojayet |
AHS1.8.021c/ tatrālpe laṅghanaṁ pathyaṁ madhye laṅghana.pācanam || 21 || [Note: AHS1.8.021v/ 8.21bv tat samīkṣya prakalpayet]
AHS1.8.022a/ prabhūte śodhanaṁ tad dhi mūlād unmūlayen malān |
AHS1.8.022c/ evam anyān api vyādhīn sva.nidāna.viparyayāt || 22 ||
AHS1.8.023a/ cikitsed anubandhe tu sati hetu.viparyayam |
AHS1.8.023c/ tyaktvā yathā.yathaṁ vaidyo yuñjyād vyādhi.viparyayam || 23 ||
AHS1.8.024a/ tad.artha.kāri vā pakve doṣe tv iddhe ca pāvake |
AHS1.8.024c/ hitam abhyañjana.sneha.pāna.vasty.ādi yuktitaḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS1.8.024v/ 8.24bv doṣe vṛddhe ca pāvake 8.24bv doṣe tv ṛddhe tu pāvake]
AHS1.8.025a/ a.jīrṇaṁ ca kaphād āmaṁ tatra śopho 'kṣi.gaṇḍayoḥ |
AHS1.8.025c/ sadyo.bhukta ivodgāraḥ prasekotkleśa.gauravam || 25 ||
AHS1.8.026a/ viṣṭabdham anilāc chūla.vibandhādhmāna.sāda.kṛt |
AHS1.8.026c/ pittād vidagdhaṁ tṛṇ.moha.bhramāmlodgāra.dāha.vat || 26 || [Note: AHS1.8.026v/ 8.26dv .bhramāmlodgāra.dāha.kṛt]
[Page 59 ]
AHS1.8.027a/ laṅghanaṁ kāryam āme tu viṣṭabdhe svedanaṁ bhṛśam |
AHS1.8.027c/ vidagdhe vamanaṁ yad vā yathāvasthaṁ hitaṁ bhavet || 27 || [Note: AHS1.8.027v/ 8.27dv yathāvasthaṁ hitaṁ bhajet]
AHS1.8.028a/ garīyaso bhavel līnād āmād eva vilambikā |
AHS1.8.028c/ kapha.vātānubaddhāma.liṅgā tat.sama.sādhanā || 28 || [Note: AHS1.8.028v/ 8.28cv kapha.vātānuviddhāma.]
AHS1.8.029a/ a.śraddhā hṛd.vyathā śuddhe 'py udgāre rasa.śeṣataḥ |
AHS1.8.029c/ śayīta kiñ.cid evātra sarvaś cān.āśito divā || 29 || [Note: AHS1.8.029v/ 8.29dv sarvaś cān.aśito divā]
AHS1.8.030a/ svapyād a.jīrṇī sañjāta.bubhukṣo 'dyān mitaṁ laghu |
AHS1.8.030c/ vibandho 'ti.pravṛttir vā glānir māruta.mūḍha.tā || 30 || [Note: AHS1.8.030v/ 8.30dv glānir māruta.śūla.tā]
AHS1.8.031a/ a.jīrṇa.liṅgaṁ sāmānyaṁ viṣṭambho gauravaṁ bhramaḥ |
AHS1.8.031c/ na cāti.mātram evānnam āma.doṣāya kevalam || 31 ||
AHS1.8.032a/ dviṣṭa.viṣṭambhi.dagdhāma.guru.rūkṣa.himā.śuci |
AHS1.8.032c/ vidāhi śuṣkam aty.ambu.plutaṁ cānnaṁ na jīryati || 32 ||
AHS1.8.033a/ upataptena bhuktaṁ ca śoka.krodha.kṣud.ādibhiḥ |
AHS1.8.033c/ miśraṁ pathyam a.pathyaṁ ca bhuktaṁ samaśanaṁ matam || 33 || [Note: AHS1.8.033v/ 8.33bv śoka.krodha.kṣudhādibhiḥ 8.33bv krodha.śoka.bhayādibhiḥ]
AHS1.8.034a/ vidyād adhyaśanaṁ bhūyo bhuktasyopari bhojanam |
AHS1.8.034c/ a.kāle bahu cālpaṁ vā bhuktaṁ tu viṣamāśanam || 34 ||
AHS1.8.035a/ trīṇy apy etāni mṛtyuṁ vā ghorān vyādhīn sṛjanti vā |
AHS1.8.035c/ kāle sātmyaṁ śuci hitaṁ snigdhoṣṇaṁ laghu tan.manāḥ || 35 ||
AHS1.8.036a/ ṣaḍ.rasaṁ madhura.prāyaṁ nāti.druta.vilambitam |
AHS1.8.036c/ snātaḥ kṣud.vān vivikta.stho dhauta.pāda.karānanaḥ || 36 ||
[Page 60 ]
AHS1.8.037a/ tarpayitvā pitṝn devān atithīn bālakān gurūn |
AHS1.8.037c/ pratyavekṣya tiraśco 'pi pratipanna.parigrahān || 37 ||
AHS1.8.038a/ samīkṣya samyag ātmānam a.nindann a.bruvan dravam |
AHS1.8.038c/ iṣṭam iṣṭaiḥ sahāśnīyāc chuci.bhakta.janāhṛtam || 38 ||
AHS1.8.039a/ bhojanaṁ tṛṇa.keśādi.juṣṭam uṣṇī.kṛtaṁ punaḥ |
AHS1.8.039c/ śākāvarānna.bhūyiṣṭham aty.uṣṇa.lavaṇaṁ tyajet || 39 ||
AHS1.8.040a/ kilāṭa.dadhi.kūcīkā.kṣāra.śuktāma.mūlakam |
AHS1.8.040c/ kṛśa.śuṣka.varāhāvi.go.matsya.mahiṣāmiṣam || 40 || [Note: AHS1.8.040v/ 8.40bv .kṣāra.śuktāmla.mūlakam]
AHS1.8.041a/ māṣa.niṣpāva.śālūka.bisa.piṣṭa.virūḍhakam |
AHS1.8.041c/ śuṣka.śākāni yavakān phāṇitaṁ ca na śīlayet || 41 || [Note: AHS1.8.041v/ 8.41bv .tila.piṣṭa.virūḍhakam]
AHS1.8.042a/ śīlayec chāli.godhūma.yava.ṣaṣṭika.jāṅgalam |
AHS1.8.042c/ suniṣaṇṇaka.jīvantī.bāla.mūlaka.vāstukam || 42 ||
AHS1.8.043a/ pathyāmalaka.mṛdvīkā.paṭolī.mudga.śarkarāḥ |
AHS1.8.043c/ ghṛta.divyodaka.kṣīra.kṣaudra.dāḍima.saindhavam || 43 ||
AHS1.8.044a/ tri.phalāṁ madhu.sarpirbhyāṁ niśi netra.balāya ca |
AHS1.8.044c/ svāsthyānuvṛtti.kṛd yac ca rogoccheda.karaṁ ca yat || 44 ||
AHS1.8.045a/ bisekṣu.moca.cocāmra.modakotkārikādikam |
AHS1.8.045c/ adyād dravyaṁ guru snigdhaṁ svādu mandaṁ sthiraṁ puraḥ || 45 ||
AHS1.8.046a/ viparītam ataś cānte madhye 'mla.lavaṇotkaṭam |
AHS1.8.046c/ annena kukṣer dvāv aṁśau pānenaikaṁ prapūrayet || 46 ||
[Page 61 ]
AHS1.8.047a/ āśrayaṁ pavanādīnāṁ caturtham avaśeṣayet |
AHS1.8.047c/ anu.pānaṁ himaṁ vāri yava.godhūmayor hitam || 47 ||
AHS1.8.048a/ dadhni madye viṣe kṣaudre koṣṇaṁ piṣṭa.mayeṣu tu |
AHS1.8.048c/ śāka.mudgādi.vikṛtau mastu.takrāmla.kāñjikam || 48 || [Note: AHS1.8.048v/ 8.48bv koṣṇaṁ piṣṭa.mayeṣu ca]
AHS1.8.049a/ surā kṛśānāṁ puṣṭy.arthaṁ sthūlānāṁ tu madhūdakam |
AHS1.8.049c/ śoṣe māṁsa.raso madyaṁ māṁse sv.alpe ca pāvake || 49 || [Note: AHS1.8.049v/ 8.49bv sthūlānāṁ ca madhūdakam 8.49dv māṁseṣv alpe ca pāvake]
AHS1.8.050a/ vyādhy.auṣadhādhva.bhāṣya.strī.laṅghanātapa.karmabhiḥ |
AHS1.8.050c/ kṣīṇe vṛddhe ca bāle ca payaḥ pathyaṁ yathāmṛtam || 50 || [Note: AHS1.8.050v/ 8.50av vyādhy.auṣadhādhva.bhāra.strī.]
AHS1.8.051a/ viparītaṁ yad annasya guṇaiḥ syād a.virodhi ca |
AHS1.8.051c/ anu.pānaṁ samāsena sarva.dā tat praśasyate || 51 ||
AHS1.8.052a/ anu.pānaṁ karoty ūrjāṁ tṛptiṁ vyāptiṁ dṛḍhāṅga.tām |
AHS1.8.052c/ anna.saṅghāta.śaithilya.viklitti.jaraṇāni ca || 52 ||
AHS1.8.053a/ nordhva.jatru.gada.śvāsa.kāsoraḥ.kṣata.pīnase |
AHS1.8.053c/ gīta.bhāṣya.prasaṅge ca svara.bhede ca tad dhitam || 53 ||
AHS1.8.054a/ praklinna.deha.mehākṣi.gala.roga.vraṇāturāḥ |
AHS1.8.054c/ pānaṁ tyajeyuḥ sarvaś ca bhāṣyādhva.śayanaṁ tyajet || 54 ||
AHS1.8.055ab/ pītvā bhuktvātapaṁ vahniṁ yānaṁ plavana.vāhanam || 55ab ||
AHS1.8.055c/ prasṛṣṭe viṇ.mūtre hṛdi su.vi.male doṣe sva.patha.ge || 55c ||
AHS1.8.055d/ viśuddhe codgāre kṣud.upagamane vāte 'nusarati || 55d ||
AHS1.8.055e/ tathāgnāv udrikte viśada.karaṇe dehe ca su.laghau || 55e ||
AHS1.8.055f/ prayuñjītāhāraṁ vidhi.niyamitaṁ kālaḥ sa hi mataḥ || 55f || [Note: AHS1.8.055v/ 8.55fv prayuñjītāhāraṁ vidhi.niyamitaḥ kālaḥ sa hi mataḥ]

1.9. Chapter 9 :: Athadravyādivijñānīyādhyāyo navamaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 74-80]
AHS1.9.001a/ dravyam eva rasādīnāṁ śreṣṭhaṁ te hi tad.āśrayāḥ |
AHS1.9.001c/ pañca.bhūtātmakaṁ tat tu kṣmām adhiṣṭhāya jāyate || 1 ||
[Page 62 ]
AHS1.9.002a/ ambu.yony.agni.pavana.nabhasām samavāyataḥ |
AHS1.9.002c/ tan.nirvṛttir viśeṣaś ca vyapadeśas tu bhūyasā || 2 || [Note: AHS1.9.002v/ 9.2dv vyapadeśaś ca bhūyasā]
AHS1.9.003a/ tasmān naika.rasaṁ dravyaṁ bhūta.saṅghāta.sambhavāt |
AHS1.9.003c/ naika.doṣās tato rogās tatra vyakto rasaḥ smṛtaḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS1.9.003v/ 9.3av tan naika.bhūta.jaṁ dravyaṁ]
AHS1.9.004a/ a.vyakto 'nu.rasaḥ kiñ.cid ante vyakto 'pi ceṣyate |
AHS1.9.004c/ gurv.ādayo guṇā dravye pṛthivy.ādau rasāśraye || 4 ||
AHS1.9.005a/ raseṣu vyapadiśyante sāhacaryopacārataḥ |
AHS1.9.005c/ tatra dravyaṁ guru.sthūla.sthira.gandha.guṇolbaṇam || 5 ||
AHS1.9.006a/ pārthivaṁ gaurava.sthairya.saṅghātopacayāvaham |
AHS1.9.006c/ drava.śīta.guru.snigdha.manda.sāndra.rasolbaṇam || 6 || [Note: AHS1.9.006v/ 9.6dv .manda.sāndra.guṇolbaṇam]
AHS1.9.007a/ āpyaṁ snehana.viṣyanda.kleda.prahlāda.bandha.kṛt |
AHS1.9.007c/ rūkṣa.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.viśada.sūkṣma.rūpa.guṇolbaṇam || 7 ||
AHS1.9.008a/ āgneyaṁ dāha.bhā.varṇa.prakāśa.pavanātmakam |
AHS1.9.008c/ vāyavyaṁ rūkṣa.viśada.laghu.sparśa.guṇolbaṇam || 8 ||
AHS1.9.009a/ raukṣya.lāghava.vaiśadya.vicāra.glāni.kārakam |
AHS1.9.009c/ nābhasaṁ sūkṣma.viśada.laghu.śabda.guṇolbaṇam || 9 || [Note: AHS1.9.009v/ 9.9bv .vicāra.glapanātmakam]
AHS1.9.010a/ sauṣirya.lāghava.karaṁ jagaty evam an.auṣadham |
AHS1.9.010c/ na kiñ.cid vidyate dravyaṁ vaśān nānārtha.yogayoḥ || 10 ||
AHS1.9.011a/ dravyam ūrdhva.gamaṁ tatra prāyo 'gni.pavanotkaṭam |
AHS1.9.011c/ adho.gāmi ca bhūyiṣṭhaṁ bhūmi.toya.guṇādhikam || 11 ||
[Page 63 ]
AHS1.9.012a/ iti dravyaṁ rasān bhedair uttara.tropadekṣyate |
AHS1.9.012c/ vīryaṁ punar vadanty eke guru snigdhaṁ himaṁ mṛdu || 12 || [Note: AHS1.9.012v/ 9.12av iti dravyaṁ raso bhedair]
AHS1.9.013a/ laghu rūkṣoṣṇa.tīkṣṇaṁ ca tad evaṁ matam aṣṭa.dhā |
AHS1.9.013c/ carakas tv āha vīryaṁ tat kriyate yena yā kriyā || 13 || [Note: AHS1.9.013v/ 9.13cv carakas tv āha vīryaṁ tu 9.13dv yena yā kriyate kriyā]
AHS1.9.014a/ nā.vīryaṁ kurute kiñ.cit sarvā vīrya.kṛtā hi sā |
AHS1.9.014c/ gurv.ādiṣv eva vīryākhyā tenānv.artheti varṇyate || 14 ||
AHS1.9.015a/ samagra.guṇa.sāreṣu śakty.utkarṣa.vivartiṣu |
AHS1.9.015c/ vyavahārāya mukhya.tvād bahv.agra.grahaṇād api || 15 || [Note: AHS1.9.015v/ 9.15av samagra.guṇa.sāra.tvāc 9.15bv chakty.utkarṣa.vivartanāt]
AHS1.9.016a/ ataś ca viparīta.tvāt sambhavaty api naiva sā |
AHS1.9.016c/ vivakṣyate rasādyeṣu vīryaṁ gurv.ādayo hy ataḥ || 16 ||
AHS1.9.017a/ uṣṇaṁ śītaṁ dvi.dhaivānye vīryam ācakṣate 'pi ca |
AHS1.9.017c/ nānātmakam api dravyam agnī.ṣomau mahā.balau || 17 ||
AHS1.9.018a/ vyaktā.vyaktaṁ jagad iva nātikrāmati jātu cit |
AHS1.9.018c/ tatroṣṇaṁ bhrama.tṛḍ.glāni.sveda.dāhāśu.pāki.tāḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS1.9.018v/ 9.18av vyaktā.vyaktaṁ jagad idaṁ 9.18av vyaktāvyaktaṁ yathā viśvaṁ]
AHS1.9.019a/ śamaṁ ca vāta.kaphayoḥ karoti śiśiraṁ punaḥ |
AHS1.9.019c/ hlādanaṁ jīvanaṁ stambhaṁ prasādaṁ rakta.pittayoḥ || 19 ||
AHS1.9.020a/ jāṭhareṇāgninā yogād yad udeti rasāntaram |
AHS1.9.020c/ rasānāṁ pariṇāmānte sa vipāka iti smṛtaḥ || 20 ||
AHS1.9.021a/ svāduḥ paṭuś ca madhuram amlo 'mlaṁ pacyate rasaḥ |
AHS1.9.021c/ tiktoṣaṇa.kaṣāyāṇāṁ vipākaḥ prāya.śaḥ kaṭuḥ || 21 ||
[Page 64 ]
AHS1.9.022a/ rasair asau tulya.phalas tatra dravyaṁ śubhā.śubham |
AHS1.9.022c/ kiñ.cid rasena kurute karma pākena cāparam || 22 ||
AHS1.9.023a/ guṇāntareṇa vīryeṇa prabhāveṇaiva kiñ.ca.na |
AHS1.9.023c/ yad yad dravye rasādīnāṁ bala.vat.tvena vartate || 23 ||
AHS1.9.024a/ abhibhūyetarāṁs tat tat kāraṇa.tvaṁ prapadyate |
AHS1.9.024c/ viruddha.guṇa.saṁyoge bhūyasālpaṁ hi jīyate || 24 ||
AHS1.9.025a/ rasaṁ vipākas tau vīryaṁ prabhāvas tāny apohati |
AHS1.9.025c/ bala.sāmye rasādīnām iti naisargikaṁ balam || 25 || [Note: AHS1.9.025v/ 9.25bv prabhāvas tān vyapohati]
AHS1.9.026a/ rasādi.sāmye yat karma viśiṣṭaṁ tat prabhāva.jam |
AHS1.9.026c/ dantī rasādyais tulyāpi citrakasya virecanī || 26 ||
AHS1.9.027a/ madhukasya ca mṛdvīkā ghṛtaṁ kṣīrasya dīpanam |
AHS1.9.027c/ iti sāmānyataḥ karma dravyādīnāṁ punaś ca tat || 27 ||
AHS1.9.028a/ vicitra.pratyayārabdha.dravya.bhedena bhidyate |
AHS1.9.028c/ svādur guruś ca godhūmo vāta.jid vāta.kṛd yavaḥ || 28 ||
AHS1.9.028ū̆/ uṣṇā matsyāḥ payaḥ śītaṁ kaṭuḥ siṁho na śūkaraḥ || 28ū̆ ||

1.10. Chapter 10 :: Atharasabhedīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 80-84]
AHS1.10.001a/ kṣmāmbho.'gni.kṣmāmbu.tejaḥ.kha.vāyv.agny.anila.go.'nilaiḥ |
AHS1.10.001c/ dvayolbaṇaiḥ kramād bhūtair madhurādi.rasodbhavaḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.10.002a/ teṣāṁ vidyād rasaṁ svāduṁ yo vaktram anulimpati |
AHS1.10.002c/ āsvādyamāno dehasya hlādano 'kṣa.prasādanaḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS1.10.002v/ 10.2bv yo vaktram upalimpati]
[Page 65 ]
AHS1.10.003a/ priyaḥ pipīlikādīnām amlaḥ kṣālayate mukham |
AHS1.10.003c/ harṣaṇo roma.dantānām akṣi.bhruva.nikocanaḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS1.10.003v/ 10.3bv amlaḥ srāvayate mukham]
AHS1.10.004a/ lavaṇaḥ syandayaty āsyaṁ kapola.gala.dāha.kṛt |
AHS1.10.004c/ tikto viśadayaty āsyaṁ rasanaṁ pratihanti ca || 4 || [Note: AHS1.10.004v/ 10.4dv rasanāṁ pratihanti ca]
AHS1.10.005a/ udvejayati jihvāgraṁ kurvaṁś cimicimāṁ kaṭuḥ |
AHS1.10.005c/ srāvayaty akṣi.nāsāsyaṁ kapolaṁ dahatīva ca || 5 ||
AHS1.10.006a/ kaṣāyo jaḍayej jihvāṁ kaṇṭha.sroto.vibandha.kṛt |
AHS1.10.006c/ rasānām iti rūpāṇi karmāṇi madhuro rasaḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.10.007a/ ā.janma.sātmyāt kurute dhātūnāṁ prabalaṁ balam |
AHS1.10.007c/ bāla.vṛddha.kṣata.kṣīṇa.varṇa.keśendriyaujasām || 7 ||
AHS1.10.008a/ praśasto bṛṁhaṇaḥ kaṇṭhyaḥ stanya.sandhāna.kṛd guruḥ |
AHS1.10.008c/ āyuṣyo jīvanaḥ snigdhaḥ pittānila.viṣāpahaḥ || 8 ||
AHS1.10.009a/ kurute 'ty.upayogena sa medaḥ.śleṣma.jān gadān |
AHS1.10.009c/ sthaulyāgni.sāda.sannyāsa.meha.gaṇḍārbudādikān || 9 || [Note: AHS1.10.009v/ 10.9bv sa medaḥ.kapha.jān gadān]
AHS1.10.010a/ amlo 'gni.dīpti.kṛt snigdho hṛdyaḥ pācana.rocanaḥ |
AHS1.10.010c/ uṣṇa.vīryo hima.sparśaḥ prīṇanaḥ kledano laghuḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS1.10.010v/ 10.10cv uṣṇa.vīryo himaḥ sparśe 10.10dv prīṇano bhedano laghuḥ]
AHS1.10.011a/ karoti kapha.pittāsraṁ mūḍha.vātānulomanaḥ |
AHS1.10.011c/ so 'ty.abhyastas tanoḥ kuryāc chaithilyaṁ timiraṁ bhramam || 11 || [Note: AHS1.10.011v/ 10.11bv mūḍha.vātānulomanam]
AHS1.10.012a/ kaṇḍū.pāṇḍu.tva.vīsarpa.śopha.visphoṭa.tṛḍ.jvarān |
AHS1.10.012c/ lavaṇaḥ stambha.saṅghāta.bandha.vidhmāpano 'gni.kṛt || 12 ||
[Page 66 ]
AHS1.10.013a/ snehanaḥ svedanas tīkṣṇo rocanaś cheda.bheda.kṛt |
AHS1.10.013c/ so 'ti.yukto 'sra.pavanaṁ khalatiṁ palitaṁ valīm || 13 ||
AHS1.10.014a/ tṛṭ.kuṣṭha.viṣa.vīsarpān janayet kṣapayed balam |
AHS1.10.014c/ tiktaḥ svayam a.rociṣṇur a.ruciṁ kṛmi.tṛḍ.viṣam || 14 ||
AHS1.10.015a/ kuṣṭha.mūrchā.jvarotkleśa.dāha.pitta.kaphāñ jayet |
AHS1.10.015c/ kleda.medo.vasā.majja.śakṛn.mūtropaśoṣaṇaḥ || 15 ||
AHS1.10.016a/ laghur medhyo himo rūkṣaḥ stanya.kaṇṭha.viśodhanaḥ |
AHS1.10.016c/ dhātu.kṣayānila.vyādhīn ati.yogāt karoti saḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS1.10.016v/ 10.16cv dhātu.kṣayaṁ cala.vyādhīn]
AHS1.10.017a/ kaṭur galāmayodarda.kuṣṭhālasaka.śopha.jit |
AHS1.10.017c/ vraṇāvasādanaḥ sneha.medaḥ.kledopaśoṣaṇaḥ || 17 ||
AHS1.10.018a/ dīpanaḥ pācano rucyaḥ śodhano 'nnasya śoṣaṇaḥ |
AHS1.10.018c/ chinatti bandhān srotāṁsi vivṛṇoti kaphāpahaḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS1.10.018v/ 10.18bv śodhano 'nnasya hāṣaṇaḥ]
AHS1.10.019a/ kurute so 'ti.yogena tṛṣṇāṁ śukra.bala.kṣayam |
AHS1.10.019c/ mūrchām ākuñcanaṁ kampaṁ kaṭī.pṛṣṭhādiṣu vyathām || 19 || [Note: AHS1.10.019v/ 10.19av kurute so 'ti.vegena]
AHS1.10.020a/ kaṣāyaḥ pitta.kapha.hā gurur asra.viśodhanaḥ |
AHS1.10.020c/ pīḍano ropaṇaḥ śītaḥ kleda.medo.viśoṣaṇaḥ || 20 ||
AHS1.10.021a/ āma.saṁstambhano grāhī rūkṣo 'ti tvak.prasādanaḥ |
AHS1.10.021c/ karoti śīlitaḥ so 'ti viṣṭambhādhmāna.hṛd.rujaḥ || 21 ||
AHS1.10.022a/ tṛṭ.kārśya.pauruṣa.bhraṁśa.sroto.rodha.mala.grahān |
AHS1.10.022c/ ghṛta.hema.guḍākṣoṭa.moca.coca.parūṣakam || 22 || [Note: AHS1.10.022v/ 10.22bv .sroto.rodha.gala.grahān 10.22bv .sroto.bandha.mala.grahān]
[Page 67 ]
AHS1.10.023a/ abhīru.vīrā.panasa.rājādana.balā.trayam |
AHS1.10.023c/ mede catasraḥ parṇinyo jīvantī jīvakarṣabhau || 23 ||
AHS1.10.024a/ madhūkaṁ madhukaṁ bimbī vidārī śrāvaṇī.yugam |
AHS1.10.024c/ kṣīraśuklā tukākṣīrī kṣīriṇyau kāśmarī sahe || 24 || [Note: AHS1.10.024v/ 10.24cv kṣīraśuklā tavakṣīrī]
AHS1.10.025a/ kṣīrekṣu.gokṣura.kṣaudra.drākṣādir madhuro gaṇaḥ |
AHS1.10.025c/ amlo dhātrī.phalāmlīkā.mātuluṅgāmla.vetasam || 25 ||
AHS1.10.026a/ dāḍimaṁ rajataṁ takraṁ cukraṁ pālevataṁ dadhi |
AHS1.10.026c/ āmram āmrātakaṁ bhavyaṁ kapitthaṁ karamardakam || 26 ||
AHS1.10.026+1a/ vṛkṣāmla.kola.likuca.kośāmlātaka.dhanvanam |
AHS1.10.026+1c/ mastu.dhānyāmla.madyāni jambīraṁ tila.kaṇṭakam || 26+1 ||
AHS1.10.027a/ varaṁ sauvarcalaṁ kṛṣṇaṁ viḍaṁ sāmudram audbhidam |
AHS1.10.027c/ romakaṁ pāṁsu.jaṁ sīsaṁ kṣāraś ca lavaṇo gaṇaḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS1.10.027v/ 10.27dv kṣārāś ca lavaṇo gaṇaḥ]
AHS1.10.028a/ tiktaḥ paṭolī trāyantī vālakośīra.candanam |
AHS1.10.028c/ bhūnimba.nimba.kaṭukā.tagarāguru.vatsakam || 28 ||
AHS1.10.029a/ naktamāla.dvi.rajanī.musta.mūrvāṭarūṣakam |
AHS1.10.029c/ pāṭhāpāmārga.kāṁsyāyo.guḍūcī.dhanvayāsakam || 29 ||
AHS1.10.030a/ pañca.mūlaṁ mahad vyāghryau viśālātiviṣā vacā |
AHS1.10.030c/ kaṭuko hiṅgu.marica.kṛmijit.pañca.kolakam || 30 || [Note: AHS1.10.030v/ 10.30cv kaṭuko hiṅgu.maricaṁ 10.30dv kṛmijit.pañca.kolakam]
AHS1.10.031a/ kuṭherādyā haritakāḥ pittaṁ mūtram aruṣkaram |
AHS1.10.031c/ vargaḥ kaṣāyaḥ pathyākṣaṁ śirīṣaḥ khadiro madhu || 31 || [Note: AHS1.10.031v/ 10.31bv pittaṁ mūtram aruṣkaraḥ 10.31cv vargaḥ kaṣāyaḥ pathyākṣaḥ]
[Page 68 ]
AHS1.10.032a/ kadambodumbaraṁ muktā.pravālāñjana.gairikam |
AHS1.10.032c/ bālaṁ kapitthaṁ kharjūraṁ bisa.padmotpalādi ca || 32 || [Note: AHS1.10.032v/ 10.32dv bisa.padmotpalāni ca]
AHS1.10.033a/ madhuraṁ śleṣmalaṁ prāyo jīrṇāc chāli.yavād ṛte |
AHS1.10.033c/ mudgād godhūmataḥ kṣaudrāt sitāyā jāṅgalāmiṣāt || 33 ||
AHS1.10.034a/ prāyo 'mlaṁ pitta.jananaṁ dāḍimāmalakād ṛte |
AHS1.10.034c/ a.pathyaṁ lavaṇaṁ prāyaś cakṣuṣo 'nya.tra saindhavāt || 34 ||
AHS1.10.035a/ tiktaṁ kaṭu ca bhūyiṣṭham a.vṛṣyaṁ vāta.kopanam |
AHS1.10.035c/ ṛte 'mṛtā.paṭolībhyāṁ śuṇṭhī.kṛṣṇā.rasonataḥ || 35 ||
AHS1.10.036a/ kaṣāyaṁ prāya.śaḥ śītaṁ stambhanaṁ cābhayāṁ vinā |
AHS1.10.036c/ rasāḥ kaṭv.amla.lavaṇā vīryeṇoṣṇā yathottaram || 36 || [Note: AHS1.10.036v/ 10.36bv stambhanaṁ cābhayāmṛte]
AHS1.10.037a/ tiktaḥ kaṣāyo madhuras tad.vad eva ca śītalāḥ |
AHS1.10.037c/ tiktaḥ kaṭuḥ kaṣāyaś ca rūkṣā baddha.malās tathā || 37 ||
AHS1.10.038a/ paṭv.amla.madhurāḥ snigdhāḥ sṛṣṭa.viṇ.mūtra.mārutāḥ |
AHS1.10.038c/ paṭoḥ kaṣāyas tasmāc ca madhuraḥ paramaṁ guruḥ || 38 ||
AHS1.10.039a/ laghur amlaḥ kaṭus tasmāt tasmād api ca tiktakaḥ |
AHS1.10.039c/ saṁyogāḥ sapta.pañcāśat kalpanā tu tri.ṣaṣṭi.dhā || 39 ||
AHS1.10.039.1+1a/ lavaṇād amla.madhurau kāryau syātāṁ yathā.kramam |
AHS1.10.039.1+1c/ vāyor nir.anubandhasya pāka.śānti.pravṛttaye || 39.1+1 || [Note: AHS1.10.039.1+1v/ 10.39.1+1dv pāka.śānti.prasaktaye]
AHS1.10.039.1+2a/ prāk tikto madhuraḥ paścāt kaṣāyo 'nte vidhīyate |
AHS1.10.039.1+2c/ taiḥ pittaṁ śamam abhyeti pakvācchī.kṛta.piṇḍitam || 39.1+2 ||
[Page 69 ]
AHS1.10.039.1+3a/ kaṭuḥ prāk tiktakaḥ paścāt kaṣāyo 'nte vidhīyate |
AHS1.10.039.1+3c/ taiḥ śleṣmā śamam abhyeti pakvācchī.kṛta.piṇḍitaḥ || 39.1+3 || [Note: AHS1.10.039.1+3v/ 10.39.1+3av kaṭukaḥ prāk tatas tiktaḥ 10.39.1+3dv pakvo 'cchī.kṛta.piṇḍitaḥ]
AHS1.10.040a/ rasānāṁ yaugika.tvena yathā.sthūlaṁ vibhajyate |
AHS1.10.040c/ ekaika.hīnās tān pañca.daśa yānti rasā dvike || 40 || [Note: AHS1.10.040v/ 10.40cv ekaika.hīnās te pañca. 10.40dv .pañca yānti rasā dvike]
AHS1.10.040+1a/ svādur dvikeṣu pañcāmlaś caturo lavaṇas trayam |
AHS1.10.040+1c/ dvau tiktaḥ kaṭukaś caikaṁ yāti pañca.daśeti tu || 40+1 ||
AHS1.10.041a/ trike svādur daśāmlaḥ ṣaṭ trīn paṭus tikta ekakam |
AHS1.10.041c/ catuṣkeṣu daśa svāduś caturo 'mlaḥ paṭuḥ sakṛt || 41 || [Note: AHS1.10.041v/ 10.41cv catuṣke tu daśa svāduś]
AHS1.10.042a/ pañcakeṣv ekam evāmlo madhuraḥ pañca sevate |
AHS1.10.042c/ dravyam ekaṁ ṣaḍ.āsvādam a.saṁyuktāś ca ṣaḍ rasāḥ || 42 ||
AHS1.10.043a/ ṣaṭ pañcakā ṣaṭ ca pṛthag rasāḥ syuś catur.dvikau pañca.daśa.prakārau |
AHS1.10.043c/ bhedās trikā viṁśatir ekam eva dravyaṁ ṣaḍ.āsvādam iti tri.ṣaṣṭiḥ || 43 ||
AHS1.10.044a/ te rasānu.rasato rasa.bhedās tāratamya.parikalpanayā ca |
AHS1.10.044c/ sambhavanti gaṇanāṁ samatītā doṣa.bheṣaja.vaśād upayojyāḥ || 44 ||

1.11. Chapter 11 :: Athadoṣādivijñānīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 84-89]
AHS1.11.001a/ doṣa.dhātu.malā mūlaṁ sadā dehasya taṁ calaḥ |
AHS1.11.001c/ utsāhocchvāsa.niśvāsa.ceṣṭā.vega.pravartanaiḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.11.002a/ samyag.gatyā ca dhātūnām akṣāṇāṁ pāṭavena ca |
AHS1.11.002c/ anugṛhṇāty a.vikṛtaḥ pittaṁ pakty.ūṣma.darśanaiḥ || 2 ||
AHS1.11.003a/ kṣut.tṛḍ.ruci.prabhā.medhā.dhī.śaurya.tanu.mārdavaiḥ |
AHS1.11.003c/ śleṣmā sthira.tva.snigdha.tva.sandhi.bandha.kṣamādibhiḥ || 3 ||
[Page 70 ]
AHS1.11.004a/ prīṇanaṁ jīvanaṁ lepaḥ sneho dhāraṇa.pūraṇe |
AHS1.11.004c/ garbhotpādaś ca dhātūnāṁ śreṣṭhaṁ karma kramāt smṛtam || 4 ||
AHS1.11.005a/ avaṣṭambhaḥ purīṣasya mūtrasya kleda.vāhanam |
AHS1.11.005c/ svedasya kleda.vidhṛtir vṛddhas tu kurute 'nilaḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS1.11.005v/ 11.5cv svedasya keśa.vidhṛtir 11.5dv vṛddhaś ca kurute 'nilaḥ]
AHS1.11.006a/ kārśya.kārṣṇyoṣṇa.kāma.tva.kampānāha.śakṛd.grahān |
AHS1.11.006c/ bala.nidrendriya.bhraṁśa.pralāpa.bhrama.dīna.tāḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS1.11.006v/ 11.6av kārśya.kārṣṇyoṣṇa.kāmi.tva.]
AHS1.11.007a/ pīta.viṇ.mūtra.netra.tvak.kṣut.tṛḍ.dāhālpa.nidra.tāḥ |
AHS1.11.007c/ pittaṁ śleṣmāgni.sadana.prasekālasya.gauravam || 7 ||
AHS1.11.008a/ śvaitya.śaitya.ślathāṅga.tvaṁ śvāsa.kāsāti.nidra.tāḥ |
AHS1.11.008c/ raso 'pi śleṣma.vad raktaṁ visarpa.plīha.vidradhīn || 8 ||
AHS1.11.009a/ kuṣṭha.vātāsra.pittāsra.gulmopa.kuśa.kāmalāḥ |
AHS1.11.009c/ vyaṅgāgni.nāśa.sammoha.rakta.tvaṅ.netra.mūtra.tāḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS1.11.009v/ 11.9cv vyaṅgāgni.sāda.sammoha]
AHS1.11.010a/ māṁsaṁ gaṇḍārbuda.granthi.gaṇḍorūdara.vṛddhi.tāḥ |
AHS1.11.010c/ kaṇṭhādiṣv adhi.māṁsaṁ ca tad.van medas tathā śramam || 10 || [Note: AHS1.11.010v/ 11.10bv .gaṇḍorūdara.vṛddha.tāḥ]
AHS1.11.011a/ alpe 'pi ceṣṭite śvāsaṁ sphik.stanodara.lambanam |
AHS1.11.011c/ asthy adhy.asthy adhi.dantāṁś ca majjā netrāṅga.gauravam || 11 ||
AHS1.11.012a/ parvasu sthūla.mūlāni kuryāt kṛcchrāṇy arūṁṣi ca |
AHS1.11.012c/ ati.strī.kāma.tāṁ vṛddhaṁ śuktaṁ śukrāśmarīm api || 12 ||
AHS1.11.013a/ kukṣāv ādhmānam āṭopaṁ gauravaṁ vedanāṁ śakṛt |
AHS1.11.013c/ mūtraṁ tu vasti.nistodaṁ kṛte 'py a.kṛta.sañjña.tām || 13 || [Note: AHS1.11.013v/ 11.13cv mūtraṁ tu vaster nistodaṁ]
[Page 71 ]
AHS1.11.014a/ svedo 'ti.sveda.daurgandhya.kaṇḍūr evaṁ ca lakṣayet |
AHS1.11.014c/ dūṣikādīn api malān bāhulya.guru.tādibhiḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.11.015a/ liṅgaṁ kṣīṇe 'nile 'ṅgasya sādo 'lpaṁ bhāṣitehitam |
AHS1.11.015c/ sañjñā.mohas tathā śleṣma.vṛddhy.uktāmaya.sambhavaḥ || 15 ||
AHS1.11.016a/ pitte mando 'nalaḥ śītaṁ prabhā.hāniḥ kaphe bhramaḥ |
AHS1.11.016c/ śleṣmāśayānāṁ śūnya.tvaṁ hṛd.dravaḥ ślatha.sandhi.tā || 16 || [Note: AHS1.11.016v/ 11.16dv hṛd.gadaḥ ślatha.sandhi.tā]
AHS1.11.017a/ rase raukṣyaṁ śramaḥ śoṣo glāniḥ śabdā.sahiṣṇu.tā |
AHS1.11.017c/ rakte 'mla.śiśira.prīti.sirā.śaithilya.rūkṣa.tāḥ || 17 ||
AHS1.11.018a/ māṁse 'kṣa.glāni.gaṇḍa.sphik.śuṣka.tā.sandhi.vedanāḥ |
AHS1.11.018c/ medasi svapanaṁ kaṭyāḥ plīhno vṛddhiḥ kṛśāṅga.tā || 18 ||
AHS1.11.019a/ asthny asthi.todaḥ śadanaṁ danta.keśa.nakhādiṣu |
AHS1.11.019c/ asthnāṁ majjani sauṣiryaṁ bhramas timira.darśanam || 19 || [Note: AHS1.11.019v/ 11.19av asthny asthi.todaḥ sadanaṁ]
AHS1.11.020a/ śukre cirāt prasicyeta śukraṁ śoṇitam eva vā |
AHS1.11.020c/ todo 'ty.arthaṁ vṛṣaṇayor meḍhraṁ dhūmāyatīva ca || 20 ||
AHS1.11.021a/ purīṣe vāyur antrāṇi sa.śabdo veṣṭayann iva |
AHS1.11.021c/ kukṣau bhramati yāty ūrdhvaṁ hṛt.pārśve pīḍayan bhṛśam || 21 || [Note: AHS1.11.021v/ 11.21cv kukṣiṁ bhramati yāty ūrdhvaṁ]
AHS1.11.022a/ mūtre 'lpaṁ mūtrayet kṛcchrād vi.varṇaṁ sāsram eva vā |
AHS1.11.022c/ svede roma.cyutiḥ stabdha.roma.tā sphuṭanaṁ tvacaḥ || 22 ||
AHS1.11.023a/ malānām ati.sūkṣmāṇāṁ dur.lakṣyaṁ lakṣayet kṣayam |
AHS1.11.023c/ sva.malāyana.saṁśoṣa.toda.śūnya.tva.lāghavaiḥ || 23 ||
[Page 72 ]
AHS1.11.024a/ doṣādīnāṁ yathā.svaṁ ca vidyād vṛddhi.kṣayau bhiṣak |
AHS1.11.024c/ kṣayeṇa viparītānāṁ guṇānāṁ vardhanena ca || 24 ||
AHS1.11.025a/ vṛddhiṁ malānāṁ saṅgāc ca kṣayaṁ cāti.visargataḥ |
AHS1.11.025c/ malocita.tvād dehasya kṣayo vṛddhes tu pīḍanaḥ || 25 ||
AHS1.11.026a/ tatrāsthani sthito vāyuḥ pittaṁ tu sveda.raktayoḥ |
AHS1.11.026c/ śleṣmā śeṣeṣu tenaiṣām āśrayāśrayiṇāṁ mithaḥ || 26 ||
AHS1.11.027a/ yad ekasya tad anyasya vardhana.kṣapaṇauṣadham |
AHS1.11.027c/ asthi.mārutayor naivaṁ prāyo vṛddhir hi tarpaṇāt || 27 ||
AHS1.11.028a/ śleṣmaṇānugatā tasmāt saṅkṣayas tad.viparyayāt |
AHS1.11.028c/ vāyunānugato 'smāc ca vṛddhi.kṣaya.samudbhavān || 28 ||
AHS1.11.029a/ vikārān sādhayec chīghraṁ kramāl laṅghana.bṛṁhaṇaiḥ |
AHS1.11.029c/ vāyor anya.tra taj.jāṁs tu tair evotkrama.yojitaiḥ || 29 ||
AHS1.11.030a/ viśeṣād rakta.vṛddhy.utthān rakta.sruti.virecanaiḥ |
AHS1.11.030c/ māṁsa.vṛddhi.bhavān rogān śastra.kṣārāgni.karmabhiḥ || 30 ||
AHS1.11.031a/ sthaulya.kārśyopacāreṇa medo.jān asthi.saṅkṣayāt |
AHS1.11.031c/ jātān kṣīra.ghṛtais tikta.saṁyutair vastibhis tathā || 31 || [Note: AHS1.11.031v/ 11.31dv .saṁyuktair vastibhis tathā]
AHS1.11.031+1a/ majja.śukrodbhavān rogān bhojanaiḥ svādu.tiktakaiḥ |
AHS1.11.031+1c/ vṛddhaṁ śukraṁ vyavāyādyair yac cānyac chukra.śoṣikam || 31+1 || [Note: AHS1.11.031+1v/ 11.31+1av praty.anīkauṣadhaṁ majja. 11.31+1bv .śukra.vṛddhi.kṣaye hitam]
AHS1.11.032a/ viḍ.vṛddhi.jān atīsāra.kriyayā viṭ.kṣayodbhavān |
AHS1.11.032c/ meṣāja.madhya.kulmāṣa.yava.māṣa.dvayādibhiḥ || 32 ||
[Page 73 ]
AHS1.11.033a/ mūtra.vṛddhi.kṣayotthāṁś ca meha.kṛcchra.cikitsayā |
AHS1.11.033c/ vyāyāmābhyañjana.sveda.madyaiḥ sveda.kṣayodbhavān || 33 || [Note: AHS1.11.033v/ 11.33av mūtra.vṛddhi.kṣayotthāṁs tu]
AHS1.11.034a/ sva.sthāna.sthasya kāyāgner aṁśā dhātuṣu saṁśritāḥ |
AHS1.11.034c/ teṣāṁ sādāti.dīptibhyāṁ dhātu.vṛddhi.kṣayodbhavaḥ || 34 ||
AHS1.11.035a/ pūrvo dhātuḥ paraṁ kuryād vṛddhaḥ kṣīṇaś ca tad.vidham |
AHS1.11.035c/ doṣā duṣṭā rasair dhātūn dūṣayanty ubhaye malān || 35 ||
AHS1.11.036a/ adho dve sapta śirasi khāni sveda.vahāni ca |
AHS1.11.036c/ malā malāyanāni syur yathā.svaṁ teṣv ato gadāḥ || 36 ||
AHS1.11.037a/ ojas tu tejo dhātūnāṁ śukrāntānāṁ paraṁ smṛtam |
AHS1.11.037c/ hṛdaya.stham api vyāpi deha.sthiti.nibandhanam || 37 ||
AHS1.11.038a/ snigdhaṁ somātmakaṁ śuddham īṣal.lohita.pītakam |
AHS1.11.038c/ yan.nāśe niyataṁ nāśo yasmiṁs tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhati || 38 ||
AHS1.11.039a/ niṣpadyante yato bhāvā vividhā deha.saṁśrayāḥ |
AHS1.11.039c/ ojaḥ kṣīyeta kopa.kṣud.dhyāna.śoka.śramādibhiḥ || 39 ||
AHS1.11.040a/ bibheti dur.balo 'bhīkṣṇaṁ dhyāyati vyathitendriyaḥ |
AHS1.11.040c/ duś.chāyo dur.manā rūkṣo bhavet kṣāmaś ca tat.kṣaye || 40 || [Note: AHS1.11.040v/ 11.40cv vi.cchāyo dur.manā rūkṣo 11.40dv bhavet kṣāmaś ca tat.kṣayāt]
AHS1.11.041a/ jīvanīyauṣadha.kṣīra.rasādyās tatra bheṣajam |
AHS1.11.041c/ ojo.vṛddhau hi dehasya tuṣṭi.puṣṭi.balodayaḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS1.11.041v/ 11.41cv ojo.vṛddhau ca dehasya 11.41cv ojo.vṛddhau tu dehasya 11.41dv tuṣṭi.puṣṭi.balodayāḥ]
AHS1.11.042a/ yad annaṁ dveṣṭi yad api prārthayetā.virodhi tu |
AHS1.11.042c/ tat tat tyajan samaśnaṁś ca tau tau vṛddhi.kṣayau jayet || 42 || [Note: AHS1.11.042v/ 11.42cv tat tat tyajan samaśnan vā]
[Page 74 ]
AHS1.11.043a/ kurvate hi ruciṁ doṣā viparīta.samānayoḥ |
AHS1.11.043c/ vṛddhāḥ kṣīṇāś ca bhūyiṣṭhaṁ lakṣayanty a.budhās tu na || 43 || [Note: AHS1.11.043v/ 11.43av kurvanti hi ruciṁ doṣā]
AHS1.11.044a/ yathā.balaṁ yathā.svaṁ ca doṣā vṛddhā vitanvate |
AHS1.11.044c/ rūpāṇi jahati kṣīṇāḥ samāḥ svaṁ karma kurvate || 44 ||
AHS1.11.045a/ ya eva dehasya samā vivṛddhyai ta eva doṣā viṣamā vadhāya |
AHS1.11.045c/ yasmād atas te hita.caryayaiva kṣayād vivṛddher iva rakṣaṇīyāḥ || 45 || [Note: AHS1.11.045v/ 11.45dv kṣayād vivṛddher api rakṣaṇīyāḥ]

1.12. Chapter 12 :: Athadoṣabhedīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 89-99]
AHS1.12.001a/ pakvāśaya.kaṭī.sakthi.śrotrāsthi.sparśanendriyam |
AHS1.12.001c/ sthānaṁ vātasya tatrāpi pakvādhānaṁ viśeṣataḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.12.002a/ nābhir āmāśayaḥ svedo lasīkā rudhiraṁ rasaḥ |
AHS1.12.002c/ dṛk sparśanaṁ ca pittasya nābhir atra viśeṣataḥ || 2 ||
AHS1.12.003a/ uraḥ.kaṇṭha.śiraḥ.kloma.parvāṇy āmāśayo rasaḥ |
AHS1.12.003c/ medo ghrāṇaṁ ca jihvā ca kaphasya su.tarām uraḥ || 3 ||
AHS1.12.004a/ prāṇādi.bhedāt pañcātmā vāyuḥ prāṇo 'tra mūrdha.gaḥ |
AHS1.12.004c/ uraḥ.kaṇṭha.caro buddhi.hṛdayendriya.citta.dhṛk || 4 ||
AHS1.12.005a/ ṣṭhīvana.kṣavathūdgāra.niḥśvāsānna.praveśa.kṛt |
AHS1.12.005c/ uraḥ sthānam udānasya nāsā.nābhi.galāṁś caret || 5 || [Note: AHS1.12.005v/ 12.5dv nāsā.nābhi.galāṁś caran]
AHS1.12.006a/ vāk.pravṛtti.prayatnorjā.bala.varṇa.smṛti.kriyaḥ |
AHS1.12.006c/ vyāno hṛdi sthitaḥ kṛtsna.deha.cārī mahā.javaḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.12.007a/ gaty.apakṣepaṇotkṣepa.nimeṣonmeṣaṇādikāḥ |
AHS1.12.007c/ prāyaḥ sarvāḥ kriyās tasmin pratibaddhāḥ śarīriṇām || 7 ||
[Page 75 ]
AHS1.12.008a/ samāno 'gni.samīpa.sthaḥ koṣṭhe carati sarvataḥ |
AHS1.12.008c/ annaṁ gṛhṇāti pacati vivecayati muñcati || 8 ||
AHS1.12.009a/ apāno 'pāna.gaḥ śroṇi.vasti.meḍhroru.go.caraḥ |
AHS1.12.009c/ śukrārtava.śakṛn.mūtra.garbha.niṣkramaṇa.kriyaḥ || 9 ||
AHS1.12.010a/ pittaṁ pañcātmakaṁ tatra pakvāmāśaya.madhya.gam |
AHS1.12.010c/ pañca.bhūtātmaka.tve 'pi yat taijasa.guṇodayāt || 10 ||
AHS1.12.011a/ tyakta.dravya.tvaṁ pākādi.karmaṇānala.śabditam |
AHS1.12.011c/ pacaty annaṁ vibhajate sāra.kiṭṭau pṛthak tathā || 11 || [Note: AHS1.12.011v/ 12.11dv sāra.kiṭṭe pṛthak tathā]
AHS1.12.012a/ tatra.stham eva pittānāṁ śeṣāṇām apy anugraham |
AHS1.12.012c/ karoti bala.dānena pācakaṁ nāma tat smṛtam || 12 ||
AHS1.12.013a/ āmāśayāśrayaṁ pittaṁ rañjakaṁ rasa.rañjanāt |
AHS1.12.013c/ buddhi.medhābhimānādyair abhipretārtha.sādhanāt || 13 ||
AHS1.12.014a/ sādhakaṁ hṛd.gataṁ pittaṁ rūpālocanataḥ smṛtam |
AHS1.12.014c/ dṛk.stham ālocakaṁ tvak.sthaṁ bhrājakaṁ bhrājanāt tvacaḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.12.015a/ śleṣmā tu pañca.dhoraḥ.sthaḥ sa trikasya sva.vīryataḥ |
AHS1.12.015c/ hṛdayasyānna.vīryāc ca tat.stha evāmbu.karmaṇā || 15 || [Note: AHS1.12.015v/ 12.15av śleṣmāpi pañca.dhoraḥ.sthaḥ]
AHS1.12.016a/ kapha.dhāmnāṁ ca śeṣāṇāṁ yat karoty avalambanam |
AHS1.12.016c/ ato 'valambakaḥ śleṣmā yas tv āmāśaya.saṁsthitaḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS1.12.016v/ 12.16dv yas tv āmāśaya.saṁśritaḥ]
AHS1.12.017a/ kledakaḥ so 'nna.saṅghāta.kledanād rasa.bodhanāt |
AHS1.12.017c/ bodhako rasanā.sthāyī śiraḥ.saṁstho 'kṣa.tarpaṇāt || 17 ||
[Page 76 ]
AHS1.12.018a/ tarpakaḥ sandhi.saṁśleṣāc chleṣakaḥ sandhiṣu sthitaḥ |
AHS1.12.018c/ iti prāyeṇa doṣāṇāṁ sthānāny a.vikṛtātmanām || 18 || [Note: AHS1.12.018v/ 12.18bv chleṣakaḥ sandhi.saṁsthitaḥ]
AHS1.12.019a/ vyāpinām api jānīyāt karmāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak |
AHS1.12.019c/ uṣṇena yuktā rūkṣādyā vāyoḥ kurvanti sañcayam || 19 ||
AHS1.12.020a/ śītena kopam uṣṇena śamaṁ snigdhādayo guṇāḥ |
AHS1.12.020c/ śītena yuktās tīkṣṇādyāś cayaṁ pittasya kurvate || 20 ||
AHS1.12.021a/ uṣṇena kopaṁ mandādyāḥ śamaṁ śītopasaṁhitāḥ |
AHS1.12.021c/ śītena yuktāḥ snigdhādyāḥ kurvate śleṣmaṇaś cayam || 21 ||
AHS1.12.022a/ uṣṇena kopaṁ tenaiva guṇā rūkṣādayaḥ śamam |
AHS1.12.022c/ cayo vṛddhiḥ sva.dhāmny eva pradveṣo vṛddhi.hetuṣu || 22 ||
AHS1.12.023a/ viparīta.guṇecchā ca kopas tūn.mārga.gami.tā |
AHS1.12.023c/ liṅgānāṁ darśanaṁ sveṣām a.svāsthyaṁ roga.sambhavaḥ || 23 ||
AHS1.12.024a/ sva.sthāna.sthasya sama.tā vikārā.sambhavaḥ śamaḥ |
AHS1.12.024c/ caya.prakopa.praśamā vāyor grīṣmādiṣu triṣu || 24 ||
AHS1.12.025a/ varṣādiṣu tu pittasya śleṣmaṇaḥ śiśirādiṣu |
AHS1.12.025c/ cīyate laghu.rūkṣābhir oṣadhibhiḥ samīraṇaḥ || 25 || [Note: AHS1.12.025v/ 12.25av varṣādiṣu ca pittasya]
AHS1.12.026a/ tad.vidhas tad.vidhe dehe kālasyauṣṇyān na kupyati |
AHS1.12.026c/ adbhir amla.vipākābhir oṣadhibhiś ca tādṛśam || 26 ||
AHS1.12.027a/ pittaṁ yāti cayaṁ kopaṁ na tu kālasya śaityataḥ |
AHS1.12.027c/ cīyate snigdha.śītābhir udakauṣadhibhiḥ kaphaḥ || 27 ||
[Page 77 ]
AHS1.12.028a/ tulye 'pi kāle dehe ca skanna.tvān na prakupyati |
AHS1.12.028c/ iti kāla.sva.bhāvo 'yam āhārādi.vaśāt punaḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS1.12.028v/ 12.28bv skanna.tvān na vikupyati]
AHS1.12.029a/ cayādīn yānti sadyo 'pi doṣāḥ kāle 'pi vā na tu |
AHS1.12.029c/ vyāpnoti sahasā deham ā.pāda.tala.mastakam || 29 ||
AHS1.12.030a/ nivartate tu kupito malo 'lpālpaṁ jalaugha.vat |
AHS1.12.030c/ nānā.rūpair a.saṅkhyeyair vikāraiḥ kupitā malāḥ || 30 ||
AHS1.12.031a/ tāpayanti tanuṁ tasmāt tad.dhetv.ākṛti.sādhanam |
AHS1.12.031c/ śakyaṁ naikaika.śo vaktum ataḥ sāmānyam ucyate || 31 ||
AHS1.12.032a/ doṣā eva hi sarveṣāṁ rogāṇām eka.kāraṇam |
AHS1.12.032c/ yathā pakṣī paripatan sarvataḥ sarvam apy ahaḥ || 32 ||
AHS1.12.033a/ chāyām atyeti nātmīyāṁ yathā vā kṛtsnam apy adaḥ |
AHS1.12.033c/ vikāra.jātaṁ vividhaṁ trīn guṇān nātivartate || 33 ||
AHS1.12.034a/ tathā sva.dhātu.vaiṣamya.nimittam api sarva.dā |
AHS1.12.034c/ vikāra.jātaṁ trīn doṣān teṣāṁ kope tu kāraṇam || 34 ||
AHS1.12.035a/ arthair a.sātmyaiḥ saṁyogaḥ kālaḥ karma ca duṣ.kṛtam |
AHS1.12.035c/ hīnāti.mithyā.yogena bhidyate tat punas tri.dhā || 35 ||
AHS1.12.036a/ hīno 'rthenendriyasyālpaḥ saṁyogaḥ svena naiva vā |
AHS1.12.036c/ ati.yogo 'ti.saṁsargaḥ sūkṣma.bhāsura.bhairavam || 36 ||
AHS1.12.037a/ aty.āsannāti.dūra.sthaṁ vi.priyaṁ vikṛtādi ca |
AHS1.12.037c/ yad akṣṇā vīkṣyate rūpaṁ mithyā.yogaḥ sa dāruṇaḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS1.12.037v/ 12.37dv mithyā.yogaḥ su.dāruṇaḥ]
[Page 78 ]
AHS1.12.038a/ evam aty.ucca.pūty.ādīn indriyārthān yathā.yatham |
AHS1.12.038c/ vidyāt kālas tu śītoṣṇa.varṣā.bhedāt tri.dhā mataḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS1.12.038v/ 12.38dv .varṣa.bhedāt tri.dhā mataḥ]
AHS1.12.039a/ sa hīno hīna.śītādir ati.yogo 'ti.lakṣaṇaḥ |
AHS1.12.039c/ mithyā.yogas tu nirdiṣṭo viparīta.sva.lakṣaṇaḥ || 39 ||
AHS1.12.040a/ kāya.vāk.citta.bhedena karmāpi vibhajet tri.dhā |
AHS1.12.040c/ kāyādi.karmaṇo hīnā pravṛttir hīna.sañjñakaḥ || 40 || [Note: AHS1.12.040v/ 12.40cv kāyādi.karmaṇāṁ hīnā 12.40dv pravṛttir hīna.sañjñikā]
AHS1.12.041a/ ati.yogo 'ti.vṛttis tu vegodīraṇa.dhāraṇam |
AHS1.12.041c/ viṣamāṅga.kriyārambha.patana.skhalanādikam || 41 || [Note: AHS1.12.041v/ 12.41av ati.yogo 'ti.vṛttiś ca]
AHS1.12.042a/ bhāṣaṇaṁ sāmi.bhuktasya rāga.dveṣa.bhayādi ca |
AHS1.12.042c/ karma prāṇātipātādi daśa.dhā yac ca ninditam || 42 ||
AHS1.12.043a/ mithyā.yogaḥ samasto 'sāv iha vāmu.tra vā kṛtam |
AHS1.12.043c/ nidānam etad doṣāṇāṁ kupitās tena naika.dhā || 43 || [Note: AHS1.12.043v/ 12.43bv iha cāmu.tra vā kṛtam]
AHS1.12.044a/ kurvanti vividhān vyādhīn śākhā.koṣṭhāsthi.sandhiṣu |
AHS1.12.044c/ śākhā raktādayas tvak ca bāhya.rogāyanaṁ hi tat || 44 || [Note: AHS1.12.044v/ 12.44dv bāhya.rogāyanaṁ hi sā]
AHS1.12.045a/ tad.āśrayā maṣa.vyaṅga.gaṇḍālajy.arbudādayaḥ |
AHS1.12.045c/ bahir.bhāgāś ca dur.nāma.gulma.śophādayo gadāḥ || 45 ||
AHS1.12.046a/ antaḥ koṣṭho mahā.srota āma.pakvāśayāśrayaḥ |
AHS1.12.046c/ tat.sthānāḥ chardy.atīsāra.kāsa.śvāsodara.jvarāḥ || 46 ||
AHS1.12.047a/ antar.bhāgaṁ ca śophārśo.gulma.visarpa.vidradhi |
AHS1.12.047c/ śiro.hṛdaya.vasty.ādi.marmāṇy asthnāṁ ca sandhayaḥ || 47 || [Note: AHS1.12.047v/ 12.47dv .marmāṇy asthnāṁ tu sandhayaḥ]
[Page 79 ]
AHS1.12.048a/ tan.nibaddhāḥ sirā.snāyu.kaṇḍarādyāś ca madhyamaḥ |
AHS1.12.048c/ roga.mārgaḥ sthitās tatra yakṣma.pakṣa.vadhārditāḥ || 48 ||
AHS1.12.049a/ mūrdhādi.rogāḥ sandhy.asthi.trika.śūla.grahādayaḥ |
AHS1.12.049c/ sraṁsa.vyāsa.vyadha.svāp a.sāda.ruk.toda.bhedanam || 49 ||
AHS1.12.050a/ saṅgāṅga.bhaṅga.saṅkoca.varta.harṣaṇa.tarpaṇam |
AHS1.12.050c/ kampa.pāruṣya.sauṣirya.śoṣa.spandana.veṣṭanam || 50 ||
AHS1.12.051a/ stambhaḥ kaṣāya.rasa.tā varṇaḥ śyāvo 'ruṇo 'pi vā |
AHS1.12.051c/ karmāṇi vāyoḥ pittasya dāha.rāgoṣma.pāki.tāḥ || 51 ||
AHS1.12.052a/ svedaḥ kledaḥ srutiḥ kothaḥ sadanaṁ mūrchanaṁ madaḥ |
AHS1.12.052c/ kaṭukāmlau rasau varṇaḥ pāṇḍurāruṇa.varjitaḥ || 52 ||
AHS1.12.053a/ śleṣmaṇaḥ sneha.kāṭhinya.kaṇḍū.śīta.tva.gauravam |
AHS1.12.053c/ bandhopalepa.staimitya.śophā.pakty.ati.nidra.tāḥ || 53 ||
AHS1.12.054a/ varṇaḥ śveto rasau svādu.lavaṇau cira.kāri.tā |
AHS1.12.054c/ ity a.śeṣāmaya.vyāpi yad uktaṁ doṣa.lakṣaṇam || 54 ||
AHS1.12.055a/ darśanādyair avahitas tat samyag upalakṣayet |
AHS1.12.055c/ vyādhy.avasthā.vibhāga.jñaḥ paśyann ārtān prati.kṣaṇam || 55 ||
AHS1.12.056a/ abhyāsāt prāpyate dṛṣṭiḥ karma.siddhi.prakāśinī |
AHS1.12.056c/ ratnādi.sad.a.saj.jñānaṁ na śāstrād eva jāyate || 56 || [Note: AHS1.12.056v/ 12.56av abhyāsāj jāyate dṛṣṭiḥ 12.56av abhyāsāt kevalaṁ dṛṣṭiḥ]
AHS1.12.057a/ dṛṣṭāpacāra.jaḥ kaś.cit kaś.cit pūrvāparādha.jaḥ |
AHS1.12.057c/ tat.saṅkarād bhavaty anyo vyādhir evaṁ tri.dhā smṛtaḥ || 57 || [Note: AHS1.12.057v/ 12.57bv kaś.cit pūrvāpacāra.jaḥ 12.57dv vyādhir evaṁ tri.dhā mataḥ]
[Page 80 ]
AHS1.12.058a/ yathā.nidānaṁ doṣotthaḥ karma.jo hetubhir vinā |
AHS1.12.058c/ mahārambho 'lpake hetāv ātaṅko doṣa.karma.jaḥ || 58 ||
AHS1.12.059a/ vipakṣa.śīlanāt pūrvaḥ karma.jaḥ karma.saṅkṣayāt |
AHS1.12.059c/ gacchaty ubhaya.janmā tu doṣa.karma.kṣayāt kṣayam || 59 ||
AHS1.12.060a/ dvi.dhā sva.para.tantra.tvād vyādhayo 'ntyāḥ punar dvi.dhā |
AHS1.12.060c/ pūrva.jāḥ pūrva.rūpākhyā jātāḥ paścād upadravāḥ || 60 ||
AHS1.12.061a/ yathā.sva.janmopaśayāḥ sva.tantrāḥ spaṣṭa.lakṣaṇāḥ |
AHS1.12.061c/ viparītās tato 'nye tu vidyād evaṁ malān api || 61 ||
AHS1.12.062a/ tān lakṣayed avahito vikurvāṇān prati.jvaram |
AHS1.12.062c/ teṣāṁ pradhāna.praśame praśamo '.śāmyatas tathā || 62 ||
AHS1.12.063a/ paścāc cikitset tūrṇaṁ vā bala.vantam upadravam |
AHS1.12.063c/ vyādhi.kliṣṭa.śarīrasya pīḍā.kara.taro hi saḥ || 63 || [Note: AHS1.12.063v/ 12.63av paścāc cikitset pūrvaṁ vā ]
AHS1.12.064a/ vikāra.nāmā.kuśalo na jihrīyāt kadā.ca.na |
AHS1.12.064c/ na hi sarva.vikārāṇāṁ nāmato 'sti dhruvā sthitiḥ || 64 ||
AHS1.12.065a/ sa eva kupito doṣaḥ samutthāna.viśeṣataḥ |
AHS1.12.065c/ sthānāntarāṇi ca prāpya vikārān kurute bahūn || 65 ||
AHS1.12.066a/ tasmād vikāra.prakṛtīr adhiṣṭhānāntarāṇi ca |
AHS1.12.066c/ buddhvā hetu.viśeṣāṁś ca śīghraṁ kuryād upakramam || 66 ||
AHS1.12.067a/ dūṣyaṁ deśaṁ balaṁ kālam analaṁ prakṛtiṁ vayaḥ |
AHS1.12.067c/ sat.tvaṁ sātmyaṁ tathāhāram avasthāś ca pṛthag.vidhāḥ || 67 ||
[Page 81 ]
AHS1.12.068a/ sūkṣma.sūkṣmāḥ samīkṣyaiṣāṁ doṣauṣadha.nirūpaṇe |
AHS1.12.068c/ yo vartate cikitsāyāṁ na sa skhalati jātu cit || 68 ||
AHS1.12.069a/ gurv.alpa.vyādhi.saṁsthānaṁ sat.tva.deha.balā.balāt |
AHS1.12.069c/ dṛśyate 'py anya.thā.kāraṁ tasminn avahito bhavet || 69 ||
AHS1.12.070a/ guruṁ laghum iti vyādhiṁ kalpayaṁs tu bhiṣag.bruvaḥ |
AHS1.12.070c/ alpa.doṣākalanayā pathye vipratipadyate || 70 || [Note: AHS1.12.070v/ 12.70bv kalayaṁs tu bhiṣag.bruvaḥ 12.70bv kalpayaṁs tu bhiṣag dhruvam]
AHS1.12.071a/ tato 'lpam alpa.vīryaṁ vā guru.vyādhau prayojitam |
AHS1.12.071c/ udīrayet.tarāṁ rogān saṁśodhanam a.yogataḥ || 71 ||
AHS1.12.072a/ śodhanaṁ tv ati.yogena viparītaṁ viparyaye |
AHS1.12.072c/ kṣiṇuyān na malān eva kevalaṁ vapur asyati || 72 || [Note: AHS1.12.072v/ 12.72dv kevalaṁ vapur apy ati]
AHS1.12.073a/ ato 'bhiyuktaḥ satataṁ sarvam ālocya sarva.thā |
AHS1.12.073c/ tathā yuñjīta bhaiṣajyam ārogyāya yathā dhruvam || 73 || [Note: AHS1.12.073v/ 12.73dv ārogyāya yathā bhavet]
AHS1.12.074a/ vakṣyante 'taḥ paraṁ doṣā vṛddhi.kṣaya.vibhedataḥ |
AHS1.12.074c/ pṛthak trīn viddhi saṁsargas tri.dhā tatra tu tān nava || 74 || [Note: AHS1.12.074v/ 12.74cv pṛthak trīn viddhi saṁsargaṁ]
AHS1.12.075a/ trīn eva samayā vṛddhyā ṣaḍ ekasyātiśāyane |
AHS1.12.075c/ trayo.daśa samasteṣu ṣaḍ dvy.ekātiśayena tu || 75 || [Note: AHS1.12.075v/ 12.75dv ṣaḍ dvy.ekātiśayena ca]
AHS1.12.076a/ ekaṁ tulyādhikaiḥ ṣaṭ ca tāratamya.vikalpanāt |
AHS1.12.076c/ pañca.viṁśatim ity evaṁ vṛddhaiḥ kṣīṇaiś ca tāvataḥ || 76 || [Note: AHS1.12.076v/ 12.76cv pañca.viṁśatir ity evaṁ]
AHS1.12.077a/ ekaika.vṛddhi.sama.tā.kṣayaiḥ ṣaṭ te punaś ca ṣaṭ |
AHS1.12.077c/ eka.kṣaya.dvandva.vṛddhyā sa.viparyayayāpi te || 77 ||
[Page 82 ]
AHS1.12.078ab/ bhedā dvi.ṣaṣṭir nirdiṣṭās tri.ṣaṣṭiḥ svāsthya.kāraṇam || 78ab ||
AHS1.12.078c/ saṁsargād rasa.rudhirādibhis tathaiṣāṁ || 78c ||
AHS1.12.078d/ doṣāṁs tu kṣaya.sama.tā.vivṛddhi.bhedaiḥ || 78d ||
AHS1.12.078e/ ānantyaṁ tara.tama.yogataś ca yātān || 78e ||
AHS1.12.078f/ jānīyād avahita.mānaso yathā.svam || 78f || [Note: AHS1.12.078v/ 12.78cv saṁsargād rasa.rudhirādibhis tathaitān 12.78dv doṣāṇāṁ kṣaya.sama.tā.vivṛddhi.bhedaiḥ]

1.13. Chapter 13 :: Athadoṣopakramaṇīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 99-103]
AHS1.13.001a/ vātasyopakramaḥ snehaḥ svedaḥ saṁśodhanaṁ mṛdu |
AHS1.13.001c/ svādv.amla.lavaṇoṣṇāni bhojyāny abhyaṅga.mardanam || 1 ||
AHS1.13.002a/ veṣṭanaṁ trāsanaṁ seko madyaṁ paiṣṭika.gauḍikam |
AHS1.13.002c/ snigdhoṣṇā vastayo vasti.niyamaḥ sukha.śīla.tā || 2 ||
AHS1.13.003a/ dīpanaiḥ pācanaiḥ snigdhāḥ snehāś cāneka.yonayaḥ |
AHS1.13.003c/ viśeṣān medya.piśita.rasa.tailānuvāsanam || 3 ||
AHS1.13.004a/ pittasya sarpiṣaḥ pānaṁ svādu.śītair virecanam |
AHS1.13.004c/ svādu.tikta.kaṣāyāṇi bhojanāny auṣadhāni ca || 4 ||
AHS1.13.005a/ su.gandhi.śīta.hṛdyānāṁ gandhānām upasevanam |
AHS1.13.005c/ kaṇṭhe.guṇānāṁ hārāṇāṁ maṇīnām urasā dhṛtiḥ || 5 ||
AHS1.13.006a/ karpūra.candanośīrair anulepaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe |
AHS1.13.006c/ pradoṣaś candramāḥ saudhaṁ hāri gītaṁ himo 'nilaḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.13.007a/ a.yantraṇa.sukhaṁ mitraṁ putraḥ sandigdha.mugdha.vāk |
AHS1.13.007c/ chandānuvartino dārāḥ priyāḥ śīla.vibhūṣitāḥ || 7 || [Note: AHS1.13.007v/ 13.7av a.yantraṇa.mukhaṁ mitraṁ]
AHS1.13.008a/ śītāmbu.dhārā.garbhāṇi gṛhāṇy udyāna.dīrghikāḥ |
AHS1.13.008c/ su.tīrtha.vipula.svaccha.salilāśaya.saikate || 8 ||
AHS1.13.009a/ sāmbho.ja.jala.tīrānte kāyamāne drumākule |
AHS1.13.009c/ saumyā bhāvāḥ payaḥ sarpir virekaś ca viśeṣataḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS1.13.009v/ 13.9bv kāyamānaṁ drumākule]
[Page 83 ]
AHS1.13.010a/ śleṣmaṇo vidhinā yuktaṁ tīkṣṇaṁ vamana.recanam |
AHS1.13.010c/ annaṁ rūkṣālpa.tīkṣṇoṣṇaṁ kaṭu.tikta.kaṣāyakam || 10 ||
AHS1.13.011a/ dīrgha.kāla.sthitaṁ madyaṁ rati.prītiḥ prajāgaraḥ |
AHS1.13.011c/ aneka.rūpo vyāyāmaś cintā rūkṣaṁ vimardanam || 11 ||
AHS1.13.012a/ viśeṣād vamanaṁ yūṣaḥ kṣaudraṁ medo.ghnam auṣadham |
AHS1.13.012c/ dhūmopavāsa.gaṇḍūṣā niḥ.sukha.tvaṁ sukhāya ca || 12 ||
AHS1.13.013a/ upakramaḥ pṛthag doṣān yo 'yam uddiśya kīrtitaḥ |
AHS1.13.013c/ saṁsarga.sannipāteṣu taṁ yathā.svaṁ vikalpayet || 13 || [Note: AHS1.13.013v/ 13.13dv taṁ yathā.svaṁ prakalpayet]
AHS1.13.014a/ graiṣmaḥ prāyo marut.pitte vāsantaḥ kapha.mārute |
AHS1.13.014c/ maruto yoga.vāhi.tvāt kapha.pitte tu śāradaḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.13.015a/ caya eva jayed doṣaṁ kupitaṁ tv a.virodhayan |
AHS1.13.015c/ sarva.kope balīyāṁsaṁ śeṣa.doṣā.virodhataḥ || 15 ||
AHS1.13.016a/ prayogaḥ śamayed vyādhim ekaṁ yo 'nyam udīrayet |
AHS1.13.016c/ nāsau viśuddhaḥ śuddhas tu śamayed yo na kopayet || 16 || [Note: AHS1.13.016v/ 13.16av prayogaḥ śamayed vyādhiṁ 13.16bv yo 'nyam anyam udīrayet]
AHS1.13.017a/ vyāyāmād ūṣmaṇas taikṣṇyād a.hitācaraṇād api |
AHS1.13.017c/ koṣṭhāc chākhāsthi.marmāṇi druta.tvān mārutasya ca || 17 ||
AHS1.13.018a/ doṣā yānti tathā tebhyaḥ sroto.mukha.viśodhanāt |
AHS1.13.018c/ vṛddhyābhiṣyandanāt pākāt koṣṭhaṁ vāyoś ca nigrahāt || 18 ||
AHS1.13.019a/ tatra.sthāś ca vilamberan bhūyo hetu.pratīkṣiṇaḥ |
AHS1.13.019c/ te kālādi.balaṁ labdhvā kupyanty anyāśrayeṣv api || 19 ||
[Page 84 ]
AHS1.13.020a/ tatrānya.sthāna.saṁstheṣu tadīyām a.baleṣu tu |
AHS1.13.020c/ kuryāc cikitsāṁ svām eva balenānyābhibhāviṣu || 20 ||
AHS1.13.021a/ āgantuṁ śamayed doṣaṁ sthāninaṁ pratikṛtya vā |
AHS1.13.021c/ prāyas tiryag.gatā doṣāḥ kleśayanty āturāṁś ciram || 21 ||
AHS1.13.021.1+1/ sādhāraṇaṁ vā kurvīta kriyām ubhaya.yoginīm || 21.1+1 ||
AHS1.13.022a/ kuryān na teṣu tvarayā dehāgni.bala.vit kriyām |
AHS1.13.022c/ śamayet tān prayogeṇa sukhaṁ vā koṣṭham ānayet || 22 ||
AHS1.13.023a/ jñātvā koṣṭha.prapannāṁś ca yathāsannaṁ vinirharet |
AHS1.13.023c/ sroto.rodha.bala.bhraṁśa.gauravānila.mūḍha.tāḥ || 23 || [Note: AHS1.13.023v/ 13.23dv .gauravānila.mūḍha.tā]
AHS1.13.024a/ ālasyā.pakti.niṣṭhīva.mala.saṅgā.ruci.klamāḥ |
AHS1.13.024c/ liṅgaṁ malānāṁ sāmānāṁ nir.āmāṇāṁ viparyayaḥ || 24 ||
AHS1.13.024.1+1a/ viṇ.mūtra.nakha.danta.tvak.cakṣuṣāṁ pīta.tā bhavet |
AHS1.13.024.1+1c/ rakta.tvam atha kṛṣṇa.tvaṁ pṛṣṭhāsthi.kaṭi.sandhi.ruk || 24.1+1 || [Note: AHS1.13.024.1+1v/ 13.24.1+1dv pṛṣṭhāsthi.kaṭi.sandhiṣu]
AHS1.13.024.1+2a/ śiro.ruk jāyate tīvrā nidrā vi.rasa.tā mukhe |
AHS1.13.024.1+2c/ kva.cic ca śvayathur gātre jvarātīsāra.harṣaṇam || 24.1+2 ||
AHS1.13.025a/ ūṣmaṇo 'lpa.bala.tvena dhātum ādyam a.pācitam |
AHS1.13.025c/ duṣṭam āmāśaya.gataṁ rasam āmaṁ pracakṣate || 25 ||
AHS1.13.026a/ anye doṣebhya evāti.duṣṭebhyo 'nyo.'nya.mūrchanāt |
AHS1.13.026c/ kodravebhyo viṣasyeva vadanty āmasya sambhavam || 26 ||
[Page 85 ]
AHS1.13.027a/ āmena tena sampṛktā doṣā dūṣyāś ca dūṣitāḥ |
AHS1.13.027c/ sāmā ity upadiśyante ye ca rogās tad.udbhavāḥ || 27 ||
AHS1.13.027+1a/ vāyuḥ sāmo vibandhāgni.sāda.stambhāntra.kūjanaiḥ |
AHS1.13.027+1c/ vedanā.śopha.nistodaiḥ krama.śo 'ṅgāni pīḍayan || 27+1 ||
AHS1.13.027+2a/ vicared yuga.pac cāpi gṛhṇāti kupito bhṛśam |
AHS1.13.027+2c/ snehādyair vṛddhim āyāti sūrya.meghodaye niśi || 27+2 ||
AHS1.13.027+3a/ nir.āmo viśado rūkṣo nir.vibandho 'lpa.vedanaḥ |
AHS1.13.027+3c/ viparīta.guṇaiḥ śāntiṁ snigdhair yāti viśeṣataḥ || 27+3 ||
AHS1.13.027+4a/ dur.gandhi haritaṁ śyāvaṁ pittam amlaṁ ghanaṁ guru |
AHS1.13.027+4c/ amlīkā.kaṇṭha.hṛd.dāha.karaṁ sāmaṁ vinirdiśet || 27+4 ||
AHS1.13.027+5a/ ā.tāmra.pītam aty.uṣṇaṁ rase kaṭukam a.sthiram |
AHS1.13.027+5c/ pakvaṁ vi.gandhi vijñeyaṁ ruci.pakti.bala.pradam || 27+5 || [Note: AHS1.13.027+5v/ 13.27+5dv ruci.vahni.bala.pradam]
AHS1.13.027+6a/ āvilas tantulaḥ styānaḥ kaṇṭha.deśe 'vatiṣṭhate |
AHS1.13.027+6c/ sāmo balāso dur.gandhiḥ kṣud.udgāra.vighāta.kṛt || 27+6 ||
AHS1.13.027+7a/ phena.vān piṇḍitaḥ pāṇdur niḥ.sāro '.gandha eva ca |
AHS1.13.027+7c/ pakvaḥ sa eva vijñeyaś cheda.vān vaktra.śuddhi.daḥ || 27+7 ||
AHS1.13.028a/ sarva.deha.pravisṛtān sāmān doṣān na nirharet |
AHS1.13.028c/ līnān dhātuṣv an.utkliṣṭān phalād āmād rasān iva || 28 ||
AHS1.13.029a/ āśrayasya hi nāśāya te syur dur.nirhara.tvataḥ |
AHS1.13.029c/ pācanair dīpanaiḥ snehais tān svedaiś ca pariṣkṛtān || 29 ||
[Page 86 ]
AHS1.13.030a/ śodhayec chodhanaiḥ kāle yathāsannaṁ yathā.balam |
AHS1.13.030c/ hanty āśu yuktaṁ vaktreṇa dravyam āmāśayān malān || 30 ||
AHS1.13.031a/ ghrāṇena cordhva.jatrūtthān pakvādhānād gudena ca |
AHS1.13.031c/ utkliṣṭān adha ūrdhvaṁ vā na cāmān vahataḥ svayam || 31 ||
AHS1.13.032a/ dhārayed auṣadhair doṣān vidhṛtās te hi roga.dāḥ |
AHS1.13.032c/ pravṛttān prāg ato doṣān upekṣeta hitāśinaḥ || 32 ||
AHS1.13.033a/ vibaddhān pācanais tais taiḥ pācayen nirhareta vā |
AHS1.13.033c/ śrāvaṇe kārttike caitre māsi sādhāraṇe kramāt || 33 || [Note: AHS1.13.033v/ 13.33bv pācayen nirharet tathā]
AHS1.13.033+1a/ prāvṛṭ.śarad.vasanteṣu māseṣv eteṣu śodhayet |
AHS1.13.033+1c/ sādhāraṇeṣu vidhinā tri.māsāntaritān malān || 33+1 ||
AHS1.13.034a/ grīṣma.varṣā.hima.citān vāyv.ādīn āśu nirharet |
AHS1.13.034c/ aty.uṣṇa.varṣa.śītā hi grīṣma.varṣā.himāgamāḥ || 34 ||
AHS1.13.035a/ sandhau sādhāraṇe teṣāṁ duṣṭān doṣān viśodhayet |
AHS1.13.035c/ svastha.vṛttam abhipretya vyādhau vyādhi.vaśena tu || 35 ||
AHS1.13.035.1+1a/ trayaḥ sādhāraṇās teṣām antare prāvṛṣādayaḥ |
AHS1.13.035.1+1c/ prāvṛṭ śuci.nabhau teṣu śarad ūrja.sahau smṛtau || 35.1+1 ||
AHS1.13.035.1+2a/ tapasyo madhu.māsaś ca vasantaḥ śodhanaṁ prati |
AHS1.13.035.1+2c/ etān ṛtūn vikalpyaivaṁ dadyāt saṁśodhanaṁ bhiṣak || 35.1+2 ||
AHS1.13.036a/ kṛtvā śītoṣṇa.vṛṣṭīnāṁ pratīkāraṁ yathā.yatham |
AHS1.13.036c/ prayojayet kriyāṁ prāptāṁ kriyā.kālaṁ na hāpayet || 36 ||
[Page 87 ]
AHS1.13.037a/ yuñjyād an.annam annādau madhye 'nte kavaḍāntare |
AHS1.13.037c/ grāse grāse muhuḥ sānnaṁ sāmudgaṁ niśi cauṣadham || 37 ||
AHS1.13.038a/ kaphodreke gade 'n.annaṁ balino roga.rogiṇoḥ |
AHS1.13.038c/ annādau vi.guṇe 'pāne samāne madhya iṣyate || 38 ||
AHS1.13.039a/ vyāne 'nte prātar.āśasya sāyam.āśasya tūttare |
AHS1.13.039c/ grāsa.grāsāntayoḥ prāṇe praduṣṭe mātariśvani || 39 ||
AHS1.13.040a/ muhur muhur viṣa.cchardi.hidhmā.tṛṭ.śvāsa.kāsiṣu |
AHS1.13.040c/ yojyaṁ sa.bhojyaṁ bhaiṣajyaṁ bhojyaiś citrair a.rocake || 40 ||
AHS1.13.041a/ kampākṣepaka.hidhmāsu sāmudgaṁ laghu.bhojinām |
AHS1.13.041c/ ūrdhva.jatru.vikāreṣu svapna.kāle praśasyate || 41 ||

1.14. Chapter 14 :: Athadvividhopakramaṇīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 103-107]
AHS1.14.001a/ upakramyasya hi dvi.tvād dvi.dhaivopakramo mataḥ |
AHS1.14.001c/ ekaḥ santarpaṇas tatra dvitīyaś cāpatarpaṇaḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.14.002a/ bṛṁhaṇo laṅghanaś ceti tat.paryāyāv udāhṛtau |
AHS1.14.002c/ bṛṁhaṇaṁ yad bṛhat.tvāya laṅghanaṁ lāghavāya yat || 2 ||
AHS1.14.003a/ dehasya bhavataḥ prāyo bhaumāpam itarac ca te |
AHS1.14.003c/ snehanaṁ rūkṣaṇaṁ karma svedanaṁ stambhanaṁ ca yat || 3 ||
AHS1.14.004a/ bhūtānāṁ tad api dvaidhyād dvitayaṁ nātivartate |
AHS1.14.004c/ śodhanaṁ śamanaṁ ceti dvi.dhā tatrāpi laṅghanam || 4 ||
AHS1.14.005a/ yad īrayed bahir doṣān pañca.dhā śodhanaṁ ca tat |
AHS1.14.005c/ nirūho vamanaṁ kāya.śiro.reko 'sra.visrutiḥ || 5 ||
[Page 88 ]
AHS1.14.006a/ na śodhayati yad doṣān samān nodīrayaty api |
AHS1.14.006c/ samī.karoti viṣamān śamanaṁ tac ca sapta.dhā || 6 ||
AHS1.14.007a/ pācanaṁ dīpanaṁ kṣut.tṛḍ.vyāyāmātapa.mārutāḥ |
AHS1.14.007c/ bṛṁhaṇaṁ śamanaṁ tv eva vāyoḥ pittānilasya ca || 7 ||
AHS1.14.008a/ bṛṁhayed vyādhi.bhaiṣajya.madya.strī.śoka.karśitān |
AHS1.14.008c/ bhārādhvoraḥ.kṣata.kṣīṇa.rūkṣa.dur.bala.vātalān || 8 ||
AHS1.14.009a/ garbhiṇī.sūtikā.bāla.vṛddhān grīṣme 'parān api |
AHS1.14.009c/ māṁsa.kṣīra.sitā.sarpir.madhura.snigdha.vastibhiḥ || 9 ||
AHS1.14.010a/ svapna.śayyā.sukhābhyaṅga.snāna.nirvṛti.harṣaṇaiḥ |
AHS1.14.010c/ mehāma.doṣāti.snigdha.jvaroru.stambha.kuṣṭhinaḥ || 10 ||
AHS1.14.011a/ visarpa.vidradhi.plīha.śiraḥ.kaṇṭhākṣi.rogiṇaḥ |
AHS1.14.011c/ sthūlāṁś ca laṅghayen nityaṁ śiśire tv aparān api || 11 ||
AHS1.14.012a/ tatra saṁśodhanaiḥ sthaulya.bala.pitta.kaphādhikān |
AHS1.14.012c/ āma.doṣa.jvara.cchardir.atīsāra.hṛd.āmayaiḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.14.013a/ vibandha.gauravodgāra.hṛl.lāsādibhir āturān |
AHS1.14.013c/ madhya.sthaulyādikān prāyaḥ pūrvaṁ pācana.dīpanaiḥ || 13 ||
AHS1.14.014a/ ebhir evāmayair ārtān hīna.sthaulya.balādhikān |
AHS1.14.014c/ kṣut.tṛṣṇā.nigrahair doṣais tv ārtān madhya.balair dṛḍhān || 14 || [Note: AHS1.14.014v/ 14.14cv kṣut.tṛṣṇā.nigrahair doṣair 14.14cv kṣut.tṛṣṇā.nigrahair doṣaiś 14.14dv cārtān madhya.balair dṛḍhān]
AHS1.14.015a/ samīraṇātapāyāsaiḥ kim utālpa.balair narān |
AHS1.14.015c/ na bṛṁhayel laṅghanīyān bṛṁhyāṁs tu mṛdu laṅghayet || 15 ||
[Page 89 ]
AHS1.14.016a/ yuktyā vā deśa.kālādi.balatas tān upācaret |
AHS1.14.016c/ bṛṁhite syād balaṁ puṣṭis tat.sādhyāmaya.saṅkṣayaḥ || 16 ||
AHS1.14.017a/ vi.malendriya.tā sargo malānāṁ lāghavaṁ ruciḥ |
AHS1.14.017c/ kṣut.tṛṭ.sahodayaḥ śuddha.hṛdayodgāra.kaṇṭha.tā || 17 ||
AHS1.14.018a/ vyādhi.mārdavam utsāhas tandrā.nāśaś ca laṅghite |
AHS1.14.018c/ an.apekṣita.mātrādi.sevite kurutas tu te || 18 ||
AHS1.14.019a/ ati.sthaulyāti.kārśyādīn vakṣyante te ca sauṣadhāḥ |
AHS1.14.019c/ rūpaṁ tair eva ca jñeyam ati.bṛṁhita.laṅghite || 19 || [Note: AHS1.14.019v/ 14.19cv rūpaṁ tair eva vijñeyam]
AHS1.14.020a/ ati.sthaulyāpacī.meha.jvarodara.bhagandarān |
AHS1.14.020c/ kāsa.sannyāsa.kṛcchrāma.kuṣṭhādīn ati.dāruṇān || 20 ||
AHS1.14.021a/ tatra medo.'nila.śleṣma.nāśanaṁ sarvam iṣyate |
AHS1.14.021c/ kulattha.jūrṇa.śyāmāka.yava.mudga.madhūdakam || 21 ||
AHS1.14.022a/ mastu.daṇḍāhatāriṣṭa.cintā.śodhana.jāgaram |
AHS1.14.022c/ madhunā tri.phalāṁ lihyād guḍūcīm abhayāṁ ghanam || 22 ||
AHS1.14.023a/ rasāñjanasya mahataḥ pañca.mūlasya gugguloḥ |
AHS1.14.023c/ śilā.jatu.prayogaś ca sāgnimantha.raso hitaḥ || 23 || [Note: AHS1.14.023v/ 14.23cv śilāhvasya prayogaś ca]
AHS1.14.024a/ viḍaṅgaṁ nāgaraṁ kṣāraḥ kāla.loha.rajo madhu |
AHS1.14.024c/ yavāmalaka.cūrṇaṁ ca yogo 'ti.sthaulya.doṣa.jit || 24 ||
AHS1.14.025a/ vyoṣa.kaṭvī.varā.śigru.viḍaṅgātiviṣā.sthirāḥ |
AHS1.14.025c/ hiṅgu.sauvarcalājājī.yavānī.dhānya.citrakāḥ || 25 ||
[Page 90 ]
AHS1.14.026a/ niśe bṛhatyau hapuṣā pāṭhā mūlaṁ ca kembukāt |
AHS1.14.026c/ eṣāṁ cūrṇaṁ madhu ghṛtaṁ tailaṁ ca sadṛśāṁśakam || 26 || [Note: AHS1.14.026v/ 14.26dv tailaṁ ca sadṛśāṁśikam]
AHS1.14.027a/ saktubhiḥ ṣo.ḍaśa.guṇair yuktaṁ pītaṁ nihanti tat |
AHS1.14.027c/ ati.sthaulyādikān sarvān rogān anyāṁś ca tad.vidhān || 27 ||
AHS1.14.028a/ hṛd.roga.kāmalā.śvitra.śvāsa.kāsa.gala.grahān |
AHS1.14.028c/ buddhi.medhā.smṛti.karaṁ sannasyāgneś ca dīpanam || 28 ||
AHS1.14.029a/ ati.kārśyaṁ bhramaḥ kāsas tṛṣṇādhikyam a.rocakaḥ |
AHS1.14.029c/ snehāgni.nidrā.dṛk.śrotra.śukraujaḥ.kṣut.svara.kṣayaḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS1.14.029v/ 14.29av ati.kārśyaṁ bhramaḥ śvāsa. 14.29bv .tṛṣṇādhikyam a.rocakaḥ]
AHS1.14.030a/ vasti.hṛn.mūrdha.jaṅghoru.trika.pārśva.rujā jvaraḥ |
AHS1.14.030c/ pralāpordhvānila.glāni.cchardi.parvāsthi.bhedanam || 30 || [Note: AHS1.14.030v/ 14.30dv .cchardiḥ.parvāsthi.bhedanam]
AHS1.14.031a/ varco.mūtra.grahādyāś ca jāyante 'ti.vilaṅghanāt |
AHS1.14.031c/ kārśyam eva varaṁ sthaulyān na hi sthūlasya bheṣajam || 31 || [Note: AHS1.14.031v/ 14.31av viṇ.mūtrādi.grahādyāś ca 14.31dv na hi sthaulyasya bheṣajam]
AHS1.14.032a/ bṛṁhaṇaṁ laṅghanaṁ vālam ati.medo.'gni.vāta.jit |
AHS1.14.032c/ madhura.snigdha.sauhityair yat saukhyena ca naśyati || 32 || [Note: AHS1.14.032v/ 14.32av bṛṁhaṇaṁ laṅghanaṁ nālam 14.32cv madhura.sneha.sauhityair 14.32dv yat saukhyena vinaśyati]
AHS1.14.033a/ kraśimā sthavimāty.anta.viparīta.niṣevaṇaiḥ |
AHS1.14.033c/ yojayed bṛṁhaṇaṁ tatra sarvaṁ pānānna.bheṣajam || 33 ||
AHS1.14.034a/ a.cintayā harṣaṇena dhruvaṁ santarpaṇena ca |
AHS1.14.034c/ svapna.prasaṅgāc ca kṛśo varāha iva puṣyati || 34 || [Note: AHS1.14.034v/ 14.34av a.cintayā praharṣeṇa 14.34cv svapna.prasaṅgāc ca naro]
AHS1.14.035a/ na hi māṁsa.samaṁ kiñ.cid anyad deha.bṛhat.tva.kṛt |
AHS1.14.035c/ māṁsāda.māṁsaṁ māṁsena sambhṛta.tvād viśeṣataḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS1.14.035v/ 14.35dv sambhṛta.tvād viśiṣyate 14.35dv sambhṛta.tvād bṛhat.tva.kṛt]
[Page 91 ]
AHS1.14.036a/ guru cā.tarpaṇaṁ sthūle viparītaṁ hitaṁ kṛśe |
AHS1.14.036c/ yava.godhūmam ubhayos tad.yogyāhita.kalpanam || 36 || [Note: AHS1.14.036v/ 14.36dv tad.yogya.hita.kalpanam 14.36dv tato grāhita.kalpanam]
AHS1.14.037a/ doṣa.gatyātiricyante grāhi.bhedy.ādi.bhedataḥ |
AHS1.14.037c/ upakramā na te dvi.tvād bhinnā api gadā iva || 37 || [Note: AHS1.14.037v/ 14.37cv upakramā na tu dvi.tvād]

1.15. Chapter 15 :: Athaśodhanādigaṇasaṅgrahādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 107-112]
AHS1.15.001a/ madana.madhuka.lambā.nimba.bimbī.viśālā.trapusa.kuṭaja.mūrvā.devadālī.kṛmighnam |
AHS1.15.001c/ vidula.dahana.citrāḥ kośavatyau karañjaḥ kaṇa.lavaṇa.vacailā.sarṣapāś chardanāni || 1 ||
AHS1.15.002a/ nikumbha.kumbha.tri.phalā.gavākṣī.snuk.śaṅkhinī.nīlini.tilvakāni |
AHS1.15.002c/ śamyāka.kampillaka.hemadugdhā dugdhaṁ ca mūtraṁ ca virecanāni || 2 ||
AHS1.15.003a/ madana.kuṭaja.kuṣṭha.devadālī.madhuka.vacā.daśa.mūla.dāru.rāsnāḥ |
AHS1.15.003c/ yava.miśi.kṛtavedhanaṁ kulatthā madhu lavaṇaṁ trivṛtā nirūhaṇāni || 3 || [Note: AHS1.15.003v/ 15.3cv yava.miśi.kṛtavedhanaṁ kulattho]
AHS1.15.004a/ vellāpāmārga.vyoṣa.dārvī.surālā bījaṁ śairīṣaṁ bārhataṁ śaigravaṁ ca |
AHS1.15.004c/ sāro mādhūkaḥ saindhavaṁ tārkṣya.śailaṁ truṭyau pṛthvīkā śodhayanty uttamāṅgam || 4 ||
AHS1.15.005a/ bhadradāru nataṁ kuṣṭhaṁ daśa.mūlaṁ balā.dvayam |
AHS1.15.005c/ vāyuṁ vīratarādiś ca vidāry.ādiś ca nāśayet || 5 || [Note: AHS1.15.005v/ 15.5bv daśa.mūlaṁ balā.trayam 15.5dv vidāry.ādiś ca śodhayet]
AHS1.15.006a/ dūrvānantā nimba.vāsātmaguptā gundrābhīruḥ śītapākī priyaṅguḥ |
AHS1.15.006c/ nyagrodhādiḥ padmakādiḥ sthire dve padmaṁ vanyaṁ śārivādiś ca pittam || 6 ||
AHS1.15.007a/ āragvadhādir arkādir muṣkakādyo 'sanādikaḥ |
AHS1.15.007c/ surasādiḥ sa.mustādir vatsakādir balāsa.jit || 7 ||
AHS1.15.008a/ jīvantī.kākolyau mede dve mudga.māṣaparṇyau ca |
AHS1.15.008c/ ṛṣabhaka.jīvaka.madhukaṁ ceti gaṇo jīvanīyākhyaḥ || 8 ||
[Page 92 ]
AHS1.15.009a/ vidāri.pañcāṅgula.vṛścikālī.vṛścīva.devāhvaya.śūrpaparṇyaḥ |
AHS1.15.009c/ kaṇḍūkarī jīvana.hrasva.sañjñe dve pañcake gopasutā tripādī || 9 || [Note: AHS1.15.009v/ 15.9bv .vṛścīva.devā.dvaya.śūrpaparṇyaḥ 15.9dv kaṇḍūkarī gopasutā tripādī]
AHS1.15.010a/ vidāry.ādir ayaṁ hṛdyo bṛṁhaṇo vāta.pitta.hā |
AHS1.15.010c/ śoṣa.gulmāṅga.mardordhva.śvāsa.kāsa.haro gaṇaḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS1.15.010v/ 15.10cv śoṣa.gulmāṅga.sādordhva.]
AHS1.15.011a/ śārivośīra.kāśmarya.madhūka.śiśira.dvayam |
AHS1.15.011c/ yaṣṭī parūṣakaṁ hanti dāha.pittāsra.tṛḍ.jvarān || 11 ||
AHS1.15.012a/ padmaka.puṇḍrau vṛddhi.tugarddhyaḥ śṛṅgy amṛtā daśa jīvana.sañjñāḥ |
AHS1.15.012c/ stanya.karā ghnantīraṇa.pittaṁ prīṇana.jīvana.bṛṁhaṇa.vṛṣyāḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.15.013a/ parūṣakaṁ varā drākṣā kaṭphalaṁ katakāt phalam |
AHS1.15.013c/ rājāhvaṁ dāḍimaṁ śākaṁ tṛṇ.mūtrāmaya.vāta.jit || 13 ||
AHS1.15.014a/ añjanaṁ phalinī māṁsī padmotpala.rasāñjanam |
AHS1.15.014c/ sailā.madhuka.nāgāhvaṁ viṣāntar.dāha.pitta.nut || 14 || [Note: AHS1.15.014v/ 15.14dv viṣāntar.dāha.pitta.jit 15.14dv viṣāntar.dāha.pitta.hṛt]
AHS1.15.015a/ paṭola.kaṭu.rohiṇī.candanaṁ madhusrava.guḍūci.pāṭhānvitam |
AHS1.15.015c/ nihanti kapha.pitta.kuṣṭha.jvarān viṣaṁ vamim a.rocakaṁ kāmalām || 15 ||
AHS1.15.016a/ guḍūcī.padmakāriṣṭa.dhānakā.rakta.candanam |
AHS1.15.016c/ pitta.śleṣma.jvara.cchardi.dāha.tṛṣṇā.ghnam agni.kṛt || 16 || [Note: AHS1.15.016v/ 15.16bv .dhānyakā.rakta.candanam 15.16bv .dhānyakaṁ rakta.candanam 15.16bv .dhanikā.rakta.candanam āragvadhendrayava.pāṭali.kākatiktā.nimbāmṛtā.madhurasā.sruva.vṛkṣa.pāṭhāḥ |]
AHS1.15.017c/ bhūnimba.sairyaka.paṭola.karañja.yugma.saptacchadāgni.suṣavī.phala.bāṇa.ghoṇṭāḥ || 17 ||
AHS1.15.018a/ āragvadhādir jayati cchardi.kuṣṭha.viṣa.jvarān |
AHS1.15.018c/ kaphaṁ kaṇḍūṁ pramehaṁ ca duṣṭa.vraṇa.viśodhanaḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS1.15.018v/ 15.18dv medodara.viśodhanaḥ]
[Page 93 ]
AHS1.15.019a/ asana.tiniśa.bhūrja.śvetavāha.prakīryāḥ khadira.kadara.bhaṇḍī.śiṁśipā.meṣaśṛṅgyaḥ |
AHS1.15.019c/ tri.hima.tala.palāśā joṅgakaḥ śāka.śālau kramuka.dhava.kaliṅga.cchāgakarṇāśvakarṇāḥ || 19 ||
AHS1.15.020a/ asanādir vijayate śvitra.kuṣṭha.kapha.krimīn |
AHS1.15.020c/ pāṇḍu.rogaṁ pramehaṁ ca medo.doṣa.nibarhaṇaḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS1.15.020v/ 15.20bv śvitra.kuṣṭha.vami.krimīn]
AHS1.15.021a/ varuṇa.sairyaka.yugma.śatāvarī.dahana.moraṭa.bilva.viṣāṇikāḥ |
AHS1.15.021c/ dvi.bṛhatī.dvi.karañja.jayā.dvayaṁ bahalapallava.darbha.rujākarāḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS1.15.021v/ 15.21av varaṇa.sairyaka.yugma.śatāvarī.]
AHS1.15.022a/ varuṇādiḥ kaphaṁ medo mandāgni.tvaṁ niyacchati |
AHS1.15.022c/ āḍhya.vātaṁ śiraḥ.śūlaṁ gulmaṁ cāntaḥ sa.vidradhim || 22 || [Note: AHS1.15.022v/ 15.22av varaṇādiḥ kaphaṁ medo 15.22cv adho.vātaṁ śiraḥ.śūlaṁ]
AHS1.15.023a/ ūṣakas tutthakaṁ hiṅgu kāsīsa.dvaya.saindhavam |
AHS1.15.023c/ sa.śilā.jatu kṛcchrāśma.gulma.medaḥ.kaphāpaham || 23 || [Note: AHS1.15.023v/ 15.23dv .gulma.meha.kaphāpaham]
AHS1.15.024a/ vellantarāraṇika.būka.vṛṣāśmabheda.gokaṇṭaketkaṭa.sahācara.bāṇa.kāśāḥ |
AHS1.15.024c/ vṛkṣādanī.nala.kuśa.dvaya.guṇṭha.gundrā.bhallūka.moraṭa.kuraṇṭa.karambha.pārthāḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS1.15.024v/ 15.24bv .gokaṇṭakotkaṭa.sahācara.bāṇa.kāśāḥ 15.24cv vṛkṣādanī.nala.kuśa.dvaya.guntha.gundrā. 15.24cv vṛkṣādanī.nala.kuśa.dvaya.guñcha.gundrā. 15.24cv vṛkṣādanī.nala.kuśa.dvaya.guccha.gundrā.]
AHS1.15.025a/ vargo vīratarādyo 'yaṁ hanti vāta.kṛtān gadān |
AHS1.15.025c/ aśmarī.śarkarā.mūtra.kṛcchrāghāta.rujā.haraḥ || 25 || [Note: AHS1.15.025v/ 15.25dv .kṛcchrāghāta.rujāpahaḥ]
AHS1.15.026a/ lodhra.śābaraka.lodhra.palāśā jiṅginī.sarala.kaṭphala.yuktāḥ |
AHS1.15.026c/ kutsitāmba.kadalī.gataśokāḥ sailavālu.paripelava.mocāḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS1.15.026v/ 15.26av lodhra.śābara.kadamba.palāśā 15.26bv jhiñjhiṇī.sarala.kaṭphala.yuktāḥ]
AHS1.15.027a/ eṣa lodhrādiko nāma medaḥ.kapha.haro gaṇaḥ |
AHS1.15.027c/ yoni.doṣa.haraḥ stambhī varṇyo viṣa.vināśanaḥ || 27 ||
AHS1.15.028a/ arkālarkau nāgadantī viśalyā bhārgī rāsnā vṛścikālī prakīryā |
AHS1.15.028c/ pratyakpuṣpī pītatailodakīryā śvetā.yugmaṁ tāpasānāṁ ca vṛkṣaḥ || 28 ||
[Page 94 ]
AHS1.15.029a/ ayam arkādiko vargaḥ kapha.medo.viṣāpahaḥ |
AHS1.15.029c/ kṛmi.kuṣṭha.praśamano viśeṣād vraṇa.śodhanaḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS1.15.029v/ 15.29av ayam arkādiko nāma]
AHS1.15.030a/ surasa.yuga.phaṇijjaṁ kālamālā viḍaṅgaṁ kharabusa.vṛṣakarṇī.kaṭphalaṁ kāsamardaḥ |
AHS1.15.030c/ kṣavaka.sarasi.bhārgī.kārmukāḥ kākamācī kulahala.viṣamuṣṭī bhūstṛṇo bhūtakeśī || 30 || [Note: AHS1.15.030v/ 15.30bv kharabuka.vṛṣakarṇī.kaṭphalāḥ kāsamardaḥ 15.30bv kharabusa.vṛṣakarṇī.kaṭphalāḥ kāsamardaḥ 15.30bc kharamukha.vṛṣakarṇī.kaṭphalaṁ kāsamardaḥ 15.30cv kṣavaka.surasi.bhārgī.kārmukāḥ kākamācī 15.30cv kṣavaka.surasi.bhārgī.kāmukāḥ kākamācī 15.30cv kṣavaka.sarasi.bhārgī.kāmukāḥ kākamācī] [Note: AHS1.15.030v/ 15.30cv kṣavaka.svarasi.bhārgī.kārmukāḥ kākamācī]
AHS1.15.031a/ surasādir gaṇaḥ śleṣma.medaḥ.kṛmi.niṣūdanaḥ |
AHS1.15.031c/ pratiśyāyā.ruci.śvāsa.kāsa.ghno vraṇa.śodhanaḥ || 31 ||
AHS1.15.032a/ muṣkaka.snug.varā.dvīpi.palāśa.dhava.śiṁśipāḥ |

AHS1.15.033a/ vatsaka.mūrvā.bhārgī.kaṭukā marīcaṁ ghuṇapriyā ca gaṇḍīram |
AHS1.15.033c/ elā pāṭhājājī kaṭvaṅga.phalājamoda.siddhārtha.vacāḥ || 33 ||
AHS1.15.034a/ jīraka.hiṅgu.viḍaṅgaṁ paśugandhā pañca.kolakaṁ hanti |
AHS1.15.034c/ cala.kapha.medaḥ.pīnasa.gulma.jvara.śūla.dur.nāmnaḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS1.15.034v/ 15.34dv paśugandhā pañca.kolakaṁ ghnanti]
AHS1.15.035a/ vacā.jalada.devāhva.nāgarātiviṣābhayāḥ |
