AHS1.15.035c/ haridrā.dvaya.yaṣṭy.āhva.kalaśī.kuṭajodbhavāḥ || 35 ||
AHS1.15.036a/ vacā.haridrādi.gaṇāv āmātīsāra.nāśanau |
AHS1.15.036c/ medaḥ.kaphāḍhya.pavana.stanya.doṣa.nibarhaṇau || 36 || [Note: AHS1.15.036v/ 15.36bv āmātīsāra.pācanau]
AHS1.15.037a/ priyaṅgu.puṣpāñjana.yugma.padmāḥ padmād rajo yojanavally anantā |
AHS1.15.037c/ mānadrumo moca.rasaḥ samaṅgā punnāga.śītaṁ madanīya.hetuḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS1.15.037v/ 15.37cv sāradrumo moca.rasaḥ samaṅgā 15.37dv punnāma.śītaṁ madanīya.hetuḥ]
AHS1.15.038a/ ambaṣṭhā madhukaṁ namaskarī nandīvṛkṣa.palāśa.kacchurāḥ |
AHS1.15.038c/ lodhraṁ dhātaki.bilva.peśike kaṭvaṅgaḥ kamalodbhavaṁ rajaḥ || 38 ||
[Page 95 ]
AHS1.15.039a/ gaṇau priyaṅgv.ambaṣṭhādī pakvātīsāra.nāśanau |
AHS1.15.039c/ sandhānīyau hitau pitte vraṇānām api ropaṇau || 39 ||
AHS1.15.040a/ mustā.vacāgni.dvi.niśā.dvi.tiktā.bhallāta.pāṭhā.tri.phalā.viṣākhyāḥ |
AHS1.15.040c/ kuṣṭhaṁ truṭī haimavatī ca yoni.stanyāmaya.ghnā mala.pācanāś ca || 40 ||
AHS1.15.041a/ nyagrodha.pippala.sadāphala.lodhra.yugmaṁ jambū.dvayārjuna.kapītana.somavalkāḥ |
AHS1.15.041c/ plakṣāmra.vañjula.piyāla.palāśa.nandī.kolī.kadamba.viralā.madhukaṁ madhūkam || 41 || [Note: AHS1.15.041v/ 15.41av nyagrodha.pippala.sadāphala.lodhra.yugma. 15.41bv .jambū.dvayārjuna.kapītana.somavalkāḥ]
AHS1.15.042a/ nyagrodhādir gaṇo vraṇyaḥ saṅgrāhī bhagna.sādhanaḥ |
AHS1.15.042c/ medaḥ.pittāsra.tṛḍ.dāha.yoni.roga.nibarhaṇaḥ || 42 || [Note: AHS1.15.042v/ 15.42av nyagrodhādir gaṇo varṇyaḥ 15.42dv .yoni.doṣa.nibarhaṇaḥ]
AHS1.15.043a/ elā.yugma.turuṣka.kuṣṭha.phalinī.māṁsī.jala.dhyāmakaṁ || 43a ||
AHS1.15.043b/ spṛkkā.coraka.coca.pattra.tagara.sthauṇeya.jātī.rasāḥ || 43b ||
AHS1.15.043c/ śuktir vyāghranakho 'marāhvam aguruḥ śrīvāsakaḥ kuṅkumaṁ || 43c ||
AHS1.15.043d/ caṇḍā.guggulu.deva.dhūpa.khapurāḥ punnāga.nāgāhvayam || 43d || [Note: AHS1.15.043v/ 15.43bv .spṛkkā.coraka.coca.pattra.tagara.sthauṇeya.jātī.rasāḥ 15.43cv śuktir vyāghranakho 'marāhvam aguruḥ śrīvāsakaṁ kuṅkumaṁ 15.43cv śukti.vyāghranakhau surāhvam aguruḥ śrīveṣṭakaḥ kuṅkumaṁ]
AHS1.15.044a/ elādiko vāta.kaphau viṣaṁ ca viniyacchati |
AHS1.15.044c/ varṇa.prasādanaḥ kaṇḍū.piṭikā.koṭha.nāśanaḥ || 44 || [Note: AHS1.15.044v/ 15.44cv varṇyaḥ prasādanaḥ kaṇḍū. ]
AHS1.15.045a/ śyāmā.dantī.dravantī.kramuka.kuṭaraṇā.śaṅkhinī.carma.sāhvā. || 45a ||
AHS1.15.045b/ .svarṇakṣīrī.gavākṣī.śikhari.rajanaka.cchinnarohā.karañjāḥ || 45b ||
AHS1.15.045c/ bastāntrī vyādhighāto bahala.bahu.rasas tīkṣṇavṛkṣāt phalāni || 45c ||
AHS1.15.045d/ śyāmādyo hanti gulmaṁ viṣama.ruci.kaphau hṛd.rujaṁ mūtra.kṛcchram || 45d || [Note: AHS1.15.045v/ 15.45av śyāmā.dantī.dravantī.kramuka.kuṭaraṇī.śaṅkhinī.carma.sāhvā. 15.45cv bastāntrī vyādhighāto bahula.bahu.rasas tīkṣṇavṛkṣāt phalāni]
AHS1.15.046a/ trayas.triṁśad iti proktā vargās teṣu tv a.lābhataḥ |
AHS1.15.046c/ yuñjyāt tad.vidham anyac ca dravyaṁ jahyād a.yaugikam || 46 ||
AHS1.15.047a/ ete vargā doṣa.dūṣyādy apekṣya kalka.kvātha.sneha.lehādi.yuktāḥ |
AHS1.15.047c/ pāne nasye 'nvāsane 'ntar bahir vā lepābhyaṅgair ghnanti rogān su.kṛcchrān || 47 || [Note: AHS1.15.047v/ 15.47av ete vargā doṣa.dūṣyādy avekṣya 15.47dv sekālepair ghnanti rogān su.kṛcchrān 15.47dv svedābhyaṅgair ghnanti rogān su.kṛcchrān]

1.16. Chapter 16 :: Athasnehādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 112-118]
AHS1.16.001a/ guru.śīta.sara.snigdha.manda.sūkṣma.mṛdu.dravam |
AHS1.16.001c/ auṣadhaṁ snehanaṁ prāyo viparītaṁ virūkṣaṇam || 1 ||
[Page 96 ]
AHS1.16.002a/ sarpir majjā vasā tailaṁ sneheṣu pravaraṁ matam |
AHS1.16.002c/ tatrāpi cottamaṁ sarpiḥ saṁskārasyānuvartanāt || 2 ||
AHS1.16.003a/ mādhuryād a.vidāhi.tvāj janmādy eva ca śīlanāt |
AHS1.16.003c/ pitta.ghnās te yathā.pūrvam itara.ghnā yathottaram || 3 ||
AHS1.16.004a/ ghṛtāt tailaṁ guru vasā tailān majjā tato 'pi ca |
AHS1.16.004c/ dvābhyāṁ tribhiś caturbhis tair yamakas tri.vṛto mahān || 4 ||
AHS1.16.005a/ svedya.saṁśodhya.madya.strī.vyāyāmāsakta.cintakāḥ |
AHS1.16.005c/ vṛddha.bālā.bala.kṛśā rūkṣāḥ kṣīṇāsra.retasaḥ || 5 ||
AHS1.16.006a/ vātārta.syanda.timira.dāruṇa.pratibodhinaḥ |
AHS1.16.006c/ snehyā na tv ati.mandāgni.tīkṣṇāgni.sthūla.dur.balāḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.16.007a/ ūru.stambhātisārāma.gala.roga.garodaraiḥ |
AHS1.16.007c/ mūrchā.chardy.a.ruci.śleṣma.tṛṣṇā.madyaiś ca pīḍitāḥ || 7 ||
AHS1.16.008a/ apaprasūtā yukte ca nasye vastau virecane |
AHS1.16.008c/ tatra dhī.smṛti.medhādi.kāṅkṣiṇāṁ śasyate ghṛtam || 8 || [Note: AHS1.16.008v/ 16.8cv tatra dhī.smṛti.medhāgni.]
AHS1.16.009a/ granthi.nāḍī.kṛmi.śleṣma.medo.māruta.rogiṣu |
AHS1.16.009c/ tailaṁ lāghava.dārḍhyārthi.krūra.koṣṭheṣu dehiṣu || 9 ||
AHS1.16.010a/ vātātapādhva.bhāra.strī.vyāyāma.kṣīṇa.dhātuṣu |
AHS1.16.010c/ rūkṣa.kleśa.kṣamāty.agni.vātāvṛta.patheṣu ca || 10 ||
AHS1.16.011a/ śeṣau vasā tu sandhy.asthi.marma.koṣṭha.rujāsu ca |
AHS1.16.011c/ tathā dagdhāhata.bhraṣṭa.yoni.karṇa.śiro.ruji || 11 ||
[Page 97 ]
AHS1.16.012a/ tailaṁ prāvṛṣi varṣānte sarpir anyau tu mādhave |
AHS1.16.012c/ ṛtau sādhāraṇe snehaḥ śasto 'hni vi.male ravau || 12 ||
AHS1.16.013a/ tailaṁ tvarāyāṁ śīte 'pi gharme 'pi ca ghṛtaṁ niśi |
AHS1.16.013c/ niśy eva pitte pavane saṁsarge pitta.vaty api || 13 ||
AHS1.16.014a/ niśy anya.thā vāta.kaphād rogāḥ syuḥ pittato divā |
AHS1.16.014c/ yuktyāvacārayet snehaṁ bhakṣyādy.annena vastibhiḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.16.015a/ nasyābhyañjana.gaṇḍūṣa.mūrdha.karṇākṣi.tarpaṇaiḥ |
AHS1.16.015c/ rasa.bhedaikaka.tvābhyāṁ catuḥ.ṣaṣṭir vicāraṇāḥ || 15 ||
AHS1.16.016a/ snehasyānyābhibhūta.tvād alpa.tvāc ca kramāt smṛtāḥ |
AHS1.16.016c/ yathokta.hetv.a.bhāvāc ca nāccha.peyo vicāraṇā || 16 || [Note: AHS1.16.016v/ 16.16av snehasyānnābhibhūta.tvād 16.16dv nācchaḥ peyo vicāraṇā]
AHS1.16.017a/ snehasya kalpaḥ sa śreṣṭhaḥ sneha.karmāśu.sādhanāt |
AHS1.16.017c/ dvābhyāṁ caturbhir aṣṭābhir yāmair jīryanti yāḥ kramāt || 17 ||
AHS1.16.018a/ hrasva.madhyottamā mātrās tās tābhyaś ca hrasīyasīm |
AHS1.16.018c/ kalpayed vīkṣya doṣādīn prāg eva tu hrasīyasīm || 18 ||
AHS1.16.019a/ hyastane jīrṇa evānne sneho 'cchaḥ śuddhaye bahuḥ |
AHS1.16.019c/ śamanaḥ kṣud.vato 'n.anno madhya.mātraś ca śasyate || 19 ||
AHS1.16.020a/ bṛṁhaṇo rasa.madyādyaiḥ sa.bhakto 'lpo hitaḥ sa ca |
AHS1.16.020c/ bāla.vṛddha.pipāsārta.sneha.dviṇ.madya.śīliṣu || 20 || [Note: AHS1.16.020v/ 16.20bv sa.bhakto 'lpo hitaś ca saḥ]
AHS1.16.021a/ strī.sneha.nitya.mandāgni.sukhita.kleśa.bhīruṣu |
AHS1.16.021c/ mṛdu.koṣṭhālpa.doṣeṣu kāle coṣṇe kṛśeṣu ca || 21 ||
[Page 98 ]
AHS1.16.022a/ prāṅ.madhyottara.bhakto 'sāv adho.madhyordhva.deha.jān |
AHS1.16.022c/ vyādhīñ jayed balaṁ kuryād aṅgānāṁ ca yathā.kramam || 22 ||
AHS1.16.023a/ vāry uṣṇam acche 'nupibet snehe tat sukha.paktaye |
AHS1.16.023c/ āsyopalepa.śuddhyai ca taubarāruṣkare na tu || 23 ||
AHS1.16.023+1a/ mūrchā dāho '.ratis tṛṣṇā jṛmbhā moha.bhrama.klamāḥ |
AHS1.16.023+1c/ bhavanti jīryati snehe jīrṇaḥ syāt taiḥ śamaṁ gataiḥ || 23+1 ||
AHS1.16.024a/ jīrṇā.jīrṇa.viśaṅkāyāṁ punar uṣṇodakaṁ pibet |
AHS1.16.024c/ tenodgāra.viśuddhiḥ syāt tataś ca laghu.tā ruciḥ || 24 ||
AHS1.16.025a/ bhojyo 'nnaṁ mātrayā pāsyan śvaḥ piban pīta.vān api |
AHS1.16.025c/ dravoṣṇam an.abhiṣyandi nāti.snigdham a.saṅkaram || 25 ||
AHS1.16.026a/ uṣṇodakopacārī syād brahma.cārī kṣapāśayaḥ |
AHS1.16.026c/ na vega.rodhī vyāyāma.krodha.śoka.himātapān || 26 ||
AHS1.16.027a/ pravāta.yāna.yānādhva.bhāṣyāty.āsana.saṁsthitīḥ |
AHS1.16.027c/ nīcāty.uccopadhānāhaḥ.svapna.dhūma.rajāṁsi ca || 27 || [Note: AHS1.16.027v/ 16.27bv .bhāṣyābhyāsana.saṁsthitīḥ 16.27bv .bhāṣyāty.aśana.saṁsthitīḥ 16.27bv .bhāṣyāty.āśana.saṁsthitīḥ]
AHS1.16.028a/ yāny ahāni pibet tāni tāvanty anyāny api tyajet |
AHS1.16.028c/ sarva.karmasv ayaṁ prāyo vyādhi.kṣīṇeṣu ca kramaḥ || 28 ||
AHS1.16.029a/ upacāras tu śamane kāryaḥ snehe virikta.vat |
AHS1.16.029c/ try.aham acchaṁ mṛdau koṣṭhe krūre sapta.dinaṁ pibet || 29 ||
AHS1.16.030a/ samyak.snigdho 'tha.vā yāvad ataḥ sātmyī.bhavet param |
AHS1.16.030c/ vātānulomyaṁ dīpto 'gnir varcaḥ snigdham a.saṁhatam || 30 ||
[Page 99 ]
AHS1.16.031a/ snehodvegaḥ klamaḥ samyak.snigdhe rūkṣe viparyayaḥ |
AHS1.16.031c/ ati.snigdhe tu pāṇḍu.tvaṁ ghrāṇa.vaktra.guda.sravāḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS1.16.031v/ 16.31av mṛdu.snigdhāṅga.tā glāniḥ 16.31bv snehodvego 'tha lāghavam 16.31bv snehodvego 'ṅga.lāghavam 16.31cv ati.snigdhe tu pāṇḍu.tva. 16.31cv vi.malendriya.tā samyak. 16.31dv .ghrāṇa.vaktra.guda.sravāḥ 16.31dv .snigdhe rūkṣe viparyayaḥ]
AHS1.16.032a/ a.mātrayā.hito '.kāle mithyāhāra.vihārataḥ |
AHS1.16.032c/ snehaḥ karoti śophārśas.tandrā.stambha.vi.sañjña.tāḥ || 32 ||
AHS1.16.033a/ kaṇḍū.kuṣṭha.jvarotkleśa.śūlānāha.bhramādikān |
AHS1.16.033c/ kṣut.tṛṣṇollekhana.sveda.rūkṣa.pānānna.bheṣajam || 33 || [Note: AHS1.16.033v/ 16.33bv .śūlānāha.bala.kṣayān 16.33cv kṣut.tṛṣṇollekhanaṁ svedo 16.33dv rūkṣaṁ pānānna.bheṣajam]
AHS1.16.034a/ takrāriṣṭa.khaloddāla.yava.śyāmāka.kodravāḥ |
AHS1.16.034c/ pippalī.tri.phalā.kṣaudra.pathyā.go.mūtra.guggulu || 34 || [Note: AHS1.16.034v/ 16.34av takrāriṣṭaṁ khaloddāla. 16.34bv .yava.śyāmāka.kodravam]
AHS1.16.035a/ yathā.svaṁ prati.rogaṁ ca sneha.vyāpadi sādhanam |
AHS1.16.035c/ virūkṣaṇe laṅghana.vat kṛtāti.kṛta.lakṣaṇam || 35 ||
AHS1.16.036a/ snigdha.dravoṣṇa.dhanvottha.rasa.bhuk svedam ācaret |
AHS1.16.036c/ snigdhas try.ahaṁ sthitaḥ kuryād virekaṁ vamanaṁ punaḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS1.16.036v/ 16.36bv .rasa.bhuk svedam ācaran]
AHS1.16.037a/ ekāhaṁ dinam anyac ca kapham utkleśya tat.karaiḥ |
AHS1.16.037c/ māṁsalā medurā bhūri.śleṣmāṇo viṣamāgnayaḥ || 37 ||
AHS1.16.038a/ snehocitāś ca ye snehyās tān pūrvaṁ rūkṣayet tataḥ |
AHS1.16.038c/ saṁsnehya śodhayed evaṁ sneha.vyāpan na jāyate || 38 ||
AHS1.16.039a/ alaṁ malān īrayituṁ snehaś cā.sātmya.tāṁ gataḥ |
AHS1.16.039c/ bāla.vṛddhādiṣu sneha.parihārā.sahiṣṇuṣu || 39 ||
AHS1.16.040a/ yogān imān an.udvegān sadyaḥ.snehān prayojayet |
AHS1.16.040c/ prājya.māṁsa.rasās teṣu peyā vā sneha.bharjitā || 40 || [Note: AHS1.16.040v/ 16.40dv peyā vā sneha.bharjitāḥ]
[Page 100 ]
AHS1.16.041a/ tila.cūrṇaś ca sa.sneha.phāṇitaḥ kṛśarā tathā |
AHS1.16.041c/ kṣīra.peyā ghṛtāḍhyoṣṇā dadhno vā sa.guḍaḥ saraḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS1.16.041v/ 16.41av tila.cūrṇaṁ ca sa.sneha. 16.41bv .phāṇitaṁ kṛśarā tathā]
AHS1.16.042a/ peyā ca pañca.prasṛtā snehais taṇḍula.pañcamaiḥ |
AHS1.16.042c/ saptaite snehanāḥ sadyaḥ snehāś ca lavaṇolbaṇāḥ || 42 || [Note: AHS1.16.042v/ 16.42dv snehaś ca lavaṇolbaṇaḥ]
AHS1.16.043a/ tad dhy abhiṣyandy a.rūkṣaṁ ca sūkṣmam uṣṇaṁ vyavāyi ca |
AHS1.16.043c/ guḍānūpāmiṣa.kṣīra.tila.māṣa.surā.dadhi || 43 || [Note: AHS1.16.043v/ 16.43av tad dhi viṣyandy a.rūkṣaṁ ca]
AHS1.16.044a/ kuṣṭha.śopha.prameheṣu snehārthaṁ na prakalpayet |
AHS1.16.044c/ tri.phalā.pippalī.pathyā.guggulv.ādi.vipācitān || 44 ||
AHS1.16.045a/ snehān yathā.svam eteṣāṁ yojayed a.vikāriṇaḥ |
AHS1.16.045c/ kṣīṇānāṁ tv āmayair agni.deha.sandhukṣaṇa.kṣamān || 45 || [Note: AHS1.16.045v/ 16.45av kṣīṇānām āmayair agni.]
AHS1.16.046a/ dīptāntarāgniḥ pariśuddha.koṣṭhaḥ pratyagra.dhātur bala.varṇa.yuktaḥ |
AHS1.16.046c/ dṛḍhendriyo manda.jaraḥ śatāyuḥ snehopasevī puruṣaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ || 46 ||

1.17. Chapter 17 :: Athasvedavidhy adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 118-121]
AHS1.17.001a/ svedas tāpopanāhoṣma.drava.bhedāc catur.vidhaḥ |
AHS1.17.001c/ tāpo 'gni.tapta.vasana.phāla.hasta.talādibhiḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.17.002a/ upanāho vacā.kiṇva.śatāhvā.devadārubhiḥ |
AHS1.17.002c/ dhānyaiḥ samastair gandhaiś ca rāsnairaṇḍa.jaṭāmiṣaiḥ || 2 ||
AHS1.17.003a/ udrikta.lavaṇaiḥ sneha.cukra.takra.payaḥ.plutaiḥ |
AHS1.17.003c/ kevale pavane śleṣma.saṁsṛṣṭe surasādibhiḥ || 3 ||
AHS1.17.004a/ pittena padmakādyais tu śālvaṇākhyaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS1.17.004c/ snigdhoṣṇa.vīryair mṛdubhiś carma.paṭṭair a.pūtibhiḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS1.17.004v/ 17.4av pittena padmakādyaiś ca 17.4bv śālvalākhyaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ]
[Page 101 ]
AHS1.17.005a/ a.lābhe vāta.jit pattra.kauśeyāvika.śāṭakaiḥ |
AHS1.17.005c/ baddhaṁ rātrau divā muñcen muñced rātrau divā.kṛtam || 5 ||
AHS1.17.006a/ ūṣmā tūtkārikā.loṣṭa.kapālopala.pāṁsubhiḥ |
AHS1.17.006c/ pattra.bhaṅgena dhānyena karīṣa.sikatā.tuṣaiḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.17.007a/ anekopāya.santaptaiḥ prayojyo deśa.kālataḥ |
AHS1.17.007c/ śigru.vāraṇakairaṇḍa.karañja.surasārjakāt || 7 ||
AHS1.17.008a/ śirīṣa.vāsā.vaṁśārka.mālatī.dīrghavṛntataḥ |
AHS1.17.008c/ pattra.bhaṅgair vacādyaiś ca māṁsaiś cānūpa.vāri.jaiḥ || 8 ||
AHS1.17.009a/ daśa.mūlena ca pṛthak sahitair vā yathā.malam |
AHS1.17.009c/ sneha.vadbhiḥ surā.śukta.vāri.kṣīrādi.sādhitaiḥ || 9 ||
AHS1.17.010a/ kumbhīr galantīr nāḍīr vā pūrayitvā rujārditam |
AHS1.17.010c/ vāsasācchāditaṁ gātraṁ snigdhaṁ siñced yathā.sukham || 10 || [Note: AHS1.17.010v/ 17.10cv vastrāvacchāditaṁ gātraṁ]
AHS1.17.011a/ tair eva vā dravaiḥ pūrṇaṁ kuṇḍaṁ sarvāṅga.ge 'nile |
AHS1.17.011c/ avagāhyāturas tiṣṭhed arśaḥ.kṛcchrādi.rukṣu ca || 11 ||
AHS1.17.012a/ nivāte 'ntar.bahiḥ.snigdho jīrṇānnaḥ svedam ācaret |
AHS1.17.012c/ vyādhi.vyādhita.deśartu.vaśān madhya.varāvaram || 12 || [Note: AHS1.17.012v/ 17.12av nir.vāte 'ntar.bahiḥ.snigdho]
AHS1.17.013a/ kaphārto rūkṣaṇaṁ rūkṣo rūkṣaḥ snigdhaṁ kaphānile |
AHS1.17.013c/ āmāśaya.gate vāyau kaphe pakvāśayāśrite || 13 || [Note: AHS1.17.013v/ 17.13av kaphe taṁ rūkṣaṇai rūkṣo]
AHS1.17.014a/ rūkṣa.pūrvaṁ tathā sneha.pūrvaṁ sthānānurodhataḥ |
AHS1.17.014c/ alpaṁ vaṅkṣaṇayoḥ sv.alpaṁ dṛṅ.muṣka.hṛdaye na vā || 14 || [Note: AHS1.17.014v/ 17.14cv alpaṁ vaṅkṣaṇayoḥ svedaṁ]
[Page 102 ]
AHS1.17.015a/ śīta.śūla.kṣaye svinno jāte 'ṅgānāṁ ca mārdave |
AHS1.17.015c/ syāc chanair mṛditaḥ snātas tataḥ sneha.vidhiṁ bhajet || 15 ||
AHS1.17.016a/ pittāsra.kopa.tṛṇ.mūrchā.svarāṅga.sadana.bhramāḥ |
AHS1.17.016c/ sandhi.pīḍā jvaraḥ śyāva.rakta.maṇḍala.darśanam || 16 ||
AHS1.17.017a/ svedāti.yogāc chardiś ca tatra stambhanam auṣadham |
AHS1.17.017c/ viṣa.kṣārāgny.atīsāra.cchardi.mohātureṣu ca || 17 ||
AHS1.17.018a/ svedanaṁ guru tīkṣṇoṣṇaṁ prāyaḥ stambhanam anya.thā |
AHS1.17.018c/ drava.sthira.sara.snigdha.rūkṣa.sūkṣmaṁ ca bheṣajam || 18 ||
AHS1.17.019a/ svedanaṁ stambhanaṁ ślakṣṇaṁ rūkṣa.sūkṣma.sara.dravam |
AHS1.17.019c/ prāyas tiktaṁ kaṣāyaṁ ca madhuraṁ ca samāsataḥ || 19 ||
AHS1.17.020a/ stambhitaḥ syād bale labdhe yathoktāmaya.saṅkṣayāt |
AHS1.17.020c/ stambha.tvak.snāyu.saṅkoca.kampa.hṛd.vāg.ghanu.grahaiḥ || 20 ||
AHS1.17.021a/ pādauṣṭha.tvak.karaiḥ śyāvair ati.stambhitam ādiśet |
AHS1.17.021c/ na svedayed ati.sthūla.rūkṣa.dur.bala.mūrchitān || 21 ||
AHS1.17.022a/ stambhanīya.kṣata.kṣīṇa.kṣāma.madya.vikāriṇaḥ |
AHS1.17.022c/ timirodara.vīsarpa.kuṣṭha.śoṣāḍhya.rogiṇaḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS1.17.022v/ 17.22dv .kuṣṭha.śophāḍhya.rogiṇaḥ]
AHS1.17.023a/ pīta.dugdha.dadhi.sneha.madhūn kṛta.virecanān |
AHS1.17.023c/ bhraṣṭa.dagdha.guda.glāni.krodha.śoka.bhayārditān || 23 || [Note: AHS1.17.023v/ 17.23dv .krodha.śoka.bhayānvitān 17.23dv .krodha.rakta.kṣayānvitān]
AHS1.17.024a/ kṣut.tṛṣṇā.kāmalā.pāṇḍu.mehinaḥ pitta.pīḍitān |
AHS1.17.024c/ garbhiṇīṁ puṣpitāṁ sūtāṁ mṛdu cātyayike gade || 24 || [Note: AHS1.17.024v/ 17.24dv mṛdu tv ātyayike gade]
[Page 103 ]
AHS1.17.025a/ śvāsa.kāsa.pratiśyāya.hidhmādhmāna.vibandhiṣu |
AHS1.17.025c/ svara.bhedānila.vyādhi.śleṣmāma.stambha.gaurave || 25 ||
AHS1.17.026a/ aṅga.marda.kaṭī.pārśva.pṛṣṭha.kukṣi.hanu.grahe |
AHS1.17.026c/ mahat.tve muṣkayoḥ khalyām āyāme vāta.kaṇṭake || 26 ||
AHS1.17.027a/ mūtra.kṛcchrārbuda.granthi.śukrāghātāḍhya.mārute |
AHS1.17.027c/ svedaṁ yathā.yathaṁ kuryāt tad.auṣadha.vibhāgataḥ || 27 ||
AHS1.17.028a/ svedo hitas tv an.āgneyo vāte medaḥ.kaphāvṛte |
AHS1.17.028c/ nivātaṁ gṛham āyāso guru.prāvaraṇaṁ bhayam || 28 ||
AHS1.17.028ū̆/ upanāhāhava.krodhā bhūri.pānaṁ kṣudhātapaḥ || 28ū̆ || [Note: AHS1.17.028ū̆v/ 17.28ū̆av upanāhāhava.krodha. 17.28ū̆bv .bhūri.pānaṁ kṣudhātapaḥ 17.28ū̆bv bhūri.pāna.kṣud.ātapaḥ]
AHS1.17.028ū̆+1/ svedayanti daśaitāni naram agni.guṇād ṛte || 28ū̆+1 ||
AHS1.17.029a/ sneha.klinnāḥ koṣṭha.gā dhātu.gā vā sroto.līnā ye ca śākhāsthi.saṁsthāḥ |
AHS1.17.029c/ doṣāḥ svedais te dravī.kṛtya koṣṭhaṁ nītāḥ samyak śuddhibhir nirhriyante || 29 ||

1.18. Chapter 18 :: Athavamanavirecanavidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 121-125]
AHS1.18.001a/ kaphe vidadhyād vamanaṁ saṁyoge vā kapholbaṇe |
AHS1.18.001c/ tad.vad virecanaṁ pitte viśeṣeṇa tu vāmayet || 1 ||
AHS1.18.002a/ nava.jvarātisārādhaḥ.pittāsṛg.rāja.yakṣmiṇaḥ |
AHS1.18.002c/ kuṣṭha.mehāpacī.granthi.ślīpadonmāda.kāsinaḥ || 2 ||
AHS1.18.003a/ śvāsa.hṛl.lāsa.vīsarpa.stanya.doṣordhva.rogiṇaḥ |
AHS1.18.003c/ a.vāmyā garbhiṇī rūkṣaḥ kṣudhito nitya.duḥkhitaḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS1.18.003v/ 18.3bv .stanya.rogordhva.rogiṇaḥ 18.3cv a.vāmyā garbhiṇī.rūkṣa. 18.3dv .kṣudhitā nitya.duḥkhitāḥ]
[Page 104 ]
AHS1.18.004a/ bāla.vṛddha.kṛśa.sthūla.hṛd.rogi.kṣata.dur.balāḥ |
AHS1.18.004c/ prasakta.vamathu.plīha.timira.kṛmi.koṣṭhinaḥ || 4 ||
AHS1.18.005a/ ūrdhva.pravṛtta.vāyv.asra.datta.vasti.hata.svarāḥ |
AHS1.18.005c/ mūtrāghāty udarī gulmī dur.vamo 'ty.agnir arśasaḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS1.18.005v/ 18.5av ūrdhva.pravṛtta.vātāsra.]
AHS1.18.006a/ udāvarta.bhramāṣṭhīlā.pārśva.rug.vāta.rogiṇaḥ |
AHS1.18.006c/ ṛte viṣa.garā.jīrṇa.viruddhābhyavahārataḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS1.18.006v/ 18.6av udāvarta.śramāṣṭhīlā.]
AHS1.18.007a/ prasakta.vamathoḥ pūrve prāyeṇāma.jvaro 'pi ca |
AHS1.18.007c/ dhūmāntaiḥ karmabhir varjyāḥ sarvair eva tv a.jīrṇinaḥ || 7 ||
AHS1.18.008a/ vireka.sādhyā gulmārśo.visphoṭa.vyaṅga.kāmalāḥ |
AHS1.18.008c/ jīrṇa.jvarodara.gara.cchardi.plīha.halīmakāḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS1.18.008v/ 18.8cv jīrṇa.jvarodara.cchardi. 18.8dv .plīhānāha.halīmakāḥ 18.8dv .plīha.pāṇḍu.halīmakāḥ]
AHS1.18.009a/ vidradhis timiraṁ kācaḥ syandaḥ pakvāśaya.vyathā |
AHS1.18.009c/ yoni.śukrāśrayā rogāḥ koṣṭha.gāḥ kṛmayo vraṇāḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS1.18.009v/ 18.9cv yoni.śukra.gatā rogāḥ 18.9cv yoni.śukrāśayā rogāḥ]
AHS1.18.010a/ vātāsram ūrdhva.gaṁ raktaṁ mūtrāghātaḥ śakṛd.grahaḥ |
AHS1.18.010c/ vāmyaś ca kuṣṭha.mehādyā na tu recyā nava.jvarī || 10 || [Note: AHS1.18.010v/ 18.10av vātāsṛg ūrdhva.gaṁ raktaṁ 18.10dv na tu recyo nava.jvarī]
AHS1.18.011a/ alpāgny.adho.ga.pittāsra.kṣata.pāyv.atisāriṇaḥ |
AHS1.18.011c/ sa.śalyāsthāpita.krūra.koṣṭhāti.snigdha.śoṣiṇaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS1.18.011v/ 18.11cv sa.śalyābhihata.krūra.]
AHS1.18.012a/ atha sādhāraṇe kāle snigdha.svinnaṁ yathā.vidhi |
AHS1.18.012c/ śvo.vamyam utkliṣṭa.kaphaṁ matsya.māṣa.tilādibhiḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS1.18.012v/ 18.12dv matsya.māṁsa.tilādibhiḥ 18.12dv māṁsa.māṣa.tilādibhiḥ]
AHS1.18.013a/ niśāṁ suptaṁ su.jīrṇānnaṁ pūrvāhṇe kṛta.maṅgalam |
AHS1.18.013c/ nir.annam īṣat.snigdhaṁ vā peyayā pīta.sarpiṣam || 13 || [Note: AHS1.18.013v/ 18.13av niśāṁ suptaṁ ca jīrṇānnaṁ]
[Page 105 ]
AHS1.18.014a/ vṛddha.bālā.bala.klība.bhīrūn rogānurodhataḥ |
AHS1.18.014c/ ā.kaṇṭhaṁ pāyitān madyaṁ kṣīram ikṣu.rasaṁ rasam || 14 || [Note: AHS1.18.014v/ 18.14cv ā.kaṇṭhaṁ pāyayen madyaṁ]
AHS1.18.015a/ yathā.vikāra.vihitāṁ madhu.saindhava.saṁyutām |
AHS1.18.015c/ koṣṭhaṁ vibhajya bhaiṣajya.mātrāṁ mantrābhimantritām || 15 ||
AHS1.18.016a/ brahma.dakṣāśvi.rudrendra.bhū.candrārkānilānalāḥ |
AHS1.18.016c/ ṛṣayaḥ sauṣadhi.grāmā bhūta.saṅghāś ca pāntu vaḥ || 16 ||
AHS1.18.017a/ rasāyanam ivarṣīṇām a.marāṇām ivāmṛtam |
AHS1.18.017c/ sudhevottama.nāgānāṁ bhaiṣajyam idam astu te || 17 || [Note: AHS1.18.017v/ 18.17av rasāyanam ivarṣīṇāṁ 18.17bv devānām amṛtaṁ yathā]
AHS1.18.017+1/ namo bhaga.vate bhaiṣajya.gurave vaiḍūrya.prabha.rājāya || 17+1 ||
AHS1.18.017+2/ tathā.gatāyārhate samyak.sambuddhāya || 17+2 ||
AHS1.18.017+3/ tad yathā || 17+3 ||
AHS1.18.017+4/ bhaiṣajye bhaiṣajye mahā.bhaiṣajye samudgate svāhā || 17+4 || [Note: AHS1.18.017+4v/ 18.17+4v bhaiṣajye bhaiṣajye mahā.bhaiṣajye bhaiṣajya.samudgate svāhā 18.17+4v bhaiṣajye mahā.bhaiṣajye samudgate svāhā]
AHS1.18.018a/ prāṅ.mukhaṁ pāyayet pīto muhūrtam anupālayet |
AHS1.18.018c/ tan.manā jāta.hṛl.lāsa.prasekaś chardayet tataḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS1.18.018v/ 18.18av prāṅ.mukhaṁ pāyayet pītaṁ 18.18av prāṅ.mukhaṁ pāyayet pīte 18.18dv .prasekaṁ chardayet tataḥ]
AHS1.18.019a/ aṅgulībhyām an.āyasto nālena mṛdunātha.vā |
AHS1.18.019c/ gala.tālv a.rujan vegān a.pravṛttān pravartayan || 19 || [Note: AHS1.18.019v/ 18.19dv nā.pravṛttān pravartayan 18.19dv nā.pravṛttān pravartayet 18.19dv a.pravṛttān pravartayet]
[Page 106 ]
AHS1.18.020a/ pravartayan pravṛttāṁś ca jānu.tulyāsane sthitaḥ |
AHS1.18.020c/ ubhe pārśve lalāṭaṁ ca vamataś cāsya dhārayet || 20 ||
AHS1.18.021a/ prapīḍayet tathā nābhiṁ pṛṣṭhaṁ ca pratilomataḥ |
AHS1.18.021c/ kaphe tīkṣṇoṣṇa.kaṭukaiḥ pitte svādu.himair iti || 21 ||
AHS1.18.022a/ vamet snigdhāmla.lavaṇaiḥ saṁsṛṣṭe marutā kaphe |
AHS1.18.022c/ pittasya darśanaṁ yāvac chedo vā śleṣmaṇo bhavet || 22 ||
AHS1.18.023a/ hīna.vegaḥ kaṇā.dhātrī.siddhārtha.lavaṇodakaiḥ |
AHS1.18.023c/ vamet punaḥ punas tatra vegānām a.pravartanam || 23 ||
AHS1.18.024a/ pravṛttiḥ sa.vibandhā vā kevalasyauṣadhasya vā |
AHS1.18.024c/ a.yogas tena niṣṭhīva.kaṇḍū.koṭha.jvarādayaḥ || 24 ||
AHS1.18.025a/ nir.vibandhaṁ pravartante kapha.pittānilāḥ kramāt |
AHS1.18.025c/ samyag.yoge 'ti.yoge tu phena.candraka.rakta.vat || 25 || [Note: AHS1.18.025v/ 18.25dv phena.candrika.rakta.vat]
AHS1.18.025.1+(1)a/ manaḥ.prasādaḥ svāsthyaṁ cāvasthānaṁ ca svayaṁ bhavet |
AHS1.18.025.1+(1)c/ vaiparītyam a.yogānāṁ na cāti.mahatī vyathā || 25.1+(1) || [Note: AHS1.18.018.25.1+(1)v/ 18.25.1+(1)av manaḥ.prasādaḥ svāsthyaṁ ca 18.25.1+(1)bv avasthānaṁ svayaṁ bhavet]
AHS1.18.026a/ vamitaṁ kṣāma.tā dāhaḥ kaṇṭha.śoṣas tamo bhramaḥ |
AHS1.18.026c/ ghorā vāyv.āmayā mṛtyur jīva.śoṇita.nirgamāt || 26 ||
AHS1.18.027a/ samyag.yogena vamitaṁ kṣaṇam āśvāsya pāyayet |
AHS1.18.027c/ dhūma.trayasyānya.tamaṁ snehācāram athādiśet || 27 ||
AHS1.18.028a/ tataḥ sāyaṁ prabhāte vā kṣud.vān snātaḥ sukhāmbunā |
AHS1.18.028c/ bhuñjāno rakta.śāly.annaṁ bhajet peyādikaṁ kramam || 28 || [Note: AHS1.18.028v/ 18.28cv purāṇa.rakta.śālīnām 18.28cv bhuñjāno 'nnam apekṣeta 18.28dv a.sneha.lavaṇoṣaṇam 18.28dv peyādikam imaṁ kramam 18.28dv peyādikam imaṁ kramāt 18.28dv peyādikam amuṁ kramam]
[Page 107 ]
AHS1.18.029a/ peyāṁ vilepīm a.kṛtaṁ kṛtaṁ ca yūṣaṁ rasaṁ trīn ubhayaṁ tathaikam |
AHS1.18.029c/ krameṇa seveta naro 'nna.kālān pradhāna.madhyāvara.śuddhi.śuddhaḥ || 29 ||
AHS1.18.030a/ yathāṇur agnis tṛṇa.go.mayādyaiḥ sandhukṣyamāṇo bhavati krameṇa |
AHS1.18.030c/ mahān sthiraḥ sarva.pacas tathaiva śuddhasya peyādibhir antarāgniḥ || 30 || [Note: AHS1.18.030v/ 18.30dv śuddhasya peyādibhir antar.agniḥ]
AHS1.18.031a/ jaghanya.madhya.pravare tu vegāś catvāra iṣṭā vamane ṣaḍ aṣṭau |
AHS1.18.031c/ daśaiva te dvi.tri.guṇā vireke prasthas tathā syād dvi.catur.guṇaś ca || 31 ||
AHS1.18.032a/ pittāvasānaṁ vamanaṁ virekād ardhaṁ kaphāntaṁ ca virekam āhuḥ |
AHS1.18.032c/ dvi.trān sa.viṭkān apanīya vegān meyaṁ vireke vamane tu pītam || 32 ||
AHS1.18.033a/ athainaṁ vāmitaṁ bhūyaḥ sneha.svedopapāditam |
AHS1.18.033c/ śleṣma.kāle gate jñātvā koṣṭhaṁ samyag virecayet || 33 ||
AHS1.18.034a/ bahu.pitto mṛduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kṣīreṇāpi viricyate |
AHS1.18.034c/ prabhūta.mārutaḥ krūraḥ kṛcchrāc chyāmādikair api || 34 ||
AHS1.18.035a/ kaṣāya.madhuraiḥ pitte virekaḥ kaṭukaiḥ kaphe |
AHS1.18.035c/ snigdhoṣṇa.lavaṇair vāyāv a.pravṛttau tu pāyayet || 35 ||
AHS1.18.036a/ uṣṇāmbu svedayed asya pāṇi.tāpena codaram |
AHS1.18.036c/ utthāne 'lpe dine tasmin bhuktvānye.dyuḥ punaḥ pibet || 36 ||
AHS1.18.037a/ a.dṛḍha.sneha.koṣṭhas tu pibed ūrdhvaṁ daśāhataḥ |
AHS1.18.037c/ bhūyo 'py upaskṛta.tanuḥ sneha.svedair virecanam || 37 ||
AHS1.18.038a/ yaugikaṁ samyag ālocya smaran pūrvam atikramam |
AHS1.18.038c/ hṛt.kukṣy.a.śuddhir a.rucir utkleśaḥ śleṣma.pittayoḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS1.18.038v/ 18.38bv smaran pūrvam anukramam]
[Page 108 ]
AHS1.18.039a/ kaṇḍū.vidāhaḥ piṭikāh pīnaso vāta.viḍ.grahaḥ |
AHS1.18.039c/ a.yoga.lakṣaṇaṁ yogo vaiparītye yathoditāt || 39 || [Note: AHS1.18.039v/ 18.39av kaṇḍū.vidāhaḥ piṭikā]
AHS1.18.040a/ viṭ.pitta.kapha.vāteṣu niḥsṛteṣu kramāt sravet |
AHS1.18.040c/ niḥ.śleṣma.pittam udakaṁ śvetaṁ kṛṣṇaṁ sa.lohitam || 40 ||
AHS1.18.041a/ māṁsa.dhāvana.tulyaṁ vā medaḥ.khaṇḍābham eva vā |
AHS1.18.041c/ guda.niḥsaraṇaṁ tṛṣṇā bhramo netra.praveśanam || 41 || [Note: AHS1.18.041v/ 18.41dv śramo netra.praveśanam]
AHS1.18.042a/ bhavanty ati.viriktasya tathāti.vamanāmayāḥ |
AHS1.18.042c/ samyag.viriktam enaṁ ca vamanoktena yojayet || 42 ||
AHS1.18.043a/ dhūma.varjyena vidhinā tato vamita.vān iva |
AHS1.18.043c/ krameṇānnāni bhuñjāno bhajet prakṛti.bhojanam || 43 ||
AHS1.18.044a/ manda.vahnim a.saṁśuddham a.kṣāmaṁ doṣa.dur.balam |
AHS1.18.044c/ a.dṛṣṭa.jīrṇa.liṅgaṁ ca laṅghayet pīta.bheṣajam || 44 ||
AHS1.18.045a/ sneha.svedauṣadhotkleśa.saṅgair iti na bādhyate |
AHS1.18.045c/ saṁśodhanāsra.visrāva.sneha.yojana.laṅghanaiḥ || 45 ||
AHS1.18.046a/ yāty agnir manda.tāṁ tasmāt kramaṁ peyādim ācaret |
AHS1.18.046c/ srutālpa.pitta.śleṣmāṇaṁ madya.paṁ vāta.paittikam || 46 ||
AHS1.18.047a/ peyāṁ na pāyayet teṣāṁ tarpaṇādi.kramo hitaḥ |
AHS1.18.047c/ a.pakvaṁ vamanaṁ dośān pacyamānaṁ virecanam || 47 || [Note: AHS1.18.047v/ 18.47bv tarpaṇādiḥ kramo hitaḥ 18.47bv tarpaṇādiḥ kramo mataḥ 18.47bv tarpaṇādi.kramo mataḥ]
AHS1.18.048a/ nirhared vamanasyātaḥ pākaṁ na pratipālayet |
AHS1.18.048c/ dur.balo bahu.doṣaś ca doṣa.pākena yaḥ svayam || 48 ||
[Page 109 ]
AHS1.18.049a/ viricyate bhedanīyair bhojyais tam upapādayet |
AHS1.18.049c/ dur.balaḥ śodhitaḥ pūrvam alpa.doṣaḥ kṛśo naraḥ || 49 || [Note: AHS1.18.049v/ 18.49bv bhojyais taṁ samupācaret]
AHS1.18.050a/ a.parijñāta.koṣṭhaś ca piben mṛdv alpam auṣadham |
AHS1.18.050c/ varaṁ tad a.sakṛt.pītam anya.thā saṁśayāvaham || 50 || [Note: AHS1.18.050v/ 18.50av varaṁ tad a.sakṛt.pītaṁ 18.50bv nānya.thā saṁśayāvaham]
AHS1.18.051a/ hared bahūṁś calān doṣān alpān alpān punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS1.18.051c/ dur.balasya mṛdu.dravyair alpān saṁśamayet tu tān || 51 ||
AHS1.18.052a/ kleśayanti ciraṁ te hi hanyur vainam a.nirhṛtāḥ |
AHS1.18.052c/ mandāgniṁ krūra.koṣṭhaṁ ca sa.kṣāra.lavaṇair ghṛtaiḥ || 52 || [Note: AHS1.18.052v/ 18.52bv hanyuś cainam a.nirhṛtāḥ]
AHS1.18.053a/ sandhukṣitāgniṁ vijita.kapha.vātaṁ ca śodhayet |
AHS1.18.053c/ rūkṣa.bahv.anila.krūra.koṣṭha.vyāyāma.śīlinām || 53 ||
AHS1.18.054a/ dīptāgnīnāṁ ca bhaiṣajyam a.virecyaiva jīryati |
AHS1.18.054c/ tebhyo vastiṁ purā dadyāt tataḥ snigdhaṁ virecanam || 54 || [Note: AHS1.18.054v/ 18.54cv tebhyo vastiṁ puro dadyāt]
AHS1.18.055a/ śakṛn nirhṛtya vā kiñ.cit tīkṣṇābhiḥ phala.vartibhiḥ |
AHS1.18.055c/ pravṛttaṁ hi malaṁ snigdho vireko nirharet sukham || 55 ||
AHS1.18.056a/ viṣābhighāta.piṭikā.kuṣṭha.śopha.visarpiṇaḥ |
AHS1.18.056c/ kāmalā.pāṇḍu.mehārtān nāti.snigdhān viśodhayet || 56 || [Note: AHS1.18.056v/ 18.56dv nāti.snigdhān virecayet ]
AHS1.18.057a/ sarvān sneha.virekaiś ca rūkṣais tu sneha.bhāvitān |
AHS1.18.057c/ karmaṇāṁ vamanādīnāṁ punar apy antare 'ntare || 57 || [Note: AHS1.18.057v/ 18.57bv rūkṣaiś ca sneha.bhāvitān]
AHS1.18.058a/ sneha.svedau prayuñjīta sneham ante balāya ca |
AHS1.18.058c/ malo hi dehād utkleśya hriyate vāsaso yathā || 58 ||
[Page 110 ]
AHS1.18.059a/ sneha.svedais tathotkliṣṭaḥ śodhyate śodhanair malaḥ |
AHS1.18.059c/ sneha.svedāv an.abhyasya kuryāt saṁśodhanaṁ tu yaḥ || 59 || [Note: AHS1.18.059v/ 18.59av sneha.svedais tathotkleśya 18.59bv hriyate śodhanair malaḥ]
AHS1.18.059ū̆ab/ dāru śuṣkam ivān.āme śarīraṁ tasya dīryate || 59ū̆ab ||
AHS1.18.060ū̆a/ buddhi.prasādaṁ balam indriyāṇāṁ dhātu.sthira.tvaṁ jvalanasya dīptim |
AHS1.18.060ū̆c/ cirāc ca pākaṁ vayasaḥ karoti saṁśodhanaṁ samyag.upāsyamānam || 60ū̆ || [Note: AHS1.18.060ū̆v/ 18.60ū̆av buddheḥ prasādaṁ balam indriyāṇāṁ 18.60ū̆bv dhātoḥ sthira.tvaṁ jvalanasya dīptim]

1.19. Chapter 19 :: Athabastividhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 125-134]
AHS1.19.001a/ vātolbaṇeṣu doṣeṣu vāte vā vastir iṣyate |
AHS1.19.001c/ upakramāṇāṁ sarveṣāṁ so 'graṇīs tri.vidhas tu saḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS1.19.001v/ 19.1dv so 'graṇīs tri.vidhaś ca saḥ]
AHS1.19.002a/ nirūho 'nvāsanaṁ vastir uttaras tena sādhayet |
AHS1.19.002c/ gulmānāha.khuḍa.plīha.śuddhātīsāra.śūlinaḥ || 2 ||
AHS1.19.003a/ jīrṇa.jvara.pratiśyāya.śukrānila.mala.grahān |
AHS1.19.003c/ vardhmāśmarī.rajo.nāśān dāruṇāṁś cānilāmayān || 3 ||
AHS1.19.004a/ an.āsthāpyās tv ati.snigdhaḥ kṣatorasko bhṛśaṁ kṛśaḥ |
AHS1.19.004c/ āmātīsārī vami.mān saṁśuddho datta.nāvanaḥ || 4 ||
AHS1.19.005a/ śvāsa.kāsa.prasekārśo.hidhmādhmānālpa.vahnayaḥ |
AHS1.19.005c/ śūna.pāyuḥ kṛtāhāro baddha.cchidrodakodarī || 5 || [Note: AHS1.19.005v/ 19.5dv baddha.cchidra.dakodarī]
AHS1.19.006a/ kuṣṭhī ca madhu.mehī ca māsān sapta ca garbhiṇī |
AHS1.19.006c/ āsthāpyā eva cānvāsyā viśeṣād ati.vahnayaḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.19.007a/ rūkṣāḥ kevala.vātārtā nānuvāsyās ta eva ca |
AHS1.19.007c/ ye 'n.āsthāpyās tathā pāṇḍu.kāmalā.meha.pīnasāḥ || 7 ||
[Page 111 ]
AHS1.19.008a/ nir.anna.plīha.viḍ.bhedi.guru.koṣṭha.kaphodarāḥ |
AHS1.19.008c/ abhiṣyandi.bhṛśa.sthūla.kṛmi.koṣṭhāḍhya.mārutāḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS1.19.008v/ 19.8bv .guru.koṣṭhaḥ kaphodarī 19.8cv abhiṣyandi.kṛśa.sthūla.]
AHS1.19.009a/ pīte viṣe gare 'pacyāṁ ślīpadī gala.gaṇḍa.vān |
AHS1.19.009c/ tayos tu netraṁ hemādi.dhātu.dārv.asthi.veṇu.jam || 9 ||
AHS1.19.010a/ go.pucchākāram a.cchidraṁ ślakṣṇarju guṭikā.mukham |
AHS1.19.010c/ ūne 'bde pañca pūrṇe 'sminn ā.saptabhyo 'ṅgulāni ṣaṭ || 10 ||
AHS1.19.011a/ saptame sapta tāny aṣṭau dvā.daśe ṣo.ḍaśe nava |
AHS1.19.011c/ dvā.daśaiva paraṁ viṁśād vīkṣya varṣāntareṣu ca || 11 ||
AHS1.19.012a/ vayo.bala.śarīrāṇi pramāṇam abhivardhayet |
AHS1.19.012c/ svāṅguṣṭhena samaṁ mūle sthaulyenāgre kaniṣṭhayā || 12 ||
AHS1.19.013a/ pūrṇe 'bde 'ṅgulam ādāya tad.ardhārdha.pravardhitam |
AHS1.19.013c/ try.aṅgulaṁ paramaṁ chidraṁ mūle 'gre vahate tu yat || 13 ||
AHS1.19.014a/ mudgaṁ māṣaṁ kalāyaṁ ca klinnaṁ karkandhukaṁ kramāt |
AHS1.19.014c/ mūla.cchidra.pramāṇena prānte ghaṭita.karṇikam || 14 ||
AHS1.19.015a/ vartyāgre pihitaṁ mūle yathā.svaṁ dvy.aṅgulāntaram |
AHS1.19.015c/ karṇikā.dvitayaṁ netre kuryāt tatra ca yojayet || 15 || [Note: AHS1.19.015v/ 19.15bv yathā.svaṁ dvy.aṅgulāntare 19.15dv kuryāt tatra prayojayet 19.15dv kuryāt tatra tu yojayet]
AHS1.19.016a/ ajāvi.mahiṣādīnāṁ vastiṁ su.mṛditaṁ dṛḍham |
AHS1.19.016c/ kaṣāya.raktaṁ niś.chidra.granthi.gandha.siraṁ tanum || 16 || [Note: AHS1.19.016v/ 19.16av go.'jāvi.mahiṣādīnāṁ]
AHS1.19.017a/ grathitaṁ sādhu sūtreṇa sukha.saṁsthāpya.bheṣajam |
AHS1.19.017c/ vasty.a.bhāve 'ṅka.pādaṁ vā nyased vāso 'tha.vā ghanam || 17 || [Note: AHS1.19.017v/ 19.17av granthitaṁ sādhu sūtreṇa]
[Page 112 ]
AHS1.19.018a/ nirūha.mātrā prathame prakuñco vatsare param |
AHS1.19.018c/ prakuñca.vṛddhiḥ praty.abdaṁ yāvat ṣaṭ prasṛtās tataḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS1.19.018v/ 19.18bv prakuñco vatsarāt param]
AHS1.19.019a/ prasṛtaṁ vardhayed ūrdhvaṁ dvā.daśāṣṭā.daśasya tu |
AHS1.19.019c/ ā.saptater idaṁ mānaṁ daśaiva prasṛtāḥ param || 19 || [Note: AHS1.19.019v/ 19.19bv dvā.daśāṣṭā.daśasya ca]
AHS1.19.020a/ yathā.yathaṁ nirūhasya pādo mātrānuvāsane |
AHS1.19.020c/ āsthāpyaṁ snehitaṁ svinnaṁ śuddhaṁ labdha.balaṁ punaḥ || 20 ||
AHS1.19.021a/ anvāsanārhaṁ vijñāya pūrvam evānuvāsayet |
AHS1.19.021c/ śīte vasante ca divā rātrau ke.cit tato 'nya.dā || 21 || [Note: AHS1.19.021v/ 19.21dv rātrau ke.cit tato 'nya.thā]
AHS1.19.022a/ abhyakta.snātam ucitāt pāda.hīnaṁ hitaṁ laghu |
AHS1.19.022c/ a.snigdha.rūkṣam aśitaṁ sānu.pānaṁ dravādi ca || 22 || [Note: AHS1.19.022v/ 19.22dv sānu.pānaṁ dravādi vā]
AHS1.19.023a/ kṛta.caṅkramaṇaṁ mukta.viṇ.mūtraṁ śayane sukhe |
AHS1.19.023c/ nāty.ucchrite na coc.chīrṣe saṁviṣṭaṁ vāma.pārśvataḥ || 23 ||
AHS1.19.024a/ saṅkocya dakṣiṇaṁ sakthi prasārya ca tato 'param |
AHS1.19.024c/ athāsya netraṁ praṇayet snigdhe snigdha.mukhaṁ gude || 24 || [Note: AHS1.19.024v/ 19.24dv snigdhaṁ snigdha.mukhe gude]
AHS1.19.025a/ ucchvāsya vaster vadane baddhe hastam a.kampayan |
AHS1.19.025c/ pṛṣṭha.vaṁśaṁ prati tato nāti.druta.vilambitam || 25 ||
AHS1.19.026a/ nāti.vegaṁ na vā mandaṁ sakṛd eva prapīḍayet |
AHS1.19.026c/ sāvaśeṣaṁ ca kurvīta vāyuḥ śeṣe hi tiṣṭhati || 26 || [Note: AHS1.19.026v/ 19.26cv sāvaśeṣaṁ prakurvīta]
AHS1.19.027a/ datte tūttāna.dehasya pāṇinā tāḍayet sphijau |
AHS1.19.027c/ tat.pārṣṇibhyāṁ tathā śayyāṁ pādataś ca trir utkṣipet || 27 ||
[Page 113 ]
AHS1.19.028a/ tataḥ prasāritāṅgasya sopadhānasya pārṣṇike |
AHS1.19.028c/ āhanyān muṣṭināṅgaṁ ca snehenābhyajya mardayet || 28 ||
AHS1.19.029a/ vedanārtam iti sneho na hi śīghraṁ nivartate |
AHS1.19.029c/ yojyaḥ śīghraṁ nivṛtte 'nyaḥ sneho '.tiṣṭhann a.kārya.kṛt || 29 ||
AHS1.19.030a/ dīptāgniṁ tv āgata.snehaṁ sāyāhne bhojayel laghu |
AHS1.19.030c/ nivṛtti.kālaḥ paramas trayo yāmas tataḥ param || 30 ||
AHS1.19.031a/ aho.rātram upekṣeta parataḥ phala.vartibhiḥ |
AHS1.19.031c/ tīkṣṇair vā vastibhiḥ kuryād yatnaṁ sneha.nivṛttaye || 31 ||
AHS1.19.032a/ ati.raukṣyād an.āgacchan na cej jāḍyādi.doṣa.kṛt |
AHS1.19.032c/ upekṣetaiva hi tato 'dhyuṣitaś ca niśāṁ pibet || 32 ||
AHS1.19.033a/ prātar nāgara.dhānyāmbhaḥ koṣṇaṁ kevalam eva vā |
AHS1.19.033c/ anvāsayet tṛtīye 'hni pañcame vā punaś ca tam || 33 ||
AHS1.19.034a/ yathā vā sneha.paktiḥ syād ato 'ty.ulbaṇa.mārutān |
AHS1.19.034c/ vyāyāma.nityān dīptāgnīn rūkṣāṁś ca prati.vāsaram || 34 ||
AHS1.19.034+1a/ ādhmāna.saṅkoca.purīṣa.bandha.kṣīṇendriya.tvā.ruci.bhaṅga.śūlāḥ |
AHS1.19.034+1c/ pāṅgulya.śākhāśrita.vāta.bhagna.bandhāś ca sādhyā hy anuvāsanena || 34+1 || [Note: AHS1.19.034+1v/ 19.34+1dv .vātāś ca sādhyā hy anuvāsanena]
AHS1.19.035a/ iti snehais tri.caturaiḥ snigdhe sroto.viśuddhaye |
AHS1.19.035c/ nirūhaṁ śodhanaṁ yuñjyād a.snigdhe snehanaṁ tanoḥ || 35 ||
AHS1.19.036a/ pañcame 'tha tṛtīye vā divase sādhake śubhe |
AHS1.19.036c/ madhyāhne kiñ.cid.āvṛtte prayukte bali.maṅgale || 36 ||
[Page 114 ]
AHS1.19.037a/ abhyakta.sveditotsṛṣṭa.malaṁ nāti.bubhukṣitam |
AHS1.19.037c/ avekṣya puruṣaṁ doṣa.bheṣajādīni cādarāt || 37 || [Note: AHS1.19.037v/ 19.37cv avetya puruṣaṁ doṣa.]
AHS1.19.038a/ vastiṁ prakalpayed vaidyas tad.vidyair bahubhiḥ saha |
AHS1.19.038c/ kvāthayed viṁśati.palaṁ dravyasyāṣṭau phalāni ca || 38 || [Note: AHS1.19.038v/ 19.38bv tad.vedyair bahubhiḥ saha 19.38bv tad.vidhair bahubhiḥ saha]
AHS1.19.039a/ tataḥ kvāthāc caturthāṁśaṁ snehaṁ vāte prakalpayet |
AHS1.19.039c/ pitte svasthe ca ṣaṣṭhāṁśam aṣṭamāṁśaṁ kaphe 'dhike || 39 || [Note: AHS1.19.039v/ 19.39bv snehaṁ vāte 'nu kalpayet 19.39bv snehaṁ vāte tu kalpayet]
AHS1.19.040a/ sarva.tra cāṣṭamaṁ bhāgaṁ kalkād bhavati vā yathā |
AHS1.19.040c/ nāty.accha.sāndra.tā vasteḥ pala.mātraṁ guḍasya ca || 40 ||
AHS1.19.041a/ madhu.paṭv.ādi.śeṣaṁ ca yuktyā sarvaṁ tad ekataḥ |
AHS1.19.041c/ uṣṇāmbu.kumbhī.bāṣpeṇa taptaṁ khaja.samāhatam || 41 ||
AHS1.19.042a/ prakṣipya vastau praṇayet pāyau nāty.uṣṇa.śītalam |
AHS1.19.042c/ nāti.snigdhaṁ na vā rūkṣaṁ nāti.tīkṣṇaṁ na vā mṛdu || 42 ||
AHS1.19.043a/ nāty.accha.sāndraṁ nonāti.mātraṁ nā.paṭu nāti ca |
AHS1.19.043c/ lavaṇaṁ tad.vad amlaṁ ca paṭhanty anye tu tad.vidaḥ || 43 || [Note: AHS1.19.043v/ 19.43dv vadanty anye tu tad.vidaḥ ]
AHS1.19.044a/ mātrāṁ tri.palikāṁ kuryāt sneha.mākṣikayoḥ pṛthak |
AHS1.19.044c/ karṣārdhaṁ māṇimanthasya svasthe kalka.pala.dvayam || 44 ||
AHS1.19.045a/ sarva.dravāṇāṁ śeṣāṇāṁ palāni daśa kalpayet |
AHS1.19.045c/ mākṣikaṁ lavaṇaṁ snehaṁ kalkaṁ kvātham iti kramāt || 45 ||
AHS1.19.046a/ āvapeta nirūhāṇām eṣa saṁyojane vidhiḥ |
AHS1.19.046c/ uttāno datta.mātre tu nirūhe tan.manā bhavet || 46 ||
[Page 115 ]
AHS1.19.047a/ kṛtopadhānaḥ sañjāta.vegaś cotkaṭakaḥ sṛjet |
AHS1.19.047c/ āgatau paramaḥ kālo muhūrto mṛtyave param || 47 || [Note: AHS1.19.047v/ 19.47bv .vegaś cotkaṭukaḥ sṛjet 19.47bv .vegaś cotkuṭakaḥ sṛjet 19.47dv muhūrto mṛtyave paraḥ]
AHS1.19.048a/ tatrānulomikaṁ sneha.kṣāra.mūtrāmla.kalpitam |
AHS1.19.048c/ tvaritaṁ snigdha.tīkṣṇoṣṇaṁ vastim anyaṁ prapīḍayet || 48 || [Note: AHS1.19.048v/ 19.48av tatrānulomika.sneha.]
AHS1.19.049a/ vidadyāt phala.vartiṁ vā svedanottrāsanādi ca |
AHS1.19.049c/ svayam eva nivṛtte tu dvitīyo vastir iṣyate || 49 || [Note: AHS1.19.049v/ 19.49bv svedanotrāsanādi vā]
AHS1.19.050a/ tṛtīyo 'pi caturtho 'pi yāvad vā su.nirūḍha.tā |
AHS1.19.050c/ virikta.vac ca yogādīn vidyād yoge tu bhojayet || 50 || [Note: AHS1.19.050v/ 19.50bv yāvad vā su.nirūha.tā 19.50dv vidyād yoge tu yojayet]
AHS1.19.051a/ koṣṇena vāriṇā snātaṁ tanu.dhanva.rasaudanam |
AHS1.19.051c/ vikārā ye nirūḍhasya bhavanti pracalair malaiḥ || 51 || [Note: AHS1.19.051v/ 19.51av koṣṇena vāriṇā snānaṁ 19.51cv vikārā ye nirūhasya]
AHS1.19.052a/ te sukhoṣṇāmbu.siktasya yānti bhukta.vataḥ śamam |
AHS1.19.052c/ atha vātārditaṁ bhūyaḥ sadya evānuvāsayet || 52 ||
AHS1.19.053a/ samyag.dhīnāti.yogāś ca tasya syuḥ sneha.pīta.vat |
AHS1.19.053c/ kiñ.cit.kālaṁ sthito yaś ca sa.purīṣo nivartate || 53 || [Note: AHS1.19.053v/ 19.53cv kiñ.cit.kālaṁ sthito yasya]
AHS1.19.054a/ sānulomānilaḥ snehas tat siddham anuvāsanam |
AHS1.19.054c/ ekaṁ trīn vā balāse tu sneha.vastīn prakalpayet || 54 || [Note: AHS1.19.054v/ 19.54dv sneha.vastīn prayojayet]
AHS1.19.055a/ pañca vā sapta vā pitte navaikā.daśa vānile |
AHS1.19.055c/ punas tato 'py a.yugmāṁs tu punar āsthāpanaṁ tataḥ || 55 ||
AHS1.19.056a/ kapha.pittānileṣv annaṁ yūṣa.kṣīra.rasaiḥ kramāt |
AHS1.19.056c/ vāta.ghnauṣadha.niḥkvātha.trivṛtā.saindhavair yutaḥ || 56 ||
[Page 116 ]
AHS1.19.057a/ vastir eko 'nile snigdhaḥ svādv.amloṣṇo rasānvitaḥ |
AHS1.19.057c/ nyagrodhādi.gaṇa.kvātha.padmakādi.sitā.yutau || 57 || [Note: AHS1.19.057v/ 19.57bv svādv.amloṣṇa.rasānvitaḥ]
AHS1.19.058a/ pitte svādu.himau sājya.kṣīrekṣu.rasa.mākṣikau |
AHS1.19.058c/ āragvadhādi.niḥkvātha.vatsakādi.yutās trayaḥ || 58 ||
AHS1.19.059a/ rūkṣāḥ sa.kṣaudra.go.mūtrās tīkṣṇoṣṇa.kaṭukāḥ kaphe |
AHS1.19.059c/ trayas te sannipāte 'pi doṣān ghnanti yataḥ kramāt || 59 || [Note: AHS1.19.059v/ 19.59cv trayaś ca sannipāte 'pi]
AHS1.19.060a/ tribhyaḥ paraṁ vastim ato necchanty anye cikitsakāḥ |
AHS1.19.060c/ na hi doṣaś caturtho 'sti punar dīyeta yaṁ prati || 60 || [Note: AHS1.19.060v/ 19.60av nācārya.carakasyāto 19.60bv vastis tribhyaḥ paraṁ mataḥ]
AHS1.19.061a/ utkleśanaṁ śuddhi.karaṁ doṣāṇāṁ śamanaṁ kramāt |
AHS1.19.061c/ tri.dhaiva kalpayed vastim ity anye 'pi pracakṣate || 61 || [Note: AHS1.19.061v/ 19.61cv tri.dhaivaṁ kalpayed vastim]
AHS1.19.062a/ doṣauṣadhādi.balataḥ sarvam etat pramāṇayet |
AHS1.19.062c/ samyaṅ.nirūḍha.liṅgaṁ tu nā.sambhāvya nivartayet || 62 ||
AHS1.19.063a/ prāk sneha ekaḥ pañcānte dvā.daśāsthāpanāni ca |
AHS1.19.063c/ sānvāsanāni karmaivaṁ vastayas triṁśad īritāḥ || 63 ||
AHS1.19.064a/ kālaḥ pañca.daśaiko 'tra prāk sneho 'nte trayas tathā |
AHS1.19.064c/ ṣaṭ pañca.vasty.antaritā yogo 'ṣṭau vastayo 'tra tu || 64 ||
AHS1.19.065a/ trayo nirūhāḥ snehāś ca snehāv ādy.antayor ubhau |
AHS1.19.065c/ sneha.vastiṁ nirūhaṁ vā naikam evātiśīlayet || 65 ||
AHS1.19.066a/ utkleśāgni.vadhau snehān nirūhān maruto bhayam |
AHS1.19.066c/ tasmān nirūḍhaḥ snehyaḥ syān nirūhyaś cānuvāsitaḥ || 66 ||
[Page 117 ]
AHS1.19.067a/ sneha.śodhana.yuktyaivaṁ vasti.karma tri.doṣa.jit |
AHS1.19.067c/ hrasvayā sneha.pānasya mātrayā yojitaḥ samaḥ || 67 ||
AHS1.19.068a/ mātrā.vastiḥ smṛtaḥ snehaḥ śīlanīyaḥ sadā ca saḥ |
AHS1.19.068c/ bāla.vṛddhādhva.bhāra.strī.vyāyāmāsakta.cintakaiḥ || 68 || [Note: AHS1.19.068v/ 19.68cv bāla.vṛddhādhva.bhāṣya.strī.]
AHS1.19.069a/ vāta.bhagnā.balālpāgni.nṛpeśvara.sukhātmabhiḥ |
AHS1.19.069c/ doṣa.ghno niṣ.parīhāro balyaḥ sṛṣṭa.malaḥ sukhaḥ || 69 || [Note: AHS1.19.069v/ 19.69bv .nṛpaiśvarya.sukhātmabhiḥ]
AHS1.19.070a/ vastau rogeṣu nārīṇāṁ yoni.garbhāśayeṣu ca |
AHS1.19.070c/ dvi.trāsthāpana.śuddhebhyo vidadhyād vastim uttaram || 70 ||
AHS1.19.071a/ āturāṅgula.mānena tan.netraṁ dvā.daśāṅgulam |
AHS1.19.071c/ vṛttaṁ go.puccha.van mūla.madyayoḥ kṛta.karṇikam || 71 ||
AHS1.19.072a/ siddhārthaka.praveśāgraṁ ślakṣṇaṁ hemādi.sambhavam |
AHS1.19.072c/ kundāśvamāra.sumanaḥ.puṣpa.vṛntopamaṁ dṛḍham || 72 ||
AHS1.19.073a/ tasya vastir mṛdu.laghur mātrā śuktir vikalpya vā |
AHS1.19.073c/ atha snātāśītasyāsya sneha.vasti.vidhānataḥ || 73 || [Note: AHS1.19.073v/ 19.73bv mātrā śuktir vikalpya ca 19.73bv mātrā śuktiḥ prakalpya vā]
AHS1.19.074a/ ṛjoḥ sukhopaviṣṭasya pīṭhe jānu.same mṛdau |
AHS1.19.074c/ hṛṣṭe meḍhre sthite carjau śanaiḥ sroto.viśuddhaye || 74 ||
AHS1.19.075a/ sūkṣmāṁ śalākāṁ praṇayet tayā śuddhe anu.sevani |
AHS1.19.075c/ ā.mehanāntaṁ netraṁ ca niṣ.kampaṁ guda.vat tataḥ || 75 || [Note: AHS1.19.075v/ 19.75bv tayā śuddhe anu.sevanīm]
AHS1.19.076a/ pīḍite 'ntar.gate snehe sneha.vasti.kramo hitaḥ |
AHS1.19.076c/ vastīn anena vidhinā dadyāt trīṁś caturo 'pi vā || 76 || [Note: AHS1.19.076v/ 19.76av pīḍite 'nugate snehe]
[Page 118 ]
AHS1.19.077a/ anuvāsana.vac cheṣaṁ sarvam evāsya cintayet |
AHS1.19.077c/ strīṇām ārtava.kāle tu yonir gṛhṇāty apāvṛteḥ || 77 ||
AHS1.19.078a/ vidadhīta tadā tasmād an.ṛtāv api cātyaye |
AHS1.19.078c/ yoni.vibhraṁśa.śūleṣu yoni.vyāpady asṛg.dare || 78 ||
AHS1.19.079a/ netraṁ daśāṅgulaṁ mudga.praveśaṁ catur.aṅgulam |
AHS1.19.079c/ apatya.mārge yojyaṁ syād dvy.aṅgulaṁ mūtra.vartmani || 79 ||
AHS1.19.080a/ mūtra.kṛcchra.vikāreṣu bālānāṁ tv ekam aṅgulam |
AHS1.19.080c/ prakuñco madhyamā mātrā bālānāṁ śuktir eva tu || 80 ||
AHS1.19.081a/ uttānāyāḥ śayānāyāḥ samyak saṅkocya sakthinī |
AHS1.19.081c/ ūrdhva.jānvās tri.caturān aho.rātreṇa yojayet || 81 ||
AHS1.19.082a/ vastīṁs tri.rātram evaṁ ca sneha.mātrāṁ vivardhayan |
AHS1.19.082c/ try.aham eva ca viśramya praṇidadhyāt punas try.aham || 82 || [Note: AHS1.19.082v/ 19.82bv sneha.mātrāṁ vivardhayet]
AHS1.19.083a/ pakṣād vireko vamite tataḥ pakṣān nirūhaṇam |
AHS1.19.083c/ sadyo nirūḍhaś cānvāsyaḥ sapta.rātrād virecitaḥ || 83 ||
AHS1.19.084a/ yathā kusumbhādi.yutāt toyād rāgaṁ haret paṭaḥ |
AHS1.19.084c/ tathā dravī.kṛtād dehād vastir nirharate malān || 84 ||
AHS1.19.085a/ śākhā.gatāḥ koṣṭha.gatāś ca rogā marmordhva.sarvāvayavāṅga.jāś ca |
AHS1.19.085c/ ye santi teṣāṁ na tu kaś.cid anyo vāyoḥ paraṁ janmani hetur asti || 85 || [Note: AHS1.19.085v/ 19.85cv ye santi teṣāṁ na hi kaś.cid anyo]
AHS1.19.086a/ viṭ.śleṣma.pittādi.maloccayānāṁ vikṣepa.saṁhāra.karaḥ sa yasmāt |
AHS1.19.086c/ tasyāti.vṛddhasya śamāya nānyad vaster vinā bheṣajam asti kiñ.cit || 86 || [Note: AHS1.19.086v/ 19.86av viṭ.śleṣma.pittādi.malācayānāṁ 19.86av viṭ.śleṣma.pittādi.malāśayānā 19.86av viṇ.mūtra.pittādi.malāśayānāṁ 19.86bv vikṣepa.saṁhāra.karo hi vāyuḥ 19.86dv vasteḥ samaṁ bheṣajam asti yasmāt]
[Page 119 ]
AHS1.19.087a/ tasmāc cikitsārdha iti pradiṣṭaḥ kṛtsnā cikitsāpi ca vastir ekaiḥ |
AHS1.19.087c/ tathā nijāgantu.vikāra.kāri.raktauṣadha.tvena sirā.vyadho 'pi || 87 || [Note: AHS1.19.087v/ 19.87av tasmāc cikitsārdham iti pradiṣṭaḥ 19.87bv kṛtsnā cikitsāpi ca vastir eke]

1.20. Chapter 20 :: Athanasyavidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 134-138]
AHS1.20.001a/ ūrdhva.jatru.vikāreṣu viśeṣān nasyam iṣyate |
AHS1.20.001c/ nāsā hi śiraso dvāraṁ tena tad vyāpya hanti tān || 1 ||
AHS1.20.002a/ virecanaṁ bṛṁhaṇaṁ ca śamanaṁ ca tri.dhāpi tat |
AHS1.20.002c/ virecanaṁ śiraḥ.śūla.jāḍya.syanda.galāmaye || 2 || [Note: AHS1.20.002v/ 20.2bv śamanaṁ ca tri.dhā bhavet ]
AHS1.20.002.1+1/ marśa.dhmānāvapīḍākhyais tat punaḥ ṣaḍ.vidhaṁ smṛtam || 2.1+1 || [Note: AHS1.20.002.1+1v/ 20.2.1+1av marśa.dhmānāvapīḍākhyāt]
AHS1.20.003a/ śopha.gaṇḍa.kṛmi.granthi.kuṣṭhāpasmāra.pīnase |
AHS1.20.003c/ bṛṁhaṇaṁ vāta.je śūle sūryāvarte svara.kṣaye || 3 ||
AHS1.20.003.1+1/ snehena tīkṣṇaiḥ siddhena kalka.kvāthādibhiś ca tat || 3.1+1 ||
AHS1.20.004a/ nāsāsya.śoṣe vāk.saṅge kṛcchra.bodhe 'va.bāhuke |
AHS1.20.004c/ śamanaṁ nīlikā.vyaṅga.keśa.doṣākṣi.rājiṣu || 4 || [Note: AHS1.20.004v/ 20.4dv .keśa.doṣākṣi.rogiṣu 20.4dv .keśa.doṣākṣi.roga.jit]
AHS1.20.005a/ yathā.svaṁ yaugikaiḥ snehair yathā.svaṁ ca prasādhitaiḥ |
AHS1.20.005c/ kalka.kvāthādibhiś cādyaṁ madhu.paṭv.āsavair api || 5 ||
AHS1.20.006a/ bṛṁhaṇaṁ dhanva.māṁsottha.rasāsṛk.khapurair api |
AHS1.20.006c/ śamanaṁ yojayet pūrvaiḥ kṣīreṇa salilena vā || 6 || [Note: AHS1.20.006v/ 20.6dv kṣīreṇa salilena ca 20.6dv kṣīreṇa ca jalena ca]
AHS1.20.007a/ marśaś ca pratimarśaś ca dvi.dhā sneho 'tra mātrayā |
AHS1.20.007c/ kalkādyair avapīḍas tu sa tīkṣṇair mūrdha.recanaḥ || 7 || [Note: AHS1.20.007v/ 20.7dv tīkṣṇair mūrdha.virecanaḥ]
[Page 120 ]
AHS1.20.008a/ dhmānaṁ virecanaś cūrṇo yuñjyāt taṁ mukha.vāyunā |
AHS1.20.008c/ ṣaḍ.aṅgula.dvi.mukhayā nāḍyā bheṣaja.garbhayā || 8 || [Note: AHS1.20.008v/ 20.8av dhmānaṁ virecanaiś cūrṇair 20.8dv nāḍyā bhaiṣajya.garbhayā]
AHS1.20.009a/ sa hi bhūri.taraṁ doṣaṁ cūrṇa.tvād apakarṣati |
AHS1.20.009c/ pradeśiny.aṅgulī.parva.dvayān magna.samuddhṛtāt || 9 ||
AHS1.20.010a/ yāvat pataty asau bindur daśāṣṭau ṣaṭ krameṇa te |
AHS1.20.010c/ marśasyotkṛṣṭa.madhyonā mātrās tā eva ca kramāt || 10 ||
AHS1.20.011a/ bindu.dvayonāḥ kalkāder yojayen na tu nāvanam |
AHS1.20.011c/ toya.madya.gara.sneha.pītānāṁ pātum icchatām || 11 ||
AHS1.20.012a/ bhukta.bhakta.śiraḥ.snāta.snātu.kāma.srutāsṛjām |
AHS1.20.012c/ nava.pīnasa.vegārta.sūtikā.śvāsa.kāsinām || 12 || [Note: AHS1.20.012v/ 20.12av bhuktābhyakta.śiraḥ.snāta.]
AHS1.20.013a/ śuddhānāṁ datta.vastīnāṁ tathān.ārtava.dur.dine |
AHS1.20.013c/ anya.trātyayikād vyādher atha nasyaṁ prayojayet || 13 ||
AHS1.20.014a/ prātaḥ śleṣmaṇi madhyāhne pitte sāyan.niśoś cale |
AHS1.20.014c/ svastha.vṛtte tu pūrvāhṇe śarat.kāla.vasantayoḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.20.015a/ śīte madhyan.dine grīṣme sāyaṁ varṣāsu sātape |
AHS1.20.015c/ vātābhibhūte śirasi hidhmāyām apatānake || 15 ||
AHS1.20.016a/ manyā.stambhe svara.bhraṁśe sāyaṁ prātar dine dine |
AHS1.20.016c/ ekāhāntaram anya.tra saptāhaṁ ca tad ācaret || 16 ||
AHS1.20.017a/ snigdha.svinnottamāṅgasya prāk.kṛtāvaśyakasya ca |
AHS1.20.017c/ nivāta.śayana.sthasya jatrūrdhvaṁ svedayet punaḥ || 17 ||
[Page 121 ]
AHS1.20.018a/ athottānarju.dehasya pāṇi.pāde prasārite |
AHS1.20.018c/ kiñ.cid.unnata.pādasya kiñ.cin mūrdhani nāmite || 18 ||
AHS1.20.019a/ nāsā.puṭaṁ pidhāyaikaṁ paryāyeṇa niṣecayet |
AHS1.20.019c/ uṣṇāmbu.taptaṁ bhaiṣajyaṁ praṇāḍyā picunātha.vā || 19 || [Note: AHS1.20.019v/ 20.19dv praṇālyā picunātha.vā]
AHS1.20.020a/ datte pāda.tala.skandha.hasta.karṇādi mardayet |
AHS1.20.020c/ śanair ucchidya niṣṭhīvet pārśvayor ubhayos tataḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS1.20.020v/ 20.20cv śanair ucchindya niṣṭhīvet]
AHS1.20.021a/ ā.bheṣaja.kṣayād evaṁ dvis trir vā nasyam ācaret |
AHS1.20.021c/ mūrchāyāṁ śīta.toyena siñcet pariharan śiraḥ || 21 ||
AHS1.20.022a/ snehaṁ virecanasyānte dadyād doṣādy.apekṣayā |
AHS1.20.022c/ nasyānte vāk.śataṁ tiṣṭhed uttāno dhārayet tataḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS1.20.022v/ 20.22av snehaṁ recana.nasyānte]
AHS1.20.023a/ dhūmaṁ pītvā kavoṣṇāmbu.kavaḍān kaṇṭha.śuddhaye |
AHS1.20.023c/ samyak.snigdhe sukhocchvāsa.svapna.bodhākṣa.pāṭavam || 23 ||
AHS1.20.024a/ rūkṣe 'kṣi.stabdha.tā śoṣo nāsāsye mūrdha.śūnya.tā |
AHS1.20.024c/ snigdhe 'ti kaṇḍū.guru.tā.prasekā.ruci.pīnasāḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS1.20.024v/ 20.24cv snigdhe 'ti kaṇḍūr guru.tā 20.24dv prasekā.ruci.pīnasāḥ]
AHS1.20.025a/ su.virikte 'kṣi.laghu.tā.vaktra.svara.viśuddhayaḥ |
AHS1.20.025c/ dur.virikte gadodrekaḥ kṣāma.tāti.virecite || 25 ||
AHS1.20.026a/ pratimarśaḥ kṣata.kṣāma.bāla.vṛddha.sukhātmasu |
AHS1.20.026c/ prayojyo '.kāla.varṣe 'pi na tv iṣṭo duṣṭa.pīnase || 26 ||
AHS1.20.027a/ madya.pīte '.bala.śrotre kṛmi.dūṣita.mūrdhani |
AHS1.20.027c/ utkṛṣṭotkliṣṭa.doṣe ca hīna.mātra.tayā hi saḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS1.20.027v/ 20.27dv hīna.māna.tayā hi saḥ]
[Page 122 ]
AHS1.20.028a/ niśāhar.bhukta.vāntāhaḥ.svapnādhva.śrama.retasām |
AHS1.20.028c/ śiro.'bhyañjana.gaṇḍūṣa.prasrāvāñjana.varcasām || 28 ||
AHS1.20.029a/ danta.kāṣṭhasya hāsasya yojyo 'nte 'sau dvi.bindukaḥ |
AHS1.20.029c/ pañcasu srotasāṁ śuddhiḥ klama.nāśas triṣu kramāt || 29 ||
AHS1.20.030a/ dṛg.balaṁ pañcasu tato danta.dārḍhyaṁ maruc.chamaḥ |
AHS1.20.030c/ na nasyam ūna.saptābde nātītāśīti.vatsare || 30 ||
AHS1.20.031a/ na conāṣṭā.daśe dhūmaḥ kavaḍo nona.pañcame |
AHS1.20.031c/ na śuddhir ūna.daśame na cātikrānta.saptatau || 31 || [Note: AHS1.20.031v/ 20.31bv kavaḍo nyūna.pañcame]
AHS1.20.032a/ ā.janma.maraṇaṁ śastaḥ pratimarśas tu vasti.vat |
AHS1.20.032c/ marśa.vac ca guṇān kuryāt sa hi nityopasevanāt || 32 ||
AHS1.20.033a/ na cātra yantraṇā nāpi vyāpadbhyo marśa.vad bhayam |
AHS1.20.033c/ tailam eva ca nasyārthe nityābhyāsena śasyate || 33 || [Note: AHS1.20.033v/ 20.33cv tailam eva ca nasyārthaṁ]
AHS1.20.034a/ śirasaḥ śleṣma.dhāma.tvāt snehāḥ svasthasya netare |
AHS1.20.034c/ āśu.kṛc.cira.kāri.tvaṁ guṇotkarṣāpakṛṣṭa.tā || 34 || [Note: AHS1.20.034v/ 20.34dv guṇotkṛṣṭāpakṛṣṭa.tā 20.34dv guṇotkṛṣṭāpakarṣa.tā 20.34dv guṇotkarṣāpakarṣa.tā]
AHS1.20.035a/ marśe ca pratimarśe ca viśeṣo na bhaved yadi |
AHS1.20.035c/ ko marśaṁ sa.parīhāraṁ sāpadaṁ ca bhajet tataḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS1.20.035v/ 20.35dv sāpadaṁ ca vadet tataḥ]
AHS1.20.036a/ accha.pāna.vicārākhyau kuṭī.vātātapa.sthitī |
AHS1.20.036c/ anvāsa.mātrā.vastī ca tad.vad eva vinirdiśet || 36 || [Note: AHS1.20.036v/ 20.36dv tad.vad eva ca nirdiśet]
AHS1.20.036+1a/ paṭola.mudga.vārtāka.hrasvamūlaka.jāṅgalaiḥ |
AHS1.20.036+1c/ rasaiḥ śāli.yavān adyān nasya.karmaṇi ṣaḍ.vidhe || 36+1 ||
[Page 123 ]
AHS1.20.036+2a/ uccair.bhāṣaṇam āyāsam a.jīrṇā.sātmya.bhojanam |
AHS1.20.036+2c/ datta.nasyo naraḥ krodhaṁ yānādīṁś ca vivarjayet || 36+2 ||
AHS1.20.037a/ jīvantī.jala.devadāru.jalada.tvak.sevya.gopī.himaṁ || 37a ||
AHS1.20.037b/ dārvī.tvaṅ.madhuka.plavāguru.varī.puṇḍrāhva.bilvotpalam || 37b ||
AHS1.20.037c/ dhāvanyau surabhiṁ sthire kṛmiharaṁ pattraṁ truṭīṁ reṇukāṁ || 37c ||
AHS1.20.037d/ kiñjalkaṁ kamalād balāṁ śata.guṇe divye 'mbhasi kvāthayet || 37d ||
AHS1.20.038a/ tailād rasaṁ daśa.guṇaṁ pariśeṣya tena tailaṁ paceta salilena daśaiva vārān |
AHS1.20.038c/ pāke kṣipec ca daśame samam āja.dugdhaṁ nasyaṁ mahā.guṇam uśanty aṇu.tailam etat || 38 || [Note: AHS1.20.038v/ 20.38bv tailaṁ pacec ca salilena daśaiva vārān]
AHS1.20.039a/ ghanonnata.prasanna.tvak.skandha.grīvāsya.vakṣasaḥ |
AHS1.20.039c/ dṛḍhendriyāsta.palitā bhaveyur nasya.śīlinaḥ || 39 || [Note: AHS1.20.039v/ 20.39cv dṛḍhendriyās tv a.palitā]

1.21. Chapter 21 :: Athadhūmapānavidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 138-140]
AHS1.21.001a/ jatrūrdhva.kapha.vātottha.vikārāṇām a.janmane |
AHS1.21.001c/ ucchedāya ca jātānāṁ pibed dhūmaṁ sadātma.vān || 1 || [Note: AHS1.21.001v/ 21.1av jatrūrdhvaṁ kapha.vātottha.]
AHS1.21.002a/ snigdho madhyaḥ sa tīkṣṇaś ca vāte vāta.kaphe kaphe |
AHS1.21.002c/ yojyo na rakta.pittārti.viriktodara.mehiṣu || 2 || [Note: AHS1.21.002v/ 21.2cv yojyo na pitta.raktārta. 21.2cv yojyo na pitta.raktārti.]
AHS1.21.003a/ timirordhvānilādhmāna.rohiṇī.datta.vastiṣu |
AHS1.21.003c/ matsya.madya.dadhi.kṣīra.kṣaudra.sneha.viṣāśiṣu || 3 ||
AHS1.21.004a/ śirasy abhihate pāṇḍu.roge jāgarite niśi |
AHS1.21.004c/ rakta.pittāndhya.bādhirya.tṛṇ.mūrchā.mada.moha.kṛt || 4 ||
AHS1.21.005a/ dhūmo '.kāle 'ti.pīto vā tatra śīto vidhir hitaḥ |
AHS1.21.005c/ kṣuta.jṛmbhita.viṇ.mūtra.strī.sevā.śastra.karmaṇām || 5 || [Note: AHS1.21.005v/ 21.5dv .strī.sevā.śastra.karmiṇām]
AHS1.21.006a/ hāsasya danta.kāṣṭhasya dhūmam ante piben mṛdum |
AHS1.21.006c/ kāleṣv eṣu niśāhāra.nāvanānte ca madhyamam || 6 || [Note: AHS1.21.006v/ 21.6av hāsyasya danta.kāṣṭhasya]
[Page 124 ]
AHS1.21.007a/ nidrā.nasyāñjana.snāna.ccharditānte virecanam |
AHS1.21.007c/ vasti.netra.sama.dravyaṁ tri.kośaṁ kārayed ṛju || 7 ||
AHS1.21.008a/ mūlāgre 'ṅguṣṭha.kolāsthi.praveśaṁ dhūma.netrakam |
AHS1.21.008c/ tīkṣṇa.snehana.madhyeṣu trīṇi catvāri pañca ca || 8 || [Note: AHS1.21.008v/ 21.8av mūle 'gre 'ṅguṣṭha.kolāsthi.]
AHS1.21.009a/ aṅgulānāṁ kramāt pātuḥ pramāṇenāṣṭakāni tat |
AHS1.21.009c/ ṛjūpaviṣṭas tac.cetā vivṛtāsyas tri.paryayam || 9 || [Note: AHS1.21.009v/ 21.9cv ṛjūpaviṣṭas tac.citto]
AHS1.21.010a/ pidhāya cchidram ekaikaṁ dhūmaṁ nāsikayā pibet |
AHS1.21.010c/ prāk piben nāsayotkliṣṭe doṣe ghrāṇa.śiro.gate || 10 || [Note: AHS1.21.010v/ 21.10dv doṣe nāsā.śiro.gate]
AHS1.21.011a/ utkleśanārthaṁ vaktreṇa viparītaṁ tu kaṇṭha.ge |
AHS1.21.011c/ mukhenaivodvamed dhūmaṁ nāsayā dṛg.vighāta.kṛt || 11 ||
AHS1.21.012a/ ākṣepa.mokṣaiḥ pātavyo dhūmas tu tris tribhis tribhiḥ |
AHS1.21.012c/ ahnaḥ pibet sakṛt snigdhaṁ dvir madhyaṁ śodhanaṁ param || 12 || [Note: AHS1.21.012v/ 21.12bv dhūmas trīṁs trīṁs tribhis tribhiḥ]
AHS1.21.013a/ triś catur vā mṛdau tatra dravyāṇy aguru guggulu |
AHS1.21.013c/ musta.sthauṇeya.śaileya.naladośīra.vālakam || 13 || [Note: AHS1.21.013v/ 21.13av triś catur vā mṛdos tatra]
AHS1.21.014a/ varāṅga.kauntī.madhuka.bilva.majjailavālukam |
AHS1.21.014c/ śrīveṣṭakaṁ sarja.raso dhyāmakaṁ madanaṁ plavam || 14 ||
AHS1.21.015a/ śallakī kuṅkumaṁ māṣā yavāḥ kundurukas tilāḥ |
AHS1.21.015c/ snehaḥ phalānāṁ sārāṇāṁ medo majjā vasā ghṛtam || 15 ||
AHS1.21.016a/ śamane śallakī lākṣā pṛthvīkā kamalotpalam |
AHS1.21.016c/ nyagrodhodumbarāśvattha.plakṣa.lodhra.tvacaḥ sitā || 16 ||
[Page 125 ]
AHS1.21.017a/ yaṣṭīmadhu suvarṇatvak padmakaṁ raktayaṣṭikā |
AHS1.21.017c/ gandhāś cā.kuṣṭha.tagarās tīkṣṇe jyotiṣmatī niśā || 17 ||
AHS1.21.018a/ daśa.mūla.manohvālaṁ lākṣā śvetā phala.trayam |
AHS1.21.018c/ gandha.dravyāṇi tīkṣṇāni gaṇo mūrdha.virecanaḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS1.21.018v/ 21.18av daśa.mūla.manohvāla. 21.18bv .lākṣā śvetā phala.trayam]
AHS1.21.019a/ jale sthitām aho.rātram iṣīkāṁ dvā.daśāṅgulām |
AHS1.21.019c/ piṣṭair dhūmauṣadhair evaṁ pañca.kṛtvaḥ pralepayet || 19 || [Note: AHS1.21.019v/ 21.19cv piṣṭair dhūmauṣadhair eva]
AHS1.21.020a/ vartir aṅguṣṭhaka.sthūlā yava.madhyā yathā bhavet |
AHS1.21.020c/ chāyā.śuṣkāṁ vi.garbhāṁ tāṁ snehābhyaktāṁ yathā.yatham || 20 || [Note: AHS1.21.020v/ 21.20av vartir aṅguṣṭha.vat sthūlā]
AHS1.21.021a/ dhūma.netrārpitāṁ pātum agni.pluṣṭāṁ prayojayet |
AHS1.21.021c/ śarāva.sampuṭa.cchidre nāḍīṁ nyasya daśāṅgulām || 21 ||
AHS1.21.021ū̆ab/ aṣṭāṅgulāṁ vā vaktreṇa kāsa.vān dhūmam āpibet || 21ū̆ab ||
AHS1.21.022ū̆a/ kāsaḥ śvāsaḥ pīnaso vi.svara.tvaṁ pūtir gandhaḥ pāṇḍu.tā keśa.doṣaḥ |
AHS1.21.022ū̆c/ karṇāsyākṣi.srāva.kaṇḍv.arti.jāḍyaṁ tandrā hidhmā dhūma.paṁ na spṛśanti || 22ū̆ ||
AHS1.21.022ū̆+1a/ hṛt.kaṇṭhendriya.saṁśuddhir lāghavaṁ śirasaḥ śamaḥ |
AHS1.21.022ū̆+1c/ yatheritānāṁ doṣāṇāṁ samyak.pītasya lakṣaṇam || 22ū̆+1 ||

1.22. Chapter 22 :: Athagaṇḍūṣādividhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 140-143]
AHS1.22.001a/ catuḥ.prakāro gaṇḍūṣaḥ snigdhaḥ śamana.śodhanau |
AHS1.22.001c/ ropaṇaś ca trayas tatra triṣu yojyāś calādiṣu || 1 ||
AHS1.22.002a/ antyo vraṇa.ghnaḥ snigdho 'tra svādv.amla.paṭu.sādhitaiḥ |
AHS1.22.002c/ snehaiḥ saṁśamanas tikta.kaṣāya.madhurauṣadhaiḥ || 2 ||
[Page 126 ]
AHS1.22.003a/ śodhanas tikta.kaṭv.amla.paṭūṣṇai ropaṇaḥ punaḥ |
AHS1.22.003c/ kaṣāya.tiktakais tatra snehaḥ kṣīraṁ madhūdakam || 3 ||
AHS1.22.004a/ śuktaṁ madyaṁ raso mūtraṁ dhānyāmlaṁ ca yathā.yatham |
AHS1.22.004c/ kalkair yuktaṁ vipakvaṁ vā yathā.sparśaṁ prayojayet || 4 ||
AHS1.22.005a/ danta.harṣe danta.cāle mukha.roge ca vātike |
AHS1.22.005c/ sukhoṣṇam atha.vā śītaṁ tila.kalkodakaṁ hitam || 5 ||
AHS1.22.006a/ gaṇḍūṣa.dhāraṇe nityaṁ tailaṁ māṁsa.raso 'tha.vā |
AHS1.22.006c/ ūṣā.dāhānvite pāke kṣate cāgantu.sambhave || 6 || [Note: AHS1.22.006v/ 22.6dv kṣate vāgantu.sambhave]
AHS1.22.007a/ viṣe kṣārāgni.dagdhe ca sarpir dhāryaṁ payo 'tha.vā |
AHS1.22.007c/ vaiśadyaṁ janayaty āśu sandadhāti mukhe vraṇān || 7 || [Note: AHS1.22.007v/ 22.7av viṣa.kṣārāgni.dagdhe ca 22.7cv vaiśadyaṁ janayaty āsye 22.7dv sandadhāti mukha.vraṇān]
AHS1.22.008a/ dāha.tṛṣṇā.praśamanaṁ madhu.gaṇḍūṣa.dhāraṇam |
AHS1.22.008c/ dhānyāmlam āsya.vairasya.mala.daurgandhya.nāśanam || 8 ||
AHS1.22.009a/ tad evā.lavaṇaṁ śītaṁ mukha.śoṣa.haraṁ param |
AHS1.22.009c/ āśu kṣārāmbu.gaṇḍūṣo bhinatti śleṣmaṇaś cayam || 9 ||
AHS1.22.010a/ sukhoṣṇodaka.gaṇḍūṣair jāyate vaktra.lāghavam |
AHS1.22.010c/ nivāte sātape svinna.mṛdita.skandha.kandharaḥ || 10 ||
AHS1.22.011a/ gaṇḍūṣam a.piban kiñ.cid.unnatāsyo vidhārayet |
AHS1.22.011c/ kapha.pūrṇāsya.tā yāvat sravad.ghrāṇākṣa.tātha.vā || 11 ||
AHS1.22.011ūab/ a.sañcāryo mukhe pūrṇe gaṇḍūṣaḥ kavaḍo 'nya.thā || 11ū̆ab || [Note: AHS1.22.011ūv/ 22.11ū̆av a.sañcāryo mukhe '.pūrṇe]
[Page 127 ]
AHS1.22.012a/ manyā.śiraḥ.karṇa.mukhākṣi.rogāḥ praseka.kaṇṭhāmaya.vaktra.śoṣāḥ |
AHS1.22.012c/ hṛl.lāsa.tandrā.ruci.pīnasāś ca sādhyā viśeṣāt kavaḍa.graheṇa || 12 ||
AHS1.22.013ab/ kalko rasa.kriyā cūrṇas tri.vidhaṁ pratisāraṇam || 13ab || [Note: AHS1.22.013v/ 22.13av kalko rasa.kriyā cūrṇaṁ]
AHS1.22.014a/ yuñjyāt tat kapha.rogeṣu gaṇḍūṣa.vihitauṣadhaiḥ |
AHS1.22.014c/ mukhālepas tri.dhā doṣa.viṣa.hā varṇa.kṛc ca saḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS1.22.014v/ 22.14cv mukha.lepas tri.dhā doṣa.]
AHS1.22.014.1+1a/ vyādher apacayaḥ puṣṭir vaiśadyaṁ vaktra.lāghavam |
AHS1.22.014.1+1c/ indriyāṇāṁ prasādaś ca kavaḍe śuddhi.lakṣaṇam || 14.1+1 ||
AHS1.22.014.1+2a/ hīnāj jāḍya.kaphotkleśāv a.rasa.jñānam eva ca |
AHS1.22.014.1+2c/ ati.yogān mukhe pākaḥ śoṣa.tṛṣṇā.ruci.klamaḥ || 14.1+2 || [Note: AHS1.22.014.1+2v/ 22.14.1+2av hīnād dhmāna.kaphotleśāv]
AHS1.22.015a/ uṣṇo vāta.kaphe śastaḥ śeṣeṣv aty.artha.śītalaḥ |
AHS1.22.015c/ tri.pramāṇaś catur.bhāga.tri.bhāgārdhāṅgulonnatiḥ || 15 ||
AHS1.22.016a/ a.śuṣkasya sthitis tasya śuṣko dūṣayati cchavim |
AHS1.22.016c/ tam ārdrayitvāpanayet tad.ante 'bhyaṅgam ācaret || 16 ||
AHS1.22.017a/ vivarjayed divā.svapna.bhāṣyāgny.ātapa.śuk.krudhaḥ |
AHS1.22.017c/ na yojyaḥ pīnase '.jīrṇe datta.nasye hanu.grahe || 17 || [Note: AHS1.22.017v/ 22.17dv datte nasye hanu.grahe]
AHS1.22.018a/ a.rocake jāgarite sa tu hanti su.yojitaḥ |
AHS1.22.018c/ a.kāla.palita.vyaṅga.valī.timira.nīlikāḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS1.22.018v/ 22.18bv sa ca hanti su.yojitaḥ]
AHS1.22.019a/ kola.majjā vṛṣān mūlaṁ śābaraṁ gaura.sarṣapāḥ |
AHS1.22.019c/ siṁhī.mūlaṁ tilāḥ kṛṣṇā dārvī.tvaṅ nis.tuṣā yavāḥ || 19 ||
[Page 128 ]
AHS1.22.020a/ darbha.mūla.himośīra.śirīṣa.miśi.taṇḍulāḥ |
AHS1.22.020c/ kumudotpala.kalhāra.dūrvā.madhuka.candanam || 20 ||
AHS1.22.021a/ kālīyaka.tilośīra.māṁsī.tagara.padmakam |
AHS1.22.021c/ tālīśa.gundrā.puṇḍrāhva.yaṣṭī.kāśa.natāguru || 21 ||
AHS1.22.022a/ ity ardhārdhoditā lepā hemantādiṣu ṣaṭ smṛtāḥ |
AHS1.22.022c/ .mukhālepana.śīlānāṁ dṛḍhaṁ bhavati darśanam || 22 ||
AHS1.22.023a/ vadanaṁ cā.parimlānaṁ ślakṣṇaṁ tāmarasopamam |
AHS1.22.023c/ abhyaṅga.seka.picavo vastiś ceti catur.vidham || 23 ||
AHS1.22.024a/ mūrdha.tailaṁ bahu.guṇaṁ tad vidyād uttarottaram |
AHS1.22.024c/ tatrābhyaṅgaḥ prayoktavyo raukṣya.kaṇḍū.malādiṣu || 24 || [Note: AHS1.22.024v/ 22.24dv rūkṣa.kaṇḍū.malādiṣu]
AHS1.22.025a/ arūṁṣikā.śiras.toda.dāha.pāka.vraṇeṣu tu |
AHS1.22.025c/ pariṣekaḥ picuḥ keśa.śāta.sphuṭana.dhūpane || 25 || [Note: AHS1.22.025v/ 22.25bv .dāha.pāka.vraṇeṣu ca]
AHS1.22.026a/ netra.stambhe ca vastis tu prasupty.ardita.jāgare |
AHS1.22.026c/ nāsāsya.śoṣe timire śiro.roge ca dāruṇe || 26 ||
AHS1.22.027a/ vidhis tasya niṣaṇṇasya pīṭhe jānu.same mṛdau |
AHS1.22.027c/ śuddhākta.svinna.dehasya dinānte gavya.māhiṣam || 27 ||
AHS1.22.028a/ dvā.daśāṅgula.vistīrṇaṁ carma.paṭṭaṁ śiraḥ.samam |
AHS1.22.028c/ ā.karṇa.bandhana.sthānaṁ lalāṭe vastra.veṣṭite || 28 ||
AHS1.22.029a/ caila.veṇikayā baddhvā māṣa.kalkena lepayet |
AHS1.22.029c/ tato yathā.vyādhi śṛtaṁ snehaṁ koṣṇaṁ niṣecayet || 29 ||
[Page 129 ]
AHS1.22.030a/ ūrdhvaṁ keśa.bhuvo yāvad aṅgulaṁ dhārayec ca tam |
AHS1.22.030c/ ā.vaktra.nāsikotkledād daśāṣṭau ṣaṭ calādiṣu || 30 || [Note: AHS1.22.030v/ 22.30cv ā.vaktra.nāsikā.kledād]
AHS1.22.031a/ mātrā.sahasrāṇy a.ruje tv ekaṁ skandhādi mardayet |
AHS1.22.031c/ mukta.snehasya paramaṁ saptāhaṁ tasya sevanam || 31 || [Note: AHS1.22.031v/ 22.31dv saptāhaṁ tasya secanam]
AHS1.22.032a/ dhārayet pūraṇaṁ karṇe karṇa.mūlaṁ vimardayan |
AHS1.22.032c/ rujaḥ syān mārdavaṁ yāvan mātrā.śatam a.vedane || 32 || [Note: AHS1.22.032v/ 22.32bv karṇa.mūlaṁ vimardayet]
AHS1.22.033a/ yāvat paryeti hastāgraṁ dakṣiṇaṁ jānu.maṇḍalam |
AHS1.22.033c/ nimeṣonmeṣa.kālena samaṁ mātrā tu sā smṛtā || 33 || [Note: AHS1.22.033v/ 22.33cv nimeṣonmeṣa.mātreṇa]
AHS1.22.034a/ kaca.sadana.sita.tva.piñjara.tvaṁ pariphuṭanaṁ śirasaḥ samīra.rogān |
AHS1.22.034c/ jayati janayatīndriya.prasādaṁ svara.hanu.mūrdha.balaṁ ca mūrdha.tailam || 34 || [Note: AHS1.22.034v/ 22.34av kaca.śadana.sita.tva.piñjara.tvaṁ 22.34av kaca.śadana.sita.tva.piñjara.tva. 22.34av kaca.sadana.sita.tva.piñjara.tva.]

1.23. Chapter 23 :: Athāścotanāñjanavidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 143-145]
AHS1.23.001a/ sarveṣām akṣi.rogāṇām ādāv āścyotanaṁ hitam |
AHS1.23.001c/ ruk.toda.kaṇḍu.gharṣāśru.dāha.rāga.nibarhaṇam || 1 || [Note: AHS1.23.001v/ 23.1dv .dāha.roga.nibarhaṇam]
AHS1.23.002a/ uṣṇaṁ vāte kaphe koṣṇaṁ tac chītaṁ rakta.pittayoḥ |
AHS1.23.002c/ nivāta.sthasya vāmena pāṇinonmīlya locanam || 2 ||
AHS1.23.003a/ śuktau pralambayānyena picu.vartyā kanīnike |
AHS1.23.003c/ daśa dvā.daśa vā bindūn dvy.aṅgulād avasecayet || 3 ||
AHS1.23.004a/ tataḥ pramṛjya mṛdunā cailena kapha.vātayoḥ |
AHS1.23.004c/ anyena koṣṇa.pānīya.plutena svedayen mṛdu || 4 ||
AHS1.23.005a/ aty.uṣṇa.tīkṣṇaṁ rug.rāga.dṛṅ.nāśāyākṣi.secanam |
AHS1.23.005c/ ati.śītaṁ tu kurute nistoda.stambha.vedanāḥ || 5 ||
[Page 130 ]
AHS1.23.006a/ kaṣāya.vartma.tāṁ gharṣaṁ kṛcchrād unmeṣaṇaṁ bahu |
AHS1.23.006c/ vikāra.vṛddhim aty.alpaṁ saṁrambham a.parisrutam || 6 ||
AHS1.23.007a/ gatvā sandhi.śiro.ghrāṇa.mukha.srotāṁsi bheṣajam |
AHS1.23.007c/ ūrdhva.gān nayane nyastam apavartayate malān || 7 || [Note: AHS1.23.007v/ 23.7av gatvā sandhi.sirā.ghrāṇa.]
AHS1.23.008a/ athāñjanaṁ śuddha.tanor netra.mātrāśraye male |
AHS1.23.008c/ pakva.liṅge 'lpa.śophāti.kaṇḍū.paicchilya.lakṣite || 8 || [Note: AHS1.23.008v/ 23.8cv pakva.liṅge 'lpa.śophārti.]
AHS1.23.009a/ manda.gharṣāśru.rāge 'kṣṇi prayojyaṁ ghana.dūṣike |
AHS1.23.009c/ ārte pitta.kaphāsṛgbhir mārutena viśeṣataḥ || 9 ||
AHS1.23.010a/ lekhanaṁ ropaṇaṁ dṛṣṭi.prasādanam iti tri.dhā |
AHS1.23.010c/ añjanaṁ lekhanaṁ tatra kaṣāyāmla.paṭūṣaṇaiḥ || 10 ||
AHS1.23.011a/ ropaṇaṁ tiktakair dravyaiḥ svādu.śītaiḥ prasādanam |
AHS1.23.011c/ tīkṣṇāñjanābhisantapte nayane tat prasādanam || 11 ||
AHS1.23.012a/ prayujyamānaṁ labhate pratyañjana.samāhvayam |
AHS1.23.012c/ daśāṅgulā tanur madhye śalākā mukulānanā || 12 ||
AHS1.23.013a/ praśastā lekhane tāmrī ropaṇe kāla.loha.jā |
AHS1.23.013c/ aṅgulī ca suvarṇotthā rūpya.jā ca prasādane || 13 ||
AHS1.23.014a/ piṇḍo rasa.kriyā cūrṇas tri.dhaivāñjana.kalpanā |
AHS1.23.014c/ gurau madhye laghau doṣe tāṁ krameṇa prayojayet || 14 || [Note: AHS1.23.014v/ 23.14cv guru.madhya.laghau doṣe 23.14dv tāḥ krameṇa prayojayet]
AHS1.23.014+1a/ piṇḍasya tīkṣṇa.dravyasya mṛdu.dravya.kṛtasya ca |
AHS1.23.014+1c/ hareṇu.mātraṁ dvi.guṇaṁ pramāṇaṁ kathayanty api || 14+1 ||
[Page 131 ]
AHS1.23.014+2a/ rasa.kriyāyām apy evaṁ viḍaṅga.phala.mātrakam |
AHS1.23.014+2c/ śalākāṁ dvi.guṇāṁ tīkṣṇe cūrṇe ca tri.guṇāṁ mṛdau || 14+2 ||
AHS1.23.015a/ hareṇu.mātrā piṇḍasya vella.mātrā rasa.kriyā |
AHS1.23.015c/ tīkṣṇasya dvi.guṇaṁ tasya mṛdunaś cūrṇitasya ca || 15 || [Note: AHS1.23.015v/ 23.15av piṇḍo hareṇu.mātras tu 23.15av hareṇu.mātraṁ piṇḍasya 23.15av hareṇu.mātraḥ piṇḍas tu 23.15bv valla.mātrā rasa.kriyā 23.15dv mṛdoś cūrṇāñjanasya ca]
AHS1.23.016a/ dve śalāke tu tīkṣṇasya tisras tad.itarasya ca |
AHS1.23.016c/ niśi svapne na madhyāhne mlāne noṣṇa.gabhastibhiḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS1.23.016v/ 23.16bv tisraḥ syur itarasya ca 23.16cv niśi svapnena madhyāhne 23.16dv pānānnoṣṇa.gabhastibhiḥ]
AHS1.23.017a/ akṣi.rogāya doṣāḥ syur vardhitotpīḍita.drutāḥ |
AHS1.23.017c/ prātaḥ sāyaṁ ca tac.chāntyai vy.abhre 'rke 'to 'ñjayet sadā || 17 ||
AHS1.23.018a/ vadanty anye tu na divā prayojyaṁ tīkṣṇam añjanam |
AHS1.23.018c/ vireka.dur.balaṁ cakṣur ādityaṁ prāpya sīdati || 18 ||
AHS1.23.019a/ svapnena rātrau kālasya saumya.tvena ca tarpitā |
AHS1.23.019c/ śīta.sātmyā dṛg āgneyī sthira.tāṁ labhate punaḥ || 19 ||
AHS1.23.020a/ aty.udrikte balāse tu lekhanīye 'tha.vā gade |
AHS1.23.020c/ kāmam ahny api nāty.uṣṇe tīkṣṇam akṣṇi prayojayet || 20 ||
AHS1.23.021a/ aśmano janma lohasya tata eva ca tīkṣṇa.tā |
AHS1.23.021c/ upaghāto 'pi tenaiva tathā netrasya tejasaḥ || 21 ||
AHS1.23.022a/ na rātrāv api śīte 'ti netre tīkṣṇāñjanaṁ hitam |
AHS1.23.022c/ doṣam a.srāvayet stabdhaṁ kaṇḍū.jāḍyādi.kāri tat || 22 || [Note: AHS1.23.022v/ 23.22cv doṣam a.srāvayat stabdhaṁ 23.22cv doṣam a.srāvayat stambha. 23.22cv doṣaṁ na srāvayet stambha. 23.22dv .kaṇḍū.jāḍyādi.kāri tat]
AHS1.23.023a/ nāñjayed bhīta.vamita.viriktāśita.vegite |
AHS1.23.023c/ kruddha.jvarita.tāntākṣi.śiro.ruk.śoka.jāgare || 23 ||
[Page 132 ]
AHS1.23.024a/ a.dṛṣṭe 'rke śiraḥ.snāte pītayor dhūma.madyayoḥ |
AHS1.23.024c/ a.jīrṇe 'gny.arka.santapte divā.supte pipāsite || 24 || [Note: AHS1.23.024v/ 23.24dv divā.svapne pipāsite]
AHS1.23.025a/ ati.tīkṣṇa.mṛdu.stoka.bahv.accha.ghana.karkaśam |
AHS1.23.025c/ aty.artha.śītalaṁ taptam añjanaṁ nāvacārayet || 25 || [Note: AHS1.23.025v/ 23.25cv aty.arthaṁ śītalaṁ taptam]
AHS1.23.026a/ athānumīlayan dṛṣṭim antaḥ sañcārayec chanaiḥ |
AHS1.23.026c/ añjite vartmanī kiñ.cic cālayec caivam añjanam || 26 ||
AHS1.23.027a/ tīkṣṇaṁ vyāpnoti sahasā na conmeṣa.nimeṣaṇam |
AHS1.23.027c/ niṣpīḍanaṁ ca vartmabhyāṁ kṣālanaṁ vā samācaret || 27 ||
AHS1.23.028a/ apetauṣadha.saṁrambhaṁ nirvṛtaṁ nayanaṁ yadā |
AHS1.23.028c/ vyādhi.doṣartu.yogyābhir adbhiḥ prakṣālayet tadā || 28 ||
AHS1.23.029a/ dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhakenākṣi tato vāmaṁ sa.vāsasā |
AHS1.23.029c/ ūrdhva.vartmani saṅgṛhya śodhyaṁ vāmena cetarat || 29 ||
AHS1.23.030a/ vartma.prāpto 'ñjanād doṣo rogān kuryād ato 'nya.thā |
AHS1.23.030c/ kaṇḍū.jāḍye 'ñjanaṁ tīkṣṇaṁ dhūmaṁ vā yojayet punaḥ || 30 || [Note: AHS1.23.030v/ 23.30av vartma.prāptāñjanād doṣo 23.30bv rogān kuryāt tato 'nya.thā]
AHS1.23.030ū̆ab/ tīkṣṇāñjanābhitapte tu cūrṇaṁ pratyañjanaṁ himam || 30ū̆ab || [Note: AHS1.23.030ū̆v/ 23.30ū̆av tīkṣṇāñjanāti.tapte tu 23.30ū̆av tīkṣṇāñjanāti.yoge tu 23.30ū̆bv cūrṇaṁ pratyañjanaṁ hitam]

1.24. Chapter 24 :: Atha tarpaṇapuṭapākavidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 145-147]
AHS1.24.001a/ nayane tāmyati stabdhe śuṣke rūkṣe 'bhighātite |
AHS1.24.001c/ vāta.pittāture jihme śīrṇa.pakṣmāvilekṣaṇe || 1 ||
AHS1.24.002a/ kṛcchronmīla.sirā.harṣa.sirotpāta.tamo.'rjunaiḥ |
AHS1.24.002c/ syanda.manthānyato.vāta.vāta.paryāya.śukrakaiḥ || 2 ||
[Page 133 ]
AHS1.24.003a/ āture śānta.rāgāśru.śūla.saṁrambha.dūṣike |
AHS1.24.003c/ nivāte tarpaṇaṁ yojyaṁ śuddhayor mūrdha.kāyayoḥ || 3 ||
AHS1.24.004a/ kāle sādhāraṇe prātaḥ sāyaṁ vottāna.śāyinaḥ |
AHS1.24.004c/ yava.māṣa.mayīṁ pālīṁ netra.kośād bahiḥ samām || 4 || [Note: AHS1.24.004v/ 24.4bv sāyaṁ cottāna.śāyinaḥ]
AHS1.24.005a/ dvy.aṅguloccāṁ dṛḍhāṁ kṛtvā yathā.svaṁ siddham āvapet |
AHS1.24.005c/ sarpir nimīlite netre taptāmbu.pravilāyitam || 5 || [Note: AHS1.24.005v/ 24.5dv taptāmbu.pravilāpitam]
AHS1.24.006a/ naktāndhya.vāta.timira.kṛcchra.bodhādike vasām |
AHS1.24.006c/ ā.pakṣmāgrād athonmeṣaṁ śanakais tasya kurvataḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.24.007a/ mātrā vigaṇayet tatra vartma.sandhi.sitāsite |
AHS1.24.007c/ dṛṣṭau ca krama.śo vyādhau śataṁ trīṇi ca pañca ca || 7 || [Note: AHS1.24.007v/ 24.7av mātrāṁ vigaṇayet tatra ]
AHS1.24.008a/ śatāni sapta cāṣṭau ca daśa manthe daśānile |
AHS1.24.008c/ pitte ṣaṭ svastha.vṛtte ca balāse pañca dhārayet || 8 || [Note: AHS1.24.008v/ 24.8bv daśa manthe 'nile daśa]
AHS1.24.009a/ kṛtvāpāṅge tato dvāraṁ snehaṁ pātre nigālayet |
AHS1.24.009c/ pibec ca dhūmaṁ nekṣeta vyoma rūpaṁ ca bhāsvaram || 9 || [Note: AHS1.24.009v/ 24.9dv vyoma rūpaṁ ca bhās.karam]
AHS1.24.010a/ itthaṁ prati.dinaṁ vāyau pitte tv ekāntaraṁ kaphe |
AHS1.24.010c/ svasthe tu dvy.antaraṁ dadyād ā.tṛpter iti yojayet || 10 ||
AHS1.24.011a/ prakāśa.kṣama.tā svāsthyaṁ viśadaṁ laghu locanam |
AHS1.24.011c/ tṛpte viparyayo '.tṛpte 'ti.tṛpte śleṣma.jā rujaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS1.24.011v/ 24.11dv tṛpte 'ti śleṣma.jā rujaḥ]
AHS1.24.012a/ sneha.pītā tanur iva klāntā dṛṣṭir hi sīdati |
AHS1.24.012c/ tarpaṇān.antaraṁ tasmād dṛg.balādhāna.kāriṇam || 12 ||
[Page 134 ]
AHS1.24.013a/ puṭa.pākaṁ prayuñjīta pūrvokteṣv eva yakṣmasu |
AHS1.24.013c/ sa vāte snehanaḥ śleṣma.sahite lekhano hitaḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS1.24.013v/ 24.13bv pūrvokteṣv eṣu yakṣmasu 24.13bv pūrvokteṣu ca yakṣmasu]
AHS1.24.014a/ dṛg.daurbalye 'nile pitte rakte svasthe prasādanaḥ |
AHS1.24.014c/ bhū.śaya.prasahānūpa.medo.majja.vasāmiṣaiḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.24.015a/ snehanaṁ payasā piṣṭair jīvanīyaiś ca kalpayet |
AHS1.24.015c/ mṛga.pakṣi.yakṛn.māṁsa.muktāyas.tāmra.saindhavaiḥ || 15 ||
AHS1.24.016a/ sroto.ja.śaṅkha.phenālair lekhanaṁ mastu.kalkitaiḥ |
AHS1.24.016c/ mṛga.pakṣi.yakṛn.majja.vasāntra.hṛdayāmiṣaiḥ || 16 ||
AHS1.24.017a/ madhuraiḥ sa.ghṛtaiḥ stanya.kṣīra.piṣṭaiḥ prasādanam |
AHS1.24.017c/ bilva.mātraṁ pṛthak piṇḍaṁ māṁsa.bheṣaja.kalkayoḥ || 17 ||
AHS1.24.018a/ urubūka.vaṭāmbho.ja.pattraiḥ snehādiṣu kramāt |
AHS1.24.018c/ veṣṭayitvā mṛdā liptaṁ dhava.dhanvana.go.mayaiḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS1.24.018v/ 24.18bv .pattraiḥ snigdhādiṣu kramāt]
AHS1.24.019a/ pacet pradīptair agny.ābhaṁ pakvaṁ niṣpīḍya tad.rasam |
AHS1.24.019c/ netre tarpaṇa.vad yuñjyāt śataṁ dve trīṇi dhārayet || 19 ||
AHS1.24.020a/ lekhana.snehanāntyeṣu koṣṇau pūrvau himo 'paraḥ |
AHS1.24.020c/ dhūma.po 'nte tayor eva yogās tatra ca tṛpti.vat || 20 ||
AHS1.24.021a/ tarpaṇaṁ puṭa.pākaṁ ca nasyān.arhe na yojayet |
AHS1.24.021c/ yāvanty ahāni yuñjīta dvis tato hita.bhāg bhavet || 21 ||
AHS1.24.021ū̆ab/ mālatī.mallikā.puṣpair baddhākṣo nivasen niśām || 21ū̆ab || [Note: AHS1.24.021ū̆v/ 24.21ū̆bv baddhākṣo nivasen niśi]
[Page 135 ]
AHS1.24.022ū̆a/ sarvātmanā netra.balāya yatnaṁ kurvīta nasyāñjana.tarpaṇādyaiḥ |
AHS1.24.022ū̆c/ dṛṣṭiś ca naṣṭā vividhaṁ jagac ca tamo.mayaṁ jāyata eka.rūpam || 22ū̆ ||

1.25. Chapter 25 :: Atha yantravidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 147-151]
AHS1.25.001a/ nānā.vidhānāṁ śalyānāṁ nānā.deśa.prabodhinām |
AHS1.25.001c/ āhartum abhyupāyo yas tad yantraṁ yac ca darśane || 1 || [Note: AHS1.25.001v/ 25.1bv nānā.deśa.vibādhinām]
AHS1.25.002a/ arśo.bhagandarādīnāṁ śastra.kṣārāgni.yojane |
AHS1.25.002c/ śeṣāṅga.parirakṣāyāṁ tathā vasty.ādi.karmaṇi || 2 ||
AHS1.25.003a/ ghaṭikālābu.śṛṅgaṁ ca jāmbavauṣṭhādikāni ca |
AHS1.25.003c/ aneka.rūpa.kāryāṇi yantrāṇi vividhāny ataḥ || 3 ||
AHS1.25.004a/ vikalpya kalpayet buddhyā yathā.sthūlaṁ tu vakṣyate |
AHS1.25.004c/ tulyāni kaṅka.siṁharkṣa.kākādi.mṛga.pakṣiṇām || 4 ||
AHS1.25.005a/ mukhair mukhāni yantrāṇāṁ kuryāt tat.sañjñakāni ca |
AHS1.25.005c/ aṣṭā.daśāṅgulāyāmāny āyasāni ca bhūri.śaḥ || 5 ||
AHS1.25.006a/ masūrākāra.pary.antaiḥ kaṇṭhe baddhāni kīlakaiḥ |
AHS1.25.006c/ vidyāt svastika.yantrāṇi mūle 'ṅkuśa.natāni ca || 6 || [Note: AHS1.25.006v/ 25.6dv mūle 'ṅkuśa.nibhāni ca]
AHS1.25.007a/ tair dṛḍhair asthi.saṁlagna.śalyāharaṇam iṣyate |
AHS1.25.007c/ kīla.baddha.vimuktāgrau sandaṁśau ṣo.ḍaśāṅgulau || 7 ||
AHS1.25.008a/ tvak.sirā.snāyu.piśita.lagna.śalyāpakarṣaṇau |
AHS1.25.008c/ ṣaḍ.aṅgulo 'nyo haraṇe sūkṣma.śalyopa.pakṣmaṇām || 8 ||
AHS1.25.009a/ mucuṇḍī sūkṣma.dantarjur mūle rucaka.bhūṣaṇā |
AHS1.25.009c/ gambhīra.vraṇa.māṁsānām armaṇaḥ śeṣitasya ca || 9 || [Note: AHS1.25.009v/ 25.9av mucuṭī sūkṣma.dantarjur ]
[Page 136 ]
AHS1.25.010a/ dve dvā.daśāṅgule matsya.tāla.vat dvy.eka.tālake |
AHS1.25.010c/ tāla.yantre smṛte karṇa.nāḍī.śalyāpahāriṇī || 10 || [Note: AHS1.25.010v/ 25.10bv .tālu.vat dvy.eka.tāluke 25.10cv tālu.yantre smṛte karṇa. 25.10dv .nāḍī.śalyāpahāraṇe 25.10dv .nāḍī.śalyāpakarṣaṇī]
AHS1.25.011a/ nāḍī.yantrāṇi suṣirāṇy ekāneka.mukhāni ca |
AHS1.25.011c/ sroto.gatānāṁ śalyānām āmayānāṁ ca darśane || 11 || [Note: AHS1.25.011v/ 25.11bv ekāneka.mukhāni tu]
AHS1.25.012a/ kriyāṇāṁ su.kara.tvāya kuryād ācūṣaṇāya ca |
AHS1.25.012c/ tad.vistāra.parīṇāha.dairghyaṁ sroto.'nurodhataḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.25.013a/ daśāṅgulārdha.nāhāntaḥ.kaṇṭha.śalyāvalokinī |
AHS1.25.013c/ nāḍī pañca.mukha.cchidrā catuṣ.karṇasya saṅgrahe || 13 || [Note: AHS1.25.013v/ 25.13bv .kaṇṭha.śalyāvalokane]
AHS1.25.014a/ vāraṅgasya dvi.karṇasya tri.cchidrā tat.pramāṇataḥ |
AHS1.25.014c/ vāraṅga.karṇa.saṁsthānānāha.dairghyānurodhataḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.25.015a/ nāḍīr evaṁ.vidhāś cānyā draṣṭuṁ śalyāni kārayet |
AHS1.25.015c/ padma.karṇikayā mūrdhni sadṛśī dvā.daśāṅgulā || 15 ||
AHS1.25.016a/ caturtha.suṣirā nāḍī śalya.nirghātinī matā |
AHS1.25.016c/ arśasāṁ go.stanākāraṁ yantrakaṁ catur.aṅgulam || 16 ||
AHS1.25.017a/ nāhe pañcāṅgulaṁ puṁsāṁ pramadānāṁ ṣaḍ.aṅgulam |
AHS1.25.017c/ dvi.cchidraṁ darśane vyādher eka.cchidraṁ tu karmaṇi || 17 ||
AHS1.25.018a/ madhye 'sya try.aṅgulaṁ chidram aṅguṣṭhodara.vistṛtam |
AHS1.25.018c/ ardhāṅgulocchritodvṛtta.karṇikaṁ ca tad.ūrdhvataḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS1.25.018v/ 25.18dv .karṇikaṁ tu tad.ūrdhvataḥ]
AHS1.25.019a/ śamy.ākhyaṁ tādṛg a.cchidraṁ yantram arśaḥ.prapīḍanam |
AHS1.25.019c/ sarva.thāpanayed oṣṭhaṁ chidrād ūrdhvaṁ bhagandare || 19 ||
[Page 137 ]
AHS1.25.020a/ ghrāṇārbudārśasām eka.cchidrā nāḍy.aṅgula.dvayā |
AHS1.25.020c/ pradeśinī.parīṇāhā syād bhagandara.yantra.vat || 20 ||
AHS1.25.021a/ aṅgulī.trāṇakaṁ dāntaṁ vārkṣaṁ vā catur.aṅgulam |
AHS1.25.021c/ dvi.cchidraṁ go.stanākāraṁ tad.vaktra.vivṛtau sukham || 21 ||
AHS1.25.022a/ yoni.vraṇekṣaṇaṁ madhye suṣiraṁ ṣo.ḍaśāṅgulam |
AHS1.25.022c/ mudrā.baddhaṁ catur.bhittam ambho.ja.mukulānanam || 22 || [Note: AHS1.25.022v/ 25.22cv mudrā.baddhaṁ catur.bhinnam 25.22cv mudrā.baddhaṁ catuṣ.koṇam]
AHS1.25.023a/ catuḥ.śalākam ākrāntaṁ mūle tad vikasen mukhe |
AHS1.25.023c/ yantre nāḍī.vraṇābhyaṅga.kṣālanāya ṣaḍ.aṅgule || 23 ||
AHS1.25.024a/ vasti.yantrākṛtī mūle mukhe 'ṅguṣṭha.kalāya.khe |
AHS1.25.024c/ agrato '.karṇike mūle nibaddha.mṛdu.carmaṇī || 24 ||
AHS1.25.025a/ dvi.dvārā nalikā piccha.nalikā vodakodare |
AHS1.25.025c/ dhūma.vasty.ādi.yantrāṇi nirdiṣṭāni yathā.yatham || 25 ||
AHS1.25.026a/ try.aṅgulāsyaṁ bhavec chṛṅgaṁ cūṣaṇe 'ṣṭā.daśāṅgulam |
AHS1.25.026c/ agre siddhārthaka.cchidraṁ su.naddhaṁ cūcukākṛti || 26 ||
AHS1.25.027a/ syād dvā.daśāṅgulo 'lābur nāhe tv aṣṭā.daśāṅgulaḥ |
AHS1.25.027c/ catus.try.aṅgula.vṛttāsyo dīpto 'ntaḥ śleṣma.rakta.hṛt || 27 ||
AHS1.25.028a/ tad.vad ghaṭī hitā gulma.vilayonnamane ca sā |
AHS1.25.028c/ śalākākhyāni yantrāṇi nānā.karmākṛtīni ca || 28 || [Note: AHS1.25.028v/ 25.28dv nānā.karmākṛtīni tu]
AHS1.25.029a/ yathā.yoga.pramāṇāni teṣām eṣaṇa.karmaṇī |
AHS1.25.029c/ ubhe gaṇḍū.pada.mukhe srotobhyaḥ śalya.hāriṇī || 29 || [Note: AHS1.25.029v/ 25.29bv teṣām eṣaṇa.karmaṇi]
[Page 138 ]
AHS1.25.030a/ masūra.dala.vaktre dve syātām aṣṭa.navāṅgule |
AHS1.25.030c/ śaṅkavaḥ ṣaḍ ubhau teṣāṁ ṣo.ḍaśa.dvā.daśāṅgulau || 30 ||
AHS1.25.031a/ vyūhane 'hi.phaṇā.vaktrau dvau daśa.dvā.daśāṅgulau |
AHS1.25.031c/ cālane śara.puṅkhāsyāv āhārye baḍiśākṛtī || 31 ||
AHS1.25.032a/ nato 'gre śaṅkunā tulyo garbha.śaṅkur iti smṛtaḥ |
AHS1.25.032c/ aṣṭāṅgulāyatas tena mūḍha.garbhaṁ haret striyāḥ || 32 ||
AHS1.25.033a/ aśmary.āharaṇaṁ sarpa.phaṇā.vad vakram agrataḥ |
AHS1.25.033c/ śara.puṅkha.mukhaṁ danta.pātanaṁ catur.aṅgulam || 33 || [Note: AHS1.25.033v/ 25.33av aśmary.āharaṇe sarpa. 25.33bv .phaṇā.vad vaktram agrataḥ]
AHS1.25.034a/ kārpāsa.vihitoṣṇīṣāḥ śalākāḥ ṣaṭ pramārjane |
AHS1.25.034c/ pāyāv āsanna.dūrārthe dve daśa.dvā.daśāṅgule || 34 ||
AHS1.25.035a/ dve ṣaṭ.saptāṅgule ghrāṇe dve karṇe 'ṣṭa.navāṅgule |
AHS1.25.035c/ karṇa.śodhanam aśvattha.pattra.prāntaṁ sruvānanam || 35 ||
AHS1.25.036a/ śalākā.jāmbavauṣṭhānāṁ kṣāre 'gnau ca pṛthak trayam |
AHS1.25.036c/ yuñjyāt sthūlāṇu.dīrghāṇāṁ śalākām antra.vardhmani || 36 ||
AHS1.25.037a/ madhyordhva.vṛtta.daṇḍāṁ ca mūle cārdhendu.sannibhām |
AHS1.25.037c/ kolāsthi.dala.tulyāsyā nāsārśo.'rbuda.dāha.kṛt || 37 ||
AHS1.25.038a/ aṣṭāṅgulā nimna.mukhās tisraḥ kṣārauṣadha.krame |
AHS1.25.038c/ kanīnī.madhyamānāmī.nakha.māna.samair mukhaiḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS1.25.038v/ 25.38cv kaniṣṭhā.madhyamānāmī.]
AHS1.25.039a/ svaṁ svam uktāni yantrāṇi meḍhra.śuddhy.añjanādiṣu |
AHS1.25.039c/ anu.yantrāṇy ayas.kānta.rajjū.vastrāśma.mudgarāḥ || 39 || [Note: AHS1.25.039v/ 25.39cv aṇu.yantrāṇy ayas.kānta.]
[Page 139 ]
AHS1.25.040a/ vadhrāntra.jihvā.vālāś ca śākhā.nakha.mukha.dvi.jāḥ |
AHS1.25.040c/ kālaḥ pākaḥ karaḥ pādo bhayaṁ harṣaś ca tat.kriyāḥ || 40 || [Note: AHS1.25.040v/ 25.40av vadhry.antra.jihvā.vālāś ca 25.40av vardhrāntra.jihvā.vālāś ca 25.40bv .śākhā.nakha.mukha.dvi.jāḥ]
AHS1.25.040ū̆ab/ upāya.vit pravibhajed ālocya nipuṇaṁ dhiyā || 40ū̆ab ||
AHS1.25.041ū̆a/ nirghātanonmathana.pūraṇa.mārga.śuddhi.saṁvyūhanāharaṇa.bandhana.pīḍanāni |
AHS1.25.041ū̆c/ ācūṣaṇonnamana.nāmana.cāla.bhaṅga.vyāvartanarju.karaṇāni ca yantra.karma || 41ū̆ ||
AHS1.25.042ū̆a/ vivartate sādhv avagāhate ca grāhyaṁ gṛhītvoddharate ca yasmāt |
AHS1.25.042ū̆c/ yantreṣv ataḥ kaṅka.mukhaṁ pradhānaṁ sthāneṣu sarveṣv adhikāri yac ca || 42ū̆ || [Note: AHS1.25.042ū̆v/ 25.42ū̆av nivartate sādhv avagāhate ca 25.42ū̆dv sthāneṣu sarveṣv a.vikāri yac ca]

1.26. Chapter 26 :: Atha śastravidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 151-156]
AHS1.26.001a/ ṣaḍ.viṁśatiḥ su.karmārair ghaṭitāni yathā.vidhi |
AHS1.26.001c/ śastrāṇi roma.vāhīni bāhulyenāṅgulāni ṣaṭ || 1 ||
AHS1.26.002a/ su.rūpāṇi su.dhārāṇi su.grahāṇi ca kārayet |
AHS1.26.002c/ a.karālāni su.dhmāta.su.tīkṣṇāv artite 'yasi || 2 ||
AHS1.26.003a/ samāhita.mukhāgrāṇi nīlāmbho.ja.cchavīni ca |
AHS1.26.003c/ nāmānugata.rūpāṇi sadā sannihitāni ca || 3 ||
AHS1.26.004a/ svonmānārdha.caturthāṁśa.phalāny ekaika.śo 'pi ca |
AHS1.26.004c/ prāyo dvi.trāṇi yuñjīta tāni sthāna.viśeṣataḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS1.26.004v/ 26.4av sva.mānārdha.caturthāṁśa.]
AHS1.26.004+(1)a/ maṇḍalāgraṁ vṛddhi.pattram utpalādhy.ardha.dhārake |
AHS1.26.004+(1)c/ sarpaiṣaṇyau vetasākhyaṁ śarāry.āsya.tri.kūrcake || 4+(1) ||
AHS1.26.004+(2)a/ kuśāsyaṁ sāṭa.vadanam antar.vaktrārdha.candrake |
AHS1.26.004+(2)c/ vrīhi.mukhaṁ kuṭhārī ca śalākāṅguli.śastrake || 4+(2) || [Note: AHS1.26.004+(2)v/ 26.4+(2)av kuśāsyā sāṭa.vadanā 26.4+(2)bv antar.vaktrārdha.candrakam 26.4+(2)bv channa.vaktrārdha.candrake 26.4+(2)bv channa.vaktrārdha.candrakam]
[Page 140 ]
AHS1.26.004+(3)a/ baḍiśaṁ kara.pattrākhyaṁ kartarī nakha.śastrakam |
AHS1.26.004+(3)c/ danta.lekhanakaṁ sūcyaḥ kūrco nāma khajāhvayam || 4+(3) ||
AHS1.26.004+(4)ab/ ārā catur.vidhākārā tathā syāt karṇa.vedhanī || 4+(4)ab || [Note: AHS1.26.004+(4)v/ 26.4+(4)bv tathā syāt karṇa.vedhanam]
AHS1.26.005a/ maṇḍalāgraṁ phale teṣāṁ tarjany.antar.nakhākṛti |
AHS1.26.005c/ lekhane chedane yojyaṁ pothakī.śuṇḍikādiṣu || 5 || [Note: AHS1.26.005v/ 26.5av maṇḍalāgraṁ phalaṁ teṣāṁ]
AHS1.26.006a/ vṛddhi.pattraṁ kṣurākāraṁ cheda.bhedana.pāṭane |
AHS1.26.006c/ ṛjv.agram unnate śophe gambhīre ca tad anya.thā || 6 || [Note: AHS1.26.006v/ 26.6dv gambhīre tu tato 'nya.thā]
AHS1.26.007a/ natāgraṁ pṛṣṭhato dīrgha.hrasva.vaktraṁ yathāśrayam |
AHS1.26.007c/ utpalādhy.ardha.dhārākhye bhedane chedane tathā || 7 || [Note: AHS1.26.007v/ 26.7bv .hrasva.vaktraṁ yathāśayam 26.7bv .hrasva.vaktraṁ yathā.kramam 26.7bv .hrasva.vaktraṁ yathā.yatham 26.7bv .hrasva.vaktre yathā.yatham]
AHS1.26.008a/ sarpāsyaṁ ghrāṇa.karṇārśaś.chedane 'rdhāṅgulaṁ phale |
AHS1.26.008c/ gater anveṣaṇe ślakṣṇā gaṇḍū.pada.mukhaiṣaṇī || 8 ||
AHS1.26.009a/ bhedanārthe 'parā sūcī.mukhā mūla.niviṣṭa.khā |
AHS1.26.009c/ vetasaṁ vyadhane srāvye śarāry.āsya.tri.kūrcake || 9 ||
AHS1.26.010a/ kuśāṭā.vadane srāvye dvy.aṅgulaṁ syāt tayoḥ phalam |
AHS1.26.010c/ tad.vad antar.mukhaṁ tasya phalam adhy.ardham aṅgulam || 10 || [Note: AHS1.26.010v/ 26.10ac kuśāṭā vadane srāvye]
AHS1.26.011a/ ardha.candrānanaṁ caitat tathādhy.ardhāṅgulaṁ phale |
AHS1.26.011c/ vrīhi.vaktraṁ prayojya ca tat sirodarayor vyadhe || 11 ||
AHS1.26.012a/ pṛthuḥ kuṭhārī go.danta.sadṛśārdhāṅgulānanā |
AHS1.26.012c/ tayordhva.daṇḍayā vidhyed upary asthnāṁ sthitāṁ sirām || 12 ||
[Page 141 ]
AHS1.26.013a/ tāmrī śalākā dvi.mukhī mukhe kurubakākṛtiḥ |
AHS1.26.013c/ liṅga.nāśaṁ tayā vidhyet kuryād aṅguli.śastrakam || 13 || [Note: AHS1.26.013v/ 26.13av tāmrī śalākā dvi.mukhā]
AHS1.26.014a/ mudrikā.nirgata.mukhaṁ phale tv ardhāṅgulāyatam |
AHS1.26.014c/ yogato vṛddhi.pattreṇa maṇḍalāgreṇa vā samam || 14 ||
AHS1.26.015a/ tat pradeśiny.agra.parva.pramāṇārpaṇa.mudrikam |
AHS1.26.015c/ sūtra.baddhaṁ gala.sroto.roga.cchedana.bhedane || 15 || [Note: AHS1.26.015v/ 26.15bv .pramāṇārpita.mudrikam]
AHS1.26.016a/ grahaṇe śuṇḍikārmāder baḍiśaṁ su.natānanam |
AHS1.26.016c/ chede 'sthnāṁ karapattraṁ tu khara.dhāraṁ daśāṅgulam || 16 || [Note: AHS1.26.016v/ 26.16bv baḍiśaḥ su.natānanaḥ]
AHS1.26.017a/ vistāre dvy.aṅgulaṁ sūkṣma.dantaṁ su.tsaru.bandhanam |
AHS1.26.017c/ snāyu.sūtra.kaca.cchede kartarī kartarī.nibhā || 17 ||
AHS1.26.018a/ vakrarju.dhāraṁ dvi.mukhaṁ nakha.śastraṁ navāṅgulam |
AHS1.26.018c/ sūkṣma.śalyoddhṛti.ccheda.bheda.pracchāna.lekhane || 18 || [Note: AHS1.26.018v/ 26.18dv .bheda.pracchanna.lekhane]
AHS1.26.019a/ eka.dhāraṁ catuṣ.koṇaṁ prabaddhākṛti caikataḥ |
AHS1.26.019c/ danta.lekhanakaṁ tena śodhayed danta.śarkarām || 19 || [Note: AHS1.26.019v/ 26.19bv pravṛddhākṛti caikataḥ]
AHS1.26.020a/ vṛttā gūḍha.dṛḍhāḥ pāśe tisraḥ sūcyo 'tra sīvane |
AHS1.26.020c/ māṁsalānāṁ pradeśānāṁ try.aśrā try.aṅgulam āyatā || 20 ||
AHS1.26.021a/ alpa.māṁsāsthi.sandhi.stha.vraṇānāṁ dvy.aṅgulāyatā |
AHS1.26.021c/ vrīhi.vaktrā dhanur.vakrā pakvāmāśaya.marmasu || 21 ||
AHS1.26.022a/ sā sārdha.dvy.aṅgulā sarva.vṛttās tāś catur.aṅgulāḥ |
AHS1.26.022c/ kūrco vṛttaika.pīṭha.sthāḥ saptāṣṭau vā su.bandhanāḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS1.26.022v/ 26.22av sā sārdha.dvy.aṅgulā sarvā 26.22bv vṛttās tāś catur.aṅgulāḥ]
[Page 142 ]
AHS1.26.023a/ sa yojyo nīlikā.vyaṅga.keśa.śāteṣu kuṭṭane |
AHS1.26.023c/ ardhāṅgula.mukhair vṛttair aṣṭābhiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ khajaḥ || 23 || [Note: AHS1.26.023v/ 26.23bv .keśa.śātana.kuṭṭane]
AHS1.26.024a/ pāṇibhyāṁ mathyamānena ghrāṇāt tena hared asṛk |
