AHS1.26.024c/ vyadhanaṁ karṇa.pālīnāṁ yūthikā.mukulānanam || 24 || [Note: AHS1.26.024v/ 26.24cv vyadhane karṇa.pālīnāṁ 26.24dv yūthikā.mukulānanā]
AHS1.26.025a/ ārārdhāṅgula.vṛttāsyā tat.praveśā tathordhvataḥ |
AHS1.26.025c/ catur.aśrā tayā vidhyec chophaṁ pakvāma.saṁśaye || 25 ||
AHS1.26.026a/ karṇa.pālīṁ ca bahalāṁ bahalāyāś ca śasyate |
AHS1.26.026c/ sūcī tri.bhāga.suṣirā try.aṅgulā karṇa.vedhanī || 26 || [Note: AHS1.26.026v/ 26.26bv tasyā eva ca śasyate]
AHS1.26.027a/ jalaukaḥ.kṣāra.dahana.kācopala.nakhādayaḥ |
AHS1.26.027c/ a.lauhāny anu.śastrāṇi tāny evaṁ ca vikalpayet || 27 ||
AHS1.26.028a/ aparāṇy api yantrādīny upayogaṁ ca yaugikam |
AHS1.26.028c/ utpāṭya.pāṭya.sīvyaiṣya.lekhya.pracchāna.kuṭṭanam || 28 || [Note: AHS1.26.028v/ 26.28cv utpāṭya.pāṭya.sevyaiṣya. 26.28dv .lekhya.pracchanna.kuṭṭanam]
AHS1.26.029a/ chedyaṁ bhedyaṁ vyadho mantho graho dāhaś ca tat.kriyāḥ |
AHS1.26.029c/ kuṇṭha.khaṇḍa.tanu.sthūla.hrasva.dīrgha.tva.vakra.tāḥ || 29 ||
AHS1.26.030a/ śastrāṇāṁ khara.dhāra.tvam aṣṭau doṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ |
AHS1.26.030c/ cheda.bhedana.lekhyārthaṁ śastraṁ vṛnta.phalāntare || 30 ||
AHS1.26.031a/ tarjanī.madhyamāṅguṣṭhair gṛhṇīyāt su.samāhitaḥ |
AHS1.26.031c/ visrāvaṇāni vṛntāgre tarjany.aṅguṣṭhakena ca || 31 ||
AHS1.26.032a/ tala.pracchanna.vṛntāgraṁ grāhyaṁ vrīhi.mukhaṁ mukhe |
AHS1.26.032c/ mūleṣv āharaṇārthāni kriyā.saukaryato 'param || 32 || [Note: AHS1.26.032v/ 26.32cv mūleṣv āharaṇārthe tu 26.32cv mūleṣv āharaṇārtheṣu]
[Page 143 ]
AHS1.26.033a/ syān navāṅgula.vistāraḥ su.ghano dvā.daśāṅgulaḥ |
AHS1.26.033c/ kṣauma.pattrorṇa.kauśeya.dukūla.mṛdu.carma.jaḥ || 33 ||
AHS1.26.034a/ vinyasta.pāśaḥ su.syūtaḥ sāntarorṇā.stha.śastrakaḥ |
AHS1.26.034c/ śalākā.pihitāsyaś ca śastra.kośaḥ su.sañcayaḥ || 34 ||
AHS1.26.035a/ jalaukasas tu sukhināṁ rakta.srāvāya yojayet |
AHS1.26.035c/ duṣṭāmbu.matsya.bhekāhi.śava.kotha.malodbhavāḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS1.26.035v/ 26.35cv duṣṭāmbu.matsya.bhekādi.]
AHS1.26.036a/ raktāḥ śvetā bhṛśaṁ kṛṣṇāś capalāḥ sthūla.picchilāḥ |
AHS1.26.036c/ indrāyudha.vicitrordhva.rājayo romaśāś ca tāḥ || 36 ||
AHS1.26.037a/ sa.viṣā varjayet tābhiḥ kaṇḍū.pāka.jvara.bhramāḥ |
AHS1.26.037c/ viṣa.pittāsra.nut kāryaṁ tatra śuddhāmbu.jāḥ punaḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS1.26.037v/ 26.37cv viṣa.pittāsra.jit kāryaṁ 26.37dv tatra śuddhāmbu.sambhavāḥ]
AHS1.26.038a/ nir.viṣāḥ śaivala.śyāvā vṛttā nīlordhva.rājayaḥ |
AHS1.26.038c/ kaṣāya.pṛṣṭhās tanv.aṅgyaḥ kiñ.cit.pītodarāś ca yāḥ || 38 ||
AHS1.26.039a/ tā apy a.samyag.vamanāt pratataṁ ca nipātanāt |
AHS1.26.039c/ sīdantiḥ salilaṁ prāpya rakta.mattā iti tyajet || 39 || [Note: AHS1.26.039v/ 26.39cv sīdanti salilaṁ prāpya]
AHS1.26.040a/ athetarā niśā.kalka.yukte 'mbhasi pariplutāḥ |
AHS1.26.040c/ avanti.some takre vā punaś cāśvāsitā jale || 40 || [Note: AHS1.26.040v/ 26.40cv kāñjike kālaśeye vā]
AHS1.26.041a/ lāgayed ghṛta.mṛt.stanya.rakta.śastra.nipātanaiḥ |
AHS1.26.041c/ pibantīr unnata.skandhāś chādayen mṛdu.vāsasā || 41 || [Note: AHS1.26.041v/ 26.41av lāgayet pala.mṛt.stanya.]
AHS1.26.042a/ sampṛktād duṣṭa.śuddhāsrāj jalaukā duṣṭa.śoṇitam |
AHS1.26.042c/ ādatte prathamaṁ haṁsaḥ kṣīraṁ kṣīrodakād iva || 42 || [Note: AHS1.26.042v/ 26.42av saṁsṛṣṭād duṣṭa.śuddhāsrāj]
[Page 144 ]
AHS1.26.042+(1)a/ gulmārśo.vidradhīn kuṣṭha.vāta.rakta.galāmayān |
AHS1.26.042+(1)c/ netra.rug.viṣa.vīsarpān śamayanti jalaukasaḥ || 42+(1) ||
AHS1.26.043a/ daṁśasya tode kaṇḍvāṁ vā mokṣayed vāmayec ca tām |
AHS1.26.043c/ paṭu.tailākta.vadanāṁ ślakṣṇa.kaṇḍana.rūṣitām || 43 || [Note: AHS1.26.043v/ 26.43bv mokṣayed vāmayec ca tāḥ 26.43cv paṭu.tailākta.vadanāḥ 26.43dv ślakṣṇa.kaṇḍana.rūkṣitām 26.43dv ślakṣṇa.kaṇḍana.rūṣitāḥ 26.43dv ślakṣṇa.kaṇḍana.rūkṣitāḥ]
AHS1.26.044a/ rakṣan rakta.madād bhūyaḥ saptāhaṁ tā na pātayet |
AHS1.26.044c/ pūrva.vat paṭu.tā dārḍhyaṁ samyag.vānte jalaukasām || 44 ||
AHS1.26.045a/ klamo 'ti.yogān mṛtyur vā dur.vānte stabdha.tā madaḥ |
AHS1.26.045c/ anya.trānya.tra tāḥ sthāpyā ghaṭe mṛtsnāmbu.garbhiṇi || 45 ||
AHS1.26.046a/ lālādi.kotha.nāśārthaṁ sa.viṣāḥ syus tad.anvayāt |
AHS1.26.046c/ a.śuddhau srāvayed daṁśān haridrā.guḍa.mākṣikaiḥ || 46 ||
AHS1.26.047a/ śata.dhautājya.picavas tato lepāś ca śītalāḥ |
AHS1.26.047c/ duṣṭa.raktāpagamanāt sadyo rāga.rujāṁ śamaḥ || 47 ||
AHS1.26.048a/ a.śuddhaṁ calitaṁ sthānāt sthitaṁ raktaṁ vraṇāśaye |
AHS1.26.048c/ vy.amlī.bhavet paryuṣitaṁ tasmāt tat srāvayet punaḥ || 48 || [Note: AHS1.26.048v/ 26.48cv amlī.bhavet paryuṣitaṁ]
AHS1.26.049a/ yuñjyān nālābu.ghaṭikā rakte pittena dūṣite |
AHS1.26.049c/ tāsām anala.saṁyogād yuñjyāt tu kapha.vāyunā || 49 || [Note: AHS1.26.049v/ 26.49dv yuñjyāc ca kapha.vāyunā]
AHS1.26.050a/ kaphena duṣṭaṁ rudhiraṁ na śṛṅgeṇa vinirharet |
AHS1.26.050c/ skanna.tvād vāta.pittābhyāṁ duṣṭaṁ śṛṅgeṇa nirharet || 50 || [Note: AHS1.26.050v/ 26.50bv na śṛṅgeṇāti nirharet 26.50bv na śṛṅgeṇābhinirharet]
AHS1.26.051a/ gātraṁ baddhvopari dṛḍhaṁ rajjvā paṭṭena vā samam |
AHS1.26.051c/ snāyu.sandhy.asthi.marmāṇi tyajan pracchānam ācaret || 51 ||
[Page 145 ]
AHS1.26.052a/ adho.deśa pravisṛtaiḥ padair upari.gāmibhiḥ |
AHS1.26.052c/ na gāḍha.ghana.tiryagbhir na pade padam ācaran || 52 || [Note: AHS1.26.052v/ 26.52dv na pade padam ācaret]
AHS1.26.053a/ pracchānenaika.deśa.sthaṁ grathitaṁ jala.janmabhiḥ |
AHS1.26.053c/ harec chṛṅgādibhiḥ suptam asṛg vyāpi sirā.vyadhaiḥ || 53 || [Note: AHS1.26.053v/ 26.53bv granthitaṁ jala.janmabhiḥ]
AHS1.26.054a/ pracchānaṁ piṇḍite vā syād avagāḍhe jalaukasaḥ |
AHS1.26.054c/ tvak.sthe 'lābu.ghaṭī.śṛṅgaṁ siraiva vyāpake 'sṛji || 54 ||
AHS1.26.055a/ vātādi.dhāma vā śṛṅga.jalauko.'lābubhiḥ kramāt |
AHS1.26.055c/ srutāsṛjaḥ pradehādyaiḥ śītaiḥ syād vāyu.kopataḥ || 55 ||
AHS1.26.055ū̆ab/ sa.toda.kaṇḍuḥ śophas taṁ sarpiṣoṣṇena secayet || 55ū̆ab || [Note: AHS1.26.055ū̆v/ 26.55ū̆av sa.toda.kaṇḍū.śophas taṁ]

1.27. Chapter 27 :: Atha sirāvyadhavidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 156-160]
AHS1.27.001a/ madhuraṁ lavaṇaṁ kiñ.cid a.śītoṣṇam a.saṁhatam |
AHS1.27.001c/ padmendragopa.hemāvi.śaśa.lohita.lohitam || 1 ||
AHS1.27.002a/ lohitaṁ prabhavaḥ śuddhaṁ tanos tenaiva ca sthitaḥ |
AHS1.27.002c/ tat pitta.śleṣmalaiḥ prāyo dūṣyate kurute tataḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS1.27.002v/ 27.2av lohitaṁ pravadec chuddhaṁ]
AHS1.27.003a/ visarpa.vidradhi.plīha.gulmāgni.sadana.jvarān |
AHS1.27.003c/ mukha.netra.śiro.roga.mada.tṛḍ.lavaṇāsya.tāḥ || 3 ||
AHS1.27.004a/ kuṣṭha.vātāsra.pittāsra.kaṭv.amlodgiraṇa.bhramān |
AHS1.27.004c/ śītoṣṇa.snigdha.rūkṣādyair upakrāntāś ca ye gadāḥ || 4 ||
AHS1.27.005a/ samyak sādhyā na sidhyanti te ca rakta.prakopa.jāḥ |
AHS1.27.005c/ teṣu srāvayituṁ raktam udriktaṁ vyadhayet sirām || 5 ||
[Page 146 ]
AHS1.27.006a/ na tūna.ṣo.ḍaśātīta.saptaty.abda.srutāsṛjām |
AHS1.27.006c/ a.snigdhā.sveditāty.artha.sveditānila.rogiṇām || 6 || [Note: AHS1.27.006v/ 27.6av na nyūna.ṣo.ḍaśātīta.]
AHS1.27.007a/ garbhiṇī.sūtikā.jīrṇa.pittāsra.śvāsa.kāsinām |
AHS1.27.007c/ atīsārodara.cchardi.pāṇḍu.sarvāṅga.śophinām || 7 ||
AHS1.27.008a/ sneha.pīte prayukteṣu tathā pañcasu karmasu |
AHS1.27.008c/ nā.yantritāṁ sirāṁ vidhyen na tiryaṅ nāpy an.utthitām || 8 || [Note: AHS1.27.008v/ 27.8dv na tiryaṅ nāpy an.ucchritām]
AHS1.27.009a/ nāti.śītoṣṇa.vātābhreṣv anya.trātyayikād gadāt |
AHS1.27.009c/ śiro.netra.vikāreṣu lalāṭyāṁ mokṣayet sirām || 9 || [Note: AHS1.27.009v/ 27.9dv lālāṭyāṁ mokṣayet sirām 27.9dv lālāṭyā mokṣayet sirāḥ 27.9dv lalāṭyā mokṣayet sirāḥ]
AHS1.27.010a/ apāṅgyām upanāsyāṁ vā karṇa.rogeṣu karṇa.jām |
AHS1.27.010c/ nāsā.rogeṣu nāsāgre sthitāṁ nāsā.lalāṭayoḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS1.27.010v/ 27.10av apāṅgyā upanāsyā vā]
AHS1.27.011a/ pīnase mukha.rogeṣu jihvauṣṭha.hanu.tālu.gāḥ |
AHS1.27.011c/ jatrūrdhva.granthiṣu grīvā.karṇa.śaṅkha.śiraḥ.śritāḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS1.27.011v/ 27.11cv jatrūrdhvaṁ granthiṣu grīvā.]
AHS1.27.012a/ uro.'pāṅga.lalāṭa.sthā unmāde 'pasmṛtau punaḥ |
AHS1.27.012c/ hanu.sandhau samaste vā sirāṁ bhrū.madhya.gāminīm || 12 || [Note: AHS1.27.012v/ 27.12av uro.'pāṅga.lalāṭa.sthām 27.12dv sirā bhrū.madhya.gāminīḥ]
AHS1.27.013a/ vidradhau pārśva.śūle ca pārśva.kakṣā.stanāntare |
AHS1.27.013c/ tṛtīyake 'ṁsayor madhye skandhasyādhaś caturthake || 13 ||
AHS1.27.014a/ pravāhikāyāṁ śūlinyāṁ śroṇito dvy.aṅgule sthitām |
AHS1.27.014c/ śukra.meḍhrāmaye meḍhra ūru.gāṁ gala.gaṇḍayoḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.27.015a/ gṛdhrasyāṁ jānuno 'dhas.tād ūrdhvaṁ vā catur.aṅgule |
AHS1.27.015c/ indra.vaster adho 'pacyāṁ dvy.aṅgule catur.aṅgule || 15 ||
[Page 147 ]
AHS1.27.016a/ ūrdhvaṁ gulphasya sakthy.artau tathā kroṣṭuka.śīrṣake |
AHS1.27.016c/ pāda.dāhe khuḍe harṣe vipādyāṁ vāta.kaṇṭake || 16 || [Note: AHS1.27.016v/ 27.16av ūrdhvaṁ gulphasya sandhy.artau]
AHS1.27.017a/ cipye ca dvy.aṅgule vidhyed upari kṣipra.marmaṇaḥ |
AHS1.27.017c/ gṛdhrasyām iva viśvācyāṁ yathoktānām a.darśane || 17 ||
AHS1.27.018a/ marma.hīne yathāsanne deśe 'nyāṁ vyadhayet sirām |
AHS1.27.018c/ atha snigdha.tanuḥ sajja.sarvopakaraṇo balī || 18 ||
AHS1.27.019a/ kṛta.svasty.ayanaḥ snigdha.rasānna.pratibhojitaḥ |
AHS1.27.019c/ agni.tāpātapa.svinno jānūccāsana.saṁsthitaḥ || 19 ||
AHS1.27.020a/ mṛdu.paṭṭātta.keśānto jānu.sthāpita.kūrparaḥ |
AHS1.27.020c/ muṣṭibhyāṁ vastra.garbhābhyāṁ manye gāḍhaṁ nipīḍayet || 20 || [Note: AHS1.27.020v/ 27.20dv manye gāḍhaṁ prapīḍayet]
AHS1.27.021a/ danta.prapīḍanotkāsa.gaṇḍādhmānāni cācaret |
AHS1.27.021c/ pṛṣṭhato yantrayec cainaṁ vastram āveṣṭayan naraḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS1.27.021v/ 27.21dv vastram āveṣṭayen naraḥ]
AHS1.27.022a/ kandharāyāṁ parikṣipya nyasyāntar vāma.tarjanīm |
AHS1.27.022c/ eṣo 'ntar.mukha.varjyānāṁ sirāṇāṁ yantraṇe vidhiḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS1.27.022v/ 27.22bv tasyāntar vāma.tarjanīm 27.22cv eṣo 'ntar.mukha.varjānāṁ]
AHS1.27.023a/ tato madhyamayāṅgulyā vaidyo 'ṅguṣṭha.vimuktayā |
AHS1.27.023c/ tāḍayed utthitāṁ jñātvā sparśād vāṅguṣṭha.pīḍanaiḥ || 23 || [Note: AHS1.27.023v/ 27.23dv sparśāṅguṣṭha.prapīḍanaiḥ]
AHS1.27.024a/ kuṭhāryā lakṣayen madhye vāma.hasta.gṛhītayā |
AHS1.27.024c/ phaloddeśe su.niṣ.kampaṁ sirāṁ tad.vac ca mokṣayet || 24 ||
AHS1.27.025a/ tāḍayan pīḍayaṁś caināṁ vidhyed vrīhi.mukhena tu |
AHS1.27.025c/ aṅguṣṭhenonnamayyāgre nāsikām upa.nāsikām || 25 || [Note: AHS1.27.025v/ 27.25av tāḍayan pīḍayan vaināṁ 27.25av tāḍayan pīḍayec caināṁ]
[Page 148 ]
AHS1.27.026a/ abhyunnata.vidaṣṭāgra.jihvasyādhas tad.āśrayām |
AHS1.27.026c/ yantrayet stanayor ūrdhvaṁ grīvāśrita.sirā.vyadhe || 26 ||
AHS1.27.027a/ pāṣāṇa.garbha.hastasya jānu.sthe prasṛte bhuje |
AHS1.27.027c/ kukṣer ārabhya mṛdite vidhyed baddhordhva.paṭṭake || 27 ||
AHS1.27.028a/ vidhyed dhasta.sirāṁ bāhāv an.ākuñcita.kūrpare |
AHS1.27.028c/ baddhvā sukhopaviṣṭasya muṣṭim aṅguṣṭha.garbhiṇam || 28 || [Note: AHS1.27.028v/ 27.28dv muṣṭim aṅguṣṭha.garbhiṇīm]
AHS1.27.029a/ ūrdhvaṁ vedhya.pradeśāc ca paṭṭikāṁ catur.aṅgule |
AHS1.27.029c/ vidhyed ālambamānasya bāhubhyāṁ pārśvayoḥ sirām || 29 ||
AHS1.27.030a/ prahṛṣṭe mehane jaṅghā.sirāṁ jānuny a.kuñcite |
AHS1.27.030c/ pāde tu su.sthite 'dhas.tāj jānu.sandher nipīḍite || 30 || [Note: AHS1.27.030v/ 27.30cv pāde tu bhū.sthite 'dhas.tāj]
AHS1.27.031a/ gāḍhaṁ karābhyām ā.gulphaṁ caraṇe tasya copari |
AHS1.27.031c/ dvitīye kuñcite kiñ.cid.ārūḍhe hasta.vat tataḥ || 31 ||
AHS1.27.032a/ baddhvā vidhyet sirām ittham an.ukteṣv api kalpayet |
AHS1.27.032c/ teṣu teṣu pradeśeṣu tat tad yantram upāya.vit || 32 ||
AHS1.27.033a/ māṁsale nikṣiped deśe vrīhy.āsyaṁ vrīhi.mātrakam |
AHS1.27.033c/ yavārdham asthnām upari sirāṁ vidhyan kuṭhārikām || 33 || [Note: AHS1.27.033v/ 27.33dv sirāṁ vidhyan kuṭhārayā 27.33dv sirāṁ vidhyet kuṭhārayā 27.33dv sirāṁ vidhyet kuṭhārikām]
AHS1.27.034a/ samyag.viddhā sraved dhārāṁ yantre mukte tu na sravet |
AHS1.27.034c/ alpa.kālaṁ vahaty alpaṁ dur.viddhā taila.cūrṇanaiḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS1.27.034v/ 27.34av samyag.viddhe sraved dhārā 27.34bv yantre mukte ca na sravet 27.34dv dur.viddhā taila.cūrṇitaiḥ]
AHS1.27.035a/ sa.śabdam ati.viddhā tu sraved duḥkhena dhāryate |
AHS1.27.035c/ bhī.mūrchā.yantra.śaithilya.kuṇṭha.śastrāti.tṛptayaḥ || 35 ||
[Page 149 ]
AHS1.27.036a/ kṣāma.tva.vegi.tā.svedā raktasyā.sruti.hetavaḥ |
AHS1.27.036c/ a.samyag asre sravati vella.vyoṣa.niśā.nataiḥ || 36 ||
AHS1.27.037a/ sāgāra.dhūma.lavaṇa.tailair dihyāt sirā.mukham |
AHS1.27.037c/ samyak.pravṛtte koṣṇena tailena lavaṇena ca || 37 || [Note: AHS1.27.037v/ 27.37dv tailena lavaṇena vā]
AHS1.27.038a/ agre sravati duṣṭāsraṁ kusumbhād iva pītikā |
AHS1.27.038c/ samyak srutvā svayaṁ tiṣṭhec chuddhaṁ tad iti nāharet || 38 ||
AHS1.27.039a/ yantraṁ vimucya mūrchāyāṁ vījite vyajanaiḥ punaḥ |
AHS1.27.039c/ srāvayen mūrchati punas tv apare.dyus try.ahe 'pi vā || 39 ||
AHS1.27.040a/ vātāc chyāvāruṇaṁ rūkṣaṁ vega.srāvy accha.phenilaṁ |
AHS1.27.040c/ pittāt pītāsitaṁ visram a.skandy auṣṇyāt sa.candrikam || 40 || [Note: AHS1.27.040v/ 27.40dv a.skandy auṣṇyāt sa.candrakam]
AHS1.27.040+1a/ vātikaṁ śoṇitaṁ śīghraṁ bhūmiḥ pibati cāvṛtam |
AHS1.27.040+1c/ makṣikāṇām a.kāntaṁ ca raktaṁ bhavati paittikam || 40+1 ||
AHS1.27.040+2ab/ ślaiṣmikaṁ makṣikākrāntaṁ śuṣyaty api na ceṇayat || 40+2ab ||
AHS1.27.041a/ kaphāt snigdham asṛk pāṇḍu tantu.mat picchilaṁ ghanam |
AHS1.27.041c/ saṁsṛṣṭa.liṅgaṁ saṁsargāt tri.doṣaṁ malināvilam || 41 ||
AHS1.27.042a/ a.śuddhau balino 'py asraṁ na prasthāt srāvayet param |
AHS1.27.042c/ ati.srutau hi mṛtyuḥ syād dāruṇā vā calāmayāḥ || 42 || [Note: AHS1.27.042v/ 27.42av a.śuddhaṁ balino 'py asraṁ]
AHS1.27.043a/ tatrābhyaṅga.rasa.kṣīra.rakta.pānāni bheṣajam |
AHS1.27.043c/ srute rakte śanair yantram apanīya himāmbunā || 43 ||
[Page 150 ]
AHS1.27.044a/ prakṣālya taila.plotāktaṁ bandhanīyaṁ sirā.mukham |
AHS1.27.044c/ a.śuddhaṁ srāvayed bhūyaḥ sāyam ahny apare 'pi vā || 44 || [Note: AHS1.27.044v/ 27.44cv a.śuddhau srāvayed bhūyaḥ]
AHS1.27.045a/ snehopaskṛta.dehasya pakṣād vā bhṛśa.dūṣitam |
AHS1.27.045c/ kiñ.cid dhi śeṣe duṣṭāsre naiva rogo 'tivartate || 45 ||
AHS1.27.046a/ sa.śeṣam apy ato dhāryaṁ na cāti.srutim ācaret |
AHS1.27.046c/ harec chṛṅgādibhiḥ śeṣaṁ prasādam atha.vā nayet || 46 ||
AHS1.27.047a/ śītopacāra.pittāsra.kriyā.śuddhi.viśoṣaṇaiḥ |
AHS1.27.047c/ duṣṭaṁ raktam an.udriktam evam eva prasādayet || 47 ||
AHS1.27.048a/ rakte tv a.tiṣṭhati kṣipraṁ stambhanīm ācaret kriyām |
AHS1.27.048c/ lodhra.priyaṅgu.pattaṅga.māṣa.yaṣṭy.āhva.gairikaiḥ || 48 ||
AHS1.27.049a/ mṛt.kapālāñjana.kṣauma.maṣī.kṣīri.tvag.aṅkuraiḥ |
AHS1.27.049c/ vicūrṇayed vraṇa.mukhaṁ padmakādi.himaṁ pibet || 49 ||
AHS1.27.050a/ tām eva vā sirāṁ vidhyed vyadhāt tasmād an.antaram |
AHS1.27.050c/ sirā.mukhaṁ vā tvaritaṁ dahet tapta.śalākayā || 50 || [Note: AHS1.27.050v/ 27.50cv sirā.mukhaṁ ca tvaritaṁ]
AHS1.27.051a/ un.mārga.gā yantra.nipīḍanena sva.sthānam āyānti punar na yāvat |
AHS1.27.051c/ doṣāḥ praduṣṭā rudhiraṁ prapannās tāvad dhitāhāra.vihāra.bhāk syāt || 51 ||
AHS1.27.052a/ nāty.uṣṇa.śītaṁ laghu dīpanīyaṁ rakte 'panīte hitam anna.pānam |
AHS1.27.052c/ tadā śarīraṁ hy an.avasthitāsṛg agnir viśeṣād iti rakṣitavyaḥ || 52 || [Note: AHS1.27.052v/ 27.52cv tadā śarīraṁ hy an.avasthitāsram 27.52dv agnir viśeṣād iti rakṣaṇīyaḥ 27.52dv agnir viśeṣeṇa ca rakṣitavyaḥ]
AHS1.27.053a/ prasanna.varṇendriyam indriyārthān icchantam a.vyāhata.paktṛ.vegam |
AHS1.27.053c/ sukhānvitaṁ puṣṭi.balopapannaṁ viśuddha.raktaṁ puruṣaṁ vadanti || 53 ||
[Page 151 ]
AHS1.27.053+1a/ rakta.jā vyaṅga.kuṣṭhādyāḥ kaṇṭhāsyākṣi.śiro.gadāḥ |
AHS1.27.053+1c/ palitārūṁṣikābādhāḥ śāmyanty ete sirā.vyadhāt || 53+1 ||
AHS1.27.053+2a/ nir.vyādhi.nīlotpala.pattra.netraṁ su.vyakta.mūlāsita.baddha.keśam |
AHS1.27.053+2c/ candropamaṁ padma.su.gandhi vaktraṁ bhavel lalāṭe tu sirā.vyadhena || 53+2 ||

1.28. Chapter 28 :: Atha śalyāharaṇavidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 160-165]
AHS1.28.001a/ vakrarju.tiryag.ūrdhvādhaḥ śalyānāṁ pañca.dhā gatiḥ |
AHS1.28.001c/ dhyāmaṁ śopha.rujā.vantaṁ sravantaṁ śoṇitaṁ muhuḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.28.002a/ abhyudgataṁ budbuda.vat piṭikopacitaṁ vraṇam |
AHS1.28.002c/ mṛdu.māṁsaṁ ca jānīyād antaḥ.śalyaṁ samāsataḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS1.28.002v/ 28.2av abhyunnataṁ budbuda.vat 28.2cv mṛdu.māṁsaṁ vijānīyād]
AHS1.28.003a/ viśeṣāt tvag.gate śalye vi.varṇaḥ kaṭhināyataḥ |
AHS1.28.003c/ śopho bhavati māṁsa.sthe coṣaḥ śopho vivardhate || 3 ||
AHS1.28.004a/ pīḍanā.kṣama.tā pākaḥ śalya.mārgo na rohati |
AHS1.28.004c/ peśy.antara.gate māṁsa.prāpta.vac chvayathuṁ vinā || 4 || [Note: AHS1.28.004v/ 28.4av pīḍane '.kṣama.tā pākaḥ 28.4dv .prāpta.vac chvayathor vinā]
AHS1.28.005a/ ākṣepaḥ snāyu.jālasya saṁrambha.stambha.vedanāḥ |
AHS1.28.005c/ snāyu.ge dur.haraṁ caitat sirādhmānaṁ sirāśrite || 5 || [Note: AHS1.28.005v/ 28.5cv snāva.ge dur.haraṁ caitat]
AHS1.28.006a/ sva.karma.guṇa.hāniḥ syāt srotasāṁ srotasi sthite |
AHS1.28.006c/ dhamanī.sthe 'nile raktaṁ phena.yuktam udīrayet || 6 || [Note: AHS1.28.006v/ 28.6dv phena.yuktam udīrayan]
AHS1.28.007a/ niryāti śabda.vān syāc ca hṛl.lāsaḥ sāṅga.vedanaḥ |
AHS1.28.007c/ saṅgharṣo bala.vān asthi.sandhi.prāpte 'sthi.pūrṇa.tā || 7 || [Note: AHS1.28.007v/ 28.7cv saṁharṣo bala.vān asthi.]
AHS1.28.008a/ naika.rūpā rujo 'sthi.sthe śophas tad.vac ca sandhi.ge |
AHS1.28.008c/ ceṣṭā.nivṛttiś ca bhaved āṭopaḥ koṣṭha.saṁśrite || 8 ||
[Page 152 ]
AHS1.28.009a/ ānāho 'nna.śakṛn.mūtra.darśanaṁ ca vraṇānane |
AHS1.28.009c/ vidyān marma.gataṁ śalyaṁ marma.viddhopalakṣaṇaiḥ || 9 ||
AHS1.28.010a/ yathā.svaṁ ca parisrāvais tvag.ādiṣu vibhāvayet |
AHS1.28.010c/ ruhyate śuddha.dehānām anuloma.sthitaṁ tu tat || 10 || [Note: AHS1.28.010v/ 28.10av yathā.yathaṁ parisrāvais]
AHS1.28.011a/ doṣa.kopābhighātādi.kṣobhād bhūyo 'pi bādhate |
AHS1.28.011c/ tvaṅ.naṣṭe yatra tatra syur abhyaṅga.sveda.mardanaiḥ || 11 ||
AHS1.28.012a/ rāga.rug.dāha.saṁrambhā yatra cājyaṁ vilīyate |
AHS1.28.012c/ āśu śuṣyati lepo vā tat.sthānaṁ śalya.vad vadet || 12 || [Note: AHS1.28.012v/ 28.12bv yatra vājyaṁ vilīyate 28.12cv āśuṣyati pralepo vā]
AHS1.28.013a/ māṁsa.praṇaṣṭaṁ saṁśuddhyā karśanāc chlatha.tāṁ gatam |
AHS1.28.013c/ kṣobhād rāgādibhiḥ śalyaṁ lakṣayet tad.vad eva ca || 13 || [Note: AHS1.28.013v/ 28.13bv karṣaṇāc chlatha.tāṁ gatam]
AHS1.28.014a/ peśy.asthi.sandhi.koṣṭheṣu naṣṭam asthiṣu lakṣayet |
AHS1.28.014c/ asthnām abhyañjana.sveda.bandha.pīḍana.mardanaiḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.28.015a/ prasāraṇākuñcanataḥ sandhi.naṣṭaṁ tathāsthi.vat |
AHS1.28.015c/ naṣṭe snāyu.sirā.sroto.dhamanīṣv a.same pathi || 15 ||
AHS1.28.016a/ aśva.yuktaṁ rathaṁ khaṇḍa.cakram āropya rogiṇam |
AHS1.28.016c/ śīghraṁ nayet tatas tasya saṁrambhāc chalyam ādiśet || 16 ||
AHS1.28.017a/ marma.naṣṭaṁ pṛthaṅ noktaṁ teṣāṁ māṁsādi.saṁśrayāt |
AHS1.28.017c/ sāmānyena sa.śalyaṁ tu kṣobhiṇyā kriyayā sa.ruk || 17 ||
AHS1.28.018a/ vṛttaṁ pṛthu catuṣ.koṇaṁ tri.puṭaṁ ca samāsataḥ |
AHS1.28.018c/ a.dṛśya.śalya.saṁsthānaṁ vraṇākṛtyā vibhāvayet || 18 ||
[Page 153 ]
AHS1.28.019a/ teṣām āharaṇopāyau pratilomānulomakau |
AHS1.28.019c/ arvācīna.parācīne nirharet tad.viparyayāt || 19 || [Note: AHS1.28.019v/ 28.19cv avācīna.parācīne]
AHS1.28.020a/ sukhāhāryaṁ yataś chittvā tatas tiryag.gataṁ haret |
AHS1.28.020c/ śalyaṁ na nirghātyam uraḥ.kakṣā.vaṅkṣaṇa.pārśva.gam || 20 ||
AHS1.28.021a/ pratilomam an.uttuṇḍaṁ chedyaṁ pṛthu.mukhaṁ ca yat |
AHS1.28.021c/ naivāhared vi.śalya.ghnaṁ naṣṭaṁ vā nir.upadravam || 21 ||
AHS1.28.022a/ athāharet kara.prāpyaṁ kareṇaivetarat punaḥ |
AHS1.28.022c/ dṛśyaṁ siṁhāhi.makara.varmi.karkaṭakānanaiḥ || 22 ||
AHS1.28.023a/ a.dṛśyaṁ vraṇa.saṁsthānād grahītuṁ śakyate yataḥ |
AHS1.28.023c/ kaṅka.bhṛṅgāhva.kurara.śarāri.vāyasānanaiḥ || 23 ||
AHS1.28.024a/ sandaṁśābhyāṁ tvag.ādi.sthaṁ tālābhyāṁ suṣiraṁ haret |
AHS1.28.024c/ suṣira.sthaṁ tu nalakaiḥ śeṣaṁ śeṣair yathā.yatham || 24 ||
AHS1.28.025a/ śastreṇa vā viśasyādau tato nir.lohitaṁ vraṇam |
AHS1.28.025c/ kṛtvā ghṛtena saṁsvedya baddhācārikam ādiśet || 25 || [Note: AHS1.28.025v/ 28.25dv baddhācārikam ācaret]
AHS1.28.026a/ sirā.snāyu.vilagnaṁ tu cālayitvā śalākayā |
AHS1.28.026c/ hṛdaye saṁsthitaṁ śalyaṁ trāsitasya himāmbunā || 26 || [Note: AHS1.28.026v/ 28.26av sirā.snāyu.vilagnaṁ ca 28.26av sirā.snāva.vilagnaṁ tu]
AHS1.28.027a/ tataḥ sthānāntaraṁ prāptaṁ āharet tad yathā.yatham |
AHS1.28.027c/ yathā.mārgaṁ dur.ākarṣam anyato 'py evam āharet || 27 ||
AHS1.28.028a/ asthi.daṣṭe naraṁ padbhyāṁ pīḍayitvā vinirharet |
AHS1.28.028c/ ity a.śakye su.balibhiḥ su.gṛhītasya kiṅkaraiḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS1.28.028v/ 28.28av asthi.dṛṣṭe naraṁ padbhyāṁ 28.28av asthi.naṣṭe naraṁ padbhyāṁ 28.28av asthi.lagnaṁ naraṁ padbhyāṁ 28.28av asthi.sthaṁ na paraṁ padbhyāṁ]
[Page 154 ]
AHS1.28.029a/ tathāpy a.śakye vāraṅgaṁ vakrī.kṛtya dhanur.jyayā |
AHS1.28.029c/ su.baddhaṁ vaktra.kaṭake badhnīyāt su.samāhitaḥ || 29 ||
AHS1.28.030a/ su.saṁyatasya pañcāṅgyā vājinaḥ kaśayātha tam |
AHS1.28.030c/ tāḍayed iti mūrdhānaṁ vegenonnamayan yathā || 30 || [Note: AHS1.28.030v/ 28.30dv vegenonnamayed yathā]
AHS1.28.031a/ uddharec chalyam evaṁ vā śākhāyāṁ kalpayet taroḥ |
AHS1.28.031c/ baddhvā dur.bala.vāraṅgaṁ kuśābhiḥ śalyam āharet || 31 ||
AHS1.28.032a/ śvayathu.grasta.vāraṅgaṁ śopham utpīḍya yuktitaḥ |
AHS1.28.032c/ mudgarāhatayā nāḍyā nirghātyottuṇḍitaṁ haret || 32 ||
AHS1.28.033a/ tair eva cānayen mārgam a.mārgottuṇḍitaṁ tu yat |
AHS1.28.033c/ mṛditvā karṇināṁ karṇaṁ nāḍy.āsyena nigṛhya vā || 33 || [Note: AHS1.28.033v/ 28.33av tenaiva vā nayen mārgam 28.33bv a.mārgottuṇḍitaṁ ca yat]
AHS1.28.034a/ ayas.kāntena niṣ.karṇaṁ vivṛtāsyam ṛju.sthitam |
AHS1.28.034c/ pakvāśaya.gataṁ śalyaṁ virekeṇa vinirharet || 34 ||
AHS1.28.035a/ duṣṭa.vāta.viṣa.stanya.rakta.toyādi cūṣaṇaiḥ |
AHS1.28.035c/ kaṇṭha.sroto.gate śalye sūtraṁ kaṇṭhe praveśayet || 35 ||
AHS1.28.036a/ bisenātte tataḥ śalye bisaṁ sūtraṁ samaṁ haret |
AHS1.28.036c/ nāḍyāgni.tāpitāṁ kṣiptvā śalākām ap.sthirī.kṛtām || 36 || [Note: AHS1.28.036v/ 28.36bv jatu.digdham a.jātuṣam]
AHS1.28.037a/ ānayej jātuṣaṁ kaṇṭhāj jatu.digdhām a.jātuṣam |
AHS1.28.037c/ keśondukena pītena dravaiḥ kaṇṭakam ākṣipet || 37 || [Note: AHS1.28.037v/ 28.37bv jatu.digdham a.jātuṣam 28.37cv keśāṇḍakena pītena 28.37cv keśāṇḍukena pītena 28.37cv keśoṇḍukena pītena]
AHS1.28.038a/ sahasā sūtra.baddhena vamatas tena cetarat |
AHS1.28.038c/ a.śakyaṁ mukha.nāsābhyām āhartuṁ parato nudet || 38 ||
[Page 155 ]
AHS1.28.039a/ ap.pāna.skandha.ghātābhyāṁ grāsa.śalyaṁ praveśayet |
AHS1.28.039c/ sūkṣmākṣi.vraṇa.śalyāni kṣauma.vāla.jalair haret || 39 ||
AHS1.28.040a/ apāṁ pūrṇaṁ vidhunuyād avāk.śirasam āyatam |
AHS1.28.040c/ vāmayec cā.mukhaṁ bhasma.rāśau vā nikhanen naram || 40 || [Note: AHS1.28.040v/ 28.40cv vāmayed ā.mukhaṁ bhasma. 28.40cv vāmayed vā.mukhaṁ bhasma. 8.40cv vāmayed vā sukhaṁ bhasma.]
AHS1.28.041a/ karṇe 'mbu.pūrṇe hastena mathitvā taila.vāriṇī |
AHS1.28.041c/ kṣiped adho.mukhaṁ karṇaṁ hanyād vācūṣayeta vā || 41 || [Note: AHS1.28.041v/ 28.41dv hanyād vācūṣayet tadā 28.41dv hanyād vācūṣayeta ca]
AHS1.28.042a/ kīṭe sroto.gate karṇaṁ pūrayed lavaṇāmbunā |
AHS1.28.042c/ śuktena vā sukhoṣṇena mṛte kleda.haro vidhiḥ || 42 ||
AHS1.28.043a/ jātuṣaṁ hema.rūpyādi.dhātu.jaṁ ca cira.sthitam |
AHS1.28.043c/ ūṣmaṇā prāya.śaḥ śalyaṁ deha.jena vilīyate || 43 ||
AHS1.28.044a/ mṛd.veṇu.dāru.śṛṅgāsthi.danta.vālopalāni na |
AHS1.28.044c/ viṣāṇa.veṇv.ayas.tāla.dāru.śalyaṁ cirād api || 44 || [Note: AHS1.28.044v/ 28.44bv .danta.vālopalādi na]
AHS1.28.045a/ prāyo nirbhujyate tad dhi pacaty āśu palāsṛjī |
AHS1.28.045c/ śalye māṁsāvagāḍhe cet sa deśo na vidahyate || 45 || [Note: AHS1.28.045v/ 28.45cv śalye māṁsāvagāḍhe ca]
AHS1.28.046a/ tatas taṁ mardana.sveda.śuddhi.karṣaṇa.bṛṁhaṇaiḥ |
AHS1.28.046c/ tīkṣṇopanāha.pānānna.ghana.śastra.padāṅkanaiḥ || 46 || [Note: AHS1.28.046v/ 28.46bv .śuddhi.karśana.bṛṁhaṇaiḥ]
AHS1.28.047a/ pācayitvā harec chalyaṁ pāṭanaiṣaṇa.bhedanaiḥ |
AHS1.28.047c/ śalya.pradeśa.yantrāṇām avekṣya bahu.rūpa.tām || 47 ||
AHS1.28.047ūab/ tais tair upāyair mati.mān śalyaṁ vidyāt tathāharet || 47ū̆ab || [Note: AHS1.28.047ūv/ 28.47ū̆bv śalyaṁ vidyāt tato haret]

1.29. Chapter 29 :: Athaśastrakarmavidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 165-171] [Page 156 ]
AHS1.29.001a/ vraṇaḥ sañjāyate prāyaḥ pākāc chvayathu.pūrvakāt |
AHS1.29.001c/ tam evopacaret tasmād rakṣan pākaṁ prayatnataḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.29.002a/ su.śīta.lepa.sekāsra.mokṣa.saṁśodhanādibhiḥ |
AHS1.29.002c/ śopho 'lpo 'lpoṣma.ruk sāmaḥ sa.varṇaḥ kaṭhinaḥ sthiraḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS1.29.002v/ 29.2av su.śīta.lepa.sekāsṛṅ. 29.2cv śopho 'lpo 'lpoṣma.ruk cāmaḥ]
AHS1.29.003a/ pacyamāno vi.varṇas tu rāgī vastir ivātataḥ |
AHS1.29.003c/ sphuṭatīva sa.nistodaḥ sāṅga.marda.vijṛmbhikaḥ || 3 ||
AHS1.29.004a/ saṁrambhā.ruci.dāhoṣā.tṛḍ.jvarā.nidra.tānvitaḥ |
AHS1.29.004c/ styānaṁ viṣyandayaty ājyaṁ vraṇa.vat sparśanā.sahaḥ || 4 ||
AHS1.29.005a/ pakve 'lpa.vega.tā mlāniḥ pāṇḍu.tā vali.sambhavaḥ |
AHS1.29.005c/ nāmo 'nteṣūnnatir madhye kaṇḍū.śophādi.mārdavam || 5 || [Note: AHS1.29.005v/ 29.5av pakve 'lpa.vega.tā glāniḥ 29.5av pakve 'lpa.vedanā glāniḥ 29.5av pakve 'lpa.vedanā mlāniḥ 29.5av pakve 'lpā vedanā mlāniḥ]
AHS1.29.006a/ spṛṣṭe pūyasya sañcāro bhaved vastāv ivāmbhasaḥ |
AHS1.29.006c/ śūlaṁ narte 'nilād dāhaḥ pittāc chophaḥ kaphodayāt || 6 ||
AHS1.29.007a/ rāgo raktāc ca pākaḥ syād ato doṣaiḥ sa.śoṇitaiḥ |
AHS1.29.007c/ pāke 'tivṛtte suṣiras tanu.tvag.doṣa.bhakṣitaḥ || 7 ||
AHS1.29.008a/ valībhir ācitaḥ śyāvaḥ śīryamāṇa.tanū.ruhaḥ |
AHS1.29.008c/ kapha.jeṣu tu śopheṣu gambhīraṁ pākam ety asṛk || 8 || [Note: AHS1.29.008v/ 29.8av valībhir ācitaḥ śyāmaḥ]
AHS1.29.009a/ pakva.liṅgaṁ tato '.spaṣṭaṁ yatra syāc chīta.śopha.tā |
AHS1.29.009c/ tvak.sāvarṇyaṁ rujo 'lpa.tvaṁ ghana.sparśa.tvam aśma.vat || 9 ||
AHS1.29.010a/ rakta.pākam iti brūyāt taṁ prājño mukta.saṁśayaḥ |
AHS1.29.010c/ alpa.sat.tve '.bale bāle pākād vāty.artham uddhate || 10 || [Note: AHS1.29.010v/ 29.10dv pākād aty.artham uddhate 29.10dv pāke vāty.artham uddhate]
[Page 157 ]
AHS1.29.011a/ dāraṇaṁ marma.sandhy.ādi.sthite cānya.tra pāṭanam |
AHS1.29.011c/ āma.cchede sirā.snāyu.vyāpado 'sṛg.ati.srutiḥ || 11 ||
AHS1.29.012a/ rujo 'ti.vṛddhir daraṇaṁ visarpo vā kṣatodbhavaḥ |
AHS1.29.012c/ tiṣṭhann antaḥ punaḥ pūyaḥ sirā.snāyv.asṛg.āmiṣam || 12 ||
AHS1.29.013a/ vivṛddho dahati kṣipraṁ tṛṇolapam ivānalaḥ |
AHS1.29.013c/ yaś chinatty āmam a.jñānād yaś ca pakvam upekṣate || 13 || [Note: AHS1.29.013v/ 29.13bv tṛṇolupam ivānalaḥ 29.13bv tṛṇopalam ivānalaḥ 29.13bv tṛṇoccayam ivānalaḥ]
AHS1.29.014a/ śva.pacāv iva vijñeyau tāv a.niścita.kāriṇau |
AHS1.29.014c/ prāk śastra.karmaṇaś ceṣṭaṁ bhojayed annam āturam || 14 || [Note: AHS1.29.014v/ 29.14av śva.pacāv iva jānīyāt 29.14bv dvāv a.niścita.kāriṇau 29.14cv prāk śastra.karmaṇaḥ śreṣṭhaṁ]
AHS1.29.015a/ pāna.paṁ pāyayen madyaṁ tīkṣṇaṁ yo vedanā.kṣamaḥ |
AHS1.29.015c/ na mūrchaty anna.saṁyogān mattaḥ śastraṁ na budhyate || 15 ||
AHS1.29.016a/ anya.tra mūḍha.garbhāśma.mukha.rogodarāturāt |
AHS1.29.016c/ athāhṛtopakaraṇaṁ vaidyaḥ prāṅ.mukham āturam || 16 || [Note: AHS1.29.016v/ 29.16cv athāhṛtopakaraṇo]
AHS1.29.017a/ sammukho yantrayitvāśu nyasyen marmādi varjayan |
AHS1.29.017c/ anulomaṁ su.niśitaṁ śastram ā.pūya.darśanāt || 17 || [Note: AHS1.29.017v/ 29.17av sammukhaṁ yantrayitvāśu]
AHS1.29.018a/ sakṛd evāharec tac ca pāke tu su.mahaty api |
AHS1.29.018c/ pāṭayed dvy.aṅgulaṁ samyag dvy.aṅgula.try.aṅgulāntaram || 18 ||
AHS1.29.019a/ eṣitvā samyag eṣiṇyā paritaḥ su.nirūpitam |
AHS1.29.019c/ aṅgulī.nāla.vālair vā yathā.deśaṁ yathāśayam || 19 ||
AHS1.29.020a/ yato gatāṁ gatiṁ vidyād utsaṅgo yatra yatra ca |
AHS1.29.020c/ tatra tatra vraṇaṁ kuryāt su.vibhaktaṁ nir.āśayam || 20 || [Note: AHS1.29.020v/ 29.20bv utsaṅgaṁ yatra yatra ca]
[Page 158 ]
AHS1.29.021a/ āyataṁ ca viśālaṁ ca yathā doṣo na tiṣṭhati |
AHS1.29.021c/ śauryam āśu.kriyā tīkṣṇaṁ śastram a.sveda.vepathū || 21 || [Note: AHS1.29.021v/ 29.21cv śauryam āśu.kriyā tīkṣṇa. 29.21dv .śastram a.sveda.vepathū]
AHS1.29.022a/ a.sammohaś ca vaidyasya śastra.karmaṇi śasyate |
AHS1.29.022c/ tiryak chindyāl lalāṭa.bhrū.danta.veṣṭaka.jatruṇi || 22 ||
AHS1.29.023a/ kukṣi.kakṣākṣi.kūṭauṣṭha.kapola.gala.vaṅkṣaṇe |
AHS1.29.023c/ anya.tra cchedanāt tiryak sirā.snāyu.vipāṭanam || 23 ||
AHS1.29.024a/ śastre 'vacārite vāgbhiḥ śītāmbhobhiś ca rogiṇam |
AHS1.29.024c/ āśvāsya parito 'ṅgulyā paripīḍya vraṇaṁ tataḥ || 24 ||
AHS1.29.025a/ kṣālayitvā kaṣāyeṇa plotenāmbho 'panīya ca |
AHS1.29.025c/ guggulv.aguru.siddhārtha.hiṅgu.sarja.rasānvitaiḥ || 25 ||
AHS1.29.026a/ dhūpayec paṭu.ṣaḍgranthā.nimba.pattrair ghṛta.plutaiḥ |
AHS1.29.026c/ tila.kalkājya.madhubhir yathā.svaṁ bheṣajena ca || 26 ||
AHS1.29.027a/ digdhāṁ vartiṁ tato dadyāt tair evācchādayec ca tām |
AHS1.29.027c/ ghṛtāktaiḥ saktubhiś cordhvaṁ ghanāṁ kavalikāṁ tataḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS1.29.027v/ 29.27bv tair evācchādayec ca tam]
AHS1.29.028a/ nidhāya yuktyā badhnīyāt paṭṭena su.samāhitam |
AHS1.29.028c/ pārśve savye 'pa.savye vā nādhas.tān naiva copari || 28 || [Note: AHS1.29.028v/ 29.28bv paṭṭena su.samāhitaḥ]
AHS1.29.029a/ śuci.sūkṣma.dṛḍhāḥ paṭṭāḥ kavalyaḥ sa.vikeśikāḥ |
AHS1.29.029c/ dhūpitā mṛdavaḥ ślakṣṇā nir.valīkā vraṇe hitāḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS1.29.029v/ 29.29bv kavalyaḥ su.vikeśikāḥ]
AHS1.29.030a/ kurvītān.antaraṁ tasya rakṣāṁ rakṣo.niṣiddhaye |
AHS1.29.030c/ baliṁ copaharet tebhyaḥ sadā mūrdhnā ca dhārayet || 30 || [Note: AHS1.29.030v/ 29.30av kurvītān.antaraṁ samyag. 29.30bv rakṣāṁ rakṣo.nivṛttaye 29.30bv .rakṣāṁ rakṣo.niṣiddhaye 29.30dv sadā mūrdhnāvadhārayet]
[Page 159 ]
AHS1.29.031a/ lakṣmīṁ guhām atiguhāṁ jaṭilāṁ brahmacāriṇīm |
AHS1.29.031c/ vacāṁ chattrām aticchattrāṁ dūrvāṁ siddhārthakān api || 31 ||
AHS1.29.032a/ tataḥ sneha.dinehoktaṁ tasyācāraṁ samādiśet |
AHS1.29.032c/ divā.svapno vraṇe kaṇḍū.rāga.ruk.śopha.pūya.kṛt || 32 || [Note: AHS1.29.032v/ 29.32av tataḥ sneha.vidhānoktaṁ]
AHS1.29.033a/ strīṇāṁ tu smṛti.saṁsparśa.darśanaiś calita.srute |
AHS1.29.033c/ śukre vyavāya.jān doṣān a.saṁsarge 'py avāpnuyāt || 33 ||
AHS1.29.033+(1)a/ vraṇe śvayathur āyāsāt sa ca rāgaś ca jāgarāt |
AHS1.29.033+(1)c/ tau ca ruk ca divā.svāpāt tāś ca mṛtyuś ca maithunāt || 33+(1) ||
AHS1.29.034a/ bhojanaṁ ca yathā.sātmyaṁ yava.godhūma.ṣaṣṭikāḥ |
AHS1.29.034c/ masūra.mudga.tubarī.jīvantī.suniṣaṇṇakāḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS1.29.034v/ 29.34av bhojanaṁ tu yathā.sātmyaṁ]
AHS1.29.035a/ bāla.mūlaka.vārtāka.taṇḍulīyaka.vāstukam |
AHS1.29.035c/ kāravellaka.karkoṭa.paṭola.kaṭukā.phalam || 35 ||
AHS1.29.036a/ saindhavaṁ dāḍimaṁ dhātrī ghṛtaṁ tapta.himaṁ jalam |
AHS1.29.036c/ jīrṇa.śāly.odanaṁ snigdham alpam uṣṇodakottaram || 36 || [Note: AHS1.29.036v/ 29.36dv alpam uṣṇaṁ dravottaram]
AHS1.29.037a/ bhuñjāno jāṅgalair māṁsaiḥ śīghraṁ vraṇam apohati |
AHS1.29.037c/ aśitaṁ mātrayā kāle pathyaṁ yāti jarāṁ sukham || 37 ||
AHS1.29.038a/ a.jīrṇāt tv anilādīnāṁ vibhramo bala.vān bhavet |
AHS1.29.038c/ tataḥ śopha.rujā.pāka.dāhānāhān avāpnuyāt || 38 || [Note: AHS1.29.038v/ 29.38av a.jīrṇe tv anilādīnāṁ]
AHS1.29.039a/ navaṁ dhānyaṁ tilān māṣān madyaṁ māṁsam a.jāṅgalam |
AHS1.29.039c/ kṣīrekṣu.vikṛtīr amlaṁ lavaṇaṁ kaṭukaṁ tyajet || 39 || [Note: AHS1.29.039v/ 29.39bv madyaṁ māṁsaṁ tv a.jāṅgalam]
[Page 160 ]
AHS1.29.040a/ yac cānyad api viṣṭambhi vidāhi guru śītalam |
AHS1.29.040c/ vargo 'yaṁ nava.dhānyādir vraṇinaḥ sarva.doṣa.kṛt || 40 || [Note: AHS1.29.040v/ 29.40dv vraṇināṁ sarva.doṣa.kṛt]
AHS1.29.041a/ madyaṁ tīkṣṇoṣṇa.rūkṣāmlam āśu vyāpādayed vraṇam |
AHS1.29.041c/ vālośīraiś ca vījyeta na cainaṁ parighaṭṭayet || 41 || [Note: AHS1.29.041v/ 29.41cv bālośīraiś ca vījyeta]
AHS1.29.042a/ na tuden na ca kaṇḍūyec ceṣṭamānaś ca pālayet |
AHS1.29.042c/ snigdha.vṛddha.dvi.jātīnāṁ kathāḥ śṛṇvan manaḥ.priyāḥ || 42 || [Note: AHS1.29.042v/ 29.42bv chayānaḥ paripālayet 29.42cv siddha.vṛddha.dvi.jātīnāṁ]
AHS1.29.043a/ āśā.vān vyādhi.mokṣāya kṣipraṁ vraṇam apohati |
AHS1.29.043c/ tṛtīye 'hni punaḥ kuryād vraṇa.karma ca pūrva.vat || 43 ||
AHS1.29.044a/ prakṣālanādi divase dvitīye nācaret tathā |
AHS1.29.044c/ tīvra.vyatho vigrathitaś cirāt saṁrohati vraṇaḥ || 44 ||
AHS1.29.045a/ snigdhāṁ rūkṣāṁ ślathāṁ gāḍhāṁ dur.nyastāṁ ca vikeśikām |
AHS1.29.045c/ vraṇe na dadyāt kalkaṁ vā snehāt kledo vivardhate || 45 ||
AHS1.29.046a/ māṁsa.cchedo 'ti.rug.raukṣyād daraṇaṁ śoṇitāgamaḥ |
AHS1.29.046c/ ślathāti.gāḍha.dur.nyāsair vraṇa.vartmāvagharṣaṇam || 46 || [Note: AHS1.29.046v/ 29.46cv ślathāti.gāḍha.dur.nyastair]
AHS1.29.047a/ sa.pūti.māṁsaṁ sotsaṅgaṁ sa.gatiṁ pūya.garbhiṇam |
AHS1.29.047c/ vraṇaṁ viśodhayec chīghraṁ sthitā hy antar vikeśikā || 47 ||
AHS1.29.048a/ vy.amlaṁ tu pāṭitaṁ śophaṁ pācanaiḥ samupācaret |
AHS1.29.048c/ bhojanair upanāhaiś ca nāti.vraṇa.virodhibhiḥ || 48 || [Note: AHS1.29.048v/ 29.48dv nāti.vraṇa.viśodhibhiḥ]
AHS1.29.049a/ sadyaḥ sadyo.vraṇān sīvyed vivṛtān abhighāta.jān |
AHS1.29.049c/ medo.jāl̐ likhitān granthīn hrasvāḥ pālīś ca karṇayoḥ || 49 ||
[Page 161 ]
AHS1.29.050a/ śiro.'kṣi.kūṭa.nāsauṣṭha.gaṇḍa.karṇoru.bāhuṣu |
AHS1.29.050c/ grīvā.lalāṭa.muṣka.sphiṅ.meḍhra.pāyūdarādiṣu || 50 ||
AHS1.29.051a/ gambhīreṣu pradeśeṣu māṁsaleṣv a.caleṣu ca |
AHS1.29.051c/ na tu vaṅkṣaṇa.kakṣādāv alpa.māṁse cale vraṇān || 51 || [Note: AHS1.29.051v/ 29.51dv alpa.māṁsa.cale vraṇān 29.51dv alpa.māṁsa.calān vraṇān]
AHS1.29.052a/ vāyu.nirvāhiṇaḥ śalya.garbhān kṣāra.viṣāgni.jān |
AHS1.29.052c/ sīvyec calāsthi.śuṣkāsra.tṛṇa.romāpanīya tu || 52 || [Note: AHS1.29.052v/ 29.52dv .tṛṇa.romāpanīya ca]
AHS1.29.053a/ pralambi māṁsaṁ vicchinnaṁ niveśya sva.niveśane |
AHS1.29.053c/ sandhy.asthi ca sthite rakte snāyvā sūtreṇa valkalaiḥ || 53 || [Note: AHS1.29.053v/ 29.53cv sandhy.asthy avasthite rakte 29.53dv snāvnā sūtreṇa valkalaiḥ]
AHS1.29.054a/ sīvyen na dūre nāsanne gṛhṇan nālpaṁ na vā bahu |
AHS1.29.054c/ sāntvayitvā tataś cārtaṁ vraṇe madhu.ghṛta.drutaiḥ || 54 || [Note: AHS1.29.054v/ 29.54dv vraṇe madhu.ghṛta.plutaiḥ]
AHS1.29.055a/ añjana.kṣauma.ja.maṣī.phalinī.śallakī.phalaiḥ | [Note: AHS1.29.055v/ 29.54bv gṛhṇan sv.alpaṁ na vā bahu 29.54cv śāntayitvā tataś cārtaṁ 29.54cv sāntayitvā tataś cārtaṁ]
AHS1.29.055c/ sa.lodhra.madhukair digdhe yuñjyād bandhādi pūrva.vat || 55 ||
AHS1.29.056a/ vraṇo niḥ.śoṇitauṣṭho yaḥ kiñ.cid evāvalikhya tam |
AHS1.29.056c/ sañjāta.rudhiraṁ sīvyet sandhānaṁ hy asya śoṇitam || 56 ||
AHS1.29.057a/ bandhanāni tu deśādīn vīkṣya yuñjīta teṣu ca | [Note: AHS1.29.057v/ 29.56bv kiñ.cid eva vilikhya tam]
AHS1.29.057c/ āvikājina.kauśeyam uṣṇaṁ kṣaumaṁ tu śītalam || 57 ||
AHS1.29.058a/ śītoṣṇaṁ tulā.santāna.kārpāsa.snāyu.valka.jam |
AHS1.29.058c/ tāmrāyas.trapu.sīsāni vraṇe medaḥ.kaphādhike || 58 || [Note: AHS1.29.058v/ 29.58bv .kārpāsa.snāva.valka.jam]
AHS1.29.059a/ bhaṅge ca yuñjyāt phalakaṁ carma.valka.kuśādi ca |
AHS1.29.059c/ sva.nāmānugatākārā bandhās tu daśa pañca ca || 59 ||
[Page 162 ]
AHS1.29.060a/ kośa.svastika.muttolī.cīna.dāmānuvellitam |
AHS1.29.060c/ khaṭvā.vibandha.sthagikā.vitānotsaṅga.goṣ.phaṇāḥ || 60 || [Note: AHS1.29.060v/ 29.60dv .vitānotsaṅga.go.phaṇāḥ]
AHS1.29.061a/ yamakaṁ maṇḍalākhyaṁ ca pañcāṅgī ceti yojayet |
AHS1.29.061c/ yo yatra su.niviṣṭaḥ syāt taṁ teṣāṁ tatra buddhi.mān || 61 || [Note: AHS1.29.061v/ 29.61cv yo yatra sanniviṣṭaḥ syāt]
AHS1.29.061.1+(1)a/ vidadhyāt teṣu teṣv eva kośam aṅguli.parvasu |
AHS1.29.061.1+(1)c/ svastikaṁ karṇa.kakṣādi.staneṣūktaṁ ca sandhiṣu || 61.1+(1) ||
AHS1.29.061.1+(2)a/ muttolīṁ meḍhra.grīvādau yuñjyāc cīnam apāṅgayoḥ |
AHS1.29.061.1+(2)c/ sambādhe 'ṅge tathā dāma śākhāsv evānuvellitam || 61.1+(2) ||
AHS1.29.061.1+(3)a/ khaṭvāṁ gaṇḍe hanau śaṅkhe vibandhaṁ pṛṣṭhakodare |
AHS1.29.061.1+(3)c/ aṅguṣṭhāṅgulimeḍhrāgre sthagikām antra.vṛddhiṣu || 61.1+(3) ||
AHS1.29.061.1+(4)a/ vitānaṁ pṛthulāṅgādau tathā śirasi cerayet |
AHS1.29.061.1+(4)c/ vilambini tathotsaṅgaṁ nāsauṣṭha.cibukādiṣu || 61.1+(4) ||
AHS1.29.061.1+(5)a/ goṣ.phaṇaṁ sandhiṣu tathā yamakaṁ yamike vraṇe |
AHS1.29.061.1+(5)c/ vṛtte 'ṅge maṇḍalākhyaṁ ca pañcāṅgīṁ cordhva.jatruṣu || 61.1+(5) ||
AHS1.29.062a/ badhnīyād gāḍham ūru.sphik.kakṣā.vaṅkṣaṇa.mūrdhasu |
AHS1.29.062c/ śākhā.vadana.karṇoraḥ.pṛṣṭha.pārśva.galodare || 62 ||
AHS1.29.063a/ samaṁ mehana.muṣke ca netre sandhiṣu ca ślatham |
AHS1.29.063c/ badhnīyāc chithila.sthāne vāta.śleṣmodbhave samam || 63 ||
AHS1.29.064a/ gāḍham eva sama.sthāne bhṛśaṁ gāḍhaṁ tad.āśaye |
AHS1.29.064c/ śīte vasante 'pi ca tau mokṣaṇīyau try.ahāt try.ahāt || 64 || [Note: AHS1.29.064v/ 29.64bv bhṛśaṁ gāḍhaṁ tad.āśraye 29.64cv śīte vasante ca tathā 29.64dv mokṣayet tau try.ahāt try.ahāt 29.64dv mokṣaṇīyas try.ahāt try.ahāt]
[Page 163 ]
AHS1.29.065a/ pitta.raktotthayor bandho gāḍha.sthāne samo mataḥ |
AHS1.29.065c/ sama.sthāne ślatho naiva śithilasyāśaye tathā || 65 ||
AHS1.29.066a/ sāyaṁ prātas tayor mokṣo grīṣme śaradi ceṣyate |
AHS1.29.066c/ a.baddho daṁśa.maśaka.śīta.vātādi.pīḍitaḥ || 66 ||
AHS1.29.067a/ duṣṭī.bhavec ciraṁ cātra na tiṣṭhet sneha.bheṣajam |
AHS1.29.067c/ kṛcchreṇa śuddhiṁ rūḍhiṁ vā yāti rūḍho vi.varṇa.tām || 67 ||
AHS1.29.068a/ baddhas tu cūrṇito bhagno viśliṣṭaḥ pāṭito 'pi vā |
AHS1.29.068c/ chinna.snāyu.siro 'py āśu sukhaṁ saṁrohati vraṇaḥ || 68 ||
AHS1.29.069a/ utthāna.śayanādyāsu sarvehāsu na pīḍyate |
AHS1.29.069c/ udvṛttauṣṭhaḥ samutsanno viṣamaḥ kaṭhino 'ti.ruk || 69 || [Note: AHS1.29.069v/ 29.69bv sarvehāsu na pīḍayet 29.69cv uddhṛtauṣṭhaḥ samutsanno]
AHS1.29.070a/ samo mṛdur a.ruk śīghraṁ vraṇaḥ śudhyati rohati |
AHS1.29.070c/ sthirāṇām alpa.māṁsānāṁ raukṣyād an.uparohatām || 70 ||
AHS1.29.071a/ pracchādyam auṣadhaṁ pattrair yathā.doṣaṁ yathartu ca |
AHS1.29.071c/ a.jīrṇa.taruṇāc chidraiḥ samantāt su.niveśitaiḥ || 71 || [Note: AHS1.29.071v/ 29.71cv a.jīrṇā.taruṇāc chidraiḥ]
AHS1.29.072a/ dhautair a.karkaśaiḥ kṣīri.bhūrjārjuna.kadamba.jaiḥ |
AHS1.29.072c/ kuṣṭhinām agni.dagdhānāṁ piṭikā madhu.mehinām || 72 ||
AHS1.29.073a/ karṇikāś conduru.viṣe kṣāra.dagdhā viṣānvitāḥ |
AHS1.29.073c/ bandhanīyā na māṁs.pāke guda.pāke ca dāruṇe || 73 || [Note: AHS1.29.073v/ 29.73cv na māṁs.pāke ca badhnīyād 29.73cv māṁsa.pāke na badhnīyād]
AHS1.29.074a/ śīryamāṇāḥ sa.rug.dāhāḥ śophāvasthā.visarpiṇaḥ |
AHS1.29.074c/ a.rakṣayā vraṇe yasmin makṣikā nikṣipet kṛmīn || 74 ||
[Page 164 ]
AHS1.29.075a/ te bhakṣayantaḥ kurvanti rujā.śophāsra.saṁsravān |
AHS1.29.075c/ surasādiṁ prayuñjīta tatra dhāvana.pūraṇe || 75 || [Note: AHS1.29.075v/ 29.75bv rujā.śophāsra.visrutīḥ]
AHS1.29.076a/ saptaparṇa.karañjārka.nimba.rājādana.tvacaḥ |
AHS1.29.076c/ go.mūtra.kalkito lepaḥ sekaḥ kṣārāmbunā hitaḥ || 76 || [Note: AHS1.29.076v/ 29.76cv go.mūtra.kalkitālepaḥ]
AHS1.29.077a/ pracchādya māṁsa.peśyā vā vraṇaṁ tān āśu nirharet |
AHS1.29.077c/ na cainaṁ tvaramāṇo 'ntaḥ sa.doṣam uparohayet || 77 ||
AHS1.29.078a/ so 'lpenāpy apacāreṇa bhūyo vikurute yataḥ |
AHS1.29.078c/ rūḍhe 'py a.jīrṇa.vyāyāma.vyavāyādīn vivarjayet || 78 ||
AHS1.29.079a/ harṣaṁ krodhaṁ bhayaṁ cāpi yāvad ā.sthairya.sambhavāt |
AHS1.29.079c/ ādareṇānuvartyo 'yaṁ māsān ṣaṭ sapta vā vidhiḥ || 79 || [Note: AHS1.29.079v/ 29.79av harṣaṁ krodhaṁ bhayaṁ vāpi]
AHS1.29.080a/ utpadyamānāsu ca tāsu tāsu vārtāsu doṣādi.balānusārī |
AHS1.29.080c/ tais tair upāyaiḥ prayataś cikitsed ālocayan vistaram uttaroktam || 80 ||

1.30. Chapter 30 :: Atha kṣārāgnikarmavidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 171-176]
AHS1.30.001a/ sarva.śastrānu.śastrāṇāṁ kṣāraḥ śreṣṭho bahūni yat |
AHS1.30.001c/ chedya.bhedyādi.karmāṇi kurute viṣameṣv api || 1 ||
AHS1.30.002a/ duḥkhāvacārya.śāstreṣu tena siddhim a.yātsu ca |
AHS1.30.002c/ ati.kṛcchreṣu rogeṣu yac ca pāne 'pi yujyate || 2 || [Note: AHS1.30.002v/ 30.2bv tena siddhiṁ na yātsu ca]
AHS1.30.003a/ sa peyo 'rśo.'gni.sādāśma.gulmodara.garādiṣu |
AHS1.30.003c/ yojyaḥ sākṣān maṣa.śvitra.bāhyārśaḥ.kuṣṭha.suptiṣu || 3 ||
AHS1.30.004a/ bhagandarārbuda.granthi.duṣṭa.nāḍī.vraṇādiṣu |
AHS1.30.004c/ na tūbhayo 'pi yoktavyaḥ pitte rakte cale '.bale || 4 || [Note: AHS1.30.004v/ 30.4av bhagandarāpacī.granthi. 30.4dv pitte rakte bale '.bale]
[Page 165 ]
AHS1.30.005a/ jvare 'tīsāre hṛn.mūrdha.roge pāṇḍv.āmaye '.rucau |
AHS1.30.005c/ timire kṛta.saṁśuddhau śvayathau sarva.gātra.ge || 5 || [Note: AHS1.30.005v/ 30.5dv śvayathau sarva.gātra.je]
AHS1.30.006a/ bhīru.garbhiṇy.ṛtu.matī.prodvṛtta.phala.yoniṣu |
AHS1.30.006c/ a.jīrṇe 'nne śiśau vṛddhe dhamanī.sandhi.marmasu || 6 ||
AHS1.30.007a/ taruṇāsthi.sirā.snāyu.sevanī.gala.nābhiṣu |
AHS1.30.007c/ deśe 'lpa.māṁse vṛṣaṇa.meḍhra.sroto.nakhāntare || 7 || [Note: AHS1.30.007v/ 30.7cv deśe 'lpa.māṁse vṛṣaṇe 30.7dv meḍhre sroto.nakhāntare]
AHS1.30.008a/ vartma.rogād ṛte 'kṣṇoś ca śīta.varṣoṣṇa.dur.dine |
AHS1.30.008c/ kāla.muṣkaka.śamyāka.kadalī.pāribhadrakān || 8 ||
AHS1.30.009a/ aśvakarṇa.mahāvṛkṣa.palāśāsphota.vṛkṣakān |
AHS1.30.009c/ indravṛkṣārka.pūtīka.naktamālāśvamārakān || 9 ||
AHS1.30.010a/ kākajaṅghām apāmārgam agnimanthāgni.tilvakān |
AHS1.30.010c/ sārdrān sa.mūla.śākhādīn khaṇḍa.śaḥ parikalpitān || 10 ||
AHS1.30.011a/ kośātakīs catasraś ca śūkaṁ nālaṁ yavasya ca |
AHS1.30.011c/ nivāte nicayī.kṛtya pṛthak tāni śilā.tale || 11 || [Note: AHS1.30.011v/ 30.11bv śūka.nālaṁ yavasya ca]
AHS1.30.012a/ prakṣipya muṣkaka.caye sudhāśmāni ca dīpayet |
AHS1.30.012c/ tatas tilānāṁ kutalair dagdhvāgnau vigate pṛthak || 12 || [Note: AHS1.30.012v/ 30.12cv tatas tilānāṁ kutilair 30.12cv tatas tilānāṁ kuntālair]
AHS1.30.013a/ kṛtvā sudhāśmanāṁ bhasma droṇaṁ tv itara.bhasmanaḥ |
AHS1.30.013c/ muṣkakottaram ādāya praty.ekaṁ jala.mūtrayoḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS1.30.013v/ 30.13bv droṇaṁ cetara.bhasmanaḥ]
AHS1.30.014a/ gālayed ardha.bhāreṇa mahatā vāsasā ca tat |
AHS1.30.014c/ yāvat picchila.raktācchas tīkṣṇo jātas tadā ca tam || 14 ||
[Page 166 ]
AHS1.30.015a/ gṛhītvā kṣāra.niṣyandaṁ pacel lauhyāṁ vighaṭṭayan |
AHS1.30.015c/ pacyamāne tatas tasmiṁs tāḥ sudhā.bhasma.śarkarāḥ || 15 ||
AHS1.30.016a/ śuktīḥ kṣīra.pakaṁ śaṅkha.nābhīś cāyasa.bhājane |
AHS1.30.016c/ kṛtvāgni.varṇān bahu.śaḥ kṣārotthe kuḍavonmite || 16 || [Note: AHS1.30.016v/ 30.16bv nnābhīṁś cāyasa.bhājane 30.16cv kṣārācche kuḍavonmite]
AHS1.30.017a/ nirvāpya piṣṭvā tenaiva pratīvāpaṁ vinikṣipet |
AHS1.30.017c/ ślakṣṇaṁ śakṛd dakṣa.śikhi.gṛdhra.kaṅka.kapota.jam || 17 ||
AHS1.30.018a/ catuṣ.pāt.pakṣi.pittāla.manohvā.lavaṇāni ca |
AHS1.30.018c/ paritaḥ su.tarāṁ cāto darvyā tam avaghaṭtayet || 18 ||
AHS1.30.019a/ sa.bāṣpaiś ca yadottiṣṭhed budbudair leha.vad ghanaḥ |
AHS1.30.019c/ avatārya tadā śīto yava.rāśāv ayo.maye || 19 || [Note: AHS1.30.019v/ 30.19av sa.bāṣpaiś ca yadā tiṣṭhed 30.19cv avatārya tataḥ śīte 30.19cv avatārya tataḥ śīto 30.19cv avatārya tadā śīte]
AHS1.30.020a/ sthāpyo 'yaṁ madhyamaḥ kṣāro na tu piṣṭvā kṣipen mṛdau |
AHS1.30.020c/ nirvāpyāpanayet tīkṣṇe pūrva.vat prativāpanam || 20 ||
AHS1.30.021a/ tathā lāṅgalikā.dantī.citrakātiviṣā.vacāḥ |
AHS1.30.021c/ svarjikā.kanakakṣīrī.hiṅgu.pūtika.pallavāḥ || 21 ||
AHS1.30.022a/ tālapattrī viḍaṁ ceti sapta.rātrāt paraṁ tu saḥ |
AHS1.30.022c/ yojyas tīkṣṇo 'nila.śleṣma.medo.jeṣv arbudādiṣu || 22 || [Note: AHS1.30.022v/ 30.22av tālapattrī viḍaṅgaṁ ca]
AHS1.30.023a/ madhyeṣv eṣv eva madhyo 'nyaḥ pittāsra.guda.janmasu |
AHS1.30.023c/ balārthaṁ kṣīṇa.pānīye kṣārāmbu punar āvapet || 23 || [Note: AHS1.30.023v/ 30.23av madhyeṣv eva ca madhyo 'nyaḥ 30.23av madhyeṣv eṣu ca madhyo 'nyaḥ 30.23bv pittāsṛg.guda.janmasu]
AHS1.30.024a/ nāti.tīkṣṇa.mṛduḥ ślakṣṇaḥ picchilaḥ śīghra.gaḥ sitaḥ |
AHS1.30.024c/ śikharī sukha.nirvāpyo na viṣyandī na cāti.ruk || 24 || [Note: AHS1.30.024v/ 30.24av nāti.tīkṣṇo mṛduḥ ślakṣṇaḥ]
[Page 167 ]
AHS1.30.025a/ kṣāro daśa.guṇaḥ śastra.tejasor api karma.kṛt |
AHS1.30.025c/ ācūṣann iva saṁrambhād gātram āpīḍayann iva || 25 ||
AHS1.30.026a/ sarvato 'nusaran doṣān unmūlayati mūlataḥ |
AHS1.30.026c/ karma kṛtvā gata.rujaḥ svayaṁ evopaśāmyati || 26 ||
AHS1.30.027a/ kṣāra.sādhye gade chinne likhite srāvite 'tha.vā |
AHS1.30.027c/ kṣāraṁ śalākayā dattvā plota.prāvṛta.dehayā || 27 || [Note: AHS1.30.027v/ 30.27dv plota.plāvita.dehayā]
AHS1.30.028a/ mātrā.śatam upekṣeta tatrārśaḥsv āvṛtānanam |
AHS1.30.028c/ hastena yantraṁ kurvīta vartma.rogeṣu vartmanī || 28 ||
AHS1.30.029a/ nirbhujya picunācchādya kṛṣṇa.bhāgaṁ vinikṣipet |
AHS1.30.029c/ padma.pattra.tanuḥ kṣāra.lepo ghrāṇārbudeṣu ca || 29 || [Note: AHS1.30.029v/ 30.29dv .lepo ghrāṇārbudeṣu tu]
AHS1.30.030a/ praty.ādityaṁ niṣaṇṇasya samunnamyāgra.nāsikām |
AHS1.30.030c/ mātrā vidhāryaḥ pañcāśat tad.vad arśasi karṇa.je || 30 || [Note: AHS1.30.030v/ 30.30bv samunnasyāgra.nāsikām 30.30cv mātrā vidhārya pañcāśat 30.30cv mātrā vidhāryāḥ pañcāśat]
AHS1.30.031a/ kṣāraṁ pramārjanenānu parimṛjyāvagamya ca |
AHS1.30.031c/ su.dagdhaṁ ghṛta.madhv.aktaṁ tat payo.mastu.kāñjikaiḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS1.30.031v/ 30.31av kṣāraṁ pramārjanenāśu]
AHS1.30.032a/ nirvāpayet tataḥ sājyaiḥ svādu.śītaiḥ pradehayet |
AHS1.30.032c/ abhiṣyandīni bhojyāni bhojyāni kledanāya ca || 32 ||
AHS1.30.033a/ yadi ca sthira.mūla.tvāt kṣāra.dagdhaṁ na śīryate |
AHS1.30.033c/ dhānyāmla.bīja.yaṣṭy.āhva.tilair ālepayet tataḥ || 33 ||
AHS1.30.034a/ tila.kalkaḥ sa.madhuko ghṛtākto vraṇa.ropaṇaḥ |
AHS1.30.034c/ pakva.jambv.asitaṁ sannaṁ samyag.dagdhaṁ viparyaye || 34 || [Note: AHS1.30.034v/ 30.34cv pakva.jambū.nibhaṁ sannaṁ]
[Page 168 ]
AHS1.30.035a/ tāmra.tā.toda.kaṇḍv.ādyair dur.dagdhaṁ taṁ punar dahet |
AHS1.30.035c/ ati.dagdhe sraved raktaṁ mūrchā.dāha.jvarādayaḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS1.30.035v/ 30.35bv dur.dagdhaṁ tat punar dahet]
AHS1.30.036a/ gude viśeṣād viṇ.mūtra.saṁrodho 'ti.pravartanam |
AHS1.30.036c/ puṁs.tvopaghāto mṛtyur vā gudasya śātanād dhruvam || 36 || [Note: AHS1.30.036v/ 30.36dv gudasya śātanaṁ dhruvam 30.36dv gudasya sadanād dhruvam 30.36dv gudasya sadanaṁ dhruvam]
AHS1.30.037a/ nāsāyāṁ nāsikā.vaṁśa.daraṇākuñcanodbhavaḥ |
AHS1.30.037c/ bhavec ca viṣayā.jñānaṁ tad.vac chrotrādikeṣv api || 37 ||
AHS1.30.038a/ viśeṣād atra seko 'mlair lepo madhu ghṛtaṁ tilāḥ |
AHS1.30.038c/ vāta.pitta.harā ceṣṭā sarvaiva śiśirā kriyā || 38 ||
AHS1.30.039a/ amlo hi śītaḥ sparśena kṣāras tenopasaṁhitaḥ |
AHS1.30.039c/ yāty āśu svādu.tāṁ tasmād amlair nirvāpayet.tarām || 39 ||
AHS1.30.039+(1)a/ viṣāgni.śastrāśani.mṛtyu.tulyaḥ kṣāro bhaved alpam ati.prayuktaḥ |
AHS1.30.039+(1)c/ rogān nihanyād a.cireṇa ghorān sa dhī.matā samyag.anuprayukto || 39+(1) ||
AHS1.30.040a/ agniḥ kṣārād api śreṣṭhas tad.dagdhānām a.sambhavāt |
AHS1.30.040c/ bheṣaja.kṣāra.śastraiś ca na siddhānāṁ prasādhanāt || 40 ||
AHS1.30.041a/ tvaci māṁse sirā.snāyu.sandhy.asthiṣu sa yujyate |
AHS1.30.041c/ maṣāṅga.glāni.mūrdhārti.mantha.kīla.tilādiṣu || 41 || [Note: AHS1.30.041v/ 30.41bv .sandhy.asthiṣu sa yojyate]
AHS1.30.042a/ tvag.dāho varti.go.danta.sūrya.kānta.śarādibhiḥ |
AHS1.30.042c/ arśo.bhagandara.granthi.nāḍī.duṣṭa.vraṇādiṣu || 42 ||
AHS1.30.043a/ māṁsa.dāho madhu.sneha.jāmbavauṣṭha.guḍādibhiḥ |
AHS1.30.043c/ śliṣṭa.vartmany asṛk.srāva.nīly.a.samyag.vyadhādiṣu || 43 || [Note: AHS1.30.043v/ 30.43cv śliṣṭa.vartmany asṛk.srāve 30.43dv nīly.a.samyag.vyadhādiṣu]
[Page 169 ]
AHS1.30.044a/ sirādi.dāhas tair eva na dahet kṣāra.vāritān |
AHS1.30.044c/ antaḥ.śalyāsṛjo bhinna.koṣṭhān bhūri.vraṇāturān || 44 || [Note: AHS1.30.044v/ 30.44bv na dahet kṣāra.varjitān]
AHS1.30.045a/ su.dagdhaṁ ghṛta.madhv.aktaṁ snigdha.śītaiḥ pradehayet |
AHS1.30.045c/ tasya liṅgaṁ sthite rakte śabda.val lasikānvitam || 45 ||
AHS1.30.046a/ pakva.tāla.kapotābhaṁ su.rohaṁ nāti.vedanam |
AHS1.30.046c/ pramāda.dagdha.vat sarvaṁ dur.dagdhāty.artha.dagdhayoḥ || 46 ||
AHS1.30.047a/ catur.dhā tat tu tucchena saha tucchasya lakṣaṇam |
AHS1.30.047c/ tvag vi.varṇoṣyate 'ty.arthaṁ na ca sphoṭa.samudbhavaḥ || 47 || [Note: AHS1.30.047v/ 30.47av catur.dhā tac ca tucchena 30.47av catur.dhā tat tu tutthena 30.47av catur.dhā tatra tucchena 30.47bv saha tutthasya lakṣaṇam ]
AHS1.30.048a/ sa.sphoṭa.dāha.tīvroṣaṁ dur.dagdham ati.dāhataḥ |
AHS1.30.048c/ māṁsa.lambana.saṅkoca.dāha.dhūpana.vedanāḥ || 48 ||
AHS1.30.049a/ sirādi.nāśas tṛṇ.mūrchā.vraṇa.gāmbhīrya.mṛtyavaḥ |
AHS1.30.049c/ tucchasyāgni.pratapanaṁ kāryam uṣṇaṁ ca bheṣajam || 49 || [Note: AHS1.30.049v/ 30.49av sirādi.nāśa.tṛṇ.mūrchā. 30.49cv tutthasyāgni.pratapanaṁ]
AHS1.30.050a/ styāne 'sre vedanāty.arthaṁ vilīne manda.tā rujaḥ |
AHS1.30.050c/ dur.dagdhe śītam uṣṇaṁ ca yuñjyād ādau tato himam || 50 ||
AHS1.30.051a/ samyag.dagdhe tavakṣīrī.plakṣa.candana.gairikaiḥ |
AHS1.30.051c/ limpet sājyāmṛtair ūrdhvaṁ pitta.vidradhi.vat kriyā || 51 || [Note: AHS1.30.051v/ 30.51av samyag.dagdhe tukākṣīrī. 30.51dv pitta.vidradhi.vat kriyām 30.51dv pitta.vidradhi.vat kriyāḥ]
AHS1.30.052a/ ati.dagdhe drutaṁ kuryāt sarvaṁ pitta.visarpa.vat |
AHS1.30.052c/ sneha.dagdhe bhṛśa.taraṁ rūkṣaṁ tatra tu yojayet || 52 ||
AHS1.30.052+(1)a/ śastra.kṣārāgnayo yasmān mṛtyoḥ paramam āyudham |
AHS1.30.052+(1)c/ a.pramatto bhiṣak tasmāt tān samyag avacārayet || 52+(1) || [Note: AHS1.30.052+(1)v/ 30.52+(1)dv tat samyag avacārayet]
[Page 170 ]
AHS1.30.053a/ samāpyate sthānam idaṁ hṛdayasya rahasya.vat |
AHS1.30.053c/ atrārthāḥ sūtritāḥ sūkṣmāḥ pratanyante hi sarvataḥ || 53 || [Note: AHS1.30.053v/ 30.53cv atrārthāḥ sūcitāḥ sūkṣmāḥ]

2. Part 2 :: Śārīrasthānam

[Note: [ K edn 177-238]

2.1. Chapter 1 :: Athagarbhāvakrāntir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 177-190]
AHS2.1.001a/ śuddhe śukrārtave sat.tvaḥ sva.karma.kleśa.coditaḥ |
AHS2.1.001c/ garbhaḥ sampadyate yukti.vaśād agnir ivāraṇau || 1 || [Note: AHS2.1.001v/ 1.1bv sva.karma.phala.noditaḥ]
AHS2.1.002a/ bījātmakair mahā.bhūtaiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ sat.tvānugaiś ca saḥ |
AHS2.1.002c/ mātuś cāhāra.rasa.jaiḥ kramāt kukṣau vivardhate || 2 ||
AHS2.1.003a/ tejo yathārka.raśmīnāṁ sphaṭikena tiras.kṛtam |
AHS2.1.003c/ nendhanaṁ dṛśyate gacchat sat.tvo garbhāśayaṁ tathā || 3 ||
AHS2.1.004a/ kāraṇānuvidhāyi.tvāt kāryāṇāṁ tat.sva.bhāva.tā |
AHS2.1.004c/ nānā.yony.ākṛtīḥ sat.tvo dhatte 'to druta.loha.vat || 4 ||
AHS2.1.005a/ ata eva ca śukrasya bāhulyāj jāyate pumān |
AHS2.1.005c/ raktasya strī tayoḥ sāmye klībaḥ śukrārtave punaḥ || 5 ||
AHS2.1.006a/ vāyunā bahu.śo bhinne yathā.svaṁ bahv.apatya.tā |
AHS2.1.006c/ vi.yoni.vikṛtākārā jāyante vikṛtair malaiḥ || 6 ||
AHS2.1.007a/ māsi māsi rajaḥ strīṇāṁ rasa.jaṁ sravati try.aham |
AHS2.1.007c/ vatsarād dvā.daśād ūrdhvaṁ yāti pañcāśataḥ kṣayam || 7 ||
AHS2.1.008a/ pūrṇa.ṣo.ḍaśa.varṣā strī pūrṇa.viṁśena saṅgatā |
AHS2.1.008c/ śuddhe garbhāśaye mārge rakte śukre 'nile hṛdi || 8 ||
AHS2.1.009a/ vīrya.vantaṁ sutaṁ sūte tato nyūnābdayoḥ punaḥ |
AHS2.1.009c/ rogy alpāyur a.dhanyo vā garbho bhavati naiva vā || 9 ||
[Page 171 ]
AHS2.1.010a/ vātādi.kuṇapa.granthi.pūya.kṣīṇa.malāhvayam |
AHS2.1.010c/ bījā.samarthaṁ reto.'sraṁ sva.liṅgair doṣa.jaṁ vadet || 10 || [Note: AHS2.1.010v/ 1.10cv prajā.samarthaṁ reto.'sraṁ]
AHS2.1.011a/ raktena kuṇapaṁ śleṣma.vātābhyāṁ granthi.sannibham |
AHS2.1.011c/ pūyābhaṁ rakta.pittābhyāṁ kṣīṇaṁ māruta.pittataḥ || 11 ||
AHS2.1.012a/ kṛcchrāṇy etāny a.sādhyaṁ tu tri.doṣaṁ mūtra.viṭ.prabham |
AHS2.1.012c/ kuryād vātādibhir duṣṭe svauṣadhaṁ kuṇape punaḥ || 12 ||
AHS2.1.013a/ dhātakī.puṣpa.khadira.dāḍimārjuna.sādhitam |
AHS2.1.013c/ pāyayet sarpir atha.vā vipakvam asanādibhiḥ || 13 ||
AHS2.1.014a/ palāśa.bhasmāśmabhidā granthy.ābhe pūya.retasi |
AHS2.1.014c/ parūṣaka.vaṭādibhyāṁ kṣīṇe śukra.karī kriyā || 14 ||
AHS2.1.014+1a/ snigdhaṁ vāntaṁ viriktaṁ ca nirūḍham anuvāsitam |
AHS2.1.014+1c/ yojayec chukra.doṣārtaṁ samyag uttara.vastibhiḥ || 14+1 ||
AHS2.1.015a/ saṁśuddho viṭ.prabhe sarpir hiṅgu.sevyādi.sādhitam |
AHS2.1.015c/ pibed granthy.ārtave pāṭhā.vyoṣa.vṛkṣaka.jaṁ jalam || 15 || [Note: AHS2.1.015v/ 1.15bv hiṅgu.sevyāgni.sādhitam]
AHS2.1.016a/ peyaṁ kuṇapa.pūyāsre candanaṁ vakṣyate tu yat |
AHS2.1.016c/ guhya.roge ca tat sarvaṁ kāryaṁ sottara.vastikam || 16 ||
AHS2.1.017a/ śukraṁ śuklaṁ guru snigdhaṁ madhuraṁ bahalaṁ bahu |
AHS2.1.017c/ ghṛta.mākṣika.tailābhaṁ sad.garbhāyārtavaṁ punaḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS2.1.017v/ 1.17av śuddhaṁ śukraṁ guru snigdhaṁ]
AHS2.1.018a/ lākṣā.rasa.śaśāsrābhaṁ dhautaṁ yac ca virajyate |
AHS2.1.018c/ śuddha.śukrārtavaṁ svasthaṁ saṁraktaṁ mithunaṁ mithaḥ || 18 ||
[Page 172 ]
AHS2.1.019a/ snehaiḥ puṁ.savanaiḥ snigdhaṁ śuddhaṁ śīlita.vastikam |
AHS2.1.019c/ naraṁ viśeṣāt kṣīrājyair madhurauṣadha.saṁskṛtaiḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS2.1.019v/ 1.19dv madhurauṣadha.sādhitaiḥ]
AHS2.1.020a/ nārīṁ tailena māṣaiś ca pittalaiḥ samupācaret |
AHS2.1.020c/ kṣāma.prasanna.vadanāṁ sphurac.chroṇi.payo.dharām || 20 || [Note: AHS2.1.020v/ 1.20cv kṣāmāṁ prasanna.vadanāṁ]
AHS2.1.021a/ srastākṣi.kukṣiṁ puṁs.kāmāṁ vidyād ṛtu.matīṁ striyam |
AHS2.1.021c/ padmaṁ saṅkocam āyāti dine 'tīte yathā tathā || 21 ||
AHS2.1.022a/ ṛtāv atīte yoniḥ sā śukraṁ nātaḥ pratīcchati |
AHS2.1.022c/ māsenopacitaṁ raktaṁ dhamanībhyām ṛtau punaḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS2.1.022v/ 1.22bv śukraṁ nāntaḥ pratīcchati]
AHS2.1.023a/ īṣat.kṛṣṇaṁ vi.gandhaṁ ca vāyur yoni.mukhān nudet |
AHS2.1.023c/ tataḥ puṣpekṣaṇād eva kalyāṇa.dhyāyinī try.aham || 23 ||
AHS2.1.024a/ mṛjālaṅkāra.rahitā darbha.saṁstara.śāyinī |
AHS2.1.024c/ kṣaireyaṁ yāvakaṁ stokaṁ koṣṭha.śodhana.karṣaṇam || 24 || [Note: AHS2.1.024v/ 1.24dv koṣṭha.śodhana.karśanam]
AHS2.1.025a/ parṇe śarāve haste vā bhuñjīta brahma.cāriṇī |
AHS2.1.025c/ caturthe 'hni tataḥ snātā śukla.mālyāmbarā śuciḥ || 25 ||
AHS2.1.026a/ icchantī bhartṛ.sadṛśaṁ putraṁ paśyet puraḥ patim |
AHS2.1.026c/ ṛtus tu dvā.daśa niśāḥ pūrvās tisro 'tra ninditāḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS2.1.026v/ 1.26dv pūrvās tisraś ca ninditāḥ ]
AHS2.1.027a/ ekā.daśī ca yugmāsu syāt putro 'nyāsu kanyakā |
AHS2.1.027c/ upādhyāyo 'tha putrīyaṁ kurvīta vidhi.vad vidhim || 27 || [Note: AHS2.1.027v/ 1.27bv syāt putro 'nya.tra kanyakā]
AHS2.1.028a/ namas.kāra.parāyās tu śūdrāyā mantra.varjitam |
AHS2.1.028c/ a.vandhya evaṁ saṁyogaḥ syād apatyaṁ ca kāmataḥ || 28 ||
[Page 173 ]
AHS2.1.029a/ santo hy āhur apatyārthaṁ dam.patyoḥ saṅgatiṁ rahaḥ |
AHS2.1.029c/ dur.apatyaṁ kulāṅgāro gotre jātaṁ mahaty api || 29 || [Note: AHS2.1.029v/ 1.29bv dam.patyoḥ saṅgataṁ rahaḥ 1.29cv dur.apatyaṁ kulāṅgāraṁ]
AHS2.1.030a/ icchetāṁ yādṛśaṁ putraṁ tad.rūpa.caritāṁś ca tau |
AHS2.1.030c/ cintayetāṁ jana.padāṁs tad.ācāra.paricchadau || 30 ||
AHS2.1.031a/ karmānte ca pumān sarpiḥ.kṣīra.śāly.odanāśitaḥ |
AHS2.1.031c/ prāg dakṣiṇena pādena śayyāṁ mauhūrtikājñayā || 31 ||
AHS2.1.032a/ ārohet strī tu vāmena tasya dakṣiṇa.pārśvataḥ |
AHS2.1.032c/ taila.māṣottarāhārā tatra mantr aṁ prayojayet || 32 || [Note: AHS2.1.032v/ 1.32av ārohet strī ca vāmena]
AHS2.1.032+1a/ āhir asy āyur asi sarvataḥ pratiṣṭhāsi || 32+1a || [Note: AHS2.1.032+1av/ 1.32+1av ahir asi sarvataḥ pratiṣṭhāsi]
AHS2.1.032+1b/ dhātā tvāṁ dadhātu vidhātā tvāṁ dadhātu || 32+1b ||
AHS2.1.032+1c/ brahma.varcasā bhaveti || 32+1c || [Note: AHS2.1.032+1cv/ 1.32+1cv brahma.varcasā bhaved iti]
AHS2.1.033a/ brahmā bṛhaspatir viṣṇuḥ somaḥ sūryas tathāśvinau |
AHS2.1.033c/ bhago 'tha mitrā.varuṇau vīraṁ dadatu me sutam || 33 ||
AHS2.1.034a/ sāntvayitvā tato 'nya.nyaṁ saṁviśetāṁ mudānvitau |
AHS2.1.034c/ uttānā tan.manā yoṣit tiṣṭhed aṅgaiḥ su.saṁsthitaiḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS2.1.034v/ 1.34av sāntayitvā tato 'nyo.'nyaṁ 1.34bv saṁvasetāṁ mudānvitau]
AHS2.1.035a/ tathā hi bījaṁ gṛhṇāti doṣaiḥ sva.sthānam āsthitaiḥ |
AHS2.1.035c/ liṅgaṁ tu sadyo.garbhāyā yonyā bījasya saṅgrahaḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS2.1.035v/ 1.35bv doṣaiḥ sva.sthānam āśritaiḥ 1.35dv yonyāṁ bījasya saṅgrahaḥ]
AHS2.1.036a/ tṛptir guru.tvaṁ sphuraṇaṁ śukrāsrān.anu bandhanam |
AHS2.1.036c/ hṛdaya.spandanaṁ tandrā tṛḍ glānī roma.harṣaṇam || 36 ||
AHS2.1.037a/ a.vyaktaḥ prathame māsi saptāhāt kalalī.bhavet |
AHS2.1.037c/ garbhaḥ puṁ.savanāny atra pūrvaṁ vyakteḥ prayojayet || 37 ||
[Page 174 ]
AHS2.1.038a/ balī puruṣa.kāro hi daivam apy ativartate |
AHS2.1.038c/ puṣye puruṣakaṁ haimaṁ rājataṁ vātha.vāyasam || 38 ||
AHS2.1.039a/ kṛtvāgni.varṇaṁ nirvāpya kṣīre tasyāñjaliṁ pibet |
AHS2.1.039c/ gauradaṇḍam apāmārgaṁ jīvakarṣabha.sairyakān || 39 ||
AHS2.1.040a/ pibet puṣye jale piṣṭān eka.dvi.tri.samasta.śaḥ |
AHS2.1.040c/ kṣīreṇa śveta.bṛhatī.mūlaṁ nāsā.puṭe svayam || 40 ||
AHS2.1.041a/ putrārthaṁ dakṣiṇe siñced vāme duhitṛ.vāñchayā |
AHS2.1.041c/ payasā lakṣmaṇā.mūlaṁ putrotpāda.sthiti.pradam || 41 ||
AHS2.1.042a/ nāsayāsyena vā pītaṁ vaṭa.śuṅgāṣṭakaṁ tathā |
AHS2.1.042c/ oṣadhīr jīvanīyāś ca bāhyāntar upayojayet || 42 || [Note: AHS2.1.042v/ 1.42bv vaṭa.śṛṅgāṣṭakaṁ tathā]
AHS2.1.043a/ upacāraḥ priya.hitair bhartrā bhṛtyaiś ca garbha.dhṛk |
AHS2.1.043c/ nava.nīta.ghṛta.kṣīraiḥ sadā cainām upācaret || 43 ||
AHS2.1.044a/ ati.vyavāyam āyāsaṁ bhāraṁ prāvaraṇaṁ guru |
AHS2.1.044c/ a.kāla.jāgara.svapnaṁ kaṭhinotkaṭakāsanam || 44 || [Note: AHS2.1.044v/ 1.44av ati.vyavāyaṁ vyāyāmaṁ 1.44cv a.kāla.jāgara.svapna. 1.44dv .kaṭhinotkaṭakāsanam 1.44dv kaṭhinotkaṭukāsanam 1.44dv .kaṭhinotkuṭakāsanam]
AHS2.1.045a/ śoka.krodha.bhayodvega.vega.śraddhā.vidhāraṇam |
AHS2.1.045c/ upavāsādhva.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.guru.viṣṭambhi.bhojanam || 45 || [Note: AHS2.1.045v/ 1.45cv upavāsādi.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.]
AHS2.1.046a/ raktaṁ nivasanaṁ śvabhra.kūpekṣāṁ madyam āmiṣam |
AHS2.1.046c/ uttāna.śayanaṁ yac ca striyo necchanti tat tyajet || 46 || [Note: AHS2.1.046v/ 1.46av raktaṁ vi.vasanaṁ śvabhra.]
AHS2.1.047a/ tathā rakta.srutiṁ śuddhiṁ vastim ā.māsato 'ṣṭamāt |
AHS2.1.047c/ ebhir garbhaḥ sraved āmaḥ kukṣau śuṣyen mriyeta vā || 47 || [Note: AHS2.1.047v/ 1.47cv evaṁ garbhaḥ sraved āmaḥ]
[Page 175 ]
AHS2.1.048a/ vātalaiś ca bhaved garbhaḥ kubjāndha.jaḍa.vāmanaḥ |
AHS2.1.048c/ pittalaiḥ khalatiḥ piṅgaḥ śvitrī pāṇḍuḥ kaphātmabhiḥ || 48 ||
AHS2.1.049a/ vyādhīṁś cāsyā mṛdu.sukhair a.tīkṣṇair auṣadhair jayet |
AHS2.1.049c/ dvitīye māsi kalalād ghanaḥ peśy atha.vārbudam || 49 ||
AHS2.1.050a/ puṁ.strī.klībāḥ kramāt tebhyas tatra vyaktasya lakṣaṇam |
AHS2.1.050c/ kṣāma.tā garimā kukṣer mūrchā chardir a.rocakaḥ || 50 || [Note: AHS2.1.050v/ 1.50cv kṣāma.tā garimā kukṣau]
AHS2.1.051a/ jṛmbhā prasekaḥ sadanaṁ roma.rājyāḥ prakāśanam |
AHS2.1.051c/ amleṣṭa.tā stanau pīnau sa.stanyau kṛṣṇa.cūcukau || 51 ||
AHS2.1.052a/ pāda.śopho vidāho 'nye śraddhāś ca vividhātmikāḥ |
AHS2.1.052c/ mātṛ.jaṁ hy asya hṛdayaṁ mātuś ca hṛdayena tat || 52 || [Note: AHS2.1.052v/ 1.52av pāda.śopho vidāho 'nne]
AHS2.1.053a/ sambaddhaṁ tena garbhiṇyā neṣṭaṁ śraddhā.vimānanam |
AHS2.1.053c/ deyam apy a.hitaṁ tasyai hitopahitam alpakam || 53 || [Note: AHS2.1.053v/ 1.53bv neṣṭaṁ śraddhā.vidhāraṇam 1.53bv neṣṭaṁ śraddhāvamānanam]
AHS2.1.054a/ śraddhā.vighātād garbhasya vikṛtiś cyutir eva vā |
AHS2.1.054c/ vyaktī.bhavati māse 'sya tṛtīye gātra.pañcakam || 54 || [Note: AHS2.1.054v/ 1.54av śraddhābhighātād garbhasya]
AHS2.1.055a/ mūrdhā dve sakthinī bāhū sarva.sūkṣmāṅga.janma ca |
AHS2.1.055c/ samam eva hi mūrdhādyair jñānaṁ ca sukha.duḥkhayoḥ || 55 || [Note: AHS2.1.055v/ 1.55bv sarva.sūkṣmāṅga.janma tu 1.55dv vijñānaṁ sukha.duḥkhayoḥ]
AHS2.1.056a/ garbhasya nābhau mātuś ca hṛdi nāḍī nibadhyate |
AHS2.1.056c/ yayā sa puṣṭim āpnoti kedāra iva kulyayā || 56 || [Note: AHS2.1.056v/ 1.56cv yayā puṣṭim avāpnoti]
AHS2.1.057a/ caturthe vyakta.tāṅgānāṁ cetanāyāś ca pañcame |
AHS2.1.057c/ ṣaṣṭhe snāyu.sirā.roma.bala.varṇa.nakha.tvacām || 57 ||
[Page 176 ]
AHS2.1.058a/ sarvaiḥ sarvāṅga.sampūrṇo bhāvaiḥ puṣyati saptame || 58ab ||
AHS2.1.058c/ garbheṇotpīḍitā doṣās tasmin hṛdayam āśritāḥ || 58cd ||
AHS2.1.058e/ kaṇḍūṁ vidāhaṁ kurvanti garbhiṇyāḥ kikkisāni ca || 58ef ||
AHS2.1.059a/ nava.nītaṁ hitaṁ tatra kolāmbu.madhurauṣadhaiḥ |
AHS2.1.059c/ siddham alpa.paṭu.snehaṁ laghu svādu ca bhojanam || 59 ||
AHS2.1.060a/ candanośīra.kalkena limped ūru.stanodaram |
AHS2.1.060c/ śreṣṭhayā vaiṇa.hariṇa.śaśa.śoṇita.yuktayā || 60 ||
AHS2.1.061a/ aśvaghna.pattra.siddhena tailenābhyajya mardayet |
AHS2.1.061c/ paṭola.nimba.mañjiṣṭhā.surasaiḥ secayet punaḥ || 61 ||
AHS2.1.062a/ dārvī.madhuka.toyena mṛjāṁ ca pariśīlayet |
AHS2.1.062c/ ojo 'ṣṭame sañcarati mātā.putrau muhuḥ kramāt || 62 ||
AHS2.1.063a/ tena tau mlāna.muditau tatra jāto na jīvati |
AHS2.1.063c/ śiśur ojo.'n.avasthānān nārī saṁśayitā bhavet || 63 || [Note: AHS2.1.063v/ 1.63bv syātām atra na jīvati 1.63bv syātāṁ jāto na jīvati]
AHS2.1.064a/ kṣīra.peyā ca peyātra sa.ghṛtānvāsanaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS2.1.064c/ madhuraiḥ sādhitaṁ śuddhyai purāṇa.śakṛtas tathā || 64 || [Note: AHS2.1.064v/ 1.64bv sa.ghṛtānvāsanaṁ hitam]
AHS2.1.065a/ śuṣka.mūlaka.kolāmla.kaṣāyeṇa praśasyate |
AHS2.1.065c/ śatāhvā.kalkito vastiḥ sa.taila.ghṛta.saindhavaḥ || 65 ||
AHS2.1.066a/ tasmiṁs tv ekāha.yāte 'pi kālaḥ sūter ataḥ param |
AHS2.1.066c/ varṣād vikāra.kārī syāt kukṣau vātena dhāritaḥ || 66 || [Note: AHS2.1.066v/ 1.66av tasminn ekāha.yāte 'pi]
AHS2.1.067a/ śastaś ca navame māsi snigdho māṁsa.rasaudanaḥ |
AHS2.1.067c/ bahu.snehā yavāgūr vā pūrvoktaṁ cānuvāsanam || 67 || [Note: AHS2.1.067v/ 1.67bv snigdha.māṁsa.rasaudanaḥ]
[Page 177 ]
AHS2.1.068a/ tata eva picuṁ cāsyā yonau nityaṁ nidhāpayet |
AHS2.1.068c/ vāta.ghna.pattra.bhaṅgāmbhaḥ śītaṁ snāne 'nv.ahaṁ hitam || 68 ||
AHS2.1.069a/ niḥ.snehāṅgī na navamān māsāt prabhṛti vāsayet |
AHS2.1.069c/ prāg dakṣiṇa.stana.stanyā pūrvaṁ tat.pārśva.ceṣṭinī || 69 ||
AHS2.1.070a/ puṁ.nāma.daurhṛda.praśna.ratā puṁ.svapna.darśinī |
AHS2.1.070c/ unnate dakṣiṇe kukṣau garbhe ca parimaṇḍale || 70 ||
AHS2.1.071a/ putraṁ sūte 'nya.thā kanyāṁ yā cecchati nṛ.saṅgatim |
AHS2.1.071c/ nṛtya.vāditra.gāndharva.gandha.mālya.priyā ca yā || 71 ||
AHS2.1.072a/ klībaṁ tat.saṅkare tatra madhyaṁ kukṣeḥ samunnatam |
AHS2.1.072c/ yamau pārśva.dvayonnāmāt kukṣau droṇyām iva sthite || 72 ||
AHS2.1.073a/ prāk caiva navamān māsāt sā sūti.gṛham āśrayet |
AHS2.1.073c/ deśe praśaste sambhāraiḥ sampannaṁ sādhake 'hani || 73 || [Note: AHS2.1.073v/ 1.73bv sūtikā.gṛham āśrayet]
AHS2.1.074a/ tatrodīkṣeta sā sūtiṁ sūtikā.parivāritā |
AHS2.1.074c/ adya.śvaḥ.prasave glāniḥ kukṣy.akṣi.ślatha.tā klamaḥ || 74 || [Note: AHS2.1.074v/ 1.74cv āsanna.prasave glāniḥ]
AHS2.1.075a/ adho.guru.tvam a.ruciḥ praseko bahu.mūtra.tā |
AHS2.1.075c/ vedanorūdara.kaṭī.pṛṣṭha.hṛd.vasti.vaṅkṣaṇe || 75 ||
AHS2.1.076a/ yoni.bheda.rujā.toda.sphuraṇa.sravaṇāni ca |
AHS2.1.076c/ āvīnām anu janmātas tato garbhodaka.srutiḥ || 76 ||
AHS2.1.077a/ athopasthita.garbhāṁ tāṁ kṛta.kautuka.magalām |
AHS2.1.077c/ hasta.stha.puṁ.nāma.phalāṁ sv.abhyaktoṣṇāmbu.secitām || 77 || [Note: AHS2.1.077v/ 1.77dv sv.aktām uṣṇāmbu.secitām]
[Page 178 ]
AHS2.1.078a/ pāyayet sa.ghṛtāṁ peyāṁ tanau bhū.śayane sthitām |
AHS2.1.078c/ ābhugna.sakthim uttānām abhyaktāṅgīṁ punaḥ punaḥ || 78 ||
AHS2.1.079a/ adho nābher vimṛdnīyāt kārayej jṛmbha.caṅkramam |
AHS2.1.079c/ garbhaḥ prayāty avāg evaṁ tal.liṅgaṁ hṛd.vimokṣataḥ || 79 ||
AHS2.1.080a/ āviśya jaṭharaṁ garbho vaster upari tiṣṭhati |
AHS2.1.080c/ āvyo 'bhitvarayanty enāṁ khaṭvām āropayet tataḥ || 80 || [Note: AHS2.1.080v/ 1.80cv āvyo hi tvarayanty enāṁ]
AHS2.1.081a/ atha sampīḍite garbhe yonim asyāḥ prasārayet |
AHS2.1.081c/ mṛdu pūrvaṁ pravāheta bāḍham ā.prasavāc ca sā || 81 || [Note: AHS2.1.081v/ 1.81bv yonim asyāḥ prasādhayet]
AHS2.1.082a/ harṣayet tāṁ muhuḥ putra.janma.śabda.jalānilaiḥ |
AHS2.1.082c/ pratyāyānti tathā prāṇāḥ sūti.kleśāvasāditāḥ || 82 ||
AHS2.1.083a/ dhūpayed garbha.saṅge tu yoniṁ kṛṣṇāhi.kañcukaiḥ |
AHS2.1.083c/ hiraṇyapuṣpī.mūlaṁ ca pāṇi.pādena dhārayet || 83 ||
AHS2.1.084a/ suvarcalāṁ viśalyāṁ vā jarāyv.a.patane 'pi ca |
AHS2.1.084c/ kāryam etat tathotkṣipya bāhvor enāṁ vikampayet || 84 || [Note: AHS2.1.084v/ 1.84cv kāryam etat tathotkṛṣya 1.84dv bāhvor etāṁ vikampayet]
AHS2.1.085a/ kaṭīm ākoṭayet pārṣṇyā sphijau gāḍhaṁ nipīḍayet |
AHS2.1.085c/ tālu.kaṇṭhaṁ spṛśed veṇyā mūrdhni dadyāt snuhī.payaḥ || 85 ||
AHS2.1.086a/ bhūrja.lāṅgalikī.tumbī.sarpa.tvak.kuṣṭha.sarṣapaiḥ |
AHS2.1.086c/ pṛthag dvābhyāṁ samastair vā yoni.lepana.dhūpanam || 86 || [Note: AHS2.1.086v/ 1.86dv yoni.dhūpaṁ ca lepanam]
AHS2.1.087a/ kuṣṭha.tālīśa.kalkaṁ vā surā.maṇḍena pāyayet |
AHS2.1.087c/ yūṣeṇa vā kulatthānāṁ bālbajenāsavena vā || 87 || [Note: AHS2.1.087v/ 1.87dv bilva.jenāsavena vā]
[Page 179 ]
AHS2.1.088a/ śatāhvā.sarṣapājājī.śigru.tīkṣṇaka.citrakaiḥ |
AHS2.1.088c/ sa.hiṅgu.kuṣṭha.madanair mūtre kṣīre ca sārṣapam || 88 ||
AHS2.1.089a/ tailaṁ siddhaṁ hitaṁ pāyau yonyāṁ vāpy anuvāsanam |
AHS2.1.089c/ śatapuṣpā.vacā.kuṣṭha.kaṇā.sarṣapa.kalkitaḥ || 89 || [Note: AHS2.1.089v/ 1.89bv yonyāṁ vā hy anuvāsanam]
AHS2.1.090a/ nirūhaḥ pātayaty āśu sa.sneha.lavaṇo 'parām |
AHS2.1.090c/ tat.saṅge hy anilo hetuḥ sā niryāty āśu taj.jayāt || 90 ||
AHS2.1.091a/ kuśalā pāṇināktena haret k pta.nakhena vā |
AHS2.1.091c/ mukta.garbhāparāṁ yoniṁ tailenāṅgaṁ ca mardayet || 91 ||
AHS2.1.092a/ makkallākhye śiro.vasti.koṣṭha.śūle tu pāyayet |
AHS2.1.092c/ su.cūrṇitaṁ yava.kṣāraṁ ghṛtenoṣṇa.jalena vā || 92 ||
AHS2.1.093a/ dhānyāmbu vā guḍa.vyoṣa.tri.jātaka.rajo.'nvitam |
AHS2.1.093c/ atha bālopacāreṇa bālaṁ yoṣid upācared || 93 ||
AHS2.1.094a/ sūtikā kṣud.vatī tailād ghṛtād vā mahatīṁ pibet |
AHS2.1.094c/ pañca.kolakinīṁ mātrām anu coṣṇaṁ guḍodakam || 94 ||
AHS2.1.095a/ vāta.ghnauṣadha.toyaṁ vā tathā vāyur na kupyati |
AHS2.1.095c/ viśudhyati ca duṣṭāsraṁ dvi.tri.rātram ayaṁ kramaḥ || 95 || [Note: AHS2.1.095v/ 1.95bv yathā vāyur na kupyati]
AHS2.1.096a/ snehā.yogyā tu niḥ.sneham amum eva vidhiṁ bhajet |
AHS2.1.096c/ pīta.vatyāś ca jaṭharaṁ yamakāktaṁ viveṣṭayet || 96 ||
AHS2.1.097a/ jīrṇe snātā pibet peyāṁ pūrvoktauṣadha.sādhitām |
AHS2.1.097c/ try.ahād ūrdhvaṁ vidāry.ādi.varga.kvāthena sādhitā || 97 ||
[Page 180 ]
AHS2.1.098a/ hitā yavāgūḥ snehāḍhyā sātmyataḥ payasātha.vā |
AHS2.1.098c/ sapta.rātrāt paraṁ cāsyai krama.śo bṛṁhaṇaṁ hitam || 98 || [Note: AHS2.1.098v/ 1.98cv sapta.rātrāt paraṁ cāsyāḥ 1.98cv sapta.rātrāt paraṁ vāsyāḥ]
AHS2.1.099a/ dvā.daśāhe 'n.atikrānte piśitaṁ nopayojayet |
AHS2.1.099c/ yatnenopacaret sūtāṁ duḥ.sādhyo hi tad.āmayaḥ || 99 || [Note: AHS2.1.099v/ 1.99bv piśitaṁ naiva yojayet]
AHS2.1.100a/ garbha.vṛddhi.prasava.ruk.kledāsra.sruti.pīḍanaiḥ |
AHS2.1.100c/ evaṁ ca māsād adhy.ardhān muktāhārādi.yantraṇā || 100 ||
AHS2.1.100ū̆ab/ gata.sūtābhidhānā syāt punar ārtava.darśanāt || 100ū̆ab ||

2.2. Chapter 2 :: Athagarbhavyāpadvidhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 190-195]
AHS2.2.001a/ garbhiṇyāḥ parihāryāṇāṁ sevayā rogato 'tha.vā |
AHS2.2.001c/ puṣpe dṛṣṭe 'tha.vā śūle bāhyāntaḥ snigdha.śītalam || 1 || [Note: AHS2.2.001v/ 2.1bv sevayā rogato 'pi vā]
AHS2.2.002a/ sevyāmbho.ja.hima.kṣīri.valka.kalkājya.lepitān |
AHS2.2.002c/ dhārayed yoni.vastibhyām ārdrārdrān picu.naktakān || 2 || [Note: AHS2.2.002v/ 2.2cv dhārayed vasti.yonibhyām]
AHS2.2.003a/ śata.dhauta.ghṛtāktāṁ strīṁ tad.ambhasy avagāhayet |
AHS2.2.003c/ sa.sitā.kṣaudra.kumuda.kamalotpala.kesaram || 3 ||
AHS2.2.004a/ lihyāt kṣīra.ghṛtaṁ khādec chṛṅgāṭaka.kaserukam |
AHS2.2.004c/ pibet kāntāb.ja.śālūka.bālodumbara.vat payaḥ || 4 ||
AHS2.2.005a/ śṛtena śāli.kākolī.dvi.balā.madhukekṣubhiḥ |
AHS2.2.005c/ payasā rakta.śāly.annam adyāt sa.madhu.śarkaram || 5 ||
AHS2.2.006a/ rasair vā jāṅgalaiḥ śuddhi.varjaṁ cāsroktam ācaret |
AHS2.2.006c/ a.sampūrṇa.tri.māsāyāḥ pratyākhyāya prasādhayet || 6 || [Note: AHS2.2.006v/ 2.6bv .varjaṁ vāsroktam ācaret]
[Page 181 ]
AHS2.2.007a/ āmānvaye ca tatreṣṭaṁ śītaṁ rūkṣopasaṁhitam |
AHS2.2.007c/ upavāso ghanośīra.guḍūcy.aralu.dhānyakāḥ || 7 ||
AHS2.2.008a/ durālabhā.parpaṭaka.candanātiviṣā.balāḥ |
AHS2.2.008c/ kvathitāḥ salile pānaṁ tṛṇa.dhānyāni bhojanam || 8 || [Note: AHS2.2.008v/ 2.8dv tṛṇa.dhānyādi bhojanam]
AHS2.2.009a/ mudgādi.yūṣair āme tu jite snigdhādi pūrva.vat |
AHS2.2.009c/ garbhe nipatite tīkṣṇaṁ madyaṁ sāmarthyataḥ pibet || 9 ||
AHS2.2.010a/ garbha.koṣṭha.viśuddhy.artham arti.vismaraṇāya ca |
AHS2.2.010c/ laghunā pañca.mūlena rūkṣāṁ peyāṁ tataḥ pibet || 10 ||
AHS2.2.011a/ peyām a.madya.pā kalke sādhitāṁ pāñcakaulike |
AHS2.2.011c/ bilvādi.pañcaka.kvāthe tiloddālaka.taṇḍulaiḥ || 11 ||
AHS2.2.012a/ māsa.tulya.dināny evaṁ peyādiḥ patite kramaḥ |
AHS2.2.012c/ laghur a.sneha.lavaṇo dīpanīya.yuto hitaḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS2.2.012v/ 2.12dv dīpanīya.yuto hi saḥ]
AHS2.2.013a/ doṣa.dhātu.parikleda.śoṣārthaṁ vidhir ity ayam |
AHS2.2.013c/ snehānna.vastayaś cordhvaṁ balya.dīpana.jīvanāḥ || 13 ||
AHS2.2.014a/ sañjāta.sāre mahati garbhe yoni.parisravāt |
AHS2.2.014c/ vṛddhim a.prāpnuvan garbhaḥ koṣṭhe tiṣṭhati sa.sphuraḥ || 14 ||
AHS2.2.015a/ upaviṣṭakam āhus taṁ vardhate tena nodaram |
AHS2.2.015c/ śokopavāsa.rūkṣādyair atha.vā yony.ati.sravāt || 15 ||
AHS2.2.016a/ vāte kruddhe kṛśaḥ śuṣyed garbho nāgodaraṁ tu tam |
AHS2.2.016c/ udaraṁ vṛddham apy atra hīyate sphuraṇaṁ cirāt || 16 || [Note: AHS2.2.016v/ 2.16bv garbho nāgodaraṁ tu tat]
[Page 182 ]
AHS2.2.017a/ tayor bṛṁhaṇa.vāta.ghna.madhura.dravya.saṁskṛtaiḥ |
AHS2.2.017c/ ghṛta.kṣīra.rasais tṛptir āma.garbhāṁś ca khādayet || 17 ||
AHS2.2.018a/ tair eva ca su.bhikṣāyāḥ kṣobhaṇaṁ yāna.vāhanaiḥ |
AHS2.2.018c/ līnākhye nisphure śyena.go.matsyotkrośa.barhi.jāḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS2.2.018v/ 2.18av tair eva ca su.tṛptāyāḥ]
AHS2.2.019a/ rasā bahu.ghṛtā deyā māṣa.mūlaka.jā api |
AHS2.2.019c/ bāla.bilvaṁ tilān māṣān saktūṁś ca payasā pibet || 19 ||
AHS2.2.020a/ sa.medya.māṁsaṁ madhu vā kaṭy.abhyaṅgaṁ ca śīlayet |
AHS2.2.020c/ harṣayet satataṁ cainām evaṁ garbhaḥ pravardhate || 20 ||
AHS2.2.021a/ puṣṭo 'nya.thā varṣa.gaṇaiḥ kṛcchrāj jāyeta naiva vā |
AHS2.2.021c/ udāvartaṁ tu garbhiṇyāḥ snehair āśu.tarāṁ jayet || 21 ||
AHS2.2.022a/ yogyaiś ca vastibhir hanyāt sa.garbhāṁ sa hi garbhiṇīm |
AHS2.2.022c/ garbhe 'ti.doṣopacayād a.pathyair daivato 'pi vā || 22 ||
AHS2.2.023a/ mṛte 'ntar udaraṁ śītaṁ stabdhaṁ dhmātaṁ bhṛśa.vyatham |
AHS2.2.023c/ garbhā.spando bhrama.tṛṣṇā kṛcchrād ucchvasanaṁ klamaḥ || 23 || [Note: AHS2.2.023v/ 2.23av mṛte 'ntar jaṭharaṁ śītaṁ 2.23bv stabdhādhmātaṁ bhṛśa.vyatham]
AHS2.2.024a/ a.ratiḥ srasta.netra.tvam āvīnām a.samudbhavaḥ |
AHS2.2.024c/ tasyāḥ koṣṇāmbu.siktāyāḥ piṣṭvā yoniṁ pralepayet || 24 ||
AHS2.2.025a/ guḍaṁ kiṇvaṁ sa.lavaṇaṁ tathāntaḥ pūrayen muhuḥ |
AHS2.2.025c/ ghṛtena kalkī.kṛtayā śālmaly.atasi.picchayā || 25 ||
AHS2.2.026a/ mantrair yogair jarāyūktair mūḍha.garbho na cet patet |
AHS2.2.026c/ athāpṛcchyeśvaraṁ vaidyo yatnenāśu tam āharet || 26 || [Note: AHS2.2.026v/ 2.26cv atha pṛṣṭveśvaraṁ vaidyo 2.26cv athāpṛṣṭveśvaraṁ vaidyo]
[Page 183 ]
AHS2.2.027a/ hastam abhyajya yoniṁ ca sājya.śālmali.picchayā |
AHS2.2.027c/ hastena śakyaṁ tenaiva gātraṁ ca viṣamaṁ sthitam || 27 || [Note: AHS2.2.027v/ 2.27dv gātraṁ ca viṣama.sthitam]
AHS2.2.028a/ āñchanotpīḍa.sampīḍa.vikṣepotkṣepaṇādibhiḥ |
AHS2.2.028c/ ānulomya samākarṣed yoniṁ praty ārjavāgatam || 28 || [Note: AHS2.2.028v/ 2.28cv ānulomye samākarṣed]
AHS2.2.029a/ hasta.pāda.śirobhir yo yoniṁ bhugnaḥ prapadyate |
AHS2.2.029c/ pādena yonim ekena bhugno 'nyena gudaṁ ca yaḥ || 29 ||
AHS2.2.030a/ viṣkambhau nāma tau mūḍhau śastra.dāraṇam arhataḥ |
AHS2.2.030c/ maṇḍalāṅguli.śastrābhyāṁ tatra karma praśasyate || 30 ||
AHS2.2.031a/ vṛddhi.pattraṁ hi tīkṣṇāgraṁ na yonāv avacārayet |
AHS2.2.031c/ pūrvaṁ śiraḥ.kapālāni dārayitvā viśodhayet || 31 ||
AHS2.2.032a/ kakṣoras.tālu.cibuka.pradeśe 'nya.tame tataḥ |
AHS2.2.032c/ samālambya dṛḍhaṁ karṣet kuśalo garbha.śaṅkunā || 32 || [Note: AHS2.2.032v/ 2.32av kakṣoras.tālu.cibuke 2.32bv pradeśe 'nya.tame tataḥ]
AHS2.2.033a/ a.bhinna.śirasaṁ tv akṣi.kūṭayor gaṇḍayor api |
AHS2.2.033c/ bāhuṁ chittvāṁsa.saktasya vātādhmātodarasya tu || 33 ||
AHS2.2.034a/ vidārya koṣṭham antrāṇi bahir vā sannirasya ca |
AHS2.2.034c/ kaṭī.saktasya tad.vac ca tat.kapālāni dārayet || 34 ||
AHS2.2.035a/ yad yad vāyu.vaśād aṅgaṁ sajjed garbhasya khaṇḍa.śaḥ |
AHS2.2.035c/ tat tac chittvāharet samyag rakṣen nārīṁ ca yatnataḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS2.2.035v/ 2.35cv tat tac chittvāharan samyag]
AHS2.2.036a/ garbhasya hi gatiṁ citrāṁ karoti vi.guṇo 'nilaḥ |
AHS2.2.036c/ tatrān.alpa.matis tasmād avasthāpekṣam ācaret || 36 ||
[Page 184 ]
AHS2.2.037a/ chindyād garbhaṁ na jīvantaṁ mātaraṁ sa hi mārayet |
AHS2.2.037c/ sahātmanā na copekṣyaḥ kṣaṇam apy asta.jīvitaḥ || 37 ||
AHS2.2.038a/ yoni.saṁvaraṇa.bhraṁśa.makkalla.śvāsa.pīḍitām |
AHS2.2.038c/ pūty.udgārāṁ himāṅgīṁ ca mūḍha.garbhāṁ parityajet || 38 ||
AHS2.2.039a/ athā.patantīm aparāṁ pātayet pūrva.vad bhiṣak |
AHS2.2.039c/ evaṁ nirhṛta.śalyāṁ tu siñced uṣṇena vāriṇā || 39 ||
AHS2.2.040a/ dadyād abhyakta.dehāyai yonau sneha.picuṁ tataḥ |
AHS2.2.040c/ yonir mṛdur bhavet tena śūlaṁ cāsyāḥ praśāmyati || 40 ||
AHS2.2.041a/ dīpyakātiviṣā.rāsnā.hiṅgv.elā.pañca.kolakāt |
AHS2.2.041c/ cūrṇaṁ snehena kalkaṁ vā kvāthaṁ vā pāyayet tataḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS2.2.041v/ 2.41dv kvāthaṁ tāṁ pāyayet tataḥ]
AHS2.2.042a/ kaṭukātiviṣā.pāṭhā.śāka.tvag.ghiṅgu.tejinīḥ |
AHS2.2.042c/ tad.vac ca doṣa.syandārthaṁ vedanopaśamāya ca || 42 || [Note: AHS2.2.042v/ 2.42bv .śāka.tvag.ghiṅgu.tejanīḥ]
AHS2.2.043a/ tri.rātram evaṁ saptāhaṁ sneham eva tataḥ pibet |
AHS2.2.043c/ sāyaṁ pibed ariṣṭaṁ ca tathā su.kṛtam āsavam || 43 ||
AHS2.2.044a/ śirīṣa.kakubha.kvātha.picūn yonau vinikṣipet |
AHS2.2.044c/ upadravāś ca ye 'nye syus tān yathā.svam upācaret || 44 ||
AHS2.2.045a/ payo vāta.haraiḥ siddhaṁ daśāhaṁ bhojane hitam |
AHS2.2.045c/ raso daśāhaṁ ca paraṁ laghu.pathyālpa.bhojanā || 45 ||
AHS2.2.046a/ svedābhyaṅga.parā snehān balā.tailādikān bhajet |
AHS2.2.046c/ ūrdhvaṁ caturbhyo māsebhyaḥ sā krameṇa sukhāni ca || 46 ||
[Page 185 ]
AHS2.2.047a/ balā.mūla.kaṣāyasya bhāgāḥ ṣaṭ payasas tathā |
AHS2.2.047c/ yava.kola.kulatthānāṁ daśa.mūlasya caikataḥ || 47 ||
AHS2.2.048a/ niḥkvātha.bhāgo bhāgaś ca tailasya tu catur.daśaḥ |
AHS2.2.048c/ dvi.medā.dāru.mañjiṣṭhā.kākolī.dvaya.candanaiḥ || 48 || [Note: AHS2.2.048v/ 2.48bv tailasya ca catur.daśaḥ]
AHS2.2.049a/ śārivā.kuṣṭha.tagara.jīvakarṣabha.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS2.2.049c/ kālānusāryā.śaileya.vacāguru.punarnavaiḥ || 49 || [Note: AHS2.2.049v/ 2.49cv kālānusārī.śaileya. 2.49cv kālānusārya.śaileya.]
AHS2.2.050a/ aśvagandhā.varī.kṣīraśuklā.yaṣṭī.varā.rasaiḥ |
AHS2.2.050c/ śatāhvā.śūrpaparṇy.elā.tvak.pattraiḥ ślakṣṇa.kalkitaiḥ || 50 ||
AHS2.2.051a/ pakvaṁ mṛdv.agninā tailaṁ sarva.vāta.vikāra.jit |
AHS2.2.051c/ sūtikā.bāla.marmāsthi.hata.kṣīṇeṣu pūjitam || 51 || [Note: AHS2.2.051v/ 2.51dv .kṣata.kṣīṇeṣu pūjitam]
AHS2.2.052a/ jvara.gulma.grahonmāda.mūtrāghātāntra.vṛddhi.jit |
AHS2.2.052c/ dhanvantarer abhimataṁ yoni.roga.kṣayāpaham || 52 ||
AHS2.2.053a/ vasti.dvāre vipannāyāḥ kukṣiḥ praspandate yadi |
AHS2.2.053c/ janma.kāle tataḥ śīghraṁ pāṭayitvoddharec chiśum || 53 ||
AHS2.2.054a/ madhukaṁ śāka.bījaṁ ca payasyā suradāru ca |
AHS2.2.054c/ aśmantakaḥ kṛṣṇa.tilās tāmravallī śatāvarī || 54 || [Note: AHS2.2.054v/ 2.54bv payasyāmaradāru ca]
AHS2.2.055a/ vṛkṣādanī payasyā ca latā sotpala.śārivā |
AHS2.2.055c/ anantā śārivā rāsnā padmā ca madhuyaṣṭikā || 55 || [Note: AHS2.2.055v/ 2.55bv latā cotpala.śārivā 2.55dv padmātha madhuyaṣṭikā 2.55dv padmāhva.madhuyaṣṭikā 2.55dv padmakaṁ madhuyaṣṭikā]
AHS2.2.056a/ bṛhatī.dvaya.kāśmarya.kṣīri.śuṅga.tvacā ghṛtam |
AHS2.2.056c/ pṛśniparṇī balā śigruḥ śvadaṁṣṭrā madhuparṇikā || 56 || [Note: AHS2.2.056v/ 2.56av bṛhatī.dvaya.kāśmaryaḥ 2.56bv .kṣīri.śṛṅga.tvacā ghṛtam 2.56bv kṣīri.śuṅga.tvacā ghṛtam]
[Page 186 ]
AHS2.2.057a/ śṛṅgāṭakaṁ bisaṁ drākṣā kaseru madhukaṁ sitā |
AHS2.2.057c/ saptaitān payasā yogān ardha.śloka.samāpanān || 57 ||
AHS2.2.058a/ kramāt saptasu māseṣu garbhe sravati yojayet |
AHS2.2.058c/ kapittha.bilva.bṛhatī.paṭolekṣu.nidigdhikāt || 58 || [Note: AHS2.2.058v/ 2.58dv .paṭolekṣu.nidigdhi.jaiḥ]
AHS2.2.059a/ mūlaiḥ śṛtaṁ prayuñjīta kṣīraṁ māse tathāṣṭame |
AHS2.2.059c/ navame śārivānantā.payasyā.madhuyaṣṭibhiḥ || 59 ||
AHS2.2.060a/ yojayed daśame māsi siddhaṁ kṣīraṁ payasyayā |
AHS2.2.060c/ atha.vā yaṣṭimadhuka.nāgarāmaradārubhiḥ || 60 ||
AHS2.2.061a/ avasthitaṁ lohitam aṅganāyā vātena garbhaṁ bruvate 'n.abhijñāḥ |
AHS2.2.061c/ garbhākṛti.tvāt kaṭukoṣṇa.tīkṣṇaiḥ srute punaḥ kevala eva rakte || 61 ||
AHS2.2.062a/ garbhaṁ jaḍā bhūta.hṛtaṁ vadanti mūrter na dṛṣṭaṁ haraṇaṁ yatas taiḥ |
AHS2.2.062c/ ojo.'śana.tvād atha.vā.vyavasthair bhūtair upekṣyeta na garbha.mātā || 62 ||

2.3. Chapter 3 :: Athāṅgavibhāgaśārīrādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 195-215]
AHS2.3.001a/ śiro 'ntar.ādhir dvau bāhū sakthinīti samāsataḥ |
AHS2.3.001c/ ṣaḍ.aṅgam aṅgaṁ pratyaṅgaṁ tasyākṣi.hṛdayādikam || 1 || [Note: AHS2.3.001v/ 3.1bv sakthinī ca samāsataḥ]
AHS2.3.002a/ śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṁ ca raso gandhaḥ kramād guṇāḥ |
AHS2.3.002c/ khānilāgny.ab.bhuvām eka.guṇa.vṛddhy.anvayaḥ pare || 2 || [Note: AHS2.3.002v/ 3.2cv khānilāgny.ambu.bhūṣv eka. 3.2dv .guṇa.vṛddhyānvayaḥ pare]
AHS2.3.003a/ tatra khāt khāni dehe 'smin śrotraṁ śabdo vivikta.tā |
AHS2.3.003c/ vātāt sparśa.tvag.ucchvāsā vahner dṛg.rūpa.paktayaḥ || 3 ||
AHS2.3.004a/ āpyā jihvā.rasa.kledā ghrāṇa.gandhāsthi pārthivam |
AHS2.3.004c/ mṛdv atra mātṛ.jaṁ rakta.māṁsa.majja.gudādikam || 4 ||
[Page 187 ]
AHS2.3.005a/ paitṛkaṁ tu sthiraṁ śukra.dhamany.asthi.kacādikam |
AHS2.3.005c/ caitanaṁ cittam akṣāṇi nānā.yoniṣu janma ca || 5 || [Note: AHS2.3.005v/ 3.5cv ātma.jaṁ cittaṁ akṣāṇi]
AHS2.3.006a/ sātmya.jaṁ tv āyur ārogyam an.ālasyaṁ prabhā balam |
AHS2.3.006c/ rasa.jaṁ vapuṣo janma vṛttir vṛddhir a.lola.tā || 6 || [Note: AHS2.3.006v/ 3.6av sātmya.jaṁ cāyur ārogyam]
AHS2.3.007a/ sāttvikaṁ śaucam āstikyaṁ śukla.dharma.rucir matiḥ |
AHS2.3.007c/ rājasaṁ bahu.bhāṣi.tvaṁ māna.krud.dambha.matsaram || 7 || [Note: AHS2.3.007v/ 3.7dv māna.krud.dambha.matsarāḥ]
AHS2.3.008a/ tāmasaṁ bhayam a.jñānaṁ nidrālasyaṁ viṣādi.tā |
AHS2.3.008c/ iti bhūta.mayo dehas tatra sapta tvaco 'sṛjaḥ || 8 ||
AHS2.3.009a/ pacyamānāt prajāyante kṣīrāt santānikā iva |
AHS2.3.009c/ dhātv.āśayāntara.kledo vipakvaḥ svaṁ svam ūṣmaṇā || 9 ||
AHS2.3.010a/ śleṣma.snāyv.aparācchannaḥ kalākhyaḥ kāṣṭha.sāra.vat |
AHS2.3.010c/ tāḥ sapta sapta cādhārā raktasyādyaḥ kramāt pare || 10 || [Note: AHS2.3.010v/ 3.10ac śleṣma.snāyv.aparā.channaḥ 3.10dv raktasyādhaḥ kramāt pare]
AHS2.3.011a/ kaphāma.pitta.pakvānāṁ vāyor mūtrasya ca smṛtāḥ |
AHS2.3.011c/ garbhāśayo 'ṣṭamaḥ strīṇāṁ pitta.pakvāśayāntare || 11 ||
AHS2.3.012a/ koṣṭhāṅgāni sthitāny eṣu hṛdayaṁ kloma phupphusam |
AHS2.3.012c/ yakṛt.plīhoṇḍukaṁ vṛkkau nābhi.ḍimbāntra.vastayaḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS2.3.012v/ 3.12bv hṛdayaṁ kloma phupphusaḥ 3.12bv hṛdayaṁ kloma.phupphuse]
AHS2.3.013a/ daśa jīvita.dhāmāni śiro.rasana.bandhanam |
AHS2.3.013c/ kaṇṭho 'sraṁ hṛdayaṁ nābhir vastiḥ śukraujasī gudam || 13 || [Note: AHS2.3.013v/ 3.13dv vastiḥ śukraujasī gudaḥ]
AHS2.3.014a/ jālāni kaṇḍarāś cāṅge pṛthak ṣo.ḍaśa nirdiśet |
AHS2.3.014c/ ṣaṭ kūrcāḥ sapta sīvanyo meḍhra.jihvā.śiro.gatāḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS2.3.014v/ 3.14cv ṣaṭ kūrcāḥ sapta sevanyo 3.14cv ṣaṭ kūrcāḥ sapta sevinyo]
[Page 188 ]
AHS2.3.015a/ śastreṇa tāḥ pariharec catasro māṁsa.rajjavaḥ |
AHS2.3.015c/ catur.daśāsthi.saṅghātāḥ sīmantā dvi.guṇā nava || 15 || [Note: AHS2.3.015v/ 3.15av śastreṇaitāḥ pariharec]
AHS2.3.016a/ asthnāṁ śatāni ṣaṣṭiś ca trīṇi danta.nakhaiḥ saha |
AHS2.3.016c/ dhanvantaris tu trīṇy āha sandhīnāṁ ca śata.dvayam || 16 || [Note: AHS2.3.016v/ 3.16av asthnāṁ śatāni ṣaṣṭhīni]
AHS2.3.017a/ daśottaraṁ sahasre dve nijagādātri.nandanaḥ |
AHS2.3.017c/ snāvnāṁ nava.śatī pañca puṁsāṁ peśī.śatāni tu || 17 || [Note: AHS2.3.017v/ 3.17cv snāyor nava.śatī pañca 3.17dv puṁsāṁ peśī.śatāni ca]
AHS2.3.018a/ adhikā viṁśatiḥ strīṇāṁ yoni.stana.samāśritāḥ |
AHS2.3.018c/ daśa mūla.sirā hṛt.sthās tāḥ sarvaṁ sarvato vapuḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS2.3.018v/ 3.18bv yoni.stana.samāśrayāḥ]
AHS2.3.019a/ rasātmakaṁ vahanty ojas tan.nibaddhaṁ hi ceṣṭitam |
AHS2.3.019c/ sthūla.mūlāḥ su.sūkṣmāgrāḥ pattra.rekhā.pratāna.vat || 19 ||
AHS2.3.020a/ bhidyante tās tataḥ sapta.śatāny āsāṁ bhavanti tu |
AHS2.3.020c/ tatraikaikaṁ ca śākhāyāṁ śataṁ tasmin na vedhayet || 20 || [Note: AHS2.3.020v/ 3.20cv tatraikaika.tra śākhāyāṁ]
AHS2.3.021a/ sirāṁ jālan.dharāṁ nāma tisraś cābhyantarāśritāḥ |
AHS2.3.021c/ ṣo.ḍaśa.dvi.guṇāḥ śroṇyāṁ tāsāṁ dve dve tu vaṅkṣaṇe || 21 ||
AHS2.3.022a/ dve dve kaṭīka.taruṇe śastreṇāṣṭau spṛśen na tāḥ |
AHS2.3.022c/ pārśvayoḥ ṣo.ḍaśaikaikām ūrdhva.gāṁ varjayet tayoḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS2.3.022v/ 3.22dv ūrdhva.gāṁ varjayet sirām]
AHS2.3.023a/ dvā.daśa.dvi.guṇāḥ pṛṣṭhe pṛṣṭha.vaṁśasya pārśvayoḥ |
AHS2.3.023c/ dve dve tatrordhva.gāminyau na śastreṇa parāmṛśet || 23 || [Note: AHS2.3.023v/ 3.23bv pṛṣṭha.vaṁśasya pārśva.ge]
AHS2.3.024a/ pṛṣṭha.vaj jaṭhare tāsāṁ mehanasyopari sthite |
AHS2.3.024c/ roma.rājīm ubhayato dve dve śastreṇa na spṛśet || 24 ||
[Page 189 ]
AHS2.3.025a/ catvāriṁśad urasy āsāṁ catur.daśa na vedhayet |
AHS2.3.025c/ stana.rohita.tan.mūla.hṛdaye tu pṛthag dvayam || 25 ||
AHS2.3.026a/ apastambhākhyayor ekāṁ tathāpālāpayor api |
AHS2.3.026c/ grīvāyāṁ pṛṣṭha.vat tāsāṁ nīle manye kṛkāṭike || 26 ||
AHS2.3.027a/ vidhure mātṛkāś cāṣṭau ṣo.ḍaśeti parityajet |
AHS2.3.027c/ hanvoḥ ṣo.ḍaśa tāsāṁ dve sandhi.bandhana.karmaṇī || 27 || [Note: AHS2.3.027v/ 3.27bv ṣo.ḍaśaitāḥ parityajet]
AHS2.3.028a/ jihvāyāṁ hanu.vat tāsām adho dve rasa.bodhane |
AHS2.3.028c/ dve ca vācaḥ.pravartinyau nāsāyāṁ catur.uttarā || 28 ||
AHS2.3.029a/ viṁśatir gandha.vedinyau tāsām ekāṁ ca tālu.gām |
AHS2.3.029c/ ṣaṭ.pañcāśan nayanayor nimeṣonmeṣa.karmaṇī || 29 ||
AHS2.3.030a/ dve dve apāṅgayor dve ca tāsāṁ ṣaḍ iti varjayet |
AHS2.3.030c/ nāsā.netrāśritāḥ ṣaṣṭir lalāṭe sthapanī.śritām || 30 ||
AHS2.3.031a/ tatraikāṁ dve tathāvartau catasraś ca kacānta.gāḥ |
AHS2.3.031c/ saptaivaṁ varjayet tāsāṁ karṇayoḥ ṣo.ḍaśātra tu || 31 ||
AHS2.3.032a/ dve śabda.bodhane śaṅkhau sirās tā eva cāśritāḥ |
AHS2.3.032c/ dve śaṅkha.sandhi.ge tāsāṁ mūrdhni dvā.daśa tatra tu || 32 ||
AHS2.3.033a/ ekaikāṁ pṛthag utkṣepa.sīmantādhipati.sthitām |
AHS2.3.033c/ ity a.vedhya.vibhāgārthaṁ pratyaṅgaṁ varṇitāḥ sirāḥ || 33 ||
AHS2.3.034a/ a.vedhyās tatra kārtsnyena dehe 'ṣṭā.navatis tathā |
AHS2.3.034c/ saṅkīrṇā grathitāḥ kṣudrā vakrāḥ sandhiṣu cāśritāḥ || 34 ||
[Page 190 ]
AHS2.3.035a/ tāsāṁ śatānāṁ saptānāṁ pādo 'sraṁ vahate pṛthak |
