AHS2.3.035c/ vāta.pitta.kaphair juṣṭaṁ śuddhaṁ caivaṁ sthitā malāḥ || 35 ||
AHS2.3.036a/ śarīram anugṛhṇanti pīḍayanty anya.thā punaḥ |
AHS2.3.036c/ tatra śyāvāruṇāḥ sūkṣmāḥ pūrṇa.riktāḥ kṣaṇāt sirāḥ || 36 ||
AHS2.3.037a/ praspandinyaś ca vātāsraṁ vahante pitta.śoṇitam |
AHS2.3.037c/ sparśoṣṇāḥ śīghra.vāhinyo nīla.pītāḥ kaphaṁ punaḥ || 37 ||
AHS2.3.038a/ gauryaḥ snigdhāḥ sthirāḥ śītāḥ saṁsṛṣṭaṁ liṅga.saṅkare |
AHS2.3.038c/ gūḍhāḥ sama.sthitāḥ snigdhā rohiṇyaḥ śuddha.śoṇitam || 38 ||
AHS2.3.039a/ dhamanyo nābhi.sambaddhā viṁśatiś catur.uttarā |
AHS2.3.039c/ tābhiḥ parivṛtā nābhiś cakra.nābhir ivārakaiḥ || 39 || [Note: AHS2.3.039v/ 3.39cv tābhiḥ parivṛto nābhiś]
AHS2.3.040a/ tābhiś cordhvam adhas tiryag deho 'yam anugṛhyate |
AHS2.3.040c/ srotāṁsi nāsike karṇau netre pāyv.āsya.mehanam || 40 ||
AHS2.3.041a/ stanau rakta.pathaś ceti nārīṇām adhikaṁ trayam |
AHS2.3.041c/ jīvitāyatanāny antaḥ srotāṁsy āhus trayo.daśa || 41 ||
AHS2.3.042a/ prāṇa.dhātu.malāmbho.'nna.vāhīny a.hita.sevanāt |
AHS2.3.042c/ tāni duṣṭāni rogāya viśuddhāni sukhāya ca || 42 ||
AHS2.3.043a/ sva.dhātu.sama.varṇāni vṛtta.sthūlāny aṇūni ca |
AHS2.3.043c/ srotāṁsi dīrghāṇy ākṛtyā pratāna.sadṛśāni ca || 43 ||
AHS2.3.044a/ āhāraś ca vihāraś ca yaḥ syād doṣa.guṇaiḥ samaḥ |
AHS2.3.044c/ dhātubhir vi.guṇo yaś ca srotasāṁ sa pradūṣakaḥ || 44 ||
[Page 191 ]
AHS2.3.045a/ ati.pravṛttiḥ saṅgo vā sirāṇāṁ granthayo 'pi vā |
AHS2.3.045c/ vi.mārgato vā gamanaṁ srotasāṁ duṣṭi.lakṣaṇam || 45 || [Note: AHS2.3.045v/ 3.45dv srotasāṁ duṣṭa.lakṣaṇam]
AHS2.3.046a/ bisānām iva sūkṣmāṇi dūraṁ pravisṛtāni ca |
AHS2.3.046c/ dvārāṇi srotasāṁ dehe raso yair upacīyate || 46 ||
AHS2.3.047a/ vyadhe tu srotasāṁ moha.kampādhmāna.vami.jvarāḥ |
AHS2.3.047c/ pralāpa.śūla.viṇ.mūtra.rodhā maraṇam eva vā || 47 ||
AHS2.3.048a/ sroto.viddham ato vaidyaḥ pratyākhyāya prasādhayet |
AHS2.3.048c/ uddhṛtya śalyaṁ yatnena sadyaḥ.kṣata.vidhānataḥ || 48 ||
AHS2.3.049a/ annasya paktā pittaṁ tu pācakākhyaṁ pureritam |
AHS2.3.049c/ doṣa.dhātu.malādīnām ūṣmety ātreya.śāsanam || 49 ||
AHS2.3.049+1a/ vāma.pārśvāśritaṁ nābheḥ kiñ.cit sūryasya maṇḍalam |
AHS2.3.049+1c/ tan.madhye maṇḍalaṁ saumyaṁ tan.madhye 'gnir vyavasthitaḥ || 49+1 ||
AHS2.3.049+2ab/ jarāyu.mātra.pracchannaḥ kāca.kośa.stha.dīpa.vat || 49+2ab ||
AHS2.3.050a/ tad.adhiṣṭhānam annasya grahaṇād grahaṇī matā |
AHS2.3.050c/ saiva dhanvantari.mate kalā pitta.dharāhvayā || 50 ||
AHS2.3.051a/ āyur.ārogya.vīryaujo.bhūta.dhātv.agni.puṣṭaye |
AHS2.3.051c/ sthitā pakvāśaya.dvāri bhukta.mārgārgaleva sā || 51 || [Note: AHS2.3.051v/ 3.51dv bhukta.mārgārgaleva yā]
AHS2.3.052a/ bhuktam āmāśaye ruddhvā sā vipācya nayaty adhaḥ |
AHS2.3.052c/ bala.vaty a.balā tv annam āmam eva vimuñcati || 52 ||
[Page 192 ]
AHS2.3.053a/ grahaṇyā balam agnir hi sa cāpi grahaṇī.balaḥ |
AHS2.3.053c/ dūṣite 'gnāv ato duṣṭā grahaṇī roga.kāriṇī || 53 ||
AHS2.3.054a/ yad annaṁ deha.dhātv.ojo.bala.varṇādi.poṣaṇam |
AHS2.3.054c/ tatrāgnir hetur āhārān na hy a.pakvād rasādayaḥ || 54 ||
AHS2.3.055a/ annaṁ kāle 'bhyavahṛtaṁ koṣṭhaṁ prāṇānilāhṛtam |
AHS2.3.055c/ dravair vibhinna.saṅghātaṁ nītaṁ snehena mārdavam || 55 || [Note: AHS2.3.055v/ 3.55bv koṣṭhe prāṇānilāhṛtam]
AHS2.3.056a/ sandhukṣitaḥ samānena pacaty āmāśaya.sthitam |
AHS2.3.056c/ audaryo 'gnir yathā bāhyaḥ sthālī.sthaṁ toya.taṇḍulam || 56 ||
AHS2.3.057a/ ādau ṣaḍ.rasam apy annaṁ madhurī.bhūtam īrayet |
AHS2.3.057c/ phenī.bhūtaṁ kaphaṁ yātaṁ vidāhād amla.tāṁ tataḥ || 57 || [Note: AHS2.3.057v/ 3.57cv phena.bhūtaṁ kaphaṁ yātaṁ]
AHS2.3.058a/ pittam āmāśayāt kuryāc cyavamānaṁ cyutaṁ punaḥ |
AHS2.3.058c/ agninā śoṣitaṁ pakvaṁ piṇḍitaṁ kaṭu mārutam || 58 ||
AHS2.3.059a/ bhaumāpyāgneya.vāyavyāḥ pañcoṣmāṇaḥ sa.nābhasāḥ |
AHS2.3.059c/ pañcāhāra.guṇān svān svān pārthivādīn pacanty anu || 59 ||
AHS2.3.060a/ yathā.svaṁ te ca puṣṇanti pakvā bhūta.guṇān pṛthak |
AHS2.3.060c/ pārthivāḥ pārthivān eva śeṣāḥ śeṣāṁś ca deha.gān || 60 || [Note: AHS2.3.060v/ 3.60av yathā.svaṁ te ca puṣyanti]
AHS2.3.061a/ kiṭṭaṁ sāraś ca tat pakvam annaṁ sambhavati dvi.dhā |
AHS2.3.061c/ tatrācchaṁ kiṭṭam annasya mūtraṁ vidyād ghanam śakṛt || 61 || [Note: AHS2.3.061v/ 3.61av kiṭṭaṁ sāras tathā pakvam]
AHS2.3.062a/ sāras tu saptabhir bhūyo yathā.svaṁ pacyate 'gnibhiḥ |
AHS2.3.062c/ rasād raktaṁ tato māṁsaṁ māṁsān medas tato 'sthi ca || 62 || [Note: AHS2.3.062v/ 3.62dv māṁsān medo 'sthi medasaḥ]
[Page 193 ]
AHS2.3.063a/ asthno majjā tataḥ śukraṁ śukrād garbhaḥ prajāyate |
AHS2.3.063c/ kaphaḥ pittaṁ malāḥ kheṣu prasvedo nakha.roma ca || 63 || [Note: AHS2.3.063v/ 3.63cv kaphaḥ pittaṁ malaḥ kheṣu]
AHS2.3.064a/ sneho 'kṣi.tvag.viṣām ojo dhātūnāṁ krama.śo malāḥ |
AHS2.3.064c/ prasāda.kiṭṭau dhātūnāṁ pākād evaṁ dvi.dharcchataḥ || 64 ||
AHS2.3.065a/ paras.paropasaṁstambhād dhātu.sneha.param.parā |
AHS2.3.065c/ ke.cid āhur aho.rātrāt ṣaḍ.ahād apare pare || 65 ||
AHS2.3.066a/ māsena yāti śukra.tvam annaṁ pāka.kramādibhiḥ |
AHS2.3.066c/ santatā bhojya.dhātūnāṁ parivṛttis tu cakra.vat || 66 ||
AHS2.3.067a/ vṛṣyādīni prabhāveṇa sadyaḥ śukrādi kurvate |
AHS2.3.067c/ prāyaḥ karoty aho.rātrāt karmānyad api bheṣajam || 67 || [Note: AHS2.3.067v/ 3.67bv sadyaḥ śukraṁ prakurvate]
AHS2.3.068a/ vyānena rasa.dhātur hi vikṣepocita.karmaṇā |
AHS2.3.068c/ yuga.pat sarvato 'jasraṁ dehe vikṣipyate sadā || 68 ||
AHS2.3.069a/ kṣipyamāṇaḥ kha.vaiguṇyād rasaḥ sajjati yatra saḥ |
AHS2.3.069c/ tasmin vikāraṁ kurute khe varṣam iva toya.daḥ || 69 ||
AHS2.3.070a/ doṣāṇām api caivaṁ syād eka.deśa.prakopaṇam |
AHS2.3.070c/ anna.bhautika.dhātv.agni.karmeti paribhāṣitam || 70 ||
AHS2.3.071a/ annasya paktā sarveṣāṁ paktṝṇām adhiko mataḥ |
AHS2.3.071c/ tan.mūlās te hi tad.vṛddhi.kṣaya.vṛddhi.kṣayātmakāḥ || 71 ||
AHS2.3.072a/ tasmāt taṁ vidhi.vad yuktair anna.pānendhanair hitaiḥ |
AHS2.3.072c/ pālayet prayatas tasya sthitau hy āyur.bala.sthitiḥ || 72 ||
[Page 194 ]
AHS2.3.073a/ samaḥ samāne sthāna.sthe viṣamo 'gnir vi.mārga.ge |
AHS2.3.073c/ pittābhimūrchite tīkṣṇo mando 'smin kapha.pīḍite || 73 ||
AHS2.3.074a/ samo 'gnir viṣamas tīkṣṇo mandaś caivaṁ catur.vidhaḥ |
AHS2.3.074c/ yaḥ pacet samyag evānnaṁ bhuktaṁ samyak samas tv asau || 74 || [Note: AHS2.3.074v/ 3.74dv bhuktaṁ samyak samas tu saḥ]
AHS2.3.075a/ viṣamo '.samyag apy āśu samyag vāpi cirāt pacet |
AHS2.3.075c/ tīkṣṇo vahniḥ pacec chīghram a.samyag api bhojanam || 75 || [Note: AHS2.3.075v/ 3.75av viṣamo '.samyag evāśu 3.75bv samyag eva cirāt pacet]
AHS2.3.076a/ mandas tu samyag apy annam upayuktaṁ cirāt pacet |
AHS2.3.076c/ kṛtvāsya.śoṣāṭopāntra.kūjanādhmāna.gauravam || 76 || [Note: AHS2.3.076v/ 3.76bv upabhuktaṁ cirāt pacet]
AHS2.3.076+1a/ śānte 'gnau mriyate yukte ciraṁ jīvaty an.āmayaḥ |
AHS2.3.076+1c/ rogī syād vikṛte mūlam agni.stambhān nirucyate || 76+1 || [Note: AHS2.3.076+1v/ 3.76+1dv agni.stambhān nirūpyate]
AHS2.3.077a/ saha.jaṁ kāla.jaṁ yukti.kṛtaṁ deha.balaṁ tri.dhā |
AHS2.3.077c/ tatra sat.tva.śarīrotthaṁ prākṛtaṁ saha.jaṁ balam || 77 ||
AHS2.3.078a/ vayaḥ.kṛtam ṛtūtthaṁ ca kāla.jaṁ yukti.jaṁ punaḥ |
AHS2.3.078c/ vihārāhāra.janitaṁ tathorjas.kara.yoga.jam || 78 ||
AHS2.3.079a/ deśo 'lpa.vāri.dru.nago jāṅgalaḥ sv.alpa.roga.daḥ |
AHS2.3.079c/ ānūpo viparīto 'smāt samaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ || 79 ||
AHS2.3.080a/ majja.medo.vasā.mūtra.pitta.śleṣma.śakṛnty asṛk |
AHS2.3.080c/ raso jalaṁ ca dehe 'sminn ekaikāñjali.vardhitam || 80 ||
AHS2.3.081a/ pṛthak sva.prasṛtaṁ proktam ojo.mastiṣka.retasām |
AHS2.3.081c/ dvāv añjalī tu stanyasya catvāro rajasaḥ striyāḥ || 81 ||
[Page 195 ]
AHS2.3.082ab/ sama.dhātor idaṁ mānaṁ vidyād vṛddhi.kṣayāv ataḥ || 82ab ||
AHS2.3.083a/ śukrāsṛg.garbhiṇī.bhojya.ceṣṭā.garbhāśayartuṣu |
AHS2.3.083c/ yaḥ syād doṣo 'dhikas tena prakṛtiḥ sapta.dhoditā || 83 || [Note: AHS2.3.083v/ 3.83dv prakṛtiḥ sapta.dhā smṛtā]
AHS2.3.084a/ vibhu.tvād āśu.kāri.tvād bali.tvād anya.kopanāt |
AHS2.3.084c/ svātantryād bahu.roga.tvād doṣāṇāṁ prabalo 'nilaḥ || 84 ||
AHS2.3.085a/ prāyo 'ta eva pavanādhyuṣitā manuṣyā doṣātmakāḥ sphuṭita.dhūsara.keśa.gātrāḥ |
AHS2.3.085c/ śīta.dviṣaś cala.dhṛti.smṛti.buddhi.ceṣṭā.sauhārda.dṛṣṭi.gatayo 'ti.bahu.pralāpāḥ || 85 ||
AHS2.3.086a/ alpa.vitta.bala.jīvita.nidrāḥ sanna.sakta.cala.jarjara.vācaḥ |
AHS2.3.086c/ nāstikā bahu.bhujaḥ sa.vilāsā gīta.hāsa.mṛgayā.kali.lolāḥ || 86 || [Note: AHS2.3.086v/ 3.86av alpa.pitta.kapha.jīvita.nidrāḥ 3.86av alpa.vitta.kapha.jīvita.nidrāḥ 3.86av alpa.pitta.bala.jīvita.nidrāḥ]
AHS2.3.087a/ madhurāmla.paṭūṣṇa.sātmya.kāṅkṣāḥ kṛśa.dīrghākṛtayaḥ sa.śabda.yātāḥ |
AHS2.3.087c/ na dṛḍhā na jitendriyā na cāryā na ca kāntā.dayitā bahu.prajā vā || 87 || [Note: AHS2.3.087v/ 3.87bv kṛśa.dīrghākṛtayaḥ sa.śabda.yānāḥ]
AHS2.3.088a/ netrāṇi caiṣāṁ khara.dhūsarāṇi vṛttāny a.cārūṇi mṛtopamāni |
AHS2.3.088c/ unmīlitānīva bhavanti supte śaila.drumāṁs te gaganaṁ ca yānti || 88 || [Note: AHS2.3.088v/ 3.88av netrāṇi vaiṣāṁ khara.dhūsarāṇi]
AHS2.3.089a/ a.dhanyā matsarādhmātāḥ stenāḥ prodbaddha.piṇḍikāḥ |
AHS2.3.089c/ śva.śṛgāloṣṭra.gṛdhrākhu.kākānūkāś ca vātikāḥ || 89 || [Note: AHS2.3.089v/ 3.89bv stenāḥ prodvṛtta.piṇḍikāḥ]
AHS2.3.090a/ pittaṁ vahnir vahni.jaṁ vā yad asmāt pittodriktas tīkṣṇa.tṛṣṇā.bubhukṣaḥ |
AHS2.3.090c/ gauroṣṇāṅgas tāmra.hastāṅghri.vaktraḥ śūro mānī piṅga.keśo 'lpa.romā || 90 || [Note: AHS2.3.090v/ 3.90bv pittodriktas tīvra.tṛṣṇā.bubhukṣaḥ]
AHS2.3.091a/ dayita.mālya.vilepana.maṇḍanaḥ su.caritaḥ śucir āśrita.vatsalaḥ |
AHS2.3.091c/ vibhava.sāhasa.buddhi.balānvito bhavati bhīṣu gatir dviṣatām api || 91 ||
[Page 196 ]
AHS2.3.092a/ medhāvī pra.śithila.sandhi.bandha.māṁso nārīṇām an.abhimato 'lpa.śukra.kāmaḥ |
AHS2.3.092c/ āvāsaḥ palita.taraṅga.nīlikānāṁ bhuṅkte 'nnaṁ madhura.kaṣāya.tikta.śītam || 92 ||
AHS2.3.093a/ gharma.dveṣī svedanaḥ pūti.gandhir bhūry.uccāra.krodha.pānāśanerṣyaḥ |
AHS2.3.093c/ suptaḥ paśyet karṇikārān palāśān dig.dāholkā.vidyud.arkānalāṁś ca || 93 ||
AHS2.3.094a/ tanūni piṅgāni calāni caiṣāṁ tanv.alpa.pakṣmāṇi hima.priyāṇi |
AHS2.3.094c/ krodhena madyena raveś ca bhāsā rāgaṁ vrajanty āśu vilocanāni || 94 || [Note: AHS2.3.094v/ 3.94av tanūni piṅgāni calāni vaiṣāṁ]
AHS2.3.095a/ madhyāyuṣo madhya.balāḥ piṇḍitāḥ kleśa.bhīravaḥ |
AHS2.3.095c/ vyāghrarkṣa.kapi.mārjāra.yakṣānūkāś ca paittikāḥ || 95 || [Note: AHS2.3.095v/ 3.95dv .vṛkānūkāś ca paittikāḥ]
AHS2.3.096a/ śleṣmā somaḥ śleṣmalas tena saumyo gūḍha.snigdha.śliṣṭa.sandhy.asthi.māṁsaḥ |
AHS2.3.096c/ kṣut.tṛḍ.duḥkha.kleśa.gharmair a.tapto buddhyā yuktaḥ sāttvikaḥ satya.sandhaḥ || 96 ||
AHS2.3.097a/ priyaṅgu.dūrvā.śara.kāṇḍa.śastra. go.rocanā.padma.suvarṇa.varṇaḥ |
AHS2.3.097c/ pralamba.bāhuḥ pṛthu.pīna.vakṣā mahā.lalāṭo ghana.nīla.keśaḥ || 97 ||
AHS2.3.098a/ mṛdv.aṅgaḥ sama.su.vibhakta.cāru.deho bahv.ojo.rati.rasa.śukra.putra.bhṛtyaḥ |
AHS2.3.098c/ dharmātmā vadati na niṣṭhuraṁ ca jātu pracchannaṁ vahati dṛḍhaṁ ciraṁ ca vairam || 98 || [Note: AHS2.3.098v/ 3.98av mṛdv.aṅgaḥ sama.su.vibhakta.cāru.varṣmā]
AHS2.3.099a/ sa.mada.dvi.radendra.tulya.yāto jala.dāmbho.dhi.mṛdaṅga.siṁha.ghoṣaḥ |
AHS2.3.099c/ smṛti.mān abhiyoga.vān vinīto na ca bālye 'py ati.rodano na lolaḥ || 99 || [Note: AHS2.3.099v/ 3.99bv jala.dāmbho.dhi.mṛdaṅga.śaṅkha.ghoṣaḥ]
AHS2.3.100a/ tiktaṁ kaṣāyaṁ kaṭukoṣṇa.rūkṣam alpaṁ sa bhuṅkte bala.vāṁs tathāpi |
AHS2.3.100c/ raktānta.su.snigdha.viśāla.dīrgha. su.vyakta.śuklāsita.pakṣmalākṣaḥ || 100 ||
AHS2.3.101a/ alpa.vyāhāra.krodha.pānāśanehaḥ prājyāyur.vitto dīrgha.darśī vadānyaḥ |
AHS2.3.101c/ śrāddho gambhīraḥ sthūla.lakṣaḥ kṣamā.vān āryo nidrālur dīrgha.sūtraḥ kṛta.jñaḥ || 101 || [Note: AHS2.3.101v/ 3.101av alpa.vyāhāra.krodha.pānāśanerṣyaḥ 3.101bv prājyāyur.vṛtto dīrgha.darśī vadānyaḥ 3.101cv śrāddho gambhīraḥ sthūla.lakṣyaḥ kṣamā.vān 3.101dv āryo nidrālur dīrgha.sūtrī kṛta.jñaḥ]
[Page 197 ]
AHS2.3.102a/ ṛjur vipaścit su.bhagaḥ su.lajjo bhakto gurūṇāṁ sthira.sauhṛdaś ca |
AHS2.3.102c/ svapne sa.padmān sa.vihaṅga.mālāṁs toyāśayān paśyati toya.dāṁś ca || 102 || [Note: AHS2.3.102v/ 3.102av ṛjur vipaścit su.bhagaḥ sa.lajjo]
AHS2.3.103a/ brahma.rudrendra.varuṇa.tārkṣya.haṁsa.gajādhipaiḥ |
AHS2.3.103c/ śleṣma.prakṛtayas tulyās tathā siṁhāśva.go.vṛṣaiḥ || 103 ||
AHS2.3.104a/ prakṛtīr dvaya.sarvotthā dvandva.sarva.guṇodaye |
AHS2.3.104c/ śaucāstikyādibhiś caivaṁ guṇair guṇa.mayīr vadet || 104 ||
AHS2.3.105a/ vayas tv ā.ṣo.ḍaśād bālaṁ tatra dhātv.indriyaujasām |
AHS2.3.105c/ vṛddhir ā.saptater madhyaṁ tatrā.vṛddhiḥ paraṁ kṣayaḥ || 105 ||
AHS2.3.106a/ svaṁ svaṁ hasta.trayaṁ sārdhaṁ vapuḥ pātraṁ sukhāyuṣoḥ |
AHS2.3.106c/ na ca yad yuktam udriktair aṣṭābhir ninditair nijaiḥ || 106 ||
AHS2.3.107a/ a.romaśāsita.sthūla.dīrgha.tvaiḥ sa.viparyayaiḥ |
AHS2.3.107c/ su.snigdhā mṛdavaḥ sūkṣmā naika.mūlāḥ sthirāḥ kacāḥ || 107 ||
AHS2.3.108a/ lalāṭam unnataṁ śliṣṭa.śaṅkham ardhendu.sannibham |
AHS2.3.108c/ karṇau nīconnatau paścān mahāntau śliṣṭa.māṁsalau || 108 ||
AHS2.3.109a/ netre vyaktāsita.site su.baddha.ghana.pakṣmaṇī |
AHS2.3.109c/ unnatāgrā mahocchvāsā pīnarjur nāsikā samā || 109 || [Note: AHS2.3.109v/ 3.109bv su.baddhe ghana.pakṣmaṇī]
AHS2.3.110a/ oṣṭhau raktāv an.udvṛttau mahatyau nolbaṇe hanū |
AHS2.3.110c/ mahad āsyaṁ ghanā dantāḥ snigdhāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ sitāḥ samāḥ || 110 ||
AHS2.3.111a/ jihvā raktāyatā tanvī māṁsalaṁ cibukaṁ mahat |
AHS2.3.111c/ grīvā hrasvā ghanā vṛttā skandhāv unnata.pīvarau || 111 ||
[Page 198 ]
AHS2.3.112a/ udaraṁ dakṣiṇāvarta.gūḍha.nābhi samunnatam |
AHS2.3.112c/ tanu.raktonnata.nakhaṁ snigdhaṁ ā.tāmra.māṁsalam || 112 ||
AHS2.3.113a/ dīrghā.cchidrāṅguli mahat pāṇi.pādaṁ pratiṣṭhitam |
AHS2.3.113c/ gūḍha.vaṁśaṁ bṛhat pṛṣṭhaṁ nigūḍhāḥ sandhayo dṛḍhāḥ || 113 || [Note: AHS2.3.113v/ 3.113cv gūḍha.vaṁśaṁ mahat pṛṣṭhaṁ]
AHS2.3.114a/ dhīraḥ svaro 'nunādī ca varṇaḥ snigdhaḥ sthira.prabhaḥ |
AHS2.3.114c/ sva.bhāva.jaṁ sthiraṁ sat.tvam a.vikāri vipatsv api || 114 ||
AHS2.3.115a/ uttarottara.su.kṣetraṁ vapur garbhādi.nī.rujam |
AHS2.3.115c/ āyāma.jñāna.vijñānair vardhamānaṁ śanaiḥ śubham || 115 ||
AHS2.3.116a/ iti sarva.guṇopete śarīre śaradāṁ śatam |
AHS2.3.116c/ āyur aiśvaryam iṣṭāś ca sarve bhāvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ || 116 ||
AHS2.3.117a/ tvag.raktādīni sat.tvāntāny agryāṇy aṣṭau yathottaram |
AHS2.3.117c/ bala.pramāṇa.jñānārthaṁ sārāṇy uktāni dehinām || 117 || [Note: AHS2.3.117v/ 3.117bv agrāṇy aṣṭau yathottaram]
AHS2.3.118a/ sārair upetaḥ sarvaiḥ syāt paraṁ gaurava.saṁyutaḥ |
AHS2.3.118c/ sarvārambheṣu cāśā.vān sahiṣṇuḥ san.matiḥ sthiraḥ || 118 || [Note: AHS2.3.118v/ 3.118dv sahiṣṇuḥ su.matiḥ sthiraḥ]
AHS2.3.119a/ an.utsekaṁ a.dainyaṁ ca sukhaṁ duḥkhaṁ ca sevate |
AHS2.3.119c/ sat.tva.vāṁs tapyamānas tu rājaso naiva tāmasaḥ || 119 || [Note: AHS2.3.119v/ 3.119cv sat.tva.vān stabhyamānas tu]
AHS2.3.120a/ dāna.śīla.dayā.satya.brahma.carya.kṛta.jña.tāḥ |
AHS2.3.120c/ rasāyanāni maitrī ca puṇyāyur.vṛddhi.kṛd gaṇaḥ || 120 ||

2.4. Chapter 4 :: Athamarmavibhāgaśārīrādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 215-222]
AHS2.4.001a/ saptottaraṁ marma.śataṁ teṣām ekā.daśādiśet |
AHS2.4.001c/ pṛthak sakthnos tathā bāhvos trīṇi koṣṭhe navorasi || 1 ||
[Page 199 ]
AHS2.4.002a/ pṛṣṭhe catur.daśordhvaṁ tu jatros triṁśac ca sapta ca |
AHS2.4.002c/ madhye pāda.talasyāhur abhito madhyamāṅgulīm || 2 ||
AHS2.4.003a/ tala.hṛn nāma rujayā tatra viddhasya pañca.tā |
AHS2.4.003c/ aṅguṣṭhāṅguli.madhya.sthaṁ kṣipraṁ ākṣepa.māraṇam || 3 ||
AHS2.4.004a/ tasyordhvaṁ dvy.aṅgule kūrcaḥ pāda.bhramaṇa.kampa.kṛt |
AHS2.4.004c/ gulpha.sandher adhaḥ kūrca.śiraḥ śopha.rujā.karam || 4 ||
AHS2.4.005a/ jaṅghā.caraṇayoḥ sandhau gulpho ruk.stambha.māndya.kṛt |
AHS2.4.005c/ jaṅghāntare tv indra.vastir mārayaty asṛjaḥ kṣayāt || 5 || [Note: AHS2.4.005v/ 4.5bv gulpho ruk.stambha.ṣāṇḍhya.kṛt 4.5bv gulpho ruk.stambha.khāñjya.kṛt 4.5bv gulpho ruk.stambha.jāḍya.kṛt]
AHS2.4.006a/ jaṅghorvoḥ saṅgame jānu khañja.tā tatra jīvataḥ |
AHS2.4.006c/ jānunas try.aṅgulād ūrdhvam āṇy.ūru.stambha.śopha.kṛt || 6 ||
AHS2.4.007a/ urvy ūru.madhye tad.vedhāt sakthi.śoṣo 'sra.saṅkṣayāt |
AHS2.4.007c/ ūru.mūle lohitākṣaṁ hanti pakṣam asṛk.kṣayāt || 7 || [Note: AHS2.4.007v/ 4.7cv ūru.mūle lohitākhyaṁ]
AHS2.4.008a/ muṣka.vaṅkṣaṇayor madhye viṭapaṁ ṣaṇḍha.tā.karam |
AHS2.4.008c/ iti sakthnos tathā bāhvor maṇi.bandho 'tra gulpha.vat || 8 || [Note: AHS2.4.008v/ 4.8bv viṭipaṁ ṣaṇḍha.tā.karam]
AHS2.4.009a/ kūrparaṁ jānu.vat kauṇyaṁ tayor viṭapa.vat punaḥ |
AHS2.4.009c/ kakṣākṣa.madhye kakṣā.dhṛk kuṇi.tvaṁ tatra jāyate || 9 ||
AHS2.4.010a/ sthūlāntra.baddhaḥ sadyo.ghno viḍ.vāta.vamano gudaḥ |
AHS2.4.010c/ mūtrāśayo dhanur.vakro vastir alpāsra.māṁsa.gaḥ || 10 ||
AHS2.4.011a/ ekādho.vadano madhye kaṭyāḥ sadyo nihanty asūn |
AHS2.4.011c/ ṛte 'śmarī.vraṇād viddhas tatrāpy ubhayataś ca saḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS2.4.011v/ 4.11dv tatrāpy ubhayataś ca yaḥ]
[Page 200 ]
AHS2.4.012a/ mūtra.srāvy ekato bhinne vraṇo rohec ca yatnataḥ |
AHS2.4.012c/ dehāma.pakva.sthānānāṁ madhye sarva.sirāśrayaḥ || 12 ||
AHS2.4.013a/ nābhiḥ so 'pi hi sadyo.ghno dvāram āmāśayasya ca |
AHS2.4.013c/ sat.tvādi.dhāma hṛdayaṁ stanoraḥ.koṣṭha.madhya.gam || 13 ||
AHS2.4.014a/ stana.rohita.mūlākhye dvy.aṅgule stanayor vadet |
AHS2.4.014c/ ūrdhvādho 'sra.kaphāpūrṇa.koṣṭho naśyet tayoḥ kramāt || 14 || [Note: AHS2.4.014v/ 4.14cv ūrdhvādho 'sṛk.kaphāpūrṇa.]
AHS2.4.015a/ apastambhāv uraḥ.pārśve nāḍyāv anila.vāhinī |
AHS2.4.015c/ raktena pūrṇa.koṣṭho 'tra śvāsāt kāsāc ca naśyati || 15 || [Note: AHS2.4.015v/ 4.15cv raktasya pūrṇa.koṣṭho 'tra]
AHS2.4.016a/ pṛṣṭha.vaṁśorasor madhye tayor eva ca pārśvayoḥ |
AHS2.4.016c/ adho 'ṁsa.kūṭayor vidyād apālāpākhya.marmaṇī || 16 ||
AHS2.4.017a/ tayoḥ koṣṭhe 'sṛjā pūrṇe naśyed yātena pūya.tām |
AHS2.4.017c/ pārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭha.vaṁśasya śroṇi.karṇau prati sthite || 17 || [Note: AHS2.4.017v/ 4.17dv śroṇi.karṇa.pratiṣṭhite 4.17dv śroṇi.karṇau pratiṣṭhitau]
AHS2.4.018a/ vaṁśāśrite sphijor ūrdhvaṁ kaṭīka.taruṇe smṛte |
AHS2.4.018c/ tatra rakta.kṣayāt pāṇdur hīna.rūpo vinaśyati || 18 ||
AHS2.4.019a/ pṛṣṭha.vaṁśaṁ hy ubhayato yau sandhī kaṭi.pārśvayoḥ |
AHS2.4.019c/ jaghanasya bahir.bhāge marmaṇī tau kukundarau || 19 || [Note: AHS2.4.019v/ 4.19av pṛṣṭha.vaṁśasyobhayato]
AHS2.4.020a/ ceṣṭā.hānir adhaḥ.kāye sparśā.jñānaṁ ca tad.vyadhāt |
AHS2.4.020c/ pārśvāntara.nibaddhau yāv upari śroṇi.karṇayoḥ || 20 ||
AHS2.4.021a/ āśaya.cchādanau tau tu nitambau taruṇāsthi.gau |
AHS2.4.021c/ adhaḥ.śarīre śopho 'tra daurbalyaṁ maraṇaṁ tataḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS2.4.021v/ 4.21av āśayācchādanau tau tu]
[Page 201 ]
AHS2.4.022a/ pārśvāntara.nibaddhau ca madhye jaghana.pārśvayoḥ |
AHS2.4.022c/ tiryag ūrdhvaṁ ca nirdiṣṭau pārśva.sandhī tayor vyadhāt || 22 || [Note: AHS2.4.022v/ 4.22bv madhyau jaghana.pārśvayoḥ 4.22cv nirdiṣṭau pārśva.sandhī tau 4.22dv tiryag ūrdhvaṁ tayor vyadhāt]
AHS2.4.023a/ rakta.pūrita.koṣṭhasya śarīrāntara.sambhavaḥ |
AHS2.4.023c/ stana.mūlārjave bhāge pṛṣṭha.vaṁśāśraye sire || 23 ||
AHS2.4.024a/ bṛhatyau tatra viddhasya maraṇaṁ rakta.saṅkṣayāt |
AHS2.4.024c/ bāhu.mūlābhisambaddhe pṛṣṭha.vaṁśasya pārśvayoḥ || 24 ||
AHS2.4.025a/ aṁsayoḥ phalake bāhu.svāpa.śoṣau tayor vyadhāt |
AHS2.4.025c/ grīvām ubhayataḥ snāvnī grīvā.bāhu.śiro.'ntare || 25 || [Note: AHS2.4.025v/ 4.25bv .svāpa.śoṣau tayor vyadhe 4.25bv .svāpa.śophau tayor vyadhe 4.25bv .svāpa.śophau tayor vyadhāt]
AHS2.4.026a/ skandhāṁsa.pīṭha.sambandhāv aṁsau bāhu.kriyā.harau |
AHS2.4.026c/ kaṇṭha.nālīm ubhayataḥ sirā hanu.samāśritāḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS2.4.026v/ 4.26av skandhāṁsa.pīṭha.baddhārthāv 4.26av skandhāṁsa.pīṭha.bandhārthāv 4.26av skandhāṁsa.pīṭha.sambaddhāv]
AHS2.4.027a/ catasras tāsu nīle dve manye dve marmaṇī smṛte |
AHS2.4.027c/ svara.praṇāśa.vaikṛtyaṁ rasā.jñānaṁ ca tad.vyadhe || 27 || [Note: AHS2.4.027v/ 4.27cv svara.praṇāśa.vaikṛtya. 4.27cv svara.praṇāśo vaikṛtyaṁ 4.27dv .rasā.jñānaṁ ca tad.vyadhe]
AHS2.4.028a/ kaṇṭha.nālīm ubhayato jihvā.nāsā.gatāḥ sirāḥ |
AHS2.4.028c/ pṛthak catasras tāḥ sadyo ghnanty asūn mātṛkāhvayāḥ || 28 ||
AHS2.4.029a/ kṛkāṭike śiro.grīvā.sandhau tatra calaṁ śiraḥ |
AHS2.4.029c/ adhas.tāt karṇayor nimne vidhure śruti.hāriṇī || 29 || [Note: AHS2.4.029v/ 4.29bv .sandhī tatra calaṁ śiraḥ]
AHS2.4.030a/ phaṇāv ubhayato ghrāṇa.mārgaṁ śrotra.pathānugau |
AHS2.4.030c/ antar.gala.sthitau vedhād gandha.vijñāna.hāriṇau || 30 ||
AHS2.4.031a/ netrayor bāhyato 'pāṅgau bhruvoḥ pucchāntayor adhaḥ |
AHS2.4.031c/ tathopari bhruvor nimnāv āvartāv āndhyam eṣu tu || 31 ||
[Page 202 ]
AHS2.4.032a/ anu.karṇaṁ lalāṭānte śaṅkhau sadyo.vināśanau |
AHS2.4.032c/ keśānte śaṅkhayor ūrdhvam utkṣepau sthapani punaḥ || 32 ||
AHS2.4.033a/ bhruvor madhye traye 'py atra śalye jīved an.uddhṛte |
AHS2.4.033c/ svayaṁ vā patite pākāt sadyo naśyati tūddhṛte || 33 ||
AHS2.4.034a/ jihvākṣi.nāsikā.śrotra.kha.catuṣṭaya.saṅgame |
AHS2.4.034c/ tālūny āsyāni catvāri srotasāṁ teṣu marmasu || 34 ||
AHS2.4.035a/ viddhaḥ śṛṅgāṭakākhyeṣu sadyas tyajati jīvitam |
AHS2.4.035c/ kapāle sandhayaḥ pañca sīmantās tiryag.ūrdhva.gāḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS2.4.035v/ 4.35cv kapāla.sandhayaḥ pañca]
AHS2.4.036a/ bhramonmāda.mano.nāśais teṣu viddheṣu naśyati |
AHS2.4.036c/ āntaro mastakasyordhvaṁ sirā.sandhi.samāgamaḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS2.4.036v/ 4.36cv antare mastakasyordhvaṁ]
AHS2.4.037a/ romāvarto 'dhipo nāma marma sadyo haraty asūn |
AHS2.4.037c/ viṣamaṁ spandanaṁ yatra pīḍite ruk ca marma tat || 37 ||
AHS2.4.038a/ māṁsāsthi.snāyu.dhamanī.sirā.sandhi.samāgamaḥ |
AHS2.4.038c/ syān marmeti ca tenātra su.tarāṁ jīvitaṁ sthitam || 38 ||
AHS2.4.039a/ bāhulyena tu nirdeśaḥ ṣo.ḍhaivaṁ marma.kalpanā |
AHS2.4.039c/ prāṇāyatana.sāmānyād aikyaṁ vā marmaṇāṁ matam || 39 || [Note: AHS2.4.039v/ 4.39dv aikyaṁ vā marmaṇāṁ smṛtam]
AHS2.4.040a/ māṁsa.jāni daśendrākhya.tala.hṛt.stana.rohitāḥ |
AHS2.4.040c/ śaṅkhau kaṭīka.taruṇe nitambāv aṁsayoḥ phale || 40 ||
AHS2.4.041a/ asthny aṣṭau snāva.marmāṇi trayo.viṁśatir āṇayaḥ |
AHS2.4.041c/ kūrca.kūrca.śiro.'pāṅga.kṣiprotkṣepāṁsa.vastayaḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS2.4.041v/ 4.41av asthny aṣṭau snāyu.marmāṇi]
[Page 203 ]
AHS2.4.042a/ gudāpastambha.vidhura.śṛṅgāṭāni navādiśet |
AHS2.4.042c/ marmāṇi dhamanī.sthāni sapta.triṁśat sirāśrayāḥ || 42 || [Note: AHS2.4.042v/ 4.42av gudo 'pastambha.vidhura.]
AHS2.4.043a/ bṛhatyau mātṛkā nīle manye kakṣā.dharau phaṇau |
AHS2.4.043c/ viṭape hṛdayaṁ nābhiḥ pārśva.sandhī stanādhare || 43 || [Note: AHS2.4.043v/ 4.43dv pārśva.sandhī stanāntare]
AHS2.4.044a/ apālāpau sthapany urvyaś catasro lohitāni ca |
AHS2.4.044c/ sandhau viṁśatir āvartau maṇi.bandhau kukundarau || 44 ||
AHS2.4.045a/ sīmantāḥ kūrparau gulphau kṛkāṭyau jānunī patiḥ |
AHS2.4.045c/ māṁsa.marma gudo 'nyeṣāṁ snāvni kakṣā.dharau tathā || 45 || [Note: AHS2.4.045v/ 4.45dv snāvnī kakṣā.dharau tathā]
AHS2.4.046a/ viṭapau vidhurākhye ca śṛṅgāṭāni sirāsu tu |
AHS2.4.046c/ apastambhāv apāṅgau ca dhamanī.sthaṁ na taiḥ smṛtam || 46 ||
AHS2.4.047a/ viddhe 'jasram asṛk.srāvo māṁsa.dhāvana.vat tanuḥ |
AHS2.4.047c/ pāṇḍu.tvam indriyā.jñānaṁ maraṇam cāśu māṁsa.je || 47 || [Note: AHS2.4.047v/ 4.47dv maraṇam vāśu māṁsa.je]
AHS2.4.048a/ majjānvito 'ccho vicchinnaḥ srāvo ruk cāsthi.marmaṇi |
AHS2.4.048c/ āyāmākṣepaka.stambhāḥ snāva.je 'bhyadhikaṁ rujā || 48 || [Note: AHS2.4.048v/ 4.48dv snāva.je 'bhyadhikaṁ rujaḥ 4.48dv snāva.je 'bhyadhikā rujaḥ 4.48dv snāyu.ge 'bhyadhikaṁ rujā]
AHS2.4.049a/ yāna.sthānāsanā.śaktir vaikalyam atha vāntakaḥ |
AHS2.4.049c/ raktaṁ sa.śabda.phenoṣṇaṁ dhamanī.sthe vi.cetasaḥ || 49 ||
AHS2.4.050a/ sirā.marma.vyadhe sāndram ajasraṁ bahv asṛk sravet |
AHS2.4.050c/ tat.kṣayāt tṛḍ.bhrama.śvāsa.moha.hidhmābhir antakaḥ || 50 ||
AHS2.4.051a/ vastu śūkair ivākīrṇaṁ rūḍhe ca kuṇi.khañja.tā |
AHS2.4.051c/ bala.ceṣṭā.kṣayaḥ śoṣaḥ parva.śophaś ca sandhi.je || 51 ||
[Page 204 ]
AHS2.4.052a/ nābhi.śaṅkhādhipāpāna.hṛc.chṛṅgāṭaka.vastayaḥ |
AHS2.4.052c/ aṣṭau ca mātṛkāḥ sadyo nighnanty ekān.na.viṁśatiḥ || 52 || [Note: AHS2.4.052v/ 4.52dv nighnanty ekona.viṁśatiḥ]
AHS2.4.053a/ saptāhaḥ paramas teṣāṁ kālaḥ kālasya karṣaṇe |
AHS2.4.053c/ trayas.triṁśad.apastambha.tala.hṛt.pārśva.sandhayaḥ || 53 || [Note: AHS2.4.053v/ 4.53av saptāhaḥ paramaṁ teṣāṁ]
AHS2.4.054a/ kaṭī.taruṇa.sīmanta.stana.mūlendra.vastayaḥ |
AHS2.4.054c/ kṣiprāpālāpa.bṛhatī.nitamba.stana.rohitāḥ || 54 ||
AHS2.4.055a/ kālāntara.prāṇa.harā māsa.māsārdha.jīvitāḥ |
AHS2.4.055c/ utkṣepau sthapanī trīṇi vi.śalya.ghnāni tatra hi || 55 || [Note: AHS2.4.055v/ 4.55dv vi.śalya.ghnāni tatra tu]
AHS2.4.056a/ vāyur māṁsa.vasā.majja.mastuluṅgāni śoṣayet |
AHS2.4.056c/ śalyāpāye vinirgacchan śvāsāt kāsāc ca hanty asūn || 56 ||
AHS2.4.057a/ phaṇāv apāṅgau vidhure nīle manye kṛkāṭike |
AHS2.4.057c/ aṁsāṁsa.phalakāvarta.viṭaporvī.kukundarāḥ || 57 || [Note: AHS2.4.057v/ 4.57av phaṇāv apāṅgau vidhurau]
AHS2.4.058a/ sa.jānu.lohitākṣāṇi.kakṣā.dhṛk.kūrca.kūrparāḥ |
AHS2.4.058c/ vaikalyam iti catvāri catvāriṁśac ca kurvate || 58 || [Note: AHS2.4.058v/ 4.58av sa.jānu.lohitākhyāni.]
AHS2.4.059a/ haranti tāny api prāṇān kadā.cid abhighātataḥ |
AHS2.4.059c/ aṣṭau kūrca.śiro.gulpha.maṇi.bandhā rujā.karāḥ || 59 ||
AHS2.4.060a/ teṣāṁ viṭapa.kakṣā.dhṛg.urvyaḥ kūrca.śirāṁsi ca |
AHS2.4.060c/ dvā.daśāṅgula.mānāni dvy.aṅgule maṇi.bandhane || 60 || [Note: AHS2.4.060v/ 4.60bv .urvī.kūrca.śirāṁsi ca]
AHS2.4.061a/ gulphau ca stana.mūle ca try.aṅgulaṁ jānu.kūrparam |
AHS2.4.061c/ apāna.vasti.hṛn.nābhi.nīlāḥ sīmanta.mātṛkāḥ || 61 || [Note: AHS2.4.061v/ 4.61bv try.aṅgulau jānu.kūrparau 4.61dv .nīlā.sīmanta.mātṛkāḥ]
[Page 205 ]
AHS2.4.062a/ kūrca.śṛṅgāṭa.manyāś ca triṁśad ekena varjitāḥ |
AHS2.4.062c/ ātma.pāṇi.talonmānāḥ śeṣāṇy ardhāṅgulaṁ vadet || 62 ||
AHS2.4.063a/ pañcāśat ṣaṭ ca marmāṇi tila.vrīhi.samāny api |
AHS2.4.063c/ iṣṭāni marmāṇy anyeṣāṁ catur.dhoktāḥ sirās tu yāḥ || 63 ||
AHS2.4.064a/ tarpayanti vapuḥ kṛtsnaṁ tā marmāṇy āśritās tataḥ |
AHS2.4.064c/ tat.kṣatāt kṣata.jāty.artha.pravṛtter dhātu.saṅkṣaye || 64 || [Note: AHS2.4.064v/ 4.64cv tat.kṣatāt kṣata.jāty.arthaṁ 4.64dv pravṛttir dhātu.saṅkṣaye]
AHS2.4.065a/ vṛddhaś calo rujas tīvrāḥ pratanoti samīrayan |
AHS2.4.065c/ tejas tad uddhṛtaṁ dhatte tṛṣṇā.śoṣa.mada.bhramān || 65 ||
AHS2.4.066a/ svinna.srasta.ślatha.tanuṁ haraty enaṁ tato 'ntakaḥ |
AHS2.4.066c/ vardhayet sandhito gātraṁ marmaṇy abhihate drutam || 66 ||
AHS2.4.067a/ chedanāt sandhi.deśasya saṅkucanti sirā hy ataḥ |
AHS2.4.067c/ jīvitaṁ prāṇināṁ tatra rakte tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhati || 67 ||
AHS2.4.068a/ su.vikṣato 'py ato jīved a.marmaṇi na marmaṇi |
AHS2.4.068c/ prāṇa.ghātini jīvet tu kaś.cid vaidya.guṇena cet || 68 ||
AHS2.4.069a/ a.samagrābhighātāc ca so 'pi vaikalyam aśnute |
AHS2.4.069c/ tasmāt kṣāra.viṣāgny.ādīn yatnān marmasu varjayet || 69 ||
AHS2.4.070a/ marmābhighātaḥ sv.alpo 'pi prāya.śo bādhate.tarām |
AHS2.4.070c/ rogā marmāśrayās tad.vat prakrāntā yatnato 'pi ca || 70 || [Note: AHS2.4.070v/ 4.70cv rogā marmāśritās tad.vat]

2.5. Chapter 5 :: Atha vikṛtivijñānīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 222-233]
AHS2.5.001a/ puṣpaṁ phalasya dhūmo 'gner varṣasya jala.dodayaḥ |
AHS2.5.001c/ yathā bhaviṣyato liṅgaṁ riṣṭaṁ mṛtyos tathā dhruvam || 1 ||
[Page 206 ]
AHS2.5.001+(1)a/ āyuṣ.mati kriyāḥ sarvāḥ sa.phalāḥ samprayojitāḥ |
AHS2.5.001+(1)c/ bhavanti bhiṣajāṁ bhūtyai kṛta.jña iva bhū.bhuji || 1+(1) ||
AHS2.5.001+(2)a/ kṣīṇāyuṣi kṛtaṁ karma vyarthaṁ kṛtam ivādhame |
AHS2.5.001+(2)c/ a.yaśo deha.sandehaṁ svārtha.hāniṁ ca yacchati || 1+(2) || [Note: AHS2.5.001+(2)v/ 5.1+(2)cv āyāsād deha.sandehaṁ]
AHS2.5.001+(3)a/ tarhīdānīṁ gatāsūnāṁ lakṣaṇaṁ sampracakṣate |
AHS2.5.001+(3)c/ vikṛtiḥ prakṛteḥ prājñaiḥ pradiṣṭā riṣṭa.sañjñayā || 1+(3) || [Note: AHS2.5.001+(3)v/ 5.1+(3)av tad idānīṁ gatāsūnāṁ]
AHS2.5.002a/ ariṣṭaṁ nāsti maraṇaṁ dṛṣṭa.riṣṭaṁ ca jīvitam |
AHS2.5.002c/ ariṣṭe riṣṭa.vijñānaṁ na ca riṣṭe 'py a.naipuṇāt || 2 ||
AHS2.5.003a/ ke.cit tu tad dvi.dhety āhuḥ sthāyy.a.sthāyi.vibhedataḥ |
AHS2.5.003c/ doṣāṇām api bāhulyād riṣṭābhāsaḥ samudbhavet || 3 ||
AHS2.5.004a/ sa doṣāṇāṁ śame śāmyet sthāyy avaśyaṁ tu mṛtyave |
AHS2.5.004c/ rūpendriya.svara.cchāyā.praticchāyā.kriyādiṣu || 4 || [Note: AHS2.5.004v/ 5.4av tad doṣāṇāṁ śame śāmyet]
AHS2.5.005a/ anyeṣv api ca bhāveṣu prākṛteṣv a.nimittataḥ |
AHS2.5.005c/ vikṛtir yā samāsena riṣṭaṁ tad iti lakṣayet || 5 ||
AHS2.5.006a/ keśa.roma.nir.abhyaṅgaṁ yasyābhyaktam ivekṣyate |
AHS2.5.006c/ yasyāty.arthaṁ cale netre stabdhāntar.gata.nirgate || 6 ||
AHS2.5.007a/ jihme vistṛta.saṅkṣipte saṅkṣipta.vinata.bhruṇī |
AHS2.5.007c/ udbhrānta.darśane hīna.darśane nakulopame || 7 ||
AHS2.5.008a/ kapotābhe alātābhe srute lulita.pakṣmaṇī |
AHS2.5.008c/ nāsikāty.artha.vivṛtā saṁvṛtā piṭikācitā || 8 ||
[Page 207 ]
AHS2.5.009a/ ucchūnā sphuṭitā mlānā yasyauṣṭho yāty adho 'dharaḥ |
AHS2.5.009c/ ūrdhvaṁ dvitīyaḥ syātāṁ vā pakva.jambū.nibhāv ubhau || 9 ||
AHS2.5.010a/ dantāḥ sa.śarkarāḥ śyāvās tāmrāḥ puṣpita.paṅkitāḥ |
AHS2.5.010c/ sahasaiva pateyur vā jihvā jihmā visarpiṇī || 10 ||
AHS2.5.011a/ śūnā śuṣkā guruḥ śyāvā liptā suptā sa.kaṇṭakā |
AHS2.5.011c/ śiraḥ śiro.dharā voḍhuṁ pṛṣṭhaṁ vā bhāram ātmanaḥ || 11 ||
AHS2.5.012a/ hanū vā piṇḍam āsya.sthaṁ śaknuvanti na yasya ca |
AHS2.5.012c/ yasyā.nimittam aṅgāni gurūṇy ati.laghūni vā || 12 ||
AHS2.5.013a/ viṣa.doṣād vinā yasya khebhyo raktaṁ pravartate |
AHS2.5.013c/ utsiktaṁ mehanaṁ yasya vṛṣaṇāv ati.niḥsṛtau || 13 ||
AHS2.5.014a/ ato 'nya.thā vā yasya syāt sarve te kāla.coditāḥ |
AHS2.5.014c/ yasyā.pūrvāḥ sirā.lekhā bālendv.ākṛtayo 'pi vā || 14 || [Note: AHS2.5.014v/ 5.14bv sarve te kāla.noditāḥ]
AHS2.5.015a/ lalāṭe vasti.śīrṣe vā ṣaṇ māsān na sa jīvati |
AHS2.5.015c/ padminī.pattra.vat toyaṁ śarīre yasya dehinaḥ || 15 ||
AHS2.5.016a/ plavate plavamānasya ṣaṇ māsās tasya jīvitam |
AHS2.5.016c/ haritābhāḥ sirā yasya roma.kūpāś ca saṁvṛtāḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS2.5.016v/ 5.16bv ṣaṇ.māsaṁ tasya jīvitam 5.16bv ṣaṇ.māsāt tasya jīvitam 5.16bv ṣaṇ māsāṁs tasya jīvitam]
AHS2.5.017a/ so 'mlābhilāṣī puruṣaḥ pittān maraṇam aśnute |
AHS2.5.017c/ yasya go.maya.cūrṇābhaṁ cūrṇaṁ mūrdhni mukhe 'pi vā || 17 ||
AHS2.5.018a/ sa.snehaṁ mūrdhni dhūmo vā māsāntaṁ tasya jīvitam |
AHS2.5.018c/ mūrdhni bhruvor vā kurvanti sīmantāvartakā navāḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS2.5.018v/ 5.18cv mūrdhni bhruvor vā yasya syuḥ]
[Page 208 ]
AHS2.5.019a/ mṛtyuṁ svasthasya ṣaḍ.rātrāt tri.rātrād āturasya tu |
AHS2.5.019c/ jihvā śyāvā mukhaṁ pūti savyam akṣi nimajjati || 19 || [Note: AHS2.5.019v/ 5.19bv tri.rātrād āturasya ca]
AHS2.5.020a/ khagā vā mūrdhni līyante yasya taṁ parivarjayet |
AHS2.5.020c/ yasya snātānuliptasya pūrvaṁ śuṣyaty uro bhṛśam || 20 ||
AHS2.5.021a/ ārdreṣu sarva.gātreṣu so 'rdha.māsaṁ na jīvati |
AHS2.5.021c/ a.kasmād yuga.pad gātre varṇau prākṛta.vaikṛtau || 21 ||
AHS2.5.022a/ tathaivopacaya.glāni.raukṣya.snehādi mṛtyave |
AHS2.5.022c/ yasya sphuṭeyur aṅgulyo nākṛṣṭā na sa jīvati || 22 ||
AHS2.5.023a/ kṣava.kāsādiṣu tathā yasyā.pūrvo dhvanir bhavet |
AHS2.5.023c/ hrasvo dīrgho 'ti vocchvāsaḥ pūtiḥ surabhir eva vā || 23 ||
AHS2.5.024a/ āplutān.āplute kāye yasya gandho 'ti.mānuṣaḥ |
AHS2.5.024c/ mala.vastra.vraṇādau vā varṣāntaṁ tasya jīvitam || 24 || [Note: AHS2.5.024v/ 5.24cv mala.vastra.vraṇādye vā]
AHS2.5.025a/ bhajante 'ty.aṅga.saurasyād yaṁ yūkā.makṣikādayaḥ |
AHS2.5.025c/ tyajanti vāti.vairasyāt so 'pi varṣaṁ na jīvati || 25 ||
AHS2.5.026a/ satatoṣmasu gātreṣu śaityaṁ yasyopalakṣyate |
AHS2.5.026c/ śīteṣu bhṛśam auṣṇyaṁ vā svedaḥ stambho 'py a.hetukaḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS2.5.026v/ 5.26dv svedaḥ stambho 'ty a.hetukaḥ]
AHS2.5.027a/ yo jāta.śīta.piṭikaḥ śītāṅgo vā vidahyate |
AHS2.5.027c/ uṣṇa.dveṣī ca śitārtaḥ sa pretādhipa.go.caraḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS2.5.027v/ 5.27bv śītāṅgo vātidahyate 5.27bv śītāṅgo vāpi dahyate]
AHS2.5.028a/ urasy ūṣmā bhaved yasya jaṭhare cāti.śīta.tā |
AHS2.5.028c/ bhinnaṁ purīṣaṁ tṛṣṇā ca yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS2.5.028v/ 5.28bv jaṭhare vāti.śīta.tā]
[Page 209 ]
AHS2.5.029a/ mūtraṁ purīṣaṁ niṣṭhyūtaṁ śukraṁ vāpsu nimajjati |
AHS2.5.029c/ niṣṭhyūtaṁ bahu.varṇaṁ vā yasya māsāt sa naśyati || 29 ||
AHS2.5.030a/ ghanī.bhūtam ivākāśam ākāśam iva yo ghanam |
AHS2.5.030c/ a.mūrtam iva mūrtaṁ ca mūrtaṁ cā.mūrta.vat sthitam || 30 ||
AHS2.5.031a/ tejasvy a.tejas tad.vac ca śuklaṁ kṛṣṇam a.sac ca sat |
AHS2.5.031c/ a.netra.rogaś candraṁ ca bahu.rūpam a.lāñchanam || 31 || [Note: AHS2.5.031v/ 5.31av tejasy a.tejas tad.vac ca 5.31cv a.netra.rogī candraṁ ca]
AHS2.5.032a/ jāgrad rakṣāṁsi gandharvān pretān anyāṁś ca tad.vidhān |
AHS2.5.032c/ rūpaṁ vy.ākṛti tat tac ca yaḥ paśyati sa naśyati || 32 || [Note: AHS2.5.032v/ 5.32cv rūpaṁ vy.ākṛti tad.vac ca]
AHS2.5.033a/ saptarṣīṇāṁ samīpa.sthāṁ yo na paśyaty arundhatīm |
AHS2.5.033c/ dhruvam ākāśa.gaṅgāṁ vā sa na paśyati tāṁ samām || 33 ||
AHS2.5.034a/ megha.toyaugha.nirghoṣa.vīṇā.paṇava.veṇu.jān |
AHS2.5.034c/ śṛṇoty anyāṁś ca yaḥ śabdān a.sato na sato 'pi vā || 34 ||
AHS2.5.035a/ niṣpīḍya karṇau śṛṇuyān na yo dhukadhukā.svanam |
AHS2.5.035c/ tad.vad gandha.rasa.sparśān manyate yo viparyayāt || 35 || [Note: AHS2.5.035v/ 5.35bv na yo dhukadhuka.svanam]
AHS2.5.036a/ sarva.śo vā na yo yaś ca dīpa.gandhaṁ na jighrati |
AHS2.5.036c/ vidhinā yasya doṣāya svāsthyāyā.vidhinā rasāḥ || 36 ||
AHS2.5.037a/ yaḥ pāṁsuneva kīrṇāṅgo yo 'ṅge ghātaṁ na vetti vā |
AHS2.5.037c/ antareṇa tapas tīvraṁ yogaṁ vā vidhi.pūrvakam || 37 || [Note: AHS2.5.037v/ 5.37av yo bhasmaneva kīrṇāṅgo]
AHS2.5.038a/ jānāty atīndriyaṁ yaś ca teṣāṁ maraṇam ādiśet |
AHS2.5.038c/ hīno dīnaḥ svaro '.vyakto yasya syād gadgado 'pi vā || 38 ||
[Page 210 ]
AHS2.5.039a/ sahasā yo vimuhyed vā vivakṣur na sa jīvati |
AHS2.5.039c/ svarasya dur.balī.bhāvaṁ hāniṁ ca bala.varṇayoḥ || 39 ||
AHS2.5.040a/ roga.vṛddhim a.yuktyā ca dṛṣṭvā maraṇam ādiśet |
AHS2.5.040c/ apa.svaraṁ bhāṣamāṇaṁ prāptaṁ maraṇam ātmanaḥ || 40 ||
AHS2.5.041a/ śrotāraṁ cāsya śabdasya dūrataḥ parivarjayet |
AHS2.5.041c/ saṁsthānena pramāṇena varṇena prabhayāpi vā || 41 || [Note: AHS2.5.041v/ 5.41av śrotāraṁ tasya śabdasya 5.41av śrotāraṁ vāsya śabdasya]
AHS2.5.042a/ chāyā vivartate yasya svapne 'pi preta eva saḥ |
AHS2.5.042c/ ātapādarśa.toyādau yā saṁsthāna.pramāṇataḥ || 42 ||
AHS2.5.043a/ chāyāṅgāt sambhavaty uktā praticchāyeti sā punaḥ |
AHS2.5.043c/ varṇa.prabhāśrayā yā tu sā chāyaiva śarīra.gā || 43 ||
AHS2.5.044a/ bhaved yasya praticchāyā chinnā bhinnādhikākulā |
AHS2.5.044c/ vi.śirā dvi.śirā jihmā vikṛtā yadi vānya.thā || 44 ||
AHS2.5.045a/ taṁ samāptāyuṣaṁ vidyān na cel lakṣya.nimitta.jā |
AHS2.5.045c/ praticchāyā.mayī yasya na cākṣṇīkṣyeta kanyakā || 45 ||
AHS2.5.046a/ khādīnāṁ pañca pañcānāṁ chāyā vividha.lakṣaṇāḥ |
AHS2.5.046c/ nābhasī nir.malā.nīlā sa.snehā sa.prabheva ca || 46 ||
AHS2.5.047a/ vātād rajo.'ruṇā śyāvā bhasma.rūkṣā hata.prabhā |
AHS2.5.047c/ viśuddha.raktā tv āgneyī dīptābhā darśana.priyā || 47 ||
AHS2.5.048a/ śuddha.vaiḍūrya.vi.malā su.snigdhā toya.jā sukhā |
AHS2.5.048c/ sthirā snigdhā ghanā śuddhā śyāmā śvetā ca pārthivī || 48 || [Note: AHS2.5.048v/ 5.48bv su.snigdhā toya.jā hi sā]
[Page 211 ]
AHS2.5.049a/ vāyavī roga.maraṇa.kleśāyānyāḥ sukhodayāḥ |
AHS2.5.049c/ prabhoktā taijasī sarvā sā tu sapta.vidhā smṛtā || 49 || [Note: AHS2.5.049v/ 5.49av vāyavyā roga.maraṇa.]
AHS2.5.050a/ raktā pītā sitā śyāvā haritā pāṇḍurāsitā |
AHS2.5.050c/ tāsāṁ yāḥ syur vikāsinyaḥ snigdhāś ca vi.malāś ca yāḥ || 50 || [Note: AHS2.5.050v/ 5.50av raktā pītā sitā śyāmā]
AHS2.5.051a/ tāḥ śubhā malinā rūkṣāḥ saṅkṣiptāś cā.śubhodayāḥ |
AHS2.5.051c/ varṇam ākrāmati cchāyā prabhā varṇa.prakāśinī || 51 || [Note: AHS2.5.051v/ 5.51bv saṅkṣiptāś cā.sukhodayāḥ 5.51dv prabhā varṇa.vikāśinī]
AHS2.5.052a/ āsanne lakṣyate chāyā vikṛṣṭe bhā prakāśate |
AHS2.5.052c/ nā.cchāyo nā.prabhaḥ kaś.cid viśeṣāś cihnayanti tu || 52 ||
AHS2.5.053a/ nṛṇāṁ śubhā.śubhotpattiṁ kāle chāyā.samāśrayāḥ |
AHS2.5.053c/ nikaṣann iva yaḥ pādau cyutāṁsaḥ parisarpati || 53 || [Note: AHS2.5.053v/ 5.53bv kāle chāyā.samāśritāḥ]
AHS2.5.054a/ hīyate balataḥ śaśvad yo 'nnam aśnan hitaṁ bahu |
AHS2.5.054c/ yo 'lpāśī bahu.viṇ.mūtro bahv.āśī cālpa.mūtra.viṭ || 54 || [Note: AHS2.5.054v/ 5.54dv bahv.āśī vālpa.mūtra.viṭ]
AHS2.5.055a/ yo vālpāśī kaphenārto dīrghaṁ śvasiti ceṣṭate |
AHS2.5.055c/ dīrgham ucchvasya yo hrasvaṁ niḥśvasya paritāmyati || 55 ||
AHS2.5.056a/ hrasvaṁ ca yaḥ praśvasiti vyāviddhaṁ spandate bhṛśam |
AHS2.5.056c/ śiro vikṣipate kṛcchrād yo 'ñcayitvā prapāṇikau || 56 ||
AHS2.5.057a/ yo lalāṭāt sruta.svedaḥ ślatha.sandhāna.bandhanaḥ |
AHS2.5.057c/ utthāpyamānaḥ sammuhyed yo balī dur.balo 'pi vā || 57 ||
AHS2.5.058a/ uttāna eva svapiti yaḥ pādau vikaroti ca |
AHS2.5.058c/ śayanāsana.kuḍyāder yo '.sad eva jighṛkṣati || 58 || [Note: AHS2.5.058v/ 5.58cv śayanāsana.kuḍyādau 5.58dv yaḥ sadaiva jighṛkṣati]
[Page 212 ]
AHS2.5.059a/ a.hāsya.hāsī sammuhyan yo leḍhi daśana.cchadau |
AHS2.5.059c/ uttarauṣṭhaṁ parilihan phūt.kārāṁś ca karoti yaḥ || 59 || [Note: AHS2.5.059v/ 5.59dv notkārāṁś ca karoti yaḥ]
AHS2.5.060a/ yam abhidravati cchāyā kṛṣṇā pītāruṇāpi vā |
AHS2.5.060c/ bhiṣag.bheṣaja.pānānna.guru.mitra.dviṣaś ca ye || 60 || [Note: AHS2.5.060v/ 5.60bv kṛṣṇā pītāruṇāpi ca]
AHS2.5.061a/ vaśa.gāḥ sarva evaite vijñeyāḥ sama.vartinaḥ |
AHS2.5.061c/ grīvā.lalāṭa.hṛdayaṁ yasya svidyati śītalam || 61 ||
AHS2.5.062a/ uṣṇo 'paraḥ pradeśaś ca śaraṇaṁ tasya devatāḥ |
AHS2.5.062c/ yo 'ṇu.jyotir anekāgro duś.chāyo dur.manāḥ sadā || 62 ||
AHS2.5.062.1+(1)a/ pūrva.rūpāṇi sarvāṇi jvarādiṣv ati.mātrayā |
AHS2.5.062.1+(1)c/ yaṁ viśanti viśaty enaṁ mṛtyur jvara.puraḥ.saraḥ || 62.1+(1) ||
AHS2.5.063a/ baliṁ bali.bhṛto yasya praṇītaṁ nopabhuñjate |
AHS2.5.063c/ nir.nimittaṁ ca yo medhāṁ śobhām upacayaṁ śriyam || 63 || [Note: AHS2.5.063v/ 5.63av baliṁ bali.bhujo yasya]
AHS2.5.064a/ prāpnoty ato vā vibhraṁśaṁ sa prāpnoti yama.kṣayam |
AHS2.5.064c/ guṇa.doṣa.mayī yasya svasthasya vyādhitasya vā || 64 || [Note: AHS2.5.064v/ 5.64cv guṇā.guṇa.mayī yasya]
AHS2.5.065a/ yāty anya.thā.tvaṁ prakṛtiḥ ṣaṇ māsān na sa jīvati |
AHS2.5.065c/ bhaktiḥ śīlaṁ smṛtis tyāgo buddhir balam a.hetukam || 65 ||
AHS2.5.066a/ ṣaḍ etāni nivartante ṣaḍbhir māsair mariṣyataḥ |
AHS2.5.066c/ matta.vad.gati.vāk.kampa.mohā māsān mariṣyataḥ || 66 ||
AHS2.5.067a/ naśyaty a.jānan ṣaḍ.ahāt keśa.luñcana.vedanām |
AHS2.5.067c/ na yāti yasya cāhāraḥ kaṇṭhaṁ kaṇṭhāmayād ṛte || 67 ||
[Page 213 ]
AHS2.5.068a/ preṣyāḥ pratīpa.tāṁ yānti pretākṛtir udīryate |
AHS2.5.068c/ yasya nidrā bhaven nityā naiva vā na sa jīvati || 68 || [Note: AHS2.5.068v/ 5.68cv yasya nidrā bhaven nityaṁ]
AHS2.5.069a/ vaktram āpūryate 'śrūṇāṁ svidyataś caraṇau bhṛśam |
AHS2.5.069c/ cakṣuś cākula.tāṁ yāti yama.rājyaṁ gamiṣyataḥ || 69 || [Note: AHS2.5.069v/ 5.69dv yama.rāṣṭraṁ gamiṣyataḥ]
AHS2.5.070a/ yaiḥ purā ramate bhāvair a.ratis tair na jīvati |
AHS2.5.070c/ sahasā jāyate yasya vikāraḥ sarva.lakṣaṇaḥ || 70 ||
AHS2.5.071a/ nivartate vā sahasā sahasā sa vinaśyati |
AHS2.5.071c/ jvaro nihanti bala.vān gambhīro dairgharātrikaḥ || 71 ||
AHS2.5.072a/ sa.pralāpa.bhrama.śvāsaḥ kṣīṇaṁ śūnaṁ hatānalam |
AHS2.5.072c/ a.kṣāmaṁ sakta.vacanaṁ raktākṣaṁ hṛdi śūlinam || 72 ||
AHS2.5.073a/ sa.śuṣka.kāsaḥ pūrvāhṇe yo 'parāhṇe 'pi vā bhavet |
AHS2.5.073c/ bala.māṁsa.vihīnasya śleṣma.kāsa.samanvitaḥ || 73 || [Note: AHS2.5.073v/ 5.73av saṁśuṣka.kāsaḥ pūrvāhṇe]
AHS2.5.074a/ rakta.pittaṁ bhṛśaṁ raktaṁ kṛṣṇam indra.dhanuṣ.prabham |
AHS2.5.074c/ tāmra.hāridra.haritaṁ rūpaṁ raktaṁ pradarśayet || 74 ||
AHS2.5.075a/ roma.kūpa.pravisṛtaṁ kaṇṭhāsya.hṛdaye sajat |
AHS2.5.075c/ vāsaso '.rañjanaṁ pūti vega.vac cāti bhūri ca || 75 || [Note: AHS2.5.075v/ 5.75cv vāsaso rañjanaṁ pūti]
AHS2.5.076a/ vṛddhaṁ pāṇḍu.jvara.cchardi.kāsa.śophātisāriṇam |
AHS2.5.076c/ kāsa.śvāsau jvara.cchardi.tṛṣṇātīsāra.śophinam || 76 ||
AHS2.5.077a/ yakṣmā pārśva.rujānāha.rakta.cchardy.aṁsa.tāpinam |
AHS2.5.077c/ chardir vega.vatī mūtra.śakṛd.gandhiḥ sa.candrikā || 77 || [Note: AHS2.5.077v/ 5.77bv .rakta.cchardy.aṅga.tāpinam]
[Page 214 ]
AHS2.5.078a/ sāsra.viṭ.pūya.ruk.kāsa.śvāsa.vaty anuṣaṅgiṇī |
AHS2.5.078c/ tṛṣṇānya.roga.kṣapitaṁ bahir.jihvaṁ vi.cetanam || 78 || [Note: AHS2.5.078v/ 5.78dv bahir.jihvam a.cetanam 5.78dv bahir.jihvaṁ vi.cetasam]
AHS2.5.079a/ madātyayo 'ti.śītārtaṁ kṣīṇaṁ taila.prabhānanam |
AHS2.5.079c/ arśāṁsi pāṇi.pan.nābhi.guda.muṣkāsya.śophinam || 79 || [Note: AHS2.5.079v/ 5.79dv .guda.muṣkādi.śophinam]
AHS2.5.080a/ hṛt.pārśvāṅga.rujā.chardi.pāyu.pāka.jvarāturam |
AHS2.5.080c/ atīsāro yakṛt.piṇḍa.māṁsa.dhāvana.mecakaiḥ || 80 ||
AHS2.5.081a/ tulyas taila.ghṛta.kṣīra.dadhi.majja.vasāsavaiḥ |
AHS2.5.081c/ mastuluṅga.maṣī.pūya.vesavārāmbu.mākṣikaiḥ || 81 ||
AHS2.5.082a/ ati.raktāsita.snigdha.pūty.accha.ghana.vedanaḥ |
AHS2.5.082c/ karburaḥ prasravan dhātūn niṣ.purīṣo 'tha.vāti.viṭ || 82 ||
AHS2.5.083a/ tantu.mān makṣikākrānto rājī.māṁś candrakair yutaḥ |
AHS2.5.083c/ śīrṇa.pāyu.valiṁ mukta.nālaṁ parvāsthi.śūlinam || 83 || [Note: AHS2.5.083v/ 5.83dv .tālaṁ parvāsthi.śūlinam 5.83dv .tāḍaṁ parvāsthi.śūlinam]
AHS2.5.084a/ srasta.pāyuṁ bala.kṣīṇam annam evopaveśayan |
AHS2.5.084c/ sa.tṛṭ.śvāsa.jvara.cchardi.dāhānāha.pravāhikaḥ || 84 || [Note: AHS2.5.084v/ 5.84bv annam evopaveśayet]
AHS2.5.085a/ aśmarī śūna.vṛṣaṇaṁ baddha.mūtraṁ rujārditam |
AHS2.5.085c/ mehas tṛḍ.dāha.piṭikā.māṁsa.kothātisāriṇam || 85 ||
AHS2.5.086a/ piṭikā marma.hṛt.pṛṣṭha.stanāṁsa.guda.mūrdha.gāḥ |
AHS2.5.086c/ parva.pāda.kara.sthā vā mandotsāhaṁ pramehiṇam || 86 || [Note: AHS2.5.086v/ 5.86bv .stanāṁsa.guda.mūrdha.jāḥ 5.86cv parva.pāda.kara.sthāś ca]
AHS2.5.087a/ sarvaṁ ca māṁsa.saṅkotha.dāha.tṛṣṇā.mada.jvaraiḥ |
AHS2.5.087c/ visarpa.marma.saṁrodha.hidhmā.śvāsa.bhrama.klamaiḥ || 87 || [Note: AHS2.5.087v/ 5.87av sarvaṁ ca māṁsa.saṅkoca.]
[Page 215 ]
AHS2.5.088a/ gulmaḥ pṛthu.parīṇāho ghanaḥ kūrma ivonnataḥ |
AHS2.5.088c/ sirā.naddho jvara.cchardi.hidhmādhmāna.rujānvitaḥ || 88 ||
AHS2.5.089a/ kāsa.pīnasa.hṛl.lāsa.śvāsātīsāra.śopha.vān |
AHS2.5.089c/ viṇ.mūtra.saṅgraha.śvāsa.śopha.hidhmā.jvara.bhramaiḥ || 89 ||
AHS2.5.090a/ mūrchā.chardy.atisāraiś ca jaṭharaṁ hanti dur.balam |
AHS2.5.090c/ śūnākṣaṁ kuṭilopastham upaklinna.tanu.tvacam || 90 ||
AHS2.5.091a/ virecana.hṛtānāham ānahyantaṁ punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS2.5.091c/ pāṇḍu.rogaḥ śvayathu.mān pītākṣi.nakha.darśanam || 91 || [Note: AHS2.5.091v/ 5.91av virecana.hatānāham]
AHS2.5.092a/ tandrā.dāhā.ruci.cchardi.mūrchādhmānātisāra.vān |
AHS2.5.092c/ anekopadrava.yutaḥ pādābhyāṁ prasṛto naram || 92 ||
AHS2.5.093a/ nārīṁ śopho mukhād dhanti kukṣi.guhyād ubhāv api |
AHS2.5.093c/ rājī.citaḥ sravaṁś chardi.jvara.śvāsātisāriṇam || 93 ||
AHS2.5.094a/ jvarātīsārau śophānte śvayathur vā tayoḥ kṣaye |
AHS2.5.094c/ dur.balasya viśeṣeṇa jāyante 'ntāya dehinaḥ || 94 ||
AHS2.5.095a/ śvayathur yasya pāda.sthaḥ parisraste ca piṇḍike |
AHS2.5.095c/ sīdataḥ sakthinī caiva taṁ bhiṣak parivarjayet || 95 ||
AHS2.5.096a/ ānanaṁ hasta.pādaṁ ca viśeṣād yasya śuṣyataḥ |
AHS2.5.096c/ śūyete vā vinā dehāt sa māsād yāti pañca.tām || 96 || [Note: AHS2.5.096v/ 5.96bv viśeṣād yasya śuṣyati]
AHS2.5.097a/ visarpaḥ kāsa.vaivarṇya.jvara.mūrchāṅga.bhaṅga.vān |
AHS2.5.097c/ bhramāsya.śopha.hṛl.lāsa.deha.sādātisāra.vān || 97 || [Note: AHS2.5.097v/ 5.97cv bhramāsya.śoṣa.hṛl.lāsa.]
[Page 216 ]
AHS2.5.098a/ kuṣṭhaṁ viśīryamāṇāṅgaṁ rakta.netraṁ hata.svaram |
AHS2.5.098c/ mandāgniṁ jantubhir juṣṭaṁ hanti tṛṣṇātisāriṇam || 98 ||
AHS2.5.099a/ vāyuḥ supta.tvacaṁ bhugnaṁ kampa.śopha.rujāturam |
AHS2.5.099c/ vātāsraṁ moha.mūrchāya.madā.svapna.jvarānvitam || 99 || [Note: AHS2.5.099v/ 5.99av vāyuḥ supta.tvacaṁ bhagnaṁ]
AHS2.5.100a/ śiro.grahā.ruci.śvāsa.saṅkoca.sphoṭa.kotha.vat |
AHS2.5.100c/ śiro.rogā.ruci.śvāsa.moha.viḍ.bheda.tṛḍ.bhramaiḥ || 100 ||
AHS2.5.101a/ ghnanti sarvāmayāḥ kṣīṇa.svara.dhātu.balānalam |
AHS2.5.101c/ vāta.vyādhir apasmārī kuṣṭhī rakty udarī kṣayī || 101 ||
AHS2.5.102a/ gulmī mehī ca tān kṣīṇān vikāre 'lpe 'pi varjayet |
AHS2.5.102c/ bala.māṁsa.kṣayas tīvro roga.vṛddhir a.rocakaḥ || 102 ||
AHS2.5.103a/ yasyāturasya lakṣyante trīn pakṣān na sa jīvati |
AHS2.5.103c/ vātāṣṭhīlāti.saṁvṛddhā tiṣṭhanti dāruṇā hṛdi || 103 ||
AHS2.5.104a/ tṛṣṇayānuparītasya sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam |
AHS2.5.104c/ śaithilyaṁ piṇḍike vāyur nītvā nāsāṁ ca jihma.tām || 104 || [Note: AHS2.5.104v/ 5.104av tṛṣṇayā tu parītasya]
AHS2.5.105a/ kṣīṇasyāyamya manye vā sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam |
AHS2.5.105c/ nābhi.gudāntaraṁ gatvā vaṅkṣaṇau vā samāśrayan || 105 || [Note: AHS2.5.105v/ 5.105av kṣīṇasyāyasya manye vā]
AHS2.5.106a/ gṛhītvā pāyu.hṛdaye kṣīṇa.dehasya vā balī |
AHS2.5.106c/ malān vasti.śiro nābhiṁ vibadhya janayan rujam || 106 ||
AHS2.5.107a/ kurvan vaṅkṣaṇayoḥ śūlaṁ tṛṣṇāṁ bhinna.purīṣa.tām |
AHS2.5.107c/ śvāsaṁ vā janayan vāyur gṛhītvā guda.vaṅkṣaṇam || 107 || [Note: AHS2.5.107v/ 5.107dv gṛhītvā guda.vaṅkṣaṇau]
[Page 217 ]
AHS2.5.108a/ vitatya parśukāgrāṇi gṛhītvoraś ca mārutaḥ |
AHS2.5.108c/ stimitasyātatākṣasya sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam || 108 || [Note: AHS2.5.108v/ 5.108av vitatya pārśvakāgrāṇi]
AHS2.5.109a/ sahasā jvara.santāpas tṛṣṇā mūrchā bala.kṣayaḥ |
AHS2.5.109c/ viśleṣaṇaṁ ca sandhīnāṁ mumūrṣor upajāyate || 109 ||
AHS2.5.110a/ go.sarge vadanād yasya svedaḥ pracyavate bhṛśam |
AHS2.5.110c/ lepa.jvaropataptasya dur.labhaṁ tasya jīvitam || 110 ||
AHS2.5.111a/ pravāla.guṭikābhāsā yasya gātre masūrikāḥ |
AHS2.5.111c/ utpadyāśu vinaśyanti na cirāt sa vinaśyati || 111 ||
AHS2.5.112a/ masūra.vidala.prakhyās tathā vidruma.sannibhāḥ |
AHS2.5.112c/ antar.vaktrāḥ kiṇābhāś ca visphoṭā deha.nāśanāḥ || 112 ||
AHS2.5.113a/ kāmalākṣṇor mukhaṁ pūrṇaṁ śaṅkhayor mukta.māṁsa.tā |
AHS2.5.113c/ santrāsaś coṣṇa.tāṅge ca yasya taṁ parivarjayet || 113 ||
AHS2.5.114a/ a.kasmād anudhāvac ca vighṛṣṭaṁ tvak.samāśrayam |
AHS2.5.114c/ yo vāta.jo na śūlāya syān na dāhāya pitta.jaḥ || 114 ||
AHS2.5.114.1+(1)a/ candanośīra.madirā.kuṇapa.dhvāṅkṣa.gandhayaḥ |
AHS2.5.114.1+(1)c/ śaivāla.kukkuṭa.śikhā.kuṅkumāla.maṣī.prabhāḥ || 114.1+(1) || [Note: AHS2.5.114.1+(1)v/ 5.114.1+(1)dv .naktamāla.maṣī.prabhāḥ 5.114.1+(1)dv .kunda.śāli.maya.prabhāḥ]
AHS2.5.114.1+(2)ab/ antar.dāhā nir.ūṣmaṇaḥ prāṇa.nāśa.karā vraṇāḥ || 114.1+(2)ab ||
AHS2.5.115a/ kapha.jo na ca pūyāya marma.jaś ca ruje na yaḥ |
AHS2.5.115c/ a.cūrṇaś cūrṇa.kīrṇābho yatrākasmāc ca dṛśyate || 115 ||
[Page 218 ]
AHS2.5.116a/ rūpaṁ śakti.dhvajādīnāṁ sarvāṁs tān varjayed vraṇān |
AHS2.5.116c/ viṇ.mūtra.māruta.vahaṁ kṛmiṇaṁ ca bhagandaram || 116 ||
AHS2.5.117a/ ghaṭṭayañ jānunā jānu pādāv udyamya pātayan |
AHS2.5.117c/ yo 'pāsyati muhur vaktram āturo na sa jīvati || 117 ||
AHS2.5.118a/ dantaiś chindan nakhāgrāṇi taiś ca keśāṁs tṛṇāni ca |
AHS2.5.118c/ bhūmiṁ kāṣṭhena vilikhan loṣṭaṁ loṣṭena tāḍayan || 118 || [Note: AHS2.5.118v/ 5.118bv taiś ca keśāṁs tṛṇāni vā]
AHS2.5.119a/ hṛṣṭa.romā sāndra.mūtraḥ śuṣka.kāsī jvarī ca yaḥ |
AHS2.5.119c/ muhur hasan muhuḥ kṣveḍan śayyāṁ pādena hanti yaḥ || 119 || [Note: AHS2.5.119v/ 5.119dv śayyāṁ pādena hanti ca]
AHS2.5.120a/ muhuś chidrāṇi vimṛśann āturo na sa jīvati |
AHS2.5.120c/ mṛtyave sahasārtasya tilaka.vyaṅga.viplavaḥ || 120 ||
AHS2.5.121a/ mukhe danta.nakhe puṣpaṁ jaṭhare vividhāḥ sirāḥ |
AHS2.5.121c/ ūrdhva.śvāsaṁ gatoṣmāṇaṁ śūlopahata.vaṅkṣaṇam || 121 ||
AHS2.5.122a/ śarma cān.adhigacchantaṁ buddhi.mān parivarjayet |
AHS2.5.122c/ vikārā yasya vardhante prakṛtiḥ parihīyate || 122 || [Note: AHS2.5.122v/ 5.122av śarma vān.adhigacchantaṁ]
AHS2.5.123a/ sahasā sahasā tasya mṛtyur harati jīvitam |
AHS2.5.123c/ yam uddiśyāturaṁ vaidyaḥ sampādayitum auṣadham || 123 ||
AHS2.5.124a/ yatamāno na śaknoti dur.labhaṁ tasya jīvitam |
AHS2.5.124c/ vijñātaṁ bahu.śaḥ siddhaṁ vidhi.vac cāvacāritam || 124 ||
AHS2.5.125a/ na sidhyaty auṣadhaṁ yasya nāsti tasya cikitsitam |
AHS2.5.125c/ bhaved yasyauṣadhe 'nne vā kalpyamāne viparyayaḥ || 125 ||
[Page 219 ]
AHS2.5.126a/ a.kasmād varṇa.gandhādeḥ svastho 'pi na sa jīvati |
AHS2.5.126c/ nivāte sendhanaṁ yasya jyotiś cāpy upaśāmyati || 126 ||
AHS2.5.127a/ āturasya gṛhe yasya bhidyante vā patanti vā |
AHS2.5.127c/ ati.mātram amatrāṇi dur.labhaṁ tasya jīvitam || 127 ||
AHS2.5.128a/ yaṁ naraṁ sahasā rogo dur.balaṁ parimuñcati |
AHS2.5.128c/ saṁśaya.prāptam ātreyo jīvitaṁ tasya manyate || 128 || [Note: AHS2.5.128v/ 5.128cv saṁśayaṁ prāptam ātreyo]
AHS2.5.129a/ kathayen na ca pṛṣṭo 'pi duḥ.śravaṁ maraṇaṁ bhiṣak |
AHS2.5.129c/ gatāsor bandhu.mitrāṇāṁ na cecchet taṁ cikitsitum || 129 || [Note: AHS2.5.129v/ 5.129av kathayen naiva pṛṣṭo 'pi]
AHS2.5.130a/ yama.dūta.piśācādyair yat parāsur upāsyate |
AHS2.5.130c/ ghnadbhir auṣadha.vīryāṇi tasmāt taṁ parivarjayet || 130 ||
AHS2.5.131a/ āyur.veda.phalaṁ kṛtsnaṁ yad āyur.jñe pratiṣṭhitam |
AHS2.5.131c/ riṣṭa.jñānādṛtas tasmāt sarva.daiva bhaved bhiṣak || 131 ||
AHS2.5.132a/ maraṇaṁ prāṇināṁ dṛṣṭam āyuḥ.puṇyobhaya.kṣayāt |
AHS2.5.132c/ tayor apy a.kṣayād dṛṣṭaṁ viṣamā.parihāriṇām || 132 ||

2.6. Chapter 6 :: Atha dūtādivijñānīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 233-238]
AHS2.6.001a/ pāṣaṇḍāśrama.varṇānāṁ sa.varṇāḥ karma.siddhaye |
AHS2.6.001c/ ta eva viparītāḥ syur dūtāḥ karma.vipattaye || 1 ||
AHS2.6.002a/ dīnaṁ bhītaṁ drutaṁ trastaṁ rūkṣā.maṅgala.vādinam |
AHS2.6.002c/ śastriṇaṁ daṇḍinaṁ ṣaṇḍhaṁ muṇḍa.śmaśru.jaṭā.dharam || 2 || [Note: AHS2.6.002v/ 6.2cv śastriṇaṁ daṇḍinaṁ khaṇḍaṁ 6.2dv muṇḍa.śmaśruṁ jaṭā.dharam 6.2dv muṇḍaṁ śmaśru.jaṭā.dharam]
AHS2.6.003a/ a.maṅgalāhvayaṁ krūra.karmāṇaṁ malinaṁ striyam |
AHS2.6.003c/ anekaṁ vyādhitaṁ vyaṅgaṁ rakta.mālyānulepanam || 3 ||
[Page 220 ]
AHS2.6.004a/ taila.paṅkāṅkitaṁ jīrṇa.vi.varṇārdraika.vāsasam |
AHS2.6.004c/ kharoṣṭra.mahiṣārūḍhaṁ kāṣṭha.loṣṭādi.mardinam || 4 || [Note: AHS2.6.004v/ 6.4dv kāṣṭha.lohādi.mardinam]
AHS2.6.005a/ nānugacched bhiṣag dūtam āhvayantaṁ ca dūrataḥ |
AHS2.6.005c/ a.śasta.cintā.vacane nagne chindati bhindati || 5 ||
AHS2.6.006a/ juhvāne pāvakaṁ piṇḍān pitṛbhyo nirvapaty api |
AHS2.6.006c/ supte mukta.kace 'bhyakte rudaty a.prayate tathā || 6 || [Note: AHS2.6.006v/ 6.6dv rudaty a.prayate 'tha.vā]
AHS2.6.007a/ vaidye dūtā manuṣyāṇām āgacchanti mumūrṣatām |
AHS2.6.007c/ vikāra.sāmānya.guṇe deśe kāle 'tha.vā bhiṣak || 7 ||
AHS2.6.008a/ dūtam abhyāgataṁ dṛṣṭvā nāturaṁ tam upācaret |
AHS2.6.008c/ spṛśanto nābhi.nāsāsya.keśa.roma.nakha.dvi.jān || 8 || [Note: AHS2.6.008v/ 6.8cv spṛśanto nābhi.nāsākṣi.]
AHS2.6.009a/ guhya.pṛṣṭha.stana.grīvā.jaṭharānāmikāṅgulīḥ |
AHS2.6.009c/ kārpāsa.busa.sīsāsthi.kapāla.musalopalam || 9 || [Note: AHS2.6.009v/ 6.9bv .jaṭharānāmikāṅguli]
AHS2.6.010a/ mārjanī.śūrpa.cailānta.bhasmāṅgāra.daśā.tuṣān |
AHS2.6.010c/ rajjūpānat.tulā.pāśam anyad vā bhagna.vicyutam || 10 || [Note: AHS2.6.010v/ 6.10dv anyad vā bhagna.vidyutam]
AHS2.6.011a/ tat.pūrva.darśane dūtā vyāharanti mariṣyatām |
AHS2.6.011c/ tathārdha.rātre madhyāhne sandhyayoḥ parva.vāsare || 11 ||
AHS2.6.012a/ ṣaṣṭhī.caturthī.navamī.rāhu.ketūdayādiṣu |
AHS2.6.012c/ bharaṇī.kṛttikāśleṣā.pūrvārdrā.paitrya.nairṛte || 12 ||
AHS2.6.013a/ yasmiṁś ca dūte bruvati vākyam ātura.saṁśrayam |
AHS2.6.013c/ paśyen nimittam a.śubhaṁ taṁ ca nānuvrajed bhiṣak || 13 ||
[Page 221 ]
AHS2.6.014a/ tad yathā vikalaḥ pretaḥ pretālaṅkāra eva vā |
AHS2.6.014c/ chinnaṁ dagdhaṁ vinaṣṭaṁ vā tad.vādīni vacāṁsi vā || 14 || [Note: AHS2.6.014v/ 6.14bv pretālaṅkāra eva ca]
AHS2.6.015a/ raso vā kaṭukas tīvro gandho vā kauṇapo mahān |
AHS2.6.015c/ sparśo vā vipulaḥ krūro yad vānyad api tādṛśam || 15 || [Note: AHS2.6.015v/ 6.15cv sparśo vā vipula.krūro]
AHS2.6.016a/ tat sarvam abhito vākyaṁ vākya.kāle 'tha.vā punaḥ |
AHS2.6.016c/ dūtam abhyāgataṁ dṛṣṭvā nāturaṁ tam upācaret || 16 ||
AHS2.6.017a/ hāhā.kranditam utkruṣṭam ākruṣṭaṁ skhalanaṁ kṣutam |
AHS2.6.017c/ vastrātapa.tra.pāda.tra.vyasanaṁ vyasanīkṣaṇam || 17 ||
AHS2.6.018a/ caitya.dhvajānāṁ pātrāṇāṁ pūrṇānāṁ ca nimajjanam |
AHS2.6.018c/ hatān.iṣṭa.pravādāś ca dūṣaṇaṁ bhasma.pāṁsubhiḥ || 18 ||
AHS2.6.019a/ pathaś chedo 'hi.mārjāra.godhā.saraṭa.vānaraiḥ |
AHS2.6.019c/ dīptāṁ prati diśaṁ vācaḥ krūrāṇāṁ mṛga.pakṣiṇām || 19 ||
AHS2.6.020a/ kṛṣṇa.dhānya.guḍodaśvil.lavaṇāsava.carmaṇām |
AHS2.6.020c/ sarṣapāṇāṁ vasā.taila.tṛṇa.paṅkendhanasya ca || 20 ||
AHS2.6.021a/ klība.krūra.śva.pākānāṁ jāla.vāgurayor api |
AHS2.6.021c/ charditasya purīṣasya pūti.dur.darśanasya ca || 21 ||
AHS2.6.022a/ niḥ.sārasya vyavāyasya kārpāsāder arer api |
AHS2.6.022c/ śayanāsana.yānānām uttānānāṁ tu darśanam || 22 || [Note: AHS2.6.022v/ 6.22dv uttānānāṁ ca darśanam]
AHS2.6.023a/ nyubjānām itareṣāṁ ca pātrādīnām a.śobhanam |
AHS2.6.023c/ puṁ.sañjñāḥ pakṣiṇo vāmāḥ strī.sañjñā dakṣiṇāḥ śubhāḥ || 23 ||
[Page 222 ]
AHS2.6.024a/ pradakṣiṇaṁ khaga.mṛgā yānto naivaṁ śva.jambukāḥ |
AHS2.6.024c/ a.yugmāś ca mṛgāḥ śastāḥ śastā nityaṁ ca darśane || 24 ||
AHS2.6.025a/ cāṣa.bhāsa.bharadvāja.nakula.cchāga.barhiṇaḥ |
AHS2.6.025c/ a.śubhaṁ sarva.tholūka.biḍāla.saraṭekṣaṇam || 25 ||
AHS2.6.026a/ praśastāḥ kīrtane kola.godhāhi.śaśa.jāhakāḥ |
AHS2.6.026c/ na darśane na virute vānararkṣāv ato 'nya.thā || 26 ||
AHS2.6.027a/ dhanur aindraṁ ca lālāṭam a.śubhaṁ śubham anyataḥ |
AHS2.6.027c/ agni.pūrṇāni pātrāṇi bhinnāni vi.śikhāni ca || 27 ||
AHS2.6.028a/ dadhy.a.kṣatādi nirgacchad vakṣyamāṇaṁ ca maṅgalam |
AHS2.6.028c/ vaidyo mariṣyatāṁ veśma praviśann eva paśyati || 28 ||
AHS2.6.029a/ dūtādy a.sādhu dṛṣṭvaivaṁ tyajed ārtam ato 'nya.thā |
AHS2.6.029c/ karuṇā.śuddha.santāno yatnatas tam upācaret || 29 || [Note: AHS2.6.029v/ 6.29dv yatnataḥ samupācaret]
AHS2.6.030a/ dadhy.a.kṣatekṣu.niṣpāva.priyaṅgu.madhu.sarpiṣām |
AHS2.6.030c/ yāvakāñjana.bhṛṅgāra.ghaṇṭā.dīpa.saro.ruhām || 30 ||
AHS2.6.031a/ dūrvārdra.matsya.māṁsānāṁ lājānāṁ phala.bhakṣayoḥ |
AHS2.6.031c/ ratnebha.pūrṇa.kumbhānāṁ kanyāyāḥ syandanasya ca || 31 ||
AHS2.6.032a/ narasya vardhamānasya devatānāṁ nṛpasya ca |
AHS2.6.032c/ śuklānāṁ su.mano.vāla.cāmarāmbara.vājinām || 32 ||
AHS2.6.033a/ śaṅkha.sādhu.dvi.joṣṇīṣa.toraṇa.svastikasya ca |
AHS2.6.033c/ bhūmeḥ samuddhatāyāś ca vahneḥ prajvalitasya ca || 33 ||
[Page 223 ]
AHS2.6.034a/ mano.jñasyānna.pānasya pūrṇasya śakaṭasya ca |
AHS2.6.034c/ nṛbhir dhenvāḥ sa.vatsāyā vaḍabāyāḥ striyā api || 34 ||
AHS2.6.035a/ jīvañjīvaka.sāraṅga.sārasa.priyavādinām |
AHS2.6.035c/ haṁsānāṁ śatapattrāṇāṁ baddhasyaika.paśos tathā || 35 ||
AHS2.6.036a/ rucakādarśa.siddhārtha.rocanānāṁ ca darśanam |
AHS2.6.036c/ gandhaḥ su.surabhir varṇaḥ su.śuklo madhuro rasaḥ || 36 ||
AHS2.6.037a/ go.pater anukūlasya svanas tad.vad gavām api |
AHS2.6.037c/ mṛga.pakṣi.narāṇāṁ ca śobhināṁ śobhanā giraḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS2.6.037v/ 6.37av go.pater anulomasya]
AHS2.6.038a/ chattra.dhvaja.patākānām utkṣepaṇam abhiṣṭutiḥ |
AHS2.6.038c/ bherī.mṛdaṅga.śaṅkhānāṁ śabdāḥ puṇyāha.niḥsvanāḥ || 38 ||
AHS2.6.039a/ vedādhyayana.śabdāś ca sukho vāyuḥ pradakṣiṇaḥ |
AHS2.6.039c/ pathi veśma.praveśe ca vidyād ārogya.lakṣaṇam || 39 ||
AHS2.6.040a/ ity uktaṁ dūta.śakunaṁ svapnān ūrdhvaṁ pracakṣate |
AHS2.6.040c/ svapne madyaṁ saha pretair yaḥ piban kṛṣyate śunā || 40 || [Note: AHS2.6.040v/ 6.40bv svapnān ūrdhvaṁ pracakṣyate 6.40bv svapnān ūrdhvaṁ pravakṣyate]
AHS2.6.041a/ sa martyo mṛtyunā śīghraṁ jvara.rūpeṇa nīyate |
AHS2.6.041c/ rakta.mālya.vapur.vastro yo hasan hriyate striyā || 41 || [Note: AHS2.6.041v/ 6.41av sa martyo mṛtyunā tūrṇaṁ]
AHS2.6.042a/ so 'sra.pittena mahiṣa.śva.varāhoṣṭra.gardabhaiḥ |
AHS2.6.042c/ yaḥ prayāti diśaṁ yāmyāṁ maraṇaṁ tasya yakṣmaṇā || 42 ||
AHS2.6.043a/ latā kaṇṭakinī vaṁśas tālo vā hṛdi jāyate |
AHS2.6.043c/ yasya tasyāśu gulmena yasya vahnim an.arciṣam || 43 ||
[Page 224 ]
AHS2.6.044a/ juhvato ghṛta.siktasya nagnasyorasi jāyate |
AHS2.6.044c/ padmaṁ sa naśyet kuṣṭhena caṇḍālaiḥ saha yaḥ pibet || 44 ||
AHS2.6.045a/ snehaṁ bahu.vidhaṁ svapne sa prameheṇa naśyati |
AHS2.6.045c/ unmādena jale majjed yo nṛtyan rākṣasaiḥ saha || 45 ||
AHS2.6.046a/ apasmāreṇa yo martyo nṛtyan pretena nīyate |
AHS2.6.046c/ yānaṁ kharoṣṭra.mārjāra.kapi.śārdūla.śūkaraiḥ || 46 ||
AHS2.6.047a/ yasya pretaiḥ śṛgālair vā sa mṛtyor vartate mukhe |
AHS2.6.047c/ apūpa.śaṣkulīr jagdhvā vibuddhas tad.vidhaṁ vaman || 47 ||
AHS2.6.048a/ na jīvaty akṣi.rogāya sūryendu.grahaṇekṣaṇam |
AHS2.6.048c/ sūryā.candramasoḥ pāta.darśanaṁ dṛg.vināśanam || 48 ||
AHS2.6.049a/ mūrdhni vaṁśa.latādīnāṁ sambhavo vayasāṁ tathā |
AHS2.6.049c/ nilayo muṇḍa.tā kāka.gṛdhrādyaiḥ parivāraṇam || 49 ||
AHS2.6.050a/ tathā preta.piśāca.strī.draviḍāndhra.gavāśanaiḥ |
AHS2.6.050c/ saṅgo vetra.latā.vaṁśa.tṛṇa.kaṇṭaka.saṅkaṭe || 50 ||
AHS2.6.051a/ śvabhra.śmaśāna.śayanaṁ patanaṁ pāṁsu.bhasmanoḥ |
AHS2.6.051c/ majjanaṁ jala.paṅkādau śīghreṇa srotasā hṛtiḥ || 51 ||
AHS2.6.052a/ nṛtya.vāditra.gītāni rakta.srag.vastra.dhāraṇam |
AHS2.6.052c/ vayo.'ṅga.vṛddhir abhyaṅgo vivāhaḥ śmaśru.karma ca || 52 ||
AHS2.6.053a/ pakvānna.sneha.madyāśaḥ pracchardana.virecane |
AHS2.6.053c/ hiraṇya.lohayor lābhaḥ kalir bandha.parājayau || 53 || [Note: AHS2.6.053v/ 6.53bv pracchardana.virecanam]
[Page 225 ]
AHS2.6.054a/ upānad.yuga.nāśaś ca prapātaḥ pāda.carmaṇoḥ |
AHS2.6.054c/ harṣo bhṛśaṁ prakupitaiḥ pitṛbhiś cāvabhartsanam || 54 ||
AHS2.6.055a/ pradīpa.graha.nakṣatra.danta.daivata.cakṣuṣām |
AHS2.6.055c/ patanaṁ vā vināśo vā bhedanaṁ parvatasya ca || 55 || [Note: AHS2.6.055v/ 6.55dv bhedanaṁ parvatasya vā]
AHS2.6.056a/ kānane rakta.kusume pāpa.karma.niveśane |
AHS2.6.056c/ citāndha.kāra.sambādhe jananyāṁ ca praveśanam || 56 || [Note: AHS2.6.056v/ 6.56cc cintāndha.kāra.sambādhe]
AHS2.6.057a/ pātaḥ prāsāda.śailāder matsyena grasanaṁ tathā |
AHS2.6.057c/ kāṣāyiṇām a.saumyānāṁ nagnānāṁ daṇḍa.dhāriṇām || 57 ||
AHS2.6.058a/ raktākṣāṇāṁ ca kṛṣṇānāṁ darśanaṁ jātu neṣyate |
AHS2.6.058c/ kṛṣṇā pāpānanācārā dīrgha.keśa.nakha.stanī || 58 ||
AHS2.6.059a/ vi.rāga.mālya.vasanā svapne kāla.niśā matā |
AHS2.6.059c/ mano.vahānāṁ pūrṇa.tvāt srotasāṁ prabalair malaiḥ || 59 ||
AHS2.6.060a/ dṛśyante dāruṇāḥ svapnā rogī yair yāti pañca.tām |
AHS2.6.060c/ a.rogaḥ saṁśayaṁ prāpya kaś.cid eva vimucyate || 60 ||
AHS2.6.061a/ dṛṣṭaḥ śruto 'nubhūtaś ca prārthitaḥ kalpitas tathā |
AHS2.6.061c/ bhāviko doṣa.jaś ceti svapnaḥ sapta.vidho mataḥ || 61 || [Note: AHS2.6.061v/ 6.61dv svapnaḥ sapta.vidhaḥ smṛtaḥ]
AHS2.6.062a/ teṣv ādyā niṣ.phalāḥ pañca yathā.sva.prakṛtir divā |
AHS2.6.062c/ vismṛto dīrgha.hrasvo 'ti pūrva.rātre cirāt phalam || 62 || [Note: AHS2.6.062v/ 6.62bv yathā.svaṁ prakṛtir divā 6.62cv vismṛto dīrgha.hrasvo 'pi 6.62cv vismṛto dīrgha.hrasvo vā]
AHS2.6.063a/ dṛṣṭaḥ karoti tucchaṁ ca go.sarge tad.ahar mahat |
AHS2.6.063c/ nidrayā vān.upahataḥ pratīpair vacanais tathā || 63 || [Note: AHS2.6.063v/ 6.63av dṛṣṭaḥ karoti tucchaṁ vā 6.63cv nidrayā cān.upahataḥ]
[Page 226 ]
AHS2.6.064a/ yāti pāpo 'lpa.phala.tāṁ dāna.homa.japādibhiḥ |
AHS2.6.064c/ a.kalyāṇam api svapnaṁ dṛṣṭvā tatraiva yaḥ punaḥ || 64 || [Note: AHS2.6.064v/ 6.64av yāti pāpo 'py a.phala.tāṁ]
AHS2.6.065a/ paśyet saumyaṁ śubhaṁ tasya śubham eva phalaṁ bhavet |
AHS2.6.065c/ devān dvi.jān go.vṛṣabhān jīvataḥ suhṛdo nṛpān || 65 ||
AHS2.6.066a/ sādhūn yaśasvino vahnim iddhaṁ svacchān jalāśayān |
AHS2.6.066c/ kanyāḥ kumārakān gaurān śukla.vastrān su.tejasaḥ || 66 || [Note: AHS2.6.066v/ 6.66cv kanyāṁ kumārakān gaurān]
AHS2.6.067a/ narāśanaṁ dīpta.tanuṁ samantād rudhirokṣitam |
AHS2.6.067c/ yaḥ paśyel labhate yo vā chattrādarśa.viṣāmiṣam || 67 || [Note: AHS2.6.067v/ 6.67av narāśanaṁ dīpta.tanuḥ 6.67bv samantād rudhirokṣitaḥ]
AHS2.6.068a/ śuklāḥ su.manaso vastram a.medhyālepanaṁ phalam |
AHS2.6.068c/ śaila.prāsāda.sa.phala.vṛkṣa.siṁha.nara.dvi.pān || 68 ||
AHS2.6.069a/ ārohed go.'śva.yānaṁ ca taren nada.hradoda.dhīn |
AHS2.6.069c/ pūrvottareṇa gamanam a.gamyāgamanaṁ mṛtam || 69 || [Note: AHS2.6.069v/ 6.69bv taren nada.mahoda.dhīn]
AHS2.6.070a/ sambādhān niḥsṛtir devaiḥ pitṛbhiś cābhinandanam |
AHS2.6.070c/ rodanaṁ patitotthānaṁ dviṣatāṁ cāvamardanam || 70 || [Note: AHS2.6.070v/ 6.70av saṅkaṭān niḥsṛtir devaiḥ 6.70dv dviṣatāṁ cāpamardanam]
AHS2.6.071a/ yasya syād āyur ārogyaṁ vittaṁ bahu ca so 'śnute |
AHS2.6.071c/ maṅgalācāra.sampannaḥ parivāras tathāturaḥ || 71 || [Note: AHS2.6.071v/ 6.71bv vittaṁ sa bahu.śo 'śnute]
AHS2.6.072a/ śrad.dadhāno 'nukūlaś ca prabhūta.dravya.saṅgrahaḥ |
AHS2.6.072c/ sat.tva.lakṣaṇa.saṁyogo bhaktir vaidya.dvi.jātiṣu || 72 ||
AHS2.6.073a/ cikitsāyām a.nirvedas tad ārogyasya lakṣaṇam |
AHS2.6.073c/ ity atra janma.maraṇaṁ yataḥ samyag udāhṛtam || 73 ||
[Page 227 ]
AHS2.6.073ū̆ab/ śarīrasya tataḥ sthānaṁ śārīram idam ucyate || 73ū̆ab ||

3. Part 3 :: Nidānasthānam

[Note: [ K edn 239-307]

3.1. Chapter 1 :: Atha sarvaroganidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 239-242]
AHS3.1.001a/ rogaḥ pāpmā jvaro vyādhir vikāro duḥkham āmayaḥ |
AHS3.1.001c/ yakṣmātaṅka.gadābādhāḥ śabdāḥ paryāya.vācinaḥ || 1 ||
AHS3.1.002a/ nidānaṁ pūrva.rūpāṇi rūpāṇy upaśayas tathā |
AHS3.1.002c/ samprāptiś ceti vijñānaṁ rogāṇāṁ pañca.dhā smṛtam || 2 ||
AHS3.1.003a/ nimitta.hetv.āyatana.pratyayotthāna.kāraṇaiḥ |
AHS3.1.003c/ nidānam āhuḥ paryāyaiḥ prāg.rūpaṁ yena lakṣyate || 3 ||
AHS3.1.004a/ utpitsur āmayo doṣa.viśeṣeṇān.adhiṣṭhitaḥ |
AHS3.1.004c/ liṅgam a.vyaktam alpa.tvād vyādhīnāṁ tad yathā.yatham || 4 ||
AHS3.1.005a/ tad eva vyakta.tāṁ yātaṁ rūpam ity abhidhīyate |
AHS3.1.005c/ saṁsthānaṁ vyañjanaṁ liṅgaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ cihnam ākṛtiḥ || 5 ||
AHS3.1.006a/ hetu.vyādhi.viparyasta.viparyastārtha.kāriṇām |
AHS3.1.006c/ auṣadhānna.vihārāṇām upayogaṁ sukhāvaham || 6 ||
AHS3.1.007a/ vidyād upaśayaṁ vyādheḥ sa hi sātmyam iti smṛtaḥ |
AHS3.1.007c/ viparīto 'n.upaśayo vyādhy.a.sātmyābhisañjñitaḥ || 7 ||
AHS3.1.008a/ yathā.duṣṭena doṣeṇa yathā cānuvisarpatā |
AHS3.1.008c/ nirvṛttir āmayasyāsau samprāptir jātir āgatiḥ || 8 ||
AHS3.1.009a/ saṅkhyā.vikalpa.prādhānya.bala.kāla.viśeṣataḥ |
AHS3.1.009c/ sā bhidyate yathātraiva vakṣyante 'ṣṭau jvarā iti || 9 ||
[Page 228 ]
AHS3.1.010a/ doṣāṇāṁ samavetānāṁ vikalpo 'ṁśāṁśa.kalpanā |
AHS3.1.010c/ svātantrya.pāratantryābhyāṁ vyādheḥ prādhānyam ādiśet || 10 ||
AHS3.1.011a/ hetv.ādi.kārtsnyāvayavair balā.bala.viśeṣaṇam |
AHS3.1.011c/ naktan.dinartu.bhuktāṁśair vyādhi.kālo yathā.malam || 11 ||
AHS3.1.012a/ iti prokto nidānārthas taṁ vyāsenopadekṣyati |
AHS3.1.012c/ sarveṣām eva rogāṇāṁ nidānaṁ kupitā malāḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS3.1.012v/ 1.12av iti prokto nidānārthaḥ 1.12bv taṁ vyāsenopadekṣyate 1.12bv taṁ vyāsenopadiśyate 1.12bv sa vyāsenopadekṣyati 1.12bv sa vyāsenopadekṣyate 1.12bv sa vyāsenopadiśyate]
AHS3.1.013a/ tat.prakopasya tu proktaṁ vividhā.hita.sevanam |
AHS3.1.013c/ a.hitaṁ tri.vidho yogas trayāṇāṁ prāg udāhṛtaḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS3.1.013v/ 1.13cv a.hitas tri.vidho yogas]
AHS3.1.014a/ tiktoṣaṇa.kaṣāyālpa.rūkṣa.pramita.bhojanaiḥ |
AHS3.1.014c/ dhāraṇodīraṇa.niśā.jāgarāty.ucca.bhāṣaṇaiḥ || 14 ||
AHS3.1.015a/ kriyāti.yoga.bhī.śoka.cintā.vyāyāma.maithunaiḥ |
AHS3.1.015c/ grīṣmāho.rātri.bhuktānte prakupyati samīraṇaḥ || 15 ||
AHS3.1.016a/ pittaṁ kaṭv.amla.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.paṭu.krodha.vidāhibhiḥ |
AHS3.1.016c/ śaran.madhyāhna.rātry.ardha.vidāha.samayeṣu ca || 16 || [Note: AHS3.1.016v/ 1.16dv .nidāgha.samayeṣu ca]
AHS3.1.017a/ svādv.amla.lavaṇa.snigdha.gurv.abhiṣyandi.śītalaiḥ |
AHS3.1.017c/ āsyā.svapna.sukhā.jīrṇa.divā.svapnāti.bṛṁhaṇaiḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS3.1.017v/ 1.17cv ati.svapna.sukhā.jīrṇa.]
AHS3.1.018a/ pracchardanādya.yogena bhukta.mātra.vasantayoḥ |
AHS3.1.018c/ pūrvāhṇe pūrva.rātre ca śleṣmā dvandvaṁ tu saṅkarāt || 18 ||
AHS3.1.019a/ miśrī.bhāvāt samastānāṁ sannipātas tathā punaḥ |
AHS3.1.019c/ saṅkīrṇā.jīrṇa.viṣama.viruddhādhyaśanādibhiḥ || 19 ||
[Page 229 ]
AHS3.1.020a/ vyāpanna.madya.pānīya.śuṣka.śākāma.mūlakaiḥ |
AHS3.1.020c/ piṇyāka.mṛd.yava.surā.pūti.śuṣka.kṛśāmiṣaiḥ || 20 ||
AHS3.1.021a/ doṣa.traya.karais tais tais tathānna.parivartanāt |
AHS3.1.021c/ ṛtor duṣṭāt puro.vātād grahāveśād viṣād garāt || 21 || [Note: AHS3.1.021v/ 1.21bv tathānna.parivartataḥ 1.21bv tathānna.parivṛttitaḥ]
AHS3.1.022a/ duṣṭānnāt parvatāśleṣād grahair janmarkṣa.pīḍanāt |
AHS3.1.022c/ mithyā.yogāc ca vividhāt pāpānāṁ ca niṣevaṇāt || 22 || [Note: AHS3.1.022v/ 1.22av duṣṭāmāt parvatāśleṣād]
AHS3.1.023a/ strīṇāṁ prasava.vaiṣamyāt tathā mithyopacārataḥ |
AHS3.1.023c/ prati.rogam iti kruddhā rogādhiṣṭhāna.gāminīḥ || 23 ||
AHS3.1.023ū̆ab/ rasāyanīḥ prapadyāśu doṣā dehe vikurvate || 23ū̆ab ||

3.2. Chapter 2 :: Athajvaranidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 242-254]
AHS3.2.001a/ jvaro roga.patiḥ pāpmā mṛtyur ojo.'śano 'ntakaḥ |
AHS3.2.001c/ krodho dakṣādhvara.dhvaṁsī rudrordhva.nayanodbhavaḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS3.2.001v/ 2.1bv mṛtyus tejo.'śano 'ntakaḥ]
AHS3.2.002a/ janmāntayor moha.mayaḥ santāpātmāpacāra.jaḥ |
AHS3.2.002c/ vividhair nāmabhiḥ krūro nānā.yoniṣu vartate || 2 ||
AHS3.2.003a/ sa jāyate 'ṣṭa.dhā doṣaiḥ pṛthaṅ miśraiḥ samāgataiḥ |
AHS3.2.003c/ āgantuś ca malās tatra svaiḥ svair duṣṭāḥ pradūṣaṇaiḥ || 3 ||
AHS3.2.004a/ āmāśayaṁ praviśyāmam anugamya pidhāya ca |
AHS3.2.004c/ srotāṁsi pakti.sthānāc ca nirasya jvalanaṁ bahiḥ || 4 ||
AHS3.2.005a/ saha tenābhisarpantas tapantaḥ sakalaṁ vapuḥ |
AHS3.2.005c/ kurvanto gātram aty.uṣṇaṁ jvaraṁ nirvartayanti te || 5 || [Note: AHS3.2.005v/ 2.5cv kurvanto gātram ā.śuṣkaṁ]
[Page 230 ]
AHS3.2.006a/ sroto.vibandhāt prāyeṇa tataḥ svedo na jāyate |
AHS3.2.006c/ tasya prāg.rūpam ālasyam a.ratir gātra.gauravam || 6 ||
AHS3.2.007a/ āsya.vairasyam a.ruci.jṛmbhā sāsrākulākṣi.tā |
AHS3.2.007c/ aṅga.mardo '.vipāko 'lpa.prāṇa.tā bahu.nidra.tā || 7 || [Note: AHS3.2.007v/ 2.7bv .jṛmbhā sāsrākulākṣa.tā]
AHS3.2.008a/ roma.harṣo vinamanaṁ piṇḍikodveṣṭanaṁ klamaḥ |
AHS3.2.008c/ hitopadeśeṣv a.kṣāntiḥ prītir amla.paṭūṣaṇe || 8 ||
AHS3.2.009a/ dveṣaḥ svāduṣu bhakṣyeṣu tathā bāleṣu tṛḍ bhṛśam |
AHS3.2.009c/ śabdāgni.śīta.vātāmbu.cchāyoṣṇeṣv a.nimittataḥ || 9 ||
AHS3.2.010a/ icchā dveṣaś ca tad anu jvarasya vyakta.tā bhavet |
AHS3.2.010c/ āgamāpagama.kṣobha.mṛdu.tā.vedanoṣmaṇām || 10 ||
AHS3.2.011a/ vaiṣamyaṁ tatra tatrāṅge tās tāḥ syur vedanāś calāḥ |
AHS3.2.011c/ pādayoḥ supta.tā stambhaḥ piṇḍikodveṣṭanaṁ śamaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS3.2.011v/ 2.11dv piṇḍikodveṣṭanaṁ klamaḥ]
AHS3.2.012a/ viśleṣa iva sandhīnāṁ sāda ūrvoḥ kaṭī.grahaḥ |
AHS3.2.012c/ pṛṣṭhaṁ kṣodam ivāpnoti niṣpīḍyata ivodaram || 12 ||
AHS3.2.013a/ chidyanta iva cāsthīni pārśva.gāni viśeṣataḥ |
AHS3.2.013c/ hṛdayasya grahas todaḥ prājaneneva vakṣasaḥ || 13 ||
AHS3.2.014a/ skandhayor mathanaṁ bāhvor bhedaḥ pīḍanam aṁsayoḥ |
AHS3.2.014c/ a.śaktir bhakṣaṇe hanvor jṛmbhaṇaṁ karṇayoḥ svanaḥ || 14 ||
AHS3.2.015a/ nistodaḥ śaṅkhayor mūrdhni vedanā vi.rasāsya.tā |
AHS3.2.015c/ kaṣāyāsya.tvam atha.vā malānām a.pravartanam || 15 ||
[Page 231 ]
AHS3.2.016a/ rūkṣāruṇa.tvag.āsyākṣi.nakha.mūtra.purīṣa.tā |
AHS3.2.016c/ prasekā.rocakā.śraddhā.vipākā.sveda.jāgarāḥ || 16 ||
AHS3.2.017a/ kaṇṭhauṣṭha.śoṣas tṛṭ śuṣkau chardi.kāsau viṣādi.tā |
AHS3.2.017c/ harṣo romāṅga.danteṣu vepathuḥ kṣavathor grahaḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS3.2.017v/ 2.17dv śvayathuḥ kṣavathor grahaḥ]
AHS3.2.018a/ bhramaḥ pralāpo gharmecchā vināmaś cānila.jvare |
AHS3.2.018c/ yuga.pad vyāptir aṅgānāṁ pralāpaḥ kaṭu.vaktra.tā || 18 ||
AHS3.2.019a/ nāsāsya.pākaḥ śītecchā bhramo mūrchā mado '.ratiḥ |
AHS3.2.019c/ viṭ.sraṁsaḥ pitta.vamanaṁ rakta.ṣṭhīvanam amlakaḥ || 19 ||
AHS3.2.020a/ rakta.koṭhodgamaḥ pīta.harita.tvaṁ tvag.ādiṣu |
AHS3.2.020c/ svedo niḥśvāsa.vaigandhyam ati.tṛṣṇā ca pitta.je || 20 ||
AHS3.2.021a/ viśeṣād a.rucir jāḍyaṁ sroto.rodho 'lpa.vega.tā |
AHS3.2.021c/ praseko mukha.mādhuryaṁ hṛl.lepa.śvāsa.pīnasāḥ || 21 ||
AHS3.2.022a/ hṛl.lāsaś chardanaṁ kāsaḥ stambhaḥ śvaityaṁ tvag.ādiṣu |
AHS3.2.022c/ aṅgeṣu śīta.piṭikās tandrodardaḥ kaphodbhave || 22 ||
AHS3.2.023a/ kāle yathā.svaṁ sarveṣāṁ pravṛttir vṛddhir eva vā || 23ab ||
AHS3.2.023c/ nidānoktān.upaśayo viparītopaśāyi.tā || 23cd ||
AHS3.2.023e/ yathā.svaṁ liṅga.saṁsarge jvaraḥ saṁsarga.jo 'pi ca || 23ef ||
AHS3.2.024a/ śiro.'rti.mūrchā.vami.dāha.moha.kaṇṭhāsya.śoṣā.rati.parva.bhedāḥ |
AHS3.2.024c/ unnidra.tā.tṛḍ.bhrama.roma.harṣā jṛmbhāti.vāk.tvaṁ ca calāt sa.pittāt || 24 ||
AHS3.2.025a/ tāpa.hāny.a.ruci.parva.śiro.ruk.pīnasa.śvasana.kāsa.vibandhāḥ |
AHS3.2.025c/ śīta.jāḍya.timira.bhrama.tandrāḥ śleṣma.vāta.janita.jvara.liṅgam || 25 ||
[Page 232 ]
AHS3.2.026a/ śīta.stambha.sveda.dāhā.vyavasthā tṛṣṇā.kāsa.śleṣma.pitta.pravṛttiḥ |
AHS3.2.026c/ mohas tandrā lipta.tiktāsya.tā ca jñeyaṁ rūpaṁ śleṣma.pitta.jvarasya || 26 || [Note: AHS3.2.026v/ 2.26bv tṛṣṇā kāsaḥ śleṣma.pitta.pravṛttiḥ]
AHS3.2.027a/ sarva.jo lakṣaṇaiḥ sarvair dāho 'tra ca muhur muhuḥ |
AHS3.2.027c/ tad.vac chītaṁ mahā.nidrā divā jāgaraṇaṁ niśi || 27 ||
AHS3.2.028a/ sadā vā naiva vā nidrā mahā.svedo 'ti naiva vā |
AHS3.2.028c/ gīta.nartana.hāsyādi.vikṛtehā.pravartanam || 28 || [Note: AHS3.2.028v/ 2.28bv mahān svedo 'ti naiva vā]
AHS3.2.029a/ sāśruṇī kaluṣe rakte bhugne lulita.pakṣmaṇī |
AHS3.2.029c/ akṣiṇī piṇḍikā.pārśva.mūrdha.parvāsthi.rug.bhramaḥ || 29 ||
AHS3.2.030a/ sa.svanau sa.rujau karṇau kaṇṭhaḥ śūkair ivācitaḥ |
AHS3.2.030c/ paridagdhā kharā jihvā guru.srastāṅga.sandhi.tā || 30 || [Note: AHS3.2.030v/ 2.30dv guruḥ srastāṅga.sandhi.tā]
AHS3.2.031a/ rakta.pitta.kapha.ṣṭhīvo lolanaṁ śiraso 'ti.ruk |
AHS3.2.031c/ koṭhānāṁ śyāva.raktānāṁ maṇḍalānāṁ ca darśanam || 31 || [Note: AHS3.2.031v/ 2.31bv lolanaṁ śiraso 'ti.tṛṭ]
AHS3.2.032a/ hṛd.vyathā mala.saṁsaṅgaḥ pravṛttir vālpa.śo 'ti vā |
AHS3.2.032c/ snigdhāsya.tā bala.bhraṁśaḥ svara.sādaḥ pralāpi.tā || 32 || [Note: AHS3.2.032v/ 2.32av hṛd.vyathā mala.saṁsargaḥ]
AHS3.2.033a/ doṣa.pākaś cirāt tandrā pratataṁ kaṇṭha.kūjanam |
AHS3.2.033c/ sannipātam abhinyāsaṁ taṁ brūyāc ca hṛtaujasam || 33 || [Note: AHS3.2.033v/ 2.33dv taṁ brūyāc ca hataujasam]
AHS3.2.033+1a/ vāyunā kapha.ruddhena pittam antaḥ prapīḍitam |
AHS3.2.033+1c/ vyavāyi.tvāc ca sūkṣma.tvād bahir.mārgaṁ pravartate || 33+1 ||
AHS3.2.033+2ab/ tena hāridra.netra.tvaṁ sannipātodbhave jvare || 33+2ab ||
[Page 233 ]
AHS3.2.034a/ doṣe vibaddhe naṣṭe 'gnau sarva.sampūrṇa.lakṣaṇaḥ |
AHS3.2.034c/ a.sādhyaḥ so 'nya.thā kṛcchro bhaved vaikalya.do 'pi vā || 34 ||
AHS3.2.035a/ anyac ca sannipātottho yatra pittaṁ pṛthak sthitam |
AHS3.2.035c/ tvaci koṣṭhe 'tha.vā dāhaṁ vidadhāti puro 'nu vā || 35 || [Note: AHS3.2.035v/ 2.35av anyaś ca sannipātottho]
AHS3.2.036a/ tad.vad vāta.kaphau śītaṁ dāhādir dus.taras tayoḥ |
AHS3.2.036c/ śītādau tatra pittena kaphe syandita.śoṣite || 36 ||
AHS3.2.037a/ śīte śānte 'mlako mūrchā madas tṛṣṇā ca jāyate |
AHS3.2.037c/ dāhādau punar ante syus tandrā.ṣṭhīva.vami.klamāḥ || 37 ||
AHS3.2.038a/ āgantur abhighātābhiṣaṅga.śāpābhicārataḥ |
AHS3.2.038c/ catur.dhātra kṣata.ccheda.dāhādyair abhighāta.jaḥ || 38 ||
AHS3.2.039a/ śramāc ca tasmin pavanaḥ prāyo raktaṁ pradūṣayan |
AHS3.2.039c/ sa.vyathā.śopha.vaivarṇyaṁ sa.rujaṁ kurute jvaram || 39 ||
AHS3.2.040a/ grahāveśauṣadhi.viṣa.krodha.bhī.śoka.kāma.jaḥ |
AHS3.2.040c/ abhiṣaṅgād graheṇāsminn a.kasmād dhāsa.rodane || 40 ||
AHS3.2.041a/ oṣadhi.gandha.je mūrchā śiro.rug vamathuḥ kṣavaḥ |
AHS3.2.041c/ viṣān mūrchātisārāsya.śyāva.tā.dāha.hṛd.gadāḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS3.2.041v/ 2.41bv śiro.ruk śvayathuḥ kṣavaḥ 2.41bv śiro.rug vepathuḥ kṣavaḥ 2.41dv .śyāva.tā.dāha.hṛd.grahāḥ]
AHS3.2.042a/ krodhāt kampaḥ śiro.ruk ca pralāpo bhaya.śoka.je |
AHS3.2.042c/ kāmād bhramo '.rucir dāho hrī.nidrā.dhī.dhṛti.kṣayaḥ || 42 || [Note: AHS3.2.042v/ 2.42dv bhī.nidrā.dhī.dhṛti.kṣayaḥ]
AHS3.2.043a/ grahādau sannipātasya bhayādau marutas traye |
AHS3.2.043c/ kopaḥ kope 'pi pittasya yau tu śāpābhicāra.jau || 43 || [Note: AHS3.2.043v/ 2.43cv kopaḥ kope tu pittasya 2.43cv kopaḥ krodhe tu pittasya]
[Page 234 ]
AHS3.2.044a/ sannipāta.jvarau ghorau tāv a.sahya.tamau matau |
AHS3.2.044c/ tatrābhicārikair mantrair hūyamānasya tapyate || 44 || [Note: AHS3.2.044v/ 2.44bv tāv a.sādhya.tamau matau]
AHS3.2.045a/ pūrvaṁ cetas tato dehas tato visphoṭa.tṛḍ.bhramaiḥ |
AHS3.2.045c/ sa.dāha.mūrchair grastasya praty.ahaṁ vardhate jvaraḥ || 45 ||
AHS3.2.046a/ iti jvaro 'ṣṭa.dhā dṛṣṭaḥ samāsād vividhas tu saḥ |
AHS3.2.046c/ śārīro mānasaḥ saumyas tīkṣṇo 'ntar.bahir.āśrayaḥ || 46 ||
AHS3.2.047a/ prākṛto vaikṛtaḥ sādhyo '.sādhyaḥ sāmo nir.āmakaḥ |
AHS3.2.047c/ pūrvaṁ śarīre śārīre tāpo manasi mānase || 47 ||
AHS3.2.048a/ pavane yoga.vāhi.tvāc chītaṁ śleṣma.yute bhavet |
AHS3.2.048c/ dāhaḥ pitta.yute miśraṁ miśre 'ntaḥ.saṁśraye punaḥ || 48 ||
AHS3.2.049a/ jvare 'dhikaṁ vikārāḥ syur antaḥ kṣobho mala.grahaḥ |
AHS3.2.049c/ bahir eva bahir.vege tāpo 'pi ca su.sādhya.tā || 49 ||
AHS3.2.050a/ varṣā.śarad.vasanteṣu vātādyaiḥ prākṛtaḥ kramāt |
AHS3.2.050c/ vaikṛto 'nyaḥ sa duḥ.sādhyaḥ prāyaś ca prākṛto 'nilāt || 50 ||
AHS3.2.051a/ varṣāsu māruto duṣṭaḥ pitta.śleṣmānvito jvaram |
AHS3.2.051c/ kuryāt pittaṁ ca śaradi tasya cānu.balaṁ kaphaḥ || 51 || [Note: AHS3.2.051v/ 2.51dv tasya cānu.balaḥ kaphaḥ]
AHS3.2.052a/ tat.prakṛtyā visargāc ca tatra nān.aśanād bhayam |
AHS3.2.052c/ kapho vasante tam api vāta.pittaṁ bhaved anu || 52 || [Note: AHS3.2.052v/ 2.52av tat.prakṛtyā visargasya]
AHS3.2.053a/ bala.vatsv alpa.doṣeṣu jvaraḥ sādhyo 'n.upadravaḥ |
AHS3.2.053c/ sarva.thā vikṛti.jñāne prāg a.sādhya udāhṛtaḥ || 53 ||
[Page 235 ]
AHS3.2.054a/ jvaropadrava.tīkṣṇa.tvam a.glānir bahu.mūtra.tā |
AHS3.2.054c/ na pravṛttir na viḍ jīrṇā na kṣut sāma.jvarākṛtiḥ || 54 ||
AHS3.2.055a/ jvara.vego 'dhikaṁ tṛṣṇā pralāpaḥ śvasanaṁ bhramaḥ |
AHS3.2.055c/ mala.pravṛttir utkleśaḥ pacyamānasya lakṣaṇam || 55 || [Note: AHS3.2.055v/ 2.55av jvara.vego 'dhikas tṛṣṇā]
AHS3.2.056a/ jīrṇa.tāma.viparyāsāt sapta.rātraṁ ca laṅghanāt |
AHS3.2.056c/ jvaraḥ pañca.vidhaḥ prokto mala.kāla.balā.balāt || 56 ||
AHS3.2.057a/ prāya.śaḥ sannipātena bhūyasā tūpadiśyate |
AHS3.2.057c/ santataḥ satato 'nye.dyus tṛtīyaka.caturthakau || 57 || [Note: AHS3.2.057v/ 2.57av prāyaḥ sa sannipātena]
AHS3.2.058a/ dhātu.mūtra.śakṛd.vāhi.srotasāṁ vyāpino malāḥ |
AHS3.2.058c/ tāpayantas tanuṁ sarvāṁ tulya.dūṣyādi.vardhitāḥ || 58 ||
AHS3.2.059a/ balino guravaḥ stabdhā viśeṣeṇa rasāśritāḥ |
AHS3.2.059c/ santataṁ niṣ.prati.dvandvā jvaraṁ kuryuḥ su.duḥ.saham || 59 ||
AHS3.2.060a/ malaṁ jvaroṣmā dhātūn vā sa śīghraṁ kṣapayet tataḥ |
AHS3.2.060c/ sarvākāraṁ rasādīnāṁ śuddhyā.śuddhyāpi vā kramāt || 60 || [Note: AHS3.2.060v/ 2.60av malāñ jvaroṣmā dhātūn vā]
AHS3.2.061a/ vāta.pitta.kaphaiḥ sapta daśa dvā.daśa vāsarān |
AHS3.2.061c/ prāyo 'nuyāti maryādāṁ mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca || 61 || [Note: AHS3.2.061v/ 2.61dv vimokṣāya vadhāya vā]
AHS3.2.062a/ ity agniveśasya mataṁ hārītasya punaḥ smṛtiḥ |
AHS3.2.062c/ dvi.guṇā saptamī yāvan navamy ekā.daśī tathā || 62 ||
AHS3.2.063a/ eṣā tri.doṣa.maryādā mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca |
AHS3.2.063c/ śuddhy.a.śuddhau jvaraḥ kālaṁ dīrgham apy anuvartate || 63 || [Note: AHS3.2.063v/ 2.63cv śuddhy.a.śuddhyor jvaraḥ kālaṁ]
[Page 236 ]
AHS3.2.064a/ kṛśānāṁ vyādhi.muktānāṁ mithyāhārādi.sevinām |
AHS3.2.064c/ alpo 'pi doṣo dūṣyāder labdhvānya.tamato balam || 64 ||
AHS3.2.065a/ sa.vipakṣo jvaraṁ kuryād viṣamaṁ kṣaya.vṛddhi.bhāk |
AHS3.2.065c/ doṣaḥ pravartate teṣāṁ sve kāle jvarayan balī || 65 || [Note: AHS3.2.065v/ 2.65dv sva.kāle jvarayan balī]
AHS3.2.066a/ nivartate punaś caiṣa praty.anīka.balā.balaḥ |
AHS3.2.066c/ kṣīṇe doṣe jvaraḥ sūkṣmo rasādiṣv eva līyate || 66 ||
AHS3.2.067a/ līna.tvāt kārśya.vaivarṇya.jāḍyādīn ādadhāti saḥ |
AHS3.2.067c/ āsanna.vivṛtāsya.tvāt srotasāṁ rasa.vāhinām || 67 ||
AHS3.2.068a/ āśu sarvasya vapuṣo vyāptir doṣeṇa jāyate |
AHS3.2.068c/ santataḥ satatas tena viparīto viparyayāt || 68 ||
AHS3.2.069a/ viṣamo viṣamārambha.kriyā.kālo 'nuṣaṅga.vān |
AHS3.2.069c/ doṣo raktāśrayaḥ prāyaḥ karoti satataṁ jvaram || 69 ||
AHS3.2.070a/ aho.rātrasya sa dviḥ syāt sakṛd anye.dyur āśritaḥ |
AHS3.2.070c/ tasmin māṁsa.vahā nāḍīr medo.nāḍīs tṛtīyake || 70 || [Note: AHS3.2.070v/ 2.70cv asmin māṁsa.vahā nāḍīr]
AHS3.2.071a/ grāhī pittānilān mūrdhnas trikasya kapha.pittataḥ |
AHS3.2.071c/ sa.pṛṣṭhasyānila.kaphāt sa caikāhāntaraḥ smṛtaḥ || 71 || [Note: AHS3.2.071v/ 2.71dv sa vaikāhāntaraḥ smṛtaḥ]
AHS3.2.072a/ caturthako male medo.majjāsthy.anya.tama.sthite |
AHS3.2.072c/ majja.stha evety apare prabhāvaṁ sa tu darśayet || 72 ||
AHS3.2.073a/ dvi.dhā kaphena jaṅghābhyāṁ sa pūrvaṁ śiraso 'nilāt |
AHS3.2.073c/ asthi.majjobhaya.gate caturthaka.viparyayaḥ || 73 || [Note: AHS3.2.073v/ 2.73dv cāturthika.viparyayaḥ]
[Page 237 ]
AHS3.2.074a/ tri.dhā dvy.ahaṁ jvarayati dinam ekaṁ tu muñcati |
AHS3.2.074c/ balā.balena doṣāṇām anna.ceṣṭādi.janmanā || 74 || [Note: AHS3.2.074v/ 2.74av try.ahād dvy.ahaṁ jvarayati 2.74bv dinam ekaṁ vimuñcati]
AHS3.2.075a/ jvaraḥ syān manasas tad.vat karmaṇaś ca tadā tadā |
AHS3.2.075c/ doṣa.dūṣyartv.aho.rātra.prabhṛtīnāṁ balāj jvaraḥ || 75 ||
AHS3.2.076a/ manaso viṣayāṇāṁ ca kālaṁ taṁ taṁ prapadyate |
AHS3.2.076c/ dhātūn prakṣobhayan doṣo mokṣa.kāle vilīyate || 76 ||
AHS3.2.077a/ tato naraḥ śvasan svidyan kūjan vamati ceṣṭate |
AHS3.2.077c/ vepate pralapaty uṣṇaiḥ śītaiś cāṅgair hata.prabhaḥ || 77 ||
AHS3.2.078a/ vi.sañjño jvara.vegārtaḥ sa.krodha iva vīkṣate |
AHS3.2.078c/ sa.doṣa.śabdaṁ ca śakṛd dravaṁ sṛjati vega.vat || 78 ||
AHS3.2.079a/ deho laghur vyapagata.klama.moha.tāpaḥ pāko mukhe karaṇa.sauṣṭhavam a.vyatha.tvam |
AHS3.2.079c/ svedaḥ kṣavaḥ prakṛti.yogi mano 'nna.lipsā kaṇḍūś ca mūrdhni vigata.jvara.lakṣaṇāni || 79 ||

3.3. Chapter 3 :: Atharaktapittakāsanidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 254-257]
AHS3.3.001a/ bhṛśoṣṇa.tīkṣṇa.kaṭv.amla.lavaṇādi.vidāhibhiḥ |
AHS3.3.001c/ kodravoddālakaiś cānnais tad.yuktair ati.sevitaiḥ || 1 ||
AHS3.3.002a/ kupitaṁ pittalaiḥ pittaṁ dravaṁ raktaṁ ca mūrchite |
AHS3.3.002c/ te mithas tulya.rūpa.tvam āgamya vyāpnutas tanum || 2 ||
AHS3.3.003a/ pittaṁ raktasya vikṛteḥ saṁsargād dūṣaṇād api |
AHS3.3.003c/ gandha.varṇānuvṛtteś ca raktena vyapadiśyate || 3 || [Note: AHS3.3.003v/ 3.3av pittaṁ raktasya vikṛtiḥ]
AHS3.3.004a/ prabhavaty asṛjaḥ sthānāt plīhato yakṛtaś ca tat |
AHS3.3.004c/ śiro.guru.tvam a.ruciḥ śītecchā dhūmako 'mlakaḥ || 4 ||
[Page 238 ]
AHS3.3.005a/ chardiś chardita.baibhatsyaṁ kāsaḥ śvāso bhramaḥ klamaḥ |
AHS3.3.005c/ loha.lohita.matsyāma.gandhāsya.tvaṁ svara.kṣayaḥ || 5 ||
AHS3.3.006a/ rakta.hāridra.harita.varṇa.tā nayanādiṣu |
AHS3.3.006c/ nīla.lohita.pītānāṁ varṇānām a.vivecanam || 6 ||
AHS3.3.007a/ svapne tad.varṇa.darśi.tvaṁ bhavaty asmin bhaviṣyati |
AHS3.3.007c/ ūrdhvaṁ nāsākṣi.karṇāsyair meḍhra.yoni.gudair adhaḥ || 7 ||
AHS3.3.008a/ kupitaṁ roma.kūpaiś ca samastais tat pravartate |
AHS3.3.008c/ ūrdhvaṁ sādhyaṁ kaphād yasmāt tad virecana.sādhanam || 8 ||
AHS3.3.009a/ bahv.auṣadhaṁ ca pittasya vireko hi varauṣadham |
AHS3.3.009c/ anubandhī kapho yaś ca tatra tasyāpi śuddhi.kṛt || 9 ||
AHS3.3.010a/ kaṣāyāḥ svādavo 'py asya viśuddha.śleṣmaṇo hitāḥ |
AHS3.3.010c/ kim u tiktāḥ kaṣāyā vā ye nisargāt kaphāpahāḥ || 10 ||
AHS3.3.011a/ adho yāpyaṁ calād yasmāt tat pracchardana.sādhanam |
AHS3.3.011c/ alpauṣadhaṁ ca pittasya vamanaṁ na varauṣadham || 11 ||
AHS3.3.012a/ anubandhī calo yaś ca śāntaye 'pi na tasya tat |
AHS3.3.012c/ kaṣāyāś ca hitās tasya madhurā eva kevalam || 12 ||
AHS3.3.013a/ kapha.māruta.saṁsṛṣṭam a.sādhyam ubhayāyanam |
AHS3.3.013c/ a.śakya.prātilomya.tvād a.bhāvād auṣadhasya ca || 13 ||
AHS3.3.014a/ na hi saṁśodhanaṁ kiñ.cid asty asya pratiloma.gam |
AHS3.3.014c/ śodhanaṁ pratilomaṁ ca rakta.pitte bhiṣag.jitam || 14 || [Note: AHS3.3.014v/ 3.14bv asty asya pratilomanam 3.14bv asty asya pratilomakam]
[Page 239 ]
AHS3.3.015a/ evam evopaśamanaṁ sarva.śo nāsya vidyate |
AHS3.3.015c/ saṁsṛṣṭeṣu hi doṣeṣu sarva.jic chamanaṁ hitam || 15 ||
AHS3.3.016a/ tatra doṣānugamanaṁ sirāsra iva lakṣayet |
AHS3.3.016c/ upadravāṁś ca vikṛti.jñānatas teṣu cādhikam || 16 ||
AHS3.3.017a/ āśu.kārī yataḥ kāsas tam evātaḥ pravakṣyati |
AHS3.3.017c/ pañca kāsāḥ smṛtā vāta.pitta.śleṣma.kṣata.kṣayaiḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS3.3.017v/ 3.17bv tam evātaḥ pracakṣyate 3.17bv tam evātaḥ pracakṣate]
AHS3.3.018a/ kṣayāyopekṣitāḥ sarve balinaś cottarottaram |
AHS3.3.018c/ teṣāṁ bhaviṣyatāṁ rūpaṁ kaṇṭhe kaṇḍūr a.rocakaḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS3.3.018v/ 3.18bv balinaś ca yathottaram]
AHS3.3.019a/ śūka.pūrṇābha.kaṇṭha.tvaṁ tatrādho vihato 'nilaḥ |
AHS3.3.019c/ ūrdhvaṁ pravṛttaḥ prāpyoras tasmin kaṇṭhe ca saṁsajan || 19 ||
AHS3.3.020a/ śiraḥ.srotāṁsi sampūrya tato 'ṅgāny utkṣipann iva |
AHS3.3.020c/ kṣipann ivākṣiṇī pṛṣṭham uraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan || 20 ||
AHS3.3.021a/ pravartate sa vaktreṇa bhinna.kāṁsyopama.dhvaniḥ |
AHS3.3.021c/ hetu.bhedāt pratīghāta.bhedo vāyoḥ sa.raṁhasaḥ || 21 ||
AHS3.3.022a/ yad rujā.śabda.vaiṣamyaṁ kāsānāṁ jāyate tataḥ |
AHS3.3.022c/ kupito vātalair vātaḥ śuṣkoraḥ.kaṇṭha.vaktra.tām || 22 || [Note: AHS3.3.022v/ 3.22cv kupito vātalair vāyuḥ]
AHS3.3.023a/ hṛt.pārśvoraḥ.śiraḥ.śūlaṁ moha.kṣobha.svara.kṣayān |
AHS3.3.023c/ karoti śuṣkaṁ kāsaṁ ca mahā.vega.rujā.svanam || 23 || [Note: AHS3.3.023v/ 3.23cv karoti śuṣka.kāsaṁ ca]
AHS3.3.024a/ so 'ṅga.harṣī kaphaṁ śuṣkaṁ kṛcchrān muktvālpa.tāṁ vrajet |
AHS3.3.024c/ pittāt pītākṣi.kapha.tā tiktāsya.tvaṁ jvaro bhramaḥ || 24 ||
[Page 240 ]
AHS3.3.025a/ pittāsṛg.vamanaṁ tṛṣṇā vaisvaryaṁ dhūmako 'mlakaḥ |
AHS3.3.025c/ pratataṁ kāsa.vegena jyotiṣām iva darśanam || 25 || [Note: AHS3.3.025v/ 3.25bv vaisvaryaṁ dhūmako madaḥ]
AHS3.3.026a/ kaphād uro 'lpa.ruṅ mūrdha.hṛdayaṁ stimitaṁ guru |
AHS3.3.026c/ kaṇṭhopalepaḥ sadanaṁ pīnasa.cchardy.a.rocakāḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS3.3.026v/ 3.26cv kaṇṭhāsya.lepaḥ sadanaṁ]
AHS3.3.027a/ roma.harṣo ghana.snigdha.śveta.śleṣma.pravartanam |
AHS3.3.027c/ yuddhādyaiḥ sāhasais tais taiḥ sevitair a.yathā.balam || 27 ||
AHS3.3.028a/ urasy antaḥ.kṣate vāyuḥ pittenānugato balī |
AHS3.3.028c/ kupitaḥ kurute kāsaṁ kaphaṁ tena sa.śoṇitam || 28 ||
AHS3.3.029a/ pītaṁ śyāvaṁ ca śuṣkaṁ ca grathitaṁ kuthitaṁ bahu |
AHS3.3.029c/ ṣṭhīvet kaṇṭhena rujatā vibhinneneva corasā || 29 || [Note: AHS3.3.029v/ 3.29av pītaṁ śyāmaṁ ca śuṣkaṁ ca]
AHS3.3.030a/ sūcībhir iva tīkṣṇābhis tudyamānena śūlinā |
AHS3.3.030c/ parva.bheda.jvara.śvāsa.tṛṣṇā.vaisvarya.kampa.vān || 30 ||
