AHS3.3.031a/ pārāvata ivākūjan pārśva.śūlī tato 'sya ca |
AHS3.3.031c/ kramād vīryaṁ ruciḥ paktā balaṁ varṇaś ca hīyate || 31 ||
AHS3.3.032a/ kṣīṇasya sāsṛṅ.mūtra.tvaṁ syāc ca pṛṣṭha.kaṭī.grahaḥ |
AHS3.3.032c/ vāyu.pradhānāḥ kupitā dhātavo rāja.yakṣmiṇaḥ || 32 ||
AHS3.3.033a/ kurvanti yakṣmāyatanaiḥ kāsaṁ ṣṭhīvet kaphaṁ tataḥ |
AHS3.3.033c/ pūti.pūyopamaṁ pītaṁ visraṁ harita.lohitam || 33 ||
AHS3.3.034a/ lucyete iva pārśve ca hṛdayaṁ patatīva ca |
AHS3.3.034c/ a.kasmād uṣṇa.śītecchā bahv.āśi.tvaṁ bala.kṣayaḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS3.3.034v/ 3.34av lupyete iva pārśve ca]
[Page 241 ]
AHS3.3.035a/ snigdha.prasanna.vaktra.tvaṁ śrī.mad.darśana.netra.tā |
AHS3.3.035c/ tato 'sya kṣaya.rūpāṇi sarvāṇy āvir.bhavanti ca || 35 || [Note: AHS3.3.035v/ 3.35bv śrī.mad.daśana.netra.tā]
AHS3.3.036a/ ity eṣa kṣaya.jaḥ kāsaḥ kṣīṇānāṁ deha.nāśanaḥ |
AHS3.3.036c/ yāpyo vā balināṁ tad.vat kṣata.jo 'bhinavau tu tau || 36 ||
AHS3.3.037a/ sidhyetām api sānāthyāt sādhyā doṣaiḥ pṛthak trayaḥ |
AHS3.3.037c/ miśrā yāpyā dvayāt sarve jarasā sthavirasya ca || 37 || [Note: AHS3.3.037v/ 3.37av sidhyetām api sāmarthyāt]
AHS3.3.038a/ kāsāc chvāsa.kṣaya.cchardi.svara.sādādayo gadāḥ |
AHS3.3.038c/ bhavanty upekṣayā yasmāt tasmāt taṁ tvarayā jayet || 38 ||

3.4. Chapter 4 :: Athaśvāsahidhmānidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 258-260]
AHS3.4.001a/ kāsa.vṛddhyā bhavec chvāsaḥ pūrvair vā doṣa.kopanaiḥ |
AHS3.4.001c/ āmātīsāra.vamathu.viṣa.pāṇḍu.jvarair api || 1 ||
AHS3.4.002a/ rajo.dhūmānilair marma.ghātād ati.himāmbunā |
AHS3.4.002c/ kṣudrakas tamakaś chinno mahān ūrdhvaś ca pañcamaḥ || 2 ||
AHS3.4.003a/ kaphoparuddha.gamanaḥ pavano viṣvag.āsthitaḥ |
AHS3.4.003c/ prāṇodakānna.vāhīni duṣṭaḥ srotāṁsi dūṣayan || 3 ||
AHS3.4.004a/ uraḥ.sthaḥ kurute śvāsam āmāśaya.samudbhavam |
AHS3.4.004c/ prāg.rūpaṁ tasya hṛt.pārśva.śūlaṁ prāṇa.viloma.tā || 4 ||
AHS3.4.005a/ ānāhaḥ śaṅkha.bhedaś ca tatrāyāsāti.bhojanaiḥ |
AHS3.4.005c/ preritaḥ prerayet kṣudraṁ svayaṁ saṁśamanaṁ marut || 5 ||
AHS3.4.006a/ pratilomaṁ sirā gacchann udīrya pavanaḥ kapham |
AHS3.4.006c/ parigṛhya śiro.grīvam uraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan || 6 ||
[Page 242 ]
AHS3.4.007a/ kāsaṁ ghurghurakaṁ moham a.rucim pīnasaṁ tṛṣam |
AHS3.4.007c/ karoti tīvra.vegaṁ ca śvāsaṁ prāṇopatāpinam || 7 ||
AHS3.4.008a/ pratāmyet tasya vegena niṣṭhyūtānte kṣaṇaṁ sukhī |
AHS3.4.008c/ kṛcchrāc chayānaḥ śvasiti niṣaṇṇaḥ svāsthyam ṛcchati || 8 ||
AHS3.4.009a/ ucchritākṣo lalāṭena svidyatā bhṛśam arti.mān |
AHS3.4.009c/ viśuṣkāsyo muhuḥ.śvāsī kāṅkṣaty uṣṇaṁ sa.vepathuḥ || 9 ||
AHS3.4.010a/ meghāmbu.śīta.prāg.vātaiḥ śleṣmalaiś ca vivardhate |
AHS3.4.010c/ sa yāpyas tamako sādhyo navo vā balino bhavet || 10 ||
AHS3.4.011a/ jvara.mūrchā.yutaḥ śītaiḥ śāmyet pratamakas tu saḥ |
AHS3.4.011c/ chinnāc chvasiti vicchinnaṁ marma.ccheda.rujārditaḥ || 11 ||
AHS3.4.012a/ sa.sveda.mūrchaḥ sānāho vasti.dāha.nirodha.vān |
AHS3.4.012c/ adho.dṛg viplutākṣaś ca muhyan raktaika.locanaḥ || 12 ||
AHS3.4.013a/ śuṣkāsyaḥ pralapan dīno naṣṭa.cchāyo vi.cetanaḥ |
AHS3.4.013c/ mahatā mahatā dīno nādena śvasiti krathan || 13 || [Note: AHS3.4.013v/ 4.13cv mahato mahatā dīno]
AHS3.4.014a/ uddhūyamānaḥ saṁrabdho mattarṣabha ivā.niśam |
AHS3.4.014c/ praṇaṣṭa.jñāna.vijñāno vibhrānta.nayanānanaḥ || 14 ||
AHS3.4.015a/ vakṣaḥ samākṣipan baddha.mūtra.varcā viśīrṇa.vāk |
AHS3.4.015c/ śuṣka.kaṇṭho muhur muhyan karṇa.śaṅkha.śiro.'ti.ruk || 15 ||
AHS3.4.016a/ dīrgham ūrdhvaṁ śvasity ūrdhvān na ca pratyāharaty adhaḥ |
AHS3.4.016c/ śleṣmāvṛta.mukha.srotāḥ kruddha.gandha.vahārditaḥ || 16 ||
[Page 243 ]
AHS3.4.017a/ ūrdhva.dṛg vīkṣate bhrāntam akṣiṇī paritaḥ kṣipan |
AHS3.4.017c/ marmasu cchidyamāneṣu paridevī niruddha.vāk || 17 ||
AHS3.4.018a/ ete sidhyeyur a.vyaktā vyaktāḥ prāṇa.harā dhruvam |
AHS3.4.018c/ śvāsaika.hetu.prāg.rūpa.saṅkhyā.prakṛti.saṁśrayāḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS3.4.018v/ 4.18dv .saṅkhyā.prakṛti.saṁśrayā]
AHS3.4.019a/ hidhmā bhaktodbhavā kṣudrā yamalā mahatīti ca |
AHS3.4.019c/ gambhīrā ca marut tatra tvarayā.yukti.sevitaiḥ || 19 ||
AHS3.4.020a/ rūkṣa.tīkṣṇa.kharā.sātmyair anna.pānaiḥ prapīḍitaḥ |
AHS3.4.020c/ karoti hidhmām a.rujāṁ manda.śabdāṁ kṣavānugām || 20 ||
AHS3.4.021a/ śamaṁ sātmyānna.pānena yā prayāti ca sānna.jā |
AHS3.4.021c/ āyāsāt pavanaḥ kṣudraḥ kṣudrāṁ hidhmāṁ pravartayet || 21 || [Note: AHS3.4.021v/ 4.21cv āyāsāt pavanaḥ kruddhaḥ]
AHS3.4.022a/ jatru.mūla.pravisṛtām alpa.vegāṁ mṛduṁ ca sā |
AHS3.4.022c/ vṛddhim āyāsyato yāti bhukta.mātre ca mārdavam || 22 ||
AHS3.4.023a/ cireṇa yamalair vegair āhāre yā pravartate |
AHS3.4.023c/ pariṇāmon.mukhe vṛddhiṁ pariṇāme ca gacchati || 23 ||
AHS3.4.024a/ kampayantī śiro.grīvam ādhmātasyāti.tṛṣyataḥ |
AHS3.4.024c/ pralāpa.cchardy.atīsāra.netra.vipluti.jṛmbhiṇaḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS3.4.024v/ 4.24av kampayantī śiro.grīvām]
AHS3.4.025a/ yamalā veginī hidhmā pariṇāma.vatī ca sā |
AHS3.4.025c/ stabdha.bhrū.śaṅkha.yugmasya sāsra.vipluta.cakṣuṣaḥ || 25 || [Note: AHS3.4.025v/ 4.25cv dhvasta.bhrū.śaṅkha.yugmasya 4.25dv sāśru.vipluta.cakṣuṣaḥ]
AHS3.4.026a/ stambhayantī tanuṁ vācaṁ smṛtiṁ sañjñāṁ ca muṣṇatī |
AHS3.4.026c/ rundhatī mārgam annasya kurvatī marma.ghaṭṭanam || 26 ||
[Page 244 ]
AHS3.4.027a/ pṛṣṭhato namanaṁ śoṣaṁ mahā.hidhmā pravartate |
AHS3.4.027c/ mahā.mūlā mahā.śabdā mahā.vegā mahā.balā || 27 ||
AHS3.4.028a/ pakvāśayād vā nābher vā pūrva.vad yā pravartate |
AHS3.4.028c/ tad.rūpā sā muhuḥ kuryāj jṛmbhām aṅga.prasāraṇam || 28 ||
AHS3.4.029a/ gambhīreṇānunādena gambhīrā tāsu sādhayet |
AHS3.4.029c/ ādye dve varjayed antye sarva.liṅgāṁ ca veginīm || 29 ||
AHS3.4.030a/ sarvāś ca sañcitāmasya sthavirasya vyavāyinaḥ |
AHS3.4.030c/ vyādhibhiḥ kṣīṇa.dehasya bhakta.ccheda.kṣatasya vā || 30 ||
AHS3.4.031a/ sarve 'pi rogā nāśāya na tv evaṁ śīghra.kāriṇaḥ |
AHS3.4.031c/ hidhmā.śvāsau yathā tau hi mṛtyu.kāle kṛtālayau || 31 ||

3.5. Chapter 5 :: Atharājayakṣmādinidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 260-265]
AHS3.5.001a/ aneka.rogānugato bahu.roga.puro.gamaḥ |
AHS3.5.001c/ rāja.yakṣmā kṣayaḥ śoṣo roga.rāḍ iti ca smṛtaḥ || 1 ||
AHS3.5.002a/ nakṣatrāṇāṁ dvi.jānāṁ ca rājño 'bhūd yad ayaṁ purā |
AHS3.5.002c/ yac ca rājā ca yakṣmā ca rāja.yakṣmā tato mataḥ || 2 ||
AHS3.5.003a/ dehauṣadha.kṣaya.kṛteḥ kṣayas tat.sambhavāc ca saḥ |
AHS3.5.003c/ rasādi.śoṣaṇāc choṣo roga.rāṭ teṣu rājanāt || 3 || [Note: AHS3.5.003v/ 5.3dv roga.rāṭ roga.rājanāt]
AHS3.5.004a/ sāhasaṁ vega.saṁrodhaḥ śukraujaḥ.sneha.saṅkṣayaḥ |
AHS3.5.004c/ anna.pāna.vidhi.tyāgaś catvāras tasya hetavaḥ || 4 ||
AHS3.5.005a/ tair udīrṇo 'nilaḥ pittaṁ kaphaṁ codīrya sarvataḥ |
AHS3.5.005c/ śarīra.sandhīn āviśya tān sirāś ca prapīḍayan || 5 ||
[Page 245 ]
AHS3.5.006a/ mukhāni srotasāṁ ruddhvā tathaivātivivṛtya vā |
AHS3.5.006c/ sarpann ūrdhvam adhas tiryag yathā.svaṁ janayed gadān || 6 ||
AHS3.5.007a/ rūpaṁ bhaviṣyatas tasya pratiśyāyo bhṛśaṁ kṣavaḥ |
AHS3.5.007c/ praseko mukha.mādhuryaṁ sadanaṁ vahni.dehayoḥ || 7 ||
AHS3.5.008a/ sthāly.amatrānna.pānādau śucāv apy a.śucīkṣaṇam |
AHS3.5.008c/ makṣikā.tṛṇa.keśādi.pātaḥ prāyo 'nna.pānayoḥ || 8 ||
AHS3.5.009a/ hṛl.lāsaś chardir a.rucir aśnato 'pi bala.kṣayaḥ |
AHS3.5.009c/ pāṇyor avekṣā pādāsya.śopho 'kṣṇor ati.śukla.tā || 9 ||
AHS3.5.010a/ bāhvoḥ pramāṇa.jijñāsā kāye baibhatsya.darśanam |
AHS3.5.010c/ strī.madya.māṁsa.priya.tā ghṛṇi.tvaṁ mūrdha.guṇṭhanam || 10 ||
AHS3.5.011a/ nakha.keśāti.vṛddhiś ca svapne cābhibhavo bhavet |
AHS3.5.011c/ pataṅga.kṛkalāsāhi.kapi.śvāpada.pakṣibhiḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS3.5.011v/ 5.11dv .kapi.śvāpada.pattribhiḥ]
AHS3.5.012a/ keśāsthi.tuṣa.bhasmādi.rāśau samadhirohaṇam |
AHS3.5.012c/ śūnyānāṁ grāma.deśānāṁ darśanaṁ śuṣyato 'mbhaso || 12 ||
AHS3.5.013a/ jyotir girīṇāṁ patatāṁ jvalatāṁ ca mahī.ruhām |
AHS3.5.013c/ pīnasa.śvāsa.kāsāṁsa.mūrdha.svara.rujo '.ruciḥ || 13 ||
AHS3.5.014a/ ūrdhvaṁ viḍ.bhraṁśa.saṁśoṣāv adhaś chardiś ca koṣṭha.ge |
AHS3.5.014c/ tiryak.sthe pārśva.rug.doṣe sandhi.ge bhavati jvaraḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS3.5.014v/ 5.14av ūrdhvaṁ viṭ.sraṁsa.saṁśoṣāv 5.14bv adhaś chardis tu koṣṭha.ge]
AHS3.5.015a/ rūpāṇy ekā.daśaitāni jāyante rāja.yakṣmiṇaḥ |
AHS3.5.015c/ teṣām upadravān vidyāt kaṇṭhoddhvaṁsam uro.rujam || 15 ||
[Page 246 ]
AHS3.5.016a/ jṛmbhāṅga.marda.niṣṭhīva.vahni.sādāsya.pūti.tāḥ |
AHS3.5.016c/ tatra vātāc chiraḥ.pārśva.śūlam aṁsāṅga.mardanam || 16 ||
AHS3.5.017a/ kaṇṭhoddhvaṁsaḥ svara.bhraṁśaḥ pittāt pādāṁsa.pāṇiṣu |
AHS3.5.017c/ dāho 'tīsāro 'sṛk.chardir mukha.gandho jvaro madaḥ || 17 ||
AHS3.5.018a/ kaphād a.rocakaś chardiḥ kāso mūrdhāṅga.gauravam |
AHS3.5.018c/ prasekaḥ pīnasaḥ śvāsaḥ svara.sādo 'lpa.vahni.tā || 18 || [Note: AHS3.5.018v/ 5.18dv svara.bhedo 'lpa.vahni.tā]
AHS3.5.019a/ doṣair mandānala.tvena sopalepaiḥ kapholbaṇaiḥ |
AHS3.5.019c/ sroto.mukheṣu ruddheṣu dhātūṣmasv alpakeṣu ca || 19 ||
AHS3.5.020a/ vidahyamānaḥ sva.sthāne rasas tāṁs tān upadravān |
AHS3.5.020c/ kuryād a.gacchan māṁsādīn asṛk cordhvaṁ pradhāvati || 20 ||
AHS3.5.021a/ pacyate koṣṭha evānnam anna.paktraiva cāsya yat |
AHS3.5.021c/ prāyo 'smān mala.tāṁ yātaṁ naivālaṁ dhātu.puṣṭaye || 21 ||
AHS3.5.022a/ raso 'py asya na raktāya māṁsāya kuta eva tu |
AHS3.5.022c/ upastabdhaḥ sa śakṛtā kevalaṁ vartate kṣayī || 22 || [Note: AHS3.5.022v/ 5.22cv upaṣṭabdhaḥ sa śakṛtā]
AHS3.5.023a/ liṅgeṣv alpeṣv api kṣīṇaṁ vyādhy.auṣadha.balā.kṣamam |
AHS3.5.023c/ varjayet sādhayed eva sarveṣv api tato 'nya.thā || 23 || [Note: AHS3.5.023v/ 5.23cv varjayet sādhayed evaṁ]
AHS3.5.023+1a/ kṣīṇa.māṁsa.balaṁ jahyāt pūrva.liṅgair upadrutam |
AHS3.5.023+1c/ pratyākhyāya naraṁ cāśu dravya.vantam upācaret || 23+1 ||
AHS3.5.024a/ doṣair vyastaiḥ samastaiś ca kṣayāt ṣaṣṭhaś ca medasā |
AHS3.5.024c/ svara.bhedo bhavet tatra kṣāmo rūkṣaś calaḥ svaraḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS3.5.024v/ 5.24bv kṣayāt ṣaṣṭhaś ca medasaḥ]
[Page 247 ]
AHS3.5.025a/ śūka.pūrṇābha.kaṇṭha.tvaṁ snigdhoṣṇopaśayo 'nilāt |
AHS3.5.025c/ pittāt tālu.gale dāhaḥ śoṣa uktāvasūyanam || 25 ||
AHS3.5.026a/ limpann iva kaphāt kaṇṭhaṁ mandaḥ khurakhurāyate |
AHS3.5.026c/ svaro vibaddhaḥ sarvais tu sarva.liṅgaḥ kṣayāt kaṣet || 26 ||
AHS3.5.027a/ dhūmāyatīva cāty.arthaṁ medasā śleṣma.lakṣaṇaḥ |
AHS3.5.027c/ kṛcchra.lakṣyākṣaraś cātra sarvair antyaṁ ca varjayet || 27 ||
AHS3.5.028a/ a.rocako bhaved doṣair jihvā.hṛdaya.saṁśrayaiḥ |
AHS3.5.028c/ sannipātena manasaḥ santāpena ca pañcamaḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS3.5.028v/ 5.28bv jihvā.hṛdaya.saṁśritaiḥ]
AHS3.5.029a/ kaṣāya.tikta.madhuraṁ vātādiṣu mukhaṁ kramāt |
AHS3.5.029c/ sarvotthe vi.rasaṁ śoka.krodhādiṣu yathā.malam || 29 ||
AHS3.5.030a/ chardir doṣaiḥ pṛthak sarvair dviṣṭair arthaiś ca pañcamī |
AHS3.5.030c/ udāno vikṛto doṣān sarvāsv apy ūrdhvam asyati || 30 ||
AHS3.5.031a/ tāsūtkleśāsya.lāvaṇya.prasekā.rucayo 'gra.gāḥ |
AHS3.5.031c/ nābhi.pṛṣṭhaṁ rujan vāyuḥ pārśve cāhāram utkṣipet || 31 ||
AHS3.5.032a/ tato vicchinnam alpālpaṁ kaṣāyaṁ phenilaṁ vamet |
AHS3.5.032c/ śabdodgāra.yutaṁ kṛṣṇam acchaṁ kṛcchreṇa vega.vat || 32 ||
AHS3.5.033a/ kāsāsya.śoṣa.hṛn.mūrdha.svara.pīḍā.klamānvitaḥ |
AHS3.5.033c/ pittāt kṣārodaka.nibhaṁ dhūmraṁ harita.pītakam || 33 ||
AHS3.5.034a/ sāsṛg amlaṁ kaṭūṣṇaṁ ca tṛṇ.mūrchā.tāpa.dāha.vat |
AHS3.5.034c/ kaphāt snigdhaṁ ghanaṁ śītaṁ śleṣma.tantu.gavākṣitam || 34 || [Note: AHS3.5.034v/ 5.34bv tṛṇ.mūrchā.tāpa.dāha.vān]
[Page 248 ]
AHS3.5.035a/ madhuraṁ lavaṇaṁ bhūri prasaktaṁ roma.harṣaṇam |
AHS3.5.035c/ mukha.śvayathu.mādhurya.tandrā.hṛl.lāsa.kāsa.vān || 35 ||
AHS3.5.036a/ sarva.liṅgā malaiḥ sarvai riṣṭoktā yā ca tāṁ tyajet |
AHS3.5.036c/ pūty.a.medhyā.śuci.dviṣṭa.darśana.śravaṇādibhiḥ || 36 ||
AHS3.5.037a/ tapte citte hṛdi kliṣṭe chardir dviṣṭārtha.yoga.jā |
AHS3.5.037c/ vātādīn eva vimṛśet kṛmi.tṛṇāma.daurhṛde || 37 ||
AHS3.5.038a/ śūla.vepathu.hṛl.lāsair viśeṣāt kṛmi.jāṁ vadet |
AHS3.5.038c/ kṛmi.hṛd.roga.liṅgaiś ca smṛtāḥ pañca tu hṛd.gadāḥ || 38 ||
AHS3.5.039a/ teṣāṁ gulma.nidānoktaiḥ samutthānaiś ca sambhavaḥ |
AHS3.5.039c/ vātena śūlyate 'ty.arthaṁ tudyate sphuṭatīva ca || 39 || [Note: AHS3.5.039v/ 5.39bv samutthānaiḥ samudbhavaḥ]
AHS3.5.040a/ bhidyate śuṣyati stabdhaṁ hṛdayaṁ śūnya.tā dravaḥ |
AHS3.5.040c/ a.kasmād dīna.tā śoko bhayaṁ śabdā.sahiṣṇu.tā || 40 || [Note: AHS3.5.040v/ 5.40bv hṛdayaṁ śūnya.tā.dravam]
AHS3.5.041a/ vepathur veṣṭanaṁ mohaḥ śvāsa.rodho 'lpa.nidra.tā |
AHS3.5.041c/ pittāt tṛṣṇā bhramo mūrchā dāhaḥ svedo 'mlakaḥ klamaḥ || 41 ||
AHS3.5.042a/ chardanaṁ cāmla.pittasya dhūmakaḥ pīta.tā jvaraḥ |
AHS3.5.042c/ śleṣmaṇā hṛdayaṁ stabdhaṁ bhārikaṁ sāśma.garbha.vat || 42 || [Note: AHS3.5.042v/ 5.42bv tamakaḥ pīta.tā jvaraḥ]
AHS3.5.043a/ kāsāgni.sāda.niṣṭhīva.nidrālasyā.ruci.jvarāḥ |
AHS3.5.043c/ sarva.liṅgas tribhir doṣaiḥ kṛmibhiḥ śyāva.netra.tā || 43 || [Note: AHS3.5.043v/ 5.43cv sarva.liṅgaṁ tribhir doṣaiḥ]
AHS3.5.044a/ tamaḥ.praveśo hṛl.lāsaḥ śoṣaḥ kaṇḍūḥ kapha.srutiḥ |
AHS3.5.044c/ hṛdayaṁ pratataṁ cātra krakaceneva dāryate || 44 ||
[Page 249 ]
AHS3.5.045a/ cikitsed āmayaṁ ghoraṁ taṁ śīghraṁ śīghra.kāriṇam |
AHS3.5.045c/ vātāt pittāt kaphāt tṛṣṇā sannipātād rasa.kṣayāt || 45 ||
AHS3.5.046a/ ṣaṣṭhī syād upasargāc ca vāta.pitte tu kāraṇam |
AHS3.5.046c/ sarvāsu tat.prakopo hi saumya.dhātu.praśoṣaṇāt || 46 ||
AHS3.5.047a/ sarva.deha.bhramotkampa.tāpa.tṛḍ.dāha.moha.kṛt |
AHS3.5.047c/ jihvā.mūla.gala.kloma.tālu.toya.vahāḥ sirāḥ || 47 ||
AHS3.5.048a/ saṁśoṣya tṛṣṇā jāyante tāsāṁ sāmānya.lakṣaṇam |
AHS3.5.048c/ mukha.śoṣo jalā.tṛptir anna.dveṣaḥ svara.kṣayaḥ || 48 ||
AHS3.5.049a/ kaṇṭhauṣṭha.jihvā.kārkaśyaṁ jihvā.niṣkramaṇaṁ klamaḥ |
AHS3.5.049c/ pralāpaś citta.vibhraṁśas tṛḍ.grahoktās tathāmayāḥ || 49 ||
AHS3.5.050a/ mārutāt kṣāma.tā dainyaṁ śaṅkha.todaḥ śiro.bhramaḥ |
AHS3.5.050c/ gandhā.jñānāsya.vairasya.śruti.nidrā.bala.kṣayāḥ || 50 || [Note: AHS3.5.050v/ 5.50cv gandhā.jñānāsya.vairasyaṁ 5.50dv .śruti.nidrā.bala.kṣayaḥ 5.50dv śruti.nidrā.bala.kṣayaḥ]
AHS3.5.051a/ śītāmbu.pānād vṛddhiś ca pittān mūrchāsya.tikta.tā |
AHS3.5.051c/ raktekṣaṇa.tvaṁ pratataṁ śoṣo dāho 'ti.dhūmakaḥ || 51 ||
AHS3.5.052a/ kapho ruṇaddhi kupitas toya.vāhiṣu mārutam |
AHS3.5.052c/ srotaḥsu sa kaphas tena paṅka.vac choṣyate tataḥ || 52 ||
AHS3.5.053a/ śūkair ivācitaḥ kaṇṭho nidrā madhura.vaktra.tā |
AHS3.5.053c/ ādhmānaṁ śiraso jāḍyaṁ staimitya.cchardy.a.rocakāḥ || 53 ||
AHS3.5.054a/ ālasyam a.vipākaś ca sarvaiḥ syāt sarva.lakṣaṇā |
AHS3.5.054c/ āmodbhavā ca bhaktasya saṁrodhād vāta.pitta.jā || 54 ||
[Page 250 ]
AHS3.5.055a/ uṣṇa.klāntasya sahasā śītāmbho bhajatas tṛṣam |
AHS3.5.055c/ ūṣmā ruddho gataḥ koṣṭhaṁ yāṁ kuryāt pitta.jaiva sā || 55 ||
AHS3.5.056a/ yā ca pānāti.pānotthā tīkṣṇāgneḥ sneha.jā ca yā |
AHS3.5.056c/ snigdha.gurv.amla.lavaṇa.bhojanena kaphodbhavā || 56 || [Note: AHS3.5.056v/ 5.56bv tīkṣṇāgni.sneha.jā ca yā]
AHS3.5.057a/ tṛṣṇā rasa.kṣayoktena lakṣaṇena kṣayātmikā |
AHS3.5.057c/ śoṣa.meha.jvarādy.anya.dīrgha.rogopasargataḥ || 57 || [Note: AHS3.5.057v/ 5.57cv śoṣa.moha.jvarādy.anya.]
AHS3.5.057ū̆ab/ yā tṛṣṇā jāyate tīvrā sopasargātmikā smṛtā || 57ū̆ab ||

3.6. Chapter 6 :: Athamadātyayanidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 265-269]
AHS3.6.001a/ tīkṣṇoṣṇa.rūkṣa.sūkṣmāmlaṁ vyavāyy āśu.karaṁ laghu |
AHS3.6.001c/ vikāṣi viśadaṁ madyam ojaso 'smād viparyayaḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS3.6.001v/ 6.1av tīkṣṇoṣṇa.rūkṣa.sūkṣmāmla. 6.1bv .vyavāyy āśu.karaṁ laghu 6.1cv vikāśi viśadaṁ madyam]
AHS3.6.002a/ tīkṣṇādayo viṣe 'py uktāś cittopaplāvino guṇāḥ |
AHS3.6.002c/ jīvitāntāya jāyante viṣe tūtkarṣa.vṛttitaḥ || 2 ||
AHS3.6.003a/ tīkṣṇādibhir guṇair madyaṁ mandādīn ojaso guṇān |
AHS3.6.003c/ daśabhir daśa saṅkṣobhya ceto nayati vi.kriyām || 3 ||
AHS3.6.004a/ ādye made dvitīye tu pramādāyatane sthitaḥ |
AHS3.6.004c/ dur.vikalpa.hato mūḍhaḥ sukham ity adhimucyate || 4 || [Note: AHS3.6.004v/ 6.4av ādye made dvitīye ca 6.4av ādye made dvitīye sa 6.4dv sukham ity abhimucyate 6.4dv sukham ity abhimanyate 6.4dv sukham ity avamanyate]
AHS3.6.005a/ madhyamottamayoḥ sandhiṁ prāpya rājasa.tāmasaḥ |
AHS3.6.005c/ nir.aṅkuśa iva vyālo na kiñ.cin nācarej jaḍaḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS3.6.005v/ 6.5dv na kiṁ kiṁ vācarej jaḍaḥ]
AHS3.6.006a/ iyaṁ bhūmir a.vadyānāṁ dauḥśīlyasyedam āspadam |
AHS3.6.006c/ eko 'yaṁ bahu.mārgāya dur.gater deśikaḥ param || 6 || [Note: AHS3.6.006v/ 6.6av iyaṁ bhūmir a.vidyānāṁ]
[Page 251 ]
AHS3.6.007a/ niś.ceṣṭaḥ śava.vac chete tṛtīye tu made sthitaḥ |
AHS3.6.007c/ maraṇād api pāpātmā gataḥ pāpa.tarāṁ daśām || 7 ||
AHS3.6.008a/ dharmā.dharmaṁ sukhaṁ duḥkham arthān.arthaṁ hitā.hitam |
AHS3.6.008c/ yad āsakto na jānāti kathaṁ tac chīlayed budhaḥ || 8 ||
AHS3.6.009a/ madye moho bhayaṁ śokaḥ krodho mṛtyuś ca saṁśritāḥ |
AHS3.6.009c/ sonmāda.mada.mūrchāyāḥ sāpasmārāpatānakāḥ || 9 ||
AHS3.6.010a/ yatraikaḥ smṛti.vibhraṁśas tatra sarvam a.sādhu yat |
AHS3.6.010c/ a.yukti.yuktam annaṁ hi vyādhaye maraṇāya vā || 10 ||
AHS3.6.011a/ madyaṁ tri.varga.dhī.dhairya.lajjāder api nāśanam |
AHS3.6.011c/ nātimādyanti balinaḥ kṛtāhārā mahāśanāḥ || 11 ||
AHS3.6.012a/ snigdhāḥ sat.tva.vayo.yuktā madya.nityās tad.anvayāḥ |
AHS3.6.012c/ medaḥ.kaphādhikā manda.vāta.pittā dṛḍhāgnayaḥ || 12 ||
AHS3.6.013a/ viparyaye 'timādyanti viśrabdhāḥ kupitāś ca ye |
AHS3.6.013c/ madyena cāmla.rūkṣeṇa sā.jīrṇe bahunāti ca || 13 || [Note: AHS3.6.013v/ 6.13dv sā.jīrṇe bahunāpi ca]
AHS3.6.014a/ vātāt pittāt kaphāt sarvaiś catvāraḥ syur madātyayāḥ |
AHS3.6.014c/ sarve 'pi sarvair jāyante vyapadeśas tu bhūyasā || 14 ||
AHS3.6.015a/ sāmānyaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ teṣāṁ pramoho hṛdaya.vyathā |
AHS3.6.015c/ viḍ.bhedaḥ pratataṁ tṛṣṇā saumyāgneyo jvaro '.ruciḥ || 15 || [Note: AHS3.6.015v/ 6.15bv pramoho hṛdaye vyathā]
AHS3.6.016a/ śiraḥ.pārśvāsthi.ruk.kampo marma.bhedas trika.grahaḥ |
AHS3.6.016c/ uro.vibandhas timiraṁ kāsaḥ śvāsaḥ prajāgaraḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS3.6.016v/ 6.16av śiraḥ.pārśvāsthi.ruk.stambho]
[Page 252 ]
AHS3.6.017a/ svedo 'ti.mātraṁ viṣṭambhaḥ śvayathuś citta.vibhramaḥ |
AHS3.6.017c/ pralāpaś chardir utkleśo bhramo duḥ.svapna.darśanam || 17 ||
AHS3.6.018a/ viśeṣāj jāgara.śvāsa.kampa.mūrdha.rujo 'nilāt |
AHS3.6.018c/ svapne bhramaty utpatati pretaiś ca saha bhāṣate || 18 ||
AHS3.6.019a/ pittād dāha.jvara.sveda.mohātīsāra.tṛḍ.bhramāḥ |
AHS3.6.019c/ deho harita.hāridro rakta.netra.kapola.tā || 19 ||
AHS3.6.020a/ śleṣmaṇā chardi.hṛl.lāsa.nidrodardāṅga.gauravam |
AHS3.6.020c/ sarva.je sarva.liṅga.tvaṁ muktvā madyaṁ pibet tu yaḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS3.6.020v/ 6.20av śleṣmaṇaś chardi.hṛl.lāsa.]
AHS3.6.021a/ sahasān.ucitaṁ vānyat tasya dhvaṁsaka.vikṣayau |
AHS3.6.021c/ bhavetāṁ mārutāt kaṣṭau dur.balasya viśeṣataḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS3.6.021v/ 6.21av sahasān.ucitaṁ cānyat 6.21bv tasya dhvaṁsaka.viṭ.kṣayau]
AHS3.6.022a/ dhvaṁsake śleṣma.niṣṭhīvaḥ kaṇṭha.śoṣo 'ti.nidra.tā |
AHS3.6.022c/ śabdā.saha.tvaṁ tandrā ca vikṣaye 'ṅga.śiro.'ti.ruk || 22 || [Note: AHS3.6.022v/ 6.22dv viṭ.kṣaye 'ṅga.śiro.'ti.ruk]
AHS3.6.023a/ hṛt.kaṇṭha.rogaḥ sammohaḥ kāsas tṛṣṇā vamir jvaraḥ |
AHS3.6.023c/ nivṛtto yas tu madyebhyo jitātmā buddhi.pūrva.kṛt || 23 || [Note: AHS3.6.023v/ 6.23av hṛt.kaṇṭha.rodhaḥ sammohaḥ]
AHS3.6.024a/ vikāraiḥ spṛśyate jātu na sa śārīra.mānasaiḥ |
AHS3.6.024c/ rajo.mohā.hitāhāra.parasya syus trayo gadāḥ || 24 ||
AHS3.6.025a/ rasāsṛk.cetanā.vāhi.sroto.rodha.samudbhavāḥ |
AHS3.6.025c/ mada.mūrchāya.sannyāsā yathottara.balottarāḥ || 25 ||
AHS3.6.026a/ mado 'tra doṣaiḥ sarvaiś ca rakta.madya.viṣair api |
AHS3.6.026c/ saktān.alpa.drutābhāṣaś calaḥ skhalita.ceṣṭitaḥ || 26 ||
[Page 253 ]
AHS3.6.027a/ rūkṣa.śyāvāruṇa.tanur made vātodbhave bhavet |
AHS3.6.027c/ pittena krodhano rakta.pītābhaḥ kalaha.priyaḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS3.6.027v/ 6.27bv made vāta.kṛte bhavet]
AHS3.6.028a/ sv.alpa.sambaddha.vāk pāṇḍuḥ kaphād dhyāna.paro 'lasaḥ |
AHS3.6.028c/ sarvātmā sannipātena raktāt stabdhāṅga.dṛṣṭi.tā || 28 || [Note: AHS3.6.028v/ 6.28av sv.alpā.sambaddha.vāk pāṇḍuḥ]
AHS3.6.029a/ pitta.liṅgaṁ ca madyena vikṛteha.svarāṅga.tā |
AHS3.6.029c/ viṣe kampo 'ti.nidrā ca sarvebhyo 'bhyadhikas tu saḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS3.6.029v/ 6.29cv viṣāt kampo 'ti.nidrā ca 6.29dv sarvebhyo 'bhyadhikaś ca saḥ]
AHS3.6.030a/ lakṣayel lakṣaṇotkarṣād vātādīn śoṇitādiṣu |
AHS3.6.030c/ aruṇaṁ kṛṣṇa.nīlaṁ vā khaṁ paśyan praviśet tamaḥ || 30 ||
AHS3.6.031a/ śīghraṁ ca pratibudhyeta hṛt.pīḍā vepathur bhramaḥ |
AHS3.6.031c/ kārśyaṁ śyāvāruṇā chāyā mūrchāye mārutātmake || 31 || [Note: AHS3.6.031v/ 6.31cv kārśyaṁ śyāvāruṇa.cchāye]
AHS3.6.032a/ pittena raktaṁ pītaṁ vā nabhaḥ paśyan viśet tamaḥ |
AHS3.6.032c/ vibudhyeta ca sa.svedo dāha.tṛṭ.tāpa.pīḍitaḥ || 32 ||
AHS3.6.033a/ bhinna.viṇ nīla.pītābho rakta.pītākulekṣaṇaḥ |
AHS3.6.033c/ kaphena megha.saṅkāśaṁ paśyann ākāśam āviśet || 33 ||
AHS3.6.034a/ tamaś cirāc ca budhyeta sa.hṛl.lāsaḥ praseka.vān |
AHS3.6.034c/ gurubhiḥ stimitair aṅgair ārdra.carmāvanaddha.vat || 34 ||
AHS3.6.035a/ sarvākṛtis tribhir doṣair apasmāra ivāparaḥ |
AHS3.6.035c/ pātayaty āśu niś.ceṣṭaṁ vinā bībhatsa.ceṣṭitaiḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS3.6.035v/ 6.35dv vinā baibhatsya.ceṣṭitaiḥ]
AHS3.6.036a/ doṣeṣu mada.mūrchāyāḥ kṛta.vegeṣu dehinām |
AHS3.6.036c/ svayam evopaśāmyanti sannyāso nauṣadhair vinā || 36 ||
[Page 254 ]
AHS3.6.037a/ vāg.deha.manasāṁ ceṣṭām ākṣipyāti.balā malāḥ |
AHS3.6.037c/ sannyāsaṁ sannipatitāḥ prāṇāyatana.saṁśrayāḥ || 37 ||
AHS3.6.038a/ kurvanti tena puruṣaḥ kāṣṭhī.bhūto mṛtopamaḥ |
AHS3.6.038c/ mriyeta śīghraṁ śīghraṁ cec cikitsā na prayujyate || 38 || [Note: AHS3.6.038v/ 6.38bv kāṣṭha.bhūto mṛtopamaḥ]
AHS3.6.039a/ a.gādhe grāha.bahule salilaugha ivāṭate |
AHS3.6.039c/ sannyāse vinimajjantaṁ naram āśu nivartayet || 39 || [Note: AHS3.6.039v/ 6.39cv abhinyāse ca majjantaṁ]
AHS3.6.040a/ mada.māna.roṣa.toṣa.prabhṛtibhir aribhir nijaiḥ pariṣvaṅgaḥ |
AHS3.6.040c/ yuktā.yuktaṁ ca samaṁ yukti.viyuktena madyena || 40 ||
AHS3.6.041a/ bala.kāla.deśa.sātmya.prakṛti.sahāyāmaya.vayāṁsi |
AHS3.6.041c/ pravibhajya tad.anurūpaṁ yadi pibati tataḥ pibaty amṛtam || 41 ||

3.7. Chapter 7 :: Athārśo nidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 269-272]
AHS3.7.001a/ ari.vat prāṇino māṁsa.kīlakā viśasanti yat |
AHS3.7.001c/ arśāṁsi tasmād ucyante guda.mārga.nirodhataḥ || 1 ||
AHS3.7.002a/ doṣās tvaṅ.māṁsa.medāṁsi sandūṣya vividhākṛtīn |
AHS3.7.002c/ māṁsāṅkurān apānādau kurvanty arśāṁsi tān jaguḥ || 2 ||
AHS3.7.003a/ saha.janmottarotthāna.bhedād dve.dhā samāsataḥ |
AHS3.7.003c/ śuṣka.srāvi.vibhedāc ca gudaḥ sthūlāntra.saṁśrayaḥ || 3 ||
AHS3.7.004a/ ardha.pañcāṅgulas tasmiṁs tisro 'dhy.ardhāṅgulāḥ sthitāḥ |
AHS3.7.004c/ balyaḥ pravāhiṇī tāsām antar madhye visarjanī || 4 ||
AHS3.7.005a/ bāhyā saṁvaraṇī tasyā gudauṣṭho bahir aṅgule |
AHS3.7.005c/ yavādhy.ardhaḥ pramāṇena romāṇy atra tataḥ param || 5 || [Note: AHS3.7.005v/ 7.5av bāhyā saṁvaraṇī tasyāṁ 7.5cv yavādhy.ardha.pramāṇena]
[Page 255 ]
AHS3.7.006a/ tatra hetuḥ sahotthānāṁ valī.bījopatapta.tā |
AHS3.7.006c/ arśasāṁ bīja.taptis tu mātā.pitr.apacārataḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS3.7.006v/ 7.6bv valī.bījopatapti.tā]
AHS3.7.007a/ daivāc ca tābhyāṁ kopo hi sannipātasya tāny ataḥ |
AHS3.7.007c/ a.sādhyāny evam ākhyātāḥ sarve rogāḥ kulodbhavāḥ || 7 ||
AHS3.7.008a/ saha.jāni viśeṣeṇa rūkṣa.dur.darśanāni ca |
AHS3.7.008c/ antar.mukhāni pāṇḍūni dāruṇopadravāṇi ca || 8 ||
AHS3.7.009a/ ṣo.ḍhānyāni pṛthag doṣa.saṁsarga.nicayāsrataḥ |
AHS3.7.009c/ śuṣkāṇi vāta.śleṣmabhyām ārdrāṇi tv asra.pittataḥ || 9 ||
AHS3.7.010a/ doṣa.prakopa.hetus tu prāg uktas tena sādite |
AHS3.7.010c/ agnau male 'ti.nicite punaś cāti.vyavāyataḥ || 10 ||
AHS3.7.011a/ yāna.saṅkṣobha.viṣama.kaṭhinotkaṭakāsanāt |
AHS3.7.011c/ vasti.netrāśma.loṣṭorvī.tala.cailādi.ghaṭṭanāt || 11 ||
AHS3.7.012a/ bhṛśaṁ śītāmbu.saṁsparśāt pratatāti.pravāhaṇāt |
AHS3.7.012c/ vāta.mūtra.śakṛd.vega.dhāraṇāt tad.udīraṇāt || 12 ||
AHS3.7.013a/ jvara.gulmātisārāma.grahaṇī.śopha.pāṇḍubhiḥ |
AHS3.7.013c/ karśanād viṣamābhyaś ca ceṣṭābhyo yoṣitāṁ punaḥ || 13 ||
AHS3.7.014a/ āma.garbha.prapatanād garbha.vṛddhi.prapīḍanāt |
AHS3.7.014c/ īdṛśaiś cāparair vāyur apānaḥ kupito malam || 14 ||
AHS3.7.015a/ pāyor valīṣu taṁ dhatte tāsv abhiṣyaṇṇa.mūrtiṣu |
AHS3.7.015c/ jāyante 'rśāṁsi tat.pūrva.lakṣaṇaṁ manda.vahni.tā || 15 || [Note: AHS3.7.015v/ 7.15av pāyu.valīṣu taṁ dhatte 7.15av pāyor valīṣu sandhatte]
[Page 256 ]
AHS3.7.016a/ viṣṭambhaḥ sakthi.sadanaṁ piṇḍikodveṣṭanaṁ bhramaḥ |
AHS3.7.016c/ sādo 'ṅge netrayoḥ śophaḥ śakṛd.bhedo 'tha.vā grahaḥ || 16 ||
AHS3.7.017a/ mārutaḥ pracuro mūḍhaḥ prāyo nābher adhaś caran |
AHS3.7.017c/ sa.ruk sa.parikartaś ca kṛcchrān nirgacchati svanam || 17 ||
AHS3.7.018a/ antra.kūjanam āṭopaḥ kṣāma.todgāra.bhūri.tā |
AHS3.7.018c/ prabhūtaṁ mūtram alpā viḍ a.śraddhā dhūmako 'mlakaḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS3.7.018v/ 7.18cv prabhūta.mūtra.tālpā viḍ]
AHS3.7.019a/ śiraḥ.pṛṣṭhorasāṁ śūlam ālasyaṁ bhinna.varṇa.tā |
AHS3.7.019c/ tandrendriyāṇāṁ daurbalyaṁ krodho duḥkhopacāra.tā || 19 ||
AHS3.7.020a/ āśaṅkā grahaṇī.doṣa.pāṇḍu.gulmodareṣu ca |
AHS3.7.020c/ etāny eva vivardhante jāteṣu hata.nāmasu || 20 || [Note: AHS3.7.020v/ 7.20cv etāny eva ca vardhante]
AHS3.7.021a/ nivartamāno 'pāno hi tair adho.mārga.rodhataḥ |
AHS3.7.021c/ kṣobhayann anilān anyān sarvendriya.śarīra.gān || 21 ||
AHS3.7.022a/ tathā mūtra.śakṛt.pitta.kaphān dhātūṁś ca sāśayān |
AHS3.7.022c/ mṛdnāty agniṁ tataḥ sarvo bhavati prāya.śo 'rśasaḥ || 22 ||
AHS3.7.023a/ kṛśo bhṛśaṁ hatotsāho dīnaḥ kṣāmo 'ti.niṣ.prabhaḥ |
AHS3.7.023c/ a.sāro vigata.cchāyo jantu.juṣṭa iva drumaḥ || 23 ||
AHS3.7.024a/ kṛtsnair upadravair grasto yathoktair marma.pīḍanaiḥ |
AHS3.7.024c/ tathā kāsa.pipāsāsya.vairasya.śvāsa.pīnasaiḥ || 24 ||
AHS3.7.025a/ klamāṅga.bhaṅga.vamathu.kṣavathu.śvayathu.jvaraiḥ |
AHS3.7.025c/ klaibya.bādhirya.taimirya.śarkarāśmari.pīḍitaḥ || 25 ||
[Page 257 ]
AHS3.7.026a/ kṣāma.bhinna.svaro dhyāyan muhuḥ ṣṭhīvan a.rocakī |
AHS3.7.026c/ sarva.parvāsthi.hṛn.nābhi.pāyu.vaṅkṣaṇa.śūla.vān || 26 ||
AHS3.7.027a/ gudena sravatā picchāṁ pulākodaka.sannibhām |
AHS3.7.027c/ vibaddha.muktaṁ śuṣkārdraṁ pakvāmaṁ cāntarāntarā || 27 ||
AHS3.7.028a/ pāṇḍu pītaṁ harid raktaṁ picchilaṁ copaveśyate |
AHS3.7.028c/ gudāṅkurā bahv.anilāḥ śuṣkāś cimicimānvitāḥ || 28 ||
AHS3.7.029a/ mlānāḥ śyāvāruṇāḥ stabdhā viṣamāḥ paruṣāḥ kharāḥ |
AHS3.7.029c/ mitho vi.sadṛśā vakrās tīkṣṇā visphuṭitānanāḥ || 29 ||
AHS3.7.030a/ bimbī.karkandhu.kharjūra.kārpāsī.phala.sannibhāḥ |
AHS3.7.030c/ ke.cit kadamba.puṣpābhāḥ ke.cit siddhārthakopamāḥ || 30 ||
AHS3.7.031a/ śiraḥ.pārśvāṁsa.kaṭy.ūru.vaṅkṣaṇābhyadhika.vyathāḥ |
AHS3.7.031c/ kṣavathūdgāra.viṣṭambha.hṛd.grahā.rocaka.pradāḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS3.7.031v/ 7.31dv .hṛd.ravā.rocaka.pradāḥ]
AHS3.7.032a/ kāsa.śvāsāgni.vaiṣamya.karṇa.nāda.bhramāvahāḥ |
AHS3.7.032c/ tair ārto grathitaṁ stokaṁ sa.śabdaṁ sa.pravāhikam || 32 ||
AHS3.7.033a/ ruk.phena.picchānugataṁ vibaddham upaveśyate |
AHS3.7.033c/ kṛṣṇa.tvaṅ.nakha.viṇ.mūtra.netra.vaktraś ca jāyate || 33 ||
AHS3.7.034a/ gulma.plīhodarāṣṭhīlā.sambhavas tata eva ca |
AHS3.7.034c/ pittottarā nīla.mukhā rakta.pītāsita.prabhāḥ || 34 ||
AHS3.7.035a/ tanv.asra.srāviṇo visrās tanavo mṛdavaḥ ślathāḥ |
AHS3.7.035c/ śuka.jihvā.yakṛt.khaṇḍa.jalauko.vaktra.sannibhāḥ || 35 ||
[Page 258 ]
AHS3.7.036a/ dāha.pāka.jvara.sveda.tṛṇ.mūrchā.ruci.moha.dāḥ |
AHS3.7.036c/ soṣmāṇo drava.nīloṣṇa.pīta.raktāma.varcasaḥ || 36 ||
AHS3.7.037a/ yava.madhyā harit.pīta.hāridra.tvaṅ.nakhādayaḥ |
AHS3.7.037c/ śleṣmolbaṇā mahā.mūlā ghanā manda.rujaḥ sitāḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS3.7.037v/ 7.37av yava.madhyā harit.pītā 7.37bv hāridra.tvaṅ.nakhādayaḥ]
AHS3.7.038a/ ucchūnopācitāḥ snigdhāḥ stabdha.vṛtta.guru.sthirāḥ |
AHS3.7.038c/ picchilāḥ stimitāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ kaṇḍv.āḍhyāḥ sparśana.priyāḥ || 38 ||
AHS3.7.039a/ karīra.panasāsthy.ābhās tathā go.stana.sannibhāḥ |
AHS3.7.039c/ vaṅkṣaṇānāhinaḥ pāyu.vasti.nābhi.vikartinaḥ || 39 ||
AHS3.7.040a/ sa.kāsa.śvāsa.hṛl.lāsa.prasekā.ruci.pīnasāḥ |
AHS3.7.040c/ meha.kṛcchra.śiro.jāḍya.śiśira.jvara.kāriṇaḥ || 40 ||
AHS3.7.041a/ klaibyāgni.mārdava.cchardir.āma.prāya.vikāra.dāḥ |
AHS3.7.041c/ vasābha.sa.kapha.prājya.purīṣāḥ sa.pravāhikāḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS3.7.041v/ 7.41cv vasābhāḥ sa.kapha.prājya.]
AHS3.7.042a/ na sravanti na bhidyante pāṇḍu.snigdha.tvag.ādayaḥ |
AHS3.7.042c/ saṁsṛṣṭa.liṅgāḥ saṁsargān nicayāt sarva.lakṣaṇāḥ || 42 ||
AHS3.7.043a/ raktolbaṇā gude.kīlāḥ pittākṛti.samanvitāḥ |
AHS3.7.043c/ vaṭa.praroha.sadṛśā guñjā.vidruma.sannibhāḥ || 43 ||
AHS3.7.044a/ te 'ty.arthaṁ duṣṭam uṣṇaṁ ca gāḍha.viṭ.pratipīḍitāḥ |
AHS3.7.044c/ sravanti sahasā raktaṁ tasya cāti.pravṛttitaḥ || 44 ||
AHS3.7.045a/ bhekābhaḥ pīḍyate duḥkhaiḥ śoṇita.kṣaya.sambhavaiḥ |
AHS3.7.045c/ hīna.varṇa.balotsāho hataujaḥ kaluṣendriyaḥ || 45 ||
[Page 259 ]
AHS3.7.046a/ mudga.kodrava.jūrṇāhva.karīra.caṇakādibhiḥ |
AHS3.7.046c/ rūkṣaiḥ saṅgrāhibhir vāyuḥ sve sthāne kupito balī || 46 || [Note: AHS3.7.046v/ 7.46dv sva.sthāne kupito balī]
AHS3.7.047a/ adho.vahāni srotāṁsi saṁrudhyādhaḥ praśoṣayan |
AHS3.7.047c/ purīṣaṁ vāta.viṇ.mūtra.saṅgaṁ kurvīta dāruṇam || 47 ||
AHS3.7.048a/ tena tīvrā rujā koṣṭha.pṛṣṭha.hṛt.pārśva.gā bhavet |
AHS3.7.048c/ ādhmānam udarāveṣṭo hṛl.lāso parikartanam || 48 ||
AHS3.7.049a/ vastau ca su.tarāṁ śūlaṁ gaṇḍa.śvayathu.sambhavaḥ |
AHS3.7.049c/ pavanasyordhva.gāmi.tvaṁ tataś chardy.a.ruci.jvarāḥ || 49 ||
AHS3.7.050a/ hṛd.roga.grahaṇī.doṣa.mūtra.saṅga.pravāhikāḥ |
AHS3.7.050c/ bādhirya.timira.śvāsa.śiro.ruk.kāsa.pīnasāḥ || 50 ||
AHS3.7.051a/ mano.vikāras tṛṣṇāsra.pitta.gulmodarādayaḥ |
AHS3.7.051c/ te te ca vāta.jā rogā jāyante bhṛśa.dāruṇāḥ || 51 ||
AHS3.7.052a/ dur.nāmnām ity udāvartaḥ paramo 'yam upadravaḥ |
AHS3.7.052c/ vātābhibhūta.koṣṭhānāṁ tair vināpi sa jāyate || 52 ||
AHS3.7.053a/ saha.jāni tri.doṣāṇi yāni cābhyantare valau |
AHS3.7.053c/ sthitāni tāny a.sādhyāni yāpyante 'gni.balādibhiḥ || 53 ||
AHS3.7.054a/ dvandva.jāni dvitīyāyāṁ valau yāny āśritāni ca |
AHS3.7.054c/ kṛcchra.sādhyāni tāny āhuḥ pari.saṁvatsarāṇi ca || 54 ||
AHS3.7.055a/ bāhyāyāṁ tu valau jātāny eka.doṣolbaṇāni ca |
AHS3.7.055c/ arśāṁsi sukha.sādhyāni na cotpatitāni ca || 55 ||
[Page 260 ]
AHS3.7.056a/ meḍhrādiṣv api vakṣyante yathā.svaṁ nābhi.jāni tu |
AHS3.7.056c/ gaṇḍū.padāsya.rūpāṇi picchilāni mṛdūni ca || 56 ||
AHS3.7.057a/ vyāno gṛhītvā śleṣmāṇaṁ karoty arśas tvaco bahiḥ |
AHS3.7.057c/ kīlopamaṁ sthira.kharaṁ carma.kīlaṁ tu taṁ viduḥ || 57 ||
AHS3.7.058a/ vātena todaḥ pāruṣyaṁ pittād asita.rakta.tā |
AHS3.7.058c/ śleṣmaṇā snigdha.tā tasya grathita.tvaṁ sa.varṇa.tā || 58 ||
AHS3.7.059a/ arśasāṁ praśame yatnam āśu kurvīta buddhi.mān |
AHS3.7.059c/ tāny āśu hi gudaṁ baddhvā kuryur baddha.gudodaram || 59 ||

3.8. Chapter 8 :: Athātīsāragrahaṇīrogayor nidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 272-274]
AHS3.8.001a/ doṣair vyastaiḥ samastaiś ca bhayāc chokāc ca ṣaḍ.vidhaḥ |
AHS3.8.001c/ atīsāraḥ sa su.tarāṁ jāyate 'ty.ambu.pānataḥ || 1 ||
AHS3.8.002a/ kṛśa.śuṣkāmiṣā.sātmya.tila.piṣṭa.virūḍhakaiḥ |
AHS3.8.002c/ madya.rūkṣāti.mātrānnair arśobhiḥ sneha.vibhramāt || 2 ||
AHS3.8.003a/ kṛmibhyo vega.rodhāc ca tad.vidhaiḥ kupito 'nilaḥ |
AHS3.8.003c/ visraṁsayaty adho 'b.dhātuṁ hatvā tenaiva cānalam || 3 ||
AHS3.8.004a/ vyāpadyānu.śakṛt koṣṭhaṁ purīṣaṁ drava.tāṁ nayan |
AHS3.8.004c/ prakalpate 'tisārāya lakṣaṇaṁ tasya bhāvinaḥ || 4 ||
AHS3.8.005a/ todo hṛd.guda.koṣṭheṣu gātra.sādo mala.grahaḥ |
AHS3.8.005c/ ādhmānam a.vipākaś ca tatra vātena viḍ.jalam || 5 ||
AHS3.8.006a/ alpālpaṁ śabda.śūlāḍhyaṁ vibaddham upaveśyate |
AHS3.8.006c/ rūkṣaṁ sa.phenam acchaṁ ca grathitaṁ vā muhur muhuḥ || 6 ||
[Page 261 ]
AHS3.8.007a/ tathā dagdha.guḍābhāsaṁ sa.picchā.parikartikam |
AHS3.8.007c/ śuṣkāsyo bhraṣṭa.pāyuś ca hṛṣṭa.romā viniṣṭanan || 7 || [Note: AHS3.8.007v/ 8.7dv hṛṣṭa.romā vinaṣṭa.vāk]
AHS3.8.008a/ pittena pītam asitaṁ hāridraṁ śādvala.prabham |
AHS3.8.008c/ sa.raktam ati.dur.gandhaṁ .tṛṇ.mūrchā.sveda.dāha.vān || 8 || [Note: AHS3.8.008v/ 8.8dv .tṛṇ.mūrchā.sveda.dāha.vat]
AHS3.8.009a/ sa.śūlaṁ pāyu.santāpa.pāka.vāñ chleṣmaṇā ghanam |
AHS3.8.009c/ picchilaṁ tantu.mac chvetaṁ snigdham āmaṁ kaphānvitam || 9 || [Note: AHS3.8.009v/ 8.9bv .pāka.vac chleṣmaṇā ghanam]
AHS3.8.010a/ abhīkṣṇam guru dur.gandhaṁ vibaddham anubaddha.ruk |
AHS3.8.010c/ nidrālur alaso 'nna.dviḍ alpālpaṁ sa.pravāhikam || 10 ||
AHS3.8.011a/ sa.roma.harṣaṁ sotkleśo guru.vasti.gudodaraḥ |
AHS3.8.011c/ kṛte 'py a.kṛta.sañjñaś ca sarvātmā sarva.lakṣaṇaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS3.8.011v/ 8.11bv guru.vastir gurūdaraḥ]
AHS3.8.012a/ bhayena kṣobhite citte sa.pitto drāvayec chakṛt |
AHS3.8.012c/ vāyus tato 'tisāryeta kṣipram uṣṇaṁ dravaṁ plavam || 12 ||
AHS3.8.013a/ vāta.pitta.samaṁ liṅgair āhus tad.vac ca śokataḥ |
AHS3.8.013c/ atīsāraḥ samāsena dvi.dhā sāmo nir.āmakaḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS3.8.013v/ 8.13dv dve.dhā sāmo nir.āmakaḥ]
AHS3.8.014a/ sāsṛṅ nir.asras tatrādye gauravād apsu majjati |
AHS3.8.014c/ śakṛd dur.gandham āṭopa.viṣṭambhārti.prasekinaḥ || 14 ||
AHS3.8.015a/ viparīto nir.āmas tu kaphāt pakvo 'pi majjati |
AHS3.8.015c/ atīsāreṣu yo nāti.yatna.vān grahaṇī.gadaḥ || 15 ||
AHS3.8.016a/ tasya syād agni.vidhvaṁsa.karair anyasya sevitaiḥ |
AHS3.8.016c/ sāmaṁ śakṛn nir.āmaṁ vā jīrṇe yenātisāryate || 16 ||
[Page 262 ]
AHS3.8.017a/ so 'tīsāro 'ti.saraṇād āśu.kārī sva.bhāvataḥ |
AHS3.8.017c/ sāmaṁ sānnam a.jīrṇe 'nne jīrṇe pakvaṁ tu naiva vā || 17 ||
AHS3.8.018a/ a.kasmād vā muhur baddham a.kasmāc chithilaṁ muhuḥ |
AHS3.8.018c/ cira.kṛd grahaṇī.doṣaḥ sañcayāc copaveśayet || 18 ||
AHS3.8.019a/ sa catur.dhā pṛthag doṣaiḥ sannipātāc ca jāyate |
AHS3.8.019c/ prāg.rūpaṁ tasya sadanaṁ cirāt pacanam amlakaḥ || 19 ||
AHS3.8.020a/ praseko vaktra.vairasyam a.rucis tṛṭ klamo bhramaḥ |
AHS3.8.020c/ ānaddhodara.tā chardiḥ karṇa.kṣveḍo 'ntra.kūjanam || 20 ||
AHS3.8.021a/ sāmānyaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ kārśyaṁ dhūmakas tamako jvaraḥ |
AHS3.8.021c/ mūrchā śiro.rug viṣṭambhaḥ śvayathuḥ kara.pādayoḥ || 21 ||
AHS3.8.022a/ tatrānilāt tālu.śoṣas timiraṁ karṇayoḥ svanaḥ |
AHS3.8.022c/ pārśvoru.vaṅkṣaṇa.grīvā.rujābhīkṣṇaṁ viṣūcikā || 22 ||
AHS3.8.023a/ raseṣu gṛddhiḥ sarveṣu kṣut tṛṣṇā parikartikā |
AHS3.8.023c/ jīrṇe jīryati cādhmānaṁ bhukte svāsthyaṁ samaśnute || 23 ||
AHS3.8.024a/ vāta.hṛd.roga.gulmārśaḥ.plīha.pāṇḍu.tva.śaṅkitaḥ |
AHS3.8.024c/ cirād duḥkhaṁ dravaṁ śuṣkaṁ tanv āmaṁ śabda.phena.vat || 24 ||
AHS3.8.025a/ punaḥ punaḥ sṛjed varcaḥ pāyu.ruk.śvāsa.kāsa.vān |
AHS3.8.025c/ pittena nīla.pītābhaṁ pītābhaḥ sṛjati dravam || 25 || [Note: AHS3.8.025v/ 8.25cv pittena nīlaṁ pītābhaṁ 8.25cv pittena pīta.nīlābhaṁ]
AHS3.8.026a/ pūty.amlodgāra.hṛt.kaṇṭha.dāhā.ruci.tṛḍ.arditaḥ |
AHS3.8.026c/ śleṣmaṇā pacyate duḥkham annaṁ chardir a.rocakaḥ || 26 ||
[Page 263 ]
AHS3.8.027a/ āsyopadeha.niṣṭhīva.kāsa.hṛl.lāsa.pīnasāḥ |
AHS3.8.027c/ hṛdayaṁ manyate styānam udaraṁ stimitaṁ guru || 27 || [Note: AHS3.8.027v/ 8.27av āsyopadeha.mādhurya. 8.27bv .kāsa.ṣṭhīvana.pīnasāḥ]
AHS3.8.028a/ udgāro duṣṭa.madhuraḥ sadanaṁ strīṣv a.harṣaṇam |
AHS3.8.028c/ bhinnāma.śleṣma.saṁsṛṣṭa.guru.varcaḥ.pravartanam || 28 ||
AHS3.8.029a/ a.kṛśasyāpi daurbalyaṁ sarva.je sarva.saṅkaraḥ |
AHS3.8.029c/ vibhāge 'ṅgasya ye coktā viṣamādyās trayo 'gnayaḥ || 29 ||
AHS3.8.030a/ te 'pi syur grahaṇī.doṣāḥ samas tu svāsthya.kāraṇam || 30ab ||
AHS3.8.030c/ vāta.vyādhy.aśmarī.kuṣṭha.mehodara.bhagandarāḥ || 30cd ||
AHS3.8.030e/ arśāṁsi grahaṇīty aṣṭau mahā.rogāḥ su.dus.tarāḥ || 30ef ||

3.9. Chapter 9 :: Athamūtrāghātanidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 274-277]
AHS3.9.001a/ vasti.vasti.śiro.meḍhra.kaṭī.vṛṣaṇa.pāyavaḥ |
AHS3.9.001c/ eka.sambandhanāḥ proktā gudāsthi.vivarāśrayāḥ || 1 ||
AHS3.9.002a/ adho.mukho 'pi vastir hi mūtra.vāhi.sirā.mukhaiḥ |
AHS3.9.002c/ pārśvebhyaḥ pūryate sūkṣmaiḥ syandamānair an.āratam || 2 ||
AHS3.9.003a/ yais tair eva praviśyainaṁ doṣāḥ kurvanti viṁśatim |
AHS3.9.003c/ mūtrāghātān pramehāṁś ca kṛcchrān marma.samāśrayān || 3 ||
AHS3.9.004a/ vasti.vaṅkṣaṇa.meḍhrārti.yukto 'lpālpaṁ muhur muhuḥ |
AHS3.9.004c/ mūtrayed vāta.je kṛcchre paitte pītaṁ sa.dāha.ruk || 4 ||
AHS3.9.005a/ raktaṁ vā kapha.je vasti.meḍhra.gaurava.śopha.vān |
AHS3.9.005c/ sa.picchaṁ sa.vibandhaṁ ca sarvaiḥ sarvātmakaṁ malaiḥ || 5 ||
AHS3.9.006a/ yadā vāyur mukhaṁ vaster āvṛtya pariśoṣayet |
AHS3.9.006c/ mūtraṁ sa.pittaṁ sa.kaphaṁ sa.śukraṁ vā tadā kramāt || 6 ||
[Page 264 ]
AHS3.9.007a/ sañjāyate 'śmarī ghorā pittād gor iva rocanā |
AHS3.9.007c/ śleṣmāśrayā ca sarvā syād athāsyāḥ pūrva.lakṣaṇam || 7 ||
AHS3.9.008a/ vasty.ādhmānaṁ tad.āsanna.deśeṣu parito 'ti.ruk |
AHS3.9.008c/ mūtre ca basta.gandha.tvaṁ mūtra.kṛcchraṁ jvaro '.ruciḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS3.9.008v/ 9.8cv mūtre basta.sa.gandha.tvaṁ]
AHS3.9.009a/ sāmānya.liṅgaṁ ruṅ nābhi.sevanī.vasti.mūrdhasu |
AHS3.9.009c/ viśīrṇa.dhāraṁ mūtraṁ syāt tayā mārga.nirodhane || 9 || [Note: AHS3.9.009v/ 9.9dv tathā mārga.nirodhane]
AHS3.9.010a/ tad.vyapāyāt sukhaṁ mehed acchaṁ gomedakopamam |
AHS3.9.010c/ tat.saṅkṣobhāt kṣate sāsram āyāsāc cāti.rug bhavet || 10 ||
AHS3.9.011a/ tatra vātād bhṛśārty.ārto dantān khādati vepate |
AHS3.9.011c/ mṛdnāti mehanaṁ nābhiṁ pīḍayaty a.niśaṁ kvaṇan || 11 ||
AHS3.9.012a/ sānilaṁ muñcati śakṛn muhur mehati bindu.śaḥ |
AHS3.9.012c/ śyāvā rūkṣāśmarī cāsya syāc citā kaṇṭakair iva || 12 ||
AHS3.9.013a/ pittena dahyate vastiḥ pacyamāna ivoṣma.vān |
AHS3.9.013c/ bhallātakāsthi.saṁsthānā raktā pītāsitāśmarī || 13 || [Note: AHS3.9.013v/ 9.13dv rakta.pītāsitāśmarī]
AHS3.9.014a/ vastir nistudyata iva śleṣmaṇā śītalo guruḥ |
AHS3.9.014c/ aśmarī mahatī ślakṣṇā madhu.varṇātha.vā sitā || 14 ||
AHS3.9.015a/ etā bhavanti bālānāṁ teṣām eva ca bhūyasā |
AHS3.9.015c/ āśrayopacayālpa.tvād grahaṇāharaṇe sukhāḥ || 15 ||
AHS3.9.016a/ śukrāśmarī tu mahatāṁ jāyate śukra.dhāraṇāt |
AHS3.9.016c/ sthānāc cyutam a.muktaṁ hi muṣkayor antare 'nilaḥ || 16 ||
[Page 265 ]
AHS3.9.017a/ śoṣayaty upasaṅgṛhya śukraṁ tac chuṣkam aśmarī |
AHS3.9.017c/ vasti.ruk.kṛcchra.mūtra.tva.muṣka.śvayathu.kāriṇī || 17 ||
AHS3.9.018a/ tasyām utpanna.mātrāyāṁ śukram eti vilīyate |
AHS3.9.018c/ pīḍite tv avakāśe 'sminn aśmary eva ca śarkarā || 18 ||
AHS3.9.019a/ aṇu.śo vāyunā bhinnā sā tv asminn anuloma.ge |
AHS3.9.019c/ nireti saha mūtreṇa pratilome vibadhyate || 19 ||
AHS3.9.020a/ mūtra.sandhāriṇaḥ kuryād ruddhvā vaster mukhaṁ marut |
AHS3.9.020c/ mūtra.saṅgaṁ rujaṁ kaṇḍūṁ kadā.cic ca sva.dhāmataḥ || 20 ||
AHS3.9.021a/ pracyāvya vastim udvṛttaṁ garbhābhaṁ sthūla.viplutam |
AHS3.9.021c/ karoti tatra rug.dāha.spandanodveṣṭanāni ca || 21 ||
AHS3.9.022a/ bindu.śaś ca pravarteta mūtraṁ vastau tu pīḍite |
AHS3.9.022c/ dhārayā dvi.vidho 'py eṣa vāta.vastir iti smṛtaḥ || 22 ||
AHS3.9.023a/ dus.taro dus.tara.taro dvitīyaḥ prabalānilaḥ |
AHS3.9.023c/ śakṛn.mārgasya vasteś ca vāyur antaram āśritaḥ || 23 ||
AHS3.9.024a/ aṣṭhīlābhaṁ ghanaṁ granthiṁ karoty a.calam unnatam |
AHS3.9.024c/ vātāṣṭhīleti sādhmāna.viṇ.mūtrānila.saṅga.kṛt || 24 ||
AHS3.9.025a/ vi.guṇaḥ kuṇḍalī.bhūto vastau tīvra.vyatho 'nilaḥ |
AHS3.9.025c/ āvidhya mūtraṁ bhramati sa.stambhodveṣṭa.gauravaḥ || 25 || [Note: AHS3.9.025v/ 9.25cv āviśya mūtraṁ bhramati]
AHS3.9.026a/ mūtram alpālpam atha.vā vimuñcati śakṛt sṛjan |
AHS3.9.026c/ vāta.kuṇḍalikety eṣā mūtraṁ tu vidhṛtaṁ ciram || 26 ||
[Page 266 ]
AHS3.9.027a/ na nireti vibaddhaṁ vā mūtrātītaṁ tad alpa.ruk |
AHS3.9.027c/ vidhāraṇāt pratihataṁ vātodāvartitaṁ yadā || 27 ||
AHS3.9.028a/ nābher adhas.tād udaraṁ mūtram āpūrayet tadā |
AHS3.9.028c/ kuryāt tīvra.rug ādhmānam a.paktiṁ mala.saṅgraham || 28 ||
AHS3.9.029a/ tan mūtra.jaṭharaṁ chidra.vaiguṇyenānilena vā |
AHS3.9.029c/ ākṣiptam alpaṁ mūtraṁ tad vastau nāle 'tha.vā maṇau || 29 || [Note: AHS3.9.029v/ 9.29cv ākṣiptam alpaṁ mūtrasya]
AHS3.9.030a/ sthitvā sravec chanaiḥ paścāt sa.rujaṁ vātha nī.rujam |
AHS3.9.030c/ mūtrotsaṅgaḥ sa vicchinna.tac.cheṣa.guru.śephasaḥ || 30 || [Note: AHS3.9.030v/ 9.30bv sa.rujaṁ vātha.vā.rujam 9.30cv mūtrotsaṅgaḥ sa vicchinnas 9.30cv mūtrotsaṅgaḥ sa vicchinnaṁ 9.30dv tac.cheṣa.guru.śephasaḥ]
AHS3.9.031a/ antar vasti.mukhe vṛttaḥ sthiro 'lpaḥ sahasā bhavet |
AHS3.9.031c/ aśmarī.tulya.rug granthir mūtra.granthiḥ sa ucyate || 31 ||
AHS3.9.032a/ mūtritasya striyaṁ yāto vāyunā śukram uddhatam |
AHS3.9.032c/ sthānāc cyutaṁ mūtrayataḥ prāk paścād vā pravartate || 32 ||
AHS3.9.033a/ bhasmodaka.pratīkāśaṁ mūtra.śukraṁ tad ucyate |
AHS3.9.033c/ rūkṣa.dur.balayor vātād udāvartaṁ śakṛd yadā || 33 || [Note: AHS3.9.033v/ 9.33dv udāvṛttaṁ śakṛd yadā]
AHS3.9.034a/ mūtra.sroto 'nuparyeti saṁsṛṣṭaṁ śakṛtā tadā |
AHS3.9.034c/ mūtraṁ viṭ.tulya.gandhaṁ syād viḍ.vighātaṁ tam ādiśet || 34 ||
AHS3.9.035a/ pittaṁ vyāyāma.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.bhojanādhvātapādibhiḥ |
AHS3.9.035c/ pravṛddhaṁ vāyunā kṣiptaṁ vasty.upasthārti.dāha.vat || 35 ||
AHS3.9.036a/ mūtraṁ pravartayet pītaṁ sa.raktaṁ raktam eva vā |
AHS3.9.036c/ uṣṇaṁ punaḥ punaḥ kṛcchrād uṣṇa.vātaṁ vadanti tam || 36 ||
[Page 267 ]
AHS3.9.037a/ rūkṣasya klānta.dehasya vasti.sthau pitta.mārutau |
AHS3.9.037c/ mūtra.kṣayaṁ sa.rug.dāhaṁ janayetāṁ tad.āhvayam || 37 ||
AHS3.9.038a/ pittaṁ kapho dvāv api vā saṁhanyete 'nilena cet |
AHS3.9.038c/ kṛcchrān mūtraṁ tadā pītaṁ raktaṁ śvetaṁ ghanaṁ sṛjet || 38 ||
AHS3.9.039a/ sa.dāhaṁ rocanā.śaṅkha.cūrṇa.varṇaṁ bhavec ca tat |
AHS3.9.039c/ śuṣkaṁ samasta.varṇaṁ vā mūtra.sādaṁ vadanti tam || 39 ||
AHS3.9.040a/ iti vistarataḥ proktā rogā mūtrā.pravṛtti.jāḥ |
AHS3.9.040c/ nidāna.lakṣaṇair ūrdhvaṁ vakṣyante 'ti.pravṛtti.jāḥ || 40 ||

3.10. Chapter 10 :: Athapramehanidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 277-281]
AHS3.10.001a/ pramehā viṁśatis tatra śleṣmato daśa pittataḥ |
AHS3.10.001c/ ṣaṭ catvāro 'nilāt teṣāṁ medo.mūtra.kaphāvaham || 1 ||
AHS3.10.002a/ anna.pāna.kriyā.jātaṁ yat prāyas tat pravartakam |
AHS3.10.002c/ svādv.amla.lavaṇa.snigdha.guru.picchila.śītalam || 2 ||
AHS3.10.003a/ nava.dhānya.surānūpa.māṁsekṣu.guḍa.go.rasam |
AHS3.10.003c/ eka.sthānāsana.ratiḥ śayanaṁ vidhi.varjitam || 3 ||
AHS3.10.004a/ vastim āśritya kurute pramehān dūṣitaḥ kaphaḥ |
AHS3.10.004c/ dūṣayitvā vapuḥ.kleda.sveda.medo.rasāmiṣam || 4 || [Note: AHS3.10.004v/ 10.4dv .sveda.medo.vasāmiṣam]
AHS3.10.005a/ pittaṁ raktam api kṣīṇe kaphādau mūtra.saṁśrayam |
AHS3.10.005c/ dhātūn vastim upānīya tat.kṣaye 'pi ca mārutaḥ || 5 ||
AHS3.10.006a/ sādhya.yāpya.parityājyā mehās tenaiva tad.bhavāḥ |
AHS3.10.006c/ samāsam a.kriya.tayā mahātyaya.tayāpi ca || 6 ||
[Page 268 ]
AHS3.10.007a/ sāmānyaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ teṣāṁ prabhūtāvila.mūtra.tā |
AHS3.10.007c/ doṣa.dūṣyā.viśeṣe 'pi tat.saṁyoga.viśeṣataḥ || 7 || [Note: AHS3.10.007v/ 10.7bv prabhūtākula.mūtra.tā]
AHS3.10.008a/ mūtra.varṇādi.bhedena bhedo meheṣu kalpyate |
AHS3.10.008c/ acchaṁ bahu sitaṁ śītaṁ nir.gandham udakopamam || 8 ||
AHS3.10.009a/ mehaty udaka.mehena kiñ.cic cāvila.picchilam |
AHS3.10.009c/ ikṣo rasam ivāty.arthaṁ madhuraṁ cekṣu.mehataḥ || 9 ||
AHS3.10.010a/ sāndrī.bhavet paryuṣitaṁ sāndra.mehena mehati |
AHS3.10.010c/ surā.mehī surā.tulyam upary accham adho ghanam || 10 ||
AHS3.10.011a/ saṁhṛṣṭa.romā piṣṭena piṣṭa.vad bahalaṁ sitam |
AHS3.10.011c/ śukrābhaṁ śukra.miśraṁ vā śukra.mehī pramehati || 11 || [Note: AHS3.10.011v/ 10.11bv piṣṭa.vad bahulaṁ sitam]
AHS3.10.012a/ mūrtāṇūn sikatā.mehī sikatā.rūpiṇo malān |
AHS3.10.012c/ śīta.mehī su.bahu.śo madhuraṁ bhṛśa.śītalam || 12 || [Note: AHS3.10.012v/ 10.12av mūtrāṇūn sikatā.mehī 10.12av mūtre 'ṇūn sikatā.mehī]
AHS3.10.013a/ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ śanair.mehī mandaṁ mandaṁ pramehati |
AHS3.10.013c/ lālā.tantu.yutaṁ mūtraṁ lālā.mehena picchilam || 13 ||
AHS3.10.014a/ gandha.varṇa.rasa.sparśaiḥ kṣāreṇa kṣāra.toya.vat |
AHS3.10.014c/ nīla.mehena nīlābhaṁ kāla.mehī maṣī.nibham || 14 ||
AHS3.10.015a/ hāridra.mehī kaṭukaṁ haridrā.sannibhaṁ dahat |
AHS3.10.015c/ visraṁ māñjiṣṭha.mehena mañjiṣṭhā.salilopamam || 15 ||
AHS3.10.016a/ visram uṣṇaṁ sa.lavaṇaṁ raktābhaṁ rakta.mehataḥ |
AHS3.10.016c/ vasā.mehī vasā.miśraṁ vasāṁ vā mūtrayen muhuḥ || 16 ||
[Page 269 ]
AHS3.10.017a/ majjānaṁ majja.miśraṁ vā majja.mehī muhur muhuḥ |
AHS3.10.017c/ hastī matta ivājasraṁ mūtraṁ vega.vivarjitam || 17 || [Note: AHS3.10.017v/ 10.17av majjābhaṁ majja.miśraṁ vā]
AHS3.10.018a/ sa.lasīkaṁ vibaddhaṁ ca hasti.mehī pramehati |
AHS3.10.018c/ madhu.mehī madhu.samaṁ jāyate sa kila dvi.dhā || 18 || [Note: AHS3.10.018v/ 10.18cv madhu.mehe madhu.samaṁ]
AHS3.10.019a/ kruddhe dhātu.kṣayād vāyau doṣāvṛta.pathe 'tha.vā |
AHS3.10.019c/ āvṛto doṣa.liṅgāni so '.nimittaṁ pradarśayet || 19 || [Note: AHS3.10.019v/ 10.19bv doṣāvṛta.pathe 'pi vā]
AHS3.10.020a/ kṣīṇaḥ kṣaṇāt kṣaṇāt pūrṇo bhajate kṛcchra.sādhya.tām |
AHS3.10.020c/ kālenopekṣitāḥ sarve yad yānti madhu.meha.tām || 20 ||
AHS3.10.021a/ madhuraṁ yac ca sarveṣu prāyo madhv iva mehati |
AHS3.10.021c/ sarve 'pi madhu.mehākhyā mādhuryāc ca tanor ataḥ || 21 ||
AHS3.10.022a/ a.vipāko '.ruciś chardir nidrā kāsaḥ sa.pīnasaḥ |
AHS3.10.022c/ upadravāḥ prajāyante mehānāṁ kapha.janmanām || 22 ||
AHS3.10.023a/ vasti.mehanayos todo muṣkāvadaraṇaṁ jvaraḥ |
AHS3.10.023c/ dāhas tṛṣṇāmlako mūrchā viḍ.bhedaḥ pitta.janmanām || 23 ||
AHS3.10.024a/ vātikānām udāvarta.kampa.hṛd.graha.lola.tāḥ |
AHS3.10.024c/ śūlam unnidra.tā śoṣaḥ kāsaḥ śvāsaś ca jāyate || 24 || [Note: AHS3.10.024v/ 10.24bv .kaṇṭha.hṛd.graha.lola.tāḥ]
AHS3.10.025a/ śarāvikā kacchapikā jālinī vinatālajī |
AHS3.10.025c/ masūrikā sarṣapikā putriṇī sa.vidārikā || 25 || [Note: AHS3.10.025v/ 10.25dv putriṇī ca vidārikā]
AHS3.10.026a/ vidradhiś ceti piṭikāḥ pramehopekṣayā daśa |
AHS3.10.026c/ sandhi.marmasu jāyante māṁsaleṣu ca dhāmasu || 26 ||
[Page 270 ]
AHS3.10.027a/ antonnatā madhya.nimnā śyāvā kleda.rujānvitā |
AHS3.10.027c/ śarāva.māna.saṁsthānā piṭikā syāc charāvikā || 27 ||
AHS3.10.028a/ avagāḍhārti.nistodā mahā.vastu.parigrahā |
AHS3.10.028c/ ślakṣṇā kacchapa.pṛṣṭhābhā piṭikā kacchapī matā || 28 ||
AHS3.10.029a/ stabdhā sirā.jāla.vatī snigdha.srāvā mahāśayā |
AHS3.10.029c/ rujā.nistoda.bahulā sūkṣma.cchidrā ca jālinī || 29 || [Note: AHS3.10.029v/ 10.29bv snigdha.srāvā mahāśrayā]
AHS3.10.030a/ avagāḍha.rujā.kledā pṛṣṭhe vā jaṭhare 'pi vā |
AHS3.10.030c/ mahatī piṭikā nīlā vinatā vinatā smṛtā || 30 ||
AHS3.10.031a/ dahati tvacam utthāne bhṛśaṁ kaṣṭā visarpiṇī |
AHS3.10.031c/ rakta.kṛṣṇāti.tṛṭ.sphoṭa.dāha.moha.jvarālajī || 31 ||
AHS3.10.032a/ māna.saṁsthānayos tulyā masūreṇa masūrikā |
AHS3.10.032c/ sarṣapā.māna.saṁsthānā kṣipra.pākā mahā.rujā || 32 ||
AHS3.10.033a/ sarṣapī sarṣapā.tulya.piṭikā.parivāritā |
AHS3.10.033c/ putriṇī mahatī bhūri.su.sūkṣma.piṭikācitā || 33 || [Note: AHS3.10.033v/ 10.33av sarṣapā sarṣapā.tulya. 10.33dv .su.sūkṣma.piṭikāvṛtā 10.33dv .su.sūkṣma.piṭikānvitā]
AHS3.10.034a/ vidārī.kanda.vad vṛttā kaṭhinā ca vidārikā |
AHS3.10.034c/ vidradhir vakṣyate 'nya.tra tatrādyaṁ piṭikā.trayam || 34 ||
AHS3.10.035a/ putriṇī ca vidārī ca duḥ.sahā bahu.medasaḥ |
AHS3.10.035c/ sahyāḥ pittolbaṇās tv anyāḥ sambhavanty alpa.medasaḥ || 35 ||
AHS3.10.036a/ tāsu meha.vaśāc ca syād doṣodreko yathā.yatham || 36ab ||
AHS3.10.036c/ prameheṇa vināpy etā jāyante duṣṭa.medasaḥ || 36cd ||
AHS3.10.036e/ tāvac ca nopalakṣyante yāvad vastu.parigrahaḥ || 36ef ||
[Page 271 ]
AHS3.10.037a/ hāridra.varṇaṁ raktaṁ vā meha.prāg.rūpa.varjitam |
AHS3.10.037c/ yo mūtrayen na taṁ mehaṁ rakta.pittaṁ tu tad viduḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS3.10.037v/ 10.37dv rakta.pittaṁ tu taṁ viduḥ 10.37dv rakta.pittaṁ ca tad viduḥ]
AHS3.10.038a/ svedo 'ṅga.gandhaḥ śithila.tvam aṅge śayyāsana.svapna.sukhābhiṣaṅgaḥ |
AHS3.10.038c/ hṛn.netra.jihvā.śravaṇopadeho ghanāṅga.tā keśa.nakhāti.vṛddhiḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS3.10.038v/ 10.38bv śayyāsana.sthāna.sukhābhilāṣaḥ]
AHS3.10.039a/ śīta.priya.tvaṁ gala.tālu.śoṣo mādhuryam āsye kara.pāda.dāhaḥ |
AHS3.10.039c/ bhaviṣyato meha.gaṇasya rūpaṁ mūtre 'bhidhāvanti pipīlikāś ca || 39 ||
AHS3.10.040a/ dṛṣṭvā pramehaṁ madhuraṁ sa.picchaṁ madhūpamaṁ syād vividho vicāraḥ |
AHS3.10.040c/ sampūraṇād vā kapha.sambhavaḥ syāt kṣīṇeṣu doṣeṣv anilātmako vā || 40 || [Note: AHS3.10.040v/ 10.40cv santarpaṇād vā kapha.sambhavaḥ syāt]
AHS3.10.041a/ sa.pūrva.rūpāḥ kapha.pitta.mehāḥ krameṇa ye vāta.kṛtāś ca mehāḥ |
AHS3.10.041c/ sādhyā na te pitta.kṛtās tu yāpyāḥ sādhyās tu medo yadi nāti.duṣṭam || 41 || [Note: AHS3.10.041v/ 10.41dv sādhyāś ca medo yadi nāti.duṣṭam]

3.11. Chapter 11 :: Athavidradhinidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 281-286]
AHS3.11.001a/ bhuktaiḥ paryuṣitāty.uṣṇa.rūkṣa.śuṣka.vidāhibhiḥ |
AHS3.11.001c/ jihma.śayyā.viceṣṭābhis tais taiś cāsṛk.pradūṣaṇaiḥ || 1 ||
AHS3.11.002a/ duṣṭa.tvaṅ.māṁsa.medo.'sthi.snāyv.asṛk.kaṇḍarāśrayaḥ |
AHS3.11.002c/ yaḥ śopho bahir antar vā mahā.mūlo mahā.rujaḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS3.11.002v/ 11.2av duṣṭas tvaṅ.māṁsa.medo.'sthi.]
AHS3.11.003a/ vṛttaḥ syād āyato yo vā smṛtaḥ ṣo.ḍhā sa vidradhiḥ |
AHS3.11.003c/ doṣaiḥ pṛthak samuditaiḥ śoṇitena kṣatena ca || 3 ||
AHS3.11.004a/ bāhyo 'tra tatra tatrāṅge dāruṇo grathitonnataḥ |
AHS3.11.004c/ āntaro dāruṇa.taro gambhīro gulma.vad ghanaḥ || 4 ||
AHS3.11.005a/ valmīka.vat samucchrāyī śīghra.ghāty agni.śastra.vat |
AHS3.11.005c/ nābhi.vasti.yakṛt.plīha.kloma.hṛt.kukṣi.vaṅkṣaṇe || 5 ||
[Page 272 ]
AHS3.11.006a/ syād vṛkkayor apāne ca vātāt tatrāti.tīvra.ruk |
AHS3.11.006c/ śyāvāruṇaś cirotthāna.pāko viṣama.saṁsthitiḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS3.11.006v/ 11.6av syād vṛkkayor apāne vā]
AHS3.11.007a/ vyadha.ccheda.bhramānāha.spanda.sarpaṇa.śabda.vān |
AHS3.11.007c/ rakta.tāmrāsitaḥ pittāt tṛṇ.moha.jvara.dāha.vān || 7 ||
AHS3.11.008a/ kṣiprotthāna.prapākaś ca pāṇḍuḥ kaṇḍū.yutaḥ kaphāt |
AHS3.11.008c/ sotkleśa.śītaka.stambha.jṛmbhā.rocaka.gauravaḥ || 8 ||
AHS3.11.009a/ cirotthāna.vipākaś ca saṅkīrṇaḥ sannipātataḥ |
AHS3.11.009c/ sāmarthyāc cātra vibhajed bāhyābhyantara.lakṣaṇam || 9 || [Note: AHS3.11.009v/ 11.9av cirotthāna.prapākaś ca]
AHS3.11.010a/ kṛṣṇa.sphoṭāvṛtaḥ śyāvas tīvra.dāha.rujā.jvaraḥ |
AHS3.11.010c/ pitta.liṅgo 'sṛjā bāhyaḥ strīṇām eva tathāntaraḥ || 10 ||
AHS3.11.011a/ śastrādyair abhighātena kṣate vā.pathya.kāriṇaḥ |
AHS3.11.011c/ kṣatoṣmā vāyu.vikṣiptaḥ sa.raktaṁ pittam īrayan || 11 || [Note: AHS3.11.011v/ 11.11dv sa.raktaṁ pittam īrayet]
AHS3.11.012a/ pittāsṛg.lakṣaṇaṁ kuryād vidradhiṁ bhūry.upadravam |
AHS3.11.012c/ teṣūpadrava.bhedaś ca smṛto 'dhiṣṭhāna.bhedataḥ || 12 ||
AHS3.11.013a/ nābhyāṁ hidhmā bhaved vastau mūtraṁ kṛcchreṇa pūti ca |
AHS3.11.013c/ śvāso yakṛti rodhas tu plīhny ucchvāsasya tṛṭ punaḥ || 13 ||
AHS3.11.014a/ gala.grahaś ca klomni syāt sarvāṅga.pragraho hṛdi |
AHS3.11.014c/ pramohas tamakaḥ kāso hṛdaye ghaṭṭanaṁ vyathā || 14 ||
AHS3.11.015a/ kukṣi.pārśvāntarāṁsārtiḥ kukṣāv āṭopa.janma ca |
AHS3.11.015c/ sakthnor graho vaṅkṣaṇayor vṛkkayoḥ kaṭi.pṛṣṭhayoḥ || 15 ||
[Page 273 ]
AHS3.11.016a/ pārśvayoś ca vyathā pāyau pavanasya nirodhanam |
AHS3.11.016c/ āma.pakva.vidagdha.tvaṁ teṣāṁ śopha.vad ādiśet || 16 ||
AHS3.11.017a/ nābher ūrdhvaṁ mukhāt pakvāḥ prasravanty adhare gudāt |
AHS3.11.017c/ gudāsyān nābhi.jo vidyād doṣaṁ kledāc ca vidradhau || 17 || [Note: AHS3.11.017v/ 11.17cv ubhābhyāṁ nābhi.jo vidyād]
AHS3.11.018a/ yathā.svaṁ vraṇa.vat tatra vivarjyaḥ sannipāta.jaḥ |
AHS3.11.018c/ pakvo hṛn.nābhi.vasti.stho bhinno 'ntar bahir eva vā || 18 ||
AHS3.11.019a/ pakvaś cāntaḥ sravan vaktrāt kṣīṇasyopadravānvitaḥ |
AHS3.11.019c/ evam eva stana.sirā vivṛtāḥ prāpya yoṣitām || 19 ||
AHS3.11.020a/ sūtānāṁ garbhiṇīnāṁ vā sambhavec chvayathur ghanaḥ |
AHS3.11.020c/ stane sa.dugdhe '.dugdhe vā bāhya.vidradhi.lakṣaṇaḥ || 20 ||
AHS3.11.021a/ nāḍīnāṁ sūkṣma.vaktra.tvāt kanyānāṁ na sa jāyate |
AHS3.11.021c/ kruddho ruddha.gatir vāyuḥ śopha.śūla.karaś caran || 21 || [Note: AHS3.11.021v/ 11.21bv kanyānāṁ tu na jāyate 11.21cv kruddho 'n.ūrdhva.gatir vāyuḥ]
AHS3.11.022a/ muṣkau vaṅkṣaṇataḥ prāpya phala.kośābhivāhinīḥ |
AHS3.11.022c/ prapīḍya dhamanīr vṛddhiṁ karoti phala.kośayoḥ || 22 ||
AHS3.11.023a/ doṣāsra.medo.mūtrāntraiḥ sa vṛddhiḥ sapta.dhā gadaḥ |
AHS3.11.023c/ mūtrāntra.jāv apy anilād dhetu.bhedas tu kevalam || 23 ||
AHS3.11.024a/ vāta.pūrṇa.dṛti.sparśo rūkṣo vātād a.hetu.ruk |
AHS3.11.024c/ pakvodumbara.saṅkāśaḥ pittād dāhoṣma.pāka.vān || 24 ||
AHS3.11.025a/ kaphāc chīto guruḥ snigdhaḥ kaṇḍū.mān kaṭhino 'lpa.ruk |
AHS3.11.025c/ kṛṣṇa.sphoṭāvṛtaḥ pitta.vṛddhi.liṅgaś ca raktataḥ || 25 || [Note: AHS3.11.025v/ 11.25cv kṛṣṇaḥ sphoṭāvṛtaḥ pitta.]
[Page 274 ]
AHS3.11.026a/ kapha.van medasā vṛddhir mṛdus tāla.phalopamaḥ |
AHS3.11.026c/ mūtra.dhāraṇa.śīlasya mūtra.jaḥ sa tu gacchataḥ || 26 ||
AHS3.11.027a/ ambhobhiḥ pūrṇa.dṛti.vat kṣobhaṁ yāti sa.ruṅ mṛduḥ |
AHS3.11.027c/ mūtra.kṛcchram adhas.tāc ca valayaṁ phala.kośayoḥ || 27 ||
AHS3.11.028a/ vāta.kopibhir āhāraiḥ śīta.toyāvagāhanaiḥ |
AHS3.11.028c/ dhāraṇeraṇa.bhārādhva.viṣamāṅga.pravartanaiḥ || 28 ||
AHS3.11.029a/ kṣobhaṇaiḥ kṣubhito 'nyaiś ca kṣudrāntrāvayavaṁ yadā |
AHS3.11.029c/ pavano vi.guṇī.kṛtya sva.niveśād adho nayet || 29 || [Note: AHS3.11.029v/ 11.29cv pavano dvi.guṇī.kṛtya]
AHS3.11.030a/ kuryād vaṅkṣaṇa.sandhi.stho granthy.ābhaṁ śvayathuṁ tadā || 30ab ||
AHS3.11.030c/ upekṣyamāṇasya ca muṣka.vṛddhim ādhmāna.ruk.stambha.vatīṁ sa vāyuḥ || 30cd ||
AHS3.11.030e/ prapīḍito 'ntaḥ svana.vān prayāti pradhmāpayann eti punaś ca muktaḥ || 30ef ||
AHS3.11.031/ antra.vṛddhir a.sādhyo 'yaṁ vāta.vṛddhi.samākṛtiḥ || 31 ||
AHS3.11.031+1/ iti vṛddhi.nidānam atha gulma.nidānam || 31+1 ||
AHS3.11.032a/ rūkṣa.kṛṣṇāruṇa.sirā.tantu.jāla.gavākṣitaḥ |
AHS3.11.032c/ gulmo 'ṣṭa.dhā pṛthag doṣaiḥ saṁsṛṣṭair nicayaṁ gataiḥ || 32 ||
AHS3.11.033a/ ārtavasya ca doṣeṇa nārīṇāṁ jāyate 'ṣṭamaḥ |
AHS3.11.033c/ jvara.cchardy.atisārādyair vamanādyaiś ca karmabhiḥ || 33 ||
AHS3.11.034a/ karśito vātalāny atti śītaṁ vāmbu bubhukṣitaḥ |
AHS3.11.034c/ yaḥ pibaty anu cānnāni laṅghana.plavanādikam || 34 || [Note: AHS3.11.034v/ 11.34bv śītaṁ cāmbu bubhukṣitaḥ]
[Page 275 ]
AHS3.11.035a/ sevate deha.saṅkṣobhi cchardiṁ vā samudīrayet |
AHS3.11.035c/ an.udīrṇām udīrṇān vā vātādīn na vimuñcati || 35 ||
AHS3.11.036a/ sneha.svedāv an.abhyasya śodhanaṁ vā niṣevate |
AHS3.11.036c/ śuddho vāśu vidāhīni bhajate syandanāni vā || 36 ||
AHS3.11.037a/ vātolbaṇās tasya malāḥ pṛthak kruddhā dvi.śo 'tha.vā |
AHS3.11.037c/ sarve vā rakta.yuktā vā mahā.sroto.'nuśāyinaḥ || 37 ||
AHS3.11.038a/ ūrdhvādho.mārgam āvṛtya kurvate śūla.pūrvakam |
AHS3.11.038c/ sparśopalabhyaṁ gulmākhyam utplutaṁ granthi.rūpiṇam || 38 || [Note: AHS3.11.038v/ 11.38dv unnataṁ granthi.rūpiṇam]
AHS3.11.039a/ karśanāt kapha.viṭ.pittair mārgasyāvaraṇena vā |
AHS3.11.039c/ vāyuḥ kṛtāśrayaḥ koṣṭhe raukṣyāt kāṭhinyam āgataḥ || 39 ||
AHS3.11.040a/ sva.tantraḥ svāśraye duṣṭaḥ para.tantraḥ parāśraye |
AHS3.11.040c/ piṇḍita.tvād a.mūrto 'pi mūrta.tvam iva saṁśritaḥ || 40 ||
AHS3.11.041a/ gulma ity ucyate vasti.nābhi.hṛt.pārśva.saṁśrayaḥ |
AHS3.11.041c/ vātān manyā.śiraḥ.śūlaṁ jvara.plīhāntra.kūjanam || 41 ||
AHS3.11.042a/ vyadhaḥ sūcyeva viṭ.saṅgaḥ kṛcchrād ucchvasanaṁ muhuḥ |
AHS3.11.042c/ stambho gātre mukhe śoṣaḥ kārśyaṁ viṣama.vahni.tā || 42 ||
AHS3.11.043a/ rūkṣa.kṛṣṇa.tvag.ādi.tvaṁ cala.tvād anilasya ca |
AHS3.11.043c/ a.nirūpita.saṁsthāna.sthāna.vṛddhi.kṣaya.vyathaḥ || 43 ||
AHS3.11.044a/ pipīlikā.vyāpta iva gulmaḥ sphurati tudyate |
AHS3.11.044c/ pittād dāho 'mlako mūrchā.viḍ.bheda.sveda.tṛḍ.jvarāḥ || 44 ||
[Page 276 ]
AHS3.11.045a/ hāridra.tvaṁ tvag.ādyeṣu gulmaś ca sparśanā.sahaḥ |
AHS3.11.045c/ dūyate dīpyate soṣmā sva.sthānaṁ dahatīva ca || 45 ||
AHS3.11.046a/ kaphāt staimityam a.ruciḥ sadanaṁ śiśira.jvaraḥ |
AHS3.11.046c/ pīnasālasya.hṛl.lāsa.kāsa.śukla.tvag.ādi.tāḥ || 46 ||
AHS3.11.047a/ gulmo 'vagāḍhaḥ kaṭhino guruḥ suptaḥ sthiro 'lpa.ruk |
AHS3.11.047c/ sva.doṣa.sthāna.dhāmānaḥ sve sve kāle ca ruk.karāḥ || 47 ||
AHS3.11.048a/ prāyas trayas tu dvandvotthā gulmāḥ saṁsṛṣṭa.lakṣaṇāḥ |
AHS3.11.048c/ sarva.jas tīvra.rug.dāhaḥ śīghra.pākī ghanonnataḥ || 48 ||
AHS3.11.049a/ so '.sādhyo rakta.gulmas tu striyā eva prajāyate |
AHS3.11.049c/ ṛtau vā nava.sūtā vā yadi vā yoni.rogiṇī || 49 ||
AHS3.11.050a/ sevate vātalāni strī kruddhas tasyāḥ samīraṇaḥ |
AHS3.11.050c/ niruṇaddhy ārtavaṁ yonyāṁ prati.māsam avasthitam || 50 ||
AHS3.11.051a/ kukṣiṁ karoti tad.garbha.liṅgam āviṣ.karoti ca |
AHS3.11.051c/ hṛl.lāsa.daurhṛda.stanya.darśana.kṣāma.tādikam || 51 ||
AHS3.11.052a/ krameṇa vāyu.saṁsargāt pitta.yoni.tayā ca tat |
AHS3.11.052c/ śoṇitaṁ kurute tasyā vāta.pittottha.gulma.jān || 52 ||
AHS3.11.053a/ ruk.stambha.dāhātīsāra.tṛḍ.jvarādīn upadravān |
AHS3.11.053c/ garbhāśaye ca su.tarāṁ śūlaṁ duṣṭāsṛg.āśraye || 53 ||
AHS3.11.054a/ yonyāś ca srāva.daurgandhya.toda.spandana.vedanāḥ |
AHS3.11.054c/ na cāṅgair garbha.vad gulmaḥ sphuraty api tu śūla.vān || 54 || [Note: AHS3.11.054v/ 11.54bv .toda.sphuraṇa.vedanāḥ 11.54bv .kleda.svedana.vedanāḥ]
[Page 277 ]
AHS3.11.055a/ piṇḍī.bhūtaḥ sa evāsyāḥ kadā.cit spandate cirāt |
AHS3.11.055c/ na cāsyā vardhate kukṣir gulma eva tu vardhate || 55 ||
AHS3.11.056a/ sva.doṣa.saṁśrayo gulmaḥ sarvo bhavati tena saḥ |
AHS3.11.056c/ pākaṁ cireṇa bhajate naiva vā vidradhiḥ punaḥ || 56 ||
AHS3.11.057a/ pacyate śīghram aty.arthaṁ duṣṭa.raktāśraya.tvataḥ |
AHS3.11.057c/ ataḥ śīghra.vidāhi.tvād vidradhiḥ so 'bhidhīyate || 57 ||
AHS3.11.058a/ gulme 'ntar.āśraye vasti.kukṣi.hṛt.plīha.vedanāḥ |
AHS3.11.058c/ agni.varṇa.bala.bhraṁśo vegānāṁ cā.pravartanam || 58 || [Note: AHS3.11.058v/ 11.58bv .kukṣi.hṛt.pārśva.vedanāḥ]
AHS3.11.059a/ ato viparyayo bāhye koṣṭhāṅgeṣu tu nāti.ruk |
AHS3.11.059c/ vaivarṇyam avakāśasya bahir unnata.tādhikam || 59 ||
AHS3.11.060a/ sāṭopam aty.ugra.rujam ādhmānam udare bhṛśam |
AHS3.11.060c/ ūrdhvādho.vāta.rodhena tam ānāhaṁ pracakṣate || 60 ||
AHS3.11.061a/ ghano 'ṣṭhīlopamo granthir aṣṭhīlordhvaṁ samunnataḥ |
AHS3.11.061c/ ānāha.liṅgas tiryak tu pratyaṣṭhīlā tad.ākṛtiḥ || 61 || [Note: AHS3.11.061v/ 11.61cv ānāha.liṅgas tiryak ca]
AHS3.11.062a/ pakvāśayād gudopasthaṁ vāyus tīvra.rujaḥ prayān |
AHS3.11.062c/ tūṇī pratūṇī tu bhavet sa evāto viparyaye || 62 ||
AHS3.11.063a/ udgāra.bāhulya.purīṣa.bandha.tṛpty.a.kṣama.tvāntra.vikūjanāni |
AHS3.11.063c/ āṭopam ādhmānam a.pakti.śaktim āsanna.gulmasya vadanti cihnam || 63 || [Note: AHS3.11.063v/ 11.63cv āṭopam ādhmānam a.pakty.a.śaktim]

3.12. Chapter 12 :: Athodaranidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 286-289]
AHS3.12.001a/ rogāḥ sarve 'pi mande 'gnau su.tarām udarāṇi tu |
AHS3.12.001c/ a.jīrṇān malinaiś cānnair jāyante mala.sañcayāt || 1 ||
[Page 278 ]
AHS3.12.002a/ ūrdhvādho dhātavo ruddhvā vāhinīr ambu.vāhinīḥ |
AHS3.12.002c/ prāṇāgny.apānān sandūṣya kuryus tvaṅ.māṁsa.sandhi.gāḥ || 2 ||
AHS3.12.003a/ ādhmāpya kukṣim udaram aṣṭa.dhā tac ca bhidyate |
AHS3.12.003c/ pṛthag doṣaiḥ samastaiś ca plīha.baddha.kṣatodakaiḥ || 3 ||
AHS3.12.004a/ tenārtāḥ śuṣka.tālv.oṣṭhāḥ śūna.pāda.karodarāḥ |
AHS3.12.004c/ naṣṭa.ceṣṭā.balāhārāḥ kṛśāḥ pradhmāta.kukṣayaḥ || 4 ||
AHS3.12.005a/ syuḥ preta.rūpāḥ puruṣā bhāvinas tasya lakṣaṇam |
AHS3.12.005c/ kṣun.nāśo 'nnaṁ cirāt sarvaṁ sa.vidāhaṁ ca pacyate || 5 || [Note: AHS3.12.005v/ 12.5dv sa.vidāhaṁ vipacyate]
AHS3.12.006a/ jīrṇā.jīrṇaṁ na jānāti sauhityaṁ sahate na ca |
AHS3.12.006c/ kṣīyate balataḥ śaśvac chvasity alpe 'pi ceṣṭite || 6 ||
AHS3.12.007a/ vṛddhir viṣo '.pravṛttiś ca kiñ.cic chophaś ca pādayoḥ |
AHS3.12.007c/ rug.vasti.sandhau tata.tā laghv.alpā.bhojanair api || 7 || [Note: AHS3.12.007v/ 12.7av vṛddhir viṣo '.pravṛttir vā]
AHS3.12.008a/ rājī.janma valī.nāśo jaṭhare jaṭhareṣu tu |
AHS3.12.008c/ sarveṣu tandrā sadanaṁ mala.saṅgo 'lpa.vahni.tā || 8 ||
AHS3.12.009a/ dāhaḥ śvayathur ādhmānam ante salila.sambhavaḥ |
AHS3.12.009c/ sarvaṁ tv a.toyam aruṇam a.śophaṁ nāti.bhārikam || 9 ||
AHS3.12.010a/ gavākṣitaṁ sirā.jālaiḥ sadā guḍaguḍāyate |
AHS3.12.010c/ nābhim antraṁ ca viṣṭabhya vegaṁ kṛtvā praṇaśyati || 10 ||
AHS3.12.011a/ māruto hṛt.kaṭī.nābhi.pāyu.vaṅkṣaṇa.vedanāḥ |
AHS3.12.011c/ sa.śabdo niścared vāyur viḍ baddhā mūtram alpakam || 11 || [Note: AHS3.12.011v/ 12.11bv .pāyu.vaṅkṣaṇa.vedanā]
[Page 279 ]
AHS3.12.012a/ nāti.mando 'nalo laulyaṁ na ca syād vi.rasaṁ mukham |
AHS3.12.012c/ tatra vātodare śophaḥ pāṇi.pān.muṣka.kukṣiṣu || 12 ||
AHS3.12.013a/ kukṣi.pārśvodara.kaṭī.pṛṣṭha.ruk parva.bhedanam |
AHS3.12.013c/ śuṣka.kāso 'ṅga.mardo 'dho.guru.tā mala.saṅgrahaḥ || 13 ||
AHS3.12.014a/ śyāvāruṇa.tvag.ādi.tvam a.kasmād vṛddhi.hrāsa.vat |
AHS3.12.014c/ sa.toda.bhedam udaraṁ tanu.kṛṣṇa.sirā.tatam || 14 || [Note: AHS3.12.014v/ 12.14dv tanu kṛṣṇa.sirā.tatam]
AHS3.12.015a/ ādhmāta.dṛti.vac chabdam āhataṁ prakaroti ca |
AHS3.12.015c/ vāyuś cātra sa.ruk.śabdo vicaret sarvato.gatiḥ || 15 ||
AHS3.12.016a/ pittodare jvaro mūrchā dāhas tṛṭ kaṭukāsya.tā |
AHS3.12.016c/ bhramo 'tīsāraḥ pīta.tvaṁ tvag.ādāv udaraṁ harit || 16 ||
AHS3.12.017a/ pīta.tāmra.sirānaddhaṁ sa.svedaṁ soṣma dahyate |
AHS3.12.017c/ dhūmāyati mṛdu.sparśaṁ kṣipra.pākaṁ pradūyate || 17 || [Note: AHS3.12.017v/ 12.17cv dhūmāyate mṛdu.sparśaṁ]
AHS3.12.018a/ śleṣmodare 'ṅga.sadanaṁ svāpaḥ śvayathu.gauravam |
AHS3.12.018c/ nidrotkleśā.ruci.śvāsa.kāsa.śukla.tvag.ādi.tā || 18 || [Note: AHS3.12.018v/ 12.18bv svāpa.śvayathu.gauravam]
AHS3.12.019a/ udaraṁ stimitaṁ ślakṣṇaṁ śukla.rājī.tataṁ mahat |
AHS3.12.019c/ cirābhivṛddhi kaṭhinaṁ śīta.sparśaṁ guru sthiram || 19 || [Note: AHS3.12.019v/ 12.19av udaraṁ stimitaṁ snigdhaṁ]
AHS3.12.020a/ tri.doṣa.kopanais tais taiḥ strī.dattaiś ca rajo.malaiḥ |
AHS3.12.020c/ gara.dūṣī.viṣādyaiś ca sa.raktāḥ sañcitā malāḥ || 20 ||
AHS3.12.021a/ koṣṭhaṁ prāpya vikurvāṇāḥ śoṣa.mūrchā.bhramānvitam |
AHS3.12.021c/ kuryus tri.liṅgam udaraṁ śīghra.pākaṁ su.dāruṇam || 21 ||
[Page 280 ]
AHS3.12.022a/ bādhate tac ca su.tarāṁ śīta.vātābhra.darśane |
AHS3.12.022c/ aty.āśitasya saṅkṣobhād yāna.yānādi.ceṣṭitaiḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS3.12.022v/ 12.22bv śīta.vātābhra.darśanaiḥ]
AHS3.12.023a/ ati.vyavāya.karmādhva.vamana.vyādhi.karśanaiḥ |
AHS3.12.023c/ vāma.pārśvāśritaḥ plīhā cyutaḥ sthānād vivardhate || 23 ||
AHS3.12.024a/ śoṇitaṁ vā rasādibhyo vivṛddhaṁ taṁ vivardhayet |
AHS3.12.024c/ so 'ṣṭhīlevāti.kaṭhinaḥ prāk tataḥ kūrma.pṛṣṭha.vat || 24 || [Note: AHS3.12.024v/ 12.24dv prākṛtaḥ kūrma.pṛṣṭha.vat]
AHS3.12.025a/ krameṇa vardhamānaś ca kukṣāv udaram āvahet |
AHS3.12.025c/ śvāsa.kāsa.pipāsāsya.vairasyādhmāna.rug.jvaraiḥ || 25 ||
AHS3.12.026a/ pāṇḍu.tva.mūrchā.chardībhir dāha.mohaiś ca saṁyutam |
AHS3.12.026c/ aruṇābhaṁ vi.varṇaṁ vā nīla.hāridra.rāji.mat || 26 || [Note: AHS3.12.026v/ 12.26av pāṇḍu.tva.mūrchāti.chardi. 12.26bv .dāha.mohaiś ca saṁyutam]
AHS3.12.027a/ udāvarta.rujānāhair moha.tṛḍ.dahana.jvaraiḥ |
AHS3.12.027c/ gauravā.ruci.kāṭhinyair vidyāt tatra malān kramāt || 27 || [Note: AHS3.12.027v/ 12.27av udāvarta.rug.ānāhair]
AHS3.12.028a/ plīha.vad dakṣiṇāt pārśvāt kuryād yakṛd api cyutam |
AHS3.12.028c/ pakṣma.vālaiḥ sahānnena bhuktair baddhāyane gude || 28 ||
AHS3.12.029a/ dur.nāmabhir udāvartair anyair vāntropalepibhiḥ |
AHS3.12.029c/ varcaḥ.pitta.kaphān ruddhvā karoti kupito 'nilaḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS3.12.029v/ 12.29bv annair vāntropalepibhiḥ]
AHS3.12.030a/ apāno jaṭharaṁ tena syur dāha.jvara.tṛṭ.kṣavāḥ |
AHS3.12.030c/ kāsa.śvāsoru.sadanaṁ śiro.hṛn.nābhi.pāyu.ruk || 30 || [Note: AHS3.12.030v/ 12.30bv syur dāha.jvara.tṛṭ.kṣudhāḥ 12.30bv syur dāha.jvara.tṛṭ.kṣutaḥ]
AHS3.12.031a/ mala.saṅgo '.ruciś chardir udaraṁ mūḍha.mārutam |
AHS3.12.031c/ sthiraṁ nīlāruṇa.sirā.rājī.naddham a.rāji vā || 31 ||
[Page 281 ]
AHS3.12.032a/ nābher upari ca prāyo go.pucchākṛti jāyate |
AHS3.12.032c/ asthy.ādi.śalyaiḥ sānnaiś ced bhuktair aty.aśanena vā || 32 || [Note: AHS3.12.032v/ 12.32cv asthy.ādi.śalyaiḥ sānnaiś ca]
AHS3.12.033a/ bhidyate pacyate vāntraṁ tac.chidraiś ca sravan bahiḥ |
AHS3.12.033c/ āma eva gudād eti tato 'lpālpaṁ sa.viḍ.rasaḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS3.12.033v/ 12.33av bhidyate pacyate cāntraṁ 12.33dv 'lpālpaḥ sa.viḍ.rasaḥ]
AHS3.12.034a/ tulyaḥ kuṇapa.gandhena picchilaḥ pīta.lohitaḥ |
AHS3.12.034c/ śeṣaś cāpūrya jaṭharaṁ jaṭharaṁ ghoram āvahet || 34 ||
AHS3.12.035a/ vardhayet tad adho nābher āśu caiti jalātma.tām |
AHS3.12.035c/ udrikta.doṣa.rūpaṁ ca vyāptaṁ ca śvāsa.tṛḍ.bhramaiḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS3.12.035v/ 12.35av vardhate tad adho nābher 12.35dv vyāptaṁ ca śvāsa.tṛḍ.jvaraiḥ]
AHS3.12.036a/ chidrodaram idaṁ prāhuḥ parisrāvīti cāpare |
AHS3.12.036c/ pravṛtta.sneha.pānādeḥ sahasāmāmbu.pāyinaḥ || 36 ||
AHS3.12.037a/ aty.ambu.pānān mandāgneḥ kṣīṇasyāti.kṛśasya vā |
AHS3.12.037c/ ruddhvāmbu.mārgān anilaḥ kaphaś ca jala.mūrchitaḥ || 37 ||
AHS3.12.038a/ vardhayetāṁ tad evāmbu tat.sthānād udarāśritau |
AHS3.12.038c/ tataḥ syād udaraṁ tṛṣṇā.guda.sruti.rujānvitam || 38 || [Note: AHS3.12.038v/ 12.38dv .guda.sruti.rujā.yutam]
AHS3.12.039a/ kāsa.śvāsā.ruci.yutaṁ nānā.varṇa.sirā.tatam |
AHS3.12.039c/ toya.pūrṇa.dṛti.sparśa.śabda.prakṣobha.vepathu || 39 || [Note: AHS3.12.039v/ 12.39bv nānā.varṇa.sirānvitam 12.39bv nānā.varṇa.sirācitam 12.39bv nānā.varṇa.sirāvṛtam]
AHS3.12.040a/ dakodaraṁ mahat snigdhaṁ sthiram āvṛtta.nābhi tat |
AHS3.12.040c/ upekṣayā ca sarveṣu doṣāḥ sva.sthānataś cyutāḥ || 40 ||
AHS3.12.041a/ pākād dravā dravī.kuryuḥ sandhi.sroto.mukhāny api |
AHS3.12.041c/ svedaś ca bāhya.srotaḥsu vihatas tiryag.āsthitaḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS3.12.041v/ 12.41av pākād dravād dravī.kuryuḥ]
[Page 282 ]
AHS3.12.042a/ tad evodakam āpyāyya picchāṁ kuryāt tadā bhavet |
AHS3.12.042c/ gurūdaraṁ sthiraṁ vṛttam āhataṁ ca na śabda.vat || 42 ||
AHS3.12.043a/ mṛdu vyapeta.rājīkaṁ nābhyāṁ spṛṣṭaṁ ca sarpati |
AHS3.12.043c/ tad anūdaka.janmāsmin kukṣi.vṛddhis tato 'dhikam || 43 ||
AHS3.12.044a/ sirāntardhānam udaka.jaṭharoktaṁ ca lakṣaṇam |
AHS3.12.044c/ vāta.pitta.kapha.plīha.sannipātodakodaram || 44 ||
AHS3.12.045a/ kṛcchraṁ yathottaraṁ pakṣāt paraṁ prāyo 'pare hataḥ |
AHS3.12.045c/ sarvaṁ ca jāta.salilaṁ riṣṭoktopadravānvitam || 45 ||
AHS3.12.046a/ janmanaivodaraṁ sarvaṁ prāyaḥ kṛcchra.tamaṁ matam |
AHS3.12.046c/ balinas tad a.jātāmbu yatna.sādhyaṁ navotthitam || 46 ||

3.13. Chapter 13 :: Athapāṇḍuśophavisarpanidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 289-294]
AHS3.13.001a/ pitta.pradhānāḥ kupitā yathoktaiḥ kopanair malāḥ |
AHS3.13.001c/ tatrānilena balinā kṣiptaṁ pittaṁ hṛdi sthitam || 1 ||
AHS3.13.002a/ dhamanīr daśa samprāpya vyāpnuvat sakalāṁ tanum |
AHS3.13.002c/ śleṣma.tvag.rakta.māṁsāni pradūṣyāntaram āśritam || 2 ||
AHS3.13.003a/ tvaṅ.māṁsayos tat kurute tvaci varṇān pṛthag.vidhān |
AHS3.13.003c/ pāṇḍu.hāridra.haritān pāṇḍu.tvaṁ teṣu cādhikam || 3 ||
AHS3.13.004a/ yato 'taḥ pāṇḍur ity uktaḥ sa rogas tena gauravam |
AHS3.13.004c/ dhātūnāṁ syāc ca śaithilyam ojasaś ca guṇa.kṣayaḥ || 4 ||
AHS3.13.005a/ tato 'lpa.rakta.medasko niḥ.sāraḥ syāc chlathendriyaḥ |
AHS3.13.005c/ mṛdyamānair ivāṅgair nā dravatā hṛdayena ca || 5 || [Note: AHS3.13.005v/ 13.5bv niḥ.sāraḥ śithilendriyaḥ 13.5dv dravatā hṛdayena vā]
[Page 283 ]
AHS3.13.006a/ śūnākṣi.kūṭaḥ sadanaḥ kopanaḥ ṣṭhīvano 'lpa.vāk |
AHS3.13.006c/ anna.dviṭ śiśira.dveṣī śīrṇa.romā hatānalaḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS3.13.006v/ 13.6av śūnākṣi.kūṭa.vadanaḥ 13.6bv kopanaḥ svedano 'lpa.vāk 13.6bv kopanaḥ sadano 'lpa.vāk]
AHS3.13.007a/ sanna.saktho jvarī śvāsī karṇa.kṣveḍī bhramī śramī |
AHS3.13.007c/ sa pañca.dhā pṛthag doṣaiḥ samastair mṛttikādanāt || 7 || [Note: AHS3.13.007v/ 13.7av sanna.sakthī jvarī śvāsī]
AHS3.13.008a/ prāg.rūpam asya hṛdaya.spandanaṁ rūkṣa.tā tvaci |
AHS3.13.008c/ a.ruciḥ pīta.mūtra.tvaṁ svedā.bhāvo 'lpa.vahni.tā || 8 ||
AHS3.13.009a/ sādaḥ śramo 'nilāt tatra gātra.ruk.toda.kampanam |
AHS3.13.009c/ kṛṣṇa.rūkṣāruṇa.sirā.nakha.viṇ.mūtra.netra.tā || 9 ||
AHS3.13.010a/ śophānāhāsya.vairasya.viṭ.śoṣāḥ pārśva.mūrdha.ruk |
AHS3.13.010c/ pittād dharita.pītābha.sirādi.tvaṁ jvaras tamaḥ || 10 ||
AHS3.13.011a/ tṛṭ.sveda.mūrchā.śītecchā daurgandhyaṁ kaṭu.vaktra.tā |
AHS3.13.011c/ varco.bhedo 'mlako dāhaḥ kaphāc chukla.sirādi.tā || 11 ||
AHS3.13.012a/ tandrā lavaṇa.vaktra.tvaṁ roma.harṣaḥ svara.kṣayaḥ |
AHS3.13.012c/ kāsaś chardiś ca nicayān miśra.liṅgo 'ti.duḥ.sahaḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS3.13.012v/ 13.12bv harṣo romṇāṁ svara.kṣayaḥ]
AHS3.13.013a/ mṛt kaṣāyānilaṁ pittam ūṣarā madhurā kapham |
AHS3.13.013c/ dūṣayitvā rasādīṁś ca raukṣyād bhuktaṁ virūkṣya ca || 13 ||
AHS3.13.014a/ srotāṁsy a.pakvaivāpūrya kuryād ruddhvā ca pūrva.vat |
AHS3.13.014c/ pāṇḍu.rogaṁ tataḥ śūna.nābhi.pādāsya.mehanaḥ || 14 ||
AHS3.13.015a/ purīṣaṁ kṛmi.man muñced bhinnaṁ sāsṛk kaphaṁ naraḥ |
AHS3.13.015c/ yaḥ pāṇḍu.rogī seveta pittalaṁ tasya kāmalām || 15 ||
[Page 284 ]
AHS3.13.016a/ koṣṭha.śākhāśrayāṁ pittaṁ dagdhvāsṛṅ.māṁsam āvahet |
AHS3.13.016c/ hāridra.netra.mūtra.tvaṅ.nakha.vaktra.śakṛt.tayā || 16 || [Note: AHS3.13.016v/ 13.16av koṣṭha.śākhāśrayaṁ pittaṁ]
AHS3.13.017a/ dāhā.vipāka.tṛṣṇā.vān bhekābho dur.balendriyaḥ |
AHS3.13.017c/ bhavet pittolbaṇasyāsau pāṇḍu.rogād ṛte 'pi ca || 17 ||
AHS3.13.018a/ upekṣayā ca śophāḍhyā sā kṛcchrā kumbha.kāmalā |
AHS3.13.018c/ harita.śyāva.pīta.tvaṁ pāṇḍu.roge yadā bhavet || 18 ||
AHS3.13.019a/ vāta.pittād bhramas tṛṣṇā strīṣv a.harṣo mṛdur jvaraḥ |
AHS3.13.019c/ tandrā balānala.bhraṁśo loḍharaṁ taṁ halīmakam || 19 ||
AHS3.13.020a/ alasaṁ ceti śaṁsanti teṣāṁ pūrvam upadravāḥ |
AHS3.13.020c/ śopha.pradhānāḥ kathitāḥ sa evāto nigadyate || 20 ||
AHS3.13.021a/ pitta.rakta.kaphān vāyur duṣṭo duṣṭān bahiḥ.sirāḥ |
AHS3.13.021c/ nītvā ruddha.gatis tair hi kuryāt tvaṅ.māṁsa.saṁśrayam || 21 ||
AHS3.13.022a/ utsedhaṁ saṁhataṁ śophaṁ tam āhur nicayād ataḥ |
AHS3.13.022c/ sarvaṁ hetu.viśeṣais tu rūpa.bhedān navātmakam || 22 ||
AHS3.13.023a/ doṣaiḥ pṛthag dvayaiḥ sarvair abhighātād viṣād api |
AHS3.13.023c/ dvi.dhā vā nijam āgantuṁ sarvāṅgaikāṅga.jaṁ ca tam || 23 ||
AHS3.13.024a/ pṛthūnnata.grathita.tā.viśeṣaiś ca tri.dhā viduḥ |
AHS3.13.024c/ sāmānya.hetuḥ śophānāṁ doṣa.jānāṁ viśeṣataḥ || 24 ||
AHS3.13.025a/ vyādhi.karmopavāsādi.kṣīṇasya bhajato drutam |
AHS3.13.025c/ ati.mātram athānyasya gurv.amla.snigdha.śītalam || 25 || [Note: AHS3.13.025v/ 13.25bv .kṣīṇasya bhajato dravam 13.25cv ati.mātram athānnaṁ ca]
[Page 285 ]
AHS3.13.026a/ lavaṇa.kṣāra.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.śākāmbu svapna.jāgaram |
AHS3.13.026c/ mṛd.grāmya.māṁsa.vallūram a.jīrṇa.śrama.maithunam || 26 ||
AHS3.13.027a/ padāter mārga.gamanaṁ yānena kṣobhiṇāpi vā |
AHS3.13.027c/ śvāsa.kāsātisārārśo.jaṭhara.pradara.jvarāḥ || 27 ||
AHS3.13.028a/ viṣūcy.alasaka.cchardi.garbha.visarpa.pāṇḍavaḥ |
AHS3.13.028c/ anye ca mithyopakrāntās tair doṣā vakṣasi sthitāḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS3.13.028v/ 13.28bv .garbha.visarpa.pāṇḍu.tā]
AHS3.13.029a/ ūrdhvaṁ śopham adho vastau madhye kurvanti madhya.gāḥ |
AHS3.13.029c/ sarvāṅga.gāḥ sarva.gataṁ pratyaṅgeṣu tad.āśrayāḥ || 29 ||
AHS3.13.030a/ tat.pūrva.rūpaṁ davathuḥ sirāyāmo 'ṅga.gauravam |
AHS3.13.030c/ vātāc chophaś calo rūkṣaḥ khara.romāruṇāsitaḥ || 30 ||
AHS3.13.031a/ saṅkoca.spanda.harṣārti.toda.bheda.prasupti.mān |
AHS3.13.031c/ kṣiprotthāna.śamaḥ śīghram unnamet pīḍitas tanuḥ || 31 ||
AHS3.13.032a/ snigdhoṣṇa.mardanaiḥ śāmyed rātrāv alpo divā mahān |
AHS3.13.032c/ tvak ca sarṣapa.lipteva tasmiṁś cimicimāyate || 32 ||
AHS3.13.033a/ pīta.raktāsitābhāsaḥ pittād ā.tāmra.roma.kṛt |
AHS3.13.033c/ śīghrānusāra.praśamo madhye prāg jāyate tanuḥ || 33 ||
AHS3.13.034a/ sa.tṛḍ.dāha.jvara.sveda.dava.kleda.mada.bhramaḥ |
AHS3.13.034c/ śītābhilāṣī viḍ.bhedī gandhī sparśā.saho mṛduḥ || 34 ||
AHS3.13.035a/ kaṇḍū.mān pāṇḍu.roma.tvak kaṭhinaḥ śītalo guruḥ |
AHS3.13.035c/ snigdhaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ sthiraḥ styāno nidrā.chardy.agni.sāda.kṛt || 35 ||
[Page 286 ]
AHS3.13.036a/ ākrānto nonnamet kṛcchra.śama.janmā niśā.balaḥ |
AHS3.13.036c/ sraven nāsṛk cirāt picchāṁ kuśa.śastrādi.vikṣataḥ || 36 ||
AHS3.13.037a/ sparśoṣṇa.kāṅkṣī ca kaphād yathā.svaṁ dvandva.jās trayaḥ |
AHS3.13.037c/ saṅkarād dhetu.liṅgānāṁ nicayān nicayātmakaḥ || 37 ||
AHS3.13.038a/ abhighātena śastrādi.ccheda.bheda.kṣatādibhiḥ |
AHS3.13.038c/ himāniloda.dhy.anilair bhallāta.kapikacchu.jaiḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS3.13.038v/ 13.38cv himānaloda.dhy.anilair]
AHS3.13.039a/ rasaiḥ śūkaiś ca saṁsparśāc chvayathuḥ syād visarpa.vān |
AHS3.13.039c/ bhṛśoṣmā lohitābhāsaḥ prāya.śaḥ pitta.lakṣaṇaḥ || 39 ||
AHS3.13.040a/ viṣa.jaḥ sa.viṣa.prāṇi.parisarpaṇa.mūtraṇāt |
AHS3.13.040c/ daṁṣṭrā.danta.nakhāpātād a.viṣa.prāṇinām api || 40 || [Note: AHS3.13.040v/ 13.40cv daṁṣṭrā.danta.nakhāghātād]
AHS3.13.041a/ viṇ.mūtra.śukropahata.mala.vad.vastra.saṅkarāt |
AHS3.13.041c/ viṣa.vṛkṣānila.sparśād gara.yogāvacūrṇanāt || 41 || [Note: AHS3.13.041v/ 13.41bv .mala.vad.vastra.dhāraṇāt]
AHS3.13.042a/ mṛduś calo 'valambī ca śīghro dāha.rujā.karaḥ |
AHS3.13.042c/ navo 'n.upadravaḥ śophaḥ sādhyo '.sādhyaḥ pureritaḥ || 42 ||
AHS3.13.043a/ syād visarpo 'bhighātāntair doṣair dūṣyaiś ca śopha.vat |
AHS3.13.043c/ try.adhiṣṭhānaṁ ca taṁ prāhur bāhyāntar.ubhayāśrayāt || 43 ||
AHS3.13.044a/ yathottaraṁ ca duḥ.sādhyās tatra doṣā yathā.yatham |
AHS3.13.044c/ prakopaṇaiḥ prakupitā viśeṣeṇa vidāhibhiḥ || 44 ||
AHS3.13.045a/ dehe śīghraṁ visarpanti te 'ntar antaḥ.sthitā bahiḥ |
AHS3.13.045c/ bahiḥ.sthā dvitaye dvi.sthā vidyāt tatrāntar.āśrayam || 45 ||
[Page 287 ]
AHS3.13.046a/ marmopatāpāt sammohād ayanānāṁ vighaṭṭanāt |
AHS3.13.046c/ tṛṣṇāti.yogād vegānāṁ viṣamaṁ ca pravartanāt || 46 || [Note: AHS3.13.046v/ 13.46av marmopaghātāt sammohād 13.46dv viṣamāc ca pravartanāt]
AHS3.13.047a/ āśu cāgni.bala.bhraṁśād ato bāhyaṁ viparyayāt |
AHS3.13.047c/ tatra vātāt parīsarpo vāta.jvara.sama.vyathaḥ || 47 ||
AHS3.13.048a/ śopha.sphuraṇa.nistoda.bhedāyāmārti.harṣa.vān |
AHS3.13.048c/ pittād druta.gatiḥ pitta.jvara.liṅgo 'ti.lohitaḥ || 48 ||
AHS3.13.049a/ kaphāt kaṇḍū.yutaḥ snigdhaḥ kapha.jvara.samāna.ruk |
AHS3.13.049c/ sva.doṣa.liṅgaiś cīyante sarve sphoṭair upekṣitāḥ || 49 ||
AHS3.13.050a/ te pakva.bhinnāḥ svaṁ svaṁ ca bibhrati vraṇa.lakṣaṇam |
AHS3.13.050c/ vāta.pittāj jvara.cchardi.mūrchātīsāra.tṛḍ.bhramaiḥ || 50 ||
AHS3.13.051a/ asthi.bhedāgni.sadana.tamakā.rocakair yutaḥ |
AHS3.13.051c/ karoti sarvam aṅgaṁ ca dīptāṅgārāvakīrṇa.vat || 51 ||
AHS3.13.052a/ yaṁ yaṁ deśaṁ visarpaś ca visarpati bhavet sa saḥ |
AHS3.13.052c/ śāntāṅgārāsito nīlo rakto vāśu ca cīyate || 52 ||
AHS3.13.053a/ agni.dagdha iva sphoṭaiḥ śīghra.ga.tvād drutaṁ ca saḥ |
AHS3.13.053c/ marmānusārī vīsarpaḥ syād vāto 'ti.balas tataḥ || 53 ||
AHS3.13.054a/ vyathetāṅgaṁ haret sañjñāṁ nidrāṁ ca śvāsam īrayet |
AHS3.13.054c/ hidhmāṁ ca sa gato 'vasthām īdṛśīṁ labhate na nā || 54 ||
AHS3.13.055a/ kva.cic charmā.rati.grasto bhūmi.śayyāsanādiṣu |
AHS3.13.055c/ ceṣṭamānas tataḥ kliṣṭo mano.deha.śramodbhavām || 55 ||
[Page 288 ]
AHS3.13.056a/ duṣ.prabodho 'śnute nidrāṁ so 'gni.visarpa ucyate |
AHS3.13.056c/ kaphena ruddhaḥ pavano bhittvā taṁ bahu.dhā kapham || 56 ||
AHS3.13.057a/ raktaṁ vā vṛddha.raktasya tvak.sirā.snāva.māṁsa.gam |
AHS3.13.057c/ dūṣayitvā ca dīrghāṇu.vṛtta.sthūla.kharātmanām || 57 ||
AHS3.13.058a/ granthīnāṁ kurute mālāṁ raktānāṁ tīvra.rug.jvarām |
AHS3.13.058c/ śvāsa.kāsātisārāsya.śoṣa.hidhmā.vami.bhramaiḥ || 58 ||
AHS3.13.059a/ moha.vaivarṇya.mūrchāṅga.bhaṅgāgni.sadanair yutām |
AHS3.13.059c/ ity ayaṁ granthi.vīsarpaḥ kapha.māruta.kopa.jaḥ || 59 ||
AHS3.13.060a/ kapha.pittāj jvaraḥ stambho nidrā.tandrā.śiro.rujaḥ |
AHS3.13.060c/ aṅgāvasāda.vikṣepa.pralāpā.rocaka.bhramāḥ || 60 ||
AHS3.13.061a/ mūrchāgni.hānir bhedo 'sthnāṁ pipāsendriya.gauravam |
AHS3.13.061c/ āmopaveśanaṁ lepaḥ srotasāṁ sa ca sarpati || 61 ||
AHS3.13.062a/ prāyeṇāmāśaye gṛhṇann eka.deśaṁ na cāti.ruk |
AHS3.13.062c/ piṭikair avakīrṇo 'ti.pīta.lohita.pāṇḍuraiḥ || 62 ||
AHS3.13.063a/ mecakābho 'sitaḥ snigdho malinaḥ śopha.vān guruḥ |
AHS3.13.063c/ gambhīra.pākaḥ prājyoṣmā spṛṣṭaḥ klinno 'vadīryate || 63 || [Note: AHS3.13.063v/ 13.63av mecakābho 'sita.snigdho]
AHS3.13.064a/ paṅka.vac.chīrṇa.māṁsaś ca spaṣṭa.snāyu.sirā.gaṇaḥ |
AHS3.13.064c/ śava.gandhiś ca vīsarpaṁ kardamākhyam uśanti tam || 64 ||
AHS3.13.065a/ sarva.jo lakṣaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ sarva.dhātv.atisarpaṇaḥ |
AHS3.13.065c/ bāhya.hetoḥ kṣatāt kruddhaḥ sa.raktaṁ pittam īrayan || 65 || [Note: AHS3.13.065v/ 13.65bv sarva.dhātv.abhisarpaṇaḥ]
[Page 289 ]
AHS3.13.066a/ visarpaṁ mārutaḥ kuryāt kulattha.sadṛśaiś citam |
AHS3.13.066c/ sphoṭaiḥ śopha.jvara.rujā.dāhāḍhyaṁ śyāva.lohitam || 66 ||
AHS3.13.067a/ pṛthag doṣais trayaḥ sādhyā dvandva.jāś cān.upadravāḥ |
AHS3.13.067c/ a.sādhyau kṣata.sarvotthau sarve cākrānta.marmakāḥ || 67 ||
AHS3.13.067ū̆ab/ śīrṇa.snāyu.sirā.māṁsāḥ praklinnāḥ śava.gandhayaḥ || 67ū̆ab ||

3.14. Chapter 14 :: Athakuṣṭhanidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 294-298]
AHS3.14.001a/ mithyāhāra.vihāreṇa viśeṣeṇa virodhinā |
AHS3.14.001c/ sādhu.nindā.vadhānya.sva.haraṇādyaiś ca sevitaiḥ || 1 ||
AHS3.14.002a/ pāpmabhiḥ karmabhiḥ sadyaḥ prāktanair veritā malāḥ |
AHS3.14.002c/ sirāḥ prapadya tiryag.gās tvag.lasīkāsṛg.āmiṣam || 2 || [Note: AHS3.14.002v/ 14.2bv prāktanaiḥ preritā malāḥ]
AHS3.14.003a/ dūṣayanti ślathī.kṛtya niścarantas tato bahiḥ |
AHS3.14.003c/ tvacaḥ kurvanti vaivarṇyaṁ duṣṭāḥ kuṣṭham uśanti tat || 3 || [Note: AHS3.14.003v/ 14.3av dūṣayantaḥ ślathī.kṛtya]
AHS3.14.004a/ kālenopekṣitaṁ yasmāt sarvaṁ kuṣṇāti tad vapuḥ |
AHS3.14.004c/ prapadya dhātūn vyāpyāntaḥ sarvān saṅkledya cāvahet || 4 ||
AHS3.14.005a/ sa.sveda.kleda.saṅkothān kṛmīn sūkṣmān su.dāruṇān |
AHS3.14.005c/ roma.tvak.snāyu.dhamanī.taruṇāsthīni yaiḥ kramāt || 5 ||
AHS3.14.006a/ bhakṣayec chvitram asmāc ca kuṣṭha.bāhyam udāhṛtam |
AHS3.14.006c/ kuṣṭhāni sapta.dhā doṣaiḥ pṛthaṅ miśraiḥ samāgataiḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS3.14.006v/ 14.6dv pṛthag dvandvaiḥ samāgataiḥ]
AHS3.14.007a/ sarveṣv api tri.doṣeṣu vyapadeśo 'dhika.tvataḥ |
AHS3.14.007c/ vātena kuṣṭhaṁ kāpālaṁ pittād audumbaraṁ kaphāt || 7 ||
[Page 290 ]
AHS3.14.008a/ maṇḍalākhyaṁ vicarcī ca ṛkṣākhyaṁ vāta.pitta.jam |
AHS3.14.008c/ carmaika.kuṣṭha.kiṭibha.sidhmālasa.vipādikāḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS3.14.008v/ 14.8bv ṛkṣākṣaṁ vāta.pitta.jam]
AHS3.14.009a/ vāta.śleṣmodbhavāḥ śleṣma.pittād dadrū.śatāruṣī |
AHS3.14.009c/ puṇḍarīkaṁ sa.visphoṭaṁ pāmā carma.dalaṁ tathā || 9 ||
AHS3.14.010a/ sarvaiḥ syāt kākaṇaṁ pūrvaṁ trikaṁ dadru sa.kākaṇam |
AHS3.14.010c/ puṇḍarīkarkṣa.jihve ca mahā.kuṣṭhāni sapta tu || 10 || [Note: AHS3.14.010v/ 14.10bv trikaṁ dadrūḥ sa.kākaṇā 14.10cv puṇḍarīkarśya.jihve ca]
AHS3.14.011a/ ati.ślakṣṇa.khara.sparśa.khedā.sveda.vi.varṇa.tāḥ |
AHS3.14.011c/ dāhaḥ kaṇḍūs tvaci svāpas todaḥ koṭhonnatiḥ śramaḥ || 11 ||
AHS3.14.012a/ vraṇānām adhikaṁ śūlaṁ śīghrotpattiś cira.sthitiḥ |
AHS3.14.012c/ rūḍhānām api rūkṣa.tvaṁ nimitte 'lpe 'pi kopanam || 12 ||
AHS3.14.013a/ roma.harṣo 'sṛjaḥ kārṣṇyam kuṣṭha.lakṣaṇam agra.jam |
AHS3.14.013c/ kṛṣṇāruṇa.kapālābhaṁ rūkṣaṁ suptaṁ kharaṁ tanu || 13 ||
AHS3.14.014a/ vistṛtā.sama.pary.antaṁ hṛṣitair romabhiś citam |
AHS3.14.014c/ todāḍhyam alpa.kaṇḍūkaṁ kāpālaṁ śīghra.sarpi ca || 14 || [Note: AHS3.14.014v/ 14.14bv dūṣitair romabhiś citam]
AHS3.14.015a/ pakvodumbara.tāmra.tvag.roma gaura.sirā.citam |
AHS3.14.015c/ bahalaṁ bahala.kleda.raktaṁ dāha.rujādhikam || 15 || [Note: AHS3.14.015v/ 14.15bv .roma gaura.sirā.tatam 14.15cv bahulaṁ bahula.kleda.]
AHS3.14.016a/ āśūtthānāvadaraṇa.kṛmi vidyād udumbaram |
AHS3.14.016c/ sthiraṁ styānaṁ guru snigdhaṁ śveta.raktam an.āśu.gam || 16 ||
AHS3.14.017a/ anyo.'nya.saktam utsannaṁ bahu.kaṇḍū.sruti.krimi |
AHS3.14.017c/ ślakṣṇa.pītābha.pary.antaṁ maṇḍalaṁ parimaṇḍalam || 17 || [Note: AHS3.14.017v/ 14.17av anyo.'nya.saktam ucchūnaṁ 14.17av anyo.'nya.saktam utsaṅgaṁ]
[Page 291 ]
AHS3.14.018a/ sa.kaṇḍū.piṭikā śyāvā lasīkāḍhyā vicarcikā |
AHS3.14.018c/ paruṣaṁ tanu raktāntam antaḥ.śyāvaṁ samunnatam || 18 ||
AHS3.14.019a/ sa.toda.dāha.ruk.kledaṁ karkaśaiḥ piṭikaiś citam |
AHS3.14.019c/ ṛkṣa.jihvākṛti proktam ṛkṣa.jihvaṁ bahu.krimi || 19 || [Note: AHS3.14.019v/ 14.19cv ṛśya.jihvākṛti proktam 14.19dv ṛśya.jihvaṁ bahu.krimi]
AHS3.14.020a/ hasti.carma.khara.sparśaṁ carmaikākhyaṁ mahāśrayam |
AHS3.14.020c/ a.svedaṁ matsya.śakala.sannibhaṁ kiṭibhaṁ punaḥ || 20 ||
AHS3.14.021a/ rūkṣaṁ kiṇa.khara.sparśaṁ kaṇḍū.mat paruṣāsitam |
AHS3.14.021c/ sidhmaṁ rūkṣaṁ bahiḥ snigdham antar ghṛṣṭaṁ rajaḥ kiret || 21 ||
AHS3.14.022a/ ślakṣṇa.sparśaṁ tanu śveta.tāmraṁ daugdhika.puṣpa.vat |
AHS3.14.022c/ prāyeṇa cordhva.kāye syād gaṇḍaiḥ kaṇḍū.yutaiś citam || 22 ||
AHS3.14.023a/ raktair alasakaṁ pāṇi.pāda.dāryo vipādikāḥ |
AHS3.14.023c/ tīvrārtyo manda.kaṇḍvaś ca sa.rāga.piṭikācitāḥ || 23 ||
AHS3.14.024a/ dīrgha.pratānā dūrvā.vad atasī.kusuma.cchaviḥ |
AHS3.14.024c/ utsanna.maṇḍalā dadrūḥ kaṇḍū.maty anuṣaṅgiṇī || 24 ||
AHS3.14.025a/ sthūla.mūlaṁ sa.dāhārti rakta.śyāvaṁ bahu.vraṇam |
AHS3.14.025c/ śatāruḥ kleda.jantv.āḍhyaṁ prāya.śaḥ parva.janma ca || 25 ||
AHS3.14.026a/ raktāntam antarā pāṇḍu kaṇḍū.dāha.rujānvitam |
AHS3.14.026c/ sotsedham ācitaṁ raktaiḥ padma.pattram ivāṁśubhiḥ || 26 ||
AHS3.14.027a/ ghana.bhūri.lasīkāsṛk.prāyam āśu vibhedi ca |
AHS3.14.027c/ puṇḍarīkaṁ tanu.tvagbhiś citaṁ sphoṭaiḥ sitāruṇaiḥ || 27 ||
[Page 292 ]
AHS3.14.028a/ visphoṭaṁ piṭikāḥ pāmā kaṇḍū.kleda.rujādhikāḥ |
AHS3.14.028c/ sūkṣmāḥ śyāvāruṇā bahvyaḥ prāyaḥ sphik.pāṇi.kūrpare || 28 ||
AHS3.14.029a/ sa.sphoṭam a.sparśa.sahaṁ kaṇḍūṣā.toda.dāha.vat |
AHS3.14.029c/ raktaṁ dalac carma.dalaṁ kākaṇaṁ tīvra.dāha.ruk || 29 ||
AHS3.14.030a/ pūrvaṁ raktaṁ ca kṛṣṇaṁ ca kākaṇantī.phalopamam |
AHS3.14.030c/ kuṣṭha.liṅgair yutaṁ sarvair naika.varṇaṁ tato bhavet || 30 ||
AHS3.14.031a/ doṣa.bhedīya.vihitair ādiśel liṅga.karmabhiḥ |
AHS3.14.031c/ kuṣṭheṣu doṣolbaṇa.tāṁ sarva.doṣolbaṇaṁ tyajet || 31 ||
AHS3.14.032a/ riṣṭoktaṁ yac ca yac cāsthi.majja.śukra.samāśrayam |
AHS3.14.032c/ yāpyaṁ medo.gataṁ kṛcchraṁ pitta.dvandvāsra.māṁsa.gam || 32 ||
AHS3.14.033a/ a.kṛcchraṁ kapha.vātāḍhyaṁ tvak.stham eka.malaṁ ca yat |
AHS3.14.033c/ tatra tvaci sthite kuṣṭhe toda.vaivarṇya.rūkṣa.tāḥ || 33 ||
AHS3.14.034a/ sveda.svāpa.śvayathavaḥ śoṇite piśite punaḥ |
AHS3.14.034c/ pāṇi.pādāśritāḥ sphoṭāḥ kledaḥ sandhiṣu cādhikam || 34 ||
AHS3.14.035a/ kauṇyaṁ gati.kṣayo 'ṅgānāṁ dalanaṁ syāc ca medasi |
AHS3.14.035c/ nāsā.bhaṅgo 'sthi.majja.sthe netra.rāgaḥ svara.kṣayaḥ || 35 ||
AHS3.14.036a/ kṣate ca kṛmayaḥ śukre sva.dārāpatya.bādhanam |
