AHS3.14.036c/ yathā.pūrvaṁ ca sarvāṇi syur liṅgāny asṛg.ādiṣu || 36 || [Note: AHS3.14.036v/ 14.36bv sva.dārāpatya.dhāvanam]
AHS3.14.037a/ kuṣṭhaika.sambhavaṁ śvitraṁ kilāsaṁ dāruṇaṁ ca tat |
AHS3.14.037c/ nirdiṣṭam a.parisrāvi tri.dhātūdbhava.saṁśrayam || 37 || [Note: AHS3.14.037v/ 14.37bv kilāsaṁ cāruṇaṁ ca tat]
[Page 293 ]
AHS3.14.038a/ vātād rūkṣāruṇaṁ pittāt tāmraṁ kamala.pattra.vat |
AHS3.14.038c/ sa.dāhaṁ roma.vidhvaṁsi kaphāc chvetaṁ ghanaṁ guru || 38 ||
AHS3.14.039a/ sa.kaṇḍu ca kramād rakta.māṁsa.medaḥsu cādiśet |
AHS3.14.039c/ varṇenaivedṛg ubhayaṁ kṛcchraṁ tac cottarottaram || 39 ||
AHS3.14.040a/ a.śukla.romā.bahalam a.saṁsṛṣṭaṁ mitho navam |
AHS3.14.040c/ an.agni.dagdha.jaṁ sādhyaṁ śvitraṁ varjyam ato 'nya.thā || 40 || [Note: AHS3.14.040v/ 14.40av a.śukla.romā.bahulam 14.40bv a.saṁsṛṣṭam atho navam]
AHS3.14.041a/ guhya.pāṇi.talauṣṭheṣu jātam apy a.ciran.tanam |
AHS3.14.041c/ sparśaikāhāra.śayyādi.sevanāt prāya.śo gadāḥ || 41 ||
AHS3.14.042a/ sarve sañcāriṇo netra.tvag.vikārā viśeṣataḥ |
AHS3.14.042c/ kṛmayas tu dvi.dhā proktā bāhyābhyantara.bhedataḥ || 42 ||
AHS3.14.043a/ bahir.mala.kaphāsṛg.viḍ.janma.bhedāc catur.vidhāḥ |
AHS3.14.043c/ nāmato viṁśati.vidhā bāhyās tatrā.mṛjodbhavāḥ || 43 || [Note: AHS3.14.043v/ 14.43dv bāhyās tatra malodbhavāḥ 14.43dv bāhyās tatrāsṛg.udbhavāḥ]
AHS3.14.044a/ tila.pramāṇa.saṁsthāna.varṇāḥ keśāmbarāśrayāḥ |
AHS3.14.044c/ bahu.pādāś ca sūkṣmāś ca yūkā likṣāś ca nāmataḥ || 44 ||
AHS3.14.045a/ dvi.dhā te koṭha.piṭikā.kaṇḍū.gaṇḍān prakurvate |
AHS3.14.045c/ kuṣṭhaika.hetavo 'ntar.jāḥ śleṣma.jās teṣu cādhikam || 45 ||
AHS3.14.046a/ madhurānna.guḍa.kṣīra.dadhi.saktu.navaudanaiḥ |
AHS3.14.046c/ śakṛj.jā bahu.viḍ.dhānya.parṇa.śākolakādibhiḥ || 46 || [Note: AHS3.14.046v/ 14.46av madhurāmla.guḍa.kṣīra. 14.46dv .parṇa.śākaukulādibhiḥ]
AHS3.14.047a/ kaphād āmāśaye jātā vṛddhāḥ sarpanti sarvataḥ |
AHS3.14.047c/ pṛthu.bradhna.nibhāḥ ke.cit ke.cid gaṇḍū.padopamāḥ || 47 ||
[Page 294 ]
AHS3.14.048a/ rūḍha.dhānyāṅkurākārās tanu.dīrghās tathāṇavaḥ |
AHS3.14.048c/ śvetās tāmrāvabhāsāś ca nāmataḥ sapta.dhā tu te || 48 ||
AHS3.14.049a/ antrādā udarāveṣṭā hṛdayādā mahā.kuhāḥ |
AHS3.14.049c/ kuravo darbha.kusumāḥ su.gandhās te ca kurvate || 49 || [Note: AHS3.14.049v/ 14.49av antrādā udarāviṣṭā 14.49bv hṛdayādā mahā.ruhāḥ 14.49cv curavo darbha.kusumāḥ]
AHS3.14.050a/ hṛl.lāsam āsya.sravaṇam a.vipākam a.rocakam |
AHS3.14.050c/ mūrchā.chardi.jvarānāha.kārśya.kṣavathu.pīnasān || 50 ||
AHS3.14.051a/ rakta.vāhi.sirotthānā rakta.jā jantavo 'ṇavaḥ |
AHS3.14.051c/ a.pādā vṛtta.tāmrāś ca saukṣmyāt ke.cid a.darśanāḥ || 51 || [Note: AHS3.14.051v/ 14.51av rakta.vāhi.sirā.sthānād 14.51av rakta.vāhi.sirā.sthānā]
AHS3.14.052a/ keśādā roma.vidhvaṁsā roma.dvīpā udumbarāḥ |
AHS3.14.052c/ ṣaṭ te kuṣṭhaika.karmāṇaḥ saha.saurasa.mātaraḥ || 52 || [Note: AHS3.14.052v/ 14.52dc saha.jā rasa.mātaraḥ]
AHS3.14.053a/ pakvāśaye purīṣotthā jāyante 'dho.visarpiṇaḥ |
AHS3.14.053c/ vṛddhāḥ santo bhaveyuś ca te yadāmāśayon.mukhāḥ || 53 || [Note: AHS3.14.053v/ 14.53cv vṛddhās te syur bhaveyuś ca]
AHS3.14.054a/ tadāsyodgāra.niḥśvāsā viḍ.gandhānuvidhāyinaḥ |
AHS3.14.054c/ pṛthu.vṛtta.tanu.sthūlāḥ śyāva.pīta.sitāsitāḥ || 54 ||
AHS3.14.055a/ te pañca nāmnā kṛmayaḥ kakeruka.makerukāḥ |
AHS3.14.055c/ sausurādāḥ sulūnākhyā lelihā janayanti ca || 55 || [Note: AHS3.14.055v/ 14.55av sausurādāḥ śalūnākhyā]
AHS3.14.056a/ viḍ.bheda.śūla.viṣṭambha.kārśya.pāruṣya.pāṇḍu.tāḥ |
AHS3.14.056c/ roma.harṣāgni.sadana.guda.kaṇḍūr vinirgamāt || 56 || [Note: AHS3.14.056v/ 14.56dv .guda.kaṇḍūr vinirgatāḥ 14.56dv .guda.kaṇḍūr vi.mārga.gāḥ]

3.15. Chapter 15 :: Athavātavyādhinidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 298-302]
AHS3.15.001a/ sarvārthān.artha.karaṇe viśvasyāsyaika.kāraṇam |
AHS3.15.001c/ a.duṣṭa.duṣṭaḥ pavanaḥ śarīrasya viśeṣataḥ || 1 ||
[Page 295 ]
AHS3.15.002a/ sa viśva.karmā viśvātmā viśva.rūpaḥ prajāpatiḥ |
AHS3.15.002c/ sraṣṭā dhātā vibhur viṣṇuḥ saṁhartā mṛtyur antakaḥ || 2 ||
AHS3.15.003a/ tad.a.duṣṭau prayatnena yatitavyam ataḥ sadā |
AHS3.15.003c/ tasyoktaṁ doṣa.vijñāne karma prākṛta.vaikṛtam || 3 ||
AHS3.15.004a/ samāsād vyāsato doṣa.bhedīye nāma dhāma ca |
AHS3.15.004c/ praty.ekaṁ pañca.dhā cāro vyāpāraś ceha vaikṛtam || 4 ||
AHS3.15.005a/ tasyocyate vibhāgena sa.nidānaṁ sa.lakṣaṇam |
AHS3.15.005c/ dhātu.kṣaya.karair vāyuḥ kupyaty ati.niṣevitaiḥ || 5 ||
AHS3.15.005.1+(1)ab/ a.saṅkhyam api saṅkhyāya yad aśītyā pureritam 5.1+(1)ab || [Note: AHS3.15.005.1+(1)v/ 15.5.1+(1)bv yathāśīty apareritam]
AHS3.15.006a/ caran srotaḥsu rikteṣu bhṛśaṁ tāny eva pūrayan |
AHS3.15.006c/ tebhyo 'nya.doṣa.pūrṇebhyaḥ prāpya vāvaraṇaṁ balī || 6 ||
AHS3.15.007a/ tatra pakvāśaye kruddhaḥ śūlānāhāntra.kūjanam |
AHS3.15.007c/ mala.rodhāśma.vardhmārśas.trika.pṛṣṭha.kaṭī.graham || 7 ||
AHS3.15.008a/ karoty adhara.kāye ca tāṁs tān kṛcchrān upadravān |
AHS3.15.008c/ āmāśaye tṛḍ.vamathu.śvāsa.kāsa.viṣūcikāḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS3.15.008v/ 15.8av karoty adhara.kāyeṣu]
AHS3.15.009a/ kaṇṭhoparodham udgārān vyādhīn ūrdhvaṁ ca nābhitaḥ |
AHS3.15.009c/ śrotrādiṣv indriya.vadhaṁ tvaci sphuṭana.rūkṣa.te || 9 ||
AHS3.15.010a/ rakte tīvrā rujaḥ svāpaṁ tāpaṁ rāgaṁ vi.varṇa.tām |
AHS3.15.010c/ arūṁṣy annasya viṣṭambham a.ruciṁ kṛśa.tāṁ bhramam || 10 || [Note: AHS3.15.010v/ 15.10cv arūṁṣy aṅgasya viṣṭambham]
[Page 296 ]
AHS3.15.011a/ māṁsa.medo.gato granthīṁs todāḍhyān karkaśāñ chramam |
AHS3.15.011c/ gurv aṅgaṁ cāti.ruk stabdhaṁ muṣṭi.daṇḍa.hatopamam || 11 || [Note: AHS3.15.011v/ 15.11bv todāḍhyān karkaśāñ chramān 15.11bv todāḍhyān karkaśān bhṛśam]
AHS3.15.012a/ asthi.sthaḥ sakthi.sandhy.asthi.śūlaṁ tīvraṁ bala.kṣayam |
AHS3.15.012c/ majja.stho 'sthiṣu sauṣiryam a.svapnaṁ santatāṁ rujam || 12 || [Note: AHS3.15.012v/ 15.12dv a.svapnaṁ stabdha.tāṁ rujam]
AHS3.15.013a/ śukrasya śīghram utsargaṁ saṅgaṁ vikṛtim eva vā |
AHS3.15.013c/ tad.vad garbhasya śukra.sthaḥ sirāsv ādhmāna.rikta.te || 13 ||
AHS3.15.014a/ tat.sthaḥ snāva.sthitaḥ kuryād gṛdhrasy.āyāma.kubja.tāḥ |
AHS3.15.014c/ vāta.pūrṇa.dṛti.sparśaṁ śophaṁ sandhi.gato 'nilaḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS3.15.014v/ 15.14bv gṛdhrasy.āyāma.kubja.tām]
AHS3.15.015a/ prasāraṇākuñcanayoḥ pravṛttiṁ ca sa.vedanām |
AHS3.15.015c/ sarvāṅga.saṁśrayas toda.bheda.sphuraṇa.bhañjanam || 15 ||
AHS3.15.016a/ stambhanākṣepaṇa.svāpa.sandhy.ākuñcana.kampanam |
AHS3.15.016c/ yadā tu dhamanīḥ sarvāḥ kruddho 'bhyeti muhur muhuḥ || 16 ||
AHS3.15.017a/ tadāṅgam ākṣipaty eṣa vyādhir ākṣepakaḥ smṛtaḥ |
AHS3.15.017c/ adhaḥ pratihato vāyur vrajann ūrdhvaṁ hṛd.āśritāḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS3.15.017v/ 15.17dv vrajann ūrdhvaṁ hṛd.āśrayāḥ]
AHS3.15.018a/ nāḍīḥ praviśya hṛdayaṁ śiraḥ śaṅkhau ca pīḍayan |
AHS3.15.018c/ ākṣipet parito gātraṁ dhanur.vac cāsya nāmayet || 18 || [Note: AHS3.15.018v/ 15.18bv śiraḥ śaṅkhau ca pīḍayet]
AHS3.15.019a/ kṛcchrād ucchvasiti stabdha.srasta.mīlita.dṛk tataḥ |
AHS3.15.019c/ kapota iva kūjec ca niḥ.sañjñaḥ so 'patantrakaḥ || 19 ||
AHS3.15.020a/ sa eva cāpatānākyho mukte tu marutā hṛdi |
AHS3.15.020c/ aśnuvīta muhuḥ svāsthyaṁ muhur a.svāsthyam āvṛte || 20 || [Note: AHS3.15.020v/ 15.20cv aśnuvīta iva svāsthyaṁ]
[Page 297 ]
AHS3.15.021a/ garbha.pāta.samutpannaḥ śoṇitāti.sravotthitaḥ |
AHS3.15.021c/ abhighāta.samutthaś ca duś.cikitsya.tamo hi saḥ || 21 ||
AHS3.15.022a/ manye saṁstabhya vāto 'ntar āyacchan dhamanīr yadā |
AHS3.15.022c/ vyāpnoti sakalaṁ dehaṁ jatrur āyamyate tadā || 22 || [Note: AHS3.15.022v/ 15.22bv āgacchan dhamanīr yadā]
AHS3.15.023a/ antar dhanur ivāṅgaṁ ca vegaiḥ stambhaṁ ca netrayoḥ |
AHS3.15.023c/ karoti jṛmbhāṁ daśanaṁ daśanānāṁ kaphodvamam || 23 ||
AHS3.15.024a/ pārśvayor vedanāṁ vākya.hanu.pṛṣṭha.śiro.graham |
AHS3.15.024c/ antar.āyāma ity eṣa bāhyāyāmaś ca tad.vidhaḥ || 24 ||
AHS3.15.025a/ dehasya bahir.āyāmāt pṛṣṭhato nīyate śiraḥ |
AHS3.15.025c/ uraś cotkṣipyate tatra kandharā cāvamṛdyate || 25 || [Note: AHS3.15.025v/ 15.25bv pṛṣṭhato hriyate śiraḥ]
AHS3.15.026a/ danteṣv āsye ca vaivarṇyaṁ prasvedaḥ srasta.gātra.tā |
AHS3.15.026c/ bāhyāyāmaṁ dhanuḥ.ṣkambhaṁ bruvate veginaṁ ca tam || 26 || [Note: AHS3.15.026v/ 15.26cv bāhyāyāmaṁ dhanuḥ.stambhaṁ]
AHS3.15.027a/ vraṇaṁ marmāśritaṁ prāpya samīraṇa.samīraṇāt |
AHS3.15.027c/ vyāyacchanti tanuṁ doṣāḥ sarvām ā.pāda.mastakam || 27 || [Note: AHS3.15.027v/ 15.27av vraṇaṁ marmāśrayaṁ prāpya]
AHS3.15.028a/ tṛṣyataḥ pāṇḍu.gātrasya vraṇāyāmaḥ sa varjitaḥ |
AHS3.15.028c/ gate vege bhavet svāsthyaṁ sarveṣv ākṣepakeṣu ca || 28 || [Note: AHS3.15.028v/ 15.28dv sarveṣv ākṣepakeṣu tu]
AHS3.15.029a/ jihvāti.lekhanāc chuṣka.bhakṣaṇād abhighātataḥ |
AHS3.15.029c/ kupito hanu.mūla.sthaḥ sraṁsayitvānilo hanū || 29 ||
AHS3.15.030a/ karoti vivṛtāsya.tvam atha.vā saṁvṛtāsya.tām |
AHS3.15.030c/ hanu.sraṁsaḥ sa tena syāt kṛcchrāc carvaṇa.bhāṣaṇam || 30 ||
[Page 298 ]
AHS3.15.031a/ vāg.vāhinī.sirā.saṁstho jihvāṁ stambhayate 'nilaḥ |
AHS3.15.031c/ jihvā.stambhaḥ sa tenānna.pāna.vākyeṣv an.īśa.tā || 31 ||
AHS3.15.032a/ śirasā bhāra.haraṇād ati.hāsya.prabhāṣaṇāt |
AHS3.15.032c/ uttrāsa.vaktra.kṣavathoḥ khara.kārmuka.karṣaṇāt || 32 || [Note: AHS3.15.032v/ 15.32cv ucchvāsa.vakra.kṣavathu. 15.32cv uttrāsa.vaktra.kṣavathu. 15.32dv .khara.kārmuka.karṣaṇāt]
AHS3.15.033a/ viṣamād upadhānāc ca kaṭhinānāṁ ca carvaṇāt |
AHS3.15.033c/ vāyur vivṛddhas tais taiś ca vātalair ūrdhvam āsthitaḥ || 33 ||
AHS3.15.034a/ vakrī.karoti vaktrārdham uktaṁ hasitam īkṣitam |
AHS3.15.034c/ tato 'sya kampate mūrdhā vāk.saṅgaḥ stabdha.netra.tā || 34 || [Note: AHS3.15.034v/ 15.34dv vāg.bhaṅgaḥ stabdha.netra.tā]
AHS3.15.035a/ danta.cālaḥ svara.bhraṁśaḥ śruti.hāniḥ kṣava.grahaḥ |
AHS3.15.035c/ gandhā.jñānaṁ smṛter mohas trāsaḥ suptasya jāyate || 35 ||
AHS3.15.036a/ niṣṭhīvaḥ pārśvato yāyād ekasyākṣṇo nimīlanam |
AHS3.15.036c/ jatror ūrdhvaṁ rujā tīvrā śarīrārdhe 'dhare 'pi vā || 36 ||
AHS3.15.037a/ tam āhur arditaṁ ke.cid ekāyāmam athāpare |
AHS3.15.037c/ raktam āśritya pavanaḥ kuryān mūrdha.dharāḥ sirāḥ || 37 ||
AHS3.15.038a/ rūkṣāḥ sa.vedanāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ so '.sādhyaḥ syāt sirā.grahaḥ |
AHS3.15.038c/ gṛhītvārdhaṁ tanor vāyuḥ sirāḥ snāyūr viśoṣya ca || 38 ||
AHS3.15.039a/ pakṣam anya.taraṁ hanti sandhi.bandhān vimokṣayan |
AHS3.15.039c/ kṛtsno 'rdha.kāyas tasya syād a.karmaṇyo vi.cetanaḥ || 39 ||
AHS3.15.040a/ ekāṅga.rogaṁ taṁ ke.cid anye pakṣa.vadhaṁ viduḥ |
AHS3.15.040c/ sarvāṅga.rogaṁ tad.vac ca sarva.kāyāśrite 'nile || 40 ||
[Page 299 ]
AHS3.15.041a/ śuddha.vāta.hataḥ pakṣaḥ kṛcchra.sādhya.tamo mataḥ |
AHS3.15.041c/ kṛcchras tv anyena saṁsṛṣṭo vivarjyaḥ kṣaya.hetukaḥ || 41 ||
AHS3.15.042a/ āma.baddhāyanaḥ kuryāt saṁsthabhyāṅgaṁ kaphānvitaḥ |
AHS3.15.042c/ a.sādhyaṁ hata.sarvehaṁ daṇḍa.vad daṇḍakaṁ marut || 42 ||
AHS3.15.043a/ aṁsa.mūla.sthito vāyuḥ sirāḥ saṅkocya tatra.gāḥ |
AHS3.15.043c/ bāhu.praspandita.haraṁ janayaty ava.bāhukam || 43 ||
AHS3.15.044a/ talaṁ praty aṅgulīnāṁ yā kaṇḍarā bāhu.pṛṣṭhataḥ |
AHS3.15.044c/ bāhu.ceṣṭāpaharaṇī viśvācī nāma sā smṛtā || 44 || [Note: AHS3.15.044v/ 15.44cv bāhvoḥ karma.kṣaya.karī]
AHS3.15.045a/ vāyuḥ kaṭyāṁ sthitaḥ sakthnaḥ kaṇḍarām ākṣiped yadā |
AHS3.15.045c/ tadā khañjo bhavej jantuḥ paṅguḥ sakthnor dvayor api || 45 ||
AHS3.15.046a/ kampate gamanārambhe khañjann iva ca yāti yaḥ |
AHS3.15.046c/ kalāya.khañjaṁ taṁ vidyān mukta.sandhi.prabandhanam || 46 ||
AHS3.15.047a/ śītoṣṇa.drava.saṁśuṣka.guru.snigdhair niṣevitaiḥ |
AHS3.15.047c/ jīrṇā.jīrṇe tathāyāsa.saṅkṣobha.svapna.jāgaraiḥ || 47 ||
AHS3.15.048a/ sa.śleṣma.medaḥ.pavanam āmam aty.artha.sañcitam |
AHS3.15.048c/ abhibhūyetaraṁ doṣam ūrū cet pratipadyate || 48 ||
AHS3.15.049a/ sakthy.asthīni prapūryāntaḥ śleṣmaṇā stimitena tat |
AHS3.15.049c/ tadā skabhnāti tenorū stabdhau śītāvacetanau || 49 || [Note: AHS3.15.049v/ 15.49cv tadā skandati tenorū 15.49cv tadā skannāti tenorū]
AHS3.15.050a/ parakīyāv iva gurū syātām ati.bhṛśa.vyathau |
AHS3.15.050c/ dhyānāṅga.marda.staimitya.tandrā.chardy.a.ruci.jvaraiḥ || 50 ||
[Page 300 ]
AHS3.15.051a/ saṁyutau pāda.sadana.kṛcchroddharaṇa.suptibhiḥ |
AHS3.15.051c/ tam ūru.stambham ity āhur āḍhya.vātam athāpare || 51 || [Note: AHS3.15.051v/ 15.51av saṁyuktau pāda.sadana.]
AHS3.15.052a/ vāta.śoṇita.jaḥ śopho jānu.madhye mahā.rujaḥ |
AHS3.15.052c/ jñeyaḥ kroṣṭuka.śīrṣaś ca sthūlaḥ kroṣṭuka.śīrṣa.vat || 52 || [Note: AHS3.15.052v/ 15.52dv sthūlaḥ kroṣṭuka.mūrdha.vat]
AHS3.15.053a/ ruk pāde viṣama.nyaste śramād vā jāyate yadā |
AHS3.15.053c/ vātena gulpham āśritya tam āhur vāta.kaṇṭakam || 53 ||
AHS3.15.054a/ pārṣṇiṁ praty aṅgulīnāṁ yā kaṇḍarā mārutārditā |
AHS3.15.054c/ sakthy.utkṣepaṁ nigṛhṇāti gṛdhrasīṁ tāṁ pracakṣate || 54 ||
AHS3.15.055a/ viśvācī gṛdhrasī coktā khallis tīvra.rujānvite |
AHS3.15.055c/ hṛṣyete caraṇau yasya bhavetāṁ ca prasupta.vat || 55 || [Note: AHS3.15.055v/ 15.55bv khallis tīvra.rujānvitā]
AHS3.15.056a/ pāda.harṣaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ kapha.māruta.kopa.jaḥ |
AHS3.15.056c/ pādayoḥ kurute dāhaṁ pittāsṛk.sahito 'nilaḥ || 56 ||
AHS3.15.056ū̆ab/ viśeṣataś caṅkramite pāda.dāhaṁ tam ādiśet || 56ū̆ab || [Note: AHS3.15.056ū̆v/ 15.56ū̆av viśeṣataś caṅkramataḥ]

3.16. Chapter 16 :: Atha vātaśoṇitanidānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 302-307]
AHS3.16.001a/ vidāhy annaṁ viruddhaṁ ca tat tac cāsṛk.pradūṣaṇam |
AHS3.16.001c/ bhajatāṁ vidhi.hīnaṁ ca svapna.jāgara.maithunam || 1 || [Note: AHS3.16.001v/ 16.1bv tat tathāsṛk.pradūṣaṇam]
AHS3.16.002a/ prāyeṇa su.kumārāṇām a.caṅkramaṇa.śīlinām |
AHS3.16.002c/ abhighātād a.śuddheś ca nṛṇām asṛji dūṣite || 2 ||
AHS3.16.003a/ vātalaiḥ śītalair vāyur vṛddhaḥ kruddho vi.mārga.gaḥ |
AHS3.16.003c/ tādṛśaivāsṛjā ruddhaḥ prāk tad eva pradūṣayet || 3 || [Note: AHS3.16.003v/ 16.3cv tādṛśenāsṛjā ruddhaḥ]
[Page 301 ]
AHS3.16.004a/ āḍhya.rogaṁ khuḍaṁ vāta.balāsaṁ vāta.śoṇitam |
AHS3.16.004c/ tad āhur nāmabhis tac ca pūrvaṁ pādau pradhāvati || 4 || [Note: AHS3.16.004v/ 16.4bv .palāśaṁ vāta.śoṇitam]
AHS3.16.005a/ viśeṣād yāna.yānād yaiḥ pralambau tasya lakṣaṇam |
AHS3.16.005c/ bhaviṣyataḥ kuṣṭha.samaṁ tathā sādaḥ ślathāṅga.tā || 5 ||
AHS3.16.006a/ jānu.jaṅghoru.kaṭy.aṁsa.hasta.pādāṅga.sandhiṣu |
AHS3.16.006c/ kaṇḍū.sphuraṇa.nistoda.bheda.gaurava.supta.tāḥ || 6 ||
AHS3.16.007a/ bhūtvā bhūtvā praṇaśyanti muhur āvir.bhavanti ca |
AHS3.16.007c/ pādayor mūlam āsthāya kadā.cid dhastayor api || 7 ||
AHS3.16.008a/ ākhor iva viṣaṁ kruddhaṁ kṛtsnaṁ dehaṁ vidhāvati |
AHS3.16.008c/ tvaṅ.māṁsāśrayam uttānaṁ tat pūrvaṁ jāyate tataḥ || 8 ||
AHS3.16.009a/ kālāntareṇa gambhīraṁ sarvān dhātūn abhidravat |
AHS3.16.009c/ kaṇḍv.ādi.saṁyutottāne tvak tāmrā śyāva.lohitā || 9 ||
AHS3.16.010a/ sāyāmā bhṛśa.dāhoṣā gambhīre 'dhika.pūrva.ruk |
AHS3.16.010c/ śvayathur grathitaḥ pākī vāyuḥ sandhy.asthi.majjasu || 10 ||
AHS3.16.011a/ chindann iva caraty antar vakrī.kurvaṁś ca vega.vān |
AHS3.16.011c/ karoti khañjaṁ paṅguṁ vā śarīre sarvataś caran || 11 || [Note: AHS3.16.011v/ 16.11av chindann iva carann antar]
AHS3.16.012a/ vāte 'dhike 'dhikaṁ tatra śūla.sphuraṇa.todanam |
AHS3.16.012c/ śophasya raukṣya.kṛṣṇa.tva.śyāva.tā.vṛddhi.hānayaḥ || 12 ||
AHS3.16.013a/ dhamany.aṅguli.sandhīnāṁ saṅkoco 'ṅga.graho 'ti.ruk |
AHS3.16.013c/ śīta.dveṣān.upaśayau stambha.vepathu.suptayaḥ || 13 ||
[Page 302 ]
AHS3.16.014a/ rakte śopho 'ti.ruk todas tāmraś cimicimāyate |
AHS3.16.014c/ snigdha.rūkṣaiḥ śamaṁ naiti kaṇḍū.kleda.samanvitaḥ || 14 ||
AHS3.16.015a/ pitte vidāhaḥ sammohaḥ svedo mūrchā madaḥ sa.tṛṭ |
AHS3.16.015c/ sparśā.kṣama.tvaṁ rug rāgaḥ śophaḥ pāko bhṛśoṣma.tā || 15 ||
AHS3.16.016a/ kaphe staimitya.guru.tā.supti.snigdha.tva.śita.tāḥ |
AHS3.16.016c/ kaṇḍūr mandā ca rug dvandva.sarva.liṅgaṁ ca saṅkare || 16 ||
AHS3.16.017a/ eka.doṣānugaṁ sādhyaṁ navaṁ yāpyaṁ dvi.doṣa.jam |
AHS3.16.017c/ tri.doṣa.jaṁ tyajet srāvi stabdham arbuda.kāri ca || 17 || [Note: AHS3.16.017v/ 16.17cv tri.doṣaṁ tat tyajet srāvi]
AHS3.16.018a/ rakta.mārgaṁ nihatyāśu śākhā.sandhiṣu mārutaḥ |
AHS3.16.018c/ niviśyānyo.'nyam āvārya vedanābhir haraty asūn || 18 || [Note: AHS3.16.018v/ 16.18av rakta.mārgaṁ nihanty āśu]
AHS3.16.019a/ vāyau pañcātmake prāṇo raukṣya.vyāyāma.laṅghanaiḥ |
AHS3.16.019c/ aty.āhārābhighātādhva.vegodīraṇa.dhāraṇaiḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS3.16.019v/ 16.19bv rūkṣa.vyāyāma.laṅghanaiḥ]
AHS3.16.020a/ kupitaś cakṣur.ādīnām upaghātaṁ pravartayet |
AHS3.16.020c/ pīnasārdita.tṛṭ.kāsa.śvāsādīṁś cāmayān bahūn || 20 ||
AHS3.16.021a/ udānaḥ kṣavathūdgāra.cchardi.nidrā.vidhāraṇaiḥ |
AHS3.16.021c/ guru.bhārāti.rudita.hāsyādyair vikṛto gadān || 21 || [Note: AHS3.16.021v/ 16.21bv .cchardi.nidrāvadhāraṇaiḥ]
AHS3.16.022a/ kaṇṭha.rodha.mano.bhraṁśa.cchardy.a.rocaka.pīnasān |
AHS3.16.022c/ kuryāc ca gala.gaṇḍādīṁs tāṁs tāñ jatrūrdhva.saṁśrayān || 22 ||
AHS3.16.023a/ vyāno 'ti.gamana.dhyāna.krīḍā.viṣama.ceṣṭitaiḥ |
AHS3.16.023c/ virodhi.rūkṣa.bhī.harṣa.viṣādādyaiś ca dūṣitaḥ || 23 || [Note: AHS3.16.023v/ 16.23av vyāno 'ti.gamana.sthāna.]
[Page 303 ]
AHS3.16.024a/ puṁs.tvotsāha.bala.bhraṁśa.śopha.cittotplava.jvarān |
AHS3.16.024c/ sarvāṅga.roga.nistoda.roma.harṣāṅga.supta.tāḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS3.16.024v/ 16.24dv .roma.harṣāṅga.supti.tāḥ]
AHS3.16.025a/ kuṣṭhaṁ visarpam anyāṁś ca kuryāt sarvāṅga.gān gadān |
AHS3.16.025c/ samāno viṣamā.jīrṇa.śīta.saṅkīrṇa.bhojanaiḥ || 25 ||
AHS3.16.026a/ karoty a.kāla.śayana.jāgarādyaiś ca dūṣitaḥ |
AHS3.16.026c/ śūla.gulma.grahaṇy.ādīn pakvāmāśaya.jān gadān || 26 ||
AHS3.16.027a/ apāno rūkṣa.gurv.anna.vegāghātāti.vāhanaiḥ |
AHS3.16.027c/ yāna.yānāsana.sthāna.caṅkramaiś cāti.sevitaiḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS3.16.027v/ 16.27bv .vega.ghātāti.vāhanaiḥ]
AHS3.16.028a/ kupitaḥ kurute rogān kṛcchrān pakvāśayāśrayān |
AHS3.16.028c/ mūtra.śukra.pradoṣārśo.guda.bhraṁśādikān bahūn || 28 ||
AHS3.16.029a/ sarvaṁ ca mārutaṁ sāmaṁ tandrā.staimitya.gauravaiḥ |
AHS3.16.029c/ snigdha.tvā.rocakālasya.śaitya.śophāgni.hānibhiḥ || 29 ||
AHS3.16.030a/ kaṭu.rūkṣābhilāṣeṇa tad.vidhopaśayena ca |
AHS3.16.030c/ yuktaṁ vidyān nir.āmaṁ tu tandrādīnāṁ viparyayāt || 30 ||
AHS3.16.031a/ vāyor āvaraṇaṁ cāto bahu.bhedaṁ pravakṣyate |
AHS3.16.031c/ liṅgaṁ pittāvṛte dāhas tṛṣṇā śūlaṁ bhramas tamaḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS3.16.031v/ 16.31bv bahu.bhedaṁ pracakṣyate]
AHS3.16.032a/ kaṭukoṣṇāmla.lavaṇair vidāhaḥ śīta.kāma.tā |
AHS3.16.032c/ śaitya.gaurava.śūlāni kaṭv.ādy.upaśayo 'dhikam || 32 ||
AHS3.16.033a/ laṅghanāyāsa.rūkṣoṣṇa.kāma.tā ca kaphāvṛte |
AHS3.16.033c/ raktāvṛte sa.dāhārtis tvaṅ.māṁsāntara.jā bhṛśam || 33 ||
[Page 304 ]
AHS3.16.034a/ bhavec ca rāgī śvayathur jāyante maṇḍalāni ca |
AHS3.16.034c/ māṁsena kaṭhinaḥ śopho vi.varṇaḥ piṭikās tathā || 34 ||
AHS3.16.035a/ harṣaḥ pipīlikānāṁ ca sañcāra iva jāyate |
AHS3.16.035c/ calaḥ snigdho mṛduḥ śītaḥ śopho gātreṣv a.rocakaḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS3.16.035v/ 16.35av harṣaḥ pipīlikādīnāṁ]
AHS3.16.036a/ āḍhya.vāta iti jñeyaḥ sa kṛcchro medasāvṛte |
AHS3.16.036c/ sparśam asthy.āvṛte 'ty.uṣṇaṁ pīḍanaṁ cābhinandati || 36 ||
AHS3.16.037a/ sūcyeva tudyate 'ty.artham aṅgaṁ sīdati śūlyate |
AHS3.16.037c/ majjāvṛte vinamanaṁ jṛmbhaṇaṁ pariveṣṭanam || 37 ||
AHS3.16.038a/ śūlaṁ ca pīḍyamānena pāṇibhyāṁ labhate sukham |
AHS3.16.038c/ śukrāvṛte 'ti.vego vā na vā niṣ.phala.tāpi vā || 38 || [Note: AHS3.16.038v/ 16.38av śūlaṁ ca pīḍyamāne ca 16.38av śūlaṁ ca pīḍyamāne tu 16.38dv na vā niṣ.phala.tāpi ca]
AHS3.16.039a/ bhukte kukṣau rujā jīrṇe śāmyaty annāvṛte 'nile |
AHS3.16.039c/ mūtrā.pravṛttir ādhmānaṁ vaster mūtrāvṛte bhavet || 39 || [Note: AHS3.16.039v/ 16.39dv vastau mūtrāvṛte bhavet]
AHS3.16.040a/ viḍ.āvṛte vibandho 'dhaḥ sva.sthāne parikṛntati |
AHS3.16.040c/ vrajaty āśu jarāṁ sneho bhukte cānahyate naraḥ || 40 || [Note: AHS3.16.040v/ 16.40av viḍ.āvṛte 'ti.viḍ.rodhaḥ 16.40bv sve sthāne parikṛntati]
AHS3.16.041a/ śakṛt pīḍitam annena duḥkhaṁ śuṣkaṁ cirāt sṛjet |
AHS3.16.041c/ sarva.dhātv.āvṛte vāyau śroṇi.vaṅkṣaṇa.pṛṣṭha.ruk || 41 ||
AHS3.16.042a/ vilomo māruto '.svasthaṁ hṛdayaṁ pīḍyate 'ti ca |
AHS3.16.042c/ bhramo mūrchā rujā dāhaḥ pittena prāṇa āvṛte || 42 || [Note: AHS3.16.042v/ 16.42av vilomo māruto '.svāsthyaṁ 16.42cv bhramo mūrchā rujānāhaḥ]
AHS3.16.043a/ vidagdhe 'nne ca vamanam udāne 'pi bhramādayaḥ |
AHS3.16.043c/ dāho 'ntar ūrjā.bhraṁśaś ca dāho vyāne ca sarva.gaḥ || 43 || [Note: AHS3.16.043v/ 16.43dv dāho vyāne tu sarva.gaḥ]
[Page 305 ]
AHS3.16.044a/ klamo 'ṅga.ceṣṭā.saṅgaś ca sa.santāpaḥ sa.vedanaḥ |
AHS3.16.044c/ samāna ūṣmopahatir ati.svedo '.ratiḥ sa.tṛṭ || 44 || [Note: AHS3.16.044v/ 16.44av klamo 'ṅga.ceṣṭā.bhaṅgaś ca]
AHS3.16.045a/ dāhaś ca syād apāne tu male hāridra.varṇa.tā |
AHS3.16.045c/ rajo.'tivṛttis tāpaś ca yoni.mehana.pāyuṣu || 45 || [Note: AHS3.16.045v/ 16.45cv rajo.'ti.vṛddhis tāpaś ca]
AHS3.16.046a/ śleṣmaṇā tv āvṛte prāṇe sādas tandrā.rucir vamiḥ |
AHS3.16.046c/ ṣṭhīvanaṁ kṣavathūdgāra.niḥśvāsocchvāsa.saṅgrahaḥ || 46 ||
AHS3.16.047a/ udāne guru.gātra.tvam a.rucir vāk.svara.grahaḥ |
AHS3.16.047c/ bala.varṇa.praṇāśaś ca vyāne parvāsthi.vāg.grahaḥ || 47 || [Note: AHS3.16.047v/ 16.47dv vyāne pārśvāsthi.vāg.grahaḥ]
AHS3.16.048a/ guru.tāṅgeṣu sarveṣu skhalitaṁ ca gatau bhṛśam |
AHS3.16.048c/ samāne 'ti.himāṅga.tvam a.svedo manda.vahni.tā || 48 ||
AHS3.16.049a/ apāne sa.kaphaṁ mūtra.śakṛtaḥ syāt pravartanam |
AHS3.16.049c/ iti dvā.viṁśati.vidhaṁ vāyor āvaraṇaṁ viduḥ || 49 || [Note: AHS3.16.049v/ 16.49av apāne sa.kaphaṁ mūtraṁ 16.49bv śakṛtaḥ syāt pravartanam]
AHS3.16.050a/ prāṇādayas tathānyo.'nyam āvṛṇvanti yathā.kramam |
AHS3.16.050c/ sarve 'pi viṁśati.vidhaṁ vidyād āvaraṇaṁ ca tat || 50 || [Note: AHS3.16.050v/ 16.50bv āvṛṇvanti yathā.yatham]
AHS3.16.051a/ niḥśvāsocchvāsa.saṁrodhaḥ pratiśyāyaḥ śiro.grahaḥ |
AHS3.16.051c/ hṛd.rogo mukha.śoṣaś ca prāṇenodāna āvṛte || 51 || [Note: AHS3.16.051v/ 16.51cv hṛd.rogo mukha.rogaś ca]
AHS3.16.052a/ udānenāvṛte prāṇe varṇaujo.bala.saṅkṣayaḥ |
AHS3.16.052c/ diśānayā ca vibhajet sarvam āvaraṇaṁ bhiṣak || 52 ||
AHS3.16.053a/ sthānāny avekṣya vātānāṁ vṛddhiṁ hāniṁ ca karmaṇām |
AHS3.16.053c/ prāṇādīnāṁ ca pañcānāṁ miśram āvaraṇaṁ mithaḥ || 53 ||
[Page 306 ]
AHS3.16.054a/ pittādibhir dvā.daśabhir miśrāṇāṁ miśritaiś ca taiḥ |
AHS3.16.054c/ miśraiḥ pittādibhis tad.van miśraṇābhir aneka.dhā || 54 ||
AHS3.16.055a/ tāratamya.vikalpāc ca yāty āvṛtir a.saṅkhya.tām |
AHS3.16.055c/ tāṁ lakṣayed avahito yathā.svaṁ lakṣaṇodayāt || 55 ||
AHS3.16.056a/ śanaiḥ śanaiś copaśayād gūḍhām api muhur muhuḥ |
AHS3.16.056c/ viśeṣāj jīvitaṁ prāṇa udāno balam ucyate || 56 ||
AHS3.16.057a/ syāt tayoḥ pīḍanād dhānir āyuṣaś ca balasya ca |
AHS3.16.057c/ āvṛtā vāyavo '.jñātā jñātā vā vatsaraṁ sthitāḥ || 57 ||
AHS3.16.058a/ prayatnenāpi duḥ.sādhyā bhaveyur vān.upakramāḥ |
AHS3.16.058c/ vidradhi.plīha.hṛd.roga.gulmāgni.sadanādayaḥ || 58 ||
AHS3.16.058ū̆ab/ bhavanty upadravās teṣām āvṛtānām upekṣaṇāt || 58ū̆ab ||
AHS3.16.058ū̆+1a/ vyādhīnāṁ saṁśayaṁ chettum anyato yo '.pramatta.vān |
AHS3.16.058ū̆+1c/ nidānaṁ satataṁ tena cintanīyaṁ vipaścitā || 58ū̆+1 ||

4. Part 4 :: Cikitsāsthānam

[Note: [ K edn 309-432]

4.1. Chapter 1 :: Atha jvaracikitsādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 309-325]
AHS4.1.001a/ āmāśaya.stho hatvāgniṁ sāmo mārgān pidhāya yat |
AHS4.1.001c/ vidadhāti jvaraṁ doṣas tasmāt kurvīta laṅghanam || 1 ||
AHS4.1.002a/ prāg.rūpeṣu jvarādau vā balaṁ yatnena pālayan |
AHS4.1.002c/ balādhiṣṭhānam ārogyam ārogyārthaḥ kriyā.kramaḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS4.1.002v/ 1.2dv ārogyārthaṁ kriyā.kramaḥ]
AHS4.1.003a/ laṅghanaiḥ kṣapite doṣe dīpte 'gnau lāghave sati |
AHS4.1.003c/ svāsthyaṁ kṣut tṛḍ ruciḥ paktir balam ojaś ca jāyate || 3 ||
[Page 307 ]
AHS4.1.004a/ tatrotkṛṣṭe samutkliṣṭe kapha.prāye cale male |
AHS4.1.004c/ sa.hṛl.lāsa.prasekānna.dveṣa.kāsa.viṣūcike || 4 ||
AHS4.1.005a/ sadyo.bhuktasya sañjāte jvare sāme viśeṣataḥ |
AHS4.1.005c/ vamanaṁ vamanārhasya śastaṁ kuryāt tad anya.thā || 5 ||
AHS4.1.006a/ śvāsātīsāra.sammoha.hṛd.roga.viṣama.jvarān |
AHS4.1.006c/ pippalībhir yutān gālān kaliṅgair madhukena vā || 6 ||
AHS4.1.007a/ uṣṇāmbhasā sa.madhunā pibet sa.lavaṇena vā |
AHS4.1.007c/ paṭola.nimba.karkoṭa.vetra.pattrodakena vā || 7 ||
AHS4.1.008a/ tarpaṇena rasenekṣor madyaiḥ kalpoditāni vā |
AHS4.1.008c/ vamanāni prayuñjīta bala.kāla.vibhāga.vit || 8 ||
AHS4.1.009a/ kṛte '.kṛte vā vamane jvarī kuryād viśoṣaṇam |
AHS4.1.009c/ doṣāṇāṁ samudīrṇānāṁ pācanāya śamāya ca || 9 ||
AHS4.1.010a/ doṣeṇa bhasmanevāgnau channe 'nnaṁ na vipacyate |
AHS4.1.010c/ tasmād ā.doṣa.pacanāj jvaritān upavāsayet || 10 || [Note: AHS4.1.010v/ 1.10av āmena bhasmanevāgnau]
AHS4.1.011a/ tṛṣṇag alpālpam uṣṇāmbu pibed vāta.kapha.jvare |
AHS4.1.011c/ tat kaphaṁ vilayaṁ nītvā tṛṣṇām āśu nivartayet || 11 || [Note: AHS4.1.011v/ 1.11av tṛṣyann alpālpam uṣṇāmbu]
AHS4.1.012a/ udīrya cāgniṁ srotāṁsi mṛdū.kṛtya viśodhayet |
AHS4.1.012c/ līna.pittānila.sveda.śakṛn.mūtrānulomanam || 12 ||
AHS4.1.013a/ nidrā.jāḍyā.ruci.haraṁ prāṇānām avalambanam |
AHS4.1.013c/ viparītam ataḥ śītaṁ doṣa.saṅghāta.vardhanam || 13 ||
[Page 308 ]
AHS4.1.014a/ uṣṇam evaṅ.guṇa.tve 'pi yuñjyān naikānta.pittale |
AHS4.1.014c/ udrikta.pitte davathu.dāha.mohātisāriṇi || 14 ||
AHS4.1.015a/ viṣa.madyotthite grīṣme kṣata.kṣīṇe 'sra.pittini |
AHS4.1.015c/ ghana.candana.śuṇṭhy.ambu.parpaṭośīra.sādhitam || 15 ||
AHS4.1.016a/ śītaṁ tebhyo hitaṁ toyaṁ pācanaṁ tṛḍ.jvarāpaham |
AHS4.1.016c/ ūṣmā pittād ṛte nāsti jvaro nāsty ūṣmaṇā vinā || 16 ||
AHS4.1.017a/ tasmāt pitta.viruddhāni tyajet pittādhike 'dhikam |
AHS4.1.017c/ snānābhyaṅga.pradehāṁś ca pariśeṣaṁ ca laṅghanam || 17 ||
AHS4.1.018a/ a.jīrṇa iva śūla.ghnaṁ sāme tīvra.ruji jvare |
AHS4.1.018c/ na pibed auṣadhaṁ tad dhi bhūya evāmam āvahet || 18 ||
AHS4.1.019a/ āmābhibhūta.koṣṭhasya kṣīraṁ viṣam aher iva |
AHS4.1.019c/ sodarda.pīnasa.śvāse jaṅghā.parvāsthi.śūlini || 19 || [Note: AHS4.1.019v/ 1.19dv jaṅghā.pārśvāsthi.śūlini]
AHS4.1.020a/ vāta.śleṣmātmake svedaḥ praśastaḥ sa pravartayet |
AHS4.1.020c/ sveda.mūtra.śakṛd.vātān kuryād agneś ca pāṭavam || 20 ||
AHS4.1.021a/ snehoktam ācāra.vidhiṁ sarva.śaś cānupālayet |
AHS4.1.021c/ laṅghanaṁ svedanaṁ kālo yavāgvas tiktako rasaḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS4.1.021v/ 1.21dv yavāgūs tiktako rasaḥ]
AHS4.1.022a/ malānāṁ pācanāni syur yathāvasthaṁ krameṇa vā |
AHS4.1.022c/ śuddha.vāta.kṣayāgantu.jīrṇa.jvariṣu laṅghanam || 22 ||
AHS4.1.023a/ neṣyate teṣu hi hitaṁ śamanaṁ yan na karśanam |
AHS4.1.023c/ tatra sāma.jvarākṛtyā jānīyād a.viśoṣitam || 23 || [Note: AHS4.1.023v/ 1.23bv śamanaṁ yan na karṣaṇam]
[Page 309 ]
AHS4.1.024a/ dvi.vidhopakrama.jñānam avekṣeta ca laṅghane |
AHS4.1.024c/ yuktaṁ laṅghita.liṅgais tu taṁ peyābhir upācaret || 24 ||
AHS4.1.025a/ yathā.svauṣadha.siddhābhir maṇḍa.pūrvābhir āditaḥ |
AHS4.1.025c/ ṣaḍ.ahaṁ vā mṛdu.tvaṁ vā jvaro yāvad avāpnuyāt || 25 ||
AHS4.1.026a/ tasyāgnir dīpyate tābhiḥ samidbhir iva pāvakaḥ |
AHS4.1.026c/ prāg lāja.peyāṁ su.jarāṁ sa.śuṇṭhī.dhānya.pippalīm || 26 ||
AHS4.1.027a/ sa.saindhavāṁ tathāmlārthī tāṁ pibet saha.dāḍimām |
AHS4.1.027c/ sṛṣṭa.viḍ bahu.pitto vā sa.śuṇṭhī.mākṣikāṁ himām || 27 ||
AHS4.1.028a/ vasti.pārśva.śiraḥ.śūlī vyāghrī.gokṣura.sādhitām |
AHS4.1.028c/ pṛśniparṇī.balā.bilva.nāgarotpala.dhānyakaiḥ || 28 ||
AHS4.1.029a/ siddhāṁ jvarātisāry amlāṁ peyāṁ dīpana.pācanīm |
AHS4.1.029c/ hrasvena pañca.mūlena hikkā.ruk.śvāsa.kāsa.vān || 29 ||
AHS4.1.030a/ pañca.mūlena mahatā kaphārto yava.sādhitām |
AHS4.1.030c/ vibaddha.varcāḥ sa.yavāṁ pippaly.āmalakaiḥ kṛtāṁ || 30 || [Note: AHS4.1.030v/ 1.30dv pippaly.āmalakaiḥ śṛtāṁ]
AHS4.1.031a/ yavāgūṁ sarpiṣā bhṛṣṭāṁ mala.doṣānulomanīm |
AHS4.1.031c/ cavikā.pippalī.mūla.drākṣāmalaka.nāgaraiḥ || 31 ||
AHS4.1.032a/ koṣṭhe vibaddhe sa.ruji pibet tu parikartini |
AHS4.1.032c/ kola.vṛkṣāmla.kalaśī.dhāvanī.śrīphalaiḥ kṛtām || 32 || [Note: AHS4.1.032v/ 1.32dv .dhāvanī.śrī.balā.kṛtām]
AHS4.1.033a/ a.sveda.nidras tṛṣṇārtaḥ sitāmalaka.nāgaraiḥ |
AHS4.1.033c/ sitā.badara.mṛdvīkā.śārivā.musta.candanaiḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS4.1.033v/ 1.33av a.sveda.nidrā.tṛṣṇārtaḥ]
[Page 310 ]
AHS4.1.034a/ tṛṣṇā.chardi.parīdāha.jvara.ghnīṁ kṣaudra.saṁyutām |
AHS4.1.034c/ kuryāt peyauṣadhair eva rasa.yūṣādikān api || 34 || [Note: AHS4.1.034v/ 1.34av tṛṣṇā.chardi.parīvāra. 1.34av tṛṣṇā.chardi.paro dāha.]
AHS4.1.035a/ madyodbhave madya.nitye pitta.sthāna.gate kaphe |
AHS4.1.035c/ grīṣme tayor vādhikayos tṛṭ.chardir.dāha.pīḍite || 35 || [Note: AHS4.1.035v/ 1.35dv tṛṭ.chardi.dāha.pīḍite]
AHS4.1.036a/ ūrdhvaṁ pravṛtte rakte ca peyāṁ necchanti teṣu tu |
AHS4.1.036c/ jvarāpahaiḥ phala.rasair adbhir vā lāja.tarpaṇāt || 36 || [Note: AHS4.1.036v/ 1.36dv adbhir vā lāja.tarpaṇam]
AHS4.1.037a/ pibet sa.śarkarā.kṣaudrān tato jīrṇe tu tarpaṇe |
AHS4.1.037c/ yavāgvāṁ vaudanaṁ kṣud.vān aśnīyād bhṛṣṭa.taṇḍulam || 37 || [Note: AHS4.1.037v/ 1.37av pibet sa.śarkarā.kṣaudraṁ 1.37bv tato jīrṇe ca tarpaṇe 1.37cv yavāgvām odanaṁ kṣud.vān 1.37cv yavāgvāṁ caudanaṁ kṣud.vān]
AHS4.1.038a/ daka.lāvaṇikair yūṣai rasair vā mudga.lāva.jaiḥ |
AHS4.1.038c/ ity ayaṁ ṣaḍ.aho neyo balaṁ doṣaṁ ca rakṣatā || 38 ||
AHS4.1.039a/ tataḥ pakveṣu doṣeṣu laṅghanādyaiḥ praśasyate |
AHS4.1.039c/ kaṣāyo doṣa.śeṣasya pācanaḥ śamano 'tha.vā || 39 ||
AHS4.1.040a/ tiktaḥ pitte viśeṣeṇa prayojyaḥ kaṭukaḥ kaphe |
AHS4.1.040c/ pitta.śleṣma.hara.tve 'pi kaṣāyaḥ sa na śasyate || 40 || [Note: AHS4.1.040v/ 1.40dv kaṣāyas tu na śasyate]
AHS4.1.041a/ nava.jvare mala.stambhāt kaṣāyo viṣama.jvaram |
AHS4.1.041c/ kurute '.ruci.hṛl.lāsa.hidhmādhmānādikān api || 41 ||
AHS4.1.042a/ saptāhād auṣadhaṁ ke.cid āhur anye daśāhataḥ |
AHS4.1.042c/ ke.cil laghv.anna.bhuktasya yojyam āmolbaṇe na tu || 42 || [Note: AHS4.1.042v/ 1.42bv āhuś cānye daśāhataḥ]
AHS4.1.043a/ tīvra.jvara.parītasya doṣa.vegodaye yataḥ |
AHS4.1.043c/ doṣe 'tha.vāti.nicite tandrā.staimitya.kāriṇi || 43 ||
[Page 311 ]
AHS4.1.044a/ a.pacyamānaṁ bhaiṣajyaṁ bhūyo jvalayati jvaram |
AHS4.1.044c/ mṛdur jvaro laghur dehaś calitāś ca malā yadā || 44 ||
AHS4.1.045a/ a.cira.jvaritasyāpi bheṣajaṁ yojayet tadā |
AHS4.1.045c/ mustayā parpaṭaṁ yuktaṁ śuṇṭhyā duḥsparśayāpi vā || 45 ||
AHS4.1.046a/ pākyaṁ śīta.kaṣāyaṁ vā pāṭhośīraṁ sa.vālakam |
AHS4.1.046c/ pibet tad.vac ca bhūnimba.guḍūcī.musta.nāgaram || 46 ||
AHS4.1.047a/ yathā.yogam ime yojyāḥ kaṣāyā doṣa.pācanāḥ |
AHS4.1.047c/ jvarā.rocaka.tṛṣṇāsya.vairasyā.pakti.nāśanāḥ || 47 ||
AHS4.1.048ab/ kaliṅgakāḥ paṭolasya pattraṁ kaṭuka.rohiṇī || 48ab ||
AHS4.1.049a/ paṭolaṁ śārivā mustā pāṭhā kaṭuka.rohiṇī |
AHS4.1.049c/ paṭola.nimba.tri.phalā.mṛdvīkā.musta.vatsakāḥ || 49 ||
AHS4.1.050a/ kirātatiktam amṛtā candanaṁ viśva.bheṣajam |
AHS4.1.050c/ dhātrī.mustāmṛtā.kṣaudram ardha.śloka.samāpanāḥ || 50 ||
AHS4.1.051a/ pañcaite santatādīnāṁ pañcānāṁ śamanā matāḥ |
AHS4.1.051c/ durālabhāmṛtā.mustā.nāgaraṁ vāta.je jvare || 51 ||
AHS4.1.052a/ atha.vā pippalī.mūla.guḍūcī.viśva.bheṣajam |
AHS4.1.052c/ kanīyaḥ pañca.mūlaṁ ca pitte śakrayavā ghanam || 52 || [Note: AHS4.1.052v/ 1.52dv pitte kṣaudra.samanvitāḥ]
AHS4.1.053a/ kaṭukā ceti sa.kṣaudraṁ mustā.parpaṭakaṁ tathā |
AHS4.1.053c/ sa.dhanvayāsa.bhūnimbaṁ vatsakādyo gaṇaḥ kaphe || 53 || [Note: AHS4.1.053v/ 1.53av kaliṅga.musta.kaṭukā]
[Page 312 ]
AHS4.1.054a/ atha.vā vṛṣa.gāṅgeyī.śṛṅgavera.durālabhāḥ |
AHS4.1.054c/ rug.vibandhānila.śleṣma.yukte dīpana.pācanam || 54 ||
AHS4.1.055a/ abhayā.pippalī.mūla.śamyāka.kaṭukā.ghanam |
AHS4.1.055c/ drākṣā.madhūka.madhuka.lodhra.kāśmarya.śārivāḥ || 55 ||
AHS4.1.056a/ mustāmalaka.hrīvera.padma.kesara.padmakam |
AHS4.1.056c/ mṛṇāla.candanośīra.nīlotpala.parūṣakam || 56 ||
AHS4.1.057a/ phāṇṭo himo vā drākṣādir jātī.kusuma.vāsitaḥ |
AHS4.1.057c/ yukto madhu.sitā.lājair jayaty anila.pitta.jam || 57 ||
AHS4.1.058a/ jvaraṁ madātyayaṁ chardiṁ mūrchāṁ dāhaṁ śramaṁ bhramam |
AHS4.1.058c/ ūrdhva.gaṁ rakta.pittaṁ ca pipāsāṁ kāmalām api || 58 || [Note: AHS4.1.058v/ 1.58av jvaraṁ madātyayaṁ chardir]
AHS4.1.059a/ pācayet kaṭukāṁ piṣṭvā karpare 'bhinave śucau |
AHS4.1.059c/ niṣpīḍito ghṛta.yutas tad.raso jvara.dāha.jit || 59 ||
AHS4.1.060a/ kapha.vāte vacā.tiktā.pāṭhāragvadha.vatsakāḥ |
AHS4.1.060c/ pippalī.cūrṇa.yukto vā kvāthaś chinnodbhavodbhavaḥ || 60 ||
AHS4.1.061a/ vyāghrī.śuṇṭhy.amṛtā.kvāthaḥ pippalī.cūrṇa.saṁyutaḥ |
AHS4.1.061c/ vāta.śleṣma.jvara.śvāsa.kāsa.pīnasa.śūla.jit || 61 ||
AHS4.1.062a/ pathyā.kustumburī.mustā.śuṇṭhī.kaṭtṛṇa.parpaṭam |
AHS4.1.062c/ sa.kaṭphala.vacā.bhārgī.devāhvaṁ madhu.hiṅgu.mat || 62 ||
AHS4.1.063a/ kapha.vāta.jvara.ṣṭhīva.kukṣi.hṛt.pārśva.vedanāḥ |
AHS4.1.063c/ kaṇṭhāmayāsya.śvayathu.kāsa.śvāsān niyacchati || 63 || [Note: AHS4.1.063v/ 1.63av kapha.vāta.jvare ṣṭheva.]
[Page 313 ]
AHS4.1.064a/ āragvadhādiḥ sa.kṣaudraḥ kapha.pitta.jvaraṁ jayet |
AHS4.1.064c/ tathā tiktā.vṛṣośīra.trāyantī.tri.phalāmṛtāḥ || 64 ||
AHS4.1.065a/ paṭolātiviṣā.nimba.mūrvā.dhanvayavāsakāḥ |
AHS4.1.065c/ sannipāta.jvare vyāghrī.devadāru.niśā.ghanam || 65 ||
AHS4.1.066a/ paṭola.pattra.nimba.tvak.tri.phalā.kaṭukā.yutam |
AHS4.1.066c/ nāgaraṁ pauṣkaraṁ mūlaṁ guḍūcī kaṇṭakārikā || 66 ||
AHS4.1.067a/ sa.kāsa.śvāsa.pārśvārtau vāta.śleṣmottare jvare |
AHS4.1.067c/ madhūka.puṣpa.mṛdvīkā.trāyamāṇā.parūṣakam || 67 ||
AHS4.1.068a/ sośīra.tiktā.tri.phalā.kāśmaryaṁ kalpayed dhimam |
AHS4.1.068c/ kaṣāyaṁ taṁ piban kāle jvarān sarvān apohati || 68 || [Note: AHS4.1.068v/ 1.68dv jvarān sarvān vyapohati]
AHS4.1.069a/ jāty.āmalaka.mustāni tad.vad dhanvayavāsakam |
AHS4.1.069c/ baddha.viṭ kaṭukā.drākṣā.trāyantī.tri.phalā.guḍam || 69 || [Note: AHS4.1.069v/ 1.69dv .trāyantī.tri.phalā.guḍān 1.69dv .trāyantī.tri.phalā.guḍāḥ]
AHS4.1.070a/ jīrṇauṣadho 'nnaṁ peyādyam ācarec chleṣma.vān na tu |
AHS4.1.070c/ peyā kaphaṁ vardhayati paṅkaṁ pāṁsuṣu vṛṣṭi.vat || 70 ||
AHS4.1.071a/ śleṣmābhiṣyaṇṇa.dehānām ataḥ prāg api yojayet |
AHS4.1.071c/ yūṣān kulattha.caṇaka.kalāyādi.kṛtān laghūn || 71 || [Note: AHS4.1.071v/ 1.71av śleṣmābhiṣava.dehānām 1.71av śleṣmābhispanda.dehānām]
AHS4.1.072a/ rūkṣāṁs tikta.rasopetān hṛdyān ruci.karān paṭūn |
AHS4.1.072c/ raktādyāḥ śālayo jīrṇāḥ ṣaṣṭikāś ca jvare hitāḥ || 72 ||
AHS4.1.073a/ śleṣmottare vīta.tuṣās tathā vāṭī.kṛtā yavāḥ |
AHS4.1.073c/ odanas taiḥ sruto dvis triḥ prayoktavyo yathā.yatham || 73 ||
[Page 314 ]
AHS4.1.074a/ doṣa.dūṣyādi.balato jvara.ghna.kvātha.sādhitaḥ |
AHS4.1.074c/ mudgādyair laghubhir yūṣāḥ kulatthaiś ca jvarāpahāḥ || 74 ||
AHS4.1.075a/ kāravellaka.karkoṭa.bāla.mūlaka.parpaṭaiḥ |
AHS4.1.075c/ vārtāka.nimba.kusuma.paṭola.phala.pallavaiḥ || 75 ||
AHS4.1.076a/ aty.anta.laghubhir māṁsair jāṅgalaiś ca hitā rasāḥ |
AHS4.1.076c/ vyāghrī.parūṣa.tarkārī.drākṣāmalaka.dāḍimaiḥ || 76 ||
AHS4.1.077a/ saṁskṛtāḥ pippalī.śuṇṭhī.dhānya.jīraka.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS4.1.077c/ sitā.madhubhyāṁ prāyeṇa saṁyutā vā kṛtā.kṛtāḥ || 77 ||
AHS4.1.078a/ an.amla.takra.siddhāni rucyāni vyañjanāni ca |
AHS4.1.078c/ acchāny anala.sampannāny anu.pāne 'pi yojayet || 78 ||
AHS4.1.079a/ tāni kvathita.śītaṁ ca vāri madyaṁ ca sātmyataḥ |
AHS4.1.079c/ sa.jvaraṁ jvara.muktaṁ vā dinānte bhojayel laghu || 79 ||
AHS4.1.080a/ śleṣma.kṣaya.vivṛddhoṣmā bala.vān analas tadā |
AHS4.1.080c/ yathocite 'tha.vā kāle deśa.sātmyānurodhataḥ || 80 ||
AHS4.1.081a/ prāg alpa.vahnir bhuñjāno na hy a.jīrṇena pīḍyate |
AHS4.1.081c/ kaṣāya.pāna.pathyānnair daśāha iti laṅghite || 81 ||
AHS4.1.082a/ sarpir dadyāt kaphe mande vāta.pittottare jvare |
AHS4.1.082c/ pakveṣu doṣeṣv amṛtaṁ tad viṣopamam anya.thā || 82 ||
AHS4.1.083a/ daśāhe syād atīte 'pi jvaropadrava.vṛddhi.kṛt |
AHS4.1.083c/ laṅghanādi.kramaṁ tatra kuryād ā.kapha.saṅkṣayāt || 83 ||
[Page 315 ]
AHS4.1.084a/ deha.dhātv.a.bala.tvāc ca jvaro jīrṇo 'nuvartate |
AHS4.1.084c/ rūkṣaṁ hi tejo jvara.kṛt tejasā rūkṣitasya ca || 84 ||
AHS4.1.085a/ vamana.sveda.kālāmbu.kaṣāya.laghu.bhojanaiḥ |
AHS4.1.085c/ yaḥ syād ati.balo dhātuḥ saha.cārī sadā.gatiḥ || 85 ||
AHS4.1.086a/ tasya saṁśamanaṁ sarpir dīptasyevāmbu veśmanaḥ |
AHS4.1.086c/ vāta.pitta.jitām agryaṁ saṁskāraṁ cānurudhyate || 86 || [Note: AHS4.1.086v/ 1.86dv saṁskāram anurudhyate]
AHS4.1.087a/ su.tarāṁ tad dhy ato dadyād yathā.svauṣadha.sādhitam |
AHS4.1.087c/ viparītaṁ jvaroṣmāṇaṁ jayet pittaṁ ca śaityataḥ || 87 ||
AHS4.1.088a/ snehād vātaṁ ghṛtaṁ tulyaṁ yoga.saṁskārataḥ kapham |
AHS4.1.088c/ pūrve kaṣāyāḥ sa.ghṛtāḥ sarve yojyā yathā.malam || 88 ||
AHS4.1.089a/ tri.phalā.picumanda.tvaṅ.madhukaṁ bṛhatī.dvayam |
AHS4.1.089c/ sa.masūra.dalaṁ kvāthaḥ sa.ghṛto jvara.kāsa.hā || 89 ||
AHS4.1.090a/ pippalīndrayava.dhāvani.tiktā.śārivāmalaka.tāmalakībhiḥ |
AHS4.1.090c/ bilva.musta.hima.pālani.sevyair drākṣayātiviṣayā sthirayā ca || 90 ||
AHS4.1.091a/ ghṛtam āśu nihanti sādhitaṁ jvaram agniṁ viṣamaṁ halīmakam |
AHS4.1.091c/ a.ruciṁ bhṛśa.tāpam aṁsayor vamathuṁ pārśva.śiro.rujaṁ kṣayam || 91 || [Note: AHS4.1.091v/ 1.91bv jvaram ugraṁ viṣamaṁ halīmakam]
AHS4.1.092a/ tailvakaṁ pavana.janmani jvare yojayet trivṛtayā viyojitam |
AHS4.1.092c/ tiktakaṁ vṛṣa.ghṛtaṁ ca paittike yac ca pālanikayā śṛtaṁ haviḥ || 92 ||
AHS4.1.093a/ viḍaṅga.sauvarcala.cavya.pāṭhā.vyoṣāgni.sindhūdbhava.yāva.śūkaiḥ |
AHS4.1.093c/ palāṁśakaiḥ kṣīra.samaṁ ghṛtasya prasthaṁ pacej jīrṇa.kapha.jvara.ghnam || 93 || [Note: AHS4.1.093v/ 1.93cv palāṁśikaiḥ kṣīra.samaṁ ghṛtasya]
[Page 316 ]
AHS4.1.094a/ guḍūcyā rasa.kalkābhyāṁ tri.phalāyā vṛṣasya vā |
AHS4.1.094c/ mṛdvīkāyā balāyāś ca snehāḥ siddhā jvara.cchidaḥ || 94 ||
AHS4.1.095a/ jīrṇe ghṛte ca bhuñjīta mṛdu.māṁsa.rasaudanam |
AHS4.1.095c/ balaṁ hy alaṁ doṣa.haraṁ paraṁ tac ca bala.pradam || 95 || [Note: AHS4.1.095v/ 1.95bv mṛdu.māṁsa.rasāśanam]
AHS4.1.096a/ kapha.pitta.harā mudga.kāravellādi.jā rasāḥ |
AHS4.1.096c/ prāyeṇa tasmān na hitā jīrṇe vātottare jvare || 96 ||
AHS4.1.097a/ śūlodāvarta.viṣṭambha.jananā jvara.vardhanāḥ |
AHS4.1.097c/ na śāmyaty evam api cej jvaraḥ kurvīta śodhanam || 97 ||
AHS4.1.098a/ śodhanārhasya vamanaṁ prāg uktaṁ tasya yojayet |
AHS4.1.098c/ āmāśaya.gate doṣe balinaḥ pālayan balam || 98 ||
AHS4.1.099a/ pakve tu śithile doṣe jvare vā viṣa.madya.je |
AHS4.1.099c/ modakaṁ tri.phalā.śyāmā.trivṛt.pippali.kesaraiḥ || 99 ||
AHS4.1.100a/ sa.sitā.madhubhir dadyād vyoṣādyaṁ vā virecanam |
AHS4.1.100c/ drākṣā.dhātrī.rasaṁ tad.vat sa.drākṣāṁ vā harītakīm || 100 ||
AHS4.1.100.1+1ab/ lihyād vā traivṛtaṁ cūrṇaṁ saṁyuktaṁ madhu.sarpiṣā || 100.1+1ab ||
AHS4.1.101a/ āragvadhaṁ vā payasā mṛdvīkānāṁ rasena vā |
AHS4.1.101c/ tri.phalāṁ trāyamāṇāṁ vā payasā jvaritaḥ pibet || 101 ||
AHS4.1.102a/ viriktānāṁ ca saṁsargī maṇḍa.pūrvā yathā.kramam |
AHS4.1.102c/ cyavamānaṁ jvarotkliṣṭam upekṣeta malaṁ sadā || 102 ||
[Page 317 ]
AHS4.1.103a/ pakvo 'pi hi vikurvīta doṣaḥ koṣṭhe kṛtāspadaḥ |
AHS4.1.103c/ atipravartamānaṁ vā pācayan saṅgrahaṁ nayet || 103 ||
AHS4.1.104a/ āma.saṅgrahaṇe doṣā doṣopakrama īritāḥ |
AHS4.1.104c/ pāyayed doṣa.haraṇaṁ mohād āma.jvare tu yaḥ || 104 || [Note: AHS4.1.104v/ 1.104av āma.saṅgrahaṇād doṣo 1.104bv doṣopakrama īritaḥ]
AHS4.1.105a/ prasuptaṁ kṛṣṇa.sarpaṁ sa karāgreṇa parāmṛśet |
AHS4.1.105c/ jvara.kṣīṇasya na hitaṁ vamanaṁ na virecanam || 105 ||
AHS4.1.106a/ kāmaṁ tu payasā tasya nirūhair vā haren malān |
AHS4.1.106c/ kṣīrocitasya prakṣīṇa.śleṣmaṇo dāha.tṛḍ.vataḥ || 106 ||
AHS4.1.107a/ kṣīraṁ pittānilārtasya pathyam apy atisāriṇaḥ |
AHS4.1.107c/ tad vapur laṅghanottaptaṁ pluṣṭaṁ vanam ivāgninā || 107 ||
AHS4.1.108a/ divyāmbu jīvayet tasya jvaraṁ cāśu niyacchati |
AHS4.1.108c/ saṁskṛtaṁ śītam uṣṇaṁ vā tasmād dhāroṣṇam eva vā || 108 || [Note: AHS4.1.108v/ 1.108dv tad.vad dhāroṣṇam eva vā]
AHS4.1.109a/ vibhajya kāle yuñjīta jvariṇaṁ hanty ato 'nya.thā |
AHS4.1.109c/ payaḥ sa.śuṇṭhī.kharjūra.mṛdvīkā.śarkarā.ghṛtam || 109 ||
AHS4.1.110a/ śṛta.śītaṁ madhu.yutaṁ tṛḍ.dāha.jvara.nāśanam |
AHS4.1.110c/ tad.vad drākṣā.balā.yaṣṭī.śārivā.kaṇa.candanaiḥ || 110 ||
AHS4.1.111a/ catur.guṇenāmbhasā vā pippalyā vā śṛtaṁ pibet |
AHS4.1.111c/ kāsāc chvāsāc chiraḥ.śūlāt pārśva.śūlāc cira.jvarāt || 111 ||
AHS4.1.112a/ mucyate jvaritaḥ pītvā pañca.mūlī.śṛtaṁ payaḥ |
AHS4.1.112c/ śṛtam eraṇḍa.mūlena bāla.bilvena vā jvarāt || 112 ||
[Page 318 ]
AHS4.1.113a/ dhāroṣṇaṁ vā payaḥ pītvā vibaddhānila.varcasaḥ |
AHS4.1.113c/ sa.rakta.picchātisṛteḥ sa.tṛṭ.śūla.pravāhikāt || 113 ||
AHS4.1.114a/ siddhaṁ śuṇṭhī.balā.vyāghrī.gokaṇṭaka.guḍaiḥ payaḥ |
AHS4.1.114c/ śopha.mūtra.śakṛd.vāta.vibandha.jvara.kāsa.jit || 114 ||
AHS4.1.115a/ vṛścīva.bilva.varṣābhū.sādhitaṁ jvara.śopha.nut |
AHS4.1.115c/ śiṁśipā.sāra.siddhaṁ ca kṣīram āśu jvarāpaham || 115 || [Note: AHS4.1.115v/ 1.115cv śiṁśipā.sāra.siddhaṁ vā]
AHS4.1.116a/ nirūhas tu balaṁ vahniṁ vi.jvara.tvaṁ mudaṁ rucim |
AHS4.1.116c/ doṣe yuktaḥ karoty āśu pakve pakvāśayaṁ gate || 116 ||
AHS4.1.117a/ pittaṁ vā kapha.pittaṁ vā pakvāśaya.gataṁ haret |
AHS4.1.117c/ sraṁsanaṁ trīn api malān vastiḥ pakvāśayāśrayān || 117 || [Note: AHS4.1.117v/ 1.117dv vastiḥ pakvāśayāśritān]
AHS4.1.118a/ prakṣīṇa.kapha.pittasya trika.pṛṣṭha.kaṭī.grahe |
AHS4.1.118c/ dīptāgner baddha.śakṛtaḥ prayuñjītānuvāsanam || 118 ||
AHS4.1.119a/ paṭola.nimba.cchadana.kaṭukā.caturaṅgulaiḥ |
AHS4.1.119c/ sthirā.balā.gokṣuraka.madanośīra.vālakaiḥ || 119 ||
AHS4.1.120a/ payasy ardhodake kvāthaṁ kṣīra.śeṣaṁ vimiśritam |
AHS4.1.120c/ kalkitair musta.madana.kṛṣṇā.madhuka.vatsakaiḥ || 120 ||
AHS4.1.121a/ vastiṁ madhu.ghṛtābhyāṁ ca pīḍayej jvara.nāśanam |
AHS4.1.121c/ catasraḥ parṇinīr yaṣṭī.phalośīra.nṛpadrumān || 121 ||
AHS4.1.122a/ kvāthayet kalkayed yaṣṭī.śatāhvā.phalinī.phalam |
AHS4.1.122c/ mustaṁ ca vastiḥ sa.guḍa.kṣaudra.sarpir jvarāpahaḥ || 122 ||
[Page 319 ]
AHS4.1.123a/ jīvantīṁ madanaṁ medāṁ pippalīṁ madhukaṁ vacām |
AHS4.1.123c/ ṛddhiṁ rāsnāṁ balāṁ bilvaṁ śatapuṣpāṁ śatāvarīm || 123 ||
AHS4.1.124a/ piṣṭvā kṣīraṁ jalaṁ sarpis tailaṁ caika.tra sādhitam |
AHS4.1.124c/ jvare 'nuvāsanaṁ dadyād yathā.snehaṁ yathā.malam || 124 || [Note: AHS4.1.124v/ 1.124cv jvare 'nuvāsanaṁ dadyāt 1.124dv tathā snehaṁ yathā malam 1.124dv yathā.doṣaṁ yathā.balam]
AHS4.1.125a/ ye ca siddhiṣu vakṣyante vastayo jvara.nāśanāḥ |
AHS4.1.125c/ śiro.rug.gaurava.śleṣma.haram indriya.bodhanam || 125 ||
AHS4.1.126a/ jīrṇa.jvare ruci.karaṁ dadyān nasyaṁ virecanam |
AHS4.1.126c/ snaihikaṁ śūnya.śiraso dāhārte pitta.nāśanam || 126 ||
AHS4.1.127a/ dhūma.gaṇḍūṣa.kavaḍān yathā.doṣaṁ ca kalpayet |
AHS4.1.127c/ pratiśyāyāsya.vairasya.śiraḥ.kaṇṭhāmayāpahān || 127 ||
AHS4.1.128a/ a.rucau mātuluṅgasya kesaraṁ sājya.saindhavam |
AHS4.1.128c/ dhātrī.drākṣā.sitānāṁ vā kalkam āsyena dhārayet || 128 ||
AHS4.1.129a/ yathopaśaya.saṁsparśān śītoṣṇa.dravya.kalpitān |
AHS4.1.129c/ abhyaṅgālepa.sekādīñ jvare jīrṇe tvag.āśrite || 129 ||
AHS4.1.130a/ kuryād añjana.dhūmāṁś ca tathaivāgantu.je 'pi tān |
AHS4.1.130c/ dāhe sahasra.dhautena sarpiṣābhyaṅgam ācaret || 130 ||
AHS4.1.131a/ sūtroktaiś ca gaṇais tais tair madhurāmla.kaṣāyakaiḥ |
AHS4.1.131c/ dūrvādibhir vā pitta.ghnaiḥ śodhanādi.gaṇoditaiḥ || 131 ||
AHS4.1.132a/ śīta.vīryair hima.sparśaiḥ kvātha.kalkī.kṛtaiḥ pacet |
AHS4.1.132c/ tailaṁ sa.kṣīram abhyaṅgāt sadyo dāha.jvaropaham || 132 ||
[Page 320 ]
AHS4.1.133a/ śiro gātraṁ ca tair eva nāti.piṣṭaiḥ pralepayet |
AHS4.1.133c/ tat.kvāthena parīṣekam avagāhaṁ ca yojayet || 133 ||
AHS4.1.134a/ tathāranāla.salila.kṣīra.śukta.ghṛtādibhiḥ |
AHS4.1.134c/ kapittha.mātuluṅgāmla.vidārī.lodhra.dāḍimaiḥ || 134 ||
AHS4.1.135a/ badarī.pallavotthena phenenāriṣṭakasya vā |
AHS4.1.135c/ lipte 'ṅge dāha.ruṅ.mohāś chardis tṛṣṇā ca śāmyati || 135 || [Note: AHS4.1.135v/ 1.135bv phenenāriṣṭakasya ca 1.135bv phenenāriṣṭa.jena vā]
AHS4.1.136a/ yo varṇitaḥ pitta.haro doṣopakramaṇe kramaḥ |
AHS4.1.136c/ taṁ ca śīlayataḥ śīghraṁ sa.dāho naśyati jvaraḥ || 136 ||
AHS4.1.137a/ vīryoṣṇair uṣṇa.saṁsparśais tagarāguru.kuṅkumaiḥ |
AHS4.1.137c/ kuṣṭha.sthauṇeya.śaileya.saralāmaradārubhiḥ || 137 ||
AHS4.1.138a/ nakha.rāsnā.pura.vacā.caṇḍailā.dvaya.corakaiḥ |
AHS4.1.138c/ pṛthvīkā.śigru.surasā.hiṁsrā.dhyāmaka.sarṣapaiḥ || 138 || [Note: AHS4.1.138v/ 1.138av nakha.rāsnā.mukha.vacā.]
AHS4.1.139a/ daśa.mūlāmṛtairaṇḍa.dvaya.pattūra.rohiṣaiḥ |
AHS4.1.139c/ tamāla.pattra.bhūtīka.śallakī.dhānya.dīpyakaiḥ || 139 || [Note: AHS4.1.139v/ 1.139cv tamāla.pattra.pūtīka.]
AHS4.1.140a/ miśi.māṣa.kulatthāgni.prakīryā.nākulī.dvayaiḥ |
AHS4.1.140c/ anyaiś ca tad.vidhair dravyaiḥ śīte tailaṁ jvare pacet || 140 ||
AHS4.1.141a/ kvathitaiḥ kalkitair yuktaiḥ surā.sauvīrakādibhiḥ |
AHS4.1.141c/ tenābhyañjyāt sukhoṣṇena taiḥ su.piṣṭaiś ca lepayet || 141 || [Note: AHS4.1.141v/ 1.141cv tenābhyajya sukhoṣṇena]
AHS4.1.142a/ kavoṣṇais taiḥ parīṣekam avagāhaṁ ca kalpayet |
AHS4.1.142c/ kevalair api tad.vac ca śukta.go.mūtra.mastubhiḥ || 142 ||
[Page 321 ]
AHS4.1.143a/ āragvadhādi.vargaṁ ca pānābhyañjana.lepane |
AHS4.1.143c/ dhūpān aguru.jān yāṁś ca vakṣyante viṣama.jvare || 143 || [Note: AHS4.1.143v/ 1.143cv dhūpān aguru.jān ye ca]
AHS4.1.144a/ agny.an.agni.kṛtān svedān svedi bheṣaja.bhojanan |
AHS4.1.144c/ garbha.bhū.veśma.śayanaṁ kutha.kambala.rallakān || 144 ||
AHS4.1.145a/ nir.dhūma.dīptair aṅgārair hasantīś ca hasantikāḥ |
AHS4.1.145c/ madyaṁ sa.try.ūṣaṇaṁ takraṁ kulattha.vrīhi.kodravān || 145 ||
AHS4.1.146a/ saṁśīlayed vepathu.mān yac cānyad api pittalam |
AHS4.1.146c/ dayitāḥ stana.śālinyaḥ pīnā vibhrama.bhūṣaṇāḥ || 146 || [Note: AHS4.1.146v/ 1.146av bhajec chītārdito yuktyā]
AHS4.1.147a/ yauvanāsava.mattāś ca tam āliṅgeyur aṅganāḥ |
AHS4.1.147c/ vīta.śītaṁ ca vijñāya tās tato 'panayet punaḥ || 147 || [Note: AHS4.1.147v/ 1.147cv vīta.śītaṁ tu viyatās]
AHS4.1.148a/ vardhanenaika.doṣasya kṣapaṇenocchritasya vā |
AHS4.1.148c/ kapha.sthānānupūrvyā vā tulya.kakṣāñ jayen malān || 148 || [Note: AHS4.1.148v/ 1.148bv kṣapaṇenocchritasya ca]
AHS4.1.148+1a/ śamayet pittam evādau jvareṣu samavāyiṣu |
AHS4.1.148+1c/ dur.nivāra.taraṁ tad dhi jvarārtānāṁ viśeṣataḥ || 148+1 ||
AHS4.1.148+2ab/ chardi.mūrchā.pipāsādīn a.virodhāñ jvarasya tu || 148+2ab ||
AHS4.1.149a/ sannipāta.jvarasyānte karṇa.mūle su.dāruṇaḥ |
AHS4.1.149c/ śophaḥ sañjāyate yena kaś.cid eva vimucyate || 149 || [Note: AHS4.1.149v/ 1.149cv śophaḥ sañjāyate tena 1.149dv kaś.cid eva pramucyate]
AHS4.1.150a/ raktāvasecanaiḥ śīghraṁ sarpiḥ.pānaiś ca taṁ jayet |
AHS4.1.150c/ pradehaiḥ kapha.pitta.ghnair nāvanaiḥ kavaḍa.grahaiḥ || 150 || [Note: AHS4.1.150v/ 1.150cv pradehaiḥ kapha.vāta.ghnair]
[Page 322 ]
AHS4.1.151a/ śītoṣṇa.snigdha.rūkṣādyair jvaro yasya na śāmyati |
AHS4.1.151c/ śākhānusārī tasyāśu muñced bāhvoḥ kramāt sirām || 151 ||
AHS4.1.152a/ ayam eva vidhiḥ kāryo viṣame 'pi yathā.yatham |
AHS4.1.152c/ jvare vibhajya vātādīn yaś cān.antaram ucyate || 152 || [Note: AHS4.1.152v/ 1.152bv viṣame ca yathā.yatham]
AHS4.1.153a/ paṭola.kaṭukā.mustā.prāṇadā.madhukaiḥ kṛtāḥ |
AHS4.1.153c/ tri.catuḥ.pañca.śaḥ kvāthā viṣama.jvara.nāśanāḥ || 153 ||
AHS4.1.154a/ yojayet tri.phalāṁ pathyāṁ guḍūcīṁ pippalīṁ pṛthak |
AHS4.1.154c/ tais tair vidhānaiḥ sa.guḍaṁ bhallātakam athāpi vā || 154 ||
AHS4.1.155a/ laṅghanaṁ bṛṁhaṇaṁ vādau jvarāgamana.vāsare |
AHS4.1.155c/ prātaḥ sa.tailaṁ laśunaṁ prāg.bhaktaṁ vā tathā ghṛtam || 155 || [Note: AHS4.1.155v/ 1.155av laṅghanaṁ bṛṁhaṇaṁ vāpi]
AHS4.1.156a/ jīrṇaṁ tad.vad dadhi payas takraṁ sarpiś ca ṣaṭ.palam |
AHS4.1.156c/ kalyāṇakaṁ pañca.gavyaṁ tiktākhyaṁ vṛṣa.sādhitam || 156 ||
AHS4.1.157a/ tri.phalā.kola.tarkārī.kvāthe dadhnā śṛtaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS4.1.157c/ tilvaka.tvak.kṛtāvāpaṁ viṣama.jvara.jit param || 157 ||
AHS4.1.158a/ surāṁ tīkṣṇaṁ ca yan madyaṁ śikhi.tittiri.dakṣa.jam |
AHS4.1.158c/ māṁsaṁ medyoṣṇa.vīryaṁ ca sahānnena pra.kāmataḥ || 158 || [Note: AHS4.1.158v/ 1.158bv śikhi.tittiri.kukkuṭāt 1.158cv māṁsaṁ madhyoṣṇa.vīryaṁ ca 1.158cv māṁsaṁ medhyoṣṇa.vīryaṁ ca]
AHS4.1.159a/ sevitvā tad.ahaḥ svapyād atha.vā punar ullikhet |
AHS4.1.159c/ sarpiṣo mahatīṁ mātrāṁ pītvā vā chardayet punaḥ || 159 ||
AHS4.1.160a/ nīlinīm ajagandhāṁ ca trivṛtāṁ kaṭu.rohiṇīm |
AHS4.1.160c/ pibej jvarasyāgamane sneha.svedopapāditaḥ || 160 ||
[Page 323 ]
AHS4.1.161a/ manohvā saindhavaṁ kṛṣṇā tailena nayanāñjanam |
AHS4.1.161c/ yojyaṁ hiṅgu.samā vyāghrī.vasā nasyaṁ sa.saindhavam || 161 ||
AHS4.1.162a/ purāṇa.sarpiḥ siṁhasya vasā tad.vat sa.saindhavā |
AHS4.1.162c/ palaṅkaṣā nimba.pattraṁ vacā kuṣṭhaṁ harītakī || 162 ||
AHS4.1.163a/ sarṣapāḥ sa.yavāḥ sarpir dhūpo viḍ vā biḍāla.jā |
AHS4.1.163c/ pura.dhyāma.vacā.sarja.nimbārkāguru.dārubhiḥ || 163 ||
AHS4.1.164a/ dhūpo jvareṣu sarveṣu kāryo 'yam a.parājitaḥ |
AHS4.1.164c/ dhūpa.nasyāñjanottrāsā ye coktāś citta.vaikṛte || 164 || [Note: AHS4.1.164v/ 1.164bv prayoktavyo '.parājitaḥ 1.164cv dhūpa.nasyāñjana.trāsā]
AHS4.1.165a/ daivāśrayaṁ ca bhaiṣajyaṁ jvarān sarvān vyapohati |
AHS4.1.165c/ viśeṣād viṣamān prāyas te hy āgantv.anubandha.jāḥ || 165 ||
AHS4.1.166a/ yathā.svaṁ ca sirāṁ vidhyed a.śāntau viṣama.jvare |
AHS4.1.166c/ kevalānila.vīsarpa.visphoṭābhihata.jvare || 166 || [Note: AHS4.1.166v/ 1.166bv a.śānte viṣama.jvare 1.166dv .visphoṭābhihate jvare]
AHS4.1.167a/ sarpiḥ.pāna.himālepa.seka.māṁsa.rasāśanam |
AHS4.1.167c/ kuryād yathā.svam uktaṁ ca rakta.mokṣādi sādhanam || 167 || [Note: AHS4.1.167v/ 1.167av sarpiḥ.pānaṁ himālepa. 1.167bv .sekān māṁsa.rasāśanam]
AHS4.1.168a/ grahotthe bhūta.vidyoktaṁ bali.mantrādi sādhanam |
AHS4.1.168c/ oṣadhi.gandha.je pitta.śamanaṁ viṣa.jid viṣe || 168 || [Note: AHS4.1.168v/ 1.168cv auṣadhi.gandha.je pitta.]
AHS4.1.169a/ iṣṭair arthair mano.jñaiś ca yathā.doṣa.śamena ca |
AHS4.1.169c/ hitā.hita.vivekaiś ca jvaraṁ krodhādi.jaṁ jayet || 169 ||
AHS4.1.170a/ krodha.jo yāti kāmena śāntiṁ krodhena kāma.jaḥ |
AHS4.1.170c/ bhaya.śokodbhavau tābhyāṁ bhī.śokābhyāṁ tathetarau || 170 ||
[Page 324 ]
AHS4.1.171a/ śāpātharvaṇa.mantrotthe vidhir daiva.vyapāśrayaḥ |
AHS4.1.171c/ te jvarāḥ kevalāḥ pūrvaṁ vyāpyante 'n.antaram malaiḥ || 171 ||
AHS4.1.172a/ tasmād doṣānusāreṇa teṣv āhārādi kalpayet |
AHS4.1.172c/ na hi jvaro 'nubadhnāti mārutādyair vinā kṛtaḥ || 172 ||
AHS4.1.173a/ jvara.kāla.smṛtiṁ cāsya hāribhir viṣayair haret |
AHS4.1.173c/ karuṇārdraṁ manaḥ śuddhaṁ sarva.jvara.vināśanam || 173 || [Note: AHS4.1.173v/ 1.173dv sarva.jvara.vimokṣaṇam]
AHS4.1.174a/ tyajed ā.bala.lābhāc ca vyāyāma.snāna.maithunam |
AHS4.1.174c/ gurv.a.sātmya.vidāhy annaṁ yac cānyaj jvara.kāraṇam || 174 ||
AHS4.1.175a/ na vi.jvaro 'pi sahasā sarvānnīno bhavet tathā |
AHS4.1.175c/ nivṛtto 'pi jvaraḥ śīghraṁ vyāpādayati dur.balam || 175 || [Note: AHS4.1.175v/ 1.175bv sarvānnīno bhavet tadā 1.175cv nivṛtto hi jvaraḥ śīghraṁ]
AHS4.1.176a/ sadyaḥ prāṇa.haro yasmāt tasmāt tasya viśeṣataḥ |
AHS4.1.176c/ tasyāṁ tasyām avasthāyāṁ tat tat kuryād bhiṣag.jitam || 176 || [Note: AHS4.1.176v/ 1.176dv tat tat kuryāc cikitsitam]
AHS4.1.177a/ oṣadhayo maṇayaś ca su.mantrāḥ sādhu.guru.dvi.ja.daivata.pūjāḥ |
AHS4.1.177c/ prīti.karā manaso viṣayāś ca ghnanty api viṣṇu.kṛtaṁ jvaram ugram || 177 || [Note: AHS4.1.177v/ 1.177av auṣadhayo maṇayaś ca su.mantrāḥ]

4.2. Chapter 2 :: Atharaktapittacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 325-328]
AHS4.2.001a/ ūrdhva.gaṁ balino '.vegam eka.doṣānugaṁ navam |
AHS4.2.001c/ rakta.pittaṁ sukhe kāle sādhayen nir.upadravam || 1 ||
AHS4.2.002a/ adho.gaṁ yāpayed raktaṁ yac ca doṣa.dvayānugam |
AHS4.2.002c/ śāntaṁ śāntaṁ punaḥ kupyan mārgān mārgāntaraṁ ca yat || 2 ||
AHS4.2.003a/ ati.pravṛttaṁ mandāgnes tri.doṣaṁ dvi.pathaṁ tyajet |
AHS4.2.003c/ jñātvā nidānam ayanaṁ malāv anu.balau balam || 3 ||
[Page 325 ]
AHS4.2.004a/ deśa.kālādy.avasthāṁ ca rakta.pitte prayojayet |
AHS4.2.004c/ laṅghanaṁ bṛṁhaṇaṁ vādau śodhanaṁ śamanaṁ tathā || 4 || [Note: AHS4.2.004v/ 2.4cv laṅghanaṁ bṛṁhaṇaṁ cādau]
AHS4.2.005a/ santarpaṇotthaṁ balino bahu.doṣasya sādhayet |
AHS4.2.005c/ ūrdhva.bhāgaṁ virekeṇa vamanena tv adho.gatam || 5 || [Note: AHS4.2.005v/ 2.5dv vamanena tv adho.gamam]
AHS4.2.006a/ śamanair bṛṁhaṇaiś cānyal laṅghya.bṛṁhyān avekṣya ca |
AHS4.2.006c/ ūrdhvaṁ pravṛtte śamanau rasau tikta.kaṣāyakau || 6 || [Note: AHS4.2.006v/ 2.6bv laṅghya.bṛṁhyān apekṣya ca]
AHS4.2.007a/ upavāsaś ca niḥ.śuṇṭhī.ṣaḍ.aṅgodaka.pāyinaḥ |
AHS4.2.007c/ adho.ge rakta.pitte tu bṛṁhaṇo madhuro rasaḥ || 7 ||
AHS4.2.008a/ ūrdhva.ge tarpaṇaṁ yojyaṁ prāk ca peyā tv adho.gate |
AHS4.2.008c/ aśnato balino '.śuddhaṁ na dhāryaṁ tad dhi roga.kṛt || 8 || [Note: AHS4.2.008v/ 2.8bv peyā pūrvam adho.gate 2.8bv prāk ca peyā tv adho.game 2.8bv vā prāk peyā tv adho.game]
AHS4.2.009a/ dhārayed anya.thā śīghram agni.vac chīghra.kāri tat |
AHS4.2.009c/ trivṛc.chyāmā.kaṣāyeṇa kalkena ca sa.śarkaram || 9 ||
AHS4.2.009.1+1a/ gala.grahaṁ pūti.nasyaṁ mūrchāyam a.ruciṁ jvaram |
AHS4.2.009.1+1c/ gulmaṁ plīhānam ānāhaṁ kilāsaṁ mūtra.kṛcchra.tām || 9.1+1 ||
AHS4.2.009.1+2a/ kuṣṭhāny arśāṁsi vīsarpaṁ varṇa.nāśaṁ bhagandaram |
AHS4.2.009.1+2c/ buddhīndriyoparodhaṁ ca kuryāt stambhitam āditaḥ || 9.1+2 ||
AHS4.2.010a/ sādhayed vidhi.val lehaṁ lihyāt pāṇi.talaṁ tataḥ |
AHS4.2.010c/ trivṛtā tri.phalā śyāmā pippalī śarkarā madhu || 10 ||
AHS4.2.011a/ modakaḥ sannipātordhva.rakta.śopha.jvarāpahaḥ |
AHS4.2.011c/ trivṛt sama.sitā tad.vat pippalī.pāda.saṁyutā || 11 || [Note: AHS4.2.011v/ 2.11bv .rakta.pitta.jvarāpahaḥ]
[Page 326 ]
AHS4.2.012a/ vamanaṁ phala.saṁyuktaṁ tarpaṇaṁ sa.sitā.madhu |
AHS4.2.012c/ sa.sitaṁ vā jalaṁ kṣaudra.yuktaṁ vā madhukodakam || 12 ||
AHS4.2.013a/ kṣīraṁ vā rasam ikṣor vā śuddhasyān.antaro vidhiḥ |
AHS4.2.013c/ yathā.svaṁ mantha.peyādiḥ prayojyo rakṣatā balam || 13 ||
AHS4.2.014a/ mantho jvarokto drākṣādiḥ pitta.ghnair vā phalaiḥ kṛtaḥ |
AHS4.2.014c/ madhu.kharjūra.mṛdvīkā.parūṣaka.sitāmbhasā || 14 ||
AHS4.2.015a/ mantho vā pañca.sāreṇa sa.ghṛtair lāja.saktubhiḥ |
AHS4.2.015c/ dāḍimāmalakāmlo vā mandāgny.amlābhilāṣiṇām || 15 || [Note: AHS4.2.015v/ 2.15dv mandāgny.amlābhilāṣiṇaḥ]
AHS4.2.016a/ kamalotpala.kiñjalka.pṛśniparṇī.priyaṅgukāḥ |
AHS4.2.016c/ uśīraṁ śabaraṁ lodhraṁ śṛṅgaveraṁ ku.candanam || 16 ||
AHS4.2.017a/ hrīveraṁ dhātakī.puṣpaṁ bilva.madhyaṁ durālabhā |
AHS4.2.017c/ ardhārdhair vihitāḥ peyā vakṣyante pāda.yaugikāḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS4.2.017v/ 2.17cv ardharcair vihitāḥ peyā 2.17cv ardhārdha.vihitāḥ peyā]
AHS4.2.018a/ bhūnimba.sevya.jaladā masūrāḥ pṛśniparṇy api |
AHS4.2.018c/ vidārigandhā mudgāś ca balā sarpir hareṇukāḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS4.2.018v/ 2.18dv balā sarpiḥ priyaṅgukāḥ]
AHS4.2.019a/ jāṅgalāni ca māṁsāni śīta.vīryāṇi sādhayet |
AHS4.2.019c/ pṛthak pṛthag jale teṣāṁ yavāgūḥ kalpayed rase || 19 ||
AHS4.2.020a/ śītāḥ sa.śarkarā.kṣaudrās tad.van māṁsa.rasān api |
AHS4.2.020c/ īṣad.amlān an.amlān vā ghṛta.bhṛṣṭān sa.śarkarān || 20 ||
AHS4.2.021a/ śūka.śimbī.bhavaṁ dhānyaṁ rakte śākaṁ ca śasyate |
AHS4.2.021c/ anna.sva.rūpa.vijñāne yad uktaṁ laghu.śītalam || 21 ||
[Page 327 ]
AHS4.2.022a/ pūrvoktam ambu pānīyaṁ pañca.mūlena vā śṛtam |
AHS4.2.022c/ laghunā śṛta.śītaṁ vā madhv.ambho vā phalāmbu vā || 22 ||
AHS4.2.023a/ śaśaḥ sa.vāstukaḥ śasto vibandhe tittiriḥ punaḥ |
AHS4.2.023c/ udumbarasya niryūhe sādhito mārute 'dhike || 23 ||
AHS4.2.024a/ plakṣasya barhiṇas tad.van nyagrodhasya ca kukkuṭaḥ |
AHS4.2.024c/ yat kiñ.cid rakta.pittasya nidānaṁ tac ca varjayet || 24 ||
AHS4.2.025a/ vāsā.rasena phalinī.mṛl.lodhrāñjana.mākṣikam |
AHS4.2.025c/ pittāsṛk śamayet pītaṁ niryāso vāṭarūṣakāt || 25 ||
AHS4.2.026a/ śarkarā.madhu.saṁyuktaḥ kevalo vā śṛto 'pi vā |
AHS4.2.026c/ vṛṣaḥ sadyo jayaty asraṁ sa hy asya param auṣadham || 26 ||
AHS4.2.027a/ paṭola.mālatī.nimba.candana.dvaya.padmakam |
AHS4.2.027c/ lodhro vṛṣas taṇḍulīyaḥ kṛṣṇā mṛn madayantikā || 27 || [Note: AHS4.2.027v/ 2.27av paṭolāmalakī.nimba.]
AHS4.2.028a/ śatāvarī gopakanyā kākolyau madhuyaṣṭikā |
AHS4.2.028c/ rakta.pitta.harāḥ kvāthās trayaḥ sa.madhu.śarkarāḥ || 28 ||
AHS4.2.029a/ palāśa.valka.kvātho vā su.śītaḥ śarkarānvitaḥ |
AHS4.2.029c/ lihyād vā madhu.sarpirbhyāṁ gavāśva.śakṛto rasam || 29 || [Note: AHS4.2.029v/ 2.29cv pibed vā madhu.sarpirbhyāṁ]
AHS4.2.030a/ sa.kṣaudraṁ grathite rakte lihyāt pārāvatāc chakṛt |
AHS4.2.030c/ ati.niḥsruta.raktaś ca kṣaudreṇa rudhiraṁ pibet || 30 || [Note: AHS4.2.030v/ 2.30bv lihyāt pārāvataṁ śakṛt 2.30cv ati.niḥsṛta.raktaś ca 2.30cv ati.niḥsṛta.rakto vā 2.30cv ati.niḥsruta.rakto vā]
AHS4.2.031a/ jāṅgalaṁ bhakṣayed vājam āmaṁ pitta.yutaṁ yakṛt |
AHS4.2.031c/ candanośīra.jalada.lāja.mudga.kaṇā.yavaiḥ || 31 ||
[Page 328 ]
AHS4.2.032a/ balā.jale paryuṣitaiḥ kaṣāyo rakta.pitta.hā |
AHS4.2.032c/ prasādaś candanāmbho.ja.sevya.mṛd.bhṛṣṭa.loṣṭa.jaḥ || 32 ||
AHS4.2.033a/ su.śītaḥ sa.sitā.kṣaudraḥ śoṇitāti.pravṛtti.jit |
AHS4.2.033c/ āpothya vā nave kumbhe plāvayed ikṣu.gaṇḍikāḥ || 33 ||
AHS4.2.034a/ sthitaṁ tad guptam ākāśe rātriṁ prātaḥ srutaṁ jalam |
AHS4.2.034c/ madhu.mad vikacāmbho.ja.kṛtottaṁsaṁ ca tad.guṇam || 34 ||
AHS4.2.035a/ ye ca pitta.jvare coktāḥ kaṣāyās tāṁś ca yojayet |
AHS4.2.035c/ kaṣāyair vividhair ebhir dīpte 'gnau vijite kaphe || 35 ||
AHS4.2.036a/ rakta.pittaṁ na cec chāmyet tatra vātolbaṇe payaḥ |
AHS4.2.036c/ yuñjyāc chāgaṁ śṛtaṁ tad.vad gavyaṁ pañca.guṇe 'mbhasi || 36 ||
AHS4.2.037a/ pañca.mūlena laghunā śṛtaṁ vā sa.sitā.madhu |
AHS4.2.037c/ jīvakarṣabhaka.drākṣā.balā.gokṣura.nāgaraiḥ || 37 ||
AHS4.2.038a/ pṛthak pṛthak śṛtaṁ kṣīraṁ sa.ghṛtaṁ sitayātha.vā |
AHS4.2.038c/ gokaṇṭakābhīru.śṛtaṁ parṇinībhis tathā payaḥ || 38 ||
AHS4.2.039a/ hanty āśu raktaṁ sa.rujaṁ viśeṣān mūtra.mārga.gam |
AHS4.2.039c/ viṇ.mārga.ge viśeṣeṇa hitaṁ moca.rasena tu || 39 ||
AHS4.2.040a/ vaṭa.prarohair śuṅgair vā śuṇṭhy.udīcyotpalair api |
AHS4.2.040c/ raktātīsāra.dur.nāma.cikitsāṁ cātra kalpayet || 40 || [Note: AHS4.2.040v/ 2.40av vaṭa.prarohair śṛṅgair vā]
AHS4.2.041a/ pītvā kaṣāyān payasā bhuñjīta payasaiva ca |
AHS4.2.041c/ kaṣāya.yogair ebhir vā vipakvaṁ pāyayed ghṛtam || 41 ||
[Page 329 ]
AHS4.2.042a/ sa.mūla.mastakaṁ kṣuṇṇaṁ vṛṣam aṣṭa.guṇe 'mbhasi |
AHS4.2.042c/ paktvāṣṭāṁśāvaśeṣeṇa ghṛtaṁ tena vipācayet || 42 ||
AHS4.2.043a/ tat.puṣpa.garbhaṁ tac chītaṁ sa.kṣaudraṁ pitta.śoṇitam |
AHS4.2.043c/ pitta.gulma.jvara.śvāsa.kāsa.hṛd.roga.kāmalāḥ || 43 ||
AHS4.2.044a/ timira.bhrama.vīsarpa.svara.sādāṁś ca nāśayet |
AHS4.2.044c/ palāśa.vṛnta.sva.rase tad.garbhaṁ ca ghṛtaṁ pacet || 44 ||
AHS4.2.045a/ sa.kṣaudraṁ tac ca rakta.ghnaṁ tathaiva trāyamāṇayā |
AHS4.2.045c/ rakte sa.picche sa.kaphe grathite kaṇṭha.mārga.ge || 45 ||
AHS4.2.046a/ lihyān mākṣika.sarpirbhyāṁ kṣāram utpala.nāla.jam |
AHS4.2.046c/ pṛthak pṛthak tathāmbho.ja.reṇu.śyāmā.madhūka.jam || 46 ||
AHS4.2.047a/ gudāgame viśeṣeṇa śoṇite vastir iṣyate |
AHS4.2.047c/ ghrāṇa.ge rudhire śuddhe nāvanaṁ cānuṣecayet || 47 ||
AHS4.2.048a/ kaṣāya.yogān pūrvoktān kṣīrekṣv.ādi.rasāplutān |
AHS4.2.048c/ kṣīrādīn sa.sitāṁs toyaṁ kevalaṁ vā jalaṁ hitaṁ || 48 || [Note: AHS4.2.048v/ 2.48bv kṣīrekṣv.ādi.rasa.plutān]
AHS4.2.049a/ raso dāḍima.puṣpāṇām āmrāsthnaḥ śādvalasya vā |
AHS4.2.049c/ kalpayec chīta.vargaṁ ca pradehābhyañjanādiṣu || 49 || [Note: AHS4.2.049v/ 2.49bv āmrāsthnaḥ śādvalasya ca]
AHS4.2.049.1+1a/ su.sūkṣmā māṣa.piṣṭī ca ghṛta.bhṛṣṭā śivasya ca |
AHS4.2.049.1+1c/ ruṇaddhi mūrdha.lepena nāsā.raktaṁ na saṁśayaḥ || 49.1+1 ||
AHS4.2.050a/ yac ca pitta.jvare proktaṁ bahir antaś ca bheṣajam |
AHS4.2.050c/ rakta.pitte hitaṁ tac ca kṣata.kṣīṇe hitaṁ ca yat || 50 ||

4.3. Chapter 3 :: Athakāsacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 328-338] [Page 330 ]
AHS4.3.001a/ kevalānila.jaṁ kāsaṁ snehair ādāv upācaret |
AHS4.3.001c/ vāta.ghna.siddhaiḥ snigdhaiś ca peyā.yūṣa.rasādibhiḥ || 1 ||
AHS4.3.002a/ lehair dhūmais tathābhyaṅga.sveda.sekāvagāhanaiḥ |
AHS4.3.002c/ vastibhir baddha.viḍ.vātaṁ sa.pittaṁ tūrdhva.bhaktikaiḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS4.3.002v/ 3.2dv sa.pittaṁ vordhva.bhaktikaiḥ 3.2dv sa.pittaṁ vordhva.bhaktikaiḥ]
AHS4.3.003a/ ghṛtaiḥ kṣīraiś ca sa.kaphaṁ jayet sneha.virecanaiḥ |
AHS4.3.003c/ guḍūcī.kaṇṭakārībhyāṁ pṛthak triṁśat.palād rase || 3 ||
AHS4.3.004a/ prasthaḥ siddho ghṛtād vāta.kāsa.nud vahni.dīpanaḥ |
AHS4.3.004c/ kṣāra.rāsnā.vacā.hiṅgu.pāṭhā.yaṣṭy.āhva.dhānyakaiḥ || 4 ||
AHS4.3.005a/ dvi.śāṇaiḥ sarpiṣaḥ prasthaṁ pañca.kola.yutaiḥ pacet |
AHS4.3.005c/ daśa.mūlasya niryūhe pīto maṇḍānupāyinā || 5 ||
AHS4.3.006a/ sa kāsa.śvāsa.hṛt.pārśva.grahaṇī.roga.gulma.nut |
AHS4.3.006c/ droṇe 'pāṁ sādhayed rāsnā.daśa.mūla.śatāvarīḥ || 6 ||
AHS4.3.007a/ palonmitā dvi.kuḍavaṁ kulatthaṁ badaraṁ yavaṁ |
AHS4.3.007c/ tulārdhaṁ cāja.māṁsasya tena sādhyaṁ ghṛtāḍhakam || 7 ||
AHS4.3.008a/ sama.kṣīraṁ palāṁśaiś ca jīvanīyaiḥ samīkṣya tat |
AHS4.3.008c/ prayuktaṁ vāta.rogeṣu pāna.nāvana.vastibhiḥ || 8 ||
AHS4.3.009a/ pañca.kāsāñ chiraḥ.kampaṁ yoni.vaṅkṣaṇa.vedanām |
AHS4.3.009c/ sarvāṅgaikāṅga.rogāṁś ca sa.plīhordhvānilāñ jayet || 9 ||
AHS4.3.010a/ vidāry.ādi.gaṇa.kvātha.kalka.siddhaṁ ca kāsa.jit |
AHS4.3.010c/ aśoka.bīja.kṣavaka.jantughnāñjana.padmakaiḥ || 10 ||
[Page 331 ]
AHS4.3.011a/ sa.viḍaiś ca ghṛtaṁ siddhaṁ tac.cūrṇaṁ vā ghṛta.plutam |
AHS4.3.011c/ lihyāt payaś cānupibed ājaṁ kāsāti.pīḍitaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS4.3.011v/ 3.11dv ājaṁ kāsābhipīḍitaḥ 3.11dv ājaṁ kāsādi.pīḍitaḥ]
AHS4.3.012a/ viḍaṅgaṁ nāgaraṁ rāsnā pippalī hiṅgu saindhavam |
AHS4.3.012c/ bhārgī kṣāraś ca tac cūrṇaṁ pibed vā ghṛta.mātrayā || 12 ||
AHS4.3.013a/ sa.kaphe 'nila.je kāse śvāsa.hidhmā.hatāgniṣu |
AHS4.3.013c/ durālabhāṁ śṛṅgaveraṁ śaṭhīṁ drākṣāṁ sitopalām || 13 || [Note: AHS4.3.013v/ 3.13dv śuṇṭhīṁ drākṣāṁ sitopalām]
AHS4.3.014a/ lihyāt karkaṭaśṛṅgīṁ ca kāse tailena vāta.je |
AHS4.3.014c/ duḥsparśāṁ pippalīṁ mustāṁ bhārgīṁ karkaṭakīṁ śaṭhīm || 14 ||
AHS4.3.015a/ purāṇa.guḍa.tailābhyāṁ cūrṇitāny avalehayet |
AHS4.3.015c/ tad.vat sa.kṛṣṇāṁ śuṇṭhīṁ ca sa.bhārgīṁ tad.vad eva ca || 15 ||
AHS4.3.016a/ pibec ca kṛṣṇāṁ koṣṇena salilena sa.saindhavām |
AHS4.3.016c/ mastunā sa.sitāṁ śuṇṭhīṁ dadhnā vā kaṇa.reṇukām || 16 || [Note: AHS4.3.016v/ 3.16dv dadhnā vā kaṇa.reṇukam]
AHS4.3.017a/ pibed badara.majjño vā madirā.dadhi.mastubhiḥ |
AHS4.3.017c/ atha.vā pippalī.kalkaṁ ghṛta.bhṛṣṭaṁ sa.saindhavam || 17 || [Note: AHS4.3.017v/ 3.17av pibed badara.majjāṁ vā]
AHS4.3.018a/ kāsī sa.pīnaso dhūmaṁ snaihikaṁ vidhinā pibet |
AHS4.3.018c/ hidhmā.śvāsokta.dhūmāṁś ca kṣīra.māṁsa.rasāśanaḥ || 18 ||
AHS4.3.019a/ grāmyānūpaudakaiḥ śāli.yava.godhūma.ṣaṣṭikān |
AHS4.3.019c/ rasair māṣātmaguptānāṁ yūṣair vā bhojayed dhitān || 19 || [Note: AHS4.3.019v/ 3.19av grāmyānūpodbhavaiḥ śāli.]
AHS4.3.020a/ yavānī.pippalī.bilva.madhya.nāgara.citrakaiḥ |
AHS4.3.020c/ rāsnājājī.pṛthakparṇī.palāśa.śaṭhi.pauṣkaraiḥ || 20 ||
[Page 332 ]
AHS4.3.021a/ siddhāṁ snigdhāmla.lavaṇāṁ peyām anila.je pibet |
AHS4.3.021c/ kaṭī.hṛt.pārśva.koṣṭhārti.śvāsa.hidhmā.praṇāśanīm || 21 ||
AHS4.3.022a/ daśa.mūla.rase tad.vat pañca.kola.guḍānvitām |
AHS4.3.022c/ pibet peyāṁ sama.tilāṁ kṣaireyīṁ vā sa.saindhavām || 22 ||
AHS4.3.023a/ mātsya.kaukkuṭa.vārāhair māṁsair vā sājya.saindhavām |
AHS4.3.023c/ vāstuko vāyasī.śākaṁ kāsaghnaḥ suniṣaṇṇakaḥ || 23 ||
AHS4.3.024a/ kaṇṭakāryāḥ phalaṁ pattraṁ bālaṁ śuṣkaṁ ca mūlakam |
AHS4.3.024c/ snehās tailādayo bhakṣyāḥ kṣīrekṣu.rasa.gauḍikāḥ || 24 ||
AHS4.3.025a/ dadhi.mastv.āranālāmla.phalāmbu.madirāḥ pibet |
AHS4.3.025c/ pitta.kāse tu sa.kaphe vamanaṁ sarpiṣā hitam || 25 ||
AHS4.3.026a/ tathā madana.kāśmarya.madhuka.kvathitair jalaiḥ |
AHS4.3.026c/ phala.yaṣṭy.āhva.kalkair vā vidārīkṣu.rasāplutaiḥ || 26 ||
AHS4.3.027a/ pitta.kāse tanu.kaphe trivṛtāṁ madhurair yutām |
AHS4.3.027c/ yuñjyād virekāya yutāṁ ghana.śleṣmaṇi tiktakaiḥ || 27 ||
AHS4.3.028a/ hṛta.doṣo himaṁ svādu snigdhaṁ saṁsarjanaṁ bhajet |
AHS4.3.028c/ ghane kaphe tu śiśiraṁ rūkṣaṁ tiktopasaṁhitam || 28 ||
AHS4.3.029a/ lehaḥ paitte sitā.dhātrī.kṣaudra.drākṣā.himotpalaiḥ |
AHS4.3.029c/ sa.ghṛtaḥ sānile hitaḥ sa.kaphe sābda.maricaḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS4.3.029v/ 3.29av lehaḥ pitte sitā.dhātrī.]
AHS4.3.030a/ mṛdvīkārdha.śataṁ triṁśat pippalīḥ śarkarā.palam |
AHS4.3.030c/ lehayen madhunā gor vā kṣīra.pasya śakṛd.rasam || 30 ||
[Page 333 ]
AHS4.3.031a/ tvag.elā.vyoṣa.mṛdvīkā.pippalī.mūla.pauṣkaraiḥ |
AHS4.3.031c/ lāja.mustā.śaṭhī.rāsnā.dhātrī.phala.vibhītakaiḥ || 31 ||
AHS4.3.032a/ śarkarā.kṣaudra.sarpirbhir leho hṛd.roga.kāsa.hā |
AHS4.3.032c/ madhurair jāṅgala.rasair yava.śyāmāka.kodravāḥ || 32 ||
AHS4.3.033a/ mudgādi.yūṣaiḥ śākaiś ca tiktakair mātrayā hitāḥ |
AHS4.3.033c/ ghana.śleṣmaṇi lehāś ca tiktakā madhu.saṁyutāḥ || 33 ||
AHS4.3.034a/ śālayaḥ syus tanu.kaphe ṣaṣṭikāś ca rasādibhiḥ |
AHS4.3.034c/ śarkarāmbho 'nu.pānārthaṁ drākṣekṣu.sva.rasāḥ payaḥ || 34 ||
AHS4.3.035a/ kākolī.bṛhatī.medā.dvayaiḥ sa.vṛṣa.nāgaraiḥ |
AHS4.3.035c/ pitta.kāse rasa.kṣīra.peyā.yūṣān prakalpayet || 35 ||
AHS4.3.036a/ drākṣāṁ kaṇāṁ pañca.mūlaṁ tṛṇākhyaṁ ca pacej jale |
AHS4.3.036c/ tena kṣīraṁ śṛtaṁ śītaṁ pibet sa.madhu.śarkaram || 36 ||
AHS4.3.037a/ sādhitāṁ tena peyāṁ vā su.śītāṁ madhunānvitām |
AHS4.3.037c/ śaṭhī.hrīvera.bṛhatī.śarkarā.viśva.bheṣajam || 37 ||
AHS4.3.038a/ piṣṭvā rasaṁ pibet pūtaṁ vastreṇa ghṛta.mūrchitam |
AHS4.3.038c/ medāṁ vidārīṁ kākolīṁ svayaṅguptā.phalaṁ balām || 38 ||
AHS4.3.039a/ śarkarāṁ jīvakaṁ mudga.māṣaparṇyau durālabhām |
AHS4.3.039c/ kalkī.kṛtya pacet sarpiḥ kṣīreṇāṣṭa.guṇena tat || 39 ||
AHS4.3.040a/ pāna.bhojana.leheṣu prayuktaṁ pitta.kāsa.jit |
AHS4.3.040c/ lihyād vā cūrṇam eteṣāṁ kaṣāyam atha.vā pibet || 40 ||
[Page 334 ]
AHS4.3.041a/ kapha.kāsī pibed ādau surakāṣṭhāt pradīpitāt |
AHS4.3.041c/ snehaṁ parisrutaṁ vyoṣa.yava.kṣārāvacūrṇitam || 41 || [Note: AHS4.3.041v/ 3.41av kapha.kāse pibed ādau]
AHS4.3.042a/ snigdhaṁ virecayed ūrdhvam adho mūrdhni ca yuktitaḥ |
AHS4.3.042c/ tīkṣṇair virekair balinaṁ saṁsargīṁ cāsya yojayet || 42 ||
AHS4.3.043a/ yava.mudga.kulatthānnair uṣṇa.rūkṣaiḥ kaṭūtkaṭaiḥ |
AHS4.3.043c/ kāsamardaka.vārtāka.vyāghrī.kṣāra.kaṇānvitaiḥ || 43 ||
AHS4.3.044a/ dhānva.baila.rasaiḥ snehais tila.sarṣapa.nimba.jaiḥ |
AHS4.3.044c/ daśa.mūlāmbu gharmāmbu madyaṁ madhv.ambu vā pibet || 44 || [Note: AHS4.3.044v/ 3.44av dhānva.baila.rasair lehais 3.44bv tila.sarṣapa.bilva.jaiḥ]
AHS4.3.045a/ mūlaiḥ pauṣkara.śamyāka.paṭolaiḥ saṁsthitaṁ niśām |
AHS4.3.045c/ pibed vāri saha.kṣaudraṁ kāleṣv annasya vā triṣu || 45 || [Note: AHS4.3.045v/ 3.45bv .paṭolair anvitaṁ niśām]
AHS4.3.046a/ pippalī pippalī.mūlaṁ śṛṅgaveraṁ vibhītakam |
AHS4.3.046c/ śikhi.kukkuṭa.picchānāṁ maṣī kṣāro yavodbhavaḥ || 46 ||
AHS4.3.047a/ viśālā pippalī.mūlaṁ trivṛtā ca madhu.dravāḥ |
AHS4.3.047c/ kapha.kāsa.harā lehās trayaḥ ślokārdha.yojitāḥ || 47 ||
AHS4.3.048a/ madhunā maricaṁ lihyān madhunaiva ca joṅgakam |
AHS4.3.048c/ pṛthag rasāṁś ca madhunā vyāghrī.vārtāka.bhṛṅga.jān || 48 ||
AHS4.3.049a/ kāsaghnasyāśva.śakṛtaḥ surasasyāsitasya ca |
AHS4.3.049c/ devadāru.śaṭhī.rāsnā.karkaṭākhyā.durālabhāḥ || 49 || [Note: AHS4.3.049v/ 3.49bv surasasyāsitasya vā]
AHS4.3.050a/ pippalī nāgaraṁ mustaṁ pathyā dhātrī sitopalā |
AHS4.3.050c/ lājāḥ sitopalā sarpiḥ śṛṅgī dhātrī.phalodbhavā || 50 || [Note: AHS4.3.050v/ 3.50dv śṛṅgī dhātrī.phalād rajaḥ]
[Page 335 ]
AHS4.3.051a/ madhu.taila.yutā lehās trayo vātānuge kaphe |
AHS4.3.051c/ dve pale dāḍimād aṣṭau guḍād vyoṣāt pala.trayam || 51 ||
AHS4.3.052a/ rocanaṁ dīpanaṁ svaryaṁ pīnasa.śvāsa.kāsa.jit |
AHS4.3.052c/ guḍa.kṣāroṣaṇa.kaṇā.dāḍimaṁ śvāsa.kāsa.jit || 52 || [Note: AHS4.3.052v/ 3.52dv .dāḍimāc chvāsa.kāsa.jit]
AHS4.3.053a/ kramāt pala.dvayārdhākṣa.karṣārdhākṣa.palonmitam |
AHS4.3.053c/ pibej jvaroktaṁ pathyādi sa.śṛṅgīkaṁ ca pācanam || 53 || [Note: AHS4.3.053v/ 3.53bv .karṣākṣārdha.palonmitam]
AHS4.3.054a/ atha.vā dīpyaka.trivṛd.viśālā.ghana.pauṣkaram |
AHS4.3.054c/ sa.kaṇaṁ kvathitaṁ mūtre kapha.kāsī jale 'pi vā || 54 ||
AHS4.3.055a/ taila.bhṛṣṭaṁ ca vaidehī.kalkākṣaṁ sa.sitopalam |
AHS4.3.055c/ pāyayet kapha.kāsa.ghnaṁ kulattha.salilāplutam || 55 ||
AHS4.3.056a/ daśa.mūlāḍhake prasthaṁ ghṛtasyākṣa.samaiḥ pacet |
AHS4.3.056c/ puṣkarāhva.śaṭhī.bilva.surasā.vyoṣa.hiṅgubhiḥ || 56 || [Note: AHS4.3.056v/ 3.56cv puṣkarākhya.śaṭhī.bilva.]
AHS4.3.057a/ peyānu.pānaṁ tat sarva.vāta.śleṣmāmayāpaham |
AHS4.3.057c/ nirguṇḍī.pattra.niryāsa.sādhitaṁ kāsa.jid ghṛtam || 57 ||
AHS4.3.057ū̆ab/ ghṛtaṁ rase viḍaṅgānāṁ vyoṣa.garbhaṁ ca sādhitam || 57ū̆ab ||
AHS4.3.058a/ punarnava.śivātikā.sarala.kāsamardāmṛtā. || 58a ||
AHS4.3.058b/ paṭola.bṛhatī.phaṇijjaka.rasaiḥ payaḥ.saṁyutaiḥ || 58b ||
AHS4.3.058c/ ghṛtaṁ tri.kaṭunā ca siddham upayujya sañjāyate || 58c ||
AHS4.3.058d/ na kāsa.viṣama.jvara.kṣaya.gudāṅkurebhyo bhayam || 58d ||
AHS4.3.059ab/ sa.mūla.phala.pattrāyāḥ kaṇṭakāryā rasāḍhake || 59ab || [Note: AHS4.3.059v/ 3.59av sa.mūla.phala.śākhāyāḥ]
[Page 336 ]
AHS4.3.060a/ ghṛta.prasthaṁ balā.vyoṣa.viḍaṅga.śaṭhi.dāḍimaiḥ |
AHS4.3.060c/ sauvarcala.yava.kṣāra.mūlāmalaka.pauṣkaraiḥ || 60 ||
AHS4.3.061a/ vṛścīva.bṛhatī.pathyā.yavānī.citrakarddhibhiḥ |
AHS4.3.061c/ mṛdvīkā.cavya.varṣābhū.durālabhāmla.vetasaiḥ || 61 ||
AHS4.3.062a/ śṛṅgī.tāmalakī.bhārgī.rāsnā.gokṣurakaiḥ pacet |
AHS4.3.062c/ kalkais tat sarva.kāseṣu śvāsa.hidhmāsu ceṣyate || 62 ||
AHS4.3.063a/ kaṇṭakārī.ghṛtaṁ caitat kapha.vyādhi.vināśanam |
AHS4.3.063c/ paced vyāghrī.tulāṁ kṣuṇṇāṁ vahe 'pām āḍhaka.sthite || 63 ||
AHS4.3.064a/ kṣipet pūte tu sañcūrṇya vyoṣa.rāsnāmṛtāgnikān |
AHS4.3.064c/ śṛṅgī.bhārgī.ghana.granthi.dhanvayāsān palārdhakān || 64 || [Note: AHS4.3.064v/ 3.64av kṣipet pūte ca sañcūrṇya]
AHS4.3.065a/ sarpiṣaḥ ṣo.ḍaśa.palaṁ catvāriṁśat palāni ca |
AHS4.3.065c/ matsyaṇḍikāyāḥ śuddhāyāḥ punaś ca tad adhiśrayet || 65 ||
AHS4.3.066a/ darvī.lepini śīte ca pṛthag dvi.kuḍavaṁ kṣipet |
AHS4.3.066c/ pippalīnāṁ tavakṣīryā mākṣikasyā.navasya ca || 66 || [Note: AHS4.3.066v/ 3.66cv pippalīnāṁ tukākṣīryā]
AHS4.3.067a/ leho 'yaṁ gulma.hṛd.roga.dur.nāma.śvāsa.kāsa.jit |
AHS4.3.067c/ śamanaṁ ca pibed dhūmaṁ śodhanaṁ bahale kaphe || 67 || [Note: AHS4.3.067v/ 3.67dv śodhanaṁ bahule kaphe]
AHS4.3.068a/ manaḥśilāla.madhuka.māṁsī.musteṅgudī.tvacaḥ |
AHS4.3.068c/ dhūmaṁ kāsa.ghna.vidhinā pītvā kṣīraṁ pibed anu || 68 ||
AHS4.3.069a/ niṣṭhyūtānte guḍa.yutaṁ koṣṇaṁ dhūmo nihanti saḥ |
AHS4.3.069c/ vāta.śleṣmottarān kāsān a.cireṇa ciran.tanān || 69 ||
[Page 337 ]
AHS4.3.070a/ tamakaḥ kapha.kāse tu syāc cet pittānubandha.jaḥ |
AHS4.3.070c/ pitta.kāsa.kriyāṁ tatra yathāvasthaṁ prayojayet || 70 ||
AHS4.3.071a/ kaphānubandhe pavane kuryāt kapha.harāṁ kriyām |
AHS4.3.071c/ pittānubandhayor vāta.kaphayoḥ pitta.nāśinīm || 71 ||
AHS4.3.072a/ vāta.śleṣmātmake śuṣke snigdham ārdre virūkṣaṇam |
AHS4.3.072c/ kāse karma sa.pitte tu kapha.je tikta.saṁyutam || 72 || [Note: AHS4.3.072v/ 3.72bv snigdhaṁ cārdre virūkṣaṇam]
AHS4.3.073a/ urasy antaḥ.kṣate sadyo lākṣāṁ kṣaudra.yutāṁ pibet |
AHS4.3.073c/ kṣīreṇa śālīn jīrṇe 'dyāt kṣīreṇaiva sa.śarkarān || 73 ||
AHS4.3.074a/ pārśva.vasti.sa.ruk cālpa.pittāgnis tāṁ surā.yutām |
AHS4.3.074c/ bhinna.viṭkaḥ sa.mustātiviṣā.pāṭhāṁ sa.vatsakām || 74 ||
AHS4.3.075a/ lākṣāṁ sarpir madhūcchiṣṭaṁ jīvanīyaṁ gaṇaṁ sitām |
AHS4.3.075c/ tvakkṣīrīṁ samitaṁ kṣīre paktvā dīptānalaḥ pibet || 75 || [Note: AHS4.3.075v/ 3.75cv tvakkṣīrīṁ sammitaṁ kṣīre]
AHS4.3.076a/ ikṣvārikā.bisa.granthi.padma.kesara.candanaiḥ |
AHS4.3.076c/ śṛtaṁ payo madhu.yutaṁ sandhānārthaṁ pibet kṣatī || 76 ||
AHS4.3.077a/ yavānāṁ cūrṇam āmānāṁ kṣīre siddhaṁ ghṛtānvitam |
AHS4.3.077c/ jvara.dāhe sitā.kṣaudra.saktūn vā payasā pibet || 77 || [Note: AHS4.3.077v/ 3.77bv kṣīra.siddhaṁ ghṛtānvitam]
AHS4.3.078a/ kāsa.vāṁs tu pibet sarpir madhurauṣadha.sādhitam |
AHS4.3.078c/ guḍodakaṁ vā kvathitaṁ sa.kṣaudra.maricaṁ hitam || 78 || [Note: AHS4.3.078v/ 3.78av kāsa.vāṁś ca pibet sarpir]
AHS4.3.079a/ cūrṇam āmalakānāṁ vā kṣīre pakvaṁ ghṛtānvitam |
AHS4.3.079c/ rasāyana.vidhānena pippalīr vā prayojayet || 79 || [Note: AHS4.3.079v/ 3.79bv kṣīra.pakvaṁ ghṛtānvitam]
[Page 338 ]
AHS4.3.080a/ kāsī parvāsthi.śūlī ca lihyāt sa.ghṛta.mākṣikāḥ |
AHS4.3.080c/ madhūka.madhuka.drākṣā.tvakkṣīrī.pippalī.balāḥ || 80 || [Note: AHS4.3.080v/ 3.80bv lihyāt sa.ghṛta.mākṣikān 3.80dv .tvakkṣīrī.pippalī.balān]
AHS4.3.081a/ tri.jātam ardha.karṣāṁśaṁ pippaly.ardha.palaṁ sitā |
AHS4.3.081c/ drākṣā madhūkaṁ kharjūraṁ palāśaṁ ślakṣṇa.cūrṇitam || 81 ||
AHS4.3.082a/ madhunā guṭikā ghnanti tā vṛṣyāḥ pitta.śoṇitam |
AHS4.3.082c/ kāsa.śvāsā.ruci.cchardi.mūrchā.hidhmā.mada.bhramān || 82 || [Note: AHS4.3.082v/ 3.82dv .mūrchā.hidhmā.vami.bhramān]
AHS4.3.083a/ kṣata.kṣaya.svara.bhraṁśa.plīha.śoṣāḍhya.mārutān |
AHS4.3.083c/ rakta.niṣṭhīva.hṛt.pārśva.ruk.pipāsā.jvarān api || 83 || [Note: AHS4.3.083v/ 3.83bv .plīha.śophāḍhya.mārutān]
AHS4.3.084a/ varṣābhū.śarkarā.rakta.śāli.taṇḍula.jaṁ rajaḥ |
AHS4.3.084c/ rakta.ṣṭhīvī pibet siddhaṁ drākṣā.rasa.payo.ghṛtaiḥ || 84 ||
AHS4.3.085a/ madhūka.madhuka.kṣīra.siddhaṁ vā taṇḍulīyakam |
AHS4.3.085c/ yathā.svaṁ mārga.visṛte rakte kuryāc ca bheṣajam || 85 ||
AHS4.3.086a/ mūḍha.vātas tv ajā.medaḥ surā.bhṛṣṭaṁ sa.saindhavam |
AHS4.3.086c/ kṣāmaḥ kṣīṇaḥ kṣatorasko manda.nidro 'gni.dīpti.mān || 86 ||
AHS4.3.087a/ śṛta.kṣīra.sareṇādyāt sa.ghṛta.kṣaudra.śarkaram |
AHS4.3.087c/ śarkarā.yava.godhūmaṁ jīvakarṣabhakau madhu || 87 || [Note: AHS4.3.087v/ 3.87cv śarkarāṁ yava.godhūmaṁ]
AHS4.3.088a/ śṛta.kṣīrānu.pānaṁ vā lihyāt kṣīṇaḥ kṣataḥ kṛśaḥ |
AHS4.3.088c/ kravyāt.piśita.niryūhaṁ ghṛta.bhṛṣṭaṁ pibec ca saḥ || 88 ||
AHS4.3.089a/ pippalī.kṣaudra.saṁyuktaṁ māṁsa.śoṇita.vardhanam |
AHS4.3.089c/ nyagrodhodumbarāśvattha.plakṣa.śāla.priyaṅgubhiḥ || 89 ||
[Page 339 ]
AHS4.3.090a/ tāla.mastaka.jambū.tvak.priyālaiś ca sa.padmakaiḥ |
AHS4.3.090c/ sāśvakarṇaiḥ śṛtāt kṣīrād adyāj jātena sarpiṣā || 90 ||
AHS4.3.091a/ śāly.odanaṁ kṣatoraskaḥ kṣīṇa.śukra.balendriyaḥ |
AHS4.3.091c/ vāta.pittārdite 'bhyaṅgo gātra.bhede ghṛtair mataḥ || 91 ||
AHS4.3.092a/ tailaiś cānila.roga.ghnaiḥ pīḍite mātariśvanā |
AHS4.3.092c/ hṛt.pārśvārtiṣu pānaṁ syāj jīvanīyasya sarpiṣaḥ || 92 || [Note: AHS4.3.092v/ 3.92cv hṛta.pārśvārtau tu pānaṁ syāj]
AHS4.3.093a/ kuryād vā vāta.roga.ghnaṁ pitta.raktā.virodhi yat |
AHS4.3.093c/ yaṣṭy.āhva.nāgabalayoḥ kvāthe kṣīra.same ghṛtam || 93 ||
AHS4.3.094a/ payasyā.pippalī.vāṁśī.kalkaiḥ siddhaṁ kṣate hitam |
AHS4.3.094c/ jīvanīyo gaṇaḥ śuṇṭhī varī vīrā punarnavā || 94 ||
AHS4.3.095a/ balā.bhārgī.svaguptarddhi.śaṭhī.tāmalakī.kaṇāḥ |
AHS4.3.095c/ śṛṅgāṭakaṁ payasyā ca pañca.mūlaṁ ca yal laghu || 95 ||
AHS4.3.096a/ drākṣākṣoṭādi ca phalaṁ madhura.snigdha.bṛṁhaṇam |
AHS4.3.096c/ taiḥ pacet sarpiṣaḥ prasthaṁ karṣāṁśaiḥ ślakṣṇa.kalkitaiḥ || 96 ||
AHS4.3.097a/ kṣīra.dhātrī.vidārīkṣu.cchāga.māṁsa.rasānvitam |
AHS4.3.097c/ prasthārdhaṁ madhunaḥ śīte śarkarārdha.tulā.rajaḥ || 97 ||
AHS4.3.098a/ palārdhakaṁ ca marica.tvag.elā.pattra.kesaram |
AHS4.3.098c/ vinīya prasṛtaṁ tasmāl lihyān mātrāṁ yathā.balam || 98 || [Note: AHS4.3.098v/ 3.98dv lihyān mātrāṁ yathānalam]
AHS4.3.099a/ amṛta.prāśam ity etan narāṇām amṛtaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS4.3.099c/ sudhāmṛta.rasaṁ prāśyaṁ kṣīra.māṁsa.rasāśinā || 99 ||
[Page 340 ]
AHS4.3.100a/ naṣṭa.śukra.kṣata.kṣīṇa.dur.bala.vyādhi.karśitān |
AHS4.3.100c/ strī.prasaktān kṛśān varṇa.svara.hīnāṁś ca bṛṁhayet || 100 || [Note: AHS4.3.100v/ 3.100bv .dur.bala.vyādhi.karṣitān]
AHS4.3.101a/ kāsa.hidhmā.jvara.śvāsa.dāha.tṛṣṇāsra.pitta.nut |
AHS4.3.101c/ putra.daṁ chardi.mūrchā.hṛd.yoni.mūtrāmayāpaham || 101 ||
AHS4.3.102a/ śvadaṁṣṭrośīra.mañjiṣṭhā.balā.kāśmarya.kaṭtṛṇam |
AHS4.3.102c/ darbha.mūlaṁ pṛthakparṇīṁ palāśarṣabhakau sthirām || 102 ||
AHS4.3.103a/ pālikāni pacet teṣāṁ rase kṣīra.catur.guṇe |
AHS4.3.103c/ kalkaiḥ svaguptā.jīvantī.medarṣabhaka.jīvakaiḥ || 103 ||
AHS4.3.104a/ śatāvary.ṛddhi.mṛdvīkā.śarkarā.śrāvaṇī.bisaiḥ |
AHS4.3.104c/ prasthaḥ siddho ghṛtād vāta.pitta.hṛd.roga.śūla.nut || 104 || [Note: AHS4.3.104v/ 3.104dv .pitta.hṛd.drava.śūla.nut]
AHS4.3.105a/ mūtra.kṛcchra.pramehārśaḥ.kāsa.śoṣa.kṣayāpahaḥ |
AHS4.3.105c/ dhanuḥ.strī.madya.bhārādhva.khinnānāṁ bala.māṁsa.daḥ || 105 ||
AHS4.3.106a/ madhukāṣṭa.pala.drākṣā.prastha.kvāthe paced ghṛtam |
AHS4.3.106c/ pippaly.aṣṭa.pale kalke prasthaṁ siddhe ca śītale || 106 ||
AHS4.3.107a/ pṛthag aṣṭa.palaṁ kṣaudra.śarkarābhyāṁ vimiśrayet |
AHS4.3.107c/ sama.saktu kṣata.kṣīṇa.rakta.gulmeṣu tad dhitam || 107 ||
AHS4.3.108a/ dhātrī.phala.vidārīkṣu.jīvanīya.rasād ghṛtāt |
AHS4.3.108c/ gavyājayoś ca payasoḥ prasthaṁ prasthaṁ vipācayet || 108 ||
AHS4.3.109a/ siddha.śīte sitā.kṣaudraṁ dvi.prasthaṁ vinayet tataḥ |
AHS4.3.109c/ yakṣmāpasmāra.pittāsṛk.kāsa.meha.kṣayāpaham || 109 || [Note: AHS4.3.109v/ 3.109av siddha.pūte sitā.kṣaudraṁ 3.109dv .kāsa.meha.jvarāpaham]
[Page 341 ]
AHS4.3.110a/ vayaḥ.sthāpanam āyuṣyaṁ māṁsa.śukra.bala.pradam |
AHS4.3.110c/ ghṛtaṁ tu pitte 'bhyadhike lihyād vāte 'dhike pibet || 110 || [Note: AHS4.3.110v/ 3.110dv lihyād vātādhike pibet]
AHS4.3.111a/ līḍhaṁ nirvāpayet pittam alpa.tvād dhanti nānalam |
AHS4.3.111c/ ākrāmaty anilaṁ pītam ūṣmāṇaṁ niruṇaddhi ca || 111 ||
AHS4.3.112a/ kṣāma.kṣīṇa.kṛśāṅgānām etāny eva ghṛtāni tu |
AHS4.3.112c/ tvakkṣīrī.śarkarā.lāja.cūrṇaiḥ styānāni yojayet || 112 || [Note: AHS4.3.112v/ 3.112cv tvakkṣīrī.pippalī.lāja. 3.112dv .cūrṇaiḥ pānāni yojayet]
AHS4.3.113a/ sarpir.guḍān sa.madhv.aṁśān kṛtvā dadyāt payo 'nu ca |
AHS4.3.113c/ reto vīryaṁ balaṁ puṣṭiṁ tair āśu.taram āpnuyāt || 113 ||
AHS4.3.114a/ vīta.tvag.asthi.kūṣmāṇḍa.tulāṁ svinnāṁ punaḥ pacet |
AHS4.3.114c/ ghaṭṭayan sarpiṣaḥ prasthe kṣaudra.varṇe 'tra ca kṣipet || 114 || [Note: AHS4.3.114v/ 3.114dv kṣaudra.varṇe tu nikṣipet]
AHS4.3.115a/ khaṇḍāc chataṁ kaṇā.śuṇṭhyor dvi.palaṁ jīrakād api |
AHS4.3.115c/ tri.jāta.dhānya.maricaṁ pṛthag ardha.palāṁśakam || 115 ||
AHS4.3.116a/ avatārita.śīte ca dattvā kṣaudraṁ ghṛtārdhakam |
AHS4.3.116c/ khajenāmathya ca sthāpyaṁ tan nihanty upayojitam || 116 ||
AHS4.3.117a/ kāsa.hidhmā.jvara.śvāsa.rakta.pitta.kṣata.kṣayān |
AHS4.3.117c/ uraḥ.sandhāna.jananaṁ medhā.smṛti.bala.pradam || 117 ||
AHS4.3.118a/ aśvibhyāṁ vihitaṁ hṛdyaṁ kūṣmāṇḍaka.rasāyanam |
AHS4.3.118c/ piben nāgabalā.mūlasyārdha.karṣābhivardhitam || 118 || [Note: AHS4.3.118v/ 3.118dv ṁyārdha.karṣādi.vardhitam 3.118dv ṁyārdha.karṣa.vivardhitam]
AHS4.3.119a/ palaṁ kṣīra.yutaṁ māsaṁ kṣīra.vṛttir an.anna.bhuk |
AHS4.3.119c/ eṣa prayogaḥ puṣṭy.āyur.bala.varṇa.karaḥ param || 119 ||
[Page 342 ]
AHS4.3.120a/ maṇḍūkaparṇyāḥ kalpo 'yaṁ yaṣṭyā viśvauṣadhasya ca |
AHS4.3.120c/ pāda.śeṣaṁ jala.droṇe pacen nāgabalā.tulām || 120 ||
AHS4.3.121a/ tena kvāthena tulyāṁśaṁ ghṛtaṁ kṣīraṁ ca sādhayet |
AHS4.3.121c/ palārdhikaiś cātibalā.balā.yaṣṭī.punarnavaiḥ || 121 ||
AHS4.3.122a/ prapauṇḍarīka.kāśmarya.priyāla.kapikacchubhiḥ |
AHS4.3.122c/ aśvagandhā.sitābhīru.medā.yugma.trikaṇṭakaiḥ || 122 ||
AHS4.3.123a/ kākolī.kṣīra.kākolī.kṣīraśuklā.dvi.jīrakaiḥ |
AHS4.3.123c/ mṛṇāla.bisa.kharjūra.śṛṅgāṭaka.kaserukaiḥ || 123 || [Note: AHS4.3.123v/ 3.123bv .kṣīraśuklā.dvi.jīvakaiḥ]
AHS4.3.124a/ etan nāgabalā.sarpiḥ pitta.rakta.kṣata.kṣayān |
AHS4.3.124c/ jayet tṛḍ.bhrama.dāhāṁś ca bala.puṣṭi.karaṁ param || 124 ||
AHS4.3.125a/ varṇyam āyuṣyam ojasyaṁ valī.palita.nāśanam |
AHS4.3.125c/ upayujya ca ṣaṇ māsān vṛddho 'pi taruṇāyate || 125 || [Note: AHS4.3.125v/ 3.125cv upayujya tu ṣaṇ.māsād]
AHS4.3.126a/ dīpte 'gnau vidhir eṣa syān mande dīpana.pācanaḥ |
AHS4.3.126c/ yakṣmoktaḥ kṣatināṁ śasto grāhī śakṛti tu drave || 126 ||
AHS4.3.127a/ daśa.mūlaṁ svayaṅguptāṁ śaṅkhapuṣpīṁ śaṭhīṁ balām |
AHS4.3.127c/ hasti.pippaly.apāmārga.pippalī.mūla.citrakān || 127 ||
AHS4.3.128a/ bhārgīṁ puṣkara.mūlaṁ ca dvi.palāṁśaṁ yavāḍhakam |
AHS4.3.128c/ harītakī.śataṁ caikaṁ jala.pañcāḍhake pacet || 128 || [Note: AHS4.3.128v/ 3.128bv dvi.palāṁśān yavāḍhakam 3.128dv jale pañcāḍhake pacet]
AHS4.3.129a/ yava.svede kaṣāyaṁ taṁ pūtaṁ tac cābhayā.śatam |
AHS4.3.129c/ paced guḍa.tulāṁ dattvā kuḍavaṁ ca pṛthag ghṛtāt || 129 || [Note: AHS4.3.129v/ 3.129av yave svinne kaṣāyaṁ taṁ]
[Page 343 ]
AHS4.3.130a/ tailāt sa.pippalī.cūrṇāt siddha.śīte ca mākṣikāt |
AHS4.3.130c/ lehaṁ dve cābhaye nityam ataḥ khāded rasāyanāt || 130 || [Note: AHS4.3.130v/ 3.130cv lehe dve cābhaye nityam]
AHS4.3.131a/ tad valī.palitaṁ hanyād varṇāyur.bala.vardhanam |
AHS4.3.131c/ pañca.kāsān kṣayaṁ śvāsaṁ sa.hidhmaṁ viṣama.jvaram || 131 ||
AHS4.3.132a/ meha.gulma.grahaṇy.arśo.hṛd.rogā.ruci.pīnasān |
AHS4.3.132c/ agastya.vihitaṁ dhanyam idaṁ śreṣṭhaṁ rasāyanam || 132 ||
AHS4.3.133a/ daśa.mūlaṁ balāṁ mūrvāṁ haridre pippalī.dvayam |
AHS4.3.133c/ pāṭhāśvagandhāpāmārga.svaguptātiviṣāmṛtāḥ || 133 || [Note: AHS4.3.133v/ 3.133bv haridrā.pippalī.dvayam 3.133dv .svaguptātiviṣāmṛtam]
AHS4.3.134a/ bāla.bilvaṁ trivṛd.dantī.mūlaṁ pattraṁ ca citrakāt |
AHS4.3.134c/ payasyāṁ kuṭajaṁ hiṁsrāṁ puṣpaṁ sāraṁ ca bījakāt || 134 ||
AHS4.3.135a/ boṭa.sthavira.bhallāta.vikaṅkata.śatāvarīḥ |
AHS4.3.135c/ pūti.karañja.śamyāka.candralekhā.sahācaram || 135 || [Note: AHS4.3.135v/ 3.135dv .candralekhā.sahācarāt]
AHS4.3.136a/ śaubhāñjanaka.nimba.tvag.ikṣuraṁ ca palāṁśakam |
AHS4.3.136c/ pathyā.sahasraṁ sa.śataṁ yavānāṁ cāḍhaka.dvayam || 136 ||
AHS4.3.137a/ paced aṣṭa.guṇe toye yava.svede 'vatārayet |
AHS4.3.137c/ pūte kṣipet sa.pathye ca tatra jīrṇa.guḍāt tulām || 137 || [Note: AHS4.3.137v/ 3.137cv pūte kṣipet sa.pathyāṁ ca]
AHS4.3.138a/ tailājya.dhātrī.rasataḥ prasthaṁ prasthaṁ tataḥ punaḥ |
AHS4.3.138c/ adhiśrayen mṛdāv agnau darvī.lepe 'vatārya ca || 138 ||
AHS4.3.139a/ śīte prastha.dvayaṁ kṣaudrāt pippalī.kuḍavaṁ kṣipet |
AHS4.3.139c/ cūrṇī.kṛtaṁ tri.jātāc ca tri.palaṁ nikhanet tataḥ || 139 ||
[Page 344 ]
AHS4.3.140a/ dhānye purāṇa.kumbha.sthaṁ māsaṁ khādec ca pūrva.vat |
AHS4.3.140c/ rasāyanaṁ vasiṣṭhoktam etat pūrva.guṇādhikam || 140 ||
AHS4.3.141a/ svasthānāṁ niṣ.parīhāraṁ sarvartuṣu ca śasyate |
AHS4.3.141c/ pālikaṁ saindhavaṁ śuṇṭhī dve ca sauvarcalāt pale || 141 ||
AHS4.3.142a/ kuḍavāṁśāni vṛkṣāmlaṁ dāḍimaṁ pattram ārjakāt |
AHS4.3.142c/ ekaikāṁ maricājājyor dhānyakād dve caturthike || 142 || [Note: AHS4.3.142v/ 3.142bv dāḍimaṁ pattram ārjakam]
AHS4.3.143a/ śarkarāyāḥ palāny atra daśa dve ca pradāpayet |
AHS4.3.143c/ kṛtvā cūrṇam ato mātrām anna.pāneṣu dāpayet || 143 ||
AHS4.3.144a/ rucyaṁ tad dīpanaṁ balyaṁ pārśvārti.śvāsa.kāsa.jit |
AHS4.3.144c/ ekāṁ ṣo.ḍaśikāṁ dhānyād dve dve cājāji.dīpyakāt || 144 || [Note: AHS4.3.144v/ 3.144bv pārśvārti.śvāsa.kāsa.nut]
