AHS4.3.145a/ tābhyāṁ dāḍima.vṛkṣāmle dvir dviḥ sauvarcalāt palam |
AHS4.3.145c/ śuṇṭhyāḥ karṣaṁ dadhitthasya madhyāt pañca palāni ca || 145 || [Note: AHS4.3.145v/ 3.145cv śuṇṭhyāḥ karṣaṁ kapitthasya]
AHS4.3.146a/ tac cūrṇaṁ ṣo.ḍaśa.palaiḥ śarkarāyā vimiśrayet |
AHS4.3.146c/ ṣāḍavo 'yaṁ pradeyaḥ syād anna.pāneṣu pūrva.vat || 146 ||
AHS4.3.147a/ vidhiś ca yakṣma.vihito yathāvasthaṁ kṣate hitaḥ |
AHS4.3.147c/ nivṛtte kṣata.doṣe tu kaphe vṛddha uraḥ śiraḥ || 147 ||
AHS4.3.148a/ dālyate kāsino yasya sa nā dhūmān pibed imān |
AHS4.3.148c/ dvi.medā.dvi.balā.yaṣṭī.kalkaiḥ kṣaume su.bhāvite || 148 || [Note: AHS4.3.148v/ 3.148av dālyete kāsino yasya 3.148bv sa dhūmān nā pibed imān]
AHS4.3.149a/ vartiṁ kṛtvā pibed dhūmaṁ jīvanīya.ghṛtānupaḥ |
AHS4.3.149c/ manaḥśilā.palāśājagandhā.tvakkṣīri.nāgaraiḥ || 149 ||
[Page 345 ]
AHS4.3.150a/ tad.vad evānu.pānaṁ tu śarkarekṣu.guḍodakam |
AHS4.3.150c/ piṣṭvā manaḥśilāṁ tulyām ārdrayā vaṭa.śuṅgayā || 150 ||
AHS4.3.151a/ sa.sarpiṣkaṁ pibed dhūmaṁ tittiri.pratibhojanam |
AHS4.3.151c/ kṣaya.je bṛṁhaṇaṁ pūrvaṁ kuryād agneś ca vardhanam || 151 || [Note: AHS4.3.151v/ 3.151bv tittiri.pratibhojitam]
AHS4.3.152a/ bahu.doṣāya sa.snehaṁ mṛdu dadyād virecanam |
AHS4.3.152c/ śamyākena trivṛtayā mṛdvīkā.rasa.yuktayā || 152 ||
AHS4.3.153a/ tilvakasya kaṣāyeṇa vidārī.sva.rasena ca |
AHS4.3.153c/ sarpiḥ siddhaṁ pibed yuktyā kṣīṇa.deho viśodhanam || 153 ||
AHS4.3.154a/ pitte kaphe dhātuṣu ca kṣīṇeṣu kṣaya.kāsa.vān |
AHS4.3.154c/ ghṛtaṁ karkaṭakī.kṣīra.dvi.balā.sādhitaṁ pibet || 154 ||
AHS4.3.155a/ vidārībhiḥ kadambair vā tāla.sasyaiś ca sādhitam |
AHS4.3.155c/ ghṛtaṁ payaś ca mūtrasya vaivarṇye kṛcchra.nirgame || 155 ||
AHS4.3.156a/ śūne sa.vedane meḍhre pāyau sa.śroṇi.vaṅkṣaṇe |
AHS4.3.156c/ ghṛta.maṇḍena laghunānuvāsyo miśrakeṇa vā || 156 ||
AHS4.3.157a/ jāṅgalair pratibhuktasya vartakādyā bile.śayāḥ |
AHS4.3.157c/ krama.śaḥ prasahās tad.vat prayojyāḥ piśitāśinaḥ || 157 ||
AHS4.3.158a/ auṣṇyāt pramāthi.bhāvāc ca srotobhyaś cyāvayanti te |
AHS4.3.158c/ kaphaṁ śuddhaiś ca taiḥ puṣṭiṁ kuryāt samyag vahan rasaḥ || 158 ||
AHS4.3.159a/ cavikā.tri.phalā.bhārgī.daśa.mūlaiḥ sa.citrakaiḥ |
AHS4.3.159c/ kulattha.pippalī.mūla.pāṭhā.kola.yavair jale || 159 ||
[Page 346 ]
AHS4.3.160a/ śṛtair nāgara.duḥsparśā.pippalī.śaṭhi.pauṣkaraiḥ |
AHS4.3.160c/ piṣṭaiḥ karkaṭaśṛṅgyā ca samaiḥ sarpir vipācayet || 160 ||
AHS4.3.161a/ siddhe 'smiṁś cūrṇitau kṣārau dvau pañca lavaṇāni ca |
AHS4.3.161c/ dattvā yuktyā piben mātrāṁ kṣaya.kāsa.nipīḍitaḥ || 161 || [Note: AHS4.3.161v/ 3.161bv dvau pañca lavaṇāni tu]
AHS4.3.162a/ kāsamardābhayā.mustā.pāṭhā.kaṭphala.nāgaraiḥ |
AHS4.3.162c/ pippalyā kaṭu.rohiṇyā kāśmaryā surasena ca || 162 ||
AHS4.3.163a/ akṣa.mātrair ghṛta.prasthaṁ kṣīra.drākṣā.rasāḍhake |
AHS4.3.163c/ pacec choṣa.jvara.plīha.sarva.kāsa.haraṁ śivam || 163 ||
AHS4.3.164a/ vṛṣa.vyāghrī.guḍūcīnāṁ pattra.mūla.phalāṅkurāt |
AHS4.3.164c/ rasa.kalkair ghṛtaṁ pakvaṁ hanti kāsa.jvarā.rucīḥ || 164 ||
AHS4.3.165a/ dvi.guṇe dāḍima.rase siddhaṁ vā vyoṣa.saṁyutam |
AHS4.3.165c/ pibed upari bhuktasya yava.kṣāra.yutaṁ naraḥ || 165 || [Note: AHS4.3.165v/ 3.165cv pibed upari bhaktasya 3.165dv yava.kṣāra.ghṛtaṁ naraḥ 3.165dv yava.kṣāra.yutaṁ ghṛtam]
AHS4.3.166a/ pippalī.guḍa.siddhaṁ vā chāga.kṣīra.yutaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS4.3.166c/ etāny agni.vivṛddhy.arthaṁ sarpīṁṣi kṣaya.kāsinām || 166 ||
AHS4.3.167a/ syur doṣa.baddha.kaṇṭhoraḥ.srotasāṁ ca viśuddhaye |
AHS4.3.167c/ prasthonmite yava.kvāthe viṁśatiṁ vijayāḥ pacet || 167 ||
AHS4.3.168a/ svinnā mṛditvā tās tasmin purāṇāt ṣaṭ.palaṁ guḍāt |
AHS4.3.168c/ pippalyā dvi.palaṁ karṣaṁ manohvāyā rasāñjanāt || 168 ||
AHS4.3.169a/ dattvārdhākṣaṁ paced bhūyaḥ sa lehaḥ śvāsa.kāsa.jit |
AHS4.3.169c/ śvāvidhāṁ sūcayo dagdhāḥ sa.ghṛta.kṣaudra.śarkarāḥ || 169 || [Note: AHS4.3.169v/ 3.169bv sa lehaḥ śvāsa.kāsa.nut]
[Page 347 ]
AHS4.3.170a/ śvāsa.kāsa.harā barhi.pādau vā madhu.sarpiṣā |
AHS4.3.170c/ eraṇḍa.pattra.kṣāraṁ vā vyoṣa.taila.guḍānvitam || 170 ||
AHS4.3.171a/ lehayet kṣāram evaṁ vā surasairaṇḍa.pattra.jam |
AHS4.3.171c/ lihyāt try.ūṣaṇa.cūrṇaṁ vā purāṇa.guḍa.sarpiṣā || 171 ||
AHS4.3.172a/ padmakaṁ tri.phalā vyoṣaṁ viḍaṅgaṁ devadāru ca |
AHS4.3.172c/ balā rāsnā ca tac.cūrṇaṁ samastaṁ sama.śarkaram || 172 || [Note: AHS4.3.172v/ 3.172dv samasta.sama.śarkaram]
AHS4.3.173a/ khāden madhu.ghṛtābhyāṁ vā lihyāt kāsa.haraṁ param |
AHS4.3.173c/ tad.van marica.cūrṇaṁ vā sa.ghṛta.kṣaudra.śarkaram || 173 || [Note: AHS4.3.173v/ 3.173cv tad.van marica.cūrṇaṁ ca]
AHS4.3.174a/ pathyā.śuṇṭhī.ghana.guḍair guṭikāṁ dhārayen mukhe |
AHS4.3.174c/ sarveṣu śvāsa.kāseṣu kevalaṁ vā vibhītakam || 174 ||
AHS4.3.175a/ pattra.kalkaṁ ghṛta.bhṛṣṭaṁ tilvakasya sa.śarkaram |
AHS4.3.175c/ peyā votkārikā chardi.tṛṭ.kāsāmātisāra.jit || 175 || [Note: AHS4.3.175v/ 3.175cv peyā cotkārikā chardi. 3.175dv .tṛṭ.kāsāmātisāra.nut]
AHS4.3.176a/ kaṇṭakārī.rase siddho kṣīraṁ yūṣān rasān api |
AHS4.3.176c/ sa.gaurāmalakaḥ sāmlaḥ sarva.kāsa.bhiṣag.jitam || 176 ||
AHS4.3.177a/ vāta.ghnauṣadha.niḥkvāthe kṣīraṁ yūṣān rasān api |
AHS4.3.177c/ vaiṣkirān prātudān bailān dāpayet kṣaya.kāsine || 177 ||
AHS4.3.178a/ kṣata.kāse ca ye dhūmāḥ sānu.pānā nidarśitāḥ |
AHS4.3.178c/ kṣaya.kāse 'pi te yojyā vakṣyate yac ca yakṣmaṇi || 178 || [Note: AHS4.3.178v/ 3.178dv vakṣyante ye ca yakṣmaṇi]
AHS4.3.179a/ bṛṁhaṇaṁ dīpanaṁ cāgneḥ srotasāṁ ca viśodhanam |
AHS4.3.179c/ vyatyāsāt kṣaya.kāsibhyo balyaṁ sarvaṁ praśasyate || 179 ||
[Page 348 ]
AHS4.3.180a/ sannipātodbhavo ghoraḥ kṣaya.kāso yatas tataḥ |
AHS4.3.180c/ yathā.doṣa.balaṁ tasya sannipāta.hitaṁ hitam || 180 ||

4.4. Chapter 4 :: Athaśvāsahidhmācikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 338-341]
AHS4.4.001a/ śvāsa.hidhmā yatas tulya.hetv.ādyāḥ sādhanaṁ tataḥ |
AHS4.4.001c/ tulyam eva tad.ārtaṁ ca pūrvaṁ svedair upācaret || 1 ||
AHS4.4.002a/ snigdhair lavaṇa.tailāktaṁ taiḥ kheṣu grathitaḥ kaphaḥ |
AHS4.4.002c/ su.līno 'pi vilīno 'sya koṣṭhaṁ prāptaḥ su.nirharaḥ || 2 ||
AHS4.4.003a/ srotasāṁ syān mṛdu.tvaṁ ca marutaś cānuloma.tā |
AHS4.4.003c/ svinnaṁ ca bhojayed annaṁ snigdham ānūpa.jai rasaiḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS4.4.003v/ 4.3bv mārutasyānuloma.tā]
AHS4.4.004a/ dadhy.uttareṇa vā dadyāt tato 'smai vamanaṁ mṛdu |
AHS4.4.004c/ viśeṣāt kāsa.vamathu.hṛd.graha.svara.sādine || 4 ||
AHS4.4.005a/ pippalī.saindhava.kṣaudra.yuktaṁ vātā.virodhi yat |
AHS4.4.005c/ nirhṛte sukham āpnoti sa kaphe duṣṭa.vigrahe || 5 ||
AHS4.4.006a/ srotaḥsu ca viśuddheṣu caraty a.vihato 'nilaḥ |
AHS4.4.006c/ dhmānodāvarta.tamake mātuluṅgāmla.vetasaiḥ || 6 ||
AHS4.4.007a/ hiṅgu.pīlu.viḍair yuktam annaṁ syād anulomanam |
AHS4.4.007c/ sa.saindhavaṁ phalāmlaṁ vā koṣṇaṁ dadyād virecanam || 7 ||
AHS4.4.008a/ ete hi kapha.saṁruddha.gati.prāṇa.prakopa.jāḥ |
AHS4.4.008c/ tasmāt tan.mārga.śuddhy.artham ūrdhvādhaḥ śodhanaṁ hitam || 8 ||
AHS4.4.009a/ udīryate bhṛśa.taraṁ mārga.rodhād vahaj jalam |
AHS4.4.009c/ yathā tathānilas tasya mārgam asmād viśodhayet || 9 ||
[Page 349 ]
AHS4.4.010a/ a.śāntau kṛta.saṁśuddher dhūmair līnaṁ malaṁ haret |
AHS4.4.010c/ haridrā.pattram eraṇḍa.mūlaṁ lākṣāṁ manaḥśilām || 10 || [Note: AHS4.4.010v/ 4.10dv .mūlaṁ drākṣāṁ manaḥśilām]
AHS4.4.011a/ sa.devadārv alaṁ māṁsīṁ piṣṭvā vartiṁ prakalpayet |
AHS4.4.011c/ tāṁ ghṛtāktāṁ pibed dhūmaṁ yavān vā ghṛta.saṁyutān || 11 ||
AHS4.4.012a/ madhūcchiṣṭaṁ sarja.rasaṁ ghṛtaṁ vā guru vāguru |
AHS4.4.012c/ candanaṁ vā tathā śṛṅgaṁ vālān vā snāva vā gavām || 12 || [Note: AHS4.4.012v/ 4.12dv vālān vā snāyu vā gavām]
AHS4.4.013a/ ṛkṣa.godhā.kuraṅgaiṇa.carma.śṛṅga.khurāṇi vā |
AHS4.4.013c/ gugguluṁ vā manohvāṁ vā śāla.niryāsam eva vā || 13 || [Note: AHS4.4.013v/ 4.13av ṛśya.godhā.kuraṅgaiṇa. 4.13bv .carma.śṛṅga.khurāṇi ca]
AHS4.4.014a/ śallakīṁ gugguluṁ lohaṁ padmakaṁ vā ghṛtāplutam |
AHS4.4.014c/ avaśyaṁ svedanīyānām a.svedyānām api kṣaṇam || 14 || [Note: AHS4.4.014v/ 4.14bv padmakaṁ vā ghṛta.plutam]
AHS4.4.015a/ svedayet sa.sitā.kṣīra.sukhoṣṇa.sneha.secanaiḥ |
AHS4.4.015c/ utkārikopanāhaiś ca svedādhyāyokta.bheṣajaiḥ || 15 ||
AHS4.4.016a/ uraḥ kaṇṭhaṁ ca mṛdubhiḥ sāme tv āma.vidhiṁ caret |
AHS4.4.016c/ ati.yogoddhataṁ vātaṁ dṛṣṭvā pavana.nāśanaiḥ || 16 ||
AHS4.4.017a/ snigdhai rasādyair nāty.uṣṇair abhyaṅgaiś ca śamaṁ nayet |
AHS4.4.017c/ an.utkliṣṭa.kaphā.svinna.dur.balānāṁ hi śodhanāt || 17 ||
AHS4.4.018a/ vāyur labdhāspado marma saṁśoṣyāśu hared asūn |
AHS4.4.018c/ kaṣāya.leha.snehādyais teṣāṁ saṁśamayed ataḥ || 18 ||
AHS4.4.019a/ kṣīṇa.kṣatātisārāsṛk.pitta.dāhānubandha.jān |
AHS4.4.019c/ madhura.snigdha.śītādyair hidhmā.śvāsān upācaret || 19 ||
[Page 350 ]
AHS4.4.020a/ kulattha.daśa.mūlānāṁ kvāthe syur jāṅgalā rasāḥ |
AHS4.4.020c/ yūṣāś ca śigru.vārtāka.kāsaghna.vṛṣa.mūlakaiḥ || 20 ||
AHS4.4.021a/ pallavair nimba.kulaka.bṛhatī.mātuluṅga.jaiḥ |
AHS4.4.021c/ vyāghrī.durālabhā.śṛṅgī.bilva.madhya.trikaṇṭakaiḥ || 21 ||
AHS4.4.022a/ sāmṛtāgni.kulatthaiś ca yūṣaḥ syāt kvathitair jale |
AHS4.4.022c/ tad.vad rāsnā.bṛhaty.ādi.balā.mudgaiḥ sa.citrakaiḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS4.4.022v/ 4.22bv yūṣaḥ syāt kvathitair jalaiḥ]
AHS4.4.023a/ peyā ca citrakājājī.śṛṅgī.sauvarcalaiḥ kṛtā |
AHS4.4.023c/ daśa.mūlena vā kāsa.śvāsa.hidhmā.rujāpahā || 23 ||
AHS4.4.024a/ daśa.mūla.śaṭhī.rāsnā.bhārgī.bilvarddhi.pauṣkaraiḥ |
AHS4.4.024c/ kulīraśṛṅgī.capalā.tāmalaky.amṛtauṣadhaiḥ || 24 ||
AHS4.4.025a/ pibet kaṣāyaṁ jīrṇe 'smin peyāṁ tair eva sādhitām |
AHS4.4.025c/ śāli.ṣaṣṭika.godhūma.yava.mudga.kulattha.bhuk || 25 ||
AHS4.4.026a/ kāsa.hṛd.graha.pārśvārti.hidhmā.śvāsa.praśāntaye |
AHS4.4.026c/ saktūn vārkāṅkura.kṣīra.bhāvitānāṁ sa.mākṣikān || 26 ||
AHS4.4.027a/ yavānāṁ daśa.mūlādi.niḥkvātha.lulitān pibet |
AHS4.4.027c/ anne ca yojayet kṣāra.hiṅgv.ājya.viḍa.dāḍimān || 27 ||
AHS4.4.028a/ sa.pauṣkara.śaṭhī.vyoṣa.mātuluṅgāmla.vetasān |
AHS4.4.028c/ daśa.mūlasya vā kvātham atha.vā devadāruṇaḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS4.4.028v/ 4.28cv daśa.mūlasya niḥkvātham]
AHS4.4.029a/ pibed vā vāruṇī.maṇḍaṁ hidhmā.śvāsī pipāsitaḥ |
AHS4.4.029c/ pippalī.pippalī.mūla.pathyā.jantughna.citrakaiḥ || 29 ||
[Page 351 ]
AHS4.4.030a/ kalkitair lepite rūḍhe niḥkṣiped ghṛta.bhājane |
AHS4.4.030c/ takraṁ māsa.sthitaṁ tad dhi dīpanaṁ śvāsa.kāsa.jit || 30 ||
AHS4.4.031a/ pāṭhāṁ madhurasāṁ dāru saralaṁ ca niśi sthitam |
AHS4.4.031c/ surā.maṇḍe 'lpa.lavaṇaṁ pibet prasṛta.sammitam || 31 || [Note: AHS4.4.031v/ 4.31bv saralaṁ niśi saṁsthitam 4.31dv pibet prasṛti.sammitam]
AHS4.4.032a/ bhārgī.śuṇṭhyau sukhāmbhobhiḥ kṣāraṁ vā maricānvitam |
AHS4.4.032c/ sva.kvātha.piṣṭāṁ lulitāṁ bāṣpikāṁ pāyayeta vā || 32 ||
AHS4.4.033a/ sva.rasaḥ saptaparṇasya puṣpāṇāṁ vā śirīṣataḥ |
AHS4.4.033c/ hidhmā.śvāse madhu.kaṇā.yuktaḥ pitta.kaphānuge || 33 ||
AHS4.4.034a/ utkārikā tugā.kṛṣṇā.madhūlī.ghṛta.nāgaraiḥ |
AHS4.4.034c/ pittānubandhe yoktavyā pavane tv anubandhini || 34 ||
AHS4.4.035a/ śvāvic.chaśāmiṣa.kaṇā.ghṛta.śalyaka.śoṇitaiḥ |
AHS4.4.035c/ suvarcalā.rasa.vyoṣa.sarpirbhiḥ sahitaṁ payaḥ || 35 ||
AHS4.4.036a/ anu śāly.odanaṁ peyam vāta.pittānubandhini |
AHS4.4.036c/ catur.guṇāmbu.siddhaṁ vā chāgaṁ sa.guḍa.nāgaram || 36 ||
AHS4.4.037a/ pippalī.mūla.madhuka.guḍa.go.'śva.śakṛd.rasān |
AHS4.4.037c/ hidhmābhiṣyanda.kāsa.ghnāl̐ lihyān madhu.ghṛtānvitān || 37 ||
AHS4.4.038a/ go.gajāśva.varāhoṣṭra.khara.meṣāja.viḍ.rasam |
AHS4.4.038c/ sa.madhv ekaika.śo lihyād bahu.śleṣmātha.vā pibet || 38 ||
AHS4.4.039a/ catuṣ.pāc.carma.romāsthi.khura.śṛṅgodbhavāṁ maṣīm |
AHS4.4.039c/ tathaiva vājigandhāyā lihyāc chvāsī kapholbaṇaḥ || 39 ||
[Page 352 ]
AHS4.4.040a/ śaṭhī.pauṣkara.dhātrīr vā pauṣkaraṁ vā kaṇānvitam |
AHS4.4.040c/ gairikāñjana.kṛṣṇā vā sva.rasaṁ vā kapittha.jam || 40 ||
AHS4.4.041a/ rasena vā kapitthasya dhātrī.saindhava.pippalīḥ |
AHS4.4.041c/ ghṛta.kṣaudreṇa vā pathyā.viḍaṅgoṣaṇa.pippalīḥ || 41 ||
AHS4.4.042a/ kola.lājāmala.drākṣā.pippalī.nāgarāṇi vā |
AHS4.4.042c/ guḍa.taila.niśā.drākṣā.kaṇā.rāsnoṣaṇāni vā || 42 ||
AHS4.4.043a/ pibed rasāmbu.madyāmlair lehauṣadha.rajāṁsi vā |
AHS4.4.043c/ jīvantī.musta.surasa.tvag.elā.dvaya.pauṣkaram || 43 ||
AHS4.4.044a/ caṇḍā.tāmalakī.loha.bhārgī.nāgara.vālakam |
AHS4.4.044c/ karkaṭākhyā.śaṭhī.kṛṣṇā.nāgakesara.corakam || 44 ||
AHS4.4.045a/ upayuktaṁ yathā.kāmaṁ cūrṇaṁ dvi.guṇa.śarkaram |
AHS4.4.045c/ pārśva.rug.jvara.kāsa.ghnaṁ hidhmā.śvāsa.haraṁ param || 45 ||
AHS4.4.046a/ śaṭhī.tāmalakī.bhārgī.caṇḍā.vālaka.pauṣkaram |
AHS4.4.046c/ śarkarāṣṭa.guṇaṁ cūrṇaṁ hidhmā.śvāsa.haraṁ param || 46 ||
AHS4.4.047a/ tulyaṁ guḍaṁ nāgaraṁ ca bhakṣayen nāvayeta vā |
AHS4.4.047c/ laśunasya palāṇḍor vā mūlaṁ gṛñjanakasya vā || 47 ||
AHS4.4.048a/ candanād vā rasaṁ dadyān nārī.kṣīreṇa nāvanam |
AHS4.4.048c/ stanyena makṣikā.viṣṭhām alaktaka.rasena vā || 48 ||
AHS4.4.049a/ sa.saindhavaṁ ghṛtācchaṁ vā siddhaṁ stanyena vā ghṛtam |
AHS4.4.049c/ kalkitair madhura.dravyais tat piben nāvayeta vā || 49 ||
[Page 353 ]
AHS4.4.050a/ sakṛd uṣṇaṁ sakṛc chītaṁ vyatyāsāt sa.sitā.madhu |
AHS4.4.050c/ tad.vat payas tathā siddham adho.bhāgauṣadhair ghṛtam || 50 ||
AHS4.4.051a/ kaṇā.sauvarcala.kṣāra.vayaḥsthā.hiṅgu.corakaiḥ |
AHS4.4.051c/ sa.kāyasthair ghṛtaṁ mastu.daśa.mūla.rase pacet || 51 ||
AHS4.4.052a/ tat pibej jīvanīyair vā lihyāt sa.madhu sādhitam |
AHS4.4.052c/ tejovaty abhayā kuṣṭhaṁ pippalī kaṭu.rohiṇī || 52 ||
AHS4.4.053a/ bhūtikaṁ pauṣkaraṁ mūlaṁ palāśaś citrakaḥ śaṭhī |
AHS4.4.053c/ paṭu.dvayaṁ tāmalakī jīvantī bilva.peśikā || 53 ||
AHS4.4.054a/ vacā pattraṁ ca tālīśaṁ karṣāṁśais tair vipācayet |
AHS4.4.054c/ hiṅgu.pādair ghṛta.prasthaṁ pītam āśu nihanti tat || 54 || [Note: AHS4.4.054v/ 4.54av vacā pattraṁ ca tālīśāt]
AHS4.4.055a/ śākhānilārśo.grahaṇī.hidhmā.hṛt.pārśva.vedanāḥ |
AHS4.4.055c/ ardhāṁśena pibet sarpiḥ kṣāreṇa paṭunātha.vā || 55 ||
AHS4.4.056a/ dhānvantaraṁ vṛṣa.ghṛtaṁ dādhikaṁ hapuṣādi vā |
AHS4.4.056c/ śītāmbu.sekaḥ sahasā trāsa.vikṣepa.bhī.śucaḥ || 56 ||
AHS4.4.057a/ harṣerṣyocchvāsa.rodhāś ca hitaṁ kīṭaiś ca daṁśanam |
AHS4.4.057c/ yat kiñ.cit kapha.vāta.ghnam uṣṇaṁ vātānulomanam || 57 || [Note: AHS4.4.057v/ 4.57av harṣerṣyocchvāsa.saṁrodhā]
AHS4.4.058a/ tat sevyaṁ prāya.śo yac ca su.tarāṁ mārutāpaham |
AHS4.4.058c/ sarveṣāṁ bṛṁhaṇe hy alpaḥ śakyaś ca prāya.śo bhavet || 58 ||
AHS4.4.059a/ nāty.arthaṁ śamane 'pāyo bhṛśo '.śakyaś ca karṣaṇe |
AHS4.4.059c/ śamanair bṛṁhaṇaiś cāto bhūyiṣṭhaṁ tān upācaret || 59 || [Note: AHS4.4.059v/ 4.59bv bhṛśo '.śakyaś ca karśane]
[Page 354 ]
AHS4.4.059ū̆ab/ kāsa.śvāsa.kṣaya.cchardi.hidhmāś cānyo.'nya.bheṣajaiḥ || 59ū̆ab ||

4.5. Chapter 5 :: Atharājayakṣmacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 341-346]
AHS4.5.001a/ balino bahu.doṣasya snigdha.svinnasya śodhanam |
AHS4.5.001c/ ūrdhvādho yakṣmiṇaḥ kuryāt sa.snehaṁ yan na karśanam || 1 || [Note: AHS4.5.001v/ 5.1dv sa.snehaṁ yan na karṣaṇam]
AHS4.5.002a/ payasā phala.yuktena madhureṇa rasena vā |
AHS4.5.002c/ sarpiṣ.matyā yavāgvā vā vamana.dravya.siddhayā || 2 ||
AHS4.5.003a/ vamed virecanaṁ dadyāt trivṛc.chyāmā.nṛpadrumān |
AHS4.5.003c/ śarkarā.madhu.sarpirbhiḥ payasā tarpaṇena vā || 3 ||
AHS4.5.004a/ drākṣā.vidārī.kāśmarya.māṁsānāṁ vā rasair yutān |
AHS4.5.004c/ śuddha.koṣṭhasya yuñjīta vidhiṁ bṛṁhaṇa.dīpanam || 4 || [Note: AHS4.5.004v/ 5.4bv .māṁsānāṁ vā rasair yutam]
AHS4.5.005a/ hṛdyāni cānna.pānāni vāta.ghnāni laghūni ca |
AHS4.5.005c/ śāli.ṣaṣṭika.godhūma.yava.mudgaṁ samoṣitam || 5 ||
AHS4.5.005+(1)ab/ laghum a.cyuta.vīryaṁ ca su.jaraṁ bala.kṛc ca yat || 5+(1)ab || [Note: AHS4.5.005+(1)v/ 5.5+(1)av laghuṁ cā.cyuta.vīryaṁ ca 5.5+(1)av laghum adbhuta.vīryaṁ ca]
AHS4.5.006a/ ājaṁ kṣīraṁ ghṛtaṁ māṁsaṁ kravyān.māṁsaṁ ca śoṣa.jit |
AHS4.5.006c/ kākolūka.vṛka.dvīpi.gavāśva.nakuloragam || 6 ||
AHS4.5.007a/ gṛdhra.bhāsa.kharoṣṭraṁ ca hitaṁ chadmopasaṁhitam |
AHS4.5.007c/ jñātaṁ jugupsitaṁ tad dhi cchardiṣe na balaujase || 7 || [Note: AHS4.5.007v/ 5.7av gṛdhra.cāṣa.kharoṣṭraṁ ca]
AHS4.5.008a/ mṛgādyāḥ pitta.kaphayoḥ pavane prasahādayaḥ |
AHS4.5.008c/ vesavārī.kṛtāḥ pathyā rasādiṣu ca kalpitāḥ || 8 ||
[Page 355 ]
AHS4.5.009a/ bhṛṣṭāḥ sarṣapa.tailena sarpiṣā vā yathā.yatham |
AHS4.5.009c/ rasikā mṛdavaḥ snigdhāḥ paṭu.dravyābhisaṁskṛtāḥ || 9 ||
AHS4.5.010a/ hitā maulaka.kaulatthās tad.vad yūṣāś ca sādhitāḥ |
AHS4.5.010c/ sa.pippalīkaṁ sa.yavaṁ sa.kulatthaṁ sa.nāgaram || 10 ||
AHS4.5.011a/ sa.dāḍimaṁ sāmalakaṁ snigdham ājaṁ rasaṁ pibet |
AHS4.5.011c/ tena ṣaḍ vinivartante vikārāḥ pīnasādayaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS4.5.011v/ 5.11bv snigdham āja.rasaṁ pibet]
AHS4.5.012a/ pibec ca su.tarāṁ madyaṁ jīrṇaṁ sroto.viśodhanam |
AHS4.5.012c/ pittādiṣu viśeṣeṇa madhv.ariṣṭāccha.vāruṇīḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS4.5.012v/ 5.12dv madhv.ariṣṭaṁ ca vāruṇīm]
AHS4.5.013a/ siddhaṁ vā pañca.mūlena tāmalakyātha.vā jalam |
AHS4.5.013c/ parṇinībhiś catasṛbhir dhānya.nāgarakeṇa vā || 13 ||
AHS4.5.014a/ kalpayec cānukūlo 'sya tenānnaṁ śuci yatna.vān |
AHS4.5.014c/ daśa.mūlena payasā siddhaṁ māṁsa.rasena vā || 14 ||
AHS4.5.015a/ balā.garbhaṁ ghṛtaṁ yojyaṁ kravyān.māṁsa.rasena vā |
AHS4.5.015c/ sa.kṣaudraṁ payasā siddhaṁ sarpir daśa.guṇena vā || 15 ||
AHS4.5.016a/ jīvantīṁ madhukaṁ drākṣāṁ phalāni kuṭajasya ca |
AHS4.5.016c/ puṣkarāhvaṁ śaṭhīṁ kṛṣṇāṁ vyāghrīṁ gokṣurakaṁ balām || 16 || [Note: AHS4.5.016v/ 5.16dv vyāghrīṁ gokṣurakaṁ balāḥ]
AHS4.5.017a/ nīlotpalaṁ tāmalakīṁ trāyamāṇāṁ durālabhām |
AHS4.5.017c/ kalkī.kṛtya ghṛtaṁ pakvaṁ roga.rāja.haraṁ param || 17 ||
AHS4.5.018a/ ghṛtaṁ kharjūra.mṛdvīkā.madhukaiḥ sa.parūṣakaiḥ |
AHS4.5.018c/ sa.pippalīkaṁ vaisvarya.kāsa.śvāsa.jvarāpaham || 18 ||
[Page 356 ]
AHS4.5.019a/ daśa.mūla.śṛtāt kṣīrāt sarpir yad udiyān navam |
AHS4.5.019c/ sa.pippalīkaṁ sa.kṣaudraṁ tat paraṁ svara.bodhanam || 19 ||
AHS4.5.020a/ śiraḥ.pārśvāṁsa.śūla.ghnaṁ kāsa.śvāsa.jvarāpaham |
AHS4.5.020c/ pañcabhiḥ pañca.mūlair vā śṛtād yad udiyād ghṛtam || 20 ||
AHS4.5.021a/ pañcānāṁ pañca.mūlānāṁ rase kṣīra.catur.guṇe |
AHS4.5.021c/ siddhaṁ sarpir jayaty etad yakṣmaṇaḥ saptakaṁ balam || 21 || [Note: AHS4.5.021v/ 5.21dv yakṣmiṇaḥ saptakaṁ balam]
AHS4.5.022a/ pañca.kola.yava.kṣāra.ṣaṭ.palena paced ghṛtam |
AHS4.5.022c/ prasthonmitaṁ tulya.payaḥ srotasāṁ tad viśodhanam || 22 ||
AHS4.5.023a/ gulma.jvarodara.plīha.grahaṇī.pāṇḍu.pīnasān |
AHS4.5.023c/ śvāsa.kāsāgni.sadana.śvayathūrdhvānilāñ jayet || 23 ||
AHS4.5.024a/ rāsnā.balā.gokṣuraka.sthirā.varṣābhu.vāriṇi |
AHS4.5.024c/ jīvantī.pippalī.garbhaṁ sa.kṣīraṁ śoṣa.jid ghṛtam || 24 ||
AHS4.5.025a/ aśvagandhā.śṛtāt kṣīrād ghṛtaṁ ca sa.sitā.payaḥ |
AHS4.5.025c/ sādhāraṇāmiṣa.tulāṁ toya.droṇa.dvaye pacet || 25 ||
AHS4.5.026a/ tenāṣṭa.bhāga.śeṣeṇa jīvanīyaiḥ palonmitaiḥ |
AHS4.5.026c/ sādhayet sarpiṣaḥ prasthaṁ vāta.pittāmayāpaham || 26 ||
AHS4.5.027a/ māṁsa.sarpir idam pītaṁ yuktaṁ māṁsa.rasena vā |
AHS4.5.027c/ kāsa.śvāsa.svara.bhraṁśa.śoṣa.hṛt.pārśva.śūla.jit || 27 || [Note: AHS4.5.027v/ 5.27bv yuktaṁ māṁsa.raseṣu vā]
AHS4.5.028a/ elājamodā.tri.phalā.saurāṣṭrī.vyoṣa.citrakān |
AHS4.5.028c/ sārān ariṣṭa.gāyatrī.śāla.bījaka.sambhavān || 28 ||
[Page 357 ]
AHS4.5.029a/ bhallātakaṁ viḍaṅgaṁ ca pṛthag aṣṭa.palonmitam |
AHS4.5.029c/ salile ṣo.ḍaśa.guṇe ṣo.ḍaśāṁśa.sthitaṁ pacet || 29 ||
AHS4.5.030a/ punas tena ghṛta.prasthaṁ siddhe cāsmin palāni ṣaṭ |
AHS4.5.030c/ tavakṣīryāḥ kṣipet triṁśat sitāyā dvi.guṇaṁ madhu || 30 ||
AHS4.5.031a/ ghṛtāt tri.jātāt tri.palaṁ tato līḍhaṁ khajāhatam |
AHS4.5.031c/ payo.'nu.pānaṁ tat prāhṇe rasāyanam a.yantraṇam || 31 ||
AHS4.5.032a/ medhyaṁ cakṣuṣyam āyuṣyaṁ dīpanaṁ hanti cā.cirāt |
AHS4.5.032c/ meha.gulma.kṣaya.vyādhi.pāṇḍu.roga.bhagandarān || 32 ||
AHS4.5.033a/ ye ca sarpir.guḍāḥ proktāḥ kṣate yojyāḥ kṣaye 'pi te |
AHS4.5.033c/ tvag.elā.pippalī.kṣīrī.śarkarā dvi.guṇāḥ kramāt || 33 ||
AHS4.5.034a/ cūrṇitā bhakṣitāḥ kṣaudra.sarpiṣā vāvalehitāḥ |
AHS4.5.034c/ svaryāḥ kāsa.kṣaya.śvāsa.pārśva.ruk.kapha.nāśanāḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS4.5.034v/ 5.34bv .sarpiṣā cāvalehitāḥ]
AHS4.5.035a/ viśeṣāt svara.sāde 'sya nasya.dhūmādi yojayet |
AHS4.5.035c/ tatrāpi vāta.je koṣṇaṁ pibed auttarabhaktikam || 35 || [Note: AHS4.5.035v/ 5.35dv pibed uttara.bhaktikam]
AHS4.5.036a/ kāsamardaka.vārtākī.mārkava.sva.rasair ghṛtam |
AHS4.5.036c/ sādhitaṁ kāsa.jit svaryaṁ siddham ārtagalena vā || 36 ||
AHS4.5.037a/ badarī.pattra.kalkaṁ vā ghṛta.bhṛṣṭaṁ sa.saindhavam |
AHS4.5.037c/ tailaṁ vā madhuka.drākṣā.pippalī.kṛminut.phalaiḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS4.5.037v/ 5.37dv .pippalī.kṛmihṛt.phalaiḥ]
AHS4.5.038a/ haṁsapadyāś ca mūlena pakvaṁ nasto niṣecayet |
AHS4.5.038c/ sukhodakānu.pānaṁ ca sa.sarpiṣkaṁ guḍaudanam || 38 ||
[Page 358 ]
AHS4.5.039a/ aśnīyāt pāyasaṁ caivaṁ snigdhaṁ svedaṁ niyojayet |
AHS4.5.039c/ pittodbhave pibet sarpiḥ śṛta.śīta.payo.'nupaḥ || 39 ||
AHS4.5.040a/ kṣīri.vṛkṣāṅkura.kvātha.kalka.siddhaṁ sa.mākṣikam |
AHS4.5.040c/ aśnīyāc ca sa.sarpiṣkaṁ yaṣṭīmadhuka.pāyasam || 40 ||
AHS4.5.041a/ balā.vidārigandhābhyāṁ vidāryā madhukena ca |
AHS4.5.041c/ siddhaṁ sa.lavaṇaṁ sarpir nasyaṁ svaryam an.uttamam || 41 ||
AHS4.5.042a/ prapauṇḍarīkaṁ madhukaṁ pippalī bṛhatī balā |
AHS4.5.042c/ sādhitaṁ kṣīra.sarpiś ca tat svaryaṁ nāvanaṁ param || 42 ||
AHS4.5.043a/ lihyān madhurakāṇāṁ ca cūrṇaṁ madhu.ghṛtāplutam |
AHS4.5.043c/ pibet kaṭūni mūtreṇa kapha.je rūkṣa.bhojanaḥ || 43 ||
AHS4.5.044a/ kaṭphalāmalaka.vyoṣaṁ lihyāt taila.madhu.plutam |
AHS4.5.044c/ vyoṣa.kṣārāgni.cavikā.bhārgī.pathyā.madhūni vā || 44 ||
AHS4.5.045a/ yavair yavāgūṁ yamake kaṇā.dhātrī.kṛtāṁ pibet |
AHS4.5.045c/ bhuktvādyāt pippalīṁ śuṇṭhīṁ tīkṣṇaṁ vā vamanaṁ bhajet || 45 ||
AHS4.5.046a/ śarkarā.kṣaudra.miśrāṇi śṛtāni madhuraiḥ saha |
AHS4.5.046c/ pibet payāṁsi yasyoccair vadato 'bhihataḥ svaraḥ || 46 ||
AHS4.5.047a/ vicitram annam a.rucau hitair upahitaṁ hitam |
AHS4.5.047c/ bahir.antar.mṛjā citta.nirvāṇaṁ hṛdyam auṣadham || 47 ||
AHS4.5.048a/ dvau kālau danta.pavanaṁ bhakṣayen mukha.dhāvanaiḥ |
AHS4.5.048c/ kaṣāyaiḥ kṣālayed āsyaṁ dhūmaṁ prāyogikaṁ pibet || 48 ||
[Page 359 ]
AHS4.5.049a/ tālīśa.cūrṇa.vaṭakāḥ sa.karpūra.sitopalāḥ |
AHS4.5.049c/ śaśāṅka.kiraṇākhyāś ca bhakṣyā ruci.karāḥ param || 49 || [Note: AHS4.5.049v/ 5.49dv bhakṣyā ruci.karā bhṛśam]
AHS4.5.050a/ vātād a.rocake tatra pibec cūrṇaṁ prasannayā |
AHS4.5.050c/ hareṇu.kṛṣṇā.kṛmijid.drākṣā.saindhava.nāgarāt || 50 ||
AHS4.5.051a/ elā.bhārgī.yava.kṣāra.hiṅgu.yuktād ghṛtena vā |
AHS4.5.051c/ chardayed vā vacāmbhobhiḥ pittāc ca guḍa.vāribhiḥ || 51 ||
AHS4.5.052a/ lihyād vā śarkarā.sarpir.lavaṇottama.mākṣikam |
AHS4.5.052c/ kaphād vamen nimba.jalair dīpyakāragvadhodakam || 52 ||
AHS4.5.053a/ pānaṁ sa.madhv.ariṣṭāś ca tīkṣṇāḥ sa.madhu.mādhavāḥ |
AHS4.5.053c/ pibec cūrṇaṁ ca pūrvoktaṁ hareṇv.ādy.uṣṇa.vāriṇā || 53 ||
AHS4.5.054a/ elā.tvaṅ.nāgakusuma.tīkṣṇa.kṛṣṇā.mahauṣadham |
AHS4.5.054c/ bhāga.vṛddhaṁ kramāc cūrṇaṁ nihanti sama.śarkaram || 54 ||
AHS4.5.055a/ prasekā.ruci.hṛt.pārśva.kāsa.śvāsa.galāmayān |
AHS4.5.055c/ yavānī.tintiḍīkāmla.vetasauṣadha.dāḍimam || 55 ||
AHS4.5.056a/ kṛtvā kolaṁ ca karṣāṁśaṁ sitāyāś ca catuḥ.palam |
AHS4.5.056c/ dhānya.sauvarcalājājī.varāṅgaṁ cārdha.kārṣikam || 56 ||
AHS4.5.057a/ pippalīnāṁ śataṁ caikaṁ dve śate maricasya ca |
AHS4.5.057c/ cūrṇam etat paraṁ rucyaṁ hṛdyaṁ grāhi hinasti ca || 57 || [Note: AHS4.5.057v/ 5.57cv tac.cūrṇaṁ dīpanaṁ rucyaṁ]
AHS4.5.058a/ vibandha.kāsa.hṛt.pārśva.plīhārśo.grahaṇī.gadān |
AHS4.5.058c/ tālīśa.pattraṁ maricaṁ nāgaraṁ pippalī śubhā || 58 ||
[Page 360 ]
AHS4.5.059a/ yathottaraṁ bhāga.vṛddhyā tvag.ele cārdha.bhāgike |
AHS4.5.059c/ tad rucyaṁ dīpanaṁ cūrṇaṁ kaṇāṣṭa.guṇa.śarkaram || 59 || [Note: AHS4.5.059v/ 5.59av yathottaraṁ bhāga.vṛddhās 5.59cv tad dravyaṁ dīpanaṁ cūrṇaṁ]
AHS4.5.060a/ kāsa.śvāsā.ruci.cchardi.plīha.hṛt.pārśva.śūla.nut |
AHS4.5.060c/ pāṇḍu.jvarātisāra.ghnaṁ mūḍha.vātānulomanam || 60 ||
AHS4.5.061a/ arkāmṛtā.kṣāra.jale śarvarīm uṣitair yavaiḥ |
AHS4.5.061c/ praseke kalpitān saktūn bhakṣyāṁś cādyād balī vamet || 61 || [Note: AHS4.5.061v/ 5.61av arkāmṛtā.kṣīra.jale]
AHS4.5.062a/ kaṭu.tiktais tathā śūlyaṁ bhakṣayej jāṅgalaṁ palam |
AHS4.5.062c/ śuṣkāṁś ca bhakṣyān su.laghūṁś caṇakādi.rasānupaḥ || 62 ||
AHS4.5.063a/ śleṣmaṇo 'ti.prasekena vāyuḥ śleṣmāṇam asyati |
AHS4.5.063c/ kapha.prasekaṁ taṁ vidvān snigdhoṣṇair eva nirjayet || 63 || [Note: AHS4.5.063v/ 5.63dv snigdhoṣṇenaiva nirjayet]
AHS4.5.064a/ pīnase 'pi kramam imaṁ vamathau ca prayojayet |
AHS4.5.064c/ viśeṣāt pīnase 'bhyaṅgān snehān svedāṁś ca śīlayet || 64 || [Note: AHS4.5.064v/ 5.64av pīnase ca kramam imaṁ]
AHS4.5.065a/ snigdhān utkārikā.piṇḍaiḥ śiraḥ.pārśva.galādiṣu |
AHS4.5.065c/ lavaṇāmla.kaṭūṣṇāṁś ca rasān snehopasaṁhitān || 65 ||
AHS4.5.066a/ śiro.'ṁsa.pārśva.śūleṣu yathā.doṣa.vidhiṁ caret |
AHS4.5.066c/ audakānūpa.piśitair upanāhāḥ su.saṁskṛtāḥ || 66 ||
AHS4.5.067a/ tatreṣṭāḥ sa.catuḥ.snehā doṣa.saṁsarga iṣyate |
AHS4.5.067c/ pralepo nata.yaṣṭy.āhva.śatāhvā.kuṣṭha.candanaiḥ || 67 ||
AHS4.5.068a/ balā.rāsnā.tilais tad.vat sa.sarpir.madhukotpalaiḥ |
AHS4.5.068c/ punarnavā.kṛṣṇagandhā.balā.vīrā.vidāribhiḥ || 68 ||
[Page 361 ]
AHS4.5.069a/ nāvanaṁ dhūma.pānāni snehāś cauttarabhaktikāḥ |
AHS4.5.069c/ tailāny abhyaṅga.yogīni vasti.karma tathā param || 69 ||
AHS4.5.070a/ śṛṅgādyair vā yathā.doṣaṁ duṣṭam eṣāṁ hared asṛk |
AHS4.5.070c/ pradehaḥ sa.ghṛtaiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ padmakośīra.candanaiḥ || 70 ||
AHS4.5.071a/ dūrvā.madhuka.mañjiṣṭhā.kesarair vā ghṛtāplutaiḥ |
AHS4.5.071c/ vaṭādi.siddha.tailena śata.dhautena sarpiṣā || 71 ||
AHS4.5.072a/ abhyaṅgaḥ payasā sekaḥ śastaś ca madhukāmbunā |
AHS4.5.072c/ prāyeṇopahatāgni.tvāt sa.piccham atisāryate || 72 ||
AHS4.5.073a/ tasyātīsāra.grahaṇī.vihitaṁ hitam auṣadham |
AHS4.5.073c/ purīṣaṁ yatnato rakṣec chuṣyato rāja.yakṣmiṇaḥ || 73 ||
AHS4.5.074a/ sarva.dhātu.kṣayārtasya balaṁ tasya hi viḍ.balam |
AHS4.5.074c/ māṁsam evāśnato yuktyā mārdvīkaṁ pibato 'nu ca || 74 ||
AHS4.5.075a/ a.vidhārita.vegasya yakṣmā na labhate 'ntaram |
AHS4.5.075c/ surāṁ sa.maṇḍāṁ mārdvīkam ariṣṭān sīdhu.mādhavān || 75 || [Note: AHS4.5.075v/ 5.75dv ariṣṭaṁ sīdhu.mādhavān]
AHS4.5.076a/ yathārham anu.pānārthaṁ piben māṁsāni bhakṣayan |
AHS4.5.076c/ sroto.vibandha.mokṣārthaṁ balaujaḥ.puṣṭaye ca tat || 76 ||
AHS4.5.077a/ sneha.kṣīrāmbu.koṣṭheṣu sv.abhyaktam avagāhayet |
AHS4.5.077c/ uttīrṇaṁ miśrakaiḥ snehair bhūyo 'bhyaktaṁ sukhaiḥ karaiḥ || 77 || [Note: AHS4.5.077v/ 5.77cv uttīrṇaṁ miśraka.snehair]
AHS4.5.078a/ mṛdnīyāt sukham āsīnaṁ sukhaṁ codvartayet param |
AHS4.5.078c/ jīvantīṁ śatavīryāṁ ca vikasāṁ sa.punarnavām || 78 ||
[Page 362 ]
AHS4.5.079a/ aśvagandhām apāmārgaṁ tarkārīṁ madhukaṁ balām |
AHS4.5.079c/ vidārīṁ sarṣapān kuṣṭhaṁ taṇḍulān atasī.phalam || 79 ||
AHS4.5.080a/ māṣāṁs tilāṁś ca kiṇvaṁ ca sarvam eka.tra cūrṇayet |
AHS4.5.080c/ yava.cūrṇaṁ tri.guṇitaṁ dadhnā yuktaṁ sa.mākṣikam || 80 ||
AHS4.5.081a/ etad udvartanaṁ kāryaṁ puṣṭi.varṇa.bala.pradam |
AHS4.5.081c/ gaura.sarṣapa.kalkena snānīyauṣadhibhiś ca saḥ || 81 || [Note: AHS4.5.081v/ 5.81av etad utsādanaṁ kāryaṁ 5.81dv snānair auṣadhibhiś ca saḥ]
AHS4.5.082a/ snāyād ṛtu.sukhais toyair jīvanīyopasādhitaiḥ |
AHS4.5.082c/ gandha.mālyādikāṁ bhūṣām a.lakṣmī.nāśanīṁ bhajet || 82 || [Note: AHS4.5.082v/ 5.82cv gandha.mālyādikair bhūṣām]
AHS4.5.083a/ suhṛdāṁ darśanaṁ gīta.vāditrotsava.saṁśrutiḥ |
AHS4.5.083c/ vastayaḥ kṣīra.sarpīṁṣi madya.māṁsa.su.śīla.tā || 83 || [Note: AHS4.5.083v/ 5.83dv madyaṁ māṁsaṁ su.śīla.tā]
AHS4.5.083ū̆ab/ daiva.vyapāśrayaṁ tat tad atharvoktaṁ ca pūjitam || 83ū̆ab ||

4.6. Chapter 6 :: Athachardyādicikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 346-351]
AHS4.6.001a/ āmāśayotkleśa.bhavāḥ prāyaś chardyo hitaṁ tataḥ |
AHS4.6.001c/ laṅghanaṁ prāg ṛte vāyor vamanaṁ tatra yojayet || 1 || [Note: AHS4.6.001v/ 6.1bv prāyaś chardyo hitaṁ matam]
AHS4.6.002a/ balino bahu.doṣasya vamataḥ pratataṁ bahu |
AHS4.6.002c/ tato virekaṁ krama.śo hṛdyaṁ madyaiḥ phalāmbubhiḥ || 2 ||
AHS4.6.003a/ kṣīrair vā saha sa hy ūrdhvaṁ gataṁ doṣaṁ nayaty adhaḥ |
AHS4.6.003c/ śamanaṁ cauṣadhaṁ rūkṣa.dur.balasya tad eva tu || 3 ||
AHS4.6.004a/ pariśuṣkaṁ priyaṁ sātmyam annaṁ laghu ca śasyate |
AHS4.6.004c/ upavāsas tathā yūṣā rasāḥ kāmbalikāḥ khalāḥ || 4 ||
[Page 363 ]
AHS4.6.005a/ śākāni lehā bhojyāni rāga.ṣāḍava.pānakāḥ |
AHS4.6.005c/ bhakṣyāḥ śuṣkā vicitrāś ca phalāni snāna.gharṣaṇam || 5 ||
AHS4.6.006a/ gandhāḥ su.gandhayo gandha.phala.puṣpānna.pāna.jāḥ |
AHS4.6.006c/ bhukta.mātrasya sahasā mukhe śītāmbu.secanam || 6 ||
AHS4.6.007a/ hanti māruta.jāṁ chardiṁ sarpiḥ pītaṁ sa.saindhavam |
AHS4.6.007c/ kiñ.cid.uṣṇaṁ viśeṣeṇa sa.kāsa.hṛdaya.dravām || 7 ||
AHS4.6.008a/ vyoṣa.tri.lavaṇāḍhyaṁ vā siddhaṁ vā dāḍimāmbunā |
AHS4.6.008c/ sa.śuṇṭhī.dadhi.dhānyena śṛtaṁ tulyāmbu vā payaḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS4.6.008v/ 6.8dv śṛtaṁ tulyāmbunā payaḥ 6.8dv pītaṁ tulyāmbunā payaḥ]
AHS4.6.009a/ vyakta.saindhava.sarpir vā phalāmlo vaiṣkiro rasaḥ |
AHS4.6.009c/ snigdhaṁ ca bhojanaṁ śuṇṭhī.dadhi.dāḍima.sādhitam || 9 ||
AHS4.6.010a/ koṣṇaṁ sa.lavaṇaṁ cātra hitaṁ sneha.virecanam |
AHS4.6.010c/ pitta.jāyāṁ virekārthaṁ drākṣekṣu.sva.rasais trivṛt || 10 ||
AHS4.6.011a/ sarpir vā tailvakaṁ yojyaṁ vṛddhaṁ ca śleṣma.dhāma.gam |
AHS4.6.011c/ ūrdhvam eva haret pittaṁ svādu.tiktair viśuddhi.mān || 11 ||
AHS4.6.012a/ piben manthaṁ yavāgūṁ vā lājaiḥ sa.madhu.śarkarām |
AHS4.6.012c/ mudga.jāṅgala.jair adyād vyañjanaiḥ śāli.ṣaṣṭikam || 12 || [Note: AHS4.6.012v/ 6.12bv lājaiḥ sa.madhu.śarkaraiḥ]
AHS4.6.013a/ mṛd.bhṛṣṭa.loṣṭa.prabhavaṁ su.śītaṁ salilaṁ pibet |
AHS4.6.013c/ mudgośīra.kaṇā.dhānyaiḥ saha vā saṁsthitaṁ niśām || 13 ||
AHS4.6.014a/ drākṣā.rasaṁ rasaṁ vekṣor guḍūcy.ambu payo 'pi vā |
AHS4.6.014c/ jambv.āmra.pallavośīra.vaṭa.śuṅgāvaroha.jaḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS4.6.014v/ 6.14av drākṣā.rasaṁ rasaṁ cekṣor 6.14dv .vaṭa.śṛṅgāvaroha.jaḥ]
[Page 364 ]
AHS4.6.015a/ kvāthaḥ kṣaudra.yutaḥ pītaḥ śīto vā viniyacchati |
AHS4.6.015c/ chardiṁ jvaram atīsāraṁ mūrchāṁ tṛṣṇāṁ ca dur.jayām || 15 ||
AHS4.6.016a/ dhātrī.rasena vā śītaṁ piben mudga.dalāmbu vā |
AHS4.6.016c/ kola.majja.sitā.lājā.makṣikā.viṭ.kaṇāñjanam || 16 || [Note: AHS4.6.016v/ 6.16cv kola.majja.sitā.lākṣā. 6.16dv .makṣikā.viṭ.rasāñjanam]
AHS4.6.017a/ lihyāt kṣaudreṇa pathyāṁ vā drākṣāṁ vā badarāṇi vā |
AHS4.6.017c/ kapha.jāyāṁ vamen nimba.kṛṣṇā.piṇḍīta.sarṣapaiḥ || 17 ||
AHS4.6.018a/ yuktena koṣṇa.toyena dur.balaṁ copavāsayet |
AHS4.6.018c/ āragvadhādi.niryūhaṁ śītaṁ kṣaudra.yutaṁ pibet || 18 || [Note: AHS4.6.018v/ 6.18cv āragvadhāder niryūhaṁ]
AHS4.6.019a/ manthān yavair vā bahu.śaś chardi.ghnauṣadha.bhāvitaiḥ |
AHS4.6.019c/ kapha.ghnam annaṁ hṛdyaṁ ca rāgāḥ sārjaka.bhūstṛṇāḥ || 19 ||
AHS4.6.020a/ līḍhaṁ manaḥśilā.kṛṣṇā.maricaṁ bījapūrakāt |
AHS4.6.020c/ sva.rasena kapitthasya sa.kṣaudreṇa vamiṁ jayet || 20 ||
AHS4.6.021a/ khādet kapitthaṁ sa.vyoṣaṁ madhunā vā durālabhām |
AHS4.6.021c/ lihyān marica.cocailā.go.śakṛd.rasa.mākṣikam || 21 ||
AHS4.6.022a/ anukūlopacāreṇa yāti dviṣṭārtha.jā śamam |
AHS4.6.022c/ kṛmi.jā kṛmi.hṛd.roga.gaditaiś ca bhiṣag.jitaiḥ || 22 ||
AHS4.6.022ū̆ab/ yathā.svaṁ pariśeṣāś ca tat.kṛtāś ca tathāmayāḥ || 22ū̆ab ||
AHS4.6.023a/ chardi.prasaṅgena hi mātariśvā dhātu.kṣayāt kopam upaity avaśyam |
AHS4.6.023c/ kuryād ato 'smin vamanāti.yoga.proktaṁ vidhiṁ stambhana.bṛṁhaṇīyam || 23 || [Note: AHS4.6.023v/ 6.23cv kuryād ato 'smin vamanāti.yoge 6.23dv proktaṁ vidhiṁ stambhana.bṛṁhaṇīyam]
[Page 365 ]
AHS4.6.024a/ sarpir.guḍā māṁsa.rasā ghṛtāni kalyāṇaka.try.ūṣaṇa.jīvanāni |
AHS4.6.024c/ payāṁsi pathyopahitāni lehāś chardiṁ prasaktāṁ praśamaṁ nayanti || 24 || [Note: AHS4.6.024v/ 6.24av sarpir guḍo māṁsa.rasā ghṛtāni]
AHS4.6.024+1/ iti chardi.cikitsitam atha hṛd.roga.cikitsitam || 24+1 ||
AHS4.6.025a/ hṛd.roge vāta.je tailaṁ mastu.sauvīra.takra.vat || 25 [sic ?] ||
AHS4.6.025c/ tailaṁ ca lavaṇaiḥ siddhaṁ sa.mūtrāmlaṁ tathā.guṇam || 26 [sic ?] ||
AHS4.6.026a/ pibet sukhoṣṇaṁ sa.viḍaṁ gulmānāhārti.jic ca tat |
AHS4.6.026c/ tailaṁ ca lavaṇaiḥ siddhaṁ sa.mūtrāmlaṁ tathā.guṇam || 26 ||
AHS4.6.027a/ bilvaṁ rāsnāṁ yavān kolaṁ devadāruṁ punarnavām |
AHS4.6.027c/ kulatthān pañca.mūlaṁ ca paktvā tasmin pacej jale || 27 ||
AHS4.6.028a/ tailaṁ tan nāvane pāne vastau ca viniyojayet |
AHS4.6.028c/ śuṇṭhī.vayaḥsthā.lavaṇa.kāyasthā.hiṅgu.pauṣkaraiḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS4.6.028v/ 6.28cv śuṇṭhī.kayasthā.lavaṇa. 6.28cv .vayaḥsthā.hiṅgu.pauṣkaraiḥ]
AHS4.6.029a/ pathyayā ca śṛtaṁ pārśva.hṛd.rujā.gulma.jid ghṛtam |
AHS4.6.029c/ sauvarcalasya dvi.pale pathyā.pañcāśad.anvite || 29 ||
AHS4.6.030a/ ghṛtasya sādhitaḥ prastho hṛd.roga.śvāsa.gulma.jit |
AHS4.6.030c/ dāḍimaṁ kṛṣṇa.lavaṇaṁ śuṇṭhī.hiṅgv.amla.vetasam || 30 || [Note: AHS4.6.030v/ 6.30bv hṛd.roga.śvāsa.gulma.hṛt 6.30dv śuṇṭhī hiṅgv amla.vetasaḥ]
AHS4.6.031a/ apatantraka.hṛd.roga.śvāsa.ghnaṁ cūrṇam uttamam |
AHS4.6.031c/ puṣkarāhva.śaṭhī.śuṇṭhī.bījapūra.jaṭābhayāḥ || 31 ||
AHS4.6.032a/ pītāḥ kalkī.kṛtāḥ kṣāra.ghṛtāmla.lavaṇair yutāḥ |
AHS4.6.032c/ vikartikā.śūla.harāḥ kvāthaḥ koṣṇaś ca tad.guṇaḥ || 32 ||
[Page 366 ]
AHS4.6.033a/ yavānī.lavaṇa.kṣāra.vacājājy.auṣadhaiḥ kṛtaḥ |
AHS4.6.033c/ sa.pūtidāru.bījāhva.palāśa.śaṭhi.pauṣkaraiḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS4.6.033v/ 6.33cv sa pūtidāru.bījāhva. 6.33dv .vijayā.śaṭhi.pauṣkaraiḥ]
AHS4.6.033+(1)a/ yava.kṣāro yavānī ca pibed uṣṇena vāriṇā |
AHS4.6.033+(1)c/ etena vāta.jaṁ śūlaṁ gulmaṁ caiva cirotthitam || 33+(1) ||
AHS4.6.033+(1ū̆)ab/ bhidyate sapta.rātreṇa pavanena yathā ghanaḥ || 33+(1ū̆)ab ||
AHS4.6.034a/ pañca.kola.śaṭhī.pathyā.guḍa.bījāhva.pauṣkaram |
AHS4.6.034c/ vāruṇī.kalkitaṁ bhṛṣṭaṁ yamake lavaṇānvitam || 34 ||
AHS4.6.035a/ hṛt.pārśva.yoni.śūleṣu khāded gulmodareṣu ca |
AHS4.6.035c/ snigdhāś ceha hitāḥ svedāḥ saṁskṛtāni ghṛtāni ca || 35 || [Note: AHS4.6.035v/ 6.35dv saṁskṛtāni ghṛtāni tu]
AHS4.6.036a/ laghunā pañca.mūlena śuṇṭhyā vā sādhitaṁ jalam |
AHS4.6.036c/ vāruṇī.dadhi.maṇḍaṁ vā dhānyāmlaṁ vā pibet tṛṣi || 36 || [Note: AHS4.6.036v/ 6.36cv vāruṇīṁ dadhi.maṇḍaṁ vā]
AHS4.6.037a/ sāyāma.stambha.śūlāme hṛdi māruta.dūṣite |
AHS4.6.037c/ kriyaiṣā sa.dravāyāma.pramohe tu hitā rasāḥ || 37 ||
AHS4.6.038a/ snehāḍhyās tittiri.krauñca.śikhi.vartaka.dakṣa.jāḥ |
AHS4.6.038c/ balā.tailaṁ sa.hṛd.rogaḥ pibed vā su.kumārakam || 38 || [Note: AHS4.6.038v/ 6.38av snehādyās tittiri.krauñca.]
AHS4.6.039a/ yaṣṭy.āhva.śata.pākaṁ vā mahā.snehaṁ tathottamam |
AHS4.6.039c/ rāsnā.jīvaka.jīvantī.balā.vyāghrī.punarnavaiḥ || 39 ||
AHS4.6.040a/ bhārgī.sthirā.vacā.vyoṣair mahā.snehaṁ vipācayet |
AHS4.6.040c/ dadhi.pādaṁ tathāmlaiś ca lābhataḥ sa niṣevitaḥ || 40 ||
[Page 367 ]
AHS4.6.041a/ tarpaṇo bṛṁhaṇo balyo vāta.hṛd.roga.nāśanaḥ |
AHS4.6.041c/ dīpte 'gnau sa.dravāyāme hṛd.roge vātike hitam || 41 ||
AHS4.6.042a/ kṣīraṁ dadhi guḍaḥ sarpir audakānūpam āmiṣam |
AHS4.6.042c/ etāny eva ca varjyāni hṛd.rogeṣu caturṣv api || 42 ||
AHS4.6.043a/ śeṣeṣu stambha.jāḍyāma.saṁyukte 'pi ca vātike |
AHS4.6.043c/ kaphānubandhe tasmiṁs tu rūkṣoṣṇām ācaret kriyām || 43 ||
AHS4.6.044a/ paitte drākṣekṣu.niryāsa.sitā.kṣaudra.parūṣakaiḥ |
AHS4.6.044c/ yukto vireko hṛdyaḥ syāt kramaḥ śuddhe ca pitta.hā || 44 || [Note: AHS4.6.044v/ 6.44cv yukto vireco hṛdyaḥ syāt]
AHS4.6.045a/ kṣata.pitta.jvaroktaṁ ca bāhyāntaḥ parimārjanam |
AHS4.6.045c/ kaṭvī.madhuka.kalkaṁ ca pibet sa.sitam ambhasā || 45 ||
AHS4.6.046a/ śreyasī.śarkarā.drākṣā.jīvakarṣabhakotpalaiḥ |
AHS4.6.046c/ balā.kharjūra.kākolī.medā.yugmaiś ca sādhitam || 46 ||
AHS4.6.047a/ sa.kṣīraṁ māhiṣaṁ sarpiḥ pitta.hṛd.roga.nāśanam |
AHS4.6.047c/ prapauṇḍarīka.madhuka.bisa.granthi.kaserukāḥ || 47 ||
AHS4.6.048a/ sa.śuṇṭhī.śaivalās tābhiḥ sa.kṣīraṁ vipaced ghṛtam |
AHS4.6.048c/ śītaṁ sa.madhu tac ceṣṭaṁ svādu.varga.kṛtaṁ ca yat || 48 ||
AHS4.6.049a/ vastiṁ ca dadyāt sa.kṣaudraṁ tailaṁ madhuka.sādhitam |
AHS4.6.049c/ kaphodbhave vamet svinnaḥ picumanda.vacāmbhasā || 49 || [Note: AHS4.6.049v/ 6.49av vastiṁ ca dadyāt sa.kṣaudra. 6.49bv .tailaṁ madhuka.sādhitam 6.49dv picumanda.vacāmbunā]
AHS4.6.050a/ kulattha.dhanvottha.rasa.tīkṣṇa.madya.yavāśanaḥ |
AHS4.6.050c/ pibec cūrṇaṁ vacā.hiṅgu.lavaṇa.dvaya.nāgarāt || 50 ||
[Page 368 ]
AHS4.6.051a/ sailā.yavānaka.kaṇā.yava.kṣārāt sukhāmbunā |
AHS4.6.051c/ phala.dhānyāmla.kaulattha.yūṣa.mūtrāsavais tathā || 51 || [Note: AHS4.6.051v/ 6.51av sailā.yavānika.kaṇā.]
AHS4.6.052a/ puṣkarāhvābhayā.śuṇṭhī.śaṭhī.rāsnā.vacā.kaṇāt |
AHS4.6.052c/ kvāthaṁ tathābhayā.śuṇṭhī.mādrī.pītadru.kaṭphalāt || 52 || [Note: AHS4.6.052v/ 6.52bc .śaṭhī.rāsnā.vacā.kaṇā. 6.52cc .kvāthaṁ tathābhayā.śuṇṭhī.]
AHS4.6.053a/ kvāthe rohītakāśvattha.khadirodumbarārjune |
AHS4.6.053c/ sa.palāśa.vaṭe vyoṣa.trivṛc.cūrṇānvite kṛtaḥ || 53 ||
AHS4.6.054a/ sukhodakānu.pānaś ca lehaḥ kapha.vikāra.hā |
AHS4.6.054c/ śleṣma.gulmoditājyāni kṣārāṁś ca vividhān pibet || 54 || [Note: AHS4.6.054v/ 6.54av sukhodakānu.pānasya]
AHS4.6.055a/ prayojayec chilāhvaṁ vā brāhmaṁ vātra rasāyanam |
AHS4.6.055c/ tathāmalaka.lehaṁ vā prāśaṁ vāgastya.nirmitam || 55 || [Note: AHS4.6.055v/ 6.55bv brāhmaṁ cātra rasāyanam 6.55dv prāśyaṁ vāgastya.nirmitam 6.55dv prāśyaṁ cāgastya.nirmitam]
AHS4.6.056a/ syāc chūlaṁ yasya bhukte 'ti jīryaty alpaṁ jarāṁ gate |
AHS4.6.056c/ śāmyet sa kuṣṭha.kṛmijil.lavaṇa.dvaya.tilvakaiḥ || 56 || [Note: AHS4.6.056v/ 6.56av syāc chūlaṁ yasya bhukte 'nne]
AHS4.6.057a/ sa.devadārv.ativiṣaiś cūrṇam uṣṇāmbunā pibet |
AHS4.6.057c/ yasya jīrṇe 'dhikaṁ snehaiḥ sa virecyaḥ phalaiḥ punaḥ || 57 ||
AHS4.6.058a/ jīryaty anne tathā mūlais tīkṣṇaiḥ śūle sadādhike |
AHS4.6.058c/ prāyo 'nilo ruddha.gatiḥ kupyaty āmāśaye gataḥ || 58 || [Note: AHS4.6.058v/ 6.58dv kupyaty āmāśaye tataḥ 6.58dv kupyaty āmāśaye yataḥ]
AHS4.6.059a/ tasyānulomanaṁ kāryaṁ śuddhi.laṅghana.pācanaiḥ |
AHS4.6.059c/ kṛmi.ghnam auṣadhaṁ sarvaṁ kṛmi.je hṛdayāmaye || 59 || [Note: AHS4.6.059v/ 6.59dv kṛmi.je ca hṛd.āmaye]
AHS4.6.060a/ tṛṣṇāsu vāta.pitta.ghno vidhiḥ prāyeṇa śasyate |
AHS4.6.060c/ sarvāsu śīto bāhyāntas tathā śamana.śodhanaḥ || 60 || [Note: AHS4.6.060v/ 6.60bv vidhiḥ prāyeṇa yujyate 6.60dv tathā śamana.śodhanam]
[Page 369 ]
AHS4.6.061a/ divyāmbu śītaṁ sa.kṣaudraṁ tad.vad bhaumaṁ ca tad.guṇam |
AHS4.6.061c/ nirvāpitaṁ tapta.loṣṭa.kapāla.sikatādibhiḥ || 61 ||
AHS4.6.062a/ sa.śarkaraṁ vā kvathitaṁ pañca.mūlena vā jalam |
AHS4.6.062c/ darbha.pūrveṇa manthaś ca praśasto lāja.saktubhiḥ || 62 ||
AHS4.6.063a/ vāṭyaś cāma.yavaiḥ śītaḥ śarkarā.mākṣikānvitaḥ |
AHS4.6.063c/ yavāgūḥ śālibhis tad.vat kodravaiś ca ciran.tanaiḥ || 63 ||
AHS4.6.064a/ śītena śīta.vīryaiś ca dravyaiḥ siddhena bhojanam |
AHS4.6.064c/ himāmbu.pariṣiktasya payasā sa.sitā.madhu || 64 ||
AHS4.6.065a/ rasaiś cān.amla.lavaṇair jāṅgalair ghṛta.bharjitaiḥ |
AHS4.6.065c/ mudgādīnāṁ tathā yūṣair jīvanīya.rasānvitaiḥ || 65 || [Note: AHS4.6.065v/ 6.65av rasaiś cān.alpa.lavaṇair]
AHS4.6.066a/ nasyaṁ kṣīra.ghṛtaṁ siddhaṁ śītair ikṣos tathā rasaḥ |
AHS4.6.066c/ nirvāpaṇāś ca gaṇḍūṣāḥ sūtra.sthānoditā hitāḥ || 66 || [Note: AHS4.6.066v/ 6.66bv śītair ikṣos tathā rasaiḥ 6.66bv śītair ikṣos tathā rase]
AHS4.6.067a/ dāha.jvaroktā lepādyā nirīha.tvaṁ mano.ratiḥ |
AHS4.6.067c/ mahā.sarid.dhradādīnāṁ darśana.smaraṇāni ca || 67 || [Note: AHS4.6.067v/ 6.67dv darśana.smaraṇādi ca]
AHS4.6.068a/ tṛṣṇāyāṁ pavanotthāyāṁ sa.guḍaṁ dadhi śasyate |
AHS4.6.068c/ rasāś ca bṛṁhaṇāḥ śītā vidāry.ādi.gaṇāmbu ca || 68 || [Note: AHS4.6.068v/ 6.68dv vidāry.ādi.gaṇāmbu vā]
AHS4.6.069a/ pitta.jāyāṁ sitā.yuktaḥ pakvodumbara.jo rasaḥ |
AHS4.6.069c/ tat.kvātho vā himas tad.vac chārivādi.gaṇāmbu vā || 69 ||
AHS4.6.070a/ tad.vidhaiś ca gaṇaiḥ śīta.kaṣāyān sa.sitā.madhūn |
AHS4.6.070c/ madhurair auṣadhais tad.vat kṣīri.vṛkṣaiś ca kalpitān || 70 ||
[Page 370 ]
AHS4.6.071a/ bījapūraka.mṛdvīkā.vaṭa.vetasa.pallavān |
AHS4.6.071c/ mūlāni kuśa.kāśānāṁ yaṣṭy.āhvaṁ ca jale śṛtam || 71 ||
AHS4.6.072a/ jvaroditaṁ vā drākṣādi pañca.sārāmbu vā pibet |
AHS4.6.072c/ kaphodbhavāyāṁ vamanaṁ nimba.prasava.vāriṇā || 72 ||
AHS4.6.073a/ bilvāḍhakī.pañca.kola.darbha.pañcaka.sādhitam |
AHS4.6.073c/ jalaṁ pibed rajanyā vā siddhaṁ sa.kṣaudra.śarkaram || 73 || [Note: AHS4.6.073v/ 6.73bv .darbha.kacchaka.sādhitam 6.73cv jalaṁ pibed rajanyāṁ vā]
AHS4.6.074a/ mudga.yūṣaṁ ca sa.vyoṣa.paṭolī.nimba.pallavam |
AHS4.6.074c/ yavānnaṁ tīkṣṇa.kavaḍa.nasya.lehāṁś ca śīlayet || 74 ||
AHS4.6.075a/ sarvair āmāc ca tad dhantrī kriyeṣṭā vamanaṁ tathā |
AHS4.6.075c/ try.ūṣaṇāruṣkara.vacā.phalāmloṣṇāmbu.mastubhiḥ || 75 ||
AHS4.6.076a/ annātyayān maṇḍam uṣṇaṁ himaṁ manthaṁ ca kāla.vit |
AHS4.6.076c/ tṛṣi śramān māṁsa.rasaṁ manthaṁ vā sa.sitaṁ pibet || 76 || [Note: AHS4.6.076v/ 6.76dv madyaṁ vā sa.sitaṁ pibet]
AHS4.6.077a/ ātapāt sa.sitaṁ manthaṁ yava.kola.ja.saktubhiḥ |
AHS4.6.077c/ sarvāṇy aṅgāni limpec ca tila.piṇyāka.kāñjikaiḥ || 77 ||
AHS4.6.078a/ śīta.snānāc ca madyāmbu pibet tṛṇ.mān guḍāmbu vā |
AHS4.6.078c/ madyād ardha.jalaṁ madyaṁ snāto 'mla.lavaṇair yutam || 78 || [Note: AHS4.6.078v/ 6.78av śīta.snānāt tu madyāmbu 6.78bv pibet tṛḍ.vān guḍāmbu vā 6.78dv snāto 'mla.lavaṇāyutam]
AHS4.6.079a/ sneha.tīkṣṇa.tarāgnis tu sva.bhāva.śiśiraṁ jalam |
AHS4.6.079c/ snehād uṣṇāmbv a.jīrṇāt tu jīrṇān maṇḍaṁ pipāsitaḥ || 79 || [Note: AHS4.6.079v/ 6.79av snehāt tīkṣṇa.tarāgnis tu]
AHS4.6.080a/ pibet snigdhānna.tṛṣito hima.spardhi guḍodakam |
AHS4.6.080c/ gurv.ādy.annena tṛṣitaḥ pītvoṣṇāmbu tad ullikhet || 80 ||
[Page 371 ]
AHS4.6.081a/ kṣaya.jāyāṁ kṣaya.hitaṁ sarvaṁ bṛṁhaṇam auṣadham |
AHS4.6.081c/ kṛśa.dur.bala.rūkṣāṇāṁ kṣīraṁ chāgo raso 'tha.vā || 81 ||
AHS4.6.082a/ kṣīraṁ ca sordhva.vātāyāṁ kṣaya.kāsa.haraiḥ śṛtam |
AHS4.6.082c/ rogopasargāj jātāyāṁ dhānyāmbu sa.sitā.madhu || 82 || [Note: AHS4.6.082v/ 6.82cv rogopasarga.jātāyāṁ]
AHS4.6.083a/ pāne praśastaṁ sarvā ca kriyā rogādy.apekṣayā |
AHS4.6.083c/ tṛṣyan pūrvāmaya.kṣīṇo na labheta jalaṁ yadi || 83 || [Note: AHS4.6.083v/ 6.83cv tṛṣṇan pūrvāmaya.kṣīṇo 6.83cc tṛṣṇak pūrvāmaya.kṣīṇo]
AHS4.6.084a/ maraṇaṁ dīrgha.rogaṁ vā prāpnuyāt tvaritaṁ tataḥ |
AHS4.6.084c/ sātmyānna.pāna.bhaiṣajyais tṛṣṇāṁ tasya jayet purā || 84 || [Note: AHS4.6.084v/ 6.84dv tṛṣṇāṁ tasya jayet puras]
AHS4.6.084ū̆ab/ tasyāṁ jitāyām anyo 'pi vyādhiḥ śakyaś cikitsitum || 84ū̆ab ||

4.7. Chapter 7 :: Athamadātyayacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 351-358]
AHS4.7.001a/ yaṁ doṣam adhikaṁ paśyet tasyādau pratikārayet |
AHS4.7.001c/ kapha.sthānānupūrvyā ca tulya.doṣe madātyaye || 1 || [Note: AHS4.7.001v/ 7.1cv kapha.sthānānupūrvyā tu]
AHS4.7.002a/ pitta.māruta.pary.antaḥ prāyeṇa hi madātyayaḥ |
AHS4.7.002c/ hīna.mithyāti.pītena yo vyādhir upajāyate || 2 ||
AHS4.7.003a/ sama.pītena tenaiva sa madyenopaśāmyati |
AHS4.7.003c/ madyasya viṣa.sādṛśyād viṣaṁ tūtkarṣa.vṛttibhiḥ || 3 ||
AHS4.7.004a/ tīkṣṇādibhir guṇair yogād viṣāntaram apekṣate |
AHS4.7.004c/ tīkṣṇoṣṇenāti.mātreṇa pītenāmla.vidāhinā || 4 ||
AHS4.7.005a/ madyenānna.rasa.kledo vidagdhaḥ kṣāra.tāṁ gataḥ |
AHS4.7.005c/ yān kuryān mada.tṛṇ.moha.jvarāntar.dāha.vibhramān || 5 ||
[Page 372 ]
AHS4.7.006a/ madyotkliṣṭena doṣeṇa ruddhaḥ srotaḥsu mārutaḥ |
AHS4.7.006c/ su.tīvrā vedanā yāś ca śirasy asthiṣu sandhiṣu || 6 ||
AHS4.7.007a/ jīrṇāma.madya.doṣasya prakāṅkṣā.lāghave sati |
AHS4.7.007c/ yaugikaṁ vidhi.vad yuktaṁ madyam eva nihanti tān || 7 ||
AHS4.7.008a/ kṣāro hi yāti mādhuryaṁ śīghram amlopasaṁhitaḥ |
AHS4.7.008c/ madyam amleṣu ca śreṣṭhaṁ doṣa.viṣyandanād alam || 8 || [Note: AHS4.7.008v/ 7.8dv doṣa.visrāvaṇād alam]
AHS4.7.009a/ tīkṣṇoṣṇādyaiḥ purā proktair dīpanādyais tathā guṇaiḥ |
AHS4.7.009c/ sātmya.tvāc ca tad evāsya dhātu.sāmya.karaṁ param || 9 ||
AHS4.7.010a/ saptāham aṣṭa.rātraṁ vā kuryāt pānātyayauṣadham |
AHS4.7.010c/ jīryaty etāvatā pānaṁ kālena vi.pathāśritam || 10 ||
AHS4.7.011a/ paraṁ tato 'nubadhnāti yo rogas tasya bheṣajam |
AHS4.7.011c/ yathā.yathaṁ prayuñjīta kṛta.pānātyayauṣadhaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS4.7.011v/ 7.11dv kṛta.pānātyayauṣadham]
AHS4.7.012a/ tatra vātolbaṇe madyaṁ dadyāt piṣṭa.kṛtaṁ yutam |
AHS4.7.012c/ bījapūraka.vṛkṣāmla.kola.dāḍima.dīpyakaiḥ || 12 ||
AHS4.7.013a/ yavānī.hapuṣājājī.vyoṣa.tri.lavaṇārdrakaiḥ |
AHS4.7.013c/ śūlya.māṁsair harītakaiḥ sneha.vadbhiś ca saktubhiḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS4.7.013v/ 7.13bv .vyoṣa.tri.lavaṇārjakaiḥ 7.13cv śūlya.māṁsair haritakaiḥ]
AHS4.7.014a/ uṣṇa.snigdhāmla.lavaṇā medya.māṁsa.rasā hitāḥ |
AHS4.7.014c/ āmrāmrātaka.peśībhiḥ saṁskṛtā rāga.ṣāḍavāḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS4.7.014v/ 7.14av uṣṇāḥ snigdhāmla.lavaṇā 7.14bv madya.māṁsa.rasā hitāḥ 7.14dv saṁskṛtā rāga.khāṇḍavāḥ]
AHS4.7.015a/ godhūma.māṣa.vikṛtir mṛduś citrā mukha.priyā |
AHS4.7.015c/ ārdrikārdraka.kulmāṣa.śukta.māṁsādi.garbhiṇī || 15 ||
[Page 373 ]
AHS4.7.016a/ surabhir lavaṇā śītā nir.gadā vāccha.vāruṇī |
AHS4.7.016c/ sva.raso dāḍimāt kvāthaḥ pañca.mūlāt kanīyasaḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS4.7.016v/ 7.16bv nigadā vāccha.vāruṇī]
AHS4.7.017a/ śuṇṭhī.dhānyāt tathā mastu śuktāmbho.'cchāmla.kāñjikam |
AHS4.7.017c/ abhyaṅgodvartana.snānam uṣṇaṁ prāvaraṇaṁ ghanam || 17 ||
AHS4.7.018a/ ghanaś cāguru.jo dhūpaḥ paṅkaś cāguru.kuṅkumaḥ |
AHS4.7.018c/ kucoru.śroṇi.śālinyo yauvanoṣṇāṅga.yaṣṭayaḥ || 18 ||
AHS4.7.019a/ harṣeṇāliṅgane yuktāḥ priyāḥ saṁvāhaneṣu ca |
AHS4.7.019c/ pittolbaṇe bahu.jalaṁ śārkaraṁ madhu vā yutam || 19 ||
AHS4.7.020a/ rasair dāḍima.kharjūra.bhavya.drākṣā.parūṣa.jaiḥ |
AHS4.7.020c/ su.śītaṁ sa.sitā.saktu yojyaṁ tādṛk ca pānakam || 20 || [Note: AHS4.7.020v/ 7.20bv .bhavya.drākṣā.parūṣakaiḥ 7.22bv .paṭolī.dāḍimair api]
AHS4.7.021a/ svādu.varga.kaṣāyair vā yuktaṁ madyaṁ sa.mākṣikam |
AHS4.7.021c/ śāli.ṣaṣṭikam aśnīyāc chaśājaiṇa.kapiñjalaiḥ || 21 ||
AHS4.7.022a/ satīna.mudgāmalaka.paṭolī.dāḍimai rasaiḥ |
AHS4.7.022c/ kapha.pittaṁ samutkliṣṭam ullikhet tṛḍ.vidāha.vān || 22 ||
AHS4.7.023a/ pītvāmbu śītaṁ madyaṁ vā bhūrīkṣu.rasa.saṁyutam |
AHS4.7.023c/ drākṣā.rasaṁ vā saṁsargī tarpaṇādiḥ paraṁ hitaḥ || 23 ||
AHS4.7.024a/ tathāgnir dīpyate tasya doṣa.śeṣānna.pācanaḥ |
AHS4.7.024c/ kāse sa.rakta.niṣṭhīve pārśva.stana.rujāsu ca || 24 ||
AHS4.7.025a/ tṛṣṇāyāṁ sa.vidāhāyāṁ sotkleśe hṛdayorasi |
AHS4.7.025c/ guḍūcī.bhadra.mustānāṁ paṭolasyātha.vā rasam || 25 ||
[Page 374 ]
AHS4.7.026a/ sa.śṛṅgaveraṁ yuñjīta tittiri.pratibhojanam |
AHS4.7.026c/ tṛṣyate cāti bala.vad vāta.pitte samuddhate || 26 || [Note: AHS4.7.026v/ 7.26av sa.nāgaraṁ yojayeta]
AHS4.7.027a/ dadyād drākṣā.rasaṁ pānaṁ śītaṁ doṣānulomanam |
AHS4.7.027c/ jīrṇe 'dyān madhurāmlena cchāga.māṁsa.rasena ca || 27 ||
AHS4.7.028a/ tṛṣy alpa.śaḥ piben madyaṁ madaṁ rakṣan bahūdakam |
AHS4.7.028c/ musta.dāḍima.lājāmbu jalaṁ vā parṇinī.śṛtam || 28 ||
AHS4.7.029a/ pāṭaly.utpala.kandair vā sva.bhāvād eva vā himam |
AHS4.7.029c/ madyāti.pānād ab.dhātau kṣīṇe tejasi coddhate || 29 || [Note: AHS4.7.029v/ 7.29av paṭoly.utpala.kandair vā]
AHS4.7.030a/ yaḥ śuṣka.gala.tālv.oṣṭho jihvāṁ niṣkṛṣya ceṣṭate |
AHS4.7.030c/ pāyayet kāmato 'mbhas taṁ niśītha.pavanāhatam || 30 ||
AHS4.7.031a/ kola.dāḍima.vṛkṣāmla.cukrīkā.cukrikā.rasaḥ |
AHS4.7.031c/ pañcāmlako mukhālepaḥ sadyas tṛṣṇāṁ niyacchati || 31 ||
AHS4.7.032a/ tvacaṁ prāptaś ca pānoṣmā pitta.raktābhimūrchitaḥ |
AHS4.7.032c/ dāhaṁ prakurute ghoraṁ tatrāti.śiśiro vidhiḥ || 32 || [Note: AHS4.7.032v/ 7.32av tvacaṁ prāptas tu pānoṣmā 7.32av tvacaṁ prāptaḥ sa pānoṣmā]
AHS4.7.033a/ a.śāmyati rasais tṛpte rohiṇīṁ vyadhayet sirām |
AHS4.7.033c/ ullekhanopavāsābhyāṁ jayec chleṣmolbaṇaṁ pibet || 33 ||
AHS4.7.034a/ śītaṁ śuṇṭhī.sthirodīcya.duḥsparśānya.tamodakam |
AHS4.7.034c/ nir.āmaṁ kṣudhitaṁ kāle pāyayed bahu.mākṣikam || 34 ||
AHS4.7.035a/ śārkaraṁ madhu vā jīrṇam ariṣṭaṁ sīdhum eva vā |
AHS4.7.035c/ rūkṣa.tarpaṇa.saṁyuktaṁ yavānī.nāgarānvitam || 35 ||
[Page 375 ]
AHS4.7.036a/ yūṣeṇa yava.godhūmaṁ tanunālpena bhojayet |
AHS4.7.036c/ uṣṇāmla.kaṭu.tiktena kaulatthenālpa.sarpiṣā || 36 || [Note: AHS4.7.036v/ 7.36cv uṣṇāmbu.kaṭu.tiktena]
AHS4.7.037a/ śuṣka.mūlaka.jaiś chāgai rasair vā dhanva.cāriṇām |
AHS4.7.037c/ sāmla.vetasa.vṛkṣāmla.paṭolī.vyoṣa.dāḍimaiḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS4.7.037v/ 7.37dv .pāṭalī.vyoṣa.dāḍimaiḥ]
AHS4.7.038a/ prabhūta.śuṇṭhī.marica.haritārdraka.peśikam |
AHS4.7.038c/ bījapūra.rasādy.amla.bhṛṣṭa.nī.rasa.vartitam || 38 ||
AHS4.7.039a/ karīra.karamardādi rociṣṇu bahu.śālanam |
AHS4.7.039c/ pravyaktāṣṭāṅga.lavaṇaṁ vikalpita.nimardakam || 39 || [Note: AHS4.7.039v/ 7.39dv vikalpita.vimardakam]
AHS4.7.040a/ yathāgni bhakṣayan māṁsaṁ mādhavaṁ nigadaṁ pibet |
AHS4.7.040c/ sitā.sauvarcalājājī.tintiḍīkāmla.vetasam || 40 || [Note: AHS4.7.040v/ 7.40bv mādhavaṁ nir.gadaṁ pibet]
AHS4.7.041a/ tvag.elā.maricārdhāṁśam aṣṭāṅga.lavaṇaṁ hitam |
AHS4.7.041c/ sroto.viśuddhy.agni.karaṁ kapha.prāye madātyaye || 41 ||
AHS4.7.042a/ rūkṣoṣṇodvartanodgharṣa.snāna.bhojana.laṅghanaiḥ |
AHS4.7.042c/ sa.kāmābhiḥ saha strībhir yuktyā jāgaraṇena ca || 42 ||
AHS4.7.043a/ madātyayaḥ kapha.prāyaḥ śīghraṁ samupaśāmyati |
AHS4.7.043c/ yad idaṁ karma nirdiṣṭaṁ pṛthag doṣa.balaṁ prati || 43 ||
AHS4.7.044a/ sannipāte daśa.vidhe tac cheṣe 'pi vikalpayet |
AHS4.7.044c/ tvaṅ.nāgapuṣpa.magadhā.maricājāji.dhānyakaiḥ || 44 ||
AHS4.7.045a/ parūṣaka.madhūkailā.surāhvaiś ca sitānvitaiḥ |
AHS4.7.045c/ sa.kapittha.rasaṁ hṛdyaṁ pānakaṁ śaśi.bodhitam || 45 ||
[Page 376 ]
AHS4.7.046a/ madātyayeṣu sarveṣu peyaṁ rucy.agni.dīpanam |
AHS4.7.046c/ nā.vikṣobhya mano madyaṁ śarīram a.vihanya vā || 46 || [Note: AHS4.7.046v/ 7.46cv nā.kṣobhya hi mano madyaṁ 7.46dv śarīram a.vihatya vā]
AHS4.7.047a/ kuryān madātyayaṁ tasmād iṣyate harṣaṇī kriyā |
AHS4.7.047c/ saṁśuddhi.śamanādyeṣu mada.doṣaḥ kṛteṣv api || 47 ||
AHS4.7.048a/ na cec chāmyet kaphe kṣīṇe jāte daurbalya.lāghave |
AHS4.7.048c/ tasya madya.vidagdhasya vāta.pittādhikasya ca || 48 ||
AHS4.7.049a/ grīṣmopataptasya taror yathā varṣaṁ tathā payaḥ |
AHS4.7.049c/ madya.kṣīṇasya hi kṣīṇaṁ kṣīram āśv eva puṣyati || 49 || [Note: AHS4.7.049v/ 7.49cv madya.kṣīṇasya hi kṣīraṁ 7.49dv pītam āśv eva puṣyati]
AHS4.7.050a/ ojas tulyaṁ guṇaiḥ sarvair viparītaṁ ca madyataḥ |
AHS4.7.050c/ payasā vihate roge bale jāte nivartayet || 50 || [Note: AHS4.7.050v/ 7.50cv payasā vijite roge]
AHS4.7.051a/ kṣīra.prayogaṁ madyaṁ ca krameṇālpālpam ācaret |
AHS4.7.051c/ na vikṣaya.dhvaṁsakotthaiḥ spṛśetopadravair yathā || 51 || [Note: AHS4.7.051v/ 7.51cv na viṭ.kṣaya.dhvaṁsakotthaiḥ 7.51dv spṛśyetopadravair yathā]
AHS4.7.052a/ tayos tu syād ghṛtaṁ kṣīraṁ vastayo bṛṁhaṇāḥ śivāḥ |
AHS4.7.052c/ abhyaṅgodvartana.snānāny anna.pānaṁ ca vāta.jit || 52 ||
AHS4.7.053a/ yukta.madyasya madyottho na vyādhir upajāyate |
AHS4.7.053c/ ato 'sya vakṣyate yogo yaḥ sukhāyaiva kevalam || 53 ||
AHS4.7.054a/ āśvinaṁ yā mahat tejo balaṁ sārasvataṁ ca yā |
AHS4.7.054c/ dadhāty aindraṁ ca yā vīryaṁ prabhāvaṁ vaiṣṇavaṁ ca yā || 54 ||
AHS4.7.055a/ astraṁ makara.ketor yā puruṣārtho balasya yā |
AHS4.7.055c/ sautrāmaṇyāṁ dvi.ja.mukhe yā hutāśe ca hvayate || 55 || [Note: AHS4.7.055v/ 7.55bv puruṣārtho balasya ca]
[Page 377 ]
AHS4.7.056a/ yā sarvauṣadhi.sampūrṇān mathyamānāt surāsuraiḥ |
AHS4.7.056c/ mahoda.dheḥ samudbhūtā śrī.śaśāṅkāmṛtaiḥ saha || 56 ||
AHS4.7.057a/ madhu.mādhava.maireya.sīdhu.gauḍāsavādibhiḥ |
AHS4.7.057c/ mada.śaktim an.ujjhantī yā rūpair bahubhiḥ sthitā || 57 || [Note: AHS4.7.057v/ 7.57cv mada.śaktim a.tyajantī]
AHS4.7.058a/ yām āsvādya vilāsinyo yathārthaṁ nāma bibhrati |
AHS4.7.058c/ kulāṅganāpi yāṁ pītvā nayaty uddhata.mānasā || 58 || [Note: AHS4.7.058v/ 7.58av yām āsādya vilāsinyo]
AHS4.7.059a/ an.aṅgāliṅgitair aṅgaiḥ kvāpi ceto muner api |
AHS4.7.059c/ taraṅga.bhaṅga.bhrū.kuṭī.tarjanair māninī.manaḥ || 59 ||
AHS4.7.060a/ ekaṁ prasādya kurute yā dvayor api nirvṛtim |
AHS4.7.060c/ yathā.kāmaṁ bhaṭāvāpti.parihṛṣṭāpsaro.gaṇe || 60 || [Note: AHS4.7.060v/ 7.60cv yathā.kāma.bhaṭāvāpti.]
AHS4.7.061a/ tṛṇa.vat puruṣā yuddhe yām āsvādya tyajanty asūn |
AHS4.7.061c/ yāṁ śīlayitvāpi ciraṁ bahu.dhā bahu.vigrahām || 61 || [Note: AHS4.7.061v/ 7.61bv yām āsādya tyajanty asūn]
AHS4.7.062a/ nityaṁ harṣāti.vegena tat.pūrvam iva sevate |
AHS4.7.062c/ śokodvegā.rati.bhayair yāṁ dṛṣṭvā nābhibhūyate || 62 ||
AHS4.7.063a/ goṣṭhī.mahotsavodyānaṁ na yasyāḥ śobhate vinā |
AHS4.7.063c/ smṛtvā smṛtvā ca bahu.śo viyuktaḥ śocate yayā || 63 || [Note: AHS4.7.063v/ 7.63cv smṛtvā tu yāṁ ca bahu.śo]
AHS4.7.064a/ a.prasannāpi yā prītyai prasannā svarga eva yā |
AHS4.7.064c/ apīndraṁ manyate duḥ.sthaṁ hṛdaya.sthitayā yayā || 64 ||
AHS4.7.065a/ a.nirdeśya.sukhāsvādā svayaṁ.vedyaiva yā param |
AHS4.7.065c/ iti citrāsv avasthāsu priyām anukaroti yā || 65 ||
[Page 378 ]
AHS4.7.066a/ priyāti.priya.tāṁ yāti yat priyasya viśeṣataḥ |
AHS4.7.066c/ yā prītir yā ratir vā vāg yā puṣṭir iti ca stutā || 66 ||
AHS4.7.067a/ deva.dānava.gandharva.yakṣa.rākṣasa.mānuṣaiḥ |
AHS4.7.067c/ pāna.pravṛttau satyāṁ tu tāṁ surāṁ vidhinā pibet || 67 || [Note: AHS4.7.067v/ 7.67bv .yakṣa.rākṣasa.mānavaiḥ 7.67bv .yakṣa.rākṣasa.mānavaiḥ]
AHS4.7.068a/ sambhavanti na te rogā medo.'nila.kaphodbhavāḥ |
AHS4.7.068c/ vidhi.yuktād ṛte madyād ye na sidhyanti dāruṇāḥ || 68 || [Note: AHS4.7.068v/ 7.68av sambhavanti ca ye rogā 7.68cv vidhi.yuktād ṛte madyāt 7.68dv te na sidhyanti dāruṇāḥ]
AHS4.7.069a/ asti dehasya sāvasthā yasyāṁ pānaṁ nivāryate |
AHS4.7.069c/ anya.tra madyān nigadād vividhauṣadha.saṁskṛtāt || 69 || [Note: AHS4.7.069v/ 7.69dv vividhauṣadha.sambhṛtāt]
AHS4.7.070a/ ānūpaṁ jāṅgalaṁ ṁāṁsaṁ vidhināpy upakalpitam |
AHS4.7.070c/ madyaṁ sahāyam a.prāpya samyak pariṇamet katham || 70 ||
AHS4.7.071a/ su.tīvra.māruta.vyādhi.ghātino laśunasya ca |
AHS4.7.071c/ madya.māṁsa.viyuktasya prayoge syāt kiyān guṇaḥ || 71 || [Note: AHS4.7.071v/ 7.71dv prayogaḥ syāt kiyān guṇaḥ 7.71dv prayogāt syāt kiyān guṇaḥ]
AHS4.7.072a/ nigūḍha.śalyāharaṇe śastra.kṣārāgni.karmaṇi |
AHS4.7.072c/ pīta.madyaś viṣahate sukhaṁ vaidya.vikatthanām || 72 || [Note: AHS4.7.072v/ 7.72bv śastra.kṣārāgni.karmasu]
AHS4.7.073a/ analottejanaṁ rucyaṁ śoka.śrama.vinodakam |
AHS4.7.073c/ na cātaḥ param asty anyad ārogya.bala.puṣṭi.kṛt || 73 || [Note: AHS4.7.073v/ 7.73bv śoka.śrama.vinodanam]
AHS4.7.074a/ rakṣatā jīvitaṁ tasmāt peyam ātma.vatā sadā |
AHS4.7.074c/ āśritopāśrita.hitaṁ paramaṁ dharma.sādhanam || 74 ||
AHS4.7.075a/ snātaḥ praṇamya sura.vipra.gurūn yathā.svaṁ vṛttiṁ vidhāya ca samasta.parigrahasya |
AHS4.7.075c/ āpāna.bhūmim atha gandha.jalābhiṣiktām āhāra.maṇḍapa.samīpa.gatāṁ śrayet || 75 ||
[Page 379 ]
AHS4.7.076a/ sv.āstṛte 'tha śayane kamanīye mitra.bhṛtya.ramaṇī.samavetaḥ |
AHS4.7.076c/ svaṁ yaśaḥ kathaka.cāraṇa.saṅghair uddhataṁ niśamayann ati.lokam || 76 ||
AHS4.7.077a/ vilāsinīnāṁ ca vilāsa.śobhi gītaṁ sa.nṛtyaṁ kala.tūrya.ghoṣaiḥ |
AHS4.7.077c/ kāñcī.kalāpaiś cala.kiṅkiṇīkaiḥ krīḍā.vihaṅgaiś ca kṛtānunādam || 77 || [Note: AHS4.7.077v/ 7.77bv gītaṁ sa.nṛttaṁ kala.tūrya.ghoṣaiḥ 7.77cv kāñcī.kalāpaiḥ sphuṭa.kiṅkiṇīkaiḥ]
AHS4.7.078a/ maṇi.kanaka.samutthair āvaneyair vicitraiḥ || 78a ||
AHS4.7.078b/ sa.jala.vividha.lekha.kṣauma.vastrāvṛtāṅgaiḥ || 78b ||
AHS4.7.078c/ api muni.jana.citta.kṣobha.sampādinībhiś || 78c ||
AHS4.7.078d/ cakita.hariṇa.lola.prekṣaṇībhiḥ priyābhiḥ || 78d || [Note: AHS4.7.078v/ 7.78av maṇi.kanaka.samutthair aupageyair vicitraiḥ 7.78av maṇi.kanaka.samutthaiḥ pāna.pātrair vicitraiḥ 7.78bv sa.jala.vividha.bhakti.kṣauma.vastrāvṛtāṅgaiḥ 7.78dv cakita.hariṇa.lola.prekṣaṇābhiḥ priyābhiḥ]
AHS4.7.079a/ stana.nitamba.kṛtād ati.gauravād alasam ākulam īśvara.sambhramāt |
AHS4.7.079c/ iti gataṁ dadhatībhir a.saṁsthitaṁ taruṇa.citta.vilobhana.kārmaṇam || 79 ||
AHS4.7.080a/ yauvanāsava.mattābhir vilāsādhiṣṭhitātmabhiḥ |
AHS4.7.080c/ sañcāryamāṇaṁ yuga.pat tanv.aṅgībhir itas.tataḥ || 80 ||
AHS4.7.081a/ tāla.vṛnta.nalinī.dalānilaiḥ śītalī.kṛtam atīva śītalaiḥ |
AHS4.7.081c/ darśane 'pi vidadhad vaśānugam svāditaṁ kim uta citta.janmanaḥ || 81 || [Note: AHS4.7.081v/ 7.81dv sevitaṁ kim uta citta.janmanaḥ]
AHS4.7.082a/ cūta.rasendu.mṛgaiḥ kṛta.vāsaṁ mallikayojjvalayā ca sa.nātham |
AHS4.7.082c/ sphāṭika.śukti.gataṁ sa.taraṅgaṁ kāntam an.aṅgam ivodvahad aṅgam || 82 || [Note: AHS4.7.082v/ 7.82bv mallikayojjvalayātha sa.nātham 7.82cv sphāṭika.śukti.gataṁ su.taraṅgaṁ]
AHS4.7.083a/ tālīśādyaṁ cūrṇam elādikaṁ vā hṛdyaṁ prāśya prāg vayaḥ.sthāpanaṁ vā |
AHS4.7.083c/ tat.prārthibhyo bhūmi.bhāge su.mṛṣṭe toyonmiśraṁ dāpayitvā tataś ca || 83 || [Note: AHS4.7.083v/ 7.83bv hṛdyaṁ prāśyaṁ prāg vayaḥ.sthāpanaṁ vā]
AHS4.7.084a/ dhṛti.mān smṛti.mān nityam an.ūnādhikam ācaran |
AHS4.7.084c/ ucitenopacāreṇa sarvam evopapādayan || 84 || [Note: AHS4.7.084v/ 7.84bv a.nyūnādhikam ācaran 7.84cv uditenopacāreṇa 7.84dv sarvam evopapālayan]
AHS4.7.085a/ jita.vikasitāsita.saro.ja.nayana.saṅkrānti.vardhita.śrīkam |
AHS4.7.085c/ kāntā.mukham iva saurabha.hṛta.madhu.pa.gaṇaṁ piben madyam || 85 || [Note: AHS4.7.085v/ 7.85bv .ja.nayana.saṅkrānta.vardhita.śrīkam 7.85bv .ja.nayanaṁ sat kānti.vardhita.śrīkam]
[Page 380 ]
AHS4.7.086a/ pītvaivaṁ caṣaka.dvayaṁ parijanaṁ san.mānya sarvaṁ tato || 86a ||
AHS4.7.086b/ gatvāhāra.bhuvaṁ puraḥ su.bhiṣajo bhuñjīta bhūyo 'tra ca || 86b ||
AHS4.7.086c/ māṁsāpūpa.ghṛtārdrakādi.haritair yuktaṁ sa.sauvarcalair || 86c ||
AHS4.7.086d/ dvis trir vā niśi cālpam eva vanitā.saṁvalganārthaṁ pibet || 86d || [Note: AHS4.7.086v/ 7.86av pītvaivaṁ caṣaka.trayaṁ parijanaṁ san.mānya sarvaṁ tato 7.86av pītvaivaṁ caṣaka.dvayaṁ parijanaṁ sambhāvya sarvaṁ tato]
AHS4.7.087a/ rahasi dayitām aṅke kṛtvā bhujāntara.pīḍanāt || 87a ||
AHS4.7.087b/ pulakita.tanuṁ jāta.svedāṁ sa.kampa.payo.dharām || 87b ||
AHS4.7.087c/ yadi sa.rabhasaṁ sīdhor vāraṁ na pāyayate kṛtī || 87c ||
AHS4.7.087d/ kim anubhavati kleśa.prāyaṁ tato gṛha.tantra.tām || 87d || [Note: AHS4.7.087v/ 7.87cv yadi sa.rabhasaṁ sīdhūdgāraṁ na pāyayate kṛtī 7.87dv kim anubhavati kleśa.prāyāṁ vṛthā gṛha.tantra.tām 7.87dv kim anubhavati kleśa.prāyāṁ tadā gṛha.tantra.tām]
AHS4.7.088a/ vara.tanu.vaktra.saṅgati.su.gandhi.taraṁ sarakam || 88a ||
AHS4.7.088b/ drutam iva padma.rāga.maṇim āsava.rūpa.dharam || 88b ||
AHS4.7.088c/ bhavati rati.śrameṇa ca madaḥ pibato 'lpam api || 88c ||
AHS4.7.088d/ kṣayam ata ojasaḥ pariharan sa śayīta param || 88d ||
AHS4.7.089a/ itthaṁ yuktyā piban madyaṁ na tri.vargād vihīyate |
AHS4.7.089c/ a.sāra.saṁsāra.sukhaṁ paramaṁ cādhigacchati || 89 ||
AHS4.7.090a/ aiśvaryasyopabhogo 'yaṁ spṛhaṇīyaḥ surair api |
AHS4.7.090c/ anya.thā hi vipatsu syāt paścāt tāpendhanaṁ dhanam || 90 || [Note: AHS4.7.090v/ 7.90cv anya.thā hi vipatsv asya]
AHS4.7.091a/ upabhogena rahito bhoga.vān iti nindyate |
AHS4.7.091c/ nirmito 'ti.kad.aryo 'yaṁ vidhinā nidhi.pālakaḥ || 91 ||
AHS4.7.092a/ tasmād vyavasthayā pānaṁ pānasya satataṁ hitam |
AHS4.7.092c/ jitvā viṣaya.lubdhānām indriyāṇāṁ sva.tantra.tām || 92 || [Note: AHS4.7.092v/ 7.92av tasmād avasthayā pānaṁ]
AHS4.7.093a/ vidhir vasu.matām eṣa bhaviṣyad.vasavas tu ye |
AHS4.7.093c/ yathopapatti tair madyaṁ pātavyaṁ mātrayā hitam || 93 ||
AHS4.7.094a/ yāvad dṛṣṭer na sambhrāntir yāvan na kṣobhate manaḥ |
AHS4.7.094c/ tāvad eva virantavyaṁ madyād ātma.vatā sadā || 94 ||
AHS4.7.095a/ abhyaṅgodvartana.snāna.vāsa.dhūpānulepanaiḥ |
AHS4.7.095c/ snigdhoṣṇair bhāvitaś cānnaiḥ pānaṁ vātottaraḥ pibet || 95 ||
[Page 381 ]
AHS4.7.096a/ śītopacārair vividhair madhura.snigdha.śītalaiḥ |
AHS4.7.096c/ paittiko bhāvitaś cānnaiḥ piban madyaṁ na sīdati || 96 ||
AHS4.7.097a/ upacārair a.śiśirair yava.godhūma.bhuk pibet |
AHS4.7.097c/ ślaiṣmiko dhanva.jair māṁsair madyaṁ māricikaiḥ saha || 97 || [Note: AHS4.7.097v/ 7.97cv ślaiṣmiko jāṅgalair māṁsair 7.97dv madyaṁ maricakaiḥ saha]
AHS4.7.098a/ tatra vāte hitaṁ madyaṁ prāyaḥ paiṣṭika.gauḍikam |
AHS4.7.098c/ pitte sāmbho madhu kaphe mārdvīkāriṣṭa.mādhavam || 98 || [Note: AHS4.7.098v/ 7.98dv mādhvīkāriṣṭa.mādhavam]
AHS4.7.099a/ prāk pibec chlaiṣmiko madyaṁ bhuktasyopari paittikaḥ |
AHS4.7.099c/ vātikas tu piben madhye sama.doṣo yathecchayā || 99 || [Note: AHS4.7.099v/ 7.99dv sama.doṣo yathecchati 7.99dv sama.doṣo yad.ṛcchayā]
AHS4.7.100a/ madeṣu vāta.pitta.ghnaṁ prāyo mūrchāsu ceṣyate |
AHS4.7.100c/ sarva.trāpi viśeṣeṇa pittam evopalakṣayet || 100 ||
AHS4.7.101a/ śītāḥ pradehā maṇayaḥ sekā vyajana.mārutāḥ |
AHS4.7.101c/ sitā drākṣekṣu.kharjūra.kāśmarya.sva.rasāḥ payaḥ || 101 ||
AHS4.7.102a/ siddhaṁ madhura.vargeṇa rasā yūṣāḥ sa.dāḍimāḥ |
AHS4.7.102c/ ṣaṣṭikāḥ śālayo raktā yavāḥ sarpiś ca jīvanam || 102 ||
AHS4.7.103a/ kalyāṇakaṁ mahā.tiktaṁ ṣaṭ.palaṁ payasāgnikaḥ |
AHS4.7.103c/ pippalyo vā śilāhvaṁ vā rasāyana.vidhānataḥ || 103 ||
AHS4.7.104a/ tri.phalā vā prayoktavyā sa.ghṛta.kṣaudra.śarkarā |
AHS4.7.104c/ prasakta.vegeṣu hitaṁ mukha.nāsāvarodhanam || 104 ||
AHS4.7.105a/ pibed vā mānuṣī.kṣīraṁ tena dadyāc ca nāvanam |
AHS4.7.105c/ mṛṇāla.bisa.kṛṣṇā vā lihyāt kṣaudreṇa sābhayāḥ || 105 || [Note: AHS4.7.105v/ 7.105av pibed vā mānuṣaṁ kṣīraṁ]
[Page 382 ]
AHS4.7.106a/ durālabhāṁ vā mustaṁ vā śītena salilena vā |
AHS4.7.106c/ piben marica.kolāsthi.majjośīrāhikesaram || 106 ||
AHS4.7.107a/ dhātrī.phala.rase siddhaṁ pathyā.kvāthena vā ghṛtam |
AHS4.7.107c/ kuryāt kriyāṁ yathoktāṁ ca yathā.doṣa.balodayam || 107 ||
AHS4.7.108a/ pañca karmāṇi ceṣṭāni secanaṁ śoṇitasya ca |
AHS4.7.108c/ sat.tvasyālambanaṁ jñānam a.gṛddhir viṣayeṣu ca || 108 ||
AHS4.7.109a/ madeṣv ati.pravṛddheṣu mūrchāyeṣu ca yojayet |
AHS4.7.109c/ tīkṣṇaṁ sannyāsa.vihitaṁ viṣa.ghnaṁ viṣa.jeṣu ca || 109 || [Note: AHS4.7.109v/ 7.109cv karma sannyāsa.vihitaṁ 7.109dv viṣa.ghnaṁ viṣa.jeṣu tu]
AHS4.7.110a/ āśu prayojyaṁ sannyāse su.tīkṣṇaṁ nasyam añjanam |
AHS4.7.110c/ dhūmaḥ pradhamanaṁ todaḥ sūcībhiś ca nakhāntare || 110 || [Note: AHS4.7.110v/ 7.110cv dhūmaṁ pradhamanaṁ todaḥ 7.110dv sūcībhiś ca nakhāntaraiḥ]
AHS4.7.111a/ keśānāṁ luñcanaṁ dāho daṁśo daśana.vṛścikaiḥ |
AHS4.7.111c/ kaṭv.amla.gālanaṁ vaktre kapikacchv.avagharṣaṇam || 111 || [Note: AHS4.7.111v/ 7.111dv kapikacchvāvagharṣaṇam]
AHS4.7.112a/ utthito labdha.sañjñaś ca laśuna.sva.rasaṁ pibet |
AHS4.7.112c/ khādet sa.vyoṣa.lavaṇaṁ bījapūraka.kesaram || 112 ||
AHS4.7.113a/ laghv.anna.prati tīkṣṇoṣṇam adyāt sroto.viśuddhaye |
AHS4.7.113c/ vismāpanaiḥ saṁsmaraṇaiḥ priya.śravaṇa.darśanaiḥ || 113 || [Note: AHS4.7.113v/ 7.113av laghv annaṁ kaṭu.tīkṣṇoṣṇam]
AHS4.7.114a/ paṭubhir gīta.vāditra.śabdair vyāyāma.śīlanaiḥ |
AHS4.7.114c/ sraṁsanollekhanair dhūmaiḥ śoṇitasyāvasecanaiḥ || 114 ||
AHS4.7.115a/ upācaret taṁ pratatam anubandha.bhayāt punaḥ |
AHS4.7.115c/ tasya saṁrakṣitavyaṁ ca manaḥ pralaya.hetutaḥ || 115 ||

4.8. Chapter 8 :: Athārśaścikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 358-369] [Page 383 ]
AHS4.8.001a/ kāle sādhāraṇe vy.abhre nāti.dur.balam arśasam |
AHS4.8.001c/ viśuddha.koṣṭhaṁ laghv.alpam anulomanam āśitam || 1 || [Note: AHS4.8.001v/ 8.1cv viśuddha.koṣṭhaṁ laghv.annam]
AHS4.8.002a/ śuciṁ kṛta.svasty.ayanaṁ mukta.viṇ.mūtram a.vyatham |
AHS4.8.002c/ śayane phalake vānya.narotsaṅge vyapāśritam || 2 ||
AHS4.8.003a/ pūrveṇa kāyenottānaṁ praty.āditya.gudaṁ samam |
AHS4.8.003c/ samunnata.kaṭī.deśam atha yantraṇa.vāsasā || 3 ||
AHS4.8.004a/ sakthnoḥ śiro.dharāyāṁ ca parikṣiptam ṛju sthitam |
AHS4.8.004c/ ālambitaṁ paricaraiḥ sarpiṣābhyakta.pāyave || 4 ||
AHS4.8.005a/ tato 'smai sarpiṣābhyaktaṁ nidadhyād ṛju yantrakam |
AHS4.8.005c/ śanair anu.sukhaṁ pāyau tato dṛṣṭvā pravāhaṇāt || 5 ||
AHS4.8.006a/ yantre praviṣṭaṁ dur.nāma plota.guṇṭhitayānu ca |
AHS4.8.006c/ śalākayotpīḍya bhiṣag yathokta.vidhinā dahet || 6 || [Note: AHS4.8.006v/ 8.6av yantre praviṣṭe dur.nāma]
AHS4.8.007a/ kṣāreṇaivārdram itarat kṣāreṇa jvalanena vā |
AHS4.8.007c/ mahad vā balinaś chittvā vīta.yantram athāturam || 7 ||
AHS4.8.008a/ sv.abhyakta.pāyu.jaghanam avagāhe nidhāpayet |
AHS4.8.008c/ nir.vāta.mandira.sthasya tato 'syācāram ādiśet || 8 || [Note: AHS4.8.008v/ 8.8cv nir.vātāgāra.saṁsthasya]
AHS4.8.009a/ ekaikam iti saptāhāt saptāhāt samupācaret |
AHS4.8.009c/ prāg dakṣiṇaṁ tato vāmam arśaḥ pṛṣṭhāgra.jaṁ tataḥ || 9 ||
AHS4.8.010a/ bahv.arśasaḥ su.dagdhasya syād vāyor anuloma.tā |
AHS4.8.010c/ rucir anne 'gni.paṭu.tā svāsthyaṁ varṇa.balodayaḥ || 10 ||
[Page 384 ]
AHS4.8.011a/ vasti.śūle tv adho nābher lepayec chlakṣṇa.kalkitaiḥ |
AHS4.8.011c/ varṣābhū.kuṣṭha.surabhi.miśi.lohāmarāhvayaiḥ || 11 ||
AHS4.8.012a/ śakṛn.mūtra.pratīghāte pariṣekāvagāhayoḥ |
AHS4.8.012c/ varaṇālambuṣair aṇḍa.gokaṇṭaka.punarnavaiḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS4.8.012v/ 8.12av śakṛn.mūtra.parīghāte]
AHS4.8.013a/ suṣavī.surabhībhyāṁ ca kvātham uṣṇaṁ prayojayet |
AHS4.8.013c/ sa.sneham atha.vā kṣīraṁ tailaṁ vā vāta.nāśanam || 13 ||
AHS4.8.014a/ yuñjītānnaṁ śakṛd.bhedi snehān vāta.ghna.dīpanān |
AHS4.8.014c/ athā.prayojya.dāhasya nirgatān kapha.vāta.jān || 14 ||
AHS4.8.015a/ sa.stambha.kaṇḍū.ruk.śophān abhyajya guda.kīlakān |
AHS4.8.015c/ bilva.mūlāgnika.kṣāra.kuṣṭhaiḥ siddhena secayet || 15 || [Note: AHS4.8.015v/ 8.15av saṁrambha.kaṇḍū.ruk.śophān 8.15av saṁstambha.kaṇḍū.ruk.śophān]
AHS4.8.016a/ tailenāhi.biḍāloṣṭra.varāha.vasayātha.vā |
AHS4.8.016c/ svedayed anu piṇḍena drava.svedena vā punaḥ || 16 ||
AHS4.8.016.1+(1)a/ kāsīsaṁ saindhavaṁ rāsnā śuṇṭhī kuṣṭhaṁ ca lāṅgalī |
AHS4.8.016.1+(1)c/ śilābhrakāśvamāraṁ ca jantuhṛd danti.citrakau || 16.1+(1) ||
AHS4.8.016.1+(2)a/ haritālaṁ tathā svarṇakṣīrī taiś ca pacet samaiḥ |
AHS4.8.016.1+(2)c/ tailaṁ sudhārka.payasī gavāṁ mūtre catur.guṇe || 16.1+(2) ||
AHS4.8.016.1+(3)a/ etad abhyaṅgato 'rśāṁsi kṣāra.vat pātayed drutam |
AHS4.8.016.1+(3)c/ kṣāra.karma.karaṁ hy etan na ca dūṣayate valīm || 16.1+(3) ||
AHS4.8.017a/ saktūnāṁ piṇḍikābhir vā snigdhānāṁ taila.sarpiṣā |
AHS4.8.017c/ rāsnāyā hapuṣāyā vā piṇḍair vā kārṣṇyagandhikaiḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS4.8.017v/ 8.17dv piṇḍair vā kārṣakānvitaiḥ]
[Page 385 ]
AHS4.8.018a/ arka.mūlaṁ śamī.pattram nṛ.keśaḥ sarpa.kañcukam |
AHS4.8.018c/ mārjāra.carma sarpiś ca dhūpanaṁ hitam arśasām || 18 ||
AHS4.8.019a/ tathāśvagandhā surasā bṛhatī pippalī ghṛtam |
AHS4.8.019c/ dhānyāmla.piṣṭair jīmūta.bījais taj.jālakaṁ mṛdu || 19 ||
AHS4.8.020a/ lepitaṁ chāyayā śuṣkaṁ vartir guda.ja.śātanī |
AHS4.8.020c/ sa.jāla.mūla.jīmūta.lehe vā kṣāra.saṁyute || 20 ||
AHS4.8.021a/ guñjā.sūraṇa.kūṣmāṇḍa.bījair vartis tathā.guṇā |
AHS4.8.021c/ snuk.kṣīrārdra.niśā.lepas tathā go.mūtra.kalkitaiḥ || 21 ||
AHS4.8.022a/ kṛkavāku.śakṛt.kṛṣṇā.niśā.guñjā.phalais tathā |
AHS4.8.022c/ snuk.kṣīra.piṣṭaiḥ ṣaḍgranthā.halinī.vāraṇāsthibhiḥ || 22 ||
AHS4.8.023a/ kulīraśṛṅgī.vijayā.kuṣṭhāruṣkara.tutthakaiḥ |
AHS4.8.023c/ śigru.mūlaka.jair bījaiḥ pattrair aśvaghna.nimba.jaiḥ || 23 || [Note: AHS4.8.023v/ 8.23cv śigru.mūlaka.bījair vā]
AHS4.8.024a/ pīlu.mūlena bilvena hiṅgunā ca samanvitaiḥ |
AHS4.8.024c/ kuṣṭhaṁ śirīṣa.bījāni pippalyaḥ saindhavaṁ guḍaḥ || 24 ||
AHS4.8.025a/ arka.kṣīraṁ sudhā.kṣīraṁ tri.phalā ca pralepanam |
AHS4.8.025c/ ārkaṁ payaḥ sudhā.kāṇḍaṁ kaṭukālābu.pallavāḥ || 25 || [Note: AHS4.8.025v/ 8.25av ārkaṁ payaḥ snuhī.kāṇḍaṁ]
AHS4.8.026a/ karañjo basta.mūtraṁ ca lepanaṁ śreṣṭham arśasām |
AHS4.8.026c/ ānuvāsanikair lepaḥ pippaly.ādyaiś ca pūjitaḥ || 26 ||
AHS4.8.027a/ ebhir evauṣadhaiḥ kuryāt tailāny abhyañjanāya ca |
AHS4.8.027c/ dhūpanālepanābhyaṅgaiḥ prasravanti gudāṅkurāḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS4.8.027v/ 8.27av ebhir lepauṣadhaiḥ kuryāt 8.27bv tailāny abhyañjanāni ca]
[Page 386 ]
AHS4.8.028a/ sañcitaṁ duṣṭa.rudhiraṁ tataḥ sampadyate sukhī |
AHS4.8.028c/ a.vartamānam ucchūna.kaṭhinebhyo hared asṛk || 28 ||
AHS4.8.029a/ arśobhyo jala.jā.śastra.sūcī.kūrcaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS4.8.029c/ śītoṣṇa.snigdha.rūkṣair hi na vyādhir upaśāmyati || 29 || [Note: AHS4.8.029v/ 8.29cv śītoṣṇa.snigdha.rūkṣādyair]
AHS4.8.030a/ rakte duṣṭe bhiṣak tasmād raktam evāvasecayet |
AHS4.8.030c/ yo jāto go.rasaḥ kṣīrād vahni.cūrṇāvacūrṇitāt || 30 || [Note: AHS4.8.030v/ 8.30dv bahu.mūlāvacūrṇitāt]
AHS4.8.031a/ pibaṁs tam eva tenaiva bhuñjāno guda.jān jayet |
AHS4.8.031c/ kovidārasya mūlānāṁ mathitena rajaḥ piban || 31 || [Note: AHS4.8.031v/ 8.31dv mathitena rajaḥ pibet]
AHS4.8.032a/ aśnan jīrṇe ca pathyāni mucyate hata.nāmabhiḥ |
AHS4.8.032c/ guda.śvayathu.śūlārto mandāgnir gaulmikān pibet || 32 ||
AHS4.8.033a/ hiṅgv.ādīn anu.takraṁ vā khāded guḍa.harītakīm |
AHS4.8.033c/ takreṇa vā pibet pathyā.vellāgni.kuṭaja.tvacaḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS4.8.033v/ 8.33av hiṅgv.ādīn anu.takrāṁ vā 8.33cv takreṇa vā pibet pathyāṁ 8.33dv vellāgni.kuṭaja.tvacaḥ]
AHS4.8.034a/ kaliṅga.magadhā.jyotiḥ.sūraṇān vāṁśa.vardhitān |
AHS4.8.034c/ koṣṇāmbunā vā tri.paṭu.vyoṣa.hiṅgv.amla.vetasam || 34 ||
AHS4.8.035a/ yuktaṁ bilva.kapitthābhyāṁ mahauṣadha.viḍena vā |
AHS4.8.035c/ aruṣkarair yavānyā vā pradadyāt takra.tarpaṇam || 35 || [Note: AHS4.8.035v/ 8.35cv āruṣkarair yavānyā vā]
AHS4.8.036a/ dadyād vā hapuṣā.hiṅgu.citrakaṁ takra.saṁyutam |
AHS4.8.036c/ māsaṁ takrānu.pānāni khādet pīlu.phalāni vā || 36 ||
AHS4.8.037a/ pibed ahar ahas takraṁ nir.anno vā pra.kāmataḥ |
AHS4.8.037c/ aty.arthaṁ manda.kāyāgnes takram evāvacārayet || 37 || [Note: AHS4.8.037v/ 8.37cv aty.artha.manda.kāyāgnes]
[Page 387 ]
AHS4.8.038a/ saptāhaṁ vā daśāhaṁ vā māsārdhaṁ māsam eva ca |
AHS4.8.038c/ bala.kāla.vikāra.jño bhiṣak takraṁ prayojayet || 38 ||
AHS4.8.039a/ sāyaṁ vā lāja.saktūnāṁ dadyāt takrāvalehikām |
AHS4.8.039c/ jīrṇe takre pradadyād vā takra.peyāṁ sa.saindhavām || 39 ||
AHS4.8.040a/ takrānu.pānaṁ sa.snehaṁ takraudanam ataḥ param |
AHS4.8.040c/ yūṣai rasair vā takrāḍhyaiḥ śālīn bhuñjīta mātrayā || 40 ||
AHS4.8.041a/ rūkṣam ardhoddhṛta.snehaṁ yataś cān.uddhṛtaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS4.8.041c/ takraṁ doṣāgni.bala.vit tri.vidhaṁ tat prayojyet || 41 ||
AHS4.8.042a/ na virohanti guda.jāḥ punas takra.samāhatāḥ |
AHS4.8.042c/ niṣiktaṁ tad dhi dahati bhūmāv api tṛṇolupam || 42 || [Note: AHS4.8.042v/ 8.42cv niṣiktaṁ tad vidahati]
AHS4.8.043a/ srotaḥsu takra.śuddheṣu raso dhātūn upaiti yaḥ |
AHS4.8.043c/ tena puṣṭir balaṁ varṇaḥ paraṁ tuṣṭiś ca jāyate || 43 ||
AHS4.8.044a/ vāta.śleṣma.vikārāṇāṁ śataṁ ca vinivartate |
AHS4.8.044c/ mathitaṁ bhājane kṣudra.bṛhatī.phala.lepite || 44 ||
AHS4.8.045a/ niśāṁ paryuṣitaṁ peyam icchadbhir guda.ja.kṣayam |
AHS4.8.045c/ dhānyopakuñcikājājī.hapuṣā.pippalī.dvayaiḥ || 45 ||
AHS4.8.046a/ kāravī.granthika.śaṭhī.yavāny.agni.yavānakaiḥ |
AHS4.8.046c/ cūrṇitair ghṛta.pātra.sthaṁ nāty.amlaṁ takram āsutam || 46 || [Note: AHS4.8.046v/ 8.46bv .yavāny.agni.yavānikaiḥ]
AHS4.8.047a/ takrāriṣṭaṁ pibej jātaṁ vyaktāmla.kaṭu kāmataḥ |
AHS4.8.047c/ dīpanaṁ rocanaṁ varṇyaṁ kapha.vātānulomanam || 47 ||
[Page 388 ]
AHS4.8.048a/ guda.śvayathu.kaṇḍv.arti.nāśanaṁ bala.vardhanam |
AHS4.8.048c/ tvacaṁ citraka.mūlasya piṣṭvā kumbhaṁ pralepayet || 48 ||
AHS4.8.049a/ takraṁ vā dadhi vā tatra jātam arśo.haraṁ pibet |
AHS4.8.049c/ bhārgy.āsphotāmṛtā.pañca.koleṣv apy eṣa saṁvidhiḥ || 49 ||
AHS4.8.050a/ piṣṭair gaja.kaṇā.pāṭhā.kāravī.pañca.kolakaiḥ |
AHS4.8.050c/ tumburv.ajājī.dhanikā.bilva.madhyaiś ca kalpayet || 50 ||
AHS4.8.051a/ phalāmlān yamaka.snehān peyā.yūṣa.rasādikān |
AHS4.8.051c/ ebhir evauṣadhaiḥ sādhyaṁ vāri sarpiś ca dīpanam || 51 ||
AHS4.8.052a/ kramo 'yaṁ bhinna.śakṛtāṁ vakṣyate gāḍha.varcasām |
AHS4.8.052c/ snehāḍhyaiḥ saktubhir yuktāṁ lavaṇāṁ vāruṇīṁ pibet || 52 ||
AHS4.8.053a/ lavaṇā eva vā takra.sīdhu.dhānyāmla.vāruṇīḥ |
AHS4.8.053c/ prāg.bhaktān yamake bhṛṣṭān saktubhiś cāvacūrṇitān || 53 || [Note: AHS4.8.053v/ 8.53cv prāg.bhaktaṁ yamake bhṛṣṭān]
AHS4.8.054a/ karañja.pallavān khāded vāta.varco.'nulomanān |
AHS4.8.054c/ sa.guḍaṁ nāgaraṁ pāṭhāṁ guḍa.kṣāra.ghṛtāni vā || 54 || [Note: AHS4.8.054v/ 8.54cv sa.guḍaṁ nāgaraṁ pāṭhā. 8.54dv .guḍa.kṣāra.ghṛtāni vā]
AHS4.8.055a/ go.mūtrādhyuṣitām adyāt sa.guḍāṁ vā harītakīm |
AHS4.8.055c/ pathyā.śata.dvayān mūtra.droṇenā.mūtra.saṅkṣayāt || 55 || [Note: AHS4.8.055v/ 8.55cv pathyā.śata.dvayaṁ mūtra.]
AHS4.8.056a/ pakvāt khādet sa.madhunī dve dve hanti kaphodbhavān |
AHS4.8.056c/ dur.nāma.kuṣṭha.śvayathu.gulma.mehodara.kṛmīn || 56 || [Note: AHS4.8.056v/ 8.56av paktvā khādet sa.madhunī]
AHS4.8.057a/ granthy.arbudāpacī.sthaulya.pāṇḍu.rogāḍhya.mārutān |
AHS4.8.057c/ ajaśṛṅgī.jaṭā.kalkam ajā.mūtreṇa yaḥ pibet || 57 ||
[Page 389 ]
AHS4.8.058a/ guḍa.vārtāka.bhuk tasya naśyanty āśu gudāṅkurāḥ |
AHS4.8.058c/ śreṣṭhā.rasena trivṛtāṁ pathyāṁ takreṇa vā saha || 58 ||
AHS4.8.059a/ pathyāṁ vā pippalī.yuktāṁ ghṛta.bhṛṣṭāṁ guḍānvitām |
AHS4.8.059c/ atha.vā sa.trivṛd.dantīṁ bhakṣayed anulomanīm || 59 ||
AHS4.8.060a/ hate gudāśraye doṣe guda.jā yānti saṅkṣayam |
AHS4.8.060c/ dāḍima.sva.rasājājī.yavānī.guḍa.nāgaraiḥ || 60 || [Note: AHS4.8.060v/ 8.60av hṛte gudāśraye doṣe]
AHS4.8.061a/ pāṭhayā vā yutaṁ takraṁ vāta.varco.'nulomanam |
AHS4.8.061c/ sīdhuṁ vā gauḍam atha.vā sa.citraka.mahauṣadham || 61 ||
AHS4.8.062a/ pibet surāṁ vā hapuṣā.pāṭhā.sauvarcalānvitām |
AHS4.8.062c/ daśādi.daśakair vṛddhāḥ pippalīr dvi.picuṁ tilān || 62 || [Note: AHS4.8.062v/ 8.62dv pippalīr dvi.picuṁ tilāt]
AHS4.8.063a/ pītvā kṣīreṇa labhate balaṁ deha.hutāśayoḥ |
AHS4.8.063c/ duḥsparśakena bilvena yavānyā nāgareṇa vā || 63 || [Note: AHS4.8.063v/ 8.63dv yavānyā nāgareṇa ca]
AHS4.8.064a/ ekaikenāpi saṁyuktā pāṭhā hanty arśasāṁ rujam |
AHS4.8.064c/ salilasya vahe paktvā prasthārdham abhayā.tvacām || 64 || [Note: AHS4.8.064v/ 8.64dv prasthārdham abhayā.tvacam]
AHS4.8.065a/ prasthaṁ dhātryā daśa.palaṁ kapitthānāṁ tato 'rdhataḥ |
AHS4.8.065c/ viśālāṁ lodhra.marica.kṛṣṇā.vellailavālukam || 65 ||
AHS4.8.066a/ dvi.palāṁśaṁ pṛthak pāda.śeṣe pūte guḍāt tule |
AHS4.8.066c/ dattvā prasthaṁ ca dhātakyāḥ sthāpayed ghṛta.bhājane || 66 || [Note: AHS4.8.066v/ 8.66cv dattvā prasthaṁ tu dhātakyāḥ]
AHS4.8.067a/ pakṣāt sa śīlito 'riṣṭaḥ karoty agniṁ nihanti ca |
AHS4.8.067c/ guda.ja.grahaṇī.pāṇḍu.kuṣṭhodara.gara.jvarān || 67 ||
[Page 390 ]
AHS4.8.068a/ śvayathu.plīha.hṛd.roga.gulma.yakṣma.vami.kṛmīn |
AHS4.8.068c/ jala.droṇe paced dantī.daśa.mūla.varāgnikān || 68 ||
AHS4.8.069a/ pālikān pāda.śeṣe tu kṣiped guḍa.tulāṁ param |
AHS4.8.069c/ pūrva.vat sarvam asya syād ānulomi.taras tv ayam || 69 ||
AHS4.8.070a/ paced durālabhā.prasthaṁ droṇe 'pāṁ prāsṛtaiḥ saha |
AHS4.8.070c/ dantī.pāṭhāgni.vijayā.vāsāmalaka.nāgaraiḥ || 70 || [Note: AHS4.8.070v/ 8.70bv droṇe 'pāṁ dvi.palaiḥ saha]
AHS4.8.071a/ tasmin sitā.śataṁ dadyāt pāda.sthe 'nyac ca pūrva.vat |
AHS4.8.071c/ limpet kumbhaṁ tu phalinī.kṛṣṇā.cavyājya.mākṣikaiḥ || 71 ||
AHS4.8.072a/ prāg.bhaktam ānulomyāya phalāmlaṁ vā pibed ghṛtam |
AHS4.8.072c/ cavya.citraka.siddhaṁ vā yava.kṣāra.guḍānvitam || 72 ||
AHS4.8.073a/ pippalī.mūla.siddhaṁ vā sa.guḍa.kṣāra.nāgaram |
AHS4.8.073c/ pippalī.pippalī.mūla.dhānakā.dāḍimair ghṛtam || 73 || [Note: AHS4.8.073v/ 8.73dv .dhānyakā.dāḍimair ghṛtam]
AHS4.8.074a/ dadhnā ca sādhitaṁ vāta.śakṛn.mūtra.vibandha.nut |
AHS4.8.074c/ palāśa.kṣāra.toyena tri.guṇena paced ghṛtam || 74 || [Note: AHS4.8.074v/ 8.74bv .śakṛn.mūtra.vibandha.hṛt]
AHS4.8.075a/ vatsakādi.pratīvāpam arśo.ghnaṁ dīpanaṁ param |
AHS4.8.075c/ pañca.kolābhayā.kṣāra.yavānī.viḍa.saindhavaiḥ || 75 ||
AHS4.8.076a/ sa.pāṭhā.dhānya.maricaiḥ sa.bilvair dadhi.mat ghṛtam |
AHS4.8.076c/ sādhayet taj jayaty āśu guda.vaṅkṣaṇa.vedanām || 76 ||
AHS4.8.077a/ pravāhikāṁ guda.bhraṁśaṁ mūtra.kṛcchraṁ parisravam |
AHS4.8.077c/ pāṭhājamoda.dhanikā.śvadaṁṣṭrā.pañca.kolakaiḥ || 77 ||
[Page 391 ]
AHS4.8.078a/ sa.bilvair dadhni cāṅgerī.sva.rase ca catur.guṇe |
AHS4.8.078c/ hanty ājyaṁ siddham ānāhaṁ mūtra.kṛcchraṁ pravāhikām || 78 ||
AHS4.8.079a/ guda.bhraṁśārti.guda.ja.grahaṇī.gada.mārutān |
AHS4.8.079c/ śikhi.tittiri.lāvānāṁ rasān amlān su.saṁskṛtān || 79 ||
AHS4.8.080a/ dakṣāṇāṁ vartakānāṁ vā dadyād viḍ.vāta.saṅgrahe |
AHS4.8.080c/ vāstukāgni.trivṛd.dantī.pāṭhāmlīkādi.pallavān || 80 ||
AHS4.8.081a/ anyac ca kapha.vāta.ghnaṁ śākaṁ ca laghu bhedi ca |
AHS4.8.081c/ sa.hiṅgu yamake bhṛṣṭaṁ siddhaṁ dadhi.saraiḥ saha || 81 || [Note: AHS4.8.081v/ 8.81dv siddhaṁ dadhi.sareṇa ca]
AHS4.8.082a/ dhanikā.pañca.kolābhyāṁ piṣṭābhyāṁ dāḍimāmbunā |
AHS4.8.082c/ ārdrikāyāḥ kisalayaiḥ śakalair ārdrakasya ca || 82 ||
AHS4.8.083a/ yuktam aṅgāra.dhūpena hṛdyena surabhī.kṛtam |
AHS4.8.083c/ sa.jīrakaṁ sa.maricaṁ viḍa.sauvarcalotkaṭam || 83 || [Note: AHS4.8.083v/ 8.83av yuktam aṅgāra.dhūmena]
AHS4.8.084a/ vātottarasya rūkṣasya mandāgner baddha.varcasaḥ |
AHS4.8.084c/ kalpayed rakta.śāly.anna.vyañjanaṁ śāka.vad rasān || 84 || [Note: AHS4.8.084v/ 8.84cv kalpayed rakta.śāly.annaṁ 8.84dv vyañjanaṁ śāka.vad rasān 8.84dv vyañjanāñ chāka.vad rasān]
AHS4.8.085a/ go.godhā.chagaloṣṭrāṇāṁ viśeṣāt kravya.bhojinām |
AHS4.8.085c/ madirāṁ śārkaraṁ gauḍaṁ sīdhuṁ takraṁ tuṣodakam || 85 ||
AHS4.8.086a/ ariṣṭaṁ mastu pānīyaṁ pānīyaṁ vālpakaṁ śṛtam |
AHS4.8.086c/ dhānyena dhānya.śuṇṭhībhyāṁ kaṇṭakārikayātha.vā || 86 ||
AHS4.8.087a/ ante bhaktasya madhye vā vāta.varco.'nulomanam |
AHS4.8.087c/ viḍ.vāta.kapha.pittānām ānulomye hi nir.male || 87 ||
[Page 392 ]
AHS4.8.088a/ gude śāmyanti guda.jāḥ pāvakaś cābhivardhate |
AHS4.8.088c/ udāvarta.parītā ye ye cāty.arthaṁ virūkṣitāḥ || 88 ||
AHS4.8.089a/ viloma.vātāḥ śūlārtās teṣv iṣṭam anuvāsanam |
AHS4.8.089c/ pippalīṁ madanaṁ bilvaṁ śatāhvāṁ madhukaṁ vacām || 89 ||
AHS4.8.090a/ kuṣṭhaṁ śaṭhīṁ puṣkarākhyaṁ citrakaṁ devadāru ca |
AHS4.8.090c/ piṣṭvā tailaṁ vipaktavyaṁ dvi.guṇa.kṣīra.saṁyutam || 90 || [Note: AHS4.8.090v/ 8.90av kuṣṭhaṁ śaṭhīṁ puṣkarāhvaṁ 8.90av kuṣṭhaṁ śaṭhīṁ pauṣkarākhyaṁ 8.90av kuṣṭhaṁ śuṇṭhīṁ puṣkarākhyaṁ]
AHS4.8.091a/ arśasāṁ mūḍha.vātānāṁ tac chreṣṭham anuvāsanam |
AHS4.8.091c/ guda.niḥsaraṇaṁ śūlaṁ mūtra.kṛcchraṁ pravāhikām || 91 ||
AHS4.8.092a/ kaṭy.ūru.pṛṣṭha.daurbalyam ānāhaṁ vaṅkṣaṇāśrayam |
AHS4.8.092c/ picchā.srāvaṁ gude śophaṁ vāta.varco.vinigraham || 92 ||
AHS4.8.093a/ utthānaṁ bahu.śo yac ca jayet tac cānuvāsanāt |
AHS4.8.093c/ nirūhaṁ vā prayuñjīta sa.kṣīraṁ pāñcamūlikam || 93 ||
AHS4.8.094a/ sa.mūtra.sneha.lavaṇaṁ kalkair yuktaṁ phalādibhiḥ |
AHS4.8.094c/ atha raktārśasāṁ vīkṣya mārutasya kaphasya vā || 94 || [Note: AHS4.8.094v/ 8.94dv mārutasya kaphasya ca]
AHS4.8.095a/ anubandhaṁ tataḥ snigdhaṁ rūkṣaṁ vā yojayed dhimam |
AHS4.8.095c/ śakṛc chyāvaṁ kharaṁ rūkṣam adho niryāti nānilaḥ || 95 ||
AHS4.8.096a/ kaṭy.ūru.guda.śūlaṁ ca hetur yadi ca rūkṣaṇam |
AHS4.8.096c/ tatrānubandho vātasya śleṣmaṇo yadi viṭ ślathā || 96 ||
AHS4.8.097a/ śvetā pītā guruḥ snigdhā sa.picchaḥ stimito gudaḥ |
AHS4.8.097c/ hetuḥ snigdha.gurur vidyād yathā.svaṁ cāsra.lakṣaṇāt || 97 ||
[Page 393 ]
AHS4.8.098a/ duṣṭe 'sre śodhanaṁ kāryaṁ laṅghanaṁ ca yathā.balam |
AHS4.8.098c/ yāvac ca doṣaiḥ kāluṣyaṁ srutes tāvad upekṣaṇam || 98 ||
AHS4.8.099a/ doṣāṇāṁ pācanārthaṁ ca vahni.sandhukṣaṇāya ca |
AHS4.8.099c/ saṅgrahāya ca raktasya paraṁ tiktair upācaret || 99 ||
AHS4.8.100a/ yat tu prakṣīṇa.doṣasya raktaṁ vātolbaṇasya vā |
AHS4.8.100c/ snehais tat sādhayet yuktaiḥ pānābhyañjana.vastiṣu || 100 ||
AHS4.8.101a/ yat tu pittolbaṇaṁ raktaṁ gharma.kāle pravartate |
AHS4.8.101c/ stambhanīyaṁ tad ekāntān na ced vāta.kaphānugam || 101 ||
AHS4.8.102a/ sa.kaphe 'sre pibet pākyaṁ śuṇṭhī.kuṭaja.valkalam |
AHS4.8.102c/ kirātatiktakaṁ śuṇṭhīṁ dhanvayāsaṁ ku.candanam || 102 ||
AHS4.8.103a/ dārvī.tvaṅ.nimba.sevyāni tvacaṁ vā dāḍimodbhavām |
AHS4.8.103c/ kuṭaja.tvak.phalaṁ tārkṣyaṁ mākṣikaṁ ghuṇavallabhām || 103 ||
AHS4.8.104a/ pibet taṇḍula.toyena kalkitaṁ vā mayūrakam |
AHS4.8.104c/ tulāṁ divyāmbhasi paced ārdrāyāḥ kuṭaja.tvacaḥ || 104 ||
AHS4.8.105a/ nī.rasāyāṁ tvaci kvāthe dadyāt sūkṣma.rajī.kṛtān |
AHS4.8.105c/ samaṅgā.phalinī.moca.rasān muṣṭy.aṁśakān samān || 105 ||
AHS4.8.106a/ taiś ca śakrayavān pūte tato darvī.pralepanam |
AHS4.8.106c/ paktvāvalehaṁ līḍhvā ca taṁ yathāgni.balaṁ pibet || 106 || [Note: AHS4.8.106v/ 8.106av taiś ca śakrayavān pūtaṁ]
AHS4.8.107a/ peyāṁ maṇḍaṁ payaś chāgaṁ gavyaṁ vā chāga.dugdha.bhuk |
AHS4.8.107c/ leho 'yaṁ śamayaty āśu raktātīsāra.pāyu.jān || 107 ||
[Page 394 ]
AHS4.8.108a/ bala.vad rakta.pittaṁ ca sravad ūrdhvam adho 'pi vā |
AHS4.8.108c/ kuṭaja.tvak.tulāṁ droṇe paced aṣṭāṁśa.śeṣitam || 108 || [Note: AHS4.8.108v/ 8.108dv paced aṣṭāṁśa.śeṣitām]
AHS4.8.109a/ kalkī.kṛtya kṣipet tatra tārkṣya.śailaṁ kaṭu.trayam |
AHS4.8.109c/ lodhra.dvayaṁ moca.rasaṁ balāṁ dāḍima.jaṁ tvacam || 109 ||
AHS4.8.110a/ bilva.karkaṭikāṁ mustaṁ samaṅgāṁ dhātakī.phalam |
AHS4.8.110c/ palonmitaṁ daśa.palaṁ kuṭajasyaiva ca tvacaḥ || 110 ||
AHS4.8.111a/ triṁśat palāni guḍato ghṛtāt pūte ca viṁśatiḥ |
AHS4.8.111c/ tat pakvaṁ leha.tāṁ yātaṁ dhānye pakṣa.sthitaṁ lihan || 111 ||
AHS4.8.112a/ sarvārśo.grahaṇī.doṣa.śvāsa.kāsān niyacchati |
AHS4.8.112c/ lodhraṁ tilān moca.rasaṁ samaṅgāṁ candanotpalam || 112 || [Note: AHS4.8.112v/ 8.112bv .śvāsa.kāsān nibarhati]
AHS4.8.113a/ pāyayitvāja.dugdhena śālīṁs tenaiva bhojayet |
AHS4.8.113c/ yaṣṭy.āhva.padmakānantā.payasyā.kṣīra.moraṭam || 113 ||
AHS4.8.114a/ sa.sitā.madhu pātavyaṁ śīta.toyena tena vā |
AHS4.8.114c/ lodhra.kaṭvaṅga.kuṭaja.samaṅgā.śālmalī.tvacam || 114 || [Note: AHS4.8.114v/ 8.114dv .samaṅgā.śālmalī.tvacaḥ]
AHS4.8.115a/ hima.kesara.yaṣṭy.āhva.sevyaṁ vā taṇḍulāmbunā |
AHS4.8.115c/ yavānīndrayavāḥ pāṭḥā bilvaṁ śuṇṭhī rasāñjanam || 115 ||
AHS4.8.116a/ cūrṇaś cale hitaḥ śūle pravṛtte cāti.śoṇite |
AHS4.8.116c/ dugdhikā.kaṇṭakārībhyāṁ siddhaṁ sarpiḥ praśasyate || 116 ||
AHS4.8.117a/ atha.vā dhātakī.lodhra.kuṭaja.tvak.phalotpalaiḥ |
AHS4.8.117c/ sa.kesarair yava.kṣāra.dāḍima.sva.rasena vā || 117 ||
[Page 395 ]
AHS4.8.118a/ śarkarāmbho.ja.kiñjalka.sahitaṁ saha vā tilaiḥ |
AHS4.8.118c/ abhyastaṁ rakta.guda.jān nava.nītaṁ niyacchati || 118 ||
AHS4.8.119a/ chāgāni nava.nītājya.kṣīra.māṁsāni jāṅgalaḥ |
AHS4.8.119c/ an.amlo vā kad.amla vā sa.vāstuka.raso rasaḥ || 119 ||
AHS4.8.120a/ rakta.śāliḥ saro dadhnaḥ ṣaṣṭikas taruṇī surā |
AHS4.8.120c/ taruṇaś ca surā.maṇḍaḥ śoṇitasyauṣadhaṁ param || 120 ||
AHS4.8.121a/ peyā.yūṣa.rasādyeṣu palāṇḍuḥ kevalo 'pi vā |
AHS4.8.121c/ sa jayaty ulbaṇaṁ raktaṁ mārutaṁ ca prayojitaḥ || 121 ||
AHS4.8.122a/ vātolbaṇāni prāyeṇa bhavanty asre 'ti.niḥsṛte |
AHS4.8.122c/ arśāṁsi tasmād adhikaṁ taj.jaye yatnam ācaret || 122 ||
AHS4.8.123a/ dṛṣṭvāsra.pittaṁ prabalam a.balau ca kaphānilau |
AHS4.8.123c/ śītopacāraḥ kartavyaḥ sarva.thā tat.praśāntaye || 123 ||
AHS4.8.124a/ na ced evaṁ śamas tasya snigdhoṣṇais tarpayet tataḥ |
