AHS4.8.124c/ rasaiḥ koṣṇaiś ca sarpirbhir avapīḍaka.yojitaiḥ || 124 || [Note: AHS4.8.124v/ 8.124av yadā caivaṁ śamo na syāt]
AHS4.8.125a/ secayet taṁ kavoṣṇaiś ca kāmaṁ taila.payo.ghṛtaiḥ |
AHS4.8.125c/ yavāsa.kuśa.kāśānāṁ mūlaṁ puṣpaṁ ca śālmaleḥ || 125 ||
AHS4.8.126a/ nyagrodhodumbarāśvattha.śuṅgāś ca dvi.palonmitāḥ |
AHS4.8.126c/ tri.prasthe salilasyaitat kṣīra.prasthe ca sādhayet || 126 ||
AHS4.8.127a/ kṣīra.śeṣe kaṣāye ca tasmin pūte vimiśrayet |
AHS4.8.127c/ kalkī.kṛtaṁ moca.rasaṁ samaṅgāṁ candanotpalam || 127 ||
[Page 396 ]
AHS4.8.128a/ priyaṅguṁ kauṭajaṁ bījaṁ kamalasya ca kesaram |
AHS4.8.128c/ picchā.vastir ayaṁ siddhaḥ sa.ghṛta.kṣaudra.śarkaraḥ || 128 ||
AHS4.8.129a/ pravāhikā.guda.bhraṁśa.rakta.srāva.jvarāpahaḥ |
AHS4.8.129c/ yaṣṭy.āhva.puṇḍarīkeṇa tathā moca.rasādibhiḥ || 129 ||
AHS4.8.130a/ kṣīra.dvi.guṇitaḥ pakvo deyaḥ sneho 'nuvāsanam |
AHS4.8.130c/ madhukotpala.lodhrāmbu samaṅgā bilva.candanam || 130 ||
AHS4.8.131a/ cavikātiviṣā mustaṁ pāṭhā kṣāro yavāgra.jaḥ |
AHS4.8.131c/ dārvī.tvaṅ nāgaraṁ māṁsī citrako devadāru ca || 131 ||
AHS4.8.132a/ cāṅgerī.sva.rase sarpiḥ sādhitaṁ tais tri.doṣa.jit |
AHS4.8.132c/ arśo.'tīsāra.grahaṇī.pāṇḍu.roga.jvarā.rucau || 132 ||
AHS4.8.133a/ mūtra.kṛcchre guda.bhraṁśe vasty.ānāhe pravāhaṇe |
AHS4.8.133c/ picchā.srāve 'rśasāṁ śūle deyaṁ tat paramauṣadham || 133 ||
AHS4.8.134a/ vyatyāsān madhurāmlāni śītoṣṇāni ca yojayet |
AHS4.8.134c/ nityam agni.balāpekṣī jayaty arśaḥ.kṛtān gadān || 134 || [Note: AHS4.8.134v/ 8.134dv jayaty arśaḥ.kṛtāṁ rujam]
AHS4.8.135a/ udāvartārtam abhyajya tailaiḥ śīta.jvarāpahaiḥ |
AHS4.8.135c/ su.snigdhaiḥ svedayet piṇḍair vartim asmai gude tataḥ || 135 ||
AHS4.8.136a/ abhyaktāṁ tat.karāṅguṣṭha.sannibhām anulomanīm |
AHS4.8.136c/ dadyāc chyāmā.trivṛd.dantī.pippalī.nīlinī.phalaiḥ || 136 ||
AHS4.8.137a/ vicūrṇitair dvi.lavaṇair guḍa.go.mūtra.saṁyutaiḥ |
AHS4.8.137c/ tad.van māgadhikā.rāṭha.gṛha.dhūmaiḥ sa.sarṣapaiḥ || 137 || [Note: AHS4.8.137v/ 8.137bv guḍa.go.mūtra.pācitaiḥ]
[Page 397 ]
AHS4.8.138a/ eteṣām eva vā cūrṇaṁ gude nāḍyā vinirdhamet |
AHS4.8.138c/ tad.vighāte su.tīkṣṇaṁ tu vastiṁ snigdhaṁ prapīḍayet || 138 ||
AHS4.8.139a/ ṛjū.kuryād guda.sirā.viṇ.mūtra.maruto 'sya saḥ |
AHS4.8.139c/ bhūyo 'nubandhe vāta.ghnair virecyaḥ sneha.recanaiḥ || 139 || [Note: AHS4.8.139v/ 8.139av ṛjū.kuryād guda.śiro.]
AHS4.8.140a/ anuvāsyaś ca raukṣyād dhi saṅgo māruta.varcasoḥ |
AHS4.8.140c/ tri.paṭu.tri.kaṭu.śreṣṭhā.danty.aruṣkara.citrakam || 140 ||
AHS4.8.141a/ jarjaraṁ sneha.mūtrāktam antar.dhūmaṁ vipācayet |
AHS4.8.141c/ śarāva.sandhau mṛl.lipte kṣāraḥ kalyāṇakāhvayaḥ || 141 ||
AHS4.8.142a/ sa pītaḥ sarpiṣā yukto bhakte vā snigdha.bhojinā |
AHS4.8.142c/ udāvarta.vibandhārśo.gulma.pāṇḍūdara.kṛmīn || 142 ||
AHS4.8.143a/ mūtra.saṅgāśmarī.śopha.hṛd.roga.grahaṇī.gadān |
AHS4.8.143c/ meha.plīha.rujānāha.śvāsa.kāsāṁś ca nāśayet || 143 ||
AHS4.8.144ab/ sarvaṁ ca kuryād yat proktam arśasāṁ gāḍha.varcasām || 144ab ||
AHS4.8.144c/ droṇe 'pāṁ pūti.valka.dvi.tulam atha pacet pāda.śeṣe ca tasmin || 144c ||
AHS4.8.144d/ deyāśītir guḍasya pratanuka.rajaso vyoṣato 'ṣṭau palāni || 144d ||
AHS4.8.144e/ etan māsena jātaṁ janayati paramām ūṣmaṇaḥ pakti.śaktiṁ || 144e ||
AHS4.8.144f/ śuktaṁ kṛtvānulomyaṁ prajayati guda.ja.plīha.gulmodarāṇi || 144f || [Note: AHS4.8.144v/ 8.144cv droṇe 'pāṁ pūti.valkaṁ dvi.tulam atha pacet pāda.śeṣe ca tasmin]
AHS4.8.145a/ pacet tulāṁ pūti.karañja.valkād dve mūlataś citraka.kaṇṭakāryoḥ |
AHS4.8.145c/ droṇa.traye 'pi caraṇāvaśeṣe pūte śataṁ tatra guḍasya dadyāt || 145 ||
AHS4.8.146a/ palikaṁ ca su.cūrṇitaṁ tri.jāta.tri.kaṭu.granthika.dāḍimāśmabhedam |
AHS4.8.146c/ pura.puṣkara.mūla.dhānya.cavyaṁ hapuṣām ārdrakam amla.vetasaṁ ca || 146 ||
AHS4.8.147a/ śītī.bhūtaṁ kṣaudra.viṁśaty.upetam ārdra.drākṣā.bījapūrārdrakaiś ca |
AHS4.8.147c/ yuktaṁ kāmaṁ gaṇḍikābhis tathekṣoḥ sarpiḥ.pātre māsa.mātreṇa jātam || 147 ||
[Page 398 ]
AHS4.8.148a/ cukraṁ krakacam ivedaṁ dur.nāmnāṁ vahni.dīpanaṁ paramam |
AHS4.8.148c/ pāṇḍu.garodara.gulma.plīhānāhāśma.kṛcchra.ghnam || 148 ||
AHS4.8.149a/ droṇaṁ pīlu.rasasya vastra.galitaṁ nyastaṁ havir.bhājane || 149a ||
AHS4.8.149b/ yuñjīta dvi.palair madā.madhuphalā.kharjūra.dhātrī.phalaiḥ || 149b ||
AHS4.8.149c/ pāṭhā.mādri.durālabhāmla.vidula.vyoṣa.tvag.elollakaiḥ || 149c ||
AHS4.8.149d/ spṛkkā.kola.lavaṅga.vella.capalā.mūlāgnikaiḥ pālikaiḥ || 149d || [Note: AHS4.8.149v/ 8.149cv pāṭhā.mādri.durālabhāmla.vidula.vyoṣa.tvag.ellāllakaiḥ]
AHS4.8.150a/ guḍa.pala.śata.yojitaṁ nivāte nihitam idaṁ prapibaṁś ca pakṣa.mātrāt |
AHS4.8.150c/ niśamayati gudāṅkurān sa.gulmān anala.balaṁ prabalaṁ karoti cāśu || 150 || [Note: AHS4.8.150v/ 8.150cv praśamayati gudāṅkurān sa.gulmān]
AHS4.8.151a/ ekaika.śo daśa.pale daśa.mūla.kumbha.pāṭhā.dvayārka.ghuṇavallabha.kaṭphalānām |
AHS4.8.151c/ dagdhe srute 'nu kalaśena jalena pakve pāda.sthite guḍa.tulāṁ pala.pañcakaṁ ca || 151 || [Note: AHS4.8.151v/ 8.151bv .pāṭhābhayārka.ghuṇavallabha.kaṭphalānām]
AHS4.8.152a/ dadyāt praty.ekaṁ vyoṣa.cavyābhayānāṁ vahner muṣṭī dve yava.kṣārataś ca |
AHS4.8.152c/ darvīm ālimpan hanti līḍho guḍo 'yaṁ gulma.plīhārśaḥ.kuṣṭha.mehāgni.sādān || 152 ||
AHS4.8.153a/ toya.droṇe citraka.mūla.tulārdhaṁ sādhyaṁ yāvat pāda.dala.stham athedam |
AHS4.8.153c/ aṣṭau dattvā jīrṇa.guḍasya palāni kvāthyaṁ bhūyaḥ sāndra.tayā samam etat || 153 || [Note: AHS4.8.153v/ 8.153bv sādhyaṁ yāvat pāda.jala.stham apy idam]
AHS4.8.154a/ tri.kaṭuka.miśi.pathyā.kuṣṭha.mustā.varāṅga.kṛmiripu.dahanailā.cūrṇa.kīrṇo 'valehaḥ |
AHS4.8.154c/ jayati guda.ja.kuṣṭha.plīha.gulmodarāṇi prabalayati hutāśaṁ śaśvad abhyasyamānaḥ || 154 || [Note: AHS4.8.154v/ 8.154cv jayati guda.ja.yukta.plīha.gulmodarāṇi]
AHS4.8.155a/ guḍa.vyoṣa.varā.vella.tilāruṣkara.citrakaiḥ |
AHS4.8.155c/ arśāṁsi hanti guṭikā tvag.vikāraṁ ca śīlitā || 155 ||
AHS4.8.156a/ mṛl.liptaṁ sauraṇaṁ kandaṁ paktvāgnau puṭa.pāka.vat |
AHS4.8.156c/ adyāt sa.taila.lavaṇaṁ dur.nāma.vinivṛttaye || 156 ||
AHS4.8.157a/ marica.pippali.nāgara.citrakān krama.vivardhita.bhāga.samāhṛtān |
AHS4.8.157c/ śikhi.catur.guṇa.sūraṇa.yojitān kuru guḍena guḍān guda.ja.cchidaḥ || 157 ||
[Page 399 ]
AHS4.8.158a/ cūrṇī.kṛtāḥ ṣo.ḍaśa sūraṇasya bhāgās tato 'rdhena ca citrakasya |
AHS4.8.158c/ mahauṣadhād dvau maricasya caiko guḍena dur.nāma.jayāya piṇḍī || 158 ||
AHS4.8.159a/ pathyā.nāgara.kṛṣṇā.karañja.vellāgnibhiḥ sitā.tulyaiḥ |
AHS4.8.159c/ vaḍabā.mukha iva jarayati bahu.gurv api bhojanaṁ cūrṇaḥ || 159 || [Note: AHS4.8.159v/ 8.159dv bahu.gurv api bhojanaṁ cūrṇam]
AHS4.8.160a/ kaliṅga.lāṅgalī.kṛṣṇā.vahny.apāmārga.taṇḍulaiḥ |
AHS4.8.160c/ bhūnimba.saindhava.guḍair guḍā guda.ja.nāśanāḥ || 160 ||
AHS4.8.161a/ lavaṇottama.vahni.kaliṅga.yavāṁś ciribilva.mahāpicumanda.yutān |
AHS4.8.161c/ piba sapta.dinaṁ mathitāluḍitān yadi marditum icchasi pāyu.ruhān || 161 || [Note: AHS4.8.161v/ 8.161cv piba sapta.dinaṁ mathitālulitān 8.161dv yadi marditum icchasi pāyu.ruhaḥ]
AHS4.8.162a/ śuṣkeṣu bhallātakam agryam uktaṁ bhaiṣajyam ārdreṣu tu vatsaka.tvak |
AHS4.8.162c/ sarveṣu sarvartuṣu kālaśeyam arśaḥsu balyaṁ ca malāpahaṁ ca || 162 ||
AHS4.8.163a/ bhittvā vibandhān anulomanāya yan mārutasyāgni.balāya yac ca |
AHS4.8.163c/ tad anna.pānauṣadham arśasena sevyaṁ vivarjyaṁ viparītam asmāt || 163 ||
AHS4.8.164a/ arśo.'tisāra.grahaṇī.vikārāḥ prāyeṇa cānyo.'nya.nidāna.bhūtāḥ |
AHS4.8.164c/ sanne 'nale santi na santi dīpte rakṣed atas teṣu viśeṣato 'gnim || 164 || [Note: AHS4.8.164v/ 8.164dv rakṣet tatas teṣu viśeṣato 'gnim]

4.9. Chapter 9 :: Athātīsāracikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 369-377]
AHS4.9.001a/ atīsāro hi bhūyiṣṭhaṁ bhavaty āmāśayānvayaḥ |
AHS4.9.001c/ hatvāgniṁ vāta.je 'py asmāt prāk tasmil̐ laṅghanaṁ hitam || 1 || [Note: AHS4.9.001v/ 9.1dv prāg asmil̐ laṅghanaṁ hitam]
AHS4.9.002a/ śūlānāha.prasekārtaṁ vāmayed atisāriṇam |
AHS4.9.002c/ doṣāḥ sannicitā ye ca vidagdhāhāra.mūrchitāḥ || 2 ||
AHS4.9.003a/ atīsārāya kalpante teṣūpekṣaiva bheṣajam |
AHS4.9.003c/ bhṛśotkleśa.pravṛtteṣu svayam eva calātmasu || 3 ||
[Page 400 ]
AHS4.9.004a/ na tu saṅgrahaṇaṁ yojyaṁ pūrvam āmātisāriṇi |
AHS4.9.004c/ api cādhmāna.guru.tā.śūla.staimitya.kāriṇi || 4 || [Note: AHS4.9.004v/ 9.4av prayojyaṁ na tu saṅgrāhi 9.4bv pūrvam āmolbaṇe na tu]
AHS4.9.005a/ prāṇadā prāṇa.dā doṣe vibaddhe sampravartinī |
AHS4.9.005c/ pibet prakvathitās toye madhya.doṣo viśoṣayan || 5 ||
AHS4.9.006a/ bhūtika.pippalī.śuṇṭhī.vacā.dhānya.harītakīḥ |
AHS4.9.006c/ atha.vā bilva.dhanikā.musta.nāgara.vālakam || 6 ||
AHS4.9.007a/ viḍa.pāṭhā.vacā.pathyā.kṛmijin.nāgarāṇi vā |
AHS4.9.007c/ śuṇṭhī.ghana.vacā.mādrī.bilva.vatsaka.hiṅgu vā || 7 ||
AHS4.9.008a/ śasyate tv alpa.doṣāṇām upavāso 'tisāriṇām |
AHS4.9.008c/ vacā.prativiṣābhyāṁ vā mustā.parpaṭakena vā || 8 ||
AHS4.9.009a/ hrīvera.nāgarābhyāṁ vā vipakvaṁ pāyayej jalam |
AHS4.9.009c/ yukte 'nna.kāle kṣut.kṣāmaṁ laghv.anna.prati bhojayet || 9 || [Note: AHS4.9.009v/ 9.9dv laghv annaṁ pratibhojayet]
AHS4.9.010a/ tathā sa śīghraṁ prāpnoti rucim agni.balaṁ balam |
AHS4.9.010c/ takreṇāvanti.somena yavāgvā tarpaṇena vā || 10 ||
AHS4.9.011a/ surayā madhunā vātha yathā.sātmyam upācaret |
AHS4.9.011c/ bhojyāni kalpayed ūrdhvaṁ grāhi.dīpana.pācanaiḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS4.9.011v/ 9.11av surayā madhunā cātha]
AHS4.9.012a/ bāla.bilva.śaṭhī.dhānya.hiṅgu.vṛkṣāmla.dāḍimaiḥ |
AHS4.9.012c/ palāśa.hapuṣājājī.yavānī.viḍa.saindhavaiḥ || 12 ||
AHS4.9.013a/ laghunā pañca.mūlena pañca.kolena pāṭhayā |
AHS4.9.013c/ śāliparṇī.balā.bilvaiḥ pṛśniparṇyā ca sādhitā || 13 ||
[Page 401 ]
AHS4.9.014a/ dāḍimāmlā hitā peyā kapha.pitte samulbaṇe |
AHS4.9.014c/ abhayā.pippalī.mūla.bilvair vātānulomanī || 14 ||
AHS4.9.015a/ vibaddhaṁ doṣa.bahulo dīptāgnir yo 'tisāryate |
AHS4.9.015c/ kṛṣṇā.viḍaṅga.tri.phalā.kaṣāyais taṁ virecayet || 15 ||
AHS4.9.016a/ peyāṁ yuñjyād viriktasya vāta.ghnair dīpanaiḥ kṛtām |
AHS4.9.016c/ āme pariṇate yas tu dīpte 'gnāv upaveśyate || 16 ||
AHS4.9.017a/ sa.phena.picchaṁ sa.rujaṁ sa.vibandhaṁ punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS4.9.017c/ alpālpam alpa.śamalaṁ nir.viḍ vā sa.pravāhikam || 17 || [Note: AHS4.9.017v/ 9.17cv alpālpam alpaṁ sa.malaṁ]
AHS4.9.018a/ dadhi.taila.ghṛta.kṣīraiḥ sa śuṇṭhīṁ sa.guḍāṁ pibet |
AHS4.9.018c/ svinnāni guḍa.tailena bhakṣayed badarāṇi vā || 18 ||
AHS4.9.019a/ gāḍha.viḍ.vihitaiḥ śākair bahu.snehais tathā rasaiḥ |
AHS4.9.019c/ kṣudhitaṁ bhojayed enaṁ dadhi.dāḍima.sādhitaiḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS4.9.019v/ 9.19dv dadhi.dāḍima.saṁskṛtaiḥ]
AHS4.9.020a/ śāly.odanaṁ tilair māṣair mudgair vā sādhu sādhitam |
AHS4.9.020c/ śaṭhyā mūlaka.potāyāḥ pāṭhāyāḥ svastikasya vā || 20 || [Note: AHS4.9.020v/ 9.20cv śuṇṭhyā mūlaka.potāyāḥ]
AHS4.9.021a/ sūṣā.yavānī.karkāru.kṣīriṇī.cirbhaṭasya vā |
AHS4.9.021c/ upodakāyā jīvantyā vākucyā vāstukasya vā || 21 ||
AHS4.9.022a/ suvarcalāyāś cuñcor vā loṇikāyā rasair api |
AHS4.9.022c/ kūrma.vartaka.lopāka.śikhi.tittiri.kaukkuṭaiḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS4.9.022v/ 9.22dv .śikhi.tittiri.dakṣa.jaiḥ]
AHS4.9.023a/ bilva.mustākṣi.bhaiṣajya.dhātakī.puṣpa.nāgaraiḥ |
AHS4.9.023c/ pakvātīsāra.jit takre yavāgūr dādhikī tathā || 23 ||
[Page 402 ]
AHS4.9.024a/ kapittha.kacchurā.phañjī.yūthikā.vaṭa.śelu.jaiḥ |
AHS4.9.024c/ dāḍimī.śaṇa.kārpāsī.śālmalīnāṁ ca pallavaiḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS4.9.024v/ 9.24dv .śālmalī.moca.pallavaiḥ]
AHS4.9.025a/ kalko bilva.śalāṭūnāṁ tila.kalkaś ca tat.samaḥ |
AHS4.9.025c/ dadhnaḥ saro 'mlaḥ sa.snehaḥ khalo hanti pravāhikām || 25 ||
AHS4.9.026a/ maricaṁ dhanikājājī tintiḍīkaṁ śaṭhī viḍam |
AHS4.9.026c/ dāḍimaṁ dhātakī pāṭhā tri.phalā pañca.kolakam || 26 ||
AHS4.9.027a/ yāva.śūkaṁ kapitthāmra.jambū.madhyaṁ sa.dīpyakam |
AHS4.9.027c/ piṣṭaiḥ ṣaḍ.guṇa.bilvais tair dadhni mudga.rase guḍe || 27 ||
AHS4.9.028a/ snehe ca yamake siddhaḥ khalo 'yam a.parājitaḥ |
AHS4.9.028c/ dīpanaḥ pācano grāhī rucyo bimbiśi.nāśanaḥ || 28 ||
AHS4.9.029a/ kolānāṁ bāla.bilvānāṁ kalkaiḥ śāli.yavasya ca |
AHS4.9.029c/ mudga.māṣa.tilānāṁ ca dhānya.yūṣaṁ prakalpayet || 29 ||
AHS4.9.030a/ aikadhyaṁ yamake bhṛṣṭaṁ dadhi.dāḍima.sārikam |
AHS4.9.030c/ varcaḥ.kṣaye śuṣka.mukhaṁ śāly.annaṁ tena bhojayet || 30 ||
AHS4.9.031a/ dadhnaḥ saraṁ vā yamake bhṛṣṭaṁ sa.guḍa.nāgaram |
AHS4.9.031c/ surāṁ vā yamake bhṛṣṭāṁ vyañjanārthaṁ prayojayet || 31 ||
AHS4.9.032a/ phalāmlaṁ yamake bhṛṣṭaṁ yūṣaṁ gṛñjanakasya vā |
AHS4.9.032c/ bhṛṣṭān vā yamake saktūn khāded vyoṣāvacūrṇitān || 32 ||
AHS4.9.033a/ māṣān su.siddhāṁs tad.vad vā ghṛta.maṇḍopasevanān |
AHS4.9.033c/ rasaṁ su.siddha.pūtaṁ vā chāga.meṣāntar.ādhi.jam || 33 || [Note: AHS4.9.033v/ 9.33cv rasaṁ su.siddhaṁ pūtaṁ vā]
[Page 403 ]
AHS4.9.034a/ paced dāḍima.sārāmlaṁ sa.dhānya.sneha.nāgaram |
AHS4.9.034c/ rakta.śāly.odanaṁ tena bhuñjānaḥ prapibaṁś ca tam || 34 ||
AHS4.9.035a/ varcaḥ.kṣaya.kṛtair āśu vikāraiḥ parimucyate |
AHS4.9.035c/ bāla.bilvaṁ guḍaṁ tailaṁ pippalīṁ viśva.bheṣajam || 35 || [Note: AHS4.9.035v/ 9.35dv pippalī.viśva.bheṣajam]
AHS4.9.036a/ lihyād vāte pratihate sa.śūlaḥ sa.pravāhikaḥ |
AHS4.9.036c/ valkalaṁ śābaraṁ puṣpaṁ dhātakyā badarī.dalam || 36 || [Note: AHS4.9.036v/ 9.36bv sa.śūle sa.pravāhike 9.36dv dhātakyā badarī.phalam]
AHS4.9.036.1+1a/ eraṇḍa.bilva.yava.gokṣurakāmla.siddhāṁ pathyāṁ lihan madhu.yutām atha vā guḍena |
AHS4.9.036.1+1c/ kṛcchra.pravṛttam ati.śūlam asṛg.vimiśraṁ hanyād avaśyam atisāram udīrṇa.vegam || 36.1+1 ||
AHS4.9.037a/ pibed dadhi.sara.kṣaudra.kapittha.sva.rasāplutam |
AHS4.9.037c/ vibaddha.vāta.varcās tu bahu.śūla.pravāhikaḥ || 37 ||
AHS4.9.038a/ sa.rakta.picchas tṛṣṇārtaḥ kṣīra.sauhityam arhati |
AHS4.9.038c/ yamakasyopari kṣīraṁ dhāroṣṇaṁ vā prayojayet || 38 ||
AHS4.9.039a/ śṛtam eraṇḍa.mūlena bāla.bilvena vā punaḥ |
AHS4.9.039c/ payasy utkvāthya mustānāṁ viṁśatiṁ tri.guṇe 'mbhasi || 39 || [Note: AHS4.9.039v/ 9.39dv viṁśatiṁ tri.guṇāmbhasi]
AHS4.9.040a/ kṣīrāvaśiṣṭaṁ tat pītaṁ hanyād āmaṁ sa.vedanam |
AHS4.9.040c/ pippalyāḥ pibataḥ sūkṣmaṁ rajo marica.janma vā || 40 ||
AHS4.9.041a/ cira.kālānuṣaktāpi naśyaty āśu pravāhikā |
AHS4.9.041c/ nir.āma.rūpaṁ śūlārtaṁ laṅghanādyaiś ca karṣitam || 41 ||
AHS4.9.042a/ rūkṣa.koṣṭham apekṣyāgniṁ sa.kṣāraṁ pāyayed ghṛtam |
AHS4.9.042c/ siddhaṁ dadhi.surā.maṇḍe daśa.mūlasya cāmbhasi || 42 || [Note: AHS4.9.042v/ 9.42dv daśa.mūlasya vāmbhasi]
[Page 404 ]
AHS4.9.043a/ sindhūttha.pañca.kolābhyāṁ tailaṁ sadyo 'rti.nāśanam |
AHS4.9.043c/ ṣaḍbhiḥ śuṇṭhyāḥ palair dvābhyāṁ dvābhyāṁ granthy.agni.saindhavāt || 43 ||
AHS4.9.044a/ taila.prasthaṁ paced dadhnā niḥ.sāraka.rujāpaham |
AHS4.9.044c/ ekato māṁsa.dugdhājyaṁ purīṣa.graha.śūla.jit || 44 ||
AHS4.9.045a/ pānānuvāsanābhyaṅga.prayuktaṁ tailam ekataḥ |
AHS4.9.045c/ tad dhi vāta.jitām agryaṁ śūlaṁ ca vi.guṇo 'nilaḥ || 45 ||
AHS4.9.046a/ dhātv.antaropamardeddhaś calo vyāpī sva.dhāma.gaḥ |
AHS4.9.046c/ tailaṁ mandānalasyāpi yuktyā śarma.karaṁ param || 46 || [Note: AHS4.9.046v/ 9.46av dhātv.antaropamardād vai 9.46av dhātv.antaropamardena]
AHS4.9.046ū̆ab/ vāyv.āśaye sa.taile hi bimbiśir nāvatiṣṭhate || 46ū̆ab ||
AHS4.9.047a/ kṣīṇe male svāyatana.cyuteṣu doṣāntareṣv īraṇa eka.vīre |
AHS4.9.047c/ ko niṣṭanan prāṇiti koṣṭha.śūlī nāntar.bahis.taila.paro yadi syāt || 47 ||
AHS4.9.048ab/ guda.rug.bhraṁśayor yuñjyāt sa.kṣīraṁ sādhitaṁ haviḥ || 48ab ||
AHS4.9.049a/ rase kolāmla.cāṅgeryor dadhni piṣṭe ca nāgare |
AHS4.9.049c/ tair eva cāmlaiḥ saṁyojya siddhaṁ su.ślakṣṇa.kalkitaiḥ || 49 || [Note: AHS4.9.049v/ 9.49cv tair eva cāmlaiḥ saṁyuktaiḥ]
AHS4.9.050a/ dhānyoṣaṇa.viḍājājī.pañca.kolaka.dāḍimaiḥ |
AHS4.9.050c/ yojayet sneha.vastiṁ vā daśa.mūlena sādhitam || 50 ||
AHS4.9.051a/ śaṭhī.śatāhvā.kuṣṭhair vā vacayā citrakeṇa vā |
AHS4.9.051c/ pravāhaṇe guda.bhraṁśe mūtrāghāte kaṭī.grahe || 51 ||
[Page 405 ]
AHS4.9.052a/ madhurāmlaiḥ śṛtaṁ tailaṁ ghṛtaṁ vāpy anuvāsanam |
AHS4.9.052c/ praveśayed gudaṁ dhvastam abhyaktaṁ sveditaṁ mṛdu || 52 ||
AHS4.9.053a/ kuryāc ca go.phaṇā.bandhaṁ madhya.cchidreṇa carmaṇā |
AHS4.9.053c/ pañca.mūlasya mahataḥ kvāthaṁ kṣīre vipācayet || 53 || [Note: AHS4.9.053v/ 9.53dv kvāthaṁ kṣīreṇa pācayet]
AHS4.9.054a/ unduruṁ cāntra.rahitaṁ tena vāta.ghna.kalka.vat |
AHS4.9.054c/ tailaṁ paced guda.bhraṁśaṁ pānābhyaṅgena taj jayet || 54 ||
AHS4.9.055a/ paitte tu sāme tīkṣṇoṣṇa.varjyaṁ prāg iva laṅghanam |
AHS4.9.055c/ tṛḍ.vān pibet ṣaḍ.aṅgāmbu sa.bhūnimbaṁ sa.śārivam || 55 ||
AHS4.9.056a/ peyādi kṣudhitasyānnam agni.sandhukṣaṇaṁ hitam |
AHS4.9.056c/ bṛhaty.ādi.gaṇābhīru.dvi.balā.śūrpaparṇibhiḥ || 56 ||
AHS4.9.057a/ pāyayed anubandhe tu sa.kṣaudraṁ taṇḍulāmbhasā |
AHS4.9.057c/ kuṭajasya phalaṁ piṣṭaṁ sa.valkaṁ sa.ghuṇapriyam || 57 || [Note: AHS4.9.057v/ 9.57bv sa.kṣaudraṁ taṇḍulāmbunā 9.57cv vatsakasya phalaṁ piṣṭaṁ]
AHS4.9.058a/ pāṭhā.vatsaka.bīja.tvag.dārvī.granthika.śuṇṭhi vā |
AHS4.9.058c/ kvāthaṁ vātiviṣā.bilva.vatsakodīcya.musta.jam || 58 ||
AHS4.9.059a/ atha.vātiviṣā.mūrvā.niśendrayava.tārkṣya.jam |
AHS4.9.059c/ sa.madhv.ativiṣā.śuṇṭhī.mustendrayava.kaṭphalam || 59 ||
AHS4.9.060a/ palaṁ vatsaka.bījasya śrapayitvā rasaṁ pibet |
AHS4.9.060c/ yo rasāśī jayec chīghraṁ sa paittaṁ jaṭharāmayam || 60 ||
AHS4.9.061a/ mustā.kaṣāyam evaṁ vā piben madhu.samāyutam |
AHS4.9.061c/ sa.kṣaudraṁ śālmalī.vṛnta.kaṣāyaṁ vā himāhvayam || 61 ||
[Page 406 ]
AHS4.9.062a/ kirātatiktakaṁ mustaṁ vatsakaṁ sa.rasāñjanam |
AHS4.9.062c/ kaṭaṅkaṭerī hrīveraṁ bilva.madhyaṁ durālabhā || 62 ||
AHS4.9.063a/ tilā moca.rasaṁ lodhraṁ samaṅgā kamalotpalam |
AHS4.9.063c/ nāgaraṁ dhātakī.puṣpaṁ dāḍimasya tvag utpalam || 63 ||
AHS4.9.064a/ ardha.ślokaiḥ smṛtā yogāḥ sa.kṣaudrās taṇḍulāmbunā |
AHS4.9.064c/ niśendrayava.lodhrailā.kvāthaḥ pakvātisāra.jit || 64 || [Note: AHS4.9.064v/ 9.64dv .kvāthaḥ pakvātisāra.nut]
AHS4.9.064+1a/ nāgarātiviṣā.mustā.bhūnimbāmṛta.vatsakaiḥ |
AHS4.9.064+1c/ sarva.jvara.haraḥ kvāthaḥ sarvātīsāra.nāśanaḥ || 64+1 ||
AHS4.9.064+2a/ guḍūcy.ativiṣā.dhānya.śuṇṭhī.bilvābda.vālakaiḥ |

AHS4.9.064+3a/ kaṣāyaḥ śitalaḥ peyo jvarātīsāra.śāntaye |
AHS4.9.064+3c/ hṛl.lāsā.rocaka.cchardi.pipāsā.dāha.nāśanaḥ || 64+3 ||
AHS4.9.065a/ lodhrāmbaṣṭhā.priyaṅgv.ādi.gaṇāṁs tad.vat pṛthak pibet |
AHS4.9.065c/ kaṭvaṅga.valka.yaṣṭy.āhva.phalinī.dāḍimāṅkuraiḥ || 65 ||
AHS4.9.066a/ peyā.vilepī.khalakān kuryāt sa.dadhi.dāḍimān |
AHS4.9.066c/ tad.vad dadhittha.bilvāmra.jambū.madhyaiḥ prakalpayet || 66 ||
AHS4.9.067a/ ajā.payaḥ prayoktavyaṁ nir.āme tena cec chamaḥ |
AHS4.9.067c/ doṣādhikyān na jāyeta balinaṁ taṁ virecayet || 67 ||
AHS4.9.068a/ vyatyāsena śakṛd.raktam upaveśyeta yo 'pi vā |
AHS4.9.068c/ palāśa.phala.niryūhaṁ yuktaṁ vā payasā pibet || 68 ||
[Page 407 ]
AHS4.9.069a/ tato 'nu koṣṇaṁ pātavyaṁ kṣīram eva yathā.balam |
AHS4.9.069c/ pravāhite tena male praśāmyaty udarāmayaḥ || 69 ||
AHS4.9.070a/ palāśa.vat prayojyā vā trāyamāṇā viśodhanī |
AHS4.9.070c/ saṁsargyāṁ kriyamāṇāyāṁ śūlaṁ yady anuvartate || 70 || [Note: AHS4.9.070v/ 9.70bv trāyamāṇā viśodhane]
AHS4.9.071a/ sruta.doṣasya taṁ śīghraṁ yathā.vahny anuvāsayet |
AHS4.9.071c/ śatapuṣpā.varībhyāṁ ca bilvena madhukena ca || 71 ||
AHS4.9.072a/ taila.pādaṁ payo.yuktaṁ pakvam anvāsanaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS4.9.072c/ a.śāntāv ity atīsāre picchā.vastiḥ paraṁ hitaḥ || 72 ||
AHS4.9.073a/ pariveṣṭya kuśair ārdrair ārdra.vṛntāni śālmaleḥ |
AHS4.9.073c/ kṛṣṇa.mṛttikayālipya svedayed go.mayāgninā || 73 ||
AHS4.9.074a/ mṛc.choṣe tāni saṅkṣudya tat.piṇḍaṁ muṣṭi.sammitam |
AHS4.9.074c/ mardayet payasaḥ prasthe pūtenāsthāpayet tataḥ || 74 ||
AHS4.9.075a/ nata.yaṣṭy.āhva.kalkājya.kṣaudra.taila.vatānu ca |
AHS4.9.075c/ snāto bhuñjīta payasā jāṅgalena rasena vā || 75 ||
AHS4.9.076a/ pittātisāra.jvara.śopha.gulma.samīraṇāsra.grahaṇī.vikārān |
AHS4.9.076c/ jayaty ayaṁ śīghram ati.pravṛttiṁ virecanāsthāpanayoś ca vastiḥ || 76 ||
AHS4.9.076+1a/ kaṭvaṅga.bilva.jaṁ tv asthi kapitthaṁ surasāñjanam |

[Page 408 ]
AHS4.9.076+3a/ pibet tenaiva toyena jvarātīsāra.nāśanaḥ |
AHS4.9.076+3c/ rakta.prasādano hy eṣa śophātīsāra.nāśanaḥ || 76+3 ||
AHS4.9.077a/ phāṇitaṁ kuṭajotthaṁ ca sarvātīsāra.nāśanam |
AHS4.9.077c/ vatsakādi.samāyuktaṁ sāmbaṣṭhādi sa.mākṣikam || 77 ||
AHS4.9.078a/ nī.ruṅ.nir.āmaṁ dīptāgner api sāsraṁ cirotthitam |
AHS4.9.078c/ nānā.varṇam atīsāraṁ puṭa.pākair upācaret || 78 ||
AHS4.9.079a/ tvak.piṇḍād dīrghavṛntasya śrīparṇī.pattra.saṁvṛtāt |
AHS4.9.079c/ mṛl.liptād agninā svinnād rasaṁ niṣpīḍitaṁ himam || 79 ||
AHS4.9.080a/ atīsārī pibed yuktaṁ madhunā sitayātha.vā |
AHS4.9.080c/ evaṁ kṣīri.druma.tvagbhis tat.prarohaiś ca kalpayet || 80 || [Note: AHS4.9.080v/ 9.80cv evaṁ kṣīra.druma.tvagbhis]
AHS4.9.081a/ kaṭvaṅga.tvag.ghṛta.yutā sveditā saliloṣmaṇā |
AHS4.9.081c/ sa.kṣaudrā hanty atīsāraṁ bala.vantam api drutam || 81 ||
AHS4.9.082a/ pittātīsārī seveta pittalāny eva yaḥ punaḥ |
AHS4.9.082c/ raktātīsāraṁ kurute tasya pittaṁ sa.tṛḍ.jvaram || 82 ||
AHS4.9.083a/ dāruṇaṁ guda.pākaṁ ca tatra cchāgaṁ payo hitam |
AHS4.9.083c/ padmotpala.samaṅgābhiḥ śṛtaṁ moca.rasena ca || 83 ||

AHS4.9.086a/ payasy ardhodake chāge hrīverotpala.nāgaraiḥ |

AHS4.9.087a/ prāg.bhaktaṁ nava.nītaṁ vā lihyān madhu.sitā.yutam |
AHS4.9.087c/ baliny asre 'sram evājaṁ mārgaṁ vā ghṛta.bharjitam || 87 ||
AHS4.9.088a/ kṣīrānu.pānaṁ kṣīrāśī try.ahaṁ kṣīrodbhavaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS4.9.088c/ kapiñjala.rasāśī vā lihann ārogyam aśnute || 88 ||
AHS4.9.089a/ pītvā śatāvarī.kalkaṁ kṣīreṇa kṣīra.bhojanaḥ |
AHS4.9.089c/ raktātīsāraṁ hanty āśu tayā vā sādhitaṁ ghṛtam || 89 ||

AHS4.9.090c/ sarpiḥ sendrayavaiḥ siddhaṁ peyā.maṇḍāvacāritam || 90 ||
AHS4.9.091a/ atīsāraṁ jayec chīghraṁ tri.doṣam api dāruṇam |
AHS4.9.091c/ kṛṣṇa.mṛc.chaṅkha.yaṣṭy.āhva.kṣaudrāsṛk.taṇḍulodakam || 91 ||
AHS4.9.092a/ jayaty asraṁ priyaṅguś ca taṇḍulāmbu.madhu.plutā |

AHS4.9.093a/ ājena payasā pītaḥ sadyo raktaṁ niyacchati |
AHS4.9.093c/ pītvā sa.śarkarā.kṣaudraṁ candanaṁ taṇḍulāmbunā || 93 ||
AHS4.9.094a/ dāha.tṛṣṇā.pramohebhyo rakta.srāvāc ca mucyate |
AHS4.9.094c/ gudasya dāhe pāke vā seka.lepā hitā himāḥ || 94 || [Note: AHS4.9.094v/ 9.94av dāha.tṛṣṇā.pramehebhyo 9.94dv sekā lepā hitā himāḥ]
AHS4.9.095a/ alpālpaṁ bahu.śo raktaṁ sa.śūlam upaveśyate |
AHS4.9.095c/ yadā vibaddho vāyuś ca kṛcchrāc carati vā na vā || 95 ||
[Page 410 ]
AHS4.9.096a/ picchā.vastiṁ tadā tasya pūrvoktam upakalpayet |
AHS4.9.096c/ pallavān jarjarī.kṛtya śiṁśipā.kovidārayoḥ || 96 ||
AHS4.9.097a/ paced yavāṁś ca sa kvāthe ghṛta.kṣīra.samanvitaḥ |
AHS4.9.097c/ picchā.srutau guda.bhraṁśe pravāhaṇa.rujāsu vā || 97 ||
AHS4.9.098a/ picchā.vastiḥ prayoktavyaḥ kṣata.kṣīṇa.balāvahaḥ |
AHS4.9.098c/ prapauṇḍarīka.siddhena sarpiṣā cānuvāsanam || 98 ||
AHS4.9.099a/ raktaṁ viṭ.sahitaṁ pūrvaṁ paścād vā yo 'tisāryate |
AHS4.9.099c/ śatāvarī.ghṛtaṁ tasya lehārtham upakalpayet || 99 ||
AHS4.9.100a/ śarkarārdhāṁśakaṁ līḍhaṁ nava.nītaṁ navoddhṛtam |
AHS4.9.100c/ kṣaudra.pādaṁ jayec chīghraṁ taṁ vikāraṁ hitāśinaḥ || 100 ||
AHS4.9.101a/ nyagrodhodumbarāśvattha.śuṅgān āpothya vāsayet |
AHS4.9.101c/ aho.rātraṁ jale tapte ghṛtaṁ tenāmbhasā pacet || 101 ||
AHS4.9.102a/ tad ardha.śarkarā.yuktaṁ lehayet kṣaudra.pādikam |
AHS4.9.102c/ adho vā yadi vāpy urdhvaṁ yasya raktaṁ pravartate || 102 || [Note: AHS4.9.102v/ 9.102cv adho vā yadi vāty.urdhvaṁ]
AHS4.9.103a/ śleṣmātīsāre vātoktaṁ viśeṣād āma.pācanam |
AHS4.9.103c/ kartavyam anubandhe 'sya pibet paktvāgni.dīpanam || 103 ||
AHS4.9.104a/ bilva.karkaṭikā.musta.prāṇadā.viśva.bheṣajam |
AHS4.9.104c/ vacā.viḍaṅga.bhūtīka.dhānakāmaradāru vā || 104 || [Note: AHS4.9.104v/ 9.104dv .dhānyakāmaradāru vā]
AHS4.9.105a/ atha.vā pippalī.mūla.pippalī.dvaya.citrakam |
AHS4.9.105c/ pāṭhāgni.vatsaka.granthi.tiktā.śuṇṭhī.vacābhayāḥ || 105 || [Note: AHS4.9.105v/ 9.105bv .pippalī.dvaya.citrakān]
[Page 411 ]
AHS4.9.106a/ kvathitā yadi vā piṣṭāḥ śleṣmātīsāra.bheṣajam |
AHS4.9.106c/ sauvarcala.vacā.vyoṣa.hiṅgu.prativiṣābhayāḥ || 106 ||
AHS4.9.107a/ pibec chleṣmātisārārtaś cūrṇitāḥ koṣṇa.vāriṇā |
AHS4.9.107c/ madhyaṁ līḍhvā kapitthasya sa.vyoṣa.kṣaudra.śarkaram || 107 || [Note: AHS4.9.107v/ 9.107dv sa.kṣaudraṁ vyoṣa.śarkaram]
AHS4.9.108a/ kaṭphalaṁ madhu.yuktaṁ vā mucyate jaṭharāmayāt |
AHS4.9.108c/ kaṇāṁ madhu.yutāṁ līḍhvā takraṁ pītvā sa.citrakam || 108 ||
AHS4.9.109a/ bhuktvā vā bāla.bilvāni vyapohaty udarāmayam |
AHS4.9.109c/ pāṭhā.moca.rasāmbhoda.dhātakī.bilva.nāgaram || 109 ||
AHS4.9.110a/ su.kṛcchram apy atīsāraṁ guḍa.takreṇa nāśayet |
AHS4.9.110c/ yavānī.pippalī.mūla.cāturjātaka.nāgaraiḥ || 110 ||
AHS4.9.111a/ maricāgni.jalājājī.dhānya.sauvarcalaiḥ samaiḥ |
AHS4.9.111c/ vṛṣāmla.dhātakī.kṛṣṇā.bilva.dāḍima.dīpyakaiḥ || 111 || [Note: AHS4.9.111v/ 9.111cc vṛkṣāmla.dhātakī.kṛṣṇā. 9.111dc .bilva.dāḍima.tindukaiḥ]
AHS4.9.112a/ tri.guṇaiḥ ṣaḍ.guṇa.sitaiḥ kapitthāṣṭa.guṇaiḥ kṛtaḥ |
AHS4.9.112c/ cūrṇo 'tīsāra.grahaṇī.kṣaya.gulma.galāmayān || 112 || [Note: AHS4.9.112v/ 9.112av tri.guṇaiḥ ṣaḍ.guṇa.site 9.112bv kapitthe 'ṣṭa.guṇe kṛtaḥ 9.112dv .kṣaya.gulmodarāmayān]
AHS4.9.113a/ kāsa.śvāsāgni.sādārśaḥ.pīnasā.rocakāñ jayet |
AHS4.9.113c/ karṣonmitā tavakṣīrī cāturjātaṁ dvi.kārṣikam || 113 || [Note: AHS4.9.113v/ 9.113cv karṣonmitaṁ tavakṣīrī. 9.113dv .cāturjātaṁ dvi.kārṣikam]
AHS4.9.114a/ yavānī.dhānyakājājī.granthi.vyoṣaṁ palāṁśakam |
AHS4.9.114c/ palāni dāḍimād aṣṭau sitāyāś caikataḥ kṛtaḥ || 114 || [Note: AHS4.9.114v/ 9.114av yavānī.dhānyakājāji 9.114bv granthi.vyoṣaṁ palāṁśakam]
AHS4.9.115a/ guṇaiḥ kapitthāṣṭaka.vac cūrṇo 'yaṁ dāḍimāṣṭakaḥ |
AHS4.9.115c/ bhojyo vātātisāroktair yathāvasthaṁ khalādibhiḥ || 115 ||
[Page 412 ]
AHS4.9.116a/ sa.viḍaṅgaḥ sa.maricaḥ sa.kapitthaḥ sa.nāgaraḥ |
AHS4.9.116c/ cāṅgerī.takra.kolāmlaḥ khalaḥ śleṣmātisāra.jit || 116 ||
AHS4.9.117a/ kṣīṇe śleṣmaṇi pūrvoktam amlaṁ lākṣādi ṣaṭ.palam |
AHS4.9.117c/ purāṇaṁ vā ghṛtaṁ dadyād yavāgū.maṇḍa.miśritam || 117 ||
AHS4.9.117+1a/ kaṭphalaṁ madhukaṁ lodhraṁ tvag.dāḍima.phalasya ca |
AHS4.9.117+1c/ vāta.pittātisāra.ghnaṁ pibet taṇḍula.vāriṇā || 117+1 ||
AHS4.9.117+2a/ mustaṁ sātiviṣā dārvī vacā śuṇṭhī ca tat.samam |
AHS4.9.117+2c/ kaṣāyaṁ kṣaudra.saṁyuktaṁ śleṣma.vātātisāriṇe || 117+2 ||
AHS4.9.117+3a/ pītadāru vacā lodhraṁ kaliṅga.phala.nāgaram |
AHS4.9.117+3c/ dāḍimāmbu.yutaṁ dadyāt pitta.śleṣmātisāriṇe || 117+3 ||
AHS4.9.118a/ vāta.śleṣma.vibandhe vā sravaty ati kaphe 'pi vā |
AHS4.9.118c/ śūle pravāhikāyāṁ vā picchā.vastiḥ praśasyate || 118 || [Note: AHS4.9.118v/ 9.118av vāta.śleṣma.vibandhe ca]
AHS4.9.119a/ vacā.bilva.kaṇā.kuṣṭha.śatāhvā.lavaṇānvitaḥ |
AHS4.9.119c/ bilva.tailena tailena vacādyaiḥ sādhitena vā || 119 ||
AHS4.9.120a/ bahu.śaḥ kapha.vātārte koṣṇenānvāsanaṁ hitam |
AHS4.9.120c/ kṣīṇe kaphe gude dīrgha.kālātīsāra.dur.bale || 120 ||
AHS4.9.121a/ anilaḥ prabalo 'vaśyaṁ sva.sthāna.sthaḥ prajāyate |
AHS4.9.121c/ sa balī sahasā hanyāt tasmāt taṁ tvarayā jayet || 121 ||
AHS4.9.122a/ vāyor an.antaraṁ pittaṁ pittasyān.antaraṁ kapham |
AHS4.9.122c/ jayet pūrvaṁ trayāṇāṁ vā bhaved yo bala.vat.tamaḥ || 122 ||
[Page 413 ]
AHS4.9.123a/ bhī.śokābhyām api calaḥ śīghraṁ kupyaty atas tayoḥ |
AHS4.9.123c/ kāryā kriyā vāta.harā harṣaṇāśvāsanāni ca || 123 ||
AHS4.9.124a/ yasyoccārād vinā mūtraṁ pavano vā pravartate |
AHS4.9.124c/ dīptāgner laghu.koṣṭhasya śāntas tasyodarāmayaḥ || 124 ||

4.10. Chapter 10 :: Athagrahaṇīdoṣacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 377-383]
AHS4.10.001a/ grahaṇīm āśritaṁ doṣam a.jīrṇa.vad upācaret |
AHS4.10.001c/ atīsārokta.vidhinā tasyāmaṁ ca vipācayet || 1 ||
AHS4.10.002a/ anna.kāle yavāgv.ādi pañca.kolādibhir yutam |
AHS4.10.002c/ vitaret paṭu.laghv.annaṁ punar yogāṁś ca dīpanān || 2 ||
AHS4.10.003a/ dadyāt sātiviṣāṁ peyām āme sāmlāṁ sa.nāgarām |
AHS4.10.003c/ pāne 'tīsāra.vihitaṁ vāri takraṁ surādi ca || 3 ||
AHS4.10.004a/ grahaṇī.doṣiṇāṁ takraṁ dīpana.grāhi.lāghavāt |
AHS4.10.004c/ pathyaṁ madhura.pāki.tvān na ca pitta.pradūṣaṇam || 4 ||
AHS4.10.005a/ kaṣāyoṣṇa.vikāśi.tvād rūkṣa.tvāc ca kaphe hitam |
AHS4.10.005c/ vāte svādv.amla.sāndra.tvāt sadyaskam a.vidāhi tat || 5 || [Note: AHS4.10.005v/ 10.5av kaṣāyoṣṇa.vikāṣi.tvād]
AHS4.10.006a/ caturṇāṁ prastham amlānāṁ try.ūṣaṇāc ca pala.trayam |
AHS4.10.006c/ lavaṇānāṁ ca catvāri śarkarāyāḥ palāṣṭakam || 6 ||
AHS4.10.007a/ tac cūrṇaṁ śāka.sūpānna.rāgādiṣv avacārayet |
AHS4.10.007c/ kāsā.jīrṇā.ruci.śvāsa.hṛt.pāṇḍu.plīha.gulma.nut || 7 || [Note: AHS4.10.007v/ 10.7dv .hṛt.pārśvāmaya.śūla.nut 10.7dv .hṛt.pāṇḍv.āmaya.śūla.nut]
AHS4.10.008a/ nāgarātiviṣā.mustaṁ pākyam āma.haraṁ pibet |
AHS4.10.008c/ uṣṇāmbunā vā tat.kalkaṁ nāgaraṁ vātha.vābhayām || 8 ||
[Page 414 ]
AHS4.10.009a/ sa.saindhavaṁ vacādiṁ vā tad.van madirayātha.vā |
AHS4.10.009c/ varcasy āme sa.pravāhe pibed vā dāḍimāmbunā || 9 ||
AHS4.10.010a/ viḍena lavaṇaṁ piṣṭaṁ bilva.citraka.nāgaram |
AHS4.10.010c/ sāme kaphānile koṣṭha.ruk.kare koṣṇa.vāriṇā || 10 ||
AHS4.10.011a/ kaliṅga.hiṅgv.ativiṣā.vacā.sauvarcalābhayam |
AHS4.10.011c/ chardi.hṛd.roga.śūleṣu peyam uṣṇena vāriṇā || 11 ||
AHS4.10.012a/ pathyā.sauvarcalājājī.cūrṇaṁ marica.saṁyutam |
AHS4.10.012c/ pippalīṁ nāgaraṁ pāṭhāṁ śārivāṁ bṛhatī.dvayam || 12 ||
AHS4.10.013a/ citrakaṁ kauṭajaṁ kṣāraṁ tathā lavaṇa.pañcakam |
AHS4.10.013c/ cūrṇī.kṛtaṁ dadhi.surā.tan.maṇḍoṣṇāmbu.kāñjikaiḥ || 13 ||
AHS4.10.014a/ pibed agni.vivṛddhy.arthaṁ koṣṭha.vāta.haraṁ param |
AHS4.10.014c/ paṭūni pañca dvau kṣārau maricaṁ pañca.kolakam || 14 ||
AHS4.10.015a/ dīpyakaṁ hiṅgu guṭikā bījapūra.rase kṛtā |
AHS4.10.015c/ kola.dāḍima.toye vā paraṁ pācana.dīpanī || 15 ||
AHS4.10.016a/ tālīśa.pattra.cavikā.maricānāṁ palaṁ palam |
AHS4.10.016c/ kṛṣṇā.tan.mūlayor dve dve pale śuṇṭhī.pala.trayam || 16 ||
AHS4.10.017a/ catur.jātam uśīraṁ ca karṣāṁśaṁ ślakṣṇa.cūrṇitam |
AHS4.10.017c/ guḍena vaṭakān kṛtvā tri.guṇena sadā bhajet || 17 ||
AHS4.10.018a/ madya.yūṣa.rasāriṣṭa.mastu.peyā.payo.'nupaḥ |
AHS4.10.018c/ vāta.śleṣmātmanāṁ chardi.grahaṇī.pārśva.hṛd.rujām || 18 ||
[Page 415 ]
AHS4.10.019a/ jvara.śvayathu.pāṇḍu.tva.gulma.pānātyayārśasām |
AHS4.10.019c/ praseka.pīnasa.śvāsa.kāsānāṁ ca nivṛttaye || 19 ||
AHS4.10.020a/ abhayāṁ nāgara.sthāne dadyāt tatraiva viḍ.grahe |
AHS4.10.020c/ chardy.ādiṣu ca paitteṣu catur.guṇa.sitānvitāḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS4.10.020v/ 10.20bv dadyād atraiva viḍ.grahe]
AHS4.10.021a/ pakvena vaṭakāḥ kāryā guḍena sitayāpi vā |
AHS4.10.021c/ paraṁ hi vahni.samparkāl laghimānaṁ bhajanti te || 21 ||
AHS4.10.022a/ athainaṁ paripakvāmaṁ māruta.grahaṇī.gadam |
AHS4.10.022c/ dīpanīya.yutaṁ sarpiḥ pāyayed alpa.śo bhiṣak || 22 || [Note: AHS4.10.022v/ 10.22av athainaṁ paripakvāma. 10.22bv .māruta.grahaṇī.gadam]
AHS4.10.023a/ kiñ.cit.sandhukṣite tv agnau sakta.viṇ.mūtra.mārutam |
AHS4.10.023c/ dvy.ahaṁ try.ahaṁ vā saṁsnehya svinnābhyaktaṁ nirūhayet || 23 ||
AHS4.10.024a/ tata eraṇḍa.tailena sarpiṣā tailvakena vā |
AHS4.10.024c/ sa.kṣāreṇānile śānte srasta.doṣaṁ virecayet || 24 ||
AHS4.10.025a/ śuddha.rūkṣāśayaṁ baddha.varcaskaṁ cānuvāsayet |
AHS4.10.025c/ dīpanīyāmla.vāta.ghna.siddha.tailena taṁ tataḥ || 25 ||
AHS4.10.026a/ nirūḍhaṁ ca viriktaṁ ca samyak cāpy anuvāsitam |
AHS4.10.026c/ laghv.anna.pratisaṁyuktaṁ sarpir abhyāsayet punaḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS4.10.026v/ 10.26bv samyag vāpy anuvāsitam]
AHS4.10.027a/ pañca.mūlābhayā.vyoṣa.pippalī.mūla.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS4.10.027c/ rāsnā.kṣāra.dvayājājī.viḍaṅga.śaṭhibhir ghṛtam || 27 ||
AHS4.10.028a/ śuktena mātuluṅgasya sva.rasenārdrakasya ca |
AHS4.10.028c/ śuṣka.mūlaka.kolāmla.cukrikā.dāḍimasya ca || 28 ||
[Page 416 ]
AHS4.10.029a/ takra.mastu.surā.maṇḍa.sauvīraka.tuṣodakaiḥ |
AHS4.10.029c/ kāñjikena ca tat pakvam agni.dīpti.karaṁ param || 29 ||
AHS4.10.030a/ śūla.gulmodara.śvāsa.kāsānila.kaphāpaham |
AHS4.10.030c/ sa.bījapūraka.rasaṁ siddhaṁ vā pāyayed ghṛtam || 30 ||
AHS4.10.031a/ tailam abhyañjanārthaṁ ca siddham ebhiś calāpaham |
AHS4.10.031c/ eteṣām auṣadhānāṁ vā pibec cūrṇaṁ sukhāmbunā || 31 ||
AHS4.10.032a/ vāte śleṣmāvṛte sāme kaphe vā vāyunoddhate |
AHS4.10.032c/ agner nirvāpakaṁ pittaṁ rekeṇa vamanena vā || 32 ||
AHS4.10.033a/ hatvā tikta.laghu.grāhi.dīpanair a.vidāhibhiḥ |
AHS4.10.033c/ annaiḥ sandhukṣayed agniṁ cūrṇaiḥ snehaiś ca tiktakaiḥ || 33 ||
AHS4.10.034a/ paṭola.nimba.trāyantī.tiktā.tiktaka.parpaṭam |
AHS4.10.034c/ kuṭaja.tvak.phalaṁ mūrvā madhu.śigru.phalaṁ vacā || 34 ||
AHS4.10.035a/ dārvī.tvak.padmakośīra.yavānī.musta.candanam |
AHS4.10.035c/ saurāṣṭry.ativiṣā.vyoṣa.tvag.elā.pattra.dāru ca || 35 ||
AHS4.10.036a/ cūrṇitaṁ madhunā lehyaṁ peyaṁ madyair jalena vā |
AHS4.10.036c/ hṛt.pāṇḍu.grahaṇī.roga.gulma.śūlā.ruci.jvarān || 36 ||
AHS4.10.037a/ kāmalāṁ sannipātaṁ ca mukha.rogāṁś ca nāśayet |
AHS4.10.037c/ bhūnimba.kaṭukā.mustā.try.ūṣaṇendrayavān samān || 37 ||
AHS4.10.038a/ dvau citrakād vatsaka.tvag.bhāgān ṣo.ḍaśa cūrṇayet |
AHS4.10.038c/ guḍa.śītāmbunā pītaṁ grahaṇī.doṣa.gulma.nut || 38 ||
[Page 417 ]
AHS4.10.039a/ kāmalā.jvara.pāṇḍu.tva.mehā.rucy.atisāra.jit |
AHS4.10.039c/ nāgarātiviṣā.mustā.pāṭhā.bilvaṁ rasāñjanam || 39 || [Note: AHS4.10.039v/ 10.39bv .mehā.rucy.atisāra.nut]
AHS4.10.040a/ kuṭaja.tvak.phalaṁ tiktā dhātakī ca kṛtaṁ rajaḥ |
AHS4.10.040c/ kṣaudra.taṇḍula.vāribhyāṁ paittike grahaṇī.gade || 40 ||
AHS4.10.041a/ pravāhikārśo.guda.rug.raktotthāneṣu ceṣyate |
AHS4.10.041c/ candanaṁ padmakośīraṁ pāṭhāṁ mūrvāṁ kuṭannaṭam || 41 ||
AHS4.10.042a/ ṣaḍgranthā.śārivāsphotā.saptaparṇāṭarūṣakān |
AHS4.10.042c/ paṭolodumbarāśvattha.vaṭa.plakṣa.kapītanān || 42 || [Note: AHS4.10.042v/ 10.42dv .vaṭa.plakṣa.kapītanam]
AHS4.10.043a/ kaṭukāṁ rohiṇīṁ mustāṁ nimbaṁ ca dvi.palāṁśakān |
AHS4.10.043c/ droṇe 'pāṁ sādhayet tena pacet sarpiḥ picūnmitaiḥ || 43 ||
AHS4.10.044a/ kirātatiktendrayava.vīrā.māgadhikotpalaiḥ |
AHS4.10.044c/ pitta.grahaṇyāṁ tat peyaṁ kuṣṭhoktaṁ tiktakaṁ ca yat || 44 ||
AHS4.10.045a/ grahaṇyāṁ śleṣma.duṣṭāyāṁ tīkṣṇaiḥ pracchardane kṛte |
AHS4.10.045c/ kaṭv.amla.lavaṇa.kṣāraiḥ kramād agniṁ vivardhayet || 45 ||
AHS4.10.046a/ pañca.kolābhayā.dhānya.pāṭhā.gandha.palāśakaiḥ |
AHS4.10.046c/ bījapūra.pragāḍhaiś ca siddhaiḥ peyādi kalpayet || 46 ||
AHS4.10.047a/ droṇaṁ madhūka.puṣpāṇāṁ viḍaṅgaṁ ca tato 'rdhataḥ |
AHS4.10.047c/ citrakasya tato 'rdhaṁ ca tathā bhallātakāḍhakam || 47 ||
AHS4.10.048a/ mañjiṣṭhāṣṭa.palaṁ caitaj jala.droṇa.traye pacet |
AHS4.10.048c/ droṇa.śeṣaṁ śṛtaṁ śītaṁ madhv.ardhāḍhaka.saṁyutam || 48 ||
[Page 418 ]
AHS4.10.049a/ elā.mṛṇālāgurubhiś candanena ca rūṣite |
AHS4.10.049c/ kumbhe māsaṁ sthitaṁ jātam āsavaṁ taṁ prayojayet || 49 || [Note: AHS4.10.049v/ 10.49cv kumbhe māsa.sthitaṁ jātam]
AHS4.10.050a/ grahaṇīṁ dīpayaty eṣa bṛṁhaṇaḥ pitta.rakta.nut |
AHS4.10.050c/ śoṣa.kuṣṭha.kilāsānāṁ pramehāṇāṁ ca nāśanaḥ || 50 || [Note: AHS4.10.050v/ 10.50bv bṛṁhaṇo rakta.pitta.nut]
AHS4.10.051a/ madhūka.puṣpa.sva.rasaṁ śṛtam ardha.kṣayī.kṛtam |
AHS4.10.051c/ kṣaudra.pāda.yutaṁ śītaṁ pūrva.vat sannidhāpayet || 51 || [Note: AHS4.10.051v/ 10.51av madhūka.puṣpa.kuḍavaṁ]
AHS4.10.052a/ tat piban grahaṇī.doṣān jayet sarvān hitāśanaḥ |
AHS4.10.052c/ tad.vad drākṣekṣu.kharjūra.sva.rasān āsutān pibet || 52 ||
AHS4.10.053a/ hiṅgu.tiktā.vacā.mādrī.pāṭhendrayava.gokṣuram |
AHS4.10.053c/ pañca.kolaṁ ca karṣāṁśaṁ palāṁśaṁ paṭu.pañcakam || 53 ||
AHS4.10.054a/ ghṛta.taila.dvi.kuḍave dadhnaḥ prastha.dvaye ca tat |
AHS4.10.054c/ āpothya kvāthayed agnau mṛdāv anugate rase || 54 ||
AHS4.10.055a/ antar.dhūmaṁ tato dagdhvā cūrṇī.kṛtya ghṛtāplutam |
AHS4.10.055c/ pibet pāṇi.talaṁ tasmiñ jīrṇe syān madhurāśanaḥ || 55 ||
AHS4.10.056a/ vāta.śleṣmāmayān sarvān hanyād viṣa.garāṁś ca saḥ |
AHS4.10.056c/ bhūnimbaṁ rohiṇīṁ tiktāṁ paṭolaṁ nimba.parpaṭam || 56 ||
AHS4.10.057a/ dagdhvā māhiṣa.mūtreṇa pibed agni.vivardhanam |
AHS4.10.057c/ dve haridre vacā kuṣṭhaṁ citrakaḥ kaṭu.rohiṇī || 57 ||
AHS4.10.058a/ mustā ca cchāga.mūtreṇa siddhaḥ kṣāro 'gni.vardhanaḥ |
AHS4.10.058c/ catuḥ.palaṁ sudhā.kāṇḍāt tri.palaṁ lavaṇa.trayāt || 58 || [Note: AHS4.10.058v/ 10.58dv tri.phalā.lavaṇāni ca]
[Page 419 ]
AHS4.10.059a/ vārtāka.kuḍavaṁ cārkād aṣṭau dve citrakāt pale |
AHS4.10.059c/ dagdhvā rasena vārtākād guṭikā bhojanottarāḥ || 59 || [Note: AHS4.10.059v/ 10.59av vārtākāt kuḍavaṁ cārkād]
AHS4.10.060a/ bhuktam annaṁ pacanty āśu kāsa.śvāsārśasāṁ hitāḥ |
AHS4.10.060c/ viṣūcikā.pratiśyāya.hṛd.roga.śamanāś ca tāḥ || 60 ||
AHS4.10.061a/ mātuluṅga.śaṭhī.rāsnā.kaṭu.traya.harītaki |
AHS4.10.061c/ svarjikā.yāva.śūkākhyau kṣārau pañca.paṭūni ca || 61 || [Note: AHS4.10.061v/ 10.61bv .kaṭu.traya.harītakīḥ]
AHS4.10.062a/ sukhāmbu.pītaṁ tac.cūrṇaṁ bala.varṇāgni.vardhanam |
AHS4.10.062c/ ślaiṣmike grahaṇī.doṣe sa.vāte tair ghṛtaṁ pacet || 62 ||
AHS4.10.063a/ dhānvantaraṁ ṣaṭ.palaṁ ca bhallātaka.ghṛtābhayam |
AHS4.10.063c/ viḍa.kācoṣa.lavaṇa.svarjikā.yāva.śūka.jān || 63 ||
AHS4.10.064a/ saptalāṁ kaṇṭakārīṁ ca citrakaṁ caikato dahet |
AHS4.10.064c/ sapta.kṛtvaḥ srutasyāsya kṣārasyārdhāḍhake pacet || 64 ||
AHS4.10.065a/ āḍhakaṁ sarpiṣaḥ peyaṁ tad agni.bala.vṛddhaye |
AHS4.10.065c/ nicaye pañca karmāṇi yuñjyāc caitad yathā.balam || 65 ||
AHS4.10.066a/ praseke ślaiṣmike 'lpāgner dīpanaṁ rūkṣa.tiktakam |
AHS4.10.066c/ yojyaṁ kṛśasya vyatyāsāt snigdha.rūkṣaṁ kaphodaye || 66 ||
AHS4.10.067a/ kṣīṇa.kṣāma.śarīrasya dīpanaṁ sneha.saṁyutam |
AHS4.10.067c/ dīpanaṁ bahu.pittasya tiktaṁ madhurakair yutam || 67 ||
AHS4.10.068a/ sneho 'mla.lavaṇair yukto bahu.vātasya śasyate |
AHS4.10.068c/ sneham eva paraṁ vidyād dur.balānala.dīpanam || 68 ||
[Page 420 ]
AHS4.10.069a/ nālaṁ sneha.samiddhasya śamāyānnaṁ su.gurv api |
AHS4.10.069c/ yo 'lpāgni.tvāt kaphe kṣīṇe varcaḥ pakvam api ślatham || 69 ||
AHS4.10.070a/ muñcet paṭv.auṣadha.yutaṁ sa pibed alpa.śo ghṛtam |
AHS4.10.070c/ tena sva.mārgam ānītaḥ sva.karmaṇi niyojitaḥ || 70 ||
AHS4.10.071a/ samāno dīpayaty agnim agneḥ sandhukṣako hi saḥ |
AHS4.10.071c/ purīṣaṁ yaś ca kṛcchreṇa kaṭhina.tvād vimuñcati || 71 || [Note: AHS4.10.071v/ 10.71bv agneḥ sandhukṣako hy asau]
AHS4.10.072a/ sa ghṛtaṁ lavaṇair yuktaṁ naro 'nnāvagrahaṁ pibet |
AHS4.10.072c/ raukṣyān mande 'nale sarpis tailaṁ vā dīpanaiḥ pibet || 72 ||
AHS4.10.073a/ kṣāra.cūrṇāsavāriṣṭan mande snehāti.pānataḥ |
AHS4.10.073c/ udāvartāt tu yoktavyā nirūha.sneha.vastayaḥ || 73 || [Note: AHS4.10.073v/ 10.73cv udāvartāt prayoktavyā]
AHS4.10.074a/ doṣāti.vṛddhyā mande 'gnau saṁśuddho 'nna.vidhiṁ caret |
AHS4.10.074c/ vyādhi.muktasya mande 'gnau sarpir eva tu dīpanam || 74 || [Note: AHS4.10.074v/ 10.74bv saṁśuddho 'nna.vidhiṁ bhajet]
AHS4.10.075a/ adhvopavāsa.kṣāma.tvair yavāgvā pāyayed ghṛtam |
AHS4.10.075c/ annāvapīḍitaṁ balyaṁ dīpanaṁ bṛṁhaṇaṁ ca tat || 75 ||
AHS4.10.076a/ dīrgha.kāla.prasaṅgāt tu kṣāma.kṣīṇa.kṛśān narān |
AHS4.10.076c/ prasahānāṁ rasaiḥ sāmlair bhojayet piśitāśinām || 76 ||
AHS4.10.077a/ laghūṣṇa.kaṭu.śodhi.tvād dīpayanty āśu te 'nalam |
AHS4.10.077c/ māṁsopacita.māṁsa.tvāt paraṁ ca bala.vardhanāḥ || 77 || [Note: AHS4.10.077v/ 10.77av laghūṣṇa.kaṭu.śodhi.tvair]
AHS4.10.078a/ snehāsava.surāriṣṭa.cūrṇa.kvātha.hitāśanaiḥ |
AHS4.10.078c/ samyak.prayuktair dehasya balam agneś ca vardhate || 78 ||
[Page 421 ]
AHS4.10.079a/ dīpto yathaiva sthāṇuś ca bāhyo 'gniḥ sāra.dārubhiḥ |
AHS4.10.079c/ sa.snehair jāyate tad.vad āhāraiḥ koṣṭha.go 'nalaḥ || 79 ||
AHS4.10.080a/ nā.bhojanena kāyāgnir dīpyate nāti.bhojanāt |
AHS4.10.080c/ yathā nir.indhano vahnir alpo vātīndhanāvṛtaḥ || 80 || [Note: AHS4.10.080v/ 10.80dv alpo vātīndhanānvitaḥ]
AHS4.10.081a/ yadā kṣīṇe kaphe pittaṁ sva.sthāne pavanānugam |
AHS4.10.081c/ pravṛddhaṁ vardhayaty agniṁ tadāsau sānilo 'nalaḥ || 81 ||
AHS4.10.082a/ paktvānnam āśu dhātūṁś ca sarvān ojaś ca saṅkṣipan |
AHS4.10.082c/ mārayet syāt sa nā svastho bhukte jīrṇe tu tāmyati || 82 || [Note: AHS4.10.082v/ 10.82cv mārayet taṁ sa nā svastho]
AHS4.10.083a/ tṛṭ.kāsa.dāha.mūrchādyā vyādhayo 'ty.agni.sambhavāḥ |
AHS4.10.083c/ tam aty.agniṁ guru.snigdha.manda.sāndra.hima.sthiraiḥ || 83 ||
AHS4.10.084a/ anna.pānair nayec chāntiṁ dīptam agnim ivāmbubhiḥ |
AHS4.10.084c/ muhur muhur a.jīrṇe 'pi bhojyāny asyopahārayet || 84 || [Note: AHS4.10.084v/ 10.84dv bhojyāny asyopakalpayet]
AHS4.10.085a/ nir.indhano 'ntaraṁ labdhvā yathainaṁ na vipādayet |
AHS4.10.085c/ kṛśarāṁ pāyasaṁ snigdhaṁ paiṣṭikaṁ guḍa.vaikṛtam || 85 || [Note: AHS4.10.085v/ 10.85bv tathainaṁ na vipādayet]
AHS4.10.086a/ aśnīyād audakānūpa.piśitāni bhṛtāni ca |
AHS4.10.086c/ matsyān viśeṣataḥ ślakṣṇān sthira.toya.carāś ca ye || 86 ||
AHS4.10.087a/ āvikaṁ su.bhṛtaṁ māṁsam adyād aty.agni.vāraṇam |
AHS4.10.087c/ payaḥ saha.madhūcchiṣṭaṁ ghṛtaṁ vā tṛṣitaḥ pibet || 87 ||
AHS4.10.088a/ godhūma.cūrṇaṁ payasā bahu.sarpiḥ.pariplutam |
AHS4.10.088c/ ānūpa.rasa.yuktān vā snehāṁs taila.vivarjitān || 88 ||
[Page 422 ]
AHS4.10.089a/ śyāmā.trivṛd.vipakvaṁ vā payo dadyād virecanam |
AHS4.10.089c/ a.sakṛt pitta.haraṇaṁ pāyasa.pratibhojanam || 89 ||
AHS4.10.090a/ yat kiñ.cid guru medyaṁ ca śleṣma.kāri ca bhojanam |
AHS4.10.090c/ sarvaṁ tad aty.agni.hitaṁ bhuktvā ca svapanaṁ divā || 90 ||
AHS4.10.091a/ āhāram agniḥ pacati doṣān āhāra.varjitaḥ |
AHS4.10.091c/ dhātūn kṣīṇeṣu doṣeṣu jīvitaṁ dhātu.saṅkṣaye || 91 ||
AHS4.10.092a/ etat prakṛtyaiva viruddham annaṁ saṁyoga.saṁskāra.vaśena cedam |
AHS4.10.092c/ ity.ādi a.vijñāya yatheṣṭa.ceṣṭāś caranti yat sāgni.balasya śaktiḥ || 92 ||
AHS4.10.093a/ tasmād agniṁ pālayet sarva.yatnais tasmin naṣṭe yāti nā nāśam eva |
AHS4.10.093c/ doṣair graste grasyate roga.saṅghair yukte tu syān nī.rujo dīrgha.jīvī || 93 ||

4.11. Chapter 11 :: Athamūtrāghātacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 383-387]
AHS4.11.000+1a/ liṅgāgra.suṣire samyag yonyāṁ vā sampraveśayet |
AHS4.11.000+1c/ mūtra.duḥkha.haraṁ mukhyaṁ karpūraṁ parisaṅkṣipet || 0+1 ||
AHS4.11.001a/ kṛcchre vāta.ghna.tailāktam adho nābheḥ samīra.je |
AHS4.11.001c/ su.snigdhaiḥ svedayed aṅgaṁ piṇḍa.sekāvagāhanaiḥ || 1 ||
AHS4.11.002a/ daśa.mūla.balairaṇḍa.yavābhīru.punarnavaiḥ |
AHS4.11.002c/ kulattha.kola.pattūra.vṛścīvopalabhedakaiḥ || 2 ||
AHS4.11.003a/ taila.sarpir.varāharkṣa.vasāḥ kvathita.kalkitaiḥ |
AHS4.11.003c/ sa.pañca.lavaṇāḥ siddhāḥ pītāḥ śūla.harāḥ param || 3 ||
AHS4.11.004a/ dravyāṇy etāni pānānne tathā piṇḍopanāhane |
AHS4.11.004c/ saha tailaphalair yuñjyāt sāmlāni sneha.vanti ca || 4 ||
[Page 423 ]
AHS4.11.005a/ sauvarcalāḍhyāṁ madirāṁ piben mūtra.rujāpahām |
AHS4.11.005c/ paitte yuñjīta śiśiraṁ seka.lepāvagāhanam || 5 ||
AHS4.11.006a/ pibed varīṁ gokṣurakaṁ vidārīṁ sa.kaserukām |
AHS4.11.006c/ tṛṇākhyaṁ pañca.mūlaṁ ca pākyaṁ sa.madhu.śarkaram || 6 ||
AHS4.11.007a/ vṛṣakaṁ trapusairvāru.laṭvā.bījāni kuṅkumam |
AHS4.11.007c/ drākṣāmbhobhiḥ piban sarvān mūtrāghātān apohati || 7 ||
AHS4.11.008a/ ervāru.bīja.yaṣṭy.āhva.dārvīr vā taṇḍulāmbunā |
AHS4.11.008c/ toyena kalkaṁ drākṣāyāḥ pibet paryuṣitena vā || 8 ||
AHS4.11.009a/ kapha.je vamanaṁ svedaṁ tīkṣṇoṣṇa.kaṭu.bhojanam |
AHS4.11.009c/ yavānāṁ vikṛtīḥ kṣāraṁ kālaśeyaṁ ca śīlayet || 9 ||
AHS4.11.010a/ piben madyena sūkṣmailāṁ dhātrī.phala.rasena vā |
AHS4.11.010c/ sārasāsthi.śvadaṁṣṭrailā.vyoṣaṁ vā madhu.mūtra.vat || 10 ||
AHS4.11.011a/ sva.rasaṁ kaṇṭakāryā vā pāyayen mākṣikānvitam |
AHS4.11.011c/ śitivāraka.bījaṁ vā takreṇa ślakṣṇa.cūrṇitam || 11 ||
AHS4.11.012a/ dhava.saptāhva.kuṭaja.guḍūcī.caturaṅgulam |
AHS4.11.012c/ kembukailā.karañjaṁ ca pākyaṁ sa.madhu sādhitām || 12 || [Note: AHS4.11.012v/ 11.12cv kaṭukailā.karañjaṁ ca]
AHS4.11.013a/ tair vā peyāṁ pravālaṁ vā cūrṇitaṁ taṇḍulāmbunā |
AHS4.11.013c/ sa.tailaṁ pāṭalā.kṣāraṁ sapta.kṛtvo 'tha.vā srutam || 13 ||
AHS4.11.014a/ pāṭalī.yāva.śūkābhyāṁ pāribhadrāt tilād api |
AHS4.11.014c/ kṣārodakena madirāṁ tvag.eloṣaṇa.saṁyutām || 14 ||
[Page 424 ]
AHS4.11.015a/ pibed guḍopadaṁśān vā lihyād etān pṛthak pṛthak |
AHS4.11.015c/ sannipātātmake sarvaṁ yathāvastham idaṁ hitam || 15 ||
AHS4.11.016a/ aśmany apy a.cirotthāne vāta.vasty.ādikeṣu ca |
AHS4.11.016c/ aśmarī dāruṇo vyādhir antaka.pratimo mataḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS4.11.016v/ 11.16bv vāta.vasty.ādikeṣv api]
AHS4.11.017a/ taruṇo bheṣajaiḥ sādhyaḥ pravṛddhaś chedam arhati |
AHS4.11.017c/ tasya pūrveṣu rūpeṣu snehādi.krama iṣyate || 17 ||
AHS4.11.018a/ pāṣāṇabhedo vasuko vaśiro 'śmantako varī |
AHS4.11.018c/ kapotavaṅkātibalā.bhallūkośīra.kacchakam || 18 || [Note: AHS4.11.018v/ 11.18dv .bhallūkośīra.kantakam]
AHS4.11.019a/ vṛkṣādanī śāka.phalaṁ vyāghryau guṇṭhas trikaṇṭakaḥ |
AHS4.11.019c/ yavāḥ kulatthāḥ kolāni varuṇaḥ katakāt phalam || 19 ||
AHS4.11.020a/ ūṣakādi.pratīvāpam eṣāṁ kvāthe śṛtaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS4.11.020c/ bhinatti vāta.sambhūtāṁ tat pītaṁ śīghram aśmarīm || 20 ||
AHS4.11.021a/ gandharvahasta.bṛhatī.vyāghrī.gokṣurakekṣurāt |
AHS4.11.021c/ mūla.kalkaṁ pibed dadhnā madhureṇāśma.bhedanam || 21 ||
AHS4.11.022a/ kuśaḥ kāśaḥ śaro guṇṭha itkaṭo moraṭo 'śmabhit |
AHS4.11.022c/ darbho vidārī vārāhī śāli.mūlaṁ trikaṇṭakaḥ || 22 ||
AHS4.11.023a/ bhallūkaḥ pāṭalī pāṭhā pattūraḥ sa.kuraṇṭakaḥ |
AHS4.11.023c/ punarnave śirīṣaś ca teṣāṁ kvāthe paced ghṛtam || 23 ||
AHS4.11.024a/ piṣṭena trapusādīnāṁ bījenendīvareṇa ca |
AHS4.11.024c/ madhukena śilā.jena tat pittāśmari.bhedanam || 24 ||
[Page 425 ]
AHS4.11.025a/ varuṇādiḥ samīra.ghnau gaṇāv elā hareṇukā |
AHS4.11.025c/ guggulur maricaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ citrakaḥ sa.surāhvayaḥ || 25 ||
AHS4.11.026a/ taiḥ kalkitaiḥ kṛtāv āpam ūṣakādi.gaṇena ca |
AHS4.11.026c/ bhinatti kapha.jām āśu sādhitaṁ ghṛtam aśmarīm || 26 ||
AHS4.11.027a/ kṣāra.kṣīra.yavāgv.ādi dravyaiḥ svaiḥ svaiś ca kalpayet |
AHS4.11.027c/ picukāṅkolla.kataka.śākendīvara.jaiḥ phalaiḥ || 27 ||
AHS4.11.028a/ pītam uṣṇāmbu sa.guḍaṁ śarkarā.pātanaṁ param |
AHS4.11.028c/ krauñcoṣṭra.rāsabhāsthīni śvadaṁṣṭrā tālapattrikā || 28 || [Note: AHS4.11.028v/ 11.28av pītam uṣṇāmbu sa.ghṛtaṁ]
AHS4.11.029a/ ajamodā kadambasya mūlaṁ viśvasya cauṣadham |
AHS4.11.029c/ pītāni śarkarāṁ bhindyuḥ surayoṣṇodakena vā || 29 || [Note: AHS4.11.029v/ 11.29bv mūlaṁ bilvasya cauṣadham]
AHS4.11.030a/ nṛtyakuṇḍaka.bījānāṁ cūrṇaṁ mākṣika.saṁyutam |
AHS4.11.030c/ avi.kṣīreṇa saptāhaṁ pītam aśmari.pātanaḥ || 30 || [Note: AHS4.11.030v/ 11.30av nṛtyakuṇḍala.bījānāṁ 11.30av markaṭakasya bījānāṁ]
AHS4.11.031a/ kvāthaś ca śigru.mūlotthaḥ kad.uṣṇo 'śmarī.pātanaḥ |
AHS4.11.031c/ tilāpāmārga.kadalī.palāśa.yava.sambhavaḥ || 31 ||
AHS4.11.032a/ kṣāraḥ peyo 'vi.mūtreṇa śarkarāsv aśmarīṣu ca |
AHS4.11.032c/ kapotavaṅkā.mūlaṁ vā pibed ekaṁ surādibhiḥ || 32 ||
AHS4.11.033a/ tat.siddhaṁ vā pibet kṣīraṁ vedanābhir upadrutaḥ |
AHS4.11.033c/ harītaky.asthi.siddhaṁ vā sādhitaṁ vā punarnavaiḥ || 33 ||
AHS4.11.034a/ kṣīrānna.bhug barhi.śikhā.mūlaṁ vā taṇḍulāmbunā |
AHS4.11.034c/ mūtrāghāteṣu vibhajed ataḥ śeṣeṣv api kriyām || 34 ||
[Page 426 ]
AHS4.11.035a/ bṛhaty.ādi.gaṇe siddhaṁ dvi.guṇī.kṛta.gokṣure |
AHS4.11.035c/ toyaṁ payo vā sarpir vā sarva.mūtra.vikāra.jit || 35 ||
AHS4.11.036a/ devadāruṁ ghanaṁ mūrvāṁ yaṣṭīmadhu harītakīm |
AHS4.11.036c/ mūtrāghāteṣu sarveṣu surā.kṣīra.jalaiḥ pibet || 36 ||
AHS4.11.037a/ rasaṁ vā dhanvayāsasya kaṣāyaṁ kakubhasya vā |
AHS4.11.037c/ sukhāmbhasā vā tri.phalāṁ piṣṭāṁ saindhava.saṁyutām || 37 ||
AHS4.11.038a/ vyāghrī.gokṣuraka.kvāthe yavāgūṁ vā sa.phāṇitām |
AHS4.11.038c/ kvāthe vīratarāder vā tāmra.cūḍa.rase 'pi vā || 38 ||
AHS4.11.039a/ adyād vīratarādyena bhāvitaṁ vā śilā.jatu |
AHS4.11.039c/ madyaṁ vā nigadaṁ pītvā rathenāśvena vā vrajet || 39 || [Note: AHS4.11.039v/ 11.39cv madyaṁ vā nir.gadaṁ pītvā]
AHS4.11.040a/ śīghra.vegena saṅkṣobhāt tathāsya cyavate 'śmarī |
AHS4.11.040c/ sarva.thā copayoktavyo vargo vīratarādikaḥ || 40 ||
AHS4.11.041a/ rekārthaṁ tailvakaṁ sarpir vasti.karma ca śīlayet |
AHS4.11.041c/ viśeṣād uttarān vastīñ chukrāśmaryāṁ tu śodhite || 41 || [Note: AHS4.11.041v/ 11.41dv chukrāśmaryāṁ ca śodhite]
AHS4.11.042a/ tair mūtra.mārge bala.vān śukrāśaya.viśuddhaye |
AHS4.11.042c/ pumān su.tṛpto vṛṣyāṇāṁ māṁsānāṁ kukkuṭasya ca || 42 ||
AHS4.11.043a/ kāmaṁ sa.kāmaḥ seveta pramadā mada.dāyinīḥ |
AHS4.11.043c/ siddhair upakramair ebhir na cec chāntis tadā bhiṣak || 43 || [Note: AHS4.11.043v/ 11.43dv na cec chāntis tato bhiṣak]
AHS4.11.044a/ iti rājānam āpṛcchya śastraṁ sādhv avacārayet |
AHS4.11.044c/ a.kriyāyāṁ dhruvo mṛtyuḥ kriyāyāṁ saṁśayo bhavet || 44 ||
[Page 427 ]
AHS4.11.045a/ niścitasyāpi vaidyasya bahu.śaḥ siddha.karmaṇaḥ |
AHS4.11.045c/ athāturam upasnigdha.śuddham īṣac ca karśitam || 45 || [Note: AHS4.11.045v/ 11.45cv athāturam upasnigdhaṁ 11.45dv .śuddham īṣac ca karṣitam 11.45dv śuddham īṣac ca karśitam]
AHS4.11.046a/ abhyakta.svinna.vapuṣam a.bhuktaṁ kṛta.maṅgalam |
AHS4.11.046c/ ā.jānu.phalaka.sthasya narasyāṅke vyapāśritam || 46 ||
AHS4.11.047a/ pūrveṇa kāyenottānaṁ niṣaṇṇaṁ vastra.cumbhale |
AHS4.11.047c/ tato 'syākuñcite jānu.kūrpare vāsasā dṛḍham || 47 ||
AHS4.11.048a/ sahāśraya.manuṣyeṇa baddhasyāśvāsitasya ca |
AHS4.11.048c/ nābheḥ samantād abhyajyād adhas tasyāś ca vāmataḥ || 48 ||
AHS4.11.049a/ mṛditvā muṣṭinākrāmed yāvad aśmary adho.gatā |
AHS4.11.049c/ tailākte vardhita.nakhe tarjanī.madhyame tataḥ || 49 ||
AHS4.11.050a/ a.dakṣiṇe gude 'ṅgulyau praṇidhāyānu.sevani |
AHS4.11.050c/ āsādya bala.yatnābhyām aśmarīṁ guda.meḍhrayoḥ || 50 || [Note: AHS4.11.050v/ 11.50bv praṇidhāyānu.sevanīm]
AHS4.11.051a/ kṛtvāntare tathā vastiṁ nir.valīkam an.āyatam |
AHS4.11.051c/ utpīḍayed aṅgulībhyāṁ yāvad granthir ivonnatam || 51 ||
AHS4.11.052a/ śalyaṁ syāt sevanīṁ muktvā yava.mātreṇa pāṭayet |
AHS4.11.052c/ aśma.mānena na yathā bhidyate sā tathāharet || 52 ||
AHS4.11.053a/ samagraṁ sarpa.vaktreṇa strīṇāṁ vastis tu pārśva.gaḥ |
AHS4.11.053c/ garbhāśayāśrayas tāsāṁ śastram utsaṅga.vat tataḥ || 53 ||
AHS4.11.054a/ nyased ato 'nya.thā hy āsāṁ mūtra.srāvī vraṇo bhavet |
AHS4.11.054c/ mūtra.praseka.kṣaṇanān narasyāpy api caika.dhā || 54 ||
[Page 428 ]
AHS4.11.055a/ vasti.bhedo 'śmarī.hetuḥ siddhiṁ yāti na tu dvi.dhā |
AHS4.11.055c/ vi.śalyam uṣṇa.pānīya.droṇyāṁ tam avagāhayet || 55 ||
AHS4.11.056a/ tathā na pūryate 'sreṇa vastiḥ pūrṇe tu pīḍayet |
AHS4.11.056c/ meḍhrāntaḥ kṣīri.vṛkṣāmbu mūtra.saṁśuddhaye tataḥ || 56 || [Note: AHS4.11.056v/ 11.56cv meḍhrataḥ kṣīri.vṛkṣāmbu 11.56cv meḍhre 'ntaḥ kṣīri.vṛkṣāmbu]
AHS4.11.057a/ kuryād guḍasya sauhityaṁ madhv.ājyākta.vraṇaḥ pibet |
AHS4.11.057c/ dvau kālau sa.ghṛtāṁ koṣṇāṁ yavāgūṁ mūtra.śodhanaiḥ || 57 ||
AHS4.11.058a/ try.ahaṁ daśāhaṁ payasā guḍāḍhyenālpam odanam |
AHS4.11.058c/ bhuñjītordhvaṁ phalāmlaiś ca rasair jāṅgala.cāriṇām || 58 ||
AHS4.11.059a/ kṣīri.vṛkṣa.kaṣāyeṇa vraṇaṁ prakṣālya lepayet |
AHS4.11.059c/ prapauṇḍarīka.mañjiṣṭhā.yaṣṭy.āhva.nayanauṣadhaiḥ || 59 ||
AHS4.11.060a/ vraṇābhyaṅge pacet tailam ebhir eva niśānvitaiḥ |
AHS4.11.060c/ daśāhaṁ svedayec cainaṁ sva.mārgaṁ sapta.rātrataḥ || 60 || [Note: AHS4.11.060v/ 11.60cv daśāhaṁ svedayec caiva 11.60cv daśāhaṁ svedayec caivaṁ]
AHS4.11.061a/ mūtre tv a.gacchati dahed aśmarī.vraṇam agninā |
AHS4.11.061c/ sva.mārga.pratipattau tu svādu.prāyair upācaret || 61 ||
AHS4.11.062a/ taṁ vastibhir na cārohed varṣaṁ rūḍha.vraṇo 'pi saḥ |
AHS4.11.062c/ naga.nāgāśva.vṛkṣa.strī.rathān nāpsu plaveta ca || 62 ||
AHS4.11.063a/ mūtra.śukra.vahau vasti.vṛṣaṇau sevanīṁ gudam |
AHS4.11.063c/ mūtra.prasekaṁ yoniṁ ca śastreṇāṣṭau vivarjayet || 63 ||

4.12. Chapter 12 :: Athapramehacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 387-390]
AHS4.12.001a/ mehino balinaḥ kuryād ādau vamana.recane |
AHS4.12.001c/ snigdhasya sarṣapāriṣṭa.nikumbhākṣa.karañja.jaiḥ || 1 ||
[Page 429 ]
AHS4.12.002a/ tailas trikaṇṭakādyena yathā.svaṁ sādhitena vā |
AHS4.12.002c/ snehena musta.devāhva.nāgara.prativāpa.vat || 2 ||
AHS4.12.003a/ surasādi.kaṣāyeṇa dadyād āsthāpanaṁ tataḥ |
AHS4.12.003c/ nyagrodhādes tu pittārtaṁ rasaiḥ śuddhaṁ ca tarpayet || 3 || [Note: AHS4.12.003v/ 12.3cv nyagrodhādes tu pittārte]
AHS4.12.004a/ mūtra.graha.rujā.gulma.kṣayādyās tv apatarpaṇāt |
AHS4.12.004c/ tato 'nubandha.rakṣārthaṁ śamanāni prayojayet || 4 ||
AHS4.12.005a/ a.saṁśodhyasya tāny eva sarva.meheṣu pāyayet |
AHS4.12.005c/ dhātrī.rasa.plutāṁ prāhṇe haridrāṁ mākṣikānvitām || 5 ||
AHS4.12.006a/ dārvī.surāhva.tri.phalā.mustā vā kvathitā jale |
AHS4.12.006c/ citraka.tri.phalā.dārvī.kaliṅgān vā sa.mākṣikān || 6 ||
AHS4.12.007a/ madhu.yuktaṁ guḍūcyā vā rasam āmalakasya vā || 7ab ||
AHS4.12.007c/ lodhrābhayā.toyada.kaṭphalānāṁ pāṭhā.viḍaṅgārjuna.dhanvanānām || 7cd ||
AHS4.12.007e/ gāyatri.dārvī.kṛmihṛd.dhavānāṁ kaphe trayaḥ kṣaudra.yutāḥ kaṣāyāḥ || 7ef ||
AHS4.12.008a/ uśīra.lodhrārjuna.candanānāṁ paṭola.nimbāmalakāmṛtānām |
AHS4.12.008c/ lodhrāmbu.kālīyaka.dhātakīnāṁ pitte trayaḥ kṣaudra.yutāḥ kaṣāyāḥ || 8 ||
AHS4.12.009ab/ yathā.svam ebhiḥ pānānnaṁ yava.godhūma.bhāvanāḥ || 9ab || [Note: AHS4.12.009v/ 12.9bv yava.godhūma.bhāvanām 12.9bv yava.godhūma.bhāvanam]
AHS4.12.010a/ vātolbaṇeṣu snehāṁś ca prameheṣu prakalpayet |
AHS4.12.010c/ apūpa.saktu.vāṭyādir yavānāṁ vikṛtir hitā || 10 ||
AHS4.12.011a/ gajāśva.guda.muktānām atha.vā veṇu.janmanām |
AHS4.12.011c/ tṛṇa.dhānyāni mudgādyāḥ śālir jīrṇaḥ sa.ṣaṣṭikaḥ || 11 ||
[Page 430 ]
AHS4.12.012a/ śrī.kukkuṭo 'mlaḥ khalakas tila.sarṣapa.kiṭṭa.jaḥ |
AHS4.12.012c/ kapitthaṁ tindukaṁ jambūs tat.kṛtā rāga.ṣāḍavāḥ || 12 ||
AHS4.12.013a/ tiktaṁ śākaṁ madhu śreṣṭhā bhakṣyāḥ śuṣkāḥ sa.saktavaḥ |
AHS4.12.013c/ dhanva.māṁsāni śūlyāni pariśuṣkāṇy ayas.kṛtiḥ || 13 ||
AHS4.12.014a/ madhv.ariṣṭāsavā jīrṇāḥ sīdhuḥ pakva.rasodbhavaḥ |
AHS4.12.014c/ tathāsanādi.sārāmbu darbhāmbho mākṣikodakam || 14 ||
AHS4.12.015a/ vāsiteṣu varā.kvāthe śarvarīṁ śoṣiteṣv ahaḥ |
AHS4.12.015c/ yaveṣu su.kṛtān saktūn sa.kṣaudrān sīdhunā pibet || 15 ||
AHS4.12.016a/ śāla.saptāhva.kampilla.vṛkṣakākṣa.kapittha.jam |
AHS4.12.016c/ rohītakaṁ ca kusumaṁ madhunādyāt su.cūrṇitam || 16 ||
AHS4.12.017a/ kapha.pitta.prameheṣu pibed dhātrī.rasena vā |
AHS4.12.017c/ trikaṇṭaka.niśā.lodhra.somavalka.vacārjunaiḥ || 17 ||
AHS4.12.018a/ padmakāśmantakāriṣṭa.candanāguru.dīpyakaiḥ |
AHS4.12.018c/ paṭola.musta.mañjiṣṭhā.mādrī.bhallātakaiḥ pacet || 18 ||
AHS4.12.019a/ tailaṁ vāta.kaphe pitte ghṛtaṁ miśreṣu miśrakam |
AHS4.12.019c/ daśa.mūla.śaṭhī.dantī.surāhvaṁ dvi.punarnavam || 19 ||
AHS4.12.020a/ mūlaṁ snug.arkayoḥ pathyāṁ bhūkadambam aruṣkaram |
AHS4.12.020c/ karañjau varuṇān mūlaṁ pippalyāḥ pauṣkaraṁ ca yat || 20 || [Note: AHS4.12.020v/ 12.20cv karañja.varuṇān mūlaṁ]
AHS4.12.021a/ pṛthag daśa.palaṁ prasthān yava.kola.kulatthataḥ |
AHS4.12.021c/ trīṁś cāṣṭa.guṇite toye vipacet pāda.vartinā || 21 ||
[Page 431 ]
AHS4.12.022a/ tena dvi.pippalī.cavya.vacā.nicula.rohiṣaiḥ |
AHS4.12.022c/ trivṛd.viḍaṅga.kampilla.bhārgī.viśvaiś ca sādhayet || 22 || [Note: AHS4.12.022v/ 12.22dv .bhārgī.bilvaiś ca sādhayet]
AHS4.12.023a/ prasthaṁ ghṛtāj jayet sarvāṁs tan mehān piṭikā viṣam |
AHS4.12.023c/ pāṇḍu.vidradhi.gulmārśaḥ.śoṣa.śopha.garodaram || 23 ||
AHS4.12.024a/ śvāsaṁ kāsaṁ vamiṁ vṛddhiṁ plīhānaṁ vāta.śoṇitam |
AHS4.12.024c/ kuṣṭhonmādāv apasmāraṁ dhānvantaram idaṁ ghṛtam || 24 ||
AHS4.12.025a/ lodhra.mūrvā.śaṭhī.vella.bhārgī.nata.nakha.plavān |
AHS4.12.025c/ kaliṅga.kuṣṭha.kramuka.priyaṅgv.ativiṣāgnikān || 25 ||
AHS4.12.026a/ dve viśāle catur.jātaṁ bhūnimbaṁ kaṭu.rohiṇīm |
AHS4.12.026c/ yavānīṁ pauṣkaraṁ pāṭhāṁ granthiṁ cavyaṁ phala.trayam || 26 ||
AHS4.12.027a/ karṣāṁśam ambu.kalaśe pāda.śeṣe srute hime |
AHS4.12.027c/ dvau prasthau mākṣikāt kṣiptvā rakṣet pakṣam upekṣayā || 27 ||
AHS4.12.028a/ lodhrāsavo 'yaṁ mehārśaḥ.śvitra.kuṣṭhā.ruci.kṛmīn |
AHS4.12.028c/ pāṇḍu.tvaṁ grahaṇī.doṣaṁ sthūla.tāṁ ca niyacchati || 28 ||
AHS4.12.029a/ sādhayed asanādīnāṁ palānāṁ viṁśatiṁ pṛthak |
AHS4.12.029c/ dvi.vahe 'pāṁ kṣipet tatra pāda.sthe dve śate guḍāt || 29 ||
AHS4.12.030a/ kṣaudrāḍhakārdhaṁ palikaṁ vatsakādiṁ ca kalkitam |
AHS4.12.030c/ tat kṣaudra.pippalī.cūrṇa.pradigdhe ghṛta.bhājane || 30 || [Note: AHS4.12.030v/ 12.30bv vatsakādi ca kalkitam]
AHS4.12.031a/ sthitaṁ dṛḍhe jatu.sṛte yava.rāśau nidhāpayet |
AHS4.12.031c/ khadirāṅgāra.taptāni bahu.śo 'tra nimajjayet || 31 ||
[Page 432 ]
AHS4.12.032a/ tanūni tīkṣṇa.lohasya pattrāṇy ā.loha.saṅkṣayāt |
AHS4.12.032c/ ayas.kṛtiḥ sthitā pītā pūrvasmād adhikā guṇaiḥ || 32 ||
AHS4.12.033a/ rūkṣam udvartanaṁ gāḍhaṁ vyāyāmo niśi jāgaraḥ |
AHS4.12.033c/ yac cānyac chleṣma.medo.ghnaṁ bahir antaś ca tad dhitam || 33 ||
AHS4.12.034a/ su.bhāvitāṁ sāra.jalais tulāṁ pītvā śilodbhavāt |
AHS4.12.034c/ sārāmbunaiva bhuñjānaḥ śālīñ jāṅgala.jai rasaiḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS4.12.034v/ 12.34dv śāliṁ jāṅgala.jai rasaiḥ]
AHS4.12.035a/ sarvān abhibhaven mehān su.bahūpadravān api |
AHS4.12.035c/ gaṇḍa.mālārbuda.granthi.sthaulya.kuṣṭha.bhagandarān || 35 ||
AHS4.12.036a/ kṛmi.ślīpada.śophāṁś ca paraṁ caitad rasāyanam |
AHS4.12.036c/ a.dhanaś chattra.pāda.tra.rahito muni.vartanaḥ || 36 ||
AHS4.12.036.1+1a/ candanam utpalaṁ drākṣā uśīraṁ ca punarnavā |
AHS4.12.036.1+1c/ yaṣṭīmadhuka.śrīkhaṇḍaṁ tri.phalotpala.śārivā || 36.1+1 ||
AHS4.12.036.1+2a/ śamī vaṁśa.phalaṁ lodhraṁ tri.jātaṁ nāgakesaram |
AHS4.12.036.1+2c/ padmakaṁ ca kaṇā.cūrṇaṁ tat.tulyā śarkarā śubhā || 36.1+2 ||
AHS4.12.036.1+3a/ etac cūrṇaṁ pibet prātas taṇḍulodaka.vāriṇā |
AHS4.12.036.1+3c/ pramehe rakta.pitte ca kṛcchra.doṣe ca dāruṇe || 36.1+3 ||
AHS4.12.037a/ yojanānāṁ śataṁ yāyāt khaned vā salilāśayān |
AHS4.12.037c/ go.śakṛn.mūtra.vṛttir vā gobhir eva saha bhramet || 37 ||
AHS4.12.038a/ bṛṁhayed auṣadhāhārair a.medo.mūtralaiḥ kṛśam |
AHS4.12.038c/ śarāvikādyāḥ piṭikāḥ śopha.vat samupācaret || 38 ||
[Page 433 ]
AHS4.12.039a/ a.pakvā vraṇa.vat pakvās tāsāṁ prāg.rūpam eva ca |
AHS4.12.039c/ kṣīri.vṛkṣāmbu pānāya basta.mūtraṁ ca śasyate || 39 ||
AHS4.12.040a/ tīkṣṇaṁ ca śodhanaṁ prāyo dur.virecyā hi mehinaḥ |
AHS4.12.040c/ tailam elādinā kuryād gaṇena vraṇa.ropaṇam || 40 ||
AHS4.12.041a/ udvartane kaṣāyaṁ tu vargeṇāragvadhādinā |
AHS4.12.041c/ pariṣeko 'sanādyena pānānne vatsakādinā || 41 || [Note: AHS4.12.041v/ 12.41cv pariṣeke 'sanādyena]
AHS4.12.042a/ pāṭhā.citraka.śārṅgaṣṭā.śārivā.kaṇṭakārikāḥ |
AHS4.12.042c/ saptāhvaṁ kauṭajaṁ mūlaṁ somavalkaṁ nṛpadrumam || 42 ||
AHS4.12.043a/ sañcūrṇya madhunā lihyāt tad.vac cūrṇaṁ navāyasam |
AHS4.12.043c/ madhu.mehi.tvam āpanno bhiṣagbhiḥ parivarjitaḥ || 43 ||
AHS4.12.043ū̆ab/ śilā.jatu.tulām adyāt pramehārtaḥ punar.navaḥ || 43ū̆ab ||

4.13. Chapter 13 :: Atha vidradhivṛddhicikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 390-393]
AHS4.13.001a/ vidradhiṁ sarvam evāmaṁ śopha.vat samupācaret |
AHS4.13.001c/ pratataṁ ca hared raktaṁ pakve tu vraṇa.vat kriyā || 1 ||
AHS4.13.002a/ pañca.mūla.jalair dhautaṁ vātikaṁ lavaṇottaraiḥ |
AHS4.13.002c/ bhadrādi.varga.yaṣṭy.āhva.tilair ālepayed vraṇam || 2 ||
AHS4.13.003a/ vairecanika.yuktena traivṛtena viśodhya ca |
AHS4.13.003c/ vidārī.varga.siddhena traivṛtenaiva ropayet || 3 ||
AHS4.13.004a/ kṣālitaṁ kṣīri.toyena limped yaṣṭy.amṛtā.tilaiḥ |
AHS4.13.004c/ paittaṁ ghṛtena siddhena mañjiṣṭhośīra.padmakaiḥ || 4 ||
[Page 434 ]
AHS4.13.005a/ payasyā.dvi.niśā.śreṣṭhā.yaṣṭī.dugdhaiś ca ropayet |
AHS4.13.005c/ nyagrodhādi.pravāla.tvak.phalair vā kapha.jaṁ punaḥ || 5 ||
AHS4.13.006a/ āragvadhādinā dhautaṁ saktu.kumbha.niśā.tilaiḥ |
AHS4.13.006c/ limpet kulatthikā.dantī .trivṛc.chyāmāgni.tilvakaiḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS4.13.006v/ 13.6av āragvadhāmbunā dhautaṁ]
AHS4.13.007a/ sa.saindhavaiḥ sa.go.mūtrais tailaṁ kurvīta ropaṇam |
AHS4.13.007c/ raktāgantūdbhave kāryā pitta.vidradhi.vat kriyā || 7 ||
AHS4.13.008a/ varuṇādi.gaṇa.kvātham a.pakve 'bhyantarotthite |
AHS4.13.008c/ ūṣakādi.pratīvāpaṁ pūrvāhṇe vidradhau pibet || 8 || [Note: AHS4.13.008v/ 13.8bv a.pakve 'bhyantara.sthite]
AHS4.13.009a/ ghṛtaṁ virecana.dravyaiḥ siddhaṁ tābhyāṁ ca pāyayet |
AHS4.13.009c/ nirūhaṁ sneha.vastiṁ ca tābhyām eva prakalpayet || 9 ||
AHS4.13.010a/ pāna.bhojana.lepeṣu madhu.śigruḥ prayojitaḥ |
AHS4.13.010c/ dattāvāpo yathā.doṣam a.pakvaṁ hanti vidradhim || 10 ||
AHS4.13.011a/ trāyantī.tri.phalā.nimba.kaṭukā.madhukaṁ samam |
AHS4.13.011c/ trivṛt.paṭola.mūlābhyāṁ catvāro 'ṁśāḥ pṛthak pṛthak || 11 ||
AHS4.13.012a/ masūrān nis.tuṣād aṣṭau tat.kvāthaḥ sa.ghṛto jayet |
AHS4.13.012c/ vidradhi.gulma.vīsarpa.dāha.moha.mada.jvarān || 12 ||
AHS4.13.013a/ tṛṇ.mūrchā.chardi.hṛd.roga.pittāsṛk.kuṣṭha.kāmalāḥ |
AHS4.13.013c/ kuḍavaṁ trāyamāṇāyāḥ sādhyam aṣṭa.guṇe 'mbhasi || 13 ||
AHS4.13.014a/ kuḍavaṁ tad.rasād dhātrī.sva.rasāt kṣīrato ghṛtāt |
AHS4.13.014c/ karṣāṁśaṁ kalkitaṁ tiktā.trāyantī.dhanvayāsakam || 14 ||
[Page 435 ]
AHS4.13.015a/ mustā.tāmalakī.vīrā.jīvantī.candanotpalam |
AHS4.13.015c/ paced eka.tra saṁyojya tad ghṛtaṁ pūrva.vad guṇaiḥ || 15 ||
AHS4.13.016a/ drākṣā madhūkaṁ kharjūraṁ vidārī sa.śatāvarī |
AHS4.13.016c/ parūṣakāṇi tri.phalā tat.kvāthe pācayed ghṛtam || 16 ||
AHS4.13.017a/ kṣīrekṣu.dhātrī.niryāsa.prāṇadā.kalka.saṁyutam |
AHS4.13.017c/ tac chītaṁ śarkarā.kṣaudra.pādikaṁ pūrva.vad guṇaiḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS4.13.017v/ 13.17av kṣīrekṣu.dhātrī.niryāse 13.17bv prāṇadā.kalka.saṁyutam]
AHS4.13.018a/ harec chṛṅgādibhir asṛk sirayā vā yathāntikam |
AHS4.13.018c/ vidradhiṁ pacyamānaṁ ca koṣṭha.sthaṁ bahir.unnatam || 18 ||
AHS4.13.019a/ jñātvopanāhayet śūle sthite tatraiva piṇḍite |
AHS4.13.019c/ tat.pārśva.pīḍanāt suptau dāhādiṣv alpakeṣu ca || 19 ||
AHS4.13.020a/ pakvaḥ syād vidradhiṁ bhittvā vraṇa.vat tam upācaret |
AHS4.13.020c/ antar.bhāgasya cāpy etac cihnaṁ pakvasya vidradeḥ || 20 ||
AHS4.13.021a/ pakvaḥ srotāṁsi sampūrya sa yāty ūrdhvam adho 'tha.vā |
AHS4.13.021c/ svayam.pravṛttaṁ taṁ doṣam upekṣeta hitāśinaḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS4.13.021v/ 13.21bv sa yāty ūrdhvam adho 'pi vā]
AHS4.13.022a/ daśāhaṁ dvā.daśāhaṁ vā rakṣan bhiṣag upadravāt |
AHS4.13.022c/ a.samyag vahati klede varuṇādiṁ sukhāmbhasā || 22 || [Note: AHS4.13.022v/ 13.22bv rakṣed bhiṣag upadravāt]
AHS4.13.023a/ pāyayen madhu.śigruṁ vā yavāgūṁ tena vā kṛtām |
AHS4.13.023c/ yava.kola.kulatthottha.yūṣair annaṁ ca śasyate || 23 ||
AHS4.13.024a/ ūrdhvaṁ daśāhāt trāyantī.sarpiṣā tailvakena vā |
AHS4.13.024c/ śodhayed balataḥ śuddhaḥ sa.kṣaudraṁ tiktakaṁ pibet || 24 ||
[Page 436 ]
AHS4.13.025a/ sarva.śo gulma.vac cainaṁ yathā.doṣam upācaret |
AHS4.13.025c/ sarvāvasthāsu sarvāsu gugguluṁ vidradhīṣu ca || 25 || [Note: AHS4.13.025v/ 13.25cv sarvāvasthāsu sarveṣu]
AHS4.13.026a/ kaṣāyair yaugikair yuñjyāt svaiḥ svais tad.vac chilā.jatu |
AHS4.13.026c/ pākaṁ ca vārayed yatnāt siddhiḥ pakve hi daivikī || 26 ||
AHS4.13.027a/ api cāśu vidāhi.tvād vidradhiḥ so 'bhidhīyate |
AHS4.13.027c/ sati cālocayen mehe pramehāṇāṁ cikitsitam || 27 ||
AHS4.13.027+1a/ śaubhāñjanaka.niryūho hiṅgu.saindhava.saṁyutaḥ |
AHS4.13.027+1c/ a.cirād vidradhiṁ hanti prātaḥ prātar niṣevitaḥ || 27+1 ||
AHS4.13.027+2a/ kaṭu.trikaṁ tiktaka.rohiṇī ghanaṁ kirātatikto 'tha śatakrator yavāḥ |
AHS4.13.027+2c/ sa.saptaparṇātiviṣā durālabhā paṭola.mūlaṁ saha trāyamāṇayā || 27+2 ||
AHS4.13.027+3a/ guḍūcī.cavyaṁ sa.viḍaṅga.nimbaṁ priyaṅgu.nīlotpala.lodhram añjanam |
AHS4.13.027+3c/ sa.dhātakī.moca.rasaṁ phala.trikaṁ sa.nāgaraṁ bilva.kapittha.śārivāḥ || 27+3 ||
AHS4.13.027+4a/ samāḥ syur ete dvi.guṇaṁ tu citrakaṁ dvir aṣṭa.bhāgaṁ kuṭaja.tvacaṁ syāt |
AHS4.13.027+4c/ su.sūkṣma.piṣṭaṁ śiśirāmbu.yojitaṁ piben manuṣyo 'rdha.palaṁ guḍānvitam || 27+4 ||
AHS4.13.027+5a/ bubhukṣite syān mṛdu bhojanaṁ hitaṁ śaśaiḥ sa.lāvair atha.vā 'pi tittiraiḥ |
AHS4.13.027+5c/ nihanti gulmān kapha.pitta.sambhavān virājate śārada.pūrṇa.candra.vat || 27+5 ||
AHS4.13.027+6a/ a.jīrṇa.kāsaṁ kṣaya.pāṇḍu.te tathā jvarātisāra.grahaṇī.gadāpacīḥ |
AHS4.13.027+6c/ prameha.mūtra.kṣaya.vardhma.vidradhīñ jayet prayuktaḥ sa.guḍaḥ kaṭu.trikaḥ || 27+6 ||
AHS4.13.027+7a/ bhūnimbārdha.palaṁ niśā.pala.yuktaṁ dārvī.pale dve tathā || 27+7a ||
AHS4.13.027+7b/ dārvy.ardhena punarnavāṁ kuru tathā dārvyā samaḥ pragrahaḥ || 27+7b ||
AHS4.13.027+7c/ sārdhaṁ duḥsparśataḥ palaṁ tu kaṭukā yojyā tad.ardhena vā || 27+7c ||
AHS4.13.027+7d/ aśvāhvaṁ niśayā samānam amṛtā.pādādhikaṁ syāt palam || 27+7d ||
[Page 437 ]
AHS4.13.027+8a/ etad vatsaka.sapta.karṣa.sahitaṁ su.ślakṣṇa.cūrṇī.kṛtaṁ || 27+8a ||
AHS4.13.027+8b/ vāsāyāḥ sva.rasena pañca caturas trīn vā pibed vāsarān || 27+8b ||
AHS4.13.027+8c/ bhūyas tad guḍa.vāriṇā prati.dinaṁ peyaṁ puraḥ.sthe ravau || 27+8c ||
AHS4.13.027+8d/ etad vidradhi.rogiṇāṁ ni.ruja.kṛc cūrṇaṁ tu guhyottamam || 27+8d ||
AHS4.13.027+9a/ nā.putrāya na cā.bhrātre nā.śiṣyāyā.hitaiṣiṇe |
AHS4.13.027+9c/ ārogya.śāstra.sarva.svaṁ deyam etat kathañ.ca.na || 27+9 ||
AHS4.13.028a/ stana.je vraṇa.vat sarvaṁ na tv enam upanāhayet |
AHS4.13.028c/ pāṭayet pālayan stanya.vāhinīḥ kṛṣṇa.cūcukau || 28 ||
AHS4.13.029a/ sarvāsv āmādy.avasthāsu nirduhīta ca tat stanam |
AHS4.13.029c/ śodhayet tri.vṛtā snigdhaṁ vṛddhau snehaiś calātmake || 29 ||
AHS4.13.030a/ kauśāmra.tilvakairaṇḍa.su.kumāraka.miśrakaiḥ |
AHS4.13.030c/ tato 'nila.ghna.niryūha.kalka.snehair nirūhayet || 30 ||
AHS4.13.031a/ rasena bhojitaṁ yaṣṭī.tailenānvāsayed anu |
AHS4.13.031c/ sveda.pralepā vāta.ghnāḥ pakve bhittvā vraṇa.kriyām || 31 ||
AHS4.13.032a/ pitta.raktodbhave vṛddhāv āma.pakve yathā.yatham |
AHS4.13.032c/ śopha.vraṇa.kriyāṁ kuryāt pratataṁ ca hared asṛk || 32 ||
AHS4.13.033a/ go.mūtreṇa pibet kalkaṁ ślaiṣmike pītadāru.jam |
AHS4.13.033c/ vimlāpanād ṛte cāsya śleṣma.granthi.kramo hitaḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS4.13.033v/ 13.33cv vimlāpanād ṛte cātra]
AHS4.13.034a/ pakve ca pāṭite tailam iṣyate vraṇa.śodhanam |
AHS4.13.034c/ sumano.'ruṣkarāṅkolla.saptaparṇeṣu sādhitam || 34 ||
AHS4.13.035a/ paṭola.nimba.rajanī.viḍaṅga.kuṭajeṣu ca |
AHS4.13.035c/ medo.jaṁ mūtra.piṣṭena su.svinnaṁ surasādinā || 35 ||
[Page 438 ]
AHS4.13.036a/ śiro.vireka.dravyair vā varjayan phala.sevanīm |
AHS4.13.036c/ dārayed vṛddhi.pattreṇa samyaṅ medasi sūddhṛte || 36 || [Note: AHS4.13.036v/ 13.36dv samyaṅ medasi coddhṛte]
AHS4.13.037a/ vraṇaṁ mākṣika.kāsīsa.saindhava.pratisāritam |
AHS4.13.037c/ sīvyed abhyañjanaṁ cāsya yojyaṁ medo.viśuddhaye || 37 ||
AHS4.13.038a/ manaḥśilailā.sumano.granthi.bhallātakaiḥ kṛtam |
AHS4.13.038c/ tailam ā.vraṇa.sandhānāt sneha.svedau ca śīlayet || 38 ||
AHS4.13.039a/ mūtra.jaṁ sveditaṁ snigdhair vastra.paṭṭena veṣṭitam |
AHS4.13.039c/ vidhyed adhas.tāt sevanyāḥ srāvayec ca yathodaram || 39 ||
AHS4.13.040a/ vraṇaṁ ca sthagikā.baddhaṁ ropayed antra.hetuke |
AHS4.13.040c/ phala.kośam a.samprāpte cikitsā vāta.vṛddhi.vat || 40 ||
AHS4.13.041a/ pacet punarnava.tulāṁ tathā daśa.palāḥ pṛthak |
AHS4.13.041c/ daśa.mūla.payasyāśvagandhairaṇḍa.śatāvarīḥ || 41 ||
AHS4.13.042a/ dvi.darbha.śara.kāśekṣu.mūla.poṭagalānvitāḥ |
AHS4.13.042c/ vahe 'pām aṣṭa.bhāga.sthe tatra triṁśat.palaṁ guḍāt || 42 ||
AHS4.13.043a/ prastham eraṇḍa.tailasya dvau ghṛtāt payasas tathā |
AHS4.13.043c/ āvaped dvi.palāṁśaṁ ca kṛṣṇā.tan.mūla.saindhavam || 43 ||
AHS4.13.044a/ yaṣṭīmadhuka.mṛdvīkā.yavānī.nāgarāṇi ca |
AHS4.13.044c/ tat.siddhaṁ su.kumārākhyaṁ su.kumāraṁ rasāyanam || 44 ||
AHS4.13.045a/ vātātapādhva.yānādi.parihāryeṣv a.yantraṇam |
AHS4.13.045c/ prayojyaṁ su.kumārāṇām īśvarāṇām sukhātmanām || 45 ||
[Page 439 ]
AHS4.13.046a/ nṛṇāṁ strī.vṛnda.bhartṝṇām a.lakṣmī.kali.nāśanam |
AHS4.13.046c/ sarva.kālopayogena kānti.lāvaṇya.puṣṭi.dam || 46 ||
AHS4.13.047a/ vardhma.vidradhi.gulmārśo.yoni.meḍhrānilārtiṣu |
AHS4.13.047c/ śophodara.khuḍa.plīha.viḍ.vibandheṣu cottamam || 47 ||
AHS4.13.047+1a/ rāsnā.yaṣṭy.amṛtairaṇḍa.balā.gokṣura.sādhitaḥ |
AHS4.13.047+1c/ kvātho 'ntra.vṛddhiṁ hanty āśu rubu.tailena miśritaḥ || 47+1 ||
AHS4.13.048a/ yāyād vardhma na cec chāntiṁ sneha.rekānuvāsanaiḥ |
AHS4.13.048c/ vasti.karma puraḥ kṛtvā vaṅkṣaṇa.sthaṁ tato dahet || 48 ||
AHS4.13.049a/ agninā mārga.rodhārthaṁ maruto 'rdhendu.vakrayā |
AHS4.13.049c/ aṅguṣṭhasyopari snāva pītaṁ tantu.samaṁ ca yat || 49 ||
AHS4.13.050a/ utkṣipya sūcyā tat tiryag dahec chittvā yato gadaḥ |
AHS4.13.050c/ tato 'nya.pārśve 'nye tv āhur dahed vānāmikāṅguleḥ || 50 ||
AHS4.13.051a/ gulme 'nyair vāta.kapha.je plīhni cāyaṁ vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
AHS4.13.051c/ kaniṣṭhikānāmikayor viśvācyāṁ ca yato gadaḥ || 51 ||
AHS4.13.051+1a/ mūlaṁ bilva.kapitthayoḥ aralukasyāgner bṛhatyor dvayoḥ || 51+1a ||
AHS4.13.051+1b/ śyāmā.pūti.karañja.śigruka.taror viśvauṣadhāruṣkaram || 51+1b ||
AHS4.13.051+1c/ kṛṣṇā.granthika.vella.pañca.lavaṇa.kṣārājamodānvitaṁ || 51+1c ||
AHS4.13.051+1d/ pītaṁ kāñjika.toya.....mathitaiś cūrṇī.kṛtaṁ vardhma.jit || 51+1d ||
AHS4.13.051+2a/ ajājī.kuṣṭha.gomeda.hapuṣā.badarāṇi ca |
AHS4.13.051+2c/ āranālena lepaḥ syād vardhma.jit param auṣadham || 51+2 ||
AHS4.13.051+3a/ avi.kṣīreṇa godhūma.cūrṇaṁ kandurukasya ca |
AHS4.13.051+3c/ pralepanaṁ sukhoṣṇaṁ syād vardhma.jit param auṣadham || 51+3 ||
[Page 440 ]
AHS4.13.051+4a/ mṛta.mātre tu vai kāke viśastena pralepayet |
AHS4.13.051+4c/ muhūrtaṁ vardhma medhāvī tat.kṣaṇād a.rujo bhavet || 51+4 ||

4.14. Chapter 14 :: Atha gulmacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 393-399]
AHS4.14.001a/ gulmaṁ baddha.śakṛd.vātaṁ vātikaṁ tīvra.vedanam |
AHS4.14.001c/ rūkṣa.śītodbhavaṁ tailaiḥ sādhayed vāta.rogikaiḥ || 1 ||
AHS4.14.002a/ pānānnānvāsanābhyaṅgaiḥ snigdhasya svedam ācaret |
AHS4.14.002c/ ānāha.vedanā.stambha.vibandheṣu viśeṣataḥ || 2 ||
AHS4.14.003a/ srotasāṁ mārdavaṁ kṛtvā jitvā mārutam ulbaṇam |
AHS4.14.003c/ bhittvā vibandhaṁ snigdhasya svedo gulmam apohati || 3 ||
AHS4.14.004a/ sneha.pānaṁ hitaṁ gulme viśeṣeṇordhva.nābhi.je |
AHS4.14.004c/ pakvāśaya.gate vastir ubhayaṁ jaṭharāśraye || 4 ||
AHS4.14.005a/ dīpte 'gnau vātike gulme vibandhe 'nila.varcasoḥ |
AHS4.14.005c/ bṛṁhaṇāny anna.pānāni snigdhoṣṇāni pradāpayet || 5 ||
AHS4.14.006a/ punaḥ punaḥ sneha.pānaṁ nirūhāḥ sānuvāsanāḥ |
AHS4.14.006c/ prayojyā vāta.je gulme kapha.pittānurakṣiṇaḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS4.14.006v/ 14.6dv kapha.pittānurakṣiṇā]
AHS4.14.007a/ vasti.karma paraṁ vidyād gulma.ghnaṁ tad dhi mārutam |
AHS4.14.007c/ sva.sthāne prathamaṁ jitvā sadyo gulmam apohati || 7 ||
AHS4.14.008a/ tasmād abhīkṣṇa.śo gulmā nirūhaiḥ sānuvāsanaiḥ |
AHS4.14.008c/ prayujyamānaiḥ śāmyanti vāta.pitta.kaphātmakāḥ || 8 ||
AHS4.14.009a/ hiṅgu.sauvarcala.vyoṣa.viḍa.dāḍima.dīpyakaiḥ |
AHS4.14.009c/ puṣkarājājī.dhānyāmla.vetasa.kṣāra.citrakaiḥ || 9 ||
[Page 441 ]
AHS4.14.010a/ śaṭhī.vacājagandhailā.surasair dadhi.saṁyutaiḥ |
AHS4.14.010c/ śūlānāha.haraṁ sarpiḥ sādhayed vāta.gulminām || 10 ||
AHS4.14.011a/ hapuṣoṣaṇa.pṛthvīkā.pañca.kolaka.dīpyakaiḥ |
AHS4.14.011c/ sājājī.saindhavair dadhnā dugdhena ca rasena ca || 11 ||
AHS4.14.012a/ dāḍimān mūlakāt kolāt pacet sarpir nihanti tat |
AHS4.14.012c/ vāta.gulmodarānāha.pārśva.hṛt.koṣṭha.vedanāḥ || 12 ||
AHS4.14.013a/ yony.arśo.grahaṇī.doṣa.kāsa.śvāsā.ruci.jvarān |
AHS4.14.013c/ daśa.mūlaṁ balāṁ kālāṁ suṣavīṁ dvau punarnavau || 13 || [Note: AHS4.14.013v/ 14.13cv daśa.mūlaṁ balāṁ kālīṁ]
AHS4.14.014a/ pauṣkarairaṇḍa.rāsnāśvagandhā.bhārgy.amṛtā.śaṭhīḥ |
AHS4.14.014c/ paced gandha.palāśaṁ ca droṇe 'pāṁ dvi.palonmitam || 14 ||
AHS4.14.015a/ yavaiḥ kolaiḥ kulatthaiś ca māṣaiś ca prāsthikaiḥ saha |
AHS4.14.015c/ kvāthe 'smin dadhi.pātre ca ghṛta.prasthaṁ vipācayet || 15 ||
AHS4.14.016a/ sva.rasair dāḍimāmrāta.mātuluṅgodbhavair yutam |
AHS4.14.016c/ tathā tuṣāmbu.dhānyāmla.śuktaiḥ ślakṣṇaiś ca kalkitaiḥ || 16 ||
AHS4.14.017a/ bhārgī.tumburu.ṣaḍgranthā.granthi.rāsnāgni.dhānyakaiḥ |
AHS4.14.017c/ yavānaka.yavāny.amla.vetasāsita.jīrakaiḥ || 17 ||
AHS4.14.018a/ ajājī.hiṅgu.hapuṣā.kāravī.vṛṣakoṣakaiḥ |
AHS4.14.018c/ nikumbha.kumbha.mūrvebha.pippalī.vella.dāḍimaiḥ || 18 ||
AHS4.14.019a/ śvadaṁṣṭrā.trapusairvāru.bīja.hiṁsrāśmabhedakaiḥ |
AHS4.14.019c/ miśi.dvi.kṣāra.surasa.śārivā.nīlinī.phalaiḥ || 19 ||
[Page 442 ]
AHS4.14.020a/ tri.kaṭu.tri.paṭūpetair dādhikaṁ tad vyapohati |
AHS4.14.020c/ rogān āśu.tarān pūrvān kaṣṭān api ca śīlitam || 20 ||
AHS4.14.021a/ apasmāra.gadonmāda.mūtrāghātānilāmayān |
AHS4.14.021c/ try.ūṣaṇa.tri.phalā.dhānya.cavikā.vella.citrakaiḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS4.14.021v/ 14.21av apasmāra.garonmāda.]
AHS4.14.022a/ kalkī.kṛtair ghṛtaṁ pakvaṁ sa.kṣīraṁ vāta.gulma.nut |
AHS4.14.022c/ tulāṁ laśuna.kandānāṁ pṛthak pañca.palāṁśakam || 22 ||
AHS4.14.023a/ pañca.mūlaṁ mahac cāmbu.bhārārdhe tad vipācayet |
AHS4.14.023c/ pāda.śeṣaṁ tad.ardhena dāḍima.sva.rasaṁ surām || 23 ||
AHS4.14.024a/ dhānyāmlaṁ dadhi cādāya piṣṭāṁś cārdha.palāṁśakān |
AHS4.14.024c/ try.ūṣaṇa.tri.phalā.hiṅgu.yavānī.cavya.dīpyakān || 24 ||
AHS4.14.025a/ sāmla.vetasa.sindhūttha.devadārūn paced ghṛtāt |
AHS4.14.025c/ taiḥ prasthaṁ tat paraṁ sarva.vāta.gulma.vikāra.jit || 25 || [Note: AHS4.14.025v/ 14.25av sāmla.vetasa.sindhūtthaṁ 14.25bv devadāru paced ghṛtāt]
AHS4.14.026a/ ṣaṭ.palaṁ vā pibet sarpir yad uktaṁ rāja.yakṣmaṇi |
AHS4.14.026c/ prasannayā vā kṣīrārthaḥ surayā dāḍimena vā || 26 ||
AHS4.14.027a/ ghṛte māruta.gulma.ghnaḥ kāryo dadhnaḥ sareṇa vā |
AHS4.14.027c/ vāta.gulme kapho vṛddho hatvāgnim a.ruciṁ yadi || 27 ||
AHS4.14.028a/ hṛl.lāsaṁ gauravaṁ tandrāṁ janayed ullikhet tu tam |
AHS4.14.028c/ śūlānāha.vibandheṣu jñātvā sa.sneham āśayam || 28 ||
AHS4.14.029a/ niryūha.cūrṇa.vaṭakāḥ prayojyā ghṛta.bheṣajaiḥ |
AHS4.14.029c/ kola.dāḍima.gharmāmbu.takra.madyāmla.kāñjikaih || 29 ||
[Page 443 ]
AHS4.14.030a/ maṇḍena vā pibet prātaś cūrṇāny annasya vā puraḥ |
AHS4.14.030c/ cūrṇāni mātuluṅgasya bhāvitāny a.sakṛd rase || 30 ||
AHS4.14.031a/ kurvīta kārmuka.tarān vaṭakān kapha.vātayoḥ || 31ab ||
AHS4.14.031c/ hiṅgu.vacā.vijayā.paśugandhā.dāḍima.dīpyaka.dhānyaka.pāṭhāḥ || 31cd ||
AHS4.14.031e/ puṣkara.mūla.śaṭhī.hapuṣāgni.kṣāra.yuga.tri.paṭu.tri.kaṭūni || 31ef ||
AHS4.14.032a/ sājāji.cavyaṁ saha.tintiḍīkaṁ sa.vetasāmlaṁ vinihanti cūrṇaṁ |
AHS4.14.032c/ hṛt.pārśva.vasti.trika.yoni.pāyu.śūlāni vāyv.āma.kaphodbhavāni || 32 ||
AHS4.14.033a/ kṛcchrān gulmān vāta.viṇ.mūtra.saṅgaṁ kaṇṭhe bandhaṁ hṛd.grahaṁ pāṇḍu.rogam |
AHS4.14.033c/ annā.śraddhā.plīha.dur.nāma.hidhmā.vardhmādhmāna.śvāsa.kāsāgni.sādān || 33 ||
AHS4.14.034a/ lavaṇa.yavānī.dīpyaka.kaṇa.nāgaram uttarottaraṁ vṛddham |
AHS4.14.034c/ sarva.samāṁśa.harītakī. cūrṇaṁ vaiśvānaraḥ sākṣāt || 34 || [Note: AHS4.14.034v/ 14.34cv sarva.samāṁśaṁ harītakī. 14.34cv sarva.samāṁśā vijayā. 14.34dv cūrṇo vaiśvānaraḥ sākṣāt]
AHS4.14.035a/ tri.kaṭukam ajamodā saindhavaṁ jīrake dve || 35a ||
AHS4.14.035b/ sama.dharaṇa.ghṛtānām aṣṭamo hiṅgu.bhāgaḥ || 35b ||
AHS4.14.035c/ prathama.kavaḍa.bhojyaḥ sarpiṣā samprayukto || 35c ||
AHS4.14.035d/ janayati jaṭharāgniṁ vāta.gulmaṁ nihanti || 35d || [Note: AHS4.14.035v/ 14.35cv prathama.kavaḍa.bhojyaḥ sarpiṣā cūrṇako 'yaṁ 14.35dv janayati bhṛśam agniṁ vāta.gulmaṁ nihanti]
AHS4.14.036a/ hiṅgūgrā.viḍa.śuṇṭhy.ajāji.vijayā.vāṭyābhidhānāmayaiś || 36a ||
AHS4.14.036b/ cūrṇaḥ kumbha.nikumbha.mūla.sahitair bhāgottaraṁ vardhitaiḥ || 36b ||
AHS4.14.036c/ pītaḥ koṣṇa.jalena koṣṭha.ja.rujo gulmodarādīn ayaṁ || 36c ||
AHS4.14.036d/ śārdūlaḥ prasabhaṁ pramathya harati vyādhīn mṛgaughān iva || 36d ||
AHS4.14.037a/ sindhūttha.pathyā.kaṇa.dīpyakānāṁ || 37a ||
AHS4.14.037b/ cūrṇāni toyaiḥ pibatāṁ kavoṣṇaiḥ || 37b ||
AHS4.14.037c/ prayāti nāśaṁ kapha.vāta.janmā || 37c ||
AHS4.14.037d/ nārāca.nirbhinna ivāmayaughaḥ || 37d ||
AHS4.14.038a/ pūtīka.pattra.gaja.cirbhaṭa.cavya.vahni. || 38a ||
AHS4.14.038b/ .vyoṣaṁ ca saṁstara.citaṁ lavaṇopadhānam || 38b ||
AHS4.14.038c/ dagdhvā vicūrṇya dadhi.mastu.yutaṁ prayojyaṁ || 38c ||
AHS4.14.038d/ gulmodara.śvayathu.pāṇḍu.gudodbhaveṣu || 38d || [Note: AHS4.14.038v/ 14.38dv gulmodara.śvayathu.pāṇḍu.gadodbhaveṣu]
AHS4.14.039ab/ hiṅgu.tri.guṇaṁ saindhavam asmāt tri.guṇaṁ ca tailam airaṇḍam || 39ab ||
[Page 444 ]
AHS4.14.040a/ tat tri.guṇa.laśuna.rasaṁ gulmodara.vardhma.śūla.ghnam |
AHS4.14.040c/ mātuluṅga.raso hiṅgu dāḍimaṁ viḍa.saindhavam || 40 ||
AHS4.14.041a/ surā.maṇḍena pātavyaṁ vāta.gulma.rujāpaham |
AHS4.14.041c/ śuṇṭhyāḥ karṣaṁ guḍasya dvau dhautāt kṛṣṇa.tilāt palam || 41 || [Note: AHS4.14.041v/ 14.41bv vāta.gulma.jvarāpaham]
AHS4.14.042a/ khādann eka.tra sañcūrṇya koṣṇa.kṣīrānupo jayet |
AHS4.14.042c/ vāta.hṛd.roga.gulmārśo.yoni.śūla.śakṛd.grahān || 42 ||
AHS4.14.043a/ pibed eraṇḍa.tailaṁ tu vāta.gulmī prasannayā |
AHS4.14.043c/ śleṣmaṇy anu.bale vāyau pitte tu payasā saha || 43 ||
AHS4.14.044a/ vivṛddhaṁ yadi vā pittaṁ santāpaṁ vāta.gulminaḥ |
AHS4.14.044c/ kuryād virecanīyo 'sau sa.snehair ānulomikaiḥ || 44 ||
AHS4.14.045a/ tāpānuvṛttāv evaṁ ca raktaṁ tasyāvasecayet |
AHS4.14.045c/ sādhayec chuddha.śuṣkasya laśunasya catuḥ.palam || 45 ||
AHS4.14.046a/ kṣīrodake 'ṣṭa.guṇite kṣīra.śeṣaṁ ca pācayet |
AHS4.14.046c/ vāta.gulmam udāvartaṁ gṛdhrasīṁ viṣama.jvaram || 46 ||
AHS4.14.047a/ hṛd.rogaṁ vidradhiṁ śoṣaṁ sādhayaty āśu tat payaḥ |
AHS4.14.047c/ tailaṁ prasannā go.mūtram āranālaṁ yavāgra.jaḥ || 47 || [Note: AHS4.14.047v/ 14.47bv nāśayaty āśu tat payaḥ]
AHS4.14.048a/ gulmaṁ jaṭharam ānāhaṁ pītam eka.tra sādhayet |
AHS4.14.048c/ citraka.granthikairaṇḍa.śuṇṭhī.kvāthaḥ paraṁ hitaḥ || 48 ||
AHS4.14.049a/ śūlānāha.vibandheṣu sa.hiṅgu.viḍa.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS4.14.049c/ puṣkarairaṇḍayor mūlaṁ yava.dhanvayavāsakam || 49 ||
[Page 445 ]
AHS4.14.050a/ jalena kvathitaṁ pītaṁ koṣṭha.dāha.rujāpaham |
AHS4.14.050c/ vāṭyāhvairaṇḍa.darbhāṇāṁ mūlaṁ dāru mahauṣadham || 50 ||
AHS4.14.051a/ pītaṁ niḥkvāthya toyena koṣṭha.pṛṣṭhāṁsa.śūla.jit |
AHS4.14.051c/ śilā.jaṁ payasān.alpa.pañca.mūla.śṛtena vā || 51 || [Note: AHS4.14.051v/ 14.51bv koṣṭha.pṛṣṭy.aṁsa.śūla.jit]
AHS4.14.052a/ vāta.gulmī pibed vāṭyam udāvarte tu bhojayet |
AHS4.14.052c/ snigdhaṁ paippalikair yūṣair mūlakānāṁ rasena vā || 52 ||
AHS4.14.053a/ baddha.viṇ.māruto 'śnīyāt kṣīreṇoṣṇena yāvakam |
AHS4.14.053c/ kulmāṣān vā bahu.snehān bhakṣayel lavaṇottarān || 53 ||
AHS4.14.054a/ nīlinī.trivṛtā.dantī.pathyā.kampillakaiḥ saha |
AHS4.14.054c/ sa.malāya ghṛtaṁ deyaṁ sa.viḍa.kṣāra.nāgaram || 54 ||
AHS4.14.055a/ nīlinīṁ tri.phalāṁ rāsnāṁ balāṁ kaṭuka.rohiṇīm |
AHS4.14.055c/ paced viḍaṅgaṁ vyāghrīṁ ca pālikāni jalāḍhake || 55 ||
AHS4.14.056a/ rase 'ṣṭa.bhāga.śeṣe tu ghṛta.prasthaṁ vipācayet |
AHS4.14.056c/ dadhnaḥ prasthena saṁyojya sudhā.kṣīra.palena ca || 56 ||
AHS4.14.057a/ tato ghṛta.palaṁ dadyād yavāgū.maṇḍa.miśritam |
AHS4.14.057c/ jīrṇe samyag.viriktaṁ ca bhojayed rasa.bhojanam || 57 ||
AHS4.14.058a/ gulma.kuṣṭhodara.vyaṅga.śopha.pāṇḍv.āmaya.jvarān |
AHS4.14.058c/ śvitraṁ plīhānam unmādaṁ hanty etan nīlinī.ghṛtam || 58 ||
AHS4.14.059a/ kukkuṭāś ca mayūrāś ca tittiri.krauñca.vartakāḥ |
AHS4.14.059c/ śālayo madirā sarpir vāta.gulma.cikitsitam || 59 ||
[Page 446 ]
AHS4.14.060a/ mitam uṣṇaṁ dravaṁ snigdhaṁ bhojanaṁ vāta.gulminām |
AHS4.14.060c/ sa.maṇḍā vāruṇī pānaṁ taptaṁ vā dhānyakair jalam || 60 ||
AHS4.14.061a/ snigdhoṣṇenodite gulme paittike sraṁsanaṁ hitam |
AHS4.14.061c/ drākṣābhayā.guḍa.rasaṁ kampillaṁ vā madhu.drutam || 61 || [Note: AHS4.14.061v/ 14.61dv kampillaṁ vā madhu.dravam]
AHS4.14.062a/ kalpoktaṁ rakta.pittoktaṁ gulme rūkṣoṣṇa.je punaḥ |
AHS4.14.062c/ paraṁ saṁśamanaṁ sarpis tiktaṁ vāsā.ghṛtaṁ śṛtam || 62 ||
AHS4.14.063a/ tṛṇākhya.pañcaka.kvāthe jīvanīya.gaṇena vā |
AHS4.14.063c/ śṛtaṁ tenaiva vā kṣīraṁ nyagrodhādi.gaṇena vā || 63 ||
AHS4.14.064a/ tatrāpi sraṁsanaṁ yuñjyāc chīghram ātyayike bhiṣak |
AHS4.14.064c/ vairecanika.siddhena sarpiṣā payasāpi vā || 64 ||
AHS4.14.065a/ rasenāmalakekṣūṇāṁ ghṛta.prasthaṁ vipācayet |
AHS4.14.065c/ pathyā.pādaṁ pibet sarpis tat siddhaṁ pitta.gulma.nut || 65 ||
AHS4.14.066a/ pibed vā tailvakaṁ sarpir yac coktaṁ pitta.vidradhau |
AHS4.14.066c/ drākṣāṁ payasyāṁ madhukaṁ candanaṁ padmakaṁ madhu || 66 ||
AHS4.14.067a/ pibet taṇḍula.toyena pitta.gulmopaśāntaye |
AHS4.14.067c/ dvi.palaṁ trāyamāṇāyā jala.dvi.prastha.sādhitam || 67 ||
AHS4.14.068a/ aṣṭa.bhāga.sthitaṁ pūtaṁ koṣṇaṁ kṣīra.samam pibet |
AHS4.14.068c/ pibed upari tasyoṣṇaṁ kṣīram eva yathā.balam || 68 ||
AHS4.14.069a/ tena nirhṛta.doṣasya gulmaḥ śāmyati paittikaḥ |
AHS4.14.069c/ dāhe 'bhyaṅgo ghṛtaiḥ śītaiḥ sājyair lepo himauṣadhaiḥ || 69 ||
[Page 447 ]
AHS4.14.070a/ sparśaḥ saro.ruhāṁ pattraiḥ pātraiś ca pracalaj.jalaiḥ |
AHS4.14.070c/ vidāha.pūrva.rūpeṣu śūle vahneś ca mārdave || 70 ||
AHS4.14.071a/ bahu.śo 'pahared raktaṁ pitta.gulme viśeṣataḥ |
AHS4.14.071c/ chinna.mūlā vidahyante na gulmā yānti ca kṣayam || 71 ||
AHS4.14.072a/ raktaṁ hi vy.amla.tāṁ yāti tac ca nāsti na cāsti ruk |
AHS4.14.072c/ hṛta.doṣaṁ parimlānaṁ jāṅgalais tarpitaṁ rasaiḥ || 72 ||
AHS4.14.073a/ samāśvastaṁ sa.śeṣārtiṁ sarpir abhyāsayet punaḥ |
AHS4.14.073c/ rakta.pittāti.vṛddha.tvāt kriyām an.upalabhya vā || 73 ||
AHS4.14.074a/ gulme pākon.mukhe sarvā pitta.vidradhi.vat kriyā |
AHS4.14.074c/ śālir gavyāja.payasī paṭolī jāṅgalaṁ ghṛtam || 74 ||
AHS4.14.075a/ dhātrī parūṣakaṁ drākṣā kharjūraṁ dāḍimaṁ sitā |
AHS4.14.075c/ bhojyaṁ pāne 'mbu balayā bṛhaty.ādyaiś ca sādhitam || 75 ||
AHS4.14.076a/ śleṣma.je vāmayet pūrvam a.vamyam upavāsayet |
AHS4.14.076c/ tiktoṣṇa.kaṭu.saṁsargyā vahniṁ sandhukṣayet tataḥ || 76 || [Note: AHS4.14.076v/ 14.76av kapha.je vāmayet pūrvam]
AHS4.14.077a/ hiṅgv.ādibhiś ca dvi.guṇa.kṣāra.hiṅgv.amla.vetasaiḥ |
AHS4.14.077c/ nigūḍhaṁ yadi vonnaddhaṁ stimitaṁ kaṭhinaṁ sthiram || 77 ||
AHS4.14.078a/ ānāhādi.yutaṁ gulmaṁ saṁsvedya vinayed anu |
AHS4.14.078c/ ghṛtaṁ sa.kṣāra.kaṭukaṁ pātavyaṁ kapha.gulminām || 78 || [Note: AHS4.14.078v/ 14.78bv saṁśodhya vinayed anu]
AHS4.14.079a/ sa.vyoṣa.kṣāra.lavaṇaṁ sa.hiṅgu.viḍa.dāḍimam |
AHS4.14.079c/ kapha.gulmaṁ jayaty āśu daśa.mūla.śṛtaṁ ghṛtam || 79 ||
[Page 448 ]
AHS4.14.080a/ bhallātakānāṁ dvi.palaṁ pañca.mūlaṁ palonmitam |
AHS4.14.080c/ alpaṁ toyāḍhake sādhyaṁ pāda.śeṣeṇa tena ca || 80 ||
AHS4.14.081a/ tulyaṁ ghṛtaṁ tulya.payo vipaced akṣa.sammitaiḥ |
AHS4.14.081c/ viḍaṅga.hiṅgu.sindhūttha.yāva.śūka.śaṭhī.viḍaiḥ || 81 ||
AHS4.14.082a/ sa.dvīpi.rāsnā.yaṣṭy.āhva.ṣaḍgranthā.kaṇa.nāgaraiḥ |
AHS4.14.082c/ etad bhallātaka.ghṛtaṁ kapha.gulma.haraṁ param || 82 ||
AHS4.14.083a/ plīha.pāṇḍv.āmaya.śvāsa.grahaṇī.roga.kāsa.jit |
AHS4.14.083c/ tato 'sya gulme dehe ca samaste svedam ācaret || 83 || [Note: AHS4.14.083v/ 14.83bv .grahaṇī.roga.kāsa.nut]
AHS4.14.084a/ sarva.tra gulme prathamaṁ sneha.svedopapādite |
AHS4.14.084c/ yā kriyā kriyate yāti sā siddhiṁ na virūkṣite || 84 ||
AHS4.14.085a/ snigdha.svinna.śarīrasya gulme śaithilyam āgate |
