AHS4.14.085c/ yathoktāṁ ghaṭikāṁ nyasyed gṛhīte 'panayec ca tām || 85 ||
AHS4.14.086a/ vastrāntaraṁ tataḥ kṛtvā bhindyād gulmaṁ pramāṇa.vit |
AHS4.14.086c/ vi.mārgāja.padādarśair yathā.lābhaṁ prapīḍayet || 86 ||
AHS4.14.087a/ pramṛjyād gulmam evaikaṁ na tv antra.hṛdayaṁ spṛśet |
AHS4.14.087c/ tilairaṇḍātasī.bīja.sarṣapaiḥ parilipya ca || 87 || [Note: AHS4.14.087v/ 14.87dv .sarṣapaiḥ parilipya vā]
AHS4.14.088a/ śleṣma.gulmam ayaḥ.pātraiḥ sukhoṣṇaiḥ svedayet tataḥ |
AHS4.14.088c/ evaṁ ca visṛtaṁ sthānāt kapha.gulmaṁ virecanaiḥ || 88 ||
AHS4.14.089a/ sa.snehair vastibhiś cainaṁ śodhayed dāśamūlikaiḥ |
AHS4.14.089c/ pippaly.āmalaka.drākṣā.śyāmādyaiḥ pālikaiḥ pacet || 89 ||
[Page 449 ]
AHS4.14.090a/ eraṇḍa.taila.haviṣoḥ prasthau payasi ṣaḍ.guṇe |
AHS4.14.090c/ siddho 'yaṁ miśrakaḥ sneho gulmināṁ sraṁsanaṁ hitam || 90 ||
AHS4.14.091a/ vṛddhi.vidradhi.śūleṣu vāta.vyādhiṣu cāmṛtam |
AHS4.14.091c/ pibed vā nīlinī.sarpir mātrayā dvi.palīnayā || 91 || [Note: AHS4.14.091v/ 14.91dv mātrayā dvi.palīkayā]
AHS4.14.092a/ tathaiva su.kumārākhyaṁ ghṛtāny audarikāṇi vā |
AHS4.14.092c/ droṇe 'mbhasaḥ paced dantyāḥ palānāṁ pañca.viṁśatim || 92 ||
AHS4.14.093a/ citrakasya tathā pathyās tāvatīs tad.rase srute |
AHS4.14.093c/ dvi.prasthe sādhayet pūte kṣiped dantī.samaṁ guḍam || 93 || [Note: AHS4.14.093v/ 14.93bv tāvatīs tad.rase śṛte]
AHS4.14.094a/ tailāt palāni catvāri trivṛtāyaś ca cūrṇataḥ |
AHS4.14.094c/ kaṇā.karṣau tathā śuṇṭhyāḥ siddhe lehe tu śītale || 94 ||
AHS4.14.095a/ madhu taila.samaṁ dadyāc catur.jātāc caturthikām |
AHS4.14.095c/ ato harītakīm ekāṁ sāvaleha.palām adan || 95 ||
AHS4.14.096a/ sukhaṁ viricyate snigdho doṣa.prastham an.āmayaḥ |
AHS4.14.096c/ gulma.hṛd.roga.dur.nāma.śophānāha.garodarān || 96 ||
AHS4.14.097a/ kuṣṭhotkleśā.ruci.plīha.grahaṇī.viṣama.jvarān |
AHS4.14.097c/ ghnanti dantī.harītakyaḥ pāṇḍu.tāṁ ca sa.kāmalām || 97 || [Note: AHS4.14.097v/ 14.97dv pāṇḍu.tāṁ ca sa.kāmalān]
AHS4.14.098a/ sudhā.kṣīra.dravaṁ cūrṇaṁ tri.vṛtāyāḥ su.bhāvitam |
AHS4.14.098c/ kārṣikaṁ madhu.sarpirbhyāṁ līḍhvā sādhu viricyate || 98 ||
AHS4.14.099a/ kuṣṭha.śyāmā.trivṛd.dantī.vijayā.kṣāra.guggulūn |
AHS4.14.099c/ go.mūtreṇa pibed ekaṁ tena guggulum eva vā || 99 ||
[Page 450 ]
AHS4.14.100a/ nirūhān kalpa.siddhy.uktān yojayed gulma.nāśanān |
AHS4.14.100c/ kṛta.mūlaṁ mahā.vāstuṁ kaṭhinaṁ stimitaṁ gurum || 100 ||
AHS4.14.101a/ gūḍha.māṁsaṁ jayed gulmaṁ kṣārāriṣṭāgni.karmabhiḥ |
AHS4.14.101c/ ekāntaram dvy.antaraṁ vā viśramayyātha.vā try.aham || 101 ||
AHS4.14.102a/ śarīra.doṣa.balayor vardhana.kṣapaṇodyataḥ |
AHS4.14.102c/ arśo.'śmarī.grahaṇy.uktāḥ kṣārā yojyāḥ kapholbaṇe || 102 ||
AHS4.14.103a/ devadāru.trivṛd.dantī.kaṭukā.pañca.kolakam |
AHS4.14.103c/ svarjikā.yāva.śūkākhyau śreṣṭhā.pāṭhopakuñcikāḥ || 103 ||
AHS4.14.104a/ kuṣṭhaṁ sarpasugandhāṁ ca dvy.akṣāṁśaṁ paṭu.pañcakam |
AHS4.14.104c/ pālikaṁ cūrṇitaṁ taila.vasā.dadhi.ghṛtāplutam || 104 ||
AHS4.14.105a/ ghaṭasyāntaḥ pacet pakvam agni.varṇe ghaṭe ca tam |
AHS4.14.105c/ kṣāraṁ gṛhītvā kṣīrājya.takra.madyādibhiḥ pibet || 105 ||
AHS4.14.106a/ gulmodāvarta.vardhmārśo.jaṭhara.grahaṇī.kṛmīn |
AHS4.14.106c/ apasmāra.garonmāda.yoni.śukrāmayāśmarīḥ || 106 ||
AHS4.14.107a/ kṣārā.gado 'yaṁ śamayed viṣaṁ cākhu.bhujaṅga.jam |
AHS4.14.107c/ śleṣmāṇaṁ madhuraṁ snigdhaṁ rasa.kṣīra.ghṛtāśinaḥ || 107 ||
AHS4.14.108a/ chittvā bhittvāśayāt kṣāraḥ kṣāra.tvāt kṣārayaty adhaḥ |
AHS4.14.108c/ mande 'gnāv a.rucau sātmyair madyaiḥ sa.sneham aśnatām || 108 || [Note: AHS4.14.108v/ 14.108av chittvā chittvāśayāt kṣāraḥ 14.108av chittvā bhittvāśayaṁ kṣāraḥ 14.108bv kṣāra.tvāt pātayaty adhaḥ]
AHS4.14.109a/ yojayed āsavāriṣṭān nigadān mārga.śuddhaye |
AHS4.14.109c/ śālayaḥ ṣaṣṭikā jīrṇāḥ kulatthā jāṅgalaṁ palam || 109 ||
[Page 451 ]
AHS4.14.110a/ ciribilvāgni.tarkārī.yavānī.varuṇāṅkurāḥ |
AHS4.14.110c/ śigrus taruṇa.bilvāni bālaṁ śuṣkaṁ ca mūlakam || 110 || [Note: AHS4.14.110v/ 14.110cv śigros taruṇa.mūlāni]
AHS4.14.111a/ bījapūraka.hiṅgv.amla.vetasa.kṣāra.dāḍimam |
AHS4.14.111c/ vyoṣaṁ takraṁ ghṛtaṁ tailaṁ bhaktaṁ pānaṁ tu vāruṇī || 111 ||
AHS4.14.112a/ dhānyāmlaṁ mastu takraṁ ca yavānī.viḍa.cūrṇitam |
AHS4.14.112c/ pañca.mūla.śṛtaṁ vāri jīrṇaṁ mārdvīkam eva vā || 112 ||
AHS4.14.113a/ pippalī.pippalī.mūla.citrakājājī.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS4.14.113c/ surā gulmaṁ jayaty āśu jagalaś ca vimiśritaḥ || 113 || [Note: AHS4.14.113v/ 14.113dv jāṅgalaś ca vimiśritaḥ]
AHS4.14.114a/ vamanair laṅghanaiḥ svedaiḥ sarpiḥ.pānair virecanaiḥ |
AHS4.14.114c/ vasti.kṣārāsavāriṣṭa.guṭikā.pathya.bhojanaiḥ || 114 || [Note: AHS4.14.114v/ 14.114cv vasti.kṣārāsavāriṣṭair 14.114dv .gulmikā.pathya.bhojanaiḥ 14.114dv gaulmikaiḥ pathya.bhojanaiḥ]
AHS4.14.115a/ ślaiṣmiko baddha.mūla.tvād yadi gulmo na śāmyati |
AHS4.14.115c/ tasya dāhaṁ hṛte rakte kuryād ante śarādibhiḥ || 115 ||
AHS4.14.116a/ atha gulmaṁ sa.pary.antaṁ vāsasāntaritaṁ bhiṣak |
AHS4.14.116c/ nābhi.vasty.antra.hṛdayaṁ roma.rājīṁ ca varjayan || 116 ||
AHS4.14.117a/ nāti.gāḍhaṁ parimṛśec chareṇa jvalatātha.vā |
AHS4.14.117c/ lohenāraṇikotthena dāruṇā taindukena vā || 117 ||
AHS4.14.118a/ tato 'gni.vege śamite śītair vraṇa iva kriyā |
AHS4.14.118c/ āmānvaye tu peyādyaiḥ sandhukṣyāgniṁ vilaṅghite || 118 ||
AHS4.14.119a/ svaṁ svaṁ kuryāt kramaṁ miśraṁ miśra.doṣe ca kāla.vit |
AHS4.14.119c/ gata.prasava.kālāyai nāryai gulme 'sra.sambhave || 119 ||
[Page 452 ]
AHS4.14.120a/ snigdha.svinna.śarīrāyai dadyāt sneha.virecanam |
AHS4.14.120c/ tila.kvāthe ghṛta.guḍa.vyoṣa.bhārgī.rajo.'nvitaḥ || 120 ||
AHS4.14.121a/ pānaṁ rakta.bhave gulme naṣṭe puṣpe ca yoṣitaḥ |
AHS4.14.121c/ bhārgī.kṛṣṇā.karañja.tvag.granthikāmaradāru.jam || 121 ||
AHS4.14.122a/ cūrṇaṁ tilānāṁ kvāthena pītaṁ gulma.rujāpaham |
AHS4.14.122c/ palāśa.kṣāra.pātre dve dve pātre taila.sarpiṣoḥ || 122 ||
AHS4.14.123a/ gulma.śaithilya.jananīṁ paktvā mātrāṁ prayojayet |
AHS4.14.123c/ na prabhidyeta yady evaṁ dadyād yoni.virecanam || 123 ||
AHS4.14.124a/ kṣāreṇa yuktaṁ palalaṁ sudhā.kṣīreṇa vā tataḥ |
AHS4.14.124c/ tābhyāṁ vā bhāvitān dadyād yonau kaṭuka.matsyakān || 124 ||
AHS4.14.125a/ varāha.matsya.pittābhyāṁ naktakān vā su.bhāvitān |
AHS4.14.125c/ kiṇvaṁ vā sa.guḍa.kṣāraṁ dadyād yonau viśuddhaye || 125 ||
AHS4.14.126a/ rakta.pitta.haraṁ kṣāraṁ lehayen madhu.sarpiṣā |
AHS4.14.126c/ laśunaṁ madirāṁ tīkṣṇāṁ matsyāṁś cāsyai prayojayet || 126 ||
AHS4.14.127a/ vastiṁ sa.kṣīra.go.mūtraṁ sa.kṣāraṁ dāśamūlikam |
AHS4.14.127c/ a.vartamāne rudhire hitaṁ gulma.prabhedanam || 127 || [Note: AHS4.14.127v/ 14.127av vastiṁ sa.kṣaudra.go.mutraṁ]
AHS4.14.128a/ yamakābhyakta.dehāyāḥ pravṛtte samupekṣaṇam |
AHS4.14.128c/ rasaudanas tathāhāraḥ pānaṁ ca taruṇī surā || 128 ||
AHS4.14.129a/ rudhire 'ti.pravṛtte tu rakta.pitta.harāḥ kriyāḥ |
AHS4.14.129c/ kāryā vāta.rug.ārtāyāḥ sarvā vāta.harāḥ punaḥ || 129 ||
[Page 453 ]
AHS4.14.129ū̆ab/ ānāhādāv udāvarta.balāsa.ghnyo yathā.yatham || 129ū̆ab ||

4.15. Chapter 15 :: Athodaracikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 399-406]
AHS4.15.001a/ doṣāti.mātropacayāt sroto.mārga.nirodhanāt |
AHS4.15.001c/ sambhavaty udaraṁ tasmān nityam enaṁ virecayet || 1 || [Note: AHS4.15.001v/ 15.1bv sroto.mārga.vighātanāt]
AHS4.15.002a/ pāyayet tailam airaṇḍaṁ sa.mūtraṁ sa.payo 'pi vā |
AHS4.15.002c/ māsaṁ dvau vātha.vā gavyaṁ mūtraṁ māhiṣam eva vā || 2 || [Note: AHS4.15.002v/ 15.2cv māsaṁ dvau vā tathā gavyaṁ]
AHS4.15.003a/ pibed go.kṣīra.bhuk syād vā karabhī.kṣīra.vartanaḥ |
AHS4.15.003c/ dāhānāhāti.tṛṇ.mūrchā.parītas tu viśeṣataḥ || 3 ||
AHS4.15.004a/ rūkṣāṇāṁ bahu.vātānāṁ doṣa.saṁśuddhi.kāṅkṣiṇām |
AHS4.15.004c/ snehanīyāni sarpīṁṣi jaṭhara.ghnāni yojayet || 4 ||
AHS4.15.005a/ ṣaṭ.palaṁ daśa.mūlāmbu.mastu.dvy.āḍhaka.sādhitam |
AHS4.15.005c/ nāgara.tri.palaṁ prasthaṁ ghṛta.tailāt tathāḍhakam || 5 || [Note: AHS4.15.005v/ 15.5cv nāgaraṁ tri.palaṁ prasthaṁ]
AHS4.15.006a/ mastunaḥ sādhayitvaitat pibet sarvodarāpaham |
AHS4.15.006c/ kapha.māruta.sambhūte gulme ca paramaṁ hitam || 6 ||
AHS4.15.007a/ catur.guṇe jale mūtre dvi.guṇe citrakāt pale |
AHS4.15.007c/ kalke siddhaṁ ghṛta.prasthaṁ sa.kṣāraṁ jaṭharī pibet || 7 ||
AHS4.15.008a/ yava.kola.kulatthānāṁ pañca.mūlasya cāmbhasā |
AHS4.15.008c/ surā.sauvīrakābhyāṁ ca siddhaṁ vā pāyayed ghṛtam || 8 ||
AHS4.15.009a/ ebhiḥ snigdhāya sañjāte bale śānte ca mārute |
AHS4.15.009c/ sraste doṣāśaye dadyāt kalpa.dṛṣṭaṁ virecanam || 9 ||
[Page 454 ]
AHS4.15.010a/ paṭola.mūlaṁ tri.phalāṁ niśāṁ vellaṁ ca kārṣikam |
AHS4.15.010c/ kampilla.nīlinī.kumbha.bhāgān dvi.tri.catur.guṇān || 10 ||
AHS4.15.011a/ pibet sañcūrṇya mūtreṇa peyā.pūrvaṁ tato rasaiḥ |
AHS4.15.011c/ virikto jāṅgalair adyāt tataḥ ṣaḍ.divasaṁ payaḥ || 11 ||
AHS4.15.012a/ śṛtaṁ pibed vyoṣa.yutaṁ pītam evaṁ punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS4.15.012c/ hanti sarvodarāṇy etac cūrṇaṁ jātodakāny api || 12 ||
AHS4.15.013a/ gavākṣīṁ śaṅkhinīṁ dantīṁ tilvakasya tvacaṁ vacām |
AHS4.15.013c/ pibet karkandhu.mṛdvīkā.kolāmbho.mūtra.sīdhubhiḥ || 13 ||
AHS4.15.014a/ yavānī hapuṣā dhānyaṁ śatapuṣpopakuñcikā |
AHS4.15.014c/ kāravī pippalī.mūlam ajagandhā śaṭhī vacā || 14 ||
AHS4.15.015a/ citrako 'jājikaṁ vyoṣaṁ svarṇakṣīrī phala.trayam |
AHS4.15.015c/ dvau kṣārau pauṣkaraṁ mūlaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ lavaṇa.pañcakam || 15 ||
AHS4.15.016a/ viḍaṅgaṁ ca samāṁśāni dantyā bhāga.trayaṁ tathā |
AHS4.15.016c/ trivṛd.viśāle dvi.guṇe sātalā ca catur.guṇā || 16 ||
AHS4.15.017a/ eṣa nārāyaṇo nāma cūrṇo roga.gaṇāpahaḥ |
AHS4.15.017c/ nainaṁ prāpyābhivardhante rogā viṣṇum ivāsurāḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS4.15.017v/ 15.17cv nainaṁ prāpyātivartante]
AHS4.15.018a/ takreṇodaribhiḥ peyo gulmibhir badarāmbunā |
AHS4.15.018c/ ānāha.vāte surayā vāta.roge prasannayā || 18 ||
AHS4.15.019a/ dadhi.maṇḍena viṭ.saṅge dāḍimāmbhobhir arśasaiḥ |
AHS4.15.019c/ parikarte sa.vṛkṣāmlair uṣṇāmbubhir a.jīrṇake || 19 ||
[Page 455 ]
AHS4.15.020a/ bhagandare pāṇḍu.roge kāse śvāse gala.grahe |
AHS4.15.020c/ hṛd.roge grahaṇī.doṣe kuṣṭhe mande 'nale jvare || 20 ||
AHS4.15.021a/ daṁṣṭrā.viṣe mūla.viṣe sa.gare kṛtrime doṣe |
AHS4.15.021c/ yathārhaṁ snigdha.koṣṭhena peyam etad virecanam || 21 ||
AHS4.15.022a/ hapuṣāṁ kāñcanakṣīrīṁ tri.phalāṁ nīlinī.phalam |
AHS4.15.022c/ trāyantīṁ rohiṇīṁ tiktāṁ sātalāṁ trivṛtāṁ vacām || 22 ||
AHS4.15.023a/ saindhavaṁ kāla.lavaṇaṁ pippalīṁ ceti cūrṇayet |
AHS4.15.023c/ dāḍima.tri.phalā.māṁsa.rasa.mūtra.sukhodakaiḥ || 23 ||
AHS4.15.024a/ peyo 'yaṁ sarva.gulmeṣu plīhni sarvodareṣu ca |
AHS4.15.024c/ śvitre kuṣṭheṣv a.jarake sadane viṣame 'nale || 24 ||
AHS4.15.025a/ śophārśaḥ.pāṇḍu.rogeṣu kāmalāyāṁ halīmake |
AHS4.15.025c/ vāta.pitta.kaphāṁś cāśu virekeṇa prasādhayet || 25 ||
AHS4.15.026a/ nīlinīṁ niculaṁ vyoṣaṁ kṣārau lavaṇa.pañcakam |
AHS4.15.026c/ citrakaṁ ca pibec cūrṇaṁ sarpiṣodara.gulma.nut || 26 ||
AHS4.15.027a/ pūrva.vac ca pibed dugdhaṁ kṣāmaḥ śuddho 'ntarāntarā |
AHS4.15.027c/ kārabhaṁ gavyam ājaṁ vā dadyād ātyayike gade || 27 ||
AHS4.15.028a/ snehān eva virekārthe dur.balebhyo viśeṣataḥ |
AHS4.15.028c/ harītakī.sūkṣma.rajaḥ.prastha.yuktaṁ ghṛtāḍhakam || 28 || [Note: AHS4.15.028v/ 15.28av sneham eva virekārthe]
AHS4.15.029a/ agnau vilāpya mathitaṁ khajena yava.pallake |
AHS4.15.029c/ nidhāpayet tato māsād uddhṛtaṁ gālitaṁ pacet || 29 ||
[Page 456 ]
AHS4.15.030a/ harītakīnāṁ kvāthena dadhnā cāmlena saṁyutam |
AHS4.15.030c/ udaraṁ garaṁ aṣṭhīlām ānāhaṁ gulma.vidradhī || 30 ||
AHS4.15.031a/ hanty etat kuṣṭham unmādam apasmāraṁ ca pānataḥ |
AHS4.15.031c/ snuk.kṣīra.yuktād go.kṣīrāc chṛta.śītāt khajāhatāt || 31 ||
AHS4.15.032a/ yaj jātam ājyaṁ snuk.kṣīra.siddhaṁ tac ca tathā.guṇam |
AHS4.15.032c/ kṣīra.droṇaṁ sudhā.kṣīra.prasthārdha.sahitaṁ dadhi || 32 || [Note: AHS4.15.032v/ 15.32dv .prasthārdhena yutaṁ dadhi]
AHS4.15.033a/ jātaṁ mathitvā tat.sarpis trivṛt.siddhaṁ ca tad.guṇam |
AHS4.15.033c/ tathā siddhaṁ ghṛta.prasthaṁ payasy aṣṭa.guṇe pibet || 33 || [Note: AHS4.15.033v/ 15.33dv payasy aṣṭa.guṇe pacet]
AHS4.15.034a/ snuk.kṣīra.pala.kalkena trivṛtā.ṣaṭ.palena ca |
AHS4.15.034c/ eṣāṁ cānu pibet peyāṁ rasaṁ svādu payo 'tha.vā || 34 ||
AHS4.15.035a/ ghṛte jīrṇe viriktaś ca koṣṇaṁ nāgara.sādhitam |
AHS4.15.035c/ pibed ambu tataḥ peyāṁ tato yūṣaṁ kulattha.jam || 35 ||
AHS4.15.036a/ pibed rūkṣas try.ahaṁ tv evaṁ bhūyo vā pratibhojitaḥ |
AHS4.15.036c/ punaḥ punaḥ pibet sarpir ānupūrvyānayaiva ca || 36 ||
AHS4.15.037a/ ghṛtāny etāni siddhāni vidadhyāt kuśalo bhiṣak |
AHS4.15.037c/ gulmānāṁ gara.doṣāṇām udarāṇāṁ ca śāntaye || 37 ||
AHS4.15.038a/ pīlu.kalkopasiddhaṁ vā ghṛtam ānāha.bhedanam |
AHS4.15.038c/ tailvakaṁ nīlinī.sarpiḥ snehaṁ vā miśrakaṁ pibet || 38 ||
AHS4.15.039a/ hṛta.doṣaḥ kramād aśnan laghu.śāly.odana.prati |
AHS4.15.039c/ upayuñjīta jaṭharī doṣa.śoṣa.nivṛttaye || 39 ||
[Page 457 ]
AHS4.15.040a/ harītakī.sahasraṁ vā go.mūtreṇa payo.'nupaḥ |
AHS4.15.040c/ sahasraṁ pippalīnāṁ vā snuk.kṣīreṇa su.bhāvitam || 40 ||
AHS4.15.041a/ pippalī.vardhamānaṁ vā kṣīrāśī vā śilā.jatu |
AHS4.15.041c/ tad.vad vā gugguluṁ kṣīraṁ tulyārdraka.rasaṁ tathā || 41 || [Note: AHS4.15.041v/ 15.41av pippalīṁ vardhamānaṁ vā]
AHS4.15.042a/ citrakāmaradārubhyāṁ kalkaṁ kṣīreṇa vā pibet |
AHS4.15.042c/ māsaṁ yuktas tathā hasti.pippalī.viśva.bheṣajam || 42 ||
AHS4.15.043a/ viḍaṅgaṁ citrako dantī cavyaṁ vyoṣaṁ ca taiḥ payaḥ |
AHS4.15.043c/ kalkaiḥ kola.samaiḥ pītvā pravṛddham udaraṁ jayet || 43 ||
AHS4.15.044a/ bhojyaṁ bhuñjīta vā māsaṁ snuhī.kṣīra.ghṛtānvitam |
AHS4.15.044c/ utkārikāṁ vā snuk.kṣīra.pīta.pathyā.kaṇā.kṛtām || 44 ||
AHS4.15.045a/ pārśva.śūlam upastambhaṁ hṛd.grahaṁ ca samīraṇaḥ |
AHS4.15.045c/ yadi kuryāt tatas tailaṁ bilva.kṣārānvitam pibet || 45 ||
AHS4.15.046a/ pakvaṁ vā ṭuṇṭuka.balā.palāśa.tila.nāla.jaiḥ |
AHS4.15.046c/ kṣāraiḥ kadaly.apāmārga.tarkārī.jaiḥ prṭhak.kṛtaiḥ || 46 ||
AHS4.15.047a/ kaphe vātena pitte vā tābhyāṁ vāpy āvṛte 'nile |
AHS4.15.047c/ balinaḥ svauṣadha.yutaṁ tailam eraṇḍa.jaṁ hitam || 47 ||
AHS4.15.048a/ devadāru.palāśārka.hasti.pippali.śigrukaiḥ |
AHS4.15.048c/ sāśvakarṇaiḥ sa.go.mūtraiḥ pradihyād udaraṁ bahiḥ || 48 ||
AHS4.15.049a/ vṛścikālī.vacā.śuṇṭhī.pañca.mūla.punarnavāt |
AHS4.15.049c/ varṣābhū.dhānya.kuṣṭhāc ca kvāthair mūtraiś ca secayet || 49 ||
[Page 458 ]
AHS4.15.050a/ virikta.mlānam udaraṁ sveditaṁ śālvaṇādibhiḥ |
AHS4.15.050c/ vāsasā veṣṭayed evaṁ vāyur nādhmāpayet punaḥ || 50 || [Note: AHS4.15.050v/ 15.50bv sveditaṁ śālvalādibhiḥ]
AHS4.15.051a/ su.viriktasya yasya syād ādhmānaṁ punar eva tam |
AHS4.15.051c/ su.snigdhair amla.lavaṇair nirūhaiḥ samupācaret || 51 ||
AHS4.15.052a/ sopastambho 'pi vā vāyur ādhmāpayati yaṁ naram |
AHS4.15.052c/ tīkṣṇāḥ sa.kṣāra.go.mūtrāḥ śasyante tasya vastayaḥ || 52 ||
AHS4.15.053a/ iti sāmānyataḥ proktāḥ siddhā jaṭhariṇāṁ kriyāḥ |
AHS4.15.053c/ vātodare 'tha balinaṁ vidāry.ādi.śṛtaṁ ghṛtam || 53 || [Note: AHS4.15.053v/ 15.53av iti sāmānyataḥ proktā 15.53bv siddhā jaṭhariṇāṁ kriyā]
AHS4.15.054a/ pāyayeta tataḥ snigdhaṁ sveditāṅgaṁ virecayet |
AHS4.15.054c/ bahu.śas tailvakenainaṁ sarpiṣā miśrakeṇa vā || 54 ||
AHS4.15.055a/ kṛte saṁsarjane kṣīraṁ balārtham avacārayet |
AHS4.15.055c/ prāg utkleśān nivartyaṁ ca bale labdhe kramāt payaḥ || 55 || [Note: AHS4.15.055v/ 15.55cv prāg utkleśān nivarteta]
AHS4.15.056a/ yūṣai rasair vā mandāmla.lavaṇair edhitānalam |
AHS4.15.056c/ sodāvartaṁ punaḥ snigdha.svinnam āsthāpayet tataḥ || 56 ||
AHS4.15.057a/ tīkṣṇādho.bhāga.yuktena daśa.mūlika.vastinā |
AHS4.15.057c/ tilorubūka.tailena vāta.ghnāmla.śṛtena ca || 57 || [Note: AHS4.15.057v/ 15.57bv daśa.mūlena vastinā]
AHS4.15.058a/ sphuraṇākṣepa.sandhy.asthi.pārśva.pṛṣṭha.trikārtiṣu |
AHS4.15.058c/ rūkṣaṁ baddha.śakṛd.vātaṁ dīptāgnim anuvāsayet || 58 ||
AHS4.15.059a/ a.virecyasya śamanā vasti.kṣīra.ghṛtādayaḥ |
AHS4.15.059c/ balinaṁ svādu.siddhena paitte saṁsnehya sarpiṣā || 59 ||
[Page 459 ]
AHS4.15.060a/ śyāmā.tribhaṇḍī.tri.phalā.vipakvena virecayet |
AHS4.15.060c/ sitā.madhu.ghṛtāḍhyena nirūho 'sya tato hitaḥ || 60 ||
AHS4.15.061a/ nyagrodhādi.kaṣāyeṇa sneha.vastiś ca tac.chṛtaḥ |
AHS4.15.061c/ dur.balaṁ tv anuvāsyādau śodhayet kṣīra.vastibhiḥ || 61 ||
AHS4.15.062a/ jāte cāgni.bale snigdhaṁ bhūyo bhūyo virecayet |
AHS4.15.062c/ kṣīreṇa sa.trivṛt.kalkenorubūka.śṛtena vā || 62 || [Note: AHS4.15.062v/ 15.62av jāte tv agni.bale snigdhaṁ 15.62dv nnorubūka.śṛtena tam]
AHS4.15.063a/ sātalā.trāyamāṇābhyāṁ śṛtenāragvadhena vā |
AHS4.15.063c/ sa.kaphe vā sa.mūtreṇa sa.tiktājyena sānile || 63 || [Note: AHS4.15.063v/ 15.63av saptalā.trāyamāṇābhyāṁ]
AHS4.15.064a/ payasānya.tamenaiṣāṁ vidāry.ādi.śṛtena vā |
AHS4.15.064c/ bhuñjīta jaṭharaṁ cāsya pāyasenopanāhayet || 64 ||
AHS4.15.065a/ punaḥ kṣīraṁ punar vastiṁ punar eva virecanam |
AHS4.15.065c/ krameṇa dhruvam ātiṣṭhan yattaḥ pittodaraṁ jayet || 65 || [Note: AHS4.15.065v/ 15.65dv yataḥ pittodaraṁ jayet]
AHS4.15.066a/ vatsakādi.vipakvena kaphe saṁsnehya sarpiṣā |
AHS4.15.066c/ svinnaṁ snuk.kṣīra.siddhena bala.vantaṁ virecitam || 66 ||
AHS4.15.067a/ saṁsarjayet kaṭu.kṣāra.yuktair annaiḥ kaphāpahaiḥ |
AHS4.15.067c/ mūtra.try.ūṣaṇa.tailāḍhyo nirūho 'sya tato hitaḥ || 67 ||
AHS4.15.068a/ muṣkakādi.kaṣāyeṇa sneha.vastiś ca tac.chṛtaḥ |
AHS4.15.068c/ bhojanaṁ vyoṣa.dugdhena kaulatthena rasena vā || 68 ||
AHS4.15.069a/ staimityā.ruci.hṛl.lāse mande 'gnau madya.pāya ca |
AHS4.15.069c/ dadyād ariṣṭān kṣārāṁś ca kapha.styāna.sthirodare || 69 || [Note: AHS4.15.069v/ 15.69av staimityā.ruci.hṛl.lāsair 15.69dv kaphe styāne sthirodare]
[Page 460 ]
AHS4.15.070a/ hiṅgūpakulye tri.phalāṁ devadāru niśā.dvayam |
AHS4.15.070c/ bhallātakaṁ śigru.phalaṁ kaṭukāṁ tiktakaṁ vacāṁ || 70 ||
AHS4.15.071a/ śuṇṭhīṁ mādrīṁ ghanaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ saralaṁ paṭu.pañcakam |
AHS4.15.071c/ dāhayej jarjarī.kṛtya dadhi.sneha.catuṣka.vat || 71 ||
AHS4.15.072a/ antar.dhūmaṁ tataḥ kṣārād biḍāla.padakaṁ pibet |
AHS4.15.072c/ madirā.dadhi.maṇḍoṣṇa.jalāriṣṭa.surāsavaiḥ || 72 || [Note: AHS4.15.072v/ 15.72dv .jalāriṣṭa.sudhāsavaiḥ]
AHS4.15.073a/ udaraṁ gulmam aṣṭhīlāṁ tūṇyau śophaṁ viṣūcikām |
AHS4.15.073c/ plīha.hṛd.roga.guda.jān udāvartaṁ ca nāśayet || 73 ||
AHS4.15.074a/ jayed ariṣṭa.go.mūtra.cūrṇāyas.kṛti.pānataḥ |
AHS4.15.074c/ sa.kṣāra.taila.pānaiś ca dur.balasya kaphodaram || 74 ||
AHS4.15.075a/ upanāhyaṁ sa.siddhārtha.kiṇvair bījaiś ca mūlakāt |
AHS4.15.075c/ kalkitair udaraṁ svedam abhīkṣṇaṁ cātra yojayet || 75 || [Note: AHS4.15.075v/ 15.75cv kalkitair udara.svedam]
AHS4.15.076a/ sannipātodare kuryān nāti.kṣīṇa.balānale |
AHS4.15.076c/ doṣodrekānurodhena pratyākhyāya kriyām imām || 76 ||
AHS4.15.077a/ dantī.dravantī.phala.jaṁ tailaṁ pāne ca śasyate |
AHS4.15.077c/ kriyā.nivṛtte jaṭhare tri.doṣe tu viśeṣataḥ || 77 ||
AHS4.15.078a/ dadyād āpṛcchya taj.jñātīn pātuṁ madyena kalkitam |
AHS4.15.078c/ mūlaṁ kākādanī.guñjā.karavīraka.sambhavam || 78 ||
AHS4.15.079a/ pāna.bhojana.saṁyuktaṁ dadyād vā sthāvaraṁ viṣam |
AHS4.15.079c/ yasmin vā kupitaḥ sarpo vimuñcati phale viṣam || 79 ||
[Page 461 ]
AHS4.15.080a/ tenāsya doṣa.saṅghātaḥ sthiro līno vi.mārga.gaḥ |
AHS4.15.080c/ bahiḥ pravartate bhinno viṣeṇāśu pramāthinā || 80 ||
AHS4.15.081a/ tathā vrajaty a.gada.tāṁ śarīrāntaram eva vā |
AHS4.15.081c/ hṛta.doṣaṁ tu śītāmbu.snātaṁ taṁ pāyayet payaḥ || 81 ||
AHS4.15.082a/ peyāṁ vā trivṛtaḥ śākaṁ māṇḍūkyā vāstukasya vā |
AHS4.15.082c/ kāla.śākaṁ yavākhyaṁ vā khādet sva.rasa.sādhitam || 82 ||
AHS4.15.083a/ nir.amla.lavaṇa.snehaṁ svinnā.svinnam an.anna.bhuk |
AHS4.15.083c/ māsam ekaṁ tataś caiva tṛṣitaḥ sva.rasaṁ pibet || 83 || [Note: AHS4.15.083v/ 15.83cv māsam ekaṁ tataś caivaṁ]
AHS4.15.084a/ evaṁ vinirhṛte śākair doṣe māsāt paraṁ tataḥ |
AHS4.15.084c/ dur.balāya prayuñjīta prāṇa.bhṛt kārabhaṁ payaḥ || 84 ||
AHS4.15.085a/ plīhodare yathā.doṣaṁ snigdhasya sveditasya ca |
AHS4.15.085c/ sirāṁ bhukta.vato dadhnā vāma.bāhau vimokṣayet || 85 ||
AHS4.15.086a/ labdhe bale ca bhūyo 'pi sneha.pītaṁ viśodhitam |
AHS4.15.086c/ samudra.śukti.jaṁ kṣāraṁ payasā pāyayet tathā || 86 ||
AHS4.15.087a/ amla.srutaṁ viḍa.kaṇā.cūrṇāḍhyaṁ naktamāla.jam |
AHS4.15.087c/ śaubhāñjanasya vā kvāthaṁ saindhavāgni.kaṇānvitam || 87 ||
AHS4.15.088a/ hiṅgv.ādi.cūrṇaṁ kṣārājyaṁ yuñjīta ca yathā.balam |
AHS4.15.088c/ pippalī.nāgaraṁ dantī.samāṁśaṁ dvi.guṇābhayam || 88 || [Note: AHS4.15.088v/ 15.88dv .samāṁśaṁ dvi.guṇābhayā]
AHS4.15.089a/ viḍārdhāṁśa.yutaṁ cūrṇam idam uṣṇāmbunā pibet |
AHS4.15.089c/ viḍaṅgaṁ citrakaṁ saktūn sa.ghṛtān saindhavaṁ vacām || 89 ||
[Page 462 ]
AHS4.15.090a/ dagdhvā kapāle payasā gulma.plīhāpahaṁ pibet |
AHS4.15.090c/ tailonmiśrair badaraka.pattraiḥ sammarditaiḥ samupanaddhaḥ || 90 ||
AHS4.15.091a/ musalena pīḍito 'nu ca yāti plīhā payo.bhujo nāśam |
AHS4.15.091c/ rohītaka.latāḥ k ptāḥ khaṇḍa.śaḥ sābhayā jale || 91 ||
AHS4.15.092a/ mūtre vāsunuyāt tac ca sapta.rātra.sthitaṁ pibet |
AHS4.15.092c/ kāmalā.plīha.gulmārśaḥ.kṛmi.mehodarāpaham || 92 || [Note: AHS4.15.092v/ 15.92av mūtre vāsunuyāt tat tu]
AHS4.15.093a/ rohītaka.tvacaḥ kṛtvā palānāṁ pañca.viṁśatim |
AHS4.15.093c/ kola.dvi.prastha.saṁyuktaṁ kaṣāyam upakalpayet || 93 ||
AHS4.15.094a/ pālikaiḥ pañca.kolais tu taiḥ samastaiś ca tulyayā |
AHS4.15.094c/ rohītaka.tvacā piṣṭair ghṛta.prasthaṁ vipācayet || 94 ||
AHS4.15.095a/ plīhābhivṛddhiṁ śamayaty etad āśu prayojitam |
AHS4.15.095c/ kadalyās tila.nālānāṁ kṣāreṇa kṣurakasya ca || 95 || [Note: AHS4.15.095v/ 15.95av plīhābhivṛddhiṁ śamayed 15.95ac plīhāti.vṛddhiṁ śamayaty 15.95dv kṣāreṇekṣurakasya ca]
AHS4.15.096a/ tailaṁ pakvaṁ jayet pānāt plīhānaṁ kapha.vāta.jam |
AHS4.15.096c/ a.śāntau gulma.vidhinā yojayed agni.karma ca || 96 ||
AHS4.15.097a/ a.prāpta.picchā.salile plīhni vāta.kapholbaṇe |
AHS4.15.097c/ paittike jīvanīyāni sarpīṁṣi kṣīra.vastayaḥ || 97 ||
AHS4.15.098a/ raktāvasekaḥ saṁśuddhiḥ kṣīra.pānaṁ ca śasyate |
AHS4.15.098c/ yakṛti plīha.vat karma dakṣiṇe tu bhuje sirām || 98 ||
AHS4.15.099a/ svinnāya baddhodariṇe mūtra.tīkṣṇauṣadhānvitam |
AHS4.15.099c/ sa.taila.lavaṇaṁ dadyān nirūhaṁ sānuvāsanam || 99 ||
[Page 463 ]
AHS4.15.100a/ parisraṁsīni cānnāni tīkṣṇaṁ cāsmai virecanam |
AHS4.15.100c/ udāvarta.haraṁ karma kāryaṁ yac cānilāpaham || 100 ||
AHS4.15.101a/ chidrodaram ṛte svedāc chleṣmodara.vad ācaret |
AHS4.15.101c/ jātaṁ jātaṁ jalaṁ srāvyam evaṁ tad yāpayed bhiṣak || 101 ||
AHS4.15.102a/ apāṁ doṣa.harāṇy ādau yojayed udakodare |
AHS4.15.102c/ mūtra.yuktāni tīkṣṇāni vividha.kṣāra.vanti ca || 102 ||
AHS4.15.103a/ dīpanīyaiḥ kapha.ghnaiś ca tam āhārair upācaret |
AHS4.15.103c/ kṣāraṁ chāga.karīṣāṇāṁ srutaṁ mūtre 'gninā pacet || 103 ||
AHS4.15.104a/ ghanī.bhavati tasmiṁś ca karṣāṁśaṁ cūrṇitaṁ kṣipet |
AHS4.15.104c/ pippalī pippalī.mūlaṁ śuṇṭhī lavaṇa.pañcakam || 104 ||
AHS4.15.105a/ nikumbha.kumbha.tri.phalā.svarṇakṣīrī.viṣāṇikāḥ |
AHS4.15.105c/ svarjikā.kṣāra.ṣaḍgranthā.sātalā.yava.śūka.jam || 105 ||
AHS4.15.106a/ kolābhā guṭikāḥ kṛtvā tataḥ sauvīrakāplutāḥ |
AHS4.15.106c/ pibed a.jarake śophe pravṛddhe codakodare || 106 || [Note: AHS4.15.106v/ 15.106dv pravṛddhe ca dakodare]
AHS4.15.107a/ ity auṣadhair a.praśame triṣu baddhodarādiṣu |
AHS4.15.107c/ prayuñjīta bhiṣak śastram ārta.bandhu.nṛpārthitaḥ || 107 ||
AHS4.15.108a/ snigdha.svinna.tanor nābher adho baddha.kṣatāntrayoḥ |
AHS4.15.108c/ pāṭayed udaraṁ muktvā vāmataś catur.aṅgulāt || 108 ||
AHS4.15.109a/ catur.aṅgula.mānaṁ tu niṣkāsyāntrāṇi tena ca |
AHS4.15.109c/ nirīkṣyāpanayed vāla.mala.lepopalādikam || 109 ||
[Page 464 ]
AHS4.15.110a/ chidre tu śalyam uddhṛtya viśodhyāntra.parisravam |
AHS4.15.110c/ markoṭair daṁśayec chidraṁ teṣu lagneṣu cāharet || 110 || [Note: AHS4.15.110v/ 15.110bv viśodhyāntraṁ parisravam]
AHS4.15.111a/ kāyaṁ mūrdhno 'nu cāntrāṇi yathā.sthānaṁ niveśayet |
AHS4.15.111c/ aktāni madhu.sarpirbhyām atha sīvyed bahir vraṇam || 111 || [Note: AHS4.15.111v/ 15.111bv yathā.sthānaṁ viveśayet]
AHS4.15.112a/ tataḥ kṛṣṇa.mṛdālipya badhnīyād yaṣṭi.miśrayā |
AHS4.15.112c/ nivāta.sthaḥ payo.vṛttiḥ sneha.droṇyāṁ vaset tataḥ || 112 ||
AHS4.15.113a/ sa.jale jaṭhare tailair abhyaktasyānilāpahaiḥ |
AHS4.15.113c/ svinnasyoṣṇāmbunā.kakṣam udare paṭṭa.veṣṭite || 113 || [Note: AHS4.15.113v/ 15.113dv udare pariveṣṭite]
AHS4.15.114a/ baddha.cchidrodita.sthāne vidhyed aṅgula.mātrakam |
AHS4.15.114c/ nidhāya tasmin nāḍīṁ ca srāvayed ardham ambhasaḥ || 114 ||
AHS4.15.115a/ athāsya nāḍīm ākṛṣya tailena lavaṇena ca |
AHS4.15.115c/ vraṇam abhyajya baddhvā ca veṣṭayed vāsasodaram || 115 ||
AHS4.15.116a/ tṛtīye 'hni caturthe vā yāvad ā.ṣo.ḍaśaṁ dinam |
AHS4.15.116c/ tasya viśramya viśramya srāvayed alpa.śo jalam || 116 || [Note: AHS4.15.116v/ 15.116bv yāvad vā.dina.ṣo.ḍaśa]
AHS4.15.117a/ viveṣṭayed gāḍha.taraṁ jaṭharaṁ vāsasā ślatham |
AHS4.15.117c/ niḥsrute laṅghitaḥ peyām a.sneha.lavaṇāṁ pibet || 117 || [Note: AHS4.15.117v/ 15.117bv jaṭharaṁ ca ślathā.ślatham]
AHS4.15.118a/ syāt kṣīra.vṛttiḥ ṣaṇ.māsāṁś trīn peyāṁ payasā pibet |
AHS4.15.118c/ trīṁś cānyān payasaivādyāt phalāmlena rasena vā || 118 ||
AHS4.15.119a/ alpa.śo '.sneha.lavaṇaṁ jīrṇaṁ śyāmāka.kodravam |
AHS4.15.119c/ prayato vatsareṇaivaṁ vijayeta jalodaram || 119 ||
[Page 465 ]
AHS4.15.120a/ varjyeṣu yantrito diṣṭe nāty.a.diṣṭe jitendriyaḥ |
AHS4.15.120c/ sarvam evodaraṁ prāyo doṣa.saṅghāta.jaṁ yataḥ || 120 ||
AHS4.15.121a/ ato vātādi.śamanī kriyā sarva.tra śasyate |
AHS4.15.121c/ vahnir manda.tvam āyāti doṣaiḥ kukṣau prapūrite || 121 || [Note: AHS4.15.121v/ 15.121bv kriyā sarvā praśasyate]
AHS4.15.122a/ tasmād bhojyāni bhojyāni dīpanāni laghūni ca |
AHS4.15.122c/ sa.pañca.mūlāny alpāmla.paṭu.sneha.kaṭūni ca || 122 ||
AHS4.15.123a/ bhāvitānāṁ gavāṁ mūtre ṣaṣṭikānāṁ ca taṇḍulaiḥ |
AHS4.15.123c/ yavāgūṁ payasā siddhāṁ pra.kāmaṁ bhojayen naram || 123 ||
AHS4.15.124a/ pibed ikṣu.rasaṁ cānu jaṭharāṇāṁ nivṛttaye |
AHS4.15.124c/ svaṁ svaṁ sthānaṁ vrajanty eṣāṁ vāta.pitta.kaphās tathā || 124 ||
AHS4.15.125a/ aty.arthoṣṇāmla.lavaṇaṁ rūkṣaṁ grāhi himaṁ guru |
AHS4.15.125c/ guḍaṁ taila.kṛtaṁ śākaṁ vāri pānāvagāhayoḥ || 125 || [Note: AHS4.15.125v/ 15.125av aty.arthoṣṇāmbu.lavaṇaṁ]
AHS4.15.126a/ āyāsādhva.divā.svapna.yānāni ca parityajet |
AHS4.15.126c/ nāty.accha.sāndra.madhuraṁ takraṁ pāne praśasyate || 126 ||
AHS4.15.127a/ sa.kaṇā.lavaṇaṁ vāte pitte soṣaṇa.śarkaram |
AHS4.15.127c/ yavānī.saindhavājājī.madhu.vyoṣaiḥ kaphodare || 127 ||
AHS4.15.128a/ try.ūṣaṇa.kṣāra.lavaṇaiḥ saṁyutaṁ nicayodare |
AHS4.15.128c/ madhu.taila.vacā.śuṇṭhī.śatāhvā.kuṣṭha.saindhavaiḥ || 128 || [Note: AHS4.15.128v/ 15.128cv madhu.taila.varā.śuṇṭhī. 15.128cv madhu.taila.vasā.śuṇṭhī.]
AHS4.15.129a/ plīhni baddhe tu hapuṣā.yavānī.paṭv.ajājibhiḥ |
AHS4.15.129c/ sa.kṛṣṇā.mākṣikaṁ chidre vyoṣa.vat salilodare || 129 ||
[Page 466 ]
AHS4.15.130a/ gauravā.rocakānāha.manda.vahny.atisāriṇām |
AHS4.15.130c/ takraṁ vāta.kaphārtānām amṛta.tvāya kalpate || 130 ||
AHS4.15.131a/ prayogāṇāṁ ca sarveṣām anu kṣīraṁ prayojayet |
AHS4.15.131c/ sthairya.kṛt sarva.dhātūnāṁ balyaṁ doṣānubandha.hṛt || 131 ||
AHS4.15.131ū̆ab/ bheṣajāpacitāṅgānāṁ kṣīram evāmṛtāyate || 131ū̆ab ||

4.16. Chapter 16 :: Atha pāṇḍurogacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 407-410]
AHS4.16.001a/ pāṇḍv.āmayī pibet sarpir ādau kalyāṇakāhvayam |
AHS4.16.001c/ pañca.gavyaṁ mahā.tiktaṁ śṛtaṁ vāragvadhādinā || 1 || [Note: AHS4.16.001v/ 16.1av pāṇḍu.rogī pibet sarpir]
AHS4.16.002a/ dāḍimāt kuḍavo dhānyāt kuḍavārdhaṁ palaṁ palam |
AHS4.16.002c/ citrakāc chṛṅgaverāc ca pippaly.ardha.palaṁ ca taiḥ || 2 ||
AHS4.16.003a/ kalkitair viṁśati.palaṁ ghṛtasya salilāḍhake |
AHS4.16.003c/ siddhaṁ hṛt.pāṇḍu.gulmārśaḥ.plīha.vāta.kaphārti.nut || 3 ||
AHS4.16.004a/ dīpanaṁ śvāsa.kāsa.ghnaṁ mūḍha.vātānulomanam |
AHS4.16.004c/ duḥkha.prasavinīnāṁ ca vandhyānāṁ ca praśasyate || 4 ||
AHS4.16.005a/ snehitaṁ vāmayet tīkṣṇaiḥ punaḥ snigdhaṁ ca śodhayet |
AHS4.16.005c/ payasā mūtra.yuktena bahu.śaḥ kevalena vā || 5 ||
AHS4.16.006a/ dantī.phala.rase koṣṇe kāśmaryāñjalim āsutam |
AHS4.16.006c/ drākṣāñjaliṁ vā mṛditaṁ tat pibet pāṇḍu.roga.jit || 6 || [Note: AHS4.16.006v/ 16.6av dantī.pala.rase koṣṇe]
AHS4.16.007a/ mūtreṇa piṣṭāṁ pathyāṁ vā tat.siddhaṁ vā phala.trayam |
AHS4.16.007c/ svarṇakṣīrī.trivṛc.chyāmā.bhadradāru.mahauṣadham || 7 ||
[Page 467 ]
AHS4.16.008a/ go.mūtrāñjalinā piṣṭaṁ śṛtaṁ tenaiva vā pibet |
AHS4.16.008c/ sādhitaṁ kṣīram ebhir vā pibed doṣānulomanam || 8 ||
AHS4.16.009a/ mūtre sthitaṁ vā saptāhaṁ payasāyo.rajaḥ pibet |
AHS4.16.009c/ jīrṇe kṣīreṇa bhuñjīta rasena madhureṇa vā || 9 ||
AHS4.16.010a/ śuddhaś cobhayato lihyāt pathyāṁ madhu.ghṛta.drutām |
AHS4.16.010c/ viśālā.kaṭukā.mustā.kuṣṭha.dāru.kaliṅgakāḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS4.16.010v/ 16.10bv pathyā madhu.ghṛta.drutāḥ 16.10cv viśālāṁ kaṭukāṁ mustāṁ 16.10dv kuṣṭhaṁ dāru.kaliṅgakāḥ]
AHS4.16.011a/ karṣāṁśā dvi.picur mūrvā karṣārdhāṁśā ghuṇapriyā |
AHS4.16.011c/ pītvā tac cūrṇam ambhobhiḥ sukhair lihyāt tato madhu || 11 ||
AHS4.16.012a/ pāṇḍu.rogaṁ jvaraṁ dāhaṁ kāsaṁ śvāsam a.rocakam |
AHS4.16.012c/ gulmānāhāma.vātāṁś ca rakta.pittaṁ ca taj jayet || 12 ||
AHS4.16.013a/ vāsā.guḍūcī.tri.phalā.kaṭvī.bhūnimba.nimba.jaḥ |
AHS4.16.013c/ kvāthaḥ kṣaudra.yuto hanti pāṇḍu.pittāsra.kāmalāḥ || 13 ||
AHS4.16.014a/ vyoṣāgni.vella.tri.phalā.mustais tulyam ayo.rajaḥ |
AHS4.16.014c/ cūrṇitaṁ takra.madhv.ājya.koṣṇāmbhobhiḥ prayojitam || 14 ||
AHS4.16.015a/ kāmalā.pāṇḍu.hṛd.roga.kuṣṭhārśo.meha.nāśanam |
AHS4.16.015c/ guḍa.nāgara.maṇḍūra.tilāṁśān mānataḥ samān || 15 ||
AHS4.16.016a/ pippalī.dvi.guṇān dadyād guṭikāṁ pāṇḍu.rogiṇe |
AHS4.16.016c/ tāpyaṁ dārvyās tvacaṁ cavyaṁ granthikaṁ devadāru ca || 16 ||
AHS4.16.017a/ vyoṣādi.navakaṁ caitac cūrṇayed dvi.guṇaṁ tataḥ |
AHS4.16.017c/ maṇḍūraṁ cāñjana.nibhaṁ sarvato 'ṣṭa.guṇe 'tha tat || 17 || [Note: AHS4.16.017v/ 16.17av vyoṣādi.navakaṁ ceti]
[Page 468 ]
AHS4.16.018a/ pṛthag vipakve go.mūtre vaṭakī.karaṇa.kṣame |
AHS4.16.018c/ prakṣipya vaṭakān kuryāt tān khādet takra.bhojanaḥ || 18 ||
AHS4.16.019a/ ete maṇḍūra.vaṭakāḥ prāṇa.dāḥ pāṇḍu.rogiṇām |
AHS4.16.019c/ kuṣṭhāny a.jarakaṁ śopham ūru.stambham a.rocakam || 19 ||
AHS4.16.020a/ arśāṁsi kāmalāṁ mehān plīhānaṁ śamayanti ca |
AHS4.16.020c/ tāpyādri.jatu.raupyāyo.malāḥ pañca.palāḥ pṛthak || 20 ||
AHS4.16.021a/ citraka.tri.phalā.vyoṣa.viḍaṅgaiḥ pālikaiḥ saha |
AHS4.16.021c/ śarkarāṣṭa.palonmiśrāś cūrṇitā madhunā drutāḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS4.16.021v/ 16.21dv cūrṇitā madhunā yutāḥ 16.21dv cūrṇitāḥ sa.madhu.drutāḥ]
AHS4.16.022a/ pāṇḍu.rogaṁ viṣaṁ kāsaṁ yakṣmāṇaṁ viṣamaṁ jvaram |
AHS4.16.022c/ kuṣṭhāny a.jarakaṁ mehaṁ śophaṁ śvāsam a.rocakam || 22 ||
AHS4.16.023a/ viśeṣād dhanty apasmāraṁ kāmalāṁ guda.jāni ca |
AHS4.16.023c/ kauṭaja.tri.phalā.nimba.paṭola.ghana.nāgaraiḥ || 23 ||
AHS4.16.024a/ bhāvitāni daśāhāni rasair dvi.tri.guṇāni vā |
AHS4.16.024c/ śilā.jatu.palāny aṣṭau tāvatī sita.śarkarā || 24 ||
AHS4.16.025a/ tvakkṣīrī.pippalī.dhātrī.karkaṭākhyāḥ palonmitāḥ |
AHS4.16.025c/ nidigdhyāḥ phala.mūlābhyāṁ palaṁ yuktyā tri.jātakam || 25 || [Note: AHS4.16.025v/ 16.25cv nidigdhā.phala.mūlābhyāṁ]
AHS4.16.026a/ madhu.tri.pala.saṁyuktān kuryād akṣa.samān guḍān |
AHS4.16.026c/ dāḍimāmbu.payaḥ.pakṣi.rasa.toya.surāsavān || 26 || [Note: AHS4.16.026v/ 16.26av madhu.tri.pala.saṁyuktaṁ]
AHS4.16.027a/ tān bhakṣayitvānupiben nir.anno bhukta eva vā |
AHS4.16.027c/ pāṇḍu.kuṣṭha.jvara.plīha.tamakārśo.bhagandaram || 27 ||
[Page 469 ]
AHS4.16.028a/ hṛn.mūtra.pūti.śukrāgni.doṣa.śoṣa.garodaram |
AHS4.16.028c/ kāsāsṛg.dara.pittāsṛk.śopha.gulma.galāmayān || 28 ||
AHS4.16.029a/ meha.vardhma.bhramān hanyuḥ sarva.doṣa.harāḥ śivāḥ |
AHS4.16.029c/ drākṣā.prasthaṁ kaṇā.prasthaṁ śarkarārdha.tulāṁ tathā || 29 ||
AHS4.16.030a/ dvi.palaṁ madhukaṁ śuṇṭhīṁ tvakkṣīrīṁ ca vicūrṇitam |
AHS4.16.030c/ dhātrī.phala.rasa.droṇe tat kṣiptvā leha.vat pacet || 30 ||
AHS4.16.031a/ śītān madhu.prastha.yutād lihyāt pāṇi.talaṁ tataḥ |
AHS4.16.031c/ halīmakaṁ pāṇḍu.rogaṁ kāmalāṁ ca niyacchati || 31 ||
AHS4.16.032a/ kanīyaḥ.pañca.mūlāmbu śasyate pāna.bhojane |
AHS4.16.032c/ pāṇḍūnāṁ kāmalārtānāṁ mṛdvīkāmalakād rasaḥ || 32 ||
AHS4.16.033a/ iti sāmānyataḥ proktaṁ pāṇḍu.roge bhiṣag.jitam |
AHS4.16.033c/ vikalpya yojyaṁ viduṣā pṛthag doṣa.balaṁ prati || 33 || [Note: AHS4.16.033v/ 16.33bv pāṇḍu.roga.bhiṣag.jitam]
AHS4.16.034a/ sneha.prāyaṁ pavana.je tikta.śītaṁ tu paittike |
AHS4.16.034c/ ślaiṣmike kaṭu.rūkṣoṣṇaṁ vimiśraṁ sānnipātike || 34 || [Note: AHS4.16.034v/ 16.34cv ślaiṣmike kaṭu.tīkṣṇoṣṇaṁ 16.34dv vimiśraṁ sannipāta.je]
AHS4.16.035a/ mṛdaṁ niryāpayet kāyāt tīkṣṇaiḥ saṁśodhanaiḥ puraḥ |
AHS4.16.035c/ balādhānāni sarpīṁṣi śuddhe koṣṭhe tu yojayet || 35 || [Note: AHS4.16.035v/ 16.35av mṛdaṁ nirvāpayet kāyāt 16.35dv śuddhe koṣṭhe niyojayet]
AHS4.16.036a/ vyoṣa.bilva.dvi.rajanī.tri.phalā.dvi.punarnavam |
AHS4.16.036c/ mustāny ayo.rajaḥ pāṭhā viḍaṅgaṁ devadāru ca || 36 ||
AHS4.16.037a/ vṛścikālī ca bhārgī ca sa.kṣīrais taiḥ śṛtaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS4.16.037c/ sarvān praśamayaty āśu vikārān mṛttikā.kṛtān || 37 ||
[Page 470 ]
AHS4.16.038a/ tad.vat kesara.yaṣṭy.āhva.pippalī.kṣīra.śādvalaiḥ |
AHS4.16.038c/ mṛd.dveṣaṇāya tal.laulye vitared bhāvitāṁ mṛdam || 38 ||
AHS4.16.039a/ vellāgni.nimba.prasavaiḥ pāṭhayā mūrvayātha.vā |
AHS4.16.039c/ mṛd.bheda.bhinna.doṣānugamād yojyaṁ ca bheṣajam || 39 ||
AHS4.16.040a/ kāmalāyāṁ tu pitta.ghnaṁ pāṇḍu.rogā.virodhi yat |
AHS4.16.040c/ pathyā.śata.rase pathyā.vṛntārdha.śata.kalkitaḥ || 40 ||
AHS4.16.041a/ prasthaḥ siddho ghṛtād gulma.kāmalā.pāṇḍu.roga.nut |
AHS4.16.041c/ āragvadhaṁ rasenekṣor vidāry.āmalakasya vā || 41 ||
AHS4.16.042a/ sa.try.ūṣaṇaṁ bilva.mātraṁ pāyayet kāmalāpaham |
AHS4.16.042c/ piben nikumbha.kalkaṁ vā dvi.guḍaṁ śīta.vāriṇā || 42 || [Note: AHS4.16.042v/ 16.42dv dvi.guṇaṁ śīta.vāriṇā]
AHS4.16.043a/ kumbhasya cūrṇaṁ sa.kṣaudraṁ traiphalena rasena vā |
AHS4.16.043c/ tri.phalāyā guḍūcyā vā dārvyā nimbasya vā rasam || 43 ||
AHS4.16.044a/ prātaḥ prātar madhu.yutaṁ kāmalārtāya yojayet |
AHS4.16.044c/ niśā.gairika.dhātrībhiḥ kāmalāpaham añjanam || 44 || [Note: AHS4.16.044v/ 16.44cv śilā.gairika.dhātrībhiḥ]
AHS4.16.045a/ tila.piṣṭa.nibhaṁ yas tu kāmalā.vān sṛjen malam |
AHS4.16.045c/ kapha.ruddha.pathaṁ tasya pittaṁ kapha.harair jayet || 45 ||
AHS4.16.046a/ rūkṣa.śīta.guru.svādu.vyāyāma.bala.nigrahaiḥ |
AHS4.16.046c/ kapha.sammūrchito vāyur yadā pittaṁ bahiḥ kṣipet || 46 ||
AHS4.16.047a/ hāridra.netra.mūtra.tvak śveta.varcās tadā naraḥ |
AHS4.16.047c/ bhavet sāṭopa.viṣṭambho guruṇā hṛdayena ca || 47 ||
[Page 471 ]
AHS4.16.048a/ daurbalyālpāgni.pārśvārti.hidhmā.śvāsā.ruci.jvaraiḥ |
AHS4.16.048c/ krameṇālpe 'nuṣajyeta pitte śākhā.samāśrite || 48 ||
AHS4.16.049a/ rasais taṁ rūkṣa.kaṭv.amlaiḥ śikhi.tittiri.dakṣa.jaiḥ |
AHS4.16.049c/ śuṣka.mūlaka.jair yūṣaiḥ kulatthotthaiś ca bhojayet || 49 ||
AHS4.16.050a/ bhṛśāmla.tīkṣṇa.kaṭuka.lavaṇoṣṇaṁ ca śasyate |
AHS4.16.050c/ sa.bījapūraka.rasaṁ lihyād vyoṣaṁ tathāśayam || 50 ||
AHS4.16.051a/ svaṁ pittam eti tenāsya śakṛd apy anurajyate |
AHS4.16.051c/ vāyuś ca yāti praśamaṁ sahāṭopādy.upadravaiḥ || 51 ||
AHS4.16.052a/ nivṛttopadravasyāsya kāryaḥ kāmaliko vidhiḥ |
AHS4.16.052c/ go.mūtreṇa pibet kumbha.kāmalāyāṁ śilā.jatu || 52 ||
AHS4.16.053a/ māsaṁ mākṣika.dhātuṁ vā kiṭṭaṁ vātha hiraṇya.jam |
AHS4.16.053c/ guḍūcī.sva.rasa.kṣīra.sādhitena halīmakī || 53 ||
AHS4.16.054a/ mahiṣī.haviṣā snigdhaḥ pibed dhātrī.rasena tu |
AHS4.16.054c/ trivṛtāṁ tad.virikto 'dyāt svādu pittānilāpaham || 54 ||
AHS4.16.055a/ drākṣā.lehaṁ ca pūrvoktaṁ sarpīṁṣi madhurāṇi ca |
AHS4.16.055c/ yāpanān kṣīra.vastīṁś ca śīlayet sānuvāsanān || 55 ||
AHS4.16.056a/ mārdvīkāriṣṭa.yogāṁś ca pibed yuktyāgni.vṛddhaye |
AHS4.16.056c/ kāsikaṁ cābhayā.lehaṁ pippalīṁ madhukaṁ balām || 56 || [Note: AHS4.16.056v/ 16.56cv kāsikaṁ vābhayā.lehaṁ]
AHS4.16.057a/ payasā ca prayuñjīta yathā.doṣaṁ yathā.balam |
AHS4.16.057c/ pāṇḍu.rogeṣu kuśalaḥ śophoktaṁ ca kriyā.kramam || 57 ||
[Page 472 ]
AHS4.16.057+1a/ ayas.tila.try.ūṣaṇa.kola.bhāgaiḥ sarvaiḥ samaṁ mākṣika.dhātu.cūrṇam |
AHS4.16.057+1c/ tair modakaḥ kṣaudra.yuto 'nu.takraḥ pāṇḍv.āmaye dūra.gate 'pi śastaḥ || 57+1 ||

4.17. Chapter 17 :: Athaśvayathucikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 410-412]
AHS4.17.001a/ sarva.tra sarvāṅga.sare doṣa.je śvayathau purā |
AHS4.17.001c/ sāme viśoṣito bhuktvā laghu koṣṇāmbhasā pibet || 1 ||
AHS4.17.002a/ nāgarātiviṣā.dāru.viḍaṅgendrayavoṣaṇam |
AHS4.17.002c/ atha.vā vijayā.śuṇṭhī.devadāru.punarnavam || 2 ||
AHS4.17.003a/ navāyasaṁ vā doṣāḍhyaḥ śuddhyai mūtra.harītakīḥ |
AHS4.17.003c/ varā.kvāthena kaṭukā.kumbhāyas.try.ūṣaṇāni ca || 3 || [Note: AHS4.17.003v/ 17.3bv śuddhyai mūtra.harītakīm]
AHS4.17.004a/ atha.vā gugguluṁ tad.vaj jatu vā śaila.sambhavam |
AHS4.17.004c/ mandāgniḥ śīlayed āma.guru.bhinna.vibandha.viṭ || 4 ||
AHS4.17.005a/ takraṁ sauvarcala.vyoṣa.kṣaudra.yuktaṁ guḍābhayām |
AHS4.17.005c/ takrānu.pānām atha.vā tad.vad vā guḍa.nāgaram || 5 ||
AHS4.17.006a/ ārdrakaṁ vā sama.guḍaṁ prakuñcārdha.vivardhitam |
AHS4.17.006c/ paraṁ pañca.palaṁ māsaṁ yūṣa.kṣīra.rasāśanaḥ || 6 ||
AHS4.17.007a/ gulmodarārśaḥ.śvayathu.pramehāñ chvāsa.pratiśyālasakā.vipākān |
AHS4.17.007c/ sa.kāmalā.śoṣa.mano.vikārān kāsaṁ kaphaṁ caiva jayet prayogaḥ || 7 ||
AHS4.17.008a/ ghṛtam ārdraka.nāgarasya kalka.sva.rasābhyāṁ payasā ca sādhayitvā |
AHS4.17.008c/ śvayathu.kṣavathūdarāgni.sādair abhibhūto 'pi piban bhavaty a.rogaḥ || 8 ||
AHS4.17.008+1a/ rasas tathaivārdraka.nāgarasya peyo 'tha jīrṇe payasānnam adyāt |
AHS4.17.008+1c/ śilāhvayaṁ vā tri.phalā.rasena hanyāt tri.doṣaṁ śvayathuṁ prasahya || 8+1 ||
[Page 473 ]
AHS4.17.008+2a/ punarnavā.nimba.paṭola.śuṇṭhī. tiktāmṛtā.dārvy.abhayā.kaṣāyaḥ |
AHS4.17.008+2c/ sarvāṅga.śophodara.kāsa.śūla.śvāsānvitaṁ pāṇḍu.gadaṁ ca hanti || 8+2 ||
AHS4.17.009a/ nir.āmo baddha.śamalaḥ pibec chvayathu.pīḍitaḥ |
AHS4.17.009c/ tri.kaṭu.trivṛtā.dantī.citrakaiḥ sādhitaṁ payaḥ || 9 ||
AHS4.17.010a/ mūtraṁ gor vā mahiṣyā vā sa.kṣīraṁ kṣīra.bhojanaḥ |
AHS4.17.010c/ saptāhaṁ māsaṁ atha.vā syād uṣṭra.kṣīra.vartanaḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS4.17.010v/ 17.10dv syād uṣṭrī.kṣīra.vartanaḥ]
AHS4.17.011a/ yavānakaṁ yava.kṣāraṁ yavānīṁ pañca.kolakam |
AHS4.17.011c/ maricaṁ dāḍimaṁ pāṭhāṁ dhānakām amla.vetasam || 11 ||
AHS4.17.012a/ bāla.bilvaṁ ca karṣāṁśaṁ sādhayet salilāḍhake |
AHS4.17.012c/ tena pakvo ghṛta.prasthaḥ śophārśo.gulma.meha.hā || 12 ||
AHS4.17.013a/ dadhnaś citraka.garbhād vā ghṛtaṁ tat.takra.saṁyutam |
AHS4.17.013c/ pakvaṁ sa.citrakaṁ tad.vad guṇair yuñjyāc ca kāla.vit || 13 ||
AHS4.17.014a/ dhānvantaraṁ mahā.tiktaṁ kalyāṇam abhayā.ghṛtam |
AHS4.17.014c/ daśa.mūla.kaṣāyasya kaṁse pathyā.śataṁ pacet || 14 ||
AHS4.17.015a/ dattvā guḍa.tulāṁ tasmin lehe dadyād vicūrṇitam |
AHS4.17.015c/ tri.jātakaṁ tri.kaṭukaṁ kiñ.cic ca yava.śūka.jam || 15 ||
AHS4.17.016a/ prasthārdhaṁ ca hime kṣaudrāt tan nihanty upayojitam || 16ab ||
AHS4.17.016c/ pravṛddha.śopha.jvara.meha.gulma.kārśyāma.vātāmlaka.rakta.pittam || 16cd ||
AHS4.17.016e/ vaivarṇya.mūtrānila.śukra.doṣa.śvāsā.ruci.plīha.garodaraṁ ca || 16ef ||
AHS4.17.017ab/ purāṇa.yava.śāly.annaṁ daśa.mūlāmbu.sādhitam || 17ab ||
[Page 474 ]
AHS4.17.018a/ alpam alpa.paṭu.snehaṁ bhojanaṁ śvayathor hitam |
AHS4.17.018c/ kṣāra.vyoṣānvitair maudgaiḥ kaulatthaiḥ sa.kaṇai rasaiḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS4.17.018v/ 17.18bv bhojanaṁ śvayathau hitam]
AHS4.17.019a/ tathā jāṅgala.jaiḥ kūrma.godhā.śalyaka.jair api |
AHS4.17.019c/ an.amlaṁ mathitaṁ pāne madyāny auṣadha.vanti ca || 19 ||
AHS4.17.020a/ ajājī.śaṭhī.jivantī.kāravī.pauṣkarāgnikaiḥ |
AHS4.17.020c/ bilva.madhya.yava.kṣāra.vṛkṣāmlair badaronmitaiḥ || 20 ||
AHS4.17.021a/ kṛtā peyājya.tailābhyāṁ yukti.bhṛṣṭā paraṁ hitā |
AHS4.17.021c/ śophātīsāra.hṛd.roga.gulmārśo.'lpāgni.mehinām || 21 ||
AHS4.17.022a/ guṇais tad.vac ca pāṭhāyāḥ pañca.kolena sādhitā |
AHS4.17.022c/ śaileya.kuṣṭha.sthauṇeya.reṇukāguru.padmakaiḥ || 22 ||
AHS4.17.023a/ śrīveṣṭaka.nakha.spṛkkā.devadāru.priyaṅgubhiḥ |
AHS4.17.023c/ māṁsī.māgadhikā.vanya.dhānya.dhyāmaka.vālakaiḥ || 23 ||
AHS4.17.024a/ catur.jātaka.tālīśa.mustā.gandha.palāśakaiḥ |
AHS4.17.024c/ kuryād abhyañjanaṁ tailaṁ lepaṁ snānāya tūdakam || 24 ||
AHS4.17.025a/ snānaṁ vā nimba.varṣābhū.naktamālārka.vāriṇā |
AHS4.17.025c/ ekāṅga.śophe varṣābhū.karavīraka.kiṁśukaiḥ || 25 ||
AHS4.17.026a/ viśālā.tri.phalā.lodhra.nalikā.devadārubhiḥ |
AHS4.17.026c/ hiṁsrā.kośātakī.mādrī.tālaparṇī.jayantibhiḥ || 26 ||
AHS4.17.027a/ sthūla.kākādanī.śāla.nākulī.vṛṣaparṇibhiḥ |
AHS4.17.027c/ vṛddhyarddhi.hastikarṇaiś ca sukhoṣṇair lepanaṁ hitam || 27 ||
[Page 475 ]
AHS4.17.028a/ athānilotthe śvayathau māsārdhaṁ trivṛtaṁ pibet |
AHS4.17.028c/ tailam eraṇḍa.jaṁ vāta.viḍ.vibandhe tad eva tu || 28 ||
AHS4.17.029a/ prāg.bhaktaṁ payasā yuktaṁ rasair vā kārayet tathā |
AHS4.17.029c/ svedābhyaṅgān samīra.ghnān lepam ekāṅga.ge punaḥ || 29 ||
AHS4.17.030a/ mātuluṅgāgnimanthena śuṇṭhī.hiṁsrāmarāhvayaiḥ |
AHS4.17.030c/ paitte tiktaṁ pibet sarpir nyagrodhādyena vā śṛtam || 30 ||
AHS4.17.031a/ kṣīraṁ tṛḍ.dāha.moheṣu lepābhyaṅgāś ca śītalāḥ |
AHS4.17.031c/ paṭola.mūla.trāyantī.yaṣṭy.āhva.kaṭukābhayāḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS4.17.031v/ 17.31cv paṭola.mūrvā.trāyantī.]
AHS4.17.032a/ dāru dārvī himaṁ dantī viśālā niculaṁ kaṇā |
AHS4.17.032c/ taiḥ kvāthaḥ sa.ghṛtaḥ pīto hanty antas.tāpa.tṛḍ.bhramān || 32 || [Note: AHS4.17.032v/ 17.32cv tat.kvāthaḥ sa.ghṛtaḥ pīto]
AHS4.17.033a/ sa.sannipāta.vīsarpa.śopha.dāha.viṣa.jvarān |
AHS4.17.033c/ āragvadhādinā siddhaṁ tailaṁ śleṣmodbhave pibet || 33 || [Note: AHS4.17.033v/ 17.33bv .śopha.dāha.mada.jvarān]
AHS4.17.034a/ sroto.vibandhe mande 'gnāv a.rucau stimitāśayaḥ |
AHS4.17.034c/ kṣāra.cūrṇāsavāriṣṭa.mūtra.takrāṇi śīlayet || 34 ||
AHS4.17.035a/ kṛṣṇā.purāṇa.piṇyāka.śigru.tvak.sikatātasīḥ |
AHS4.17.035c/ praleponmardane yuñjyāt sukhoṣṇā mūtra.kalkitāḥ || 35 ||
AHS4.17.036a/ snānaṁ mūtrāmbhasī siddhe kuṣṭha.tarkāri.citrakaiḥ |
AHS4.17.036c/ kulattha.nāgarābhyāṁ vā caṇḍāguru vilepane || 36 ||
AHS4.17.037a/ kālājaśṛṅgī.sarala.bastagandhā.hayāhvayāḥ |
AHS4.17.037c/ ekaiṣīkā ca lepaḥ syāc chvayathāv eka.gātra.ge || 37 ||
[Page 476 ]
AHS4.17.037+1a/ yaṣṭī.dugdha.tilair lepo nava.nītena saṁyutaḥ |
AHS4.17.037+1c/ śopham āruṣkaraṁ hanti vṛntaiḥ śāla.dalasya vā || 37+1 ||
AHS4.17.038a/ yathā.doṣaṁ yathāsannaṁ śuddhiṁ raktāvasecanam |
AHS4.17.038c/ kurvīta miśra.doṣe tu doṣodreka.balāt kriyām || 38 ||
AHS4.17.039a/ ajāji.pāṭhā.ghana.pañca.kola.vyāghrī.rajanyaḥ sukha.toya.pītāḥ |
AHS4.17.039c/ śophaṁ tri.doṣaṁ cira.jaṁ pravṛddhaṁ nighnanti bhūnimba.mahauṣadhe ca || 39 ||
AHS4.17.040a/ amṛtā.dvitayaṁ śivātikā surakāṣṭhaṁ sa.puraṁ sa.go.jalam |
AHS4.17.040c/ śvayathūdara.kuṣṭha.pāṇḍu.tā.kṛmi.mehordhva.kaphānilāpaham || 40 ||
AHS4.17.041a/ iti nijam adhikṛtya pathyam uktaṁ kṣata.janite kṣata.jaṁ viśodhanīyam |
AHS4.17.041c/ sruti.hima.ghṛta.lepa.seka.rekair viṣa.janite viṣa.jic ca śopha iṣṭam || 41 ||
AHS4.17.042a/ grāmyāb.jānūpaṁ piśitam a.balaṁ śuṣka.śākaṁ tilānnaṁ || 42a ||
AHS4.17.042b/ gauḍaṁ piṣṭānnaṁ dadhi sa.lavaṇaṁ vijjalaṁ madyam amlam || 42b ||
AHS4.17.042c/ dhānā vallūraṁ samaśanam atho gurv a.sātmyaṁ vidāhi || 42c ||
AHS4.17.042d/ svapnaṁ cā.rātrau śvayathu.gada.vān varjayen maithunaṁ ca || 42d || [Note: AHS4.17.042v/ 17.42bv gauḍaṁ piṣṭānnaṁ dadhi sa.lavaṇaṁ nir.jalaṁ madyam amlam]

4.18. Chapter 18 :: Athavisarpacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 412-414]
AHS4.18.001a/ ādāv eva visarpeṣu hitaṁ laṅghana.rūkṣaṇam |
AHS4.18.001c/ raktāvaseko vamanaṁ virekaḥ snehanaṁ na tu || 1 ||
AHS4.18.002a/ pracchardanaṁ visarpa.ghnaṁ sa.yaṣṭīndrayavaṁ phalam |
AHS4.18.002c/ paṭola.pippalī.nimba.pallavair vā samanvitam || 2 ||
AHS4.18.003a/ rasena yuktaṁ trāyantyā drākṣāyās traiphalena vā |
AHS4.18.003c/ virecanaṁ trivṛc.cūrṇaṁ payasā sarpiṣātha.vā || 3 ||
AHS4.18.004a/ yojyaṁ koṣṭha.gate doṣe viśeṣeṇa viśodhanam |
AHS4.18.004c/ a.viśodhyasya doṣe 'lpe śamanaṁ candanotpalam || 4 ||
[Page 477 ]
AHS4.18.005a/ musta.nimba.paṭolaṁ vā paṭolādikam eva vā |
AHS4.18.005c/ śārivāmalakośīra.mustaṁ vā kvathitaṁ jale || 5 ||
AHS4.18.006a/ durālabhāṁ parpaṭakaṁ guḍūcīṁ viśva.bheṣajam |
AHS4.18.006c/ pākyaṁ śīta.kaṣāyaṁ vā tṛṣṇā.visarpa.vān pibet || 6 ||
AHS4.18.007a/ dārvī.paṭola.kaṭukā.masūra.tri.phalās tathā |
AHS4.18.007c/ sa.nimba.yaṣṭī.trāyantīḥ kvathitā ghṛta.mūrchitāḥ || 7 ||
AHS4.18.007+1a/ amṛta.vṛṣa.paṭolaṁ mustakaṁ saptaparṇaṁ || 7+1a ||
AHS4.18.007+1b/ khadiram asita.vetraṁ nimba.pattraṁ haridre || 7+1b ||
AHS4.18.007+1c/ vividha.viṣa.visarpān kuṣṭha.visphoṭa.kaṇḍūr || 7+1c ||
AHS4.18.007+1d/ apanayati masūrīṁ śīta.pittaṁ jvaraṁ ca || 7+1d ||
AHS4.18.008a/ śākhā.duṣṭe tu rudhire raktam evādito haret |
AHS4.18.008c/ tvaṅ.māṁsa.snāyu.saṅkledo rakta.kledād dhi jāyate || 8 ||
AHS4.18.009a/ nir.āme śleṣmaṇi kṣīṇe vāta.pittottare hitam |
AHS4.18.009c/ ghṛtaṁ tiktaṁ mahā.tiktaṁ śṛtaṁ vā trāyamāṇayā || 9 ||
AHS4.18.010a/ nirhṛte 'sre viśuddhe 'ntar.doṣe tvaṅ.māṁsa.sandhi.ge |
AHS4.18.010c/ bahiḥ.kriyāḥ pradehādyāḥ sadyo visarpa.śāntaye || 10 ||
AHS4.18.011a/ śatāhvā.musta.vārāhī.vaṁśārtagala.dhānyakam |
AHS4.18.011c/ surāhvā kṛṣṇagandhā ca kuṣṭhaṁ cālepanaṁ cale || 11 || [Note: AHS4.18.011v/ 18.11dv kuṣṭhaṁ vālepanaṁ cale]
AHS4.18.012a/ nyagrodhādi.gaṇaḥ pitte tathā padmotpalādikam |
AHS4.18.012c/ nyagrodha.pādās taruṇāḥ kadalī.garbha.saṁyutāḥ || 12 ||
AHS4.18.013a/ bisa.granthiś ca lepaḥ syāc chata.dhauta.ghṛtāplutaḥ |
AHS4.18.013c/ padminī.kardamaḥ śītaḥ piṣṭaṁ mauktikam eva vā || 13 ||
[Page 478 ]
AHS4.18.014a/ śaṅkhaḥ pravālaṁ śuktir vā gairikaṁ vā ghṛtānvitam |
AHS4.18.014c/ tri.phalā.padmakośīra.samaṅgā.karavīrakam || 14 || [Note: AHS4.18.014v/ 18.14dv .samaṅgā.karavīra.jam]
AHS4.18.015a/ nala.mūlāny anantā ca lepaḥ śleṣma.visarpa.hā |
AHS4.18.015c/ dhava.saptāhva.khadira.devadāru.kuraṇṭakam || 15 ||
AHS4.18.016a/ sa.mustāragvadhaṁ lepo vargo vā varuṇādikaḥ |
AHS4.18.016c/ āragvadhasya pattrāṇi tvacaḥ śleṣmātakodbhavāḥ || 16 ||
AHS4.18.017a/ indrāṇi.śākaṁ kākāhvā śirīṣa.kusumāni ca |
AHS4.18.017c/ seka.vraṇābhyaṅga.havir.lepa.cūrṇān yathā.yatham || 17 || [Note: AHS4.18.017v/ 18.17av indrāṇi.śāka.kākāhvā. 18.17bv .śirīṣa.kusumāni ca]
AHS4.18.018a/ etair evauṣadhaiḥ kuryād vāyau lepā ghṛtādhikāḥ |
AHS4.18.018c/ kapha.sthāna.gate sāme pitta.sthāna.gate 'tha.vā || 18 ||
AHS4.18.019a/ a.śītoṣṇā hitā rūkṣā rakta.pitte ghṛtānvitāḥ |
AHS4.18.019c/ aty.artha.śītās tanavas tanu.vastrāntarā.sthitāḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS4.18.019v/ 18.19dv tanu.vastrāntara.sthitāḥ]
AHS4.18.020a/ yojyāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe 'nye 'nye manda.vīryās ta eva ca |
AHS4.18.020c/ saṁsṛṣṭa.doṣe saṁsṛṣṭam etat karma praśasyate || 20 ||
AHS4.18.021a/ śata.dhauta.ghṛtenāgniṁ pradihyāt kevalena vā |
AHS4.18.021c/ secayed ghṛta.maṇḍena śītena madhukāmbunā || 21 ||
AHS4.18.022a/ sitāmbhasāmbho.da.jalaiḥ kṣīreṇekṣu.rasena vā |
AHS4.18.022c/ pāna.lepana.sekeṣu mahā.tiktaṁ paraṁ hitam || 22 || [Note: AHS4.18.022v/ 18.22av sitāmbhasāmbho.ja.jalaiḥ]
AHS4.18.023a/ granthy.ākhye rakta.pitta.ghnaṁ kṛtvā samyag yathoditam |
AHS4.18.023c/ kaphānila.ghnaṁ karmeṣṭaṁ piṇḍa.svedopanāhanam || 23 ||
[Page 479 ]
AHS4.18.024a/ granthi.visarpa.śūle tu tailenoṣṇena secayet |
AHS4.18.024c/ daśa.mūla.vipakvena tad.van mūtrair jalena vā || 24 ||
AHS4.18.025a/ sukhoṣṇayā pradihyād vā piṣṭayā kṛṣṇagandhayā |
AHS4.18.025c/ naktamāla.tvacā śuṣka.mūlakaiḥ kalinātha.vā || 25 ||
AHS4.18.026a/ dantī citraka.mūla.tvak saudhārka.payasī guḍaḥ |
AHS4.18.026c/ bhallātakāsthi kāsīsaṁ lepo bhindyāc chilām api || 26 || [Note: AHS4.18.026v/ 18.26bv snuhy.arka.payasī guḍaḥ]
AHS4.18.027a/ bahir.mārgāśritaṁ granthiṁ kiṁ punaḥ kapha.sambhavam |
AHS4.18.027c/ dīrgha.kāla.sthitaṁ granthim ebhir bhindyāc ca bheṣajaiḥ || 27 ||
AHS4.18.028a/ mūlakānāṁ kulatthānāṁ yūṣaiḥ sa.kṣāra.dāḍimaiḥ |
AHS4.18.028c/ godhūmānnair yavānnair vā sa.sīdhu.madhu.śārkaraiḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS4.18.028v/ 18.28cv godhūmānnair yavānnaiś ca 18.28dv sa.sīdhu.madhu.śarkaraiḥ]
AHS4.18.029a/ sa.kṣaudrair vāruṇī.maṇḍair mātuluṅga.rasānvitaiḥ |
AHS4.18.029c/ tri.phalāyāḥ prayogaiś ca pippalyāḥ kṣaudra.saṁyutaiḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS4.18.029v/ 18.29dv pippalī.kṣaudra.saṁyutaiḥ]
AHS4.18.030a/ devadāru.guḍūcyoś ca prayogair girijasya ca |
AHS4.18.030c/ musta.bhallāta.saktūnāṁ prayogair mākṣikasya ca || 30 ||
AHS4.18.031a/ dhūmair virekaiḥ śirasaḥ pūrvoktair gulma.bhedanaiḥ |
AHS4.18.031c/ taptāyo.hema.lavaṇa.pāṣāṇādi.prapīḍanaiḥ || 31 ||
AHS4.18.032a/ ābhiḥ kriyābhiḥ siddhābhir vividhābhir bale sthitaḥ |
AHS4.18.032c/ granthiḥ pāṣāṇa.kaṭhino yadi naivopaśāmyati || 32 ||
AHS4.18.033a/ athāsya dāhaḥ kṣāreṇa śarair hemnāpi vā hitaḥ |
AHS4.18.033c/ pākibhiḥ pācayitvā vā pāṭayitvā tam uddharet || 33 || [Note: AHS4.18.033v/ 18.33cv pākibhiḥ pācayitvā ca]
[Page 480 ]
AHS4.18.034a/ mokṣayed bahu.śaś cāsya raktam utkleśam āgatam |
AHS4.18.034c/ punaś cāpahṛte rakte vāta.śleṣma.jid auṣadham || 34 ||
AHS4.18.035a/ praklinne dāha.pākābhyāṁ bāhyāntar vraṇa.vat kriyā |
AHS4.18.035c/ dārvī.viḍaṅga.kampillaiḥ siddhaṁ tailaṁ vraṇe hitam || 35 ||
AHS4.18.036a/ dūrvā.sva.rasa.siddhaṁ tu kapha.pittottare ghṛtam |
AHS4.18.036c/ ekataḥ sarva.karmāṇi rakta.mokṣaṇam ekataḥ || 36 ||
AHS4.18.037a/ visarpo na hy a.saṁsṛṣṭaḥ sa 'sra.pittena jāyate |
AHS4.18.037c/ raktam evāśrayaś cāsya bahu.śo 'sraṁ hared ataḥ || 37 ||
AHS4.18.038a/ na ghṛtaṁ bahu.doṣāya deyaṁ yan na virecanam |
AHS4.18.038c/ tena doṣo hy upastabdhas tvag.rakta.piśitaṁ pacet || 38 ||

4.19. Chapter 19 :: Athakuṣṭhacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 415-]
AHS4.19.001a/ kuṣṭhinaṁ sneha.pānena pūrvaṁ sarvam upācaret |
AHS4.19.001c/ tatra vātottare tailaṁ ghṛtaṁ vā sādhitaṁ hitam || 1 ||
AHS4.19.002a/ daśa.mūlāmṛtairaṇḍa.śārṅgaṣṭā.meṣaśṛṅgibhiḥ |
AHS4.19.002c/ paṭola.nimba.kaṭukā.dārvī.pāṭhā.durālabhāḥ || 2 ||
AHS4.19.003a/ parpaṭaṁ trāyamāṇāṁ ca palāṁśaṁ pācayed apām |
AHS4.19.003c/ dvy.āḍhake 'ṣṭāṁśa.śeṣeṇa tena karṣonmitais tathā || 3 ||
AHS4.19.004a/ trāyantī.musta.bhūnimba.kaliṅga.kaṇa.candanaiḥ |
AHS4.19.004c/ sarpiṣo dvā.daśa.palaṁ pacet tat tiktakaṁ jayet || 4 ||
AHS4.19.005a/ pitta.kuṣṭha.parīsarpa.piṭikā.dāha.tṛḍ.bhramān |
AHS4.19.005c/ kaṇḍū.pāṇḍv.āmayān gaṇḍān duṣṭa.nāḍī.vraṇāpacīḥ || 5 ||
[Page 481 ]
AHS4.19.006a/ visphoṭa.vidradhī.gulma.śophonmāda.madān api |
AHS4.19.006c/ hṛd.roga.timira.vyaṅga.grahaṇī.śvitra.kāmalāḥ || 6 ||
AHS4.19.007a/ bhagandaram apasmāram udaraṁ pradaraṁ garam |
AHS4.19.007c/ arśo.'sra.pittam anyāṁś ca su.kṛcchrān pitta.jān gadān || 7 ||
AHS4.19.008a/ sa.pracchadaḥ parpaṭakaḥ śamyākaḥ kaṭukā vacā |
AHS4.19.008c/ tri.phalā padmakaṁ pāṭhā rajanyau śārive kaṇe || 8 ||
AHS4.19.009a/ nimba.candana.yaṣṭy.āhva.viśālendrayavāmṛtāḥ |
AHS4.19.009c/ kirātatiktakaṁ sevyaṁ vṛṣo mūrvā śatāvarī || 9 ||
AHS4.19.010a/ paṭolātiviṣā.mustā.trāyantī.dhanvayāsakam |
AHS4.19.010c/ tair jale 'ṣṭa.guṇe sarpir dvi.guṇāmalakī.rase || 10 ||
AHS4.19.011a/ siddhaṁ tiktān mahā.tiktaṁ guṇair abhyadhikaṁ matam |
AHS4.19.011c/ kaphottare ghṛtaṁ siddhaṁ nimba.saptāhva.citrakaiḥ || 11 ||
AHS4.19.012a/ kuṣṭhoṣaṇa.vacā.śāla.priyāla.caturaṅgulaiḥ |
AHS4.19.012c/ sarveṣu cāruṣkara.jaṁ taubaraṁ sārṣapaṁ pibet || 12 ||
AHS4.19.013a/ snehaṁ ghṛtaṁ vā kṛmijit.pathyā.bhallātakaiḥ śṛtam |
AHS4.19.013c/ āragvadhasya mūlena śata.kṛtvaḥ śṛtaṁ ghṛtam || 13 || [Note: AHS4.19.013v/ 19.13bv .pathyā.bhallātaka.śṛtam 19.13dv sapta.kṛtvaḥ śṛtaṁ ghṛtam]
AHS4.19.014a/ piban kuṣṭhaṁ jayaty āśu bhajan sa.khadiraṁ jalam |
AHS4.19.014c/ ebhir eva yathā.svaṁ ca snehair abhyañjanaṁ hitam || 14 || [Note: AHS4.19.014v/ 19.14av pibet kuṣṭhaṁ jayaty āśu]
AHS4.19.015a/ snigdhasya śodhanaṁ yojyaṁ visarpe yad udāhṛtam |
AHS4.19.015c/ lalāṭa.hasta.pādeṣu sirāś cāsya vimokṣayet || 15 ||
[Page 482 ]
AHS4.19.016a/ pracchānam alpake kuṣṭhe śṛṅgādyāś ca yathā.yatham |
AHS4.19.016c/ snehair āpyāyayec cainaṁ kuṣṭha.ghnair antarāntarā || 16 ||
AHS4.19.017a/ mukta.rakta.viriktasya rikta.koṣṭhasya kuṣṭhinaḥ |
AHS4.19.017c/ prabhañjanas tathā hy asya na syād deha.prabhañjanaḥ || 17 ||
AHS4.19.018a/ vāsāmṛtā.nimba.varā.paṭola.vyāghrī.karañjodaka.kalka.pakvam |
AHS4.19.018c/ sarpir visarpa.jvara.kāmalāsra.kuṣṭhāpahaṁ vajrakam āmananti || 18 ||
AHS4.19.019a/ tri.phalā.tri.kaṭu.dvi.kaṇṭakārī.kaṭukā.kumbha.nikumbha.rājavṛkṣaiḥ |
AHS4.19.019c/ sa.vacātiviṣāgnikaiḥ sa.pāṭhaiḥ picu.bhāgair nava.vajra.dugdha.muṣṭyā || 19 ||
AHS4.19.020a/ piṣṭaiḥ siddhaṁ sarpiṣaḥ prastham ebhiḥ krūre koṣṭhe snehanaṁ recanaṁ ca |
AHS4.19.020c/ kuṣṭha.śvitra.plīha.vardhmāśma.gulmān hanyāt kṛcchrāṁs tan mahā.vajrakākhyam || 20 ||
AHS4.19.021a/ danty.āḍhakam apāṁ droṇe paktvā tena ghṛtaṁ pacet |
AHS4.19.021c/ dhāmārgava.pale pītaṁ tad ūrdhvādho viśuddhi.kṛt || 21 ||
AHS4.19.022a/ āvartakī.tulāṁ droṇe paced aṣṭāṁśa.śeṣitam |
AHS4.19.022c/ tan.mūlais tatra niryūhe ghṛta.prasthaṁ vipācayet || 22 ||
AHS4.19.023a/ pītvā tad eka.divasāntaritaṁ su.jīrṇe bhuñjīta kodravam a.saṁskṛta.kāñjikena |
AHS4.19.023c/ kuṣṭhaṁ kilāsam apacīṁ ca vijetum icchan icchan prajāṁ ca vipulāṁ grahaṇaṁ smṛtiṁ ca || 23 || [Note: AHS4.19.023v/ 19.23bv bhuñjīta kodrava.su.saṁskṛta.kāñjikena]
AHS4.19.024a/ yater lelītaka.vasā kṣaudra.jātī.rasānvitā |
AHS4.19.024c/ kuṣṭha.ghnī sama.sarpir vā sa.gāyatry.asanodakā || 24 ||
AHS4.19.025a/ śālayo yava.godhūmāḥ koradūṣāḥ priyaṅgavaḥ |
AHS4.19.025c/ mudgā masūrās tubarī tikta.śākāni jāṅgalam || 25 ||
[Page 483 ]
AHS4.19.026a/ varā.paṭola.khadira.nimbāruṣkara.yojitam |
AHS4.19.026c/ madyāny auṣadha.garbhāṇi mathitaṁ cendurāji.mat || 26 ||
AHS4.19.027a/ anna.pānaṁ hitaṁ kuṣṭhe na tv amla.lavaṇoṣaṇam |
AHS4.19.027c/ dadhi.dugdha.guḍānūpa.tila.māṣāṁs tyajet.tarām || 27 ||
AHS4.19.028a/ paṭola.mūla.tri.phalā.viśālāḥ pṛthak.tri.bhāgāpacita.tri.śāṇāḥ |
AHS4.19.028c/ syus trāyamāṇā kaṭu.rohiṇī ca bhāgārdhike nāgara.pāda.yukte || 28 ||
AHS4.19.029a/ etat palaṁ jarjaritaṁ vipakvaṁ jale pibed doṣa.viśodhanāya |
AHS4.19.029c/ jīrṇe rasair dhanva.mṛga.dvi.jānāṁ purāṇa.śāly.odanam ādadīta || 29 ||
AHS4.19.030a/ kuṣṭhaṁ kilāsaṁ grahaṇī.pradoṣam arśāṁsi kṛcchrāṇi halīmakaṁ ca |
AHS4.19.030c/ ṣaḍ.rātra.yogena nihanti caitad hṛd.vasti.śūlaṁ viṣama.jvaraṁ ca || 30 || [Note: AHS4.19.030v/ 19.30cv ṣaḍ.rātra.yogena nihanti caiṣa]
AHS4.19.031a/ viḍaṅga.sārāmalakābhayānāṁ pala.trayaṁ trīṇi palāni kumbhāt |
AHS4.19.031c/ guḍasya ca dvā.daśa māsam eṣa jitātmanāṁ hanty upayujymānaḥ || 31 ||
AHS4.19.032a/ kuṣṭha.śvitra.śvāsa.kāsodarārśo.meha.plīha.granthi.rug.jantu.gulmān |
AHS4.19.032c/ siddhaṁ yogaṁ prāha yakṣo mumukṣor bhikṣoḥ prāṇān māṇibhadraḥ kilemam || 32 ||
AHS4.19.033a/ bhūnimba.nimba.tri.phalā.padmakātiviṣā.kaṇāḥ |
AHS4.19.033c/ mūrvā.paṭolī.dvi.niśā.pāṭhā.tiktendravāruṇīḥ || 33 ||
AHS4.19.034a/ sa.kaliṅga.vacās tulyā dvi.guṇāś ca yathottaram |
AHS4.19.034c/ lihyād dantī.trivṛd.brāhmīs cūrṇitā madhu.sarpiṣā || 34 ||
AHS4.19.035a/ kuṣṭha.meha.prasuptīnāṁ paramaṁ syāt tad auṣadham |
AHS4.19.035c/ varā.viḍaṅga.kṛṣṇā vā lihyāt tailājya.mākṣikaiḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS4.19.035v/ 19.35av kuṣṭha.meha.prataptānāṁ]
[Page 484 ]
AHS4.19.036a/ kākodumbarikā.vella.nimbābda.vyoṣa.kalka.vān |
AHS4.19.036c/ hanti vṛkṣaka.niryūhaḥ pānāt sarvāṁs tvag.āmayān || 36 || [Note: AHS4.19.036v/ 19.36dv pānāt sarva.tvag.āmayān]
AHS4.19.037a/ kuṭajāgni.nimba.nṛpataru.khadirāsana.saptaparṇa.niryūhe |
AHS4.19.037c/ siddhā madhu.ghṛta.yuktāḥ kuṣṭha.ghnīr bhakṣayed abhayāḥ || 37 ||
AHS4.19.037ū̆ab/ dārvī.khadira.nimbānāṁ tvak.kvāthaḥ kuṣṭha.sūdanaḥ || 37ū̆ab ||
AHS4.19.038a/ niśottamā.nimba.paṭola.mūla.tiktā.vacā.lohitayaṣṭikābhiḥ |
AHS4.19.038c/ kṛtaḥ kaṣāyaḥ kapha.pitta.kuṣṭhaṁ su.sevito dharma ivocchinatti || 38 ||
AHS4.19.039a/ ebhir eva ca śṛtaṁ ghṛtam ukhyaṁ bheṣajair jayati māruta.kuṣṭham |
AHS4.19.039c/ kalpayet khadira.nimba.guḍūcī.devadāru.rajanīḥ pṛthag evam || 39 ||
AHS4.19.040a/ pāṭhā.dārvī.vahni.ghuṇeṣṭā.kaṭukābhir || 40a ||
AHS4.19.040b/ mūtraṁ yuktaṁ śakrayavaiś coṣṇa.jalaṁ vā || 40b ||
AHS4.19.040c/ kuṣṭhī pītvā māsam a.ruk syād guda.kīlī || 40c ||
AHS4.19.040d/ mehī śophī pāṇḍura.jīrṇī kṛmi.māṁś ca || 40d ||
AHS4.19.041a/ lākṣā.dantī.madhurasa.varā.dvīpi.pāṭhā.viḍaṅga. || 41a ||
AHS4.19.041b/ .pratyakpuṣpī.tri.kaṭu.rajanī.saptaparṇāṭarūṣam || 41b ||
AHS4.19.041c/ raktā nimbaṁ surataru kṛtaṁ pañca.mūlyau ca cūrṇaṁ || 41c ||
AHS4.19.041d/ pītvā māsaṁ jayati hita.bhug gavya.mūtreṇa kuṣṭham || 41d || [Note: AHS4.19.041v/ 19.41av lākṣā.dantī.madhurasa.varā.dvīpi.pāṭhā.viḍaṅgaṁ 19.41bv pratyakpuṣpī.tri.kaṭu.rajanī.saptaparṇāṭarūṣam]
AHS4.19.042a/ niśā.kaṇā.nāgara.vella.taubaraṁ sa.vahni.tāpyaṁ krama.śo vivardhitam |
AHS4.19.042c/ gavāmbu.pītaṁ vaṭakī.kṛtaṁ tathā nihanti kuṣṭhāni sa.dāruṇāny api || 42 ||
AHS4.19.043a/ tri.kaṭūttamā.tilāruṣkarājya.mākṣika.sitopalā.vihitā |
AHS4.19.043c/ guṭikā rasāyanaṁ kuṣṭha.jic ca vṛṣyā ca sapta.samā || 43 || [Note: AHS4.19.043v/ 19.43cv guṭikā rasāyanaṁ syāt 19.43cc ṇṭha.hṛc ca vṛṣyā ca sapta.samā 19.43dv kuṣṭha.jic ca vṛṣyā ca sapta.samā]
AHS4.19.044a/ candraśakalāgni.rajanī.viḍaṅga.tubarāsthy.aruṣkara.tri.phalābhiḥ |
AHS4.19.044c/ vaṭakā guḍāṁśa.k ptāḥ samasta.kuṣṭhāni nāśayanty abhyastāḥ || 44 ||
[Page 485 ]
AHS4.19.045a/ viḍaṅga.bhallātaka.vākucīnāṁ sa.dvīpi.vārāhi.harītakīnām |
AHS4.19.045c/ sa.lāṅgalī.kṛṣṇa.tilopakulyā guḍena piṇḍī vinihanti kuṣṭham || 45 ||
AHS4.19.046a/ śaśāṅkalekhā sa.viḍaṅga.sārā sa.pippalīkā sa.hutāśa.mūlā |
AHS4.19.046c/ sāyo.malā sāmalakā sa.tailā kuṣṭhāni kṛcchrāṇi nihanti līḍhā || 46 || [Note: AHS4.19.046v/ 19.46av śaśāṅkalekhā sa.viḍaṅga.mūlā]
AHS4.19.047a/ pathyā.tila.guḍaiḥ piṇḍī kuṣṭhaṁ sāruṣkarair jayet |
AHS4.19.047c/ guḍāruṣkara.jantughna.somarājī.kṛtātha.vā || 47 ||
AHS4.19.048a/ viḍaṅgādri.jatu.kṣaudra.sarpiṣ.mat khādiraṁ rajaḥ |
AHS4.19.048c/ kiṭibha.śvitra.dadrū.ghnaṁ khāden mita.hitāśanaḥ || 48 ||
AHS4.19.049a/ sitā.taila.kṛmighnāni dhātry.ayo.mala.pippalīḥ |
AHS4.19.049c/ lihānaḥ sarva.kuṣṭhāni jayaty ati.gurūṇy api || 49 ||
AHS4.19.050a/ mustaṁ vyoṣaṁ tri.phalā mañjiṣṭhā dāru pañca.mūle dve |
AHS4.19.050c/ saptacchada.nimba.tvak sa.viśālā citrako mūrvā || 50 ||
AHS4.19.051a/ cūrṇaṁ tarpaṇa.bhāgair navabhiḥ saṁyojitaṁ sa.madhv.aṁśam |
AHS4.19.051c/ nityaṁ kuṣṭha.nibarhaṇam etat prāyogikaṁ khādan || 51 ||
AHS4.19.052a/ śvayathuṁ sa.pāṇḍu.rogaṁ śvitraṁ grahaṇī.pradoṣam arśāṁsi |
AHS4.19.052c/ vardhma.bhagandara.piṭikā.kaṇḍū.koṭhāpacīr hanti || 52 ||
AHS4.19.053a/ rasāyana.prayogeṇa tubarāsthīni śīlayet |
AHS4.19.053c/ bhallātakaṁ vākucikāṁ vahni.mūlaṁ śilāhvayam || 53 ||
AHS4.19.054a/ iti doṣe vijite 'ntas.tvak.sthe śamanaṁ bahiḥ pralepādi hitam |
AHS4.19.054c/ tīkṣṇālepotkliṣṭaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ hi vivṛddhim eti maline dehe || 54 ||
[Page 486 ]
AHS4.19.055a/ sthira.kaṭhina.maṇḍalānāṁ kuṣṭhānāṁ poṭalair hitaḥ svedaḥ |
AHS4.19.055c/ svinnotsannaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ śastrair likhitaṁ pralepanair limpet || 55 ||
AHS4.19.056a/ yeṣu na śastraṁ kramate sparśendriya.nāśaneṣu kuṣṭheṣu |
AHS4.19.056c/ teṣu nipātyaḥ kṣāro raktaṁ doṣaṁ ca visrāvya || 56 ||
AHS4.19.057a/ lepo 'ti.kaṭhina.paruṣe supte kuṣṭhe sthire purāṇe ca |
AHS4.19.057c/ pītā.gadasya kāryo viṣaiḥ sa.mantro '.gadaiś cānu || 57 || [Note: AHS4.19.057v/ 19.57dv viṣaiḥ sa.mantrā.gadaiś cānu]
AHS4.19.058a/ stabdhāni supta.suptāny a.svedana.kaṇḍulāni kuṣṭhāni |
AHS4.19.058c/ ghṛṣṭāni śuṣka.go.maya.phenaka.śastraiḥ pradehyāni || 58 ||
AHS4.19.059a/ mustā tri.phalā madanaṁ karañja āragvadhaḥ kaliṅga.yavāḥ |
AHS4.19.059c/ saptāhva.kuṣṭha.phalinī.dārvyaḥ siddhārthakaṁ snānam || 59 ||
AHS4.19.060a/ eṣa kaṣāyo vamanaṁ virecanaṁ varṇakas tathodgharṣaḥ |
AHS4.19.060c/ tvag.doṣa.kuṣṭha.śopha.prabādhanaḥ pāṇḍu.roga.ghnaḥ || 60 ||
AHS4.19.061a/ karavīra.nimba.kuṭajāc chamyākāc citrakāc ca mūlānām |
AHS4.19.061c/ mūtre darvī.lepī kvātho lepena kuṣṭha.ghnaḥ || 61 ||
AHS4.19.062a/ śveta.karavīra.mūlaṁ kuṭaja.karañjāt phalaṁ tvaco dārvyāḥ |
AHS4.19.062c/ sumanaḥ.pravāla.yukto lepaḥ kuṣṭhāpahaḥ siddhaḥ || 62 ||
AHS4.19.063a/ śairīṣī tvak puṣpaṁ kārpāsyā rājavṛkṣa.pattrāṇi |
AHS4.19.063c/ piṣṭā ca kākamācī catur.vidhaḥ kuṣṭha.hā lepaḥ || 63 ||
AHS4.19.064a/ vyoṣa.sarṣapa.niśā.gṛha.dhūmair yāva.śūka.paṭu.citraka.kuṣṭhaiḥ |
AHS4.19.064c/ kola.mātra.guṭikārdha.viṣāṁśā śvitra.kuṣṭha.haraṇo vara.lepaḥ || 64 ||
[Page 487 ]
AHS4.19.065a/ nimbaṁ haridre surasaṁ paṭolaṁ kuṣṭhāśvagandhe suradāru śigruḥ |
AHS4.19.065c/ sa.sarṣapaṁ tumburu.dhānya.vanyaṁ caṇḍā ca cūrṇāni samāni kuryāt || 65 ||
AHS4.19.066a/ tais takra.piṣṭaiḥ prathamaṁ śarīraṁ tailāktam udvartayituṁ yateta |
AHS4.19.066c/ tathāsya kaṇḍūḥ piṭikāḥ sa.koṭhāḥ kuṣṭhāni śophāś ca śamaṁ vrajanti || 66 || [Note: AHS4.19.066v/ 19.66cv tenāsya kaṇḍūḥ piṭikāḥ sa.koṭhāḥ]
AHS4.19.067a/ mustāmṛtāsaṅga.kaṭaṅkaṭerī.kāsīsa.kampillaka.kuṣṭha.lodhrāḥ |
AHS4.19.067c/ gandhopalaḥ sarja.raso viḍaṅgaṁ manaḥśilāle karavīraka.tvak || 67 ||
AHS4.19.068a/ tailākta.gātrasya kṛtāni cūrṇāny etāni dadyād avacūrṇanārtham |
AHS4.19.068c/ dadrūḥ sa.kaṇḍūḥ kiṭibhāni pāmā vicarcikā ceti tathā na santi || 68 ||
AHS4.19.069a/ snug.gaṇḍe sarṣapāt kalkaḥ kukūlānala.pācitaḥ |
AHS4.19.069c/ lepād vicarcikāṁ hanti rāga.vega iva trapām || 69 ||
AHS4.19.070a/ manaḥśilāle maricāni tailam ārkaṁ payaḥ kuṣṭha.haraḥ pradehaḥ |
AHS4.19.070c/ tathā karañja.prapunāṭa.bījaṁ kuṣṭhānvitaṁ go.salilena piṣṭam || 70 ||
AHS4.19.071a/ guggulu.marica.viḍaṅgaiḥ sarṣapa.kāsīsa.sarja.rasa.mustaiḥ |
AHS4.19.071c/ śrīveṣṭa.kālagandhair manaḥśilā.kuṣṭha.kampillaiḥ || 71 ||
AHS4.19.072a/ ubhaya.haridrā.sahitaiś cākrika.tailena miśritair ebhiḥ |
AHS4.19.072c/ dina.kara.karābhitaptaiḥ kuṣṭhaṁ ghṛṣṭaṁ ca naṣṭaṁ ca || 72 ||
AHS4.19.073a/ maricaṁ tamāla.pattraṁ kuṣṭhaṁ sa.manaḥśilaṁ sa.kāsīsam |
AHS4.19.073c/ tailena yuktam uṣitaṁ saptāhaṁ bhājane tāmre || 73 ||
AHS4.19.074a/ tenāliptaṁ sidhmaṁ saptāhād gharma.sevino 'paiti |
AHS4.19.074c/ māsān navaṁ kilāsaṁ snānena vinā viśuddhasya || 74 ||
[Page 488 ]
AHS4.19.075a/ mayūraka.kṣāra.jale sapta.kṛtvaḥ parisrute |
AHS4.19.075c/ siddhaṁ jyotiṣmatī.tailam abhyaṅgāt sidhma.nāśanam || 75 ||
AHS4.19.076a/ vāyasajaṅghā.mūlaṁ vamanī.pattrāṇi mūlakād bījam |
AHS4.19.076c/ takreṇa bhauma.vāre lepaḥ sidhmāpahaḥ siddhaḥ || 76 ||
AHS4.19.077a/ jīvantī mañjiṣṭhā dārvī kampillakaṁ payas tuttham |
AHS4.19.077c/ eṣa ghṛta.taila.pākaḥ siddhaḥ siddhe ca sarja.rasaḥ || 77 ||
AHS4.19.078a/ deyaḥ sa.madhūcchiṣṭo vipādikā tena naśyati hy aktā |
AHS4.19.078c/ carmaika.kuṣṭha.kiṭibhaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ śāmyaty alasakaṁ ca || 78 ||
AHS4.19.079a/ mūlaṁ saptāhvāt tvak śirīṣāśvamārād arkān mālatyāś citrakāsphota.nimbāt |
AHS4.19.079c/ bījaṁ kārañjaṁ sārṣapaṁ prāpunāṭam śreṣṭhā jantughnaṁ try.ūṣaṇaṁ dve haridre || 79 ||
AHS4.19.080a/ tailaṁ tailaṁ sādhitaṁ taiḥ sa.mūtrais tvag.doṣāṇāṁ duṣṭa.nāḍī.vraṇānām |
AHS4.19.080c/ abhyaṅgena śleṣma.vātodbhavānāṁ nāśāyālaṁ vajrakaṁ vajra.tulyam || 80 ||
AHS4.19.081a/ eraṇḍa.tārkṣya.ghana.nīpa.kadamba.bhārgī. || 81a ||
AHS4.19.081b/ .kampilla.vella.phalinī.suravāruṇībhiḥ || 81b ||
AHS4.19.081c/ nirguṇḍy.aruṣkara.surāhva.suvarṇadugdhā. || 81c ||
AHS4.19.081d/ .śrīveṣṭa.guggulu.śilā.paṭu.tāla.viśvaiḥ || 81d ||
AHS4.19.082a/ tulya.snug.arka.dugdhaṁ siddhaṁ tailaṁ smṛtaṁ mahā.vajram |
AHS4.19.082c/ atiśayita.vajraka.guṇaṁ śvitrārśo.granthi.mālā.ghnam || 82 ||
AHS4.19.083a/ kuṣṭhāśvamāra.bhṛṅgārka.mūtra.snuk.kṣīra.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS4.19.083c/ tailaṁ siddhaṁ viṣāpaham abhyaṅgāt kuṣṭha.jit param || 83 ||
AHS4.19.084a/ siddhaṁ sikthaka.sindūra.pura.tutthaka.tārkṣya.jaiḥ |
AHS4.19.084c/ kacchūṁ vicarcikāṁ cāśu kaṭu.tailaṁ nibarhati || 84 || [Note: AHS4.19.084v/ 19.84bv .pura.tutthaka.tārkṣyakaiḥ 19.84cv pāmāṁ vicarcikāṁ cāśu 19.84dv kaṭu.tailaṁ niyacchati]
[Page 489 ]
AHS4.19.085a/ lākṣā vyoṣaṁ prāpunāṭaṁ ca bījaṁ sa.śrīveṣṭaṁ kuṣṭha.siddhārthakāś ca |
AHS4.19.085c/ takronmiśraḥ syād dharidrā ca lepo dadrūṣūkto mūlakotthaṁ ca bījam || 85 ||
AHS4.19.086a/ citraka.śobhāñjanakau guḍūcy.apāmārga.devadārūṇi |
AHS4.19.086c/ khadiro dhavaś ca lepaḥ śyāmā dantī dravantī ca || 86 ||
AHS4.19.087a/ lākṣā.rasāñjanailāḥ punarnavā ceti kuṣṭhināṁ lepāḥ |
AHS4.19.087c/ dadhi.maṇḍa.yutāḥ pādaiḥ ṣaṭ proktā māruta.kapha.ghnāḥ || 87 ||
AHS4.19.088a/ jala.vāpya.loha.kesara.pattra.plava.candana.mṛṇālāni |
AHS4.19.088c/ bhāgottarāṇi siddhaṁ pralepanaṁ pitta.kapha.kuṣṭhe || 88 ||
AHS4.19.089a/ tikta.ghṛtair dhauta.ghṛtair abhyaṅgo dahyamāna.kuṣṭheṣu |
AHS4.19.089c/ tailaiś candana.madhuka.prapauṇḍarīkotpala.yutaiś ca || 89 ||
AHS4.19.090a/ klede prapatati cāṅge dāhe visphoṭake ca carma.dale |
AHS4.19.090c/ śītāḥ pradeha.sekā vyadhana.virekau ghṛtaṁ tiktam || 90 ||
AHS4.19.091a/ khadira.vṛṣa.nimba.kuṭajāḥ śreṣṭhā.kṛmijit.paṭola.madhuparṇyaḥ |
AHS4.19.091c/ antar bahiḥ prayuktāḥ kṛmi.kuṣṭha.nudaḥ sa.go.mutrāḥ || 91 ||
AHS4.19.091+1a/ pralepodvartana.snāna.pāna.bhojana.karmaṇi |
AHS4.19.091+1c/ śīlitaṁ khādiraṁ vāri sarva.tvag.doṣa.nāśanam || 91+1 ||
AHS4.19.092a/ vātottareṣu sarpir vamanaṁ śleṣmottareṣu kuṣṭheṣu |
AHS4.19.092c/ pittottareṣu mokṣo raktasya virecanaṁ cāgre || 92 || [Note: AHS4.19.092v/ 19.92dv raktasya virecanaṁ cāgryam]
AHS4.19.093a/ ye lepāḥ kuṣṭhānāṁ yujyante nirhṛtāsra.doṣāṇām |
AHS4.19.093c/ saṁśodhitāśayānāṁ sadyaḥ siddhir bhavati teṣām || 93 ||
[Page 490 ]
AHS4.19.094a/ doṣe hṛte 'panīte rakte bāhyāntare kṛte śamane |
AHS4.19.094c/ snehe ca kāla.yukte na kuṣṭham ativartate sādhyam || 94 ||
AHS4.19.095a/ bahu.doṣaḥ saṁśodhyaḥ kuṣṭhī bahu.śo 'nurakṣatā prāṇān |
AHS4.19.095c/ doṣe hy ati.mātra.hṛte vāyur hanyād a.balam āśu || 95 ||
AHS4.19.096a/ pakṣāt pakṣāc chardanāny abhyupeyān māsān māsāc chodhanāny apy adhas.tāt |
AHS4.19.096c/ śuddhir mūrdhni syāt tri.rātrāt tri.rātrāt ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe māsy asṛṅ.mokṣaṇaṁ ca || 96 || [Note: AHS4.19.096v/ 19.96dv ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe māsy asṛṅ.mokṣaṇāni]
AHS4.19.097a/ yo dur.vānto dur.virikto 'tha.vā syāt || 97a ||
AHS4.19.097b/ kuṣṭhī doṣair uddhatair vyāpyate 'sau || 97b ||
AHS4.19.097c/ niḥ.sandehaṁ yāty a.sādhya.tvam evaṁ || 97c ||
AHS4.19.097d/ tasmāt kṛtsnān nirhared asya doṣān || 97d ||
AHS4.19.098a/ vrata.dama.yama.sevā.tyāga.śīlābhiyogo || 98a ||
AHS4.19.098b/ dvi.ja.sura.guru.pūjā sarva.sat.tveṣu maitrī || 98b ||
AHS4.19.098c/ śiva.śiva.suta.tārā.bhās.karārādhanāni || 98c ||
AHS4.19.098d/ prakaṭita.mala.pāpaṁ kuṣṭham unmūlayanti || 98d || [Note: AHS4.19.098v/ 19.98cv jina.jina.suta.tārā.bhās.karārādhanāni]

4.20. Chapter 20 :: Athaśvitrakṛmicikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 421-423]
AHS4.20.001a/ kuṣṭhād api bībhatsaṁ yac chīghra.taraṁ ca yāty a.sādhya.tvam |
AHS4.20.001c/ śvitram atas tac.chāntyai yateta dīpte yathā bhavane || 1 ||
AHS4.20.002a/ saṁśodhanaṁ viśeṣāt prayojayet pūrvam eva dehasya |
AHS4.20.002c/ śvitre sraṁsanam agryaṁ malayū.rasa iṣyate sa.guḍaḥ || 2 ||
AHS4.20.003a/ taṁ pītvābhyakta.tanur yathā.balaṁ sūrya.pāda.santāpam |
AHS4.20.003c/ seveta virikta.tanur try.ahaṁ pipāsuḥ pibet peyām || 3 ||
AHS4.20.004a/ śvitre 'ṅge ye sphoṭā jāyante kaṇṭakena tān bhindyāt |
AHS4.20.004c/ sphoṭeṣu niḥsruteṣu prātaḥ prātaḥ pibet tri.dinam || 4 || [Note: AHS4.20.004v/ 20.4dv prātaḥ prātaḥ pibet pakṣam]
AHS4.20.005a/ malayūm asanaṁ priyaṅguṁ śatapuṣpāṁ cāmbhasā samutkvāthya |
AHS4.20.005c/ pālāśaṁ vā kṣāraṁ yathā.balaṁ phāṇitopetam || 5 ||
[Page 491 ]
AHS4.20.006a/ phalgv.akṣa.vṛkṣa.valkala.niryūheṇendurājikā.kalkam |
AHS4.20.006c/ pītvoṣṇa.sthitasya jāte sphoṭe takreṇa bhojanaṁ nir.lavaṇam || 6 ||
AHS4.20.007a/ gavyaṁ mūtraṁ citraka.vyoṣa.yuktaṁ sarpiḥ.kumbhe sthāpitaṁ kṣaudra.miśram |
AHS4.20.007c/ pakṣād ūrdhvaṁ śvitriṇā peyam etat kāryaṁ cāsmai kuṣṭha.diṣṭaṁ vidhānam || 7 || [Note: AHS4.20.007v/ 20.7cv pakṣād ūrdhvaṁ śvitribhiḥ peyam etat]
AHS4.20.008a/ mārkavam atha.vā svāded bhṛṣṭaṁ tailena loha.pātra.stham |
AHS4.20.008c/ bījaka.śṛtaṁ ca dugdhaṁ tad anu pibec chvitra.nāśāya || 8 ||
AHS4.20.009a/ pūtīkārka.vyādhighāta.snuhīnāṁ mūtre piṣṭāḥ pallavā jāti.jāś ca |
AHS4.20.009c/ ghnanty ālepāc chvitra.dur.nāma.dadrū.pāmā.koṭhān duṣṭa.nāḍī.vraṇāṁś ca || 9 ||
AHS4.20.010a/ dvaipaṁ dagdhaṁ carma mātaṅga.jaṁ vā śvitre lepas taila.yukto variṣṭhaḥ |
AHS4.20.010c/ pūtiḥ kīṭo rājavṛkṣodbhavena kṣāreṇāktaḥ śvitram eko 'pi hanti || 10 || [Note: AHS4.20.010v/ 20.10dv kṣāreṇāktaḥ śvitram eko nihanti]
AHS4.20.011a/ rātrau go.mūtre vāsitān jarjarāṅgān ahni cchāyāyāṁ śoṣayet sphoṭa.hetūn |
AHS4.20.011c/ evaṁ vārāṁs trīṁs tais tataḥ ślakṣṇa.piṣṭaiḥ snuhyāḥ kṣīreṇa śvitra.nāśāya lepaḥ || 11 ||
AHS4.20.012a/ akṣa.taila.drutā lepaḥ kṛṣṇa.sarpodbhavā maṣī |
AHS4.20.012c/ śikhi.pittaṁ tathā dagdhaṁ hrīveraṁ vā tad.āplutam || 12 || [Note: AHS4.20.012v/ 20.12av akṣa.taila.kṛto lepaḥ 20.12av akṣa.taila.druto lepaḥ]
AHS4.20.013a/ kuḍavo 'valguja.bījād dharitāla.catur.bhāga.sammiśraḥ |
AHS4.20.013c/ mūtreṇa gavāṁ piṣṭaḥ sa.varṇa.karaṇaṁ paraṁ śvitre || 13 ||
AHS4.20.014a/ kṣāre su.dagdhe gaja.liṇḍa.je ca gajasya mūtreṇa parisrute ca |
AHS4.20.014c/ droṇa.pramāṇe daśa.bhāga.yuktaṁ dattvā paced bījam avalgujānām || 14 || [Note: AHS4.20.014v/ 20.14av kṣāre su.dagdhe gaja.liṇḍa.je vā 20.14bv gajasya mūtre ca parisrute ca]
AHS4.20.015a/ śvitraṁ jayec cikkaṇa.tāṁ gatena tena pralimpan bahu.śaḥ praghṛṣṭaṁ |
AHS4.20.015c/ kuṣṭhaṁ maṣaṁ vā tila.kālakaṁ vā yad vā vraṇe syād adhi.māṁsa.jātam || 15 ||
[Page 492 ]
AHS4.20.016a/ bhallātakaṁ dvīpi.sudhārka.mūlaṁ guñjā.phalaṁ try.ūṣaṇa.śaṅkha.cūrṇam |
AHS4.20.016c/ tutthaṁ sa.kuṣṭhaṁ lavaṇāni pañca kṣāra.dvayaṁ lāṅgalikāṁ ca paktvā || 16 || [Note: AHS4.20.016v/ 20.16av bhallātaka.dvīpi.sudhārka.mūla. 20.16bv .guñjā.phala.try.ūṣaṇa.śaṅkha.cūrṇam]
AHS4.20.017a/ snug.arka.dugdhe ghanam āyasa.sthaṁ śalākayā tad vidadhīta lepam |
AHS4.20.017c/ kuṣṭhe kilāse tila.kālakeṣu maṣeṣu dur.nāmasu carma.kīle || 17 ||
AHS4.20.018a/ śuddhyā śoṇita.mokṣair virūkṣaṇair bhakṣaṇaiś ca saktūnām |
AHS4.20.018c/ śvitraṁ kasya.cid eva praśāmyati kṣīṇa.pāpasya || 18 ||
AHS4.20.019a/ snigdha.svinne guḍa.kṣīra.matsyādyaiḥ kṛmiṇodare |
AHS4.20.019c/ utkleśita.kṛmi.kaphe śarvarīṁ tāṁ sukhoṣite || 19 ||
AHS4.20.020a/ surasādi.gaṇaṁ mūtre kvāthayitvārdha.vāriṇi |
AHS4.20.020c/ taṁ kaṣāyaṁ kaṇā.gāla.kṛmijit.kalka.yojitam || 20 ||
AHS4.20.021a/ sa.taila.svarjikā.kṣāraṁ yuñjyād vastiṁ tato 'hani |
AHS4.20.021c/ tasminn eva nirūḍhaṁ taṁ pāyayeta virecanam || 21 ||
AHS4.20.022a/ trivṛt.kalkaṁ phala.kaṇā.kaṣāyāloḍitaṁ tataḥ |
AHS4.20.022c/ ūrdhvādhaḥ.śodhite kuryāt pañca.kola.yutaṁ kramam || 22 ||
AHS4.20.023a/ kaṭu.tikta.kaṣāyāṇāṁ kaṣāyaiḥ pariṣecanam |
AHS4.20.023c/ kāle viḍaṅga.tailena tatas tam anuvāsayet || 23 || [Note: AHS4.20.023v/ 20.23bv kaṣāyaiḥ pariṣecayet]
AHS4.20.024a/ śiro.roga.niṣedhoktam ācaren mūrdha.geṣv anu |
AHS4.20.024c/ udrikta.tikta.kaṭukam alpa.snehaṁ ca bhojanam || 24 || [Note: AHS4.20.024v/ 20.24dv alpa.snehaṁ ca bhojayet]
AHS4.20.025a/ viḍaṅga.kṛṣṇā.marica.pippalī.mūla.śigrubhiḥ |
AHS4.20.025c/ pibet sa.svarjikā.kṣārair yavāgūṁ takra.sādhitām || 25 || [Note: AHS4.20.025v/ 20.25av viḍaṅga.kṛṣṇā.madhuka. 20.25cv pibet sa.svarjikā.kṣārāṁ]
[Page 493 ]
AHS4.20.026a/ rasaṁ śirīṣa.kiṇihī.pāribhadraka.kembukāt |
AHS4.20.026c/ palāśa.bīja.pattūra.pūtikād vā pṛthak pibet || 26 ||
AHS4.20.027a/ sa.kṣaudraṁ surasādīn vā lihyāt kṣaudra.yutān pṛthak |
AHS4.20.027c/ śata.kṛtvo 'śva.viṭ.cūrṇaṁ viḍaṅga.kvātha.bhāvitam || 27 ||
AHS4.20.028a/ kṛmi.mān madhunā lihyād bhāvitaṁ vā varā.rasaiḥ |
AHS4.20.028c/ śiro.gateṣu kṛmiṣu cūrṇaṁ pradhamanaṁ ca tat || 28 ||
AHS4.20.029a/ ākhukarṇī.kisalayaiḥ su.piṣṭaiḥ piṣṭa.miśritaiḥ |
AHS4.20.029c/ paktvā pūpalikāṁ khāded dhānyāmlaṁ ca pibed anu || 29 || [Note: AHS4.20.029v/ 20.29av ākhuparṇī.kisalayaiḥ]
AHS4.20.030a/ sa.pañca.kola.lavaṇam a.sāndraṁ takram eva vā |
AHS4.20.030c/ nīpa.mārkava.nirguṇḍī.pallaveṣv apy ayaṁ vidhiḥ || 30 || [Note: AHS4.20.030v/ 20.30cv nimbāpāmārga.nirguṇḍī.]
AHS4.20.031a/ viḍaṅga.cūrṇa.miśrair vā piṣṭair bhakṣyān prakalpayet |
AHS4.20.031c/ viḍaṅga.taṇḍulair yuktam ardhāṁśair ātape sthitam || 31 || [Note: AHS4.20.031v/ 20.31dv ardhāṁśair ātapa.sthitam]
AHS4.20.032a/ dinam āruṣkaraṁ tailaṁ pāne vastau ca yojayet |
AHS4.20.032c/ surāhva.sarala.snehaṁ pṛthag evaṁ ca kalpayet || 32 ||
AHS4.20.033a/ purīṣa.jeṣu su.tarāṁ dadyād vasti.virecane |
AHS4.20.033c/ śiro.virekaṁ vamanaṁ śamanaṁ kapha.janmasu || 33 ||
AHS4.20.034a/ rakta.jānāṁ pratīkāraṁ kuryāt kuṣṭha.cikitsitāt |
AHS4.20.034c/ indra.lupta.vidhiś cātra vidheyo roma.bhojiṣu || 34 ||
AHS4.20.035a/ kṣīrāṇi māṁsāni ghṛtaṁ guḍaṁ ca dadhīni śākāni ca parṇa.vanti |
AHS4.20.035c/ samāsato 'mlān madhurān rasāṁś ca kṛmīñ jihāsuḥ parivarjayeta || 35 ||

4.21. Chapter 21 :: Athavātavyādhicikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 423-428] [Page 494 ]
AHS4.21.001a/ kevalaṁ nir.upastambham ādau snehair upācaret |
AHS4.21.001c/ vāyuṁ sarpir.vasā.majja.taila.pānair naraṁ tataḥ || 1 ||
AHS4.21.002a/ sneha.klāntaṁ samāśvāsya payobhiḥ snehayet punaḥ |
AHS4.21.002c/ yūṣair grāmyaudakānūpa.rasair vā sneha.saṁyutaiḥ || 2 ||
AHS4.21.003a/ pāyasaiḥ kṛśaraiḥ sāmla.lavaṇaiḥ sānuvāsanaiḥ |
AHS4.21.003c/ nāvanais tarpaṇaiś cānnaiḥ su.snigdhaiḥ svedayet tataḥ || 3 ||
AHS4.21.004a/ sv.abhyaktaṁ sneha.saṁyuktaiḥ śaṅkarādyaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS4.21.004c/ snehāktaṁ svinnam aṅgaṁ tu vakraṁ stabdhaṁ sa.vedanam || 4 || [Note: AHS4.21.004v/ 21.4cv snehākta.svinnam aṅgaṁ tu]
AHS4.21.005a/ yatheṣṭam ānāmayituṁ sukham eva hi śakyate |
AHS4.21.005c/ śuṣkāṇy api hi kāṣṭhāni sneha.svedopapādanaiḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS4.21.005v/ 21.5dv sneha.svedopanāhanaiḥ]
AHS4.21.006a/ śakyaṁ karmaṇya.tāṁ netuṁ kim u gātrāṇi jīvatām |
AHS4.21.006c/ harṣa.toda.rug.āyāma.śopha.stambha.grahādayaḥ || 6 ||
AHS4.21.007a/ svinnasyāśu praśāmyanti mārdavaṁ copajāyate |
AHS4.21.007c/ snehaś ca dhātūn saṁśuṣkān puṣṇāty āśūpayojitaḥ || 7 || [Note: AHS4.21.007v/ 21.7dv puṣṇāty āśu prayojitaḥ]
AHS4.21.008a/ balam agni.balaṁ puṣṭiṁ prāṇāṁś cāsyābhivardhayet |
AHS4.21.008c/ a.sakṛt taṁ punaḥ snehaiḥ svedaiś ca pratipādayet || 8 || [Note: AHS4.21.008v/ 21.8bv prāṇaṁ cāsyābhivardhayet]
AHS4.21.009a/ tathā sneha.mṛdau koṣṭhe na tiṣṭhanty anilāmayāḥ |
AHS4.21.009c/ yady etena sa.doṣa.tvāt karmaṇā na praśāmyati || 9 ||
AHS4.21.010a/ mṛdubhiḥ sneha.saṁyuktair bheṣajais taṁ viśodhayet |
AHS4.21.010c/ ghṛtaṁ tilvaka.siddhaṁ vā sātalā.siddham eva vā || 10 ||
[Page 495 ]
AHS4.21.011a/ payasairaṇḍa.tailaṁ vā pibed doṣa.haraṁ śivam |
AHS4.21.011c/ snigdhāmla.lavaṇoṣṇādyair āhārair hi malaś citaḥ || 11 ||
AHS4.21.012a/ sroto baddhvānilaṁ rundhyāt tasmāt tam anulomayet |
AHS4.21.012c/ dur.balo yo '.virecyaḥ syāt taṁ nirūhair upācaret || 12 || [Note: AHS4.21.012v/ 21.12av sroto ruddhvānilaṁ rundhyāt]
AHS4.21.013a/ dīpanaiḥ pācanīyair vā bhojyair vā tad.yutair naram |
AHS4.21.013c/ saṁśuddhasyotthite cāgnau sneha.svedau punar hitau || 13 ||
AHS4.21.014a/ āmāśaya.gate vāyau vamita.pratibhojite |
AHS4.21.014c/ sukhāmbunā ṣaḍ.dharaṇaṁ vacādiṁ vā prayojayet || 14 || [Note: AHS4.21.014v/ 21.14cv sukhāmbunā ṣaṭ.caraṇaṁ]
AHS4.21.015a/ sandhukṣite 'gnau parato vidhiḥ kevala.vātikaḥ |
AHS4.21.015c/ matsyān nābhi.pradeśa.sthe siddhān bilva.śalāṭubhiḥ || 15 ||
AHS4.21.016a/ vasti.karma tv adho nābheḥ śasyate cāvapīḍakaḥ |
AHS4.21.016c/ koṣṭha.ge kṣāra.cūrṇādyā hitāḥ pācana.dīpanāḥ || 16 ||
AHS4.21.017a/ hṛt.sthe payaḥ sthirā.siddhaṁ śiro.vastiḥ śiro.gate |
AHS4.21.017c/ snaihikaṁ nāvanaṁ dhūmaḥ śrotrādīnāṁ ca tarpaṇam || 17 ||
AHS4.21.018a/ svedābhyaṅga.nivātāni hṛdyaṁ cānnaṁ tvag.āśrite |
AHS4.21.018c/ śītāḥ pradehā rakta.sthe vireko rakta.mokṣaṇam || 18 || [Note: AHS4.21.018v/ 21.18av svedābhyaṅgāni śastāni]
AHS4.21.019a/ vireko māṁsa.medaḥ.sthe nirūhaḥ śamanāni ca |
AHS4.21.019c/ bāhyābhyantarataḥ snehair asthi.majja.gataṁ jayet || 19 ||
AHS4.21.020a/ praharṣo 'nnaṁ ca śukra.sthe bala.śukra.karaṁ hitam |
AHS4.21.020c/ vibaddha.mārgaṁ dṛṣṭvā tu śukraṁ dadyād virecanam || 20 || [Note: AHS4.21.020v/ 21.20bv balyaṁ śukra.karaṁ hitam]
[Page 496 ]
AHS4.21.021a/ viriktaṁ pratibhuktaṁ ca pūrvoktāṁ kārayet kriyām |
AHS4.21.021c/ garbhe śuṣke tu vātena bālānāṁ ca viśuṣyatām || 21 || [Note: AHS4.21.021v/ 21.21av virikta.pratibhuktasya]
AHS4.21.022a/ sitā.kāśmarya.madhukaiḥ siddham utthāpane payaḥ |
AHS4.21.022c/ snāva.sandhi.sirā.prāpte sneha.dāhopanāhanam || 22 ||
AHS4.21.023a/ tailaṁ saṅkucite 'bhyaṅgo māṣa.saindhava.sādhitam |
AHS4.21.023c/ āgāra.dhūma.lavaṇa.tailair lepaḥ srute 'sṛji || 23 ||
AHS4.21.024a/ supte 'ṅge veṣṭa.yukte tu kartavyam upanāhanam |
AHS4.21.024c/ athāpatānakenārtam a.srastākṣam a.vepanam || 24 ||
AHS4.21.025a/ a.stabdha.meḍhram a.svedaṁ bahir.āyāma.varjitam |
AHS4.21.025c/ a.khaṭvāghātinaṁ cainaṁ tvaritaṁ samupācaret || 25 ||
AHS4.21.026a/ tatra prāg eva su.snigdha.svinnāṅge tīkṣṇa.nāvanam |
AHS4.21.026c/ sroto.viśuddhaye yuñjyād accha.pānaṁ tato ghṛtam || 26 ||
AHS4.21.027a/ vidāry.ādi.gaṇa.kvātha.dadhi.kṣīra.rasaiḥ śṛtam |
AHS4.21.027c/ nāti.mātraṁ tathā vāyur vyāpnoti sahasaiva vā || 27 ||
AHS4.21.028a/ kulattha.yava.kolāni bhadradārv.ādikaṁ gaṇam |
AHS4.21.028c/ niḥkvāthyānūpa.māṁsaṁ ca tenāmlaiḥ payasāpi ca || 28 ||
AHS4.21.029a/ svādu.skandha.pratīvāpaṁ mahā.snehaṁ vipācayet |
AHS4.21.029c/ sekābhyaṅgāvagāhānna.pāna.nasyānuvāsanaiḥ || 29 ||
AHS4.21.030a/ sa hanti vātaṁ te te ca sneha.svedāḥ su.yojitāḥ |
AHS4.21.030c/ vegāntareṣu mūrdhānam a.sakṛc cāsya recayet || 30 ||
[Page 497 ]
AHS4.21.031a/ avapīḍaiḥ pradhamanais tīkṣṇaiḥ śleṣma.nibarhaṇaiḥ |
AHS4.21.031c/ śvasanāsu vimuktāsu tathā sañjñāṁ sa vindati || 31 ||
AHS4.21.031ū̆ab/ sauvarcalābhayā.vyoṣa.siddhaṁ sarpiś cale 'dhike || 31ū̆ab ||
AHS4.21.032a/ palāṣṭakaṁ tilvakato varāyāḥ prasthaṁ palāṁśaṁ guru.pañca.mūlam |
AHS4.21.032c/ sairaṇḍa.siṁhī.trivṛtaṁ ghaṭe 'pāṁ paktvā pacet pāda.śṛtena tena || 32 ||
AHS4.21.033a/ dadhnaḥ pātre yāva.śūkāt tri.bilvaiḥ sarpiḥ.prasthaṁ hanti tat sevyamānam |
AHS4.21.033c/ duṣṭān vātān eka.sarvāṅga.saṁsthān yoni.vyāpad.gulma.vardhmodaraṁ ca || 33 || [Note: AHS4.21.033v/ 21.33av dadhnaḥ pātre yāva.śūka.tri.bilvaiḥ]
AHS4.21.034ab/ vidhis tilvaka.vaj jñeyo ramyakāśokayor api || 34ab || [Note: AHS4.21.034v/ 21.34bv śamyākāśokayor api]
AHS4.21.035a/ cikitsitam idaṁ kuryāc chuddha.vātāpatānake |
AHS4.21.035c/ saṁsṛṣṭa.doṣe saṁsṛṣṭaṁ cūrṇayitvā kaphānvite || 35 ||
AHS4.21.036a/ tumburūṇy abhayā hiṅgu pauṣkaraṁ lavaṇa.trayam |
AHS4.21.036c/ yava.kvāthāmbunā peyaṁ hṛt.pārśvārty.apatantrake || 36 ||
AHS4.21.037a/ hiṅgu sauvarcalaṁ śuṇṭhī dāḍimaṁ sāmla.vetasam |
AHS4.21.037c/ pibed vā śleṣma.pavana.hṛd.rogoktaṁ ca śasyate || 37 ||
AHS4.21.038a/ āyāmayor ardita.vad bāhyābhyantarayoḥ kriyā |
AHS4.21.038c/ taila.droṇyāṁ ca śayanam āntaro 'tra su.dus.taraḥ || 38 ||
AHS4.21.039a/ vi.varṇa.danta.vadanaḥ srastāṅgo naṣṭa.cetanaḥ |
AHS4.21.039c/ prasvidyaṁś ca dhanuḥ.ṣkambhī daśa.rātraṁ na jīvati || 39 || [Note: AHS4.21.039v/ 21.39cv prasvidyaṁś ca dhanuḥ.stambhī]
[Page 498 ]
AHS4.21.040a/ vegeṣv ato anya.thā jīven mandeṣu vinato jaḍaḥ |
AHS4.21.040c/ khañjaḥ kuṇiḥ pakṣa.hataḥ paṅgulo vikalo 'tha.vā || 40 || [Note: AHS4.21.040v/ 21.40dv paṅgulo vikalo 'pi vā]
AHS4.21.041a/ hanu.sraṁse hanū snigdha.svinnau sva.sthānam ānayet |
AHS4.21.041c/ unnāmayec ca kuśalaś cibukaṁ vivṛtte mukhe || 41 ||
AHS4.21.042a/ nāmayet saṁvṛte śeṣam ekāyāma.vad ācaret |
AHS4.21.042c/ jihvā.stambhe yathāvasthaṁ kāryaṁ vāta.cikitsitam || 42 ||
AHS4.21.042+1a/ vāg.grahe koṣṇa.toyena vetasāmlaṁ piben naraḥ |
AHS4.21.042+1c/ mātuluṅga.rasaṁ tad.vad dhiṅgu.sauvarcalānvitam || 42+1 ||
AHS4.21.043a/ ardite nāvanaṁ mūrdhni tailaṁ śrotrākṣi.tarpaṇam |
AHS4.21.043c/ sa.śophe vamanaṁ dāha.rāga.yukte sirā.vyadhaḥ || 43 ||
AHS4.21.043+1a/ nava.nītena saṁyuktāṁ khāden māṣeṇḍarīṁ naraḥ |
AHS4.21.043+1c/ dur.vāram arditaṁ hanti saptāhān nātra saṁśayaḥ || 43+1 ||
AHS4.21.044a/ snehanaṁ sneha.saṁyuktaṁ pakṣāghāte virecanam |
AHS4.21.044c/ ava.bāhau hitaṁ nasyaṁ snehaś cottara.bhaktikaḥ || 44 ||
AHS4.21.044.1+1a/ māṣa.balā.śuka.śimbī.kaṭtṛṇa.rāsnāśvagandhorubūkāṇām |
AHS4.21.044.1+1c/ kvātho nasya.nipīto rāmaṭha.lavaṇānvitaḥ koṣṇaḥ || 44.1+1 ||
AHS4.21.044.1+2a/ apanayati pakṣa.vātaṁ manyā.stambhaṁ sa.karṇa.nāda.rujam |
AHS4.21.044.1+2c/ dur.jayam ardita.vātaṁ saptāhāj jayati cāvaśyam || 44.1+2 ||
AHS4.21.044+1a/ guḍamañjaryā khapuraṁ vṛṣabhī.mūlaṁ ca śiśira.jala.piṣṭam |
AHS4.21.044+1c/ nāvana.vidhau prayojitam ava.bāhuka.gala.rujārti.haram || 44+1 ||
[Page 499 ]
AHS4.21.044+2a/ daśa.mūla.balā.māṣa.kvāthaṁ tailājya.miśritam |
AHS4.21.044+2c/ sāyaṁ bhuktvā piben nasyaṁ viśvācyām ava.bāhuke || 44+2 ||
AHS4.21.045a/ ūru.stambhe tu na sneho na ca saṁśodhanaṁ hitam |
AHS4.21.045c/ śleṣmāma.medo.bāhulyād yuktyā tat.kṣapaṇāny ataḥ || 45 || [Note: AHS4.21.045v/ 21.45av ūru.stambhe na ca sneho]
AHS4.21.046a/ kuryād rūkṣopacāraś ca yava.śyāmāka.kodravāḥ |
AHS4.21.046c/ śākair a.lavaṇaiḥ śastāḥ kiñ.cit.tailair jalaiḥ śṛtaiḥ || 46 ||
AHS4.21.047a/ jāṅgalair a.ghṛtair māṁsair madhv.ambho.'riṣṭa.pāyinaḥ |
AHS4.21.047c/ vatsakādir haridrādir vacādir vā sa.saindhavaḥ || 47 ||
AHS4.21.048a/ āḍhya.vāte sukhāmbhobhiḥ peyaḥ ṣaḍ.dharaṇo 'tha.vā |
AHS4.21.048c/ lihyāt kṣaudreṇa vā śreṣṭhā.cavya.tiktā.kaṇā.ghanāt || 48 || [Note: AHS4.21.048v/ 21.48av āma.vāte sukhāmbhobhiḥ 21.48bv peyaḥ ṣaṭ.caraṇo 'tha.vā 21.48dv .cavya.tiktā.kaṇā.ghanān]
AHS4.21.048.1+1a/ citrakendrayavāḥ pāṭhā kaṭukātiviṣā niśā |
AHS4.21.048.1+1c/ vāta.vyādhi.praśamano yogaḥ ṣaḍ.dharaṇāhvayaḥ || 48.1+1 ||
AHS4.21.049a/ kalkaṁ sa.madhu vā cavya.pathyāgni.suradāru.jam |
AHS4.21.049c/ mūtrair vā śīlayet pathyāṁ gugguluṁ girisambhavam || 49 ||
AHS4.21.050a/ vyoṣāgni.musta.tri.phalā.viḍaṅgair gugguluṁ samam |
AHS4.21.050c/ khādan sarvāñ jayed vyādhīn medaḥ.śleṣmāma.vāta.jān || 50 ||
AHS4.21.051a/ śāmyaty evaṁ kaphākrāntaḥ sa.medaskaḥ prabhañjanaḥ |
AHS4.21.051c/ kṣāra.mūtrānvitān svedān sekān udvartanāni ca || 51 ||
AHS4.21.052a/ kuryād dihyāc ca mūtrāḍhyaiḥ karañja.phala.sarṣapaiḥ |
AHS4.21.052c/ mūlair vāpy arka.tarkārī.nimba.jaiḥ sa.surāhvayaiḥ || 52 ||
[Page 500 ]
AHS4.21.053a/ sa.kṣaudra.sarṣapā.pakva.loṣṭa.valmīka.mṛttikaiḥ |
