AHS4.21.053c/ kapha.kṣayārthaṁ vyāyāme sahye cainaṁ pravartayet || 53 ||
AHS4.21.054a/ sthalāny ullaṅghayen nārīḥ śaktitaḥ pariśīlayet |
AHS4.21.054c/ sthira.toyaṁ saraḥ kṣemaṁ prati.sroto nadīṁ taret || 54 ||
AHS4.21.055a/ śleṣma.medaḥ.kṣaye cātra snehādīn avacārayet |
AHS4.21.055c/ sthāna.dūṣyādi cālocya kāryā śeṣeṣv api kriyā || 55 || [Note: AHS4.21.055v/ 21.55cv sthānaṁ dūṣyādi cālocya]
AHS4.21.055.1+1a/ bṛhan.nimba.taror mūlaṁ vāriṇā paripeṣitam |
AHS4.21.055.1+1c/ sampītaṁ nāśayet kṣipram a.sādhyām api gṛdhrasīm || 55.1+1 ||
AHS4.21.055.1+2a/ tūṇī.pratūṇyor lavanaṁ sa.ghṛtaṁ kṣāra.hiṅgu vā |
AHS4.21.055.1+2c/ raktāvasecanaṁ kuryād abhīkṣṇaṁ vāta.kaṇṭake || 55.1+2 ||
AHS4.21.055.1+3a/ pibed eraṇḍa.tailaṁ vā dahet sūcībhir eva vā |
AHS4.21.055.1+3c/ sājyaiḥ saktubhir abhyaktau na cā.kṣīra.samanvitaiḥ || 55.1+3 ||
AHS4.21.055.1+4ab/ śālmalī.tvag.viliptau vā pādau santāpam udgataḥ || 55.1+4ab ||
AHS4.21.056a/ sahacaraṁ suradāru sa.nāgaraṁ kvathitam ambhasi taila.vimiśritam |
AHS4.21.056c/ pavana.pīḍita.deha.gatiḥ piban druta.vilambita.go bhavatīcchayā || 56 ||
AHS4.21.057a/ rāsnā.mahauṣadha.dvīpi.pippalī.śaṭhi.pauṣkaram |
AHS4.21.057c/ piṣṭvā vipācayet sarpir vāta.roga.haraṁ param || 57 ||
AHS4.21.058a/ nimbāmṛtā.vṛṣa.paṭola.nidigdhikānāṁ bhāgān pṛthak daśa palān vipaced ghaṭe 'pām |
AHS4.21.058c/ aṣṭāṁśa.śeṣita.rasena punaś ca tena prasthaṁ ghṛtasya vipacet picu.bhāga.kalkaiḥ || 58 || [Note: AHS4.21.058v/ 21.58av nimbāmṛtā.vṛṣa.paṭola.karañjakānāṁ]
[Page 501 ]
AHS4.21.059a/ pāṭhā.viḍaṅga.suradāru.gajopakulyā.dvi.kṣāra.nāgara.niśā.miśi.cavya.kuṣṭhaiḥ |
AHS4.21.059c/ tejovatī.marica.vatsaka.dīpyakāgni.rohiṇy.aruṣkara.vacā.kaṇa.mūla.yuktaiḥ || 59 ||
AHS4.21.060a/ mañjiṣṭhayātiviṣayā viṣayā yavānyā saṁśuddha.guggulu.palair api pañca.saṅkhyaiḥ |
AHS4.21.060c/ tat sevitaṁ vidhamati prabalaṁ samīraṁ sandhy.asthi.majja.gatam apy atha kuṣṭham īdṛk || 60 || [Note: AHS4.21.060v/ 21.60cv tat sevitaṁ pradhamati prabalaṁ samīraṁ]
AHS4.21.061a/ nāḍī.vraṇārbuda.bhagandara.gaṇḍa.mālā.jatrūrdhva.sarva.gada.gulma.gudottha.mehān |
AHS4.21.061c/ yakṣmā.ruci.śvasana.pīnasa.kāsa.śopha.hṛt.pāṇḍu.roga.mada.vidradhi.vāta.raktam || 61 || [Note: AHS4.21.061v/ 21.61dv .hṛt.pārśva.roga.mada.vidradhi.vāta.raktam]
AHS4.21.061+1a/ rāsnāṭarūṣa.suradārv.amṛtā.śatāvary.eraṇḍa.puṣkara.dhamāsaka.śuṇṭhi.pathyāḥ |
AHS4.21.061+1c/ nighnanti vāta.ja.rujaṁ khalu sa.śvadaṁṣṭrāḥ śaileya.śaṭhy.ativiṣāḥ kvathitāḥ prayuktā || 61+1 ||
AHS4.21.062a/ balā.bilva.śṛte kṣīre ghṛta.maṇḍaṁ vipācayet |
AHS4.21.062c/ tasya śuktiḥ prakuñco vā nasyaṁ vāte śiro.gate || 62 ||
AHS4.21.063a/ tad.vat siddhā vasā nakra.matsya.kūrma.culūka.jā |
AHS4.21.063c/ viśeṣeṇa prayoktavyā kevale mātariśvani || 63 ||
AHS4.21.064a/ jīrṇaṁ piṇyākaṁ pañca.mūlaṁ pṛthak ca kvāthyaṁ kvāthābhyām ekatas tailam ābhyām |
AHS4.21.064c/ kṣīrād aṣṭāṁśaṁ pācayet tena pānād vātā naśyeyuḥ śleṣma.yuktā viśeṣāt || 64 ||
AHS4.21.065a/ prasāriṇī.tulā.kvāthe taila.prasthaṁ payaḥ.samam |
AHS4.21.065c/ dvi.medā.miśi.mañjiṣṭhā.kuṣṭha.rāsnā.ku.candanaiḥ || 65 ||
AHS4.21.066a/ jīvakarṣabha.kākolī.yugalāmaradārubhiḥ |
AHS4.21.066c/ kalkitair vipacet sarva.mārutāmaya.nāśanam || 66 ||
AHS4.21.067a/ sa.mūla.śākhasya sahācarasya tulāṁ sametāṁ daśa.mūlataś ca |
AHS4.21.067c/ palāni pañcāśad abhīrutaś ca pādāvaśeṣaṁ vipaced vahe 'pām || 67 ||
[Page 502 ]
AHS4.21.068a/ tatra sevya.nakha.kuṣṭha.himailā.spṛk.priyaṅgu.nalikāmbu.śilā.jaiḥ |
AHS4.21.068c/ lohitā.nalada.loha.surāhvaiḥ kopanā.miśi.turuṣka.nataiś ca || 68 ||
AHS4.21.069a/ tulya.kṣīraṁ pālikais taila.pātraṁ siddhaṁ kṛcchrāñ chīlitaṁ hanti vātān |
AHS4.21.069c/ kampākṣepa.stambha.śoṣādi.yuktān gulmonmādau pīnasaṁ yoni.rogān || 69 || [Note: AHS4.21.069v/ 21.69av tulyaṁ kṣīraṁ pālikais taila.pātraṁ]
AHS4.21.070a/ sahacara.tulāyās tu rase tailāḍhakaṁ pacet |
AHS4.21.070c/ mūla.kalkād daśa.palaṁ payo dattvā catur.guṇam || 70 ||
AHS4.21.071a/ atha.vā nata.ṣaḍgranthā.sthirā.kuṣṭha.surāhvayāt |
AHS4.21.071c/ sailā.nalada.śaileya.śatāhvā.rakta.candanāt || 71 || [Note: AHS4.21.071v/ 21.71bv .sthirā.kuṣṭha.surāhvayān 21.71dv .śatāhvā.rakta.candanān]
AHS4.21.072a/ siddhe 'smiñ charkarā.cūrṇād aṣṭā.daśa.palaṁ kṣipet |
AHS4.21.072c/ bheḍasya sammataṁ tailaṁ tat kṛcchrān anilāmayān || 72 ||
AHS4.21.073a/ vāta.kuṇḍalikonmāda.gulma.vardhmādikāñ jayet |
AHS4.21.073c/ balā.śataṁ chinnaruhā.pādaṁ rāsnāṣṭa.bhāgikam || 73 ||
AHS4.21.074a/ jalāḍhaka.śate paktvā śata.bhāga.sthite rase |
AHS4.21.074c/ dadhi.mastv.ikṣu.niryāsa.śuktais tailāḍhakaṁ samaiḥ || 74 ||
AHS4.21.075a/ pacet sāja.payo.'rdhāṁśaṁ kalkair ebhiḥ palonmitaiḥ |
AHS4.21.075c/ śaṭhī.saraladārv.elā.mañjiṣṭhāguru.candanaiḥ || 75 ||
AHS4.21.076a/ padmakātibalā.mustā.śūrpaparṇī.hareṇubhiḥ |
AHS4.21.076c/ yaṣṭy.āhva.surasa.vyāghranakharṣabhaka.jīvakaiḥ || 76 ||
AHS4.21.077a/ palāśa.rasa.kastūrī.nalikā.jāti.kośakaiḥ |
AHS4.21.077c/ spṛkkā.kuṅkuma.śaileya.jātī.kaṭuphalāmbubhiḥ || 77 || [Note: AHS4.21.077v/ 21.77dv .jātikā.kaṭphalāmbubhiḥ]
[Page 503 ]
AHS4.21.078a/ tvak.kunduruka.karpūra.turuṣka.śrīnivāsakaiḥ |
AHS4.21.078c/ lavaṅga.nakha.kaṅkola.kuṣṭha.māṁsī.priyaṅgubhiḥ || 78 ||
AHS4.21.079a/ sthauṇeya.tagara.dhyāma.vacā.madanaka.plavaiḥ |
AHS4.21.079c/ sa.nāgakesaraiḥ siddhe dadyāc cātrāvatārite || 79 || [Note: AHS4.21.079v/ 21.79bv .vacā.madana.pallavaiḥ]
AHS4.21.080a/ pattra.kalkaṁ tataḥ pūtaṁ vidhinā tat prayojitam |
AHS4.21.080c/ kāsaṁ śvāsaṁ jvaraṁ chardiṁ mūrchāṁ gulma.kṣata.kṣayān || 80 ||
AHS4.21.081a/ plīha.śoṣāv apasmāram a.lakṣmīṁ ca praṇāśayet |
AHS4.21.081c/ balā.tailam idaṁ śreṣṭhaṁ vāta.vyādhi.vināśanam || 81 ||
AHS4.21.082a/ pāne nasye 'nvāsane 'bhyañjane ca snehāḥ kāle samyag ete prayuktāḥ |
AHS4.21.082c/ duṣṭān vātān āśu śāntiṁ nayeyur vandhyā nārīḥ putra.bhājaś ca kuryuḥ || 82 || [Note: AHS4.21.082v/ 21.82dv vandhyā nārīḥ putra.bhājaḥ prakuryuḥ]
AHS4.21.083a/ sneha.svedair drutaḥ śleṣmā yadā pakvāśaye sthitaḥ |
AHS4.21.083c/ pittaṁ vā darśayed rūpaṁ vastibhis taṁ vinirjayet || 83 || [Note: AHS4.21.083v/ 21.83bv yadā pakvāśayaṁ sthitaḥ]

4.22. Chapter 22 :: Athavātaśoṇitacikitsitādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 428-432]
AHS4.22.001a/ vāta.śoṇitino raktaṁ snigdhasya bahu.śo haret |
AHS4.22.001c/ alpālpaṁ pālayan vāyuṁ yathā.doṣaṁ yathā.balam || 1 ||
AHS4.22.002a/ rug.rāga.toda.dāheṣu jalaukobhir vinirharet |
AHS4.22.002c/ śṛṅga.tumbaiś cimicimā.kaṇḍū.rug.dūyanānvitam || 2 ||
AHS4.22.003a/ pracchānena sirābhir vā deśād deśāntaraṁ vrajat |
AHS4.22.003c/ aṅga.glānau tu na srāvyaṁ rūkṣe vātottare ca yat || 3 || [Note: AHS4.22.003v/ 22.3cv aṅga.mlānau tu na srāvyaṁ 22.3dv rūkṣaṁ vātottaraṁ ca yat]
AHS4.22.004a/ gambhīraṁ śvayathuṁ stambhaṁ kampaṁ snāyu.sirāmayān |
AHS4.22.004c/ glānim anyāṁś ca vātotthān kuryād vāyur asṛk.kṣayāt || 4 ||
[Page 504 ]
AHS4.22.005a/ virecyaḥ snehayitvā tu sneha.yuktair virecanaiḥ |
AHS4.22.005c/ vātottare vāta.rakte purāṇaṁ pāyayed ghṛtam || 5 ||
AHS4.22.006a/ śrāvaṇī.kṣīra.kākolī.kṣīriṇī.jīvakaiḥ samaiḥ |
AHS4.22.006c/ siddhaṁ sarṣabhakaiḥ sarpiḥ sa.kṣīraṁ vāta.rakta.nut || 6 ||
AHS4.22.007a/ drākṣā.madhūka.vāribhyāṁ siddhaṁ vā sa.sitopalam |
AHS4.22.007c/ ghṛtaṁ pibet tathā kṣīraṁ guḍūcī.sva.rase śṛtam || 7 ||
AHS4.22.008a/ tailaṁ payaḥ śarkarāṁ ca pāyayed vā su.mūrchitam |
AHS4.22.008c/ balā.śatāvarī.rāsnā.daśa.mūlaiḥ sa.pīlubhiḥ || 8 ||
AHS4.22.009a/ śyāmairaṇḍa.sthirābhiś ca vātārti.ghnaṁ śṛtaṁ payaḥ |
AHS4.22.009c/ dhāroṣṇaṁ mūtra.yuktaṁ vā kṣīraṁ doṣānulomanam || 9 ||
AHS4.22.010a/ paitte paktvā varī.tiktā.paṭola.tri.phalāmṛtāḥ |
AHS4.22.010c/ pibed ghṛtaṁ vā kṣīraṁ vā svādu.tiktaka.sādhitam || 10 ||
AHS4.22.011a/ kṣīreṇairaṇḍa.tailaṁ ca prayogeṇa piben naraḥ |
AHS4.22.011c/ bahu.doṣo virekārthaṁ jīrṇe kṣīraudanāśanaḥ || 11 ||
AHS4.22.012a/ kaṣāyam abhayānāṁ vā pāyayed ghṛta.bharjitam |
AHS4.22.012c/ kṣīrānu.pānaṁ trivṛtā.cūrṇaṁ drākṣā.rasena vā || 12 ||
AHS4.22.013a/ nirhared vā malaṁ tasya sa.ghṛtaiḥ kṣīra.vastibhiḥ |
AHS4.22.013c/ na hi vasti.samaṁ kiñ.cid vāta.rakta.cikitsitam || 13 ||
AHS4.22.014a/ viśeṣāt pāyu.pārśvoru.parvāsthi.jaṭharārtiṣu |
AHS4.22.014c/ mustā.dhātrī.haridrāṇāṁ pibet kvāthaṁ kapholbaṇe || 14 || [Note: AHS4.22.014v/ 22.14cv musta.drākṣā.haridrāṇāṁ]
[Page 505 ]
AHS4.22.015a/ sa.kṣaudraṁ tri.phalāyā vā guḍūcīṁ vā yathā tathā |
AHS4.22.015c/ yathārha.sneha.pītaṁ ca vāmitaṁ mṛdu rūkṣayet || 15 || [Note: AHS4.22.015v/ 22.15bv guḍūcīṁ vā yathā.balam 22.15bv guḍūcīṁ vā yathā.yatham]
AHS4.22.016a/ tri.phalā.vyoṣa.pattrailā.tvakkṣīrī.citrakaṁ vacām |
AHS4.22.016c/ viḍaṅgaṁ pippalī.mūlaṁ romaśāṁ vṛṣakaṁ tvacam || 16 || [Note: AHS4.22.016v/ 22.16dv romaśaṁ vṛṣakaṁ tvacam]
AHS4.22.017a/ ṛddhiṁ lāṅgalikīṁ cavyaṁ sama.bhāgāni peṣayet |
AHS4.22.017c/ kalye liptvāyasīṁ pātrīṁ madhyāhne bhakṣayed idam || 17 ||
AHS4.22.018a/ vātāsre sarva.doṣe 'pi paraṁ śūlānvite hitam |
AHS4.22.018c/ kokilākṣaka.niryūhaḥ pītas tac chāka.bhojinā || 18 || [Note: AHS4.22.018v/ 22.18dv pītas tac chāka.bhakṣiṇā]
AHS4.22.019a/ kṛpābhyāsa iva krodhaṁ vāta.raktaṁ niyacchati |
AHS4.22.019c/ pañca.mūlasya dhātryā vā rasair lelītakīṁ vasām || 19 ||
AHS4.22.020a/ khuḍaṁ su.rūḍham apy aṅge brahma.cārī piban jayet |
AHS4.22.020c/ ity ābhyantaram uddiṣṭaṁ karma bāhyam ataḥ param || 20 ||
AHS4.22.020.1+1a/ tri.phalāṣṭa.palaṁ kvāthya pāda.śeṣaṁ jalāḍhake |
AHS4.22.020.1+1c/ ṣo.ḍaśaiva palāny atra prakṣipec chuddha.gugguloḥ || 20.1+1 ||
AHS4.22.020.1+2a/ tatas tasmin ghanī.bhūte kalkī.kṛtya dvi.kārṣikāḥ |
AHS4.22.020.1+2c/ pathyā.viḍaṅga.kaṭukā guḍūcī pala.sammitā || 20.1+2 ||
AHS4.22.020.1+3a/ karṣāṁśe trivṛtā dantī khāded iṣṭānu.pānataḥ |
AHS4.22.020.1+3c/ vividham api vāta.raktaṁ sruta.śuṣka.sphuṭitam api hanti || 20.1+3 ||
AHS4.22.020.1+4a/ vraṇa.kāsa.kuṣṭha.gulma.śvayathūdara.pāṇḍu.meham arśāṁsi |
AHS4.22.020.1+4c/ abhibhūya jarā.doṣaṁ karoti kaiśorakaṁ kāyam || 20.1+4 ||
[Page 506 ]
AHS4.22.021a/ āranālāḍhake tailaṁ pāda.sarja.rasaṁ śṛtam |
AHS4.22.021c/ prabhūte khajitaṁ toye jvara.dāhārti.nut param || 21 ||
AHS4.22.022a/ sa.madhūcchiṣṭa.mañjiṣṭhaṁ sa.sarja.rasa.śārivam |
AHS4.22.022c/ piṇḍa.tailaṁ tad abhyaṅgād vāta.rakta.rujāpaham || 22 ||
AHS4.22.023a/ daśa.mūla.śṛtaṁ kṣīraṁ sadyaḥ śūla.nivāraṇam |
AHS4.22.023c/ pariṣeko 'nila.prāye tad.vat koṣṇena sarpiṣā || 23 ||
AHS4.22.024a/ snehair madhura.siddhair vā caturbhiḥ pariṣecayet |
AHS4.22.024c/ stambhākṣepaka.śūlārtaṁ koṣṇair dāhe tu śītalaiḥ || 24 ||
AHS4.22.025a/ tad.vad gavyāvika.cchāgaiḥ kṣīrais taila.vimiśritaiḥ |
AHS4.22.025c/ niḥkvāthair jīvanīyānāṁ pañca.mūlasya vā laghoḥ || 25 ||
AHS4.22.026a/ drākṣekṣu.rasa.madyāni dadhi.mastv.amla.kāñjikam |
AHS4.22.026c/ sekārthaṁ taṇḍula.kṣaudra.śarkarāmbhaś ca śasyate || 26 ||
AHS4.22.027a/ priyāḥ priyaṁ.vadāḥ nāryāś candanārdra.kara.stanāḥ |
AHS4.22.027c/ sparśa.śītāḥ sukha.sparśā ghnanti dāhaṁ rujaṁ klamam || 27 ||
AHS4.22.028a/ sa.rāge sa.ruje dāhe raktaṁ hṛtvā pralepayet |
AHS4.22.028c/ prapauṇḍarīka.mañjiṣṭhā.dārvī.madhuka.candanaiḥ || 28 ||
AHS4.22.029a/ sitopalairakā.saktu.masūrośīra.padmakaiḥ |
AHS4.22.029c/ lepo rug.dāha.vīsarpa.rāga.śopha.nibarhaṇaḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS4.22.029v/ 22.29av sa.sitopala.kāsekṣu. 22.29bv .masūrairaka.saktubhiḥ]
AHS4.22.030a/ vāta.ghnaiḥ sādhitaḥ snigdhaḥ kṛśaro mudga.pāyasaḥ |
AHS4.22.030c/ tila.sarṣapa.piṇḍaiś ca śūla.ghnam upanāhanam || 30 || [Note: AHS4.22.030v/ 22.30cv tila.sarṣapa.piṇḍaś ca]
[Page 507 ]
AHS4.22.031a/ audaka.prasahānūpa.vesavārāḥ su.saṁskṛtāḥ |
AHS4.22.031c/ jīvanīyauṣadhaiḥ sneha.yuktāḥ syur upanāhane || 31 || [Note: AHS4.22.031v/ 22.31cv jīvanīyauṣadha.sneha.]
AHS4.22.032a/ stambha.toda.rug.āyāma.śophāṅga.graha.nāśanāḥ |
AHS4.22.032c/ jīvanīyauṣadhaiḥ siddhā sa.payaskā vasāpi vā || 32 ||
AHS4.22.033a/ ghṛtaṁ sahacarān mūlaṁ jīvantī chāgalaṁ payaḥ |
AHS4.22.033c/ lepaḥ piṣṭās tilās tad.vad bhṛṣṭāḥ payasi nirvṛtāḥ || 33 ||
AHS4.22.034a/ kṣīra.piṣṭa.kṣumāṁ lepam eraṇḍasya phalāni vā |
AHS4.22.034c/ kuryāc chūla.nivṛtty.arthaṁ śatāhvāṁ vānile 'dhike || 34 || [Note: AHS4.22.034v/ 22.34av kṣīra.piṣṭām umāṁ lepam]
AHS4.22.035a/ mūtra.kṣāra.surā.pakvaṁ ghṛtam abhyañjane hitam |
AHS4.22.035c/ siddhaṁ sa.madhu śuktaṁ vā sekābhyaṅge kaphottare || 35 || [Note: AHS4.22.035v/ 22.35av musta.kṣāra.sitā.pakvaṁ 22.35dv sekābhyaṅgaḥ kaphottare]
AHS4.22.036a/ gṛha.dhūmo vacā kuṣṭhaṁ śatāhvā rajanī.dvayam |
AHS4.22.036c/ pralepaḥ śūla.nud vāta.rakte vāta.kaphottare || 36 ||
AHS4.22.037a/ madhu.śigror hitaṁ tad.vad bījaṁ dhānyāmla.saṁyutam |
AHS4.22.037c/ muhūrta.liptam amlaiś ca siñced vāta.kaphottare || 37 ||
AHS4.22.038a/ uttānaṁ lepanābhyaṅga.pariṣekāvagāhanaiḥ |
AHS4.22.038c/ virekāsthāpana.sneha.pānair gambhīram ācaret || 38 ||
AHS4.22.039a/ vāta.śleṣmottare koṣṇā lepādyās tatra śītalaiḥ |
AHS4.22.039c/ vidāha.śopha.ruk.kaṇḍū.vivṛddhiḥ stambhanād bhavet || 39 ||
AHS4.22.040a/ pitta.raktottare vāta.rakte lepādayo himāḥ |
AHS4.22.040c/ uṣṇaiḥ ploṣoṣa.rug.rāga.svedāvadaraṇodbhavaḥ || 40 ||
[Page 508 ]
AHS4.22.041a/ madhuyaṣṭyāḥ pala.śataṁ kaṣāye pāda.śeṣite |
AHS4.22.041c/ tailāḍhakaṁ sama.kṣīraṁ pacet kalkaiḥ palonmitaiḥ || 41 ||
AHS4.22.042a/ sthirā.tāmalakī.dūrvā.payasyābhīru.candanaiḥ |
AHS4.22.042c/ loha.haṁsapadī.māṁsī.dvi.medā.madhuparṇibhiḥ || 42 ||
AHS4.22.043a/ kākolī.kṣīra.kākolī.śatapuṣparddhi.padmakaiḥ |
AHS4.22.043c/ jīvakarṣabha.jīvantī.tvak.pattra.nakha.vālakaiḥ || 43 ||
AHS4.22.044a/ prapauṇḍarīka.mañjiṣṭhā.śārivaindrī.vitunnakaiḥ |
AHS4.22.044c/ catuṣ.prayogaṁ vātāsṛk.pitta.dāha.jvarārti.nut || 44 || [Note: AHS4.22.044v/ 22.44cv catuṣ.prayogāt tad dhanti 22.44dv tailaṁ māruta.śoṇitam]
AHS4.22.044+1a/ sopadravaṁ sāṅga.śūlaṁ sarva.gātrānugaṁ tathā |
AHS4.22.044+1c/ vātāsṛk.pitta.dāhārti.jvara.ghnaṁ bala.varṇa.kṛt || 44+1 ||
AHS4.22.045a/ balā.kaṣāya.kalkābhyāṁ tailaṁ kṣīra.samaṁ pacet |
AHS4.22.045c/ sahasra.śata.pākaṁ tad vātāsṛg.vāta.roga.nut || 45 ||
AHS4.22.046a/ rasāyanaṁ mukhya.tamam indriyāṇāṁ prasādanam |
AHS4.22.046c/ jīvanaṁ bṛṁhaṇaṁ svaryaṁ śukrāsṛg.doṣa.nāśanam || 46 ||
AHS4.22.047a/ kupite mārga.saṁrodhān medaso vā kaphasya vā |
AHS4.22.047c/ ati.vṛddhyānile śastaṁ nādau snehana.bṛṁhaṇam || 47 ||
AHS4.22.048a/ kṛtvā tatrāḍhya.vātoktaṁ vāta.śoṇitikaṁ tataḥ |
AHS4.22.048c/ bheṣajaṁ snehanaṁ kuryād yac ca rakta.prasādanam || 48 ||
AHS4.22.049a/ prāṇādi.kope yuga.pad yathoddiṣṭaṁ yathāmayam |
AHS4.22.049c/ yathāsannaṁ ca bhaiṣajyaṁ vikalpyaṁ syād yathā.balam || 49 ||
[Page 509 ]
AHS4.22.050a/ nīte nir.āma.tāṁ sāme sveda.laṅghana.pācanaiḥ |
AHS4.22.050c/ rūkṣaiś cālepa.sekādyaiḥ kuryāt kevala.vāta.nut || 50 ||
AHS4.22.051a/ śoṣākṣepaṇa.saṅkoca.stambha.svapana.kampanam |
AHS4.22.051c/ hanu.sraṁso 'rditaṁ khāñjyaṁ pāṅgulyaṁ khuḍa.vāta.tā || 51 ||
AHS4.22.052a/ sandhi.cyutiḥ pakṣa.vadho medo.majjāsthi.gā gadāḥ |
AHS4.22.052c/ ete sthānasya gāmbhīryāt sidhyeyur yatnato navāḥ || 52 ||
AHS4.22.053a/ tasmāj jayen navān etān balino nir.upadravān |
AHS4.22.053c/ vāyau pittāvṛte śītām uṣṇāṁ ca bahu.śaḥ kriyām || 53 ||
AHS4.22.054a/ vyatyāsād yojayet sarpir jīvanīyaṁ ca pāyayet |
AHS4.22.054c/ dhanva.māṁsaṁ yavāḥ śālir virekaḥ kṣīra.vān mṛduḥ || 54 ||
AHS4.22.055a/ sa.kṣīrā vastayaḥ kṣīraṁ pañca.mūla.balā.śṛtam |
AHS4.22.055c/ kāle 'nuvāsanaṁ tailair madhurauṣadha.sādhitaiḥ || 55 || [Note: AHS4.22.055v/ 22.55cv kāle 'nuvāsanaṁ tailaṁ 22.55dv madhurauṣadha.sādhitam]
AHS4.22.056a/ yaṣṭīmadhu.balā.taila.ghṛta.kṣīraiś ca secanam |
AHS4.22.056c/ pañca.mūla.kaṣāyeṇa vāriṇā śītalena vā || 56 || [Note: AHS4.22.056v/ 22.56dv vāriṇā śītalena ca]
AHS4.22.057a/ kaphāvṛte yavānnāni jāṅgalā mṛga.pakṣiṇaḥ |
AHS4.22.057c/ svedās tīkṣṇā nirūhāś ca vamanaṁ sa.virecanam || 57 ||
AHS4.22.058a/ purāṇa.sarpis tailaṁ ca tila.sarṣapa.jaṁ hitam |
AHS4.22.058c/ saṁsṛṣṭe kapha.pittābhyāṁ pittam ādau vinirjayet || 58 ||
AHS4.22.059a/ kārayed rakta.saṁsṛṣṭe vāta.śoṇitikīṁ kriyām |
AHS4.22.059c/ svedābhyaṅga.rasāḥ kṣīraṁ sneho māṁsāvṛte hitam || 59 || [Note: AHS4.22.059v/ 22.59dv sneho māṁsāvṛte hitaḥ]
[Page 510 ]
AHS4.22.060a/ prameha.medo.vāta.ghnam āḍhya.vāte bhiṣag.jitam |
AHS4.22.060c/ mahā.sneho 'sthi.majja.sthe pūrvoktaṁ retasāvṛte || 60 ||
AHS4.22.061a/ annāvṛte pācanīyaṁ vamanaṁ dīpanaṁ laghu |
AHS4.22.061c/ mūtrāvṛte mūtralāni svedāś cottara.vastayaḥ || 61 || [Note: AHS4.22.061v/ 22.61dv svedā uttara.vastayaḥ]
AHS4.22.062a/ eraṇḍa.tailaṁ varcaḥ.sthe vasti.snehāś ca bhedinaḥ |
AHS4.22.062c/ kapha.pittā.viruddhaṁ yad yac ca vātānulomanam || 62 ||
AHS4.22.063a/ sarva.sthānāvṛte 'py āśu tat kāryaṁ mātariśvani |
AHS4.22.063c/ an.abhiṣyandi ca snigdhaṁ srotasāṁ śuddhi.kāraṇam || 63 || [Note: AHS4.22.063v/ 22.63av sarva.sthānāvṛte cāśu 22.63av sarva.sthānāvṛte tv āśu]
AHS4.22.064a/ yāpanā vastayaḥ prāyo madhurāḥ sānuvāsanāḥ |
AHS4.22.064c/ prasamīkṣya balādhikyaṁ mṛdu kāryaṁ virecanam || 64 || [Note: AHS4.22.064v/ 22.64dv mṛdu kāya.virecanam]
AHS4.22.065a/ rasāyanānāṁ sarveṣām upayogaḥ praśasyate |
AHS4.22.065c/ śilāhvasya viśeṣeṇa payasā śuddha.gugguloḥ || 65 ||
AHS4.22.066a/ leho vā bhārgavas tad.vad ekā.daśa.sitāśitaḥ |
AHS4.22.066c/ apāne tv āvṛte sarvaṁ dīpanaṁ grāhi bheṣajam || 66 || [Note: AHS4.22.066v/ 22.66bv ekā.daśa.sitāsitaḥ]
AHS4.22.067a/ vātānulomanaṁ kāryaṁ mūtrāśaya.viśodhanam |
AHS4.22.067c/ iti saṅkṣepataḥ proktam āvṛtānāṁ cikitsitam || 67 ||
AHS4.22.068a/ prāṇādīnāṁ bhiṣak kuryād vitarkya svayam eva tat |
AHS4.22.068c/ udānaṁ yojayed ūrdhvam apānaṁ cānulomayet || 68 ||
AHS4.22.069a/ samānaṁ śamayed vidvāṁs tri.dhā vyānaṁ tu yojayet |
AHS4.22.069c/ prāṇo rakṣyaś caturbhyo 'pi tat.sthitau deha.saṁsthitiḥ || 69 || [Note: AHS4.22.069v/ 22.69bv tri.dhā vyānaṁ ca yojayet]
[Page 511 ]
AHS4.22.070a/ svaṁ svaṁ sthānaṁ nayed evaṁ vṛtān vātān vi.mārga.gān |
AHS4.22.070c/ sarvaṁ cāvaraṇam pitta.rakta.saṁsarga.varjitam || 70 ||
AHS4.22.071a/ rasāyana.vidhānena laśuno hanti śīlitaḥ |
AHS4.22.071c/ pittāvṛte pitta.haraṁ marutaś cānulomanam || 71 ||
AHS4.22.072a/ raktāvṛte 'pi tad.vac ca khuḍoktaṁ yac ca bheṣajam |
AHS4.22.072c/ rakta.pittānila.haraṁ vividhaṁ ca rasāyanam || 72 ||
AHS4.22.073a/ yathā.nidānaṁ nirdiṣṭam iti samyak cikitsitam |
AHS4.22.073c/ āyur.veda.phalaṁ sthānam etat sadyo 'rti.nāśanāt || 73 || [Note: AHS4.22.073v/ 22.73dv etat sadyo 'rti.nāśanam]
AHS4.22.074a/ cikitsitaṁ hitaṁ pathyaṁ prāyaścittaṁ bhiṣag.jitam |
AHS4.22.074c/ bheṣajaṁ śamanaṁ śastaṁ paryāyaiḥ smṛtam auṣadham || 74 ||

5. Part 5 :: Kalpasthānam

[Note: [ K edn 433-452]

5.1. Chapter 1 :: Athavamanakalpādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 433-436]
AHS5.1.001a/ vamane madanaṁ śreṣṭhaṁ trivṛn.mūlaṁ virecane |
AHS5.1.001c/ nityam anyasya tu vyādhi.viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭa.tā || 1 ||
AHS5.1.002a/ phalāni nāti.pāṇḍūni na cāti.haritāny api |
AHS5.1.002c/ ādāyāhni praśatarkṣe madhye grīṣma.vasantayoḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS5.1.002v/ 1.2av phalāni tāni pāṇḍūni 1.2bv na cāti.haritāni ca 1.2bv na cāti.haritāny atha]
AHS5.1.003a/ pramṛjya kuśa.muttolyāṁ kṣiptvā baddhvā pralepayet |
AHS5.1.003c/ go.mayenānu muttolīṁ dhānya.madhye nidhāpayet || 3 || [Note: AHS5.1.003v/ 1.3av pramṛjya kuśa.pūtolyāṁ 1.3cv go.mayenānu pūtolīṁ]
AHS5.1.004a/ mṛdu.bhūtāni madhv.iṣṭa.gandhāni kuśa.veṣṭanāt |
AHS5.1.004c/ niṣkṛṣṭāni gate 'ṣṭāhe śoṣayet tāny athātape || 4 || [Note: AHS5.1.004v/ 1.4av mṛdu.bhūtāni madyeṣṭa. 1.4cv niṣkṛṣṭāni gatāṣṭāhe 1.4cv niṣkṛṣya nirgate 'ṣṭāhe 1.4cv niṣkṛṣya vigate 'ṣṭāhe]
AHS5.1.005a/ teṣāṁ tataḥ su.śuṣkāṇām uddhṛtya phala.pippalīḥ |
AHS5.1.005c/ dadhi.madhv.ājya.palalair mṛditvā śoṣayet punaḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS5.1.005v/ 1.5cv dadhi.madhv.āmbu.palalair]
[Page 512 ]
AHS5.1.006a/ tataḥ su.guptaṁ saṁsthāpya kārya.kāle prayojayet |
AHS5.1.006c/ athādāya tato mātrāṁ jarjarī.kṛtya vāsayet || 6 ||
AHS5.1.007a/ śarvarīṁ madhuyaṣṭyā vā kovidārasya vā jale |
AHS5.1.007c/ karbudārasya bimbyā vā nīpasya vidulasya vā || 7 || [Note: AHS5.1.007v/ 1.7cv jīmūtakasya bimbyā vā]
AHS5.1.008a/ śaṇapuṣpyāḥ sadāpuṣpyāḥ pratyakpuṣpy.udake 'tha.vā |
AHS5.1.008c/ tataḥ pibet kaṣāyaṁ taṁ prātar mṛdita.gālitam || 8 || [Note: AHS5.1.008v/ 1.8bv pratyakpuṣpodake 'tha.vā 1.8bv pratyakpuṣpodakena vā]
AHS5.1.009a/ sūtroditena vidhinā sādhu tena tathā vamet |
AHS5.1.009c/ śleṣma.jvara.pratiśyāya.gulmāntar.vidradhīṣu ca || 9 || [Note: AHS5.1.009v/ 1.9bv sādhu tena yathā vamet 1.9bv sādhu tena tato vamet]
AHS5.1.010a/ pracchardayed viśeṣeṇa yāvat pittasya darśanam |
AHS5.1.010c/ phala.pippalī.cūrṇaṁ vā kvāthena svena bhāvitam || 10 ||
AHS5.1.011a/ tri.bhāga.tri.phalā.cūrṇaṁ kovidārādi.vāriṇā |
AHS5.1.011c/ pibej jvarā.ruci.ṣṭheva.granthy.apacy.arbudodarī || 11 || [Note: AHS5.1.011v/ 1.11cv pibej jvara.gara.ṣṭhīva. 1.11cv pibej jvara.gara.ṣṭheva. 1.11cv pibej jvara.gara.sveda. 1.11cv pibej jvarā.ruci.ṣṭhīva. 1.11cv pibej jvarā.ruciṣv evaṁ 1.11dv granthy.apacy.arbudodarī]
AHS5.1.012a/ pitte kapha.sthāna.gate jīmūtādi.jalena tat |
AHS5.1.012c/ hṛd.dāhe 'dho.'sra.pitte ca kṣīraṁ tat.pippalī.śṛtam || 12 ||
AHS5.1.013a/ kṣaireyīṁ vā kapha.cchardi.praseka.tamakeṣu tu |
AHS5.1.013c/ dadhy.uttaraṁ vā dadhi vā tac.chṛta.kṣīra.sambhavam || 13 || [Note: AHS5.1.013v/ 1.13bv .praseka.tamakeṣu ca]
AHS5.1.014a/ phalādi.kvātha.kalkābhyāṁ siddhaṁ tat.siddha.dugdha.jam |
AHS5.1.014c/ sarpiḥ kaphābhibhūte 'gnau śuṣyad.dehe ca vāmanam || 14 || [Note: AHS5.1.014v/ 1.14dv śuṣka.dehe ca vāmanam 1.14dv śuṣyad.dehe tu vāmanam]
AHS5.1.015a/ sva.rasaṁ phala.majjño vā bhallātaka.vidhi.śṛtam |
AHS5.1.015c/ ā.darvī.lepanāt siddhaṁ līḍhvā pracchardayet sukham || 15 ||
[Page 513 ]
AHS5.1.016a/ taṁ lehaṁ bhakṣya.bhojyeṣu tat.kaṣāyāṁś ca yojayet |
AHS5.1.016c/ vatsakādi.pratīvāpaḥ kaṣāyaḥ phala.majja.jaḥ || 16 ||
AHS5.1.017a/ nimbārkānya.tara.kvātha.samāyukto niyacchati |
AHS5.1.017c/ baddha.mūlān api vyādhīn sarvān santarpaṇodbhavān || 17 || [Note: AHS5.1.017v/ 1.17dv śleṣma.santarpaṇodbhavān]
AHS5.1.018a/ rāṭha.puṣpa.phala.ślakṣṇa.cūrṇair mālyaṁ su.rūkṣitam |
AHS5.1.018c/ vamen maṇḍa.rasādīnāṁ tṛpto jighran sukhaṁ sukhī || 18 || [Note: AHS5.1.018v/ 1.18bv .cūrṇair mālyaṁ virūkṣitam 1.18bv .cūrṇair mālyaṁ su.rūṣitam 1.18bv .cūrṇair mālāṁ su.rūṣitām 1.18cv vamen naro rasādīnāṁ]
AHS5.1.019a/ evam eva phalā.bhāve kalpyaṁ puṣpaṁ śalāṭu vā |
AHS5.1.019c/ jīmūtādyāś ca phala.vaj jīmūtaṁ tu viśeṣataḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS5.1.019v/ 1.19av evam eva phalā.lābhe]
AHS5.1.020a/ prayoktavyaṁ jvara.śvāsa.kāsa.hidhmādi.rogiṇām |
AHS5.1.020c/ payaḥ puṣpe 'sya nirvṛtte phale peyā payas.kṛtā || 20 ||
AHS5.1.021a/ romaśe kṣīra.santānaṁ dadhy.uttaram a.romaśe |
AHS5.1.021c/ śṛte payasi dadhy.amlaṁ jātaṁ harita.pāṇḍuke || 21 || [Note: AHS5.1.021v/ 1.21dv jāte harita.pāṇḍuke 1.21dv jāte harita.pāṇḍure 1.21dv jātaṁ harita.pāṇḍure]
AHS5.1.022a/ āsutya vāruṇī.maṇḍaṁ piben mṛdita.gālitam |
AHS5.1.022c/ kaphād a.rocake kāse pāṇḍu.tve rāja.yakṣmaṇi || 22 ||
AHS5.1.023a/ iyaṁ ca kalpanā kāryā tumbī.kośātakīṣv api |
AHS5.1.023c/ paryāgatānāṁ śuṣkāṇāṁ phalānāṁ veṇi.janmanām || 23 || [Note: AHS5.1.023v/ 1.23dv phalānāṁ veṇu.janmanām 1.23dv phalānāṁ coṇi.janmanām]
AHS5.1.024a/ cūrṇasya payasā śuktiṁ vāta.pittārditaḥ pibet |
AHS5.1.024c/ dve vā trīṇy api vāpothya kvāthe tiktottamasya vā || 24 || [Note: AHS5.1.024v/ 1.24cv dve vā trīṇy atha.vāpothya]
AHS5.1.025a/ āragvadhādi.navakād āsutyānya.tamasya vā |
AHS5.1.025c/ vimṛdya pūtaṁ taṁ kvāthaṁ pitta.śleṣma.jvarī pibet || 25 || [Note: AHS5.1.025v/ 1.25cv vimṛjya pūtaṁ taṁ kvāthaṁ]
[Page 514 ]
AHS5.1.026a/ jīmūta.kalkaṁ cūrṇaṁ vā pibec chītena vāriṇā |
AHS5.1.026c/ jvare paitte kavoṣṇena kapha.vātāt kaphād api || 26 || [Note: AHS5.1.026v/ 1.26av jīmūta.cūrṇaṁ kalkaṁ vā]
AHS5.1.027a/ kāsa.śvāsa.viṣa.cchardi.jvarārte kapha.karśite |
AHS5.1.027c/ ikṣvākur vamane śastaḥ pratāmyati ca mānave || 27 || [Note: AHS5.1.027v/ 1.27bv .jvarārte kapha.karṣite 1.27cv ikṣvākur vamane śreṣṭhaḥ]
AHS5.1.028a/ phala.puṣpa.vihīnasya pravālais tasya sādhitam |
AHS5.1.028c/ pitta.śleṣma.jvare kṣīraṁ pittodrikte prayojayet || 28 || [Note: AHS5.1.028v/ 1.28bv pravālais tena sādhitam 1.28dv pittodreke prayojayet]
AHS5.1.029a/ hṛta.madhye phale jīrṇe sthitaṁ kṣīraṁ yadā dadhi |
AHS5.1.029c/ syāt tadā kapha.je kāse śvāse vamyaṁ ca pāyayet || 29 || [Note: AHS5.1.029v/ 1.29av hṛta.madhye phale pakve 1.29dv śvāse vamyāṁ ca pāyayet]
AHS5.1.030a/ mastunā vā phalān madhyaṁ pāṇḍu.kuṣṭha.viṣārditaḥ |
AHS5.1.030c/ tena takraṁ vipakvaṁ vā pibet sa.madhu.saindhavam || 30 || [Note: AHS5.1.030v/ 1.30bv pāṇduḥ kuṣṭhī viṣārditaḥ]
AHS5.1.031a/ bhāvayitvāja.dugdhena bījaṁ tenaiva vā pibet |
AHS5.1.031c/ viṣa.gulmodara.granthi.gaṇḍeṣu ślīpadeṣu ca || 31 ||
AHS5.1.032a/ saktubhir vā piben manthaṁ tumbī.sva.rasa.bhāvitaiḥ |
AHS5.1.032c/ kaphodbhave jvare kāse gala.rogeṣv a.rocake || 32 ||
AHS5.1.033a/ gulme jvare prasakte ca kalkaṁ māṁsa.rasaiḥ pibet |
AHS5.1.033c/ naraḥ sādhu vamaty evaṁ na ca daurbalyam aśnute || 33 || [Note: AHS5.1.033v/ 1.33av gulme jvare praseke ca]
AHS5.1.034a/ tumbyāḥ phala.rasaiḥ śuṣkaiḥ sa.puṣpair avacūrṇitam |
AHS5.1.034c/ chardayen mālyam āghrāya gandha.sampat.sukhocitaḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS5.1.034v/ 1.34av tumbyāḥ phala.rasaiḥ śuṣkaṁ 1.34dv gandhaṁ samyak sukhocitaḥ 1.34dv gandha.sampat.sukhocitam 1.34dv gandhaṁ samyak sukhocitam]
AHS5.1.035a/ kāsa.gulmodara.gare vāte śleṣmāśaya.sthite |
AHS5.1.035c/ kaphe ca kaṇṭha.vaktra.sthe kapha.sañcaya.jeṣu ca || 35 || [Note: AHS5.1.035v/ 1.35dv kapha.sañcaya.jeṣu tu]
[Page 515 ]
AHS5.1.036a/ dhāmārgavo gadeṣv iṣṭaḥ sthireṣu ca mahatsu ca |
AHS5.1.036c/ jīvakarṣabhakau vīrā kapikacchūḥ śatāvarī || 36 ||
AHS5.1.037a/ kākolī śrāvaṇī medā mahāmedā madhūlikā |
AHS5.1.037c/ tad.rajobhiḥ pṛthag lehā dhāmārgava.rajo.'nvitāḥ || 37 ||
AHS5.1.038a/ kāse hṛdaya.dāhe ca śastā madhu.sitā.drutāḥ |
AHS5.1.038c/ te sukhāmbho.'nu.pānāḥ syuḥ pittoṣma.sahite kaphe || 38 || [Note: AHS5.1.038v/ 1.38bv śastā madhu.sitā.yutāḥ 1.38bv śastā madhu.sitānvitāḥ]
AHS5.1.039a/ dhānya.tumburu.yūṣeṇa kalkas tasya viṣāpahaḥ |
AHS5.1.039c/ bimbyāḥ punarnavāyā vā kāsamardasya vā rase || 39 || [Note: AHS5.1.039v/ 1.39cv bimbyāḥ punarnavāyāś ca]
AHS5.1.040a/ ekaṁ dhāmārgavaṁ dve vā mānase mṛditaṁ pibet |
AHS5.1.040c/ tac.chṛta.kṣīra.jaṁ sarpiḥ sādhitaṁ vā phalādibhiḥ || 40 ||
AHS5.1.041a/ kṣveḍo 'ti.kaṭu.tīkṣṇoṣṇaḥ pragāḍheṣu praśasyate |
AHS5.1.041c/ kuṣṭha.pāṇḍv.āmaya.plīha.śopha.gulma.garādiṣu || 41 || [Note: AHS5.1.041v/ 1.41bv pragāḍheṣu ca śasyate]
AHS5.1.042a/ pṛthak phalādi.ṣaṭkasya kvāthe māṁsam anūpa.jam |
AHS5.1.042c/ kośātakyā samaṁ siddhaṁ tad.rasaṁ lavaṇaṁ pibet || 42 || [Note: AHS5.1.042v/ 1.42cv kośātakyāḥ samaṁ siddhaṁ]
AHS5.1.043a/ phalādi.pippalī.tulyaṁ siddhaṁ kṣveḍa.rase 'tha.vā |
AHS5.1.043c/ kṣveḍa.kvāthaṁ pibet siddhaṁ miśram ikṣu.rasena vā || 43 || [Note: AHS5.1.043v/ 1.43bv siddhaṁ kṣveḍa.rasena vā 1.43cv kṣveḍa.kvāthe pibet siddhaṁ]
AHS5.1.044a/ kauṭajaṁ su.kumāreṣu pitta.rakta.kaphodaye |
AHS5.1.044c/ jvare visarpe hṛd.roge khuḍe kuṣṭhe ca pūjitam || 44 || [Note: AHS5.1.044v/ 1.44av kuṭajaṁ su.kumāreṣu]
AHS5.1.045a/ sarṣapāṇāṁ madhūkānāṁ toyena lavaṇasya vā |
AHS5.1.045c/ pāyayet kauṭajaṁ bījaṁ yuktaṁ kṛśarayātha.vā || 45 ||
[Page 516 ]
AHS5.1.046a/ saptāhaṁ vārka.dugdhāktaṁ tac.cūrṇaṁ pāyayet pṛthak |
AHS5.1.046c/ phala.jīmūtakekṣvāku.jīvantī.jīvakodakaiḥ || 46 || [Note: AHS5.1.046v/ 1.46av saptāhaṁ cārka.dughāktaṁ]
AHS5.1.047a/ vamanauṣadha.mukhyānām iti kalpa.dig īritā |
AHS5.1.047c/ bījenānena mati.mān anyāny api ca kalpayet || 47 || [Note: AHS5.1.047v/ 1.47cv vidhinānena mati.mān 1.47dv anyān api ca kalpayet 1.47dv anyān api ca yojayet]

5.2. Chapter 2 :: Athavirecanakalpādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 436-439]
AHS5.2.001a/ kaṣāya.madhurā rūkṣā vipāke kaṭukā trivṛt |
AHS5.2.001c/ kapha.pitta.praśamanī raukṣyāc cānila.kopanī || 1 || [Note: AHS5.2.001v/ 2.1av kaṣāyā madhurā rūkṣā 2.1dv raukṣyāt sānila.kopanī 2.1dv raukṣyād anila.kopanī]
AHS5.2.002a/ sedānīm auṣadhair yuktā vāta.pitta.kaphāpahaiḥ |
AHS5.2.002c/ kalpa.vaiśeṣyam āsādya jāyate sarva.roga.jit || 2 ||
AHS5.2.003a/ dvi.dhā khyātaṁ ca tan.mūlaṁ śyāmaṁ śyāmāruṇaṁ trivṛt |
AHS5.2.003c/ trivṛd.ākhyaṁ vara.taraṁ nir.apāyaṁ sukhaṁ tayoḥ || 3 ||
AHS5.2.004a/ su.kumāre śiśau vṛddhe mṛdu.koṣṭhe ca tad dhitam |
AHS5.2.004c/ mūrchā.sammoha.hṛt.kaṇṭha.kaṣaṇa.kṣaṇana.pradam || 4 || [Note: AHS5.2.004v/ 2.4dv .karṣaṇa.kṣaṇana.pradam]
AHS5.2.005a/ śyāmaṁ tīkṣṇāśu.kāri.tvād atas tad api śasyate |
AHS5.2.005c/ krūre koṣṭhe bahau doṣe kleśa.kṣamiṇi cāture || 5 || [Note: AHS5.2.005v/ 2.5cv krūre koṣṭhe bahu.doṣe 2.5cv krūre koṣṭhe mahā.doṣe]
AHS5.2.006a/ gambhīrānugataṁ ślakṣṇam a.tiryag.visṛtaṁ ca yat |
AHS5.2.006c/ gṛhītvā visṛjet kāṣṭhaṁ tvacaṁ śuṣkāṁ nidhāpayet || 6 || [Note: AHS5.2.006v/ 2.6bv a.tiryag.vistṛtaṁ ca yat]
AHS5.2.007a/ atha kāle tataś cūrṇaṁ kiñ.cin nāgara.saindhavam |
AHS5.2.007c/ vātāmaye pibed amlaiḥ paitte sājya.sitā.madhu || 7 || [Note: AHS5.2.007v/ 2.7av atha kāle ca tac.cūrṇaṁ 2.7av atha kāle tu tac.cūrṇaṁ 2.7av atha kāle trivṛc.cūrṇaṁ 2.7av atha kālena tac.cūrṇaṁ 2.7cv vātāmayī pibed amlaiḥ 2.7dv pitte sājya.sitā.madhu]
AHS5.2.008a/ kṣīra.drākṣekṣu.kāśmarya.svādu.skandha.varā.rasaiḥ |
AHS5.2.008c/ kaphāmaye pīlu.rasa.mūtra.madyāmla.kāñjikaiḥ || 8 ||
[Page 517 ]
AHS5.2.009a/ pañca.kolādi.cūrṇaiś ca yuktyā yuktaṁ kaphāpahaiḥ |
AHS5.2.009c/ trivṛt.kalka.kaṣāyābhyāṁ sādhitaḥ sa.sito himaḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS5.2.009v/ 2.9cv trivṛt.kalka.kaṣāyeṇa 2.9dv yuktaṁ yuñjyāt kaphāpahaiḥ]
AHS5.2.010a/ madhu.tri.jāta.saṁyukto leho hṛdyaṁ virecanam |
AHS5.2.010c/ ajagandhā tavakṣīrī vidārī śarkarā trivṛt || 10 || [Note: AHS5.2.010v/ 2.10cv ajagandhā tukākṣīrī]
AHS5.2.011a/ cūrṇitaṁ madhu.sarpirbhyāṁ līḍhvā sādhu viricyate |
AHS5.2.011c/ sannipāta.jvara.stambha.pipāsā.dāha.pīḍitaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS5.2.011v/ 2.11av tac.cūrṇaṁ madhu.sarpirbhyāṁ]
AHS5.2.012a/ limped antas trivṛtayā dvi.dhā kṛtvekṣu.gaṇḍikām |
AHS5.2.012c/ ekī.kṛtya ca tat svinnaṁ puṭa.pākena bhakṣayet || 12 || [Note: AHS5.2.012v/ 2.12bv dvi.dhā kṛtvekṣu.gaṇḍikāḥ 2.12bv dvi.dhā kṛtvekṣu.kaṇḍikām 2.12bv dvi.dhā kṛtvekṣu.kāṇḍikām 2.12cv ekī.kṛtaṁ ca tat svinnaṁ 2.12cv ekī.kṛtya ca su.svinnaṁ 2.12cv ekī.kṛtya tu tat svinnaṁ]
AHS5.2.013a/ bhṛṅgailābhyāṁ samā nīlī tais trivṛtaiś ca śarkarā |
AHS5.2.013c/ cūrṇaṁ phala.rasa.kṣaudra.saktubhis tarpaṇaṁ pibet || 13 || [Note: AHS5.2.013v/ 2.13av tvag.elābhyāṁ samā nīlī]
AHS5.2.014a/ vāta.pitta.kaphottheṣu rogeṣv alpānaleṣu ca |
AHS5.2.014c/ nareṣu su.kumāreṣu nir.apāyaṁ virecanam || 14 ||
AHS5.2.015a/ viḍaṅga.taṇḍula.varā.yāva.śūka.kaṇās trivṛt |
AHS5.2.015c/ sarvato 'rdhena tal līḍhaṁ madhv.ājyena guḍena vā || 15 ||
AHS5.2.016a/ gulmaṁ plīhodaraṁ kāsaṁ halīmakam a.rocakam |
AHS5.2.016c/ kapha.vāta.kṛtāṁś cānyān parimārṣṭi gadān bahūn || 16 ||
AHS5.2.017a/ viḍaṅga.pippalī.mūla.tri.phalā.dhānya.citrakān |
AHS5.2.017c/ marīcendrayavājājī.pippalī.hasti.pippalīḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS5.2.017v/ 2.17bv .tri.phalā.dhānya.citrakam 2.17dv .pippalī.hasti.pippali]
AHS5.2.018a/ dīpyakaṁ pañca.lavaṇaṁ cūrṇitaṁ kārṣikaṁ pṛthak |
AHS5.2.018c/ tila.taila.trivṛc.cūrṇa.bhāgau cāṣṭa.palonmitau || 18 || [Note: AHS5.2.018v/ 2.18dv .bhāgāv aṣṭa.palonmitau]
[Page 518 ]
AHS5.2.019a/ dhātrī.phala.rasa.prasthāṁs trīn guḍārdha.tulānvitān |
AHS5.2.019c/ paktvā mṛdv.agninā khādet tato mātrām a.yantraṇaḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS5.2.019v/ 2.19bv trīn guḍārdha.tulonmitān 2.19dv tato mātrām a.yantritaḥ]
AHS5.2.019+1ab/ mandāgni.tvaṁ jvaraṁ mūrchāṁ mūtra.kṛcchram a.rocakam || 19+1ab ||
AHS5.2.020a/ kuṣṭhārśaḥ.kāmalā.gulma.mehodara.bhagandarān |
AHS5.2.020c/ grahaṇī.pāṇḍu.rogāṁś ca hanti puṁ.savanaś ca saḥ || 20 ||
AHS5.2.021a/ guḍaḥ kalyāṇako nāma sarveṣv ṛtuṣu yaugikaḥ |
AHS5.2.021c/ vyoṣa.tri.jātakāmbhoda.kṛmighnāmalakais trivṛt || 21 ||
AHS5.2.022a/ sarvaiḥ samā sama.sitā kṣaudreṇa guṭikāḥ kṛtāḥ |
AHS5.2.022c/ mūtra.kṛcchra.jvara.cchardi.kāsa.śoṣa.bhrama.kṣaye || 22 || [Note: AHS5.2.022v/ 2.22av sarvaiḥ samānā sa.sitā 2.22bv kṣaudreṇa guṭikī.kṛtā]
AHS5.2.022.1+1ab/ bhakṣayet prātar utthāya śītaṁ cānu pibej jalam || 22.1+1ab ||
AHS5.2.023a/ tāpe pāṇḍv.āmaye 'lpe 'gnau śastāḥ sarva.viṣeṣu ca |
AHS5.2.023c/ a.vipattir ayaṁ yogaḥ praśastaḥ pitta.rogiṇām || 23 ||
AHS5.2.024a/ trivṛtā kauṭajaṁ bījaṁ pippalī viśva.bheṣajam |
AHS5.2.024c/ kṣaudra.drākṣā.rasopetaṁ varṣā.kāle virecanam || 24 ||
AHS5.2.025a/ trivṛd.durālabhā.musta.śarkarodīcya.candanam |
AHS5.2.025c/ drākṣāmbunā sa.yaṣṭy.āhva.sātalaṁ jala.dātyaye || 25 || [Note: AHS5.2.025v/ 2.25cv drākṣāmbunā sa.yaṣṭy.āhvaṁ 2.25dv .śītalaṁ jala.dātyaye 2.25dv śītalaṁ jala.dātyaye]
AHS5.2.026a/ trivṛtāṁ citrakaṁ pāṭhām ajājīṁ saralaṁ vacām |
AHS5.2.026c/ svarṇakṣīrīṁ ca hemante cūrṇam uṣṇāmbunā pibet || 26 ||
[Page 519 ]
AHS5.2.027a/ trivṛtā śarkarā.tulyā grīṣma.kāle virecanam |
AHS5.2.027c/ trivṛt.trāyanti.hapuṣā.sātalā.kaṭu.rohiṇīḥ || 27 ||
AHS5.2.028a/ svarṇakṣīrīṁ ca sañcūrṇya go.mūtre bhāvayet try.aham |
AHS5.2.028c/ eṣa sarvartuko yogaḥ snigdhānāṁ mala.doṣa.hṛt || 28 ||
AHS5.2.029a/ śyāmā.trivṛd.durālabhā.hasti.pippalī.vatsakam |
AHS5.2.029c/ nīlinī.kaṭukā.mustā.śreṣṭhā.yuktaṁ su.cūrṇitam || 29 ||
AHS5.2.030a/ rasājyoṣṇāmbubhiḥ śastaṁ rūkṣāṇām api sarva.dā |
AHS5.2.030c/ jvara.hṛd.roga.vātāsṛg.udāvartādi.rogiṣu || 30 ||
AHS5.2.030.1+1a/ saindhavaṁ pippalī.mūlam abhayā dvi.guṇottaram |
AHS5.2.030.1+1c/ cūrṇam uṣṇāmbunā peyaṁ svasthe sukha.virecanam || 30.1+1 || [Note: AHS5.2.030.1+1v/ 2.30.1+1cv cūrṇam uṣṇāmbunā pītaṁ]
AHS5.2.031a/ rājavṛkṣo 'dhikaṁ pathyo mṛdur madhura.śītalaḥ |
AHS5.2.031c/ bāle vṛddhe kṣate kṣīṇe su.kumāre ca mānave || 31 ||
AHS5.2.032a/ yojyo mṛdv.an.apāyi.tvād viśeṣāc caturaṅgulaḥ |
AHS5.2.032c/ phala.kāle pariṇataṁ phalaṁ tasya samāharet || 32 ||
AHS5.2.033a/ teṣāṁ guṇa.vatāṁ bhāraṁ sikatāsu vinikṣipet |
AHS5.2.033c/ sapta.rātrāt samuddhṛtya śoṣayed ātape tataḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS5.2.033v/ 2.33dv śoṣayec cātape tataḥ 2.33dv śoṣayed ātape punaḥ]
AHS5.2.034a/ tato majjānam uddhṛtya śucau pātre nidhāpayet |
AHS5.2.034c/ drākṣā.rasena taṁ dadyād dāhodāvarta.pīḍite || 34 ||
AHS5.2.035a/ catur.varṣe sukhaṁ bāle yāvad dvā.daśa.vārṣike |
AHS5.2.035c/ caturaṅgula.majjño vā kaṣāyaṁ pāyayed dhimam || 35 ||
[Page 520 ]
AHS5.2.036a/ dadhi.maṇḍa.surā.maṇḍa.dhātrī.phala.rasaiḥ pṛthak |
AHS5.2.036c/ sauvīrakeṇa vā yuktaṁ kalkena traivṛtena vā || 36 ||
AHS5.2.037a/ dantī.kaṣāye tan.majjño guḍaṁ jīrṇaṁ ca nikṣipet |
AHS5.2.037c/ tam ariṣṭaṁ sthitaṁ māsaṁ pāyayet pakṣam eva vā || 37 ||
AHS5.2.038a/ tvacaṁ tilvaka.mūlasya tyaktvābhyantara.valkalam |
AHS5.2.038c/ viśoṣya cūrṇayitvā ca dvau bhāgau gālayet tataḥ || 38 ||
AHS5.2.039a/ lodhrasyaiva kaṣāyeṇa tṛtīyaṁ tena bhāvayet |
AHS5.2.039c/ kaṣāye daśa.mūlasya taṁ bhāgaṁ bhāvitaṁ punaḥ || 39 || [Note: AHS5.2.039v/ 2.39av lodhrasya tu kaṣāyeṇa]
AHS5.2.040a/ śuṣkaṁ cūrṇaṁ punaḥ kṛtvā tataḥ pāṇi.talaṁ pibet |
AHS5.2.040c/ mastu.mūtra.surā.maṇḍa.kola.dhātrī.phalāmbubhiḥ || 40 || [Note: AHS5.2.040v/ 2.40av śuṣka.cūrṇaṁ tataḥ kuryāt 2.40av śuṣka.cūrṇaṁ punaḥ kṛtvā 2.40av śuṣkaṁ cūrṇaṁ tataḥ kṛtvā]
AHS5.2.041a/ tilvakasya kaṣāyeṇa kalkena ca sa.śarkaraḥ |
AHS5.2.041c/ sa.ghṛtaḥ sādhito lehaḥ sa ca śreṣṭhaṁ virecanam || 41 || [Note: AHS5.2.041v/ 2.41dv sa ca śreṣṭho virecanam]
AHS5.2.042a/ sudhā bhinatti doṣāṇāṁ mahāntam api sañcayam |
AHS5.2.042c/ āśv eva kaṣṭa.vibhraṁśān naiva tāṁ kalpayed ataḥ || 42 || [Note: AHS5.2.042v/ 2.42cv āśv eva kaṣṭa.vibhraṁśāṁ 2.42cv āśv eva koṣṭha.vibhraṁśān 2.42dv naiva tāṁ kalpayet tataḥ]
AHS5.2.043a/ mṛdau koṣṭhe '.bale bāle sthavire dīrgha.rogiṇi |
AHS5.2.043c/ kalpyā gulmodara.gara.tvag.roga.madhu.mehiṣu || 43 ||
AHS5.2.044a/ pāṇḍau dūṣī.viṣe śophe doṣa.vibhrānta.cetasi |
AHS5.2.044c/ sā śreṣṭhā kaṇṭakais tīkṣṇair bahubhiś ca samācitā || 44 ||
AHS5.2.045a/ dvi.varṣāṁ vā tri.varṣāṁ vā śiśirānte viśeṣataḥ |
AHS5.2.045c/ tāṁ pāṭayitvā śastreṇa kṣīram uddhārayet tataḥ || 45 ||
[Page 521 ]
AHS5.2.046a/ bilvādīnāṁ bṛhatyor vā kvāthena samam eka.śaḥ |
AHS5.2.046c/ miśrayitvā sudhā.kṣīraṁ tato 'ṅgāreṣu śoṣayet || 46 ||
AHS5.2.047a/ pibet kṛtvā tu guṭikāṁ mastu.mūtra.surādibhiḥ |
AHS5.2.047c/ trivṛtādīn nava varāṁ svarṇakṣīrīṁ sa.sātalām || 47 ||
AHS5.2.048a/ saptāhaṁ snuk.payaḥ.pītān rasenājyena vā pibet |
AHS5.2.048c/ tad.vad vyoṣottamā.kumbha.nikumbhāgnīn guḍāmbunā || 48 || [Note: AHS5.2.048v/ 2.48dv .nikumbhādīn guḍāmbunā]
AHS5.2.049a/ nāti.śuṣkaṁ phalaṁ grāhyaṁ śaṅkhinyā nis.tuṣī.kṛtam |
AHS5.2.049c/ saptalāyās tathā mūlaṁ te tu tīkṣṇa.vikāṣiṇī || 49 ||
AHS5.2.050a/ śleṣmāmayodara.gara.śvayathv.ādiṣu kalpayet |
AHS5.2.050c/ akṣa.mātraṁ tayoḥ piṇḍaṁ madirā.lavaṇānvitam || 50 ||
AHS5.2.051a/ hṛd.roge vāta.kapha.je tad.vad gulme 'pi yojayet |
AHS5.2.051c/ danti.danta.sthiraṁ sthūlaṁ mūlaṁ dantī.dravanti.jam || 51 || [Note: AHS5.2.051v/ 2.51bv tad.vad gulme prayojay et]
AHS5.2.052a/ ā.tāmra.śyāva.tīkṣṇoṣṇam āśu.kāri vikāśi ca |
AHS5.2.052c/ guru prakopi vātasya pitta.śleṣma.vilāyanam || 52 || [Note: AHS5.2.052v/ 2.52bv āśu.kāri vikāṣi ca]
AHS5.2.053a/ tat kṣaudra.pippalī.liptaṁ svedyaṁ mṛd.darbha.veṣṭitam |
AHS5.2.053c/ śoṣyaṁ mandātape 'gny.arkau hato hy asya vikāśi.tām || 53 || [Note: AHS5.2.053v/ 2.53av tat kṣaudra.pippalī.miśraṁ 2.53av tat kṣaudra.pippalī.yuktaṁ 2.53dv hato hy asya vikāṣi.tām]
AHS5.2.054a/ tat piben mastu.madirā.takra.pīlu.rasāsavaiḥ |
AHS5.2.054c/ abhiṣyaṇṇa.tanur gulmī pramehī jaṭharī garī || 54 || [Note: AHS5.2.054v/ 2.54cv abhiṣyanda.tanur gulmī 2.54cv abhiṣyandi.tanur gulmī]
AHS5.2.055a/ go.mṛgāja.rasaiḥ pāṇḍuḥ kṛmi.koṣṭhī bhagandarī |
AHS5.2.055c/ siddhaṁ tat kvātha.kalkābhyāṁ daśa.mūla.rasena ca || 55 ||
[Page 522 ]
AHS5.2.056a/ visarpa.vidradhy.alajī.kakṣā.dāhān jayed ghṛtam |
AHS5.2.056c/ tailaṁ tu gulma.mehārśo.vibandha.kapha.mārutān || 56 ||
AHS5.2.057a/ mahā.snehaḥ śakṛc.chukra.vāta.saṅgānila.vyathāḥ |
AHS5.2.057c/ virecane mukhya.tamā navaite trivṛtādayaḥ || 57 || [Note: AHS5.2.057v/ 2.57av mahā.snehaś ca viṭ.śukra.]
AHS5.2.058a/ harītakīm api trivṛd.vidhānenopakalpayet |
AHS5.2.058c/ guḍasyāṣṭa.pale pathyā viṁśatiḥ syāt palaṁ palam || 58 ||
AHS5.2.059a/ dantī.citrakayoḥ karṣau pippalī.trivṛtor daśa |
AHS5.2.059c/ prakalpya modakān ekaṁ daśame daśame 'hani || 59 ||
AHS5.2.060a/ uṣṇāmbho 'nupibet khādet tān sarvān vidhināmunā |
AHS5.2.060c/ ete niṣ.parihārāḥ syuḥ sarva.vyādhi.nibarhaṇāḥ || 60 || [Note: AHS5.2.060v/ 2.60av uṣṇāmbho 'nupiban khādet]
AHS5.2.061a/ viśeṣād grahaṇī.pāṇḍu.kaṇḍū.koṭhārśasāṁ hitāḥ |
AHS5.2.061c/ alpasyāpi mahārtha.tvaṁ prabhūtasyālpa.karma.tām || 61 || [Note: AHS5.2.061v/ 2.61bv .kaṇḍū.koṣṭhāṛśasāṁ hitāḥ 2.61bv .kaṇḍū.kuṣṭhāṛśasāṁ hitāḥ]
AHS5.2.061ū̆ab/ kuryāt saṁśleṣa.viśleṣa.kāla.saṁskāra.yuktibhiḥ || 61ū̆ab || [Note: AHS5.2.061ū̆v/ 2.61ū̆bv .kāla.saṁskāra.yuktitaḥ]
AHS5.2.062a/ tvak.kesarāmrātaka.dāḍimailā.sitopalā.mākṣika.mātuluṅgaiḥ |
AHS5.2.062c/ madyena tais taiś ca mano.'nukūlair yuktāni deyāni virecanāni || 62 || [Note: AHS5.2.062v/ 2.62cv madyaiś ca tais taiś ca mano.'nukūlair]

5.3. Chapter 3 :: Athavamanavirecanavyāpatsiddhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 439-441]
AHS5.3.001a/ vamanaṁ mṛdu.koṣṭhena kṣud.vatālpa.kaphena vā |
AHS5.3.001c/ ati.tīkṣṇa.hima.stokam a.jīrṇe dur.balena vā || 1 ||
AHS5.3.002a/ pītaṁ prayāty adhas tasminn iṣṭa.hānir malodayaḥ |
AHS5.3.002c/ vāmayet taṁ punaḥ snigdhaṁ smaran pūrvam atikramam || 2 || [Note: AHS5.3.002v/ 3.2dv smaran pūrvam anu.kramam]
[Page 523 ]
AHS5.3.003a/ a.jīrṇinaḥ śleṣma.vato vrajaty ūrdhvaṁ virecanam |
AHS5.3.003c/ ati.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.lavaṇam a.hṛdyam ati.bhūri vā || 3 ||
AHS5.3.004a/ tatra pūrvoditā vyāpat siddhiś ca na tathāpi cet |
AHS5.3.004c/ āśaye tiṣṭhati tatas tṛtīyaṁ nāvacārayet || 4 ||
AHS5.3.005a/ anya.tra sātmyād dhṛdyād vā bheṣajān nir.apāyataḥ |
AHS5.3.005c/ a.snigdha.svinna.dehasya purāṇaṁ rūkṣam auṣadham || 5 || [Note: AHS5.3.005v/ 3.5av anya.tra sātmyād dhṛdyād ca 3.5cv a.snigdhā.svinna.dehasya]
AHS5.3.006a/ doṣān utkleśya nirhartum a.śaktaṁ janayed gadān |
AHS5.3.006c/ vibhraṁśaṁ śvayathuṁ hidhmāṁ tamaso darśanaṁ tṛṣam || 6 || [Note: AHS5.3.006v/ 3.6cv cid.bhraṁśaṁ śvayathuṁ hidhmāṁ]
AHS5.3.007a/ piṇḍikodveṣṭanaṁ kaṇḍūm ūrvoḥ sādaṁ vi.varṇa.tām |
AHS5.3.007c/ snigdha.svinnasya vāty.alpaṁ dīptāgner jīrṇam auṣadham || 7 || [Note: AHS5.3.007v/ 3.7cv snigdha.svinnasya cāty.alpaṁ]
AHS5.3.008a/ śītair vā stabdham āme vā samutkleśyāharan malān |
AHS5.3.008c/ tān eva janayed rogān a.yogaḥ sarva eva saḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS5.3.008v/ 3.8av śītair vā stabdham āmair vā 3.8bv samutkleśyāharen malān 3.8bv samutkleśya haren malān]
AHS5.3.009a/ taṁ taila.lavaṇābhyaktaṁ svinnaṁ prastara.saṅkaraiḥ |
AHS5.3.009c/ nirūḍhaḥ jāṅgala.rasair bhojayitvānuvāsayet || 9 || [Note: AHS5.3.009v/ 3.9bv svinnaṁ saṁstara.saṅkaraiḥ 3.9bv svinnaṁ saṁstara.śaṅkaraiḥ]
AHS5.3.010a/ phala.māgadhikā.dāru.siddha.tailena mātrayā |
AHS5.3.010c/ snigdhaṁ vāta.haraiḥ snehaiḥ punas tīkṣṇena śodhayet || 10 ||
AHS5.3.011a/ bahu.doṣasya rūkṣasya mandāgner alpam auṣadham |
AHS5.3.011c/ sodāvartasya cotkleśya doṣān mārgān nirudhya taiḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS5.3.011v/ 3.11dv doṣān mārgaṁ nirudhya taiḥ]
AHS5.3.012a/ bhṛśam ādhmāpayen nābhiṁ pṛṣṭha.pārśva.śiro.rujam |
AHS5.3.012c/ śvāsaṁ viṇ.mūtra.vātānāṁ saṅgaṁ kuryāc ca dāruṇam || 12 || [Note: AHS5.3.012v/ 3.12av bhṛśam ādhmāpayen nābhi. 3.12bv .pṛṣṭha.pārśva.śiro.rujam]
[Page 524 ]
AHS5.3.013a/ abhyaṅga.sveda.varty.ādi sa.nirūhānuvāsanam |
AHS5.3.013c/ udāvarta.haram sarvaṁ karmādhmātasya śasyate || 13 ||
AHS5.3.014a/ pañca.mūla.yava.kṣāra.vacā.bhūtika.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS5.3.014c/ yavāgūḥ su.kṛtā śūla.vibandhānāha.nāśanī || 14 || [Note: AHS5.3.014v/ 3.14av pañca.kola.yava.kṣāra.]
AHS5.3.015a/ pippalī.dāḍima.kṣāra.hiṅgu.śuṇṭhy.amla.vetasān |
AHS5.3.015c/ sa.saindhavān piben madyaiḥ sarpiṣoṣṇodakena vā || 15 ||
AHS5.3.016a/ pravāhikā.parisrāva.vedanā.parikartane |
AHS5.3.016c/ pītauṣadhasya vegānāṁ nigrahān mārutādayaḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS5.3.016v/ 3.16av pravāhikā.parisrāve 3.16bv vedanā.parikartane]
AHS5.3.017a/ kupitā hṛdayaṁ gatvā ghoraṁ kurvanti hṛd.graham |
AHS5.3.017c/ hidhmā.pārśva.rujā.kāsa.dainya.lālākṣi.vibhramaiḥ || 17 ||
AHS5.3.018a/ jihvāṁ khādati niḥ.sañjño dantān kaṭakaṭāyayan |
AHS5.3.018c/ na gacched vibhramaṁ tatra vāmayed āśu taṁ bhiṣak || 18 || [Note: AHS5.3.018v/ 3.18bv dantān kaṭakaṭāyate]
AHS5.3.019a/ madhuraiḥ pitta.mūrchārtaṁ kaṭubhiḥ kapha.mūrchitam |
AHS5.3.019c/ pācanīyais tataś cāsya doṣa.śeṣaṁ vipācayet || 19 || [Note: AHS5.3.019v/ 3.19cv pācanīyais tataś cāśu 3.19dv doṣa.śeṣaṁ ca pācayet]
AHS5.3.020a/ kāyāgniṁ ca balaṁ cāsya krameṇābhipravardhayet |
AHS5.3.020c/ pavanenāti.vamato hṛdayaṁ yasya pīḍyate || 20 || [Note: AHS5.3.020v/ 3.20bv krameṇābhipravartayet]
AHS5.3.021a/ tasmai snigdhāmla.lavaṇān dadyāt pitta.kaphe 'nya.thā |
AHS5.3.021c/ pītauṣadhasya vegānāṁ nigraheṇa kaphena vā || 21 || [Note: AHS5.3.021v/ 3.21av tasmai snigdhāmla.lavaṇaṁ]
AHS5.3.022a/ ruddho 'ti vā viśuddhasya gṛhṇāty aṅgāni mārutaḥ |
AHS5.3.022c/ stambha.vepathu.nistoda.sādodveṣṭārti.bhedanaiḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS5.3.022v/ 3.22av ruddho vāti viśuddhasya 3.22dv .sādodveṣṭādhibhedanaiḥ]
[Page 525 ]
AHS5.3.023a/ tatra vāta.haraṁ sarvaṁ sneha.svedādi śasyate |
AHS5.3.023c/ bahu.tīkṣṇaṁ kṣudhārtasya mṛdu.koṣṭhasya bheṣajam || 23 ||
AHS5.3.024a/ hṛtvāśu viṭ.pitta.kaphān dhātūn āsrāvayed dravān |
AHS5.3.024c/ tatrāti.yoge madhuraiḥ śeṣam auṣadham ullikhet || 24 || [Note: AHS5.3.024v/ 3.24bv dhātūn prasrāvayed dravān]
AHS5.3.025a/ yojyo 'ti.vamane reko vireke vamanaṁ mṛdu |
AHS5.3.025c/ pariṣekāvagāhādyaiḥ su.śītaiḥ stambhayec ca tam || 25 || [Note: AHS5.3.025v/ 3.25av yojyo 'ti reko vamite]
AHS5.3.026a/ añjanaṁ candanośīram ajāsṛk.śarkarodakam |
AHS5.3.026c/ lāja.cūrṇaiḥ piben mantham ati.yoga.haraṁ param || 26 || [Note: AHS5.3.026v/ 3.26av añjanaṁ candanośīra. 3.26bv .majjāsṛk.śarkarodakam]
AHS5.3.027a/ vamanasyāti.yoge tu śītāmbu.pariṣecitaḥ |
AHS5.3.027c/ pibet phala.rasair manthaṁ sa.ghṛta.kṣaudra.śarkaram || 27 ||
AHS5.3.028a/ sodgārāyāṁ bhṛśaṁ chardyāṁ mūrvāyā dhānya.mustayoḥ |
AHS5.3.028c/ sa.madhūkāñjanaṁ cūrṇaṁ lehayen madhu.saṁyutam || 28 || [Note: AHS5.3.028v/ 3.28bv mūrchāyāṁ dhānya.mustayoḥ]
AHS5.3.029a/ vamato 'ntaḥ praviṣṭāyāṁ jihvāyāṁ kavaḍa.grahāḥ |
AHS5.3.029c/ snigdhāmla.lavaṇā hṛdyā yūṣa.māṁsa.rasā hitāḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS5.3.029v/ 3.29cv snigdhāmla.lavaṇā hṛdyāś 3.29dv chāga.māṁsa.rasā hitāḥ]
AHS5.3.030a/ phalāny amlāni khādeyus tasya cānye 'grato narāḥ |
AHS5.3.030c/ niḥsṛtāṁ tu tila.drākṣā.kalka.liptāṁ praveśayet || 30 || [Note: AHS5.3.030v/ 3.30bv tasya cānye 'grato janāḥ 3.30bv tasya caivāgrato narāḥ 3.30dv .kalka.liptāṁ prayojayet]
AHS5.3.031a/ vāg.grahānila.rogeṣu ghṛta.māṁsopasādhitām |
AHS5.3.031c/ yavāgūṁ tanukāṁ dadyāt sneha.svedau ca kāla.vit || 31 ||
AHS5.3.032a/ ati.yogāc ca bhaiṣajyaṁ jīvaṁ harati śoṇitam |
AHS5.3.032c/ taj jīvādānam ity uktam ādatte jīvitaṁ yataḥ || 32 || [Note: AHS5.3.032v/ 3.32dv ādhatte jīvanaṁ nṛṇām]
[Page 526 ]
AHS5.3.033a/ śune kākāya vā dadyāt tenānnam asṛjā saha |
AHS5.3.033c/ bhukte '.bhukte vadej jīvaṁ pittaṁ vā bheṣajeritam || 33 || [Note: AHS5.3.033v/ 3.33cv bhuktā.bhuktaṁ vadej jīvaṁ 3.33cv bhukte tasmin vadej jīvam 3.33cv bhuktvā.bhukte vadej jīvaṁ 3.33dv a.bhukte pittam ādiśet]
AHS5.3.034a/ śuklaṁ vā bhāvitaṁ vastram āvānaṁ koṣṇa.vāriṇā |
AHS5.3.034c/ prakṣālitaṁ vi.varṇaṁ syāt pitte śuddhaṁ tu śoṇite || 34 || [Note: AHS5.3.034v/ 3.34dv pittaṁ śuddhaṁ tu śoṇitaṁ]
AHS5.3.035a/ tṛṣṇā.mūrchā.madārtasya kuryād ā.maraṇāt kriyām |
AHS5.3.035c/ rakta.pittātisāra.ghnīṁ tasyāśu prāṇa.rakṣaṇīm || 35 || [Note: AHS5.3.035v/ 3.35bv kuryād ā.maraṇa.kriyām 3.35dv tasyāpi prāṇa.rakṣaṇīm]
AHS5.3.036a/ mṛga.go.mahiṣājānāṁ sadyaskaṁ jīvatām asṛk |
AHS5.3.036c/ pibej jīvābhisandhānaṁ jīvaṁ tad dhy āśu gacchati || 36 || [Note: AHS5.3.036v/ 3.36dv jīvaṁ tad dhy āśu yacchati]
AHS5.3.037a/ tad eva darbha.mṛditaṁ raktaṁ vastau niṣecayet |
AHS5.3.037c/ śyāmā.kāśmarya.madhuka.dūrvośīraiḥ śṛtaṁ payaḥ || 37 ||
AHS5.3.038a/ ghṛta.maṇḍāñjana.yutaṁ vastiṁ vā yojayed dhimam |
AHS5.3.038c/ picchā.vastiṁ su.śītaṁ vā ghṛta.maṇḍānuvāsanam || 38 ||
AHS5.3.039a/ gudaṁ bhraṣṭaṁ kaṣāyaiś ca stambhayitvā praveśayet |
AHS5.3.039c/ vi.sañjñaṁ śrāvayet sāma.veṇu.gītādi.nisvanam || 39 || [Note: AHS5.3.039v/ 3.39bv stambhayitvā prayojayet]

5.4. Chapter 4 :: Athadoṣaharaṇasākalyabastikalpādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 441-446]
AHS5.4.001a/ balāṁ guḍūcīṁ tri.phalāṁ sa.rāsnāṁ dvi.pañca.mūlaṁ ca palonmitāni |
AHS5.4.001c/ aṣṭau phalāny ardha.tulāṁ ca māṁsāc chāgāt paced apsu caturtha.śeṣam || 1 ||
AHS5.4.002a/ pūto yavānī.phala.bilva.kuṣṭha.vacā.śatāhvā.ghana.pippalīnām |
AHS5.4.002c/ kalkair guḍa.kṣaudra.ghṛtaiḥ sa.tailair yuktaḥ sukhoṣṇo lavaṇānvitaś ca || 2 || [Note: AHS5.4.002v/ 4.2av pūtaṁ yavānī.phala.bilva.kuṣṭha.]
AHS5.4.003a/ vastiḥ paraṁ sarva.gada.pramāthī svasthe hito jīvana.bṛṁhaṇaś ca |
AHS5.4.003c/ vastau ca yasmin paṭhito na kalkaḥ sarva.tra dadyād amum eva tatra || 3 || [Note: AHS5.4.003v/ 4.3cv vastau ca yasmin kathito na kalkaḥ]
[Page 527 ]
AHS5.4.004a/ dvi.pañca.mūlasya raso 'mla.yuktaḥ sa.cchāga.māṁsasya sa.pūrva.peṣyaḥ |
AHS5.4.004c/ tri.sneha.yuktaḥ pravaro nirūhaḥ sarvānila.vyādhi.haraḥ pradiṣṭaḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS5.4.004v/ 4.4bv sa.cchāga.māṁsasya sa.pūrva.kalkaḥ]
AHS5.4.005a/ balā.paṭolī.laghu.pañca.mūla.trāyantikairaṇḍa.yavāt su.siddhāt |
AHS5.4.005c/ prastho rasāc chāga.rasārdha.yuktaḥ sādhyaḥ punaḥ prastha.samaḥ sa yāvat || 5 ||
AHS5.4.006a/ priyaṅgu.kṛṣṇā.ghana.kalka.yuktaḥ sa.taila.sarpir.madhu.saindhavaś ca |
AHS5.4.006c/ syād dīpano māṁsa.bala.pradaś ca cakṣur.balaṁ copadadhāti sadyaḥ || 6 ||
AHS5.4.007a/ eraṇḍa.mūlāt tri.palaṁ palāśāt tathā palāṁśaṁ laghu.pañca.mūlam |
AHS5.4.007c/ rāsnā.balā.chinnaruhāśvagandhā.punarnavāragvadha.devadāru || 7 || [Note: AHS5.4.007v/ 4.7bv tathā palāṁśaṁ laghu.pañca.mūlāt]
AHS5.4.008a/ phalāni cāṣṭau salilāḍhakābhyāṁ vipācayed aṣṭama.śeṣite 'smin |
AHS5.4.008c/ vacā.śatāhvā.hapuṣā.priyaṅgu.yaṣṭī.kaṇā.vatsaka.bīja.mustam || 8 ||
AHS5.4.009a/ dadyāt su.piṣṭaṁ saha.tārkṣya.śailam akṣa.pramāṇaṁ lavaṇāṁśa.yuktam |
AHS5.4.009c/ sa.mākṣikas taila.yutaḥ sa.mūtro vastir jayel lekhana.dīpano 'sau || 9 || [Note: AHS5.4.009v/ 4.9dv vastir jayed dīpana.pācano 'sau]
AHS5.4.010a/ jaṅghoru.pāda.trika.pṛṣṭha.koṣṭha.hṛd.guhya.śūlaṁ guru.tāṁ vibandham |
AHS5.4.010c/ gulmāśma.vardhma.grahaṇī.gudotthāṁs tās tāṁś ca rogān kapha.vāta.jātān || 10 || [Note: AHS5.4.010v/ 4.10cv gulmāśma.vardhma.grahaṇī.vikārāṁs 4.10dv tāṁs tāṁś ca rogān kapha.vāta.jāṁś ca]
AHS5.4.011a/ yaṣṭy.āhva.lodhrābhaya.candanaiś ca śṛtaṁ payo 'gryaṁ kamalotpalaiś ca |
AHS5.4.011c/ sa.śarkarā.kṣaudra.ghṛtaṁ su.śītaṁ pittāmayān hanti sa.jīvanīyam || 11 || [Note: AHS5.4.011v/ 4.11cv sa.śarkaraṁ kṣaudra.yutaṁ su.śītaṁ 4.11dv pittāmayaṁ hanti sa.jīvanīyam]
AHS5.4.012a/ rāsnāṁ vṛṣaṁ lohitikām anantāṁ balāṁ kanīyas.tṛṇa.pañca.mūlyau |
AHS5.4.012c/ gopāṅganā.candana.padmakarddhi.yaṣṭy.āhva.lodhrāṇi palārdhakāni || 12 || [Note: AHS5.4.012v/ 4.12cv gopāṅganā.candana.padmakāhva.]
AHS5.4.013a/ niḥkvāthya toyena rasena tena śṛtaṁ payo 'rdhāḍhakam ambu.hīnam |
AHS5.4.013c/ jīvanti.medarddhi.varī.vidārī.vīrā.dvi.kākoli.kaserukābhiḥ || 13 ||
[Page 528 ]
AHS5.4.014a/ sitopalā.jīvaka.padma.reṇu.prapauṇḍarīkotpala.puṇḍarīkaiḥ |
AHS5.4.014c/ lodhrātmaguptā.madhuyaṣṭikābhir nāgāhva.muñjātaka.candanaiś ca || 14 || [Note: AHS5.4.014v/ 4.14cv lohātmaguptā.madhuyaṣṭikābhir]
AHS5.4.015a/ piṣṭair ghṛta.kṣaudra.yutair nirūhaṁ sa.saindhavaṁ śītalam eva dadyāt |
AHS5.4.015c/ pratyāgate dhanva.rasena śālīn kṣīreṇa vādyāt pariṣikta.gātraḥ || 15 ||
AHS5.4.016a/ dāhātisāra.pradarāsra.pitta.hṛt.pāṇḍu.rogān viṣama.jvaraṁ ca |
AHS5.4.016c/ sa.gulma.mūtra.graha.kāmalādīn sarvāmayān pitta.kṛtān nihanti || 16 || [Note: AHS5.4.016v/ 4.16av dāhātisāra.pradarāmla.pitta. 4.16bv .hṛt.pāṇḍu.rogān viṣama.jvarāṁś ca 4.16bv .hṛt.pāṇḍu.rogān viṣamān jvarāṁś ca]
AHS5.4.017a/ kośātakāragvadha.devadāru.mūrvā.śvadaṁṣṭrā.kuṭajārka.pāṭhāḥ |
AHS5.4.017c/ paktvā kulatthān bṛhatīṁ ca toye rasasya tasya prasṛtā daśa syuḥ || 17 ||
AHS5.4.018a/ tān sarṣapailā.madanaiḥ sa.kuṣṭhair akṣa.pramāṇaiḥ prasṛtaiś ca yuktān |
AHS5.4.018c/ kṣaudrasya tailasya phalāhvayasya kṣārasya tailasya ca sārṣapasya || 18 || [Note: AHS5.4.018v/ 4.18dv kṣārasya tailasya ca sarṣapasya]
AHS5.4.019a/ dadyān nirūhaṁ kapha.rogitāya mandāgnaye cāśana.vidviṣe ca |
AHS5.4.019c/ vakṣye mṛdūn sneha.kṛto nirūhān sukhocitānāṁ prasṛtaiḥ pṛthak tu || 19 ||
AHS5.4.020a/ athemān su.kumārāṇāṁ nirūhān snehanān mṛdūn |
AHS5.4.020c/ karmaṇā viplutānāṁ ca vakṣyāmi prasṛtaiḥ pṛthak || 20 || [Note: AHS5.4.020v/ 4.20cv karmaṇā viplutānāṁ tu]
AHS5.4.021a/ kṣīrād dvau prasṛtau kāryau madhu.taila.ghṛtāt trayaḥ |
AHS5.4.021c/ khajena mathito vastir vāta.ghno bala.varṇa.kṛt || 21 ||
AHS5.4.022a/ ekaikaḥ prasṛtas taila.prasannā.kṣaudra.sarpiṣām |
AHS5.4.022c/ bilvādi.mūla.kvāthād dvau kaulatthād dvau sa vāta.jit || 22 || [Note: AHS5.4.022v/ 4.22av ekaikaḥ prasṛtis taila.]
AHS5.4.023a/ paṭola.nimba.bhūtīka.rāsnā.saptacchadāmbhasaḥ |
AHS5.4.023c/ prasṛtaḥ pṛthag ājyāc ca vastiḥ sarṣapa.kalka.vān || 23 || [Note: AHS5.4.023v/ 4.23av paṭola.nimba.pūtīka. 4.23bv .rāsnā.saptacchadāmbhasām 4.23cv prasṛtāḥ pṛthag ājyāc ca]
[Page 529 ]
AHS5.4.024a/ sa pañca.tikto 'bhiṣyanda.kṛmi.kuṣṭha.prameha.hā |
AHS5.4.024c/ catvāras taila.go.mūtra.dadhi.maṇḍāmla.kāñjikāt || 24 || [Note: AHS5.4.024v/ 4.24bv .kṛmi.kuṣṭha.pramoha.hā 4.24bv .kṛmi.kuṣṭha.prameha.jit]
AHS5.4.025a/ prasṛtāḥ sarṣapaiḥ piṣṭair viṭ.saṅgānāha.bhedanaḥ |
AHS5.4.025c/ payasyekṣu.sthirā.rāsnā.vidārī.kṣaudra.sarpiṣām || 25 || [Note: AHS5.4.025v/ 4.25bv viṭ.saṅgānāha.bhedanāḥ 4.25bv viṭ.saṅgānāha.bhedinaḥ 4.25dv .vidārī.kṣaudra.sarpiṣaḥ]
AHS5.4.026a/ ekaikaḥ prasṛto vastiḥ kṛṣṇā.kalko vṛṣa.tva.kṛt |
AHS5.4.026c/ siddha.vastīn ato vakṣye sarva.dā yān prayojayet || 26 ||
AHS5.4.027a/ nir.vyāpado bahu.phalān bala.puṣṭi.karān sukhān |
AHS5.4.027c/ madhu.taile same karṣaḥ saindhavād dvi.picur miśiḥ || 27 ||
AHS5.4.028a/ eraṇḍa.mūla.kvāthena nirūho mādhutailikaḥ |
AHS5.4.028c/ rasāyanaṁ pramehārśaḥ.kṛmi.gulmāntra.vṛddhi.nut || 28 || [Note: AHS5.4.028v/ 4.28bv nirūho madhu.tailikaḥ 4.28dv .kṛmi.gulmāntra.vṛddhi.hṛt]
AHS5.4.029a/ sa.yaṣṭīmadhukaś caiṣa cakṣuṣyo rakta.pitta.jit |
AHS5.4.029c/ yāpano ghana.kalkena madhu.taila.rasājya.vān || 29 ||
AHS5.4.030a/ pāyu.jānūru.vṛṣaṇa.vasti.mehana.śūla.jit |
AHS5.4.030c/ prasṛtāṁśair ghṛta.kṣaudra.vasā.tailaiḥ prakalpayet || 30 || [Note: AHS5.4.030v/ 4.30av pāyu.jaṅghoru.vṛṣaṇa.]
AHS5.4.031a/ yāpanaṁ saindhavārdhākṣa.hapuṣārdha.palānvitam |
AHS5.4.031c/ eraṇḍa.mūla.niḥkvātho madhu.tailaṁ sa.saindhavam || 31 || [Note: AHS5.4.031v/ 4.31dv madhu.tailaṁ sa.saindhavaḥ]
AHS5.4.032a/ eṣa yukta.ratho vastiḥ sa.vacā.pillalī.phalaḥ |
AHS5.4.032c/ sa kvātho madhu.ṣaḍgranthā.śatāhvā.hiṅgu.saindhavam || 32 || [Note: AHS5.4.032v/ 4.32cv tat.kvātho madhu.ṣaḍgranthā. 4.32dv .śatāhvā.hiṅgu.saindhavaḥ]
AHS5.4.033a/ suradāru ca rāsnā ca vastir doṣa.haraḥ śivaḥ |
AHS5.4.033c/ pañca.mūlasya niḥkvāthas tailaṁ māgadhikā madhu || 33 || [Note: AHS5.4.033v/ 4.33av suradāru vacā rāsnā 4.33bv vastir doṣa.haraś ca saḥ 4.33bv vastir doṣa.haraḥ paraḥ]
[Page 530 ]
AHS5.4.034a/ sa.saindhavaḥ sa.madhukaḥ siddha.vastir iti smṛtaḥ |
AHS5.4.034c/ dvi.pañca.mūla.tri.phalā.phala.bilvāni pācayet || 34 ||
AHS5.4.035a/ go.mūtre tena piṣṭaiś ca pāṭhā.vatsaka.toyadaiḥ |
AHS5.4.035c/ sa.phalaiḥ kṣaudra.tailābhyāṁ kṣāreṇa lavaṇena ca || 35 || [Note: AHS5.4.035v/ 4.35dv kṣāreṇa lavaṇena vā]
AHS5.4.036a/ yukto vastiḥ kapha.vyādhi.pāṇḍu.roga.viṣūciṣu |
AHS5.4.036c/ śukrānila.vibandheṣu vasty.āṭope ca pūjitaḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS5.4.036v/ 4.36dv vasty.āṭopeṣu pūjitaḥ]
AHS5.4.037a/ mustā.pāṭhāmṛtairaṇḍa.balā.rāsnā.punarnavāḥ |
AHS5.4.037c/ mañjiṣṭhāragvadhośīra.trāyamāṇākṣa.rohiṇīḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS5.4.037v/ 4.37bv .balā.rāsnā.punarnavam 4.37dv .trāyamāṇākṣa.rohiṇi]
AHS5.4.038a/ kanīyaḥ pañca.mūlaṁ ca pālikaṁ madanāṣṭakam |
AHS5.4.038c/ jalāḍhake pacet tac ca pāda.śeṣaṁ parisrutam || 38 ||
AHS5.4.039a/ kṣīra.dvi.prastha.saṁyuktaṁ kṣīra.śeṣaṁ punaḥ pacet |
AHS5.4.039c/ sa.pāda.jāṅgala.rasaḥ sa.sarpir.madhu.saindhavaḥ || 39 ||
AHS5.4.040a/ piṣṭair yaṣṭī.miśi.śyāmā.kaliṅgaka.rasāñjanaiḥ |
AHS5.4.040c/ vastiḥ sukhoṣṇo māṁsāgni.bala.śukra.vivardhanaḥ || 40 ||
AHS5.4.041a/ vātāsṛṅ.moha.mehārśo.gulma.viṇ.mūtra.saṅgrahān |
AHS5.4.041c/ viṣama.jvara.vīsarpa.vardhmādhmāna.pravāhikāḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS5.4.041v/ 4.41av vāta.rakta.pramehārśo. 4.41av vātāsṛṅ.meha.medo.'rśo. 4.41bv .gulma.viṇ.mūtra.saṅgraham]
AHS5.4.042a/ vaṅkṣaṇoru.kaṭī.kukṣi.manyā.śrotra.śiro.rujaḥ |
AHS5.4.042c/ hanyād asṛg.daronmāda.śopha.kāsāśma.kuṇḍalān || 42 ||
AHS5.4.043a/ cakṣuṣyaḥ putra.do rājā yāpanānāṁ rasāyanam |
AHS5.4.043c/ mṛgāṇāṁ laghu.vadrāṇāṁ daśa.mūlasya cāmbhasā || 43 || [Note: AHS5.4.043v/ 4.43bv yāpanānāṁ rasāyanaḥ 4.43cv mṛgāṇāṁ laghu.babhrūṇāṁ 4.43cv mṛgāṇāṁ laghu.barhāṇāṁ 4.43cv mṛgāṇāṁ laghu.vaḍrāṇāṁ 4.43cv mṛgāṇāṁ laghu.vabhrāṇāṁ 4.43cv mṛgāṇāṁ laghu.babhrāṇāṁ 4.43cv mṛgāṇāṁ laghu.vargāṇāṁ]
[Page 531 ]
AHS5.4.044a/ hapuṣā.miśi.gāṅgeyī.kalkair vāta.haraḥ param |
AHS5.4.044c/ nirūho 'ty.artha.vṛṣyaś ca mahā.sneha.samanvitaḥ || 44 || [Note: AHS5.4.044v/ 4.44bv .kalkair vāta.haraiḥ param 4.44bv .kalko vāta.haraḥ param]
AHS5.4.045a/ mayūraṁ pakṣa.pittāntra.pāda.viṭ.tuṇḍa.varjitam |
AHS5.4.045c/ laghunā pañca.mūlena pālikena samanvitam || 45 ||
AHS5.4.046a/ paktvā kṣīra.jale kṣīra.śeṣaṁ sa.ghṛta.mākṣikam |
AHS5.4.046c/ tad vidārī.kaṇā.yaṣṭī.śatāhvā.phala.kalka.vat || 46 || [Note: AHS5.4.046v/ 4.46dv .śatāhvā.phala.kalka.vān]
AHS5.4.047a/ vastir īṣat.paṭu.yutaḥ paramaṁ bala.śukra.kṛt |
AHS5.4.047c/ kalpaneyaṁ pṛthak kāryā tittiri.prabhṛtiṣv api || 47 || [Note: AHS5.4.047v/ 4.47bv paramaṁ bala.varṇa.kṛt]
AHS5.4.048a/ viṣkireṣu samasteṣu pratuda.prasaheṣu ca |
AHS5.4.048c/ jala.cāriṣu tad.vac ca matsyeṣu kṣīra.varjitā || 48 ||
AHS5.4.049a/ godhā.nakula.mārjāra.śalyakondura.jaṁ palam |
AHS5.4.049c/ pṛthag daśa.palaṁ kṣīre pañca.mūlaṁ ca sādhayet || 49 ||
AHS5.4.050a/ tat payaḥ phala.vaidehī.kalka.dvi.lavaṇānvitam |
AHS5.4.050c/ sa.sitā.taila.madhv.ājyo vastir yojyo rasāyanam || 50 || [Note: AHS5.4.050v/ 4.50cv sa.sitā.taila.madhv.ājyaṁ 4.50cv sa.sitā.taila.madhv.ājyaṁ]
AHS5.4.051a/ vyāyāma.mathitoraska.kṣīṇendriya.balaujasām |
AHS5.4.051c/ vibaddha.śukra.viṇ.mūtra.khuḍa.vāta.vikāriṇām || 51 || [Note: AHS5.4.051v/ 4.51cv vibandha.śukra.viṇ.mūtra.]
AHS5.4.052a/ gaja.vāji.ratha.kṣobha.bhagna.jarjaritātmanām |
AHS5.4.052c/ punar.nava.tvaṁ kurute vājī.karaṇam uttamam || 52 || [Note: AHS5.4.052v/ 4.52dv vājī.karaṇa.sat.tamam]
AHS5.4.053a/ siddhena payasā bhojyam ātmaguptoccaṭekṣuraiḥ |
AHS5.4.053c/ snehāṁś cā.yantraṇān siddhān siddha.dravyaiḥ prakalpayet || 53 || [Note: AHS5.4.053v/ 4.53cv snehāṁś cāḍhya.guṇān siddhān]
[Page 532 ]
AHS5.4.054a/ doṣa.ghnāḥ sa.parīhārā vakṣyante sneha.vastayaḥ |
AHS5.4.054c/ daśa.mūlaṁ balāṁ rāsnām aśvagandhāṁ punarnavām || 54 || [Note: AHS5.4.054v/ 4.54av doṣa.ghnā niṣ.parīhārā]
AHS5.4.055a/ guḍūcyairaṇḍa.bhūtīka.bhārgī.vṛṣaka.rohiṣam |
AHS5.4.055c/ śatāvarīṁ sahacaraṁ kākanāsāṁ palāṁśakam || 55 || [Note: AHS5.4.055v/ 4.55av guḍūcyairaṇḍa.pūtīka. 4.55dv kākanāsāṁ palāṁśikam 4.55dv kākanāsāṁ palāṁśikām]
AHS5.4.056a/ yava.māṣātasī.kola.kulatthān prasṛtonmitān |
AHS5.4.056c/ vahe vipācya toyasya droṇa.śeṣeṇa tena ca || 56 ||
AHS5.4.057a/ pacet tailāḍhakaṁ peṣyair jīvanīyaiḥ palonmitaiḥ |
AHS5.4.057c/ anuvāsanam ity etat sarva.vāta.vikāra.nut || 57 || [Note: AHS5.4.057v/ 4.57av pacet tailāḍḥakaṁ kalkair 4.57dv sarva.vāta.vikāra.jit]
AHS5.4.058a/ ānūpānāṁ vasā tad.vaj jīvanīyopasādhitā |
AHS5.4.058c/ śatāhvā.ciribilvāmlais tailaṁ siddhaṁ samīraṇe || 58 || [Note: AHS5.4.058v/ 4.58cv śatāhvā.yava.bilvāmlais 4.58dv tailaṁ tad.vat samīraṇe]
AHS5.4.059a/ saindhavenāgni.varṇena taptaṁ cānila.jid ghṛtam |
AHS5.4.059c/ jīvantīṁ madanaṁ medāṁ śrāvaṇīṁ madhukaṁ balām || 59 ||
AHS5.4.060a/ śatāhvarṣabhakau kṛṣṇāṁ kākanāsāṁ śatāvarīm |
AHS5.4.060c/ svaguptāṁ kṣīra.kākolīṁ karkaṭākhyāṁ śaṭhīṁ vacām || 60 ||
AHS5.4.061a/ piṣṭvā taila.ghṛtaṁ kṣīre sādhayet tac.catur.guṇe |
AHS5.4.061c/ bṛṁhaṇaṁ vāta.pitta.ghnaṁ bala.śukrāgni.vardhanam || 61 || [Note: AHS5.4.061v/ 4.61av piṣṭvā tailaṁ ghṛtaṁ kṣīre 4.61bv sādhayet ca catur.guṇe]
AHS5.4.062a/ rajaḥ.śukrāmaya.haraṁ putrīyaṁ cānuvāsanam |
AHS5.4.062c/ saindhavaṁ madanaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ śatāhvā niculo vacā || 62 || [Note: AHS5.4.062v/ 4.62av rajaḥ.śukrānila.haraṁ 4.62bv putrīyam anuvāsanam]
AHS5.4.063a/ hrīveraṁ madhukaṁ bhārgī devadāru sa.kaṭphalam |
AHS5.4.063c/ nāgaraṁ puṣkaraṁ medā cavikā citrakaḥ śaṭhī || 63 || [Note: AHS5.4.063v/ 4.63av hrīveraṁ padmakaṁ bhārgī]
[Page 533 ]
AHS5.4.064a/ viḍaṅgātiviṣe śyāmā hareṇur nīlinī sthirā |
AHS5.4.064c/ bilvājamoda.capalā dantī rāsnā ca taiḥ samaiḥ || 64 || [Note: AHS5.4.064v/ 4.64av viḍaṅgātiviṣā.śyāmā 4.64cv bilvājamodā.capalā 4.64cv bilvājamode capalā]
AHS5.4.065a/ sādhyam eraṇḍa.tailaṁ vā tailaṁ vā kapha.roga.nut |
AHS5.4.065c/ vardhmodāvarta.gulmārśaḥ.plīha.mehāḍhya.mārutān || 65 || [Note: AHS5.4.065v/ 4.65av sādhyam eraṇḍa.jaṁ tailaṁ 4.65bv kapha.vāta.ja.roga.nut]
AHS5.4.066a/ ānāham aśmarīṁ cāśu hanyāt tad anuvāsanam |
AHS5.4.066c/ sādhitaṁ pañca.mūlena tailaṁ bilvādinātha.vā || 66 ||
AHS5.4.067a/ kapha.ghnaṁ kalpayet tailaṁ dravyair vā kapha.ghātibhiḥ |
AHS5.4.067c/ phalair aṣṭa.guṇaiś cāmlaiḥ siddham anvāsanaṁ kaphe || 67 || [Note: AHS5.4.067v/ 4.67cv phalair aṣṭa.guṇe cāmle]
AHS5.4.068a/ mṛdu.vasti.jaḍī.bhūte tīkṣṇo 'nyo vastir iṣyate |
AHS5.4.068c/ tīkṣṇair vikarṣite snigdho madhuraḥ śiśiro mṛduḥ || 68 || [Note: AHS5.4.068v/ 4.68av mṛdu.vastau jaḍī.bhūte]
AHS5.4.069a/ tīkṣṇa.tvaṁ mūtra.pīlv.agni.lavaṇa.kṣāra.sarṣapaiḥ |
AHS5.4.069c/ prāpta.kālaṁ vidhātavyaṁ kṣīrājyādyais tu mārdavam || 69 || [Note: AHS5.4.069v/ 4.69av tīkṣṇa.tvaṁ mūtra.bilvāgni. 4.69dv kṣīrājyādyaiś ca mārdavam 4.69dv kṣīrādyaiś caiva mārdavam 4.69dv ghṛta.kṣīrais tu mārdavam]
AHS5.4.070a/ bala.kāla.roga.doṣa.prakṛtīḥ pravibhajya yojito vastiḥ |
AHS5.4.070c/ svaiḥ svair auṣadha.vargaiḥ svān svān rogān nivartayati || 70 || [Note: AHS5.4.070v/ 4.70bv .prakṛtīḥ pravivīkṣya yojito vastiḥ 4.70dv svān svān doṣān nivartayati]
AHS5.4.071a/ uṣṇārtānāṁ śītāñ chītārtānāṁ tathā sukhoṣṇāṁś ca |
AHS5.4.071c/ tad.yogyauṣadha.yuktān vastīn santarkya yuñjīta || 71 ||
AHS5.4.072a/ vastīn na bṛṁhaṇīyān dadyād vyādhiṣu viśodhanīyeṣu |
AHS5.4.072c/ medasvino viśodhyā ye ca narāḥ kuṣṭha.mehārtāḥ || 72 || [Note: AHS5.4.072v/ 4.72bv dadyād vyādhiṣu ca śodhanīyeṣu]
AHS5.4.073a/ na kṣīṇa.kṣata.dur.bala.mūrchita.kṛśa.śuṣka.śuddha.dehānām |
AHS5.4.073c/ dadyād viśodhanīyān doṣa.nibaddhāyuṣo ye ca || 73 ||

5.5. Chapter 5 :: Athabastivyāpatsiddhir adhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 446-449] [Page 534 ]
AHS5.5.001a/ a.snigdha.svinna.dehasya guru.koṣṭhasya yojitaḥ |
AHS5.5.001c/ śīto 'lpa.sneha.lavaṇa.dravya.mātro ghano 'pi vā || 1 || [Note: AHS5.5.001v/ 5.1dv .drava.mātro ghano 'pi vā]
AHS5.5.002a/ vastiḥ saṅkṣobhya taṁ doṣaṁ dur.bala.tvād a.nirharan |
AHS5.5.002c/ karoty a.yogaṁ tena syād vāta.mūtra.śakṛd.grahaḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS5.5.002v/ 5.2av vastiḥ saṁstabhya taṁ doṣaṁ]
AHS5.5.003a/ nābhi.vasti.rujā dāho hṛl.lepaḥ śvayathur gude |
AHS5.5.003c/ kaṇḍūr gaṇḍāni vaivarṇyam a.ratir vahni.mārdavam || 3 || [Note: AHS5.5.003v/ 5.3av nābhi.vasti.rujānāho 5.3cv kaṇḍūr gaṇḍāti.vaivarṇyam 5.3cv kaṇḍūr gaṇḍākṣi.vaivarṇyam]
AHS5.5.004a/ kvātha.dvayaṁ prāg.vihitaṁ madhya.doṣe 'tisāriṇi |
AHS5.5.004c/ uṣṇasya tasmād ekasya tatra pānaṁ praśasyate || 4 || [Note: AHS5.5.004v/ 5.4dv tatra pānaṁ vidhīyate]
AHS5.5.005a/ phala.vartyas tathā svedāḥ kālaṁ jñātvā virecanam |
AHS5.5.005c/ bilva.mūla.trivṛd.dāru.yava.kola.kulattha.vān || 5 ||
AHS5.5.006a/ surādi.mūtra.vān vastiḥ sa.prāk.peṣyas tam ānayet |
AHS5.5.006c/ yukto 'lpa.vīryo doṣāḍhye rūkṣe krūrāśaye 'tha.vā || 6 || [Note: AHS5.5.006v/ 5.6av surādi.māṁs tatra vastiḥ]
AHS5.5.007a/ vastir doṣāvṛto ruddha.mārgo rundhyāt samīraṇam |
AHS5.5.007c/ sa vi.mārgo 'nilaḥ kuryād ādhmānaṁ marma.pīḍanam || 7 ||
AHS5.5.008a/ vidāhaṁ guda.koṣṭhasya muṣka.vaṅkṣaṇa.vedanām |
AHS5.5.008c/ ruṇaddhi hṛdayaṁ śūlair itaś cetaś ca dhāvati || 8 ||
AHS5.5.009a/ sv.abhyakta.svinna.gātrasya tatra vartiṁ prayojayet |
AHS5.5.009c/ bilvādiś ca nirūhaḥ syāt pīlu.sarṣapa.mūtra.vān || 9 || [Note: AHS5.5.009v/ 5.9av abhyakta.svinna.gātrasya 5.9av sv.abhyakta.svinna.gātrāya 5.9av sv.abhyakta.svinna.dehasya]
AHS5.5.010a/ saralāmaradārubhyāṁ sādhitaṁ cānuvāsanam |
AHS5.5.010c/ kurvato vega.saṁrodhaṁ pīḍito vāti.mātrayā || 10 || [Note: AHS5.5.010v/ 5.10bv sādhitaṁ vānuvāsanam 5.10dv pīḍitaś cāti.mātrayā]
[Page 535 ]
AHS5.5.011a/ a.snigdha.lavaṇoṣṇo vā vastir alpo 'lpa.bheṣajaḥ |
AHS5.5.011c/ mṛdur vā mārutenordhvaṁ vikṣipto mukha.nāsikāt || 11 ||
AHS5.5.012a/ nireti mūrchā.hṛl.lāsa.tṛḍ.dāhādīn pravartayan |
AHS5.5.012c/ mūrchā.vikāraṁ dṛṣṭvāsya siñcec chītāmbunā mukham || 12 || [Note: AHS5.5.012v/ 5.12bv .tṛḍ.dāhādīn prakalpayet 5.12bv .tṛḍ.dāhādīn pravartayet]
AHS5.5.013a/ vyajed ā.klama.nāśāc ca prāṇāyāmaṁ ca kārayet |
AHS5.5.013c/ pṛṣṭha.pārśvodaraṁ mṛjyāt karair uṣṇair adho.mukham || 13 || [Note: AHS5.5.013v/ 5.13av vījet klama.vināśāc ca 5.13av vījed ā.klama.nāśāc ca 5.13av vījyed ā.klama.nāśāc ca 5.13cv pṛṣṭha.pārśvodaraṁ mṛdyāt]
AHS5.5.014a/ keśeṣūtkṣipya dhunvīta bhīṣayed vyāla.daṁṣṭribhiḥ |
AHS5.5.014c/ śastrolkā.rāja.puruṣair vastir eti tathā hy adhaḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS5.5.014v/ 5.14bv bhāyayed vyāla.daṁṣṭribhiḥv 5.14bv bhāpayed vyāla.daṁṣṭribhiḥ]
AHS5.5.015a/ pāṇi.vastrair galāpīḍaṁ kuryān na mriyate tathā |
AHS5.5.015c/ prāṇodāna.nirodhād dhi su.prasiddha.tarāyanaḥ || 15 ||
AHS5.5.016a/ apānaḥ pavano vastiṁ tam āśv evāpakarṣati |
AHS5.5.016c/ kuṣṭha.kramuka.kalkaṁ ca pāyayetāmla.saṁyutam || 16 || [Note: AHS5.5.016v/ 5.16bv tathāśv evāpakarṣati 5.16cv kuṣṭha.kramuka.kalkaṁ vā 5.16dv pāyayed amla.saṁyutam]
AHS5.5.017a/ auṣṇyāt taikṣṇyāt sara.tvāc ca vastiṁ so 'syānulomayet |
AHS5.5.017c/ go.mūtreṇa trivṛt.pathyā.kalkaṁ vādho.'nulomanam || 17 || [Note: AHS5.5.017v/ 5.17dv .kalkaṁ cādho.'nulomanam]
AHS5.5.018a/ pakvāśaya.sthite svinne nirūho dāśamūlikaḥ |
AHS5.5.018c/ yava.kola.kulatthaiś ca vidheyo mūtra.sādhitaiḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS5.5.018v/ 5.18dv vidheyo mūtra.sādhitaḥ]
AHS5.5.019a/ vastir go.mūtra.siddhair vā sāmṛtā.vaṁśa.pallavaiḥ |
AHS5.5.019c/ pūti.karañja.tvak.pattra.śaṭhī.devāhva.rohiṣaiḥ || 19 ||
AHS5.5.020a/ sa.taila.guḍa.sindhūttho virekauṣadha.kalka.vān |
AHS5.5.020c/ bilvādi.pañca.mūlena siddho vastir uraḥ.sthite || 20 ||
[Page 536 ]
AHS5.5.021a/ śiraḥ.sthe nāvanaṁ dhūmaḥ pracchādyaṁ sarṣapaiḥ śiraḥ |
AHS5.5.021c/ vastir aty.uṣṇa.tīkṣṇāmla.ghano 'ti.sveditasya vā || 21 ||
AHS5.5.022a/ alpe doṣe mṛdau koṣṭhe prayukto vā punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS5.5.022c/ ati.yoga.tvam āpanno bhavet kukṣi.rujā.karaḥ || 22 ||
AHS5.5.023a/ virecanāti.yogena sa tulyākṛti.sādhanaḥ |
AHS5.5.023c/ vastiḥ kṣārāmla.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.lavaṇaḥ paittikasya vā || 23 || [Note: AHS5.5.023v/ 5.23dv .lavaṇaḥ paittikasya ca]
AHS5.5.024a/ gudaṁ dahan likhan kṣiṇvan karoty asya parisravam |
AHS5.5.024c/ sa vidagdhaṁ sravaty asraṁ varṇaiḥ pittaṁ ca bhūribhiḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS5.5.024v/ 5.24bv karoty asra.parisravam]
AHS5.5.025a/ bahu.śaś cāti.vegena mohaṁ gacchati so '.sakṛt |
AHS5.5.025c/ rakta.pittātisāra.ghnī kriyā tatra praśasyate || 25 || [Note: AHS5.5.025v/ 5.25av bahu.śaś cāti.yogena 5.25bv mohaṁ gacchati cā.sakṛt 5.25bv mohaṁ gacchati vā.sakṛt]
AHS5.5.026a/ dāhādiṣu trivṛt.kalkaṁ mṛdvīkā.vāriṇā pibet |
AHS5.5.026c/ tad dhi pitta.śakṛd.vātān hṛtvā dāhādikāñ jayet || 26 || [Note: AHS5.5.026v/ 5.26dv hatvā dāhādikāñ jayet]
AHS5.5.027a/ viśuddhaś ca pibec chītāṁ yavāgūṁ śarkarā.yutām |
AHS5.5.027c/ yuñjyād vāti.viriktasya kṣīṇa.viṭkasya bhojanam || 27 || [Note: AHS5.5.027v/ 5.27bv yavāgūṁ śarkarānvitām]
AHS5.5.028a/ māṣa.yūṣeṇa kulmāṣān pānaṁ dadhy atha.vā surām |
AHS5.5.028c/ siddhir vasty.āpadām evaṁ sneha.vastes tu vakṣyate || 28 || [Note: AHS5.5.028v/ 5.28dv sneha.vastiṣu vakṣyate 5.28dv sneha.kalpas tu vakṣyate]
AHS5.5.029a/ śīto 'lpo vādhike vāte pitte 'ty.uṣṇaḥ kaphe mṛduḥ |
AHS5.5.029c/ ati.bhukte gurur varcaḥ.sañcaye 'lpa.balas tathā || 29 ||
AHS5.5.030a/ dattas tair āvṛtaḥ sneho nāyāty abhibhavād api |
AHS5.5.030c/ stambhoru.sadanādhmāna.jvara.śūlāṅga.mardanaiḥ || 30 || [Note: AHS5.5.030v/ 5.30bv nāyāty abhibhavād adhaḥ]
[Page 537 ]
AHS5.5.031a/ pārśva.rug.veṣṭanair vidyād vāyunā sneham āvṛtam |
AHS5.5.031c/ snigdhāmla.lavaṇoṣṇais taṁ rāsnā.pītadru.tailikaiḥ || 31 ||
AHS5.5.032a/ sauvīraka.surā.kola.kulattha.yava.sādhitaiḥ |
AHS5.5.032c/ nirūhair nirharet samyak sa.mūtraiḥ pāñcamūlikaiḥ || 32 || [Note: AHS5.5.032v/ 5.32av sauvīraka.surāṅkolla. 5.32dv sa.mūtraiḥ pāñcamaulikaiḥ]
AHS5.5.033a/ tābhyām eva ca tailābhyāṁ sāyaṁ bhukte 'nuvāsayet |
AHS5.5.033c/ tṛḍ.dāha.rāga.sammoha.vaivarṇya.tamaka.jvaraiḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS5.5.033v/ 5.33av tābhyām eva tu tailābhyāṁ 5.33av tailābhyām eva tābhyāṁ vā]
AHS5.5.034a/ vidyāt pittāvṛtaṁ svādu.tiktais taṁ vastibhir haret |
AHS5.5.034c/ tandrā.śīta.jvarālasya.prasekā.ruci.gauravaiḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS5.5.034v/ 5.34bv .tiktais taṁ ca vinirharet]
AHS5.5.035a/ sammūrchā.glānibhir vidyāc chleṣmaṇā sneham āvṛtam |
AHS5.5.035c/ kaṣāya.tikta.kaṭukaiḥ surā.mūtropasādhitaiḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS5.5.035v/ 5.35av sa.mūrchā.glānibhir vidyāc 5.35dv surā.mūtraiḥ prasādhitaiḥ 5.35dv surā.go.mūtra.sādhitaiḥ]
AHS5.5.036a/ phala.taila.yutaiḥ sāmlair vastibhis taṁ vinirharet |
AHS5.5.036c/ chardi.mūrchā.ruci.glāni.śūla.nidrāṅga.mardanaiḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS5.5.036v/ 5.36dv .śūla.tandrāṅga.mardanaiḥ]
AHS5.5.037a/ āma.liṅgaiḥ sa.dāhais taṁ vidyād aty.aśanāvṛtam |
AHS5.5.037c/ kaṭūnāṁ lavaṇānāṁ ca kvāthaiś cūrṇaiś ca pācanam || 37 || [Note: AHS5.5.037v/ 5.37bv vidyād āmāvṛtaṁ tu tam]
AHS5.5.038a/ mṛdur virekaḥ sarvaṁ ca tatrāma.vihitaṁ hitam |
AHS5.5.038c/ viṇ.mūtrānila.saṅgārti.guru.tvādhmāna.hṛd.grahaiḥ || 38 ||
AHS5.5.039a/ snehaṁ viḍ.āvṛtaṁ jñātvā sneha.svedaiḥ sa.vartibhiḥ |
AHS5.5.039c/ śyāmā.bilvādi.siddhaiś ca nirūhaiḥ sānuvāsanaiḥ || 39 ||
AHS5.5.040a/ nirhared vidhinā samyag udāvarta.hareṇa ca |
AHS5.5.040c/ a.bhukte śūna.pāyau vā peyā.mātrāśitasya vā || 40 || [Note: AHS5.5.040v/ 5.40bv udāvarta.hareṇa vā 5.40dv peyā.mātrāśitasya ca]
[Page 538 ]
AHS5.5.041a/ gude praṇihitaḥ sneho vegād dhāvaty an.āvṛtaḥ |
AHS5.5.041c/ ūrdhvaṁ kāyaṁ tataḥ kaṇṭhād ūrdhvebhyaḥ khebhya ety api || 41 || [Note: AHS5.5.041v/ 5.41cv ūrdhva.kāyaṁ tataḥ kaṇṭhād]
AHS5.5.042a/ mūtra.śyāmā.trivṛt.siddho yava.kola.kulattha.vān |
AHS5.5.042c/ tat.siddha.tailo deyaḥ syān nirūhaḥ sānuvāsanaḥ || 42 ||
AHS5.5.043a/ kaṇṭhād āgacchataḥ stambha.kaṇṭha.graha.virecanaiḥ |
AHS5.5.043c/ chardi.ghnībhiḥ kriyābhiś ca tasya kuryān nibarhaṇam || 43 ||
AHS5.5.044a/ nā.pakvaṁ praṇayet snehaṁ gudaṁ sa hy upalimpati |
AHS5.5.044c/ tataḥ kuryāt sa.ruṅ.moha.kaṇḍū.śophān kriyātra ca || 44 || [Note: AHS5.5.044v/ 5.44av nā.pakvaṁ snehayet snehaṁ 5.44cv tataḥ kuryāt sa.tṛṇ.moha. 5.44cv sa kuryāt sakthi.ruṅ.moha.]
AHS5.5.045a/ tīkṣṇo vastis tathā tailam arka.pattra.rase śṛtam |
AHS5.5.045c/ an.ucchvāsya tu baddhe vā datte niḥśeṣa eva vā || 45 || [Note: AHS5.5.045v/ 5.45cv an.ucchvāsya nu baddhe vā 5.45cv an.ucchvāsyānubaddhe vā 5.45dv datte niḥśeṣa eva ca]
AHS5.5.046a/ praviśya kṣubhito vāyuḥ śūla.toda.karo bhavet |
AHS5.5.046c/ tatrābhyaṅgo gude svedo vāta.ghnāny aśanāni ca || 46 || [Note: AHS5.5.046v/ 5.46dv vāta.ghnāny aśanāny atha]
AHS5.5.047a/ drutaṁ praṇīte niṣkṛṣṭe sahasotkṣipta eva vā |
AHS5.5.047c/ syāt kaṭī.guda.jaṅghoru.vasti.stambhārti.bhedanam || 47 ||
AHS5.5.048a/ bhojanaṁ tatra vāta.ghnaṁ svedābhyaṅgāḥ sa.vastayaḥ |
AHS5.5.048c/ pīḍyamāne 'ntarā mukte gude pratihato 'nilaḥ || 48 ||
AHS5.5.049a/ uraḥ.śiro.rujaṁ sādam ūrvoś ca janayed balī |
AHS5.5.049c/ vastiḥ syāt tatra bilvādi.phala.śyāmādi.mūtra.vān || 49 || [Note: AHS5.5.049v/ 5.49cv vastiḥ syāt tatra bilvādiḥ 5.49dv phala.śyāmādi.mūtra.vān]
AHS5.5.050a/ ati.prapīḍitaḥ koṣṭhe tiṣṭhaty āyāti vā galam |
AHS5.5.050c/ tatra vastir virekaś ca gala.pīḍādi karma ca || 50 || [Note: AHS5.5.050v/ 5.50bv tiṣṭhann āyāti vā galam]
[Page 539 ]
AHS5.5.051a/ vamanādyair viśuddhaṁ ca kṣāma.deha.balānalam |
AHS5.5.051c/ yathāṇḍaṁ taruṇaṁ pūrṇaṁ taila.pātraṁ yathā tathā || 51 || [Note: AHS5.5.051v/ 5.51av karmabhir vamanādyaiś ca 5.51av vamanādyair viśuddhaṁ tu]
AHS5.5.052a/ bhiṣak prayatnato rakṣet sarvasmād apacārataḥ |
AHS5.5.052c/ dadyān madhura.hṛdyāni tato 'mla.lavaṇau rasau || 52 || [Note: AHS5.5.052v/ 5.52bv sarvasmād apavādataḥ]
AHS5.5.053a/ svādu.tiktau tato bhūyaḥ kaṣāya.kaṭukau tataḥ |
AHS5.5.053c/ anyo.'nya.praty.anīkānāṁ rasānāṁ snigdha.rūkṣayoḥ || 53 ||
AHS5.5.054a/ vyatyāsād upayogena kramāt taṁ prakṛtiṁ nayet |
AHS5.5.054c/ sarvaṁ.sahaḥ sthira.balo vijñeyaḥ prakṛtiṁ gataḥ || 54 ||

5.6. Chapter 6 :: Athabheṣajakalpādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 449-452]
AHS5.6.001a/ dhanve sādhāraṇe deśe same san.mṛttike śucau |
AHS5.6.001c/ śmaśāna.caityāyatana.śvabhra.valmīka.varjite || 1 || [Note: AHS5.6.001v/ 6.1av dhanva.sādhāraṇe deśe 6.1cv śmaśāna.caityādyatana.]
AHS5.6.002a/ mṛdau pradakṣiṇa.jale kuśa.rohiṣa.saṁstṛte |
AHS5.6.002c/ a.phāla.kṛṣṭe 'n.ākrānte pādapair bala.vat.taraiḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS5.6.002v/ 6.2bv kuśa.rohiṣa.saṁskṛte]
AHS5.6.003a/ śasyate bheṣajaṁ jātaṁ yuktaṁ varṇa.rasādibhiḥ |
AHS5.6.003c/ jantv.a.jagdhaṁ davā.dagdham a.vidagdhaṁ ca vaikṛtaiḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS5.6.003v/ 6.3cv jantv.a.juṣṭaṁ davā.dagdham 6.3dv a.vijagdhaṁ ca vaikṛtaiḥ]
AHS5.6.004a/ bhūtaiś chāyātapāmbv.ādyair yathā.kālaṁ ca sevitam |
AHS5.6.004c/ avagāḍha.mahā.mūlam udīcīṁ diśam āśritam || 4 || [Note: AHS5.6.004v/ 6.4dv udīcīṁ diśam āsthitam]
AHS5.6.004+(1)a/ mahendra.rāma.kṛṣṇānāṁ brāhmaṇānāṁ gavām api |
AHS5.6.004+(1)c/ tapasā tejasā vāpi praśāmyadhvaṁ śivāya vai || 4+(1) || [Note: AHS5.6.004+(1)v/ 6.4+(1)cv tapasāṁ tejasāṁ vāpi 6.4+(1)dv praśāmyadhvaṁ śamāya vai]
AHS5.6.004+(2)ab/ mantreṇānena mati.mān sarvam apy auṣadhaṁ nayet || 4+(2)ab ||
[Page 540 ]
AHS5.6.005a/ atha kalyāṇa.caritaḥ śrāddhaḥ śucir upoṣitaḥ |
AHS5.6.005c/ gṛhṇīyād auṣadhaṁ su.sthaṁ sthitaṁ kāle ca kalpayet || 5 ||
AHS5.6.006a/ sa.kṣīraṁ tad a.sampattāv an.atikrānta.vatsaram |
AHS5.6.006c/ ṛte guḍa.ghṛta.kṣaudra.dhānya.kṛṣṇā.viḍaṅgataḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS5.6.006v/ 6.6cv ṛte ghṛta.guḍa.kṣaudra.]
AHS5.6.007a/ payo bāṣkayaṇaṁ grāhyaṁ viṇ.mūtraṁ tac ca nī.rujām |
AHS5.6.007c/ vayo.bala.vatāṁ dhātu.piccha.śṛṅga.khurādikam || 7 || [Note: AHS5.6.007v/ 6.7bv viṇ.mūtraṁ tac ca nī.ruji 6.7bv viṇ.mūtraṁ tac ca nī.rujam 6.7dv .puccha.śṛṅga.khurādikam 6.7dv .pitta.śṛṅga.khurādikam]
AHS5.6.008a/ kaṣāya.yonayaḥ pañca rasā lavaṇa.varjitāḥ |
AHS5.6.008c/ rasaḥ kalkaḥ śṛtaḥ śītaḥ phāṇṭaś ceti prakalpanā || 8 || [Note: AHS5.6.008v/ 6.8dv phāṇṭaś ceti prakalpanāḥ]
AHS5.6.009a/ pañca.dhaiva kaṣāyāṇāṁ pūrvaṁ pūrvaṁ balādhikā |
AHS5.6.009c/ sadyaḥ.samuddhṛtāt kṣuṇṇād yaḥ sravet paṭa.pīḍitāt || 9 || [Note: AHS5.6.009v/ 6.9av pañca caiva kaṣāyāṇāṁ 6.9bv pūrvaṁ pūrvaṁ balādhikāḥ 6.9bv pūrvaṁ pūrvaṁ balāvahāḥ 6.9cv sadyaḥ.samuddhṛta.kṣuṇṇād 6.9dv yaḥ sravet paṭa.pīḍanāt]
AHS5.6.010a/ sva.rasaḥ sa samuddiṣṭaḥ kalkaḥ piṣṭo dravāplutaḥ |
AHS5.6.010c/ cūrṇo '.plutaḥ śṛtaḥ kvāthaḥ śīto rātriṁ drave sthitaḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS5.6.010v/ 6.10dv śīto rātrau drave sthitaḥ]
AHS5.6.011a/ sadyo.'bhiṣuta.pūtas tu phāṇṭas tan.māna.kalpane |
AHS5.6.011c/ yuñjyād vyādhy.ādi.balatas tathā ca vacanaṁ muneḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS5.6.011v/ 6.11av sadyo.'bhikṣuṇṇa.pūtas tu]
AHS5.6.012a/ mātrāyā na vyavasthāsti vyādhiṁ koṣṭhaṁ balaṁ vayaḥ |
AHS5.6.012c/ ālocya deśa.kālau ca yojyā tad.vac ca kalpanā || 12 || [Note: AHS5.6.012v/ 6.12av mātrāyā nāsty avasthānaṁ 6.12bv doṣam agniṁ balaṁ vayaḥ]
AHS5.6.013a/ madhyaṁ tu mānaṁ nirdiṣṭaṁ sva.rasasya catuḥ.palam |
AHS5.6.013c/ peṣyasya karṣam āloḍyaṁ tad dravasya pala.traye || 13 || [Note: AHS5.6.013v/ 6.13av madhya.mānaṁ vinirdiṣṭaṁ]
AHS5.6.014a/ kvāthaṁ dravya.pale kuryāt prasthārdhaṁ pāda.śeṣitam |
AHS5.6.014c/ śītaṁ pale palaiḥ ṣaḍbhiś caturbhis tu tato 'param || 14 || [Note: AHS5.6.014v/ 6.14dv caturbhiś ca tato 'param 6.14dv caturbhis tu tataḥ param]
[Page 541 ]
AHS5.6.015a/ sneha.pāke tv a.mānoktau catur.guṇa.vivardhitam |
AHS5.6.015c/ kalka.sneha.dravaṁ yojyam adhīte śaunakaḥ punaḥ || 15 ||
AHS5.6.016a/ snehe sidhyati śuddhāmbu.niḥkvātha.sva.rasaiḥ kramāt |
AHS5.6.016c/ kalkasya yojayed aṁśaṁ caturthaṁ ṣaṣṭham aṣṭamam || 16 ||
AHS5.6.017a/ pṛthak sneha.samaṁ dadyāt pañca.prabhṛti tu dravam |
AHS5.6.017c/ nāṅgulī.grāhi.tā kalke na snehe 'gnau sa.śabda.tā || 17 || [Note: AHS5.6.017v/ 6.17av dravaṁ tu pañca.prabhṛti 6.17bv pṛthak sneha.samaṁ kṣipet]
AHS5.6.017.1+1a/ śuṣka.dravyaṁ yadā na syāt tadā sadyaḥ.samuddhṛtam |
AHS5.6.017.1+1c/ dvi.guṇaṁ tat prayoktavyaṁ kuḍavādi dravaṁ tathā || 17.1+1 ||
AHS5.6.018a/ varṇādi.sampac ca yadā tadainaṁ śīghram āharet |
AHS5.6.018c/ ghṛtasya phenopaśamas tailasya tu tad.udbhavaḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS5.6.018v/ 6.18dc tailasya ca tad.udbhavaḥ]
AHS5.6.019a/ lehasya tantu.mat.tāpsu majjanaṁ saraṇaṁ na ca |
AHS5.6.019c/ pākas tu tri.vidho mandaś cikkaṇaḥ khara.cikkaṇaḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS5.6.019v/ 6.19bv majjanaṁ śaraṇaṁ na ca]
AHS5.6.020a/ mandaḥ kalka.same kiṭṭe cikkaṇo madanopame |
AHS5.6.020c/ kiñ.cit sīdati kṛṣṇe ca vartya.māne ca paścimaḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS5.6.020v/ 6.20dv varti.māne ca paścimaḥ 6.20dv vartamāne ca paścimaḥ 6.20dv vartamāne tu paścimaḥ]
AHS5.6.021a/ dagdho 'ta ūrdhvaṁ niṣkāryaḥ syād āmas tv agni.sāda.kṛt |
AHS5.6.021c/ mṛdur nasye kharo 'bhyaṅge pāne vastau ca cikkaṇaḥ || 21 ||
AHS5.6.022a/ śāṇaṁ pāṇi.talaṁ muṣṭiṁ kuḍavaṁ prastham āḍhakam |
AHS5.6.022c/ droṇaṁ vahaṁ ca krama.śo vijānīyāc catur.guṇam || 22 ||
AHS5.6.023a/ dvi.guṇaṁ yojayed ārdraṁ kuḍavādi tathā dravam |
AHS5.6.023c/ peṣaṇāloḍane vāri sneha.pāke ca nir.drave || 23 ||
[Page 542 ]
AHS5.6.024a/ kalpayet sadṛśān bhāgān pramāṇaṁ yatra noditam |
AHS5.6.024c/ kalkī.kuryāc ca bhaiṣajyam a.nirūpita.kalpanam || 24 ||
AHS5.6.025a/ aṅgān.uktau tu mūlaṁ syād a.prasiddhau tad eva tu |
AHS5.6.025c/ dvau śāṇau vaṭakaḥ kolaṁ badaraṁ draṅkṣaṇaś ca tau || 25 || [Note: AHS5.6.025v/ 6.25av a.nirdiṣṭā.prasiddheṣu 6.25bv mūlaṁ grāhyaṁ tvag.ādiṣu 6.25cv dvau śāṇau vaṭakaḥ kolo]
AHS5.6.025.1+(1)a/ ṣaḍ vaṁśyas tu marīciḥ syāt ṣaṇ marīcyas tu sarṣapaḥ |
AHS5.6.025.1+(1)c/ taṇḍulaḥ sarṣapās tv aṣṭau dhānya.māṣas tu tau yavaḥ || 25.1+(1) || [Note: AHS5.6.06.25.1+(1)v/ 6.25.1+(1)dv dhānya.māṣaś ca tau yavaḥ]
AHS5.6.025.1+(2)ab/ tāv aṇḍikā caturbhis tair māṣakaḥ śāṇakas tathā || 25.1+(2)ab || [Note: AHS5.6.025.1+(2)v/ 6.25.1+(2)av tāvanto gaditā māṣāḥ 6.25.1+(2)av tais turyair guñjakā māṣas 6.25.1+(2)bv śāṇo 'yaṁ munibhiḥ smṛtaḥ 6.25.1+(2)bv turyābhiḥ śāṇakaḥ smṛtaḥ]
AHS5.6.026a/ akṣaṁ picuḥ pāṇi.talaṁ suvarṇaṁ kavaḍa.grahaḥ |
AHS5.6.026c/ karṣo biḍāla.padakaṁ tindukaḥ pāṇi.mānikā || 26 || [Note: AHS5.6.026v/ 6.26bv suvarṇaṁ kavaḍa.graham 6.26dv tindukaṁ pāṇi.mānikā]
AHS5.6.027a/ śabdānya.tvam a.bhinne 'rthe śuktir aṣṭamikā picū |
AHS5.6.027c/ palaṁ prakuñco bilvaṁ ca muṣṭir āmraṁ caturthikā || 27 || [Note: AHS5.6.027v/ 6.27av śabdān evam a.bhinne 'rthe 6.27av śabdā hy amī a.bhinne 'rthe]
AHS5.6.028a/ dve pale prasṛtas tau dvāv añjalis tau tu mānikā |
AHS5.6.028c/ āḍhakaṁ bhājanaṁ kaṁso droṇaḥ kumbho ghaṭo 'rmaṇam || 28 || [Note: AHS5.6.028v/ 6.28av dve pale prasṛtis tau dvāv]
AHS5.6.029a/ tulā pala.śataṁ tāni viṁśatir bhāra ucyate |
AHS5.6.029c/ himavad.vindhya.śailābhyāṁ prāyo vyāptā vasundharā || 29 || [Note: AHS5.6.029v/ 6.29av tulā pala.śataṁ tāsāṁ]
AHS5.6.029ū̆ab/ saumyaṁ pathyaṁ ca tatrādyam āgneyaṁ vaindhyam auṣadham || 29ū̆ab || [Note: AHS5.6.029ū̆v/ 6.29ū̆av saumyaṁ tatrādyam āgneyaṁ 6.29ū̆bv vaindhyam auṣadham īritam]

6. Part 6 :: Uttarasthānam

[Note: [ K edn 453-588]

6.1. Chapter 1 :: Athabālopacaraṇīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 453-456]
AHS6.1.001a/ jāta.mātraṁ viśodhyolbād bālaṁ saindhava.sarpiṣā |
AHS6.1.001c/ prasūti.kleśitaṁ cānu balā.tailena secayet || 1 ||
[Page 543 ]
AHS6.1.002a/ aśmanor vādanaṁ cāsya karṇa.mūle samācaret |
AHS6.1.002c/ athāsya dakṣiṇe karṇe mantram uccārayed imam || 2 ||
AHS6.1.003a/ aṅgād aṅgāt sambhavasi hṛdayād abhijāyase |
AHS6.1.003c/ ātmā vai putra.nāmāsi sañjīva śaradāṁ śatam || 3 || [Note: AHS6.1.003v/ 1.3dv sañjīva śaradaḥ śatam]
AHS6.1.004a/ śatāyuḥ śata.varṣo 'si dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi |
AHS6.1.004c/ nakṣatrāṇi diśo rātrir ahaś ca tvābhirakṣatu || 4 || [Note: AHS6.1.004v/ 1.4dv ahaś catvāri rakṣatu]
AHS6.1.005a/ svasthī.bhūtasya nābhiṁ ca sūtreṇa catur.aṅgulāt |
AHS6.1.005c/ baddhvordhvaṁ vardhayitvā ca grīvāyām avasañjayet || 5 || [Note: AHS6.1.005v/ 1.5cv baddhvordhvaṁ vardhayitvā tu 1.5dv grīvāyām avasajjayet]
AHS6.1.006a/ nābhiṁ ca kuṣṭha.tailena secayet snāpayed anu |
AHS6.1.006c/ kṣīri.vṛkṣa.kaṣāyeṇa sarva.gandhodakena vā || 6 || [Note: AHS6.1.006v/ 1.6av nābhiṁ tu kuṣṭha.tailena 1.6bv secayet snapayed anu]
AHS6.1.007a/ koṣṇena tapta.rajata.tapanīya.nimajjanaiḥ |
AHS6.1.007c/ tato dakṣiṇa.tarjanyā tālūnnamyāvaguṇṭhayet || 7 ||
AHS6.1.008a/ śirasi sneha.picunā prāśyaṁ cāsya prayojayet |
AHS6.1.008c/ hareṇu.mātraṁ medhāyur.balārtham abhimantritam || 8 || [Note: AHS6.1.008v/ 1.8bv prāśaṁ cāsya prayojayet]
AHS6.1.009a/ aindrī.brāhmī.vacā.śaṅkhapuṣpī.kalkaṁ ghṛtaṁ madhu |
AHS6.1.009c/ cāmīkara.vacā.brāhmī.tāpya.pathyā rajī.kṛtāḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS6.1.009v/ 1.9dv .kuṣṭha.pathyā rajī.kṛtāḥ]
AHS6.1.010a/ lihyān madhu.ghṛtopetā hema.dhātrī.rajo 'tha.vā |
AHS6.1.010c/ garbhāmbhaḥ saindhava.vatā sarpiṣā vāmayet tataḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS6.1.010v/ 1.10cv garbhāmbhaḥ saindhava.vacā. 1.10dv .sarpiṣā vāmayet tataḥ]
AHS6.1.011a/ prājāpatyena vidhinā jāta.karmāṇi kārayet |
AHS6.1.011c/ sirāṇāṁ hṛdaya.sthānāṁ vivṛta.tvāt prasūtitaḥ || 11 ||
[Page 544 ]
AHS6.1.012a/ tṛtīye 'hni caturthe vā strīṇāṁ stanyaṁ pravartate |
AHS6.1.012c/ prathame divase tasmāt tri.kālaṁ madhu.sarpiṣī || 12 ||
AHS6.1.013a/ anantā.miśrite mantra.pāvite prāśayec chiśum |
AHS6.1.013c/ dvitīye lakṣmaṇā.siddhaṁ tṛtīye ca ghṛtaṁ tataḥ || 13 ||
AHS6.1.014a/ prāṅ.niṣiddha.stanasyāsya tat.pāṇi.tala.sammitam |
AHS6.1.014c/ stanyānu.pānaṁ dvau kālau nava.nītaṁ prayojayet || 14 ||
AHS6.1.015a/ mātur eva pibet stanyaṁ tad dhy alaṁ deha.vṛddhaye |
AHS6.1.015c/ stanya.dhātryāv ubhe kārye tad.a.sampadi vatsale || 15 || [Note: AHS6.1.015v/ 1.15bv tat paraṁ deha.vṛddhaye]
AHS6.1.016a/ a.vyaṅge brahma.cāriṇyau varṇa.prakṛtitaḥ same |
AHS6.1.016c/ nī.ruje madhya.vayasau jīvad.vatse na lolupe || 16 ||
AHS6.1.017a/ hitāhāra.vihāreṇa yatnād upacarec ca te |
AHS6.1.017c/ śuk.krodha.laṅghanāyāsāḥ stanya.nāśasya hetavaḥ || 17 ||
AHS6.1.018a/ stanyasya sīdhu.varjyāni madyāny ānūpa.jā rasāḥ |
AHS6.1.018c/ kṣīraṁ kṣīriṇya oṣadhyaḥ śokādeś ca viparyayaḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS6.1.018v/ 1.18cv kṣīraṁ kṣīriṇy auṣadhayaḥ]
AHS6.1.019a/ viruddhāhāra.bhuktāyāḥ kṣudhitāyā vi.cetasaḥ |
AHS6.1.019c/ praduṣṭa.dhātor garbhiṇyāḥ stanyaṁ roga.karaṁ śiśoḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS6.1.019v/ 1.19av viruddhāhāra.ceṣṭāyāḥ]
AHS6.1.020a/ stanyā.bhāve payaś chāgaṁ gavyaṁ vā tad.guṇaṁ pibet |
AHS6.1.020c/ hrasvena pañca.mūlena sthirābhyāṁ vā sitā.yutam || 20 || [Note: AHS6.1.020v/ 1.20cv mūlaiḥ siddhaṁ bṛhaty.ādyaiḥ]
AHS6.1.021a/ ṣaṣṭhīṁ niśāṁ viśeṣeṇa kṛta.rakṣā.bali.kriyāḥ |
AHS6.1.021c/ jāgṛyur bāndhavās tasya dadhataḥ paramāṁ mudam || 21 ||
[Page 545 ]
AHS6.1.022a/ daśame divase pūrṇe vidhibhiḥ sva.kulocitaiḥ |
AHS6.1.022c/ kārayet sūtikotthānaṁ nāma bālasya cārcitam || 22 || [Note: AHS6.1.022v/ 1.22bv vidhi.vat sva.kulocitaiḥ]
AHS6.1.023a/ bibhrato 'ṅgair manohvāla.rocanāguru.candanam |
