AHS6.1.023c/ nakṣatra.devatā.yuktaṁ bāndhavaṁ vā samākṣaram || 23 ||
AHS6.1.024a/ tataḥ prakṛti.bhedokta.rūpair āyuḥ.parīkṣaṇam |
AHS6.1.024c/ prāg.udak.śirasaḥ kuryād bālasya jñāna.vān bhiṣak || 24 ||
AHS6.1.025a/ śuci.dhautopadhānāni nir.valīni mṛdūni ca |
AHS6.1.025c/ śayyāstaraṇa.vāsāṁsi rakṣo.ghnair dhūpitāni ca || 25 ||
AHS6.1.026a/ kāko viśastaḥ śastaś ca dhūpane trivṛtānvitaḥ |
AHS6.1.026c/ jīvat.khaḍgādi.śṛṅgotthān sadā bālaḥ śubhān maṇīn || 26 || [Note: AHS6.1.026v/ 1.26av kaṅko viśastaḥ śastaś ca 1.26cv jīvat.khaḍgādi.śṛṅga.sthān]
AHS6.1.027a/ dhārayed auṣadhīḥ śreṣṭhāḥ brāhmy.aindrī.jīvakādikāḥ |
AHS6.1.027c/ hastābhyāṁ grīvayā mūrdhnā viśeṣāt satataṁ vacām || 27 || [Note: AHS6.1.027v/ 1.27av dhārayec cauṣadhīḥ śreṣṭhā 1.27av dhārayed auṣadhīś ceṣṭā]
AHS6.1.028a/ āyur.medhā.smṛti.svāsthya.karīṁ rakṣo.'bhirakṣiṇīm |
AHS6.1.028c/ ṣaṭ.saptāṣṭama.māseṣu nī.rujasya śubhe 'hani || 28 || [Note: AHS6.1.028v/ 1.28cv ṣaṭ.saptāṣṭasu māseṣu]
AHS6.1.029a/ karṇau himāgame vidhyed dhātry.aṅka.sthasya sāntvayan |
AHS6.1.029c/ prāg dakṣiṇaṁ kumārasya bhiṣag vāmaṁ tu yoṣitaḥ || 29 ||
AHS6.1.030a/ dakṣiṇena dadhat sūcīṁ pālīm anyena pāṇinā |
AHS6.1.030c/ madhyataḥ karṇa.pīṭhasya kiñ.cid gaṇḍāśrayaṁ prati || 30 ||
AHS6.1.031a/ jarāyu.mātra.pracchanne ravi.raśmy.avabhāsite |
AHS6.1.031c/ ghṛtasya niś.calaṁ samyag alaktaka.rasāṅkite || 31 ||
[Page 546 ]
AHS6.1.032a/ vidhyed daiva.kṛte cchidre sakṛd evarju lāghavāt |
AHS6.1.032c/ nordhvaṁ na pārśvato nādhaḥ sirās tatra hi saṁśritāḥ || 32 ||
AHS6.1.033a/ kālikā.marmarī.raktās tad.vyadhād rāga.rug.jvarāḥ |
AHS6.1.033c/ sa.śopha.dāha.saṁrambha.manyā.stambhāpatānakāḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS6.1.033v/ 1.33bv tad.bādhād rāga.rug.jvarāḥ]
AHS6.1.034a/ teṣāṁ yathāmayaṁ kuryād vibhajyāśu cikitsitam |
AHS6.1.034c/ sthāne vyadhān na rudhiraṁ na rug.rāgādi.sambhavaḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS6.1.034v/ 1.34cv sthāna.vyadhān na rudhiraṁ]
AHS6.1.035a/ snehāktaṁ sūcy.anusyūtaṁ sūtraṁ cānu nidhāpayet |
AHS6.1.035c/ āma.tailena siñcec ca bahalāṁ tad.vad ārayā || 35 ||
AHS6.1.036a/ vidhyet pālīṁ hita.bhujaḥ sañcāryātha sthavīyasī |
AHS6.1.036c/ vartis try.ahāt tato rūḍhaṁ vardhayeta śanaiḥ śanaiḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS6.1.036v/ 1.36bv sañcāryānyā sthavīyasī 1.36cv vartis try.ahāt tato rūḍhāṁ]
AHS6.1.037a/ athainaṁ jāta.daśanaṁ krameṇāpanayet stanāt |
AHS6.1.037c/ pūrvoktaṁ yojayet kṣīram annaṁ ca laghu bṛṁhaṇam || 37 || [Note: AHS6.1.037v/ 1.37av jāta.dantaṁ śiśuṁ śīte 1.37bv krama.śo 'panayet stanāt]
AHS6.1.038a/ priyāla.majja.madhuka.madhu.lāja.sitopalaiḥ |
AHS6.1.038c/ apa.stanasya saṁyojyaḥ prīṇano modakaḥ śiśoḥ || 38 ||
AHS6.1.039a/ dīpano bāla.bilvailā.śarkarā.lāja.saktubhiḥ |
AHS6.1.039c/ saṅgrāhī dhātakī.puṣpa.śarkarā.lāja.tarpaṇaiḥ || 39 ||
AHS6.1.040a/ rogāṁś cāsya jayet saumyair bheṣajair a.viṣādakaiḥ |
AHS6.1.040c/ anya.trātyayikād vyādher virekaṁ su.tarāṁ tyajet || 40 || [Note: AHS6.1.040v/ 1.40bv bheṣajair a.viṣādikaiḥ 1.40bv bheṣajair a.vipādikaiḥ 1.40bv bheṣajair a.vipādakaiḥ]
AHS6.1.041a/ trāsayen nā.vidheyaṁ taṁ trastaṁ gṛhṇanti hi grahāḥ |
AHS6.1.041c/ vastra.vātāt para.sparśāt pālayel laṅghanāc ca tam || 41 || [Note: AHS6.1.041v/ 1.41av trāsayen nā.vidheyaṁ ca 1.41cv vastra.pātāt khara.sparśāt 1.41cv vastra.pātāt para.sparśāt 1.41dv pālayel laṅghitāc ca tam]
[Page 547 ]
AHS6.1.042a/ brāhmī.siddhārthaka.vacā.śārivā.kuṣṭha.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS6.1.042c/ sa.kaṇaiḥ sādhitaṁ pītaṁ vāṅ.medhā.smṛti.kṛd ghṛtam || 42 ||
AHS6.1.043a/ āyuṣyaṁ pāpma.rakṣo.ghnaṁ bhūtonmāda.nibarhaṇam |
AHS6.1.043c/ vacendulekhā.maṇḍūkī.śaṅkhapuṣpī.śatāvarīḥ || 43 || [Note: AHS6.1.043v/ 1.43cv vacendulekhā maṇḍūkī 1.43dv śaṅkhapuṣpī śatāvarī]
AHS6.1.044a/ brahmasomāmṛtā.brāhmīḥ kalkī.kṛtya palāṁśikāḥ |
AHS6.1.044c/ aṣṭāṅgaṁ vipacet sarpiḥ prasthaṁ kṣīra.catur.guṇam || 44 || [Note: AHS6.1.044v/ 1.44av brahmasomāṁrtā brāhmī 1.44bv kalkī.kṛtya palāṁśikaiḥ 1.44dv prasthaṁ kṣīraṁ catur.guṇam]
AHS6.1.045a/ tat pītaṁ dhanyam āyuṣyaṁ vāṅ.medhā.smṛti.buddhi.kṛt |
AHS6.1.045c/ ajā.kṣīrābhayā.vyoṣa.pāṭhogrā.śigru.saindhavaiḥ || 45 || [Note: AHS6.1.045v/ 1.45bv vāṅ.medhā.smṛti.kṛt param 1.45bv vāṅ.medhā.smṛti.vahni.kṛt 1.45dv .pāṭhogrā.śakra.saindhavaiḥ]
AHS6.1.046a/ siddhaṁ sārasvataṁ sarpir vāṅ.medhā.smṛti.vahni.kṛt |
AHS6.1.046c/ vacāmṛtā.śaṭhī.pathyā.śaṅkhinī.vella.nāgaraiḥ || 46 || [Note: AHS6.1.046v/ 1.46bv vāṅ.medhā.smṛti.buddhi.kṛt 1.46cv vacāmṛtā.varī.pathyā.]
AHS6.1.047a/ apāmārgeṇa ca ghṛtaṁ sādhitaṁ pūrva.vad guṇaiḥ |
AHS6.1.047c/ hema śveta.vacā kuṣṭham arkapuṣpī sa.kāñcanā || 47 || [Note: AHS6.1.047v/ 1.47cv hema śveta.vacā kuṣṭhaṁ 1.47dv śaṅkhapuṣpī sa.kāñcanā 1.47dv śaṅkhapuṣpī sa.rocanā]
AHS6.1.048a/ hema matsyākṣakaḥ śaṅkhaḥ kaiḍaryaḥ kanakaṁ vacā |
AHS6.1.048c/ catvāra ete pādoktāḥ prāśā madhu.ghṛta.plutāḥ || 48 || [Note: AHS6.1.048v/ 1.48av hema matsyākṣakaḥ phañjī 1.48bv kaiḍaryaṁ kanakaṁ vacā 1.48dv prāśyā madhu.ghṛta.plutāḥ]
AHS6.1.049a/ varṣaṁ līḍhā vapur.medhā.bala.varṇa.karāḥ śubhāḥ |
AHS6.1.049c/ vacā.yaṣṭy.āhva.sindhūttha.pathyā.nāgara.dīpyakaiḥ || 49 ||
AHS6.1.049ū̆ab/ śudhyate vāg ghavir.līḍhaiḥ sa.kuṣṭha.kaṇa.jīrakaiḥ || 49ū̆ab || [Note: AHS6.1.049ū̆v/ 1.49ū̆av śudhyate vāg ghṛtālīḍhaiḥ]

6.2. Chapter 2 :: Athabālāmayapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 456-460]
AHS6.2.001a/ tri.vidhaḥ kathito bālaḥ kṣīrānnobhaya.vartanaḥ |
AHS6.2.001c/ svāsthyaṁ tābhyām a.duṣṭābhyāṁ duṣṭābhyāṁ roga.sambhavaḥ || 1 ||
[Page 548 ]
AHS6.2.002a/ yad adbhir eka.tāṁ yāti na ca doṣair adhiṣṭhitam |
AHS6.2.002c/ tad viśuddhaṁ payo vātād duṣṭaṁ tu plavate 'mbhasi || 2 || [Note: AHS6.2.002v/ 2.2dv duṣṭaṁ tu plavate jale]
AHS6.2.003a/ kaṣāyaṁ phenilaṁ rūkṣaṁ varco.mūtra.vibandha.kṛt |
AHS6.2.003c/ pittād uṣṇāmla.kaṭukaṁ pīta.rājy apsu dāha.kṛt || 3 ||
AHS6.2.004a/ kaphāt sa.lavaṇaṁ sāndraṁ jale majjati picchilam |
AHS6.2.004c/ saṁsṛṣṭa.liṅgaṁ saṁsargāt tri.liṅgaṁ sānnipātikam || 4 ||
AHS6.2.005a/ yathā.sva.liṅgāṁs tad vyādhīn janayaty upayojitam |
AHS6.2.005c/ śiśos tīkṣṇam abhīkṣṇaṁ ca rodanāl lakṣayed rujam || 5 || [Note: AHS6.2.005v/ 2.5cv śiśos tīkṣṇam a.tīkṣṇaṁ ca]
AHS6.2.006a/ sa yaṁ spṛśed bhṛśaṁ deśaṁ yatra ca sparśanā.kṣamaḥ |
AHS6.2.006c/ tatra vidyād rujaṁ mūrdhni rujaṁ cākṣi.nimīlanāt || 6 || [Note: AHS6.2.006v/ 2.6av svayaṁ spṛśed bhṛśaṁ deśaṁ 2.6bv yatra ca sparśanā.kṣamam]
AHS6.2.007a/ hṛdi jihvauṣṭha.daśana.śvāsa.muṣṭi.nipīḍanaiḥ |
AHS6.2.007c/ koṣṭhe vibandha.vamathu.stana.daṁśāntra.kūjanaiḥ || 7 || [Note: AHS6.2.007v/ 2.7bv .śvāsa.muṣṭi.nipīḍitaiḥ 2.7dv .stanya.dveṣāntra.kūjanaiḥ]
AHS6.2.008a/ ādhmāna.pṛṣṭha.namana.jaṭharonnamanair api |
AHS6.2.008c/ vastau guhye ca viṇ.mūtra.saṅgottrāsa.dig.īkṣaṇaiḥ || 8 ||
AHS6.2.009a/ atha dhātryāḥ kriyāṁ kuryād yathā.doṣaṁ yathāmayam |
AHS6.2.009c/ tatra vātātmake stanye daśa.mūlaṁ try.ahaṁ pibet || 9 ||
AHS6.2.010a/ atha.vāgni.vacā.pāṭhā.kaṭukā.kuṣṭha.dīpyakam |
AHS6.2.010c/ sa.bhārgī.dāru.sarala.vṛścikālī.kaṇoṣaṇam || 10 ||
AHS6.2.011a/ tataḥ pibed anya.tamaṁ vāta.vyādhi.haraṁ ghṛtam |
AHS6.2.011c/ anu cāccha.surām evaṁ snigdhāṁ mṛdu virecayet || 11 || [Note: AHS6.2.011v/ 2.11bv vāta.vyādhi.hitaṁ ghṛtam]
[Page 549 ]
AHS6.2.012a/ vasti.karma tataḥ kuryāt svedādīṁś cānilāpahān |
AHS6.2.012c/ rāsnājamodā.sarala.devadāru.rajo.'nvitam || 12 ||
AHS6.2.013a/ bālo lihyād ghṛtaṁ tair vā vipakvaṁ sa.sitopalam |
AHS6.2.013c/ pitta.duṣṭe 'mṛtābhīru.paṭolī.nimba.candanam || 13 ||
AHS6.2.014a/ dhātrī kumāraś ca pibet kvāthayitvā sa.śārivam |
AHS6.2.014c/ atha.vā tri.phalā.musta.bhūnimba.kaṭu.rohiṇīḥ || 14 ||
AHS6.2.015a/ śārivādiṁ paṭolādiṁ padmakādiṁ tathā gaṇam |
AHS6.2.015c/ ghṛtāny ebhiś ca siddhāni pitta.ghnaṁ ca virecanam || 15 ||
AHS6.2.016a/ śītāṁś cābhyaṅga.lepādīn yuñjyāc chleṣmātmake punaḥ |
AHS6.2.016c/ yaṣṭy.āhva.saindhava.yutaṁ kumāraṁ pāyayed ghṛtam || 16 ||
AHS6.2.017a/ sindhūttha.pippalī.mad vā piṣṭaiḥ kṣaudra.yutair atha |
AHS6.2.017c/ rāṭha.puṣpaiḥ stanau limpec chiśoś ca daśana.cchadau || 17 || [Note: AHS6.2.017v/ 2.17av sindhūttha.pippalī.madya. 2.17av sindhūttha.pippalī.mustā. 2.17av sindhūttha.pippalī.mūrvā. 2.17bv .piṣṭaiḥ kṣaudra.yutair atha]
AHS6.2.018a/ sukham evaṁ vamed bālaḥ tīkṣṇair dhātrīṁ tu vāmayet |
AHS6.2.018c/ athācarita.saṁsargī mustādiṁ kvathitaṁ pibet || 18 ||
AHS6.2.019a/ tad.vat tagara.pṛthvīkā.suradāru.kaliṅgakān |
AHS6.2.019c/ atha.vātiviṣā.musta.ṣaḍgranthā.pañca.kolakam || 19 || [Note: AHS6.2.019v/ 2.19bv .suradāru.kaliṅgakam 2.19dv .ṣaḍgranthā.pañca.kolakān]
AHS6.2.020a/ stanye tri.doṣa.maline dur.gandhy āmaṁ jalopamam |
AHS6.2.020c/ vibaddham acchaṁ vicchinnaṁ phenilaṁ copaveśyate || 20 ||
AHS6.2.021a/ śakṛn nānā.vyathā.varṇaṁ mūtraṁ pītaṁ sitaṁ ghanam |
AHS6.2.021c/ jvarā.rocaka.tṛṭ.chardi.śuṣkodgāra.vijṛmbhikāḥ || 21 ||
[Page 550 ]
AHS6.2.022a/ aṅga.bhaṅgo 'ṅga.vikṣepaḥ kūjanaṁ vepathur bhramaḥ |
AHS6.2.022c/ ghrāṇākṣi.mukha.pākādyā jāyante 'nye 'pi taṁ gadam || 22 || [Note: AHS6.2.022v/ 2.22bv kvaṇanaṁ vepathur bhramaḥ]
AHS6.2.023a/ kṣīrālasakam ity āhur atyayaṁ cāti.dāruṇam |
AHS6.2.023c/ tatrāśu dhātrīṁ bālaṁ ca vamanenopapādayet || 23 ||
AHS6.2.024a/ vihitāyāṁ ca saṁsargyāṁ vacādiṁ yojayed gaṇam |
AHS6.2.024c/ niśādiṁ vātha.vā mādrī.pāṭhā.tiktā.ghanāmayān || 24 ||
AHS6.2.025a/ pāṭhā.śuṇṭhy.amṛtā.tikta.tiktā.devāhva.śārivāḥ |
AHS6.2.025c/ sa.musta.mūrvendrayavāḥ stanya.doṣa.harāḥ param || 25 ||
AHS6.2.026a/ anubandhe yathā.vyādhi pratikurvīta kāla.vit |
AHS6.2.026c/ dantodbhedaś ca rogāṇāṁ sarveṣām api kāraṇam || 26 ||
AHS6.2.027a/ viśeṣāj jvara.viḍ.bheda.kāsa.cchardi.śiro.rujām |
AHS6.2.027c/ abhiṣyandasya pothakyā visarpasya ca jāyate || 27 ||
AHS6.2.028a/ pṛṣṭha.bhaṅge biḍālānāṁ barhiṇāṁ ca śikhodbhave |
AHS6.2.028c/ dantodbhede ca bālānāṁ na hi kiñ.cin na dūyate || 28 || [Note: AHS6.2.028v/ 2.28cv dantodbhave ca bālānāṁ]
AHS6.2.029a/ yathā.doṣaṁ yathā.rogaṁ yathodrekaṁ yathā.bhayam |
AHS6.2.029c/ vibhajya deśa.kālādīṁs tatra yojyaṁ bhiṣag.jitam || 29 || [Note: AHS6.2.029v/ 2.29bv yathodrekaṁ yathā.balam 2.29bv yathodrekaṁ yathā.vayaḥ 2.29bv yathodrekaṁ yathāśayam]
AHS6.2.030a/ ta eva doṣā dūṣyāś ca jvarādyā vyādhayaś ca yat |
AHS6.2.030c/ atas tad eva bhaiṣajyaṁ mātrā tv asya kanīyasī || 30 || [Note: AHS6.2.030v/ 2.30bv jvarādyā vyādhayaś ca te]
AHS6.2.031a/ saukumāryālpa.kāya.tvāt sarvānnān.upasevanāt |
AHS6.2.031c/ snigdhā eva sadā bālā ghṛta.kṣīra.niṣevaṇāt || 31 || [Note: AHS6.2.031v/ 2.31bv sarvānnān.upasevanaiḥ]
[Page 551 ]
AHS6.2.032a/ sadyas tān vamanaṁ tasmāt pāyayen mati.mān mṛdu |
AHS6.2.032c/ stanyasya tṛptaṁ vamayet kṣīra.kṣīrānna.sevinam || 32 ||
AHS6.2.033a/ pīta.vantaṁ tanuṁ peyām annādaṁ ghṛta.saṁyutām |
AHS6.2.033c/ vastiṁ sādhye virekeṇa marśena pratimarśanam || 33 ||
AHS6.2.034a/ yuñjyād virecanādīṁs tu dhātryā eva yathoditān |
AHS6.2.034c/ mūrvā.vyoṣa.varā.kola.jambū.tvag.dāru.sarṣapāḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS6.2.034v/ 2.34av yuñjyād virecanādīṁś ca 2.34cv mūrvā.vyoṣa.vacā.kola. 2.34cv mūrvā.vyoṣa.varāṅkolla.]
AHS6.2.035a/ sa.pāṭhā madhunā līḍhāḥ stanya.doṣa.harāḥ param |
AHS6.2.035c/ danta.pālīṁ sa.madhunā cūrṇena pratisārayet || 35 || [Note: AHS6.2.035v/ 2.35bv stanya.doṣa.nibarhaṇāḥ]
AHS6.2.036a/ pippalyā dhātakī.puṣpa.dhātrī.phala.kṛtena vā |
AHS6.2.036c/ lāva.tittiri.vallūra.rajaḥ puṣpa.rasa.drutam || 36 || [Note: AHS6.2.036v/ 2.36bv .dhātrī.phala.rasena vā 2.36dv .rajaḥ puṣpa.rasa.plutam 2.36dv .rajaḥ puṣpa.rasāplutam]
AHS6.2.037a/ drutaṁ karoti bālānāṁ danta.kesara.van mukham |
AHS6.2.037c/ vacā.dvi.bṛhatī.pāṭhā.kaṭukātiviṣā.ghanaiḥ || 37 ||
AHS6.2.038a/ madhuraiś ca ghṛtaṁ siddhaṁ siddhaṁ daśana.janmani |
AHS6.2.038c/ rajanī.dāru.sarala.śreyasī.bṛhatī.dvayam || 38 || [Note: AHS6.2.038v/ 2.38cv rajanī.dāru.saralāḥ 2.38dv śreyasī.bṛhatī.dvayam]
AHS6.2.039a/ pṛśniparṇī śatāhvā ca līḍhaṁ mākṣika.sarpiṣā |
AHS6.2.039c/ grahaṇī.dīpanaṁ śreṣṭhaṁ mārutasyānulomanam || 39 ||
AHS6.2.040a/ atīsāra.jvara.śvāsa.kāmalā.pāṇḍu.kāsa.nut |
AHS6.2.040c/ bālasya sarva.rogeṣu pūjitaṁ bala.varṇa.dam || 40 || [Note: AHS6.2.040v/ 2.40bv .kāmalā.pāṇḍu.roga.nut]
AHS6.2.041a/ samaṅgā.dhātakī.lodhra.kuṭannaṭa.balā.dvayaiḥ |
AHS6.2.041c/ mahā.sahā.kṣudra.sahā.mudga.bilva.śalāṭubhiḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS6.2.041v/ 2.41bv .kuṭannaṭa.balāhvayaiḥ 2.41bv .kuṭannaṭa.vaṭāhvayaiḥ]
[Page 552 ]
AHS6.2.042a/ sa.kārpāsī.phalais toye sādhitaiḥ sādhitaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS6.2.042c/ kṣīra.mastu.yutaṁ hanti śīghraṁ dantodbhavodbhavān || 42 ||
AHS6.2.043a/ vividhān āmayān etad vṛddha.kāśyapa.nirmitam |
AHS6.2.043c/ dantodbhaveṣu rogeṣu na bālam atiyantrayet || 43 || [Note: AHS6.2.043v/ 2.43cv dantodbhedottha.rogeṣu]
AHS6.2.044a/ svayam apy upaśāmyanti jāta.dantasya yad.gadāḥ |
AHS6.2.044c/ aty.ahaḥ.svapna.śītāmbu.ślaiṣmika.stanya.sevinaḥ || 44 || [Note: AHS6.2.044v/ 2.44dv .ślaiṣmika.stanya.pāyinaḥ]
AHS6.2.045a/ śiśoḥ kaphena ruddheṣu srotaḥsu rasa.vāhiṣu |
AHS6.2.045c/ a.rocakaḥ pratiśyāyo jvaraḥ kāsaś ca jāyate || 45 ||
AHS6.2.046a/ kumāraḥ śuṣyati tataḥ snigdha.śukla.mukhekṣaṇaḥ |
AHS6.2.046c/ saindhava.vyoṣa.śārṅgaṣṭā.pāṭhā.giri.kadambakān || 46 || [Note: AHS6.2.046v/ 2.46dv .pāṭhā.giri.kadambakam]
AHS6.2.047a/ śuṣyato madhu.sarpirbhyām a.rucy.ādiṣu yojayet |
AHS6.2.047c/ aśoka.rohiṇī.yuktaṁ pañca.kolaṁ ca cūrṇitam || 47 ||
AHS6.2.048a/ badarī.dhātakī.dhātrī.cūrṇaṁ vā sarpiṣā drutam |
AHS6.2.048c/ sthirā.vacā.dvi.bṛhatī.kākolī.pippalī.nataiḥ || 48 || [Note: AHS6.2.048v/ 2.48bv .cūrṇaṁ vā sarpiṣāplutam]
AHS6.2.049a/ niculotpala.varṣābhū.bhārgī.mustaiś ca kārṣikaiḥ |
AHS6.2.049c/ siddhaṁ prasthārdham ājyasya srotasāṁ śodhanaṁ param || 49 ||
AHS6.2.050a/ siṁhy.aśvagandhā.surasā.kaṇā.garbhaṁ ca tad.guṇam |
AHS6.2.050c/ yaṣṭy.āhva.pippalī.lodhra.padmakotpala.candanaiḥ || 50 ||
AHS6.2.051a/ tālīśa.śārivābhyāṁ ca sādhitaṁ śoṣa.jid ghṛtam |
AHS6.2.051c/ śṛṅgī.madhūlikā.bhārgī.pippalī.devadārubhiḥ || 51 ||
[Page 553 ]
AHS6.2.052a/ aśvagandhā.dvi.kākolī.rāsnarṣabhaka.jīvakaiḥ |
AHS6.2.052c/ śūrpaparṇī.viḍaṅgaiś ca kalkitaiḥ sādhitaṁ ghṛtam || 52 ||
AHS6.2.053a/ śaśottamāṅga.niryūhe śuṣyataḥ puṣṭi.kṛt param |
AHS6.2.053c/ vacā.vayaḥsthā.tagara.kāyasthā.corakaiḥ śṛtam || 53 ||
AHS6.2.054a/ basta.mūtra.surābhyāṁ ca tailam abhyañjane hitam |
AHS6.2.054c/ lākṣā.rasa.samaṁ taila.prasthaṁ mastu catur.guṇam || 54 || [Note: AHS6.2.054v/ 2.54bv tailān mastu catur.guṇam 2.54cv lākṣā.rasa.samaṁ tailaṁ 2.54dv prasthaṁ mastu catur.guṇam]
AHS6.2.055a/ aśvagandhā.niśā.dāru.kauntī.kuṣṭhābda.candanaiḥ |
AHS6.2.055c/ sa.mūrvā.rohiṇī.rāsnā.śatāhvā.madhukaiḥ samaiḥ || 55 ||
AHS6.2.056a/ siddhaṁ lākṣādikaṁ nāma tailam abhyañjanād idam |
AHS6.2.056c/ balyaṁ jvara.kṣayonmāda.śvāsāpasmāra.vāta.nut || 56 ||
AHS6.2.057a/ yakṣa.rākṣasa.bhūta.ghnaṁ garbhiṇīnāṁ ca śasyate |
AHS6.2.057c/ madhunātiviṣā.śṛṅgī.pippalīr lehayec chiśum || 57 ||
AHS6.2.058a/ ekāṁ vātiviṣāṁ kāsa.jvara.cchardir.upadrutam |
AHS6.2.058c/ pītaṁ pītaṁ vamati yaḥ stanyaṁ taṁ madhu.sarpiṣā || 58 || [Note: AHS6.2.058v/ 2.58bv .jvara.cchardibhir arditam 2.58cv pītaṁ pītaṁ ca vamati 2.58dv yaḥ stanyaṁ madhu.sarpiṣā]
AHS6.2.059a/ dvi.vārtākī.phala.rasaṁ pañca.kolaṁ ca lehayet |
AHS6.2.059c/ pippalī.pañca.lavaṇaṁ kṛmijit.pāribhadrakam || 59 || [Note: AHS6.2.059v/ 2.59cv pippalī.pañca.lavaṇa. 2.59dv .kṛmijit.pāribhadrakam 2.59dv viḍaṅgaṁ pāribhadrakam]
AHS6.2.060a/ tad.val lihyāt tathā vyoṣaṁ maṣīṁ vā roma.carmaṇām |
AHS6.2.060c/ lābhataḥ śalyaka.śvāvid.godharkṣa.śikhi.janmanām || 60 ||
AHS6.2.061a/ khadirārjuna.tālīśa.kuṣṭha.candana.je rase |
AHS6.2.061c/ sa.kṣīraṁ sādhitaṁ sarpir vamathuṁ viniyacchati || 61 ||
[Page 554 ]
AHS6.2.061+(1)a/ hanu.mūla.gato vāyur danta.deśāsthi.go.caraḥ |
AHS6.2.061+(1)c/ yadā śiśoḥ prakupito nottiṣṭhanti tadā dvi.jāḥ || 61+(1) || [Note: AHS6.2.061+(1)v/ 2.61+(1)av hanu.mūlāśrito vāyur 2.61+(1)bv danta.deśān viśoṣayet 2.61+(1)bv danta.deśān viśodhayet]
AHS6.2.061+(2)a/ rūkṣāśino vātikasya cālayaty anilaḥ sirāḥ |
AHS6.2.061+(2)c/ hanv.āśrayāḥ prasuptasya dantaiḥ śabdaṁ karoty ataḥ || 61+(2) ||
AHS6.2.062a/ sa.danto jāyate yas tu dantāḥ prāg yasya cottarāḥ |
AHS6.2.062c/ kurvīta tasminn utpāte śāntiṁ taṁ ca dvi.jātaye || 62 || [Note: AHS6.2.062v/ 2.62dv śāntikaṁ ca dvi.jātaye]
AHS6.2.063a/ dadyāt sa.dakṣiṇaṁ bālaṁ naigameṣaṁ ca pūjayet |
AHS6.2.063c/ tālu.māṁse kaphaḥ kruddhaḥ kurute tālu.kaṇṭakam || 63 || [Note: AHS6.2.063v/ 2.63bv sainikeśaṁ ca pūjayet]
AHS6.2.064a/ tena tālu.pradeśasya nimna.tā mūrdhni jāyate |
AHS6.2.064c/ tālu.pātaḥ stana.dveṣaḥ kṛcchrāt pānaṁ śakṛd.dravam || 64 ||
AHS6.2.065a/ tṛḍ.āsya.kaṇḍv.akṣi.rujā grīvā.dur.dhara.tā vamiḥ |
AHS6.2.065c/ tatrotkṣipya yava.kṣāra.kṣaudrābhyāṁ pratisārayet || 65 ||
AHS6.2.066a/ tālu tad.vat kaṇā.śuṇṭhī.go.śakṛd.rasa.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS6.2.066c/ śṛṅgavera.niśā.bhṛṅgaṁ kalkitaṁ vaṭa.pallavaiḥ || 66 ||
AHS6.2.067a/ baddhvā go.śakṛtā liptam kukūle svedayet tataḥ |
AHS6.2.067c/ rasena limpet tālv.āsyaṁ netre ca pariṣecayet || 67 ||
AHS6.2.068a/ harītakī.vacā.kuṣṭha.kalkaṁ mākṣika.saṁyutam |
AHS6.2.068c/ pītvā kumāraḥ stanyena mucyate tālu.kaṇṭakāt || 68 ||
AHS6.2.069a/ malopalepāt svedād vā gude rakta.kaphodbhavaḥ |
AHS6.2.069c/ tāmro vraṇo 'ntaḥ kaṇḍū.mān jāyate bhūry.upadravaḥ || 69 ||
[Page 555 ]
AHS6.2.070a/ ke.cit taṁ mātṛkā.doṣaṁ vadanty anye 'hi.pūtanam |
AHS6.2.070c/ pṛṣṭhārur guda.kuṭṭaṁ ca ke.cic ca tam a.nāmikam || 70 || [Note: AHS6.2.070v/ 2.70av ke.cic ca tam a.nāmakam 2.70bv vadanty anye 'pi pūtanam 2.70bv vadanty anye tu pūtanam 2.70bc vadanty anye hi pūtanam 2.70cv pṛṣṭhārur guda.kaṇḍūṁ ca 2.70cv pṛṣṭhārur guda.kiṭṭaṁ ca 2.70cv pṛṣṭhārur guda.kuṣṭhaṁ ca]
AHS6.2.071a/ tatra dhātryāḥ payaḥ śodhyaṁ pitta.śleṣma.harauṣadhaiḥ |
AHS6.2.071c/ śṛta.śītaṁ ca śītāmbu.yuktam antara.pānakam || 71 || [Note: AHS6.2.071v/ 2.71cv sita.śītaṁ ca śītāmbu.]
AHS6.2.072a/ sa.kṣaudra.tārkṣya.śailena vraṇaṁ tena ca lepayet |
AHS6.2.072c/ tri.phalā.badarī.plakṣa.tvak.kvātha.pariṣecitam || 72 ||
AHS6.2.073a/ kāsīsa.rocanā.tuttha.manohvāla.rasāñjanaiḥ |
AHS6.2.073c/ lepayed amla.piṣṭair vā cūrṇitair vāvacūrṇayet || 73 ||
AHS6.2.074a/ su.ślakṣṇair atha.vā yaṣṭī.śaṅkha.sauvīrakāñjanaiḥ |
AHS6.2.074c/ śārivā.śaṅkhanābhibhyām asanasya tvacātha.vā || 74 ||
AHS6.2.075a/ rāga.kaṇḍūtkaṭe kuryād rakta.srāvaṁ jalaukasā |
AHS6.2.075c/ sarvaṁ ca pitta.vraṇa.jic chasyate guda.kuṭṭake || 75 || [Note: AHS6.2.075v/ 2.75dv chasyate guda.kiṭṭake]
AHS6.2.076a/ pāṭhā.vella.dvi.rajanī.musta.bhārgī.punarnavaiḥ |
AHS6.2.076c/ sa.bilva.try.ūṣaṇaiḥ sarpiḥ vṛścikālī.yutaiḥ śṛtam || 76 ||
AHS6.2.077a/ lihāno mātrayā rogair mucyate mṛttikodbhavaiḥ || 77ab ||
AHS6.2.077c/ vyādher yady asya bhaiṣajyaṁ stanas tena pralepitaḥ || 77cd ||
AHS6.2.077e/ sthito muhūrtaṁ dhauto 'nu pītas taṁ taṁ jayed gadam || 77ef || [Note: AHS6.2.077v/ 2.77fv pītas tat taṁ jayed gadam]

6.3. Chapter 3 :: Athabālagrahapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 460-463]
AHS6.3.001a/ purā guhasya rakṣārthaṁ nirmitāḥ śūla.pāṇinā |
AHS6.3.001c/ manuṣya.vigrahāḥ pañca sapta strī.vigrahā grahāḥ || 1 ||
AHS6.3.002a/ skando viśākho meṣākhyaḥ śva.grahaḥ pitṛ.sañjñitaḥ |
AHS6.3.002c/ śakuniḥ pūtanā śīta.pūtanā.dṛṣṭi.pūtanā || 2 || [Note: AHS6.3.002v/ 3.2av skando viśākho meṣāsyaḥ]
[Page 556 ]
AHS6.3.003a/ mukha.maṇḍitikā tad.vad revatī śuṣka.revatī |
AHS6.3.003c/ teṣāṁ grahīṣyatāṁ rūpaṁ pratataṁ rodanaṁ jvaraḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS6.3.003v/ 3.3av mukha.maṇḍanikā tad.vad 3.3av mukha.maṇḍinikā tad.vad]
AHS6.3.004a/ sāmānyaṁ rūpam uttrāsa.jṛmbhā.bhrū.kṣepa.dīna.tāḥ |
AHS6.3.004c/ phena.srāvordhva.dṛṣṭy.oṣṭha.danta.daṁśa.prajāgarāḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS6.3.004v/ 3.4bv .jṛmbhā.bhrūtkṣepa.dīna.tāḥ]
AHS6.3.005a/ rodanaṁ kūjanaṁ stanya.vidveṣaḥ svara.vaikṛtam |
AHS6.3.005c/ nakhair a.kasmāt paritaḥ sva.dhātry.aṅga.vilekhanam || 5 ||
AHS6.3.006a/ tatraika.nayana.srāvī śiro vikṣipate muhuḥ |
AHS6.3.006c/ hataika.pakṣaḥ stabdhāṅgaḥ sa.svedo nata.kandharaḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS6.3.006v/ 3.6bv śiro vikṣepate muhuḥ 3.6bv śiro vikṣipyate muhuḥ]
AHS6.3.007a/ danta.khādī stana.dveṣī trasyan roditi vi.svaram |
AHS6.3.007c/ vakra.vaktro vaman lālāṁ bhṛśam ūrdhvaṁ nirīkṣate || 7 || [Note: AHS6.3.007v/ 3.7bv trasan roditi vi.svaram 3.7cv vakra.vaktro vamel lālāṁ]
AHS6.3.008a/ vasāsṛg.gandhir udvigno baddha.muṣṭi.śakṛc chiśuḥ |
AHS6.3.008c/ calitaikākṣi.gaṇḍa.bhrūḥ saṁraktobhaya.locanaḥ || 8 ||
AHS6.3.009a/ skandārtas tena vaikalyaṁ maraṇaṁ vā bhaved dhruvam |
AHS6.3.009c/ sañjñā.nāśo muhuḥ keśa.luñcanaṁ kandharā.natiḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS6.3.009v/ 3.9bv maraṇaṁ vā bhaved drutam 3.9cv sañjñā.nāśo bhavet keśa.]
AHS6.3.010a/ vinamya jṛmbhamāṇasya śakṛn.mūtra.pravartanam |
AHS6.3.010c/ phenodvamanam ūrdhvekṣā hasta.bhrū.pāda.nartanam || 10 ||
AHS6.3.011a/ stana.sva.jihvā.sandaṁśa.saṁrambha.jvara.jāgarāḥ |
AHS6.3.011c/ pūya.śoṇita.gandhaś ca skandāpasmāra.lakṣaṇam || 11 ||
AHS6.3.012a/ ādhmānaṁ pāṇi.pādasya spandanaṁ phena.nirvamaḥ |
AHS6.3.012c/ tṛṇ.muṣṭi.bandhātīsāra.svara.dainya.vi.varṇa.tāḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS6.3.012v/ 3.12av ādhmānaṁ pāṇi.pādāsya. 3.12bv .spandanaṁ phena.nirvamaḥ 3.12bv spandanaṁ phena.nirgamaḥ 3.12bv spandanaṁ hananaṁ bhramaḥ]
[Page 557 ]
AHS6.3.013a/ kūjanaṁ stananaṁ chardiḥ kāsa.hidhmā.prajāgarāḥ |
AHS6.3.013c/ oṣṭha.daṁśāṅga.saṅkoca.stambha.bastābha.gandha.tāḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS6.3.013v/ 3.13av kūjanaṁ śvasanaṁ chardiḥ 3.13av kūjanaṁ stambhanaṁ chardiḥ 3.13av kūjanaṁ svananaṁ chardiḥ]
AHS6.3.014a/ ūrdhvaṁ nirīkṣya hasanaṁ madhye vinamanaṁ jvaraḥ |
AHS6.3.014c/ mūrchaika.netra.śophaś ca naigameṣa.grahākṛtiḥ || 14 ||
AHS6.3.015a/ kampo hṛṣita.roma.tvaṁ svedaś cakṣur.nimīlanam |
AHS6.3.015c/ bahir.āyāmanaṁ jihvā.daṁśo 'ntaḥ.kaṇṭha.kūjanam || 15 || [Note: AHS6.3.015v/ 3.15av kampo harṣita.roma.tvaṁ]
AHS6.3.016a/ dhāvanaṁ viṭ.sa.gandha.tvaṁ krośanaṁ ca śva.vac chuni |
AHS6.3.016c/ roma.harṣo muhus trāsaḥ sahasā rodanaṁ jvaraḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS6.3.016v/ 3.16bv krośanaṁ śvāna.vac chuni 3.16cv roma.harṣo muhuḥ śvāsaḥ]
AHS6.3.017a/ kāsātīsāra.vamathu.jṛmbhā.tṛṭ.śava.gandha.tāḥ |
AHS6.3.017c/ aṅgeṣv ākṣepa.vikṣepa.śoṣa.stambha.vi.varṇa.tāḥ || 17 ||
AHS6.3.018a/ muṣṭi.bandhaḥ srutiś cākṣṇor bālasya syuḥ pitṛ.grahe |
AHS6.3.018c/ srastāṅga.tvam atīsāro jihvā.tālu.gale vraṇāḥ || 18 ||
AHS6.3.019a/ sphoṭāḥ sa.dāha.ruk.pākāḥ sandhiṣu syuḥ punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS6.3.019c/ niśy ahni pravilīyante pāko vaktre gude 'pi vā || 19 ||
AHS6.3.020a/ bhayaṁ śakuni.gandha.tvaṁ jvaraś ca śakuni.grahe |
AHS6.3.020c/ pūtanāyāṁ vamiḥ kampas tandrā rātrau prajāgaraḥ || 20 ||
AHS6.3.021a/ hidhmādhmānaṁ śakṛd.bhedaḥ pipāsā mūtra.nigrahaḥ |
AHS6.3.021c/ srasta.hṛṣṭāṅga.roma.tvaṁ kāka.vat pūti.gandhi.tā || 21 ||
AHS6.3.022a/ śīta.pūtanayā kampo rodanaṁ tiryag.īkṣaṇam |
AHS6.3.022c/ tṛṣṇāntra.kūjo 'tīsāro vasā.vad visra.gandha.tā || 22 ||
[Page 558 ]
AHS6.3.023a/ pārśvasyaikasya śīta.tvam uṣṇa.tvam aparasya ca |
AHS6.3.023c/ andha.pūtanayā chardir jvaraḥ kāso 'lpa.nidra.tā || 23 || [Note: AHS6.3.023v/ 3.23dv jvaraḥ kāso 'lpa.vahni.tā]
AHS6.3.024a/ varcaso bheda.vaivarṇya.daurgandhyāny aṅga.śoṣaṇam |
AHS6.3.024c/ dṛṣṭeḥ sādāti.ruk.kaṇḍū.pothakī.janma.śūna.tāḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.3.024v/ 3.24cv dṛṣṭi.prasādo ruk.kaṇḍū. 3.24cv dṛṣṭi.sādo 'kṣi.ruk.kaṇḍū. 3.24cv dṛṣṭi.sādo 'ti.ruk kaṇḍūḥ 3.24cv dṛṣṭi.sādo 'ti.ruk.kaṇḍū. 3.24cv dṛṣṭeḥ sādo 'kṣi.ruk.kaṇḍū. 3.24dv pothakī.janma śūna.tā 3.24dv .pothakī.janma śūna.tā 3.24dv .pothakī.janma śūnya.tā]
AHS6.3.025a/ hidhmodvega.stana.dveṣa.vaivarṇya.svara.tīkṣṇa.tāḥ |
AHS6.3.025c/ vepathur matsya.gandha.tvam atha.vā sāmla.gandha.tā || 25 || [Note: AHS6.3.025v/ 3.25bv .vaivarṇyaṁ svara.tīkṣṇa.tā 3.25cv vamathur matsya.gandha.tvam]
AHS6.3.026a/ mukha.maṇḍitayā pāṇi.pādāsya.ramaṇīya.tā |
AHS6.3.026c/ sirābhir asitābhābhir ācitodara.tā jvaraḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS6.3.026v/ 3.26av mukha.maṇḍikayā pāṇi. 3.26bv .pādasya ramaṇīya.tā]
AHS6.3.027a/ a.rocako 'ṅga.glapanaṁ go.mūtra.sama.gandha.tā |
AHS6.3.027c/ revatyāṁ śyāva.nīla.tvaṁ karṇa.nāsākṣi.mardanam || 27 || [Note: AHS6.3.027v/ 3.27cv revatyā śyāva.nīla.tvaṁ]
AHS6.3.028a/ kāsa.hidhmākṣi.vikṣepa.vakra.vaktra.tva.rakta.tāḥ |
AHS6.3.028c/ basta.gandho jvaraḥ śoṣaḥ purīṣaṁ haritaṁ dravam || 28 ||
AHS6.3.029a/ jāyate śuṣka.revatyāṁ kramāt sarvāṅga.saṅkṣayaḥ |
AHS6.3.029c/ keśa.śāto 'nna.vidveṣaḥ svara.dainyaṁ vi.varṇa.tā || 29 || [Note: AHS6.3.029v/ 3.29av jāyate śuṣka.revatyā]
AHS6.3.029+1ab/ nānā.varṇa.purīṣa.tvam udare granthayaḥ sirāḥ || 29+1ab ||
AHS6.3.030a/ rodanaṁ gṛdhra.gandha.tvaṁ dīrgha.kālānuvartanam |
AHS6.3.030c/ udare granthayo vṛttā yasya nānā.vidhaṁ śakṛt || 30 ||
AHS6.3.031a/ jihvāyā nimna.tā madhye śyāvaṁ tālu ca taṁ tyajet |
AHS6.3.031c/ bhuñjāno 'nnaṁ bahu.vidhaṁ yo bālaḥ parihīyate || 31 || [Note: AHS6.3.031v/ 3.31av jihvāyāṁ nimna.tā madhye]
[Page 559 ]
AHS6.3.032a/ tṛṣṇā.gṛhītaḥ kṣāmākṣo hanti taṁ śuṣka.revatī |
AHS6.3.032c/ hiṁsā.raty.arcanākāṅkṣā graha.grahaṇa.kāraṇam || 32 ||
AHS6.3.033a/ tatra hiṁsātmake bālo mahān vā sruta.nāsikaḥ |
AHS6.3.033c/ kṣata.jihvaḥ kvaṇed bāḍham a.sukhī sāśru.locanaḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS6.3.033v/ 3.33cv kṣata.jihvaḥ kvaṇan bāḍham 3.33cv kṣata.jihvaḥ kvaṇed gāḍham 3.33cv kṣata.jihvo vamed bāḍham 3.33dv a.sukhī sāsra.locanaḥ]
AHS6.3.034a/ dur.varṇo hīna.vacanaḥ pūti.gandhiś ca jāyate |
AHS6.3.034c/ kṣāmo mūtra.purīṣaṁ svaṁ mṛdnāti na jugupsate || 34 || [Note: AHS6.3.034v/ 3.34bv pūti.gandhis tu jāyate 3.34dv gṛhṇāti na jugupsate]
AHS6.3.035a/ hastau codyamya saṁrabdho hanty ātmānaṁ tathā param |
AHS6.3.035c/ tad.vac ca śastra.kāṣṭhādyair agniṁ vā dīptam āviśet || 35 || [Note: AHS6.3.035v/ 3.35av hastau codyamya saṅkruddho]
AHS6.3.036a/ apsu majjet patet kūpe kuryād anyac ca tad.vidham |
AHS6.3.036c/ tṛḍ.dāha.mohān pūyasya cchardanaṁ ca pravartayet || 36 || [Note: AHS6.3.036v/ 3.36cv tṛḍ.dāha.mohāḥ pūyasya]
AHS6.3.037a/ raktaṁ ca sarva.mārgebhyo riṣṭotpattiṁ ca taṁ tyajet |
AHS6.3.037c/ rahaḥ.strī.rati.saṁlāpa.gandha.srag.bhūṣaṇa.priyaḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS6.3.037v/ 3.37bv riṣṭotpattiś ca taṁ tyajet]
AHS6.3.038a/ hṛṣṭaḥ śāntaś ca duḥ.sādhyo rati.kāmena pīḍitaḥ |
AHS6.3.038c/ dīnaḥ parimṛśan vaktraṁ śuṣkauṣṭha.gala.tālukaḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS6.3.038v/ 3.38cv dīnaḥ parimṛśed vaktraṁ]
AHS6.3.039a/ śaṅkitaṁ vīkṣate rauti dhyāyaty āyāti dīna.tām |
AHS6.3.039c/ annam annābhilāṣe 'pi dattaṁ nāti bubhukṣate || 39 ||
AHS6.3.040a/ gṛhītaṁ bali.kāmena taṁ vidyāt sukha.sādhanam |
AHS6.3.040c/ hantu.kāmaṁ jayed dhomaiḥ siddha.mantra.pravartitaiḥ || 40 || [Note: AHS6.3.040v/ 3.40av gṛhītaṁ maha.kāmena]
AHS6.3.041a/ itarau tu yathā.kāmaṁ rati.baly.ādi.dānataḥ |
AHS6.3.041c/ atha sādhya.grahaṁ bālaṁ vivikte śaraṇe sthitam || 41 ||
[Page 560 ]
AHS6.3.042a/ trir ahnaḥ sikta.sammṛṣṭe sadā sannihitānale |
AHS6.3.042c/ vikīrṇa.bhūti.kusuma.pattra.bījānna.sarṣape || 42 || [Note: AHS6.3.042v/ 3.42av trir ahnaṁ sikta.sammṛṣṭe 3.42av trir ahnaḥ sikta.saṁsṛṣṭe 3.42av trir ahni sikta.sammṛṣṭe 3.42av trir ahni sikta.saṁsṛṣṭe 3.42cv vikīrṇa.bhūri.kusuma.]
AHS6.3.043a/ rakṣo.ghna.taila.jvalita.pradīpa.hata.pāpmani |
AHS6.3.043c/ vyavāya.madya.piśita.nivṛtta.paricārake || 43 || [Note: AHS6.3.043v/ 3.43bv .pradīpe hata.pāpmani]
AHS6.3.044a/ purāṇa.sarpiṣābhyaktaṁ pariṣiktaṁ sukhāmbunā |
AHS6.3.044c/ sādhitena balā.nimba.vaijayantī.nṛpadrumaiḥ || 44 ||
AHS6.3.045a/ pāribhadraka.kaṭvaṅga.jambū.varuṇa.kaṭtṛṇaiḥ |
AHS6.3.045c/ kapotavaṅkāpāmārga.pāṭalā.madhu.śigrubhiḥ || 45 || [Note: AHS6.3.045v/ 3.45dv .pāṭalī.madhuśigrubhiḥ 3.45dv .mālatī.madhuśigrubhiḥ]
AHS6.3.046a/ kākajaṅghā.mahāśvetā.kapittha.kṣīri.pādapaiḥ |
AHS6.3.046c/ sa.kadamba.karañjaiś ca dhūpaṁ snātasya cācaret || 46 || [Note: AHS6.3.046v/ 3.46bv .kapittha.kṣīra.pādapaiḥ]
AHS6.3.047a/ dvīpi.vyāghrāhi.siṁharkṣa.carmabhir ghṛta.miśritaiḥ |
AHS6.3.047c/ pūti.daśāṅga.siddhārtha.vacā.bhallāta.dīpyakaiḥ || 47 || [Note: AHS6.3.047v/ 3.47cv pūti.daśāṅgī.siddhārtha.]
AHS6.3.048a/ sa.kuṣṭhaiḥ sa.ghṛtair dhūpaḥ sarva.graha.vimokṣaṇaḥ |
AHS6.3.048c/ sarṣapā nimba.pattrāṇi mūlam aśvakhurā vacā || 48 || [Note: AHS6.3.048v/ 3.48av sa.kuṣṭhaiḥ sādhito dhūpaḥ 3.48dv mūtram aśvakhurā vacā 3.48dv mūlam aśvakhuraṁ vacā]
AHS6.3.049a/ bhūrja.pattraṁ ghṛtaṁ dhūpaḥ sarva.graha.nivāraṇaḥ |
AHS6.3.049c/ anantāmrāsthi.tagaraṁ maricaṁ madhuro gaṇaḥ || 49 || [Note: AHS6.3.049v/ 3.49bv sarva.graha.nibarhaṇaḥ 3.49cv anantāmrāsthi.tagara. 3.49dv .maricaṁ madhuro gaṇaḥ]
AHS6.3.050a/ śṛgālavinnā mustā ca kalkitais tair ghṛtaṁ pacet |
AHS6.3.050c/ daśa.mūla.rasa.kṣīra.yuktaṁ tad graha.jit param || 50 ||
AHS6.3.051a/ rāsnā.dvy.aṁśumatī.vṛddha.pañca.mūla.balā.ghanāt |
AHS6.3.051c/ kvāthe sarpiḥ pacet piṣṭaiḥ śārivā.vyoṣa.citrakaiḥ || 51 || [Note: AHS6.3.051v/ 3.51av rāsnā.dvy.aṁśumatī.pattra. 3.51av rāsnā.dvy.aṁśumatī.lodhra. 3.51bv .pañca.mūla.vacā.ghanāt]
[Page 561 ]
AHS6.3.052a/ pāṭhā.viḍaṅga.madhuka.payasyā.hiṅgu.dārubhiḥ |
AHS6.3.052c/ sa.granthikaiḥ sendrayavaiḥ śiśos tat satataṁ hitam || 52 || [Note: AHS6.3.052v/ 3.52dv śiśos tu satataṁ hitam]
AHS6.3.053a/ sarva.roga.graha.haraṁ dīpanaṁ bala.varṇa.dam |
AHS6.3.053c/ śārivā.surabhi.brāhmī.śaṅkhinī.kuṣṭha.sarṣapaiḥ || 53 || [Note: AHS6.3.053v/ 3.53bv dīpanaṁ bala.vardhanam 3.53dv .śaṅkhinī.kṛṣṇa.sarṣapaiḥ]
AHS6.3.054a/ vacāśvagandhā.surasa.yuktaiḥ sarpir vipācayet |
AHS6.3.054c/ tan nāśayed grahān sarvān pānenābhyañjanena ca || 54 || [Note: AHS6.3.054v/ 3.54av vacāśvagandhā.surasā.]
AHS6.3.055a/ go.śṛṅga.carma.vālāhi.nirmokaṁ vṛṣa.daṁśa.viṭ |
AHS6.3.055c/ nimba.pattrājya.kaṭukā.madanaṁ bṛhatī.dvayam || 55 || [Note: AHS6.3.055v/ 3.55av go.śṛṅga.carma.vālāsthi. 3.55av go.śṛṅga.roma.vālāhi.]
AHS6.3.056a/ kārpāsāsthi.yava.cchāga.roma.devāhva.sarṣapam |
AHS6.3.056c/ mayūra.pattra.śrīvāsaṁ tuṣa.keśaṁ sa.rāmaṭham || 56 || [Note: AHS6.3.056v/ 3.56av kārpāsāsthi.yava.vacā. 3.56av kārpāsāsthi.vacā.bilva. 3.56av kārpāsāsthi.vacā.lodhra. 3.56av mayūra.piccha.śrīvāsa. 3.56av mayūra.piccha.śrīvāsaṁ 3.56bv .lodhra.devāhva.sarṣapam 3.56bv .devāhvaṁ yava.sarṣapam 3.56cv mayūra.pattra.śrīvāsa. 3.56dv .nara.keśaṁ sa.rāmaṭham]
AHS6.3.057a/ mṛd.bhāṇḍe basta.mūtreṇa bhāvitaṁ ślakṣṇa.cūrṇitam |
AHS6.3.057c/ dhūpanaṁ ca hitaṁ sarva.bhūteṣu viṣama.jvare || 57 || [Note: AHS6.3.057v/ 3.57cv dhūpanārthaṁ hitaṁ sarva.]
AHS6.3.058a/ ghṛtāni bhūta.vidyāyāṁ vakṣyante yāni tāni ca |
AHS6.3.058c/ yuñjyāt tathā baliṁ homaṁ snapanaṁ mantra.tantra.vit || 58 ||
AHS6.3.059a/ pūti.karañja.tvak.pattraṁ kṣīribhyo barbarād api |
AHS6.3.059c/ tumbī.viśālāraluka.śamī.bilva.kapitthataḥ || 59 || [Note: AHS6.3.059v/ 3.59av pūti.karañja.tvak.pattra. 3.59av pūti.karañjāt tvak.pattraṁ 3.59bv .kṣīribhyo vedarād api 3.59bv .mūlebhyo barbarād api 3.59bv .mūlebhyo vardharād api 3.59dv .śamī.bilva.kapitthakam]
AHS6.3.060a/ utkvāthya toyaṁ tad rātrau bālānāṁ snapanaṁ śivam |
AHS6.3.060c/ anubandhān yathā.kṛcchraṁ grahāpāye 'py upadravān || 60 || [Note: AHS6.3.060v/ 3.60dv graha.vyāpady upadravān]
AHS6.3.060ū̆ab/ bālāmaya.niṣedhokta.bheṣajaiḥ samupācaret || 60ū̆ab || [Note: AHS6.3.060ū̆v/ 3.60ū̆bv .bhaiṣajyaiḥ samupācaret]

6.4. Chapter 4 :: Athabhūtavidyājñānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 463-464] [Page 562 ]
AHS6.4.001a/ lakṣayej jñāna.vijñāna.vāk.ceṣṭā.bala.pauruṣam |
AHS6.4.001c/ puruṣe '.pauruṣaṁ yatra tatra bhūta.grahaṁ vadet || 1 ||
AHS6.4.002a/ bhūtasya rūpa.prakṛti.bhāṣā.gaty.ādi.ceṣṭitaiḥ |
AHS6.4.002c/ yasyānukāraṁ kurute tenāviṣṭaṁ tam ādiśet || 2 ||
AHS6.4.003a/ so 'ṣṭā.daśa.vidho deva.dānavādi.vibhedataḥ |
AHS6.4.003c/ hetus tad.anuṣaktau tu sadyaḥ pūrva.kṛto 'tha.vā || 3 || [Note: AHS6.4.003v/ 4.3dv sadyaḥ pūrvaṁ kṛto 'tha.vā]
AHS6.4.004a/ prajñāparādhaḥ su.tarāṁ tena kāmādi.janmanā |
AHS6.4.004c/ lupta.dharma.vratācāraḥ pūjyān apy ativartate || 4 || [Note: AHS6.4.004v/ 4.4dv pūjyānām ativartanaiḥ]
AHS6.4.005a/ taṁ tathā bhinna.maryādaṁ pāpam ātmopaghātinam |
AHS6.4.005c/ devādayo 'py anughnanti grahāś chidra.prahāriṇaḥ || 5 ||
AHS6.4.006a/ chidraṁ pāpa.kriyārambhaḥ pāko 'n.iṣṭasya karmaṇaḥ |
AHS6.4.006c/ ekasya śūnye 'vasthānaṁ śmaśānādiṣu vā niśi || 6 ||
AHS6.4.007a/ dig.vāsas.tvaṁ guror nindā rater a.vidhi.sevanam |
AHS6.4.007c/ a.śucer devatārcādi para.sūtaka.saṅkaraḥ || 7 || [Note: AHS6.4.007v/ 4.7cv a.śucer devatārāddhiḥ 4.7dv para.sūtaka.saṅkarāt]
AHS6.4.008a/ homa.mantra.balījyānāṁ vi.guṇaṁ parikarma ca |
AHS6.4.008c/ samāsād dina.caryādi.proktācāra.vyatikramaḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS6.4.008v/ 4.8dv .proktānāṁ ca viparyayaḥ]
AHS6.4.009a/ gṛhṇanti śukla.pratipat.trayo.daśyoḥ surā naram |
AHS6.4.009c/ śukla.trayo.daśī.kṛṣṇa.dvā.daśyor dānavā grahāḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS6.4.009v/ 4.9dv .dvā.daśyor dānava.grahāḥ]
AHS6.4.010a/ gandharvās tu catur.daśyāṁ dvā.daśyāṁ coragāḥ punaḥ |
AHS6.4.010c/ pañcamyāṁ śukla.saptamy.ekā.daśyos tu dhaneśvarāḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS6.4.010v/ 4.10cv pañcamyāṁ śukla.saptamyām 4.10dv ekā.daśyāṁ dhaneśvarāḥ]
[Page 563 ]
AHS6.4.011a/ śuklāṣṭa.pañcamī.paurṇamāsīṣu brahma.rākṣasāḥ |
AHS6.4.011c/ kṛṣṇe rakṣaḥ.piśācādyā nava.dvā.daśa.parvasu || 11 || [Note: AHS6.4.011v/ 4.11av śuklāṣṭa.pañcamī.pūrṇa. 4.11bv .māsīṣu brahma.rākṣasāḥ]
AHS6.4.012a/ daśāmāvāsyayor aṣṭa.navamyoḥ pitaro 'pare |
AHS6.4.012c/ guru.vṛddhādayaḥ prāyaḥ kālaṁ sandhyāsu lakṣayet || 12 || [Note: AHS6.4.012v/ 4.12av darśāmāvāsyayor aṣṭa. 4.12av daśāmāvāsyayoḥ ṣaṣṭhī.]
AHS6.4.013a/ phulla.padmopama.mukhaṁ saumya.dṛṣṭim a.kopanam |
AHS6.4.013c/ alpa.vāk.sveda.viṇ.mūtraṁ bhojanān.abhilāṣiṇam || 13 || [Note: AHS6.4.013v/ 4.13cv sv.alpa.vāk.sveda.viṇ.mūtraṁ]
AHS6.4.014a/ deva.dvi.jāti.paramaṁ śuciṁ saṁskṛta.vādinam |
AHS6.4.014c/ mīlayantaṁ cirān netre surabhiṁ vara.dāyinam || 14 ||
AHS6.4.015a/ śukla.mālyāmbara.saric.chailocca.bhavana.priyam |
AHS6.4.015c/ a.nidram a.pradhṛṣyaṁ ca vidyād deva.vaśī.kṛtam || 15 || [Note: AHS6.4.015v/ 4.15av śukla.mālyāmbara.dharaṁ 4.15bv śailocca.bhavana.priyam]
AHS6.4.016a/ jihma.dṛṣṭiṁ dur.ātmānaṁ guru.deva.dvi.ja.dviṣam |
AHS6.4.016c/ nir.bhayaṁ māninaṁ śūraṁ krodhanaṁ vyavasāyinam || 16 || [Note: AHS6.4.016v/ 4.16cv nir.bhayaṁ māninaṁ krūraṁ]
AHS6.4.017a/ rudraḥ skando viśākho 'ham indro 'ham iti vādinam |
AHS6.4.017c/ surā.māṁsa.ruciṁ vidyād daitya.graha.gṛhītakam || 17 || [Note: AHS6.4.017v/ 4.17av rudraḥ skandaḥ piśāco 'ham 4.17cv madya.māṁsa.ruciṁ vidyād 4.17dv daitya.graha.vaśī.kṛtam]
AHS6.4.018a/ sv.ācāraṁ surabhiṁ hṛṣṭaṁ gīta.nartana.kāriṇam |
AHS6.4.018c/ snānodyāna.ruciṁ rakta.vastra.mālyānulepanam || 18 || [Note: AHS6.4.018v/ 4.18av sv.ācāra.surabhi.śiṣṭa. 4.18av sve.caraṁ surabhiṁ hṛṣṭaṁ 4.18bv .gīta.nartana.kāriṇam 4.18cv snānodyāna.rataṁ rakta.]
AHS6.4.019a/ śṛṅgāra.līlābhirataṁ gandharvādhyuṣitaṁ vadet |
AHS6.4.019c/ raktākṣaṁ krodhanaṁ stabdha.dṛṣṭiṁ vakra.gatiṁ calam || 19 || [Note: AHS6.4.019v/ 4.19av śṛṅgāra.mālyābhirataṁ 4.19av śṛṅgāra.līlābhihitaṁ]
AHS6.4.020a/ śvasantam a.niśaṁ jihvā.lolinaṁ sṛkkiṇī.liham |
AHS6.4.020c/ priya.dugdha.guḍa.snānam adho.vadana.śāyinam || 20 ||
[Page 564 ]
AHS6.4.021a/ uragādhiṣṭhitaṁ vidyāt trasyantaṁ cātapa.trataḥ |
AHS6.4.021c/ vipluta.trasta.raktākṣaṁ śubha.gandhaṁ su.tejasam || 21 ||
AHS6.4.022a/ priya.nṛtya.kathā.gīta.snāna.mālyānulepanam |
AHS6.4.022c/ matsya.māṁsa.ruciṁ hṛṣṭaṁ tuṣṭaṁ balinam a.vyatham || 22 || [Note: AHS6.4.022v/ 4.22av priya.narta.kathā.gīta. 4.22cv matsya.māṁsa.ruciṁ hṛṣṭa. 4.22dv .tuṣṭaṁ balinam a.vyatham 4.22dv tuṣṭaṁ balinam a.vyayam]
AHS6.4.023a/ calitāgra.karaṁ kasmai kiṁ dadāmīti vādinam |
AHS6.4.023c/ rahasya.bhāṣiṇaṁ vaidya.dvi.jāti.paribhāvinam || 23 || [Note: AHS6.4.023v/ 4.23dv .dvi.jāti.parivādinam]
AHS6.4.024a/ alpa.roṣaṁ druta.gatiṁ vidyād yakṣa.gṛhītakam |
AHS6.4.024c/ hāsya.nṛtya.priyaṁ raudra.ceṣṭaṁ chidra.prahāriṇam || 24 || [Note: AHS6.4.024v/ 4.24av alpa.roṣaṁ hṛta.gatiṁ 4.24cv hāsya.nṛtta.priyaṁ raudra. 4.24cv hāsya.nṛtya.karaṁ raudra.]
AHS6.4.025a/ ākrośinaṁ śīghra.gatiṁ deva.dvi.ja.bhiṣag.dviṣam |
AHS6.4.025c/ ātmānaṁ kāṣṭha.śastrādyair ghnantaṁ bhoḥ.śabda.vādinam || 25 || [Note: AHS6.4.025v/ 4.25dv ghnantaṁ go.śabda.vādinam]
AHS6.4.026a/ śāstra.veda.paṭhaṁ vidyād gṛhītaṁ brahma.rākṣasaiḥ |
AHS6.4.026c/ sa.krodha.dṛṣṭiṁ bhrū.kuṭīm udvahantaṁ sa.sambhramaṁ || 26 || [Note: AHS6.4.026v/ 4.26bv gṛhītaṁ brahma.rākṣasā]
AHS6.4.027a/ praharantaṁ pradhāvantaṁ śabdantaṁ bhairavānanam |
AHS6.4.027c/ annād vināpi balinaṁ naṣṭa.nidraṁ niśā.caram || 27 || [Note: AHS6.4.027v/ 4.27bv rudantaṁ bhairavānanam]
AHS6.4.028a/ nir.lajjam a.śuciṁ śūraṁ krūraṁ paruṣa.bhāṣiṇam |
AHS6.4.028c/ roṣaṇaṁ rakta.mālya.strī.rakta.madyāmiṣa.priyam || 28 || [Note: AHS6.4.028v/ 4.28dv .megha.madyāmiṣa.priyam]
AHS6.4.029a/ dṛṣṭvā ca raktaṁ māṁsaṁ vālihānaṁ daśana.cchadau |
AHS6.4.029c/ hasantam anna.kāle ca rākṣasādhiṣṭhitaṁ vadet || 29 || [Note: AHS6.4.029v/ 4.29av dṛṣṭvā ca rakta.māṁsāni 4.29bv lihānaṁ daśana.cchadau]
AHS6.4.030a/ a.svastha.cittaṁ naika.tra tiṣṭhantaṁ paridhāvinam |
AHS6.4.030c/ ucchiṣṭa.nṛtya.gandharva.hāsa.madyāmiṣa.priyam || 30 ||
[Page 565 ]
AHS6.4.031a/ nirbhartsanād dīna.mukhaṁ rudantam a.nimittataḥ |
AHS6.4.031c/ nakhair likhantam ātmānaṁ rūkṣa.dhvasta.vapuḥ.svaram || 31 ||
AHS6.4.032a/ āvedayantam duḥkhādi sambaddhā.baddha.bhāṣiṇam |
AHS6.4.032c/ naṣṭa.smṛtiṁ śūnya.ratiṁ lolaṁ nagnaṁ malīmasam || 32 || [Note: AHS6.4.032v/ 4.32av āvedayantam duḥkhāni]
AHS6.4.033a/ rathyā.caila.parīdhānaṁ tṛṇa.mālā.vibhūṣaṇam |
AHS6.4.033c/ ārohantaṁ ca kāṣṭhāśvaṁ tathā saṅkara.kūṭakam || 33 || [Note: AHS6.4.033v/ 4.33cv ārohantaṁ ca kāṣṭhāśma. 4.33dv .rāśiṁ saṅkara.kūṭakam 4.33dv tathā saṅkāra.kūṭakam]
AHS6.4.034a/ bahv.āśinaṁ piśācena vijānīyād adhiṣṭhitam |
AHS6.4.034c/ pretākṛti.kriyā.gandhaṁ bhītam āhāra.vidviṣam || 34 || [Note: AHS6.4.034v/ 4.34dv bhīrum āhāra.vidviṣam]
AHS6.4.035a/ tṛṇa.cchidaṁ ca pretena gṛhītaṁ naram ādiśet |
AHS6.4.035c/ bahu.pralāpaṁ kṛṣṇāsyaṁ pravilambita.yāyinam || 35 ||
AHS6.4.036a/ śūna.pralamba.vṛṣaṇaṁ kūṣmāṇḍādhiṣṭhitaṁ vadet |
AHS6.4.036c/ gṛhītvā kāṣṭha.loṣṭādi bhramantaṁ cīra.vāsasam || 36 || [Note: AHS6.4.036v/ 4.36cv gṛhītvā kāṣṭha.lohādi]
AHS6.4.037a/ nagnaṁ dhāvantam uttrasta.dṛṣṭiṁ tṛṇa.vibhūṣaṇam |
AHS6.4.037c/ śmaśāna.śūnyāyatana.rathyaika.druma.sevinam || 37 ||
AHS6.4.038a/ tilānna.madya.māṁseṣu satataṁ sakta.locanaṁ |
AHS6.4.038c/ niṣādādhiṣṭhitaṁ vidyād vadantaṁ paruṣāṇi ca || 38 || [Note: AHS6.4.038v/ 4.38bv saṁsaktaṁ rakta.locanam 4.38bv satataṁ rakta.locanam 4.38bv sa.raktaṁ rakta.locanam 4.38cv karkoṭādhiṣṭhitaṁ vindyād]
AHS6.4.039a/ yācantam udakaṁ cānnaṁ trasta.lohita.locanam |
AHS6.4.039c/ ugra.vākyaṁ ca jānīyān naram aukiraṇārditam || 39 || [Note: AHS6.4.039v/ 4.39av dhāvantam udakaṁ nānnaṁ 4.39av yācantam udakaṁ nānnaṁ 4.39av yācantam udakānnaṁ ca 4.39bv rakta.vitrasta.locanam 4.39dv naram autkiraṇārditam 4.39dv naraṁ maukiraṇārditam 4.39dv naram uttaruṇārditam]
AHS6.4.040a/ gandha.mālya.ratiṁ satya.vādinaṁ parivepinam |
AHS6.4.040c/ bahu.nidraṁ ca jānīyād vetālena vaśī.kṛtam || 40 || [Note: AHS6.4.040v/ 4.40av gandha.mālya.rataṁ satya. 4.40av gandha.mālya.ruciṁ satya. 4.40bv .vādinaṁ parivedinam 4.40bv .vādinaṁ paridevinam 4.40dv vaitālena vaśī.kṛtam]
[Page 566 ]
AHS6.4.041a/ a.prasanna.dṛśaṁ dīna.vadanaṁ śuṣka.tālukam |
AHS6.4.041c/ calan.nayana.pakṣmāṇaṁ nidrāluṁ manda.pāvakam || 41 ||
AHS6.4.042a/ apasavya.parīdhānaṁ tila.māṁsa.guḍa.priyam |
AHS6.4.042c/ skhalad.vācaṁ ca jānīyāt pitṛ.graha.vaśī.kṛtam || 42 || [Note: AHS6.4.042v/ 4.42cv skhalad.vācaṁ vijānīyāt]
AHS6.4.043a/ guru.vṛddharṣi.siddhābhiśāpa.cintānurūpataḥ |
AHS6.4.043c/ vyāhārāhāra.ceṣṭābhir yathā.svaṁ tad.grahaṁ vadet || 43 || [Note: AHS6.4.043v/ 4.43av guru.vṛddharṣi.siddhānāṁ 4.43bv śāpa.cintānurūpataḥ 4.43bv ṁśāpa.cittānurūpataḥ 4.43bv śāpa.cittānurūpataḥ 4.43cv vihārāhāra.ceṣṭābhir 4.43dv yathā.svaṁ taṁ grahaṁ vadet]
AHS6.4.044a/ kumāra.vṛndānugataṁ nagnam uddhata.mūrdha.jam |
AHS6.4.044c/ a.svastha.manasaṁ dairghya.kālikaṁ sa.grahaṁ tyajet || 44 ||

6.5. Chapter 5 :: Athabhūtapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 464-467]
AHS6.5.001a/ bhūtaṁ jayed a.hiṁsecchaṁ japa.homa.bali.vrataiḥ |
AHS6.5.001c/ tapaḥ.śīla.samādhāna.dāna.jñāna.dayādibhiḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS6.5.001v/ 5.1av bhūtaṁ jayed a.hiṁsotthaṁ 5.1cv tapaḥ.śīla.samādhyāna.]
AHS6.5.002a/ hiṅgu.vyoṣāla.nepālī.laśunārka.jaṭā.jaṭāḥ |
AHS6.5.002c/ ajalomī sa.golomī bhūtakeśī vacā latā || 2 || [Note: AHS6.5.002v/ 5.2bv .laśunārka.jaṭāmayāḥ 5.2dv bhūtakeśī.vacā.latāḥ 5.2dv bhūtakeśī vacā balā]
AHS6.5.003a/ kukkuṭī sarpagandhākhyā tilāḥ kāṇa.vikāṇike |
AHS6.5.003c/ vajraproktā vayaḥsthā ca śṛṅgī mohanavally api || 3 || [Note: AHS6.5.003v/ 5.3bv tilāḥ kāla.vikāṇike 5.3bv tilāḥ kāṇa.viṣāṇike 5.3bv tathā kāṇa.vikāṇike 5.3cv vajraproktā vayaḥsthā vā]
AHS6.5.004a/ sroto.jāñjana.rakṣoghnaṁ rakṣo.ghnaṁ cānyad auṣadham |
AHS6.5.004c/ kharāśva.śvāvid.uṣṭrarkṣa.godhā.nakula.śalyakāt || 4 || [Note: AHS6.5.004v/ 5.4dv .godhā.nakula.matsyakāt]
AHS6.5.005a/ dvīpi.mārjāra.go.siṁha.vyāghra.sāmudra.sat.tvataḥ |
AHS6.5.005c/ carma.pitta.dvi.ja.nakhā varge 'smin sādhayed ghṛtam || 5 ||
AHS6.5.006a/ purāṇam atha.vā tailaṁ navaṁ tat pāna.nasyayoḥ |
AHS6.5.006c/ abhyaṅge ca prayoktavyam eṣāṁ cūrṇaṁ ca dhūpane || 6 ||
[Page 567 ]
AHS6.5.007a/ ebhiś ca guṭikāṁ yuñjyād añjane sāvapīḍane |
AHS6.5.007c/ pralepe kalkam eteṣāṁ kvāthaṁ ca pariṣecane || 7 || [Note: AHS6.5.007v/ 5.7bv añjane sāvapīḍake]
AHS6.5.008a/ prayogo 'yaṁ grahonmādān sāpasmārāñ chamaṁ nayet |
AHS6.5.008c/ gajāhvā.pippalī.mūla.vyoṣāmalaka.sarṣapān || 8 ||
AHS6.5.009a/ godhā.nakula.mārjāra.jhaṣa.pitta.prapeṣitān |
AHS6.5.009c/ nāvanābhyaṅga.sekeṣu vidadhīta grahāpahān || 9 || [Note: AHS6.5.009v/ 5.9bv .śaśa.pitta.prapeṣitān 5.9bv .ṛkṣa.pitta.prapeṣitān]
AHS6.5.010a/ siddhārthaka.vacā.hiṅgu.priyaṅgu.rajanī.dvayam |
AHS6.5.010c/ mañjiṣṭhā śveta.kaṭabhī varā śvetādrikarṇikā || 10 || [Note: AHS6.5.010v/ 5.10cv mañjiṣṭhā.śveta.kaṭabhī. 5.10dv .varā.śvetādrikarṇikāḥ]
AHS6.5.011a/ nimbasya pattraṁ bījaṁ tu naktamāla.śirīṣayoḥ |
AHS6.5.011c/ surāhvaṁ try.ūṣaṇaṁ sarpir go.mūtre taiś catur.guṇe || 11 || [Note: AHS6.5.011v/ 5.11dv go.mūtre ca catur.guṇe]
AHS6.5.012a/ siddhaṁ siddhārthakaṁ nāma pāne nasye ca yojitam |
AHS6.5.012c/ grahān sarvān nihanty āśu viśeṣād āsurān grahān || 12 ||
AHS6.5.013a/ kṛtyā.lakṣmī.viṣonmāda.jvarāpasmāra.pāpma ca |
AHS6.5.013c/ ebhir evauṣadhair basta.vāriṇā kalpito '.gadaḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS6.5.013v/ 5.13bv .jvarāpasmāra.pāpma.nut]
AHS6.5.014a/ pāna.nasyāñjanālepa.snānodgharṣaṇa.yojitaḥ |
AHS6.5.014c/ guṇaiḥ pūrva.vad uddiṣṭo rāja.dvāre ca siddhi.kṛt || 14 || [Note: AHS6.5.014v/ 5.14cv sa guṇaiḥ pūrva.vad diṣṭo]
AHS6.5.015a/ siddhārthaka.vyoṣa.vacāśvagandhā niśā.dvayaṁ hiṅgu.palāṇḍu.kandaḥ |
AHS6.5.015c/ bījaṁ karañjāt kusumaṁ śirīṣāt phalaṁ ca valkaṁ ca kapittha.vṛkṣāt || 15 || [Note: AHS6.5.015v/ 5.15bv niśā.dvayaṁ hiṅgu.palāṇḍu.kandam 5.15dv phalaṁ ca kalkaś ca kapittha.vṛkṣāt 5.15dv phalaṁ ca puṣpaṁ ca kapittha.vṛkṣāt 5.15dv phalaṁ ca valkaś ca kapittha.vṛkṣāt]
AHS6.5.016a/ sa.māṇimanthaṁ sa.nataṁ sa.kuṣṭhaṁ śyoṇāka.mūlaṁ kiṇihī sitā ca |
AHS6.5.016c/ bastasya mūtreṇa su.bhāvitaṁ tat pittena gavyena guḍān vidadhyāt || 16 ||
[Page 568 ]
AHS6.5.017a/ duṣṭa.vraṇonmāda.tamo.niśāndhān udbandhakān vāri.nimagna.dehān |
AHS6.5.017c/ digdhāhatān darpita.sarpa.daṣṭāṁs te sādhayanty añjana.nasya.lepaiḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS6.5.017v/ 5.17av duṣṭa.vraṇonmāda.tamo.niśāndhyam 5.17bv udbaddhakān vāri.nimagna.dehān 5.17dv tān sādhayanty añjana.nasya.lepaiḥ 5.17dv te sādhayanty añjana.pāna.lepaiḥ]
AHS6.5.018a/ kārpāsāsthi.mayūra.pattra.bṛhatī.nirmālya.piṇḍītaka. || 18a ||
AHS6.5.018b/ .tvaṅ.māṁsī.vṛṣa.daṁśa.viṭ.tuṣa.vacā.keśāhi.nirmokakaiḥ || 18b ||
AHS6.5.018c/ nāgendra.dvi.ja.śṛṅga.hiṅgu.maricais tulyaiḥ kṛtaṁ dhūpanaṁ || 18c ||
AHS6.5.018d/ skandonmāda.piśāca.rākṣasa.surāveśa.jvara.ghnaṁ param || 18d || [Note: AHS6.5.018v/ 5.18av kārpāsāsthi.mayūra.piccha.bṛhatī.nirmālya.piṇḍītaka. 5.18bv .tvag.vāṁśī.vṛṣa.daṁśa.viṭ.tuṣa.vacā.keśāhi.nirmocanaiḥ 5.18bv .tvag.vāṁśī.vṛṣa.daṁśa.viṇ.nakha.vacā.keśāhi.nirmocanaiḥ 5.18bv .tvaṅ.māṁsī.vṛṣa.daṁśa.viṭ.tuṣa.vacā.keśāhi.nirmocanaiḥ 5.18dv skandonmāda.piśāca.rākṣasa.surāveśa.graha.ghnaṁ param]
AHS6.5.019a/ tri.kaṭuka.dala.kuṅkuma.granthika.kṣāra.siṁhī.niśā.dāru.siddhārtha.yugmāmbu.śakrāhvayaiḥ || 19a ||
AHS6.5.019b/ sita.laśuna.phala.trayośīra.tiktā.vacā.tuttha.yaṣṭī.balā.lohitailā.śilā.padmakaiḥ || 19b ||
AHS6.5.019c/ dadhi.tagara.madhūka.sāra.priyāhvā.viṣākhyā.viṣā.tārkṣya.śailaiḥ sa.cavyāmayaiḥ kalkitaiḥ || 19c ||
AHS6.5.019d/ ghṛtam a.navam a.śeṣa.mūtrāṁśa.siddhaṁ mataṁ bhūta.rāvāhvayaṁ pānatas tad graha.ghnaṁ param || 19d ||
AHS6.5.020a/ nata.madhuka.karañja.lākṣā.paṭolī.samaṅgā.vacā.pāṭalī.hiṅgu.siddhārtha.siṁhī.niśā.yug.latā.rohiṇī. || 20a ||
AHS6.5.020b/ .badara.kaṭu.phala.trikā.kāṇḍa.dāru.kṛmighnājagandhāmarāṅkolla.kośātakī.śigru.nimbāmbu dendrāhvayaiḥ || 20b ||
AHS6.5.020c/ gada.śukataru.puṣpa.bījogra.yaṣṭy.adrikarṇī.nikumbhāgni.bilvaiḥ samaiḥ kalkitair mūtra.vargeṇa siddhaṁ ghṛtaṁ || 20c ||
AHS6.5.020d/ vidhi.vinihitam āśu sarvaiḥ kramair yojitaṁ hanti sarva.grahonmāda.kuṣṭha.jvarāṁs tan mahā.bhūta. rāvaṁ smṛtam || 20d || [Note: AHS6.5.020v/ 5.20av nata.madhuka.karañja.lākṣā.paṭolī.samaṅgā.vacā.pāṭalā.hiṅgu.siddhārtha.siṁhī.niśā.yug.latā.rohiṇī. 5.20bv .badara.kaṭu.phala.trikā.kāṇḍa.dāru.kṛmighnājagandhā.surāṅkolla.kośātakī.śigru.nimbāmbudendrāhvayaiḥ 5.20bv .madana.kaṭu.phala.trikā.kāṇḍa.dāru.kṛmighnājagandhāmarāṅkolla.kośātakī.śigru.nimbāmbudendrāhvayaiḥ 5.20bv madana.kaṭu.phala.trikā.kāṇḍa.dāru.kṛmighnājagandhā.surāṅkolla.kośātakī.śigru.nimbāmbudendrāhvayaiḥ 5.20bv .madana.kaṭu.phala.trikā.kāṇḍa.dāru.kṛmighnājagandhāmṛtā.kola.kośātakī.śigru.nimbāmbudendrāhvayaiḥ 5.20dv vidhi.van nihitam āśu sarvaiḥ kramair yojitaṁ hanti sarva.grahonmāda.kuṣṭha.jvarāṁs tan mahā.bhūta. rāvaṁ smṛtam 5.20dv cira.vinihitam āśu sarvaiḥ kramair yojitaṁ hanti sarva.grahonmāda.kuṣṭha.jvarāṁs tan mahā.bhūta.rāvaṁ smṛtam]
AHS6.5.021a/ grahā gṛhṇanti ye yeṣu teṣāṁ teṣu viśeṣataḥ |
AHS6.5.021c/ dineṣu bali.homādīn prayuñjīta cikitsakaḥ || 21 ||
AHS6.5.022a/ snāna.vastra.vasā.māṁsa.madya.kṣīra.guḍādi ca |
AHS6.5.022c/ rocate yad yadā yebhyas tat teṣām āharet tadā || 22 || [Note: AHS6.5.022v/ 5.22av snānaṁ vastraṁ vasā māṁsaṁ 5.22bv madyaṁ kṣīra.guḍāni vā]
AHS6.5.023a/ ratnāni gandha.mālyāni bījāni madhu.sarpiṣī |
AHS6.5.023c/ bhakṣyāś ca sarve sarveṣāṁ sāmānyo vidhir ity ayam || 23 || [Note: AHS6.5.023v/ 5.23av raktāni gandha.mālyāni 5.23cv bhakṣāś ca sarve sarveṣāṁ]
AHS6.5.024a/ surarṣi.guru.vṛddhebhyaḥ siddhebhyaś ca surālaye |
AHS6.5.024c/ diśy uttarasyāṁ tatrāpi devāyopahared balim || 24 ||
AHS6.5.025a/ paścimāyāṁ yathā.kālaṁ daitya.bhūtāya catvare |
AHS6.5.025c/ gandharvāya gavāṁ mārge sa.vastrābharaṇaṁ balim || 25 ||
AHS6.5.026a/ pitṛ.nāga.grahe nadyāṁ nāgebhyaḥ pūrva.dakṣiṇe |
AHS6.5.026c/ yakṣāya yakṣāyatane saritor vā samāgame || 26 || [Note: AHS6.5.026v/ 5.26av pitṛ.nāma.grahe nadyāṁ]
[Page 569 ]
AHS6.5.027a/ catuṣ.pathe rākṣasāya bhīmeṣu gahaneṣu ca |
AHS6.5.027c/ rakṣasāṁ dakṣiṇasyāṁ tu pūrvasyāṁ brahma.rakṣasām || 27 || [Note: AHS6.5.027v/ 5.27bv bhīmeṣu gahaneṣu vā]
AHS6.5.028a/ śūnyālaye piśācāya paścimāṁ diśam āsthite |
AHS6.5.028c/ śuci.śuklāni mālyāni gandhāḥ kṣaireyam odanam || 28 || [Note: AHS6.5.028v/ 5.28bv paścimāṁ diśam āśrite 5.28bv paścimāyāṁ diśi sthite]
AHS6.5.029a/ dadhi cchattraṁ ca dhavalaṁ devānāṁ balir iṣyate |
AHS6.5.029c/ hiṅgu.sarṣapa.ṣaḍgranthā.vyoṣair ardha.palonmitaiḥ || 29 ||
AHS6.5.030a/ catur.guṇe gavāṁ mūtre ghṛta.prasthaṁ vipācayet |
AHS6.5.030c/ tat.pāna.nāvanābhyaṅgair deva.graha.vimokṣaṇam || 30 ||
AHS6.5.031a/ nasyāñjanaṁ vacā.hiṅgu.laśunaṁ basta.vāriṇā |
AHS6.5.031c/ daitye balir bahu.phalaḥ sośīra.kamalotpalaḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS6.5.031v/ 5.31av nasyāñjane vacā.hiṅgu.]
AHS6.5.032a/ nāgānāṁ sumano.lāja.guḍāpūpa.guḍaudanaiḥ |
AHS6.5.032c/ paramānna.madhu.kṣīra.kṛṣṇa.mṛn.nāgakesaraiḥ || 32 ||
AHS6.5.033a/ vacā.padma.purośīra.raktotpala.dalair baliḥ |
AHS6.5.033c/ śvetapattraṁ ca lodhraṁ ca tagaraṁ nāga.sarṣapāḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS6.5.033v/ 5.33av vacā.pāṭhā.purośīra.]
AHS6.5.034a/ śītena vāriṇā piṣṭaṁ nāvanāñjanayor hitam |
AHS6.5.034c/ yakṣāṇāṁ kṣīra.dadhy.ājya.miśrakaudana.guggulu || 34 ||
AHS6.5.035a/ devadārūtpalaṁ padmaṁ uśīraṁ vastra.kāñcanam |
AHS6.5.035c/ hiraṇyaṁ ca balir yojyo mūtrājya.kṣīram ekataḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS6.5.035v/ 5.35bv uśīraṁ vastra.candanam 5.35bv uśīraṁ vastra.kambalam]
AHS6.5.036a/ siddhaṁ samonmitaṁ pāna.nāvanābhyañjane hitam |
AHS6.5.036c/ harītakī haridre dve laśuno maricaṁ vacā || 36 || [Note: AHS6.5.036v/ 5.36av siddhaṁ palonmitaṁ pāna.]
[Page 570 ]
AHS6.5.037a/ nimba.pattraṁ ca bastāmbu.kalkitaṁ nāvanāñjanam |
AHS6.5.037c/ brahma.rakṣo.baliḥ siddhaṁ yavānāṁ pūrṇam āḍhakam || 37 || [Note: AHS6.5.037v/ 5.37dv yavānāṁ cūrṇam āḍhakam]
AHS6.5.038a/ toyasya kumbhaḥ palalaṁ chattraṁ vastram vilepanam |
AHS6.5.038c/ gāyatrī.viṁśati.pala.kvāthe 'rdha.palikaiḥ pacet || 38 || [Note: AHS6.5.038v/ 5.38av toya.kumbhaṁ ca palalaṁ]
AHS6.5.039a/ try.ūṣaṇa.tri.phalā.hiṅgu.ṣaḍgranthā.miśi.sarṣapaiḥ |
AHS6.5.039c/ sa.nimba.pattra.laśunaiḥ kuḍavān sapta sarpiṣaḥ || 39 ||
AHS6.5.040a/ go.mūtre tri.guṇe pāna.nasyābhyaṅgeṣu tad dhitam |
AHS6.5.040c/ rakṣasāṁ palalaṁ śuklaṁ kusumaṁ miśrakaudanam || 40 || [Note: AHS6.5.040v/ 5.40av go.mūtre tri.guṇe siddhaṁ 5.40bv pānābhyaṅgeṣu tad dhitam 5.40dv kusumaṁ miśrakaudanaḥ]
AHS6.5.041a/ baliḥ pakvāma.māṁsāni niṣpāvā rudhirokṣitāḥ |
AHS6.5.041c/ naktamāla.śirīṣa.tvaṅ.mūla.puṣpa.phalāni ca || 41 || [Note: AHS6.5.041v/ 5.41dv .mūlaṁ puṣpaṁ phalāni ca 5.41dv .mūle puṣpaṁ phalāni ca]
AHS6.5.042a/ tad.vac ca kṛṣṇa.pāṭalyā bilva.mūlaṁ kaṭu.trikam |
AHS6.5.042c/ hiṅgv.indrayava.siddhārtha.laśunāmalakī.phalam || 42 ||
AHS6.5.043a/ nāvanāñjanayor yojyo basta.mūtra.yuto '.gadaḥ |
AHS6.5.043c/ ebhir eva ghṛtaṁ siddhaṁ gavāṁ mūtre catur.guṇe || 43 || [Note: AHS6.5.043v/ 5.43bv basta.mūtra.hṛto '.gadaḥ 5.43bv basta.mūtra.druto '.gadaḥ]
AHS6.5.044a/ rakṣo.grahān vārayate pānābhyañjana.nāvanaiḥ |
AHS6.5.044c/ piśācānāṁ baliḥ sīdhuḥ piṇyākaḥ palalaṁ dadhi || 44 ||
AHS6.5.045a/ mūlakaṁ lavaṇaṁ sarpiḥ sa.bhūtaudana.yāvakam |
AHS6.5.045c/ haridrā.dvaya.mañjiṣṭhā.miśi.saindhava.nāgaram || 45 || [Note: AHS6.5.045v/ 5.45bv prabhūtaudana.yāvakam 5.45bv prāg.bhūtaudana.yāvakam 5.45dv .miśi.saindhava.nāgaraiḥ]
AHS6.5.046a/ hiṅgu.priyaṅgu.tri.kaṭu.laśuna.tri.phalā vacā |
AHS6.5.046c/ pāṭalī.śveta.kaṭabhī.śirīṣa.kusumair ghṛtam || 46 || [Note: AHS6.5.046v/ 5.46bv .laśuna.tri.phalā.vacāḥ 5.46cv paṭolī.śveta.kaṭabhī. 5.46cv pāṭalā.śveta.kaṭabhī.]
[Page 571 ]
AHS6.5.047a/ go.mūtra.pādikaṁ siddhaṁ pānābhyañjanayor hitam |
AHS6.5.047c/ bastāmbu.piṣṭais tair eva yojyam añjana.nāvanam || 47 ||
AHS6.5.048a/ devarṣi.pitṛ.gandharve tīkṣṇaṁ nasyādi varjayet |
AHS6.5.048c/ sarpiḥ.pānādi mṛdv asmin bhaiṣajyam avacārayet || 48 ||
AHS6.5.049a/ ṛte piśācāt sarveṣu pratikūlaṁ ca nācaret |
AHS6.5.049c/ sa.vaidyam āturaṁ ghnanti kruddhās te hi mahaujasaḥ || 49 ||
AHS6.5.050a/ īśvaraṁ dvā.daśa.bhujaṁ nātham āryāvalokitam |
AHS6.5.050c/ sarva.vyādhi.cikitsāṁ ca japan sarva.grahān jayet || 50 || [Note: AHS6.5.050v/ 5.50cv sarva.vyādhi.cikitsantaṁ 5.50cv sarva.vyādhi.cikitsaṁ ca 5.50cv sarva.vyādhi.cikitsitaṁ]
AHS6.5.051a/ tathonmādān apasmārān anyaṁ vā citta.viplavam |
AHS6.5.051c/ mahā.vidyāṁ ca māyūrīṁ śuciṁ taṁ śrāvayet sadā || 51 || [Note: AHS6.5.051v/ 5.51bv anyān vā citta.vibhramān 5.51dv śucis taṁ śrāvayet sadā]
AHS6.5.052a/ bhūteśaṁ pūjayet sthāṇuṁ pramathākhyāṁś ca tad.gaṇān |
AHS6.5.052c/ japan siddhāṁś ca tan.mantrān grahān sarvān apohati || 52 ||
AHS6.5.053a/ yac cān.antarayoḥ kiñ.cid vakṣyate 'dhyāyayor hitam |
AHS6.5.053c/ yac coktam iha tat sarvaṁ prayuñjīta paras.param || 53 || [Note: AHS6.5.053v/ 5.53cv yathoktam iha tat sarvaṁ]

6.6. Chapter 6 :: Athonmādapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 467-470]
AHS6.6.001a/ unmādāḥ ṣaṭ pṛthag.doṣa.nicayādhi.viṣodbhavāḥ |
AHS6.6.001c/ unmādo nāma manaso doṣair unmārga.gair madaḥ || 1 ||
AHS6.6.002a/ śārīra.mānasair duṣṭair a.hitād anna.pānataḥ |
AHS6.6.002c/ vikṛtā.sātmya.sa.malād viṣamād upayogataḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS6.6.002v/ 6.2av śārīra.mānasair doṣair 6.2cv vikṛtā.sātmya.sa.mala. 6.2dv .viṣamād upayogataḥ]
AHS6.6.003a/ viṣaṇṇasyālpa.sat.tvasya vyādhi.vega.samudgamāt |
AHS6.6.003c/ kṣīṇasya ceṣṭā.vaiṣamyāt pūjya.pūjā.vyatikramāt || 3 || [Note: AHS6.6.003v/ 6.3bv vyādhi.vega.samudbhavāt 6.3bv vyādhi.vega.samudbhramāt]
[Page 572 ]
AHS6.6.004a/ ādhibhir citta.vibhraṁśād viṣeṇopaviṣeṇa ca |
AHS6.6.004c/ ebhir hi hīna.sat.tvasya hṛdi doṣāḥ pradūṣitāḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS6.6.004v/ 6.4bv viṣeṇopaviṣeṇa vā 6.4cv ebhir vihīna.sat.tvasya]
AHS6.6.005a/ dhiyo vidhāya kāluṣyaṁ hṛtvā mārgān mano.vahān |
AHS6.6.005c/ unmādaṁ kurvate tena dhī.vijñāna.smṛti.bhramāt || 5 ||
AHS6.6.006a/ deho duḥkha.sukha.bhraṣṭo bhraṣṭa.sārathi.vad rathaḥ |
AHS6.6.006c/ bhramaty a.cintitārambhas tatra vātāt kṛśāṅga.tā || 6 || [Note: AHS6.6.006v/ 6.6av dehī duḥkha.sukha.bhraṣṭo]
AHS6.6.007a/ a.sthāne rodanākrośa.hasita.smita.nartanam |
AHS6.6.007c/ gīta.vāditra.vāg.aṅga.vikṣepāsphoṭanāni ca || 7 ||
AHS6.6.008a/ a.sāmnā veṇu.vīṇādi.śabdānukaraṇaṁ muhuḥ |
AHS6.6.008c/ āsyāt phenāgamo 'jasram aṭanaṁ bahu.bhāṣi.tā || 8 || [Note: AHS6.6.008v/ 6.8av abhīkṣṇaṁ veṇu.vīṇādi. 6.8av āsyena veṇu.vīṇādi. 6.8bv .śabdādi.karaṇaṁ muhuḥ 6.8dv aṭanaṁ bahu.bhāṣitam]
AHS6.6.009a/ alaṅkāro 'n.alaṅkārair a.yānair gamanodyamaḥ |
AHS6.6.009c/ gṛddhir abhyavahāryeṣu tal.lābhe cāvamāna.tā || 9 || [Note: AHS6.6.009v/ 6.9dv tal.lābhe vāvamāna.tā 6.9dv tal.lābheṣv avamāna.tā]
AHS6.6.010a/ utpiṇḍitāruṇākṣi.tvaṁ jīrṇe cānne gadodbhavaḥ |
AHS6.6.010c/ pittāt santarjanaṁ krodho muṣṭi.loṣṭādy.abhidravaḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS6.6.010v/ 6.10av utpīḍitāruṇākṣi.tvaṁ]
AHS6.6.011a/ śīta.cchāyodakākāṅkṣā nagna.tvaṁ pīta.varṇa.tā |
AHS6.6.011c/ a.satya.jvalana.jvālā.tārakā.dīpa.darśanam || 11 || [Note: AHS6.6.011v/ 6.11bv netra.tvak.pīta.varṇa.tā 6.11cv a.sati jvalane jvālā. 6.11cv a.satya.jvalanolkādi.]
AHS6.6.012a/ kaphād a.rocakaś chardir alpehāhāra.vākya.tā |
AHS6.6.012c/ strī.kāma.tā rahaḥ.prītir lālā.siṅghāṇaka.srutiḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.6.013a/ baibhatsyaṁ śauca.vidveṣo nidrā śvayathur ānane |
AHS6.6.013c/ unmādo bala.vān rātrau bhukta.mātre ca jāyate || 13 ||
[Page 573 ]
AHS6.6.014a/ sarvāyatana.saṁsthāna.sannipāte tad.ātmakam |
AHS6.6.014c/ unmādaṁ dāruṇaṁ vidyāt taṁ bhiṣak parivarjayet || 14 || [Note: AHS6.6.014v/ 6.14bv .sannipātāt tad.ātmakam]
AHS6.6.015a/ dhana.kāntādi.nāśena duḥ.sahenābhiṣaṅga.vān |
AHS6.6.015c/ pāṇḍur dīno muhur muhyan hāheti paridevate || 15 ||
AHS6.6.016a/ rodity a.kasmān mriyate tad.guṇān bahu manyate |
AHS6.6.016c/ śoka.kliṣṭa.manā dhyāyañ jāgarūko viceṣṭate || 16 || [Note: AHS6.6.016v/ 6.16av rodity a.kasmāt smayate]
AHS6.6.017a/ viṣeṇa śyāva.vadano naṣṭa.cchāyā.balendriyaḥ |
AHS6.6.017c/ vegāntare 'pi sambhrānto raktākṣas taṁ vivarjayet || 17 || [Note: AHS6.6.017v/ 6.17bv naṣṭa.cchāyo '.balendriyaḥ]
AHS6.6.018a/ athānila.ja unmāde sneha.pānaṁ prayojayet |
AHS6.6.018c/ pūrvam āvṛta.mārge tu sa.snehaṁ mṛdu śodhanam || 18 ||
AHS6.6.019a/ kapha.pitta.bhave 'py ādau vamanaṁ sa.virecanam |
AHS6.6.019c/ snigdha.svinnasya vastiṁ ca śirasaḥ sa.virecanam || 19 || [Note: AHS6.6.019v/ 6.19av kapha.pittodbhave 'py ādau 6.19cv snigdha.svinnasya vastīṁś ca 6.19dv śirasaś ca virecanam]
AHS6.6.020a/ tathāsya śuddha.dehasya prasādaṁ labhate manaḥ |
AHS6.6.020c/ ittham apy anuvṛttau tu tīkṣṇaṁ nāvanam añjanam || 20 || [Note: AHS6.6.020v/ 6.20av tathaiva śuddha.dehasya]
AHS6.6.021a/ harṣaṇāśvāsanottrāsa.bhaya.tāḍana.tarjanam |
AHS6.6.021c/ abhyaṅgodvartanālepa.dhūpān pānaṁ ca sarpiṣaḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS6.6.021v/ 6.21dv .dhūmān pānaṁ ca sarpiṣaḥ]
AHS6.6.022a/ yuñjyāt tāni hi śuddhasya nayanti prakṛtiṁ manaḥ |
AHS6.6.022c/ hiṅgu.sauvarcala.vyoṣair dvi.palāṁśair ghṛtāḍhakam || 22 ||
AHS6.6.023a/ siddhaṁ sa.mūtram unmāda.bhūtāpasmāra.nut param |
AHS6.6.023c/ dvau prasthau sva.rasād brāhmyā ghṛta.prasthaṁ ca sādhitam || 23 ||
[Page 574 ]
AHS6.6.024a/ vyoṣa.śyāmā.trivṛd.dantī.śaṅkhapuṣpī.nṛpadrumaiḥ |
AHS6.6.024c/ sa.saptalā.kṛmiharaiḥ kalkitair akṣa.sammitaiḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.6.024v/ 6.24av vyoṣa.śyāmā.trivṛd.bimbī. 6.24cv sātalā.kṛmijit.kalkaiḥ 6.24dv sarvais tair akṣa.sammitaiḥ]
AHS6.6.025a/ pala.vṛddhyā prayuñjīta paraṁ mātrā catuḥ.palam |
AHS6.6.025c/ unmāda.kuṣṭhāpasmāra.haraṁ vandhyā.suta.pradam || 25 ||
AHS6.6.026a/ vāk.svara.smṛti.medhā.kṛd dhanyaṁ brāhmī.ghṛtaṁ smṛtam |
AHS6.6.026c/ varā.viśālā.bhadrailā.devadārv.elavālukaiḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS6.6.026v/ 6.26cv varā.viśālākautpalā. 6.26cv varā.viśālā.pattrailā.]
AHS6.6.027a/ dvi.śārivā.dvi.rajanī.dvi.sthirā.phalinī.nataiḥ |
AHS6.6.027c/ bṛhatī.kuṣṭha.mañjiṣṭhā.nāgakesara.dāḍimaiḥ || 27 ||
AHS6.6.028a/ vella.tālīśa.pattrailā.mālatī.mukulotpalaiḥ |
AHS6.6.028c/ sa.dantī.padmaka.himaiḥ karṣāṁśaiḥ sarpiṣaḥ pacet || 28 || [Note: AHS6.6.028v/ 6.28bv .mālatī.kumudotpalaiḥ 6.28cv rudantī.padmaka.himaiḥ]
AHS6.6.029a/ prasthaṁ bhūta.grahonmāda.kāsāpasmāra.pāpmasu |
AHS6.6.029c/ pāṇḍu.kaṇḍū.viṣe śoṣe mohe mehe gare jvare || 29 || [Note: AHS6.6.029v/ 6.29bv .kāsāpasmāra.pāpma.jit 6.29cv pāṇḍu.kaṇḍū.viṣe śophe]
AHS6.6.030a/ a.retasy a.prajasi vā daivopahata.cetasi |
AHS6.6.030c/ a.medhasi skhalad.vāci smṛti.kāme 'lpa.pāvake || 30 || [Note: AHS6.6.030v/ 6.30av a.retasy alpa.rajasi]
AHS6.6.031a/ balyaṁ maṅgalyam āyuṣyaṁ kānti.saubhāgya.puṣṭi.dam |
AHS6.6.031c/ kalyāṇakam idaṁ sarpiḥ śreṣṭhaṁ puṁ.savaneṣu ca || 31 ||
AHS6.6.032a/ ebhyo dvi.śārivādīni jale paktvaika.viṁśatim |
AHS6.6.032c/ rase tasmin pacet sarpir gṛṣṭi.kṣīra.catur.guṇam || 32 || [Note: AHS6.6.032v/ 6.32dv gṛṣṭi.kṣīre catur.guṇe 6.32dv gṛṣṭi.kṣīraṁ catur.guṇam]
AHS6.6.033a/ vīrā.dvi.medā.kākolī.kapikacchū.viṣāṇibhiḥ |
AHS6.6.033c/ śūrpaparṇī.yutair etan mahā.kalyāṇakaṁ param || 33 || [Note: AHS6.6.033v/ 6.33av vīrarddhi.medā.kākolī. 6.33dv mahā.kalyāṇakaṁ smṛtam]
[Page 575 ]
AHS6.6.034a/ bṛṁhaṇaṁ sannipāta.ghnaṁ pūrvasmād adhikaṁ guṇaiḥ |
AHS6.6.034c/ jaṭilā pūtanā keśī cāraṭī markaṭī vacā || 34 ||
AHS6.6.035a/ trāyamāṇā jayā vīrā corakaḥ kaṭu.rohiṇī |
AHS6.6.035c/ vayaḥsthā śūkarī chattrā sāticchattrā palaṅkaṣā || 35 || [Note: AHS6.6.035v/ 6.35dv aticchattrā palaṅkaṣā]
AHS6.6.036a/ mahāpuruṣadantā ca kāyasthā nākulī.dvayam |
AHS6.6.036c/ kaṭambharā vṛścikālī śāliparṇī ca tair ghṛtam || 36 || [Note: AHS6.6.036v/ 6.36cv kaṭambharā.vṛścikālī. 6.36dv .sthirāś cāhṛtya tair ghṛtam]
AHS6.6.037a/ siddhaṁ cāturthikonmāda.grahāpasmāra.nāśanam |
AHS6.6.037c/ mahā.paiśācakaṁ nāma ghṛtam etad yathāmṛtam || 37 || [Note: AHS6.6.037v/ 6.37av siddhaṁ caturthakonmāda. 6.37av siddhaṁ cāturthakonmāda.]
AHS6.6.038a/ buddhi.medhā.smṛti.karaṁ bālānāṁ cāṅga.vardhanam |
AHS6.6.038c/ brāhmīm aindrīṁ viḍaṅgāni vyoṣaṁ hiṅgu jaṭāṁ murām || 38 || [Note: AHS6.6.038v/ 6.38av smṛti.buddhi.karaṁ caiva 6.38bv bālānām aṅga.vardhanam]
AHS6.6.039a/ rāsnāṁ viṣaghnāṁ laśunaṁ viśalyāṁ surasāṁ vacām |
AHS6.6.039c/ jyotiṣmatīṁ nāgavinnām anantāṁ sa.harītakīm || 39 || [Note: AHS6.6.039v/ 6.39av rāsnāṁ viṣaghnīṁ laśunaṁ]
AHS6.6.040a/ kāṅkṣīṁ ca hasti.mūtreṇa piṣṭvā chāyā.viśoṣītā |
AHS6.6.040c/ vartir nasyāñjanālepa.dhūpair unmāda.sūdanī || 40 || [Note: AHS6.6.040v/ 6.40av kācchīṁ ca hasti.mūtreṇa 6.40av saurāṣṭrīṁ basta.mūtreṇa 6.40dv .dhūpair unmāda.nāśinī]
AHS6.6.041a/ avapīḍāś ca vividhāḥ sarṣapāḥ sneha.saṁyutāḥ |
AHS6.6.041c/ kaṭu.tailena cābhyaṅgo dhmāpayec cāsya tad rajaḥ || 41 ||
AHS6.6.042a/ sa.hiṅgus tīkṣṇa.dhūmaś ca sūtra.sthānodito hitaḥ |
AHS6.6.042c/ śṛgāla.śalyakolūka.jalaukā.vṛṣa.basta.jaiḥ || 42 || [Note: AHS6.6.042v/ 6.42av sa.hiṅgu tīkṣṇa.dhūmaś ca 6.42dv .jalūkā.vṛṣa.basta.jaiḥ 6.42dv .jalaukā.vṛka.basta.jaiḥ]
AHS6.6.043a/ mūtra.pitta.śakṛd.roma.nakha.carmabhir ācaret |
AHS6.6.043c/ dhūpa.dhūmāñjanābhyaṅga.pradeha.pariṣecanam || 43 ||
[Page 576 ]
AHS6.6.044a/ dhūpayet satataṁ cainaṁ śva.go.matsyaiḥ su.pūtibhiḥ |
AHS6.6.044c/ vāta.śleṣmātmake prāyaḥ paittike tu praśasyate || 44 ||
AHS6.6.045a/ tiktakaṁ jīvanīyaṁ ca sarpiḥ snehaś ca miśrakaḥ |
AHS6.6.045c/ śītāni cānna.pānāni madhurāṇi laghūni ca || 45 ||
AHS6.6.046a/ vidhyet sirāṁ yathoktāṁ vā tṛptaṁ medyāmiṣasya vā |
AHS6.6.046c/ nivāte śāyayed evaṁ mucyate mati.vibhramāt || 46 || [Note: AHS6.6.046v/ 6.46av vidhyet sirāṁ yathoktāṁ ca]
AHS6.6.047a/ prakṣipyā.salile kūpe śoṣayed vā bubhukṣayā |
AHS6.6.047c/ āśvāsayet suhṛt taṁ vā vākyair dharmārtha.saṁhitaiḥ || 47 || [Note: AHS6.6.047v/ 6.47cv āśvāsayet suhṛdbhis taṁ]
AHS6.6.048a/ brūyād iṣṭa.vināśaṁ vā darśayed adbhutāni vā |
AHS6.6.048c/ baddhaṁ sarṣapa.tailāktaṁ nyased vottānam ātape || 48 || [Note: AHS6.6.048v/ 6.48av brūyād iṣṭasya nāśaṁ vā 6.48dv nyastaṁ cottānam ātape]
AHS6.6.049a/ kapikacchvātha.vā taptair loha.taila.jalaiḥ spṛśet |
AHS6.6.049c/ kaśābhis tāḍayitvā vā baddhaṁ śvabhre viniḥkṣipet || 49 || [Note: AHS6.6.049v/ 6.49dv baddhvā śvabhre viniḥkṣipet]
AHS6.6.050a/ atha.vā vīta.śastrāśma.jane santamase gṛhe |
AHS6.6.050c/ sarpeṇoddhṛta.daṁṣṭreṇa dāntaiḥ siṁhair gajaiś ca tam || 50 ||
AHS6.6.050+(1)ab/ trāsayec chastra.hastair vā kirātārāti.taskaraiḥ || 50+(1)ab || [Note: AHS6.6.050+(1)v/ 6.50+(1)bv taskaraiḥ śatrubhis tathā]
AHS6.6.051a/ atha.vā rāja.puruṣā bahir nītvā su.saṁyatam |
AHS6.6.051c/ bhāpayeyur vadhenainaṁ tarjayanto nṛpājñayā || 51 ||
AHS6.6.052a/ deha.duḥkha.bhayebhyo hi paraṁ prāṇa.bhayaṁ matam |
AHS6.6.052c/ tena yāti śamaṁ tasya sarvato viplutaṁ manaḥ || 52 || [Note: AHS6.6.052v/ 6.52dv sarvato 'pasṛtaṁ manaḥ]
[Page 577 ]
AHS6.6.053a/ siddhā kriyā prayojyeyaṁ deśa.kālādy.apekṣayā |
AHS6.6.053c/ iṣṭa.dravya.vināśāt tu mano yasyopahanyate || 53 || [Note: AHS6.6.053v/ 6.53av siddhāḥ kriyā prayoktavyā]
AHS6.6.054a/ tasya tat.sadṛśa.prāpti.sāntvāśvāsaiḥ śamaṁ nayet |
AHS6.6.054c/ kāma.śoka.bhaya.krodha.harṣerṣyā.lobha.sambhavān || 54 || [Note: AHS6.6.054v/ 6.54av tasya tat.sadṛśa.prāptiḥ 6.54bv .sāntvāśvāsaiḥ prasādayet 6.54bv .priyāśvāsaiḥ pradarśayet 6.54bv sāntvāśvāsaiḥ śamaṁ nayet]
AHS6.6.055a/ paras.para.prati.dvandvair ebhir eva śamaṁ nayet |
AHS6.6.055c/ bhūtānubandham īkṣeta prokta.liṅgādhikākṛtim || 55 || [Note: AHS6.6.055v/ 6.55cv bhūtānubaddham īkṣeta]
AHS6.6.056a/ yady unmāde tataḥ kuryād bhūta.nirdiṣṭam auṣadham |
AHS6.6.056c/ baliṁ ca dadyāt palalaṁ yāvakaṁ saktu.piṇḍikām || 56 || [Note: AHS6.6.056v/ 6.56av yady unmāde ca tat kuryād]
AHS6.6.057a/ snigdhaṁ madhuram āhāraṁ taṇḍulān rudhirokṣitān |
AHS6.6.057c/ pakvāmakāni māṁsāni surāṁ maireyam āsavam || 57 || [Note: AHS6.6.057v/ 6.57cv pakvāmāhvāni māṁsāni 6.57dv surā.maireyam āsavam]
AHS6.6.058a/ atimuktasya puṣpāṇi jātyāḥ sahacarasya ca |
AHS6.6.058c/ catuṣ.pathe gavāṁ tīrthe nadīnāṁ saṅgameṣu ca || 58 ||
AHS6.6.059a/ nivṛttāmiṣa.madyo yo hitāśī prayataḥ śuciḥ |
AHS6.6.059c/ nijāgantubhir unmādaiḥ sat.tva.vān na sa yujyate || 59 || [Note: AHS6.6.059v/ 6.59av nivṛttāmiṣa.madyo 'pi]
AHS6.6.060a/ prasāda indriyārthānāṁ buddhy.ātma.manasāṁ tathā |
AHS6.6.060c/ dhātūnāṁ prakṛti.stha.tvaṁ vigatonmāda.lakṣaṇam || 60 || [Note: AHS6.6.060v/ 6.60av indriyāṇāṁ prasanna.tvaṁ 6.60dv gatonmādasya lakṣaṇam]

6.7. Chapter 7 :: Athāpasmārapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 470-472]
AHS6.7.001a/ smṛty.apāyo hy apasmāraḥ sa dhī.sat.tvābhisamplavāt |
AHS6.7.001c/ jāyate 'bhihate citte cintā.śoka.bhayādibhiḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS6.7.001v/ 7.1bv sa dhī.sat.tvādi.samplavāt]
AHS6.7.002a/ unmāda.vat prakupitaiś citta.deha.gatair malaiḥ |
AHS6.7.002c/ hate sat.tve hṛdi vyāpte sañjñā.vāhiṣu kheṣu ca || 2 ||
[Page 578 ]
AHS6.7.003a/ tamo viśan mūḍha.matir bībhatsāḥ kurute kriyāḥ |
AHS6.7.003c/ dantān khādan vaman phenaṁ hastau pādau ca vikṣipan || 3 || [Note: AHS6.7.003v/ 7.3dv hastau pādau ca kampayan]
AHS6.7.004a/ paśyann a.santi rūpāṇi praskhalan patati kṣitau |
AHS6.7.004c/ vijihmākṣi.bhruvo doṣa.vege 'tīte vibudhyate || 4 ||
AHS6.7.005a/ kālāntareṇa sa punaś caivam eva viceṣṭate |
AHS6.7.005c/ apasmāraś catur.bhedo vātādyair nicayena ca || 5 ||
AHS6.7.006a/ rūpam utpatsyamāne 'smin hṛt.kampaḥ śūnya.tā bhramaḥ |
AHS6.7.006c/ tamaso darśanaṁ dhyānaṁ bhrū.vyudāso 'kṣi.vaikṛtam || 6 || [Note: AHS6.7.006v/ 7.6av rūpam utpadyamāne 'smin]
AHS6.7.007a/ a.śabda.śravaṇaṁ svedo lālā.siṅghāṇaka.srutiḥ |
AHS6.7.007c/ a.vipāko '.rucir mūrchā kukṣy.āṭopo bala.kṣayaḥ || 7 ||
AHS6.7.008a/ nidrā.nāśo 'ṅga.mardas tṛṭ svapne gānaṁ sa.nartanam |
AHS6.7.008c/ pānaṁ tailasya madyasya tayor eva ca mehanam || 8 ||
AHS6.7.009a/ tatra vātāt sphurat.sakthiḥ prapataṁś ca muhur muhuḥ |
AHS6.7.009c/ apasmarati sañjñāṁ ca labhate vi.svaraṁ rudan || 9 || [Note: AHS6.7.009v/ 7.9bv pratataṁ ca muhur muhuḥ]
AHS6.7.010a/ utpiṇḍitākṣaḥ śvasiti phenaṁ vamati kampate |
AHS6.7.010c/ āvidhyati śiro dantān daśaty ādhmāta.kandharaḥ || 10 ||
AHS6.7.011a/ parito vikṣipaty aṅgaṁ viṣamaṁ vinatāṅguliḥ |
AHS6.7.011c/ rūkṣa.śyāvāruṇākṣi.tvaṅ.nakhāsyaḥ kṛṣṇam īkṣate || 11 ||
AHS6.7.012a/ capalaṁ paruṣaṁ rūpaṁ vi.rūpaṁ vikṛtānanam |
AHS6.7.012c/ apasmarati pittena muhuḥ sañjñāṁ ca vindati || 12 || [Note: AHS6.7.012v/ 7.12av capalaṁ paramaṁ rūpaṁ 7.12av capalaṁ paruṣaṁ rūkṣaṁ]
[Page 579 ]
AHS6.7.013a/ pīta.phenākṣi.vaktra.tvag āsphālayati medinīm |
AHS6.7.013c/ bhairavādīpta.ruṣita.rūpa.darśī tṛṣānvitaḥ || 13 ||
AHS6.7.014a/ kaphāc cireṇa grahaṇaṁ cireṇaiva vibodhanam |
AHS6.7.014c/ ceṣṭālpā bhūyasī lālā śukla.netra.nakhāsya.tā || 14 ||
AHS6.7.015a/ śuklābha.rūpa.darśi.tvaṁ sarva.liṅgaṁ tu varjayet |
AHS6.7.015c/ athāvṛtānāṁ dhī.citta.hṛt.khānāṁ prāk.prabodhanam || 15 ||
AHS6.7.016a/ tīkṣṇaiḥ kuryād apasmāre karmabhir vamanādibhiḥ |
AHS6.7.016c/ vātikaṁ vasti.bhūyiṣṭhaiḥ paittaṁ prāyo virecanaiḥ || 16 ||
AHS6.7.017a/ ślaiṣmikaṁ vamana.prāyair apasmāram upācaret |
AHS6.7.017c/ sarvataḥ su.viśuddhasya samyag āśvāsitasya ca || 17 ||
AHS6.7.018a/ apasmāra.vimokṣārthaṁ yogān saṁśamanāñ chṛṇu |
AHS6.7.018c/ go.maya.sva.rasa.kṣīra.dadhi.mūtraiḥ śṛtaṁ haviḥ || 18 ||
AHS6.7.019a/ apasmāra.jvaronmāda.kāmalānta.karaṁ pibet |
AHS6.7.019c/ dvi.pañca.mūla.tri.phalā.dvi.niśā.kuṭaja.tvacaḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS6.7.019v/ 7.19cv dvi.pañca.mūlī.tri.phalā.]
AHS6.7.020a/ saptaparṇam apāmārgaṁ nīlinīṁ kaṭu.rohiṇīm |
AHS6.7.020c/ śamyāka.puṣkara.jaṭā.phalgu.mūla.durālabhāḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS6.7.020v/ 7.20cv śyoṇāka.puṣkara.jaṭā.]
AHS6.7.021a/ dvi.palāḥ salila.droṇe paktvā pādāvaśeṣite |
AHS6.7.021c/ bhārgī.pāṭhāḍhakī.kumbha.nikumbha.vyoṣa.rohiṣaiḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS6.7.021v/ 7.21av dvi.palāni jala.droṇe]
AHS6.7.022a/ mūrvā.bhūtika.bhūnimba.śreyasī.śārivā.dvayaiḥ |
AHS6.7.022c/ madayanty.agni.niculair akṣāṁśaiḥ sarpiṣaḥ pacet || 22 || [Note: AHS6.7.022v/ 7.22av mūrvā.pūtika.bhūnimba.]
[Page 580 ]
AHS6.7.023a/ prasthaṁ tad.vad dravaiḥ pūrvaiḥ pañca.gavyam idaṁ mahat |
AHS6.7.023c/ jvarāpasmāra.jaṭhara.bhagandara.haraṁ param || 23 ||
AHS6.7.024a/ śophārśaḥ.kāmalā.pāṇḍu.gulma.kāsa.grahāpaham |
AHS6.7.024c/ brāhmī.rasa.vacā.kuṣṭha.śaṅkhapuṣpī.śṛtaṁ ghṛtam || 24 || [Note: AHS6.7.024v/ 7.24bv .gulma.kāsa.bhramāpaham]
AHS6.7.025a/ purāṇaṁ medhyam unmādā.lakṣmy.apasmāra.pāpma.jit |
AHS6.7.025c/ taila.prasthaṁ ghṛta.prasthaṁ jīvanīyaiḥ palonmitaiḥ || 25 ||
AHS6.7.026a/ kṣīra.droṇe pacet siddham apasmāra.vimokṣaṇam |
AHS6.7.026c/ kaṁse kṣīrekṣu.rasayoḥ kāśmarye 'ṣṭa.guṇe rase || 26 ||
AHS6.7.027a/ kārṣikair jīvanīyaiś ca sarpiḥ.prasthaṁ vipācayet |
AHS6.7.027c/ vāta.pittodbhavaṁ kṣipram apasmāraṁ nihanti tat || 27 ||
AHS6.7.028a/ tad.vat kāśa.vidārīkṣu.kuśa.kvātha.śṛtaṁ payaḥ |
AHS6.7.028c/ kūṣmāṇḍa.sva.rase sarpir aṣṭā.daśa.guṇe śṛtam || 28 || [Note: AHS6.7.028v/ 7.28bv .kuśa.kvāthe śṛtaṁ payaḥ 7.28bv .kuśa.kvāthaiḥ śṛtaṁ payaḥ]
AHS6.7.029a/ yaṣṭī.kalkam apasmāra.haraṁ dhī.vāk.svara.pradam |
AHS6.7.029c/ kapilānāṁ gavāṁ pittaṁ nāvane paramaṁ hitam || 29 || [Note: AHS6.7.029v/ 7.29av yaṣṭī.kalkaṁ apasmāraṁ 7.29bv nāvanaṁ paramaṁ hitam 7.29bv hared dhī.vāk.svara.pradam]
AHS6.7.030a/ śva.śṛgāla.biḍālānāṁ siṁhādīnāṁ ca pūjitam |
AHS6.7.030c/ godhā.nakula.nāgānāṁ pṛṣatarkṣa.gavām api || 30 || [Note: AHS6.7.030v/ 7.30dv vṛṣabharkṣa.gavām api 7.30dv vṛka.carka.gavām api]
AHS6.7.031a/ pitteṣu sādhitaṁ tailaṁ nasye 'bhyaṅge ca śasyate |
AHS6.7.031c/ tri.phalā.vyoṣa.pītadru.yava.kṣāra.phaṇijjakaiḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS6.7.031v/ 7.31av pitteṣu sādhayet tailaṁ 7.31bv nasyābhyaṅgeṣu śasyate]
AHS6.7.032a/ śry.āhvāpāmārga.kārañja.bījais tailaṁ vipācitam |
AHS6.7.032c/ basta.mūtre hitaṁ nasyaṁ cūrṇaṁ vā dhmāpayed bhiṣak || 32 || [Note: AHS6.7.032v/ 7.32av śyāmāpāmārga.kārañja. 7.32bv .bījais tailaṁ prasādhitam 7.32bv .bījais tailaṁ vipācayet]
[Page 581 ]
AHS6.7.033a/ nakulolūka.mārjāra.gṛdhra.kīṭāhi.kāka.jaiḥ |
AHS6.7.033c/ tuṇḍaiḥ pakṣaiḥ purīṣaiś ca dhūpam asya prayojayet || 33 || [Note: AHS6.7.033v/ 7.33dv dhūmam asya prayojayet 7.33dv dhūpam asmai prayojayet]
AHS6.7.034a/ śīlayet taila.laśunaṁ payasā vā śatāvarīm |
AHS6.7.034c/ brāhmī.rasaṁ kuṣṭha.rasaṁ vacāṁ vā madhu.saṁyutām || 34 ||
AHS6.7.035a/ samaṁ kruddhair apasmāro doṣaiḥ śārīra.mānasaiḥ |
AHS6.7.035c/ yaj jāyate yataś caiṣa mahā.marma.samāśrayaḥ || 35 ||
AHS6.7.036a/ tasmād rasāyanair enaṁ duś.cikitsyam upācaret |
AHS6.7.036c/ tad.ārtaṁ cāgni.toyāder viṣamāt pālayet sadā || 36 || [Note: AHS6.7.036v/ 7.36av tasmād rasāyanenainaṁ 7.36cv tad.ārtaṁ cāgni.toyādi. 7.36dv .viṣamāt pālayet sadā]
AHS6.7.037a/ muktaṁ mano.vikāreṇa tvam itthaṁ kṛta.vān iti |
AHS6.7.037c/ na brūyād viṣayair iṣṭaiḥ kliṣṭaṁ ceto 'sya bṛṁhayet || 37 ||

6.8. Chapter 8 :: Athavartmarogavijñānīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 472-474]
AHS6.8.001a/ sarva.roga.nidānoktair a.hitaiḥ kupitā malāḥ |
AHS6.8.001c/ a.cakṣuṣyair viśeṣeṇa prāyaḥ pittānusāriṇaḥ || 1 ||
AHS6.8.002a/ sirābhir ūrdhvaṁ prasṛtā netrāvayavam āśritāḥ |
AHS6.8.002c/ vartma sandhiṁ sitaṁ kṛṣṇaṁ dṛṣṭiṁ vā sarvam akṣi vā || 2 ||
AHS6.8.003a/ rogān kuryuś calas tatra prāpya vartmāśrayāḥ sirāḥ |
AHS6.8.003c/ suptotthitasya kurute vartma.stambhaṁ sa.vedanam || 3 ||
AHS6.8.004a/ pāṁsu.pūrṇābha.netra.tvaṁ kṛcchronmīlanam aśru ca |
AHS6.8.004c/ vimardanāt syāc ca śamaḥ kṛcchronmūlaṁ vadanti tat || 4 ||
AHS6.8.005a/ cālayan vartmanī vāyur nimeṣonmeṣaṇaṁ muhuḥ |
AHS6.8.005c/ karoty a.ruṅ nimeṣo 'sau vartma yat tu nimīlyate || 5 ||
[Page 582 ]
AHS6.8.006a/ vimukta.sandhi niś.ceṣṭaṁ hīnaṁ vāta.hataṁ hi tat |
AHS6.8.006c/ kṛṣṇāḥ pittena bahvyo 'ntar.vartma kumbhīka.bīja.vat || 6 || [Note: AHS6.8.006v/ 8.6cv pittena vartmano 'ntar.jā 8.6dv bahvyaḥ kumbhīka.bīja.vat]
AHS6.8.007a/ ādhmāyante punar bhinnāḥ piṭikāḥ kumbhi.sañjñitāḥ |
AHS6.8.007c/ sa.dāha.kleda.nistodaṁ raktābhaṁ sparśanā.kṣamam || 7 || [Note: AHS6.8.007v/ 8.7bv piṭikāḥ kumbhi.sañjñakāḥ]
AHS6.8.008a/ pittena jāyate vartma pittotkliṣṭam uśanti tat |
AHS6.8.008c/ karoti kaṇḍūṁ dāhaṁ ca pittaṁ pakṣṁāntam āsthitam || 8 || [Note: AHS6.8.008v/ 8.8dv pittaṁ pakṣṁāntam āśritam]
AHS6.8.009a/ pakṣmaṇāṁ śātanaṁ cānu pakṣma.śātaṁ vadanti tam |
AHS6.8.009c/ pothakyaḥ piṭikāḥ śvetāḥ sarṣapābhā ghanāḥ kaphāt || 9 || [Note: AHS6.8.009v/ 8.9av pakṣmaṇāṁ śatanaṁ cānu 8.9av pakṣmaṇāṁ sadanaṁ cānu]
AHS6.8.010a/ śophopadeha.ruk.kaṇḍū.picchilāśru.samanvitāḥ |
AHS6.8.010c/ kaphotkliṣṭaṁ bhaved vartma stambha.kledopadeha.vat || 10 ||
AHS6.8.011a/ granthiḥ pāṇḍura.ruk.pākaḥ kaṇḍū.mān kaṭhinaḥ kaphāt |
AHS6.8.011c/ kola.mātraḥ sa lagaṇaḥ kiñ.cid alpas tato 'tha.vā || 11 || [Note: AHS6.8.011v/ 8.11dv kiñ.cid alpas tato 'pi vā]
AHS6.8.012a/ raktā raktena piṭikā tat.tulya.piṭikācitā |
AHS6.8.012c/ utsaṅgākhyā tathotkliṣṭaṁ rājī.mat sparśanā.kṣamam || 12 || [Note: AHS6.8.012v/ 8.12av raktā raktena piṭikās 8.12bv tat.tulya.piṭikācitāḥ 8.12cv utsaṅgākhyās tathotkliṣṭaṁ]
AHS6.8.013a/ arśo 'dhi.māṁsaṁ vartmāntaḥ stabdhaṁ snigdhaṁ sa.dāha.ruk |
AHS6.8.013c/ raktaṁ raktena tat.srāvi cchinnaṁ chinnaṁ ca vardhate || 13 ||
AHS6.8.014a/ madhye vā vartmano 'nte vā kaṇḍūṣā.rug.vatī sthirā |
AHS6.8.014c/ mudga.mātrāsṛjā tāmrā piṭikāñjana.nāmikā || 14 ||
AHS6.8.015a/ doṣair vartma bahiḥ śūnaṁ yad antaḥ sūkṣma.khācitam |
AHS6.8.015c/ sa.srāvam antar.udakaṁ bisābhaṁ bisa.vartma tat || 15 ||
[Page 583 ]
AHS6.8.016a/ yad vartmotkliṣṭam utkliṣṭam a.kasmān mlāna.tām iyāt |
AHS6.8.016c/ rakta.doṣa.trayotkleśād bhavaty utkliṣṭa.vartma tat || 16 || [Note: AHS6.8.016v/ 8.16dv vadanty utkliṣṭa.vartma tat]
AHS6.8.017a/ śyāva.vartma malaiḥ sāsraiḥ śyāvaṁ ruk.kleda.śopha.vat |
AHS6.8.017c/ śliṣṭākhyaṁ vartmanī śliṣṭe kaṇḍū.śvayathu.rāgiṇī || 17 ||
AHS6.8.018a/ vartmano 'ntaḥ kharā rūkṣāḥ piṭikāḥ sikatopamāḥ |
AHS6.8.018c/ sikatā.vartma kṛṣṇaṁ tu kardamaṁ kardamopamam || 18 ||
AHS6.8.019a/ bahalaṁ bahalair māṁsaiḥ sa.varṇaiś cīyate samaiḥ |
AHS6.8.019c/ kukūṇakaḥ śiśor eva dantotpatti.nimitta.jaḥ || 19 ||
AHS6.8.020a/ syāt tena śiśur ucchūna.tāmrākṣo vīkṣaṇā.kṣamaḥ |
AHS6.8.020c/ sa.vartma.śūla.paicchilyaḥ karṇa.nāsākṣi.mardanaḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS6.8.020v/ 8.20bv .tāmrākṣo vīkṣaṇe '.kṣamaḥ]
AHS6.8.021a/ pakṣmoparodhe saṅkoco vartmanāṁ jāyate tathā |
AHS6.8.021c/ khara.tāntar.mukha.tvaṁ ca romṇām anyāni vā punaḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS6.8.021v/ 8.21bv vartmano jāyate tathā]
AHS6.8.022a/ kaṇṭakair iva tīkṣṇāgrair ghṛṣṭaṁ tair akṣi śūyate |
AHS6.8.022c/ uṣyate cānilādi.dviḍ alpāhaḥ śāntir uddhṛtaiḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS6.8.022v/ 8.22bv ghṛṣṭaṁ tair akṣi sūyate 8.22cv uṣyate vānilādi.dviḍ 8.22cv uṣyate cānilādyaiś ca 8.22dv alpāhaṁ śāntir uddhṛtaiḥ]
AHS6.8.023a/ kanīnake bahir.vartma kaṭhino granthir unnataḥ |
AHS6.8.023c/ tāmraḥ pakvo 'sra.pūya.srud alajy ādhmāyate muhuḥ || 23 ||
AHS6.8.024a/ vartmāntar māṁsa.piṇḍābhaḥ śvayathur grathito '.rujaḥ |
AHS6.8.024c/ sāsraiḥ syād arbudo doṣair viṣamo bāhyataś calaḥ || 24 ||
AHS6.8.025a/ catur.viṁśatir ity ete vyādhayo vartma.saṁśrayāḥ |
AHS6.8.025c/ ādyo 'tra bheṣajaiḥ sādhyo dvau tato 'rśaś ca varyajet || 25 ||
[Page 584 ]
AHS6.8.026a/ pakṣmoparodho yāpyaḥ syāc cheṣāñ chastreṇa sādhayet |
AHS6.8.026c/ kuṭṭayet pakṣma.sadanaṁ chindyāt teṣv api cārbudam || 26 || [Note: AHS6.8.026v/ 8.26cv kuṭṭayet pakṣma.śadanaṁ]
AHS6.8.027a/ bhindyāl lagaṇa.kumbhīkā.bisotsaṅgāñjanālajīḥ |
AHS6.8.027c/ pothakī.śyāva.sikatā.śliṣṭotkliṣṭa.catuṣṭayam || 27 ||
AHS6.8.027ū̆ab/ sa.kardamaṁ sa.bahalaṁ vilikhet sa.kukūṇakam || 27ū̆ab ||

6.9. Chapter 9 :: Athavartmarogapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 474-476]
AHS6.9.001a/ kṛcchronmīle purāṇājyaṁ drākṣā.kalkāmbu.sādhitam |
AHS6.9.001c/ sa.sitaṁ yojayet snigdhaṁ nasya.dhūmāñjanādi ca || 1 ||
AHS6.9.002a/ kumbhīkā.vartma.likhitaṁ saindhava.pratisāritam |
AHS6.9.002c/ yaṣṭī.dhātrī.paṭolīnāṁ kvāthena pariṣecayet || 2 ||
AHS6.9.003a/ nivāte 'dhiṣṭhitasyāptaiḥ śuddhasyottāna.śāyinaḥ |
AHS6.9.003c/ bahiḥ koṣṇāmbu.taptena sveditaṁ vartma vāsasā || 3 ||
AHS6.9.004a/ nirbhujya vastrāntaritaṁ vāmāṅguṣṭhāṅgulī.ghṛtam |
AHS6.9.004c/ na sraṁsate calati vā vartmaivaṁ sarvatas tataḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS6.9.004v/ 9.4cv na sraṁsate na calati]
AHS6.9.005a/ maṇḍalāgreṇa tat tiryak kṛtvā śastra.padāṅkitam |
AHS6.9.005c/ likhet tenaiva pattrair vā śāka.śephālikādi.jaiḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS6.9.005v/ 9.5dv śāka.śephālikādikaiḥ 9.5dv śāka.śephālikādibhiḥ]
AHS6.9.006a/ phenena toya.rāśer vā picunā pramṛjann asṛk |
AHS6.9.006c/ sthite rakte su.likhitaṁ sa.kṣaudraiḥ pratisārayet || 6 ||
AHS6.9.007a/ yathā.svam uktair anu ca prakṣālyoṣṇena vāriṇā |
AHS6.9.007c/ ghṛtena siktam abhyaktaṁ badhnīyān madhu.sarpiṣā || 7 || [Note: AHS6.9.007v/ 9.7cv ghṛtenāsiktam abhyaktaṁ]
[Page 585 ]
AHS6.9.008a/ ūrdhvādhaḥ karṇayor dattvā piṇḍīṁ ca yava.saktubhiḥ |
AHS6.9.008c/ dvitīye 'hani muktasya pariṣekaṁ yathā.yatham || 8 ||
AHS6.9.009a/ kuryāc caturthe nasyādīn muñced evāhni pañcame |
AHS6.9.009c/ samaṁ nakha.nibhaṁ śopha.kaṇḍū.gharṣādya.pīḍitam || 9 ||
AHS6.9.010a/ vidyāt su.likhitaṁ vartma likhed bhūyo viparyaye |
AHS6.9.010c/ ruk.pakṣma.vartma.sadana.sraṁsanāny ati.lekhanāt || 10 ||
AHS6.9.011a/ sneha.svedādikas tasminn iṣṭo vāta.haraḥ kramaḥ |
AHS6.9.011c/ abhyajya nava.nītena śveta.lodhraṁ pralepayet || 11 ||
AHS6.9.012a/ eraṇḍa.mūla.kalkena puṭa.pāke pacet tataḥ |
AHS6.9.012c/ svinnaṁ prakṣālitaṁ śuṣkaṁ cūrṇitaṁ poṭalī.kṛtam || 12 ||
AHS6.9.013a/ striyāḥ kṣīre chagalyā vā mṛditaṁ netra.secanam |
AHS6.9.013c/ śāli.taṇḍula.kalkena liptaṁ tad.vat pariṣkṛtam || 13 || [Note: AHS6.9.013v/ 9.13av striyāḥ kṣīre chāgale vā]
AHS6.9.014a/ kuryān netre 'ti.likhite mṛditaṁ dadhi.mastunā |
AHS6.9.014c/ kevalenāpi vā sekaṁ mastunā jāṅgalāśinaḥ || 14 ||
AHS6.9.015a/ piṭikā vrīhi.vaktreṇa bhittvā tu kaṭhinonnatāḥ |
AHS6.9.015c/ niṣpīḍayed anu vidhiḥ pariśeṣas tu pūrva.vat || 15 || [Note: AHS6.9.015v/ 9.15av piṭikāṁ vrīhi.vaktreṇa 9.15bv bhittvā tu kaṭhinonnatām]
AHS6.9.016a/ lekhane bhedane cāyaṁ kramaḥ sarva.tra vartmani |
AHS6.9.016c/ pittāsrotkliṣṭayoḥ svādu.skandha.siddhena sarpiṣā || 16 ||
AHS6.9.017a/ sirā.vimokṣaḥ snigdhasya trivṛc chreṣṭhaṁ virecanam |
AHS6.9.017c/ likhite sruta.rakte ca vartmani kṣālanaṁ hitam || 17 || [Note: AHS6.9.017v/ 9.17bv trivṛc chreṣṭhā virecane 9.17cv likhite niḥsṛte rakte]
[Page 586 ]
AHS6.9.018a/ yaṣṭī.kaṣāyaḥ sekas tu kṣīraṁ candana.sādhitam |
AHS6.9.018c/ pakṣmaṇāṁ sadane sūcyā roma.kūpān vikuṭṭayet || 18 || [Note: AHS6.9.018v/ 9.18av yaṣṭī.kvāthena sekas tu]
AHS6.9.019a/ grāhayed vā jalaukobhiḥ payasekṣu.rasena vā |
AHS6.9.019c/ vamanaṁ nāvanaṁ sarpiḥ śṛtaṁ madhura.śītalaiḥ || 19 ||
AHS6.9.020a/ sañcūrṇya puṣpa.kāsīsaṁ bhāvayet surasā.rasaiḥ |
AHS6.9.020c/ tāmre daśāhaṁ paramaṁ pakṣma.śāte tad añjanam || 20 ||
AHS6.9.021a/ pothakīr likhitāḥ śuṇṭhī.saindhava.pratisāritāḥ |
AHS6.9.021c/ uṣṇāmbu.kṣālitāḥ siñcet khadirāḍhaki.śigrubhiḥ || 21 || [Note: AHS6.9.021v/ 9.21av pothakīṁ likhitaṁ śuṇṭhī. 9.21bv .saindhava.pratisāritām 9.21cv uṣṇāmbu.kṣālitāṁ siñcet]
AHS6.9.022a/ ap.siddhair dvi.niṣā.śreṣṭhā.madhukair vā sa.mākṣikaiḥ |
AHS6.9.022c/ kaphotkliṣṭe vilikhite sa.kṣaudraiḥ pratisāraṇam || 22 ||
AHS6.9.023a/ sūkṣmaiḥ saindhava.kāsīsa.manohvā.kaṇa.tārkṣya.jaiḥ |
AHS6.9.023c/ vamanāñjana.nasyādi sarvaṁ ca kapha.jid dhitam || 23 ||
AHS6.9.024a/ kartavyaṁ lagaṇe 'py etad a.śāntāv agninā dahet |
AHS6.9.024c/ kukūṇe khadira.śreṣṭhā.nimba.pattra.śṛtaṁ ghṛtam || 24 || [Note: AHS6.9.024v/ 9.24dv .nimba.pattraiḥ śṛtaṁ ghṛtam]
AHS6.9.024.1+(1)a/ svinnāṁ bhittvā viniṣpīḍya bhiṣag añjana.nāmikām |
AHS6.9.024.1+(1)c/ śilailā.saindhava.nataiḥ sa.kṣaudraiḥ pratisārayet || 24.1+(1) || [Note: AHS6.9.024.1+(1)v/ 9.24.1+(1)av svinnāṁ bhittvā viniṣpīḍyotṁ 9.24.1+(1)bv ṁsaṅgāṁ cāñjana.nāmikām]
AHS6.9.025a/ pītvā dhātrī vamet kṛṣṇā.yaṣṭī.sarṣapa.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS6.9.025c/ abhayā.pippalī.drākṣā.kvāthenaināṁ virecayet || 25 ||
AHS6.9.026a/ mustā.dvi.rajanī.kṛṣṇā.kalkenālepayet stanau |
AHS6.9.026c/ dhūpayet sarṣapaiḥ sājyaiḥ śuddhāṁ kvāthaṁ ca pāyayet || 26 ||
[Page 587 ]
AHS6.9.027a/ paṭola.musta.mṛdvīkā.guḍūcī.tri.phalodbhavam |
AHS6.9.027c/ śiśos tu likhitaṁ vartma srutāsṛg vāmbu.janmabhiḥ || 27 ||
AHS6.9.028a/ dhātry.aśmantaka.jambūttha.pattra.kvāthena secayet |
AHS6.9.028c/ prāyaḥ kṣīra.ghṛtāśi.tvād bālānāṁ śleṣma.jā gadāḥ || 28 ||
AHS6.9.029a/ tasmād vamanam evāgre sarva.vyādhiṣu pūjitam |
AHS6.9.029c/ sindhūttha.kṛṣṇāpāmārga.bījājya.stanya.mākṣikam || 29 ||
AHS6.9.030a/ cūrṇo vacāyāḥ sa.kṣaudro madanaṁ madhukānvitam |
AHS6.9.030c/ kṣīraṁ kṣīrānnam annaṁ ca bhajataḥ kramataḥ śiśoḥ || 30 || [Note: AHS6.9.030v/ 9.30dv bhajataḥ krama.śaḥ śiśoḥ]
AHS6.9.031a/ vamanaṁ sarva.rogeṣu viśeṣeṇa kukūṇake |
AHS6.9.031c/ saptalā.rasa.siddhājyaṁ yojyaṁ cobhaya.śodhanam || 31 ||
AHS6.9.032a/ dvi.niśā.lodhra.yaṣṭy.āhva.rohiṇī.nimba.pallavaiḥ |
AHS6.9.032c/ kukūṇake hitā vartiḥ piṣṭais tāmra.rajo.'nvitaiḥ || 32 ||
AHS6.9.033a/ kṣīra.kṣaudra.ghṛtopetaṁ dagdhaṁ vā loha.jaṁ rajaḥ |
AHS6.9.033c/ elā.laśuna.kataka.śaṅkhoṣaṇa.phaṇijjakaiḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS6.9.033v/ 9.33bv dagdhaṁ vā lodhra.jaṁ rajaḥ]
AHS6.9.034a/ vartiḥ kukūṇa.pothakyoḥ surā.piṣṭaiḥ sa.kaṭphalaiḥ |
AHS6.9.034c/ pakṣma.rodhe pravṛddheṣu śuddha.dehasya romasu || 34 ||
AHS6.9.035a/ utsṛjya dvau bhruvo 'dhas.tād bhāgau bhāgaṁ ca pakṣmataḥ |
AHS6.9.035c/ yava.mātraṁ yavākāraṁ tiryak chittvārdra.vāsasā || 35 ||
AHS6.9.036a/ apaneyam asṛk tasminn alpī.bhavati śoṇite |
AHS6.9.036c/ sīvyet kuṭilayā sūcyā mudga.mātrāntaraiḥ padaiḥ || 36 ||
[Page 588 ]
AHS6.9.037a/ baddhvā lalāṭe paṭṭaṁ ca tatra sīvana.sūtrakam |
AHS6.9.037c/ nāti.gāḍha.ślathaṁ sūcyā nikṣiped atha yojayet || 37 ||
AHS6.9.038a/ madhu.sarpiḥ.kavalikāṁ na cāsmin bandham ācaret |
AHS6.9.038c/ nyagrodhādi.kaṣāyaiś ca sa.kṣīraiḥ secayed ruji || 38 ||
AHS6.9.039a/ pañcame divase sūtram apanīyāvacūrṇayet |
AHS6.9.039c/ gairikeṇa vraṇaṁ yuñjyāt tīkṣṇaṁ nasyāñjanādi ca || 39 || [Note: AHS6.9.039v/ 9.39dv tīkṣṇa.nasyāñjanādi ca 9.39dv tīkṣṇa.nasyāñjanāni ca 9.39dv tīkṣṇaṁ nasyāñjanāni ca]
AHS6.9.040a/ dahed a.śāntau nirbhujya vartma.doṣāśrayāṁ valīm |
AHS6.9.040c/ sandaṁśenādhikaṁ pakṣma hṛtvā tasyāśrayaṁ dahet || 40 ||
AHS6.9.041a/ sūcy.agreṇāgni.varṇena dāho bāhyālajeḥ punaḥ |
AHS6.9.041c/ bhinnasya kṣāra.vahnibhyāṁ su.cchinnasyārbudasya ca || 41 ||

6.10. Chapter 10 :: Athasandhisitāsitarogavijñānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 476-479]
AHS6.10.001a/ vāyuḥ kruddhaḥ sirāḥ prāpya jalābhaṁ jala.vāhinīḥ |
AHS6.10.001c/ aśru srāvayate vartma.śukla.sandheḥ kanīnakāt || 1 || [Note: AHS6.10.001v/ 10.1dv .śukla.sandhi.kanīnikāt]
AHS6.10.002a/ tena netraṁ sa.rug.rāga.śophaṁ syāt sa jalāsravaḥ |
AHS6.10.002c/ kaphāt kaphāsrave śvetaṁ picchilaṁ bahalaṁ sravet || 2 || [Note: AHS6.10.002v/ 10.2cv kaphāt kapha.śrave śvetaṁ 10.2cv kaphāt kapha.srave śvetaṁ]
AHS6.10.003a/ kaphena śophas tīkṣṇāgraḥ kṣāra.budbudakopamaḥ |
AHS6.10.003c/ pṛthu.mūla.balaḥ snigdhaḥ sa.varṇo mṛdu.picchilaḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS6.10.003v/ 10.3dv sa.varṇa.mṛdu.picchilaḥ]
AHS6.10.004a/ mahān a.pākaḥ kaṇḍū.mān upanāhaḥ sa nī.rujaḥ |
