AHS6.10.004c/ raktād raktāsrāve tāmraṁ bahūṣṇaṁ cāśru saṁsravet || 4 || [Note: AHS6.10.004v/ 10.4cv raktād rakta.srave tāmraṁ 10.4cv raktād raktaṁ sravet tāmraṁ 10.4dv bahūṣṇaṁ vāśru saṁsravet]
AHS6.10.005a/ vartma.sandhy.āśrayā śukle piṭikā dāha.śūlinī |
AHS6.10.005c/ tāmrā mudgopamā bhinnā raktaṁ sravati parvaṇī || 5 ||
[Page 589 ]
AHS6.10.006a/ pūyāsrave malāḥ sāsrā vartma.sandheḥ kanīnakāt |
AHS6.10.006c/ srāvayanti muhuḥ pūyaṁ sāsraṁ tvaṅ.māṁsa.pākataḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS6.10.006v/ 10.6bv vartma.sandhi.kanīnakāt 10.6dv sāsra.tvaṅ.māṁsa.pākataḥ 10.6dv sāśru.tvaṅ.māṁsa.pākataḥ]
AHS6.10.007a/ pūyālaso vraṇaḥ sūkṣmaḥ śopha.saṁrambha.pūrvakaḥ |
AHS6.10.007c/ kanīna.sandhāv ādhmāyī pūyāsrāvī sa.vedanaḥ || 7 ||
AHS6.10.008a/ kanīnasyāntar alajī śopho ruk.toda.dāha.vān |
AHS6.10.008c/ apāṅge vā kanīne vā kaṇḍūṣā.pakṣma.poṭa.vān || 8 ||
AHS6.10.009a/ pūyāsrāvī kṛmi.granthir granthiḥ kṛmi.yuto 'rti.mān |
AHS6.10.009c/ upanāha.kṛmi.granthi.pūyālasaka.parvaṇīḥ || 9 ||
AHS6.10.010a/ śastreṇa sādhayet pañca sālajīn āsravāṁs tyajet |
AHS6.10.010c/ pittaṁ kuryāt site bindūn asita.śyāva.pītakān || 10 ||
AHS6.10.011a/ malāktādarśa.tulyaṁ vā sarvaṁ śuklaṁ sa.dāha.ruk |
AHS6.10.011c/ rogo 'yaṁ śuktikā.sañjñaḥ sa.śakṛd.bheda.tṛḍ.jvaraḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS6.10.011v/ 10.11bv sarvaṁ śuklam a.dāha.ruk]
AHS6.10.012a/ kaphāc chukle samaṁ śvetaṁ cira.vṛddhy.adhi.māṁsakam |
AHS6.10.012c/ śuklārma śophas tv a.rujaḥ sa.varṇo bahalo '.mṛduḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.10.013a/ guruḥ snigdho 'mbu.bindv.ābho balāsa.grathitaṁ smṛtaṁ |
AHS6.10.013c/ bindubhiḥ piṣṭa.dhavalair utsannaiḥ piṣṭakaṁ vadet || 13 || [Note: AHS6.10.013v/ 10.13dv balāsa.granthi sa smṛtaḥ]
AHS6.10.014a/ rakta.rājī.tataṁ śuklam uṣyate yat sa.vedanam |
AHS6.10.014c/ a.śophāśrūpadehaṁ ca sirotpātaḥ sa śoṇitāt || 14 || [Note: AHS6.10.014v/ 10.14cv sa.śothāśrūpadehaṁ ca]
AHS6.10.015a/ upekṣitah sirotpāto rājīs tā eva vardhayan |
AHS6.10.015c/ kuryāt sāsraṁ sirā.harṣaṁ tenākṣy.udvīkṣaṇā.kṣamam || 15 || [Note: AHS6.10.015v/ 10.15cv kuryāt sāśruṁ sirā.harṣaṁ 10.15dv tenākṣaṁ vīkṣaṇā.kṣamam]
[Page 590 ]
AHS6.10.016a/ sirā.jāle sirā.jālaṁ bṛhad raktaṁ ghanonnatam |
AHS6.10.016c/ śoṇitārma samaṁ ślakṣṇaṁ padmābham adhi.māṁsakam || 16 ||
AHS6.10.017a/ nī.ruk ślakṣṇo 'rjunaṁ binduḥ śaśa.lohita.lohitaḥ |
AHS6.10.017c/ mṛdv.āśu.vṛddhy.a.ruṅ.māṁsaṁ prastāri śyāva.lohitam || 17 ||
AHS6.10.018a/ prastāry.arma malaiḥ sāsraiḥ snāvārma snāva.sannibham |
AHS6.10.018c/ śuṣkāsṛk.piṇḍa.vac chyāvaṁ yan māṁsaṁ bahalaṁ pṛthu || 18 ||
AHS6.10.019a/ adhi.māṁsārma tad dāha.gharṣa.vatyaḥ sirāvṛtāḥ |
AHS6.10.019c/ kṛṣṇāsannāḥ sirā.sañjñāḥ piṭikāḥ sarṣapopamāḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS6.10.019v/ 10.19av adhi.māṁsārma rug.dāha.]
AHS6.10.020a/ śukti.harṣa.sirotpāta.piṣṭaka.grathitārjunam |
AHS6.10.020c/ sādhayed auṣadhaiḥ ṣaṭkaṁ śeṣaṁ śastreṇa saptakam || 20 || [Note: AHS6.10.020v/ 10.20av śukti.harṣa.sirotpātān 10.20bv piṣṭaka.grathitārjunam]
AHS6.10.021a/ navotthaṁ tad api dravyair armoktaṁ yac ca pañca.dhā |
AHS6.10.021c/ tac chedyam asita.prāptaṁ māṁsa.snāva.sirāvṛtam || 21 || [Note: AHS6.10.021v/ 10.21bv armoktaṁ yat tu pañca.dhā]
AHS6.10.022a/ carmoddāla.vad ucchrāyi dṛṣṭi.prāptaṁ ca varjayet |
AHS6.10.022c/ pittaṁ kṛṣṇe 'tha.vā dṛṣṭau śukraṁ todāśru.rāga.vat || 22 || [Note: AHS6.10.022v/ 10.22bv dṛṣṭi.prāptaṁ tu varjayet 10.22dv śukraṁ todāsra.rāga.vat]
AHS6.10.023a/ chittvā tvacaṁ janayati tena syāt kṛṣṇa.maṇḍalam |
AHS6.10.023c/ pakva.jambū.nibhaṁ kiñ.cin nimnaṁ ca kṣata.śukrakam || 23 ||
AHS6.10.024a/ tat kṛcchra.sādhyaṁ yāpyaṁ tu dvitīya.paṭala.vyadhāt |
AHS6.10.024c/ tatra todādi.bāhulyaṁ sūcī.viddhābha.kṛṣṇa.tā || 24 ||
AHS6.10.025a/ tṛtīya.paṭala.cchedād a.sādhyaṁ nicitaṁ vraṇaiḥ |
AHS6.10.025c/ śaṅkha.śuklaṁ kaphāt sādhyaṁ nāti.ruk śuddha.śukrakam || 25 ||
[Page 591 ]
AHS6.10.026a/ ā.tāmra.picchilāsra.srud ā.tāmra.piṭikāti.ruk |
AHS6.10.026c/ ajā.viṭ.sadṛśocchrāya.kārṣṇyā varjyāsṛjājakā || 26 || [Note: AHS6.10.026v/ 10.26av ā.tāmra.picchilāśruḥ syād 10.26av ā.tāmra.picchilāsṛk syād 10.26cv ajā.viṭ.sadṛśocchrāyā 10.26dv kṛṣṇā varjyāsṛjājakā]
AHS6.10.027a/ sirā.śukraṁ malaiḥ sāsrais taj.juṣṭaṁ kṛṣṇa.maṇḍalam |
AHS6.10.027c/ sa.toda.dāha.tāmrābhiḥ sirābhir avatanyate || 27 ||
AHS6.10.028a/ a.nimittoṣṇa.śītāccha.ghanāsra.sruc ca tat tyajet |
AHS6.10.028c/ doṣaiḥ sāsraiḥ sakṛt kṛṣṇaṁ nīyate śukla.rūpa.tām || 28 || [Note: AHS6.10.028v/ 10.28bv .ghanāśru syāc ca tat tyajet 10.28bv .ghanāśru.srāvi tat tyajet 10.28bc .ghanāśru.sruc ca tat tyajet 10.28cv doṣaiḥ sāsraiḥ sa.dṛk kṛṣṇaṁ]
AHS6.10.029a/ dhavalābhropaliptābhaṁ niṣpāvārdha.dalākṛti |
AHS6.10.029c/ ati.tīvra.rujā.rāga.dāha.śvayathu.pīḍitam || 29 ||
AHS6.10.030a/ pākātyayena tac chukraṁ varjayet tīvra.vedanam |
AHS6.10.030c/ yasya vā liṅga.nāśo 'ntaḥ śyāvaṁ yad vā sa.lohitam || 30 ||
AHS6.10.031a/ aty.utsedhāvagāḍhaṁ vā sāśru nāḍī.vraṇāvṛtam |
AHS6.10.031c/ purāṇaṁ viṣamaṁ madhye vicchinnaṁ yac ca śukrakam || 31 || [Note: AHS6.10.031v/ 10.31bv sāsra.nāḍī.vraṇāvṛtam]
AHS6.10.031ū̆ab/ pañcety uktā gadāḥ kṛṣṇe sādhyā.sādhya.vibhāgataḥ || 31ū̆ab ||

6.11. Chapter 11 :: Athasandhisitāsitarogapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 479-482]
AHS6.11.001a/ upanāhaṁ bhiṣak svinnaṁ bhinnaṁ vrīhi.mukhena ca |
AHS6.11.001c/ lekhayen maṇḍalāgreṇa tataś ca pratisārayet || 1 || [Note: AHS6.11.001v/ 11.1bv bhinnaṁ vrīhi.mukhena tu]
AHS6.11.002a/ pippalī.kṣaudra.sindhūtthair badhnīyāt pūrva.vat tataḥ |
AHS6.11.002c/ paṭola.pattrāmalaka.kvāthenāścyotayec ca tam || 2 ||
AHS6.11.003a/ parvaṇī baḍiśenāttā bāhya.sandhi.tri.bhāgataḥ |
AHS6.11.003c/ vṛddhi.pattreṇa vardhyārdhe syād aśru.gatir anya.thā || 3 || [Note: AHS6.11.003v/ 11.3av parvaṇī baḍiśenāntar. 11.3bv .bāhya.sandhi.tri.bhāgataḥ 11.3dv syād asra.gatir anya.thā 11.3dv syād asra.srutir anya.thā]
[Page 592 ]
AHS6.11.004a/ cikitsā cārma.vat kṣaudra.saindhava.pratisāritā |
AHS6.11.004c/ pūyālase sirāṁ vidhyet tatas tam upanāhayet || 4 || [Note: AHS6.11.004v/ 11.4dv tatas tad upanāhayet]
AHS6.11.005a/ kurvīta cākṣi.pākoktaṁ sarvaṁ karma yathā.vidhi |
AHS6.11.005c/ saindhavārdraka.kāsīsa.loha.tāmraiḥ su.cūrṇitaiḥ || 5 ||
AHS6.11.006a/ cūrṇāñjanaṁ prayuñjīta sa.kṣaudrair vā rasa.kriyām |
AHS6.11.006c/ kṛmi.granthiṁ karīṣeṇa svinnaṁ bhittvā vilikhya ca || 6 ||
AHS6.11.007a/ tri.phalā.kṣaudra.kāsīsa.saindhavaiḥ pratisārayet |
AHS6.11.007c/ pittābhiṣyanda.vac chuktiṁ balāsāhvaya.piṣṭake || 7 || [Note: AHS6.11.007v/ 11.7dv balāsāhvaya.piṣṭakau]
AHS6.11.008a/ kaphābhiṣyanda.van muktvā sirā.vyadham upācaret |
AHS6.11.008c/ bījapūra.rasāktaṁ ca vyoṣa.kaṭphalam añjanam || 8 ||
AHS6.11.009a/ jātī.mukula.sindhūttha.devadāru.mahauṣadhaiḥ |
AHS6.11.009c/ piṣṭaiḥ prasannayā vartiḥ śopha.kaṇḍū.ghnam añjanam || 9 || [Note: AHS6.11.009v/ 11.9dv śopha.kaṇḍū.ghnam auṣadham]
AHS6.11.010a/ rakta.syanda.vad utpāta.harṣa.jālārjuna.kriyā |
AHS6.11.010c/ sirotpāte viśeṣeṇa ghṛta.mākṣikam añjanam || 10 ||
AHS6.11.011a/ sirā.harṣe tu madhunā ślakṣṇa.ghṛṣṭaṁ rasāñjanam |
AHS6.11.011c/ arjune śarkarā.mastu.kṣaudrair āścyotanaṁ hitam || 11 ||
AHS6.11.012a/ sphaṭikaḥ kuṅkumaṁ śaṅkho madhukaṁ madhunāñjanam |
AHS6.11.012c/ madhunā cāñjanaṁ śaṅkhaḥ pheno vā sitayā saha || 12 || [Note: AHS6.11.012v/ 11.12av sphaṭikaṁ kuṅkumaṁ śaṅkhaṁ 11.12bv kāsīsaṁ madhunāñjanam]
AHS6.11.013a/ armoktaṁ pañca.dhā tatra tanu dhūmāvilaṁ ca yat |
AHS6.11.013c/ raktaṁ dadhi.nibhaṁ yac ca śukra.vat tasya bheṣajam || 13 ||
[Page 593 ]
AHS6.11.014a/ uttānasyetarat svinnaṁ sa.sindhūtthena cāñjitam |
AHS6.11.014c/ rasena bījapūrasya nimīlyākṣi vimardayet || 14 ||
AHS6.11.015a/ itthaṁ saṁroṣitākṣasya pracale 'rmādhi.māṁsake |
AHS6.11.015c/ ghṛtasya niś.calaṁ mūrdhni vartmanoś ca viśeṣataḥ || 15 || [Note: AHS6.11.015v/ 11.15bv prabale 'rmādhi.māṁsake]
AHS6.11.016a/ apāṅgam īkṣamāṇasya vṛddhe 'rmaṇi kanīnakāt |
AHS6.11.016c/ valī syād yatra tatrārma baḍiśenāvalambitam || 16 ||
AHS6.11.017a/ nāty.āyataṁ mucuṇḍyā vā sūcyā sūtreṇa vā tataḥ |
AHS6.11.017c/ samantān maṇḍalāgreṇa mocayed atha mokṣitam || 17 || [Note: AHS6.11.017v/ 11.17av nāty.āyataṁ samutpāṭya]
AHS6.11.018a/ kanīnakam upānīya catur.bhāgāvaśeṣitam |
AHS6.11.018c/ chindyāt kanīnakaṁ rakṣed vāhinīś cāśru.vāhinīḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS6.11.018v/ 11.18cv chindyāt kanīnakaṁ rakṣan 11.18cv chindyāt kanīnakaṁ rakṣye]
AHS6.11.019a/ kanīnaka.vyadhād aśru nāḍī cākṣṇi pravartate |
AHS6.11.019c/ vṛddhe 'rmaṇi tathāpāṅgāt paśyato 'sya kanīnakam || 19 || [Note: AHS6.11.019v/ 11.19av kanīnaka.vadhād aśru 11.19av kanīnaka.vadhād āśu 11.19av kanīnaka.vyadhād a.sru. 11.19bv .nāḍī cākṣṇi pravartate]
AHS6.11.020a/ samyak.chinnaṁ madhu.vyoṣa.saindhava.pratisāritam |
AHS6.11.020c/ uṣṇena sarpiṣā siktam abhyaktaṁ madhu.sarpiṣā || 20 ||
AHS6.11.021a/ badhnīyāt secayen muktvā tṛtīyādi.dineṣu ca |
AHS6.11.021c/ karañja.bīja.siddhena kṣīreṇa kvathitais tathā || 21 ||
AHS6.11.022a/ sa.kṣaudrair dvi.niśā.lodhra.paṭolī.yaṣṭi.kiṁśukaiḥ |
AHS6.11.022c/ kuraṇṭa.mukulopetair muñced evāhni saptame || 22 || [Note: AHS6.11.022v/ 11.22cv koraṇṭa.mukulopetair]
AHS6.11.023a/ samyak.chinne bhavet svāsthyaṁ hīnāti.ccheda.jān gadān |
AHS6.11.023c/ sekāñjana.prabhṛtibhir jayel lekhana.bṛṁhaṇaiḥ || 23 ||
[Page 594 ]
AHS6.11.024a/ sitā.manaḥśilaileya.lavaṇottama.nāgaram |
AHS6.11.024c/ ardha.karṣonmitaṁ tārkṣyaṁ palārdhaṁ ca madhu.drutam || 24 || [Note: AHS6.11.024v/ 11.24dv palārdhaṁ ca madhu.plutam]
AHS6.11.025a/ añjanaṁ śleṣma.timira.pilla.śukrārma.śoṣa.jit |
AHS6.11.025c/ tri.phalaika.tama.dravya.tvacaṁ pānīya.kalkitām || 25 || [Note: AHS6.11.025v/ 11.25bv .pilla.śukrārma.kāca.jit]
AHS6.11.026a/ śarāva.pihitāṁ dagdhvā kapāle cūrṇayet tataḥ |
AHS6.11.026c/ pṛthak.śeṣauṣadha.rasaiḥ pṛthag eva ca bhāvitā || 26 ||
AHS6.11.027a/ sā maṣī śoṣitā peṣyā bhūyo dvi.lavaṇānvitā |
AHS6.11.027c/ trīṇy etāny añjanāny āha lekhanāni paraṁ nimiḥ || 27 ||
AHS6.11.028a/ sirā.jāle sirā yās tu kaṭhinā lekhanauṣadhaiḥ |
AHS6.11.028c/ na sidhyanty arma.vat tāsāṁ piṭikānāṁ ca sādhanam || 28 ||
AHS6.11.029a/ doṣānurodhāc chukreṣu snigdha.rūkṣā varā ghṛtam |
AHS6.11.029c/ tiktam ūrdhvam asṛk.srāvo reka.sekādi ceṣyate || 29 || [Note: AHS6.11.029v/ 11.29av doṣānubandhāc chukreṣu 11.29bv snigdhā rūkṣā varā ghṛtam 11.29bv snigdha.rūkṣa.varā ghṛtam 11.29cv tiktam ūrdhvam asṛk.srāva. 11.29dv .reka.sekādi ceṣyate]
AHS6.11.030a/ tris trivṛd.vāriṇā pakvaṁ kṣata.śukre ghṛtaṁ pibet |
AHS6.11.030c/ sirayānu hared raktaṁ jalaukobhiś ca locanāt || 30 ||
AHS6.11.031a/ siddhenotpala.kākolī.drākṣā.yaṣṭī.vidāribhiḥ |
AHS6.11.031c/ sa.sitenāja.payasā secanaṁ salilena vā || 31 ||
AHS6.11.032a/ rāgāśru.vedanā.śāntau paraṁ lekhanam añjanam |
AHS6.11.032c/ vartayo jāti.mukula.lākṣā.gairika.candanaiḥ || 32 ||
AHS6.11.033a/ prasādayanti pittāsraṁ ghnanti ca kṣata.śukrakam |
AHS6.11.033c/ dantair danti.varāhoṣṭra.gavāśvāja.kharodbhavaiḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS6.11.033v/ 11.33av prasādayanti pittāsṛk 11.33dv .go.rāsabha.samudbhavaiḥ]
[Page 595 ]
AHS6.11.034a/ sa.śaṅkha.mauktikāmbho.dhi.phenair marica.pādikaiḥ |
AHS6.11.034c/ kṣata.śukram api vyāpi danta.vartir nivartayet || 34 ||
AHS6.11.035a/ tamāla.pattraṁ go.danta.śaṅkha.pheno 'sthi gārdabham |
AHS6.11.035c/ tāmraṁ ca vartir mūtreṇa sarva.śukraka.nāśinī || 35 || [Note: AHS6.11.035v/ 11.35cv tāmraṁ ca basta.mūtreṇa]
AHS6.11.036a/ ratnāni dantāḥ śṛṅgāṇi dhātavas try.ūṣaṇaṁ truṭī |
AHS6.11.036c/ karañja.bījaṁ laśuno vraṇa.sādi ca bheṣajam || 36 ||
AHS6.11.037a/ sa.vraṇā.vraṇa.gambhīra.tvak.stha.śukra.ghnam añjanam |
AHS6.11.037c/ nimnam unnamayet sneha.pāna.nasya.rasāñjanaiḥ || 37 ||
AHS6.11.038a/ sa.rujaṁ nī.rujaṁ tṛpti.puṭa.pākena śukrakam |
AHS6.11.038c/ śuddha.śukre niśā.yaṣṭī.śārivā.śābarāmbhasā || 38 || [Note: AHS6.11.038v/ 11.38dv .śārivā.sādhitāmbhasā]
AHS6.11.039a/ secanaṁ lodhra.poṭalyā koṣṇāmbho.magnayātha.vā |
AHS6.11.039c/ bṛhatī.mūla.yaṣṭy.āhva.tāmra.saindhava.nāgaraiḥ || 39 ||
AHS6.11.040a/ dhātrī.phalāmbunā piṣṭair lepitaṁ tāmra.bhājanam |
AHS6.11.040c/ yavājyāmalakī.pattrair bahu.śo dhūpayet tataḥ || 40 ||
AHS6.11.041a/ tatra kurvīta guṭikās tā jala.kṣaudra.peṣitāḥ |
AHS6.11.041c/ mahā.nīlā iti khyātāḥ śuddha.śukra.harāḥ param || 41 ||
AHS6.11.042a/ sthire śukre ghane cāsya bahu.śo 'pahared asṛk |
AHS6.11.042c/ śiraḥ.kāya.virekāṁś ca puṭa.pākāṁś ca bhūri.śaḥ || 42 ||
AHS6.11.043a/ kuryān marica.vaidehī.śirīṣa.phala.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS6.11.043c/ harṣaṇaṁ tri.phalā.kvātha.pītena lavaṇena vā || 43 || [Note: AHS6.11.043v/ 11.43cv gharṣaṇaṁ tri.phalā.kvātha. 11.43cv sarṣapa.tri.phalā.kvātha.]
[Page 596 ]
AHS6.11.044a/ kuryād añjana.yogau vā ślokārdha.gaditāv imau |
AHS6.11.044c/ śaṅkha.kolāsthi.kataka.drākṣā.madhuka.mākṣikaiḥ || 44 ||
AHS6.11.045a/ surā.dantārṇava.malaiḥ śirīṣa.kusumānvitaiḥ |
AHS6.11.045c/ dhātrī.phaṇijjaka.rase kṣāro lāṅgalikodbhavaḥ || 45 || [Note: AHS6.11.045v/ 11.45av khara.dantārṇava.malaiḥ 11.45dv kṣāro lāṅgalikā.bhavaḥ 11.45dv kṣāro lāṅgalikī.bhavaḥ]
AHS6.11.046a/ uṣitaḥ śoṣitaś cūrṇaḥ śukra.harṣaṇam añjanam |
AHS6.11.046c/ mudgā vā nis.tuṣāḥ piṣṭāḥ śaṅkha.kṣaudra.samāyutāḥ || 46 || [Note: AHS6.11.046v/ 11.46bv śukra.gharṣaṇam añjanam]
AHS6.11.047a/ sāro madhūkān madhu.mān majjā vākṣāt sa.mākṣikā |
AHS6.11.047c/ go.kharāśvoṣṭra.daśanāḥ śaṅkhaḥ phenaḥ samudra.jaḥ || 47 || [Note: AHS6.11.047v/ 11.47av sāro madhūkāt sa.madhur 11.47av sāro madhūkān madhunā]
AHS6.11.048a/ vartir arjuna.toyena hṛṣṭa.śukraka.nāśinī |
AHS6.11.048c/ utsannaṁ vā sa.śalyaṁ vā śūkraṁ vālādibhir likhet || 48 || [Note: AHS6.11.048v/ 11.48bv piṣṭā śukraka.nāśinī 11.48bv duṣṭa.śukraka.nāśinī]
AHS6.11.049a/ sirā.śukre tv a.dṛṣṭi.ghne cikitsā vraṇa.śukra.vat |
AHS6.11.049c/ puṇḍra.yaṣṭy.āhva.kākolī.siṁhī.loha.niśāñjanam || 49 ||
AHS6.11.050a/ kalkitaṁ chāga.dugdhena sa.ghṛtair dhūpitaṁ yavaiḥ |
AHS6.11.050c/ dhātrī.pattraiś ca paryāyād vartir atrāñjanaṁ param || 50 || [Note: AHS6.11.050v/ 11.50dv vartir atrāñjanaṁ hitam 11.50dv vartir netrāñjanaṁ param]
AHS6.11.051a/ a.śāntāv arma.vac chastram ajakākhye ca yojayet |
AHS6.11.051c/ ajakāyām a.sādhyāyāṁ śukre 'nya.tra ca tad.vidhe || 51 ||
AHS6.11.052a/ vedanopaśamaṁ sneha.pānāsṛk.srāvaṇādibhiḥ |
AHS6.11.052c/ kuryād bībhatsa.tāṁ jetuṁ śukrasyotsedha.sādhanam || 52 || [Note: AHS6.11.052v/ 11.52dv śukla.tvotsedha.sādhanam]
AHS6.11.053a/ nārikelāsthi.bhallāta.tāla.vaṁśa.karīra.jam |
AHS6.11.053c/ bhasmādbhiḥ srāvayet tābhir bhāvayet karabhāsthi.jam || 53 ||
[Page 597 ]
AHS6.11.054a/ cūrṇaṁ śukreṣv a.sādhyeṣu tad vaivarṇya.ghnam añjanam |
AHS6.11.054c/ sādhyeṣu sādhanāyālam idam eva ca śīlitam || 54 ||
AHS6.11.055a/ ajakāṁ pārśvato viddhvā sūcyā visrāvya codakam |
AHS6.11.055c/ samaṁ prapīḍyāṅguṣṭhena vasārdreṇānu pūrayet || 55 ||
AHS6.11.056a/ vraṇaṁ go.māṁsa.cūrṇena baddhaṁ baddhaṁ vimucya ca |
AHS6.11.056c/ sapta.rātrād vraṇe rūḍhe kṛṣṇa.bhāge same sthire || 56 ||
AHS6.11.057a/ snehāñjanaṁ ca kartavyaṁ nasyaṁ ca kṣīra.sarpiṣā |
AHS6.11.057c/ tathāpi punar.ādhmāne bheda.cchedādikāṁ kriyām || 57 || [Note: AHS6.11.057v/ 11.57cv tathāpi punar.ādhmāte]
AHS6.11.057ū̆ab/ yuktyā kuryād yathā nāti.cchedena syāt nimajjanam || 57ū̆ab || [Note: AHS6.11.057ū̆v/ 11.57ū̆av yuktyā yuñjyād yathā nāti.]
AHS6.11.058a/ nityaṁ ca śukreṣu śṛtaṁ yathā.svaṁ pāne ca marśe ca ghṛtaṁ vidadhyāt |
AHS6.11.058c/ na hīyate labdha.balā tathāntas tīkṣṇāñjanair dṛk satataṁ prayuktaiḥ || 58 || [Note: AHS6.11.058v/ 11.58dv tīkṣṇāñjanair dṛk pratataṁ prayuktaiḥ]

6.12. Chapter 12 :: Athadṛṣṭirogavijñānīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 482-484]
AHS6.12.001a/ sirānusāriṇi male prathamaṁ paṭalaṁ śrite |
AHS6.12.001c/ a.vyaktam īkṣate rūpaṁ vyaktam apy a.nimittataḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS6.12.001v/ 12.1bv prathamaṁ paṭalaṁ gate 12.1cv a.vyaktam īkṣyate rūpaṁ]
AHS6.12.002a/ prāpte dvitīyaṁ paṭalaṁ a.bhūtam api paśyati |
AHS6.12.002c/ bhūtaṁ tu yatnād āsannaṁ dūre sūkṣmaṁ ca nekṣate || 2 || [Note: AHS6.12.002v/ 12.2dv dūraṁ sūkṣmaṁ ca nekṣate]
AHS6.12.003a/ dūrāntika.sthaṁ rūpaṁ ca viparyāsena manyate |
AHS6.12.003c/ doṣe maṇḍala.saṁsthāne maṇḍalānīva paśyati || 3 ||
AHS6.12.004a/ dvi.dhaikaṁ dṛṣṭi.madhya.sthe bahu.dhā bahu.dhā.sthite |
AHS6.12.004c/ dṛṣṭer abhyantara.gate hrasva.vṛddha.viparyayam || 4 || [Note: AHS6.12.004v/ 12.4dv hrasva.dīrgha.viparyayam 12.4dv hrasvaṁ bahu viparyayam]
[Page 598 ]
AHS6.12.005a/ nāntika.stham adhaḥ.saṁsthe dūra.gaṁ nopari sthite |
AHS6.12.005c/ pārśve paśyen na pārśva.sthe timirākhyo 'yam āmayaḥ || 5 ||
AHS6.12.006a/ prāpnoti kāca.tāṁ doṣe tṛtīya.paṭalāśrite |
AHS6.12.006c/ tenordhvam īkṣate nādhas tanu.cailāvṛtopamam || 6 || [Note: AHS6.12.006v/ 12.6cv tenordhvam īkṣyate nādhas]
AHS6.12.007a/ yathā.varṇaṁ ca rajyeta dṛṣṭir hīyeta ca kramāt |
AHS6.12.007c/ tathāpy upekṣamāṇasya caturthaṁ paṭalaṁ gataḥ || 7 || [Note: AHS6.12.007v/ 12.7av yathā.doṣaṁ ca rajyeta]
AHS6.12.008a/ liṅga.nāśaṁ malaḥ kurvaṁś chādayed dṛṣṭi.maṇḍalam |
AHS6.12.008c/ tatra vātena timire vyāviddham iva paśyati || 8 ||
AHS6.12.009a/ calāvilāruṇābhāsaṁ prasannaṁ cekṣate muhuḥ |
AHS6.12.009c/ jālāni keśān maśakān raśmīṁś copekṣite 'tra ca || 9 || [Note: AHS6.12.009v/ 12.9av dhūmāvilāruṇābhāsaṁ 12.9bv prasannaṁ vīkṣate muhuḥ 12.9dv raśmīṁś copekṣite 'tra tu]
AHS6.12.010a/ kācī.bhūte dṛg aruṇā paśyaty āsyam a.nāsikam |
AHS6.12.010c/ candra.dīpādy.aneka.tvaṁ vakram ṛjv api manyate || 10 ||
AHS6.12.011a/ vṛddhaḥ kāco dṛśaṁ kuryād rajo.dhūmāvṛtām iva |
AHS6.12.011c/ spaṣṭāruṇābhāṁ vistīrṇāṁ sūkṣmāṁ vā hata.darśanām || 11 || [Note: AHS6.12.011v/ 12.11cv sphuṭāruṇābhāṁ vistīrṇāṁ]
AHS6.12.012a/ sa liṅga.nāśo vāte tu saṅkocayati dṛk.sirāḥ |
AHS6.12.012c/ dṛṅ.maṇḍalaṁ viśaty antar gambhīrā dṛg asau smṛtā || 12 ||
AHS6.12.013a/ pitta.je timire vidyut.khadyota.dyota.dīpitam |
AHS6.12.013c/ śikhi.tittiri.pattrābhaṁ prāyo nīlaṁ ca paśyati || 13 || [Note: AHS6.12.013v/ 12.13bv .khadyotodyota.dīpitam 12.13cv śikhi.tittiri.picchābhaṁ]
AHS6.12.014a/ kāce dṛg kāca.nīlābhā tādṛg eva ca paśyati |
AHS6.12.014c/ arkendu.pariveṣāgni.marīcīndra.dhanūṁṣi ca || 14 || [Note: AHS6.12.014v/ 12.14av kāce dṛg kāṁsya.nīlābhā]
[Page 599 ]
AHS6.12.015a/ bhṛṅga.nīlā nir.ālokā dṛk snigdhā liṅga.nāśataḥ |
AHS6.12.015c/ dṛṣṭiḥ pittena hrasvākhyā sā hrasvā hrasva.darśinī || 15 ||
AHS6.12.016a/ bhavet pitta.vidagdhākhyā pītā pītābha.darśanā |
AHS6.12.016c/ kaphena timire prāyaḥ snigdhaṁ śvetaṁ ca paśyati || 16 || [Note: AHS6.12.016v/ 12.16bv pītā pītābha.darśinī]
AHS6.12.017a/ śaṅkhendu.kunda.kusumaiḥ kumudair iva cācitam |
AHS6.12.017c/ kāce tu niṣ.prabhendv.arka.pradīpādyair ivācitam || 17 || [Note: AHS6.12.017v/ 12.17bv kumudair iva vācitam]
AHS6.12.018a/ sitābhā sā ca dṛṣṭiḥ syāl liṅga.nāśe tu lakṣyate |
AHS6.12.018c/ mūrtaḥ kapho dṛṣṭi.gataḥ snigdho darśana.nāśanaḥ || 18 ||
AHS6.12.019a/ bindur jalasyeva calaḥ padminī.puṭa.saṁsthitaḥ |
AHS6.12.019c/ uṣṇe saṅkocam āyāti cchāyāyāṁ parisarpati || 19 || [Note: AHS6.12.019v/ 12.19bv padminī.puṭa.saṁśritaḥ 12.19bv padminī.pattra.saṁśritaḥ]
AHS6.12.020a/ śaṅkha.kundendu.kumuda.sphaṭikopama.śuklimā |
AHS6.12.020c/ raktena timire raktaṁ tamo.bhūtaṁ ca paśyati || 20 ||
AHS6.12.021a/ kācena raktā kṛṣṇā vā dṛṣṭis tādṛk ca paśyati |
AHS6.12.021c/ liṅga.nāśe 'pi tādṛg dṛṅ niṣ.prabhā hata.darśanā || 21 ||
AHS6.12.022a/ saṁsarga.sannipāteṣu vidyāt saṅkīrṇa.lakṣaṇān |
AHS6.12.022c/ timirādīn a.kasmāc ca taiḥ syād vyaktākulekṣaṇaḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS6.12.022v/ 12.22dv taiḥ syād vakrākulekṣaṇaḥ 12.22dv taiḥ syād vyaktākulekṣaṇam]
AHS6.12.023a/ timire śeṣayor dṛṣṭau citro rāgaḥ prajāyate |
AHS6.12.023c/ dyotyate nakulasyeva yasya dṛṅ nicitā malaiḥ || 23 ||
AHS6.12.024a/ nakulāndhaḥ sa tatrāhni citraṁ paśyati no niśi |
AHS6.12.024c/ arke 'sta.mastaka.nyasta.gabhastau stambham āgatāḥ || 24 ||
[Page 600 ]
AHS6.12.025a/ sthagayanti dṛśaṁ doṣā doṣāndhaḥ sa gado 'paraḥ |
AHS6.12.025c/ divā.kara.kara.spṛṣṭā bhraṣṭā dṛṣṭi.pathān malāḥ || 25 ||
AHS6.12.026a/ vilīna.līnā yacchanti vyaktam atrāhni darśanam |
AHS6.12.026c/ uṣṇa.taptasya sahasā śīta.vāri.nimajjanāt || 26 ||
AHS6.12.027a/ tri.doṣa.rakta.sampṛkto yāty ūṣmordhvaṁ tato 'kṣiṇi |
AHS6.12.027c/ dāhoṣe malinaṁ śuklam ahany āvila.darśanam || 27 ||
AHS6.12.028a/ rātrāv āndhyaṁ ca jāyeta vidagdhoṣṇena sā smṛtā |
AHS6.12.028c/ bhṛśam amlāśanād doṣaiḥ sāsrair yā dṛṣṭir ācitā || 28 ||
AHS6.12.029a/ sa.kleda.kaṇḍū.kaluṣā vidagdhāmlena sā smṛtā |
AHS6.12.029c/ śoka.jvara.śiro.roga.santaptasyānilādayaḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS6.12.029v/ 12.29bv vidagdhāmlena sā matā]
AHS6.12.030a/ dhūmāvilāṁ dhūma.dṛśaṁ dṛśaṁ kuryuḥ sa dhūmaraḥ |
AHS6.12.030c/ sahasaivālpa.sat.tvasya paśyato rūpam adbhutam || 30 || [Note: AHS6.12.030v/ 12.30av dhūmāvilāṁ dhūma.dṛśāṁ 12.30bv dṛśaṁ kuryuḥ sa dhūsaraḥ 12.30bv dṛśaṁ kuryuḥ sa dhūmakaḥ]
AHS6.12.031a/ bhāsvaraṁ bhās.karādiṁ vā vātādyā nayanāśritāḥ |
AHS6.12.031c/ kurvanti tejaḥ saṁśoṣya dṛṣṭiṁ muṣita.darśanām || 31 || [Note: AHS6.12.031v/ 12.31av bhāsuraṁ bhās.karādiṁ vā]
AHS6.12.032a/ vaiḍūrya.varṇāṁ stimitāṁ prakṛti.sthām ivā.vyathām |
AHS6.12.032c/ aupasargika ity eṣa liṅga.nāśo 'tra varjayet || 32 ||
AHS6.12.033a/ vinā kaphāl liṅga.nāśān gambhīrāṁ hrasva.jām api |
AHS6.12.033c/ ṣaṭ kācā nakulāndhaś ca yāpyāḥ śeṣāṁs tu sādhayet || 33 || [Note: AHS6.12.033v/ 12.33cv ṣaṭ kācā nakulāndhyaś ca]
AHS6.12.033ū̆ab/ dvā.daśeti gadā dṛṣṭau nirdiṣṭāḥ sapta.viṁśatiḥ || 33ū̆ab ||

6.13. Chapter 13 :: Athatimirapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 484-489] [Page 601 ]
AHS6.13.001a/ timiraṁ kāca.tāṁ yāti kāco 'py āndhyam upekṣayā |
AHS6.13.001c/ netra.rogeṣv ato ghoraṁ timiraṁ sādhayed drutam || 1 ||
AHS6.13.002a/ tulāṁ paceta jīvantyā droṇe 'pāṁ pāda.śeṣite |
AHS6.13.002c/ tat.kvāthe dvi.guṇa.kṣīraṁ ghṛta.prasthaṁ vipācayet || 2 || [Note: AHS6.13.002v/ 13.2cv tat.kvāthe dvi.guṇaṁ kṣīraṁ]
AHS6.13.003a/ prapauṇḍarīka.kākolī.pippalī.lodhra.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS6.13.003c/ śatāhvā.madhuka.drākṣā.sitā.dāru.phala.trayaiḥ || 3 ||
AHS6.13.004a/ kārṣikair niśi tat pītaṁ timirāpaharaṁ param |
AHS6.13.004c/ drākṣā.candana.mañjiṣṭhā.kākolī.dvaya.jīvakaiḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS6.13.004v/ 13.4bv timirāṇāṁ haraṁ param]
AHS6.13.005a/ sitā.śatāvarī.medā.puṇḍrāhva.madhukotpalaiḥ |
AHS6.13.005c/ pacej jīrṇa.ghṛta.prasthaṁ sama.kṣīraṁ picūnmitaiḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS6.13.005v/ 13.5cv pacej jīrṇaṁ ghṛta.prasthaṁ]
AHS6.13.006a/ hanti tat kāca.timira.rakta.rājī.śiro.rujaḥ |
AHS6.13.006c/ paṭola.nimba.kaṭukā.dārvī.sevya.varā.vṛṣam || 6 ||
AHS6.13.007a/ sa.dhanvayāsa.trāyantī.parpaṭaṁ pālikaṁ pṛthak |
AHS6.13.007c/ prastham āmalakānāṁ ca kvāthayen nalvaṇe 'mbhasi || 7 ||
AHS6.13.008a/ tad.āḍhake 'rdha.palikaiḥ piṣṭaiḥ prasthaṁ ghṛtāt pacet |
AHS6.13.008c/ musta.bhūnimba.yaṣṭy.āhva.kuṭajodīcya.candanaiḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS6.13.008v/ 13.8av tad.āḍhake 'rdha.palikair 13.8bv ghṛta.prasthaṁ vipācayet]
AHS6.13.009a/ sa.pippalīkais tat sarpir ghrāṇa.karṇāsya.roga.jit |
AHS6.13.009c/ vidradhi.jvara.duṣṭārur.visarpāpaci.kuṣṭha.nut || 9 || [Note: AHS6.13.009v/ 13.9av sa.vyoṣa.cavyais tat sarpir 13.9bv ghrāṇa.karṇākṣi.roga.jit 13.9cv vidradhi.jvara.duṣṭāsra.]
AHS6.13.010a/ viśeṣāc chukra.timira.naktāndhyoṣṇāmla.dāha.hṛt |
AHS6.13.010c/ tri.phalāṣṭa.palaṁ kvāthyaṁ pāda.śeṣaṁ jalāḍhake || 10 || [Note: AHS6.13.010v/ 13.10bv .naktāndhyoṣṇāmla.dāha.nut 13.10dv pāda.śeṣe jalāḍhake]
[Page 602 ]
AHS6.13.011a/ tena tulya.payaskena tri.phalā.pala.kalka.vān |
AHS6.13.011c/ ardha.prastho ghṛtāt siddhaḥ sitayā mākṣikeṇa vā || 11 ||
AHS6.13.012a/ yuktaṁ pibet tat timirī tad.yuktaṁ vā varā.rasam |
AHS6.13.012c/ yaṣṭīmadhu.dvi.kākolī.vyāghrī.kṛṣṇāmṛtotpalaiḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.13.013a/ pālikaiḥ sa.sitā.drākṣair ghṛta.prasthaṁ pacet samaiḥ |
AHS6.13.013c/ ajā.kṣīra.varā.vasā.mārkava.sva.rasaiḥ pṛthak || 13 ||
AHS6.13.014a/ mahā.traiphalam ity etat paraṁ dṛṣṭi.vikāra.jit |
AHS6.13.014c/ traiphalenātha haviṣā lihānas tri.phalāṁ niśi || 14 || [Note: AHS6.13.014v/ 13.14bv paraṁ dṛṣṭi.vikāra.nut]
AHS6.13.015a/ yaṣṭīmadhuka.saṁyuktāṁ madhunā ca pariplutām |
AHS6.13.015c/ māsam ekaṁ hitāhāraḥ pibann āmalakodakam || 15 ||
AHS6.13.016a/ sauparṇaṁ labhate cakṣur ity āha bhaga.vān nimiḥ |
AHS6.13.016c/ tāpyāyo.hema.yaṣṭy.āhva.sitā.jīrṇājya.mākṣikaiḥ || 16 ||
AHS6.13.017a/ saṁyojitā yathā.kāmaṁ timira.ghnī varā varā |
AHS6.13.017c/ sa.ghṛtaṁ vā varā.kvāthaṁ śīlayet timirāmayī || 17 ||
AHS6.13.018a/ apūpa.sūpa.saktūn vā tri.phalā.cūrṇa.saṁyutān |
AHS6.13.018c/ pāyasaṁ vā varā.yuktaṁ śītaṁ sa.madhu.śarkaram || 18 || [Note: AHS6.13.018v/ 13.18av apūpa.takra.saktūn vā]
AHS6.13.019a/ prātar bhaktasya vā pūrvam adyāt pathyāṁ pṛthak pṛthak |
AHS6.13.019c/ mṛdvīkā.śarkarā.kṣaudraiḥ satataṁ timirāturaḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS6.13.019v/ 13.19av prātar bhuktasya vā pūrvam]
AHS6.13.020a/ sroto.jāṁśāṁś catuḥ.ṣaṣṭiṁ tāmrāyo.rūpya.kāñcanaiḥ |
AHS6.13.020c/ yuktān praty.ekam ekāṁśair andha.mūṣodara.sthitān || 20 ||
[Page 603 ]
AHS6.13.021a/ dhmāpayitvā samāvṛttaṁ tatas tac ca niṣecayet |
AHS6.13.021c/ rasa.skandha.kaṣāyeṣu sapta.kṛtvaḥ pṛthak pṛthak || 21 ||
AHS6.13.022a/ vaiḍūrya.muktā.śaṅkhānāṁ tribhir bhāgair yutaṁ tataḥ |
AHS6.13.022c/ cūrṇāñjanaṁ prayuñjīta tat sarva.timirāpaham || 22 || [Note: AHS6.13.022v/ 13.22dv tat sarvaṁ timirāpaham]
AHS6.13.023a/ māṁsī.tri.jātakāyaḥ.kuṅkuma.nīlotpalābhayā.tutthaiḥ |
AHS6.13.023c/ sita.kāca.śaṅkha.phenaka.maricāñjana.pippalī.madhukaiḥ || 23 ||
AHS6.13.024a/ candre 'śvinī.sa.nāthe su.cūrṇitair añjayed yugalaṁ akṣṇoḥ |
AHS6.13.024c/ timirārma.rakta.rājī.kaṇḍū.kācādi.śamam icchan || 24 ||
AHS6.13.025a/ marica.vara.lavaṇa.bhāgau bhāgau dvau kaṇa.samudra.phenābhyām |
AHS6.13.025c/ sauvīra.bhāga.navakaṁ citrāyāṁ cūrṇitaṁ kaphāmaya.jit || 25 || [Note: AHS6.13.025v/ 13.25dv citrā.sañcūrṇitaṁ kaphāmaya.jit]
AHS6.13.025+(1)a/ manohvā.tuttha.kastūrī.māṁsī.malaya.rocanāḥ |
AHS6.13.025+(1)c/ daśa.karpūra.saṁyuktam aśīti.guṇam añjanam || 25+(1) || [Note: AHS6.13.025+(1)v/ 13.25+(1)cv dara.karpūra.saṁyuktam]
AHS6.13.025+(2)a/ piṣṭaṁ citrāśvinī.puṣye ṣaḍ.vidhe timire hitam |
AHS6.13.025+(2)c/ prasādanaṁ ca dṛṣṭeḥ syāc cakṣuṣeṇāvabhāṣitam || 25+(2) ||
AHS6.13.026a/ drākṣā.mṛṇālī.sva.rase kṣīra.madya.vasāsu ca |
AHS6.13.026c/ pṛthak divyāpsu sroto.jaṁ sapta.kṛtvo niṣecayet || 26 ||
AHS6.13.027a/ tac cūrṇitaṁ sthitaṁ śaṅkhe dṛk.prasādanam añjanam |
AHS6.13.027c/ śastaṁ sarvākṣi.rogeṣu videha.pati.nirmitam || 27 || [Note: AHS6.13.027v/ 13.27av tac cūrṇitaṁ ghṛtaṁ śaṅkhe]
AHS6.13.028a/ nirdagdhaṁ bādarāṅgārais tutthaṁ cetthaṁ niṣecitam |
AHS6.13.028c/ kramād ajā.payaḥ.sarpiḥ.kṣaudre tasmāt pala.dvayam || 28 || [Note: AHS6.13.028v/ 13.28bv tutthaṁ caivaṁ niṣecitam 13.28cv kramāc chāga.payaḥ.sarpiḥ.]
[Page 604 ]
AHS6.13.029a/ kārṣikais tāpya.marica.sroto.ja.kaṭukā.nataiḥ |
AHS6.13.029c/ paṭu.lodhra.śilā.pathyā.kaṇailāñjana.phenakaiḥ || 29 ||
AHS6.13.030a/ yuktaṁ palena yaṣṭyāś ca mūṣāntar.dhmāta.cūrṇitam |
AHS6.13.030c/ hanti kācārma.naktāndhya.rakta.rājīḥ su.śīlitaḥ || 30 ||
AHS6.13.031a/ cūrṇo viśeṣāt timiraṁ bhās.karo bhās.karo yathā |
AHS6.13.031c/ triṁśad.bhāgā bhujaṅgasya gandha.pāṣāṇa.pañcakam || 31 ||
AHS6.13.032a/ śulba.tālakayor dvau dvau vaṅgasyaiko 'ñjanāt trayam |
AHS6.13.032c/ andha.mūṣī.kṛtaṁ dhmātaṁ pakvaṁ vi.malam añjanam || 32 || [Note: AHS6.13.032v/ 13.32av śulba.tārakayor dvau dvau 13.32cv andha.mūṣā.gataṁ dhmātaṁ]
AHS6.13.033ab/ timirānta.karaṁ loke dvitīya iva bhās.karaḥ || 33ab ||
AHS6.13.033c/ go.mūtre chagaṇa.rase 'mla.kāñjike ca strī.stanye || 33c ||
AHS6.13.033d/ haviṣi viṣe ca mākṣike ca || 33d ||
AHS6.13.033e/ yat tutthaṁ jvalitam aneka.śo niṣiktaṁ || 33e ||
AHS6.13.033f/ tat kuryād garuḍa.samaṁ narasya cakṣuḥ || 33f || [Note: AHS6.13.033v/ 13.33av timirāpaharaṁ loke 13.33cv go.mūtre chagala.rase 'mla.kāñjike ca]
AHS6.13.033+1a/ tutthaṁ sa.kāśaṁ kanakaṁ sa.phalaṁ śaṅkha.śilā.gairikam añjanaṁ ca |
AHS6.13.033+1c/ naraḥ kapāla.sahi.kūṅkuḍāṇḍaṁ sapta.dvi.sapta.tri.samayo gataḥ || 33+1 ||
AHS6.13.033+2a/ bhṛṅgodbhava.sva.rasa.bhāvitam āja.dugdhe mūtre gavām payasi ca tri.phalā.kaṣāye |
AHS6.13.033+2c/ drākṣā.rase ca pariśuddham iti krameṇa sauvīram añjanam idaṁ timiraṁ nihanti || 33+2 ||
AHS6.13.034a/ śreṣṭhā.jalaṁ bhṛṅga.rasaṁ sa.viṣājyam ajā.payaḥ |
AHS6.13.034c/ yaṣṭī.rasaṁ ca yat sīsaṁ sapta.kṛtvaḥ pṛthak pṛthak || 34 || [Note: AHS6.13.034v/ 13.34av śreṣṭhā.rasaṁ bhṛṅga.rasaṁ]
AHS6.13.035a/ taptaṁ taptaṁ pāyitaṁ tac.chalākā netre yuktā sāñjanān.añjanā vā |
AHS6.13.035c/ taimiryārma.srāva.paicchilya.paillaṁ kaṇḍūṁ jāḍyaṁ rakta.rājīṁ ca hanti || 35 ||
AHS6.13.036a/ rasendra.bhujagau tulyau tayos tulyam athāñjanam |
AHS6.13.036c/ īṣat.karpūra.saṁyuktam añjanaṁ timirāpaham || 36 || [Note: AHS6.13.036v/ 13.36cv īṣat.karpūra.sahitam 13.36dv añjanaṁ timire varam 13.36dv añjanaṁ nayanāmṛtam]
[Page 605 ]
AHS6.13.037a/ yo gṛdhras taruṇa.ravi.prakāśa.gallas tasyāsyaṁ samaya.mṛtasya go.śakṛdbhiḥ |
AHS6.13.037c/ nirdagdhaṁ sama.ghṛtam añjanaṁ ca peṣyaṁ yogo 'yaṁ nayana.balaṁ karoti gārdhram || 37 ||
AHS6.13.038a/ kṛṣṇa.sarpa.vadane sa.haviṣkaṁ dagdham añjana.niḥsṛta.dhūmam |
AHS6.13.038c/ cūrṇitaṁ nalada.pattra.vimiśraṁ bhinna.tāram api rakṣati cakṣuḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS6.13.038v/ 13.38bv dagdham añjana.nirgata.dhūmam 13.38cv yojitaṁ nalada.pattra.vimiśraṁ]
AHS6.13.038+1a/ nāgāñjanāśmāla.śilārka.vaṅgais triṁśad.dvi.pañca.dvayam a.dvikaikaiḥ |
AHS6.13.038+1c/ andha.mūṣī.kṛtaiś chāga.payo.niṣiktair dṛṣṭer idaṁ bhās.karam añjanaṁ syāt || 38+1 ||
AHS6.13.038+2a/ sroto.'śma.vīraṁ ... veṣṭyājamodā.vaṭa.cchadaiḥ |
AHS6.13.038+2c/ ṣaṭkaṁ timira.jit kliṣṭaṁ mṛl.liptaṁ go.mayāgninā || 38+2 ||
AHS6.13.038+3a/ tāmrāyas.kānta.gandhāhvā.tārkṣā yat su.cchalaṁ rajaḥ |
AHS6.13.038+3c/ lohe bhṛṅgarajo bhṛṣṭaṁ saptāhaṁ dṛṣṭi.roga.jit || 38+3 || [Note: AHS6.13.038+3v/ 13.38+3bv .tārkṣyā yat su.cchalaṁ rajaḥ]
AHS6.13.039a/ kṛṣṇa.sarpaṁ mṛtaṁ nyasya caturaś cāpi vṛścikān |
AHS6.13.039c/ kṣīra.kumbhe tri.saptāhaṁ kledayitvā pramanthayet || 39 || [Note: AHS6.13.039v/ 13.39dv kledayitvānu manthayet 13.39dv kledayitvātha manthayet]
AHS6.13.040a/ tatra yan nava.nītaṁ syāt puṣṇīyāt tena kukkuṭam |
AHS6.13.040c/ andhas tasya puṛīṣeṇa prekṣate dhruvam añjanāt || 40 ||
AHS6.13.041a/ kṛṣṇa.sarpa.vasā śaṅkhaḥ katakāt phalam añjanam |
AHS6.13.041c/ rasa.kriyeyam a.cirād andhānāṁ darśana.pradā || 41 ||
AHS6.13.042a/ maricāni daśārdha.picus tāpyāt tutthāt palaṁ picur yaṣṭyāḥ |
AHS6.13.042c/ kṣīrārdra.dagdham añjanam a.pratisārākhyam uttamaṁ timire || 42 || [Note: AHS6.13.042v/ 13.42cv maricāni daśa dvi.palaṁ]
AHS6.13.043a/ akṣa.bīja.maricāmalaka.tvak.tuttha.yaṣṭimadhukair jala.piṣṭaiḥ |

[Page 606 ]
AHS6.13.044a/ maricāmalaka.jalodbhava.tutthāñjana.tāpya.dhātubhiḥ krama.vṛddhaiḥ |

AHS6.13.045a/ ratnāni rūpyaṁ sphaṭikaṁ suvarṇaṁ sroto.'ñjanaṁ tāmram ayaḥ sa.śaṅkhaṁ |
AHS6.13.045c/ ku.candanaṁ lohita.gairikaṁ ca cūrṇāñjanaṁ sarva.dṛg.āmaya.ghnam || 45 ||
AHS6.13.046a/ tila.tailam akṣa.tailaṁ bhṛṅga.sva.raso 'sanāc ca niryūhaḥ |

AHS6.13.047a/ doṣānurodhena ca naika.śas taṁ snehāsra.visrāvaṇa.reka.nasyaiḥ |
AHS6.13.047c/ upācared añjana.mūrdha.vasti.vasti.kriyā.tarpaṇa.lepa.sekaiḥ || 47 ||
AHS6.13.048ab/ sāmānyaṁ sādhanam idaṁ prati.doṣam ataḥ śṛṇu || 48ab ||
AHS6.13.049a/ vāta.je timire tatra daśa.mūlāmbhasā ghṛtam |

AHS6.13.051a/ sa.mūla.jāla.jīvantī.tulāṁ droṇe 'mbhasaḥ pacet |

AHS6.13.054a/ keśāsya.kandharā.skandha.puṣṭi.lāvaṇya.kānti.dam |

AHS6.13.055a/ ghoṣayā bilva.mūlaiś ca tailaṁ pakvaṁ payo.'nvitam |

AHS6.13.056a/ vasāñjane ca vaiyāghrī vārāhī vā praśasyate |
AHS6.13.056c/ gṛdhrāhi.kukkuṭotthā vā madhukenānvitā pṛthak || 56 ||
AHS6.13.057a/ pratyañjane ca sroto.jaṁ rasa.kṣīra.ghṛte kramāt |

AHS6.13.058a/ na ced evaṁ śamaṁ yāti tatas tarpaṇam ācaret |

AHS6.13.060a/ medasas tad.vad aiṇeyād dugdha.siddhāt khajāhatāt |
AHS6.13.060c/ uddhṛtaṁ sādhitaṁ tejo madhukośīra.candanaiḥ || 60 ||

AHS6.13.075a/ saṁsarga.sannipātotthe yathā.doṣodayaṁ kriyā |

AHS6.13.076a/ sa.kṣīraṁ nāvanaṁ tailaṁ piṣṭair lepo mukhasya ca |

AHS6.13.078a/ tat srutaṁ sa.ghṛtaṁ bhūyaḥ pacet kṣaudraṁ ghane kṣipet |

AHS6.13.079a/ asthīni majja.pūrṇāni sat.tvānāṁ rātri.cāriṇām |

[Page 610 ]
AHS6.13.081a/ cūrṇitāny añjanaṁ śreṣṭhaṁ timire sānnipātike |

AHS6.13.082a/ āndhyāya syur malā dadyāt srāvye tv asre jalaukasaḥ |
AHS6.13.082c/ guḍaḥ pheno 'ñjanaṁ kṛṣṇā maricaṁ kuṅkumād rajaḥ || 82 || [Note: AHS6.13.082v/ 13.82av āndhyāya syur ato dadyāt]
AHS6.13.083a/ rasa.kriyeyaṁ sa.kṣaudrā kāca.yāpanam añjanam |

AHS6.13.086a/ piṣṭair go.maya.toyena vartir doṣāndha.nāsinī |

AHS6.13.087a/ kālānusārī.tri.kaṭu.tri.phalāla.manaḥśilāḥ |

AHS6.13.088a/ sanniveśya yakṛn.madhye pippalīr a.dahan pacet |
AHS6.13.088c/ tāḥ śuṣkā madhunā ghṛṣṭā niśāndhe śreṣṭham añjanam || 88 || [Note: AHS6.13.088v/ 13.88dv niśāndhye śreṣṭham añjanam 13.88dv naktāndhye śreṣṭham añjanam]
AHS6.13.089a/ khādec ca plīha.yakṛtī māhiṣe taila.sarpiṣā |
AHS6.13.089c/ ghṛte siddhāni jīvantyāḥ pallavāni ca bhakṣayet || 89 ||
AHS6.13.090a/ tathātimuktakairaṇḍa.śephāly.abhīru.jāni ca |
AHS6.13.090c/ bhṛṣṭaṁ ghṛtaṁ kumbhayoneḥ pattraiḥ pāne ca pūjitam || 90 || [Note: AHS6.13.090v/ 13.90cv siddhaṁ ghṛtaṁ kumbha.yoneḥ 13.90dv pattraiḥ pāne 'ti.pūjitam]
[Page 611 ]
AHS6.13.091a/ dhūmarākhyāmla.pittoṣṇa.vidāhe jīrṇa.sarpiṣā |
AHS6.13.091c/ snigdhaṁ virecayec chītaiḥ śītair dihyāc ca sarvataḥ || 91 ||
AHS6.13.092a/ go.śakṛd.rasa.dugdhājyair vipakvaṁ śasyate 'ñjanam |
AHS6.13.092c/ svarṇa.gairika.tālīśa.cūrṇāvāpā rasa.kriyā || 92 ||
AHS6.13.093a/ medā.śābarakānantā.mañjiṣṭhā.dārvi.yaṣṭibhiḥ |
AHS6.13.093c/ kṣīrāṣṭāṁśaṁ ghṛtaṁ pakvaṁ sa.tailaṁ nāvanaṁ hitam || 93 ||
AHS6.13.094a/ tarpaṇaṁ kṣīra.sarpiḥ syād a.śāmyati sirā.vyadhaḥ |
AHS6.13.094c/ cintābhighāta.bhī.śoka.raukṣyāt sotkaṭakāsanāt || 94 || [Note: AHS6.13.094v/ 13.94dv .rūkṣāmla.kaṭukāśanāt]
AHS6.13.095a/ vireka.nasya.vamana.puṭa.pākādi.vibhramāt |
AHS6.13.095c/ vidagdhāhāra.vamanāt kṣut.tṛṣṇādi.vidhāraṇāt || 95 ||
AHS6.13.096a/ akṣi.rogāvasānāc ca paśyet timira.rogi.vat |
AHS6.13.096c/ yathā.svaṁ tatra yuñjīta doṣādīn vīkṣya bheṣajam || 96 ||
AHS6.13.097a/ sūryoparāgānala.vidyud.ādi.vilokanenopahatekṣaṇasya |
AHS6.13.097c/ santarpaṇaṁ snigdha.himādi kāryaṁ tathāñjanaṁ hema ghṛtena ghṛṣṭam || 97 ||
AHS6.13.098a/ cakṣū.rakṣāyāṁ sarva.kālaṁ manuṣyair yatnaḥ kartavyo jīvite yāvad icchā |
AHS6.13.098c/ vyartho loko 'yaṁ tulya.rātrin.divānāṁ puṁsām andhānāṁ vidyamāne 'pi vitte || 98 ||
AHS6.13.099a/ tri.phalā rudhira.srutir viśuddhir manaso nirvṛtir añjanaṁ sa.nasyam |
AHS6.13.099c/ śakunāśana.tā sa.pāda.pūjā ghṛta.pānaṁ ca sadaiva netra.rakṣā || 99 || [Note: AHS6.13.099v/ 13.99bv manaso nirvṛtir añjanaṁ ca nasyam 13.99cv śayanāsana.tā sa.pāda.pūjā 13.99cv śayanāsana.toṣa.pāda.pūjā]
AHS6.13.100a/ a.hitād aśanāt sadā nivṛttir bhṛśa.bhās.vac.cala.sūkṣma.vīkṣaṇāc ca |
AHS6.13.100c/ muninā niminopadiṣṭam etat paramaṁ rakṣaṇam īkṣaṇasya puṁsām || 100 ||

6.14. Chapter 14 :: Athaliṅganāśapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 489-491] [Page 612 ]
AHS6.14.001a/ vidhyet su.jātaṁ niṣ.prekṣyaṁ liṅga.nāśaṁ kaphodbhavam |
AHS6.14.001c/ āvartaky.ādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir vivarjitam upadravaiḥ || 1 ||
AHS6.14.002a/ so '.sañjāto hi viṣamo dadhi.mastu.nibhas tanuḥ |
AHS6.14.002c/ śalākayāvakṛṣṭo 'pi punar ūrdhvaṁ prapadyate || 2 || [Note: AHS6.14.002v/ 14.2dv punar ūrdhvaṁ pravartate]
AHS6.14.003a/ karoti vedanāṁ tīvrāṁ dṛṣṭiṁ ca sthagayet punaḥ |
AHS6.14.003c/ śleṣmalaiḥ pūryate cāśu so 'nyaiḥ sopadravaś cirāt || 3 || [Note: AHS6.14.003v/ 14.3dv so 'nyaiḥ sopadravaiś cirāt]
AHS6.14.004a/ ślaiṣmiko liṅga.nāśo hi sita.tvāc chleṣmaṇaḥ sitaḥ |
AHS6.14.004c/ tasyānya.doṣābhibhavād bhavaty ā.nīla.tā gadaḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS6.14.004v/ 14.4dv bhavaty ā.nīla.tā gade 14.4dv bhavaty ā.nīlikā gade]
AHS6.14.005a/ tatrāvarta.calā dṛṣṭir āvartaky aruṇāsitā |
AHS6.14.005c/ śarkarārka.payo.leśa.niciteva ghanāti ca || 5 || [Note: AHS6.14.005v/ 14.5bv āvartaky aruṇā sitā]
AHS6.14.006a/ rājī.matī dṛṅ nicitā śāli.śūkābha.rājibhiḥ |
AHS6.14.006c/ viṣama.cchinna.dagdhābhā sa.ruk chinnāṁśukā smṛtā || 6 ||
AHS6.14.007a/ dṛṣṭiḥ kāṁsya.sama.cchāyā candrakī candrakākṛtiḥ |
AHS6.14.007c/ chattrābhā naika.varṇā ca chattrakī nāma nīlikā || 7 ||
AHS6.14.008a/ na vidhyed a.sirārhāṇāṁ na tṛṭ.pīnasa.kāsinām |
AHS6.14.008c/ nā.jīrṇi.bhīru.vamita.śiraḥ.karṇākṣi.śūlinām || 8 || [Note: AHS6.14.008v/ 14.8bv na dṛk.pīnasa.kāsinām]
AHS6.14.009a/ atha sādhāraṇe kāle śuddha.sambhojitātmanaḥ |
AHS6.14.009c/ deśe prakāśe pūrvāhṇe bhiṣag jānūcca.pīṭha.gaḥ || 9 ||
AHS6.14.010a/ yantritasyopaviṣṭasya svinnākṣasya mukhānilaiḥ |
AHS6.14.010c/ aṅguṣṭha.mṛdite netre dṛṣṭau dṛṣṭvotplutaṁ malam || 10 ||
[Page 613 ]
AHS6.14.011a/ svāṁ nāsāṁ prekṣamāṇasya niṣ.kampaṁ mūrdhni dhārite |
AHS6.14.011c/ kṛṣṇād ardhāṅgulaṁ muktvā tathārdhārdham apāṅgataḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS6.14.011v/ 14.11av sva.nāsāṁ prekṣamāṇasya 14.11dv tad ardhārdham apāṅgataḥ]
AHS6.14.012a/ tarjanī.madhyamāṅguṣṭhaiḥ śalākāṁ niś.calaṁ dhṛtām |
AHS6.14.012c/ daiva.cchidraṁ nayet pārśvād ūrdhvam āmanthayan iva || 12 ||
AHS6.14.013a/ savyaṁ dakṣiṇa.hastena netraṁ savyena cetarat |
AHS6.14.013c/ vidhyet su.viddhe śabdaḥ syād a.ruk cāmbu.lava.srutiḥ || 13 ||
AHS6.14.014a/ sāntvayann āturaṁ cānu netraṁ stanyena secayet |
AHS6.14.014c/ śalākāyās tato 'greṇa nirlikhen netra.maṇḍalam || 14 || [Note: AHS6.14.014v/ 14.14dv nirlikhed dṛṣṭi.maṇḍalam]
AHS6.14.015a/ a.bādhamānaḥ śanakair nāsāṁ prati nudaṁs tataḥ |
AHS6.14.015c/ ucchiṅghanāc cāpahared dṛṣṭi.maṇḍala.gaṁ kapham || 15 || [Note: AHS6.14.015v/ 14.15cv ucchiṅkhanāc cāpahared]
AHS6.14.016a/ sthire doṣe cale vāti svedayed akṣi bāhyataḥ |
AHS6.14.016c/ atha dṛṣṭeṣu rūpeṣu śalākām āharec chanaiḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS6.14.016v/ 14.16av sthire doṣe cale vāpi]
AHS6.14.017a/ ghṛtāplutaṁ picuṁ dattvā baddhākṣaṁ śāyayet tataḥ |
AHS6.14.017c/ viddhād anyena pārśvena tam uttānaṁ dvayor vyadhe || 17 || [Note: AHS6.14.017v/ 14.17cv vyadhād anyena pārśvena]
AHS6.14.018a/ nivāte śayane 'bhyakta.śiraḥ.pādaṁ hite ratam |
AHS6.14.018c/ kṣavathuṁ kāsam udgāraṁ ṣṭhīvanaṁ pānam ambhasaḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS6.14.018v/ 14.18bv .śiro.gātraṁ hite ratam]
AHS6.14.019a/ adho.mukha.sthitiṁ snānaṁ danta.dhāvana.bhakṣaṇam |
AHS6.14.019c/ saptāhaṁ nācaret sneha.pīta.vac cātra yantraṇā || 19 ||
AHS6.14.020a/ śaktito laṅghayet seko ruji koṣṇena sarpiṣā |
AHS6.14.020c/ sa.vyoṣāmalakaṁ vāṭyam aśnīyāt sa.ghṛtaṁ dravam || 20 ||
[Page 614 ]
AHS6.14.021a/ vilepīṁ vā try.ahāc cāsya kvāthair muktvākṣi secayet |
AHS6.14.021c/ vāta.ghnaiḥ saptame tv ahni sarva.thaivākṣi mocayet || 21 ||
AHS6.14.022a/ yantraṇām anurudhyeta dṛṣṭer ā.sthairya.lābhataḥ |
AHS6.14.022c/ rūpāṇi sūkṣma.dīptāni sahasā nāvalokayet || 22 ||
AHS6.14.023a/ śopha.rāga.rujādīnām adhimanthasya codbhavaḥ |
AHS6.14.023c/ a.hitair vedha.doṣāc ca yathā.svaṁ tān upācaret || 23 || [Note: AHS6.14.023v/ 14.23cv a.hitair vedhya.doṣāc ca 14.23dv yathā.svaṁ tān upakramet]
AHS6.14.024a/ kalkitāḥ sa.ghṛtā dūrvā.yava.gairika.śārivāḥ |
AHS6.14.024c/ mukhālepe prayoktavyā rujā.rāgopaśāntaye || 24 ||
AHS6.14.025a/ sa.sarṣapās tilās tad.van mātuluṅga.rasāplutāḥ |
AHS6.14.025c/ payasyā.śārivā.pattra.mañjiṣṭhā.madhuyaṣṭibhiḥ || 25 ||
AHS6.14.026a/ ajā.kṣīra.yutair lepaḥ sukhoṣṇaḥ śarma.kṛt param |
AHS6.14.026c/ lodhra.saindhava.mṛdvīkā.madhukaiś chāgalaṁ payaḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS6.14.026v/ 14.26av ajā.kṣīrānvitair lepaḥ]
AHS6.14.027a/ śṛtam āścyotanaṁ yojyaṁ rujā.rāga.vināśanam |
AHS6.14.027c/ madhukotpala.kuṣṭhair vā drākṣā.lākṣā.sitānvitaiḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS6.14.027v/ 14.27cv madhukotpala.kuṣṭhailā. 14.27dv drākṣā.lākṣā.rasānvitaiḥ 14.27dv .drākṣā.lākṣā.sitānvitaiḥ 14.27dv .drākṣā.lākṣā.rasānvitaiḥ]
AHS6.14.028a/ vāta.ghna.siddhe payasi śṛtaṁ sarpiś catur.guṇe |
AHS6.14.028c/ padmakādi.pratīvāpaṁ sarva.karmasu śasyate || 28 ||
AHS6.14.029a/ sirāṁ tathān.upaśame snigdha.svinnasya mokṣayet |
AHS6.14.029c/ manthoktāṁ ca kriyāṁ kuryād vedhe rūḍhe 'ñjanaṁ mṛdu || 29 || [Note: AHS6.14.029v/ 14.29dv vyadhe rūḍhe 'ñjanaṁ mṛdu]
AHS6.14.030a/ āḍhakī.mūla.marica.haritāla.rasāñjanaiḥ |
AHS6.14.030c/ viddhe 'kṣṇi sa.guḍā vartir yojyā divyāmbu.peṣitā || 30 ||
[Page 615 ]
AHS6.14.031a/ jātī.śirīṣa.dhava.meṣaviṣāṇi.puṣpa.vaiḍūrya.mauktika.phalaṁ payasā su.piṣṭam |
AHS6.14.031c/ ājena tāmram amunā pratanu pradigdhaṁ saptāhataḥ punar idaṁ payasaiva piṣṭam || 31 || [Note: AHS6.14.031v/ 14.31av jātī.śirīṣa.dhava.meṣaviṣāṇa.puṣpa.]
AHS6.14.032a/ piṇḍāñjanaṁ hitam an.ātapa.śuṣkam akṣṇi viddhe prasāda.jananaṁ bala.kṛc ca dṛṣṭeḥ |
AHS6.14.032c/ sroto.ja.vidruma.śilāmbu.dhi.phena.tīkṣṇair asyaiva tulyam uditaṁ guṇa.kalpanābhiḥ || 32 || [Note: AHS6.14.032v/ 14.32cv sroto.ja.vidruma.śilārṇava.phena.tīkṣṇair]

6.15. Chapter 15 :: Atha sarvākṣirogavijñānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 491-492]
AHS6.15.001a/ vātena netre 'bhiṣyaṇṇe nāsānāho 'lpa.śopha.tā |
AHS6.15.001c/ śaṅkhākṣi.bhrū.lalāṭasya toda.sphuraṇa.bhedanam || 1 || [Note: AHS6.15.001v/ 15.1av vātena netre 'bhiṣyande 15.1cv śaṅkhākṣi.bhrū.lalāṭāsya. 15.1dv .toda.sphuraṇa.bhedanam]
AHS6.15.002a/ śuṣkālpā dūṣikā śītam acchaṁ cāśru calā rujaḥ |
AHS6.15.002c/ nimeṣonmeṣaṇaṁ kṛcchrāj jantūnām iva sarpaṇam || 2 || [Note: AHS6.15.002v/ 15.2bv accham aśru calā rujaḥ]
AHS6.15.003a/ akṣy ādhmātam ivābhāti sūkṣmaiḥ śalyair ivācitam |
AHS6.15.003c/ snigdhoṣṇaiś copaśamanaṁ so 'bhiṣyanda upekṣitaḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS6.15.003v/ 15.3cv snigdhoṣṇecchopaśamanaṁ]
AHS6.15.004a/ adhimantho bhavet tatra karṇayor nadanaṁ bhramaḥ |
AHS6.15.004c/ araṇyeva ca mathyante lalāṭākṣi.bhruvādayaḥ || 4 ||
AHS6.15.005a/ hatādhimanthaḥ so 'pi syāt pramādāt tena vedanāḥ |
AHS6.15.005c/ aneka.rūpā jāyante vraṇo dṛṣṭau ca dṛṣṭi.hā || 5 ||
AHS6.15.006a/ manyākṣi.śaṅkhato vāyur anyato vā pravartayan |
AHS6.15.006c/ vyathāṁ tīvrām a.paicchilya.rāga.śophaṁ vilocanam || 6 || [Note: AHS6.15.006v/ 15.6bv anyato vā pravartayet]
AHS6.15.007a/ saṅkocayati pary.aśru so 'nyato.vāta.sañjñitaḥ |
AHS6.15.007c/ tad.vaj jihmaṁ bhaven netram ūnaṁ vā vāta.paryaye || 7 || [Note: AHS6.15.007v/ 15.7cv tad.vaj jihmaṁ bhaven netraṁ 15.7cv tad.van netraṁ bhavej jihmam 15.7dv śūnaṁ vā vāta.paryaye]
AHS6.15.008a/ dāho dhūmāyanaṁ śophaḥ śyāva.tā vartmano bahiḥ |
AHS6.15.008c/ antaḥ.kledo 'śru pītoṣṇaṁ rāgaḥ pītābha.darśanam || 8 ||
[Page 616 ]
AHS6.15.009a/ kṣārokṣita.kṣatākṣi.tvaṁ pittābhiṣyanda.lakṣaṇam |
AHS6.15.009c/ jvalad.aṅgāra.kīrṇābhaṁ yakṛt.piṇḍa.sama.prabham || 9 ||
AHS6.15.010a/ adhimanthe bhaven netraṁ syande tu kapha.sambhave |
AHS6.15.010c/ jāḍyaṁ śopho mahān kaṇḍūr nidrānnān.abhinandanam || 10 ||
AHS6.15.011a/ sāndra.snigdha.bahu.śveta.picchā.vad.dūṣikāśru.tā |
AHS6.15.011c/ adhimanthe nataṁ kṛṣṇam unnataṁ śukla.maṇḍalam || 11 || [Note: AHS6.15.011v/ 15.11bv .picchā.vad.dūṣikāsra.tā]
AHS6.15.012a/ praseko nāsikādhmānaṁ pāṁsu.pūrṇam ivekṣaṇam |
AHS6.15.012c/ raktāśru.rājī.dūṣīkā.rakta.maṇḍala.darśanam || 12 || [Note: AHS6.15.012v/ 15.12cv raktāsra.rājī.dūṣīkā. 15.12dv .śukla.maṇḍala.darśanam]
AHS6.15.013a/ rakta.syandena nayanaṁ sa.pitta.syanda.lakṣaṇam |
AHS6.15.013c/ manthe 'kṣi tāmra.pary.antam utpāṭana.samāna.ruk || 13 ||
AHS6.15.014a/ rāgeṇa bandhūka.nibhaṁ tāmyati sparśanā.kṣamam |
AHS6.15.014c/ asṛṅ.nimagnāriṣṭābhaṁ kṛṣṇam agny.ābha.darśanam || 14 ||
AHS6.15.015a/ adhimanthā yathā.svaṁ ca sarve syandādhika.vyathāḥ |
AHS6.15.015c/ śaṅkha.danta.kapoleṣu kapāle cāti.ruk.karāḥ || 15 ||
AHS6.15.016a/ vāta.pittāturaṁ gharṣa.toda.bhedopadeha.vat |
AHS6.15.016c/ rūkṣa.dāruṇa.vartmākṣi kṛcchronmīla.nimīlanam || 16 || [Note: AHS6.15.016v/ 15.16av vāta.pittottaraṁ gharṣa.]
AHS6.15.017a/ vikūṇana.viśuṣka.tva.śītecchā.śūla.pāka.vat |
AHS6.15.017c/ uktaḥ śuṣkādi.pāko yaṁ sa.śophaḥ syāt tribhir malaiḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS6.15.017v/ 15.17av vikūṇanaṁ viśuṣkaṁ ca 15.17av vikūṇena viśuṣka.tvaṁ 15.17bv śītecchā.śūla.pāka.vat]
AHS6.15.018a/ sa.raktais tatra śopho 'ti.rug.dāha.ṣṭhīvanādi.mān |
AHS6.15.018c/ pakvodumbara.saṅkāśaṁ jāyate śukla.maṇḍalam || 18 ||
[Page 617 ]
AHS6.15.019a/ aśrūṣṇa.śīta.viśada.picchilāccha.ghanaṁ muhuḥ |
AHS6.15.019c/ alpa.śophe 'lpa.śophas tu pāko 'nyair lakṣaṇais tathā || 19 || [Note: AHS6.15.019v/ 15.19cv alpa.śopho 'lpa.śophas tu]
AHS6.15.020a/ akṣi.pākātyaye śophaḥ saṁrambhaḥ kaluṣāśru.tā |
AHS6.15.020c/ kaphopadigdham asitaṁ sitaṁ prakleda.rāga.vat || 20 || [Note: AHS6.15.020v/ 15.20cv kaphena digdham asitaṁ]
AHS6.15.021a/ dāho darśana.saṁrodho vedanāś cān.avasthitāḥ |
AHS6.15.021c/ anna.sāro 'mla.tāṁ nītaḥ pitta.raktolbaṇair malaiḥ || 21 ||
AHS6.15.022a/ sirābhir netram ārūḍhaḥ karoti śyāva.lohitam |
AHS6.15.022c/ sa.śopha.dāha.pākāśru bhṛśaṁ cāvila.darśanam || 22 ||
AHS6.15.023a/ amloṣito 'yam ity uktā gadāḥ ṣo.ḍaśa sarva.gāḥ |
AHS6.15.023c/ hatādhimantham eteṣu sākṣi.pākātyayaṁ tyajet || 23 || [Note: AHS6.15.023v/ 15.23cv hatādhimanthaṁ caiteṣu]
AHS6.15.024a/ vātodbhūtaḥ pañca.rātreṇa dṛṣṭiṁ saptāhena śleṣma.jāto 'dhimanthaḥ |
AHS6.15.024c/ raktotpanno hanti tad.vat tri.rātrān mithyācārāt paittikaḥ sadya eva || 24 || [Note: AHS6.15.024v/ 15.24bv saptāhena śleṣma.jaś cādhimanthaḥ]

6.16. Chapter 16 :: Atha sarvākṣirogapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 493-496]
AHS6.16.001a/ prāg.rūpa eva syandeṣu tīkṣṇaṁ gaṇḍūṣa.nāvanam |
AHS6.16.001c/ kārayed upavāsaṁ ca kopād anya.tra vāta.jāt || 1 ||
AHS6.16.002a/ dāhopadeha.rāgāśru.śopha.śāntyai biḍālakam |
AHS6.16.002c/ kuryāt sarva.tra pattrailā.marica.svarṇa.gairikaiḥ || 2 ||
AHS6.16.003a/ sa.rasāñjana.yaṣṭy.āhva.nata.candana.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS6.16.003c/ saindhavaṁ nāgaraṁ tārkṣyaṁ bhṛṣṭaṁ maṇḍena sarpiṣaḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS6.16.003v/ 16.3dv ghṛṣṭaṁ maṇḍena sarpiṣaḥ]
AHS6.16.003.1+1a/ badarī.pattra.yaṣṭy.āhva.pathyāmalaka.tutthakam |
AHS6.16.003.1+1c/ antar.dhūmaṁ dahet sadyaḥ kope tac.cūrṇaṁ vāta.je || 3.1+1 ||
[Page 618 ]
AHS6.16.004a/ vāta.je ghṛta.bhṛṣṭaṁ vā yojyaṁ śabara.deśa.jam |
AHS6.16.004c/ māṁsī.padmaka.kālīya.yaṣṭy.āhvaiḥ pitta.raktayoḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS6.16.004v/ 16.4bv yojyaṁ śābara.deśa.jam 16.4cv māṁsī.padmaka.kākolī.]
AHS6.16.005a/ manohvā.phalinī.kṣaudraiḥ kaphe sarvais tu sarva.je || 5ab ||
AHS6.16.005c/ sita.marica.bhāgam ekaṁ catur.manohvaṁ dvir aṣṭa.śābarakam || 5cd ||
AHS6.16.005e/ sañcūrṇya vastra.baddhaṁ prakupita.mātre 'vaguṇṭhanaṁ netre || 5ef || [Note: AHS6.16.005v/ 16.5ev sañcūrṇyam ati.prabaddhaṁ 16.5fv prakupita.mātre 'vaguṇṭhanam idaṁ netre]
AHS6.16.005.1(1)+1ab/ dhātu.śuṇṭhy.abhayā.tārkṣyaṁ bahir.lepo 'kṣi.roga.hā || 5.1(1)+1ab || [Note: AHS6.16.005.1(1)+1v/ 16.5.1(1)+1av dhātu.śuṇṭhy.abhayā.tārkṣya. 16.5.1(1)+1bv .bahir.lepo 'kṣi.roga.hā]
AHS6.16.005.1(2)+1a/ harītakī.saindhava.tārkṣya.śīlaiḥ sa.gairikaiḥ sva.sva.kara.pramṛṣṭaiḥ |
AHS6.16.005.1(2)+1c/ bahiḥ.pralepaṁ nayanasya kuryāt sarvākṣi.roga.praśamārtham etat || 5.1(2)+1 ||
AHS6.16.006a/ āraṇyāś chagaṇa.rase paṭāvabaddhāḥ su.svinnā nakha.vi.tuṣī.kṛtāḥ kulatthāḥ |
AHS6.16.006c/ tac.cūrṇaṁ sakṛd avacūrṇanān niśīthe netrāṇāṁ vidhamati sadya eva kopam || 6 || [Note: AHS6.16.006v/ 16.6av āraṇyāś chagaṇa.rase paṭāvanaddhāḥ]
AHS6.16.007a/ ghoṣābhayā.tutthaka.yaṣṭi.lodhrair mūtī su.sūkṣmaiḥ ślatha.vastra.baddhaiḥ |
AHS6.16.007c/ tāmra.stha.dhānyāmla.nimagna.mūrtir artiṁ jayaty akṣiṇi naika.rūpām || 7 || [Note: AHS6.16.007v/ 16.7av ghoṣābhayā.tutthaka.yaṣṭi.lodhraiḥ 16.7av vyoṣābhayā.tutthaka.yaṣṭi.lodhrair 16.7bv guṇḍī su.sūkṣmaiḥ ślatha.vastra.baddhaiḥ 16.7bv piṣṭaiḥ su.sūkṣmaiḥ ślatha.vastra.baddhaiḥ 16.7cv tāmrāccha.dhānyāmla.nimagna.mūrtir]
AHS6.16.008a/ ṣo.ḍaśabhiḥ salila.palaiḥ palaṁ tathaikaṁ kaṭaṅkaṭeryāḥ siddham |
AHS6.16.008c/ seko 'ṣṭa.bhāga.śiṣṭaḥ kṣaudra.yutaḥ sarva.doṣa.kupite netre || 8 || [Note: AHS6.16.008v/ 16.8dv kṣaudra.yutaḥ sarva.doṣa.prakupite netre]
AHS6.16.009a/ vāta.pitta.kapha.sannipāta.jāṁ netrayor bahu.vidhām api vyathām |
AHS6.16.009c/ śīghram eva jayati prayojitaḥ śigru.pallava.rasaḥ sa.mākṣikaḥ || 9 ||
AHS6.16.010a/ taruṇam urubūka.pattraṁ mūlaṁ ca vibhidya siddham āje kṣīre |
AHS6.16.010c/ vātābhiṣyanda.rujaṁ sadyo vinihanti saktu.piṇḍikā coṣṇā || 10 || [Note: AHS6.16.010v/ 16.10bv mūlaṁ ca vicūrṇya siddham āje kṣīre]
AHS6.16.011a/ āścyotanaṁ māruta.je kvātho bilvādibhir hitaḥ |
AHS6.16.011c/ koṣṇaḥ sahairaṇḍa.jaṭā.bṛhatī.madhu.śigrubhiḥ || 11 ||
[Page 619 ]
AHS6.16.012a/ hrīvera.vakra.śārṅgaṣṭodumbara.tvakṣu sādhitam |

AHS6.16.012+1a/ lodhrāmalaka.rasāñja[na].bimbitikā.pattra.tubarikā.tutthaiḥ |
AHS6.16.012+1c/ āścyotanam idam akṣṇoḥ prasahya sadyaḥ prakopa.haram || 12+1 ||
AHS6.16.013a/ mañjiṣṭhā.rajanī.lākṣā.drākṣarddhi.madhukotpalaiḥ |

AHS6.16.014a/ kaseru.yaṣṭy.āhva.rajas tāntave śithilaṁ sthitam |
AHS6.16.014c/ apsu divyāsu nihitaṁ hitaṁ syande 'sra.pitta.je || 14 || [Note: AHS6.16.014v/ 16.14bv tāntave śithile sthitam]
AHS6.16.015a/ puṇḍra.yaṣṭī.niśā.mūtī plutā stanye sa.śarkare |
AHS6.16.015c/ chāga.dugdhe 'tha.vā dāha.rug.rāgāśru.nivartanī || 15 ||
AHS6.16.016a/ śveta.lodhraṁ sa.madhukaṁ ghṛta.bhṛṣṭaṁ su.cūrṇitam |
AHS6.16.016c/ vastra.sthaṁ stanya.mṛditaṁ pitta.raktābhighāta.jit || 16 ||
AHS6.16.017a/ nāgara.tri.phalā.nimba.vāsā.lodhra.rasaḥ kaphe |

AHS6.16.018a/ sarpiḥ purāṇaṁ pavane pitte śarkarayānvitam |

AHS6.16.019a/ srāvayed rudhiraṁ bhūyas tataḥ snigdhaṁ virecayet |

AHS6.16.020a/ uṣṇena śūle dāhe tu payaḥ.sarpir.yutair himaiḥ |

AHS6.16.021a/ ayam eva vidhiḥ sarvo manthādiṣv api śasyate |

AHS6.16.022a/ rūpyaṁ rūkṣeṇa go.dadhnā limpen nīla.tvam āgate |
AHS6.16.022c/ śuṣke tu mastunā vartir vātākṣy.āmaya.nāśinī || 22 || [Note: AHS6.16.022v/ 16.22bv liptaṁ nīla.tvam āgate 16.22bv lipte nīla.tvam āgate]
AHS6.16.023a/ sumanaḥ.korakāḥ śaṅkhas tri.phalā madhukaṁ balā |

AHS6.16.024c/ phena aileyakaṁ sarjo vartiḥ śleṣmākṣi.roga.nut || 24 ||
AHS6.16.025a/ prapauṇḍarīkaṁ yaṣṭy.āhvaṁ dārvī cāṣṭa.palaṁ pacet |
AHS6.16.025c/ jala.droṇe rase pūte punaḥ pakve ghane kṣipet || 25 ||
AHS6.16.026a/ puṣpāñjanād daśa.palaṁ karṣaṁ ca maricāt tataḥ |
AHS6.16.026c/ kṛtaś cūrṇo 'tha.vā vartiḥ sarvābhiṣyanda.sambhavān || 26 ||
AHS6.16.027a/ hanti rāga.rujā.gharṣān sadyo dṛṣṭiṁ prasādayet |
AHS6.16.027c/ ayaṁ pāśupato yogo rahasyaṁ bhiṣajāṁ param || 27 ||
AHS6.16.028a/ śuṣkākṣi.pāke haviṣaḥ pānam akṣṇoś ca tarpaṇam |

AHS6.16.047a/ pillī.bhūteṣu sāmānyād atha pillākhya.rogiṇaḥ |

AHS6.16.048a/ viriktasya ca vartmānu nirlikhed ā.viśuddhitaḥ |
AHS6.16.048c/ tutthakasya palaṁ śveta.maricāni ca viṁśatiḥ || 48 || [Note: AHS6.16.048v/ 16.48av viriktasya tu vartmānu 16.48bv vilikhed ā.viśuddhitaḥ]
AHS6.16.049a/ triṁśatā kāñjika.palaiḥ piṣṭvā tāmre nidhāpayet |
AHS6.16.049c/ pillān a.pillān kurute bahu.varṣotthitān api || 49 ||
AHS6.16.050a/ tat sekenopadehāśru.kaṇḍū.śophāṁś ca nāśayet |
AHS6.16.050c/ karañja.bījaṁ surasaṁ sumanaḥ.korakāṇi ca || 50 || [Note: AHS6.16.050v/ 16.50dv sumanaḥ.kṣārakāṇi ca]
AHS6.16.051a/ saṅkṣudya sādhayet kvāthe pūte tatra rasa.kriyā |
AHS6.16.051c/ añjanaṁ pilla.bhaiṣajyaṁ pakṣmaṇāṁ ca prarohaṇam || 51 ||
AHS6.16.052a/ rasāñjanaṁ sarja.raso rīti.puṣpaṁ manaḥśilā |
AHS6.16.052c/ samudra.pheno lavaṇaṁ gairikaṁ maricāni ca || 52 || [Note: AHS6.16.052v/ 16.52bv jātī.puṣpaṁ manaḥśilā 16.52cv samudra.phenaṁ lavaṇaṁ]
AHS6.16.053a/ añjanaṁ madhunā piṣṭaṁ kleda.kaṇḍū.ghnam uttamam |
AHS6.16.053c/ abhayā.rasa.piṣṭaṁ vā tagaraṁ pilla.nāśanam || 53 ||
AHS6.16.054a/ bhāvitaṁ basta.mūtreṇa sa.snehaṁ devadāru ca |

AHS6.16.055a/ sa.tāmra.rajaso vartiḥ pilla.śukraka.nāśinī |

[Page 624 ]
AHS6.16.056a/ alaṁ ca sauvīrakam añjanaṁ ca tābhyāṁ samaṁ tāmra.rajaḥ su.sūkṣmam |
AHS6.16.056c/ pilleṣu romāṇi niṣevito 'sau cūrṇaḥ karoty eka.śalākayāpi || 56 || [Note: AHS6.16.056v/ 16.56bv tābhyāṁ samaṁ tāmra.rajaś ca sūkṣmam 16.56cv pilleṣu romāṇi niṣevito 'yaṁ]
AHS6.16.057a/ lākṣā.nirguṇḍī.bhṛṅga.dārvī.rasena śreṣṭhaṁ kārpāsaṁ bhāvitaṁ sapta.kṛtvaḥ |
AHS6.16.057c/ dīpaḥ prajvālyaḥ sarpiṣā tat.samutthā śreṣṭhā pillānāṁ ropaṇārthe maṣī sā || 57 || [Note: AHS6.16.057v/ 16.57dv śreṣṭhā pillānāṁ ropaṇārthaṁ maṣī sā]
AHS6.16.058ab/ vartmāvalekhaṁ bahu.śas tad.vac choṇita.mokṣaṇam || 58ab ||
AHS6.16.059a/ punaḥ punar virekaṁ ca nityam āścyotanāñjanam |
AHS6.16.059c/ nāvanaṁ dhūma.pānaṁ ca pilla.rogāturo bhajet || 59 ||
AHS6.16.060a/ pūyālase tv a.śānte 'nte dāhaḥ sūkṣma.śalākayā |
AHS6.16.060c/ catur.ṇavatir ity akṣṇo hetu.lakṣaṇa.sādhanaiḥ || 60 || [Note: AHS6.16.060v/ 16.60av pūyālase tv a.śānte tu 16.60cv catur.ṇavatir ity akṣṇor]
AHS6.16.061a/ paras.param a.saṅkīrṇāḥ kārtsnyena gaditā gadāḥ |
AHS6.16.061c/ sarva.dā ca niṣeveta svastho 'pi nayana.priyaḥ || 61 ||
AHS6.16.062a/ purāṇa.yava.godhūma.śāli.ṣaṣṭika.kodravān |
AHS6.16.062c/ mudgādīn kapha.pitta.ghnān bhūri.sarpiḥ.pariplutān || 62 ||
AHS6.16.063a/ śākaṁ caivaṁ.vidhaṁ māṁsaṁ jāṅgalaṁ dāḍimaṁ sitām |
AHS6.16.063c/ saindhavaṁ tri.phalāṁ drākṣāṁ vāri pāne ca nābhasam || 63 ||
AHS6.16.064a/ ātapa.traṁ pada.trāṇaṁ vidhi.vad doṣa.śodhanam |
AHS6.16.064c/ varjayed vega.saṁrodham a.jīrṇādhyaśanāni ca || 64 || [Note: AHS6.16.064v/ 16.64dv a.jīrṇādhyaśanādi ca]
AHS6.16.065a/ krodha.śoka.divā.svapna.rātri.jāgaraṇātapān |
AHS6.16.065c/ vidāhi viṣṭambha.karaṁ yac cehāhāra.bheṣajam || 65 || [Note: AHS6.16.065v/ 16.65bv .niśā.jāgaraṇāni ca 16.65cv vidāha.viṣṭambha.karaṁ 16.65dv yad yad āhāra.bheṣajam 16.65dv vihārāhāra.bheṣajam]
[Page 625 ]
AHS6.16.066a/ dve pāda.madhye pṛthu.sanniveśe sire gate te bahu.dhā ca netre |
AHS6.16.066c/ tā mrakṣaṇodvartana.lepanādīn pāda.prayuktān nayane nayanti || 66 || [Note: AHS6.16.066v/ 16.66av dve pāda.madhye pṛthu.sanniviṣṭe 16.66dv pāda.prayuktān nayanaṁ nayanti]
AHS6.16.067a/ malauṣṇya.saṅghaṭṭana.pīḍanādyais tā dūṣayante nayanāni duṣṭāḥ |
AHS6.16.067c/ bhajet sadā dṛṣṭi.hitāni tasmād upānad.abhyañjana.dhāvanāni || 67 || [Note: AHS6.16.067v/ 16.67av taloṣṇa.saṅghaṭṭana.pīḍanādyais 16.67av mṛl.loṣṭa.saṅghaṭṭana.pīḍanādyais]

6.17. Chapter 17 :: Atha karṇarogavijñānīyādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 496-498]
AHS6.17.001a/ pratiśyāya.jala.krīḍā.karṇa.kaṇḍūyanair marut |
AHS6.17.001c/ mithyā.yogena śabdasya kupito 'nyaiś ca kopanaiḥ || 1 ||
AHS6.17.002a/ prāpya śrotra.sirāḥ kuryāc chūlaṁ srotasi vega.vat |
AHS6.17.002c/ ardhāvabhedakaṁ stambhaṁ śiśirān.abhinandanam || 2 ||
AHS6.17.003a/ cirāc ca pākaṁ pakvaṁ tu lasīkām alpa.śaḥ sravet |
AHS6.17.003c/ śrotraṁ śūnyam a.kasmāc ca syāt sañcāra.vicāra.vat || 3 ||
AHS6.17.004a/ śūlaṁ pittāt sa.dāhoṣā.śītecchā.śvayathu.jvaram |
AHS6.17.004c/ āśu.pākaṁ prapakvaṁ ca sa.pīta.lasikā.sruti || 4 || [Note: AHS6.17.004v/ 17.4bv .śītecchā.śvayathur jvaraḥ]
AHS6.17.005a/ sā lasīkā spṛśed yad yat tat tat pākam upaiti ca |
AHS6.17.005c/ kaphāc chiro.hanu.grīvā.gauravaṁ manda.tā rujaḥ || 5 ||
AHS6.17.006a/ kaṇḍūḥ śvayathur uṣṇecchā pākāc chveta.ghana.srutiḥ |
AHS6.17.006c/ karoti śravaṇe śūlam abhighātādi.dūṣitam || 6 || [Note: AHS6.17.006v/ 17.6bv pākāc chveta.ghanā srutiḥ]
AHS6.17.007a/ raktaṁ pitta.samānārti kiñ.cid vādhika.lakṣaṇam |
AHS6.17.007c/ śūlaṁ samuditair doṣaiḥ sa.śopha.jvara.tīvra.ruk || 7 ||
AHS6.17.008a/ paryāyād uṣṇa.śītecchāṁ jāyate śruti.jāḍya.vat |
AHS6.17.008c/ pakvaṁ sitāsitā.rakta.ghana.pūya.pravāhi ca || 8 ||
[Page 626 ]
AHS6.17.009a/ śabda.vāhi.sirā.saṁsthe śṛṇoti pavane muhuḥ |
AHS6.17.009c/ nādān a.kasmād vividhān karṇa.nādaṁ vadanti tam || 9 ||
AHS6.17.010a/ śleṣmaṇānugato vāyur nādo vā samupekṣitaḥ |
AHS6.17.010c/ uccaiḥ kṛcchrāc chrutiṁ kuryād badhira.tvaṁ krameṇa ca || 10 || [Note: AHS6.17.010v/ 17.10dv badhira.tvaṁ krameṇa vā]
AHS6.17.011a/ vātena śoṣitaḥ śleṣmā śroto limpet tato bhavet |
AHS6.17.011c/ rug.gauravaṁ pidhānaṁ ca sa pratīnāha.sañjñitaḥ || 11 ||
AHS6.17.012a/ kaṇḍū.śophau kaphāc chrotre sthirau tat.sañjñayā smṛtau |
AHS6.17.012c/ kapho vidagdhaḥ pittena sa.rujaṁ nī.rujaṁ tv api || 12 || [Note: AHS6.17.012v/ 17.12bv sthirau tat.sañjñitau smṛtau 17.12dv sa.rujaṁ nī.rujaṁ tv atha]
AHS6.17.013a/ ghana.pūti.bahu.kledaṁ kurute pūti.karṇakam |
AHS6.17.013c/ vātādi.dūṣitaṁ śrotraṁ māṁsāsṛk.kleda.jā rujam || 13 || [Note: AHS6.17.013v/ 17.13dv māṁsāsṛk.kleda.jāṁ rujam]
AHS6.17.014a/ khādanto jantavaḥ kuryus tīvrāṁ sa kṛmi.karṇakaḥ |
AHS6.17.014c/ śrotra.kaṇḍūyanāj jāte kṣate syāt pūrva.lakṣaṇaḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS6.17.014v/ 17.14cv śrotaḥ.kaṇḍūyanāj jāte]
AHS6.17.015a/ vidradhiḥ pūrva.vac cānyaḥ śopho 'rśo 'rbudam īritam |
AHS6.17.015c/ teṣu ruk pūti.karṇa.tvaṁ badhira.tvaṁ ca bādhate || 15 || [Note: AHS6.17.015v/ 17.15bv ṣo.ḍhārśo 'rbudam īritam 17.15dv badhira.tvaṁ ca jāyate]
AHS6.17.016a/ garbhe 'nilāt saṅkucitā śaṣkulī kuci.karṇakaḥ |
AHS6.17.016c/ eko nī.rug aneko vā garbhe māṁsāṅkuraḥ sthiraḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS6.17.016v/ 17.16bv śaṣkulī kuñci.karṇakaḥ 17.16bv śaṣkulī kūci.karṇakaḥ 17.16dv garbhe māṁsāṅkuraḥ sthitaḥ]
AHS6.17.017a/ pippalī pippalī.mānaḥ sannipātād vidārikā |
AHS6.17.017c/ sa.varṇaḥ sa.rujaḥ stabdhaḥ śvayathuḥ sa upekṣitaḥ || 17 ||
AHS6.17.018a/ kaṭu.taila.nibhaṁ pakvaḥ sravet kṛcchreṇa rohati |
AHS6.17.018c/ saṅkocayati rūḍhā ca sā dhruvaṁ karṇa.śaṣkulīm || 18 || [Note: AHS6.17.018v/ 17.18bv sravan kṛcchreṇa rohati]
[Page 627 ]
AHS6.17.019a/ sirā.sthaḥ kurute vāyuḥ pālī.śoṣaṁ tad.āhvayam |
AHS6.17.019c/ kṛśā dṛḍhā ca tantrī.vat pālī vātena tantrikā || 19 ||
AHS6.17.020a/ su.kumāre cirotsargāt sahasaiva pravardhite |
AHS6.17.020c/ karṇe śophaḥ sa.ruk pālyām aruṇaḥ paripoṭa.vān || 20 ||
AHS6.17.021a/ paripoṭaḥ sa pavanād utpātaḥ pitta.śoṇitāt |
AHS6.17.021c/ gurv.ābharaṇa.bhārādyaiḥ śyāvo rug.dāha.pāka.vān || 21 ||
AHS6.17.022a/ śvayathuḥ sphoṭa.piṭikā.rāgoṣā.kleda.saṁyutaḥ |
AHS6.17.022c/ pālyāṁ śopho 'nila.kaphāt sarvato nir.vyathaḥ sthiraḥ || 22 ||
AHS6.17.023a/ stabdhaḥ sa.varṇaḥ kaṇḍū.mān unmantho galliraś ca saḥ |
AHS6.17.023c/ dur.viddhe vardhite karṇe sa.kaṇḍū.dāha.pāka.ruk || 23 || [Note: AHS6.17.023v/ 17.23bv unmantho gallikaś ca saḥ]
AHS6.17.024a/ śvayathuḥ sannipātotthaḥ sa nāmnā duḥkha.vardhanaḥ |
AHS6.17.024c/ kaphāsṛk.kṛmi.jāḥ sūkṣmāḥ sa.kaṇḍū.kleda.vedanāḥ || 24 ||
AHS6.17.025a/ lihyuḥ pālīm upekṣitāḥ lehyākhyāḥ piṭikās tā hi |
AHS6.17.025c/ pippalī sarva.jaṁ śūlaṁ vidārī kuci.karṇakaḥ || 25 || [Note: AHS6.17.025v/ 17.25av lihyākhyāḥ piṭikās tā hi 17.25dv vidārī kūci.karṇakaḥ]
AHS6.17.026a/ eṣām a.sādhyā yāpyaikā tantrikānyāṁs tu sādhayet |
AHS6.17.026c/ pañca.viṁśatir ity uktāḥ karṇa.rogā vibhāgataḥ || 26 ||

6.18. Chapter 18 :: Atha karṇarogapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 498-501]
AHS6.18.001a/ karṇa.śūle pavana.je pibed rātrau rasāśitaḥ |
AHS6.18.001c/ vāta.ghna.sādhitaṁ sarpiḥ karṇaṁ svinnaṁ ca pūrayet || 1 ||
AHS6.18.002a/ pattrāṇāṁ pṛthag aśvattha.bilvārkairaṇḍa.janmanām |
AHS6.18.002c/ taila.sindhūttha.digdhānāṁ svinnānāṁ puṭa.pākataḥ || 2 ||
[Page 628 ]
AHS6.18.003a/ rasaiḥ kavoṣṇais tad.vac ca mūlakasyāralor api |
AHS6.18.003c/ gaṇe vāta.hare 'mleṣu mūtreṣu ca vipācitaḥ || 3 ||
AHS6.18.004a/ mahā.sneho drutaṁ hanti su.tīvrām api vedanām |
AHS6.18.004c/ mahataḥ pañca.mūlasya kāṣṭhāt kṣaumeṇa veṣṭitāt || 4 ||
AHS6.18.005a/ taila.siktāt pradīptāgrāt snehaḥ sadyo rujāpahaḥ |
AHS6.18.005c/ yojyaś caivaṁ bhadrakāṣṭhāt kuṣṭhāt kāṣṭhāc ca sāralāt || 5 || [Note: AHS6.18.005v/ 18.5bv snehaḥ sadyo rujā.haraḥ]
AHS6.18.006a/ vāta.vyādhi.pratiśyāya.vihitaṁ hitam atra ca |
AHS6.18.006c/ varjayec chirasā snānaṁ śītāmbhaḥ.pānam ahny api || 6 || [Note: AHS6.18.006v/ 18.6cv varjayec chirasaḥ snānaṁ]
AHS6.18.007a/ pitta.śūle sitā.yukta.ghṛta.snigdhaṁ virecayet |
AHS6.18.007c/ drākṣā.yaṣṭī.śṛtaṁ stanyaṁ śasyate karṇa.pūraṇam || 7 ||
AHS6.18.008a/ yaṣṭy.anantā.himośīra.kākolī.lodhra.jīvakaiḥ |
AHS6.18.008c/ mṛṇāla.bisa.mañjiṣṭhā.śārivābhiś ca sādhayet || 8 ||
AHS6.18.009a/ yaṣṭīmadhu.rasa.prastha.kṣīra.dvi.prastha.saṁyutam |
AHS6.18.009c/ tailasya kuḍavaṁ nasya.pūraṇābhyañjanair idam || 9 ||
AHS6.18.010a/ nihanti śūla.dāhoṣāḥ kevalaṁ kṣaudram eva vā |
AHS6.18.010c/ yaṣṭy.ādibhiś ca sa.ghṛtaiḥ karṇau dihyāt samantataḥ || 10 ||
AHS6.18.011a/ vāmayet pippalī.siddha.sarpiḥ.snigdhaṁ kaphodbhave |
AHS6.18.011c/ dhūma.nāvana.gaṇḍūṣa.svedān kuryāt kaphāpahān || 11 ||
AHS6.18.012a/ laśunārdraka.śigrūṇāṁ muraṅgyā mūlakasya ca |
AHS6.18.012c/ kadalyāḥ sva.rasaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kad.uṣṇaḥ karṇa.pūraṇe || 12 || [Note: AHS6.18.012v/ 18.12bv suraṅgyā mūlakasya ca 18.12bv bhṛṅgasya mūlakasya ca]
[Page 629 ]
AHS6.18.013a/ arkāṅkurān amla.piṣṭāṁs tailāktāl̐ lavaṇānvitān |
AHS6.18.013c/ sannidhāya snuhī.kāṇḍe korite tac.chadāvṛtān || 13 || [Note: AHS6.18.013v/ 18.13dv korite tac chadāvṛte]
AHS6.18.014a/ svedayet puṭa.pākena sa rasaḥ śūla.jit param |
AHS6.18.014c/ rasena bījapūrasya kapitthasya ca pūrayet || 14 ||
AHS6.18.015a/ śuktena pūrayitvā vā phenenānv avacūrṇayet |
AHS6.18.015c/ ajāvi.mūtra.vaṁśa.tvak.siddhaṁ tailaṁ ca pūraṇam || 15 || [Note: AHS6.18.015v/ 18.15dv .siddha.tailena pūrayet]
AHS6.18.016a/ siddhaṁ vā sārṣapaṁ tailaṁ hiṅgu.tumburu.nāgaraiḥ |
AHS6.18.016c/ rakta.je pitta.vat kāryaṁ sirāṁ cāśu vimokṣayet || 16 ||
AHS6.18.017a/ pakve pūya.vahe karṇe dhūma.gaṇḍūṣa.nāvanam |
AHS6.18.017c/ yuñjyān nāḍī.vidhānaṁ ca duṣṭa.vraṇa.haraṁ ca yat || 17 ||
AHS6.18.018a/ srotaḥ pramṛjya digdhaṁ tu dvau kālau picu.vartibhiḥ |
AHS6.18.018c/ pureṇa dhūpayitvā tu mākṣikeṇa prapūrayet || 18 ||
AHS6.18.019a/ surasādi.gaṇa.kvātha.phāṇitāktāṁ ca yojayet |
AHS6.18.019c/ picu.vartiṁ su.sūkṣmaiś ca tac.cūrṇair avacūrṇayet || 19 || [Note: AHS6.18.019v/ 18.19bv .phāṇitāktāṁ ca śīlayet 18.19bv .phāṇitāktāṁ prayojayet 18.19bv .phāṇitāktāṁ niyojayet]
AHS6.18.020a/ śūla.kleda.guru.tvānāṁ vidhir eṣa nivartakaḥ |
AHS6.18.020c/ priyaṅgu.madhukāmbaṣṭhā.dhātaky.utpala.parṇibhiḥ || 20 ||
AHS6.18.021a/ mañjiṣṭhā.lodhra.lākṣābhiḥ kapitthasya rasena ca |
AHS6.18.021c/ pacet tailaṁ tad āsrāvaṁ nigṛhṇāty āśu pūraṇāt || 21 ||
AHS6.18.022a/ nāda.bādhiryayoḥ kuryād vāta.śūloktam auṣadham |
AHS6.18.022c/ śleṣmānubandhe śleṣmāṇam prāg jayed vamanādibhiḥ || 22 ||
[Page 630 ]
AHS6.18.023a/ eraṇḍa.śigru.varuṇa.mūlakāt pattra.je rase |
AHS6.18.023c/ catur.guṇe pacet tailaṁ kṣīre cāṣṭa.guṇonmite || 23 || [Note: AHS6.18.023v/ 18.23av eraṇḍa.śigru.taruṇa.]
AHS6.18.024a/ yaṣṭy.āhvā.kṣīra.kākolī.kalka.yuktaṁ nihanti tat |
AHS6.18.024c/ nāda.bādhirya.śūlāni nāvanābhyaṅga.pūraṇaiḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.18.024v/ 18.24bv .kalka.yuktaṁ hinasti tat]
AHS6.18.025a/ pakvaṁ prativiṣā.hiṅgu.miśi.tvak.svarjikoṣaṇaiḥ |
AHS6.18.025c/ sa.śuktaiḥ pūraṇāt tailaṁ ruk.srāvā.śruti.nāda.nut || 25 || [Note: AHS6.18.025v/ 18.25dv ruk.srāva.śruti.nāda.nut]
AHS6.18.026a/ karṇa.nāde hitaṁ tailaṁ sarṣapotthaṁ ca pūraṇe |
AHS6.18.026c/ śuṣka.mūlaka.khaṇḍānāṁ kṣāro hiṅgu mahauṣadham || 26 ||
AHS6.18.027a/ śatapuṣpā.vacā.kuṣṭha.dāru.śigru.rasāñjanam |
AHS6.18.027c/ sauvarcala.yava.kṣāra.svarjikaudbhida.saindhavam || 27 ||
AHS6.18.028a/ bhūrja.granthi.viḍaṁ mustā madhu.śuktaṁ catur.guṇam |
AHS6.18.028c/ mātuluṅga.rasas tad.vat kadalī.sva.rasaś ca taiḥ || 28 ||
AHS6.18.029a/ pakvaṁ tailaṁ jayaty āśu su.kṛcchrān api pūraṇāt |
AHS6.18.029c/ kaṇḍūṁ kledaṁ ca bādhirya.pūti.karṇa.tva.ruk.kṛmīn || 29 || [Note: AHS6.18.029v/ 18.29cv kaṇḍū.kṣveḍana.bādhirya. 18.29cv kaṇḍū.jvalana.bādhirya.]
AHS6.18.030a/ kṣāra.tailam idaṁ śreṣṭhaṁ mukha.dantāmayeṣu ca |
AHS6.18.030c/ atha suptāv iva syātāṁ karṇau raktaṁ haret tataḥ || 30 || [Note: AHS6.18.030v/ 18.30dv karṇau raktaṁ haret tayoḥ]
AHS6.18.031a/ sa.śopha.kledayor manda.śruter vamanam ācaret |
AHS6.18.031c/ bādhiryaṁ varjayed bāla.vṛddhayoś cira.jaṁ ca yat || 31 ||
AHS6.18.032a/ pratīnāhe parikledya sneha.svedair viśodhayet |
AHS6.18.032c/ karṇa.śodhanakenānu karṇaṁ tailasya pūrayet || 32 || [Note: AHS6.18.032v/ 18.32dv karṇaṁ tailena pūrayet]
[Page 631 ]
AHS6.18.033a/ sa.śukta.saindhava.madhor mātuluṅga.rasasya vā |
AHS6.18.033c/ śodhanād rūkṣa.totpattau ghṛta.maṇḍasya pūraṇam || 33 || [Note: AHS6.18.033v/ 18.33av sa.śukta.saindhavenāśu 18.33bv mātuluṅga.rasena vā 18.33dv ghṛta.maṇḍena pūraṇam]
AHS6.18.034a/ kramo 'yaṁ mala.pūrṇe 'pi karṇe kaṇḍvāṁ kaphāpaham |
AHS6.18.034c/ nasyādi tad.vac chophe 'pi kaṭūṣṇaiś cātra lepanam || 34 || [Note: AHS6.18.034v/ 18.34dv kaṭūṣṇaiś cānu lepanam]
AHS6.18.035a/ karṇa.srāvoditaṁ kuryāt pūti.kṛmiṇa.karṇayoḥ |
AHS6.18.035c/ pūraṇaṁ kaṭu.tailena viśeṣāt kṛmi.karṇake || 35 || [Note: AHS6.18.035v/ 18.35bv pūti.kṛmila.karṇayoḥ 18.35bv pūti.kṛmika.karṇayoḥ]
AHS6.18.036a/ vami.pūrvā hitā karṇa.vidradhau vidradhi.kriyā |
AHS6.18.036c/ pittottha.karṇa.śūloktaṁ kartavyaṁ kṣata.vidradhau || 36 || [Note: AHS6.18.036v/ 18.36av vamiḥ pūrvaṁ hitā karṇa.]
AHS6.18.037a/ arśo.'rbudeṣu nāsā.vad āmā karṇa.vidārikā |
AHS6.18.037c/ karṇa.vidradhi.vat sādhyā yathā.doṣodayena ca || 37 ||
AHS6.18.038a/ pālī.śoṣe 'nila.śrotra.śūla.van nasya.lepanam |
AHS6.18.038c/ svedaṁ ca kuryāt svinnāṁ ca pālīm udvartayet tilaiḥ || 38 ||
AHS6.18.039a/ priyāla.bīja.yaṣṭy.āhva.hayagandhā.yavānvitaiḥ |
AHS6.18.039c/ tataḥ puṣṭi.karaiḥ snehair abhyaṅgaṁ nityam ācaret || 39 ||
AHS6.18.040a/ śatāvarī.vājigandhā.payasyairaṇḍa.jīvakaiḥ |
AHS6.18.040c/ tailaṁ vipakvaṁ sa.kṣīraṁ pālīnāṁ puṣṭi.kṛt param || 40 ||
AHS6.18.041a/ kalkena jīvanīyena tailaṁ payasi pācitam |
AHS6.18.041c/ ānūpa.māṁsa.kvāthe ca pālī.poṣaṇa.vardhanam || 41 || [Note: AHS6.18.041v/ 18.41cv ānūpa.māṁsa.kvāthena]
AHS6.18.042a/ pālīṁ chittvāti.saṅkṣīṇāṁ śeṣāṁ sandhāya poṣayet |
AHS6.18.042c/ yāpyaivaṁ tantrikākhyāpi paripoṭe 'py ayaṁ vidhiḥ || 42 ||
[Page 632 ]
AHS6.18.043a/ utpāte śītalair lepo jalauko.hṛta.śoṇite |
AHS6.18.043c/ jambv.āmra.pallava.balā.yaṣṭī.lodhra.tilotpalaiḥ || 43 ||
AHS6.18.044a/ sa.dhānyāmlaiḥ sa.mañjiṣṭhaiḥ sa.kadambaiḥ sa.śārivaiḥ |
AHS6.18.044c/ siddham abhyañjane tailaṁ visarpokta.ghṛtāni ca || 44 || [Note: AHS6.18.044v/ 18.44cv siddham abhyañjanaṁ tailaṁ]
AHS6.18.045a/ unmanthe 'bhyañjanaṁ tailaṁ godhā.karka.vasānvitam |
AHS6.18.045c/ tālapattry.aśvagandhārka.vākucī.phala.saindhavaiḥ || 45 || [Note: AHS6.18.045v/ 18.45bv godhā.karki.vasānvitam 18.45dv .vākucī.tila.saindhavaiḥ]
AHS6.18.046a/ surasā.lāṅgalībhyāṁ ca siddhaṁ tīkṣṇaṁ ca nāvanam |
AHS6.18.046c/ dur.viddhe 'śmanta.jambv.āmra.pattra.kvāthena secitām || 46 || [Note: AHS6.18.046v/ 18.46bv siddhaṁ tīkṣṇaṁ tu nāvanam]
AHS6.18.047a/ tailena pālīṁ sv.abhyaktāṁ su.ślakṣṇair avacūrṇayet |
AHS6.18.047c/ cūrṇair madhuka.mañjiṣṭhā.prapuṇḍrāhva.niśodbhavaiḥ || 47 || [Note: AHS6.18.047v/ 18.47dv .prapauṇḍrāhva.niśodbhavaiḥ 18.47dv .pauṇḍarīka.niśodbhavaiḥ]
AHS6.18.048a/ lākṣā.viḍaṅga.siddhaṁ ca tailam abhyañjane hitam |
AHS6.18.048c/ svinnāṁ go.maya.jaiḥ piṇḍair bahu.śaḥ parilehikām || 48 ||
AHS6.18.049a/ viḍaṅga.sārair ālimped urabhrī.mūtra.kalkitaiḥ |
AHS6.18.049c/ kauṭajeṅguda.kārañja.bīja.śamyāka.valkalaiḥ || 49 ||
AHS6.18.050a/ atha.vābhyañjanaṁ tair vā kaṭu.tailaṁ vipācayet |
AHS6.18.050c/ sa.nimba.pattra.marica.madanair lehikā.vraṇe || 50 ||
AHS6.18.051a/ chinnaṁ tu karṇaṁ śuddhasya bandham ālocya yaugikam |
AHS6.18.051c/ śuddhāsraṁ lāgayel lagne sadyaś.chinne viśodhanam || 51 || [Note: AHS6.18.051v/ 18.51dv samyak.chinne viśodhanam]
AHS6.18.052a/ atha grathitvā keśāntaṁ kṛtvā chedana.lekhanam |
AHS6.18.052c/ niveśya sandhiṁ suṣamaṁ na nimnaṁ na samunnatam || 52 ||
[Page 633 ]
AHS6.18.053a/ abhyajya madhu.sarpirbhyāṁ picu.plotāvaguṇṭhitam |
AHS6.18.053c/ sūtreṇā.gāḍha.śithilaṁ baddhvā cūrṇair avākiret || 53 ||
AHS6.18.054a/ śoṇita.sthāpanair vraṇyam ācāraṁ cādiśet tataḥ |
AHS6.18.054c/ saptāhād āma.tailāktaṁ śanair apanayet picum || 54 || [Note: AHS6.18.054v/ 18.54av śoṇitāsthāpanair vraṇyam]
AHS6.18.055a/ su.rūḍhaṁ jāta.romāṇaṁ śliṣṭa.sandhiṁ samaṁ sthiram |
AHS6.18.055c/ su.varṣmāṇam a.rogaṁ ca śanaiḥ karṇaṁ vivardhayet || 55 || [Note: AHS6.18.055v/ 18.55cv su.varṣmāṇaṁ su.romaṁ ca]
AHS6.18.056a/ jala.śūkaḥ svayaṅguptā rajanyau bṛhatī.phalam |
AHS6.18.056c/ aśvagandhā.balā.hasti.pippalī.gaura.sarṣapāḥ || 56 ||
AHS6.18.057a/ mūlaṁ kośātakāśvaghna.rūpikā.saptaparṇa.jam |
AHS6.18.057c/ chucchundarī kāla.mṛtā gṛhaṁ madhu.karī.kṛtam || 57 ||
AHS6.18.058a/ jatūkā jala.janmā ca tathā śabarakandakam |
AHS6.18.058c/ ebhiḥ kalkaiḥ kharaṁ pakvaṁ sa.tailaṁ māhiṣaṁ ghṛtam || 58 || [Note: AHS6.18.058v/ 18.58bv tathā śabarakandakaḥ]
AHS6.18.059a/ hasty.aśva.mūtreṇa param abhyaṅgāt karṇa.vardhanam |
AHS6.18.059c/ atha kuryād vayaḥ.sthasya cchinnāṁ śuddhasya nāsikām || 59 ||
AHS6.18.060a/ chindyān nāsā.samaṁ pattraṁ tat.tulyaṁ ca kapolataḥ |
AHS6.18.060c/ tvaṅ.māṁsaṁ nāsikāsanne rakṣaṁs tat tanu.tāṁ nayet || 60 ||
AHS6.18.061a/ sīvyed gaṇḍaṁ tataḥ sūcyā sevinyā picu.yuktayā |
AHS6.18.061c/ nāsā.cchede 'tha likhite parivartyopari tvacam || 61 || [Note: AHS6.18.061v/ 18.61cv nāsā.cchede su.likhite]
AHS6.18.062a/ kapola.vadhraṁ sandadhyāt sīvyen nāsāṁ ca yatnataḥ |
AHS6.18.062c/ nāḍībhyām utkṣiped antaḥ sukhocchvāsa.pravṛttaye || 62 || [Note: AHS6.18.062v/ 18.62av kapola.bandhaṁ sandadhyāt 18.62av kapola.vadhrīṁ sandadhyāt]
[Page 634 ]
AHS6.18.063a/ āma.tailena siktvānu pattaṅga.madhukāñjanaiḥ |
AHS6.18.063c/ śoṇita.sthāpanaiś cānyaiḥ su.ślakṣṇair avacūrṇayet || 63 || [Note: AHS6.18.063v/ 18.63bv pataṅga.madhukāñjanaiḥ 18.63cv śoṇitāsthāpanaiś cānyaiḥ]
AHS6.18.064a/ tato madhu.ghṛtābhyaktaṁ baddhvācārikam ādiśet |
AHS6.18.064c/ jñātvāvasthāntaraṁ kuryāt sadyo.vraṇa.vidhiṁ tataḥ || 64 || [Note: AHS6.18.064v/ 18.64bv baddhvācāram athādiśet]
AHS6.18.065a/ chindyād rūḍhe 'dhikaṁ māṁsaṁ nāsopāntāc ca carma tat |
AHS6.18.065c/ sīvyet tataś ca su.ślakṣṇaṁ hīnaṁ saṁvardhayet punaḥ || 65 || [Note: AHS6.18.065v/ 18.65bv nāsopāntāc ca carma.vat]
AHS6.18.066a/ niveśite yathā.nyāsaṁ sadyaś.chinne 'py ayaṁ vidhiḥ |
AHS6.18.066c/ nāḍī.yogād vinauṣṭhasya nāsā.sandhāna.vad vidhiḥ || 66 || [Note: AHS6.18.066v/ 18.66bv sadyaś.chede 'py ayaṁ vidhiḥ]

6.19. Chapter 19 :: Atha nāsārogavijñānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 501-503]
AHS6.19.001a/ avaśyāyānila.rajo.bhāṣyāti.svapna.jāgaraiḥ |
AHS6.19.001c/ nīcāty.uccopadhānena pītenānyena vāriṇā || 1 ||
AHS6.19.002a/ aty.ambu.pāna.ramaṇa.cchardi.bāṣpa.grahādibhiḥ |
AHS6.19.002c/ kruddhā vātolbaṇā doṣā nāsāyāṁ styāna.tāṁ gatāḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS6.19.002v/ 19.2cv kṣubdhā vātolbaṇā doṣā 19.2cv vṛddhā vātolbaṇā doṣā]
AHS6.19.003a/ janayanti pratiśyāyaṁ vardhamānaṁ kṣaya.pradam |
AHS6.19.003c/ tatra vātāt pratiśyāye mukha.śoṣo bhṛśaṁ kṣavaḥ || 3 ||
AHS6.19.004a/ ghrāṇoparodha.nistoda.danta.śaṅkha.śiro.vyathāḥ |
AHS6.19.004c/ kīṭikā iva sarpantīr manyate parito bhruvau || 4 || [Note: AHS6.19.004v/ 19.4cv kīṭakā iva sarpanti]
AHS6.19.005a/ svara.sādaś cirāt pākaḥ śiśirāccha.kapha.srutiḥ |
AHS6.19.005c/ pittāt tṛṣṇā.jvara.ghrāṇa.piṭikā.sambhava.bhramāḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS6.19.005v/ 19.5cv pittāt tṛṣṇā.jvaro ghrāṇe 19.5dv piṭikā.sambhava.bhramāḥ]
AHS6.19.006a/ nāsāgra.pāko rūkṣoṣṇa.tāmra.pīta.kapha.srutiḥ |
AHS6.19.006c/ kaphāt kāso '.ruciḥ śvāso vamathur gātra.gauravam || 6 ||
[Page 635 ]
AHS6.19.007a/ mādhuryaṁ vadane kaṇḍūḥ snigdha.śukla.kapha.srutiḥ |
AHS6.19.007c/ sarva.jo lakṣaṇaiḥ sarvair a.kasmād vṛddhi.śānti.mān || 7 || [Note: AHS6.19.007v/ 19.7bv snigdha.śukla.ghana.srutiḥ 19.7bv snigdha.śukla.ghanā srutiḥ]
AHS6.19.008a/ duṣṭaṁ nāsā.sirāḥ prāpya pratiśyāyaṁ karoty asṛk |
AHS6.19.008c/ urasaḥ supta.tā tāmra.netra.tvaṁ śvāsa.pūti.tā || 8 ||
AHS6.19.009a/ kaṇḍūḥ śrotrākṣi.nāsāsu pittoktaṁ cātra lakṣaṇam |
AHS6.19.009c/ sarva eva pratiśyāyā duṣṭa.tāṁ yānty upekṣitāḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS6.19.009v/ 19.9bv pittotthaṁ cātra lakṣaṇam]
AHS6.19.010a/ yathoktopadravādhikyāt sa sarvendriya.tāpanaḥ |
AHS6.19.010c/ sāgni.sāda.jvara.śvāsa.kāsoraḥ.pārśva.vedanaḥ || 10 ||
AHS6.19.011a/ kupyaty a.kasmād bahu.śo mukha.daurgandhya.śopha.kṛt |
AHS6.19.011c/ nāsikā.kleda.saṁśoṣa.śuddhi.rodha.karo muhuḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS6.19.011v/ 19.11bv mukha.daurgandhya.śoṣa.kṛt]
AHS6.19.012a/ pūyopamāsitā.rakta.grathita.śleṣma.saṁsrutiḥ |
AHS6.19.012c/ mūrchanti cātra kṛmayo dīrgha.snigdha.sitāṇavaḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS6.19.012v/ 19.12av pūyopamāsitā raktā 19.12bv .grathitā śleṣma.saṁsrutiḥ 19.12bv grathita.śleṣma.saṁsrutiḥ]
AHS6.19.013a/ pakva.liṅgāni teṣv aṅga.lāghavaṁ kṣavathoḥ śamaḥ |
AHS6.19.013c/ śleṣmā sa.cikkaṇaḥ pīto '.jñānaṁ ca rasa.gandhayoḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS6.19.013v/ 19.13dv jñānaṁ ca rasa.gandhayoḥ]
AHS6.19.014a/ tīkṣṇāghrāṇopayogārka.raśmi.sūtra.tṛṇādibhiḥ |
AHS6.19.014c/ vāta.kopibhir anyair vā nāsikā.taruṇāsthani || 14 || [Note: AHS6.19.014v/ 19.14av tīkṣṇa.ghrāṇopayogārka.]
AHS6.19.015a/ vighaṭṭite 'nilaḥ kruddho ruddhaḥ śṛṅgāṭakaṁ vrajet |
AHS6.19.015c/ nivṛttaḥ kurute 'ty.arthaṁ kṣavathuṁ sa bhṛśa.kṣavaḥ || 15 || [Note: AHS6.19.015v/ 19.15bv ruddhaḥ śṛṅgāṭakaṁ vrajan 19.15dv kṣavathuṁ sa bhṛśaṅ.kṣavaḥ]
AHS6.19.016a/ śoṣayan nāsikā.srotaḥ kaphaṁ ca kurute 'nilaḥ |
AHS6.19.016c/ śūka.pūrṇābha.nāsā.tvaṁ kṛcchrād ucchvasanaṁ tataḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS6.19.016v/ 19.16av śoṣayen nāsikā.srotaḥ 19.16cv śūka.pūrṇābha.kaṇṭha.tvaṁ 19.16cv śūka.pūrṇābha.nāsa.tvaṁ]
[Page 636 ]
AHS6.19.017a/ smṛto 'sau nāsikā.śoṣo nāsānāhe tu jāyate |
AHS6.19.017c/ naddha.tvam iva nāsāyāḥ śleṣma.ruddhena vāyunā || 17 ||
AHS6.19.018a/ niḥśvāsocchvāsa.saṁrodhāt srotasī saṁvṛte iva |
AHS6.19.018c/ pacen nāsā.puṭe pittaṁ tvaṅ.māṁsaṁ dāha.śūla.vat || 18 ||
AHS6.19.019a/ sa ghrāṇa.pākaḥ srāvas tu tat.sañjñaḥ śleṣma.sambhavaḥ |
AHS6.19.019c/ accho jalopamo 'jasraṁ viśeṣān niśi jāyate || 19 ||
AHS6.19.020a/ kaphaḥ pravṛddho nāsāyāṁ ruddhvā srotāṁsy a.pīnasam |
AHS6.19.020c/ kuryāt sa.ghurghura.śvāsaṁ pīnasādhika.vedanam || 20 || [Note: AHS6.19.020v/ 19.20bv ruddhaḥ srotaḥsu pīnasam]
AHS6.19.021a/ aver iva sravaty asya praklinnā tena nāsikā |
AHS6.19.021c/ ajasraṁ picchilaṁ pītaṁ pakvaṁ siṅghāṇakaṁ ghanam || 21 ||
AHS6.19.022a/ raktena nāsā dagdheva bāhyāntaḥ.sparśanā.sahā |
AHS6.19.022c/ bhaved dhūmopamocchvāsā sā dīptir dahatīva ca || 22 ||
AHS6.19.023a/ tālu.mūle malair duṣṭair māruto mukha.nāsikāt |
AHS6.19.023c/ śleṣmā ca pūtir nirgacchet pūti.nāsaṁ vadanti tam || 23 ||
AHS6.19.024a/ nicayād abhighātād vā pūyāsṛṅ nāsikā sravet |
AHS6.19.024c/ tat pūya.raktam ākhyātaṁ śiro.dāha.rujā.karam || 24 ||
AHS6.19.025a/ pitta.śleṣmāvaruddho 'ntar nāsāyāṁ śoṣayen marut |
AHS6.19.025c/ kaphaṁ sa śuṣkaḥ puṭa.tāṁ prāpnoti puṭakaṁ tu tat || 25 || [Note: AHS6.19.025v/ 19.25cv kaphaṁ sa śuṣka.puṭa.tāṁ]
AHS6.19.026a/ arśo.'rbudāni vibhajed doṣa.liṅgair yathā.yatham |
AHS6.19.026c/ sarveṣu kṛcchrocchvasanaṁ pīnasaḥ pratataṁ kṣutiḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS6.19.026v/ 19.26dv pīnasaḥ pratataṁ kṣavaḥ 19.26dv pīnasaḥ satataṁ kṣutiḥ]
[Page 637 ]
AHS6.19.027a/ sānunāsika.vādi.tvaṁ pūti.nāsaḥ śiro.vyathā |
AHS6.19.027c/ aṣṭā.daśānām ity eṣāṁ yāpayed duṣṭa.pīnasam || 27 || [Note: AHS6.19.027v/ 19.27bv pūti.nāsā śiro.vyathā 19.27bv pūtir nāsā śiro.vyathā 19.27cv aṣṭā.daśānām eteṣāṁ 19.27dv yāpayed duṣṭa.pīnasān 19.27dv varjayed duṣṭa.pīnasam]

6.20. Chapter 20 :: Atha nāsārogapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 503-504]
AHS6.20.001a/ sarveṣu pīnaseṣv ādau nivātāgāra.go bhajet |
AHS6.20.001c/ snehana.sveda.vamana.dhūma.gaṇḍūṣa.dhāraṇam || 1 || [Note: AHS6.20.001v/ 20.1bv nivātāgāra.go bhavet]
AHS6.20.002a/ vāso gurūṣṇaṁ śirasaḥ su.ghanaṁ pariveṣṭanam |
AHS6.20.002c/ laghv.amla.lavaṇaṁ snigdham uṣṇaṁ bhojanam a.dravam || 2 || [Note: AHS6.20.002v/ 20.2cv laghv.amla.lavaṇa.snigdham 20.2cv laghv amlaṁ lavaṇaṁ snigdham]
AHS6.20.003a/ dhanva.māṁsa.guḍa.kṣīra.caṇaka.tri.kaṭūtkaṭam |
AHS6.20.003c/ yava.godhūma.bhūyiṣṭhaṁ dadhi.dāḍima.sārikam || 3 || [Note: AHS6.20.003v/ 20.3dv dadhi.dāḍima.sādhitam]
AHS6.20.004a/ bāla.mūlaka.jo yūṣaḥ kulatthotthaś ca pūjitaḥ |
AHS6.20.004c/ kavoṣṇaṁ daśa.mūlāmbu jīrṇāṁ vā vāruṇīṁ pibet || 4 ||
AHS6.20.005a/ jighrec coraka.tarkārī.vacājājy.upakuñcikāḥ |
AHS6.20.005c/ vyoṣa.tālīśa.cavikā.tintiḍīkāmla.vetasam || 5 ||
AHS6.20.005.1+1a/ manaḥśilā.viḍaṅgāla.vacā.tri.kaṭu.hiṅgubhiḥ |
AHS6.20.005.1+1c/ cūrṇī.kṛtya samāghrātaḥ pratiśyāyo vinaśyati || 5.1+1 ||
AHS6.20.005.1+2ab/ tad.vad doraka.vally.elā.lavā.tārkṣya.dvi.jīrakaiḥ || 5.1+2ab ||
AHS6.20.006a/ sāgny.ajāji dvi.palikaṁ tvag.elā.pattra.pādikam |
AHS6.20.006c/ jīrṇād guḍāt tulārdhena pakvena vaṭakī.kṛtam || 6 ||
AHS6.20.007a/ pīnasa.śvāsa.kāsa.ghnaṁ ruci.svara.karaṁ param |
AHS6.20.007c/ śatāhvā.tvag.balā mūlaṁ śyoṇākairaṇḍa.bilva.jam || 7 ||
[Page 638 ]
AHS6.20.008a/ sāragvadhaṁ pibed dhūmaṁ vasājya.madanānvitam |
AHS6.20.008c/ atha.vā sa.ghṛtān saktūn kṛtvā mallaka.sampuṭe || 8 ||
AHS6.20.009a/ tyajet snānaṁ śucaṁ krodhaṁ bhṛśaṁ śayyāṁ himaṁ jalam |
AHS6.20.009c/ pibed vāta.pratiśyāye sarpir vāta.ghna.sādhitam || 9 ||
AHS6.20.010a/ paṭu.pañcaka.siddhaṁ vā vidāry.ādi.gaṇena vā |
AHS6.20.010c/ sveda.nasyādikāṁ kuryāt cikitsām arditoditām || 10 ||
AHS6.20.011a/ pitta.raktotthayoḥ peyaṁ sarpir madhurakaiḥ śṛtam |
AHS6.20.011c/ pariṣekān pradehāṁś ca śītaiḥ kurvīta śītalān || 11 ||
AHS6.20.012a/ dhava.tvak.tri.phalā.śyāmā.śrīparṇī.yaṣṭi.tilvakaiḥ |
AHS6.20.012c/ kṣīre daśa.guṇe tailaṁ nāvanaṁ sa.niśaiḥ pacet || 12 || [Note: AHS6.20.012v/ 20.12bv .śrīparṇī.yaṣṭi.bilvakaiḥ]
AHS6.20.013a/ kapha.je laṅghanaṁ lepaḥ śiraso gaura.sarṣapaiḥ |
AHS6.20.013c/ sa.kṣāraṁ vā ghṛtam pītvā vamet piṣṭais tu nāvanam || 13 || [Note: AHS6.20.013v/ 20.13cv sa.kṣāraṁ ca ghṛtaṁ pītvā 20.13cv sa.kṣāraṁ tu ghṛtaṁ pītvā]
AHS6.20.014a/ bastāmbunā paṭu.vyoṣa.vella.vatsaka.jīrakaiḥ |
AHS6.20.014c/ kaṭu.tīkṣṇair ghṛtair nasyaiḥ kavaḍaiḥ sarva.jaṁ jayet || 14 ||
AHS6.20.015a/ yakṣma.kṛmi.kramaṁ kurvan yāpayed duṣṭa.pīnasam |
AHS6.20.015c/ vyoṣorubūka.kṛmijid.dāru.mādrī.gadeṅgudam || 15 || [Note: AHS6.20.015v/ 20.15av yakṣma.kṛmi.kramaṁ kuryāt 20.15dv .dāru.mādry.ambudeṅgudam]
AHS6.20.016a/ vārtāka.bījaṁ trivṛtā siddhārthaḥ pūti.matsyakaḥ |
AHS6.20.016c/ agnimanthasya puṣpāṇi pīlu.śigru.phalāni ca || 16 ||
AHS6.20.017a/ aśva.viḍ.rasa.mūtrābhyāṁ hasti.mūtreṇa caikataḥ |
AHS6.20.017c/ kṣauma.garbhāṁ kṛtāṁ vartiṁ dhūmaṁ ghrāṇāsyataḥ pibet || 17 ||
[Page 639 ]
AHS6.20.018a/ kṣavathau puṭakākhye ca tīkṣṇaiḥ pradhamanaṁ hitam |
AHS6.20.018c/ śuṇṭhī.kuṣṭha.kaṇā.vella.drākṣā.kalka.kaṣāya.vat || 18 ||
AHS6.20.019a/ sādhitaṁ tailam ājyaṁ vā nasyaṁ kṣava.puṭa.praṇut |
AHS6.20.019c/ nāsā.śoṣe balā.tailaṁ pānādau bhojanaṁ rasaiḥ || 19 ||
AHS6.20.020a/ snigdho dhūmas tathā svedo nāsānāhe 'py ayaṁ vidhiḥ |
AHS6.20.020c/ pāke dīptau ca pitta.ghnaṁ tīkṣṇaṁ nasyādi saṁsrutau || 20 || [Note: AHS6.20.020v/ 20.20dv tīkṣṇaṁ nasyādi śasyate]
AHS6.20.021a/ kapha.pīnasa.vat pūti.nāsā.pīnasayoḥ kriyā |
AHS6.20.021c/ lākṣā.karañja.marica.vella.hiṅgu.kaṇā.guḍaiḥ || 21 ||
AHS6.20.022a/ avi.mūtra.drutair nasyaṁ kārayed vamane kṛte |
AHS6.20.022c/ śigru.siṁhī.nikumbhānāṁ bījaiḥ sa.vyoṣa.saindhavaiḥ || 22 ||
AHS6.20.023a/ sa.vella.surasais tailaṁ nāvanaṁ paramaṁ hitam |
AHS6.20.023c/ pūya.rakte nave kuryād rakta.pīnasa.vat kramam || 23 || [Note: AHS6.20.023v/ 20.23dv rakta.pīnasa.vat kriyām]
AHS6.20.024a/ ati.pravṛddhe nāḍī.vad dagdheṣv arśo.'rbudeṣu ca |
AHS6.20.024c/ nikumbha.kumbha.sindhūttha.manohvāla.kaṇāgnikaiḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.20.024v/ 20.24bv dagdheṣv arśo.'rbudeṣu tu]
AHS6.20.025a/ kalkitair ghṛta.madhv.aktāṁ ghrāṇe vartiṁ praveśayet |
AHS6.20.025c/ śigrv.ādi.nāvanaṁ cātra pūti.nāsoditaṁ bhajet || 25 || [Note: AHS6.20.025v/ 20.25av kalkitair ghṛta.madhv.āktāṁ]

6.21. Chapter 21 :: Atha mukharogavijñānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 504-508]
AHS6.21.001a/ mātsya.māhiṣa.vārāha.piśitāmaka.mūlakam |
AHS6.21.001c/ māṣa.sūpa.dadhi.kṣīra.śuktekṣu.rasa.phāṇitam || 1 || [Note: AHS6.21.001v/ 21.1av matsya.māhiṣa.vārāha.]
AHS6.21.002a/ avāk.śayyāṁ ca bhajato dviṣato danta.dhāvanam |
AHS6.21.002c/ dhūma.cchardana.gaṇḍūṣān ucitaṁ ca sirā.vyadham || 2 ||
[Page 640 ]
AHS6.21.003a/ kruddhāḥ śleṣmolbaṇā doṣāḥ kurvanty antar mukhaṁ gadān |
AHS6.21.003c/ tatra khaṇḍauṣṭha ity ukto vātenauṣṭho dvi.dhā kṛtaḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS6.21.003v/ 21.3bv kurvanty antar.mukhe gadān]
AHS6.21.004a/ oṣṭha.kope tu pavanāt stabdhāv oṣṭhau mahā.rujau |
AHS6.21.004c/ dālyete paripāṭyete paruṣāsita.karkaśau || 4 ||
AHS6.21.005a/ pittāt tīkṣṇa.sahau pītau sarṣapākṛtibhiś citau |
AHS6.21.005c/ piṭikābhir bahu.kledāv āśu.pākau kaphāt punaḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS6.21.005v/ 21.5cv piṭikābhir mahā.kledāv]
AHS6.21.006a/ śītā.sahau gurū śūnau sa.varṇa.piṭikācitau |
AHS6.21.006c/ sannipātād anekābhau dur.gandhāsrāva.picchilau || 6 || [Note: AHS6.21.006v/ 21.6dv dur.gandha.srāva.picchilau 21.6dv dur.gandhāv ati.picchilau]
AHS6.21.007a/ a.kasmān mlāna.saṁśūna.rujau viṣama.pākinau |
AHS6.21.007c/ raktopasṛṣṭau rudhiraṁ sravataḥ śoṇita.prabhau || 7 ||
AHS6.21.008a/ kharjūra.sadṛśaṁ cātra kṣīṇe rakte 'rbudaṁ bhavet |
AHS6.21.008c/ māṁsa.piṇḍopamau māṁsāt syātāṁ mūrchat.kṛmī kramāt || 8 ||
AHS6.21.009a/ tailābha.śvayathu.kledau sa.kaṇḍvau medasā mṛdū |
AHS6.21.009c/ kṣata.jāv avadīryete pāṭyete cā.sakṛt punaḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS6.21.009v/ 21.9bv sa.kaṇḍū medasā mṛdū 21.9dv pāṭyete vā.sakṛt punaḥ]
AHS6.21.010a/ grathitau ca punaḥ syātāṁ kaṇḍūlau daśana.cchadau |
AHS6.21.010c/ jala.budbuda.vad vāta.kaphād oṣṭhe jalārbudam || 10 ||
AHS6.21.011a/ gaṇḍālajī sthiraḥ śopho gaṇḍe dāha.jvarānvitaḥ |
AHS6.21.011c/ vātād uṣṇa.sahā dantāḥ śīta.sparśe 'dhika.vyathāḥ || 11 ||
AHS6.21.012a/ dālyanta iva śūlena śītākhyo dālanaś ca saḥ |
AHS6.21.012c/ danta.harṣe pravātāmla.śīta.bhakṣā.kṣamā dvi.jāḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS6.21.012v/ 21.12dv .śīta.bhakṣyā.sahā dvi.jāḥ]
[Page 641 ]
AHS6.21.013a/ bhavanty amlāśaneneva sa.rujāś calitā iva |
AHS6.21.013c/ danta.bhede dvi.jās toda.bheda.ruk.sphuṭanānvitāḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS6.21.013v/ 21.13bv sa.rujaś calitā iva 21.13dv .bheda.ruk.vedanānvitāḥ]
AHS6.21.014a/ cālaś caladbhir daśanair bhakṣaṇād adhika.vyathaiḥ |
AHS6.21.014c/ karālas tu karālānāṁ daśanānāṁ samudgamaḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS6.21.014v/ 21.14dv daśanānāṁ samudbhavaḥ 21.14dv daśanānāṁ samudbhave]
AHS6.21.015a/ danto 'dhiko 'dhi.dantākhyaḥ sa coktaḥ khalu vardhanaḥ |
AHS6.21.015c/ jāyamāne 'ti.rug dante jāte tatra tu śāmyati || 15 || [Note: AHS6.21.015v/ 21.15cv jāyate jāyamāne 'ti 21.15dv rug jāte tatra śāmyati]
AHS6.21.016a/ a.dhāvanān malo dante kapho vā vāta.śoṣitaḥ |
