AHS6.21.016c/ pūti.gandhiḥ sthirī.bhūtaḥ śarkarā sāpy upekṣitā || 16 || [Note: AHS6.21.016v/ 21.16cv pūti.gandhaḥ sthirī.bhūtaḥ 21.16dv śarkarā so 'py upekṣitaḥ]
AHS6.21.017a/ śātayaty aṇu.śo dantāt kapālāni kapālikā |
AHS6.21.017c/ śyāvaḥ śyāva.tvam āyāto rakta.pittānilair dvi.jaḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS6.21.017v/ 21.17av śātayaty aṇu.śo danta. 21.17bv .kapālāni kapālikā 21.17cv śyāvaḥ śyāva.tvam āyātā 21.17dv rakta.pittānilair dvi.jāḥ]
AHS6.21.018a/ sa.mūlaṁ dantam āśritya doṣair ulbaṇa.mārutaiḥ |
AHS6.21.018c/ śoṣite majjñi suṣire dante 'nna.mala.pūrite || 18 ||
AHS6.21.019a/ pūti.tvāt kṛmayaḥ sūkṣmā jāyante jāyate tataḥ |
AHS6.21.019c/ a.hetu.tīvrārti.śamaḥ sa.saṁrambho 'sitaś calaḥ || 19 ||
AHS6.21.020a/ pralūnaḥ pūya.rakta.srut sa coktaḥ kṛmi.dantakaḥ |
AHS6.21.020c/ śleṣma.raktena pūtīni vahanty asram a.hetukam || 20 || [Note: AHS6.21.020v/ 21.20av prabhūta.pūya.rakta.srut]
AHS6.21.021a/ śīryante danta.māṁsāni mṛdu.klinnāsitāni ca |
AHS6.21.021c/ śītādo 'sāv upa.kuśaḥ pākaḥ pittāsṛg.udbhavaḥ || 21 ||
AHS6.21.022a/ danta.māṁsāni dahyante raktāny utsedha.vanty ataḥ |
AHS6.21.022c/ kaṇḍū.manti sravanty asram ādhmāyante 'sṛji sthite || 22 ||
[Page 642 ]
AHS6.21.023a/ calā manda.rujo dantāḥ pūti vaktraṁ ca jāyate |
AHS6.21.023c/ dantayos triṣu vā śopho badarāsthi.nibho ghanaḥ || 23 ||
AHS6.21.024a/ kaphāsrāt tīvra.ruk śīghraṁ pacyate danta.puppuṭaḥ |
AHS6.21.024c/ danta.māṁse malaiḥ sāsrair bāhyāntaḥ śvayathur guruḥ || 24 ||
AHS6.21.025a/ sa.rug.dāhaḥ sraved bhinnaḥ pūyāsraṁ danta.vidradhiḥ |
AHS6.21.025c/ śvayathur danta.mūleṣu rujā.vān pitta.rakta.jaḥ || 25 || [Note: AHS6.21.025v/ 21.25bv pūyāsre danta.vidradhiḥ]
AHS6.21.026a/ lālā.srāvī sa suṣiro danta.māṁsa.praśātanaḥ |
AHS6.21.026c/ sa sannipātāj jvara.vān sa.pūya.rudhira.srutiḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS6.21.026v/ 21.26cv sa sannipāta.jvara.vān]
AHS6.21.027a/ mahā.suṣira ity ukto viśīrṇa.dvi.ja.bandhanaḥ |
AHS6.21.027c/ dantānte kīla.vac chopho hanu.karṇa.rujā.karaḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS6.21.027v/ 21.27bv viśīrṇa.rada.bandhanaḥ]
AHS6.21.028a/ pratihanty abhyavahṛtim śleṣmaṇā so 'dhi.māṁsakaḥ |
AHS6.21.028c/ ghṛṣṭeṣu danta.māṁseṣu saṁrambho jāyate mahān || 28 ||
AHS6.21.029a/ yasmiṁś calanti dantāś ca sa vidarbho 'bhighāta.jaḥ |
AHS6.21.029c/ danta.māṁsāśritān rogān yaḥ sādhyān apy upekṣate || 29 || [Note: AHS6.21.029v/ 21.29bv sa vaidarbho 'bhighāta.jaḥ]
AHS6.21.030a/ antas tasyāsravan doṣaḥ sūkṣmāṁ sañjanayed gatim |
AHS6.21.030c/ pūyaṁ muhuḥ sā sravati tvaṅ.māṁsāsthi.prabhedinī || 30 ||
AHS6.21.031a/ tāḥ punaḥ pañca vijñeyā lakṣaṇaiḥ svair yathoditaiḥ |
AHS6.21.031c/ śāka.pattra.kharā suptā sphuṭitā vāta.dūṣitā || 31 ||
AHS6.21.032a/ jihvā pittāt sa.dāhoṣā raktair māṁsāṅkuraiś citā |
AHS6.21.032c/ śālmalī.kaṇṭakābhais tu kaphena bahalā guruḥ || 32 || [Note: AHS6.21.032v/ 21.32dv kaphena bahulā guruḥ]
[Page 643 ]
AHS6.21.033a/ kapha.pittād adhaḥ śopho jihvā.stambha.kṛd unnataḥ |
AHS6.21.033c/ matsya.gandhir bhavet pakvaḥ so 'laso māṁsa.śātanaḥ || 33 ||
AHS6.21.034a/ prabandhane 'dho jihvāyāḥ śopho jihvāgra.sannibhaḥ |
AHS6.21.034c/ sāṅkuraḥ kapha.pittāsrair lāloṣā.stambha.vān kharaḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS6.21.034v/ 21.34av pralambano 'dho jihvāyāḥ]
AHS6.21.035a/ adhi.jihvaḥ sa.ruk.kaṇḍur vākyāhāra.vighāta.kṛt |
AHS6.21.035c/ tādṛg evopa.jihvas tu jihvāyā upari sthitaḥ || 35 ||
AHS6.21.036a/ tālu.māṁse 'nilād duṣṭe piṭikāḥ sa.rujaḥ kharāḥ |
AHS6.21.036c/ bahvyo ghanāḥ srāva.yutās tās tālu.piṭikāḥ smṛtāḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS6.21.036v/ 21.36bv piṭikāḥ sa.rujāḥ kharāḥ 21.36cv bahvyo ghanāḥ srāva.yuktās]
AHS6.21.037a/ tālu.mūle kaphāt sāsrān matsya.vasti.nibho mṛduḥ |
AHS6.21.037c/ pralambaḥ picchilaḥ śopho nāsayāhāram īrayan || 37 ||
AHS6.21.038a/ kaṇṭhoparodha.tṛṭ.kāsa.vami.kṛt gala.śuṇḍikā |
AHS6.21.038c/ tālu.madhye ni.ruṅ māṁsaṁ saṁhataṁ tālu.saṁhatiḥ || 38 ||
AHS6.21.039a/ padmākṛtis tālu.madhye raktāc chvayathur arbudam |
AHS6.21.039c/ kacchapaḥ kacchapākāraś cira.vṛddhiḥ kaphād a.ruk || 39 ||
AHS6.21.040a/ kolābhaḥ śleṣma.medobhyāṁ puppuṭo nī.rujaḥ sthiraḥ |
AHS6.21.040c/ pittena pākaḥ pākākhyaḥ pūyāsrāvī mahā.rujaḥ || 40 ||
AHS6.21.041a/ vāta.pitta.jvarāyāsais tālu.śoṣas tad.āhvayaḥ |
AHS6.21.041c/ jihvā.prabandha.jāḥ kaṇṭhe dāruṇā mārga.rodhinaḥ || 41 ||
AHS6.21.042a/ māṁsāṅkurāḥ śīghra.cayā rohiṇī śīghra.kāriṇī |
AHS6.21.042c/ kaṇṭhāsya.śoṣa.kṛd vātāt sā hanu.śrotra.ruk.karī || 42 || [Note: AHS6.21.042v/ 21.42bv rohiṇī sāśu.kāriṇī]
[Page 644 ]
AHS6.21.043a/ pittāj jvaroṣā.tṛṇ.moha.kaṇṭha.dhūmāyanānvitā |
AHS6.21.043c/ kṣipra.jā kṣipra.pākāti.rāgiṇī sparśanā.sahā || 43 ||
AHS6.21.044a/ kaphena picchilā pāṇḍur asṛjā sphoṭakācitā |
AHS6.21.044c/ taptāṅgāra.nibhā karṇa.ruk.karī pitta.jākṛtiḥ || 44 ||
AHS6.21.045a/ gambhīra.pākā nicayāt sarva.liṅga.samanvitā |
AHS6.21.045c/ doṣaiḥ kapholbaṇaiḥ śophaḥ kola.vad grathitonnataḥ || 45 ||
AHS6.21.046a/ śūka.kaṇṭaka.vat kaṇṭhe śālūko mārga.rodhanaḥ |
AHS6.21.046c/ vṛndo vṛttonnato dāha.jvara.kṛd gala.pārśva.gaḥ || 46 ||
AHS6.21.047a/ hanu.sandhy.āśritaḥ kaṇṭhe kārpāsī.phala.sannibhaḥ |
AHS6.21.047c/ picchilo manda.ruk śophaḥ kaṭhinas tuṇḍikerikā || 47 || [Note: AHS6.21.047v/ 21.47bv karpāsī.phala.sannibhaḥ]
AHS6.21.048a/ bāhyāntaḥ śvayathur ghoro gala.mārgārgalopamaḥ |
AHS6.21.048c/ galaugho mūrdha.guru.tā.tandrā.lālā.jvara.pradaḥ || 48 ||
AHS6.21.049a/ valayaṁ nāti.ruk śophas tad.vad evāyatonnataḥ |
AHS6.21.049c/ māṁsa.kīlo gale doṣair eko 'neko 'tha.vā 'lpa.ruk || 49 ||
AHS6.21.050a/ kṛcchrocchvāsābhyavahṛtiḥ pṛthu.mūlo gilāyukaḥ |
AHS6.21.050c/ bhūri.māṁsāṅkura.vṛtā tīvra.tṛḍ.jvara.mūrdha.ruk || 50 || [Note: AHS6.21.050v/ 21.50bv pṛthu.mūlo galāyukaḥ]
AHS6.21.051a/ śata.ghnī nicitā vartiḥ śata.ghnīvāti.ruk.karī |
AHS6.21.051c/ vyāpta.sarva.galaḥ śīghra.janma.pāko mahā.rujaḥ || 51 || [Note: AHS6.21.051v/ 21.51av śata.ghnī.nicitevāntaḥ 21.51bv śata.ghnī cāti.ruk.karī]
AHS6.21.052a/ pūti.pūya.nibha.srāvī śvayathur gala.vidradhiḥ |
AHS6.21.052c/ jihvāvasāne kaṇṭhādāv a.pākaṁ śvayathuṁ malāḥ || 52 ||
[Page 645 ]
AHS6.21.053a/ janayanti sthiraṁ raktaṁ nī.rujaṁ tad galārbudam || 53ab ||
AHS6.21.053c/ pavana.śleṣma.medobhir gala.gaṇḍo bhaved bahiḥ || 53cd ||
AHS6.21.053e/ vardhamānaḥ sa kālena muṣka.val lambate 'ti.ruk || 53ef || [Note: AHS6.21.053v/ 21.53bv nī.rujaṁ taṁ galārbudam 21.53fv muṣka.val lambate ni.ruk]
AHS6.21.054a/ kṛṣṇo 'ruṇo vā todāḍhyaḥ sa vātāt kṛṣṇa.rāji.mān |
AHS6.21.054c/ vṛddhas tālu.gale śoṣaṁ kuryāc ca vi.rasāsya.tām || 54 ||
AHS6.21.055a/ sthiraḥ sa.varṇaḥ kaṇḍū.mān śīta.sparśo guruḥ kaphāt |
AHS6.21.055c/ vṛddhas tālu.gale lepaṁ kuryāc ca madhurāsya.tām || 55 || [Note: AHS6.21.055v/ 21.55cv vṛddhas tālu.gale śophaṁ]
AHS6.21.056a/ medasaḥ śleṣma.vad dhāni.vṛddhyoḥ so 'nuvidhīyate |
AHS6.21.056c/ dehaṁ vṛddhaś ca kurute gale śabdaṁ svare 'lpa.tām || 56 ||
AHS6.21.057a/ śleṣma.ruddhānila.gatiḥ śuṣka.kaṇṭho hata.svaraḥ |
AHS6.21.057c/ tāmyan prasaktaṁ śvasiti yena sa svara.hānilāt || 57 ||
AHS6.21.058a/ karoti vadanasyāntar vraṇān sarva.saro 'nilaḥ |
AHS6.21.058c/ sañcāriṇo 'ruṇān rūkṣān oṣṭhau tāmrau cala.tvacau || 58 ||
AHS6.21.059a/ jihvā śītā.sahā gurvī sphuṭitā kaṇṭakācitā |
AHS6.21.059c/ vivṛṇoti ca kṛcchreṇa mukhaṁ pāko mukhasya saḥ || 59 || [Note: AHS6.21.059v/ 21.59dv mukhaṁ pāko mukhasya ca]
AHS6.21.060a/ adhaḥ pratihato vāyur arśo.gulma.kaphādibhiḥ |
AHS6.21.060c/ yāty ūrdhvaṁ vaktra.daurgandhyaṁ kurvann ūrdhva.gudas tu saḥ || 60 || [Note: AHS6.21.060v/ 21.60dv kurvann ūrdhva.gadas tu saḥ]
AHS6.21.061a/ mukhasya pitta.je pāke dāhoṣe tikta.vaktra.tā |
AHS6.21.061c/ kṣārokṣita.kṣata.samā vraṇās tad.vac ca rakta.je || 61 ||
AHS6.21.062a/ kapha.je madhurāsya.tvaṁ kaṇḍū.mat.picchilā vraṇāḥ |
AHS6.21.062c/ antaḥ.kapolam āśritya śyāva.pāṇḍu kapho 'rbudam || 62 || [Note: AHS6.21.062v/ 21.62dv śyāvaṁ pāṇḍu kapho 'rbudam]
[Page 646 ]
AHS6.21.063a/ kuryāt tad ghaṭṭitaṁ chinnaṁ mṛditaṁ ca vivardhate |
AHS6.21.063c/ mukha.pāko bhavet sāsraiḥ sarvaiḥ sarvākṛtir malaiḥ || 63 || [Note: AHS6.21.063v/ 21.63av kuryāt tat pāṭitaṁ chinnaṁ 21.63av kuryāt tad vyadhitaṁ chinnaṁ]
AHS6.21.064a/ pūty.āsya.tā ca tair eva danta.kāṣṭhādi.vidviṣaḥ |
AHS6.21.064c/ oṣṭhe gaṇḍe dvi.je mūle jihvāyāṁ tāluke gale || 64 ||
AHS6.21.065a/ vaktre sarva.tra cety uktāḥ pañca.saptatir āmayāḥ |
AHS6.21.065c/ ekā.daśaiko daśa ca trayo.daśa tathā ca ṣaṭ || 65 ||
AHS6.21.066a/ aṣṭāv aṣṭā.daśāṣṭau ca kramāt teṣv an.upakramāḥ |
AHS6.21.066c/ karālo māṁsa.raktauṣṭhāv arbudāni jalād vinā || 66 || [Note: AHS6.21.066v/ 21.66bv kramād eṣv an.upakramāḥ]
AHS6.21.067a/ kacchapas tālu.piṭikā galaughaḥ suṣiro mahān |
AHS6.21.067c/ svara.ghnordhva.guda.śyāva.śata.ghnī.valayālasāḥ || 67 || [Note: AHS6.21.067v/ 21.67cv svara.ghnordhva.gada.śyāva.]
AHS6.21.068a/ nāḍy.oṣṭha.kopau nicayād raktāt sarvaiś ca rohiṇī |
AHS6.21.068c/ daśane sphuṭite danta.bhedaḥ pakvopa.jihvikā || 68 ||
AHS6.21.069a/ gala.gaṇḍaḥ svara.bhraṁśī kṛcchrocchvāso 'ti.vatsaraḥ |
AHS6.21.069c/ yāpyas tu harṣo bhedaś ca śeṣāñ chastrauṣadhair jayet || 69 || [Note: AHS6.21.069v/ 21.69av gala.gaṇḍaḥ svara.bhraṁśaḥ]

6.22. Chapter 22 :: Atha mukharogapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 509-515]
AHS6.22.001a/ khaṇḍauṣṭhasya vilikhyāntau syūtvā vraṇa.vad ācaret |
AHS6.22.001c/ yaṣṭī.jyotiṣmatī.lodhra.śrāvaṇī.śārivotpalaiḥ || 1 ||
AHS6.22.002a/ paṭolyā kākamācyā ca tailam abhyañjanaṁ pacet |
AHS6.22.002c/ nasyaṁ ca tailaṁ vāta.ghna.madhura.skandha.sādhitam || 2 ||
AHS6.22.003a/ mahā.snehena vātauṣṭhe siddhenāktaḥ picur hitaḥ |
AHS6.22.003c/ deva.dhūpa.madhūcchiṣṭa.guggulv.amaradārubhiḥ || 3 ||
[Page 647 ]
AHS6.22.004a/ yaṣṭy.āhva.cūrṇa.yuktena tenaiva pratisāraṇam |
AHS6.22.004c/ nāḍy.oṣṭhaṁ svedayed dugdha.siddhair eraṇḍa.pallavaiḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS6.22.004v/ 22.4av yaṣṭy.āhva.cūrṇa.yuktais tu 22.4bv tair eva pratisāraṇam]
AHS6.22.005a/ khaṇḍauṣṭha.vihitaṁ nasyaṁ tasya mūrdhni ca tarpaṇam |
AHS6.22.005c/ pittābhighāta.jāv oṣṭhau jalaukobhir upācaret || 5 ||
AHS6.22.006a/ lodhra.sarja.rasa.kṣaudra.madhukaiḥ pratisāraṇam |
AHS6.22.006c/ guḍūcī.yaṣṭi.pattaṅga.siddham abhyañjane ghṛtam || 6 ||
AHS6.22.007a/ pitta.vidradhi.vac cātra kriyā śoṇita.je 'pi ca |
AHS6.22.007c/ idam eva nave kāryaṁ karmauṣṭhe tu kaphāture || 7 || [Note: AHS6.22.007v/ 22.7cv idam eva bhavet kāryaṁ 22.7dv karmauṣṭhe tu kaphottare]
AHS6.22.008a/ pāṭhā.kṣāra.madhu.vyoṣair hṛtāsre pratisāraṇam |
AHS6.22.008c/ dhūma.nāvana.gaṇḍūṣāḥ prayojyāś ca kapha.cchidaḥ || 8 ||
AHS6.22.009a/ svinnaṁ bhinnaṁ vi.medaskaṁ dahen medo.jam agninā |
AHS6.22.009c/ priyaṅgu.lodhra.tri.phalā.mākṣikaiḥ pratisārayet || 9 ||
AHS6.22.010a/ sa.kṣaudrā gharṣaṇaṁ tīkṣṇā bhinna.śuddhe jalārbude |
AHS6.22.010c/ avagāḍhe 'ti.vṛddhe vā kṣāro 'gnir vā pratikriyā || 10 || [Note: AHS6.22.010v/ 22.10av sa.kṣaudrair gharṣaṇaṁ tīkṣṇair 22.10dv kṣāro vahniḥ pratikriyā]
AHS6.22.011a/ āmādy.avasthāsv alajīṁ gaṇḍe śopha.vad ācaret |
AHS6.22.011c/ svinnasya śīta.dantasya pālīṁ vilikhitāṁ dahet || 11 ||
AHS6.22.012a/ tailena pratisāryā ca sa.kṣaudra.ghana.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS6.22.012c/ dāḍima.tvag.varā.tārkṣya.kāntā.jambv.asthi.nāgaraiḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.22.013a/ kavaḍaḥ kṣīriṇāṁ kvāthair aṇu.tailaṁ ca nāvanam |
AHS6.22.013c/ danta.harṣe tathā bhede sarvā vāta.harā kriyā || 13 || [Note: AHS6.22.013v/ 22.13cv danta.bhede tathā harṣe 22.13dv sarvā vāta.harāḥ kriyāḥ]
[Page 648 ]
AHS6.22.014a/ tila.yaṣṭīmadhu.śṛtaṁ kṣīraṁ gaṇḍūṣa.dhāraṇam |
AHS6.22.014c/ sa.snehaṁ daśa.mūlāmbu gaṇḍūṣaḥ pracalad.dvi.je || 14 || [Note: AHS6.22.014v/ 22.14cv sa.sneha.daśa.mūlāmbu. 22.14dv .gaṇḍūṣāḥ pracale dvi.je]
AHS6.22.015a/ tuttha.lodhra.kaṇā.śreṣṭhā.pattaṅga.paṭu.gharṣaṇam |
AHS6.22.015c/ snigdhāḥ śīlyā yathāvasthaṁ nasyānna.kavaḍādayaḥ || 15 || [Note: AHS6.22.015v/ 22.15dv gaṇḍūṣa.kavaḍādayaḥ]
AHS6.22.016a/ adhi.dantakam āliptaṁ yadā kṣāreṇa jarjaram |
AHS6.22.016c/ kṛmi.dantam ivotpāṭya tad.vac copacaret tadā || 16 ||
AHS6.22.017a/ an.avasthita.rakte ca dagdhe vraṇa iva kriyā |
AHS6.22.017c/ a.hiṁsan danta.mūlāni dantebhyaḥ śarkarāṁ haret || 17 ||
AHS6.22.018a/ kṣāra.cūrṇair madhu.yutais tataś ca pratisārayet |
AHS6.22.018c/ kapālikāyām apy evaṁ harṣoktaṁ ca samācaret || 18 ||
AHS6.22.019a/ jayed visrāvaṇaiḥ svinnam a.calaṁ kṛmi.dantakam |
AHS6.22.019c/ snigdhaiś cālepa.gaṇḍūṣa.nasyāhāraiś calāpahaiḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS6.22.019v/ 22.19bv a.balaṁ kṛmi.dantakam]
AHS6.22.020a/ guḍena pūrṇaṁ suṣiraṁ madhūcchiṣṭena vā dahet |
AHS6.22.020c/ saptacchadārka.kṣīrābhyāṁ pūraṇaṁ kṛmi.śūla.jit || 20 ||
AHS6.22.021a/ hiṅgu.kaṭphala.kāsīsa.svarjikā.kuṣṭha.vella.jam |
AHS6.22.021c/ rajo rujaṁ jayaty āśu vastra.sthaṁ daśane ghṛtam || 21 || [Note: AHS6.22.021v/ 22.21dv vastra.sthaṁ daśanair ghṛtam]
AHS6.22.021+1a/ alaktakaṁ vā sindhūtthaṁ vella.dhūmaṁ sa.hiṅgu vā |
AHS6.22.021+1c/ dhānyāmla.siddhaṁ śevālaṁ koṣṇaṁ vā daśana.sthitam || 21+1 || [Note: AHS6.22.021+1v/ 22.21+1bv veśma.dhūmaṁ sa.hiṅgu vā]
AHS6.22.021+2a/ varāhakarṇī.mūlaṁ vā śarapuṅkhā.jaṭātha.vā |
AHS6.22.021+2c/ vartir vāvalguja.phalair bījapūra.jaṭānvitaiḥ || 21+2 ||
[Page 649 ]
AHS6.22.022a/ gaṇḍūṣaṁ grāhayet tailam ebhir eva ca sādhitam |
AHS6.22.022c/ kvāthair vā yuktam eraṇḍa.dvi.vyāghrī.bhūkadamba.jaiḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS6.22.022v/ 22.22av gaṇḍūṣaṁ dhārayet tailam 22.22dv .vyāghrī.bhūrja.kadambakaiḥ]
AHS6.22.023a/ kriyā.yogair bahu.vidhair ity a.śānta.rujaṁ bhṛśam |
AHS6.22.023c/ dṛḍham apy uddhared dantaṁ pūrvaṁ mūlād vimokṣitam || 23 ||
AHS6.22.024a/ sandaṁśakena laghunā danta.nirghātanena vā |
AHS6.22.024c/ tailaṁ sa.yaṣṭy.āhva.rajo gaṇḍūṣo madhu vā tataḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.22.024v/ 22.24dv gaṇḍūṣo madhunā tataḥ]
AHS6.22.025a/ tato vidāri.yaṣṭy.āhva.śṛṅgāṭaka.kaserubhiḥ |
AHS6.22.025c/ tailaṁ daśa.guṇa.kṣīraṁ siddhaṁ yuñjīta nāvanam || 25 ||
AHS6.22.026a/ kṛśa.dur.bala.vṛddhānāṁ vātārtānāṁ ca noddharet |
AHS6.22.026c/ noddharec cottaraṁ dantaṁ bahūpadrava.kṛd dhi saḥ || 26 ||
AHS6.22.027a/ eṣām apy uddhṛtau snigdha.svādu.śīta.kramo hitaḥ |
AHS6.22.027c/ visrāvitāsre śītāde sa.kṣaudraiḥ pratisāraṇam || 27 || [Note: AHS6.22.027v/ 22.27av eṣām apy uddhṛtaiḥ snigdha.]
AHS6.22.028a/ mustārjuna.tvak.tri.phalā.phalinī.tārkṣya.nāgaraiḥ |
AHS6.22.028c/ tat.kvāthaḥ kavaḍo nasyaṁ tailaṁ madhura.sādhitam || 28 ||
AHS6.22.029a/ danta.māṁsāny upa.kuśe svinnāny uṣṇāmbu.dhāraṇaiḥ |
AHS6.22.029c/ maṇḍalāgreṇa śākādi.pattrair vā bahu.śo likhet || 29 ||
AHS6.22.030a/ tataś ca pratisāryāṇi ghṛta.maṇḍa.madhu.drutaiḥ |
AHS6.22.030c/ lākṣā.priyaṅgu.pattaṅga.lavaṇottama.gairikaiḥ || 30 || [Note: AHS6.22.030v/ 22.30bv ghṛta.maṇḍa.madhu.plutaiḥ]
AHS6.22.031a/ sa.kuṣṭha.śuṇṭhī.marica.yaṣṭīmadhu.rasāñjanaiḥ |
AHS6.22.031c/ sukhoṣṇo ghṛta.maṇḍo 'nu tailaṁ vā kavaḍa.grahaḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS6.22.031v/ 22.31dv tailaṁ vā kavaḍa.grahe]
[Page 650 ]
AHS6.22.032a/ ghṛtaṁ ca madhuraiḥ siddhaṁ hitaṁ kavaḍa.nasyayoḥ |
AHS6.22.032c/ danta.puppuṭake svinna.cchinna.bhinna.vilekhite || 32 || [Note: AHS6.22.032v/ 22.32av ghṛtaṁ vā madhuraiḥ siddhaṁ]
AHS6.22.033a/ yaṣṭy.āhva.svarjikā.śuṇṭhī.saindhavaiḥ pratisāraṇam |
AHS6.22.033c/ vidradhau kaṭu.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.rūkṣaiḥ kavaḍa.lepanam || 33 ||
AHS6.22.034a/ gharṣaṇaṁ kaṭukā.kuṣṭha.vṛścikālī.yavodbhavaiḥ |
AHS6.22.034c/ rakṣet pākaṁ himaiḥ pakvaḥ pāṭyo dāhyo 'vagāḍhakaḥ || 34 ||
AHS6.22.035a/ suṣire chinna.likhite sa.kṣaudraiḥ pratisāraṇam |
AHS6.22.035c/ lodhra.musta.miśi.śreṣṭhā.tārkṣya.pattaṅga.kiṁśukaiḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS6.22.035v/ 22.35av sauṣire chinna.likhite]
AHS6.22.036a/ sa.kaṭphalaiḥ kaṣāyaiś ca teṣāṁ gaṇḍūṣa iṣyate |
AHS6.22.036c/ yaṣṭī.lodhrotpalānantā.śārivāguru.candanaiḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS6.22.036v/ 22.36av sa.kaṭphalaiḥ kaṣāyaś ca]
AHS6.22.037a/ sa.gairika.sitā.puṇḍraiḥ siddhaṁ tailaṁ ca nāvanam |
AHS6.22.037c/ chittvādhi.māṁsakaṁ cūrṇaiḥ sa.kṣaudraiḥ pratisārayet || 37 ||
AHS6.22.038a/ vacā.tejovatī.pāṭhā.svarjikā.yava.śūka.jaiḥ |
AHS6.22.038c/ paṭola.nimba.tri.phalā.kaṣāyaḥ kavaḍo hitaḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS6.22.038v/ 22.38bv .svarjikā.yāva.śūka.jaiḥ]
AHS6.22.039a/ vidarbhe danta.mūlāni maṇḍalāgreṇa śodhayet |
AHS6.22.039c/ kṣāraṁ yuñjyāt tato nasyaṁ gaṇḍūṣādi ca śītalam || 39 ||
AHS6.22.040a/ saṁśodhyobhayataḥ kāyaṁ śiraś copacaret tataḥ |
AHS6.22.040c/ nāḍīṁ dantānugāṁ dantaṁ samuddhṛtyāgninā dahet || 40 ||
AHS6.22.041a/ kubjāṁ naika.gatiṁ pūrṇāṁ guḍena madanena vā |
AHS6.22.041c/ dhāvanaṁ jāti.madana.khadira.svādukaṇṭakaiḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS6.22.041v/ 22.41av nyubjāṁ naika.gatiṁ pūrṇāṁ 22.41bv guḍena madhunātha.vā]
[Page 651 ]
AHS6.22.042a/ kṣīri.vṛkṣāmbu.gaṇḍūṣo nasyaṁ tailaṁ ca tat.kṛtam |
AHS6.22.042c/ kuryād vātauṣṭha.kopoktaṁ kaṇṭakeṣv anilātmasu || 42 ||
AHS6.22.043a/ jihvāyāṁ pitta.jāteṣu ghṛṣṭeṣu rudhire srute |
AHS6.22.043c/ pratisāraṇa.gaṇḍūṣa.nāvanaṁ madhurair hitam || 43 ||
AHS6.22.044a/ tīkṣṇaiḥ kaphottheṣv evaṁ ca sarṣapa.try.ūṣaṇādibhiḥ |
AHS6.22.044c/ nave jihvālase 'py evaṁ taṁ tu śastreṇa na spṛśet || 44 || [Note: AHS6.22.044v/ 22.44av tīkṣṇaiḥ kaphottheṣv apy evaṁ 22.44av tīkṣṇaiḥ kaphottheṣv evaṁ tu]
AHS6.22.045a/ unnamya jihvām ākṛṣṭāṁ baḍiśenādhi.jihvikām |
AHS6.22.045c/ chedayen maṇḍalāgreṇa tīkṣṇoṣṇair gharṣaṇādi ca || 45 ||
AHS6.22.046a/ upa.jihvāṁ parisrāvya yava.kṣāreṇa gharṣayet |
AHS6.22.046c/ kapha.ghnaiḥ śuṇḍikā sādhyā nasya.gaṇḍūṣa.gharṣaṇaiḥ || 46 ||
AHS6.22.047a/ ervāru.bīja.pratimaṁ vṛddhāyām a.sirā.tatam |
AHS6.22.047c/ agraṁ niviṣṭaṁ jihvāyā baḍīśādy.avalambitam || 47 || [Note: AHS6.22.047v/ 22.47cv agraṁ niviṣṭaṁ jihvāyāṁ 22.47cv agre niviṣṭaṁ jihvāyā]
AHS6.22.048a/ chedayen maṇḍalāgreṇa nāty.agre na ca mūlataḥ |
AHS6.22.048c/ chede 'ty asṛk.kṣayān mṛtyur hīne vyādhir vivardhate || 48 || [Note: AHS6.22.048v/ 22.48bv nāty.agre nāti.mūlataḥ]
AHS6.22.049a/ maricātiviṣā.pāṭhā.vacā.kuṣṭha.kuṭannaṭaiḥ |
AHS6.22.049c/ chinnāyāṁ sa.paṭu.kṣaudrair gharṣaṇaṁ kavaḍaḥ punaḥ || 49 ||
AHS6.22.050a/ kaṭukātiviṣā.pāṭhā.nimba.rāsnā.vacāmbubhiḥ |
AHS6.22.050c/ saṅghāte puppuṭe kūrme vilikhyaivaṁ samācaret || 50 ||
AHS6.22.051a/ a.pakve tālu.pāke tu kāsīsa.kṣaudra.tārkṣya.jaiḥ |
AHS6.22.051c/ gharṣaṇaṁ kavaḍaḥ śīta.kaṣāya.madhurauṣadhaiḥ || 51 || [Note: AHS6.22.051v/ 22.51cv gharṣaṇaṁ kavaḍaḥ śītaḥ 22.51dv kaṣāya.madhurauṣadhaiḥ]
[Page 652 ]
AHS6.22.052a/ pakve 'ṣṭā.pada.vad bhinne tīkṣṇoṣṇaiḥ pratisāraṇam |
AHS6.22.052c/ vṛṣa.nimba.paṭolādyais tiktaiḥ kavaḍa.dhāraṇam || 52 ||
AHS6.22.053a/ tālu.śoṣe tv a.tṛṣṇasya sarpir uttara.bhaktikam |
AHS6.22.053c/ kaṇā.śuṇṭhī.śṛtaṁ pānam amlair gaṇḍūṣa.dhāraṇam || 53 || [Note: AHS6.22.053v/ 22.53av tālu.śoṣe tṛṣārtasya]
AHS6.22.054a/ dhanva.māṁsa.rasāḥ snigdhāḥ kṣīra.sarpiś ca nāvanam |
AHS6.22.054c/ kaṇṭha.rogeṣv asṛṅ.mokṣas tīkṣṇair nasyādi karma ca || 54 ||
AHS6.22.055a/ kvāthaḥ pānaṁ ca dārvī.tvaṅ.nimba.tārkṣya.kaliṅga.jaḥ |
AHS6.22.055c/ harītakī.kaṣāyo vā peyo mākṣika.saṁyutaḥ || 55 ||
AHS6.22.056a/ śreṣṭhā.vyoṣa.yava.kṣāra.dārvī.dvīpi.rasāñjanaiḥ |
AHS6.22.056c/ sa.pāṭhā.tejinī.nimbaiḥ śukta.go.mūtra.sādhitaiḥ || 56 ||
AHS6.22.057a/ kavaḍo guṭikā vātra kalpitā pratisāraṇam |
AHS6.22.057c/ niculaṁ kaṭabhī mustaṁ devadāru mahauṣadham || 57 || [Note: AHS6.22.057v/ 22.57av kavaḍo guṭikā cātra 22.57cv niculaṁ kaṭabhī mustā]
AHS6.22.058a/ vacā dantī ca mūrvā ca lepaḥ koṣṇo 'rti.śopha.hā |
AHS6.22.058c/ athāntar.bāhyataḥ svinnāṁ vāta.rohiṇikāṁ likhet || 58 ||
AHS6.22.059a/ aṅgulī.śastrakeṇāśu paṭu.yukta.nakhena vā |
AHS6.22.059c/ pañca.mūlāmbu kavaḍas tailaṁ gaṇḍūṣa.nāvanam || 59 ||
AHS6.22.060a/ visrāvya pitta.sambhūtāṁ sitā.kṣaudra.priyaṅgubhiḥ |
AHS6.22.060c/ gharṣet sa.lodhra.pattaṅgaiḥ kavaḍaḥ kvathitaiś ca taiḥ || 60 ||
AHS6.22.061a/ drākṣā.parūṣaka.kvātho hitaś ca kavaḍa.grahe |
AHS6.22.061c/ upācared evam eva pratyākhyāyāsra.sambhavām || 61 ||
[Page 653 ]
AHS6.22.062a/ sāgāra.dhūmaiḥ kaṭukaiḥ kapha.jāṁ pratisārayet |
AHS6.22.062c/ nasya.gaṇḍūṣayos tailaṁ sādhitaṁ ca praśasyate || 62 ||
AHS6.22.063a/ apāmārga.phala.śvetā.dantī.jantughna.saindhavaiḥ |
AHS6.22.063c/ tad.vac ca vṛnda.śālūka.tuṇḍikerī.gilāyuṣu || 63 || [Note: AHS6.22.063v/ 22.63dv .tuṇḍikerī.galāyuṣu]
AHS6.22.064a/ vidradhau srāvite śreṣṭhā.rocanā.tārkṣya.gairikaiḥ |
AHS6.22.064c/ sa.lodhra.paṭu.pattaṅga.kaṇair gaṇḍūṣa.gharṣaṇe || 64 || [Note: AHS6.22.064v/ 22.64dv .kaṇair gaṇḍūṣa.dhāraṇam 22.64dv .kaṇair gaṇḍūṣa.gharṣaṇam]
AHS6.22.065a/ gala.gaṇḍaḥ pavana.jaḥ svinno niḥsruta.śoṇitaḥ |
AHS6.22.065c/ tilair bījaiś ca laṭvomā.priyāla.śaṇa.sambhavaiḥ || 65 || [Note: AHS6.22.065v/ 22.65bv svinno visruta.śoṇitaḥ]
AHS6.22.066a/ upanāhyo vraṇe rūḍhe pralepyaś ca punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS6.22.066c/ śigru.tilvaka.tarkārī.gaja.kṛṣṇā.punarnavaiḥ || 66 ||
AHS6.22.067a/ kālāmṛtārka.mūlaiś ca puṣpaiś ca karahāṭa.jaiḥ |
AHS6.22.067c/ ekaiṣīkānvitaiḥ piṣṭaiḥ surayā kāñjikena vā || 67 || [Note: AHS6.22.067v/ 22.67av tāla.mūlārka.mūlaiś ca 22.67bv puṣpaiś ca karaghāṭa.jaiḥ]
AHS6.22.068a/ guḍūcī.nimba.kuṭaja.haṁsapadī.balā.dvayaiḥ |
AHS6.22.068c/ sādhitaṁ pāyayet tailaṁ sa.kṛṣṇā.devadārubhiḥ || 68 ||
AHS6.22.069a/ kartavyaṁ kapha.je 'py etat sveda.vimlāpane tv ati |
AHS6.22.069c/ lepo 'jagandhātiviṣā.viśalyāḥ sa.viṣāṇikāḥ || 69 ||
AHS6.22.070a/ guñjālābu.śukāhvāś ca palāśa.kṣāra.kalkitāḥ |
AHS6.22.070c/ mūtra.srutaṁ haṭha.kṣāraṁ paktvā kodrava.bhuk pibet || 70 || [Note: AHS6.22.070v/ 22.70cv mūtra.śṛtaṁ yava.kṣāraṁ 22.70cv mūtra.srutaṁ yava.kṣāraṁ 22.70cv sūtra.srutaṁ yava.kṣāraṁ]
AHS6.22.071a/ sādhitaṁ vatsakādyair vā tailaṁ sa.paṭu.pañcakaiḥ |
AHS6.22.071c/ kapha.ghnān dhūma.vamana.nāvanādīṁś ca śīlayet || 71 || [Note: AHS6.22.071v/ 22.71cv kapha.ghnān dhūma.gaṇḍūṣān 22.71dv vamanādīṁś ca śīlayet]
[Page 654 ]
AHS6.22.072a/ medo.bhave sirāṁ vidhyet kapha.ghnaṁ ca vidhiṁ bhajet |
AHS6.22.072c/ asanādi.rajaś cainaṁ prātar mūtreṇa pāyayet || 72 ||
AHS6.22.073a/ a.śāntau pācayitvā ca sarvān vraṇa.vad ācaret |
AHS6.22.073c/ mukha.pākeṣu sa.kṣaudrā prayojyā mukha.dhāvanāḥ || 73 || [Note: AHS6.22.073v/ 22.73av a.śāntau pāṭayitvā ca 22.73dv prayojyā mukha.pāvanāḥ]
AHS6.22.074a/ kvathitās tri.phalā.pāṭhā.mṛdvīkā.jāti.pallavāḥ |
AHS6.22.074c/ niṣṭhevyā bhakṣayitvā vā kuṭherādir gaṇo 'tha.vā || 74 || [Note: AHS6.22.074v/ 22.74cv nighṛṣṭavyā bhakṣayitvā]
AHS6.22.075a/ mukha.pāke 'nilāt kṛṣṇā.paṭv.elāḥ pratisāraṇam |
AHS6.22.075c/ tailaṁ vāta.haraiḥ siddhaṁ hitaṁ kavaḍa.nasyayoḥ || 75 ||
AHS6.22.076a/ pittāsre pitta.rakta.ghnaḥ kapha.ghnaś ca kaphe vidhiḥ |
AHS6.22.076c/ likhec chākādi.pattraiś ca piṭikāḥ kaṭhināḥ sthirāḥ || 76 || [Note: AHS6.22.076v/ 22.76av pittāsre rakta.pitta.ghnaḥ]
AHS6.22.077a/ yathā.doṣodayaṁ kuryāt sannipāte cikitsitam |
AHS6.22.077c/ nave 'rbude tv a.saṁvṛddhe chedite pratisāraṇam || 77 ||
AHS6.22.078a/ svarjikā.nāgara.kṣaudraiḥ kvātho gaṇḍūṣa iṣyate |
AHS6.22.078c/ guḍūcī.nimba.kalkottho madhu.taila.samanvitaḥ || 78 ||
AHS6.22.079a/ yavānna.bhuk tīkṣṇa.taila.nasyābhyaṅgāṁs tathācaret |
AHS6.22.079c/ vamite pūti.vadane dhūmas tīkṣṇaḥ sa.nāvanaḥ || 79 ||
AHS6.22.080a/ samaṅgā.dhātakī.lodhra.phalinī.padmakair jalam |
AHS6.22.080c/ dhāvanaṁ vadanasyāntaś cūrṇitair avacūrṇitam || 80 || [Note: AHS6.22.080v/ 22.80dv cūrṇitair avacūrṇanam]
AHS6.22.081a/ śītādopa.kuśoktaṁ ca nāvanādi ca śīlayet || 81ab ||
AHS6.22.081c/ phala.traya.dvīpi.kirātatikta.yaṣṭy.āhva.siddhārtha.kaṭu.trikāṇi || 81cd ||
AHS6.22.081e/ mustā.haridrā.dvaya.yāva.śūka.vṛkṣāmlakāmlāgrima.vetasāś ca || 81ef ||
[Page 655 ]
AHS6.22.082a/ aśvattha.jambv.āmra.dhanañjaya.tvak tvak cāhimārāt khadirasya sāraḥ |
AHS6.22.082c/ kvāthena teṣāṁ ghana.tāṁ gatena tac.cūrṇa.yuktā guṭikā vidheyāḥ || 82 ||
AHS6.22.083a/ tā dhāritā ghnanti mukhena nityaṁ kaṇṭhauṣṭha.tālv.ādi.gadān su.kṛcchrān |
AHS6.22.083c/ viśeṣato rohiṇikāsya.śoṣa.gandhān videhādhipati.praṇītāḥ || 83 ||
AHS6.22.084a/ khadira.tulām ambu.ghaṭe paktvā toyena tena piṣṭaiś ca |
AHS6.22.084c/ candana.joṅgaka.kuṅkuma.paripelava.vālakośīraiḥ || 84 ||
AHS6.22.085a/ surataru.lodhra.drākṣā.mañjiṣṭhā.coca.padmaka.viḍaṅgaiḥ |
AHS6.22.085c/ spṛkkā.nata.nakha.kaṭphala.sūkṣmailā.dhyāmakaiḥ sa.pattaṅgaiḥ || 85 ||
AHS6.22.086a/ taila.prasthaṁ vipacet karṣāṁśaiḥ pāna.nasya.gaṇḍūṣais tat |
AHS6.22.086c/ hatvāsye sarva.gadān janayati gārdhrīṁ dṛśaṁ śrutiṁ ca vārāhīm || 86 || [Note: AHS6.22.086v/ 22.86bv karṣāṁśaiḥ pāna.nasya.gaṇḍūṣaiḥ 22.86cv hanty āsye sarva.gadān]
AHS6.22.087a/ udvartitaṁ ca prapunāṭa.lodhra.dārvībhir abhyaktam anena vaktram |
AHS6.22.087c/ nir.vyaṅga.nīlī.mukha.dūṣikādi sañjāyate candra.samāna.kānti || 87 || [Note: AHS6.22.087v/ 22.87cv nir.vyaṅga.nīlī.mukha.dūṣikaṁ ca]
AHS6.22.088a/ pala.śataṁ bāṇāt toya.ghaṭe paktvā rase 'smiṁś ca palārdhikaiḥ |
AHS6.22.088c/ khadira.jambū.yaṣṭyānantāmrair ahimāra.nīlotpalānvitaiḥ || 88 || [Note: AHS6.22.088v/ 22.88cv khadira.jambū.yaṣṭyānantā.lodhrair]
AHS6.22.089a/ taila.prasthaṁ pācayec chlakṣṇa.piṣṭair ebhir dravyair dhāritaṁ tan mukhena |
AHS6.22.089c/ rogān sarvān hanti vaktre viśeṣāt sthairyaṁ dhatte danta.paṅkteś calāyāḥ || 89 || [Note: AHS6.22.089v/ 22.89av taila.prasthaṁ pācayet sūkṣma.piṣṭair 22.89bv ebhir dravyair dhāritaṁ tat sukhena]
AHS6.22.090a/ khadira.sārād dve tule paced valkāt tulāṁ cārimedasaḥ |
AHS6.22.090c/ ghaṭa.catuṣke pāda.śeṣe 'smin pūte punaḥ kvathanād ghane || 90 || [Note: AHS6.22.090v/ 22.90av khadira.sārād dve tule vipaced 22.90bv valka.tulāṁ cārimedasaḥ 22.90bv valkala.tulāṁ cārimedasaḥ 22.90bv valkala.tulāṁ cārimedataḥ 22.90dv 'smin pūte punaḥ kvāthanād ghane 22.90dv 'smin pūte punaḥ kvāthayed ghane]
AHS6.22.091a/ ākṣikaṁ kṣipet su.sūkṣmaṁ rajaḥ sevyāmbu.pattaṅga.gairikam |
AHS6.22.091c/ candana.dvaya.lodhra.puṇḍrāhva.yaṣṭy.āhva.lākṣāñjana.dvayam || 91 || [Note: AHS6.22.091v/ 22.91av ākṣikaṁ kṣipet su.sūkṣma.rajaḥ 22.91av ākṣikaṁ ca kṣipet sūkṣma.rajaḥ 22.91av kārṣikaṁ kṣipet su.sūkṣma.rajaḥ 22.91cv candana.dvaya.śyāmā.puṇḍrāhva.]
[Page 656 ]
AHS6.22.092a/ dhātakī.kaṭphala.dvi.niśā.tri.phalā.catur.jāta.joṅgakam |
AHS6.22.092c/ musta.mañjiṣṭhā.nyagrodha.praroha.māṁsī.yavāsakam || 92 || [Note: AHS6.22.092v/ 22.92dv ndha.praroha.vacā.māṁsī.yavāsakam]
AHS6.22.093a/ padmakailā.samaṅgāś ca śīte tasmiṁs tathā pālikāṁ pṛthak |
AHS6.22.093c/ jātīpattrikāṁ sa.jāti.phalāṁ saha.lavaṅga.kaṇkollakām || 93 || [Note: AHS6.22.093v/ 22.93av padmakaileya.samaṅgāś ca 22.93bv śīte tathā pālikāṁ pṛthak 22.93dv saha.nakha.lavaṅga.kaṅkollakām]
AHS6.22.094a/ sphaṭika.śubhra.surabhi.karpūra.kuḍavaṁ ca tatrāvapet tataḥ |
AHS6.22.094c/ kārayed guṭikāḥ sadā caitā dhāryā mukhe tad.gadāpahāḥ || 94 || [Note: AHS6.22.094v/ 22.94cv kārayed guṭikāś caitā 22.94cv kāryāś caitā guṭikā]
AHS6.22.095a/ kvāthyauṣadha.vyatyaya.yojanena tailaṁ pacet kalpanayānayaiva |
AHS6.22.095c/ sarvāsya.rogoddhṛtaye tad āhur danta.sthira.tve tv idam eva mukhyam || 95 || [Note: AHS6.22.095v/ 22.95av kvāthauṣadha.vyatyaya.yojanena 22.95cv sarvāsya.roga.praśamārtham uktaṁ 22.95cv sarvāsya.roge vyayanaṁ tad āhur]
AHS6.22.096a/ khadireṇaitā guṭikās tailam idaṁ cārimedasā prathitam |
AHS6.22.096c/ anuśīlayan prati.dinaṁ svastho 'pi dṛḍha.dvi.jo bhavati || 96 || [Note: AHS6.22.096v/ 22.96dv vṛddho 'pi dṛḍha.dvi.jo bhavati]
AHS6.22.097a/ kṣudrā.guḍūcī.sumanaḥ.pravāla.dārvī.yavāsa.tri.phalā.kaṣāyaḥ |
AHS6.22.097c/ kṣaudreṇa yuktaḥ kavaḍa.graho 'yaṁ sarvāmayān vaktra.gatān nihanti || 97 || [Note: AHS6.22.097v/ 22.97av drākṣā.guḍūcī.sumanaḥ.pravāla.]
AHS6.22.098a/ pāṭhā.dārvī.tvak.kuṣṭha.mustā.samaṅgā.tiktā.pītāṅgī.lodhra.tejovatīnām |
AHS6.22.098c/ cūrṇaḥ sa.kṣaudro danta.māṁsārti.kaṇḍū.pāka.srāvāṇāṁ nāśano gharṣaṇena || 98 ||
AHS6.22.099a/ gṛha.dhūma.tārkṣya.pāṭhā.vyoṣa.kṣārāgny.ayo.varā.tejo.hvaiḥ |
AHS6.22.099c/ mukha.danta.gala.vikāre sa.kṣaudraḥ kālako vidhāryaś cūrṇaḥ || 99 || [Note: AHS6.22.099v/ 22.99dv sa.kṣaudraḥ kāliko vidhāryaś cūrṇaḥ]
AHS6.22.100a/ dārvī.tvak.sindhūdbhava.manaḥśilā.yāva.śūka.haritālaiḥ |
AHS6.22.100c/ dhāryaḥ pītaka.cūrṇo dantāsya.galāmaye sa.madhv.ājyaḥ || 100 ||
AHS6.22.101a/ dvi.kṣāra.dhūmaka.varā.pañca.paṭu.vyoṣa.vella.giri.tārkṣyaiḥ |
AHS6.22.101c/ go.mūtreṇa vipakvā galāmaya.ghnī rasa.kriyā eṣā || 101 || [Note: AHS6.22.101v/ 22.101av dvi.kṣāra.gṛha.dhūmaka.varā. 22.101cv go.mūtreṇa piban kvāthaṁ]
[Page 657 ]
AHS6.22.102a/ go.mūtra.kvathana.vilīna.vigrahāṇāṁ pathyānāṁ jala.miśi.kuṣṭha.bhāvitānām |
AHS6.22.102c/ attāraṁ naram aṇavo 'pi vaktra.rogāḥ śrotāraṁ nṛpam iva na spṛśanty an.arthāḥ || 102 ||
AHS6.22.103a/ saptacchadośīra.paṭola.musta.harītakī.tiktaka.rohiṇībhiḥ |
AHS6.22.103c/ yaṣṭy.āhva.rājadruma.candanaiś ca kvāthaṁ pibet pāka.haraṁ mukhasya || 103 ||
AHS6.22.104a/ paṭola.śuṇṭhī.tri.phalā.viśālā.trāyanti.tiktā.dvi.niśāmṛtānām |
AHS6.22.104c/ pītaḥ kaṣāyo madhunā nihanti mukhe sthitaś cāsya.gadān a.śeṣān || 104 || [Note: AHS6.22.104v/ 22.104dv mukhotthitāṁś cāśu gadān a.śeṣān]
AHS6.22.105a/ sva.rasaḥ kvathito dārvyā ghanī.bhūtaḥ sa.gairikaḥ |
AHS6.22.105c/ āsya.sthaḥ sa.madhur vaktra.pāka.nāḍī.vraṇāpahaḥ || 105 ||
AHS6.22.106a/ paṭola.nimba.yaṣṭy.āhva.vāsā.jāty.arimedasām |
AHS6.22.106c/ khadirasya varāyāś ca pṛthag evaṁ prakalpanā || 106 ||
AHS6.22.107a/ khadirāyo.varā.pārtha.madayanty.ahimārakaiḥ |
AHS6.22.107c/ gaṇḍūṣo 'mbu.śṛtair dhāryo dur.bala.dvi.ja.śāntaye || 107 ||
AHS6.22.108a/ mukha.danta.mūla.gala.jāḥ prāyo rogāḥ kaphāsra.bhūyiṣṭhāḥ |
AHS6.22.108c/ tasmāt teṣām a.sakṛd rudhiraṁ visrāvayed duṣṭam || 108 ||
AHS6.22.109a/ kāya.śirasor vireko vamanaṁ kavaḍa.grahāś ca kaṭu.tiktāḥ |
AHS6.22.109c/ prāyaḥ śastaṁ teṣāṁ kapha.rakta.haraṁ tathā karma || 109 ||
AHS6.22.110a/ yava.tṛṇa.dhānyaṁ bhaktaṁ vidalaiḥ kṣāroṣitair apa.snehāḥ |
AHS6.22.110c/ yūṣā bhakṣyāś ca hitā yac cānyac chleṣma.nāśāya || 110 || [Note: AHS6.22.110v/ 22.110av yava.tṛṇa.dhānyaṁ bhuktaṁ 22.110bv vidalaiḥ kṣāroṣitair apa.sneham]
AHS6.22.111a/ prāṇānila.patha.saṁsthāḥ śvasitam api nirundhate pramāda.vataḥ |
AHS6.22.111c/ kaṇṭhāmayāś cikitsitam ato drutaṁ teṣu kurvīta || 111 ||

6.23. Chapter 23 :: Atha śirorogavijñānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 515-517] [Page 658 ]
AHS6.23.001a/ dhūmātapa.tuṣārāmbu.krīḍāti.svapna.jāgaraiḥ |
AHS6.23.001c/ utsvedādhi.puro.vāta.bāṣpa.nigraha.rodanaiḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS6.23.001v/ 23.1cv unmādādhi.puro.vāta.]
AHS6.23.002a/ aty.ambu.madya.pānena kṛmibhir vega.dhāraṇaiḥ |
AHS6.23.002c/ upadhāna.mṛjābhyaṅga.dveṣādhaḥ.pratatekṣaṇaiḥ || 2 ||
AHS6.23.003a/ a.sātmya.gandha.duṣṭāma.bhāṣyādyaiś ca śiro.gatāḥ |
AHS6.23.003c/ janayanty āmayān doṣās tatra māruta.kopataḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS6.23.003v/ 23.3av a.sātmya.gandha.duṣṭāmbu.]
AHS6.23.004a/ nistudyete bhṛśaṁ śaṅkhau ghāṭā sambhidyate tathā |
AHS6.23.004c/ bhruvor madhyaṁ lalāṭaṁ ca patatīvāti.vedanam || 4 || [Note: AHS6.23.004v/ 23.4cv bhruvor madhye lalāṭaṁ ca]
AHS6.23.005a/ bādhyete svanataḥ śrotre niṣkṛṣyete ivākṣiṇī |
AHS6.23.005c/ ghūrṇatīva śiraḥ sarvaṁ sandhibhya iva mucyate || 5 ||
AHS6.23.006a/ sphuraty ati sirā.jālaṁ kandharā.hanu.saṅgrahaḥ |
AHS6.23.006c/ prakāśā.saha.tā ghrāṇa.srāvo '.kasmād vyathā.śamau || 6 ||
AHS6.23.007a/ mārdavaṁ mardana.sneha.sveda.bandhaiś ca jāyate |
AHS6.23.007c/ śiras.tāpo 'yam ardhe tu mūrdhnaḥ so 'rdhāvabhedakaḥ || 7 ||
AHS6.23.008a/ pakṣāt kupyati māsād vā svayam eva ca śāmyati |
AHS6.23.008c/ ati.vṛddhas tu nayanaṁ śravaṇaṁ vā vināśayet || 8 ||
AHS6.23.009a/ śiro.'bhitāpe pittotthe śiro.dhūmāyanaṁ jvaraḥ |
AHS6.23.009c/ svedo 'kṣi.dahanaṁ mūrchā niśi śītaiś ca mārdavam || 9 ||
AHS6.23.010a/ a.ruciḥ kapha.je mūrdhno guru.stimita.śīta.tā |
AHS6.23.010c/ sirā.niṣpanda.tālasyaṁ ruṅ mandāhny adhikā niśi || 10 ||
[Page 659 ]
AHS6.23.011a/ tandrā śūnākṣi.kūṭa.tvaṁ karṇa.kaṇḍūyanaṁ vamiḥ |
AHS6.23.011c/ raktāt pittādhika.rujaḥ sarvaiḥ syāt sarva.lakṣaṇaḥ || 11 ||
AHS6.23.012a/ saṅkīrṇair bhojanair mūrdhni kledite rudhirāmiṣe |
AHS6.23.012c/ kopite sannipāte ca jāyante mūrdhni jantavaḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.23.013a/ śirasas te pibanto 'sraṁ ghorāḥ kurvanti vedanāḥ |
AHS6.23.013c/ citta.vibhraṁśa.jananīr jvaraḥ kāso bala.kṣayaḥ || 13 ||
AHS6.23.014a/ raukṣya.śopha.vyadha.ccheda.dāha.sphuraṇa.pūti.tāḥ |
AHS6.23.014c/ kapāle tālu.śirasoḥ kaṇḍūḥ śoṣaḥ pramīlakaḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS6.23.014v/ 23.14av raukṣya.śophe vyadha.ccheda. 23.14bv .dāha.sphuṭana.pūti.tāḥ 23.14dv kaṇḍūḥ śophaḥ pramīlakaḥ 23.14dv kaṇḍūḥ śopho '.pramīlakaḥ]
AHS6.23.015a/ tāmrāccha.siṅghāṇaka.tā karṇa.nādaś ca jantu.je |
AHS6.23.015c/ vātolbaṇāḥ śiraḥ.kampaṁ tat.sañjñaṁ kurvate malāḥ || 15 ||
AHS6.23.016a/ pitta.pradhānair vātādyaiḥ śaṅkhe śophaḥ sa.śoṇitaiḥ |
AHS6.23.016c/ tīvra.dāha.rujā.rāga.pralāpa.jvara.tṛḍ.bhramāḥ || 16 ||
AHS6.23.017a/ tiktāsyaḥ pīta.vadanaḥ kṣipra.kārī sa śaṅkhakaḥ |
AHS6.23.017c/ tri.rātrāj jīvitaṁ hanti sidhyaty apy āśu sādhitaḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS6.23.017v/ 23.17dv sidhyaty āśu su.sādhitaḥ]
AHS6.23.018a/ pittānubaddhaḥ śaṅkhākṣi.bhrū.lalāṭeṣu mārutaḥ |
AHS6.23.018c/ rujaṁ sa.spandanāṁ kuryād anu.sūryodayodayām || 18 || [Note: AHS6.23.018v/ 23.18av pittānubandhaḥ śaṅkhākṣi.]
AHS6.23.019a/ ā.madhyāhnaṁ vivardhiṣṇuḥ kṣud.vataḥ sā viśeṣataḥ |
AHS6.23.019c/ a.vyavasthita.śītoṣṇa.sukhā śāmyaty ataḥ param || 19 ||
AHS6.23.020a/ sūryāvartaḥ sa ity uktā daśa rogāḥ śiro.gatāḥ |
AHS6.23.020c/ śirasy eva ca vakṣyante kapāle vyādhayo nava || 20 ||
[Page 660 ]
AHS6.23.021a/ kapāle pavane duṣṭe garbha.sthasyāpi jāyate |
AHS6.23.021c/ sa.varṇo nī.rujaḥ śophas taṁ vidyād upa.śīrṣakam || 21 ||
AHS6.23.022a/ yathā.doṣodayaṁ brūyāt piṭikārbuda.vidradhīn |
AHS6.23.022c/ kapāle kleda.bahulāḥ pittāsṛk.śleṣma.jantubhiḥ || 22 ||
AHS6.23.023a/ kaṅgu.siddhārthaka.nibhāḥ piṭikāḥ syur arūṁṣikāḥ |
AHS6.23.023c/ kaṇḍū.keśa.cyuti.svāpa.raukṣya.kṛt sphuṭanaṁ tvacaḥ || 23 || [Note: AHS6.23.023v/ 23.23dv .rūkṣa.kṛt sphuṭanaṁ tvacaḥ]
AHS6.23.024a/ su.sūkṣmaṁ kapha.vātābhyāṁ vidyād dāruṇakaṁ tu tat |
AHS6.23.024c/ roma.kūpānugaṁ pittaṁ vātena saha mūrchitam || 24 || [Note: AHS6.23.024v/ 23.24bv vidyād dāruṇakaṁ ca tat]
AHS6.23.025a/ pracyāvayati romāṇi tataḥ śleṣmā sa.śoṇitaḥ |
AHS6.23.025c/ roma.kūpān ruṇaddhy asya tenānyeṣām a.sambhavaḥ || 25 ||
AHS6.23.026a/ tad indra.luptaṁ rujyāṁ ca prāhuś cāceti cāpare |
AHS6.23.026c/ khalater api janmaivaṁ śātanaṁ tatra tu kramāt || 26 || [Note: AHS6.23.026v/ 23.26av tad indra.luptaṁ tajjāṁ ca 23.26av tad indra.luptaṁ tajhjhāṁ ca 23.26av tad indra.luptaṁ tahnāś ca 23.26av tad indra.luptaṁ rūḍhyāṁ ca 23.26dv śatanaṁ tatra tu kramāt 23.26dv śadanaṁ tatra tu kramāt 23.26dv sadanaṁ tatra tu kramāt]
AHS6.23.027a/ sā vātād agni.dagdhābhā pittāt svinna.sirāvṛtā |
AHS6.23.027c/ kaphād ghana.tvag varṇāṁś ca yathā.svaṁ nirdiśet tvaci || 27 || [Note: AHS6.23.027v/ 23.27bv pittāt snigdha.sirāvṛtā 23.27bv pittāt snigdhā sirāvṛtā 23.27bv pittāt pīta.sirāvṛtā]
AHS6.23.028a/ doṣaiḥ sarvākṛtiḥ sarvair a.sādhyā sā nakha.prabhā |
AHS6.23.028c/ dagdhāgnineva nī.romā sa.dāhā yā ca jāyate || 28 || [Note: AHS6.23.028v/ 23.28dv sa.dāhoṣā ca jāyate]
AHS6.23.029a/ śoka.śrama.krodha.kṛtaḥ śarīroṣmā śiro.gataḥ |
AHS6.23.029c/ keśān sa.doṣaḥ pacati palitaṁ sambhavaty ataḥ || 29 ||
AHS6.23.030a/ tad vātāt sphuṭitaṁ śyāvaṁ kharaṁ rūkṣaṁ jala.prabham |
AHS6.23.030c/ pittāt sa.dāhaṁ pītābhaṁ kaphāt snigdhaṁ vivṛddhi.mat || 30 ||
[Page 661 ]
AHS6.23.031a/ sthūlaṁ su.śuklaṁ sarvais tu vidyād vyāmiśra.lakṣaṇam |
AHS6.23.031c/ śiro.rujodbhavaṁ cānyad vi.varṇaṁ sparśanā.saham || 31 || [Note: AHS6.23.031v/ 23.31av sthūlaṁ sa.śuklaṁ sarvais tu]
AHS6.23.032a/ a.sādhyā sannipātena khalatiḥ palitāni ca |
AHS6.23.032c/ śarīra.pariṇāmotthāny apekṣante rasāyanam || 32 ||

6.24. Chapter 24 :: Atha śirorogapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 517-519]
AHS6.24.001a/ śiro.'bhitāpe 'nila.je vāta.vyādhi.vidhiṁ caret |
AHS6.24.001c/ ghṛtam akta.śirā rātrau pibed uṣṇa.payo.'nupaḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS6.24.001v/ 24.1cv ghṛtam akta.śiro rātrau 24.1cv ghṛtābhyakta.śiro rātrau 24.1dv pibet sarpiḥ payo.'nupaḥ]
AHS6.24.002a/ māṣān kulatthān mudgān vā tad.vat khāded ghṛtānvitān |
AHS6.24.002c/ tailaṁ tilānāṁ kalkaṁ vā kṣīreṇa saha pāyayet || 2 ||
AHS6.24.003a/ piṇḍopanāha.svedāś ca māṁsa.dhānya.kṛtā hitāḥ |
AHS6.24.003c/ vāta.ghna.daśa.mūlādi.siddha.kṣīreṇa secanam || 3 ||
AHS6.24.004a/ snigdhaṁ nasyaṁ tathā dhūmaḥ śiraḥ.śravaṇa.tarpaṇam |
AHS6.24.004c/ varaṇādau gaṇe kṣuṇṇe kṣīram ardhodakaṁ pacet || 4 || [Note: AHS6.24.004v/ 24.4cv varuṇādau gaṇe kṣuṇṇe]
AHS6.24.005a/ kṣīrāvaśiṣṭaṁ tac chītaṁ mathitvā sāram āharet |
AHS6.24.005c/ tato madhurakaiḥ siddhaṁ nasyaṁ tat pūjitaṁ haviḥ || 5 ||
AHS6.24.006a/ varge 'tra pakvaṁ kṣīre ca peyaṁ sarpiḥ sa.śarkaram |
AHS6.24.006c/ kārpāsa.majjā tvaṅ mustā sumanaḥ.korakāṇi ca || 6 || [Note: AHS6.24.006v/ 24.6av tasmin vipakvaṁ kṣīre ca 24.6cv kārpāsa.majjā tvaṅ mustaṁ 24.6dv sumanaḥ.kṣārakāṇi ca]
AHS6.24.007a/ nasyam uṣṇāmbu.piṣṭāni sarva.mūrdha.rujāpaham |
AHS6.24.007c/ śarkarā.kuṅkuma.śṛtaṁ ghṛtaṁ pittāsṛg.anvaye || 7 ||
AHS6.24.008a/ pralepaiḥ sa.ghṛtaiḥ kuṣṭha.kuṭilotpala.candanaiḥ |
AHS6.24.008c/ vātodreka.bhayād raktaṁ na cāsminn avasecayet || 8 ||
[Page 662 ]
AHS6.24.009a/ ity a.śāntau cale dāhaḥ kaphe ceṣṭo yathoditaḥ |
AHS6.24.009c/ ardhāvabhedake 'py eṣā tathā doṣānvayāt kriyā || 9 || [Note: AHS6.24.009v/ 24.9bv kaphe coṣṇaṁ yathoditam 24.9dv yathā.doṣānvayā kriyā 24.9dv yathā.doṣānvaye kriyā]
AHS6.24.010a/ śirīṣa.bījāpāmārga.mūlaṁ nasyaṁ viḍānvitam |
AHS6.24.010c/ sthirā.raso vā lepe tu prapunnāṭo 'mla.kalkitaḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS6.24.010v/ 24.10cv sthirā.raso vā lepo 'tra]
AHS6.24.011a/ sūryāvarte 'pi tasmiṁs tu sirayāpahared asṛk |
AHS6.24.011c/ śiro.'bhitāpe pittotthe snigdhasya vyadhayet sirām || 11 || [Note: AHS6.24.011v/ 24.11av sūryāvarte tu tasmiṁs tu]
AHS6.24.012a/ śītāḥ śiro.mukhālepa.seka.śodhana.vastayaḥ |
AHS6.24.012c/ jīvanīya.śṛte kṣīra.sarpiṣī pāna.nasyayoḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.24.013a/ kartavyaṁ rakta.je 'py etat pratyākhyāya ca śaṅkhake |
AHS6.24.013c/ śleṣmābhitāpe jīrṇājya.snehitaiḥ kaṭukair vamet || 13 ||
AHS6.24.014a/ sveda.pralepa.nasyādyā rūkṣa.tīkṣṇoṣṇa.bheṣajaiḥ |
AHS6.24.014c/ śasyante copavāso 'tra nicaye miśram ācaret || 14 || [Note: AHS6.24.014v/ 24.14cv śasyate copavāso 'tra]
AHS6.24.015a/ kṛmi.je śoṇitaṁ nasyaṁ tena mūrchanti jantavaḥ |
AHS6.24.015c/ mattāḥ śoṇita.gandhena niryānti ghrāṇa.vaktrayoḥ || 15 || [Note: AHS6.24.015v/ 24.15dv niryānti ghrāṇa.vaktrataḥ]
AHS6.24.016a/ su.tīkṣṇa.nasya.dhūmābhyāṁ kuryān nirharaṇaṁ tataḥ |
AHS6.24.016c/ viḍaṅga.svarjikā.dantī.hiṅgu.go.mūtra.sādhitam || 16 ||
AHS6.24.017a/ kaṭu.nimbeṅgudī.pīlu.tailaṁ nasyaṁ pṛthak pṛthak |
AHS6.24.017c/ ajā.mūtra.drutaṁ nasyaṁ kṛmijit kṛmi.jit param || 17 || [Note: AHS6.24.017v/ 24.17cv ajā.mūtra.drutaṁ nasye]
AHS6.24.018a/ pūti.matsya.yutaiḥ kuryād dhūmaṁ nāvana.bheṣajaiḥ |
AHS6.24.018c/ kṛmibhiḥ pīta.rakta.tvād raktam atra na nirhared || 18 ||
[Page 663 ]
AHS6.24.018.1+1ab/ pūti.matsyaḥ kṛmīn hatvā dur.gandha.tvāt tu vāta.je || 18.1+1ab ||
AHS6.24.019a/ vātābhitāpa.vihitaḥ kampe dāhād vinā kramaḥ |
AHS6.24.019c/ nave janmottaraṁ jāte yojayed upa.śīrṣake || 19 ||
AHS6.24.020a/ vāta.vyādhi.kriyāṁ pakve karma vidradhi.coditam |
AHS6.24.020c/ āma.pakve yathā.yogyaṁ vidradhi.piṭikārbude || 20 ||
AHS6.24.021a/ arūṁṣikā jalaukobhir hṛtāsrā nimba.vāriṇā |
AHS6.24.021c/ siktā prabhūta.lavaṇair limped aśva.śakṛd.rasaiḥ || 21 ||
AHS6.24.022a/ paṭola.nimba.pattrair vā sa.haridraiḥ su.kalkitaiḥ |
AHS6.24.022c/ go.mūtra.jīrṇa.piṇyāka.kṛkavāku.malair api || 22 ||
AHS6.24.023a/ kapāla.bhṛṣṭaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ vā cūrṇitaṁ taila.saṁyutam |
AHS6.24.023c/ rūṁṣikālepanaṁ kaṇḍū.kleda.dāhārti.nāśanam || 23 ||
AHS6.24.024a/ mālatī.citrakāśvaghna.naktamāla.prasādhitam |
AHS6.24.024c/ cācārūṁṣikayos tailam abhyaṅgaḥ kṣura.ghṛṣṭayoḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.24.024v/ 24.24dv abhyaṅge kṣura.ghṛṣṭayoḥ 24.24dv abhyaṅgaḥ kṣura.mṛṣṭayoḥ]
AHS6.24.025a/ a.śāntau śirasaḥ śuddhyai yateta vamanādibhiḥ |
AHS6.24.025c/ vidhyet sirāṁ dāruṇake lālāṭyāṁ śīlayen mṛjām || 25 ||
AHS6.24.026a/ nāvanaṁ mūrdha.vastiṁ ca lepayec ca sa.mākṣikaiḥ |
AHS6.24.026c/ priyāla.bīja.madhuka.kuṣṭha.māṣaiḥ sa.sarṣapaiḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS6.24.026v/ 24.26av nāvanaṁ mūrdhni vastiṁ ca]
AHS6.24.027a/ lākṣā.śamyāka.pattraiḍagaja.dhātrī.phalais tathā |
AHS6.24.027c/ koradūṣa.tṛṇa.kṣāra.vāri.prakṣālanaṁ hitam || 27 || [Note: AHS6.24.027v/ 24.27dv .vāri prakṣālane hitam]
[Page 664 ]
AHS6.24.028a/ indra.lupte yathāsannaṁ sirāṁ viddhvā pralepayet |
AHS6.24.028c/ pracchāya gāḍhaṁ kāsīsa.manohvā.tutthakoṣaṇaiḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS6.24.028v/ 24.28bv sirāṁ viddhvā pralepanam]
AHS6.24.029a/ vanyāmaratarubhyāṁ vā guñjā.mūla.phalais tathā |
AHS6.24.029c/ tathā lāṅgalikā.mūlaiḥ karavīra.rasena vā || 29 || [Note: AHS6.24.029v/ 24.29av kuṭannaṭa.marubhyāṁ vā 24.29av dhānyāmaratarubhyāṁ vā]
AHS6.24.030a/ sa.kṣaudra.kṣudra.vārtāka.sva.rasena rasena vā |
AHS6.24.030c/ dhattūrakasya pattrāṇāṁ bhallātaka.rasena vā || 30 || [Note: AHS6.24.030v/ 24.30av sa.kṣaudra.kṣudra.bṛhatī. 24.30dv bhallātaka.phalena vā]
AHS6.24.031a/ atha.vā mākṣika.havis.tila.puṣpa.trikaṇṭakaiḥ |
AHS6.24.031c/ tailāktā hasti.dantasya maṣī cācauṣadhaṁ param || 31 || [Note: AHS6.24.031v/ 24.31dv maṣī vāpy auṣadhaṁ param 24.31dv maṣī vā cauṣadhaṁ param]
AHS6.24.032a/ śukla.romodgame tad.van maṣī meṣa.viṣāṇa.jā |
AHS6.24.032c/ varjayed vāriṇā sekaṁ yāvad roma.samudbhavaḥ || 32 || [Note: AHS6.24.032v/ 24.32dv yāvad roma.samudgamaḥ 24.32dv yāvad roma.punar.bhavaḥ]
AHS6.24.033a/ khalatau palite valyāṁ harid.romni ca śodhitam |
AHS6.24.033c/ nasya.vaktra.śiro.'bhyaṅga.pradehaiḥ samupācaret || 33 ||
AHS6.24.034a/ siddhaṁ tailaṁ bṛhaty.ādyair jīvanīyaiś ca nāvanam |
AHS6.24.034c/ māsaṁ vā nimba.jaṁ tailaṁ kṣīra.bhuṅ nāvayed yatiḥ || 34 ||
AHS6.24.035a/ nīlī.śirīṣa.koraṇṭa.bhṛṅga.sva.rasa.bhāvitam |
AHS6.24.035c/ śelv.akṣa.tila.rāmāṇāṁ bījaṁ kākāṇḍakī.samam || 35 ||
AHS6.24.036a/ piṣṭvāja.payasā lohāl liptād arkāṁśu.tāpitāt |
AHS6.24.036c/ tailaṁ srutaṁ kṣīra.bhujo nāvanāt palitānta.kṛt || 36 || [Note: AHS6.24.036v/ 24.36av piṣṭvāja.payasā loha. 24.36bv .liptād arkāṁśu.tāpitāt]
AHS6.24.037a/ kṣīrāt sāhacarād bhṛṅgarajasaḥ saurasād rasāt |
AHS6.24.037c/ prasthais tailasya kuḍavaḥ siddho yaṣṭī.palānvitaḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS6.24.037v/ 24.37av kṣīrāt sahacarād bhṛṅgaṁ 24.37av kṣīrāt sāhacarād bhṛṅga. 24.37bv ṁrājataḥ saurasād rasāt 24.37bv .rasataḥ saurasād rasāt]
[Page 665 ]
AHS6.24.038a/ nasyaṁ śailāsane bhāṇḍe śṛṅge meṣasya vā sthitaḥ |
AHS6.24.038c/ kṣīreṇa ślakṣṇa.piṣṭau vā dugdhikā.karavīrakau || 38 || [Note: AHS6.24.038v/ 24.38av nasyaṁ śilā.maye bhāṇḍe 24.38av nasyaṁ śailodbhave bhāṇḍe]
AHS6.24.039a/ utpāṭya palitaṁ deyāv āśaye palitāpahau |
AHS6.24.039c/ kṣīraṁ priyālaṁ yaṣṭy.āhvaṁ jīvanīyo gaṇas tilāḥ || 39 ||
AHS6.24.040a/ kṛṣṇāḥ pralepo vaktrasya harid.roma.valī.hitaḥ |
AHS6.24.040c/ tilāḥ sāmalakāḥ padma.kiñjalko madhukaṁ madhu || 40 || [Note: AHS6.24.040v/ 24.40bv hari.lopa.valī.hitaḥ]
AHS6.24.041a/ bṛṁhayed rañjayec caitat keśān mūrdha.pralepanāt |
AHS6.24.041c/ māṁsī kuṣṭhaṁ tilāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ śārivā nīlam utpalam || 41 || [Note: AHS6.24.041v/ 24.41av bṛṁhayec ca rajec caitat 24.41bv keśān mūrdhnaḥ pralepanāt]
AHS6.24.042a/ kṣaudraṁ ca kṣīra.piṣṭāni keśa.saṁvardhanam param |
AHS6.24.042c/ ayo.rajo bhṛṅgarajas tri.phalā kṛṣṇa.mṛttikā || 42 ||
AHS6.24.043a/ sthitam ikṣu.rase māsaṁ sa.mūlaṁ palitaṁ rajet |
AHS6.24.043c/ māṣa.kodrava.dhānyāmlair yavāgūṁs tri.dinoṣitā || 43 || [Note: AHS6.24.043v/ 24.43cv yava.kodrava.dhānyāmlair]
AHS6.24.044a/ loha.śuklotkaṭā piṣṭā balākām api rañjayet |
AHS6.24.044c/ prapauṇḍarīka.madhuka.pippalī.candanotpalaiḥ || 44 || [Note: AHS6.24.044v/ 24.44av loha.kuṣṭhotkaṭā piṣṭā 24.44av loha.śuktotkaṭā piṣṭā 24.44av lohe śuktotkaṭā piṣṭā 24.44av lauhe śuklotkaṭā piṣṭā]
AHS6.24.044.1+1a/ bhṛṅgarajas.tri.phalotpala.sāri.loha.purīṣa.samanvita.kāri |
AHS6.24.044.1+1c/ tailam idaṁ paca dāruṇa.hāri luñcita.keśa.ghana.sthira.kāri || 44.1+1 || [Note: AHS6.24.044.1+1v/ 24.44.1+1bv .loha.purīṣa.samanvita.dhāri]
AHS6.24.045a/ siddhaṁ dhātrī.rase tailaṁ nasyenābhyañjanena ca |
AHS6.24.045c/ sarvān mūrdha.gadān hanti palitāni ca śīlitam || 45 ||
AHS6.24.045+1a/ madhūka.yaṣṭī.kṛmijid.viśva.bhṛṅgaiḥ śṛtaṁ haviḥ |
AHS6.24.045+1c/ ṣaḍ.bindu.dānāt tan nasyaṁ sarva.mūrdha.gadāpaham || 45+1 || [Note: AHS6.24.045+1v/ 24.45+1cv ṣaḍ.bindu.nāma tan nasyaṁ 24.45+1cv ṣaḍ.bindu.nāmnā tan nasyaṁ]
[Page 666 ]
AHS6.24.046a/ varī.jīvanti.niryāsa.payobhir yamakaṁ pacet |
AHS6.24.046c/ jīvanīyaiś ca tan nasyaṁ sarva.jatrūrdhva.roga.jit || 46 || [Note: AHS6.24.046v/ 24.46av varī.jīvanti.niryāsaiḥ 24.46bv .payobhir yad ghṛtaṁ pacet 24.46bv sa.payobhir ghṛtaṁ pacet]
AHS6.24.047a/ mayūraṁ pakṣa.pittāntra.pāda.viṭ.tuṇḍa.varjitam |
AHS6.24.047c/ daśa.mūla.balā.rāsnā.madhukais tri.palair yutam || 47 || [Note: AHS6.24.047v/ 24.47bv .śakṛt.pāt.tuṇḍa.varjitam 24.47dv .madhukais tri.palaiḥ saham]
AHS6.24.048a/ jale paktvā ghṛta.prasthaṁ tasmin kṣīra.samaṁ pacet |
AHS6.24.048c/ kalkitair madhura.dravyaiḥ sarva.jatrūrdhva.roga.jit || 48 ||
AHS6.24.049a/ tad abhyāsī.kṛtaṁ pāna.vasty.abhyañjana.nāvanaiḥ |
AHS6.24.049c/ etenaiva kaṣāyeṇa ghṛta.prasthaṁ vipācayet || 49 ||
AHS6.24.050a/ catur.guṇena payasā kalkair ebhiś ca kārṣikaiḥ |
AHS6.24.050c/ jīvantī.tri.phalā.medā.mṛdvīkarddhi.parūṣakaiḥ || 50 ||
AHS6.24.051a/ samaṅgā.cavikā.bhārgī.kāśmarī.karkaṭāhvayaiḥ |
AHS6.24.051c/ ātmaguptā.mahāmedā.tāla.kharjūra.mastakaiḥ || 51 || [Note: AHS6.24.051v/ 24.51dv .tāla.kharjūra.mustakaiḥ]
AHS6.24.052a/ mṛṇāla.bisa.kharjūra.yaṣṭīmadhuka.jīvakaiḥ |
AHS6.24.052c/ śatāvarī.vidārīkṣu.bṛhatī.śārivā.yugaiḥ || 52 || [Note: AHS6.24.052v/ 24.52dv .bṛhatī.śrāvaṇī.yugaiḥ]
AHS6.24.053a/ mūrvā.śvadaṁṣṭrarṣabhaka.śṛṅgāṭaka.kaserukaiḥ |
AHS6.24.053c/ rāsnā.sthirā.tāmalakī.sūkṣmailā.śaṭhi.pauṣkaraiḥ || 53 || [Note: AHS6.24.053v/ 24.53av dūrvā.śvadaṁṣṭraṣabhaka.]
AHS6.24.054a/ punarnavā.tavakṣīrī.kākolī.dhanvayāsakaiḥ |
AHS6.24.054c/ madhūkākṣoṭa.vātāma.muñjātābhiṣukair api || 54 || [Note: AHS6.24.054v/ 24.54cv madhukākṣoṭa.vātāma.]
AHS6.24.055a/ mahā.māyūram ity etan māyūrād adhikaṁ guṇaiḥ |
AHS6.24.055c/ dhātv.indriya.svara.bhraṁśa.śvāsa.kāsārditāpaham || 55 ||
[Page 667 ]
AHS6.24.056a/ yony.asṛk.śukra.doṣeṣu śastaṁ vandhyā.suta.pradam |
AHS6.24.056c/ ākhubhiḥ kukkuṭair haṁsaiḥ śaśaiś ceti prakalpayet || 56 || [Note: AHS6.24.056v/ 24.56cv ākhubhiḥ karkaṭair haṁsaiḥ]
AHS6.24.057a/ jatrūrdhva.jānāṁ vyādhīnām eka.triṁśac.chata.dvayam |
AHS6.24.057c/ paras.param a.saṅkīrṇaṁ vistareṇa prakāśitam || 57 || [Note: AHS6.24.057v/ 24.57bv eka.triṁśaṁ śata.dvayam]
AHS6.24.058a/ ūrdhva.mūlam adhaḥ.śākham ṛṣayaḥ puruṣaṁ viduḥ |
AHS6.24.058c/ mūla.prahāriṇas tasmād rogāñ chīghra.taraṁ jayet || 58 ||
AHS6.24.059a/ sarvendriyāṇi yenāsmin prāṇā yena ca saṁśritāḥ |
AHS6.24.059c/ tena tasyottamāṅgasya rakṣāyām ādṛto bhavet || 59 ||
AHS6.24.059+1a/ nīlotpalaṁ sotpala.kuṣṭha.yuktaṁ sa.pippalīkaṁ madhukaṁ śatāhvam |
AHS6.24.059+1c/ sa.śṛṅgaveraṁ śirasaḥ pralepaḥ sadyaḥ śiro.roga.vināśanāya || 59+1 ||

6.25. Chapter 25 :: Atha vraṇavijñanīyapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 520-523]
AHS6.25.001a/ vraṇo dvi.dhā nijāgantu.duṣṭa.śuddha.vibhedataḥ |
AHS6.25.001c/ nijo doṣaiḥ śarīrotthair āgantur bāhya.hetu.jaḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS6.25.001v/ 25.1dv āgantur bāhya.hetubhiḥ]
AHS6.25.002a/ doṣair adhiṣṭhito duṣṭaḥ śuddhas tair an.adhiṣṭhitaḥ |
AHS6.25.002c/ saṁvṛta.tvaṁ vivṛta.tā kāṭhinyaṁ mṛdu.tāti vā || 2 || [Note: AHS6.25.002v/ 25.2dv kāṭhinyaṁ mṛdu.tāpi vā 25.2dv kāṭhinyaṁ mṛdu.tāpi ca]
AHS6.25.003a/ aty.utsannāvasanna.tvam aty.auṣṇyam ati.śīta.tā |
AHS6.25.003c/ rakta.tvaṁ pāṇḍu.tā kārṣṇyaṁ pūti.pūya.parisrutiḥ || 3 ||
AHS6.25.004a/ pūti.māṁsa.sirā.snāyu.cchanna.totsaṅgi.tāti.ruk |
AHS6.25.004c/ saṁrambha.dāha.śvayathu.kaṇḍv.ādibhir upadrutaḥ || 4 ||
AHS6.25.005a/ dīrgha.kālānubandhaś ca vidyād duṣṭa.vraṇākṛtim |
AHS6.25.005c/ sa pañca.daśa.dhā doṣaiḥ sa.raktais tatra mārutāt || 5 || [Note: AHS6.25.005v/ 25.5cv sa pañca.dhā pṛthag doṣaiḥ]
[Page 668 ]
AHS6.25.006a/ śyāvaḥ kṛṣṇo 'ruṇo bhasma.kapotāsthi.nibho 'pi vā |
AHS6.25.006c/ mastu.māṁsa.pulākāmbu.tulya.tanv.alpa.saṁsrutiḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS6.25.006v/ 25.6bv .kapotāsthi.nibho 'tha.vā]
AHS6.25.007a/ nir.māṁsas toda.bhedāḍhyo rūkṣaś caṭacaṭāyate |
AHS6.25.007c/ pittena kṣipra.jaḥ pīto nīlaḥ kapila.piṅgalaḥ || 7 || [Note: AHS6.25.007v/ 25.7cv pittād vahni.prabhaḥ pīto]
AHS6.25.008a/ mūtra.kiṁśuka.bhasmāmbu.tailābhoṣṇa.bahu.srutiḥ |
AHS6.25.008c/ kṣārokṣita.kṣata.sama.vyatho rāgoṣma.pāka.vān || 8 ||
AHS6.25.009a/ kaphena pāṇḍuḥ kaṇḍū.mān bahu.śveta.ghana.srutiḥ |
AHS6.25.009c/ sthūlauṣṭhaḥ kaṭhinaḥ snāyu.sirā.jāla.tato 'lpa.ruk || 9 ||
AHS6.25.010a/ pravāla.rakto raktena sa.raktaṁ pūyam udgiret |
AHS6.25.010c/ vāji.sthāna.samo gandhe yukto liṅgaiś ca paittikaiḥ || 10 || [Note: AHS6.25.010v/ 25.10bv sa.raktaṁ pūyam īrayet 25.10cv vāji.sthāna.samo gandhair 25.10cv vāji.sthāna.samo gandho]
AHS6.25.011a/ dvābhyāṁ tribhiś ca sarvaiś ca vidyāl lakṣaṇa.saṅkarāt |
AHS6.25.011c/ jihvā.prabho mṛduḥ ślakṣṇaḥ śyāvauṣṭha.piṭikaḥ samaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS6.25.011v/ 25.11dv śyāvauṣṭho '.piṭikaḥ samaḥ]
AHS6.25.012a/ kiñ.cid.unnata.madhyo vā vraṇaḥ śuddho 'n.upadravaḥ |
AHS6.25.012c/ tvag.āmiṣa.sirā.snāyu.sandhy.asthīni vraṇāśayāḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.25.013a/ koṣṭho marma ca tāny aṣṭau duḥ.sādhyāny uttarottaram |
AHS6.25.013c/ su.sādhyaḥ sat.tva.māṁsāgni.vayo.bala.vati vraṇaḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS6.25.013v/ 25.13dv .vayo.bala.vatāṁ vraṇaḥ]
AHS6.25.014a/ vṛtto dīrghas tri.puṭakaś catur.aśrākṛtiś ca yaḥ |
AHS6.25.014c/ tathā sphik.pāyu.meḍhrauṣṭha.pṛṣṭhāntar.vaktra.gaṇḍa.gaḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS6.25.014v/ 25.14dv .pṛṣṭhāntar.vaktra.gaṇḍa.jaḥ 25.14dv .pṛṣṭhāntar.vaktra.gaṇḍayoḥ]
AHS6.25.015a/ kṛcchra.sādhyo 'kṣi.daśana.nāsikāpāṅga.nābhiṣu |
AHS6.25.015c/ sevanī.jaṭhara.śrotra.pārśva.kakṣā.staneṣu ca || 15 ||
[Page 669 ]
AHS6.25.016a/ phena.pūyānila.vahaḥ śalya.vān ūrdhva.nirvamī |
AHS6.25.016c/ bhagandaro 'ntar.vadanas tathā kaṭy.asthi.saṁśritaḥ || 16 ||
AHS6.25.017a/ kuṣṭhināṁ viṣa.juṣṭānāṁ śoṣiṇāṁ madhu.mehināṁ |
AHS6.25.017c/ vraṇāḥ kṛcchreṇa sidhyanti yeṣāṁ ca syur vraṇe vraṇāḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS6.25.017v/ 25.17dv yeṣāṁ cāpi vraṇe vraṇāḥ]
AHS6.25.018a/ naiva sidhyanti vīsarpa.jvarātīsāra.kāsinām |
AHS6.25.018c/ pipāsūnām a.nidrāṇāṁ śvāsinām a.vipākinām || 18 || [Note: AHS6.25.018v/ 25.18cv pipāsūnāṁ sa.nidrāṇāṁ]
AHS6.25.019a/ bhinne śiraḥ.kapāle vā mastuluṅgasya darśane |
AHS6.25.019c/ snāyu.kledāt sirā.chedād gāmbhīryāt kṛmi.bhakṣaṇāt || 19 ||
AHS6.25.020a/ asthi.bhedāt sa.śalya.tvāt sa.viṣa.tvād a.tarkitāt |
AHS6.25.020c/ mithyā.bandhād ati.snehād raukṣyād romādi.ghaṭṭanāt || 20 ||
AHS6.25.021a/ kṣobhād a.śuddha.koṣṭha.tvāt sauhityād ati.karśanāt |
AHS6.25.021c/ madya.pānād divā.svapnād vyavāyād rātri.jāgarāt || 21 || [Note: AHS6.25.021v/ 25.21cv madya.pānād divā.svāpād]
AHS6.25.022a/ vraṇo mithyopacārāc ca naiva sādhyo 'pi sidhyati |
AHS6.25.022c/ kapota.varṇa.pratimā yasyāntaḥ kleda.varjitāḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS6.25.022v/ 25.22bv naiva sādhyo 'pi rohati]
AHS6.25.023a/ sthirāś cipiṭikā.vanto rohatīti tam ādiśet |
AHS6.25.023c/ athātra śophāvasthāyāṁ yathāsannaṁ viśodhanam || 23 || [Note: AHS6.25.023v/ 25.23av sthirāś ca piṭikā.vanto]
AHS6.25.024a/ yojyaṁ śopho hi śuddhānāṁ vraṇaś cāśu praśāmyati |
AHS6.25.024c/ kuryāc chītopacāraṁ ca śophāvasthasya santatam || 24 || [Note: AHS6.25.024v/ 25.24cv kuryāc chītopacāraṁ tu]
AHS6.25.025a/ doṣāgnir agni.vat tena prayāti sahasā śamam |
AHS6.25.025c/ śophe vraṇe ca kaṭhine vi.varṇe vedanānvite || 25 ||
[Page 670 ]
AHS6.25.026a/ viṣa.yukte viśeṣeṇa jala.jādyair hared asṛk |
AHS6.25.026c/ duṣṭāsre 'pagate sadyaḥ śopha.rāga.rujāṁ śamaḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS6.25.026v/ 25.26bv jalaukādyair hared asṛk]
AHS6.25.027a/ hṛte hṛte ca rudhire su.śītaiḥ sparśa.vīryayoḥ |
AHS6.25.027c/ su.ślakṣṇais tad.ahaḥ.piṣṭaiḥ kṣīrekṣu.sva.rasa.dravaiḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS6.25.027v/ 25.27dv kṣīrekṣu.sva.rasa.drutaiḥ]
AHS6.25.028a/ śata.dhauta.ghṛtopetair muhur anyair a.śoṣibhiḥ |
AHS6.25.028c/ pratilomaṁ hito lepaḥ sekābhyaṅgāś ca tat.kṛtāḥ || 28 ||
AHS6.25.029a/ nyagrodhodumbarāśvattha.plakṣa.vetasa.valkalaiḥ |
AHS6.25.029c/ pradeho bhūri.sarpirbhiḥ śopha.nirvāpaṇaḥ param || 29 || [Note: AHS6.25.029v/ 25.29cv pradeho bhūri.sarpiś ca]
AHS6.25.030a/ vātolbaṇānāṁ stabdhānāṁ kaṭhinānāṁ mahā.rujām |
AHS6.25.030c/ srutāsṛjāṁ ca śophānāṁ vraṇānām api cedṛśām || 30 ||
AHS6.25.031a/ ānūpa.vesavārādyaiḥ svedaḥ somās tilāḥ punaḥ |
AHS6.25.031c/ bhṛṣṭā nirvāpitāḥ kṣīre tat.piṣṭā dāha.rug.harāḥ || 31 ||
AHS6.25.032a/ sthirān manda.rujaḥ śophān snehair vāta.kaphāpahaiḥ |
AHS6.25.032c/ abhyajya svedayitvā ca veṇu.nāḍyā śanaiḥ śanaiḥ || 32 ||
AHS6.25.033a/ vimlāpanārthaṁ mṛdnīyāt talenāṅguṣṭhakena vā |
AHS6.25.033c/ yava.godhūma.mudgaiś ca siddha.piṣṭaiḥ pralepayet || 33 || [Note: AHS6.25.033v/ 25.33dv siddhaiḥ piṣṭaiḥ pralepayet 25.33dv siddhaṁ piṣṭaṁ pralepayet 25.33dv dugdha.piṣṭaiḥ pralepayet]
AHS6.25.034a/ vilīyate sa cen naivaṁ tatas tam upanāhayet |
AHS6.25.034c/ a.vidagdhas tathā śāntiṁ vidagdhaḥ pākam aśnute || 34 ||
AHS6.25.035a/ sa.kola.tila.vallomā dadhy.amlā saktu.piṇḍikā |
AHS6.25.035c/ sa.kiṇva.kuṣṭha.lavaṇā koṣṇā śastopanāhane || 35 || [Note: AHS6.25.035v/ 25.35av sa.kola.tila.vallūra. 25.35bv .dadhy.amlā saktu.piṇḍikā]
[Page 671 ]
AHS6.25.036a/ su.pakve piṇḍite śophe pīḍanair upapīḍite |
AHS6.25.036c/ dāraṇaṁ dāraṇārhasya su.kumārasya ceṣyate || 36 ||
AHS6.25.037a/ guggulv.atasi.go.danta.svarṇakṣīrī.kapota.viṭ |
AHS6.25.037c/ kṣārauṣadhāni kṣārāś ca pakva.śopha.vidāraṇam || 37 || [Note: AHS6.25.037v/ 25.37cv kṣārauṣadhāni kṣāraś ca]
AHS6.25.038a/ pūya.garbhān aṇu.dvārān sotsaṅgān marma.gān api |
AHS6.25.038c/ niḥ.snehaiḥ pīḍana.dravyaiḥ samantāt pratipīḍayet || 38 ||
AHS6.25.039a/ śuṣyantaṁ samupekṣeta pralepaṁ pīḍanaṁ prati |
AHS6.25.039c/ na mukhe cainam ālimpet tathā doṣaḥ prasicyate || 39 ||
AHS6.25.040a/ kalāya.yava.godhūma.māṣa.mudga.hareṇavaḥ |
AHS6.25.040c/ dravyāṇāṁ picchilānāṁ ca tvaṅ.mūlāni prapīḍanam || 40 || [Note: AHS6.25.040v/ 25.40cv dravyāṇāṁ picchilānāṁ tu 25.40cv dravyāṇāṁ picchilānāṁ vā]
AHS6.25.041a/ saptasu kṣālanādyeṣu surasāragvadhādikau |
AHS6.25.041c/ bhṛśaṁ duṣṭe vraṇe yojyau meha.kuṣṭha.vraṇeṣu ca || 41 ||
AHS6.25.042a/ atha.vā kṣālanaṁ kvāthaḥ paṭolī.nimba.pattra.jaḥ |
AHS6.25.042c/ a.viśuddhe viśuddhe tu nyagrodhādi.tvag.udbhavaḥ || 42 || [Note: AHS6.25.042v/ 25.42av atha.vā kṣālane kvāthaḥ]
AHS6.25.043a/ paṭolī.tila.yaṣṭy.āhva.trivṛd.dantī.niśā.dvayam |
AHS6.25.043c/ nimba.pattrāṇi cālepaḥ sa.paṭur vraṇa.śodhanaḥ || 43 || [Note: AHS6.25.043v/ 25.43dv sa.paṭur vraṇa.śodhanam]
AHS6.25.044a/ vraṇān viśodhayed vartyā sūkṣmāsyān sandhi.marma.gān |
AHS6.25.044c/ kṛtayā trivṛtā.dantī.lāṅgalī.madhu.saindhavaiḥ || 44 ||
AHS6.25.045a/ vātābhibhūtān sāsrāvān dhūpayed ugra.vedanān |
AHS6.25.045c/ yavājya.bhūrja.madana.śrīveṣṭaka.surāhvayaiḥ || 45 ||
[Page 672 ]
AHS6.25.046a/ nirvāpayed bhṛśaṁ śītaiḥ pitta.rakta.viṣolbaṇān |
AHS6.25.046c/ śuṣkālpa.māṁse gambhīre vraṇa utsādanaṁ hitam || 46 ||
AHS6.25.047a/ nyagrodha.padmakādibhyām aśvagandhā.balā.tilaiḥ |
AHS6.25.047c/ adyān māṁsāda.māṁsāni vidhinopahitāni ca || 47 || [Note: AHS6.25.047v/ 25.47dv vihitopahitāni ca 25.47dv vidhānopahitāni ca]
AHS6.25.048a/ māṁsaṁ māṁsāda.māṁsena vardhate śuddha.cetasaḥ |
AHS6.25.048c/ utsanna.mṛdu.māṁsānāṁ vraṇānām avasādanam || 48 || [Note: AHS6.25.048v/ 25.48bv vardhate śuddha.tejasaḥ]
AHS6.25.049a/ jātī.mukula.kāsīsa.manohvāla.purāgnikaiḥ |
AHS6.25.049c/ utsanna.māṁsān kaṭhinān kaṇḍū.yuktāṁś cirotthitān || 49 ||
AHS6.25.050a/ vraṇān su.duḥkha.śodhyāṁś ca śodhayet kṣāra.karmaṇā |
AHS6.25.050c/ sravanto 'śmarī.jā mūtraṁ ye cānye rakta.vāhinaḥ || 50 || [Note: AHS6.25.050v/ 25.50av vraṇān su.duḥkha.sādhyāṁś ca 25.50bv yojayet kṣāra.karmaṇā 25.50dv ye cānye kṣata.vāhinaḥ]
AHS6.25.051a/ chinnāś ca sandhayo yeṣāṁ yathoktair ye ca śodhanaiḥ |
AHS6.25.051c/ śodhyamānā na śudhyanti śodhyāḥ syus te 'gni.karmaṇā || 51 || [Note: AHS6.25.051v/ 25.51bv yathoktair ye ca sādhanaiḥ 25.51cv sādhyamānā na sidhyanti 25.51dv sādhyāḥ syus te 'gni.karmaṇā 25.51dv sādhyās te cāgni.karmaṇā]
AHS6.25.052a/ śuddhānāṁ ropaṇaṁ yojyam utsādāya yad īritam |
AHS6.25.052c/ aśvagandhā ruhā lodhraṁ kaṭphalaṁ madhuyaṣṭikā || 52 || [Note: AHS6.25.052v/ 25.52av śuddhānāṁ ropaṇe yojyam]
AHS6.25.053a/ samaṅgā dhātakī.puṣpaṁ paramaṁ vraṇa.ropaṇam |
AHS6.25.053c/ apeta.pūti.māṁsānāṁ māṁsa.sthānām a.rohatām || 53 ||
AHS6.25.054a/ kalkaṁ saṁrohaṇaṁ kuryāt tilānāṁ madhukānvitam |
AHS6.25.054c/ snigdhoṣṇa.tikta.madhura.kaṣāya.tvaiḥ sa sarva.jit || 54 || [Note: AHS6.25.054v/ 25.54av kalkaṁ saṁrohaṇe kuryāt 25.54av kalkaḥ saṁrohaṇaṁ kuryāt 25.54bv tilānāṁ madhukānvitaḥ 25.54dv .kaṣāyair eṣa sarva.jit]
AHS6.25.055a/ sa kṣaudra.nimba.pattrābhyāṁ yuktaḥ saṁśodhanaṁ param |
AHS6.25.055c/ pūrvābhyāṁ sarpiṣā cāsau yuktaḥ syād āśu ropaṇaḥ || 55 || [Note: AHS6.25.055v/ 25.55bv yuktaḥ saṁśodhanaḥ param 25.55dv yuktaḥ syād api ropaṇaḥ]
[Page 673 ]
AHS6.25.056a/ tila.vad yava.kalkaṁ tu ke.cid icchanti tad.vidaḥ |
AHS6.25.056c/ sāsra.pitta.viṣāgantu.gambhīrān soṣmaṇo vraṇān || 56 ||
AHS6.25.057a/ kṣīra.ropaṇa.bhaiṣajya.śṛtenājyena ropayet |
AHS6.25.057c/ ropaṇauṣadha.siddhena tailena kapha.vāta.jān || 57 ||
AHS6.25.058a/ kācchī.lodhrābhayā.sarja.sindūrāñjana.tutthakam |
AHS6.25.058c/ cūrṇitaṁ taila.madanair yuktaṁ ropaṇam uttamam || 58 || [Note: AHS6.25.058v/ 25.58av kākṣī.lodhrābhayā.sarja. 25.58av kāṅkṣī.lodhrābhayā.sarja.]
AHS6.25.059a/ samānāṁ sthira.māṁsānāṁ tvak.sthānāṁ cūrṇa iṣyate |
AHS6.25.059c/ kakubhodumbarāśvattha.jambū.kaṭphala.lodhra.jaiḥ || 59 || [Note: AHS6.25.059v/ 25.59bv tvak.sthānāṁ cūrṇam iṣyate]
AHS6.25.060a/ tvak.cūrṇaiś cūrṇitā vraṇāḥ tvak.cūrṇaiś cūrṇitā vraṇāḥ |
AHS6.25.060c/ lākṣā.manohvā.mañjiṣṭhā.haritāla.niśā.dvayaiḥ || 60 || [Note: AHS6.25.060v/ 25.60av tvacam āśu nigṛhṇāti 25.60bv tvak.cūrṇaiś cūrṇito vraṇaḥ]
AHS6.25.061a/ pralepaḥ sa.ghṛta.kṣaudras tvag.viśuddhi.karaḥ param |
AHS6.25.061c/ kālīyaka.latāmrāsthi.hema.kālā.rasottamaiḥ || 61 || [Note: AHS6.25.061v/ 25.61av pralepaḥ sa.ghṛta.kṣaudrais]
AHS6.25.062a/ lepaḥ sa.go.maya.rasaḥ sa.varṇa.karaṇaḥ param |
AHS6.25.062c/ dagdho vāraṇa.danto 'ntar.dhūmaṁ tailaṁ rasāñjanam || 62 || [Note: AHS6.25.062v/ 25.62bv sa.varṇa.karaṇo bhavet 25.62dv .dhūmas tailaṁ rasāñjanam]
AHS6.25.063a/ roma.sañjanano lepas tad.vat taila.pariplutā |
AHS6.25.063c/ catuṣ.pān.nakha.romāsthi.tvak.śṛṅga.khura.jā maṣī || 63 ||
AHS6.25.064a/ vraṇinaḥ śastra.karmoktaṁ pathyā.pathyānnam ādiśet |
AHS6.25.064c/ dve pañca.mūle vargaś ca vāta.ghno vātike hitaḥ || 64 || [Note: AHS6.25.064v/ 25.64av vraṇināṁ śastra.karmoktaṁ 25.64bv yat pathyā.pathyam ādiśet]
AHS6.25.065a/ nyagrodha.padmakādyau tu tad.vat pitta.pradūṣite |
AHS6.25.065c/ āragvadhādiḥ śleṣma.ghnaḥ kaphe miśrās tu miśra.je || 65 || [Note: AHS6.25.065v/ 25.65dv kaphe miśras tu miśra.je 25.65dv kaphe miśrās tu miśrake]
[Page 674 ]
AHS6.25.066a/ ebhiḥ prakṣālanaṁ lepo ghṛtaṁ tailaṁ rasa.kriyā |
AHS6.25.066c/ cūrṇo vartiś ca saṁyojya vraṇe sapta yathā.yatham || 66 || [Note: AHS6.25.066v/ 25.66av ebhiḥ prakṣālanālepa. 25.66bv .ghṛta.taila.rasa.kriyāḥ]
AHS6.25.067a/ jātī.nimba.paṭola.pattra.kaṭukā.dārvī.niśā.śārivā. || 67a ||
AHS6.25.067b/ .mañjiṣṭhābhaya.siktha.tuttha.madhukair naktāhva.bījānvitaiḥ || 67b ||
AHS6.25.067c/ sarpiḥ sādhyam anena sūkṣma.vadanā marmāśritāḥ kledino || 67c ||
AHS6.25.067d/ gambhīrāḥ sa.rujo vraṇāḥ sa.gatayaḥ śudhyanti rohanti ca || 67d || [Note: AHS6.25.067v/ 25.67bv .mañjiṣṭhābhaya.siktha.tuttha.madhukair naktāhva.bījais tathā 25.67cv sarpiḥ sādhyam anena sūkṣma.vadanā marmāśritāḥ srāviṇo 25.67cv sarpiḥ siddham anena sūkṣma.vadanā marmāśritāḥ kledino 25.67dv gambhīrāḥ sa.rujo vraṇāḥ sa.gatikāḥ śudhyanti rohanti ca]
AHS6.25.067+1a/ sādhitaṁ sva.rase tailaṁ kākamācyāś catur.guṇe |
AHS6.25.067+1c/ gati.bhājām api hitaṁ vraṇānāṁ ropaṇaṁ param || 67+1 || [Note: AHS6.25.067+1v/ 25.67+1cv gati.bhājām api varaṁ]

6.26. Chapter 26 :: Atha sadyovraṇapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 523-526]
AHS6.26.001a/ sadyo.vraṇā ye sahasā sambhavanty abhighātataḥ |
AHS6.26.001c/ an.antair api tair aṅgam ucyate juṣṭam aṣṭa.dhā || 1 ||
AHS6.26.002a/ ghṛṣṭāvakṛtta.vicchinna.pravilambita.pātitam |
AHS6.26.002c/ viddhaṁ bhinnaṁ vidalitaṁ tatra ghṛṣṭaṁ lasīkayā || 2 || [Note: AHS6.26.002v/ 26.2bv .pravilambi.nipātitam]
AHS6.26.003a/ rakta.leśena vā yuktaṁ sa.ploṣaṁ chedanāt sravet |
AHS6.26.003c/ avagāḍhaṁ tataḥ kṛttaṁ vicchinnaṁ syāt tato 'pi ca || 3 ||
AHS6.26.004a/ pravilambi sa.śeṣe 'sthni patitaṁ pātitaṁ tanoḥ |
AHS6.26.004c/ sūkṣmāsya.śalya.viddhaṁ tu viddhaṁ koṣṭha.vivarjitam || 4 || [Note: AHS6.26.004v/ 26.4av pravilambi sa.śeṣāsthi]
AHS6.26.005a/ bhinnam anyad vidalitaṁ majja.rakta.pariplutam |
AHS6.26.005c/ prahāra.pīḍanotpeṣāt sahāsthnā pṛthu.tāṁ gatam || 5 || [Note: AHS6.26.005v/ 26.5cv prahāra.pīḍanotpātaiḥ 26.5cv prahāra.pīḍanāt teṣāṁ]
AHS6.26.006a/ sadyaḥ sadyo.vraṇaṁ siñced atha yaṣṭy.āhva.sarpiṣā |
AHS6.26.006c/ tīvra.vyathaṁ kavoṣṇena balā.tailena vā punaḥ || 6 ||
AHS6.26.007a/ kṣatoṣmaṇo nigrahārthaṁ tat.kālaṁ visṛtasya ca |
AHS6.26.007c/ kaṣāya.śīta.madhura.snigdhā lepādayo hitāḥ || 7 ||
[Page 675 ]
AHS6.26.008a/ sadyo.vraṇeṣv āyateṣu sandhānārthaṁ viśeṣataḥ |
AHS6.26.008c/ madhu.sarpiś ca yuñjīta pitta.ghnīś ca himāḥ kriyāḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS6.26.008v/ 26.8cv madhu.sarpiḥ prayuñjīta]
AHS6.26.009a/ sa.saṁrambheṣu kartavyam ūrdhvaṁ cādhaś ca śodhanam |
AHS6.26.009c/ upavāso hitaṁ bhuktaṁ pratataṁ rakta.mokṣaṇam || 9 || [Note: AHS6.26.009v/ 26.9cv upavāso hitas tatra]
AHS6.26.010a/ ghṛṣṭe vidalite caiṣa su.tarām iṣyate vidhiḥ |
AHS6.26.010c/ tayor hy alpaṁ sravaty asraṁ pākas tenāśu jāyate || 10 ||
AHS6.26.011a/ aty.artham asraṁ sravati prāya.śo 'nya.tra vikṣate |
AHS6.26.011c/ tato rakta.kṣayād vāyau kupite 'ti.rujā.kare || 11 || [Note: AHS6.26.011v/ 26.11av aty.artham asraṁ vamati 26.11bv prāya.śo 'nya.tra ca kṣate]
AHS6.26.012a/ sneha.pāna.parīṣeka.sveda.lepopanāhanam |
AHS6.26.012c/ sneha.vastiṁ ca kurvīta vāta.ghnauṣadha.sādhitam || 12 || [Note: AHS6.26.012v/ 26.12dv snehair vastiṁ ca kurvīta 26.12dv vāta.ghnauṣadha.sādhitaiḥ]
AHS6.26.013a/ iti sāptāhikaḥ proktaḥ sadyo.vraṇa.hito vidhiḥ |
AHS6.26.013c/ saptāhād gata.vege tu pūrvoktaṁ vidhim ācaret || 13 || [Note: AHS6.26.013v/ 26.13av iti saptāhikaḥ proktaḥ]
AHS6.26.014a/ prāyaḥ sāmānya.karmedaṁ vakṣyate tu pṛthak pṛthak |
AHS6.26.014c/ ghṛṣṭe rujaṁ nigṛhyāśu vraṇe cūrṇāni yojayet || 14 ||
AHS6.26.015a/ kalkādīny avakṛtte tu vicchinna.pravilambinoḥ |
AHS6.26.015c/ sīvanaṁ vidhinoktena bandhanaṁ cānu pīḍanam || 15 || [Note: AHS6.26.015v/ 26.15dv bandhanaṁ cāśu pīḍanam]
AHS6.26.016a/ a.sādhyaṁ sphuṭitaṁ netram a.dīrṇaṁ lambate tu yat |
AHS6.26.016c/ sanniveśya yathā.sthānam a.vyāviddha.siraṁ bhiṣak || 16 || [Note: AHS6.26.016v/ 26.16bv udīrṇaṁ lambate tu yat 26.16cv sanniveśya yathā.sthānaṁ 26.16dv sūcyā vidhyet sirāṁ bhiṣak]
AHS6.26.017a/ pīḍayet pāṇinā padma.palāśāntaritena tat |
AHS6.26.017c/ tato 'sya secane nasye tarpaṇe ca hitaṁ haviḥ || 17 || [Note: AHS6.26.017v/ 26.17dv tarpaṇe kathitaṁ haviḥ]
[Page 676 ]
AHS6.26.018a/ vipakvam ājaṁ yaṣṭy.āhva.jīvakarṣabhakotpalaiḥ |
AHS6.26.018c/ sa.payaskaiḥ paraṁ tad dhi sarva.netrābhighāta.jit || 18 ||
AHS6.26.019a/ gala.pīḍāvasanne 'kṣṇi vamanotkāsana.kṣavāḥ |
AHS6.26.019c/ prāṇāyāmo 'tha.vā kāryaḥ kriyā ca kṣata.netra.vat || 19 || [Note: AHS6.26.019v/ 26.19av gala.pīḍo 'vasanne 'kṣṇi 26.19bv vamanotkleśana.kṣavāḥ]
AHS6.26.020a/ karṇe sthānāc cyute syūte śrotas tailena pūrayet |
AHS6.26.020c/ kṛkāṭikāyāṁ chinnāyāṁ nirgacchaty api mārute || 20 || [Note: AHS6.26.020v/ 26.20av karṇe sthāna.cyute syūte 26.20bv srotas tailena pūrayet]
AHS6.26.021a/ samaṁ niveśya badhnīyāt syūtvā śīghraṁ nir.antaram |
AHS6.26.021c/ ājena sarpiṣā cātra pariṣekaḥ praśasyate || 21 || [Note: AHS6.26.021v/ 26.21av samāṁ niveśya badhnīyāt 26.21cv ājena sarpiṣā tatra]
AHS6.26.022a/ uttāno 'nnāni bhuñjīta śayīta ca su.yantritaḥ |
AHS6.26.022c/ ghātaṁ śākhāsu tiryak.sthaṁ gātre samyaṅ.niveśite || 22 ||
AHS6.26.023a/ syūtvā vellita.bandhena badhnīyād ghana.vāsasā |
AHS6.26.023c/ carmaṇā goṣ.phaṇā.bandhaḥ kāryaś cā.saṅgate vraṇe || 23 || [Note: AHS6.26.023v/ 26.23dv kāryaś cāṁsa.gate vraṇe 26.23dv kāryaś cāṁśa.gate vraṇe]
AHS6.26.024a/ pādau vilambi.muṣkasya prokṣya netre ca vāriṇā |
AHS6.26.024c/ praveśya vṛṣaṇau sīvyet sevanyā tunna.sañjñayā || 24 || [Note: AHS6.26.024v/ 26.24dv sevanyā picu.yuktayā 26.24dv sīvanyā picu.yuktayā]
AHS6.26.025a/ kāryaś ca goṣ.phaṇā.bandhaḥ kaṭyām āveśya paṭṭakam |
AHS6.26.025c/ sneha.sekaṁ na kurvīta tatra klidyati hi vraṇaḥ || 25 || [Note: AHS6.26.025v/ 26.25dv tatra klidyanti hi vraṇāḥ 26.25dv tena klidyanti hi vraṇāḥ]
AHS6.26.026a/ kālānusāry.agurv.elā.jātī.candana.parpaṭaiḥ |
AHS6.26.026c/ śilā.dārvy.amṛtā.tutthaiḥ siddhaṁ tailaṁ ca ropaṇam || 26 || [Note: AHS6.26.026v/ 26.26bv .jātī.candana.padmakaiḥ]
AHS6.26.027a/ chinnāṁ niḥśeṣataḥ śākhāṁ dagdhvā tailena yuktitaḥ |
AHS6.26.027c/ badhnīyāt kośa.bandhena tato vraṇa.vad ācaret || 27 || [Note: AHS6.26.027v/ 26.27bv dagdhvā tailena yuktibhiḥ]
[Page 677 ]
AHS6.26.028a/ kāryā śalyāhṛte viddhe bhaṅgād vidalite kriyā |
AHS6.26.028c/ śiraso 'pahṛte śalye vāla.vartiṁ praveśayet || 28 ||
AHS6.26.029a/ mastuluṅga.sruteḥ kruddho hanyād enaṁ calo 'nya.thā |
AHS6.26.029c/ vraṇe rohati caikaikaṁ śanair apanayet kacam || 29 || [Note: AHS6.26.029v/ 26.29av mastuluṅga.srute kruddho]
AHS6.26.030a/ mastuluṅga.srutau khāden mastiṣkān anya.jīva.jān |
AHS6.26.030c/ śalye hṛte 'ṅgād anyasmāt sneha.vartiṁ nidhāpayet || 30 ||
AHS6.26.031a/ dūrāvagāḍhāḥ sūkṣmāsyā ye vraṇāḥ sruta.śoṇitāḥ |
AHS6.26.031c/ secayec cakra.tailena sūkṣma.netrārpitena tān || 31 ||
AHS6.26.032a/ bhinne koṣṭhe 'sṛjā pūrṇe mūrchā.hṛt.pārśva.vedanāḥ |
AHS6.26.032c/ jvaro dāhas tṛḍ ādhmānaṁ bhaktasyān.abhinandanam || 32 ||
AHS6.26.033a/ saṅgo viṇ.mūtra.marutāṁ śvāsaḥ svedo 'kṣi.rakta.tā |
AHS6.26.033c/ loha.gandhi.tvam āsyasya syād gātre ca vi.gandha.tā || 33 ||
AHS6.26.034a/ āmāśaya.sthe rudhire rudhiraṁ chardayaty api |
AHS6.26.034c/ ādhmānenāti.mātreṇa śūlena ca viśasyate || 34 || [Note: AHS6.26.034v/ 26.34dv śūlena ca vinaśyati 26.34dv śūlena ca viśiṣyate]
AHS6.26.035a/ pakvāśaya.sthe rudhire sa.śūlaṁ gauravaṁ bhavet |
AHS6.26.035c/ nābher adhas.tāc chīta.tvaṁ khebhyo raktasya cāgamaḥ || 35 ||
AHS6.26.036a/ a.bhinno 'py āśayaḥ sūkṣmaiḥ srotobhir abhipūryate |
AHS6.26.036c/ asṛjā syandamānena pārśve mūtreṇa vasti.vat || 36 ||
AHS6.26.037a/ tatrāntar.lohitaṁ śīta.pādocchvāsa.karānanam |
AHS6.26.037c/ raktākṣaṁ pāṇdu.vadanam ānaddhaṁ ca vivarjayet || 37 ||
[Page 678 ]
AHS6.26.038a/ āmāśaya.sthe vamanaṁ hitaṁ pakvāśayāśrite |
AHS6.26.038c/ virecanaṁ nirūhaṁ ca niḥ.snehoṣṇair viśodhanaiḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS6.26.038v/ 26.38bv hitaṁ pakvāśayāśraye 26.38bv hitaṁ pakvāśaya.sthite 26.38dv niḥ.snehoṣṇair viśodhanam]
AHS6.26.039a/ yava.kola.kulatthānāṁ rasaiḥ sneha.vivarjitaiḥ |
AHS6.26.039c/ bhuñjītānnaṁ yavāgūṁ vā pibet saindhava.saṁyutām || 39 || [Note: AHS6.26.039v/ 26.39dv pibet saindhava.saṁyutam]
AHS6.26.040a/ ati.niḥsruta.raktas tu bhinna.koṣṭhaḥ pibed asṛk |
AHS6.26.040c/ kliṣṭa.cchinnāntra.bhedena koṣṭha.bhedo dvi.dhā smṛtaḥ || 40 || [Note: AHS6.26.040v/ 26.40av ati.niḥsṛta.raktas tu 26.40cv klinna.bhinnāntra.bhedena 26.40cv śliṣṭa.cchinnāntra.bhedena]
AHS6.26.041a/ mūrchādayo 'lpāḥ prathame dvitīye tv ati.bādhakāḥ |
AHS6.26.041c/ kliṣṭāntraḥ saṁśayī dehī chinnāntro naiva jīvati || 41 || [Note: AHS6.26.041v/ 26.41cv klinnāntraḥ saṁśayī dehī 26.41cv kliṣṭāntraḥ saṁśaye dehī 26.41cv śliṣṭāntraḥ saṁśayī dehī 26.41dv bhinnāntro naiva jīvati]
AHS6.26.042a/ yathā.svaṁ mārgam āpannā yasya viṇ.mūtra.mārutāḥ |
AHS6.26.042c/ vy.upadravaḥ sa bhinne 'pi koṣṭhe jīvaty a.saṁśayam || 42 ||
AHS6.26.043a/ a.bhinnam antraṁ niṣkrāntaṁ praveśyaṁ na tv ato 'nya.thā |
AHS6.26.043c/ utpaṅgila.śiro.grastaṁ tad apy eke vadanti tu || 43 || [Note: AHS6.26.043v/ 26.43cv urogala.śiro.grastaṁ 26.43cv uroṅgila.śiro.grastaṁ 26.43cv pupuṅgala.śiro.grastaṁ 26.43cv vayaṅgila.śiro.grastaṁ]
AHS6.26.044a/ prakṣālya payasā digdhaṁ tṛṇa.śoṇita.pāṁsubhiḥ |
AHS6.26.044c/ praveśayet k pta.nakho ghṛtenāktaṁ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ || 44 ||
AHS6.26.045a/ kṣīreṇārdrī.kṛtaṁ śuṣkaṁ bhūri.sarpiḥ.pariplutam |
AHS6.26.045c/ aṅgulyā pramṛśet kaṇṭhaṁ jalenodvejayed api || 45 ||
AHS6.26.046a/ tathāntrāṇi viśanty antas tat.kālaṁ pīḍayanti ca |
AHS6.26.046c/ vraṇa.saukṣmyād bahu.tvād vā koṣṭham antram an.āviśat || 46 || [Note: AHS6.26.046v/ 26.46bv tat.kālaṁ pīḍayeta ca]
AHS6.26.047a/ tat.pramāṇena jaṭharaṁ pāṭayitvā praveśayet |
AHS6.26.047c/ yathā.sthānaṁ sthite samyak antre sīvyed anu vraṇam || 47 || [Note: AHS6.26.047v/ 26.47cv yathā.sthāna.sthite samyag]
[Page 679 ]
AHS6.26.048a/ sthānād apetam ādatte jīvitaṁ kupitaṁ ca tat |
AHS6.26.048c/ veṣṭayitvānu paṭṭena ghṛtena pariṣecayet || 48 || [Note: AHS6.26.048v/ 26.48bv jīvitaṁ kupitaṁ ca yat]
AHS6.26.048.1+1a/ cūrṇair yathoktaiḥ sandhānaṁ kṛtvā kṣaudra.ghṛta.plutaiḥ |
AHS6.26.048.1+1c/ tataḥ kavalikāṁ dattvā veṣṭayed anu.pūrva.śaḥ || 48.1+1 ||
AHS6.26.049a/ pāyayeta tataḥ koṣṇaṁ citrā.taila.yutaṁ payaḥ |
AHS6.26.049c/ mṛdu.kriyārthaṁ śakṛto vāyoś cādhaḥ.pravṛttaye || 49 || [Note: AHS6.26.049v/ 26.49av pāyayet taṁ tataḥ koṣṇaṁ 26.49bv citra.taila.yutaṁ payaḥ]
AHS6.26.050a/ anuvarteta varṣaṁ ca yathoktaṁ vraṇa.yantraṇām |
AHS6.26.050c/ udarān medaso vartiṁ nirgatāṁ bhasmanā mṛdā || 50 || [Note: AHS6.26.050v/ 26.50bv yathoktaṁ vraṇa.yantraṇam]
AHS6.26.051a/ avakīrya kaṣāyair vā ślakṣṇair mūlais tataḥ samam |
AHS6.26.051c/ dṛḍhaṁ baddhvā ca sūtreṇa vardhayet kuśalo bhiṣak || 51 || [Note: AHS6.26.051v/ 26.51bv ślakṣṇair mūle tataḥ samam 26.51bv ślakṣṇaiś cūrṇais tataḥ samam]
AHS6.26.052a/ tīkṣṇenāgni.prataptena śastreṇa sakṛd eva tu |
AHS6.26.052c/ syād anya.thā rug āṭopo mṛtyur vā chidyamānayā || 52 ||
AHS6.26.053a/ sa.kṣaudre ca vraṇe baddhe su.jīrṇe 'nne ghṛtaṁ pibet |
AHS6.26.053c/ kṣīraṁ vā śarkarā.citrā.lākṣā.gokṣurakaiḥ śṛtam || 53 || [Note: AHS6.26.053v/ 26.53av sa.kṣaudre tu vraṇe baddhe 26.53bv su.jīrṇānno ghṛtaṁ pibet]
AHS6.26.054a/ rug.dāha.jit sa.yaṣṭy.āhvaiḥ paraṁ pūrvodito vidhiḥ |
AHS6.26.054c/ medo.granthy.uditaṁ tatra tailam abhyañjane hitam || 54 || [Note: AHS6.26.054v/ 26.54cv medo.granthy.uditaṁ cātra]
AHS6.26.055a/ tālīśaṁ padmakaṁ māṁsī hareṇv.aguru.candanam |
AHS6.26.055c/ haridre padma.bījāni sośīraṁ madhukaṁ ca taiḥ || 55 ||
AHS6.26.056a/ pakvaṁ sadyo.vraṇeṣūktaṁ tailaṁ ropaṇam uttamam |
AHS6.26.056c/ gūḍha.prahārābhihate patite viṣamoccakaiḥ || 56 || [Note: AHS6.26.056v/ 26.56cv mūḍha.prahārābhihate]
[Page 680 ]
AHS6.26.057a/ kāryaṁ vātāsra.jit tṛpti.mardanābhyañjanādikam |
AHS6.26.057c/ viśliṣṭa.dehaṁ mathitaṁ kṣīṇaṁ marmāhataṁ hatam || 57 || [Note: AHS6.26.057v/ 26.57av kuryād vātāsṛg.uktaṁ hi 26.57bv .mardanābhyaṅga.śodhanam 26.57bv mardanābhyaṅga.śodhanam 26.57dv kṣīṇaṁ marmāhatāhatam 26.57dv kṣīṇaṁ marmāhataṁ ca tam]
AHS6.26.057ū̆ab/ vāsayet taila.pūrṇāyāṁ droṇyāṁ māṁsa.rasāśinam || 57ū̆ab ||

6.27. Chapter 27 :: Athabhaṅgapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 526-529]
AHS6.27.001a/ pāta.ghātādibhir dve.dhā bhaṅgo 'sthnāṁ sandhy.a.sandhitaḥ |
AHS6.27.001c/ prasāraṇākuñcanayor a.śaktiḥ sandhi.mukta.tā || 1 || [Note: AHS6.27.001v/ 27.1bv bhaṅgo 'sthnaḥ sandhy.a.sandhi.gaḥ 27.1bv bhaṅgo 'sthnaḥ sandhy.a.sandhitaḥ]
AHS6.27.002a/ itarasmin bhṛśaṁ śophaḥ sarvāvasthāsv ati.vyathā |
AHS6.27.002c/ a.śaktiś ceṣṭite 'lpe 'pi pīḍyamāne sa.śabda.tā || 2 || [Note: AHS6.27.002v/ 27.2bv sarvāvasthāsv ati.vyathaḥ]
AHS6.27.003a/ samāsād iti bhaṅgasya lakṣaṇaṁ bahu.dhā tu tat |
AHS6.27.003c/ bhidyate bhaṅga.bhedena tasya sarvasya sādhanam || 3 ||
AHS6.27.004a/ yathā syād upayogāya tathā tad upadekṣyate |
AHS6.27.004c/ prājyāṇu.dāri yat tv asthi sparśe śabdaṁ karoti yat || 4 || [Note: AHS6.27.004v/ 27.4cv prājyāṇu.dāri yac cāsthi]
AHS6.27.005a/ yatrāsthi.leśaḥ praviśen madhyam asthno vidāritaḥ |
AHS6.27.005c/ bhagnaṁ yac cābhighātena kiñ.cid evāvaśeṣitam || 5 || [Note: AHS6.27.005v/ 27.5cv bhagnaṁ yad abhighātena 27.5cv bhagnaṁ yad vābhighātena]
AHS6.27.006a/ unnamyamānaṁ kṣata.vad yac ca majjani majjati |
AHS6.27.006c/ tad duḥ.sādhyaṁ kṛśā.śakta.vātalālpāśinām api || 6 ||
AHS6.27.007a/ bhinnaṁ kapālaṁ yat kaṭyāṁ sandhi.muktaṁ cyutaṁ ca yat |
AHS6.27.007c/ jaghanaṁ prati piṣṭaṁ ca bhagnaṁ yat tad vivarjayet || 7 || [Note: AHS6.27.007v/ 27.7av bhinnaṁ kapālaṁ yat kaṭyāḥ]
AHS6.27.008a/ a.saṁśliṣṭa.kapālaṁ ca lalāṭaṁ cūrṇitaṁ tathā |
AHS6.27.008c/ yac ca bhagnaṁ bhavec chaṅkha.śiraḥ.pṛṣṭha.stanāntare || 8 ||
[Page 681 ]
AHS6.27.009a/ samyag.yamitam apy asthi dur.nyāsād dur.nibandhanāt |
AHS6.27.009c/ saṅkṣobhād api yad gacched vi.kriyāṁ tad vivarjayet || 9 || [Note: AHS6.27.009v/ 27.9dv vi.kriyāṁ tac ca varjayet]
AHS6.27.010a/ ādito yac ca dur.jātam asthi sandhir athāpi vā |
AHS6.27.010c/ taruṇāsthīni bhujyante bhajyante nalakāni tu || 10 || [Note: AHS6.27.010v/ 27.10cv taruṇāsthīni namyante 27.10dv bhajyante nalakāni ca]
AHS6.27.011a/ kapālāni vibhidyante sphuṭanty anyāni bhūyasā |
AHS6.27.011c/ athāvanatam unnamyam unnataṁ cāvapīḍayet || 11 || [Note: AHS6.27.011v/ 27.11av kapālāsthīni bhidyante]
AHS6.27.012a/ āñched atikṣiptam adho.gataṁ copari vartayet |
AHS6.27.012c/ āñchanotpīḍanonnāma.carma.saṅkṣepa.bandhanaiḥ || 12 || [Note: AHS6.27.012v/ 27.12av āñched a.vikṣiptam adho.]
AHS6.27.013a/ sandhīñ charīra.gān sarvāṁś calān apy a.calān api |
AHS6.27.013c/ ity etaiḥ sthāpanopāyaiḥ samyak saṁsthāpya niś.calam || 13 || [Note: AHS6.27.013v/ 27.13dv samyak saṁsthāpya niś.calān]
AHS6.27.014a/ paṭṭaiḥ prabhūta.sarpirbhiḥ veṣṭayitvā sukhais tataḥ |
AHS6.27.014c/ kadambodumbarāśvattha.sarjārjuna.palāśa.jaiḥ || 14 ||
AHS6.27.015a/ vaṁśodbhavair vā pṛthubhis tanubhiḥ su.niveśitaiḥ |
AHS6.27.015c/ su.ślakṣṇaiḥ sa.pratistambhair valkalaiḥ śakalair api || 15 || [Note: AHS6.27.015v/ 27.15cv su.ślakṣṇaiḥ sa.pratistambhair]
AHS6.27.016a/ kuśāhvayaiḥ samaṁ bandhaṁ paṭṭasyopari yojayet |
AHS6.27.016c/ śithilena hi bandhena sandhi.sthairyaṁ na jāyate || 16 || [Note: AHS6.27.016v/ 27.16dv sandheḥ sthairyaṁ na jāyate]
AHS6.27.017a/ gāḍhenāti rujā.dāha.pāka.śvayathu.sambhavaḥ |
AHS6.27.017c/ try.ahāt try.ahād ṛtau gharme saptāhān mokṣayed dhime || 17 || [Note: AHS6.27.017v/ 27.17av gāḍhenāpi rujā.dāha.]
AHS6.27.018a/ sādhāraṇe tu pañcāhād bhaṅga.doṣa.vaśena vā |
AHS6.27.018c/ nyagrodhādi.kaṣāyeṇa tataḥ śītena secayet || 18 || [Note: AHS6.27.018v/ 27.18bv bhagna.doṣa.vaśena vā 27.18bv bhaṅge doṣa.vaśena vā]
[Page 682 ]
AHS6.27.019a/ taṁ pañca.mūla.pakvena payasā tu sa.vedanam |
AHS6.27.019c/ sukhoṣṇaṁ vāvacāryaṁ syāc cakra.tailaṁ vijānatā || 19 || [Note: AHS6.27.019v/ 27.19av pañca.mūla.vipakvena 27.19cc sukhoṣṇam avacāryaṁ syāc]
AHS6.27.020a/ vibhajya deśaṁ kālaṁ ca vāta.ghnauṣadha.saṁyutam |
AHS6.27.020c/ pratataṁ seka.lepāṁś ca vidadhyād bhṛśa.śītalān || 20 || [Note: AHS6.27.020v/ 27.20av vibhajya deśa.kālau ca 27.20bv vāta.ghnauṣadha.sādhitam]
AHS6.27.021a/ gṛṣṭi.kṣīraṁ sa.sarpiṣkaṁ madhurauṣadha.sādhitam |
AHS6.27.021c/ prātaḥ prātaḥ pibed bhagnaḥ śītalaṁ lākṣayā yutam || 21 ||
AHS6.27.022a/ sa.vraṇasya tu bhagnasya vraṇo madhu.ghṛtottaraiḥ |
AHS6.27.022c/ kaṣāyaiḥ pratisāryo 'tha śeṣo bhaṅgoditaḥ kramaḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS6.27.022v/ 27.22cv kaṣāyaiḥ pratisāryo vā]
AHS6.27.023a/ lambāni vraṇa.māṁsāni pralipya madhu.sarpiṣā |
AHS6.27.023c/ sandadhīta vraṇān vaidyo bandhanaiś copapādayet || 23 ||
AHS6.27.024a/ tān samān su.sthitāñ jñātvā phalinī.lodhra.kaṭphalaiḥ |
AHS6.27.024c/ samaṅgā.dhātakī.yuktaiś cūrṇitair avacūrṇayet || 24 ||
AHS6.27.025a/ dhātakī.lodhra.cūrṇair vā rohanty āśu tathā vraṇāḥ |
AHS6.27.025c/ iti bhaṅga upakrāntaḥ sthira.dhātor ṛtau hime || 25 ||
AHS6.27.026a/ māṁsalasyālpa.doṣasya su.sādhyo dāruṇo 'nya.thā |
AHS6.27.026c/ pūrva.madhyānta.vayasām eka.dvi.tri.guṇaiḥ kramāt || 26 || [Note: AHS6.27.026v/ 27.26bv su.sādho dāruṇo 'nya.thā]
AHS6.27.027a/ māsaiḥ sthairyaṁ bhavet sandher yathoktaṁ bhajatāṁ vidhim |
AHS6.27.027c/ kaṭī.jaṅghoru.bhagnānāṁ kapāṭa.śayanaṁ hitam || 27 || [Note: AHS6.27.027v/ 27.27bv yathoktaṁ bhajato vidhim]
AHS6.27.028a/ yantraṇārthaṁ tathā kīlāḥ pañca kāryā nibandhanāḥ |
AHS6.27.028c/ jaṅghorvoḥ pārśvayor dvau dvau tala ekaś ca kīlakaḥ || 28 ||
[Page 683 ]
AHS6.27.029a/ śroṇyāṁ vā pṛṣṭha.vaṁśe vā vakṣasy akṣakayos tathā |
AHS6.27.029c/ vimokṣe bhagna.sandhīnāṁ vidhim evaṁ samācaret || 29 || [Note: AHS6.27.029v/ 27.29bv vakṣasy aṁśakayos tathā 27.29bv vaktrasyākṣakayos tathā 27.29dv vidhim enaṁ samācaret]
AHS6.27.030a/ sandhīṁś cira.vimuktāṁs tu snigdha.svinnān mṛdū.kṛtān |
AHS6.27.030c/ uktair vidhānair buddhyā ca yathā.svaṁ sthānam ānayet || 30 || [Note: AHS6.27.030v/ 27.30av sandhīṁś cira.vimuktāṁś ca 27.30cv uktair vidhānair yuktyā ca 27.30cv uktair vidhānair yuktyā vā]
AHS6.27.031a/ a.sandhi.bhagne rūḍhe tu viṣamolbaṇa.sādhite |
AHS6.27.031c/ āpothya bhaṅgaṁ yamayet tato bhagna.vad ācaret || 31 || [Note: AHS6.27.031v/ 27.31av a.sandhi.bhagne rūḍhe ca 27.31bv viṣamolbaṇa.sādhanaiḥ]
AHS6.27.032a/ bhagnaṁ naiti yathā pākaṁ prayateta tathā bhiṣak |
AHS6.27.032c/ pakva.māṁsa.sirā.snāyuḥ sandhiḥ śleṣaṁ na gacchati || 32 || [Note: AHS6.27.032v/ 27.32av bhaṅgo naiti yathā pākaṁ]
AHS6.27.033a/ vāta.vyādhi.vinirdiṣṭān snehān bhagnasya yojayet |
AHS6.27.033c/ catuṣ.prayogān balyāṁś ca vasti.karma ca śīlayet || 33 ||
AHS6.27.034a/ śāly.ājya.rasa.dugdhādyaiḥ pauṣṭikair a.vidāhibhiḥ |
AHS6.27.034c/ mātrayopacared bhagnaṁ sandhi.saṁśleṣa.kāribhiḥ || 34 ||
AHS6.27.035a/ glānir na śasyate tasya sandhi.viśleṣa.kṛd dhi sā || 35ab ||
AHS6.27.035c/ lavaṇaṁ kaṭukaṁ kṣāram amlaṁ maithunam ātapam || 35cd ||
AHS6.27.035e/ vyāyāmaṁ ca na seveta bhagno rūkṣaṁ ca bhojanam || 35ef ||
AHS6.27.036a/ kṛṣṇāṁs tilān vi.rajaso dṛḍha.vastra.baddhān sapta kṣapā vahati vāriṇi vāsayet |
AHS6.27.036c/ saṁśoṣayed anu.dinaṁ pravisārya caitān kṣīre tathaiva madhuka.kvathite ca toye || 36 || [Note: AHS6.27.036v/ 27.36cv saṁśoṣayed anu.dinaṁ pratisārya caitān 27.36cv saṁśoṣayed anu.dinaṁ pravibhāvya caitān]
AHS6.27.037a/ punar api pīta.payaskāṁs tān pūrva.vad eva śoṣitān bāḍham |
AHS6.27.037c/ vigata.tuṣān a.rajaskān sañcūrṇya su.cūrṇitair yuñjyāt || 37 || [Note: AHS6.27.037v/ 27.37dv sañcūrṇya vicūrṇitair yuñjyāt]
AHS6.27.038a/ nalada.vālaka.lohitayaṣṭikā.nakha.miśi.plava.kuṣṭha.balā.trayaiḥ |
AHS6.27.038c/ aguru.kuṅkuma.candana.śārivā.sarala.sarja.rasāmaradārubhiḥ || 38 ||
[Page 684 ]
AHS6.27.039a/ padmakādi.gaṇopetais tila.piṣṭaṁ tataś ca tat |
AHS6.27.039c/ samasta.gandha.bhaiṣajya.siddha.dugdhena pīḍayet || 39 || [Note: AHS6.27.039v/ 27.39bv tila.piṣṭaṁ tataś ca tam]
AHS6.27.040a/ śaileya.rāsnāṁśumatī.kaseru.kālānusārī.nata.pattra.lodhraiḥ |
AHS6.27.040c/ sa.kṣīraśuklaiḥ sa.payaḥ sa.dūrvais tailaṁ pacet tan naladādibhiś ca || 40 || [Note: AHS6.27.040v/ 27.40cv tvak.kṣīra.yuktaiḥ payasā sa.dūrvais 27.40cv sa.kṣīra.yuktais payasā sa.dūrvais 27.40cv sa.kṣīra.yuktais sa.payaḥ sa.dūrvais]
AHS6.27.041a/ gandha.tailam idam uttamam asthi.sthairya.kṛj jayati cāśu vikārān |
AHS6.27.041c/ vāta.pitta.janitān ati.vīryān vyāpino 'pi vividhair upayogaiḥ || 41 || [Note: AHS6.27.041v/ 27.41cv vāta.pitta.janitān ati.vīryaṁ 27.41cv vāta.pitta.janitān ati.vīrya. 27.41dv .vyāpino 'pi vividhair upayogaiḥ]

6.28. Chapter 28 :: Atha bhaṅgadarapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 529-531]
AHS6.28.001a/ hasty.aśva.pṛṣṭha.gamana.kaṭhinotkaṭakāsanaiḥ |
AHS6.28.001c/ arśo.nidānābhihitair aparaiś ca niṣevitaiḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS6.28.001v/ 28.1bv .kaṭhinotkaṭukāsanaiḥ]
AHS6.28.002a/ an.iṣṭā.dṛṣṭa.pākena sadyo vā sādhu.garhaṇaiḥ |
AHS6.28.002c/ prāyeṇa piṭikā.pūrvo yo 'ṅgule dvy.aṅgule 'pi vā || 2 || [Note: AHS6.28.002v/ 28.2av an.iṣṭa.diṣṭa.pākena]
AHS6.28.003a/ pāyor vraṇo 'ntar bāhyo vā duṣṭāsṛṅ.māṁsa.go bhavet |
AHS6.28.003c/ vasti.mūtrāśayābhyāsa.gata.tvāt syandanātmakaḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS6.28.003v/ 28.3av pāyau vraṇo 'ntar bāhyo vā]
AHS6.28.004a/ bhagandaraḥ sa sarvāṁś ca dārayaty a.kriyā.vataḥ |
AHS6.28.004c/ bhaga.vasti.gudāṁs teṣu dīryamāṇeṣu bhūribhiḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS6.28.004v/ 28.4av bhagandaraḥ sa sarvaś ca 28.4av bhagandaraḥ sa sarvasya]
AHS6.28.005a/ vāta.mūtra.śakṛc.chukraṁ khaiḥ sūkṣmair vamati kramāt |
AHS6.28.005c/ doṣaiḥ pṛthag yutaiḥ sarvair āgantuḥ so 'ṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS6.28.005v/ 28.5dv āgantuś cāṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ]
AHS6.28.006a/ a.pakvaṁ piṭikāṁ āhuḥ pāka.prāptaṁ bhagandaram |
AHS6.28.006c/ gūḍha.mūlāṁ sa.saṁrambhāṁ rug.āḍhyāṁ rūḍha.kopinīm || 6 ||
AHS6.28.007a/ bhagandara.karīṁ vidyāt piṭikāṁ na tv ato 'nya.thā |
AHS6.28.007c/ tatra śyāvāruṇā toda.bheda.sphuraṇa.ruk.karī || 7 ||
[Page 685 ]
AHS6.28.008a/ piṭikā mārutāt pittād uṣṭra.grīvā.vad ucchritā |
AHS6.28.008c/ rāgiṇī tanur ūṣmāḍhyā jvara.dhūmāyanānvitā || 8 || [Note: AHS6.28.008v/ 28.8cv rāgiṇī tanu.sūkṣmā ca]
AHS6.28.009a/ sthirā snigdhā mahā.mūlā pāṇḍuḥ kaṇḍū.matī kaphāt |
AHS6.28.009c/ śyāvā tāmrā sa.dāhoṣā ghora.rug vāta.pitta.jā || 9 || [Note: AHS6.28.009v/ 28.9cv śyāva.tāmrā sa.dāhoṣā]
AHS6.28.010a/ pāṇḍurā kiñ.cid.ā.śyāvā kṛcchra.pākā kaphānilāt |
AHS6.28.010c/ pādāṅguṣṭha.samā sarvair doṣair nānā.vidha.vyathā || 10 ||
AHS6.28.011a/ śūlā.rocaka.tṛḍ.dāha.jvara.cchardir.upadrutā |
AHS6.28.011c/ vraṇa.tāṁ yānti tāḥ pakvāḥ pramādāt tatra vāta.jā || 11 ||
AHS6.28.012a/ cīyate 'ṇu.mukhaiś chidraiḥ śata.ponaka.vat kramāt |
AHS6.28.012c/ acchaṁ sravadbhir āsrāvam ajasraṁ phena.saṁyutam || 12 || [Note: AHS6.28.012v/ 28.12av dīryate 'ṇu.mukhaiś chidraiḥ 28.12bv śata.ponaka.vaktra.vat]
AHS6.28.013a/ śata.ponaka.sañjño 'yam uṣṭra.grīvas tu pitta.jaḥ |
AHS6.28.013c/ bahu.picchā.parisrāvī parisrāvī kaphodbhavaḥ || 13 ||
AHS6.28.014a/ vāta.pittāj parikṣepī parikṣipya gudaṁ gatiḥ |
