AHS6.28.014c/ jāyate paritas tatra prākāraṁ parikheva ca || 14 || [Note: AHS6.28.014v/ 28.14dv prākāra.parikheva ca]
AHS6.28.015a/ ṛjur vāta.kaphād ṛjvyā gudo gatyātra dīryate |
AHS6.28.015c/ kapha.pitte tu pūrvotthaṁ dur.nāmāśritya kupyataḥ || 15 || [Note: AHS6.28.015v/ 28.15bv gudo gatyā tu dīryate 28.15bv gudo gatyā nu dīryate 28.15cv kapha.pitte tu pūrvoktaṁ]
AHS6.28.016a/ arśo.mūle tataḥ śophaḥ kaṇḍū.dāhādi.mān bhavet |
AHS6.28.016c/ sa śīghraṁ pakva.bhinno 'sya kledayan mūlam arśasaḥ || 16 ||
AHS6.28.017a/ sravaty ajasraṁ gatibhir ayam arśo.bhagandaraḥ |
AHS6.28.017c/ sarva.jaḥ śambukāvartaḥ śambūkāvarta.sannibhaḥ || 17 ||
[Page 686 ]
AHS6.28.018a/ gatayo dārayanty asmin rug.vegair dāruṇair gudam |
AHS6.28.018c/ asthi.leśo 'bhyavahṛto māṁsa.gṛddhyā yadā gudam || 18 ||
AHS6.28.019a/ kṣiṇoti tiryaṅ nirgacchann un.mārgaṁ kṣatato gatiḥ |
AHS6.28.019c/ syāt tataḥ pūya.dīrṇāyāṁ māṁsa.kothena tatra ca || 19 || [Note: AHS6.28.019v/ 28.19av kṣaṇoti tiryaṅ nirgacchan 28.19cv syāt tadā pūya.dīrṇāyāṁ]
AHS6.28.020a/ jāyante kṛmayas tasya khādantaḥ parito gudam |
AHS6.28.020c/ vidārayanti na cirād un.mārgī kṣata.jaś ca saḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS6.28.020v/ 28.20av jāyante kṛmayas tebhyaḥ 28.20dv un.mārgī kṣata.jas tu saḥ]
AHS6.28.021a/ teṣu rug.dāha.kaṇḍv.ādīn vidyād vraṇa.niṣedhataḥ |
AHS6.28.021c/ ṣaṭ kṛcchra.sādhanās teṣāṁ nicaya.kṣata.jau tyajet || 21 || [Note: AHS6.28.021v/ 28.21bv vidyād vraṇa.vibhaktitaḥ]
AHS6.28.022a/ pravāhiṇīṁ valīṁ prāptaṁ sevanīṁ vā samāśritam |
AHS6.28.022c/ athāsya piṭikām eva tathā yatnād upācaret || 22 ||
AHS6.28.023a/ śuddhy.asṛk.sruti.sekādyair yathā pākaṁ na gacchati |
AHS6.28.023c/ pāke punar upasnigdhaṁ sveditaṁ cāvagāhataḥ || 23 ||
AHS6.28.024a/ yantrayitvārśasam iva paśyet samyag bhagandaram |
AHS6.28.024c/ arvācīnaṁ parācīnam antar.mukha.bahir.mukham || 24 || [Note: AHS6.28.024v/ 28.24cv avācīnaṁ parācīnam]
AHS6.28.025a/ athāntar.mukham eṣitvā samyak śastreṇa pāṭayet |
AHS6.28.025c/ bahir.mukhaṁ ca niḥśeṣaṁ tataḥ kṣāreṇa sādhayet || 25 ||
AHS6.28.026a/ agninā vā bhiṣak sādhu kṣāreṇaivoṣṭra.kandharam |
AHS6.28.026c/ nāḍīr ekāntarāḥ kṛtvā pāṭayec chata.ponakam || 26 || [Note: AHS6.28.026v/ 28.26cv nāḍīm ekāntaraṁ kṛtvā 28.26dv pāṭayec chata.ponake]
AHS6.28.027a/ tāsu rūḍhāsu śeṣāś ca mṛtyur dīrṇe gude 'nya.thā |
AHS6.28.027c/ parikṣepiṇi cāpy evaṁ nāḍy.uktaiḥ kṣāra.sūtrakaiḥ || 27 ||
[Page 687 ]
AHS6.28.028a/ arśo.bhagandare pūrvam arśāṁsi pratisādhayet |
AHS6.28.028c/ tyaktvopacaryaḥ kṣata.jaḥ śalyaṁ śalya.vatas tataḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS6.28.028v/ 28.28bv arśāṁsi pratisārayet]
AHS6.28.029a/ āharec ca tathā dadyāt kṛmi.ghnaṁ lepa.bhojanam |
AHS6.28.029c/ piṇḍa.nāḍy.ādayaḥ svedāḥ su.snigdhā ruji pūjitāḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS6.28.029v/ 28.29av āhareta tathā dadyāt 28.29av āharet tat tathā dadyāt 28.29av āharet tu tathā dadyāt]
AHS6.28.030a/ sarva.tra ca bahu.cchidre chedān ālocya yojayet |
AHS6.28.030c/ go.tīrtha.sarvato.bhadra.dala.lāṅgala.lāṅgalān || 30 || [Note: AHS6.28.030v/ 28.30av sarva.trāpi bahu.cchidre]
AHS6.28.031a/ pārśvaṁ gatena śastreṇa cchedo go.tīrthako mataḥ |
AHS6.28.031c/ sarvataḥ sarvato.bhadraḥ pārśva.cchedo 'rdha.lāṅgalaḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS6.28.031v/ 28.31av pārśva.gatena śastreṇa 28.31av pārśvāgatena śastreṇa]
AHS6.28.032a/ pārśva.dvaye lāṅgalakaḥ samastāṁś cāgninā dahet |
AHS6.28.032c/ āsrāva.mārgān niḥśeṣaṁ naivaṁ vikurute punaḥ || 32 || [Note: AHS6.28.032v/ 28.32cv āsrāva.mārgān niḥśeṣān]
AHS6.28.033a/ yateta koṣṭha.śuddhau ca bhiṣak tasyāntarāntarā |
AHS6.28.033c/ lepo vraṇe biḍālāsthi tri.phalā.rasa.kalkitam || 33 || [Note: AHS6.28.033v/ 28.33av yateta koṣṭha.śuddhyai ca 28.33av yateta koṣṭha.saṁśuddhau 28.33dv tri.phalā.rasa.kalkitaḥ]
AHS6.28.034a/ jyotiṣmatī.malayu.lāṅgali.śelu.pāṭhā.kumbhāgni.sarja.karavīra.vacā.sudhārkaiḥ |
AHS6.28.034c/ abhyañjanāya vipaceta bhagandarāṇāṁ tailaṁ vadanti paramaṁ hitam etad eṣām || 34 || [Note: AHS6.28.034v/ 28.34bv .kumbhāgni.sarji.karavīra.vacā.sudhārkaiḥ 28.34dv tailaṁ vadanti paramaṁ hitam etad eva]
AHS6.28.035a/ madhuka.lodhra.kaṇā.truṭi.reṇukā.dvi.rajanī.phalinī.paṭu.śārivāḥ |
AHS6.28.035c/ kamala.kesara.padmaka.dhātakī.madana.sarja.rasāmaya.rodikāḥ || 35 || [Note: AHS6.28.035v/ 28.35dv .madana.sarja.rasāmaya.lodhrakāḥ]
AHS6.28.036a/ sa.bījapūra.cchadanair ebhis tailaṁ vipācitam |
AHS6.28.036c/ bhagandarāpacī.kuṣṭha.madhu.meha.vraṇāpaham || 36 ||
AHS6.28.037a/ madhu.taila.yutā viḍaṅga.sāra.tri.phalā.māgadhikā.kaṇāś ca līḍhāḥ |
AHS6.28.037c/ kṛmi.kuṣṭha.bhagandara.prameha.kṣata.nāḍī.vraṇa.ropaṇā bhavanti || 37 || [Note: AHS6.28.037v/ 28.37bv .tri.phalā.māgadhikoṣaṇāś ca līḍhāḥ 28.37dv .kṣata.nāḍī.vraṇa.rohaṇā bhavanti]
[Page 688 ]
AHS6.28.038a/ amṛtā.truṭi.vella.vatsakaṁ kali.pathyāmalakāni gugguluḥ |
AHS6.28.038c/ krama.vṛddham idaṁ madhu.drutaṁ piṭikā.sthaulya.bhagandarāñ jayet || 38 || [Note: AHS6.28.038v/ 28.38cv krama.vṛddham idaṁ madhu.plutaṁ]
AHS6.28.039a/ māgadhikāgni.kaliṅga.viḍaṅgair bilva.ghṛtaiḥ sa.varā.pala.ṣaṭkaiḥ |
AHS6.28.039c/ guggulunā sadṛśena sametaiḥ kṣaudra.yutaiḥ sakalāmaya.nāśaḥ || 39 || [Note: AHS6.28.039v/ 28.39av māgadhikāgni.kaliṅga.viḍaṅgais 28.39bv tulya.ghṛtaiḥ sa.varā.pala.ṣaṭkaiḥ]
AHS6.28.040a/ guggulu.pañca.palaṁ palikāṁśā māgadhikā tri.phalā ca pṛthak syāt |
AHS6.28.040c/ tvak.truṭi.karṣa.yutaṁ madhu.līḍhaṁ kuṣṭha.bhagandara.gulma.gati.ghnam || 40 ||
AHS6.28.041a/ śṛṅgavera.rajo.yuktaṁ tad eva ca su.bhāvitam |
AHS6.28.041c/ kvāthena daśa.mūlasya viśeṣād vāta.roga.jit || 41 ||
AHS6.28.042a/ uttamā.khadira.sāra.jaṁ rajaḥ śīlayann asana.vāri.bhāvitam |
AHS6.28.042c/ hanti tulya.mahiṣākṣa.mākṣikaṁ kuṣṭha.meha.piṭikā.bhagandarān || 42 || [Note: AHS6.28.042v/ 28.42bv śīlayed anala.vāri.bhāvitam 28.42bv śīlayed asana.vāri.bhāvitam 28.42cv hanti tulya.mahiṣākhya.mākṣikaṁ]
AHS6.28.043a/ bhagandareṣv eṣa viśeṣa uktaḥ śeṣāṇi tu vyañjana.sādhanāni |
AHS6.28.043c/ vraṇādhikārāt pariśīlanāc ca samyag viditvaupayikaṁ vidadhyāt || 43 || [Note: AHS6.28.043v/ 28.43dv samyag viditvauṣadhikaṁ vidadhyāt]
AHS6.28.044a/ aśva.pṛṣṭha.gamanaṁ cala.rodhaṁ madya.maithunam a.jīrṇam a.sātmyam |
AHS6.28.044c/ sāhasāni vividhāni ca rūḍhe vatsaraṁ parihared adhikaṁ vā || 44 || [Note: AHS6.28.044v/ 28.44dv vatsaraṁ parihared adhikaṁ ca]

6.29. Chapter 29 :: Atha granthyarbudaślīpadāpacīnāḍīvijñānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 531-534]
AHS6.29.001a/ kapha.pradhānāḥ kurvanti medo.māṁsāsra.gā malāḥ |
AHS6.29.001c/ vṛttonnataṁ yaṁ śvayathuṁ sa granthir grathanāt smṛtaḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS6.29.001v/ 29.1dv sa granthir granthanāt smṛtaḥ]
AHS6.29.002a/ doṣāsra.māṁsa.medo.'sthi.sirā.vraṇa.bhavā nava |
AHS6.29.002c/ te tatra vātād āyāma.toda.bhedānvito 'sitaḥ || 2 ||
AHS6.29.003a/ sthānāt sthānāntara.gatir a.kasmād dhāni.vṛddhi.mān |
AHS6.29.003c/ mṛdur vastir ivānaddho vibhinno 'cchaṁ sravaty asṛk || 3 ||
[Page 689 ]
AHS6.29.004a/ pittāt sa.dāhaḥ pītābho rakto vā pacyate drutam |
AHS6.29.004c/ bhinno 'sram uṣṇaṁ sravati śleṣmaṇā nī.rujo ghanaḥ || 4 ||
AHS6.29.005a/ śītaḥ sa.varṇaḥ kaṇḍū.mān pakvaḥ pūyaṁ sraved ghanam |
AHS6.29.005c/ doṣair duṣṭe 'sṛji granthir bhaven mūrchatsu jantuṣu || 5 ||
AHS6.29.006a/ sirā.māṁsaṁ ca saṁśritya sa.svāpaḥ pitta.lakṣaṇaḥ |
AHS6.29.006c/ māṁsalair dūṣitaṁ māṁsam āhārair granthim āvahet || 6 ||
AHS6.29.007a/ snigdhaṁ mahāntaṁ kaṭhinaṁ sirā.naddhaṁ kaphākṛtim |
AHS6.29.007c/ pravṛddhaṁ medurair medo nītaṁ māṁse 'tha.vā tvaci || 7 ||
AHS6.29.008a/ vāyunā kurute granthiṁ bhṛśaṁ snigdhaṁ mṛduṁ calam |
AHS6.29.008c/ śleṣma.tulyākṛtiṁ deha.kṣaya.vṛddhi.kṣayodayam || 8 ||
AHS6.29.009a/ sa vibhinno ghanaṁ medas tāmrāsita.sitaṁ sravet |
AHS6.29.009c/ asthi.bhaṅgābhighātābhyām unnatāvanataṁ tu yat || 9 || [Note: AHS6.29.009v/ 29.9av sa vibhinno ghanaṁ medaḥ 29.9bv pūyaṁ tāmrāsitaṁ sravet 29.9cv asthi.bhagnābhighātābhyām]
AHS6.29.010a/ so 'sthi.granthiḥ padātes tu sahasāmbho.'vagāhanāt |
AHS6.29.010c/ vyāyāmād vā pratāntasya sirā.jālaṁ sa.śoṇitam || 10 ||
AHS6.29.011a/ vāyuḥ sampīḍya saṅkocya vakrī.kṛtya viśoṣya ca |
AHS6.29.011c/ niḥ.sphuraṁ nī.rujaṁ granthiṁ kurute sa sirāhvayaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS6.29.011v/ 29.11av vāyuḥ prapīḍya saṅkocya]
AHS6.29.012a/ a.rūḍhe rūḍha.mātre vā vraṇe sarva.rasāśinaḥ |
AHS6.29.012c/ sārdre vā bandha.rahite gātre 'śmābhihate 'tha.vā || 12 ||
AHS6.29.013a/ vāto 'sram a.srutaṁ duṣṭaṁ saṁśoṣya grathitaṁ vraṇam |
AHS6.29.013c/ kuryāt sa.dāhaḥ kaṇḍū.mān vraṇa.granthir ayaṁ smṛtaḥ || 13 || [Note: AHS6.29.013v/ 29.13av vāyuḥ prakupitaḥ kṣipraṁ 29.13bv prāpya marmāśritaṁ vraṇam]
[Page 690 ]
AHS6.29.014a/ sādhyā doṣāsra.medo.jā na tu sthūla.kharāś calāḥ |
AHS6.29.014c/ marma.kaṇṭhodara.sthāś ca mahat tu granthito 'rbudam || 14 || [Note: AHS6.29.014v/ 29.14bv na tu sthūlāḥ kharāś calāḥ 29.14dv mahāṁs tu granthito 'rbudam]
AHS6.29.015a/ tal.lakṣaṇaṁ ca medo.'ntaiḥ ṣo.ḍhā doṣādibhis tu tat |
AHS6.29.015c/ prāyo medaḥ.kaphāḍhya.tvāt sthira.tvāc ca na pacyate || 15 ||
AHS6.29.016a/ sirā.sthaṁ śoṇitaṁ doṣaḥ saṅkocyāntaḥ prapīḍya ca |
AHS6.29.016c/ pācayeta tad ānaddhaṁ sāsrāvaṁ māṁsa.piṇḍitam || 16 || [Note: AHS6.29.016v/ 29.16bv saṅkocyānu prapīḍya ca 29.16bv saṅkocyānu prapīḍya vā 29.16bv saṅkocyāntaḥ prapīḍya vā 29.16dv sa.srāvaṁ māṁsa.piṇḍa.tām]
AHS6.29.017a/ māṁsāṅkuraiś citaṁ yāti vṛddhiṁ cāśu sravet tataḥ |
AHS6.29.017c/ ajasraṁ duṣṭa.rudhiraṁ bhūri tac choṇitārbudam || 17 || [Note: AHS6.29.017v/ 29.17bv vṛddhaṁ cāśu sravet tataḥ]
AHS6.29.018a/ teṣv asṛṅ.māṁsa.je varjye catvāry anyāni sādhayet |
AHS6.29.018c/ prasthitā vaṅkṣaṇorv.ādim adhaḥ.kāyaṁ kapholbaṇāḥ || 18 ||
AHS6.29.019a/ doṣā māṁsāsra.gāḥ pādau kālenāśritya kurvate |
AHS6.29.019c/ śanaiḥ śanair ghanaṁ śophaṁ ślīpadaṁ tat pracakṣate || 19 || [Note: AHS6.29.019v/ 29.19dv ślīpadaṁ tat pracakṣyate]
AHS6.29.020a/ paripoṭa.yutaṁ kṛṣṇam a.nimitta.rujaṁ kharam |
AHS6.29.020c/ rūkṣaṁ ca vātāt pittāt tu pītaṁ dāha.jvarānvitam || 20 || [Note: AHS6.29.020v/ 29.20cv rūkṣaṁ ca vātāt pittāc ca 29.20cv rūkṣaṁ ca ślīpadaṁ vātāt 29.20dv pittād dāha.jvarānvitam]
AHS6.29.021a/ kaphād guru snigdham a.ruk citaṁ māṁsāṅkurair bṛhat |
AHS6.29.021c/ tat tyajed vatsarātītaṁ su.mahat su.parisruti || 21 || [Note: AHS6.29.021v/ 29.21bv citaṁ māṁsāṅkurair mahat]
AHS6.29.022a/ pāṇi.nāsauṣṭha.karṇeṣu vadanty eke tu pāda.vat |
AHS6.29.022c/ ślīpadaṁ jāyate tac ca deśe 'nūpe bhṛśaṁ bhṛśam || 22 || [Note: AHS6.29.022v/ 29.22bv vadanty anye tu pāda.vat]
AHS6.29.023a/ meda.sthāḥ kaṇṭha.manyākṣa.kakṣā.vaṅkṣaṇa.gā malāḥ |
AHS6.29.023c/ sa.varṇān kaṭhinān snigdhān vārtākāmalakākṛtīn || 23 || [Note: AHS6.29.023v/ 29.23av meda.sthāḥ kaṇṭha.manyākṣi.]
[Page 691 ]
AHS6.29.024a/ avagāḍhān bahūn gaṇḍāṁś cira.pākāṁś ca kurvate |
AHS6.29.024c/ pacyante 'lpa.rujas te 'nye sravanty anye 'ti.kaṇḍurāḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.29.024v/ 29.24cv pacyante 'lpa.rujas tv anye 29.24dv sravanty anye 'ti.kaṇḍulāḥ]
AHS6.29.025a/ naśyanty anye bhavanty anye dīrgha.kālānubandhinaḥ |
AHS6.29.025c/ gaṇḍa.mālāpacī ceyaṁ dūrveva kṣaya.vṛddhi.bhāk || 25 ||
AHS6.29.026a/ tāṁ tyajet sa.jvara.cchardi.pārśva.ruk.kāsa.pīnasām |
AHS6.29.026c/ a.bhedāt pakva.śophasya vraṇe cā.pathya.sevinaḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS6.29.026v/ 29.26bv .pārśva.ruk.śvāsa.pīnasām 29.26dv vraṇe vā.pathya.sevinaḥ]
AHS6.29.027a/ anupraviśya māṁsādīn dūraṁ pūyo 'bhidhāvati |
AHS6.29.027c/ gatiḥ sā dūra.gamanān nāḍī nāḍīva saṁsruteḥ || 27 ||
AHS6.29.028a/ nāḍy ekān.ṛjur anyeṣāṁ saivāneka.gatir gatiḥ |
AHS6.29.028c/ sā doṣaiḥ pṛthag eka.sthaiḥ śalya.hetuś ca pañcamī || 28 || [Note: AHS6.29.028v/ 29.28cv doṣaiḥ pṛthak samastaiś ca]
AHS6.29.029a/ vātāt sa.ruk sūkṣma.mukhī vi.varṇā phenilodvamā |
AHS6.29.029c/ sravaty abhyadhikaṁ rātrau pittāt tṛḍ.jvara.dāha.kṛt || 29 ||
AHS6.29.030a/ pītoṣṇa.pūti.pūya.srud divā cāti niṣiñcati |
AHS6.29.030c/ ghana.picchila.saṁsrāvā kaṇḍūlā kaṭhinā kaphāt || 30 || [Note: AHS6.29.030v/ 29.30av pītoṣṇa.pūti.pūyaṁ tu 29.30av pītoṣṇa.pūti.pūyāśru 29.30av pītoṣṇa.pūti.pūyāsrur]
AHS6.29.031a/ niśi cābhyadhika.kledā sarvaiḥ sarvākṛtiṁ tyajet || 31ab ||
AHS6.29.031c/ antaḥ.sthitaṁ śalyam an.āhṛtaṁ tu karoti nāḍīṁ vahate ca sāsya || 31cd ||
AHS6.29.031e/ phenānuviddhaṁ tanum alpam uṣṇaṁ sāsraṁ ca pūyaṁ sa.rujaṁ ca nityam || 31ef || [Note: AHS6.29.031v/ 29.31bv sarvaiḥ sarvākṛtis tyajet 29.31dv karoti nāḍīṁ vahate ca sāsyāt 29.31ev phenānuviddhaṁ tanum accham uṣṇaṁ]

6.30. Chapter 30 :: Atha granthyarbudaślīpadāpacīnāḍīpratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 534-536]
AHS6.30.001a/ granthiṣv āmeṣu kartavyā yathā.svaṁ śopha.vat kriyā |
AHS6.30.001c/ bṛhatī.citraka.vyāghrī.kaṇā.siddhena sarpiṣā || 1 ||
AHS6.30.002a/ snehayec chuddhi.kāmaṁ ca tīkṣṇaiḥ śuddhasya lepanam |
AHS6.30.002c/ saṁsvedya bahu.śo granthiṁ vimṛdnīyāt punaḥ punaḥ || 2 ||
[Page 692 ]
AHS6.30.003a/ eṣa vāte viśeṣeṇa kramaḥ pittāsra.je punaḥ |
AHS6.30.003c/ jalaukaso himaṁ sarvaṁ kapha.je vātiko vidhiḥ || 3 ||
AHS6.30.004a/ tathāpy a.pakvaṁ chittvainaṁ sthite rakte 'gninā dahet |
AHS6.30.004c/ sādhv a.śeṣaṁ sa.śeṣo hi punar āpyāyate dhruvam || 4 || [Note: AHS6.30.004v/ 30.4dv punar ānahyate drutam]
AHS6.30.005a/ māṁsa.vraṇodbhavau granthī yāpayed evam eva ca |
AHS6.30.005c/ kāryaṁ medo.bhave 'py etat taptaiḥ phalādibhiś ca tam || 5 || [Note: AHS6.30.005v/ 30.5bv pāṭayed evam eva ca]
AHS6.30.006a/ pramṛdyāt tila.digdhena cchannaṁ dvi.guṇa.vāsasā |
AHS6.30.006c/ śastreṇa pāṭayitvā vā dahen medasi sūddhṛte || 6 || [Note: AHS6.30.006v/ 30.6av pramṛjyāt tila.digdhena 30.6dv dahen medasi tūddhṛte]
AHS6.30.007a/ sirā.granthau nave peyaṁ tailaṁ sāhacaraṁ tathā |
AHS6.30.007c/ upanāho 'nila.harair vasti.karma sirā.vyadhaḥ || 7 ||
AHS6.30.008a/ arbude granthi.vat kuryāt yathā.svaṁ su.tarāṁ hitam |
AHS6.30.008c/ ślīpade 'nila.je vidhyet snigdha.svinnopanāhite || 8 ||
AHS6.30.008.1+(1)ab/ ajā.śakṛc.chigru.mūla.lākṣā.surasa.kāñjikaiḥ || 8.1+(1)ab || [Note: AHS6.30.008.1+(1)v/ 30.8.1+(1)bv .lākṣā.rasa.sa.kāñjikaiḥ 30.8.1+(1)bv .lavaṇa.kṣāra.kāñjikaiḥ]
AHS6.30.008.1+(2)a/ upodakā.pattra.piṇḍyā chadair ācchāditaṁ ghanam |
AHS6.30.008.1+(2)c/ niveśya paṭṭaṁ badhnīyāc chāmyaty evaṁ navārbudam || 8.1+(2) || [Note: AHS6.30.008.1+(2)v/ 30.8.1+(2)av upodakārka.piṇyāka. 30.8.1+(2)bv .cchadair ācchāditaṁ ghanam]
AHS6.30.008.1+(3)a/ jīrṇe cārka.cchada.sudhā.sāmudra.guḍa.kāñjikaiḥ |
AHS6.30.008.1+(3)c/ pracchāne piṇḍikā baddhā granthy.arbuda.vilāyanī || 8.1+(3) || [Note: AHS6.30.008.1+(3)v/ 30.8.1+(3)av jīrṇārdrārka.cchada.sudhā. 30.8.1+(3)bv .sāmudraṁ tulyakāmbubhiḥ 30.8.1+(3)cv pracchanne piṭikāṁ baddhvā 30.8.1+(3)cv pracchānair piṇḍikāṁ baddhvā 30.8.1+(3)dv granthy.arbuda.vilāyanam]
AHS6.30.009a/ sirām upari gulphasya dvy.aṅgule pāyayec ca tam |
AHS6.30.009c/ māsam eraṇḍa.jaṁ tailaṁ go.mūtreṇa samanvitam || 9 ||
[Page 693 ]
AHS6.30.010a/ jīrṇe jīrṇānnam aśnīyāc chuṇṭhī.śṛta.payo.'nvitam |
AHS6.30.010c/ traivṛtaṁ vā pibed evam a.śāntāv agninā dahet || 10 ||
AHS6.30.011a/ gulphasyādhaḥ sirā.mokṣaḥ paitte sarvaṁ ca pitta.jit |
AHS6.30.011c/ sirām aṅguṣṭhake viddhvā kapha.je śīlayed yavān || 11 ||
AHS6.30.012a/ sa.kṣaudrāṇi kaṣāyāṇi vardhamānās tathābhayāḥ |
AHS6.30.012c/ limpet sarṣapa.vārtākī.mūlābhyāṁ dhanvayātha.vā || 12 || [Note: AHS6.30.012v/ 30.12dv .mūlābhyāṁ dhānyayātha.vā]
AHS6.30.013a/ ūrdhvādhaḥ.śodhanaṁ peyam apacyāṁ sādhitaṁ ghṛtam |
AHS6.30.013c/ dantī.dravantī.trivṛtā.jālinī.devadālibhiḥ || 13 ||
AHS6.30.014a/ śīlayet kapha.medo.ghnaṁ dhūma.gaṇḍūṣa.nāvanam |
AHS6.30.014c/ sirayāpahared raktaṁ piben mūtreṇa tārkṣya.jam || 14 ||
AHS6.30.014+(1)a/ palam ardha.palaṁ vāpi karṣaṁ vāpy uṣṇa.vāriṇā |
AHS6.30.014+(1)c/ kāñcanāra.tvacaṁ pītvā gaṇḍa.mālāṁ vyapohati || 14+(1) || [Note: AHS6.30.014+(1)v/ 30.14+(1)bv karṣaṁ voṣṇena vāriṇā]
AHS6.30.015a/ granthīn a.pakvān ālimpen nākulī.paṭu.nāgaraiḥ |
AHS6.30.015c/ svinnān lavaṇa.poṭalyā kaṭhinān anu mardayet || 15 ||
AHS6.30.016a/ śamī.mūlaka.śigrūṇāṁ bījaiḥ sa.yava.sarṣapaiḥ |
AHS6.30.016c/ lepaḥ piṣṭo ṇmla.takreṇa granthi.gaṇḍa.vilāyanaḥ || 16 || [Note: AHS6.30.016v/ 30.16av śamī.mūlaka.śigrūttha. 30.16av śamī.mūlaka.śigrūmā. 30.16bv .bījaḥ sa.yava.sarṣapaiḥ 30.16bv .bījaiḥ sa.yava.sarṣapaiḥ]
AHS6.30.016+(1)a/ kṣuṇṇāni nimba.pattrāṇi k ptair bhallātakaiḥ saha |
AHS6.30.016+(1)c/ śarāva.sampuṭe dagdhvā sārdhaṁ siddhārthakaiḥ samaiḥ || 16+(1) || [Note: AHS6.30.016+(1)v/ 30.16+(1)av jīrṇāni nimba.pattrāṇi 30.16+(1)bv klinnair bhallātakaiḥ saha 30.16+(1)bv kṣiprair bhallātakaiḥ saha]
AHS6.30.016+(2)ab/ etac chāgāmbunā piṣṭaṁ gaṇḍa.mālā.pralepanam || 16+(2)ab || [Note: AHS6.30.016+(2)v/ 30.16+(2)bv gaṇḍa.mālā.vilepanam]
[Page 694 ]
AHS6.30.017a/ pākon.mukhān srutāsrasya pitta.śleṣma.harair jayet |
AHS6.30.017c/ a.pakvān evo voddhṛtya kṣārāgnibhyām upācaret || 17 ||
AHS6.30.018a/ kākādanī.lāṅgalikā.nahikottuṇḍikī.phalaiḥ |
AHS6.30.018c/ jīmūta.bīja.karkoṭī.viśālā.kṛtavedhanaiḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS6.30.018v/ 30.18bv .nalikottuṇḍikī.phalaiḥ 30.18bv .nalikottuṇḍakī.phalaiḥ 30.18bv .nahikottaiṇḍukī.phalaiḥ]
AHS6.30.019a/ pāṭhānvitaiḥ palārdhāṁśair viṣa.karṣa.yutaiḥ pacet |
AHS6.30.019c/ prasthaṁ karañja.tailasya nirguṇḍī.sva.rasāḍhake || 19 || [Note: AHS6.30.019v/ 30.19av pathyānvitaiḥ palārdhāṁśair]
AHS6.30.020a/ anena mālā gaṇḍānāṁ cira.jā pūya.vāhinī |
AHS6.30.020c/ sidhyaty a.sādhya.kalpāpi pānābhyañjana.nāvanaiḥ || 20 ||
AHS6.30.021a/ tailaṁ lāṅgalikī.kanda.kalka.pādaṁ catur.guṇe |
AHS6.30.021c/ nirguṇḍī.sva.rase pakvaṁ nasyādyair apacī.praṇut || 21 || [Note: AHS6.30.021v/ 30.21bv .kalka.pāde catur.guṇe]
AHS6.30.022a/ bhadraśrī.dāru.marica.dvi.haridrā.trivṛd.ghanaiḥ |
AHS6.30.022c/ manaḥśilāla.nalada.viśālā.karavīrakaiḥ || 22 || [Note: AHS6.30.022v/ 30.22ac bhadra.śrīdāru.marica. 30.22cv manaḥśilāla.madana.]
AHS6.30.023a/ go.mūtra.piṣṭaiḥ palikair viṣasyārdha.palena ca |
AHS6.30.023c/ brāhmī.rasārka.ja.kṣīra.go.śakṛd.rasa.saṁyutam || 23 ||
AHS6.30.024a/ prasthaṁ sarṣapa.tailasya siddham āśu vyapohati |
AHS6.30.024c/ pānādyaiḥ śīlitaṁ kuṣṭha.duṣṭa.nāḍī.vraṇāpacīḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.30.024v/ 30.24cv pānādyaiḥ śīlitaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ 30.24dv duṣṭa.nāḍī.vraṇāpacīḥ]
AHS6.30.025a/ vacā.harītakī.lākṣā.kaṭu.rohiṇi.candanaiḥ |
AHS6.30.025c/ tailaṁ prasādhitaṁ pītaṁ sa.mūlām apacīṁ jayet || 25 ||
AHS6.30.026a/ śarapuṅkhodbhavaṁ mūlaṁ piṣṭaṁ taṇḍula.vāriṇā |
AHS6.30.026c/ nasyāl lepāc ca duṣṭārur.apacī.viṣa.jantu.jit || 26 ||
[Page 695 ]
AHS6.30.027a/ mūlair uttamakāraṇyāḥ pīluparṇyāḥ sahācarāt |
AHS6.30.027c/ sa.lodhrābhaya.yaṣṭy.āhva.śatāhvā.dvīpi.dārubhiḥ || 27 || [Note: AHS6.30.027v/ 30.27av mūlair uttamavāruṇyāḥ 30.27av mūlair uttaravāruṇyāḥ 30.27av mūlair uttaravāriṇyāḥ]
AHS6.30.028a/ tailaṁ kṣīra.samaṁ siddhaṁ nasye 'bhyaṅge ca pūjitam |
AHS6.30.028c/ go.'vy.ajāśva.khurā dagdhāḥ kaṭu.tailena lepanam || 28 || [Note: AHS6.30.028v/ 30.28cv go.gajāśva.khurā dagdhāḥ]
AHS6.30.029a/ aiṅgudena tu kṛṣṇāhir vāyaso vā svayaṁ mṛtaḥ |
AHS6.30.029c/ ity a.śāntau gadasyānya.pārśva.jaṅghā.samāśritam || 29 || [Note: AHS6.30.029v/ 30.29cv ity a.śāntau gade cānya. 30.29dv .pārśve jaṅghā.samāśritam]
AHS6.30.030a/ vaster ūrdhvam adhas.tād vā medo hṛtvāgninā dahet |
AHS6.30.030c/ sthitasyordhvaṁ padaṁ mitvā tan.mānena ca pārṣṇitaḥ || 30 ||
AHS6.30.031a/ tata ūrdhvaṁ hared granthīn ity āha bhaga.vān nimiḥ || 31ab ||
AHS6.30.031c/ pārṣṇiṁ prati dvā.daśa cāṅgulāni muktvendra.vastiṁ ca gadānya.pārśve || 31cd ||
AHS6.30.031e/ vidārya matsyāṇḍa.nibhāni madhyāj jālāni karṣed iti suśrutoktiḥ || 31ef ||
AHS6.30.032a/ ā.gulpha.karṇāt su.mitasya jantos tasyāṣṭa.bhāgaṁ khuḍakād vibhajya |
AHS6.30.032c/ ghrāṇārjave 'dhaḥ sura.rāja.vaster bhittvākṣa.mātraṁ tv apare vadanti || 32 || [Note: AHS6.30.032v/ 30.32cv ghoṇārjave 'dhaḥ sura.rāja.vaster 30.32dv bhittvākṣa.mātrām apare vadanti]
AHS6.30.033a/ upanāhyānilān nāḍīṁ pāṭitāṁ sādhu lepayet |
AHS6.30.033c/ pratyakpuṣpī.phala.yutais tailaiḥ piṣṭaiḥ sa.saindhavaiḥ || 33 ||
AHS6.30.034a/ paittīṁ tu tila.mañjiṣṭhā.nāgadantī.niśā.dvayaiḥ |
AHS6.30.034c/ ślaiṣmikīṁ tila.saurāṣṭrī.nikumbhāriṣṭa.saindhavaiḥ || 34 ||
AHS6.30.035a/ śalya.jāṁ tila.madhv.ājyair lepayec chinna.śodhitām |
AHS6.30.035c/ a.śastra.kṛtyām eṣiṇyā bhittvānte samyag.eṣitām || 35 ||
AHS6.30.036a/ kṣāra.pītena sūtreṇa bahu.śo dārayed gatim |
AHS6.30.036c/ vraṇeṣu duṣṭa.sūkṣmāsya.gambhīrādiṣu sādhanam || 36 || [Note: AHS6.30.036v/ 30.36bv bahu.śo pūrayed gatim]
[Page 696 ]
AHS6.30.037a/ yā vartyo yāni tailāni tan nāḍīṣv api śasyate |
AHS6.30.037c/ piṣṭaṁ cañcu.phalaṁ lepān nāḍī.vraṇa.haraṁ param || 37 ||
AHS6.30.038a/ ghoṇṭā.phala.tvak lavaṇaṁ sa.lākṣaṁ būkasya pattraṁ vanitā.payaś ca |
AHS6.30.038c/ snug.arka.dugdhānvita eṣa kalko vartī.kṛto hanty a.cireṇa nāḍīm || 38 || [Note: AHS6.30.038v/ 30.38bv cukrasya pattraṁ vanitā.payaś ca 30.38bv vṛṣasya pattraṁ vanitā.payaś ca]
AHS6.30.039a/ sāmudra.sauvarcala.sindhu.janma.su.pakva.ghoṇṭā.phala.veśma.dhūmāḥ |
AHS6.30.039c/ āmrāta.gāyatri.ja.pallavāś ca kaṭaṅkaṭeryāv atha cetakī ca || 39 || [Note: AHS6.30.039v/ 30.39dv kaṭaṅkaṭeryāv atha ketakī ca 30.39dv kaṭaṅkaṭeryāv atha dīnikā ca]
AHS6.30.040a/ kalke 'bhyaṅge cūrṇe vartyāṁ caiteṣu śīlyamāneṣu |
AHS6.30.040c/ a.gatir iva naśyati gatiś capalā capaleṣu bhūtir iva || 40 || [Note: AHS6.30.040v/ 30.40bv vartyāṁ caiteṣu sevyamāneṣu]

6.31. Chapter 31 :: Atha kṣudrarogavijñānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 536-538]
AHS6.31.001a/ snigdhā sa.varṇā grathitā nī.rujā mudga.sannibhā |
AHS6.31.001c/ piṭikā kapha.vātābhyāṁ bālānām ajagallikā || 1 || [Note: AHS6.31.001v/ 31.1av snigdhāḥ sa.varṇā grathitā 31.1cv piṭikāḥ kapha.vātābhyāṁ 31.1dv nī.rujā mudga.sammitā 31.1dv nī.rujā mudga.sannibhāḥ]
AHS6.31.002a/ yava.prakhyā yava.prakhyā tābhyāṁ māṁsāśritā ghanā |
AHS6.31.002c/ a.vaktrā cālajī vṛttā stoka.pūyā ghanonnatā || 2 || [Note: AHS6.31.002v/ 31.2av yava.prakhyā yavākārā 31.2cv a.vaktrāś cālajī.vṛttāḥ 31.2dv stoka.pūyā ghanonnatāḥ]
AHS6.31.003a/ granthayaḥ pañca vā ṣaḍ vā kacchapī kacchaponnatāḥ |
AHS6.31.003c/ karṇasyordhvaṁ samantād vā piṭikā kaṭhinogra.ruk || 3 || [Note: AHS6.31.003v/ 31.3bv kacchapī kacchaponnatā]
AHS6.31.004a/ śālūkābhā panasikā śophas tv alpa.rujaḥ sthiraḥ |
AHS6.31.004c/ hanu.sandhi.samudbhūtas tābhyāṁ pāṣāṇa.gardabhaḥ || 4 ||
AHS6.31.005a/ śālmalī.kaṇṭakākārāḥ piṭikāḥ sa.rujo ghanāḥ |
AHS6.31.005c/ medo.garbhā mukhe yūnāṁ tābhyāṁ ca mukha.dūṣikāḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS6.31.005v/ 31.5dv tābhyāṁ ca mukha.dūṣakāḥ]
AHS6.31.006a/ te padma.kaṇṭakā jñeyā yaiḥ padmam iva kaṇṭakaiḥ |
AHS6.31.006c/ cīyate nī.rujaiḥ śvetaiḥ śarīraṁ kapha.vāta.jaiḥ || 6 ||
[Page 697 ]
AHS6.31.007a/ pittena piṭikā vṛttā pakvodumbara.sannibhā |
AHS6.31.007c/ mahā.dāha.jvara.karī vivṛtā vivṛtānanā || 7 ||
AHS6.31.008a/ gātreṣv antaś ca vaktrasya dāha.jvara.rujānvitāḥ |
AHS6.31.008c/ masūra.mātrās tad.varṇās tat.sañjñāḥ piṭikā ghanāḥ || 8 ||
AHS6.31.009a/ tataḥ kaṣṭa.tarāḥ sphoṭā visphoṭākhyā mahā.rujāḥ |
AHS6.31.009c/ yā padma.karṇikākārā piṭikā piṭikācitā || 9 ||
AHS6.31.010a/ sā viddhā vāta.pittābhyāṁ tābhyām eva ca gardabhī |
AHS6.31.010c/ maṇḍalā vipulotsannā sa.rāga.piṭikācitā || 10 ||
AHS6.31.011a/ kakṣeti kakṣāsanneṣu prāyo deśeṣu sānilāt |
AHS6.31.011c/ pittād bhavanti piṭikāḥ sūkṣmā lājopamā ghanāḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS6.31.011v/ 31.11dv sūkṣmā jālopamā ghanāḥ]
AHS6.31.012a/ tādṛśī mahatī tv ekā gandha.nāmeti kīrtitā |
AHS6.31.012c/ gharma.sveda.parīte 'ṅge piṭikāḥ sa.rujo ghanāḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.31.013a/ rājīkā.varṇa.saṁsthāna.pramāṇā rājikāhvayāḥ |
AHS6.31.013c/ doṣaiḥ pittolbaṇair mandair visarpati visarpa.vat || 13 ||
AHS6.31.014a/ śopho '.pākas tanus tāmro jvara.kṛj jāla.gardabhaḥ |
AHS6.31.014c/ malaiḥ pittolbaṇaiḥ sphoṭā jvariṇo māṁsa.dāraṇāḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS6.31.014v/ 31.14dv jvariṇo māṁsa.dāruṇāḥ 31.14dv jvariṇo māṁsa.dāriṇaḥ]
AHS6.31.015a/ kakṣā.bhāgeṣu jāyante ye 'gny.ābhāḥ sāgni.rohiṇī |
AHS6.31.015c/ pañcāhāt sapta.rātrād vā pakṣād vā hanti jīvitam || 15 ||
AHS6.31.016a/ tri.liṅgā piṭikā vṛttā jatrūrdhvam irivellikā |
AHS6.31.016c/ vidārī.kanda.kaṭhinā vidārī kakṣa.vaṅkṣaṇe || 16 ||
[Page 698 ]
AHS6.31.017a/ medo.'nila.kaphair granthiḥ snāyu.māṁsa.sirāśrayaiḥ |
AHS6.31.017c/ bhinno vasājya.madhv.ābhaṁ sravet tatrolbaṇo 'nilaḥ || 17 ||
AHS6.31.018a/ māṁsaṁ viśoṣya grathitāṁ śarkarāṁ upapādayet |
AHS6.31.018c/ dur.gandhaṁ rudhiraṁ klinnaṁ nānā.varṇaṁ tato malāḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS6.31.018v/ 31.18cv dur.gandhi rudhiraṁ klinnaṁ]
AHS6.31.019a/ tāṁ srāvayanti nicitāṁ vidyāt tac charkarārbudam |
AHS6.31.019c/ pāṇi.pāda.tale sandhau jatrūrdhvaṁ vopacīyate || 19 || [Note: AHS6.31.019v/ 31.19av tāṁ srāvayanti nicitā 31.19dv jatrūrdhvaṁ copacīyate]
AHS6.31.020a/ valmīka.vac chanair granthis tad.vad bahv.aṇubhir mukhaiḥ |
AHS6.31.020c/ rug.dāha.kaṇḍū.kledāḍhyair valmīko 'sau samasta.jaḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS6.31.020v/ 31.20cv rug.dāha.kaṇḍū.kledāḍhyo]
AHS6.31.021a/ śarkaronmathite pāde kṣate vā kaṇṭakādibhiḥ |
AHS6.31.021c/ granthiḥ kīla.vad utsanno jāyate kadaraṁ tu tat || 21 ||
AHS6.31.022a/ vega.sandhāraṇād vāyur apāno 'pāna.saṁśrayam |
AHS6.31.022c/ aṇū.karoti bāhyāntar.mārgam asya tataḥ śakṛt || 22 || [Note: AHS6.31.022v/ 31.22bv apāno 'pāna.saṁśrayaḥ]
AHS6.31.023a/ kṛcchrān nirgacchati vyādhir ayaṁ ruddha.gudo mataḥ |
AHS6.31.023c/ kuryāt pittānilaṁ pākaṁ nakha.māṁse sa.rug.jvaram || 23 ||
AHS6.31.024a/ cipyam a.kṣata.rogaṁ ca vidyād upa.nakhaṁ ca tam |
AHS6.31.024c/ kṛṣṇo 'bhighātād rūkṣaś ca kharaś ca ku.nakho nakhaḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.31.024v/ 31.24bv vidyād upa.nakhaṁ ca tat]
AHS6.31.025a/ duṣṭa.kardama.saṁsparśāt kaṇḍū.kledānvitāntarāḥ |
AHS6.31.025c/ aṅgulyo 'lasam ity āhus tilābhāṁs tila.kālakān || 25 ||
AHS6.31.026a/ kṛṣṇān a.vedanāṁs tvak.sthān māṣāṁs tān eva connatān |
AHS6.31.026c/ maṣebhyas tūnnata.tarāṁś carma.kīlān sitāsitān || 26 ||
[Page 699 ]
AHS6.31.027a/ tathā.vidho jatu.maṇiḥ saha.jo lohitas tu saḥ |
AHS6.31.027c/ kṛṣṇaṁ sitaṁ vā saha.jaṁ maṇḍalaṁ lāñchanaṁ samam || 27 || [Note: AHS6.31.027v/ 31.27bv sa.rujo lohitas tu saḥ]
AHS6.31.028a/ śoka.krodhādi.kupitād vāta.pittān mukhe tanu |
AHS6.31.028c/ śyāmalaṁ maṇḍalaṁ vyaṅgaṁ vaktrād anya.tra nīlikā || 28 ||
AHS6.31.029a/ paruṣaṁ paruṣa.sparśaṁ vyaṅgaṁ śyāvaṁ ca mārutāt |
AHS6.31.029c/ pittāt tāmrāntam ā.nīlaṁ śvetāntaṁ kaṇḍu.mat kaphāt || 29 || [Note: AHS6.31.029v/ 31.29cv pittāt tāmraṁ tathā nīlaṁ 31.29dv śvetābhaṁ kaṇḍu.mat kaphāt]
AHS6.31.030a/ raktād raktāntam ā.tāmraṁ sauṣaṁ cimicimāyate |
AHS6.31.030c/ vāyunodīritaḥ śleṣmā tvacaṁ prāpya viśuṣyati || 30 || [Note: AHS6.31.030v/ 31.30bv mukhaṁ cimicimāyate]
AHS6.31.031a/ tatas tvag jāyate pāṇduḥ krameṇa ca vi.cetanā |
AHS6.31.031c/ alpa.kaṇḍūr a.vikledā sā prasuptiḥ prasuptitaḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS6.31.031v/ 31.31cv alpa.kaṇḍūr apa.kledā]
AHS6.31.032a/ a.samyag.vamanodīrṇa.pitta.śleṣmānna.nigrahaiḥ |
AHS6.31.032c/ maṇḍalāny ati.kaṇḍūni rāga.vanti bahūni ca || 32 ||
AHS6.31.033a/ utkoṭhaḥ so 'nubaddhas tu koṭha ity abhidhīyate |
AHS6.31.033c/ proktāḥ ṣaṭ.triṁśad ity ete kṣudra.rogā vibhāga.śaḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS6.31.033v/ 31.33av utkoṭhaḥ so 'nubandhas tu]
AHS6.31.033+(1)ab/ yān a.vijñāya muhyeta cikitsāyāṁ cikitsakaḥ || 33+(1)ab ||

6.32. Chapter 32 :: Atha kṣudrarogapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 538-540]
AHS6.32.001a/ visrāvayej jalaukobhir a.pakvām ajagallikām |
AHS6.32.001c/ svedayitvā yava.prakhyāṁ vilayāya pralepayet || 1 ||
AHS6.32.002a/ dāru.kuṣṭha.manohvālair ity ā.pāṣāṇa.gardabhāt |
AHS6.32.002c/ vidhis tāṁś cācaret pakvān vraṇa.vat sājagallikān || 2 ||
[Page 700 ]
AHS6.32.003a/ lodhra.kustumburu.vacāḥ pralepo mukha.dūṣike |
AHS6.32.003c/ vaṭa.pallava.yuktā vā nārikelottha.śuktayaḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS6.32.003v/ 32.3av lodhra.kustumburu.vacā. 32.3bv .pralepo mukha.dūṣike]
AHS6.32.004a/ a.śāntau vamanaṁ nasyaṁ lalāṭe ca sirā.vyadhaḥ |
AHS6.32.004c/ nimbāmbu.vānto nimbāmbu.sādhitaṁ padma.kaṇṭake || 4 ||
AHS6.32.005a/ pibet kṣaudrānvitaṁ sarpir nimbāragvadha.lepanam || 5ab ||
AHS6.32.005c/ vivṛtādīṁs tu jālāntāṁś cikitset serivellikān || 5cd ||
AHS6.32.005e/ pitta.visarpa.vat tad.vat pratyākhyāyāgni.rohiṇīm || 5ef || [Note: AHS6.32.005v/ 32.5bv nimbāragvadha.lepanaḥ 32.5dv cikitsed irivellikām]
AHS6.32.006a/ vilaṅghanaṁ rakta.vimokṣaṇaṁ ca virūkṣaṇaṁ kāya.viśodhanaṁ ca |
AHS6.32.006c/ dhātrī.prayogāñ chiśira.pradehān kuryāt sadā jālaka.gardabhasya || 6 || [Note: AHS6.32.006v/ 32.6bv virūkṣaṇaṁ kāya.virecanaṁ ca 32.6cv dhātrī.pradehāñ chiśira.prayogān]
AHS6.32.007a/ vidārikāṁ hṛte rakte śleṣma.granthi.vad ācaret |
AHS6.32.007c/ medo.'rbuda.kriyāṁ kuryāt su.tarāṁ śarkarārbude || 7 ||
AHS6.32.008a/ pravṛddhaṁ su.bahu.cchidraṁ sa.śophaṁ marmaṇi sthitam |
AHS6.32.008c/ valmīkaṁ hasta.pāde ca varjayed itarat punaḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS6.32.008v/ 32.8dv varjayed itaraṁ punaḥ]
AHS6.32.009a/ śuddhasyāsre hṛte limpet sa.paṭv.ārevatāmṛtaiḥ |
AHS6.32.009c/ śyāmā.kulatthikā.mūla.dantī.palala.saktubhiḥ || 9 || [Note: AHS6.32.009v/ 32.9bv sa.paṭv.āragvadhāmṛtaiḥ]
AHS6.32.010a/ pakve tu duṣṭa.māṁsāni gatīḥ sarvāś ca śodhayet |
AHS6.32.010c/ śastreṇa samyag anu ca kṣāreṇa jvalanena vā || 10 ||
AHS6.32.011a/ śastreṇotkṛtya niḥ.śeṣaṁ snehena kadaraṁ dahet |
AHS6.32.011c/ niruddha.maṇi.vat kāryaṁ ruddha.pāyoś cikitsitam || 11 || [Note: AHS6.32.011v/ 32.11av śastreṇoddhṛtya niḥ.śeṣaṁ]
AHS6.32.012a/ cipyaṁ śuddhyā jitoṣmāṇaṁ sādhayec chastra.karmaṇā |
AHS6.32.012c/ duṣṭaṁ ku.nakham apy evaṁ caraṇāv alase punaḥ || 12 ||
[Page 701 ]
AHS6.32.013a/ dhānyāmla.siktau kāsīsa.paṭolī.rocanā.tilaiḥ |
AHS6.32.013c/ sa.nimba.pattrair ālimped dahet tu tila.kālakān || 13 ||
AHS6.32.014a/ maṣāṁś ca sūrya.kāntena kṣāreṇa yadi vāgninā |
AHS6.32.014c/ tad.vad utkṛtya śastreṇa carma.kīla.jatū.maṇī || 14 ||
AHS6.32.015a/ lāñchanādi.traye kuryād yathāsannaṁ sirā.vyadham |
AHS6.32.015c/ lepayet kṣīra.piṣṭaiś ca kṣīri.vṛkṣa.tvag.aṅkuraiḥ || 15 || [Note: AHS6.32.015v/ 32.15av nyacchādi.tritaye kuryād]
AHS6.32.016a/ vyaṅgeṣu cārjuna.tvag vā mañjiṣṭhā vā sa.mākṣikā |
AHS6.32.016c/ lepaḥ sa.nava.nītā vā śvetāśva.khura.jā maṣī || 16 || [Note: AHS6.32.016v/ 32.16av vyaṅgeṣu vārjuna.tvag vā]
AHS6.32.017a/ rakta.candana.mañjiṣṭhā.kuṣṭha.lodhra.priyaṅgavaḥ |
AHS6.32.017c/ vaṭāṅkurā masūrāś ca vyaṅga.ghnā mukha.kānti.dāḥ || 17 ||
AHS6.32.018a/ dve jīrake kṛṣṇa.tilāḥ sarṣapāḥ payasā saha |
AHS6.32.018c/ piṣṭāḥ kurvanti vaktrendum apāsta.vyaṅga.lāñchanam || 18 ||
AHS6.32.019a/ kṣīra.piṣṭā ghṛta.kṣaudra.yuktā vā bhṛṣṭa.nis.tuṣāḥ |
AHS6.32.019c/ masūrāḥ kṣīra.piṣṭā vā tīkṣṇāḥ śālmali.kaṇṭakāḥ || 19 ||
AHS6.32.020a/ sa.guḍaḥ kola.majjā vā śaśāsṛk.kṣaudra.kalkitaḥ |
AHS6.32.020c/ saptāhaṁ mātuluṅga.sthaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ vā madhunānvitam || 20 || [Note: AHS6.32.020v/ 32.20dv kuṣṭhaṁ vā madhukānvitam]
AHS6.32.021a/ piṣṭā vā chāga.payasā sa.kṣaudrā mausalī jaṭā |
AHS6.32.021c/ gor asthi musalī.mūla.yuktaṁ vā sājya.mākṣikam || 21 ||
AHS6.32.022a/ jambv.āmra.pallavā mastu haridre dve navo guḍaḥ |
AHS6.32.022c/ lepaḥ sa.varṇa.kṛt piṣṭaṁ sva.rasena ca tindukam || 22 ||
[Page 702 ]
AHS6.32.023a/ utpalam utpala.kuṣṭhaṁ priyaṅgu.kālīyakaṁ badara.majjā |
AHS6.32.023c/ idam udvartanam āsyaṁ karoti śatapattra.saṅkāśam || 23 || [Note: AHS6.32.023v/ 32.23av utpala.pattraṁ tagaraṁ 32.23dv karoti śatapattrakākāram]
AHS6.32.024a/ ebhir evauṣadhaiḥ piṣṭair mukhābhyaṅgāya sādhayet |
AHS6.32.024c/ yathā.doṣartukān snehān madhuka.kvātha.saṁyutaiḥ || 24 ||
AHS6.32.025a/ yavān sarja.rasaṁ lodhram uśīraṁ madanaṁ madhu |
AHS6.32.025c/ ghṛtaṁ guḍaṁ ca go.mūtre paced ā.darvi.lepanāt || 25 || [Note: AHS6.32.025v/ 32.25bv uśīraṁ candanaṁ madhu]
AHS6.32.026a/ tad abhyaṅgān nihanty āśu nīlikā.vyaṅga.dūṣikān |
AHS6.32.026c/ mukhaṁ karoti padmābhaṁ pādau padma.dalopamau || 26 || [Note: AHS6.32.026v/ 32.26bv nīlikā.vyaṅga.dūṣakān]
AHS6.32.027a/ kuṅkumośīra.kālīya.lākṣā.yaṣṭy.āhva.candanam |
AHS6.32.027c/ nyagrodha.pādāṁs taruṇān padmakaṁ padma.kesaram || 27 ||
AHS6.32.028a/ sa.nīlotpala.mañjiṣṭhaṁ pālikaṁ salilāḍhake |
AHS6.32.028c/ paktvā pādāvaśeṣeṇa tena piṣṭaiś ca kārṣikaiḥ || 28 ||
AHS6.32.029a/ lākṣā.pattaṅga.mañjiṣṭhā.yaṣṭīmadhuka.kuṅkumaiḥ |
AHS6.32.029c/ ajā.kṣīraṁ dvi.guṇitaṁ tailasya kuḍavaṁ pacet || 29 || [Note: AHS6.32.029v/ 32.29cv ajā.kṣīra.dvi.guṇitaṁ]
AHS6.32.030a/ nīlikā.palita.vyaṅga.valī.tilaka.dūṣikān |
AHS6.32.030c/ hanti tan nasyam abhyastaṁ mukhopacaya.varṇa.kṛt || 30 ||
AHS6.32.031a/ mañjiṣṭhā śabarodbhavas tubarikā lākṣā haridrā.dvayaṁ || 31a ||
AHS6.32.031b/ nepālī haritāla.kuṅkuma.gadā go.rocanā gairikam || 31b ||
AHS6.32.031c/ pattraṁ pāṇḍu vaṭasya candana.yugaṁ kālīyakaṁ pāradaṁ || 31c ||
AHS6.32.031d/ pattaṅgaṁ kanaka.tvacaṁ kamala.jaṁ bījaṁ tathā kesaram || 31d || [Note: AHS6.32.031v/ 32.31bv nepālī haritāla.kuṅkuma.gadaṁ go.rocanā gairikam]
AHS6.32.032a/ sikthaṁ tutthaṁ padmakādyo vasājyaṁ majjā kṣīraṁ kṣīri.vṛkṣāmbu cāgnau |
AHS6.32.032c/ siddhaṁ siddhaṁ vyaṅga.nīly.ādi.nāśe vaktre chāyām aindavīṁ cāśu dhatte || 32 ||
[Page 703 ]
AHS6.32.033a/ mārkava.sva.rasa.kṣīra.toyānīṣṭāni nāvane |
AHS6.32.033c/ prasuptau vāta.kuṣṭhoktaṁ kuryād dāhaṁ ca vahninā || 33 || [Note: AHS6.32.033v/ 32.33bv .toya.piṣṭāni nāvane]
AHS6.32.033ū̆ab/ utkoṭhe kapha.pittoktaṁ koṭhe sarvaṁ ca kauṣṭhikam || 33ū̆ab ||

6.33. Chapter 33 :: Atha guhyarogavijñānādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 540-543]
AHS6.33.001a/ strī.vyavāya.nivṛttasya sahasā bhajato 'tha.vā |
AHS6.33.001c/ doṣādhyuṣita.saṅkīrṇa.malināṇu.rajaḥ.pathām || 1 || [Note: AHS6.33.001v/ 33.1av strīṁ vyavāya.nivṛttasya]
AHS6.33.002a/ anya.yonim an.icchantīm a.gamyāṁ nava.sūtikām |
AHS6.33.002c/ dūṣitaṁ spṛśatas toyaṁ ratānteṣv api naiva vā || 2 ||
AHS6.33.003a/ vivardhayiṣayā tīkṣṇān pralepādīn prayacchataḥ |
AHS6.33.003c/ muṣṭi.danta.nakhotpīḍā.viṣa.vac.chūka.pātanaiḥ || 3 || [Note: AHS6.33.003v/ 33.3dv .viṣa.val.lūka.pātanaiḥ]
AHS6.33.004a/ vega.nigraha.dīrghāti.khara.sparśa.vighaṭṭanaiḥ |
AHS6.33.004c/ doṣā duṣṭā gatā guhyaṁ trayo.viṁśatim āmayān || 4 || [Note: AHS6.33.004v/ 33.4bv .khara.sparśādi.ghaṭṭanaiḥ 33.4bv .khara.śaṣpādi.ghaṭṭanaiḥ]
AHS6.33.005a/ janayanty upadaṁśādīn upadaṁśo 'tra pañca.dhā |
AHS6.33.005c/ pṛthag doṣaiḥ sa.rudhiraiḥ samastaiś cātra mārutāt || 5 || [Note: AHS6.33.005v/ 33.5av janayanty avadaṁśādīn 33.5bv avadaṁśo 'tra pañca.dhā]
AHS6.33.006a/ meḍhre śopho rujaś citrāḥ stambhas tvak.paripoṭanam |
AHS6.33.006c/ pakvodumbara.saṅkāśaḥ pittena śvayathur jvaraḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS6.33.006v/ 33.6av meḍhra.śopho rujaś citrāḥ]
AHS6.33.007a/ śleṣmaṇā kaṭhinaḥ snigdhaḥ kaṇḍū.māñ chītalo guruḥ |
AHS6.33.007c/ śoṇitenāsita.sphoṭa.sambhavo 'sra.srutir jvaraḥ || 7 ||
AHS6.33.008a/ sarva.je sarva.liṅga.tvaṁ śvayathur muṣkayor api |
AHS6.33.008c/ tīvrā rug āśu.pacanaṁ daraṇaṁ kṛmi.sambhavaḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS6.33.008v/ 33.8dv dāraṇaṁ kṛmi.sambhavaḥ]
[Page 704 ]
AHS6.33.009a/ yāpyo raktodbhavas teṣāṁ mṛtyave sannipāta.jaḥ |
AHS6.33.009c/ jāyante kupitair doṣair guhyāsṛk.piśitāśrayaiḥ || 9 ||
AHS6.33.010a/ antar bahir vā meḍhrasya kaṇḍūlā māṁsa.kīlakāḥ |
AHS6.33.010c/ picchilāsra.sravā yonau tad.vac ca cchattra.sannibhāḥ || 10 ||
AHS6.33.011a/ te 'rśāṁsy upekṣayā ghnanti meḍhra.puṁs.tvaṁ bhagārtavaṁ |
AHS6.33.011c/ guhyasya bahir antar vā piṭikāḥ kapha.rakta.jāḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS6.33.011v/ 33.11bv meḍhra.puṁs.tva.bhagārtavaṁ 33.11bv meḍhraṁ puṁso bhagārtavaṁ]
AHS6.33.012a/ sarṣapā.māna.saṁsthānā ghanāḥ sarṣapikāḥ smṛtāḥ |
AHS6.33.012c/ piṭikā bahavo dīrghā dīryante madhyataś ca yāḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.33.013a/ so 'vamanthaḥ kaphāsṛgbhyāṁ vedanā.roma.harṣa.vān |
AHS6.33.013c/ kumbhīkā rakta.pittotthā jāmbavāsthi.nibhāśu.jā || 13 || [Note: AHS6.33.013v/ 33.13dv jāmbavāsthi.nibhā.śubhā]
AHS6.33.014a/ alajīṁ meha.vad vidyād uttamāṁ pitta.rakta.jām |
AHS6.33.014c/ piṭikāṁ māṣa.mudgābhāṁ piṭikā piṭikācitā || 14 || [Note: AHS6.33.014v/ 33.14bv uttamāṁ rakta.pitta.jām]
AHS6.33.015a/ karṇikā puṣkarasyeva jñeyā puṣkariketi sā |
AHS6.33.015c/ pāṇibhyāṁ bhṛśa.saṁvyūḍhe saṁvyūḍha.piṭikā bhavet || 15 ||
AHS6.33.016a/ mṛditaṁ mṛditaṁ vastra.saṁrabdhaṁ vāta.kopataḥ |
AHS6.33.016c/ viṣamā kaṭhinā bhugnā vāyunāṣṭhīlikā smṛtā || 16 || [Note: AHS6.33.016v/ 33.16av mṛditaṁ mṛditaṁ yat tu 33.16av mṛditaṁ mṛditaṁ vastu 33.16bv saṁrabdhaṁ vāta.kopataḥ]
AHS6.33.017a/ vimardanādi.duṣṭena vāyunā carma meḍhra.jam |
AHS6.33.017c/ nivartate sa.rug.dāhaṁ kva.cit pākaṁ ca gacchati || 17 || [Note: AHS6.33.017v/ 33.17dv kva.cit pākaṁ na gacchati]
AHS6.33.018a/ piṇḍitaṁ granthitaṁ carma tat pralambam adho maṇeḥ |
AHS6.33.018c/ nivṛtta.sañjñaṁ sa.kaphaṁ kaṇḍū.kāṭhinya.vat tu tat || 18 || [Note: AHS6.33.018v/ 33.18av piṇḍitaṁ granthitaṁ tac ca 33.18bv vipralambam adho maṇeḥ 33.18bv pravilambam adho maṇeḥ]
[Page 705 ]
AHS6.33.019a/ dur.ūḍhaṁ sphuṭitaṁ carma nirdiṣṭam avapāṭikā |
AHS6.33.019c/ vātena dūṣitaṁ carma maṇau saktaṁ ruṇaddhi cet || 19 || [Note: AHS6.33.019v/ 33.19av duḥ.sahaṁ sphuṭitaṁ carma 33.19bv maṇau saktaṁ ruṇaddhi tat]
AHS6.33.020a/ sroto mūtraṁ tato 'bhyeti manda.dhāram a.vedanam |
AHS6.33.020c/ maṇer vikāśa.rodhaś ca sa niruddha.maṇir gadaḥ || 20 ||
AHS6.33.021a/ liṅgaṁ śūkair ivāpūrṇaṁ grathitākhyaṁ kaphodbhavam |
AHS6.33.021c/ śūka.dūṣita.raktotthā sparśa.hānis tad.āhvayā || 21 ||
AHS6.33.022a/ chidrair aṇu.mukhair yat tu mehanaṁ sarvataś citam |
AHS6.33.022c/ vāta.śoṇita.kopena taṁ vidyāc chata.ponakam || 22 ||
AHS6.33.023a/ pittāsṛgbhyāṁ tvacaḥ pākas tvak.pāko jvara.dāha.vān |
AHS6.33.023c/ māṁs.pākaḥ sarva.jaḥ sarva.vedano māṁsa.śātanaḥ || 23 ||
AHS6.33.024a/ sa.rāgair asitaiḥ sphoṭaiḥ piṭikābhiś ca pīḍitam |
AHS6.33.024c/ mehanaṁ vedanā cogrā taṁ vidyād asṛg.arbudam || 24 ||
AHS6.33.025a/ māṁsārbudaṁ prāg uditaṁ vidradhiś ca tri.doṣa.jaḥ |
AHS6.33.025c/ kṛṣṇāni bhūtvā māṁsāni viśīryante samantataḥ || 25 ||
AHS6.33.026a/ pakvāni sannipātena tān vidyāt tila.kālakān |
AHS6.33.026c/ māṁsottham arbudaṁ pākaṁ vidradhiṁ tila.kālakān || 26 ||
AHS6.33.027a/ caturo varjayed eṣāṁ śeṣāñ chīghram upācaret |
AHS6.33.027c/ viṁśatir vyāpado yoner jāyante duṣṭa.bhojanāt || 27 ||
AHS6.33.028a/ viṣama.sthāṅga.śayana.bhṛśa.maithuna.sevanaiḥ |
AHS6.33.028c/ duṣṭārtavād apadravair bīja.doṣeṇa daivataḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS6.33.028v/ 33.28cv duṣṭārtavād upadravair]
[Page 706 ]
AHS6.33.029a/ yonau kruddho 'nilaḥ kuryād ruk.todāyāma.supta.tāḥ |
AHS6.33.029c/ pipīlikā.sṛptim iva stambhaṁ karkaśa.tāṁ svanam || 29 || [Note: AHS6.33.029v/ 33.29cv pipīlikā.gatim iva]
AHS6.33.030a/ phenilāruṇa.kṛṣṇālpa.tanu.rūkṣārtava.srutim |
AHS6.33.030c/ sraṁsaṁ vaṅkṣaṇa.pārśvādau vyathāṁ gulmaṁ krameṇa ca || 30 || [Note: AHS6.33.030v/ 33.30cv ūru.vaṅkṣaṇa.pārśvādau 33.30cv bhṛśaṁ vaṅkṣaṇa.pārśvādau]
AHS6.33.031a/ tāṁs tāṁś ca svān gadān vyāpad vātikī nāma sā smṛtā |
AHS6.33.031c/ saivāti.caraṇā śopha.saṁyuktāti.vyavāyataḥ || 31 || [Note: AHS6.33.031v/ 33.31av tāṁs tāṁś ca sva.gadān vyāpad 33.31av tāṁs tān svāṁs svān gadān vyāpad]
AHS6.33.032a/ maithunād ati.bālāyāḥ pṛṣṭha.jaṅghoru.vaṅkṣaṇam |
AHS6.33.032c/ rujan sandūṣayed yoniṁ vāyuḥ prāk.caraṇeti sā || 32 ||
AHS6.33.033a/ vegodāvartanād yoniṁ prapīḍayati mārutaḥ |
AHS6.33.033c/ sā phenilaṁ rajaḥ kṛcchrād udāvṛttaṁ vimuñcati || 33 || [Note: AHS6.33.033v/ 33.33av vegenāvartanād yoniṁ 33.33dv udāvartaṁ vimuñcati 33.33dv udāvartya vimuñcati]
AHS6.33.034a/ iyaṁ vyāpad udāvṛttā jāta.ghnī tu yadānilaḥ |
AHS6.33.034c/ jātaṁ jātaṁ sutaṁ hanti raukṣyād duṣṭārtavodbhavam || 34 || [Note: AHS6.33.034v/ 33.34av iyaṁ vyāpad udāvartā]
AHS6.33.035a/ aty.āśitāyā viṣamaṁ sthitāyāḥ su.rate marut |
AHS6.33.035c/ annenotpīḍito yoneḥ sthitaḥ srotasi vakrayet || 35 ||
AHS6.33.036a/ sāsthi.māṁsaṁ mukhaṁ tīvra.rujam antar.mukhīti sā |
AHS6.33.036c/ vātalāhāra.sevinyāṁ jananyāṁ kupito 'nilaḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS6.33.036v/ 33.36bv .rujaṁ vakra.mukhīti sā]
AHS6.33.037a/ striyo yonim aṇu.dvārāṁ kuryāt sūcī.mukhīti sā |
AHS6.33.037c/ vega.rodhād ṛtau vāyur duṣṭo viṇ.mūtra.saṅgraham || 37 ||
AHS6.33.038a/ karoti yoneḥ śoṣaṁ ca śuṣkākhyā sāti.vedanā |
AHS6.33.038c/ ṣaḍ.ahāt sapta.rātrād vā śukraṁ garbhāśayān marut || 38 ||
[Page 707 ]
AHS6.33.039a/ vamet sa.ruṅ nī.rujo vā yasyāḥ sā vāminī matā |
AHS6.33.039c/ yonau vātopataptāyāṁ strī.garbhe bīja.doṣataḥ || 39 || [Note: AHS6.33.039v/ 33.39av vamet sa.ruṅ nī.rujo vā hy 33.39bv yasyāṁ sā vāminī matā 33.39bv asyāṁ sā vāminī matā]
AHS6.33.040a/ nṛ.dveṣiṇy a.stanī ca syāt ṣaṇḍha.sañjñān.upakramā |
AHS6.33.040c/ duṣṭo viṣṭabhya yony.āsyaṁ garbha.koṣṭhaṁ ca mārutaḥ || 40 ||
AHS6.33.041a/ kurute vivṛtāṁ srastāṁ vātikīm iva duḥkhitām |
AHS6.33.041c/ utsanna.māṁsāṁ tām āhur mahā.yoniṁ mahā.rujām || 41 ||
AHS6.33.042a/ yathā.svair dūṣaṇair duṣṭaṁ pittaṁ yonim upāśritam |
AHS6.33.042c/ karoti dāha.pākoṣā.pūti.gandhi.jvarānvitām || 42 || [Note: AHS6.33.042v/ 33.42dv .pūti.gandha.jvarānvitām 33.42dv .pūti.gandhāṁ jvarānvitām]
AHS6.33.043a/ bhṛśoṣṇa.bhūri.kuṇapa.nīla.pītāsitārtavām |
AHS6.33.043c/ sā vyāpat paittikī rakta.yony.ākhyāsṛg.ati.sruteḥ || 43 ||
AHS6.33.044a/ kapho 'bhiṣyandibhiḥ kruddhaḥ kuryād yonim a.vedanām |
AHS6.33.044c/ śītalāṁ kaṇḍulāṁ pāṇḍu.picchilāṁ tad.vidha.srutim || 44 ||
AHS6.33.045a/ sā vyāpac chlaiṣmikī vāta.pittābhyāṁ kṣīyate rajaḥ |
AHS6.33.045c/ sa.dāha.kārśya.vaivarṇyaṁ yasyāḥ sā lohita.kṣayā || 45 || [Note: AHS6.33.045v/ 33.45dv yasyāṁ sā lohita.kṣayā]
AHS6.33.046a/ pittalāyā nṛ.saṁvāse kṣavathūdgāra.dhāraṇāt |
AHS6.33.046c/ pitta.yuktena marutā yonir bhavati dūṣitā || 46 ||
AHS6.33.047a/ śūnā sparśā.sahā sārtir nīla.pītāsra.vāhinī |
AHS6.33.047c/ vasti.kukṣi.guru.tvātīsārā.rocaka.kāriṇī || 47 ||
AHS6.33.048a/ śroṇi.vaṅkṣaṇa.ruk.toda.jvara.kṛt sā pariplutā |
AHS6.33.048c/ vāta.śleṣmāmaya.vyāptā śveta.picchila.vāhinī || 48 ||
[Page 708 ]
AHS6.33.049a/ upaplutā smṛtā yonir viplutākhyā tv a.dhāvanāt |
AHS6.33.049c/ sañjāta.jantuḥ kaṇḍūlā kaṇḍvā cāti.rati.priyā || 49 ||
AHS6.33.050a/ a.kāla.vāhanād vāyuḥ śleṣma.rakta.vimūrchitaḥ |
AHS6.33.050c/ karṇikāṁ janayed yonau rajo.mārga.nirodhinīm || 50 ||
AHS6.33.051a/ sā karṇinī tribhir doṣair yoni.garbhāśayāśritaiḥ |
AHS6.33.051c/ yathā.svopadrava.karair vyāpat sā sānnipātikī || 51 ||
AHS6.33.052a/ iti yoni.gadā nārī yaiḥ śukraṁ na pratīcchati |
AHS6.33.052c/ tato garbhaṁ na gṛhṇāti rogāṁś cāpnoti dāruṇān || 52 ||
AHS6.33.052ū̆ab/ asṛg.darārśo.gulmādīn ābādhāṁś cānilādibhiḥ || 52ū̆ab || [Note: AHS6.33.052ū̆v/ 33.52ū̆bv ābādhāś cānilādibhiḥ]

6.34. Chapter 34 :: Atha guhyarogapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 543-546]
AHS6.34.001a/ meḍhra.madhye sirāṁ vidhyed upadaṁśe navotthite |
AHS6.34.001c/ śītāṁ kuryāt kriyāṁ śuddhiṁ virekeṇa viśeṣataḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS6.34.001v/ 34.1bv avadaṁśe navotthite]
AHS6.34.002a/ tila.kalka.ghṛta.kṣaudrair lepaḥ pakve tu pāṭite |
AHS6.34.002c/ jambv.āmra.sumano.nīpa.śveta.kāmbojikāṅkurān || 2 ||
AHS6.34.003a/ śallakī.badarī.bilva.palāśa.tiniśodbhavāḥ |
AHS6.34.003c/ tvacaḥ kṣīri.drumāṇāṁ ca tri.phalāṁ ca pacej jale || 3 ||
AHS6.34.004a/ sa kvāthaḥ kṣālanaṁ tena pakvaṁ tailaṁ ca ropaṇam |
AHS6.34.004c/ tuttha.gairika.lodhrailā.manohvāla.rasāñjanaiḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS6.34.004v/ 34.4av sa kvāthaḥ kṣālane tena]
AHS6.34.005a/ hareṇu.puṣpa.kāsīsa.saurāṣṭrī.lavaṇottamaiḥ |
AHS6.34.005c/ lepaḥ kṣaudra.drutaiḥ sūkṣmair upadaṁśa.vraṇāpahaḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS6.34.005v/ 34.5dv avadaṁśa.vraṇāpahaḥ]
[Page 709 ]
AHS6.34.006a/ kapāle tri.phalā dagdhā sa.ghṛtā ropaṇaṁ param |
AHS6.34.006c/ sāmānyaṁ sādhanam idaṁ prati.doṣaṁ tu śopha.vat || 6 ||
AHS6.34.007a/ na ca yāti yathā pākaṁ prayateta tathā bhṛśam |
AHS6.34.007c/ pakvaiḥ snāyu.sirā.māṁsaiḥ prāyo naśyati hi dhvajaḥ || 7 ||
AHS6.34.008a/ arśasāṁ chinna.dagdhānāṁ kriyā kāryopadaṁśa.vat |
AHS6.34.008c/ sarṣapā likhitāḥ sūkṣmaiḥ kaṣāyair avacūrṇayet || 8 || [Note: AHS6.34.008v/ 34.8bv kriyā kāryāvadaṁśa.vat 34.8cv sarṣapāṁ likhitāṁ sūkṣmaiḥ]
AHS6.34.009a/ tair evābhyañjanaṁ tailaṁ sādhayed vraṇa.ropaṇam |
AHS6.34.009c/ kriyeyam avamanthe 'pi raktaṁ srāvyaṁ tathobhayoḥ || 9 ||
AHS6.34.010a/ kumbhīkāyāṁ hared raktaṁ pakvāyāṁ śodhite vraṇe |
AHS6.34.010c/ tinduka.tri.phalā.lodhrair lepas tailaṁ ca ropaṇam || 10 ||
AHS6.34.011a/ alajyāṁ sruta.raktāyām ayam eva kriyā.kramaḥ |
AHS6.34.011c/ uttamākhyāṁ tu piṭikāṁ sañchidya baḍiśoddhṛtām || 11 ||
AHS6.34.012a/ kalkaiś cūrṇaiḥ kaṣāyāṇāṁ kṣaudra.yuktair upācaret |
AHS6.34.012c/ kramaḥ pitta.visarpoktaḥ puṣkara.vyūḍhayor hitaḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.34.013a/ tvak.pāke sparśa.hānyāṁ ca secayed mṛditaṁ punaḥ |
AHS6.34.013c/ balā.tailena koṣṇena madhuraiś copanāhayet || 13 || [Note: AHS6.34.013v/ 34.13av tvak.pāke sparśa.hānyau vā]
AHS6.34.014a/ aṣṭhīlikāṁ hṛte rakte śleṣma.granthi.vad ācaret |
AHS6.34.014c/ nivṛttaṁ sarpiṣābhyajya svedayitvopanāhayet || 14 ||
AHS6.34.015a/ tri.rātraṁ pañca.rātraṁ vā su.snigdhaiḥ śālvaṇādibhiḥ |
AHS6.34.015c/ svedayitvā tato bhūyaḥ snigdhaṁ carma samānayet || 15 || [Note: AHS6.34.015v/ 34.15dv snigdhaṁ carma samāharet]
[Page 710 ]
AHS6.34.016a/ maṇiṁ prapīḍya śanakaiḥ praviṣṭe copanāhanam |
AHS6.34.016c/ maṇau punaḥ punaḥ snigdhaṁ bhojanaṁ cātra śasyate || 16 ||
AHS6.34.017a/ ayam eva prayojyaḥ syād avapāṭyām api kramaḥ |
AHS6.34.017c/ nāḍīm ubhayato.dvārāṁ niruddhe jatunā sṛtām || 17 || [Note: AHS6.34.017v/ 34.17dv niruddhe jatunā śṛtām 34.17dv niruddhe jatunā kṛtām]
AHS6.34.018a/ snehāktāṁ srotasi nyasya siñcet snehaiś calāpahaiḥ |
AHS6.34.018c/ try.ahāt try.ahāt sthūla.tarāṁ nyasya nāḍīṁ vivardhayet || 18 ||
AHS6.34.019a/ sroto.dvāram a.siddhau tu vidvān śastreṇa pāṭayet |
AHS6.34.019c/ sevanīṁ varjayan yuñjyāt sadyaḥ.kṣata.vidhiṁ tataḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS6.34.019v/ 34.19av sroto.dvāram a.siddhau vā]
AHS6.34.020a/ granthitaṁ sveditaṁ nāḍyā snigdhoṣṇair upanāhayet |
AHS6.34.020c/ limpet kaṣāyaiḥ sa.kṣaudrair likhitvā śata.ponakam || 20 ||
AHS6.34.021a/ rakta.vidradhi.vat kāryā cikitsā śoṇitārbude |
AHS6.34.021c/ vraṇopacāraṁ sarveṣu yathāvasthaṁ prayojayet || 21 ||
AHS6.34.022a/ yoni.vyāpatsu bhūyiṣṭhaṁ śasyate karma vāta.jit |
AHS6.34.022c/ snehana.sveda.vasty.ādi vāta.jāsu viśeṣataḥ || 22 ||
AHS6.34.023a/ na hi vātād ṛte yonir vanitānāṁ praduṣyati |
AHS6.34.023c/ ato jitvā tam anyasya kuryād doṣasya bheṣajam || 23 || [Note: AHS6.34.023v/ 34.23cv ato '.jitvā tam anyac ca 34.23cv ato '.jitvā tam anyasya 34.23dv na kuryād doṣa.bheṣajam]
AHS6.34.024a/ pāyayeta balā.tailaṁ miśrakaṁ su.kumārakam |
AHS6.34.024c/ snigdha.svinnāṁ tathā yoniṁ duḥ.sthitāṁ sthāpayet samām || 24 || [Note: AHS6.34.024v/ 34.24av pāyayec ca balā.tailaṁ 34.24av pāyayet tāṁ balā.tailaṁ 34.24av pāyayed vā balā.tailaṁ]
AHS6.34.025a/ pāṇinā namayej jihmāṁ saṁvṛtāṁ vyadhayet punaḥ |
AHS6.34.025c/ praveśayen niḥsṛtāṁ ca vivṛtāṁ parivartayet || 25 || [Note: AHS6.34.025v/ 34.25av pāṇinā nāmayej jihmāṁ 34.25av pāṇinonnamayej jihmāṁ 34.25bv saṁvṛtāṁ vyāsayet punaḥ]
[Page 711 ]
AHS6.34.026a/ sthānāpavṛttā yonir hi śalya.bhūtā striyo matā |
AHS6.34.026c/ karmabhir vamanādyaiś ca mṛdubhir yojayet striyam || 26 || [Note: AHS6.34.026v/ 34.26av sthānāpavartā yonir hi]
AHS6.34.027a/ sarvataḥ su.viśuddhāyāḥ śeṣaṁ karma vidhīyate |
AHS6.34.027c/ vasty.abhyaṅga.parīṣeka.pralepa.picu.dhāraṇam || 27 || [Note: AHS6.34.027v/ 34.27av sarvatas tu viśuddhāyāḥ]
AHS6.34.028a/ kāśmarya.tri.phalā.drākṣā.kāsamarda.niśā.dvayaiḥ |
AHS6.34.028c/ guḍūcī.sairyakābhīru.śukanāsā.punarnavaiḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS6.34.028v/ 34.28cv guḍūcī.gairikābhīru.]
AHS6.34.029a/ parūṣakaiś ca vipacet prastham akṣa.samair ghṛtāt |
AHS6.34.029c/ yoni.vāta.vikāra.ghnaṁ tat pītaṁ garbha.daṁ param || 29 || [Note: AHS6.34.029v/ 34.29av parūṣakaiś ca vipaced 34.29bv prastham akṣa.samair ghṛtam 34.29bv akṣaiḥ prastha.samaṁ ghṛtam]
AHS6.34.030a/ vacopakuñcikājājī.kṛṣṇā.vṛṣaka.saindhavam |
AHS6.34.030c/ ajamodā.yava.kṣāra.śarkarā.citrakānvitam || 30 ||
AHS6.34.031a/ piṣṭvā prasannayāloḍya khādet tad ghṛta.bharjitam |
AHS6.34.031c/ yoni.pārśvārti.hṛd.roga.gulmārśo.vinivṛttaye || 31 || [Note: AHS6.34.031v/ 34.31dv .gulmārśo.'rti.nivṛttaye]
AHS6.34.032a/ vṛṣakaṁ mātuluṅgasya mūlāni madayantikām |
AHS6.34.032c/ piben madyaiḥ sa.lavaṇais tathā kṛṣṇopakuñcike || 32 || [Note: AHS6.34.032v/ 34.32av vṛṣasya mātuluṅgasya 34.32dv tathā kṛṣṇopakuñcikā]
AHS6.34.033a/ rāsnā.śvadaṁṣṭrā.vṛṣakaiḥ śṛtaṁ śūla.haraṁ payaḥ |
AHS6.34.033c/ guḍūcī.tri.phalā.dantī.kvāthaiś ca pariṣecanam || 33 ||
AHS6.34.034a/ nata.vārtākinī.kuṣṭha.saindhavāmaradārubhiḥ |
AHS6.34.034c/ tailāt prasādhitād dhāryaḥ picur yonau rujāpahaḥ || 34 ||
AHS6.34.035a/ pittalānāṁ tu yonīnāṁ sekābhyaṅga.picu.kriyāḥ |
AHS6.34.035c/ śītāḥ pitta.jitaḥ kāryāḥ snehanārthaṁ ghṛtāni ca || 35 || [Note: AHS6.34.035v/ 34.35av pittalānāṁ ca yonīnāṁ]
[Page 712 ]
AHS6.34.036a/ śatāvarī.mūla.tulā.catuṣkāt kṣuṇṇa.pīḍitāt |
AHS6.34.036c/ rasena kṣīra.tulyena pācayeta ghṛtāḍhakam || 36 ||
AHS6.34.037a/ jīvanīyaiḥ śatāvaryā mṛdvīkābhiḥ parūṣakaiḥ |
AHS6.34.037c/ piṣṭaiḥ priyālaiś cākṣāṁśair dvi.balā.madhukānvitaiḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS6.34.037v/ 34.37dv madhukarddhi.balānvitaiḥ]
AHS6.34.038a/ siddha.śīte tu madhunaḥ pippalyāś ca palāṣṭakam |
AHS6.34.038c/ śarkarāyā daśa.palaṁ kṣipel lihyāt picuṁ tataḥ || 38 ||
AHS6.34.039a/ yony.asṛk.śukra.doṣa.ghnaṁ vṛṣyaṁ puṁ.savanaṁ param |
AHS6.34.039c/ kṣataṁ kṣayam asṛk.pittaṁ kāsaṁ śvāsaṁ halīmakam || 39 || [Note: AHS6.34.039v/ 34.39cv kṣata.kṣayam asṛk.pittaṁ]
AHS6.34.040a/ kāmalāṁ vāta.rudhiraṁ visarpaṁ hṛc.chiro.graham |
AHS6.34.040c/ apasmārārditāyāma.madonmādāṁś ca nāśayet || 40 || [Note: AHS6.34.040v/ 34.40cv apasmārārditāyāmān 34.40dv madonmādāṁś ca nāśayet]
AHS6.34.041a/ evam eva payaḥ.sarpir jīvanīyopasādhitam |
AHS6.34.041c/ garbha.daṁ pitta.jānāṁ ca rogāṇāṁ paramaṁ hitam || 41 ||
AHS6.34.042a/ balā.droṇa.dvaya.kvāthe ghṛta.tailāḍhakaṁ pacet |
AHS6.34.042c/ kṣīre catur.guṇe kṛṣṇā.kākanāsā.sitānvitaiḥ || 42 ||
AHS6.34.043a/ jīvantī.kṣīra.kākolī.sthirā.vīrarddhi.jīvakaiḥ |
AHS6.34.043c/ payasyā.śrāvaṇī.mudga.pīlu.māṣākhya.parṇibhiḥ || 43 || [Note: AHS6.34.043v/ 34.43bv .sthirā.vīrarddhi.jīrakaiḥ 34.43bv .sthirā.vīrā.dvi.jīvakaiḥ 34.43dv .pīlu.māṣākhukarṇibhiḥ]
AHS6.34.044a/ vāta.pittāmayān hatvā pānād garbhaṁ dadhāti tat |
AHS6.34.044c/ rakta.yonyām asṛg.varṇair anubandham avekṣya ca || 44 || [Note: AHS6.34.044v/ 34.44bv pānād garbhaṁ dadāti tat]
AHS6.34.045a/ yathā.doṣodayaṁ yuñjyād rakta.sthāpanam auṣadham |
AHS6.34.045c/ pāṭhāṁ jambv.āmrayor asthi śilodbhedaṁ rasāñjanam || 45 ||
[Page 713 ]
AHS6.34.045.1+1a/ mañjiṣṭhāguru.kaṭphala.musta.priyaṅgu.miśi.kuṣṭhaiḥ |
AHS6.34.045.1+1c/ kaṭvaṅga.kuṭaja.śābara.kakubha.tvaṅ.madhuka.padmaka.madhūkaiḥ || 45.1+1 || [Note: AHS6.34.045.1+1v/ 34.45.1+1av mañjiṣṭhā.madhu.kaṭphala.]
AHS6.34.045.1+2a/ kuṅkuma.bilvātiviṣā.mākṣīka.rasāñjanaiḥ sa.kiñjalkaiḥ |
AHS6.34.045.1+2c/ piṣṭair ghṛtaṁ vipakvaṁ dvi.guṇāja.kṣīra.saṁyuktam || 45.1+2 ||
AHS6.34.045.1+3a/ strīṇām apatya.jananaṁ yoni.rujā.doṣa.jit sadā yuñjyāt |
AHS6.34.045.1+3c/ uttara.vastiṣu sarpir yojyaṁ kalyāṇakaṁ nāma || 45.1+3 ||
AHS6.34.046a/ ambaṣṭhāṁ śālmalī.picchāṁ samaṅgāṁ vatsaka.tvacam |
AHS6.34.046c/ bāhlīka.bilvātiviṣā.lodhra.toyada.gairikam || 46 || [Note: AHS6.34.046v/ 34.46bv samaṅgāṁ vatsaka.tvacām]
AHS6.34.047a/ śuṇṭhī.madhūka.mācīka.rakta.candana.kaṭphalam |
AHS6.34.047c/ kaṭvaṅga.vatsakānantā.dhātakī.madhukārjunam || 47 || [Note: AHS6.34.047v/ 34.47av śuṇṭhī.madhuka.mācīka. 34.47av śuṇṭhī.madhuka.mādhvīka. 34.47av śuṇṭhī.madhuka.mārdvīka. 34.47av śuṇṭhī.madhuka.mārdvīkā. 34.47av śuṇṭhī.madhūka.mṛdvīkā. 34.47dv .dhātakī.madhukāñjanam]
AHS6.34.048a/ puṣye gṛhītvā sañcūrṇya sa.kṣaudraṁ taṇḍulāmbhasā |
AHS6.34.048c/ pibed arśaḥsv atīsāre raktaṁ yaś copaveśyate || 48 || [Note: AHS6.34.048v/ 34.48bv sa.kṣaudraṁ taṇḍulāmbunā]
AHS6.34.049a/ doṣā jantu.kṛtā ye ca bālānāṁ tāṁś ca nāśayet |
AHS6.34.049c/ yoni.doṣaṁ rajo.doṣaṁ śyāva.śvetāruṇāsitam || 49 || [Note: AHS6.34.049v/ 34.49av doṣā danta.kṛtā ye ca]
AHS6.34.050a/ cūrṇaṁ puṣyānugaṁ nāma hitam ātreya.pūjitam |
AHS6.34.050c/ yonyāṁ balāsa.duṣṭāyāṁ sarvaṁ rūkṣoṣṇam auṣadham || 50 ||
AHS6.34.051a/ dhātaky.āmalakī.pattra.sroto.ja.madhukotpalaiḥ |
AHS6.34.051c/ jambv.āmra.sāra.kāsīsa.lodhra.kaṭphala.tindukaiḥ || 51 ||
AHS6.34.052a/ saurāṣṭrikā.dāḍima.tvag.udumbara.śalāṭubhiḥ |
AHS6.34.052c/ akṣa.mātrair ajā.mūtre kṣīre ca dvi.guṇe pacet || 52 ||
[Page 714 ]
AHS6.34.053a/ taila.prasthaṁ tad abhyaṅga.picu.vastiṣu yojayet |
AHS6.34.053c/ tena śūnonnatā stabdhā picchilā srāviṇī tathā || 53 || [Note: AHS6.34.053v/ 34.53cv śūnottānonnatā stabdhā]
AHS6.34.054a/ viplutopaplutā yoniḥ sidhyet sa.sphoṭa.śūlinī |
AHS6.34.054c/ yavānnam abhayāriṣṭaṁ sīdhu tailaṁ ca śīlayet || 54 || [Note: AHS6.34.054v/ 34.54bv sidhyeta sphoṭa.śūlinī]
AHS6.34.055a/ pippaly.ayo.rajaḥ.pathyā.prayogāṁś ca sa.mākṣikān |
AHS6.34.055c/ kāsīsaṁ tri.phalā kāṅkṣī sāmra.jambv.asthi dhātakī || 55 || [Note: AHS6.34.055v/ 34.55cv kāsīsaṁ tri.phalā kācchī]
AHS6.34.056a/ paicchilye kṣaudra.saṁyuktaś cūrṇo vaiśadya.kārakaḥ |
AHS6.34.056c/ palāśa.dhātakī.jambū.samaṅgā.moca.sarja.jaḥ || 56 ||
AHS6.34.057a/ dur.gandhe picchile klede stambhanaś cūrṇa iṣyate |
AHS6.34.057c/ āragvadhādi.vargasya kaṣāyaḥ pariṣecanam || 57 || [Note: AHS6.34.057v/ 34.57dv kaṣāyaḥ pariṣecane]
AHS6.34.058a/ stabdhānāṁ karkaśānāṁ ca kāryaṁ mārdava.kārakam |
AHS6.34.058c/ dhāraṇaṁ vesavārasya kṛśarā.pāyasasya ca || 58 ||
AHS6.34.059a/ dur.gandhānāṁ kaṣāyaḥ syāt tailaṁ vā kalka eva vā |
AHS6.34.059c/ cūrṇo vā sarva.gandhānāṁ pūti.gandhāpakarṣaṇaḥ || 59 || [Note: AHS6.34.059v/ 34.59dv pūti.gandhy.apakarṣaṇaḥ]
AHS6.34.060a/ śleṣmalānāṁ kaṭu.prāyāḥ sa.mūtrā vastayo hitāḥ |
AHS6.34.060c/ pitte sa.madhuka.kṣīrā vāte tailāmla.saṁyutāḥ || 60 ||
AHS6.34.061a/ sannipāta.samutthāyāḥ karma sādhāraṇaṁ hitam |
AHS6.34.061c/ evaṁ yoniṣu śuddhāsu garbhaṁ vindanti yoṣitaḥ || 61 || [Note: AHS6.34.061v/ 34.61av sannipāta.samutthāyāṁ 34.61dv garbho bhavati yoṣitām]
AHS6.34.061.1+1a/ candano natayośīra.tiktā.padmebha.kesaraiḥ |
AHS6.34.061.1+1c/ kuṭaja.tvak.phalaṁ mustaṁ jambv.āmrāsthi rasāñjanam || 61.1+1 || [Note: AHS6.34.061.1+1v/ 34.61.1+1bv .tiktā.padmebha.kesaram]
[Page 715 ]
AHS6.34.061.1+2a/ padmakotpala.bilvābda.kaṭphalaiḥ sādhitā niśā |
AHS6.34.061.1+2c/ dhātaky.ativiṣā.māṁsī.pāṭhā.moca.rasodakam || 61.1+2 ||
AHS6.34.061.1+3a/ madhūkaṁ madhukānantā.śārivā.dāḍima.[tva]cam |
AHS6.34.061.1+3c/ mṛl.lodhrārjuna.śaileya.samaṅgā nāgarāḥ samāḥ || 61.1+3 ||
AHS6.34.061.1+4a/ cūrṇaṁ śreṣṭhāmbunā pītaṁ hanti lohita.mehinam |
AHS6.34.061.1+4c/ mūrchā.tṛṣṇā.jvarārtāya raktātīsāra.mehinām || 61.1+4 ||
AHS6.34.061.1+5ab/ strīṇām asṛg.daraṁ yāti garbha.saṁsthāpanaṁ param || 61.1+5ab ||
AHS6.34.062a/ a.duṣṭe prākṛte bīje jīvopakramaṇe sati |
AHS6.34.062c/ pañca.karma.viśuddhasya puruṣasyāpi cendriyam || 62 ||
AHS6.34.063a/ parīkṣya varṇair doṣāṇāṁ duṣṭaṁ tad.ghnair upācaret |
AHS6.34.063c/ mañjiṣṭhā.kuṣṭha.tagara.tri.phalā.śarkarā.vacāḥ || 63 ||
AHS6.34.063.1+1a/ rasaṁ śirīṣa.pattrāṇāṁ kalkaṁ ca ṣaḍ.ahaḥ pibet |
AHS6.34.063.1+1c/ kṣīropanāśinā yoṣid ṛtu.snātā sutārthinī || 63.1+1 ||
AHS6.34.064a/ dve niśe madhukaṁ medāṁ dīpyakaṁ kaṭu.rohiṇīm |
AHS6.34.064c/ payasyā.hiṅgu.kākolī.vājigandhā.śatāvarīḥ || 64 || [Note: AHS6.34.064v/ 34.64av dve niśe madhukaṁ medā 34.64bv dīpyakaḥ kaṭu.rohiṇī 34.64cv payasyā hiṅgu kākolī 34.64dv vājigandhā śatāvarī]
AHS6.34.065a/ piṣṭvākṣāṁśā ghṛta.prasthaṁ pacet kṣīra.catur.guṇam |
AHS6.34.065c/ yoni.śukra.pradoṣeṣu tat sarveṣu praśasyate || 65 || [Note: AHS6.34.065v/ 34.65av piṣṭvākṣāṁśair ghṛta.prasthaṁ 34.65bv pacet kṣīraṁ catur.guṇam 34.65bv pacet kṣīre catur.guṇe 34.65dv tat sarveṣu ca śasyate]
AHS6.34.066a/ āyuṣyaṁ pauṣṭikaṁ medhyaṁ dhanyaṁ puṁ.savanaṁ param |
AHS6.34.066c/ phala.sarpir iti khyātaṁ puṣpe pītaṁ phalāya yat || 66 ||
[Page 716 ]
AHS6.34.067a/ mriyamāṇa.prajānāṁ ca garbhiṇīnāṁ ca pūjitam |
AHS6.34.067c/ etat paraṁ ca bālānāṁ graha.ghnaṁ deha.vardhanam || 67 ||

6.35. Chapter 35 :: Atha viṣapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 546-550]
AHS6.35.001a/ mathyamāne jala.nidhāv amṛtārthaṁ surāsuraiḥ |
AHS6.35.001c/ jātaḥ prāg amṛtotpatteḥ puruṣo ghora.darśanaḥ || 1 ||
AHS6.35.002a/ dīpta.tejāś catur.daṁṣṭro hari.keśo 'nalekṣaṇaḥ |
AHS6.35.002c/ jagad viṣaṇṇaṁ taṁ dṛṣṭvā tenāsau viṣa.sañjñitaḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS6.35.002v/ 35.2bv harit.keśo 'nalekṣaṇaḥ 35.2dv tenāsau viṣa.sañjñakaḥ]
AHS6.35.003a/ huṅ.kṛto brahmaṇā mūrtī tataḥ sthāvara.jaṅgame |
AHS6.35.003c/ so 'dhyatiṣṭhan nijaṁ rūpam ujjhitvā vañcanātmakam || 3 || [Note: AHS6.35.003v/ 35.3av huṅ.kṛto brahmaṇā mūrtas 35.3av huṅ.kṛto brahmaṇā mūrtīs 35.3bv tataḥ sthāvara.jaṅgamam 35.3bv tataḥ sthāvara.jaṅgamam 35.3bv tataḥ sthāvara.jaṅgamāt 35.3bv tataḥ sthāvara.jaṅgamāḥ 35.3dv ujjhitvā vañcanātmakaḥ]
AHS6.35.004a/ sthiram ity ulbaṇaṁ vīrye yat kandeṣu pratiṣṭhitam |
AHS6.35.004c/ kālakūṭendravatsākhya.śṛṅgī.hālāhalādikam || 4 ||
AHS6.35.005a/ sarpa.lūtādi.daṁṣṭrāsu dāruṇaṁ jaṅgamaṁ viṣam |
AHS6.35.005c/ sthāvaraṁ jaṅgamaṁ ceti viṣaṁ proktam a.kṛtrimam || 5 ||
AHS6.35.006a/ kṛtrimaṁ gara.sañjñaṁ tu kriyate vividhauṣadhaiḥ |
AHS6.35.006c/ hanti yoga.vaśenāśu cirāc cira.tarāc ca tat || 6 ||
AHS6.35.007a/ śopha.pāṇḍūdaronmāda.dur.nāmādīn karoti vā |
AHS6.35.007c/ tīkṣṇoṣṇa.rūkṣa.viśadaṁ vyavāyy āśu.karaṁ laghu || 7 || [Note: AHS6.35.007v/ 35.7bv .dur.nāmādīn karoti ca]
AHS6.35.008a/ vikāṣi sūkṣmam a.vyakta.rasaṁ viṣama.pāki ca |
AHS6.35.008c/ ojaso viparītaṁ tat tīkṣṇādyair anvitaṁ guṇaiḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS6.35.008v/ 35.8av vikāśi sūkṣmam a.vyakta. 35.8av vikāsi sūkṣmam a.vyakta. 35.8bv .rasair yuktam a.pāki ca 35.8cv ojaso viparītaṁ tu]
AHS6.35.009a/ vāta.pittottaraṁ nṝṇāṁ sadyo harati jīvitam |
AHS6.35.009c/ viṣaṁ hi dehaṁ samprāpya prāg dūṣayati śoṇitam || 9 ||
[Page 717 ]
AHS6.35.010a/ kapha.pittānilāṁś cānu samaṁ doṣān sahāśayān |
AHS6.35.010c/ tato hṛdayam āsthāya dehocchedāya kalpate || 10 || [Note: AHS6.35.010v/ 35.10bv sama.doṣaṁ sahāśayān 35.10bv samaṁ doṣān sahāya.vat 35.10bv sama.doṣaṁ sahāya.vat 35.10bv sama.doṣaṁ sahāśrayam 35.10dv deha.cchedāya kalpate]
AHS6.35.011a/ sthāvarasyopayuktasya vege pūrve prajāyate |
AHS6.35.011c/ jihvāyāḥ śyāva.tā stambho mūrchā trāsaḥ klamo vamiḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS6.35.011v/ 35.11bv vegaḥ pūrvaṁ prajāyate 35.11bv vege pūrve ca jāyate]
AHS6.35.012a/ dvitīye vepathuḥ svedo dāhaḥ kaṇṭhe ca vedanā |
AHS6.35.012c/ viṣaṁ cāmāśayaṁ prāptaṁ kurute hṛdi vedanām || 12 ||
AHS6.35.013a/ tālu.śoṣas tṛtīye tu śūlaṁ cāmāśaye bhṛśam |
AHS6.35.013c/ dur.bale harite śūne jāyete cāsya locane || 13 || [Note: AHS6.35.013v/ 35.13cv dur.varṇe harite śūne 35.13cv dur.varṇe harite śūnye]
AHS6.35.014a/ pakvāśaya.gate toda.hidhmā.kāsāntra.kūjanam |
AHS6.35.014c/ caturthe jāyate vege śirasaś cāti.gauravam || 14 || [Note: AHS6.35.014v/ 35.14av pakvāśaya.gate todo 35.14bv hidhmā kāsāntra.kūjanam]
AHS6.35.015a/ kapha.praseko vaivarṇyaṁ parva.bhedaś ca pañcame |
AHS6.35.015c/ sarva.doṣa.prakopaś ca pakvādhāne ca vedanā || 15 ||
AHS6.35.016a/ ṣaṣṭhe sañjñā.praṇāśaś ca su.bhṛśaṁ cātisāryate |
AHS6.35.016c/ skandha.pṛṣṭha.kaṭī.bhaṅgo bhaven mṛtyuś ca saptame || 16 ||
AHS6.35.017a/ prathame viṣa.vege tu vāntaṁ śītāmbu.secinam |
AHS6.35.017c/ sarpir.madhubhyāṁ saṁyuktam a.gadaṁ pāyayed drutam || 17 || [Note: AHS6.35.017v/ 35.17av prathame viṣa.vege 'tha]
AHS6.35.018a/ dvitīye pūrva.vad vāntaṁ viriktaṁ cānupāyayet |
AHS6.35.018c/ tṛtīye '.gada.pānaṁ tu hitaṁ nasyaṁ tathāñjanam || 18 ||
AHS6.35.019a/ caturthe sneha.saṁyuktam a.gadaṁ pratiyojayet |
AHS6.35.019c/ pañcame madhuka.kvātha.mākṣikābhyāṁ yutaṁ hitam || 19 ||
[Page 718 ]
AHS6.35.020a/ ṣaṣṭhe 'tīsāra.vad siddhir avapīḍaś tu saptame |
AHS6.35.020c/ mūrdhni kāka.padaṁ kṛtvā sāsṛg vā piśitaṁ kṣipet || 20 || [Note: AHS6.35.020v/ 35.20bv avapīḍaś ca saptame]
AHS6.35.021a/ kośātaky agnikaḥ pāṭhā sūryavally.amṛtābhayāḥ |
AHS6.35.021c/ śeluḥ śirīṣaḥ kiṇihī haridre kṣaudra.sāhvayā || 21 || [Note: AHS6.35.021v/ 35.21bv sūryavally amṛtābhayā 35.21dv haridre kṣaudra.sāhvayam]
AHS6.35.022a/ punarnave tri.kaṭukaṁ bṛhatyau śārive balā |
AHS6.35.022c/ eṣāṁ yavāgūṁ niryūhe śītāṁ sa.ghṛta.mākṣikām || 22 || [Note: AHS6.35.022v/ 35.22av punarnavā tri.kaṭukaṁ 35.22bv bṛhatyau śārive bale]
AHS6.35.023a/ yuñjyād vegāntare sarva.viṣa.ghnīṁ kṛta.karmaṇaḥ |
AHS6.35.023c/ tad.van madhūka.madhuka.padma.kesara.candanaiḥ || 23 ||
AHS6.35.024a/ añjanaṁ tagaraṁ kuṣṭhaṁ haritālaṁ manaḥśilā |
AHS6.35.024c/ phalinī tri.kaṭu spṛkkā nāgapuṣpaṁ sa.kesaram || 24 ||
AHS6.35.025a/ hareṇur madhukaṁ māṁsī rocanā kākamālikā |
AHS6.35.025c/ śrīveṣṭakaṁ sarja.rasaḥ śatāhvā kuṅkumaṁ balā || 25 || [Note: AHS6.35.025v/ 35.25bv rocanā kālamālikā 35.25bv rocanā kālamañjikā]
AHS6.35.026a/ tamāla.pattra.tālīśa.bhūrjośīra.niśā.dvayam |
AHS6.35.026c/ kanyopavāsinī snātā śukla.vāsā madhu.drutaiḥ || 26 || [Note: AHS6.35.026v/ 35.26av tamāla.pattraṁ tālīśaṁ 35.26bv bhūrjośīraṁ niśā.dvayam 35.26dv śukla.vāsā madhu.plutaiḥ]
AHS6.35.027a/ dvi.jān abhyarcya taiḥ puṣye kalpayed a.gadottamam |
AHS6.35.027c/ vaidyaś cātra tadā mantraṁ prayatātmā paṭhed imam || 27 || [Note: AHS6.35.027v/ 35.27av dvi.jān abhyarcya puṣyarkṣe 35.27cv vaidyaś cāśu tadā mantraṁ]
AHS6.35.028a/ namaḥ puruṣa.siṁhāya namo nārāyaṇāya ca |
AHS6.35.028c/ yathāsau nābhijānāti raṇe kṛṣṇa.parājayam || 28 || [Note: AHS6.35.028v/ 35.28dv raṇe kṛṣṇaḥ parājayam]
AHS6.35.029a/ etena satya.vākyena a.gado me prasidhyatu |
AHS6.35.029c/ namo vaiḍūryamāte hulu hulu rakṣa māṁ sarva.viṣebhyaḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS6.35.029v/ 35.29dv hulu kulu rakṣa māṁ sarva.viṣebhyaḥ]
[Page 719 ]
AHS6.35.030ab/ gauri gāndhāri cāṇḍāli mātaṅgi svāhā piṣṭe ca dvitīyo mantraḥ || 30ab ||
AHS6.35.030c/ harimāyi svāhā || 30c || [Note: AHS6.35.030v/ 35.30av gauri gāndhāri caṇḍāli mātaṅgi svāhā 35.30cv hāritamāyi svāhā]
AHS6.35.031a/ a.śeṣa.viṣa.vetāla.graha.kārmaṇa.pāpmasu |
AHS6.35.031c/ maraka.vyādhi.dur.bhikṣa.yuddhāśani.bhayeṣu ca || 31 ||
AHS6.35.032a/ pāna.nasyāñjanālepa.maṇi.bandhādi.yojitaḥ |
AHS6.35.032c/ eṣa candrodayo nāma śānti.svasty.ayanaṁ param || 32 || [Note: AHS6.35.032v/ 35.32dv śāntiḥ svasty.ayanaṁ param]
AHS6.35.032+(1)ab/ vāsavo vṛtram avadhīt samāliptaḥ kilāmunā || 32+(1)ab || [Note: AHS6.35.032+(1)v/ 35.32+(1)bv samālipto 'munā kila]
AHS6.35.033a/ jīrṇaṁ viṣa.ghnauṣadhibhir hataṁ vā dāvāgni.vātātapa.śoṣitaṁ vā |
AHS6.35.033c/ sva.bhāvato vā na guṇaiḥ su.yuktaṁ dūṣī.viṣākhyāṁ viṣam abhyupaiti || 33 || [Note: AHS6.35.033v/ 35.33cv sva.bhāvato vā su.guṇair na yuktaṁ 35.33cv sva.bhāvato vā sva.guṇair na yuktaṁ 35.33dv dūṣī.viṣākhyaṁ viṣam abhyupaiti]
AHS6.35.034a/ vīryālpa.bhāvād a.vibhāvyam etat kaphāvṛtaṁ varṣa.gaṇānubandhi |
AHS6.35.034c/ tenārdito bhinna.purīṣa.varṇo duṣṭāsra.rogī tṛḍ.a.rocakārtaḥ || 34 ||
AHS6.35.035a/ mūrchan vaman gadgada.vāg vimuhyan bhavec ca dūṣyodara.liṅga.juṣṭaḥ |
AHS6.35.035c/ āmāśaya.sthe kapha.vāta.rogī pakvāśaya.sthe 'nila.pitta.rogī || 35 ||
AHS6.35.036a/ bhaven naro dhvasta.śiro.ruhāṅgo vilūna.pakṣaḥ sa yathā vihaṅgaḥ |
AHS6.35.036c/ sthitaṁ rasādiṣv atha.vā vicitrān karoti dhātu.prabhavān vikārān || 36 ||
AHS6.35.037a/ prāg.vātā.jīrṇa.śītābhra.divā.svapnā.hitāśanaiḥ |
AHS6.35.037c/ duṣṭaṁ dūṣayate dhātūn ato dūṣī.viṣaṁ smṛtam || 37 || [Note: AHS6.35.037v/ 35.37cv duṣṭaṁ dūṣayate dhātuṁ 35.37dv tato dūṣī.viṣaṁ smṛtam]
AHS6.35.038a/ dūṣī.viṣārtaṁ su.svinnam ūrdhvaṁ cādhaś ca śodhitam |
AHS6.35.038c/ dūṣī.viṣārim a.gadaṁ lehayen madhunāplutam || 38 ||
[Page 720 ]
AHS6.35.039a/ pippalyo dhyāmakaṁ māṁsī lodhram elā suvarcikā |
AHS6.35.039c/ kuṭannaṭaṁ nataṁ kuṣṭhaṁ yaṣṭī candana.gairikam || 39 ||
AHS6.35.040a/ dūṣī.viṣārir nāmnāyaṁ na cānya.trāpi vāryate |
AHS6.35.040c/ viṣa.digdhena viddhas tu pratāmyati muhur muhuḥ || 40 ||
AHS6.35.041a/ vi.varṇa.bhāvaṁ bhajate viṣādaṁ cāśu gacchati |
AHS6.35.041c/ kīṭair ivāvṛtaṁ cāsya gātraṁ cimicimāyate || 41 ||
AHS6.35.042a/ śroṇi.pṛṣṭha.śiraḥ.skandha.sandhayaḥ syuḥ sa.vedanāḥ |
AHS6.35.042c/ kṛṣṇa.duṣṭāsra.visrāvī tṛṇ.mūrchā.jvara.dāha.vān || 42 ||
AHS6.35.043a/ dṛṣṭi.kāluṣya.vamathu.śvāsa.kāsa.karaḥ kṣaṇāt |
AHS6.35.043c/ ā.rakta.pīta.pary.antaḥ śyāva.madhyo 'ti.rug vraṇaḥ || 43 ||
AHS6.35.044a/ śūyate pacyate sadyo gatvā māṁsaṁ ca kṛṣṇa.tām |
AHS6.35.044c/ praklinnaṁ śīryate 'bhīkṣṇaṁ sa.picchila.parisravam || 44 ||
AHS6.35.045a/ kuryād a.marma.viddhasya hṛdayāvaraṇaṁ drutam |
AHS6.35.045c/ śalyam ākṛṣya taptena lohenānu dahed vraṇam || 45 ||
AHS6.35.046a/ atha.vā muṣkaka.śvetā.soma.tvak.tāmravallitaḥ |
AHS6.35.046c/ śirīṣād gṛdhranakhyāś ca kṣāreṇa pratisārayet || 46 ||
AHS6.35.047a/ śukanāsā.prativiṣā.vyāghrī.mūlaiś ca lepayet |
AHS6.35.047c/ kīṭa.daṣṭa.cikitsāṁ ca kuryāt tasya yathārhataḥ || 47 ||
AHS6.35.048a/ vraṇe tu pūti.piśite kriyā pitta.visarpa.vat |
AHS6.35.048c/ saubhāgyārthaṁ striyo bhartre rājñe vā.rati.coditāḥ || 48 || [Note: AHS6.35.048v/ 35.48dv rājñe cā.rati.coditāḥ]
[Page 721 ]
AHS6.35.049a/ garam āhāra.sampṛktaṁ yacchanty āsanna.vartinaḥ |
AHS6.35.049c/ nānā.prāṇy.aṅga.śamala.viruddhauṣadhi.bhasmanām || 49 || [Note: AHS6.35.049v/ 35.49cv nānā.prāṇy.aṅga.sa.mala.]
AHS6.35.050a/ viṣāṇāṁ cālpa.vīryāṇāṁ yogo gara iti smṛtaḥ |
AHS6.35.050c/ tena pāṇduḥ kṛśo 'lpāgniḥ kāsa.śvāsa.jvarārditaḥ || 50 || [Note: AHS6.35.050v/ 35.50av viṣāṇāṁ manda.vīryāṇāṁ]
AHS6.35.051a/ vāyunā pratilomena svapna.cintā.parāyaṇaḥ |
AHS6.35.051c/ mahodara.yakṛt.plīhī dīna.vāg dur.balo 'lasaḥ || 51 || [Note: AHS6.35.051v/ 35.51cv mehodara.yakṛt.plīhī 35.51dv hīna.vāg dur.balo 'lasaḥ]
AHS6.35.052a/ śopha.vān satatādhmātaḥ śuṣka.pāda.karaḥ kṣayī |
AHS6.35.052c/ svapne gomāyu.mārjāra.nakula.vyāla.vānarān || 52 ||
AHS6.35.053a/ prāyaḥ paśyati śuṣkāṁś ca vanaspati.jalāśayān |
AHS6.35.053c/ manyate kṛṣṇam ātmānaṁ gauro gauraṁ ca kālakaḥ || 53 ||
AHS6.35.054a/ vi.karṇa.nāsā.nayanaṁ paśyet tad.vihatendriyaḥ |
AHS6.35.054c/ etair anyaiś ca bahubhiḥ kliṣṭo ghorair upadravaiḥ || 54 || [Note: AHS6.35.054v/ 35.54bv paśyet tu vihatendriyaḥ]
AHS6.35.055a/ garārto nāśam āpnoti kaś.cit sadyo '.cikitsitaḥ |
AHS6.35.055c/ garārto vānta.vān bhuktvā tat pathyaṁ pāna.bhojanam || 55 ||
AHS6.35.056a/ śuddha.hṛc chīlayed dhema sūtra.sthāna.vidheḥ smaran |
AHS6.35.056c/ śarkarā.kṣaudra.saṁyuktaṁ cūrṇaṁ tāpya.suvarṇayoḥ || 56 || [Note: AHS6.35.056v/ 35.56bv sūtra.sthāna.vidhiṁ smaran]
AHS6.35.057a/ lehaḥ praśamayanty ugraṁ sarva.yoga.kṛtaṁ viṣam |
AHS6.35.057c/ mūrvāmṛtā.nata.kaṇā.paṭolī.cavya.citrakān || 57 ||
AHS6.35.058a/ vacā.musta.viḍaṅgāni takra.koṣṇāmbu.mastubhiḥ |
AHS6.35.058c/ pibed rasena vāmlena garopahata.pāvakaḥ || 58 || [Note: AHS6.35.058v/ 35.58cv pibed rasena cāmlena]
[Page 722 ]
AHS6.35.059a/ pārāvatāmiṣa.śaṭhī.puṣkarāhva.śṛtaṁ himam |
AHS6.35.059c/ gara.tṛṣṇā.rujā.kāsa.śvāsa.hidhmā.jvarāpaham || 59 || [Note: AHS6.35.059v/ 35.59bv .puṣkarāhvaṁ śṛtaṁ himam]
AHS6.35.059+1a/ try.ūṣaṇaṁ pañca.lavaṇaṁ mañjiṣṭhāṁ rajanī.dvayam |
AHS6.35.059+1c/ sūkṣmailāṁ trivṛtāṁ pattraṁ viḍaṅgānīndravāruṇīm || 59+1 ||
AHS6.35.059+2a/ madhukaṁ ceti sa.kṣaudraṁ go.viṣāṇe nidhāpayet |
AHS6.35.059+2c/ tasmād uṣṇāmbunā mātrāṁ prāg.bhaktaṁ yojayet tathā || 59+2 ||
AHS6.35.059+3a/ viṣaṁ bhuktaṁ jarāṁ yāti nir.viṣe 'pi na doṣa.kṛt |
AHS6.35.059+3c/ lākṣā.priyaṅgu.mañjiṣṭhāḥ sa.mṛṇāla.hareṇukāḥ || 59+3 ||
AHS6.35.059+4a/ sa.yaṣṭy.āhvā madhu.yutā basta.pittena kalpitāḥ |
AHS6.35.059+4c/ nikhaned go.viṣāṇa.sthāḥ sapta.rātraṁ mahī.tale || 59+4 ||
AHS6.35.059+5a/ tatra kṛtvā maṇiṁ hemnā baddhaṁ hastena dhārayet |
AHS6.35.059+5c/ saṁspṛṣṭaṁ sa.viṣaṁ tena sadyo bhavati nir.viṣam || 59+5 ||
AHS6.35.060a/ viṣa.prakṛti.kālānna.doṣa.dūṣyādi.saṅgame |
AHS6.35.060c/ viṣa.saṅkaṭam uddiṣṭaṁ śatasyaiko 'tra jīvati || 60 ||
AHS6.35.061a/ kṣut.tṛṣṇā.gharma.daurbalya.krodha.śoka.bhaya.śramaiḥ |
AHS6.35.061c/ a.jīrṇa.varco.drava.tā.pitta.māruta.vṛddhibhiḥ || 61 ||
AHS6.35.062a/ tila.puṣpa.phalāghrāṇa.bhū.bāṣpa.ghana.garjitaiḥ |
AHS6.35.062c/ hasti.mūṣika.vāditra.niḥsvanair viṣa.saṅkaṭaiḥ || 62 || [Note: AHS6.35.062v/ 35.62bv .bhū.bāṣpa.ghana.garjanaiḥ]
AHS6.35.063a/ puro.vātotpalāmoda.madanair vardhate viṣam |
AHS6.35.063c/ varṣāsu cāmbu.yoni.tvāt saṅkledaṁ guḍa.vad gatam || 63 || [Note: AHS6.35.063v/ 35.63cv varṣāsu vāmbu.yoni.tvāt]
[Page 723 ]
AHS6.35.064a/ visarpati ghanāpāye tad agastyo hinasti ca |
AHS6.35.064c/ prayāti manda.vīrya.tvaṁ viṣaṁ tasmād ghanātyaye || 64 ||
AHS6.35.065a/ iti prakṛti.sātmyartu.sthāna.vega.balā.balam |
AHS6.35.065c/ ālocya nipuṇaṁ buddhyā karmān.antaram ācaret || 65 ||
AHS6.35.066a/ ślaiṣmikaṁ vamanair uṣṇa.rūkṣa.tīkṣṇaiḥ pralepanaiḥ |
AHS6.35.066c/ kaṣāya.kaṭu.tiktaiś ca bhojanaiḥ śamayed viṣam || 66 ||
AHS6.35.067a/ paittikaṁ sraṁsanaiḥ seka.pradehair bhṛśa.śītalaiḥ |
AHS6.35.067c/ kaṣāya.tikta.madhurair ghṛta.yuktaiś ca bhojanaiḥ || 67 ||
AHS6.35.068a/ vātātmakaṁ jayet svādu.snigdhāmla.lavaṇānvitaiḥ |
AHS6.35.068c/ sa.ghṛtair bhojanair lepais tathaiva piśitāśanaiḥ || 68 || [Note: AHS6.35.068v/ 35.68bv .snigdhāmla.lavaṇāyutaiḥ]
AHS6.35.069a/ nā.ghṛtaṁ sraṁsanaṁ śastaṁ pralepo bhojyam auṣadham |
AHS6.35.069c/ sarveṣu sarvāvasthāsu viṣeṣu na ghṛtopamam || 69 ||
AHS6.35.070a/ vidyate bheṣajaṁ kiñ.cid viśeṣāt prabale 'nile |
AHS6.35.070c/ a.yatnāc chleṣma.gaṁ sādhyaṁ yatnāt pittāśayāśrayam || 70 || [Note: AHS6.35.070v/ 35.70av a.yatnāc chlaiṣmikaṁ sādhyaṁ 35.70cv a.yatnāc chleṣmakaṁ sādhyaṁ 35.70dv yatnāt pittāśayāśritam]
AHS6.35.070ū̆ab/ su.duḥ.sādhyam a.sādhyaṁ vā vātāśaya.gataṁ viṣam || 70ū̆ab ||
AHS6.35.070ū̆+1a/ jatu.sarja.rasośīra.sarṣapā.pattra.vālakaiḥ |
AHS6.35.070ū̆+1c/ sa.vaillāruṣkara.puraiḥ kusumair arjunasya ca || 70ū̆+1 || [Note: AHS6.35.070ū̆+1v/ 35.70ū̆+1cv sa.vailla.puṣkara.puraiḥ]
AHS6.35.070ū̆+2a/ dhūpo vāsa.gṛhe hanti viṣaṁ sthāvara.jaṅgamam |
AHS6.35.070ū̆+2c/ na tatra kīṭāḥ sa.viṣā nondurā na sarīsṛpāḥ || 70ū̆+2 ||
[Page 724 ]
AHS6.35.070ū̆+3ab/ na kṛtyāḥ kārmaṇādyāś ca dhūpo 'yaṁ yatra dahyate || 70ū̆+3ab ||

6.36. Chapter 36 :: Atha sarpaviṣapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 550-555]
AHS6.36.001a/ darvī.karā maṇḍalino rājī.mantaś ca pannagāḥ |
AHS6.36.001c/ tri.dhā samāsato bhaumā bhidyante te tv aneka.dhā || 1 ||
AHS6.36.002a/ vyāsato yoni.bhedena nocyante 'n.upayoginaḥ |
AHS6.36.002c/ viśeṣād rūkṣa.kaṭukam amloṣṇaṁ svādu.śītalam || 2 || [Note: AHS6.36.002v/ 36.2bv nocyante 'n.upayogataḥ]
AHS6.36.003a/ viṣaṁ darvī.karādīnāṁ kramād vātādi.kopanam |
AHS6.36.003c/ tāruṇya.madhya.vṛddha.tve vṛṣṭi.śītātapeṣu ca || 3 ||
AHS6.36.004a/ viṣolbaṇā bhavanty ete vyantarā ṛtu.sandhiṣu |
AHS6.36.004c/ rathāṅga.lāṅgala.cchattra.svastikāṅkuśa.dhāriṇaḥ || 4 ||
AHS6.36.005a/ phaṇinaḥ śīghra.gatayaḥ sarpā darvī.karāḥ smṛtāḥ |
AHS6.36.005c/ jñeyā maṇḍalino '.bhogā maṇḍalair vividhaiś citāḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS6.36.005v/ 36.5bv sarpā darvī.karā matāḥ]
AHS6.36.006a/ prāṁśavo manda.gamanā rājī.mantas tu rājibhiḥ |
AHS6.36.006c/ snigdhā vicitra.varṇābhis tiryag ūrdhvaṁ ca citritāḥ || 6 || [Note: AHS6.36.006v/ 36.6bv rājī.mantaś ca rājibhiḥ 36.6cv snigdhābhir bahu.varṇābhis]
AHS6.36.007a/ godhā.sutas tu gaudhero viṣe darvī.karaiḥ samaḥ |
AHS6.36.007c/ catuṣ.pād vyantarān vidyād eteṣām eva saṅkarāt || 7 || [Note: AHS6.36.007v/ 36.7av godhā.sutas tu gaudheyo]
AHS6.36.008a/ vyāmiśra.lakṣaṇās te hi sannipāta.prakopaṇāḥ |
AHS6.36.008c/ āhārārthaṁ bhayāt pāda.sparśād ati.viṣāt krudhaḥ || 8 ||
AHS6.36.009a/ pāpa.vṛtti.tayā vairād devarṣi.yama.codanāt |
AHS6.36.009c/ daśanti sarpās teṣūktaṁ viṣādhikyaṁ yathottaram || 9 || [Note: AHS6.36.009v/ 36.9av pāpa.vṛtta.tayā vairād 36.9bv devarṣi.yama.nodanāt]
[Page 725 ]
AHS6.36.010a/ ādiṣṭāt kāraṇaṁ jñātvā pratikuryād yathā.yatham |
AHS6.36.010c/ vyantaraḥ pāpa.śīla.tvān mārgam āśritya tiṣṭhati || 10 || [Note: AHS6.36.010v/ 36.10av āviṣṭāt kāraṇaṁ jñātvā 36.10dv mārgam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati]
AHS6.36.011a/ yatra lālā.parikleda.mātraṁ gātre pradṛśyate |
AHS6.36.011c/ na tu daṁṣṭrā.kṛtaṁ daṁśaṁ tat tuṇḍāhatam ādiśet || 11 || [Note: AHS6.36.011v/ 36.11bv .mātraṁ gātreṣu dṛśyate 36.11cv na tu daṁṣṭrā.kṣataṁ daṁśaṁ 36.11cv na tu daṁṣṭrā.kṣataṁ daṁśe 36.11dv taṁ tuṇḍāhataṁ ādiśet]
AHS6.36.012a/ ekaṁ daṁṣṭrā.padaṁ dve vā vyālīḍhākhyam a.śoṇitam |
AHS6.36.012c/ daṁṣṭrā.pade sa.rakte dve vyāluptaṁ trīṇi tāni tu || 12 || [Note: AHS6.36.012v/ 36.12dv vyāluptaṁ trīṇi tāni ca]
AHS6.36.013a/ māṁsa.cchedād a.vicchinna.rakta.vāhīni daṣṭakam |
AHS6.36.013c/ daṁṣṭrā.padāni catvāri tad.vad daṣṭa.nipīḍitam || 13 ||
AHS6.36.014a/ nir.viṣaṁ dvayam atrādyam a.sādhyaṁ paścimaṁ vadet |
AHS6.36.014c/ viṣaṁ nāheyam a.prāpya raktaṁ dūṣayate vapuḥ || 14 ||
AHS6.36.015a/ raktam aṇv api tu prāptaṁ vardhate tailam ambu.vat |
AHS6.36.015c/ bhīros tu sarpa.saṁsparśād bhayena kupito 'nilaḥ || 15 || [Note: AHS6.36.015v/ 36.15av raktam aṇv api tat prāptaṁ 36.15bv vardhate taila.bindu.vat]
AHS6.36.016a/ kadā.cit kurute śophaṁ sarpāṅgābhihataṁ tu tat |
AHS6.36.016c/ dur.gāndha.kāre viddhasya kena.cid daṣṭa.śaṅkayā || 16 || [Note: AHS6.36.016v/ 36.16cv dur.ge 'ndhakāre viddhasya]
AHS6.36.017a/ viṣodvego jvaraś chardir mūrchā dāho 'pi vā bhavet |
AHS6.36.017c/ glānir moho 'tisāro vā tac chaṅkā.viṣam ucyate || 17 || [Note: AHS6.36.017v/ 36.17av viṣa.vegāj jvaraś chardir 36.17av viṣodreko jvaraś chardir 36.17av viṣodvegāj jvaraś chardir]
AHS6.36.018a/ tudyate sa.viṣo daṁśaḥ kaṇḍū.śopha.rujānvitaḥ |
AHS6.36.018c/ dahyate grathitaḥ kiñ.cid viparītas tu nir.viṣaḥ || 18 || [Note: AHS6.36.018v/ 36.18av tudyate viṣa.jo daṁśaḥ]
AHS6.36.019a/ pūrve darvī.kṛtāṁ vege duṣṭaṁ śyāvī.bhavaty asṛk |
AHS6.36.019c/ śyāva.tā tena vaktrādau sarpantīva ca kīṭakāḥ || 19 || [Note: AHS6.36.019v/ 36.19bv duṣṭaṁ śyāvaṁ bhavaty asṛk 36.19cv śyāva.tā netra.vaktrādau]
[Page 726 ]
AHS6.36.020a/ dvitīye granthayo vege tṛtīye mūrdhni gauravam |
AHS6.36.020c/ dṛg.rodho daṁśa.vikledaś caturthe ṣṭhīvanaṁ vamiḥ || 20 || [Note: AHS6.36.020v/ 36.20bv tṛtīye mūrdha.gauravam 36.20cv dṛg.bādhā daṁśa.vikledaś 36.20dv caturthe ṣṭhevanaṁ vamiḥ]
AHS6.36.021a/ sandhi.viśleṣaṇaṁ tandrā pañcame parva.bhedanam |
AHS6.36.021c/ dāho hidhmā ca ṣaṣṭhe tu hṛt.pīḍā gātra.gauravam || 21 || [Note: AHS6.36.021v/ 36.21cv dāho hidhmā ca ṣaṣṭhe ca]
AHS6.36.022a/ mūrchā.vipāko 'tīsāraḥ prāpya śukraṁ tu saptame |
AHS6.36.022c/ skandha.pṛṣṭha.kaṭī.bhaṅgaḥ sarva.ceṣṭā.nivartanam || 22 || [Note: AHS6.36.022v/ 36.22bv prāpya śukraṁ ca saptame]
AHS6.36.023a/ atha maṇḍali.daṣṭasya duṣṭaṁ pītī.bhavaty asṛk |
AHS6.36.023c/ tena pītāṅga.tā dāho dvitīye śvayathūdbhavaḥ || 23 || [Note: AHS6.36.023v/ 36.23bv duṣṭaṁ pītaṁ bhavaty asṛk]
AHS6.36.024a/ tṛtīye daṁśa.vikledaḥ svedas tṛṣṇā ca jāyate |
AHS6.36.024c/ caturthe jvaryate dāhaḥ pañcame sarva.gātra.gaḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.36.024v/ 36.24bv svedas tṛṣṇā prajāyate]
AHS6.36.025a/ daṣṭasya rājilair duṣṭaṁ pāṇḍu.tāṁ yāti śoṇitam |
AHS6.36.025c/ pāṇḍu.tā tena gātrāṇāṁ dvitīye guru.tāti ca || 25 ||
AHS6.36.026a/ tṛtīye daṁśa.vikledo nāsikākṣi.mukha.sravāḥ |
AHS6.36.026c/ caturthe garimā mūrdhno manyā.stambhaś ca pañcame || 26 ||
AHS6.36.027a/ gātra.bhaṅgo jvaraḥ śītaḥ śeṣayoḥ pūrva.vad vadet |
AHS6.36.027c/ kuryāt pañcasu vegeṣu cikitsāṁ na tataḥ param || 27 || [Note: AHS6.36.027v/ 36.27bv śeṣayoḥ pūrva.vad bhavet]
AHS6.36.028a/ jalāplutā rati.kṣīṇā bhītā nakula.nirjitāḥ |
AHS6.36.028c/ śīta.vātātapa.vyādhi.kṣut.tṛṣṇā.śrama.pīḍitāḥ || 28 ||
AHS6.36.029a/ tūrṇaṁ deśāntarāyātā vimukta.viṣa.kañcukāḥ |
AHS6.36.029c/ kuśauṣadhi.kaṇṭaka.vad ye caranti ca kānanam || 29 ||
[Page 727 ]
AHS6.36.030a/ deśaṁ ca divyādhyuṣitaṁ sarpās te 'lpa.viṣā matāḥ |
AHS6.36.030c/ śmaśāna.citi.caityādau pañcamī.pakṣa.sandhiṣu || 30 || [Note: AHS6.36.030v/ 36.30av deśaṁ ca vidyādhyuṣitaṁ]
AHS6.36.031a/ aṣṭamī.navamī.sandhyā.madhya.rātri.dineṣu ca |
AHS6.36.031c/ yāmyāgneya.maghāśleṣā.viśākhā.pūrva.nairṛte || 31 ||
AHS6.36.032a/ nairṛtākhye muhūrte ca daṣṭaṁ marmasu ca tyajet |
AHS6.36.032c/ daṣṭa.mātraḥ sitāsyākṣaḥ śīryamāṇa.śiro.ruhaḥ || 32 || [Note: AHS6.36.032v/ 36.32cv daṣṭa.mātras tu tāmrākṣaḥ]
AHS6.36.033a/ stabdha.jihvo muhur mūrchan śītocchvāso na jīvati |
AHS6.36.033c/ hidhmā śvāso vamiḥ kāso daṣṭa.mātrasya dehinaḥ || 33 || [Note: AHS6.36.033v/ 36.33bv śītocchvāsī na jīvati]
AHS6.36.034a/ jāyante yuga.pad yasya sa hṛc.chūlī na jīvati |
AHS6.36.034c/ phenaṁ vamati niḥ.sañjñaḥ śyāva.pāda.karānanaḥ || 34 ||
AHS6.36.035a/ nāsāvasādo bhaṅgo 'ṅge viḍ.bhedaḥ ślatha.sandhi.tā |
AHS6.36.035c/ viṣa.pītasya daṣṭasya digdhenābhihatasya ca || 35 || [Note: AHS6.36.035v/ 36.35av nāsāvasādo ruk vāṅge]
AHS6.36.036a/ bhavanty etāni rūpāṇi samprāpte jīvita.kṣaye |
AHS6.36.036c/ na nasyaiś cetanā tīkṣṇair na kṣatāt kṣata.jāgamaḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS6.36.036v/ 36.36bv prāpte jīvita.saṅkṣaye]
AHS6.36.037a/ daṇḍāhatasya no rājī prayātasya yamāntikam |
AHS6.36.037c/ ato 'nya.thā tu tvarayā pradīptāgāra.vad bhiṣak || 37 || [Note: AHS6.36.037v/ 36.37bv prayāti sa yamāntikam]
AHS6.36.038a/ rakṣan kaṇṭha.gatān prāṇān viṣam āśu śamaṁ nayet |
AHS6.36.038c/ mātrā.śataṁ viṣaṁ sthitvā daṁśe daṣṭasya dehinaḥ || 38 ||
AHS6.36.039a/ dehaṁ prakramate dhātūn rudhirādīn pradūṣayan |
AHS6.36.039c/ etasminn antare karma daṁśasyotkartanādikam || 39 || [Note: AHS6.36.039v/ 36.39bv rudhirādīn pradūṣayet]
[Page 728 ]
AHS6.36.040a/ kuryac chīghraṁ yathā dehe viṣa.vallī na rohati |
AHS6.36.040c/ daṣṭa.mātro daśed āśu tam eva pavanāśinam || 40 || [Note: AHS6.36.040v/ 36.40dv tam eva pavanāśanam]
AHS6.36.041a/ loṣṭaṁ mahīṁ vā daśanaiś chittvā cānu sa.sambhramam |
AHS6.36.041c/ niṣṭhīvena samālimped daṁśaṁ karṇa.malena vā || 41 || [Note: AHS6.36.041v/ 36.41bv chittvā cāśu sa.sambhramam]
AHS6.36.042a/ daṁśasyopari badhnīyād ariṣṭāṁ catur.aṅgule |
AHS6.36.042c/ kṣaumādibhir veṇikayā siddhair mantraiś ca mantra.vit || 42 ||
AHS6.36.043a/ ambu.vat setu.bandhena bandhena stabhyate viṣam |
AHS6.36.043c/ na vahanti sirāś cāsya viṣaṁ bandhābhipīḍitāḥ || 43 || [Note: AHS6.36.043v/ 36.43cv na vahanti sirās tasya 36.43dv viṣaṁ bandhana.pīḍitāḥ]
AHS6.36.044a/ niṣpīḍyānūddhared daṁśaṁ marma.sandhy.a.gataṁ tathā |
AHS6.36.044c/ na jāyate viṣād vego bīja.nāśād ivāṅkuraḥ || 44 || [Note: AHS6.36.044v/ 36.44av niṣpīḍya coddhared daṁśaṁ 36.44cv na jāyate viṣāvego]
AHS6.36.045a/ daṁśaṁ maṇḍalināṁ muktvā pittala.tvād athāparam |
AHS6.36.045c/ prataptair hema.lohādyair dahed āśūlmukena vā || 45 ||
AHS6.36.046a/ karoti bhasma.sāt sadyo vahniḥ kiṁ nāma tu kṣatam |
AHS6.36.046c/ ācūṣet pūrṇa.vaktro vā mṛd.bhasmā.gada.go.mayaiḥ || 46 || [Note: AHS6.36.046v/ 36.46bv vahniḥ kiṁ nāma na kṣaṇāt 36.46bv vahniḥ kiṁ nāma na kṣaṇam]
AHS6.36.047a/ pracchāyāntar ariṣṭāyāṁ māṁsalaṁ tu viśeṣataḥ |
AHS6.36.047c/ aṅgaṁ sahaiva daṁśena lepayed a.gadair muhuḥ || 47 ||
AHS6.36.048a/ candanośīra.yuktena salilena ca secayet |
AHS6.36.048c/ viṣe pravisṛte vidhyet sirāṁ sā paramā kriyā || 48 ||
AHS6.36.049a/ rakte nirhriyamāṇe hi kṛtsnaṁ nirhriyate viṣam |
AHS6.36.049c/ dur.gandhaṁ sa.viṣaṁ raktam agnau caṭacaṭāyate || 49 || [Note: AHS6.36.049v/ 36.49cv dur.gandhi sa.viṣaṁ raktam]
[Page 729 ]
AHS6.36.050a/ yathā.doṣaṁ viśuddhaṁ ca pūrva.val lakṣayed asṛk |
AHS6.36.050c/ sirāsv a.dṛśyamānāsu yojyāḥ śṛṅga.jalaukasaḥ || 50 ||
AHS6.36.051a/ śoṇitaṁ sruta.śeṣaṁ ca pravilīnaṁ viṣoṣmaṇā |
AHS6.36.051c/ lepa.sekaiḥ su.bahu.śaḥ stambhayed bhṛśa.śītalaiḥ || 51 ||
AHS6.36.052a/ a.skanne viṣa.vegād dhi mūrchāya.mada.hṛd.dravāḥ |
AHS6.36.052c/ bhavanti tān jayec chītair vījec cā.roma.harṣataḥ || 52 || [Note: AHS6.36.052v/ 36.52dv vījayed roma.harṣataḥ]
AHS6.36.053a/ skanne tu rudhire sadyo viṣa.vegaḥ praśāmyati |
AHS6.36.053c/ viṣaṁ karṣati tīkṣṇa.tvād dhṛdayaṁ tasya guptaye || 53 ||
AHS6.36.054a/ pibed ghṛtaṁ ghṛta.kṣaudram a.gadaṁ vā ghṛtāplutam |
AHS6.36.054c/ hṛdayāvaraṇe cāsya śleṣmā hṛdy upacīyate || 54 || [Note: AHS6.36.054v/ 36.54cv hṛdayāvaraṇenāsya]
AHS6.36.055a/ pravṛtta.gauravotkleśa.hṛl.lāsaṁ vāmayet tataḥ |
AHS6.36.055c/ dravaiḥ kāñjika.kaulattha.taila.madyādi.varjitaiḥ || 55 ||
AHS6.36.056a/ vamanair viṣa.hṛdbhiś ca naivaṁ vyāpnoti tad vapuḥ |
AHS6.36.056c/ bhujaṅga.doṣa.prakṛti.sthāna.vega.viśeṣataḥ || 56 ||
AHS6.36.057a/ su.sūkṣmaṁ samyag ālocya viśiṣṭāṁ cācaret kriyām |
AHS6.36.057c/ sindhuvārita.mūlāni śvetā ca girikarṇikā || 57 || [Note: AHS6.36.057v/ 36.57bv viśiṣṭāṁ vācaret kriyām]
AHS6.36.058a/ pānaṁ darvī.karair daṣṭe nasyaṁ madhu sa.pākalam |
AHS6.36.058c/ kṛṣṇa.sarpeṇa daṣṭasya limped daṁśaṁ hṛte 'sṛji || 58 || [Note: AHS6.36.058v/ 36.58bv nasyaṁ sa.madhu pākalam 36.58bv nasyaṁ sa.madhu vālakam 36.58bv nasyaṁ madhu sa.vālakam]
AHS6.36.059a/ cāraṭī.nākulībhyāṁ vā tīkṣṇa.mūla.viṣeṇa vā |
AHS6.36.059c/ pānaṁ ca kṣaudra.mañjiṣṭhā.gṛha.dhūma.yutaṁ ghṛtam || 59 || [Note: AHS6.36.059v/ 36.59cv pāne ca kṣaudra.mañjiṣṭhā.]
[Page 730 ]
AHS6.36.060a/ taṇḍulīyaka.kāśmarya.kiṇihī.girikarṇikāḥ |
AHS6.36.060c/ mātuluṅgī sitā śeluḥ pāna.nasyāñjanair hitaḥ || 60 || [Note: AHS6.36.060v/ 36.60cv mātuluṅgaiḥ śiphā śeluḥ]
AHS6.36.061a/ a.gadaḥ phaṇināṁ ghore viṣe rājī.matām api |
AHS6.36.061c/ samāḥ sugandhā.mṛdvīkā.śvetākhyā.gajadantikāḥ || 61 || [Note: AHS6.36.061v/ 36.61cv samāḥ sugandhā mṛdvīkā 36.61dv śvetākhyā gajamṛttikā 36.61dv śvetākhyā gajavṛttikā]
AHS6.36.062a/ ardhāṁśaṁ saurasaṁ pattraṁ kapitthaṁ bilva.dāḍimam |
AHS6.36.062c/ sa.kṣaudro maṇḍali.viṣe viśeṣād a.gado hitaḥ || 62 ||
AHS6.36.063a/ pañca.valka.varā.yaṣṭī.nāgapuṣpailavālukam |
AHS6.36.063c/ jīvakarṣabhakau śītaṁ sitā padmakam utpalam || 63 || [Note: AHS6.36.063v/ 36.63av pañca.valka.balā.yaṣṭī. 36.63av pañca.valka.vacā.yaṣṭī. 36.63cv jīvakarṣabhakośīraṁ]
AHS6.36.064a/ sa.kṣaudro himavān nāma hanti maṇḍalināṁ viṣam |
AHS6.36.064c/ lepāc chvayathu.vīsarpa.visphoṭa.jvara.dāha.hā || 64 ||
AHS6.36.065a/ kāśmaryaṁ vaṭa.śuṅgāni jīvakarṣabhakau sitā |
AHS6.36.065c/ mañjiṣṭhā madhukaṁ ceti daṣṭo maṇḍalinā pibet || 65 || [Note: AHS6.36.065v/ 36.65av kāśmaryaṁ vaṭa.śṛṅgāni]
AHS6.36.066a/ vaṁśa.tvag.bīja.kaṭukā.pāṭalī.bīja.nāgaram |
