AHS6.36.066c/ śirīṣa.bījātiviṣe mūlaṁ gāvedhukaṁ vacā || 66 || [Note: AHS6.36.066v/ 36.66bv .pāṭalā.bīja.nāgaram 36.66dv mūlaṁ gāvedhukaṁ vacām 36.66dv mūlaṁ śrīveṣṭakaṁ vacām]
AHS6.36.067a/ piṣṭo go.vāriṇāṣṭāṅgo hanti gonasa.jaṁ viṣam |
AHS6.36.067c/ kaṭukātiviṣā.kuṣṭha.gṛha.dhūma.hareṇukāḥ || 67 ||
AHS6.36.068a/ sa.kṣaudra.vyoṣa.tagarā ghnanti rājī.matāṁ viṣam |
AHS6.36.068c/ nikhanet kāṇḍa.citrāyā daṁśaṁ yāma.dvayaṁ bhuvi || 68 ||
AHS6.36.069a/ uddhṛtya pracchitaṁ sarpir.dhānya.mṛdbhyāṁ pralepayet |
AHS6.36.069c/ pibet purāṇaṁ ca ghṛtaṁ varā.cūrṇāvacūrṇitam || 69 || [Note: AHS6.36.069v/ 36.69av uddhṛtya prasthitaṁ sarpir. 36.69dv varā.cūrṇa.vicūrṇitam]
[Page 731 ]
AHS6.36.070a/ jīrṇe virikto bhuñjīta yavānnaṁ sūpa.saṁskṛtam |
AHS6.36.070c/ karavīrārka.kusuma.mūla.lāṅgalikā.kaṇāḥ || 70 || [Note: AHS6.36.070v/ 36.70av jīrṇe virikte bhuñjīta 36.70dv .mūlaṁ lāṅgalikā kaṇā]
AHS6.36.071a/ kalkayed āranālena pāṭhā.marica.saṁyutāḥ |
AHS6.36.071c/ eṣa vyantara.daṣṭānām a.gadaḥ sārvakārmikaḥ || 71 ||
AHS6.36.072a/ śirīṣa.puṣpa.sva.rase saptāhvaṁ maricaṁ sitam |
AHS6.36.072c/ bhāvitaṁ sarpa.daṣṭānāṁ pāna.nasyāñjane hitam || 72 || [Note: AHS6.36.072v/ 36.72dv pāna.nasyāñjanair hitam 36.72dv pāne nasye 'ñjane hitam]
AHS6.36.073a/ dvi.palaṁ nata.kuṣṭhābhyāṁ ghṛta.kṣaudraṁ catuḥ.palam |
AHS6.36.073c/ api takṣaka.daṣṭānāṁ pānam etat sukha.pradam || 73 || [Note: AHS6.36.073v/ 36.73bv ghṛta.kṣaudra.catuḥ.palam 36.73cv api tārkṣaka.daṣṭānāṁ]
AHS6.36.074a/ atha darvī.kṛtāṁ vege pūrve visrāvya śoṇitam |
AHS6.36.074c/ a.gadaṁ madhu.sarpirbhyāṁ saṁyuktaṁ tvaritaṁ pibet || 74 ||
AHS6.36.075a/ dvitīye vamanaṁ kṛtvā tad.vad evā.gadaṁ pibet |
AHS6.36.075c/ viṣāpahe prayuñjīta tṛtīye 'ñjana.nāvane || 75 || [Note: AHS6.36.075v/ 36.75cv viṣāpahaiḥ prayuñjīta]
AHS6.36.076a/ pibec caturthe pūrvoktāṁ yavāgūṁ vamane kṛte |
AHS6.36.076c/ ṣaṣṭha.pañcamayoḥ śītair digdhaṁ siktam abhīkṣṇa.śaḥ || 76 ||
AHS6.36.077a/ pāyayed vamanaṁ tīkṣṇaṁ yavāgūṁ ca viṣāpahaiḥ |
AHS6.36.077c/ a.gadaṁ saptame tīkṣṇaṁ yuñjyād añjana.nasyayoḥ || 77 ||
AHS6.36.078a/ kṛtvāvagāḍhaṁ śastreṇa mūrdhni kāka.padaṁ tataḥ |
AHS6.36.078c/ māṁsaṁ sa.rudhiraṁ tasya carma vā tatra nikṣipet || 78 ||
AHS6.36.079a/ tṛtīye vamitaḥ peyāṁ vege maṇḍalināṁ pibet |
AHS6.36.079c/ a.tīkṣṇam a.gadaṁ ṣaṣṭhe gaṇaṁ vā padmakādikam || 79 || [Note: AHS6.36.079v/ 36.79av tṛtīye vāmitaḥ peyāṁ]
[Page 732 ]
AHS6.36.080a/ ādye 'vagāḍhaṁ pracchāya vege daṣṭasya rājilaiḥ |
AHS6.36.080c/ alābunā hared raktaṁ pūrva.vac cā.gadaṁ pibet || 80 ||
AHS6.36.081a/ ṣaṣṭhe 'ñjanaṁ tīkṣṇa.tamam avapīḍaṁ ca yojayet |
AHS6.36.081c/ an.ukteṣu ca vegeṣu kriyāṁ darvī.karoditām || 81 ||
AHS6.36.082a/ garbhiṇī.bāla.vṛddheṣu mṛduṁ vidhyet sirāṁ na ca |
AHS6.36.082c/ tvaṅ manohvā niśe vakraṁ rasaḥ śārdūla.jo nakhaḥ || 82 || [Note: AHS6.36.082v/ 36.82av gurviṇī.bāla.vṛddheṣu 36.82bv mṛdu vidhyet sirāṁ na ca 36.82cv tvaṅ manohvā niśe vaktraṁ]
AHS6.36.083a/ tamālaḥ kesaraṁ śītaṁ pītaṁ taṇḍula.vāriṇā |
AHS6.36.083c/ hanti sarva.viṣāṇy etad vajraṁ vajram ivāsurān || 83 || [Note: AHS6.36.083v/ 36.83cv hanti sarva.viṣāṇy etac 36.83dv chakra.vajram ivāsurān 36.83dv vajri.vajram ivāsurān]
AHS6.36.084a/ bilvasya mūlaṁ surasasya puṣpaṁ phalaṁ karañjasya nataṁ surāhvam |
AHS6.36.084c/ phala.trikaṁ vyoṣa.niśā.dvayaṁ ca bastasya mūtreṇa su.sūkṣma.piṣṭam || 84 || [Note: AHS6.36.084v/ 36.84cv phala.trayaṁ vyoṣa.niśā.dvayaṁ ca]
AHS6.36.085a/ bhujaṅga.lūtondura.vṛścikādyair viṣūcikā.jīrṇa.gara.jvaraiś ca |
AHS6.36.085c/ ārtān narān bhūta.vidharṣitāṁś ca svasthī.karoty añjana.pāna.nasyaiḥ || 85 || [Note: AHS6.36.085v/ 36.85cv ārtān narān bhūta.vimarditāṁś ca]
AHS6.36.086a/ pralepādyaiś ca niḥśeṣaṁ daṁśād apy uddhared viṣam |
AHS6.36.086c/ bhūyo vegāya jāyeta śeṣaṁ dūṣī.viṣāya vā || 86 || [Note: AHS6.36.086v/ 36.86dv śeṣaṁ dūṣī.viṣaṁ yathā 36.86dv śeṣaṁ dūṣī.viṣāya ca]
AHS6.36.087a/ viṣāpāye 'nilaṁ kruddhaṁ snehādibhir upācaret |
AHS6.36.087c/ taila.madya.kulatthāmla.varjyaiḥ pavana.nāśanaiḥ || 87 ||
AHS6.36.088a/ pittaṁ pitta.jvara.haraiḥ kaṣāya.sneha.vastibhiḥ |
AHS6.36.088c/ sa.mākṣikeṇa vargeṇa kapham āragvadhādinā || 88 ||
AHS6.36.089a/ sitā vaigandhiko drākṣā payasyā madhukaṁ madhu |
AHS6.36.089c/ pānaṁ sa.mantra.pūtāmbu prokṣaṇaṁ sāntva.harṣaṇam || 89 || [Note: AHS6.36.089v/ 36.89av sitā vaigandhako drākṣā]
[Page 733 ]
AHS6.36.090a/ sarpāṅgābhihate yuñjyāt tathā śaṅkā.viṣārdite |
AHS6.36.090c/ karketanaṁ marakataṁ vajraṁ vāraṇa.mauktikam || 90 ||
AHS6.36.091a/ vaiḍūryaṁ gardabha.maṇiṁ picukaṁ viṣa.mūṣikām |
AHS6.36.091c/ himavad.giri.sambhūtāṁ somarājīṁ punarnavām || 91 || [Note: AHS6.36.091v/ 36.91av vaiḍūrya.gardabha.maṇiṁ 36.91bv picukaṁ viṣa.dūṣikām]
AHS6.36.092a/ tathā droṇāṁ mahā.droṇāṁ mānasīṁ sarpa.jaṁ maṇim |
AHS6.36.092c/ viṣāṇi viṣa.śānty.arthaṁ vīrya.vanti ca dhārayet || 92 || [Note: AHS6.36.092v/ 36.92av tathā droṇaṁ mahā.droṇaṁ]
AHS6.36.093a/ chattrī jharjhara.pāṇiś ca cared rātrau viśeṣataḥ |
AHS6.36.093c/ tac.chāyā.śabda.vitrastāḥ praṇaśyanti bhujaṅgamāḥ || 93 || [Note: AHS6.36.093v/ 36.93av chattrī jarjara.pāṇiś ca 36.93av chattrī jarjhara.pāṇiś ca 36.93av chattrī jharjara.pāṇiś ca 36.93bv cared rātrau ca sarva.dā 36.93dv vidravanti bhujaṅgamāḥ]
AHS6.36.093+1a/ vāri.guñjā.phalośīraṁ netrayor viṣa.duṣṭayoḥ |
AHS6.36.093+1c/ añjanaṁ vāriṇā piṣṭaṁ gāruḍaṁ garuḍopamam || 93+1 ||

6.37. Chapter 37 :: Atha kīṭalatādiviṣapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 555-560]
AHS6.37.001a/ sarpāṇām eva viṇ.mūtra.śukrāṇḍa.śava.kotha.jāḥ |
AHS6.37.001c/ doṣair vyastaiḥ samastaiś ca yuktāḥ kīṭāś catur.vidhāḥ || 1 ||
AHS6.37.002a/ daṣṭasya kīṭair vāyavyair daṁśas toda.rujolbaṇaḥ |
AHS6.37.002c/ āgneyair alpa.saṁsrāvo dāha.rāga.visarpa.vān || 2 ||
AHS6.37.003a/ pakva.pīlu.phala.prakhyaḥ kharjūra.sadṛśo 'tha.vā |
AHS6.37.003c/ kaphādhikair manda.rujaḥ pakvodumbara.sannibhaḥ || 3 ||
AHS6.37.004a/ srāvāḍhyaḥ sarva.liṅgas tu vivarjyaḥ sānnipātikaiḥ |
AHS6.37.004c/ vegāś ca sarpa.vac chopho vardhiṣṇur visra.rakta.tā || 4 || [Note: AHS6.37.004v/ 37.4bv vivarjyaḥ sānnipātikaḥ]
AHS6.37.005a/ śiro.'kṣi.gauravaṁ mūrchā bhramaḥ śvāso 'ti.vedanā |
AHS6.37.005c/ sarveṣāṁ karṇikā śopho jvaraḥ kaṇḍūr a.rocakaḥ || 5 || [Note: AHS6.37.005v/ 37.5bv bhramaḥ śvāso 'ti.vedanāḥ]
[Page 734 ]
AHS6.37.006a/ vṛścikasya viṣaṁ tīkṣṇam ādau dahati vahni.vat |
AHS6.37.006c/ ūrdhvam ārohati kṣipraṁ daṁśe paścāt tu tiṣṭhati || 6 || [Note: AHS6.37.006v/ 37.6dc daṁśe paścāc ca tiṣṭhati]
AHS6.37.007a/ daṁśaḥ sadyo 'ti.ruk śyāvas tudyate sphuṭatīva ca |
AHS6.37.007c/ te gavādi.śakṛt.kothād digdha.daṣṭādi.kothataḥ || 7 ||
AHS6.37.008a/ sarpa.kothāc ca sambhūtā manda.madhya.mahā.viṣāḥ |
AHS6.37.008c/ mandāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śyāvā rūkṣāḥ karbura.mecakāḥ || 8 || [Note: AHS6.37.008v/ 37.8dv rūkṣa.karbura.mecakāḥ]
AHS6.37.009a/ romaśā bahu.parvāṇo lohitāḥ pāṇḍurodarāḥ |
AHS6.37.009c/ dhūmrodarās tri.parvāṇo madhyās tu kapilāruṇāḥ || 9 ||
AHS6.37.010a/ piśaṅgāḥ śabarāś citrāḥ śoṇitābhā mahā.viṣāḥ |
AHS6.37.010c/ agny.ābhā dvy.eka.parvāṇo raktāsita.sitodarāḥ || 10 ||
AHS6.37.011a/ tair daṣṭaḥ śūna.rasanaḥ stabdha.gātro jvarārditaḥ |
AHS6.37.011c/ khair vamañ choṇitaṁ kṛṣṇam indriyārthān a.saṁvidan || 11 ||
AHS6.37.012a/ svidyan mūrchan viśuṣkāsyo vihvalo vedanāturaḥ |
AHS6.37.012c/ viśīryamāṇa.māṁsaś ca prāya.śo vijahāty asūn || 12 ||
AHS6.37.013a/ ucciṭiṅgas tu vaktreṇa daśaty abhyadhika.vyathaḥ |
AHS6.37.013c/ sādhyato vṛścikāt stambhaṁ śephaso hṛṣṭa.roma.tām || 13 || [Note: AHS6.37.013v/ 37.13av ucciṭaṅgas tu vaktreṇa 37.13cv so 'dhamo vṛścikāt stambhaṁ]
AHS6.37.014a/ karoti sekam aṅgānāṁ daṁśaḥ śītāmbuneva ca |
AHS6.37.014c/ uṣṭra.dhūmaḥ sa evokto rātri.cārāc ca rātrikaḥ || 14 || [Note: AHS6.37.014v/ 37.14bv daṁśe śītāmbuneva ca]
AHS6.37.015a/ vāta.pittottarāḥ kīṭāḥ ślaiṣmikāḥ kaṇabhondurāḥ |
AHS6.37.015c/ prāyo vātolbaṇa.viṣā vṛścikāḥ soṣṭra.dhūmakāḥ || 15 ||
[Page 735 ]
AHS6.37.016a/ yasya yasyaiva doṣasya liṅgādhikyaṁ pratarkayet |
AHS6.37.016c/ tasya tasyauṣadhaiḥ kuryād viparīta.guṇaiḥ kriyām || 16 || [Note: AHS6.37.016v/ 37.16bv liṅgādhikyaṁ pravartayet]
AHS6.37.017a/ hṛt.pīḍordhvānila.stambhaḥ sirāyāmo 'sthi.parva.ruk |
AHS6.37.017c/ ghūrṇanodveṣṭanaṁ gātra.śyāva.tā vātike viṣe || 17 ||
AHS6.37.018a/ sañjñā.nāśoṣṇa.niśvāsau hṛd.dāhaḥ kaṭukāsya.tā |
AHS6.37.018c/ māṁsāvadaraṇaṁ śopho rakta.pītaś ca paittike || 18 || [Note: AHS6.37.018v/ 37.18dv raktaḥ pītaś ca paittike]
AHS6.37.019a/ chardy.a.rocaka.hṛl.lāsa.prasekotkleśa.pīnasaiḥ |
AHS6.37.019c/ sa.śaitya.mukha.mādhuryair vidyāc chleṣmādhikaṁ viṣam || 19 ||
AHS6.37.020a/ piṇyākena vraṇālepas tailābhyaṅgaś ca vātike |
AHS6.37.020c/ svedo nāḍī.pulākādyair bṛṁhaṇaś ca vidhir hitaḥ || 20 ||
AHS6.37.021a/ paittikaṁ stambhayet sekaiḥ pradehaiś cāti.śītalaiḥ |
AHS6.37.021c/ lekhana.cchedana.sveda.vamanaiḥ ślaiṣmikaṁ jayet || 21 ||
AHS6.37.022a/ kīṭānāṁ tri.prakārāṇāṁ traividhyena kriyā hitā |
AHS6.37.022c/ svedālepana.sekāṁs tu koṣṇān prāyo 'vacārayet || 22 || [Note: AHS6.37.022v/ 37.22bv traividhyena kriyā hitāḥ 37.22dv kavoṣṇān pravicārayet]
AHS6.37.023a/ anya.tra mūrchitād daṁśa.pākataḥ kothato 'tha.vā |
AHS6.37.023c/ nṛ.keśāḥ sarṣapāḥ pītā guḍo jīrṇaś ca dhūpanam || 23 ||
AHS6.37.024a/ viṣa.daṁśasya sarvasya kāśyapaḥ param abravīt |
AHS6.37.024c/ viṣa.ghnaṁ ca vidhiṁ sarvaṁ kuryāt saṁśodhanāni ca || 24 || [Note: AHS6.37.024v/ 37.24bv kaśyapaḥ param abravīt]
AHS6.37.025a/ sādhayet sarpa.vad daṣṭān viṣograiḥ kīṭa.vṛścikaiḥ |
AHS6.37.025c/ taṇḍulīyaka.tulyāṁśāṁ trivṛtāṁ sarpiṣā pibet || 25 ||
[Page 736 ]
AHS6.37.026a/ yāti kīṭa.viṣaiḥ kampaṁ na kailāsa ivānilaiḥ |
AHS6.37.026c/ kṣīri.vṛkṣa.tvag.ālepaḥ śuddhe kīṭa.viṣāpahaḥ || 26 ||
AHS6.37.027a/ muktā.lepo varaḥ śopha.toda.dāha.jvara.praṇut |
AHS6.37.027c/ vacā.hiṅgu.viḍaṅgāni saindhavaṁ gaja.pippalī || 27 ||
AHS6.37.028a/ pāṭhā prativiṣā vyoṣaṁ kāśyapena vinirmitam |
AHS6.37.028c/ daśāṅgam a.gadaṁ pītvā sarva.kīṭa.viṣaṁ jayet || 28 ||
AHS6.37.029a/ sadyo vṛścika.jaṁ daṁśaṁ cakra.tailena secayet |
AHS6.37.029c/ vidārigandhā.siddhena kavoṣṇenetareṇa vā || 29 ||
AHS6.37.030a/ lavaṇottama.yuktena sarpiṣā vā punaḥ punaḥ |
AHS6.37.030c/ siñcet koṣṇāranālena sa.kṣīra.lavaṇena vā || 30 || [Note: AHS6.37.030v/ 37.30dv sa.kṣāra.lavaṇena vā]
AHS6.37.031a/ upanāho ghṛte bhṛṣṭaḥ kalko 'jājyāḥ sa.saindhavaḥ |
AHS6.37.031c/ ādaṁśaṁ sveditaṁ cūrṇaiḥ pracchāya pratisārayet || 31 || [Note: AHS6.37.031v/ 37.31av upanāhe ghṛta.bhṛṣṭaḥ 37.31av upanāho ghṛta.bhṛṣṭaḥ]
AHS6.37.032a/ rajanī.saindhava.vyoṣa.śirīṣa.phala.puṣpa.jaiḥ |
AHS6.37.032c/ mātuluṅgāmla.go.mūtra.piṣṭaṁ ca surasāgra.jam || 32 || [Note: AHS6.37.032v/ 37.32cv mātuluṅgaṁ tu go.mūtra. 37.32dv .piṣṭaḥ sa.surasārjakaḥ]
AHS6.37.033a/ lepaḥ sukhoṣṇaś ca hitaḥ piṇyāko go.mayo 'pi vā |
AHS6.37.033c/ pāne sarpir madhu.yutaṁ kṣīraṁ vā bhūri.śarkaram || 33 || [Note: AHS6.37.033v/ 37.33bv piṇyāko go.mayena vā]
AHS6.37.034a/ pārāvata.śakṛt pathyā tagaraṁ viśva.bheṣajam |
AHS6.37.034c/ bījapūra.rasonmiśraḥ paramo vṛścikā.gadaḥ || 34 || [Note: AHS6.37.034v/ 37.34dv paramo vṛścike '.gadaḥ 37.34dv paramo vṛściko '.gadaḥ]
AHS6.37.035a/ sa.śaivaloṣṭra.daṁṣṭrā ca hanti vṛścika.jaṁ viṣam |
AHS6.37.035c/ hiṅgunā haritālena mātuluṅga.rasena ca || 35 || [Note: AHS6.37.035v/ 37.35av sa.saindhavoṣṭra.daṁṣṭrā ca 37.35dv mātuluṅga.rasena vā]
[Page 737 ]
AHS6.37.036a/ lepāñjanābhyāṁ guṭikā paramaṁ vṛścikāpahā |
AHS6.37.036c/ karañjārjuna.śelūnāṁ kaṭabhyāṁ kuṭajasya ca || 36 ||
AHS6.37.037a/ śirīṣasya ca puṣpāṇi mastunā daṁśa.lepanam |
AHS6.37.037c/ yo muhyati praśvasiti pralapaty ugra.vedanaḥ || 37 ||
AHS6.37.038a/ tasya pathyā.niśā.kṛṣṇā.mañjiṣṭhātiviṣoṣaṇam |
AHS6.37.038c/ sālābu.vṛntaṁ vārtāka.rasa.piṣṭaṁ pralepanam || 38 || [Note: AHS6.37.038v/ 37.38cv śalāṭu.vṛntaṁ vārtāka.]
AHS6.37.039a/ sarva.tra cogrāli.viṣe pāyayed dadhi.sarpiṣī || 39ab ||
AHS6.37.039c/ vidhyet sirāṁ vidadhyāc ca vamanāñjana.nāvanam || 39cd ||
AHS6.37.039e/ uṣṇa.snigdhāmla.madhuraṁ bhojanaṁ cānilāpaham || 39ef ||
AHS6.37.040a/ nāgaraṁ gṛha.kapota.purīṣaṁ bījapūraka.raso haritālam |
AHS6.37.040c/ saindhavaṁ ca vinihanty a.gado 'yaṁ lepato 'li.kula.jaṁ viṣam āśu || 40 ||
AHS6.37.041a/ ante vṛścika.daṣṭānāṁ samudīrṇe bhṛśaṁ viṣe |
AHS6.37.041c/ viṣeṇālepayed daṁśam ucciṭiṅge 'py ayaṁ vidhiḥ || 41 ||
AHS6.37.042a/ nāga.purīṣa.cchattraṁ rohiṣa.mūlaṁ ca śelu.toyena |
AHS6.37.042c/ kuryād guṭikāṁ lepād iyam ali.viṣa.nāśanī śreṣṭhā || 42 ||
AHS6.37.043a/ arkasya dugdhena śirīṣa.bījaṁ trir bhāvitaṁ pippali.cūrṇa.miśram |
AHS6.37.043c/ eṣo '.gado hanti viṣāṇi kīṭa.bhujaṅga.lūtondura.vṛścikānām || 43 ||
AHS6.37.044a/ śirīṣa.puṣpaṁ sa.karañja.bījaṁ kāśmīra.jaṁ kuṣṭha.manaḥśile ca |
AHS6.37.044c/ eṣo '.gado rātrika.vṛścikānāṁ saṅkrānti.kārī kathito jinena || 44 || [Note: AHS6.37.044v/ 37.44av śirīṣa.bījaṁ sa.karañja.bījaṁ]
AHS6.37.045a/ kīṭebhyo dāruṇa.tarā lūṭāḥ ṣo.ḍaśa tā jaguḥ |
AHS6.37.045c/ aṣṭā.viṁśatir ity eke tato 'py anye tu bhūyasīḥ || 45 ||
[Page 738 ]
AHS6.37.046a/ sahasra.raśmy.anucarā vadanty anye sahasra.śaḥ |
AHS6.37.046c/ bahūpadrava.rūpā tu lūtaikaiva viṣātmikā || 46 ||
AHS6.37.047a/ rūpāṇi nāmatas tasyā dur.jñeyāny ati.saṅkarāt |
AHS6.37.047c/ nāsti sthāna.vyavasthā ca doṣato 'taḥ pracakṣate || 47 ||
AHS6.37.048a/ kṛcchra.sādhyā pṛthag.doṣair a.sādhyā nicayena sā |
AHS6.37.048c/ tad.daṁśaḥ paittiko dāha.tṛṭ.sphoṭa.jvara.moha.vān || 48 ||
AHS6.37.049a/ bhṛśoṣṁā rakta.pītābhaḥ kledī drākṣā.phalopamaḥ |
AHS6.37.049c/ ślaiṣmikaḥ kaṭhinaḥ pāṇḍuḥ parūṣaka.phalākṛtiḥ || 49 || [Note: AHS6.37.049v/ 37.49av bhṛśoṣṁa.rakta.pītābhaḥ]
AHS6.37.050a/ nidrāṁ śīta.jvaraṁ kāsaṁ kaṇḍūṁ ca kurute bhṛśam |
AHS6.37.050c/ vātikaḥ paruṣaḥ śyāvaḥ parva.bheda.jvara.pradaḥ || 50 ||
AHS6.37.051a/ tad.vibhāgaṁ yathā.svaṁ ca doṣa.liṅgair vibhāvayet |
AHS6.37.051c/ a.sādhyāyāṁ tu hṛn.moha.śvāsa.hidhmā.śiro.grahāḥ || 51 || [Note: AHS6.37.051v/ 37.51dv .śvāsa.hidhmā.śiro.rujāḥ]
AHS6.37.052a/ śveta.pītāsitā.raktāḥ piṭikāḥ śvayathūdbhavaḥ |
AHS6.37.052c/ vepathur vamathur dāhas tṛḍ āndhyaṁ vakra.nāsa.tā || 52 || [Note: AHS6.37.052v/ 37.52av śveta.pītāsitā.rakta. 37.52bv .piṭikā.śvayathūdbhavaḥ 37.52dv tṛḍ āndhyaṁ vakra.nāsikā]
AHS6.37.053a/ śyāvauṣṭha.vaktra.danta.tvaṁ pṛṣṭha.grīvāvabhañjanam |
AHS6.37.053c/ pakva.jambū.sa.varṇaṁ ca daṁśāt sravati śoṇitam || 53 ||
AHS6.37.054a/ sarvāpi sarva.jā prāyo vyapadeśas tu bhūyasā |
AHS6.37.054c/ tīkṣṇa.madhyāvara.tvena sā tri.dhā hanty upekṣitā || 54 || [Note: AHS6.37.054v/ 37.54dv sā tri.dhā hanty upekṣayā]
AHS6.37.055a/ saptāhena daśāhena pakṣeṇa ca paraṁ kramāt |
AHS6.37.055c/ lūtā.daṁśaś ca sarvo 'pi dadrū.maṇḍala.sannibhaḥ || 55 || [Note: AHS6.37.055v/ 37.55cv lūtā.daṁśas tu sarvo 'pi]
[Page 739 ]
AHS6.37.056a/ sito 'sito 'ruṇaḥ pītaḥ śyāvo vā mṛdur unnataḥ |
AHS6.37.056c/ madhye kṛṣṇo 'tha.vā śyāvaḥ pary.ante jālakāvṛtaḥ || 56 || [Note: AHS6.37.056v/ 37.56av sitāsito 'ruṇaḥ pītaḥ]
AHS6.37.057a/ visarpa.vāṁś chopha.yutas tapyate bahu.vedanaḥ |
AHS6.37.057c/ jvarāśu.pāka.vikleda.kothāvadaraṇānvitaḥ || 57 ||
AHS6.37.058a/ kledena yat spṛśaty aṅgaṁ tatrāpi kurute vraṇam |
AHS6.37.058c/ śvāsa.daṁṣṭrā.śakṛn.mūtra.śukra.lālā.nakhārtavaiḥ || 58 ||
AHS6.37.059a/ aṣṭābhir udvamaty eṣā viṣaṁ vaktrād viśeṣataḥ |
AHS6.37.059c/ lūtā nābher daśaty ūrdhvam ūrdhvaṁ cādhaś ca kīṭakāḥ || 59 || [Note: AHS6.37.059v/ 37.59av aṣṭābhir udvamanty etā 37.59bv viṣaṁ vaktrair viśeṣataḥ 37.59cv lūtā nābher daśanty ūrdhvam 37.59dv ūrdhvaṁ vādhaś ca kīṭakāḥ 37.59dv ūrdhvaṁ cādhaś ca kīṭakaḥ 37.59dv adhaś ca viṣa.kīṭakāḥ]
AHS6.37.060a/ tad.dūṣitaṁ ca vastrādi dehe pṛktaṁ vikāra.kṛt |
AHS6.37.060c/ dinārdhaṁ lakṣyate naiva daṁśo lūtā.viṣodbhavaḥ || 60 ||
AHS6.37.061a/ sūcī.vyadha.vad ābhāti tato 'sau prathame 'hani |
AHS6.37.061c/ a.vyakta.varṇaḥ pracalaḥ kiñ.cit.kaṇḍū.rujānvitaḥ || 61 || [Note: AHS6.37.061v/ 37.61av sūcī.viddha.vad ābhāti]
AHS6.37.062a/ dvitīye 'bhyunnato 'nteṣu piṭikair iva vācitaḥ |
AHS6.37.062c/ vyakta.varṇo nato madhye kaṇḍū.mān granthi.sannibhaḥ || 62 || [Note: AHS6.37.062v/ 37.62av dvitīye 'ty.unnato 'nteṣu 37.62bv piṭikair iva cācitaḥ]
AHS6.37.063a/ tṛtīye sa.jvaro roma.harṣa.kṛd rakta.maṇḍalaḥ |
AHS6.37.063c/ śarāva.rūpas todāḍhyo roma.kūpeṣu sāsravaḥ || 63 || [Note: AHS6.37.063v/ 37.63dv roma.kūpeṣu sa.sravaḥ]
AHS6.37.064a/ mahāṁś caturthe śvayathus tāpa.śvāsa.bhrama.pradaḥ |
AHS6.37.064c/ vikārān kurute tāṁs tān pañcame viṣa.kopa.jān || 64 ||
AHS6.37.065a/ ṣaṣṭhe vyāpnoti marmāṇi saptame hanti jīvitam |
AHS6.37.065c/ iti tīkṣṇaṁ viṣaṁ madhyaṁ hīnaṁ ca vibhajed ataḥ || 65 || [Note: AHS6.37.065v/ 37.65av ṣaṣṭhe prāpnoti marmāṇi]
[Page 740 ]
AHS6.37.066a/ eka.viṁśati.rātreṇa viṣaṁ śāmyati sarva.thā |
AHS6.37.066c/ athāśu lūtā.daṣṭasya śastreṇādaṁśam uddharet || 66 || [Note: AHS6.37.066v/ 37.66dv daṁśaṁ śastreṇa coddharet]
AHS6.37.067a/ dahec ca jāmbavauṣṭhādyair na tu pittottaraṁ dahet |
AHS6.37.067c/ karkaśaṁ bhinna.romāṇaṁ marma.sandhy.ādi.saṁśritam || 67 ||
AHS6.37.068a/ prasṛtaṁ sarvato daṁśaṁ na cchindīta dahen na ca |
AHS6.37.068c/ lepayed dagdham a.gadair madhu.saindhava.saṁyutaiḥ || 68 || [Note: AHS6.37.068v/ 37.68bv na cchindīta dahen na vā]
AHS6.37.069a/ su.śītaiḥ secayec cānu kaṣāyaiḥ kṣīri.vṛkṣa.jaiḥ |
AHS6.37.069c/ sarvato 'pahared raktaṁ śṛṅgādyaiḥ sirayāpi vā || 69 ||
AHS6.37.070a/ seka.lepās tataḥ śītā bodhi.śleṣmātakākṣakaiḥ |
AHS6.37.070c/ phalinī.dvi.niśā.kṣaudra.sarpirbhiḥ padmakāhvayaḥ || 70 || [Note: AHS6.37.070v/ 37.70av sekālepās tataḥ śītā 37.70bv bodhi.śleṣmātakākṣikaiḥ 37.70bv bodhi.śleṣmātakākṣa.jaiḥ 37.70cv phalinī.dvi.niśā.śreṣṭhā.]
AHS6.37.071a/ a.śeṣa.lūtā.kīṭānām a.gadaḥ sārvakārmikaḥ |
AHS6.37.071c/ haridrā.dvaya.pattaṅga.mañjiṣṭhā.nata.kesaraiḥ || 71 ||
AHS6.37.072a/ sa.kṣaudra.sarpiḥ pūrvasmād adhikaś campakāhvayaḥ |
AHS6.37.072c/ tad.vad go.maya.niṣpīḍa.śarkarā.ghṛta.mākṣikaiḥ || 72 || [Note: AHS6.37.072v/ 37.72cv tad.vad go.maya.niṣpīḍā.]
AHS6.37.073a/ apāmārga.mano'hvāla.dārvī.dhyāmaka.gairikaiḥ |
AHS6.37.073c/ natailā.kuṣṭha.marica.yaṣṭy.āhva.ghṛta.mākṣikaiḥ || 73 ||
AHS6.37.074a/ a.gado mandaro nāma tathānyo gandha.mādanaḥ |
AHS6.37.074c/ nata.lodhra.vacā.kaṭvī.pāṭhailā.pattra.kuṅkumaiḥ || 74 ||
AHS6.37.074+1a/ mañjiṣṭhā.śleṣmātaka.rajanī.suvahā.śirīṣa.pālindyaḥ |
AHS6.37.074+1c/ sa.sindhuvārā viṣaṁ ghnanti sailā.candana.kanakāḥ || 74+1 ||
[Page 741 ]
AHS6.37.075a/ viṣa.ghnaṁ bahu.doṣeṣu prayuñjīta viśodhanam |
AHS6.37.075c/ yaṣṭy.āhva.madanāṅkolla.jālinī.sindhuvārikāḥ || 75 || [Note: AHS6.37.075v/ 37.75av viṣa.ghnair bahu.doṣeṣu 37.75dv .jālinī.sindhuvāritān 37.75dv .jālinī.sindhuvāritam]
AHS6.37.076a/ kaphe jyeṣṭhāmbunā pītvā viṣam āśu samudvamet |
AHS6.37.076c/ śirīṣa.pattra.tvaṅ.mūla.phalaṁ vāṅkolla.mūla.vat || 76 || [Note: AHS6.37.076v/ 37.76dv .phalaṁ cāṅkolla.mūla.vat]
AHS6.37.077a/ virecayec ca tri.phalā.nīlinī.trivṛtādibhiḥ |
AHS6.37.077c/ nivṛtte dāha.śophādau karṇikāṁ pātayed vraṇāt || 77 || [Note: AHS6.37.077v/ 37.77bv .phalinī.trivṛtādibhiḥ]
AHS6.37.078a/ kusumbha.puṣpaṁ go.dantaḥ svarṇakṣīrī kapota.viṭ |
AHS6.37.078c/ trivṛtā saindhavaṁ dantī karṇikā.pātanaṁ tathā || 78 || [Note: AHS6.37.078v/ 37.78av kusumbha.puṣpa.go.danta. 37.78bv .svarṇakṣīrī.kapota.viṭ 37.78dv karṇikā.pātanaṁ param]
AHS6.37.079a/ mūlam uttaravāruṇyā vaṁśa.nirlekha.saṁyutam |
AHS6.37.079c/ tad.vac ca saindhavaṁ kuṣṭhaṁ dantī kaṭuka.daugdhikam || 79 ||
AHS6.37.080a/ rāja.kośātakī.mūlaṁ kiṇvo vā mathitodbhavaḥ |
AHS6.37.080c/ karṇikā.pāta.samaye bṛṁhayec ca viṣāpahaiḥ || 80 || [Note: AHS6.37.080v/ 37.80bv kiṭṭo vā mathitodbhavaḥ 37.80bv kiṇo vā mathitodbhavaḥ 37.80dv bṛṁhayeta viṣāpahaiḥ]
AHS6.37.081a/ sneha.kāryam a.śeṣaṁ ca sarpiṣaiva samācaret |
AHS6.37.081c/ viṣasya vṛddhaye tailam agner iva tṛṇolupam || 81 || [Note: AHS6.37.081v/ 37.81cv viṣam āvardhayet tailam 37.81dv agner iva tṛṇolapam]
AHS6.37.082a/ hrīvera.vaikaṅkata.gopakanyā.mustā.śamī.candana.ṭuṇṭukāni |
AHS6.37.082c/ śaivāla.nīlotpala.vakra.yaṣṭī.tvaṅ.nākulī.padmaka.rāṭha.madhyam || 82 || [Note: AHS6.37.082v/ 37.82bv .mustā.śamī.candana.tindukāni]
AHS6.37.083a/ rajanī.ghana.sarpalocanā.kaṇa.śuṇṭhī.kaṇa.mūla.citrakāḥ |
AHS6.37.083c/ varuṇāguru.bilva.pāṭalī.picumandāmaya.śelu.kesaram || 83 || [Note: AHS6.37.083v/ 37.83cv varuṇāguru.bilva.pāṭalā.]
AHS6.37.084a/ bilva.candana.natotpala.śuṇṭhī.pippalī.nicula.vetasa.kuṣṭham |
AHS6.37.084c/ śukti.śāka.vara.pāṭali.bhārgī.sindhuvāra.karaghāṭa.varāṅgam || 84 || [Note: AHS6.37.084v/ 37.84cv śukti.śābaraka.pāṭali.bhārgī. 37.84dv .sindhuvāra.karahāṭa.varāṅgam]
[Page 742 ]
AHS6.37.085a/ pitta.kaphānila.lūtāḥ pānāñjana.nasya.lepa.sekena |
AHS6.37.085c/ a.gada.varā vṛtta.sthāḥ ku.gatīr iva vārayanty ete || 85 || [Note: AHS6.37.085v/ 37.85dv ku.gatīr iva dārayanty ete 37.85dv ku.matīr iva dārayanty ete 37.85dv ku.matīr iva vārayanty ete]
AHS6.37.086a/ lodhraṁ sevyaṁ padmakaṁ padma.reṇuḥ kālīyākhyaṁ candanaṁ yac ca raktam |
AHS6.37.086c/ kāntā.puṣpaṁ dugdhinīkā mṛṇālaṁ lūtāḥ sarvā ghnanti sarva.kriyābhiḥ || 86 ||

6.38. Chapter 38 :: Athamūṣikālarkaviṣapratiṣedhādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 560-562]
AHS6.38.001a/ lālanaś capalaḥ putro hasiraś cikkiro 'jiraḥ |
AHS6.38.001c/ kaṣāya.dantaḥ kulakaḥ kokilaḥ kapilo 'sitaḥ || 1 || [Note: AHS6.38.001v/ 38.1bv hasiraś cikriro 'janaḥ 38.1bv hasiraś cikkiro 'jaraḥ 38.1bv hasiraś cikilo 'jiraḥ]
AHS6.38.002a/ aruṇaḥ śabaraḥ śvetaḥ kapotaḥ palitonduraḥ |
AHS6.38.002c/ chucchundaro rasālākhyo daśāṣṭau ceti mūṣikāḥ || 2 || [Note: AHS6.38.002v/ 38.2bv kapotaḥ palitonduruḥ 38.2cv chucchundaro balāsākhyo 38.2cv chucchundaro rasālākṣo] [Note: AHS6.38.002v/ 38.2dv daśa cāṣṭau ca mūṣikāḥ]
AHS6.38.003a/ śukraṁ patati yatraiṣāṁ śukra.digdhaiḥ spṛśanti vā |
AHS6.38.003c/ yad aṅgam aṅgais tatrāsre dūṣite pāṇḍu.tāṁ gate || 3 ||
AHS6.38.004a/ granthayaḥ śvayathuḥ koṭho maṇḍalāni bhramo '.ruciḥ |
AHS6.38.004c/ śīta.jvaro 'ti.ruk sādo vepathuḥ parva.bhedanam || 4 || [Note: AHS6.38.004v/ 38.4av granthayaḥ śvayathuḥ kotho]
AHS6.38.005a/ roma.harṣaḥ srutir mūrchā dīrgha.kālānubandhanam |
AHS6.38.005c/ śleṣmānubaddha.bahv.ākhu.potaka.cchardanaṁ sa.tṛṭ || 5 || [Note: AHS6.38.005v/ 38.5cv śleṣmānubandha.bahv.ākhu. 38.5cv śleṣmānuviddha.bahv.ākhu. 38.5dv .potaka.cchardanaṁ sakṛt]
AHS6.38.006a/ vyavāyy ākhu.viṣaṁ kṛcchraṁ bhūyo bhūyaś ca kupyati |
AHS6.38.006c/ mūrchāṅga.śopha.vaivarṇya.kleda.śabdā.śruti.jvarāḥ || 6 ||
AHS6.38.007a/ śiro.guru.tvaṁ lālāsṛk.chardiś cā.sādhya.lakṣaṇam |
AHS6.38.007c/ śūna.vastiṁ vi.varṇauṣṭham ākhv.ābhair granthibhiś citam || 7 ||
AHS6.38.008a/ chucchundara.sa.gandhaṁ ca varjayed ākhu.dūṣitam |
AHS6.38.008c/ śunaḥ śleṣmolbaṇā doṣāḥ sañjñāṁ sañjñā.vahāśritāḥ || 8 ||
[Page 743 ]
AHS6.38.009a/ muṣṇantaḥ kurvate kṣobhaṁ dhātūnām ati.dāruṇam |
AHS6.38.009c/ lālā.vān andha.badhiraḥ sarvataḥ so 'bhidhāvati || 9 ||
AHS6.38.010a/ srasta.puccha.hanu.skandhaḥ śiro.duḥkhī natānanaḥ |
AHS6.38.010c/ daṁśas tena vidaṣṭasya suptaṁ kṛṣṇaṁ kṣaraty asṛk || 10 ||
AHS6.38.011a/ hṛc.chiro.rug.jvara.stambha.tṛṣṇā.mūrchodbhavo 'nu ca |
AHS6.38.011c/ anenānye 'pi boddhavyā vyālā daṁṣṭrā.prahāriṇaḥ || 11 || [Note: AHS6.38.011v/ 38.11av hṛc.chiro.rug.jvara.stambhas 38.11av hṛc.chiro.rug jvaraḥ stambhas 38.11bv tṛṣṇā.mūrchodbhavo 'nu ca 38.11bv tṛṣṇā mūrchodbhavo 'nu ca 38.11cv vyāla.daṁṣṭrā.prahāriṇaḥ]
AHS6.38.012a/ śṛgālāśvatarāśvarkṣa.dvīpi.vyāghra.vṛkādayaḥ |
AHS6.38.012c/ kaṇḍū.nistoda.vaivarṇya.supti.kleda.jvara.bhramāḥ || 12 ||
AHS6.38.013a/ vidāha.rāga.ruk.pāka.śopha.granthi.vikuñcanam |
AHS6.38.013c/ daṁśāvadaraṇaṁ sphoṭāḥ karṇikā maṇḍalāni ca || 13 ||
AHS6.38.014a/ sarva.tra sa.viṣe liṅgaṁ viparītaṁ tu nir.viṣe |
AHS6.38.014c/ daṣṭo yena tu tac.ceṣṭā.rutaṁ kurvan vinaśyati || 14 ||
AHS6.38.015a/ paśyaṁs tam eva cā.kasmād ādarśa.salilādiṣu |
AHS6.38.015c/ yo 'dbhyas trasyed a.daṣṭo 'pi śabda.saṁsparśa.darśanaiḥ || 15 || [Note: AHS6.38.015v/ 38.15dv śabda.sparśa.nidarśanaiḥ]
AHS6.38.016a/ jala.santrāsa.nāmānaṁ daṣṭaṁ tam api varjayet |
AHS6.38.016c/ ākhunā daṣṭa.mātrasya daṁśaṁ kāṇḍena dāhayet || 16 ||
AHS6.38.017a/ darpaṇenātha.vā tīvra.rujā syāt karṇikānya.thā |
AHS6.38.017c/ dagdhaṁ visrāvayed daṁśaṁ pracchitaṁ ca pralepayet || 17 || [Note: AHS6.38.017v/ 38.17cv dagdhvā visrāvayed daṁśaṁ 38.17dv pracchinnaṁ ca pralepayet]
AHS6.38.018a/ śirīṣa.rajanī.vakra.kuṅkumāmṛtavallibhiḥ |
AHS6.38.018c/ agāra.dhūma.mañjiṣṭhā.rajanī.lavaṇottamaiḥ || 18 ||
[Page 744 ]
AHS6.38.019a/ lepo jayaty ākhu.viṣaṁ karṇikāyāś ca pātanaḥ |
AHS6.38.019c/ tato 'mlaiḥ kṣālayitvānu toyair anu ca lepayet || 19 || [Note: AHS6.38.019v/ 38.19dv piṣṭair anu ca lepayet]
AHS6.38.020a/ pālindī.śveta.kaṭabhī.bilva.mūla.guḍūcibhiḥ |
AHS6.38.020c/ anyaiś ca viṣa.śopha.ghnaiḥ sirāṁ vā mokṣayed drutam || 20 || [Note: AHS6.38.020v/ 38.20dv sirāṁ vā mocayed drutam]
AHS6.38.021a/ chardanaṁ nīlinī.kvāthaiḥ śukākhyāṅkollayor api |
AHS6.38.021c/ kośātakyāḥ śukākhyāyāḥ phalaṁ jīmūtakasya ca || 21 || [Note: AHS6.38.021v/ 38.21cv kośavatyāḥ śukākhyāyāḥ]
AHS6.38.022a/ madanasya ca sañcūrṇya dadhnā pītvā viṣaṁ vamet |
AHS6.38.022c/ vacā.madana.jīmūta.kuṣṭhaṁ vā mūtra.peṣitam || 22 ||
AHS6.38.023a/ pūrva.kalpena pātavyaṁ sarvondura.viṣāpaham |
AHS6.38.023c/ virecanaṁ trivṛn.nīlī.tri.phalā.kalka iṣyate || 23 || [Note: AHS6.38.023v/ 38.23cv virecane trivṛn.nīlī.]
AHS6.38.024a/ śiro.virecane sāraḥ śirīṣasya phalāni ca |
AHS6.38.024c/ añjanaṁ go.maya.raso vyoṣa.sūkṣma.rajo.'nvitaḥ || 24 || [Note: AHS6.38.024v/ 38.24cv añjane go.maya.raso 38.24dv vyoṣa.sūkṣma.rajo.'nvitaḥ]
AHS6.38.025a/ kapittha.go.maya.raso madhu.mān avalehanam |
AHS6.38.025c/ taṇḍulīyaka.mūlena siddhaṁ pāne hitaṁ ghṛtam || 25 || [Note: AHS6.38.025v/ 38.25bv madhu.mān avalehane]
AHS6.38.026a/ dvi.niśā.kaṭabhī.raktā.yaṣṭy.āhvair vāmṛtānvitaiḥ |
AHS6.38.026c/ āsphota.mūla.siddhaṁ vā pañca.kāpittham eva vā || 26 ||
AHS6.38.027a/ sindhuvāraṁ nataṁ śigru.bilva.mūlaṁ punarnavā |
AHS6.38.027c/ vacā.śvadaṁṣṭrā.jīmūtam eṣāṁ kvāthaṁ sa.mākṣikam || 27 || [Note: AHS6.38.027v/ 38.27av sindhuvāra.nataṁ śigru. 38.27bv .bilva.mūlaṁ punarnavam]
AHS6.38.028a/ pibec chāly.odanaṁ dadhnā bhuñjāno mūṣikārditaḥ |
AHS6.38.028c/ takreṇa śarapuṅkhāyā bījaṁ sañcūrṇya vā pibet || 28 ||
[Page 745 ]
AHS6.38.029a/ aṅkolla.mūla.kalko vā basta.mūtreṇa kalkitaḥ |
AHS6.38.029c/ pānālepanayor yuktaḥ sarvākhu.viṣa.nāśanaḥ || 29 || [Note: AHS6.38.029v/ 38.29cv pāna.lepanayor yuktaḥ]
AHS6.38.030a/ kapittha.madhya.tilaka.tilāṅkolla.jaṭāḥ pibet |
AHS6.38.030c/ gavāṁ mūtreṇa payasā mañjarīṁ tilakasya vā || 30 || [Note: AHS6.38.030v/ 38.30av kapittha.madhya.tilakaṁ 38.30av kapittha.madhyaṁ tilakaṁ 38.30bv .tilāṅkolla.jaṭāṁ pibet 38.30bv tilāṅkolla.jaṭāḥ pibet 38.30dv mañjarīs tilakasya vā]
AHS6.38.031a/ atha.vā sairyakān mūlaṁ sa.kṣaudraṁ taṇḍulāmbunā |
AHS6.38.031c/ kaṭukālābu.vinyastaṁ pītaṁ vāmbu niśoṣitam || 31 || [Note: AHS6.38.031v/ 38.31dv pibed vāmbu niśoṣitam 38.31dv pibec cāmbu niśoṣitam]
AHS6.38.032a/ sindhuvārasya mūlāni biḍālāsthi viṣaṁ natam |
AHS6.38.032c/ jala.piṣṭo '.gado hanti nasyādyair ākhu.jaṁ viṣam || 32 ||
AHS6.38.033a/ sa.śeṣaṁ mūṣika.viṣaṁ prakupyaty abhra.darśane |
AHS6.38.033c/ yathā.yathaṁ vā kāleṣu doṣāṇāṁ vṛddhi.hetuṣu || 33 || [Note: AHS6.38.033v/ 38.33ac sa.śeṣaṁ mūṣaka.viṣaṁ]
AHS6.38.034a/ tatra sarve yathāvasthaṁ prayojyāḥ syur upakramāḥ |
AHS6.38.034c/ yathā.svaṁ ye ca nirdiṣṭās tathā dūṣī.viṣāpahāḥ || 34 ||
AHS6.38.035a/ daṁśaṁ tv alarka.daṣṭasya dagdham uṣṇena sarpiṣā |
AHS6.38.035c/ pradihyād a.gadais tais taiḥ purāṇaṁ ca ghṛtaṁ pibet || 35 ||
AHS6.38.036a/ arka.kṣīra.yutaṁ cāsya yojyam āśu virecanam |
AHS6.38.036c/ aṅkollottara.mūlāmbu tri.palaṁ sa.haviḥ.palam || 36 || [Note: AHS6.38.036v/ 38.36ac arka.kṣīra.yutaṁ vāsya]
AHS6.38.037a/ pibet sa.dhattūra.phalāṁ śvetāṁ vāpi punarnavām |
AHS6.38.037c/ aikadhyaṁ palalaṁ tailaṁ rūpikāyāḥ payo guḍaḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS6.38.037v/ 38.37bv śvetāṁ cāpi punarnavām 38.37dv rūyikāyāḥ payo guḍaḥ 38.37dv rūṣikāyāḥ payo guḍaḥ]
AHS6.38.038a/ bhinatti viṣam ālarkaṁ ghana.vṛndam ivānilaḥ |
AHS6.38.038c/ sa.mantraṁ sauṣadhī.ratnaṁ snapanaṁ ca prayojayet || 38 ||
[Page 746 ]
AHS6.38.039a/ catuṣ.pādbhir dvi.pādbhir vā nakha.danta.parikṣatam |
AHS6.38.039c/ śūyate pacyate rāga.jvara.srāva.rujānvitam || 39 || [Note: AHS6.38.039v/ 38.39dv .jvarāsrāva.rujānvitam]
AHS6.38.040a/ somavalko 'śvakarṇaś ca gojihvā haṁsapādikā |
AHS6.38.040c/ rajanyau gairikaṁ lepo nakha.danta.viṣāpahaḥ || 40 ||

6.39. Chapter 39 :: Atharasāyanādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 562-574]
AHS6.39.001a/ dīrgham āyuḥ smṛtiṁ medhām ārogyaṁ taruṇaṁ vayaḥ |
AHS6.39.001c/ prabhā.varṇa.svaraudāryaṁ dehendriya.balodayam || 1 ||
AHS6.39.002a/ vāk.siddhiṁ vṛṣa.tāṁ kāntim avāpnoti rasāyanāt |
AHS6.39.002c/ lābhopāyo hi śastānāṁ rasādīnāṁ rasāyanam || 2 || [Note: AHS6.39.002v/ 39.2cv lābhopāyo hi saptānāṁ]
AHS6.39.003a/ pūrve vayasi madhye vā tat prayojyaṁ jitātmanaḥ |
AHS6.39.003c/ snigdhasya sruta.raktasya viśuddhasya ca sarva.thā || 3 ||
AHS6.39.004a/ a.viśuddhe śarīre hi yukto rāsāyano vidhiḥ |
AHS6.39.004c/ vājī.karo vā maline vastre raṅga ivā.phalaḥ || 4 || [Note: AHS6.39.004v/ 39.4dv vastre rāga ivā.phalaḥ]
AHS6.39.005a/ rasāyanānāṁ dvi.vidhaṁ prayogam ṛṣayo viduḥ |
AHS6.39.005c/ kuṭī.prāveśikaṁ mukhyaṁ vātātapikam anya.thā || 5 ||
AHS6.39.006a/ pure prāpyopakaraṇe harmya.nir.vāta.nir.bhaye |
AHS6.39.006c/ diśy udīcyāṁ śubhe deśe tri.garbhāṁ sūkṣma.locanām || 6 || [Note: AHS6.39.006v/ 39.6av nir.vāte nir.bhaye dharmye 39.6av nir.vāte nir.bhaye harmye 39.6bv prāpyopakaraṇe pure 39.6cv diśy aiśānyāṁ śubhe deśe]
AHS6.39.007a/ dhūmātapa.rajo.vyāla.strī.mūrkhādya.vilaṅghitām |
AHS6.39.007c/ sajja.vaidyopakaraṇāṁ su.mṛṣṭāṁ kārayet kuṭīm || 7 ||
AHS6.39.008a/ atha puṇye 'hni sampūjya pūjyāṁs tāṁ praviśec chuciḥ |
AHS6.39.008c/ tatra saṁśodhanaiḥ śuddhaḥ sukhī jāta.balaḥ punaḥ || 8 ||
[Page 747 ]
AHS6.39.009a/ brahma.cārī dhṛti.yutaḥ śrad.dadhāno jitendriyaḥ |
AHS6.39.009c/ dāna.śīla.dayā.satya.vrata.dharma.parāyaṇaḥ || 9 ||
AHS6.39.010a/ devatānusmṛtau yukto yukta.svapna.prajāgaraḥ |
AHS6.39.010c/ priyauṣadhaḥ peśala.vāg ārabheta rasāyanam || 10 || [Note: AHS6.39.010v/ 39.10cv priyauṣadhaḥ peśala.vāk 39.10dv prārabheta rasāyanam]
AHS6.39.011a/ harītakīm āmalakaṁ saindhavaṁ nāgaraṁ vacām |
AHS6.39.011c/ haridrāṁ pippalīṁ vellaṁ guḍaṁ coṣṇāmbunā pibet || 11 ||
AHS6.39.012a/ snigdha.svinno naraḥ pūrvaṁ tena sādhu viricyate |
AHS6.39.012c/ tataḥ śuddha.śarīrāya kṛta.saṁsarjanāya ca || 12 || [Note: AHS6.39.012v/ 39.12av snigdhaḥ svinno naraḥ pūrvaṁ 39.12bv tena sādhu viśudhyati]
AHS6.39.013a/ tri.rātraṁ pañca.rātraṁ vā saptāhaṁ vā ghṛtānvitam |
AHS6.39.013c/ dadyād yāvakam ā.śuddheḥ purāṇa.śakṛto 'tha.vā || 13 ||
AHS6.39.014a/ itthaṁ saṁskṛta.koṣṭhasya rasāyanam upāharet |
AHS6.39.014c/ yasya yad yaugikaṁ paśyet sarvam ālocya sātmya.vit || 14 ||
AHS6.39.015a/ pathyā.sahasraṁ tri.guṇa.dhātrī.phala.samanvitam |
AHS6.39.015c/ pañcānāṁ pañca.mūlānāṁ sārdhaṁ pala.śata.dvayam || 15 ||
AHS6.39.016a/ jale daśa.guṇe paktvā daśa.bhāga.sthite rase |
AHS6.39.016c/ āpothya kṛtvā vy.asthīni vijayāmalakāny atha || 16 ||
AHS6.39.017a/ vinīya tasmin niryūhe yojayet kuḍavāṁśakam |
AHS6.39.017c/ tvag.elā.musta.rajanī.pippaly.aguru.candanam || 17 ||
AHS6.39.018a/ maṇḍūkaparṇī.kanaka.śaṅkhapuṣpī.vacā.plavam |
AHS6.39.018c/ yaṣṭy.āhvayaṁ viḍaṅgaṁ ca cūrṇitaṁ tulayādhikam || 18 ||
[Page 748 ]
AHS6.39.019a/ sitopalārdha.bhāraṁ ca pātrāṇi trīṇi sarpiṣaḥ |
AHS6.39.019c/ dve ca tailāt pacet sarvaṁ tad agnau leha.tāṁ gatam || 19 ||
AHS6.39.020a/ avatīrṇaṁ himaṁ yuñjyād viṁśaiḥ kṣaudra.śatais tribhiḥ |
AHS6.39.020c/ tataḥ khajena mathitaṁ nidadhyād ghṛta.bhājane || 20 ||
AHS6.39.021a/ yā noparundhyād āhāram ekaṁ mātrāsya sā smṛtā |
AHS6.39.021c/ ṣaṣṭikaḥ payasā cātra jīrṇe bhojanam iṣyate || 21 || [Note: AHS6.39.021v/ 39.21bv ekā mātrāsya sā smṛtā]
AHS6.39.022a/ vaikhānasā bālakhilyās tathā cānye tapo.dhanāḥ |
AHS6.39.022c/ brahmaṇā vihitaṁ dhanyam idaṁ prāśya rasāyanam || 22 || [Note: AHS6.39.022v/ 39.22av vaikhānasā bālikhilyās]
AHS6.39.023a/ tandrā.śrama.klama.valī.palitāmaya.varjitāḥ |
AHS6.39.023c/ medhā.smṛti.balopetā babhūvur a.mitāyuṣaḥ || 23 ||
AHS6.39.024a/ abhayāmalaka.sahasraṁ nir.āmayaṁ pippalī.sahasra.yutam |
AHS6.39.024c/ taruṇa.palāśa.kṣāra.dravī.kṛtaṁ sthāpayed bhāṇḍe || 24 ||
AHS6.39.025a/ upayukte ca kṣāre chāyā.saṁśuṣka.cūrṇitaṁ yojyam |
AHS6.39.025c/ pādāṁśena sitāyāś catur.guṇābhyāṁ madhu.ghṛtābhyām || 25 || [Note: AHS6.39.025v/ 39.25av upayukte ca kvāthe]
AHS6.39.026a/ tad ghṛta.kumbhe bhūmau nidhāya ṣaṇ.māsa.saṁstham uddhṛtya |
AHS6.39.026c/ prāhṇe prāśya yathānalam ucitāhāro bhavet satatam || 26 || [Note: AHS6.39.026v/ 39.26bv nikhāya ṣaṇ.māsa.saṁstham uddhṛtya 39.26cv prāhṇe prāśya yathā.balam]
AHS6.39.027a/ ity upayuñjyā.śeṣaṁ varṣa.śatam an.āmayo jarā.rahitaḥ |
AHS6.39.027c/ jīvati bala.puṣṭi.vapuḥ.smṛti.medhādy.anvito viśeṣeṇa || 27 || [Note: AHS6.39.027v/ 39.27av ity upayojyā.śeṣaṁ]
AHS6.39.028a/ nī.rujārdra.palāśasya cchinne śirasi tat kṣatam |
AHS6.39.028c/ antar dvi.hastaṁ gambhīraṁ pūryam āmalakair navaiḥ || 28 || [Note: AHS6.39.028v/ 39.28bv cchinne śirasi takṣitam]
[Page 749 ]
AHS6.39.029a/ ā.mūlaṁ veṣṭitaṁ darbhaiḥ padminī.paṅka.lepitam |
AHS6.39.029c/ ādīpya go.mayair vanyair nir.vāte svedayet tataḥ || 29 ||
AHS6.39.030a/ svinnāni tāny āmalakāni tṛptyā khāden naraḥ kṣaudra.ghṛtānvitāni |
AHS6.39.030c/ kṣīraṁ śṛtaṁ cānu pibet pra.kāmaṁ tenaiva varteta ca māsam ekam || 30 ||
AHS6.39.031a/ varjyāni varjyāni ca tatra yatnāt spṛśyaṁ ca śītāmbu na pāṇināpi |
AHS6.39.031c/ ekā.daśāhe 'sya tato vyatīte patanti keśā daśanā nakhāś ca || 31 || [Note: AHS6.39.031v/ 39.31bv spṛśen na śītāmbu ca pāṇināpi]
AHS6.39.032a/ athālpakair eva dinaiḥ su.rūpaḥ strīṣv a.kṣayaḥ kuñjara.tulya.vīryaḥ |
AHS6.39.032c/ viśiṣṭa.medhā.bala.buddhi.sat.tvo bhavaty asau varṣa.sahasra.jīvī || 32 ||
AHS6.39.033a/ daśa.mūla.balā.musta.jīvakarṣabhakotpalam |
AHS6.39.033c/ parṇinyau pippalī śṛṅgī medā tāmalakī truṭī || 33 ||
AHS6.39.034a/ jīvantī joṅgakaṁ drākṣā pauṣkaraṁ candanaṁ śaṭhī |
AHS6.39.034c/ punarnavarddhi.kākolī.kākanāsāmṛtā.dvayam || 34 || [Note: AHS6.39.034v/ 39.34cv punarnavā.dvi.kākolī. 39.34dv .kākanāsāmṛtāhvayāḥ]
AHS6.39.035a/ vidārī vṛṣa.mūlaṁ ca tad aikadhyaṁ palonmitam |
AHS6.39.035c/ jala.droṇe pacet pañca dhātrī.phala.śatāni ca || 35 ||
AHS6.39.036a/ pāda.śeṣaṁ rasaṁ tasmād vy.asthīny āmalakāni ca |
AHS6.39.036c/ gṛhītvā bharjayet taila.ghṛtād dvā.daśabhiḥ palaiḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS6.39.036v/ 39.36av pāda.śeṣe rase tasmin]
AHS6.39.037a/ matsyaṇḍikā.tulārdhena yuktaṁ tal leha.vat pacet |
AHS6.39.037c/ snehārdhaṁ madhu siddhe tu tavakṣīryāś catuḥ.palam || 37 || [Note: AHS6.39.037v/ 39.37cv snehārdhaṁ madhunaḥ śīte]
AHS6.39.038a/ pippalyā dvi.palaṁ dadyāc catur.jātaṁ kaṇārdhitam |
AHS6.39.038c/ ato 'valehayen mātrāṁ kuṭī.sthaḥ pathya.bhojanaḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS6.39.038v/ 39.38bv catur.jātaṁ kaṇārdhikam 39.38bv catur.jātaṁ kaṇārdhakam 39.38dv kuṭī.sthaṁ pathya.bhojinam]
[Page 750 ]
AHS6.39.039a/ ity eṣa cyavana.prāśo yaṁ prāśya cyavano muniḥ |
AHS6.39.039c/ jarā.jarjarito 'py āsīn nārī.nayana.nandanaḥ || 39 ||
AHS6.39.040a/ kāsaṁ śvāsaṁ jvaraṁ śoṣaṁ hṛd.rogaṁ vāta.śoṇitam |
AHS6.39.040c/ mūtra.śukrāśrayān doṣān vaisvaryaṁ ca vyapohati || 40 ||
AHS6.39.041a/ bāla.vṛddha.kṣata.kṣīṇa.kṛśānām aṅga.vardhanaḥ || 41ab ||
AHS6.39.041c/ medhāṁ smṛtiṁ kāntim an.āmaya.tvam āyuḥ.prakarṣaṁ pavanānulomyam || 41cd ||
AHS6.39.041e/ strīṣu praharṣaṁ balam indriyāṇām agneś ca kuryād vidhinopayuktaḥ || 41ef ||
AHS6.39.042a/ madhukena tavakṣīryā pippalyā sindhu.janmanā |
AHS6.39.042c/ pṛthag lohaiḥ suvarṇena vacayā madhu.sarpiṣā || 42 ||
AHS6.39.043a/ sitayā vā samā yuktā samāyuktā rasāyanam |
AHS6.39.043c/ tri.phalā sarva.roga.ghnī medhāyuḥ.smṛti.buddhi.dā || 43 || [Note: AHS6.39.043v/ 39.43av sitayātha samāyuktā 39.43bv raupya.yuktā rasāyanī]
AHS6.39.044a/ maṇḍūkaparṇyāḥ sva.rasaṁ yathāgni kṣīreṇa yaṣṭīmadhukasya cūrṇam |
AHS6.39.044c/ rasaṁ guḍūcyās saha.mūla.puṣpyāḥ kalkaṁ prayuñjīta ca śaṅkhapuṣpyāḥ || 44 ||
AHS6.39.045a/ āyuḥ.pradāny āmaya.nāśanāni balāgni.varṇa.svara.vardhanāni |
AHS6.39.045c/ medhyāni caitāni rasāyanāni medhyā viśeṣeṇa tu śaṅkhapuṣpī || 45 || [Note: AHS6.39.045v/ 39.45dv medhyā viśeṣeṇa ca śaṅkhapuṣpī]
AHS6.39.046a/ naladaṁ kaṭu.rohiṇī payasyā madhukaṁ candana.śārivogragandhāḥ |
AHS6.39.046c/ tri.phalā kaṭuka.trayaṁ haridre sa.paṭolaṁ lavaṇaṁ ca taiḥ su.piṣṭaiḥ || 46 ||
AHS6.39.047a/ tri.guṇena rasena śaṅkhapuṣpyāḥ sa.payaskaṁ ghṛta.nalvaṇaṁ vipakvam |
AHS6.39.047c/ upayujya bhavej jaḍo 'pi vāṅmī śruta.dhārī pratibhāna.vān a.rogaḥ || 47 || [Note: AHS6.39.047v/ 39.47dv śruti.dhārī pratibhāna.vān a.rogaḥ 39.47dv śruti.dhārī pratibhāna.vān a.rogī]
AHS6.39.048a/ peṣyair mṛṇāla.bisa.kesara.pattra.bījaiḥ siddhaṁ sa.hema.śakalaṁ payasā ca sarpiḥ |
AHS6.39.048c/ pañcāravindam iti tat prathitaṁ pṛthivyāṁ prabhraṣṭa.pauruṣa.bala.pratibhair niṣevyam || 48 || [Note: AHS6.39.048v/ 39.48cv pañcāravindam iti sarpir udāra.vīryaṁ]
[Page 751 ]
AHS6.39.049a/ yan nāla.kanda.dala.kesara.vad vipakvaṁ nīlotpalasya tad api prathitaṁ dvitīyam |
AHS6.39.049c/ sarpiś catuṣ.kuvalayaṁ sa.hiraṇya.pattraṁ medhyaṁ gavām api bhavet kim u mānuṣāṇām || 49 ||
AHS6.39.050a/ brāhmī.vacā.saindhava.śaṅkhapuṣpī.matsyākṣaka.brahmasuvarcalaindryaḥ |
AHS6.39.050c/ vaidehikā ca tri.yavāḥ pṛthak syur yavau suvarṇasya tilo viṣasya || 50 ||
AHS6.39.051a/ sarpiṣaś ca palam ekata etad yojayet pariṇate ca ghṛtāḍhyam |
AHS6.39.051c/ bhojanaṁ sa.madhu vatsaram evaṁ śīlayann adhika.dhī.smṛti.medhaḥ || 51 || [Note: AHS6.39.051v/ 39.51dv śīlayann adhika.dhī.smṛti.veṣaḥ]
AHS6.39.052a/ atikrānta.jarā.vyādhi.tandrālasya.śrama.klamaḥ |
AHS6.39.052c/ jīvaty abda.śataṁ pūrṇaṁ śrī.tejaḥ.kānti.dīpti.mān || 52 || [Note: AHS6.39.052v/ 39.52dv śrī.tejaḥ.kānti.mūrti.mān]
AHS6.39.053a/ viśeṣataḥ kuṣṭha.kilāsa.gulma.viṣa.jvaronmāda.garodarāṇi |
AHS6.39.053c/ atharva.mantrādi.kṛtāś ca kṛtyāḥ śāmyanty anenāti.balāś ca vātāḥ || 53 ||
AHS6.39.054a/ śaran.mukhe nāgabalāṁ puṣya.yoge samuddharet |
AHS6.39.054c/ akṣa.mātraṁ tato mūlāc cūrṇitāt payasā pibet || 54 || [Note: AHS6.39.054v/ 39.54cv akṣa.mātraṁ tato mūlaṁ 39.54dv cūrṇitaṁ payasā pibet]
AHS6.39.055a/ lihyān madhu.ghṛtābhyāṁ vā kṣīra.vṛttir an.anna.bhuk |
AHS6.39.055c/ evaṁ varṣa.prayogena jīved varṣa.śataṁ balī || 55 ||
AHS6.39.056a/ phalon.mukho gokṣurakaḥ sa.mūlaś chāyā.viśuṣkaḥ su.vicūrṇitāṅgaḥ |
AHS6.39.056c/ su.bhāvitaḥ svena rasena tasmān mātrāṁ parāṁ prāsṛtikīṁ pibed yaḥ || 56 || [Note: AHS6.39.056v/ 39.56dv mātrāṁ paraṁ prāsṛtikīṁ pibed yaḥ]
AHS6.39.057a/ kṣīreṇa tenaiva ca śālim aśnan jīrṇe bhavet sa dvi.tulopayogāt |
AHS6.39.057c/ śaktaḥ su.rūpaḥ su.bhagaḥ śatāyuḥ kāmī kakud.mān iva go.kula.sthaḥ || 57 ||
AHS6.39.058a/ vārāhī.kandam ārdrārdraṁ kṣīreṇa kṣīra.paḥ pibet |
AHS6.39.058c/ māsaṁ nir.anno māsaṁ ca kṣīrānnādo jarāṁ jayet || 58 ||
[Page 752 ]
AHS6.39.059a/ tat.kanda.ślakṣṇa.cūrṇaṁ vā sva.rasena su.bhāvitam |
AHS6.39.059c/ ghṛta.kṣaudra.plutaṁ lihyāt tat.pakvaṁ vā ghṛtaṁ pibet || 59 || [Note: AHS6.39.059v/ 39.59cv ghṛta.kṣaudra.yutaṁ lihyāt]
AHS6.39.060a/ tad.vad vidāry.atibalā.balā.madhuka.vāyasīḥ |
AHS6.39.060c/ śreyasī.śreyasī.yuktā.pathyā.dhātrī.sthirāmṛtāḥ || 60 || [Note: AHS6.39.060v/ 39.60cv jīvantī.śreyasī.yuktā.]
AHS6.39.061a/ maṇḍūkī.śaṅkhakusumā.vājigandhā.śatāvarīḥ |
AHS6.39.061c/ upayuñjīta medhā.dhī.vayaḥ.sthairya.bala.pradāḥ || 61 || [Note: AHS6.39.061v/ 39.61cv upayuñjīta dhī.medhā. 39.61cv upayuñjīta medhāvī 39.61dv vayaḥ.sthairya.bala.pradāḥ]
AHS6.39.062a/ yathā.svaṁ citrakaḥ puṣpair jñeyaḥ pīta.sitāsitaiḥ |
AHS6.39.062c/ yathottaraṁ sa guṇa.vān vidhinā ca rasāyanam || 62 ||
AHS6.39.063a/ chāyā.śuṣkaṁ tato mūlaṁ māsaṁ cūrṇī.kṛtaṁ lihan |
AHS6.39.063c/ sarpiṣā madhu.sarpirbhyāṁ piban vā payasā yatiḥ || 63 ||
AHS6.39.064a/ ambhasā vā hitānnāśī śataṁ jīvati nī.rujaḥ |
AHS6.39.064c/ medhāvī bala.vān kānto vapuṣ.mān dīpta.pāvakaḥ || 64 ||
AHS6.39.065a/ tailena līḍho māsena vātān hanti su.dus.tarān |
AHS6.39.065c/ mūtreṇa śvitra.kuṣṭhāni pītas takreṇa pāyu.jān || 65 || [Note: AHS6.39.065v/ 39.65bv vātān hanti su.dāruṇān]
AHS6.39.066a/ bhallātakāni puṣṭāni dhānya.rāśau nidhāpayet |
AHS6.39.066c/ grīṣme saṅgṛhya hemante svādu.snigdha.himair vapuḥ || 66 || [Note: AHS6.39.066v/ 39.66dv svādu.snigdha.himaiḥ punaḥ]
AHS6.39.067a/ saṁskṛtya tāny aṣṭa.guṇe salile 'ṣṭau vipācayet |
AHS6.39.067c/ aṣṭāṁśa.śiṣṭaṁ tat.kvāthaṁ sa.kṣīraṁ śītalaṁ pibet || 67 || [Note: AHS6.39.067v/ 39.67cv aṣṭāṁśa.śiṣṭaṁ taṁ kvāthaṁ]
AHS6.39.068a/ vardhayet praty.ahaṁ cānu tatraikaikam aruṣkaram |
AHS6.39.068c/ sapta.rātra.trayaṁ yāvat trīṇi trīṇi tataḥ param || 68 ||
[Page 753 ]
AHS6.39.069a/ ā.catvāriṁśatas tāni hrāsayed vṛddhi.vat tataḥ |
AHS6.39.069c/ sahasram upayuñjīta saptāhair iti saptabhiḥ || 69 || [Note: AHS6.39.069v/ 39.69dv saptāhair api saptabhiḥ]
AHS6.39.070a/ yantritātmā ghṛta.kṣīra.śāli.ṣaṣṭika.bhojanaḥ |
AHS6.39.070c/ tad.vat tri.guṇitaṁ kālaṁ prayogānte 'pi cācaret || 70 || [Note: AHS6.39.070v/ 39.70dv prayogānte 'py upācaret]
AHS6.39.071a/ āśiṣo labhate '.pūrvā vahner dīptiṁ viśeṣataḥ |
AHS6.39.071c/ prameha.kṛmi.kuṣṭhārśo.medo.doṣa.vivarjitaḥ || 71 || [Note: AHS6.39.071v/ 39.71av āśiṣo labhate pūrvā]
AHS6.39.072a/ piṣṭa.svedanam a.rujaiḥ pūrṇaṁ bhallātakair vijarjaritaiḥ |
AHS6.39.072c/ bhūmi.nikhāte kumbhe pratiṣṭhitaṁ kṛṣṇa.mṛl.liptam || 72 || [Note: AHS6.39.072v/ 39.72bv pūrṇaṁ bhallātakaiḥ su.jarjaritaiḥ]
AHS6.39.073a/ parivāritaṁ samantāt pacet tato go.mayāgninā mṛdunā |
AHS6.39.073c/ tat.sva.raso yaś cyavate gṛhṇīyāt taṁ dine 'nyasmin || 73 || [Note: AHS6.39.073v/ 39.73bv pacet tad go.mayāgninā mṛdunā]
AHS6.39.074a/ amum upayujya sva.rasaṁ madhv.aṣṭama.bhāgikaṁ dvi.guṇa.sarpiḥ |
AHS6.39.074c/ pūrva.vidhi.yantritātmā prāpnoti guṇān sa tān eva || 74 || [Note: AHS6.39.074v/ 39.74av amum upayuñjyāt sva.rasaṁ]
AHS6.39.075a/ puṣṭāni pākena paricyutāni bhallātakāny āḍhaka.sammitāni |
AHS6.39.075c/ ghṛṣṭveṣṭikā.cūrṇa.kaṇair jalena prakṣālya saṁśoṣya ca mārutena || 75 ||
AHS6.39.076a/ jarjarāṇi vipacej jala.kumbhe pāda.śeṣa.ghṛta.gālita.śītam |
AHS6.39.076c/ tad.rasaṁ punar api śrapayeta kṣīra.kumbha.sahitaṁ caraṇa.sthe || 76 || [Note: AHS6.39.076v/ 39.76bv pāda.śeṣa.ghṛta.gālita.śeṣam 39.76bv pāda.śeṣa.ghṛta.gālita.śīte 39.76bv pāda.śeṣam avatārita.śītam 39.76cv taṁ rasaṁ punar api śrapayeta 39.76dv kṣīra.kumbha.sahitaṁ caraṇa.stham]
AHS6.39.077a/ sarpiḥ pakvaṁ tatra tulya.pramāṇaṁ yuñjyāt svecchaṁ śarkarayā rajobhiḥ |
AHS6.39.077c/ ekī.bhūtaṁ tat khaja.kṣobhaṇena sthāpyaṁ dhānye sapta.rātraṁ su.guptam || 77 || [Note: AHS6.39.077v/ 39.77av sarpiḥ pakvaṁ tena tulya.pramāṇaṁ 39.77bv yuñjyāt prasthaṁ śarkarayā rajobhiḥ 39.77bv yuñjyāt svacchaṁ śarkarayā rajobhiḥ 39.77cv ekī.bhūtaṁ taṁ khaja.kṣobhaṇena]
AHS6.39.078a/ tam amṛta.rasa.pākaṁ yaḥ prage prāśam aśnann anupibati yatheṣṭaṁ vāri dugdhaṁ rasaṁ vā |
AHS6.39.078c/ smṛti.mati.bala.medhā.sat.tva.sārair upetaḥ kanaka.nicaya.gauraḥ so 'śnute dīrgham āyuḥ || 78 ||
[Page 754 ]
AHS6.39.079a/ droṇe 'mbhaso vraṇakṛtāṁ tri.śatād vipakvāt kvāthāḍhake pala.samais tila.taila.pātram |
AHS6.39.079c/ tiktā.viṣā.dvaya.varā.girijanma.tārkṣyaiḥ siddhaṁ paraṁ nikhila.kuṣṭha.nibarhaṇāya || 79 || [Note: AHS6.39.079v/ 39.79av droṇe 'mbhaso vraṇakṛtāṁ tri.śatāni paktvā 39.79cv tiktā.niśā.dvaya.vacā.girijanma.tārkṣyaiḥ 39.79cv tiktā.niśā.dvaya.varā.girijanma.tārkṣyaiḥ 39.79cv tiktā.viṣā.dvaya.vacā.girijanma.tārkṣyaiḥ 39.79cv tiktā.viṣā.dvaya.varā.girijāta.tārkṣyaiḥ]
AHS6.39.080a/ sahāmalaka.śuktibhir dadhi.sareṇa tailena vā || 80a ||
AHS6.39.080b/ guḍena payasā ghṛtena yava.saktubhir vā saha || 80b ||
AHS6.39.080c/ tilena saha mākṣikeṇa palalena sūpena vā || 80c ||
AHS6.39.080d/ vapuṣ.karam aruṣkaraṃ parama.medhyam āyuṣ.karam || 80d ||
AHS6.39.081a/ bhallātakāni tīkṣṇāni pākīny agni.samāni ca |

AHS6.39.082a/ kapha.jo na sa rogo 'sti na vibandho 'sti kaś.ca.na |

AHS6.39.083a/ vātātapa.vidhāne 'pi viśeṣeṇa vivarjayet |

AHS6.39.084a/ vṛkṣās tubarakā nāma paścimārṇava.tīra.jāḥ |

AHS6.39.086a/ tila.vat pīḍayed droṇyāṁ kvāthayed vā kusumbha.vat |
AHS6.39.086c/ tat.tailaṁ sambhṛtaṁ bhūyaḥ paced ā.salila.kṣayāt || 86 || [Note: AHS6.39.086v/ 39.86cv tat.tailaṁ sa.ghṛtaṁ bhūyaḥ 39.86cv tat.tailaṁ saṁsṛtaṁ bhūyaḥ 39.86cv tat.tailaṁ saṁhṛtaṁ bhūyaḥ]
AHS6.39.087a/ avatārya karīṣe ca pakṣa.mātraṁ nidhāpayet |

AHS6.39.088a/ caturtha.bhaktāntaritaḥ prātaḥ pāṇi.talaṁ pibet |
AHS6.39.088c/ mantreṇānena pūtasya tailasya divase śubhe || 88 ||
[Page 755 ]
AHS6.39.089a/ majja.sāra mahā.vīrya sarvān dhātūn viśodhaya |
AHS6.39.089c/ śaṅkha.cakra.gadā.pāṇis tvām ājñāpayate '.cyutaḥ || 89 || [Note: AHS6.39.089v/ 39.89av majjā.sāra mahā.vīrya 39.89dv tvām ājñāpayate '.cyuta]
AHS6.39.090a/ tenāsyordhvam adhas.tāc ca doṣā yānty a.sakṛt tataḥ |

AHS6.39.091a/ pañcāhāni pibet tailam itthaṁ varjyān vivarjayan |

AHS6.39.093a/ tenābhyakta.śarīraś ca kurvann āhāram īritam |

AHS6.39.097a/ tisras tisras tu pūrvāhṇe bhuktvāgre bhojanasya ca |

AHS6.39.098a/ prayojyā madhu.sammiśrā rasāyana.guṇaiṣiṇā |

AHS6.39.100a/ pippalīnāṁ sahasrasya prayogo 'yaṁ rasāyanam |

AHS6.39.101a/ tad.vac ca cchāga.dugdhena dve sahasre prayojayet |

AHS6.39.102a/ yakṣma.meha.grahaṇy.arśaḥ.pāṇḍu.tva.viṣama.jvarān |

[Page 757 ]
AHS6.39.106a/ kṣīrāñjalibhyāṁ ca rasāyanāni yuktāny amūny āyasa.lepanāni |
AHS6.39.106c/ kurvanti pūrvokta.guṇa.prakarṣam āyuḥ.prakarṣaṁ dvi.guṇaṁ tataś ca || 106 ||
AHS6.39.107a/ asana.khadira.yūṣair bhāvitāṁ somarājīṁ madhu.ghṛta.śikhi.pathyā.loha.cūrṇair upetām |

AHS6.39.108a/ tīvreṇa kuṣṭhena parīta.mūrtir yaḥ somarājīṁ niyamena khādet |
AHS6.39.108c/ saṁvatsaraṁ kṛṣṇa.tila.dvitīyāṁ sa somarājīṁ vapuṣātiśete || 108 ||
AHS6.39.109a/ ye somarājyā vi.tuṣī.kṛtāyāś cūrṇair upetāt payasaḥ su.jātāt |
AHS6.39.109c/ uddhṛtya sāraṁ madhunā lihanti takraṁ tad evānupibanti cānte || 109 ||
AHS6.39.110a/ kuṣṭhinaḥ śīryamāṇāṅgās te jātāṅguli.nāsikāḥ |
AHS6.39.110c/ bhānti vṛkṣā iva punaḥ prarūḍha.nava.pallavāḥ || 110 || [Note: AHS6.39.110v/ 39.110av kuṣṭhinaḥ kuthyamānāṅgās]
AHS6.39.110+(1)a/ śīta.vāta.hima.dagdha.tanūnāṁ stabdha.bhagna.kuṭila.vyathitāsthnām |

AHS6.39.111a/ rāhor amṛta.cauryeṇa lūnād ye patitā galāt |
AHS6.39.111c/ amṛtasya kaṇā bhūmau te laśuna.tvam āgatāḥ || 111 || [Note: AHS6.39.111v/ 39.111av rāhor acyuta.cakreṇa]
AHS6.39.112a/ dvi.jā nāśnanti tam ato daitya.deha.samudbhavam |
AHS6.39.112c/ sākṣād amṛta.sambhūter grāmaṇīḥ sa rasāyanam || 112 ||
AHS6.39.113a/ śīlayel laśunaṁ śīte vasante 'pi kapholbaṇaḥ |
