AHS6.39.114a/ snigdha.śuddha.tanuḥ śīta.madhuropaskṛtāśayaḥ |
AHS6.39.114c/ tad.uttaṁsāvataṁsābhyāṁ carcitānucarājiraḥ || 114 ||
[Page 758 ]
AHS6.39.115a/ tasya kandān vasantānte himavac.chaka.deśa.jān |
AHS6.39.115c/ apanīta.tvaco rātrau timayen madirādibhiḥ || 115 || [Note: AHS6.39.115v/ 39.115cv apanīya tvaco rātrau 39.115dv tīmayen madirādibhiḥ 39.115dv peṣayen madirādibhiḥ]
AHS6.39.116a/ tat.kalka.sva.rasaṁ prātaḥ śuci.tāntava.pīḍitam |
AHS6.39.116c/ madirāyāḥ su.rūḍhāyās tri.bhāgena samanvitam || 116 ||
AHS6.39.117a/ madyasyānyasya takrasya mastunaḥ kāñjikasya vā |
AHS6.39.117c/ tat.kāla eva vā yuktaṁ yuktam ālocya mātrayā || 117 || [Note: AHS6.39.117v/ 39.117av madyasyānyasya tailasya]
AHS6.39.118a/ taila.sarpir.vasā.majja.kṣīra.māṁsa.rasaiḥ pṛthak |
AHS6.39.118c/ kvāthena vā yathā.vyādhi rasaṁ kevalam eva vā || 118 || [Note: AHS6.39.118v/ 39.118bv kṣīra.sarpir.vasā.majja. 39.118bv .dhanva.māṁsa.rasaiḥ pṛthak 39.118bv .dhanva.māṁsaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak]
AHS6.39.119a/ pibed gaṇḍūṣa.mātraṁ prāk kaṇṭha.nālī.viśuddhaye |
AHS6.39.119c/ pratataṁ svedanaṁ cānu vedanāyāṁ praśasyate || 119 || [Note: AHS6.39.119v/ 39.119cv pratataṁ svedanaṁ cātra]
AHS6.39.120a/ śītāmbu.sekaḥ sahasā vami.mūrchāyayor mukhe |
AHS6.39.120c/ śeṣaṁ pibet klamāpāye sthira.tāṁ gata ojasi || 120 ||
AHS6.39.121a/ vidāha.parihārāya paraṁ śītānulepanaḥ |
AHS6.39.121c/ dhārayet sāmbu.kaṇikā muktā.karpūra.mālikāḥ || 121 || [Note: AHS6.39.121v/ 39.121cv dhārayet sāmbu.kaṇikāṁ 39.121dv muktāṁ karpūra.mālikām 39.121dv muktā.karpūra.mālikām]
AHS6.39.122a/ kuḍavo 'sya parā mātrā tad.ardhaṁ kevalasya tu |
AHS6.39.122c/ palaṁ piṣṭasya tan.majjñaḥ sa.bhaktaṁ prāk ca śīlayet || 122 ||
AHS6.39.123a/ jīrṇa.śāly.odanaṁ jīrṇe śaṅkha.kundendu.pāṇḍuram |
AHS6.39.123c/ bhuñjīta yūṣair payasā rasair vā dhanva.cāriṇām || 123 ||
AHS6.39.124a/ madyam ekaṁ pibet tatra tṛṭ.prabandhe jalānvitam |
AHS6.39.124c/ a.madya.pas tv āranālaṁ phalāmbu parisikthakām || 124 || [Note: AHS6.39.124v/ 39.124av madyam ekaṁ pibet tv atra 39.124bv tṛṭ.[pra]vṛddhe jalānvitam 39.124bv tṛḍ.vibandhe jalānvitam 39.124dv phalāmbu parisikthikām 39.124dv phalāmbu parisitthikām 39.124dv phalāmbu parisikthikam 39.124dv phalāmbu.pariṣecitam]
[Page 759 ]
AHS6.39.125a/ tat.kalkaṁ vā sama.ghṛtaṁ ghṛta.pātre khajāhatam |
AHS6.39.125c/ sthitaṁ daśāhād aśnīyāt tad.vad vā vasayā samam || 125 || [Note: AHS6.39.125v/ 39.125dv tad.vad vā payasā samam]
AHS6.39.126a/ vi.kañcuka.prājya.rasona.garbhān sa.śūlya.māṁsān vividhopadaṁśān |
AHS6.39.126c/ nimardakān vā ghṛta.śukta.yuktān pra.kāmam adyāl laghu tuccham aśnan || 126 || [Note: AHS6.39.126v/ 39.126cv vimardakān vā ghṛta.śukta.yuktān 39.126dv pra.kāmam adyāl laghu tuttham aśnan]
AHS6.39.127a/ pitta.rakta.vinirmukta.samastāvaraṇāvṛte |
AHS6.39.127c/ śuddhe vā vidyate vāyau na dravyaṁ laśunāt param || 127 || [Note: AHS6.39.127v/ 39.127av pitta.rakta.vinirmukte 39.127bv samastāvaraṇāvṛte]
AHS6.39.128a/ priyāmbu.guḍa.dugdhasya māṁsa.madyāmla.vidviṣaḥ |
AHS6.39.128c/ a.titikṣor a.jīrṇaṁ ca laśuno vyāpade dhruvam || 128 || [Note: AHS6.39.128v/ 39.128bv māṁsa.madyādi.vidviṣaḥ 39.128cv a.tityakṣor a.jīrṇam ca 39.128cv ati.rūkṣair a.jīrṇe ca]
AHS6.39.129a/ pitta.kopa.bhayād ante yuñjyān mṛdu virecanam |
AHS6.39.129c/ rasāyana.guṇān evaṁ paripūrṇān samaśnute || 129 ||
AHS6.39.130a/ grīṣme 'rka.taptā girayo jatu.tulyaṁ vamanti yat |
AHS6.39.130c/ hemādi.ṣaḍ.dhātu.rasaṁ procyate tac chilā.jatu || 130 ||
AHS6.39.131a/ sarvaṁ ca tikta.kaṭukaṁ nāty.uṣṇaṁ kaṭu pākataḥ |
AHS6.39.131c/ chedanaṁ ca viśeṣeṇa lauhaṁ tatra praśasyate || 131 ||
AHS6.39.132a/ go.mūtra.gandhi kṛṣṇaṁ guggulv.ābhaṁ vi.śarkaraṁ mṛtsnam |
AHS6.39.132c/ snigdham an.amla.kaṣāyaṁ mṛdu guru ca śilā.jatu śreṣṭham || 132 ||
AHS6.39.133a/ vyādhi.vyādhita.sātmyaṁ samanusmaran bhāvayed ayaḥ.pātre |
AHS6.39.133c/ prāk kevala.jala.dhautaṁ śuṣkaṁ kvāthais tato bhāvyam || 133 ||
AHS6.39.134a/ sama.girijam aṣṭa.guṇite niḥkvāthyaṁ bhāvanauṣadhaṁ toye |
AHS6.39.134c/ tan.niryūhe 'ṣṭāṁśe pūtoṣṇe prakṣiped girijam || 134 ||
[Page 760 ]
AHS6.39.135a/ tat sama.rasa.tāṁ yātaṁ saṁśuṣkaṁ prakṣiped rase bhūyaḥ |
AHS6.39.135c/ svaiḥ svair evaṁ kvāthair bhāvyaṁ vārān bhavet sapta || 135 ||
AHS6.39.136a/ atha snigdhasya śuddhasya ghṛtaṁ tiktaka.sādhitam |
AHS6.39.136c/ try.ahaṁ yuñjīta girijam ekaikena tathā try.aham || 136 || [Note: AHS6.39.136v/ 39.136av atha snigdha.viśuddhasya]
AHS6.39.137a/ phala.trayasya yūṣeṇa paṭolyā madhukasya ca |
AHS6.39.137c/ yogaṁ yogyaṁ tatas tasya kālāpekṣaṁ prayojayet || 137 || [Note: AHS6.39.137v/ 39.137cv yoga.yogyaṁ tatas tasya 39.137cv yoge yojyaṁ tatas tasya 39.137dv kālāpekṣaṁ tu yojayet]
AHS6.39.138a/ śilā.jam evaṁ dehasya bhavaty aty.upakārakam |
AHS6.39.138c/ guṇān samagrān kurute sahasā vyāpadaṁ na ca || 138 ||
AHS6.39.139a/ eka.tri.sapta.saptāhaṁ karṣam ardha.palaṁ palam |
AHS6.39.139c/ hīna.madhyottamo yogaḥ śilā.jasya kramān mataḥ || 139 ||
AHS6.39.140a/ saṁskṛtaṁ saṁskṛte dehe prayuktaṁ girijāhvayam |
AHS6.39.140c/ yuktaṁ vyastaiḥ samastair vā tāmrāyo.rūpya.hemabhiḥ || 140 ||
AHS6.39.141a/ kṣīreṇāloḍitaṁ kuryāc chīghraṁ rāsāyanaṁ phalam |
AHS6.39.141c/ kulatthān kākamācīṁ ca kapotāṁś ca sadā tyajet || 141 ||
AHS6.39.142a/ na so 'sti rogo bhuvi sādhya.rūpo jatv aśma.jaṁ yaṁ na jayet prasahya |
AHS6.39.142c/ tat.kāla.yogair vidhi.vat prayuktaṁ svasthasya corjāṁ vipulāṁ dadhāti || 142 || [Note: AHS6.39.142v/ 39.142bv jatv aśma.jaṁ yaṁ na haret prasahya 39.142dv svasthasya corjāṁ vipulāṁ dadāti]
AHS6.39.143a/ kuṭī.praveśaḥ kṣaṇināṁ paricchada.vatāṁ hitaḥ |
AHS6.39.143c/ ato 'nya.thā tu ye teṣāṁ saurya.mārutiko vidhiḥ || 143 || [Note: AHS6.39.143v/ 39.143av kuṭī.praveśaḥ kṣamiṇāṁ 39.143av kuṭī.praveśaḥ kṣīṇānāṁ 39.143dv sūrya.mārutiko vidhiḥ]
AHS6.39.144a/ vātātapa.sahā yogā vakṣyante 'to viśeṣataḥ |
AHS6.39.144c/ sukhopacārā bhraṁśe 'pi ye na dehasya bādhakāḥ || 144 ||
[Page 761 ]
AHS6.39.145a/ śītodakaṁ payaḥ kṣaudraṁ ghṛtam ekaika.śo dvi.śaḥ |
AHS6.39.145c/ tri.śaḥ samastam atha.vā prāk pītaṁ sthāpayed vayaḥ || 145 ||
AHS6.39.146a/ guḍena madhunā śuṇṭhyā kṛṣṇayā lavaṇena vā |
AHS6.39.146c/ dve dve khādan sadā pathye jīved varṣa.śataṁ sukhī || 146 ||
AHS6.39.147a/ harītakīṁ sarpiṣi sampratāpya samaśnatas tat pibato ghṛtaṁ ca |
AHS6.39.147c/ bhavec cira.sthāyi balaṁ śarīre sakṛt kṛtaṁ sādhu yathā kṛta.jñe || 147 || [Note: AHS6.39.147v/ 39.147bv samaśnute cet pibato ghṛtaṁ ca 39.147cv bhavec cira.sthāyi.balaṁ śarīraṁ 39.147dv sakṛt kṛtaṁ sādhu yathā kṛta.jñāḥ]
AHS6.39.148a/ dhātrī.rasa.kṣaudra.sitā.ghṛtāni hitāśanānāṁ lihatāṁ narāṇām |
AHS6.39.148c/ praṇāśam āyānti jarā.vikārā granthā viśālā iva dur.gṛhītāḥ || 148 || [Note: AHS6.39.148v/ 39.148bv hitāśināṁ vai lihatāṁ narāṇām]
AHS6.39.149a/ dhātrī.kṛmighnāsana.sāra.cūrṇaṁ sa.taila.sarpir.madhu.loha.reṇu |
AHS6.39.149c/ niṣevamāṇasya bhaven narasya tāruṇya.lāvaṇyam a.vipraṇaṣṭam || 149 || [Note: AHS6.39.149v/ 39.149dv tāruṇya.lāvaṇyam ati.pratiṣṭham 39.149dv tāruṇya.lāvaṇyam api praṇaṣṭam]
AHS6.39.150a/ lauhaṁ rajo vella.bhavaṁ ca sarpiḥ.kṣaudra.drutaṁ sthāpitam abda.mātram |
AHS6.39.150c/ samudgake bījaka.sāra.k pte lihan balī jīvati kṛṣṇa.keśaḥ || 150 || [Note: AHS6.39.150v/ 39.150av lohaṁ rajo vella.bhavaṁ ca sarpiḥ. 39.150av lohād rajo vella.bhavaṁ ca sarpiḥ. 39.150cv samudgake bījaka.sāra.lipte 39.150cv sāmudgake bījaka.kṣāra.k pte]
AHS6.39.151a/ viḍaṅga.bhallātaka.nāgarāṇi ye 'śnanti sarpir.madhu.saṁyutāni |
AHS6.39.151c/ jarā.nadīṁ roga.taraṅgiṇīṁ te lāvaṇya.yuktāḥ puruṣās taranti || 151 ||
AHS6.39.152a/ khadirāsana.yūṣa.bhāvitāyās tri.phalāyā ghṛta.mākṣika.plutāyāḥ |
AHS6.39.152c/ niyamena narā niṣevitāro yadi jīvanty a.rujaḥ kim atra citram || 152 || [Note: AHS6.39.152v/ 39.152bv tri.phalāyā ghṛta.mākṣikānvitāyāḥ 39.152dv yadi jīvanty a.jarāḥ kim atra citram]
AHS6.39.153a/ bījakasya rasam aṅguli.hāryaṁ śarkarāṁ madhu ghṛtaṁ tri.phalāṁ ca |
AHS6.39.153c/ śīlayatsu puruṣeṣu jarat.tā sv.āgatāpi vinivartata eva || 153 || [Note: AHS6.39.153v/ 39.153bv śarkarā.madhu.ghṛtaṁ tri.phalāṁ ca 39.153bv śarkarā.madhu.yutaṁ tri.phalāṁ ca]
AHS6.39.154a/ punarnavasyārdha.palaṁ navasya piṣṭaṁ pibed yaḥ payasārdha.māsam |
AHS6.39.154c/ māsa.dvayaṁ tat.tri.guṇaṁ samāṁ vā jīrṇo 'pi bhūyaḥ sa punar.navaḥ syāt || 154 ||
[Page 762 ]
AHS6.39.155a/ mūrvā.bṛhaty.aṁśumatī.balānām uśīra.pāṭhāsana.śārivāṇām |
AHS6.39.155c/ kālānusāryāguru.candanānāṁ vadanti paunarnavam eva kalpam || 155 ||
AHS6.39.156a/ śatāvarī.kalka.kaṣāya.siddhaṁ ye sarpir aśnanti sitā.dvitīyam |
AHS6.39.156c/ tāñ jīvitādhvānam abhiprapannān na vipralumpanti vikāra.caurāḥ || 156 ||
AHS6.39.157a/ pītāśvagandhā payasārdha.māsaṁ ghṛtena tailena sukhāmbunā vā |
AHS6.39.157c/ kṛśasya puṣṭiṁ vapuṣo vidhatte bālasya sasyasya yathā su.vṛṣṭiḥ || 157 || [Note: AHS6.39.157v/ 39.157bv ghṛtena tailena su.sūkṣma.piṣṭā 39.157dv bālasya vṛkṣasya yathāmbu.vṛṣṭiḥ]
AHS6.39.158a/ dine dine kṛṣṇa.tila.prakuñcaṁ samaśnatāṁ śīta.jalānu.pānam |
AHS6.39.158c/ poṣaḥ śarīrasya bhavaty an.alpo dṛḍhī.bhavanty ā.maraṇāc ca dantāḥ || 158 || [Note: AHS6.39.158v/ 39.158bv samaśnataḥ śīta.jalānu.pānam]
AHS6.39.159a/ cūrṇaṁ śvadaṁṣṭrāmalakāmṛtānāṁ lihan sa.sarpir madhu.bhāga.miśram |
AHS6.39.159c/ vṛṣaḥ sthiraḥ śānta.vikāra.duḥkhaḥ samāḥ śataṁ jīvati kṛṣṇa.keśaḥ || 159 || [Note: AHS6.39.159v/ 39.159bv lihan sa.sarpir madhunā prayuktam 39.159bv lihan sa.sarpir madhu.bhāga.yuktam]
AHS6.39.160a/ sārdhaṁ tilair āmalakāni kṛṣṇair akṣāṇi saṅkṣudya harītakīr vā |
AHS6.39.160c/ ye 'dyur mayūrā iva te manuṣyā ramyaṁ parīṇāmam avāpnuvanti || 160 ||
AHS6.39.161a/ śilā.jatu.kṣaudra.viḍaṅga.sarpir.lohābhayā.pārada.tāpya.bhakṣaḥ |
AHS6.39.161c/ āpūryate dur.bala.deha.dhātus tri.pañca.rātreṇa yathā śaśāṅkaḥ || 161 ||
AHS6.39.162a/ ye māsam ekaṁ sva.rasaṁ pibanti dine dine bhṛṅgarajaḥ.samuttham |
AHS6.39.162c/ kṣīrāśinas te bala.vīrya.yuktāḥ samāḥ śataṁ jīvitam āpnuvanti || 162 || [Note: AHS6.39.162v/ 39.162dv samā.śataṁ jīvitam āpnuvanti]
AHS6.39.163a/ māsaṁ vacām apy upasevamānāḥ kṣīreṇa tailena ghṛtena vāpi |
AHS6.39.163c/ bhavanti rakṣobhir a.dhṛṣya.rūpā medhāvino nir.mala.mṛṣṭa.vākyāḥ || 163 ||
AHS6.39.164a/ maṇḍūkaparṇīm api bhakṣayanto bhṛṣṭāṁ ghṛte māsam an.anna.bhakṣāḥ |
AHS6.39.164c/ jīvanti kālaṁ vipulaṁ pragalbhās tāruṇya.lāvaṇya.guṇodaya.sthāḥ || 164 || [Note: AHS6.39.164v/ 39.164av maṇḍūkaparṇīṁ paribhakṣayanto 39.164bv bhṛṣṭāṁ ghṛte māsam an.anna.bhakṣyāḥ]
[Page 763 ]
AHS6.39.165a/ lāṅgalī.tri.phalā.loha.pala.pañcāśatā kṛtam |
AHS6.39.165c/ mārkava.sva.rase ṣaṣṭyā guṭikānāṁ śata.trayam || 165 || [Note: AHS6.39.165v/ 39.165bv .pala.pañcāśataḥ kṛtāt 39.165bv .pala.pañcāśatī.kṛtam 39.165cv mārkava.sva.rase piṣṭād 39.165cv mārkava.sva.rase piṣṭvā 39.165dv guṭikānāṁ śata.trayāt]
AHS6.39.166a/ chāyā.viśuṣkaṁ guṭikārdham adyāt pūrvaṁ samastām api tāṁ krameṇa |
AHS6.39.166c/ bhajed viriktaḥ krama.śaś ca maṇḍaṁ peyāṁ vilepīṁ rasakaudanaṁ ca || 166 || [Note: AHS6.39.166v/ 39.166av chāyā.viśuṣkād guṭikārdham adyāt]
AHS6.39.167a/ sarpiḥ.snigdhaṁ māsam ekaṁ yatātmā māsād ūrdhvaṁ sarva.thā svaira.vṛttiḥ |
AHS6.39.167c/ varjyaṁ yatnāt sarva.kālaṁ tv a.jīrṇaṁ varṣeṇaivaṁ yogam evopayuñjyāt || 167 || [Note: AHS6.39.167v/ 39.167bv māsād ūrdhvaṁ sarva.śaḥ svaira.vṛttiḥ 39.167dv varṣeṇaivaṁ yogam evopayuñjya]
AHS6.39.168a/ bhavati vigata.rogo yo 'py a.sādhyāmayārtaḥ prabala.puruṣa.kāraḥ śobhate yo 'pi vṛddhaḥ |
AHS6.39.168c/ upacita.pṛthu.gātra.śrotra.netrādi.yuktas taruṇa iva samānāṁ pañca jīvec chatāni || 168 ||
AHS6.39.169a/ gāyatrī.śikhi.śiṁśipāsana.śivā.vellākṣakāruṣkarān || 169a ||
AHS6.39.169b/ piṣṭvāṣṭā.daśa.saṅguṇe 'mbhasi dhṛtān khaṇḍaiḥ sahāyo.mayaiḥ || 169b ||
AHS6.39.169c/ pātre loha.maye try.ahaṁ ravi.karair āloḍayan pācayed || 169c ||
AHS6.39.169d/ agnau cānu mṛdau sa.loha.śakalaṁ pāda.sthitaṁ tat pacet || 169d || [Note: AHS6.39.169v/ 39.169av gāyatrī.śikhi.śiṁśipāsana.śivā.vellākṣakāruṣkaraṁ 39.169bv piṣṭvāṣṭā.daśa.saṅguṇe 'mbhasi dhṛtān khaṇḍaiḥ sahāyo.malaiḥ 39.169bv piṣṭvāṣṭā.daśa.saṅguṇe 'mbhasi dhṛtaṁ khaṇḍaiḥ sahāyo.mayaiḥ 39.169bv piṣṭvāṣṭau daśa.ṣaḍ.guṇe 'mbhasi dhṛtaṁ khaṇḍaiḥ sahāyo.mayaiḥ 39.169cv pātre loha.kṛte try.ahaṁ ravi.karair āloḍayan pācayed]
AHS6.39.170a/ pūtasyāṁśaḥ kṣīrato 'ṁśas tathāṁśau bhārgān niryāsād dvau varāyās trayo 'ṁśāḥ |
AHS6.39.170c/ aṁśāś catvāraś ceha haiyaṅgavīnād ekī.kṛtyaitat sādhayet kṛṣṇa.lauhe || 170 || [Note: AHS6.39.170v/ 39.170bv bhārgī.niryāsād dvau varāyās trayo 'ṁśāḥ 39.170cv aṁśāś catvāraś caiva haiyaṅgavīnād]
AHS6.39.171a/ vi.mala.khaṇḍa.sitā.madhubhiḥ pṛthag yutam a.yuktam idaṁ yadi vā ghṛtam |
AHS6.39.171c/ sva.ruci.bhojana.pāna.viceṣṭito bhavati nā pala.śaḥ pariśīlayan || 171 || [Note: AHS6.39.171v/ 39.171av vi.malayā sitayā madhunātha.vā 39.171dv bhavati nā pala.śaḥ pariśīlayet]
AHS6.39.172a/ śrī.mān nirdhūta.pāpmā vana.mahiṣa.balo vāji.vegaḥ sthirāṅgaḥ || 172a ||
AHS6.39.172b/ keśair bhṛṅgāṅga.nīlair madhu.surabhi.mukho naika.yoṣin.niṣevī || 172b ||
AHS6.39.172c/ vāṅ.medhā.dhī.samṛddhaḥ su.paṭu.huta.vaho māsa.mātropayogād || 172c ||
AHS6.39.172d/ dhatte 'sau nārasiṁhaṁ vapur anala.śikhā.tapta.cāmīkarābham || 172d || [Note: AHS6.39.172v/ 39.172bv keśair bhṛṅgāti.nīlair madhu.surabhi.mukho naika.yoṣin.niṣevī 39.172cv vāṅ.medhāvī samṛddhaḥ su.paṭu.huta.vaho māsa.mātropayogād]
AHS6.39.173a/ attāraṁ nārasiṁhasya vyādhayo na spṛśanty api |
AHS6.39.173c/ cakrojjvala.bhujaṁ bhītā nārasiṁham ivāsurāḥ || 173 || [Note: AHS6.39.173v/ 39.173cv cakrojjvala.bhujā bhītā]
AHS6.39.174a/ bhṛṅga.pravālān amunaiva bhṛṣṭān ghṛtena yaḥ khādati yantritātmā |
AHS6.39.174c/ viśuddha.koṣṭho 'sana.sāra.siddha.dugdhānupas tat.kṛta.bhojanārthaḥ || 174 ||
[Page 764 ]
AHS6.39.175a/ māsopayogāt sa sukhī jīvaty abda.śata.trayam |
AHS6.39.175c/ gṛhṇāti sakṛd apy uktam a.vilupta.smṛtīndriyaḥ || 175 || [Note: AHS6.39.175v/ 39.175bv jīvaty abda.śata.dvayam]
AHS6.39.176a/ anenaiva ca kalpena yas tailam upayojayet |
AHS6.39.176c/ tān evāpnoti sa guṇān kṛṣṇa.keśaś ca jāyate || 176 ||
AHS6.39.177a/ uktāni śakyāni phalānvitāni yugānurūpāṇi rasāyanāni |
AHS6.39.177c/ mahānuśaṁsāny api cāparāṇi prāpty.ādi.kaṣṭāni na kīrtitāni || 177 || [Note: AHS6.39.177v/ 39.177cv mahānubhāvāny api cāparāṇi 39.177cv mahānuśaṁsyāny api cāparāṇi]
AHS6.39.178a/ rasāyana.vidhi.bhraṁśāj jāyeran vyādhayo yadi |
AHS6.39.178c/ yathā.svam auṣadhaṁ teṣāṁ kāryaṁ muktvā rasāyanam || 178 ||
AHS6.39.179a/ satya.vādinam a.krodham adhy.ātma.pravaṇendriyam |
AHS6.39.179c/ śāntaṁ sad.vṛtta.nirataṁ vidyān nitya.rasāyanam || 179 ||
AHS6.39.180a/ guṇair ebhiḥ samuditaḥ sevate yo rasāyanam |
AHS6.39.180c/ sa nivṛttātmā dīrghāyuḥ para.treha ca modate || 180 || [Note: AHS6.39.180v/ 39.180av guṇair etaiḥ samuditaiḥ 39.180cv sa nirvṛtātmā dīrghāyuḥ]
AHS6.39.181a/ śāstrānusāriṇī caryā citta.jñāḥ pārśva.vartinaḥ |
AHS6.39.181c/ buddhir a.skhalitārtheṣu paripūrṇaṁ rasāyanam || 181 ||

6.40. Chapter 40 :: Atha vājīkaraṇādhyāyaḥ

[Note: [ K edn 574-588]
AHS6.40.001a/ vājī.karaṇam anvicchet satataṁ viṣayī pumān |
AHS6.40.001c/ tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭir apatyaṁ ca guṇa.vat tatra saṁśritam || 1 ||
AHS6.40.002a/ apatya.santāna.karaṁ yat sadyaḥ sampraharṣaṇam |
AHS6.40.002c/ vājīvāti.balo yena yāty a.pratihato 'ṅganāḥ || 2 ||
AHS6.40.003a/ bhavaty ati.priyaḥ strīṇāṁ yena yenopacīyate |
AHS6.40.003c/ tad vājī.karaṇaṁ tad dhi dehasyorjas.karaṁ param || 3 || [Note: AHS6.40.003v/ 40.3dv dehasyaujas.karaṁ param]
[Page 765 ]
AHS6.40.004a/ dharmyaṁ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṁ loka.dvaya.rasāyanam |
AHS6.40.004c/ anumodāmahe brahma.caryam ekānta.nirmalam || 4 || [Note: AHS6.40.004v/ 40.4av dhanyaṁ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṁ 40.4bv loka.dvaya.sukhāvaham 40.4bv loka.dvaya.hitāvaham]
AHS6.40.005a/ alpa.sat.tvasya tu kleśair bādhyamānasya rāgiṇaḥ |
AHS6.40.005c/ śarīra.kṣaya.rakṣārthaṁ vājī.karaṇam ucyate || 5 || [Note: AHS6.40.005v/ 40.5av alpa.sat.tvasya ca kleśair 40.5av alpa.sat.tvasya cotkleśair 40.5bv bādhyamānasya rogiṇaḥ]
AHS6.40.006a/ kalyasyodagra.vayaso vājī.karaṇa.sevinaḥ |
AHS6.40.006c/ sarveṣv ṛtuṣv ahar ahar vyavāyo na nivāryate || 6 || [Note: AHS6.40.006v/ 40.6av kalpasyodagra.vayaso]
AHS6.40.007a/ atha snigdha.viśuddhānāṁ nirūhān sānuvāsanān |
AHS6.40.007c/ ghṛta.taila.rasa.kṣīra.śarkarā.kṣaudra.saṁyutān || 7 ||
AHS6.40.008a/ yoga.vid yojayet pūrvaṁ kṣīra.māṁsa.rasāśinām |
AHS6.40.008c/ tato vājī.karān yogān śukrāpatya.bala.pradān || 8 || [Note: AHS6.40.008v/ 40.8dv śukrāpatya.vivardhanān]
AHS6.40.009a/ a.cchāyaḥ pūti.kusumaḥ phalena rahito drumaḥ |
AHS6.40.009c/ yathaikaś caika.śākhaś ca nir.apatyas tathā naraḥ || 9 ||
AHS6.40.010a/ skhalad.gamanam a.vyakta.vacanaṁ dhūli.dhūsaram |
AHS6.40.010c/ api lālāvila.mukhaṁ hṛdayāhlāda.kārakam || 10 || [Note: AHS6.40.010v/ 40.10dv hṛdayāhlāda.kāriṇam]
AHS6.40.011a/ apatyaṁ tulya.tāṁ kena darśana.sparśanādiṣu |
AHS6.40.011c/ kiṁ punar yad yaśo.dharma.māna.śrī.kula.vardhanam || 11 || [Note: AHS6.40.011v/ 40.11av apatyaṁ tulya.tā kena 40.11cv kiṁ punar yo yaśo.dharma. 40.11dv .māna.śrī.kula.vardhanaḥ 40.11dv .māna.śrī.kula.vardhanāt]
AHS6.40.012a/ śuddha.kāye yathā.śakti vṛṣya.yogān prayojayet |
AHS6.40.012c/ śarekṣu.kuśa.kāśānāṁ vidāryā vīraṇasya ca || 12 || [Note: AHS6.40.012v/ 40.12av śuddhe kāye yathā.śakti]
AHS6.40.013a/ mūlāni kaṇṭakāryāś ca jīvakarṣabhakau balām |
AHS6.40.013c/ mede dve dve ca kākolyau śūrpaparṇyau śatāvarīm || 13 ||
[Page 766 ]
AHS6.40.014a/ aśvagandhām atibalāṁ ātmaguptāṁ punarnavām |
AHS6.40.014c/ vīrāṁ payasyāṁ jīvantīm ṛddhiṁ rāsnāṁ trikaṇṭakam || 14 ||
AHS6.40.015a/ madhukaṁ śāliparṇīṁ ca bhāgāṁs tri.palikān pṛthak |
AHS6.40.015c/ māṣāṇām āḍhakaṁ caitad dvi.droṇe sādhayed apām || 15 ||
AHS6.40.016a/ rasenāḍhaka.śeṣeṇa pacet tena ghṛtāḍhakam |
AHS6.40.016c/ dattvā vidārī.dhātrīkṣu.rasānām āḍhakāḍhakam || 16 ||
AHS6.40.017a/ ghṛtāc catur.guṇaṁ kṣīraṁ peṣyāṇīmāni cāvapet |
AHS6.40.017c/ vīrāṁ svaguptāṁ kākolyau yaṣṭīṁ phalgūni pippalīm || 17 || [Note: AHS6.40.017v/ 40.17dv yaṣṭikaṁ gaja.pippalīm]
AHS6.40.018a/ drākṣāṁ vidārīṁ kharjūraṁ madhukāni śatāvarīm |
AHS6.40.018c/ tat siddha.pūtaṁ cūrṇasya pṛthak prasthena yojayet || 18 ||
AHS6.40.019a/ śarkarāyās tugāyāś ca pippalyāḥ kuḍavena ca |
AHS6.40.019c/ maricasya prakuñcena pṛthag ardha.palonmitaiḥ || 19 ||
AHS6.40.020a/ tvag.elā.kesaraiḥ ślakṣṇaiḥ kṣaudra.dvi.kuḍavena ca |
AHS6.40.020c/ pala.mātraṁ tataḥ khādet praty.ahaṁ rasa.dugdha.bhuk || 20 || [Note: AHS6.40.020v/ 40.20bv kṣaudrād dvi.kuḍavena ca 40.20dv praty.ahaṁ madhu.dugdha.bhuk]
AHS6.40.021a/ tenārohati vājīva kuliṅga iva hṛṣyati |
AHS6.40.021c/ vidārī.pippalī.śāli.priyālekṣurakād rajaḥ || 21 ||
AHS6.40.022a/ pṛthak svaguptā.mūlāc ca kuḍavāṁśaṁ tathā madhu |
AHS6.40.022c/ tulārdhaṁ śarkarā.cūrṇāt prasthārdhaṁ nava.sarpiṣaḥ || 22 ||
AHS6.40.023a/ so 'kṣa.mātram ataḥ khādet yasya rāmā.śataṁ gṛhe |
AHS6.40.023c/ sātmaguptā.phalān kṣīre godhūmān sādhitān himān || 23 || [Note: AHS6.40.023v/ 40.23bv yasya kāntā.śataṁ gṛhe]
[Page 767 ]
AHS6.40.024a/ māṣān vā sa.ghṛta.kṣaudrān khādan gṛṣṭi.payo.'nupaḥ |
AHS6.40.024c/ jāgarti rātriṁ sakalām a.khinnaḥ khedayan striyaḥ || 24 ||
AHS6.40.025a/ bastāṇḍa.siddhe payasi bhāvitān a.sakṛt tilān |
AHS6.40.025c/ yaḥ khādet sa.sitān gacchet sa strī.śatam a.pūrva.vat || 25 || [Note: AHS6.40.025v/ 40.25bv bhāvitān bahu.śas tilān]
AHS6.40.026a/ cūrṇaṁ vidāryā bahu.śaḥ sva.rasenaiva bhāvitam |
AHS6.40.026c/ kṣaudra.sarpir.yutaṁ līḍhvā pramadā.śatam ṛcchati || 26 || [Note: AHS6.40.026v/ 40.26dv pramadā daśa gacchati]
AHS6.40.027a/ kṛṣṇā.dhātrī.phala.rajaḥ sva.rasena su.bhāvitam |
AHS6.40.027c/ śarkarā.madhu.sarpirbhir līḍhvā yo 'nu payaḥ pibet || 27 || [Note: AHS6.40.027v/ 40.27av kṛṣṇa.dhātrī.phala.rajaḥ]
AHS6.40.028a/ sa naro 'śīti.varṣo 'pi yuveva parihṛṣyati |
AHS6.40.028c/ karṣaṁ madhuka.cūrṇasya ghṛta.kṣaudra.samanvitam || 28 || [Note: AHS6.40.028v/ 40.28dv ghṛta.kṣaudra.samāṁśakam]
AHS6.40.029a/ payo.'nu.pānaṁ yo lihyān nitya.vegaḥ sa nā bhavet |
AHS6.40.029c/ kulīraśṛṅgyā yaḥ kalkam āloḍya payasā pibet || 29 ||
AHS6.40.030a/ sitā.ghṛta.payo.'nnāśī sa nārīṣu vṛṣāyate |
AHS6.40.030c/ yaḥ payasyāṁ payaḥ.siddhāṁ khāden madhu.ghṛtānvitām || 30 ||
AHS6.40.031a/ pibed bāṣkayaṇaṁ cānu kṣīraṁ na kṣayam eti saḥ |
AHS6.40.031c/ svayaṅguptekṣurakayor bīja.cūrṇaṁ sa.śarkaram || 31 || [Note: AHS6.40.031v/ 40.31av pibed bāṣkayiṇaṁ cānu]
AHS6.40.032a/ dhāroṣṇena naraḥ pītvā payasā rāsabhāyate |
AHS6.40.032c/ uccaṭā.cūrṇam apy evaṁ śatāvaryāś ca yojayet || 32 ||
AHS6.40.033a/ candra.śubhraṁ dadhi.saraṁ sa.sitā.ṣaṣṭikaudanam |
AHS6.40.033c/ paṭe su.mārjitaṁ bhuktvā vṛddho 'pi taruṇāyate || 33 || [Note: AHS6.40.033v/ 40.33cc paṭe su.bhāvitaṁ bhuktvā]
[Page 768 ]
AHS6.40.034a/ śvadaṁṣṭrekṣura.māṣātmaguptā.bīja.śatāvarīḥ |
AHS6.40.034c/ piban kṣīreṇa jīrṇo 'pi gacchati pramadā.śatam || 34 || [Note: AHS6.40.034v/ 40.34cv pibet kṣīreṇa jīrṇo 'pi]
AHS6.40.035a/ yat kiñ.cin madhuraṁ snigdhaṁ bṛṁhaṇaṁ bala.vardhanam |
AHS6.40.035c/ manaso harṣaṇaṁ yac ca tat sarvaṁ vṛṣyam ucyate || 35 ||
AHS6.40.036a/ dravyair evaṁ.vidhais tasmād darpitaḥ pramadāṁ vrajet |
AHS6.40.036c/ ātma.vegena codīrṇaḥ strī.guṇaiś ca praharṣitaḥ || 36 || [Note: AHS6.40.036v/ 40.36bv bhāvitaḥ pramadāṁ vrajet]
AHS6.40.037a/ sevyāḥ sarvendriya.sukhā dharma.kalpa.drumāṅkurāḥ |
AHS6.40.037c/ viṣayātiśayāḥ pañca śarāḥ kusuma.dhanvanaḥ || 37 || [Note: AHS6.40.037v/ 40.37dv śarāḥ kusuma.dhanvinaḥ]
AHS6.40.038a/ iṣṭā hy ekaika.śo 'py arthā harṣa.prīti.karāḥ param |
AHS6.40.038c/ kiṁ punaḥ strī.śarīre ye saṅghātena pratiṣṭhitāḥ || 38 || [Note: AHS6.40.038v/ 40.38cv kiṁ punaḥ strī.śarīreṣu]
AHS6.40.039a/ nāmāpi yasyā hṛdayotsavāya yāṁ paśyatāṁ tṛptir an.āpta.pūrvā |
AHS6.40.039c/ sarvendriyākarṣaṇa.pāśa.bhūtā kāntānuvṛtti.vrata.dīkṣitā yā || 39 || [Note: AHS6.40.039v/ 40.39bv yāṁ paśyatas tṛptir an.āpta.pūrvā]
AHS6.40.040a/ kalā.vilāsāṅga.vayo.vibhūṣā śuciḥ sa.lajjā rahasi pragalbhā |
AHS6.40.040c/ priyaṁ.vadā tulya.manaḥ.śayā yā sā strī vṛṣya.tvāya paraṁ narasya || 40 || [Note: AHS6.40.040v/ 40.40cv priyaṁ.vadā tulya.manaḥ.sva.bhāvā]
AHS6.40.041a/ ācarec ca sakalāṁ rati.caryāṁ kāma.sūtra.vihitām an.a.vadyām |
AHS6.40.041c/ deśa.kāla.bala.śakty.anurodhād vaidya.tantra.samayokty.a.viruddhām || 41 || [Note: AHS6.40.041v/ 40.41bv kāma.śāstra.vihitām an.a.vadyām]
AHS6.40.042a/ abhyañjanodvartana.seka.gandha.srak.citra.vastrābharaṇa.prakārāḥ |
AHS6.40.042c/ gāndharva.kāvyādi.kathā.pravīṇāḥ sama.sva.bhāvā vaśa.gā vayasyāḥ || 42 || [Note: AHS6.40.042v/ 40.42bv .srag.anna.vastrābharaṇa.prakārāḥ 40.42cv gandharva.kanyādi.kathā.pravīṇāḥ]
AHS6.40.043a/ dīrghikā sva.bhavanānta.niviṣṭā padma.reṇu.madhu.matta.vihaṅgā |
AHS6.40.043c/ nīla.sānu.giri.kūṭa.nitambe kānanāni pura.kaṇṭha.gatāni || 43 || [Note: AHS6.40.043v/ 40.43av dīrghikāḥ sva.bhavanānta.niviṣṭāḥ 40.43bv padma.reṇu.madhu.matta.vihaṅgāḥ 40.43cv nīla.sānu.giri.kūṭa.nitambāḥ]
[Page 769 ]
AHS6.40.044a/ dṛṣṭi.sukhā vividhā taru.jātiḥ śrotra.sukhaḥ kala.kokila.nādaḥ |
AHS6.40.044c/ aṅga.sukhartu.vaśena vibhūṣā citta.sukhaḥ sakalaḥ parivāraḥ || 44 || [Note: AHS6.40.044v/ 40.44bv śrotra.sukhāḥ kala.kokila.nādāḥ 40.44cv aṅga.sukhartu viśeṣa.vibhūṣā]
AHS6.40.045a/ tāmbūlam accha.madirā kāntā kāntā niśā śaśāṅkāṅkā |
AHS6.40.045c/ yad yac ca kiñ.cid iṣṭaṁ manaso vājī.karaṁ tat tat || 45 || [Note: AHS6.40.045v/ 40.45bv kāntāḥ kāntā niśāḥ śaśāṅkāṅkāḥ 40.45dv manaso vājī.karaṁ hi tat]
AHS6.40.046a/ madhu mukham iva sotpalaṁ priyāyāḥ kala.raṇanā parivādinī priyeva |
AHS6.40.046c/ kusuma.caya.mano.ramā ca śayyā kisalayinī latikeva puṣpitāgrā || 46 || [Note: AHS6.40.046v/ 40.46bv kala.raṇanā priya.vādinī priyeva 40.46cv kusuma.caya.mano.harā ca śayyā]
AHS6.40.047a/ deśe śarīre ca na kā.cid artir artheṣu nālpo 'pi mano.vidhānaḥ |
AHS6.40.047c/ vājī.karāḥ sannihitāś ca yogāḥ kāmasya kāmaṁ paripūrayanti || 47 || [Note: AHS6.40.047v/ 40.47av deśe śarīre na kadā.cid artir 40.47bv artheṣu nālpo 'pi mano.'bhighātaḥ]
AHS6.40.048a/ mustā parpaṭakaṁ jvare tṛṣi jalaṁ mṛd.bhṛṣṭa.loṣṭodbhavaṁ || 48a ||
AHS6.40.048b/ lājāś chardiṣu vasti.jeṣu girijaṁ meheṣu dhātrī.niśe || 48b ||
AHS6.40.048c/ pāṇḍau śreṣṭham ayo 'bhayānila.kaphe plīhāmaye pippalī || 48c ||
AHS6.40.048d/ sandhāne kṛmijā viṣe śukatarur medo.'nile gugguluḥ || 48d ||
AHS6.40.049a/ vṛṣo 'sra.pitte kuṭajo 'tisāre bhallātako 'rśaḥsu gareṣu hema |
AHS6.40.049c/ sthūleṣu tārkṣyaṁ kṛmiṣu kṛmighnaṁ śoṣe surā chāga.payo 'tha māṁsam || 49 || [Note: AHS6.40.049v/ 40.49bv bhallātam arśaḥsu gareṣu hema]
AHS6.40.050a/ akṣy.āmayeṣu tri.phalā guḍūcī vātāsra.roge mathitaṁ grahaṇyām |
AHS6.40.050c/ kuṣṭheṣu sevyaḥ khadirasya sāraḥ sarveṣu rogeṣu śilāhvayaṁ ca || 50 ||
AHS6.40.051a/ unmādaṁ ghṛtam a.navaṁ śokaṁ madyaṁ vyapasmṛtiṁ brāhmī |
AHS6.40.051c/ nidrā.nāśaṁ kṣīraṁ jayati rasālā pratiśyāyam || 51 || [Note: AHS6.40.051v/ 40.51bv śokaṁ madyaṁ visaṁsmṛtiṁ brāhmī]
AHS6.40.052a/ māṁsaṁ kārśyaṁ laśunaḥ prabhañjanaṁ stabdha.gātra.tāṁ svedaḥ |
AHS6.40.052c/ guḍamañjaryāḥ khapuro nasyāt skandhāṁsa.bāhu.rujam || 52 || [Note: AHS6.40.052v/ 40.52dv nasyaṁ skandhāṁsa.bāhu.rujam]
AHS6.40.053a/ nava.nīta.khaṇḍa.marditam auṣṭraṁ mūtraṁ payaś ca hanty udaram |
AHS6.40.053c/ nasyaṁ mūrdha.vikārān vidradhim a.cirotthitam asra.visrāvaḥ || 53 || [Note: AHS6.40.053v/ 40.53bv auṣṭrī.mūtraṁ payaś ca hanty udaram 40.53cv nasyaṁ cordhva.vikārān 40.53cv nasyaṁ mūrdhni vikārān]
[Page 770 ]
AHS6.40.054a/ nasyaṁ kavaḍo mukha.jān nasyāñjana.tarpaṇāni netra.rujaḥ |
AHS6.40.054c/ vṛddhasya kṣīra.ghṛte mūrchāṁ śītāmbu.māruta.cchāyāḥ || 54 || [Note: AHS6.40.054v/ 40.54av nasyaṁ kavaḍaṁ mukha.gadān 40.54av nasyaṁ kevalaṁ mukha.gadān 40.54av nasyaṁ kavaḍaṁ mukha.jān]
AHS6.40.055a/ sama.śuktārdraka.mātrā mande vahnau śrame surā snānam |
AHS6.40.055c/ duḥkha.saha.tve sthairye vyāyāmo gokṣurur hitaḥ kṛcchre || 55 || [Note: AHS6.40.055v/ 40.55av sama.śuṣkārdraka.mātrā 40.55bv mande vahnau śrame surā.pānam 40.55cv duḥkha.saha.tvaṁ sthairye 40.55cv duḥkha.saha.tvaṁ sthaulye]
AHS6.40.056a/ kāse nidigdhikā pārśva.śūle puṣkara.jā jaṭā |
AHS6.40.056c/ vayasaḥ sthāpane dhātrī tri.phalā guggulur vraṇe || 56 || [Note: AHS6.40.056v/ 40.56av kāse nidigdhikā.pānaṁ 40.56bv pārśva.śūle ca pauṣkaram 40.56cv vayaḥ.saṁsthāpane dhātrī]
AHS6.40.057a/ vastir vāta.vikārān paittān rekaḥ kaphodbhavān vamanam |
AHS6.40.057c/ kṣaudraṁ jayati balāsaṁ sarpiḥ pittaṁ samīraṇaṁ tailam || 57 ||
AHS6.40.058a/ ity agryaṁ yat proktaṁ rogāṇām auṣadhaṁ śamāyālam |
AHS6.40.058c/ tad deśa.kāla.balato vikalpanīyaṁ yathā.yogam || 58 ||
AHS6.40.059a/ ity ātreyād āgamayyārtha.sūtraṁ tat.sūktānāṁ peśalānām a.tṛptaḥ |
AHS6.40.059c/ bheḍādīnāṁ sammato bhakti.namraḥ papracchedaṁ saṁśayāno 'gniveśaḥ || 59 || [Note: AHS6.40.059v/ 40.59av ity ātreyād āgamād ārtha.sūkṣmaṁ 40.59av ity ātreyād āgamayyārtha.sūkṣmaṁ 40.59bv tat.sūktīnāṁ peśalānām a.tṛptaḥ]
AHS6.40.060a/ dṛśyante bhaga.van ke.cid ātma.vanto 'pi rogiṇaḥ |
AHS6.40.060c/ dravyopasthātṛ.sampannā vṛddha.vaidya.matānugāḥ || 60 ||
AHS6.40.061a/ kṣīyamāṇāmaya.prāṇā viparītās tathā 'pare |
AHS6.40.061c/ hitā.hita.vibhāgasya phalaṁ tasmād a.niścitam || 61 ||
AHS6.40.062a/ kiṁ śāsti śāstram asmin iti kalpayato 'gniveśa.mukhyasya |
AHS6.40.062c/ śiṣya.gaṇasya punarvasur ācakhyau kārtsnyatas tat.tvam || 62 || [Note: AHS6.40.062v/ 40.62dv ācakṣe kārtsnyatas tat.tvam]
AHS6.40.063a/ na cikitsā.cikitsā ca tulyā bhavitum arhati |
AHS6.40.063c/ vināpi kriyayā svāsthyaṁ gacchatāṁ ṣo.ḍaśāṁśayā || 63 ||
[Page 771 ]
AHS6.40.064a/ ātaṅka.paṅka.magnānāṁ hastālambo bhiṣag.jitam |
AHS6.40.064c/ jīvitaṁ mriyamāṇānāṁ sarveṣām eva nauṣadhāt || 64 || [Note: AHS6.40.064v/ 40.64dv sarveṣām eva nauṣadham]
AHS6.40.065a/ na hy upāyam apekṣante sarve rogā na cānya.thā |
AHS6.40.065c/ upāya.sādhyāḥ sidhyanti nā.hetur hetu.mān yataḥ || 65 || [Note: AHS6.40.065v/ 40.65dv no '.hetur hetu.māṁs tataḥ]
AHS6.40.066a/ yad uktaṁ sarva.sampatti.yuktayāpi cikitsayā |
AHS6.40.066c/ mṛtyur bhavati tan naivaṁ nopāye 'sty an.upāya.tā || 66 || [Note: AHS6.40.066v/ 40.66dv nopāyeṣv an.upāya.tā]
AHS6.40.067a/ api copāya.yuktasya dhī.mato jātu cit kriyā |
AHS6.40.067c/ na sidhyed daiva.vaiguṇyān na tv iyaṁ ṣo.ḍaśātmikā || 67 || [Note: AHS6.40.067v/ 40.67av apy evopāya.yuktasya 40.67cv na siddhir daiva.vaiguṇyān 40.67dv na nv iyaṁ ṣo.ḍaśātmikā]
AHS6.40.068a/ kasyā.siddho 'gni.toyādiḥ sveda.stambhādi.karmaṇi |
AHS6.40.068c/ na prīṇanaṁ karṣaṇaṁ vā kasya kṣīraṁ gavedhukam || 68 || [Note: AHS6.40.068v/ 40.68cv na prīṇanaṁ karśanaṁ vā 40.68dv kasya kṣīra.gavedhukam]
AHS6.40.069a/ kasya māṣātmaguptādau vṛṣya.tve nāsti niścayaḥ |
AHS6.40.069c/ viṇ.mūtra.karaṇākṣepau kasya saṁśayitau yave || 69 || [Note: AHS6.40.069v/ 40.69av kasya māṣātmaguptādyair 40.69bv vṛṣa.tve nāsti niścayaḥ]
AHS6.40.070a/ viṣaṁ kasya jarāṁ yāti mantra.tantra.vivarjitam |
AHS6.40.070c/ kaḥ prāptaḥ kalya.tāṁ pathyād ṛte rohiṇikādiṣu || 70 || [Note: AHS6.40.070v/ 40.70cv kaḥ prāptaḥ kalpa.tāṁ pathyād]
AHS6.40.071a/ api cā.kāla.maraṇaṁ sarva.siddhānta.niścitam |
AHS6.40.071c/ mahatāpi prayatnena vāryatāṁ katham anya.thā || 71 ||
AHS6.40.072a/ candanādy api dāhādau rūḍham āgama.pūrvakam |
AHS6.40.072c/ śāstrād eva gataṁ siddhiṁ jvare laṅghana.bṛṁhaṇam || 72 ||
AHS6.40.073a/ catuṣ.pād.guṇa.sampanne samyag ālocya yojite |
AHS6.40.073c/ mā kṛthā vyādhi.nirghātaṁ vicikitsāṁ cikitsite || 73 || [Note: AHS6.40.073v/ 40.73av catuṣ.pād.guṇa.sampūrṇe 40.73cv mā kṛthā vyādhi.nirghāte]
[Page 772 ]
AHS6.40.074a/ etad dhi mṛtyu.pāśānām a.kāṇḍe chedanaṁ dṛḍham |
AHS6.40.074c/ rogottrāsita.bhītānāṁ rakṣā.sūtram a.sūtrakam || 74 ||
AHS6.40.075a/ etat tad amṛtaṁ sākṣāj jagad.āyāsa.varjitam |
AHS6.40.075c/ yāti hālāhala.tvaṁ tu sadyo dur.bhājana.sthitam || 75 || [Note: AHS6.40.075v/ 40.75av etad vedāmṛtaṁ sākṣāj 40.75bv jagaty āyāsa.varjitam 40.75cv yāti hālāhala.tvaṁ ca]
AHS6.40.076a/ a.jñāta.śāstra.sad.bhāvāñ chāstra.mātra.parāyaṇān |
AHS6.40.076c/ tyajed dūrād bhiṣak.pāśān pāśān vaivasvatān iva || 76 || [Note: AHS6.40.076v/ 40.76cv vivarjayed bhiṣak.pāśān]
AHS6.40.077a/ bhiṣajāṁ sādhu.vṛttānāṁ bhadram āgama.śālinām |
AHS6.40.077c/ abhyasta.karmaṇāṁ bhadraṁ bhadraṁ bhadrābhilāṣiṇām || 77 || [Note: AHS6.40.077v/ 40.77bv bahu.dhāgama.śālinām 40.77bv bhadram āgama.śīlinām 40.77cv abhyasta.karmaṇāṁ siddhir]
AHS6.40.078a/ iti tantra.guṇair yuktaṁ tantra.doṣair vivarjitam |
AHS6.40.078c/ cikitsā.śāstram a.khilaṁ vyāpya yat paritaḥ sthitam || 78 || [Note: AHS6.40.078v/ 40.78bv tantra.doṣa.vivarjitam 40.78dv vyāpaṭhya paritaḥ sthitam]
AHS6.40.079a/ vipulā.mala.vijñāna.mahā.muni.matānugam |
AHS6.40.079c/ mahā.sāgara.gambhīra.saṅgrahārthopalakṣaṇam || 79 || [Note: AHS6.40.079v/ 40.79av vipulā.mala.vijñānaṁ 40.79cv mahā.sāgara.gambhīraṁ 40.79cv mahā.muni.matānugam 40.79dv saṅgrahārthopalakṣaṇam 40.79dv saṅgrahārthopalakṣakam]
AHS6.40.080a/ aṣṭāṅga.vaidyaka.mahodadhi.manthanena yo 'ṣṭāṅga.saṅgraha.mahāmṛta.rāśir āptaḥ |
AHS6.40.080c/ tasmād an.alpa.phalam alpa.samudyamānāṁ prīty.artham etad uditaṁ pṛthag eva tantram || 80 || [Note: AHS6.40.080v/ 40.80bv yo 'ṣṭāṅga.saṅgraha.mahāmṛta.sāra.tulyaḥ 40.80dv prīty.artham evam uditaṁ pṛthag eva tantram]
AHS6.40.081a/ idam āgama.siddha.tvāt pratyakṣa.phala.darśanāt |
AHS6.40.081c/ mantra.vat samprayoktavyaṁ na mīmāṁsyaṁ kathañ.ca.na || 81 || [Note: AHS6.40.081v/ 40.81av idam āgama.śuddha.tvāt 40.81dv na mīmāṁsyaṁ kadā.ca.na]
AHS6.40.082a/ dīrgha.jīvitam ārogyaṁ dharmam arthaṁ sukhaṁ yaśaḥ |
AHS6.40.082c/ pāṭhāvabodhānuṣṭhānair adhigacchaty ato dhruvam || 82 || [Note: AHS6.40.082v/ 40.82av dīrghaṁ jīvitam ārogyaṁ]
AHS6.40.083a/ etat paṭhan saṅgraha.bodha.śaktaḥ sv.abhyasta.karmā bhiṣag a.prakampyaḥ |
AHS6.40.083c/ ākampayaty anya.viśāla.tantra.kṛtābhiyogān yadi tan na citram || 83 || [Note: AHS6.40.083v/ 40.83cv yaḥ kampayaty anya.viśāla.tantra.]
[Page 773 ]
AHS6.40.084a/ yadi carakam adhīte tad dhruvaṁ suśrutādi.praṇigadita.gadānāṁ nāma.mātre 'pi bāhyaḥ |
AHS6.40.084c/ atha caraka.vihīnaḥ prakriyāyām a.klinnaḥ kim iva khalu karotu vyādhitānāṁ varākaḥ || 84 || [Note: AHS6.40.084v/ 40.84bv .praṇigadita.gadānāṁ nāma.mātreṇa bāhyaḥ 40.84bv .pratigadita.gadānāṁ nāma.mātre 'pi bāhyaḥ 40.84dv kim iha khalu karotu vyādhitānāṁ varākaḥ]
AHS6.40.085a/ abhiniveśa.vaśād abhiyujyate su.bhaṇite 'pi na yo dṛḍha.mūḍhakaḥ |
AHS6.40.085c/ paṭhatu yatna.paraḥ puruṣāyuṣaṁ sa khalu vaidyakam ādyam a.nirvidaḥ || 85 ||
AHS6.40.086a/ vāte pitte śleṣma.śāntau ca pathyaṁ tailaṁ sarpir mākṣikaṁ ca krameṇa |
AHS6.40.086c/ etad brahmā bhāṣatāṁ brahma.jo vā kā nir.mantre vaktṛ.bhedokti.śaktiḥ || 86 || [Note: AHS6.40.086v/ 40.86cv etad brahmā bhāṣate brahma.jo vā]
AHS6.40.087a/ abhidhātṛ.vaśāt kiṁ vā dravya.śaktir viśiṣyate |
AHS6.40.087c/ ato matsaram utsṛjya mādhyasthyam avalambyatām || 87 || [Note: AHS6.40.087v/ 40.87av abhidhātur vaśāt kiñ.cid]
AHS6.40.088a/ ṛṣi.praṇīte prītiś cen muktvā caraka.suśrutau |
AHS6.40.088c/ bheḍādyāḥ kiṁ na paṭhyante tasmād grāhyaṁ su.bhāṣitam || 88 ||
AHS6.40.089a/ hṛdayam iva hṛdayam etat sarvāyur.veda.vāṅ.maya.payo.dheḥ |
AHS6.40.089c/ kṛtvā yac chubham āptaṁ śubham astu paraṁ tato jagataḥ || 89 ||

Appendix A Appendix A: Bibliographic Notes

Author: Vāgbhaṭa
Editor: R.P. Das and R.E. Emmerick ; R.B. Mahoney
Title: Vāgbhaṭa's Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṃhitā - SARIT transcript
Place: London
Publisher: SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts
Year: 2009
Version: 0.1_003
Subject: Medicine, Ayurvedic -- Early works to 1800
Language: Sanskrit
Citation: Vāgbhaṭa's Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṁhitā - SARIT transcript, Das, R.P. and Emmerick, R.E., compilation and editing, Mahoney, R.B., editing and conversion to TEI markup, (London: SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts, 2009), Id. No. 0001-00000003.
Description: UTF-8 encoded XML file ; approx. 2573000 bytes
Identifier: 0001-00000003
Remarks: The base e-text was: Das, R.P. and Emmerick, R.E., editors, A machine-readable transcription of the Aṣṭāṅgahṛdaya by Vāgbhaṭa, (London: INDOLOGY: Resources for Indological Scholarship, 1997), CSX encoded text file (ah-raw.csx); approx. 1020150 bytes.

The base e-text was subsequently published as: Das, R.P. and Emmerick, R.E., editors, Vāgbhaṭa's Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṃhitā: the romanised text accompanied by line and word indexes, (Groningen: Egbert Forsten, 1998).

The SARIT transcript of the base e-text was correlated with: 1.) Kuṇṭe, Aṇṇā Moreśvara and Navare, Kṛṣṇaśāstrī, editors, Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayam: sūtra-śārīra-nidāna-cikitsā-kalpa-uttarasthānavibhaktam: Aruṇadattapraṇītayā Sarvāṅgasundarākhyayā vyākhyayā samalaṅkṛtam [The Astângahṛidaya: a compendium of the Hindu system of medicine: with the commentary of Aruṇadatta: including sûtra, nidân, chikitsâ, kalpa and uttara], (Mumbayyām: Nirṇaya-sāgara Press, 1902); and 2.) Vogel, Claus, editor, Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṃhitā: the first five chapters of its Tibetan version, edited and rendered into English along with the original Sanskrit, ([Marburg] / Wiesbaden: Deutsche Morgenländische Gesellschaft / Steiner [in Komm.], 1965).
Funder: The British Association for South Asian Studies ; The British Academy
Rights: Copyright (C) 1997 R.P. Das and R.E. Emmerick. All rights reserved. ; Copyright (C) 2009 Dominik Wujastyk. All rights reserved. For more complete details please refer to the Availability Section of the Text Encoding Initiative (TEI) Header.

Appendix B Appendix B: Text Input System

(1)
Sanskrit diacritics are entered using the Unicode Standard Encoding (utf-8):
vowels and diphthongs:
a, ā, i, ī, u, ū, ṛ, ṝ, ḷ, e, ai, o, au
gutturals:
k, kh, g, gh, ṅ
palatals:
c, ch, j, jh, ñ
cerebrals:
ṭ, ṭh, ḍ, ḍh, ṇ
dentals:
t, th, d, dh, n
labials:
p, ph, b, bh, m
semivowels:
y, r, l, v
sibilants:
ś, ṣ, s
aspirate:
h
anusvāra:
ṁ
visarga:
ḥ
avagraha:
'
(2)
Anusvāra is transliterated by:
ṅ
before gutturals
ñ
before palatals
ṇ
before cerebrals
n
before dentals
m
before labials
(3)
Members of a compound are separated by periods.

Appendix C Appendix C: References Declaration

(1)
References to each portion of the Sanskrit text have been placed at the start of each line: e.g., AHS1.9.019a/ refers to Das and Emmerick's edition of the Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṁhitā, Part 1, Chapter 9, Verse 19, Line 1 - Das, R.P. and Emmerick, R.E., op. cit..
(2)
Part and Chapter headings are from: Kuṇṭe, Aṇṇā Moreśvara and Navare, Kṛṣṇaśāstrī, op. cit..
(3)
Page references have been placed in the body of the text at ten verse intervals: e.g., -- 6 -- refers to the SARIT transcript, page 6.
(4)
Page references to Kuṇṭe and Navare's edition of the Sanskrit text have been placed below and to the right of the section headings: e.g., [ K edn 12-18 :: V edn & tr. 82-120 refers to Kuṇṭe and Navare's 1902 edition, pages 12 to 18 - Kuṇṭe, A.M. and Navare, K., op. cit..
(5)
Page references to Vogel's edition and English translation of the Tibetan and Sanskrit text have been placed below and to the right of the section headings: e.g., [ K edn 12-18 :: V edn & tr. 82-120 refers to Vogel's 1965 edition and translation, pages 82 to 120 - Vogel, Claus, op. cit..
